hraSonh al-hqorintim

ioHnn hraSonh
ioHnn hSniih
ioHnn hSliSit
ihodh
ihoSe lpi mti

ihoSe lpi loqm
meSi hSliHim
ihoSe lpi ioHnn
htglot ihoSe

braSit

1

braSit bra alhim at hSmim oat harz : oharz hith tho obho oHSk el pni thom oroH alhim mrHpt el pni hmim : oiamr alhim ihi aor oihi aor : oira alhim at haor ki Tob oibdl alhim bin haor obin hHSk : oiqra alhim laor iom olHSk qra lilh oihi erb oihi bqr iom aHd : oiamr alhim ihi rqie btok hmim oihi mbdil bin mim lmim : oieS alhim at hrqie oibdl bin hmim aSr mtHt lrqie obin hmim aSr mel lrqie oihi kn : oiqra alhim lrqie Smim oihi erb oihi bqr iom Sni : oiamr alhim iqoo hmim mtHt hSmim al mqom aHd otrah hibSh oihi kn : oiqra alhim libSh arz olmqoh hmim qra imim oira alhim ki Tob : oiamr alhim tdSa harz dSa eSb mcrie cre ez pri eSh pri lmino aSr creo bo el harz oihi kn : otoza harz dSa eSb mcrie cre lminho oez eSh pri aSr creo bo lminho oira alhim ki Tob : oihi erb oihi bqr iom SliSi : oiamr alhim ihi mart brqie hSmim lhbdil bin hiom obin hlilh ohio latt olmoedim olimim oSnim : ohio lmaort brqie hSmim lhair el harz oihi kn : oieS alhim at Sni hmart hgdlim at hmaor hgdl lmmSlt hiom oat hmaor hqTn lmmSlt hlilh oat hkokbim : oitn atm alhim brqie hSmim lhair el harz : olmSl biom oblilh olhbdil bin haor obin hHSk oira alhim ki Tob : oihi erb oihi bqr iom rbiei : oiamr alhim iSrzo hmim Srz npS Hih oeop ieopp el harz el pni rqie hSmim : oibra alhim at htninm hgdlim oat kl npS hHih hrmSt aSr Srzo hmim lminhm oat kl eop knp lminho oira alhim ki Tob : oibrk atm alhim lamr pro orbo omlao at hmim bimim oheop irb barz : oihi erb oihi bqr iom HmiSi : oiamr alhim toza harz npS Hih lminh bhmh ormS oHito arz lminh oihi kn : oieS alhim at Hit harz lminh oat hbhmh lminh oat kl rmS hadmh lminho oira alhim ki Tob : oiamr alhim neSh adm bzlmno kdmotno oirdo bdgt him obeop hSmim obbhmh obkl harz obkl hrmS hrmS el harz : oibra alhim at hadm bzlmo bzlm alhim bra ato ckr onqbh bra atm : oibrk atm alhim oiamr lhm alhim pro orbo omlao at harz okbSh ordo bdgt him obeop hSmim obkl Hih hrmSt el harz : oiamr alhim hnh ntti lkm at kl eSb cre cre aSr el pni kl harz oat kl hez aSr bo pri ez cre cre lkm ihih laklh : olkl Hit harz olkl eop hSmim olkl romS el harz aSr bo npS Hih at kl irq eSb laklh oihi kn : oira alhim at kl aSr eSh ohnh Tob mad oihi erb oihi bqr iom hSSi :

2

oiklo hSmim oharz okl zbam : oikl alhim biom hSbiei mlakto aSr eSh oiSbt biom hSbiei mkl mlakto aSr eSh : oibrk alhim at iom hSbiei oiqdS ato ki bo Sbt mkl mlakto aSr bra alhim leSot : alh toldot hSmim oharz bhbram biom eSot ihoh alhim arz oSmim : okl SiH hSdh Trm ihih barz okl eSb hSdh Trm izmH ki la hmTir ihoh alhim el harz oadm ain lebd at hadmh : oad ielh mn harz ohSqh at kl pni hadmh : oiizr ihoh alhim at hadm epr mn hadmh oipH bapio nSmt Hiim oihi hadm lnpS Hih : oiTe ihoh alhim gn bedn mqdm oiSm Sm at hadm aSr izr : oizmH ihoh alhim mn hadmh kl ez nHmd lmrah oTob lmakl oez hHiim btok hgn oez hdet Tob ore : onhr iza medn lhSqot at hgn omSm iprd ohih larbeh raSim : Sm haHd piSon hoa hsbb at kl arz hHoilh aSr Sm hchb : ochb harz hhoa Tob Sm hbdlH oabn hShm : oSm hnhr hSni giHon hoa hsobb at kl arz koS : oSm hnhr hSliSi Hdql hoa hhlk qdmt aSor ohnhr hrbiei hoa prt : oiqH ihoh alhim at hadm oinHho bgn edn lebdh olSmrh : oizo ihoh alhim el hadm lamr mkl ez hgn akl takl : omez hdet Tob ore la takl mmno ki biom aklk mmno mot tmot : oiamr ihoh alhim la Tob hiot hadm lbdo aeSh lo ecr kngdo : oizr ihoh alhim mn hadmh kl Hit hSdh oat kl eop hSmim oiba al hadm lraot mh iqra lo okl aSr iqra lo hadm npS Hih hoa Smo : oiqra hadm Smot lkl hbhmh oleop hSmim olkl Hit hSdh oladm la mza ecr kngdo : oipl ihoh alhim trdmh el hadm oiiSn oiqH aHt mzletio oisgr bSr tHtnh : oibn ihoh alhim at hzle aSr lqH mn hadm laSh oibah al hadm : oiamr hadm cat hpem ezm mezmi obSr mbSri lcat iqra aSh ki maiS lqHh cat : el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio lbSr aHd : oihio Snihm eromim hadm oaSto ola itbSSo :

3

ohnHS hih erom mkl Hit hSdh aSr eSh ihoh alhim oiamr al haSh ap ki amr alhim la taklo mkl ez hgn : otamr haSh al hnHS mpri ez hgn nakl : ompri hez aSr btok hgn amr alhim la taklo mmno ola tgeo bo pn tmton : oiamr hnHS al haSh la mot tmton : ki ide alhim ki biom aklkm mmno onpqHo einikm ohiitm kalhim idei Tob ore : otra haSh ki Tob hez lmakl oki taoh hoa leinim onHmd hez lhSkil otqH mprio otakl ottn gm laiSh emh oiakl : otpqHnh eini Snihm oideo ki eirmm hm oitpro elh tanh oieSo lhm Hgrt : oiSmeo at qol ihoh alhim mthlk bgn lroH hiom oitHba hadm oaSto mpni ihoh alhim btok ez hgn : oiqra ihoh alhim al hadm oiamr lo aikh : oiamr at qlk Smeti bgn oaira ki eirm anki oaHba : oiamr mi hgid lk ki eirm ath hmn hez aSr zoitik lblti akl mmno aklt : oiamr hadm haSh aSr ntth emdi hoa ntnh li mn hez oakl : oiamr ihoh alhim laSh mh cat eSit otamr haSh hnHS hSiani oakl : oiamr ihoh alhim al hnHS ki eSit cat aror ath mkl hbhmh omkl Hit hSdh el gHnk tlk oepr takl kl imi Hiik : oaibh aSit bink obin haSh obin crek obin creh hoa iSopk raS oath tSopno eqb : al haSh amr hrbh arbh ezbonk ohrnk bezb tldi bnim oal aiSk tSoqtk ohoa imSl bk : oladm amr ki Smet lqol aStk otakl mn hez aSr zoitik lamr la takl mmno arorh hadmh bebork bezbon taklnh kl imi Hiik : oqoz odrdr tzmiH lk oaklt at eSb hSdh : bcet apik takl lHm ed Sobk al hadmh ki mmnh lqHt ki epr ath oal epr tSob : oiqra hadm Sm aSto Hoh ki hoa hith am kl Hi : oieS ihoh alhim ladm olaSto ktnot eor oilbSm : oiamr ihoh alhim hn hadm hih kaHd mmno ldet Tob ore oeth pn iSlH ido olqH gm mez hHiim oakl oHi lelm : oiSlHho ihoh alhim mgn edn lebd at hadmh aSr lqH mSm : oigrS at hadm oiSkn mqdm lgn edn at hkrbim oat lhT hHrb hmthpkt lSmr at drk ez hHiim :

4

ohadm ide at Hoh aSto othr otld at qin otamr qniti aiS at ihoh : otsp lldt at aHio at hbl oihi hbl reh zan oqin hih ebd admh : oihi mqz imim oiba qin mpri hadmh mnHh lihoh : ohbl hbia gm hoa mbkrot zano omHlbhn oiSe ihoh al hbl oal mnHto : oal qin oal mnHto la Seh oiHr lqin mad oiplo pnio : oiamr ihoh al qin lmh Hrh lk olmh nplo pnik : hloa am tiTib Sat oam la tiTib lptH HTat rbz oalik tSoqto oath tmSl bo : oiamr qin al hbl aHio oihi bhiotm bSdh oiqm qin al hbl aHio oihrgho : oiamr ihoh al qin ai hbl aHik oiamr la ideti hSmr aHi anki : oiamr mh eSit qol dmi aHik zeqim ali mn hadmh : oeth aror ath mn hadmh aSr pzth at pih lqHt at dmi aHik midk : ki tebd at hadmh la tsp tt kHh lk ne ond thih barz : oiamr qin al ihoh gdol eoni mnSa : hn grSt ati hiom mel pni hadmh ompnik astr ohiiti ne ond barz ohih kl mzai ihrgni : oiamr lo ihoh lkn kl hrg qin Sbetim iqm oiSm ihoh lqin aot lblti hkot ato kl mzao : oiza qin mlpni ihoh oiSb barz nod qdmt edn : oide qin at aSto othr otld at Hnok oihi bnh eir oiqra Sm heir kSm bno Hnok : oiold lHnok at eird oeird ild at mHoial omHiial ild at mtoSal omtoSal ild at lmk : oiqH lo lmk Sti nSim Sm haHt edh oSm hSnit zlh : otld edh at ibl hoa hih abi iSb ahl omqnh : oSm aHio iobl hoa hih abi kl tpS knor oeogb : ozlh gm hoa ildh at tobl qin lTS kl HrS nHSt obrcl oaHot tobl qin nemh : oiamr lmk lnSio edh ozlh Smen qoli nSi lmk hacnh amrti ki aiS hrgti lpzei oild lHbrti : ki Sbetim iqm qin olmk Sbeim oSbeh : oide adm eod at aSto otld bn otqra at Smo St ki St li alhim cre aHr tHt hbl ki hrgo qin : olSt gm hoa ild bn oiqra at Smo anoS ac hoHl lqra bSm ihoh :

5

ch spr toldt adm biom bra alhim adm bdmot alhim eSh ato : ckr onqbh bram oibrk atm oiqra at Smm adm biom hbram : oiHi adm SlSim omat Snh oiold bdmoto kzlmo oiqra at Smo St : oihio imi adm aHri holido at St Smnh mat Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi adm aSr Hi tSe maot Snh oSlSim Snh oimt : oiHi St HmS Snim omat Snh oiold at anoS : oiHi St aHri holido at anoS Sbe Snim oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi St Stim eSrh Snh otSe maot Snh oimt : oiHi anoS tSeim Snh oiold at qinn : oiHi anoS aHri holido at qinn HmS eSrh Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi anoS HmS Snim otSe maot Snh oimt : oiHi qinn Sbeim Snh oiold at mhllal : oiHi qinn aHri holido at mhllal arbeim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi qinn eSr Snim otSe maot Snh oimt : oiHi mhllal HmS Snim oSSim Snh oiold at ird : oiHi mhllal aHri holido at ird SlSim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi mhllal HmS otSeim Snh oSmnh maot Snh oimt : oiHi ird Stim oSSim Snh omat Snh oiold at Hnok : oiHi ird aHri holido at Hnok Smnh maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi ird Stim oSSim Snh otSe maot Snh oimt : oiHi Hnok HmS oSSim Snh oiold at mtoSlH : oithlk Hnok at halhim aHri holido at mtoSlH SlS maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihi kl imi Hnok HmS oSSim Snh oSlS maot Snh : oithlk Hnok at halhim oainno ki lqH ato alhim : oiHi mtoSlH Sbe oSmnim Snh omat Snh oiold at lmk : oiHi mtoSlH aHri holido at lmk Stim oSmonim Snh oSbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihio kl imi mtoSlH tSe oSSim Snh otSe maot Snh oimt : oiHi lmk Stim oSmnim Snh omat Snh oiold bn : oiqra at Smo nH lamr ch inHmno mmeSno omezbon idino mn hadmh aSr arrh ihoh : oiHi lmk aHri holido at nH HmS otSeim Snh oHmS mat Snh oiold bnim obnot : oihi kl imi lmk Sbe oSbeim Snh oSbe maot Snh oimt : oihi nH bn HmS maot Snh oiold nH at Sm at Hm oat ipt :

6

oihi ki hHl hadm lrb el pni hadmh obnot ildo lhm : oirao bni halhim at bnot hadm ki Tbt hnh oiqHo lhm nSim mkl aSr bHro : oiamr ihoh la idon roHi badm lelm bSgm hoa bSr ohio imio mah oeSrim Snh : hnplim hio barz bimim hhm ogm aHri kn aSr ibao bni halhim al bnot hadm oildo lhm hmh hgbrim aSr meolm anSi hSm : oira ihoh ki rbh ret hadm barz okl izr mHSbt lbo rq re kl hiom : oinHm ihoh ki eSh at hadm barz oitezb al lbo : oiamr ihoh amHh at hadm aSr brati mel pni hadmh madm ed bhmh ed rmS oed eop hSmim ki nHmti ki eSitm : onH mza Hn beini ihoh : alh toldt nH nH aiS zdiq tmim hih bdrtio at halhim hthlk nH : oiold nH SlSh bnim at Sm at Hm oat ipt : otSHt harz lpni halhim otmla harz Hms : oira alhim at harz ohnh nSHth ki hSHit kl bSr at drko el harz : oiamr alhim lnH qz kl bSr ba lpni ki mlah harz Hms mpnihm ohnni mSHitm at harz : eSh lk tbt ezi gpr qnim teSh at htbh okprt ath mbit omHoz bkpr : och aSr teSh ath SlS maot amh ark htbh HmSim amh rHbh oSlSim amh qomth : zhr teSh ltbh oal amh tklnh mlmelh optH htbh bzdh tSim tHtim Snim oSlSim teSh : oani hnni mbia at hmbol mim el harz lSHt kl bSr aSr bo roH Hiim mtHt hSmim kl aSr barz igoe : ohqmti at briti atk obat al htbh ath obnik oaStk onSi bnik atk : omkl hHi mkl bSr Snim mkl tbia al htbh lhHit atk ckr onqbh ihio : mheop lminho omn hbhmh lminh mkl rmS hadmh lminho Snim mkl ibao alik lhHiot : oath qH lk mkl makl aSr iakl oaspt alik ohih lk olhm laklh : oieS nH kkl aSr zoh ato alhim kn eSh :

7

oiamr ihoh lnH ba ath okl bitk al htbh ki atk raiti zdiq lpni bdor hch : mkl hbhmh hThorh tqH lk Sbeh Sbeh aiS oaSto omn hbhmh aSr la Thrh hoa Snim aiS oaSto : gm meop hSmim Sbeh Sbeh ckr onqbh lHiot cre el pni kl harz : ki limim eod Sbeh anki mmTir el harz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh omHiti at kl hiqom aSr eSiti mel pni hadmh : oieS nH kkl aSr zoho ihoh : onH bn SS maot Snh ohmbol hih mim el harz : oiba nH obnio oaSto onSi bnio ato al htbh mpni mi hmbol : mn hbhmh hThorh omn hbhmh aSr ainnh Thrh omn heop okl aSr rmS el hadmh : Snim Snim bao al nH al htbh ckr onqbh kaSr zoh alhim at nH : oihi lSbet himim omi hmbol hio el harz : bSnt SS maot Snh lHii nH bHdS hSni bSbeh eSr iom lHdS biom hch nbqeo kl meint thom rbh oarbt hSmim nptHo : oihi hgSm el harz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh : bezm hiom hch ba nH oSm oHm oipt bni nH oaSt nH oSlSt nSi bnio atm al htbh : hmh okl hHih lminh okl hbhmh lminh okl hrmS hrmS el harz lminho okl heop lminho kl zpor kl knp : oibao al nH al htbh Snim Snim mkl hbSr aSr bo roH Hiim : ohbaim ckr onqbh mkl bSr bao kaSr zoh ato alhim oisgr ihoh bedo : oihi hmbol arbeim iom el harz oirbo hmim oiSao at htbh otrm mel harz : oigbro hmim oirbo mad el harz otlk htbh el pni hmim : ohmim gbro mad mad el harz oikso kl hhrim hgbhim aSr tHt kl hSmim : HmS eSrh amh mlmelh gbro hmim oikso hhrim : oigoe kl bSr hrmS el harz beop obbhmh obHih obkl hSrz hSrz el harz okl hadm : kl aSr nSmt roH Hiim bapio mkl aSr bHrbh mto : oimH at kl hiqom aSr el pni hadmh madm ed bhmh ed rmS oed eop hSmim oimHo mn harz oiSar ak nH oaSr ato btbh : oigbro hmim el harz HmSim omat iom :

8

oickr alhim at nH oat kl hHih oat kl hbhmh aSr ato btbh oiebr alhim roH el harz oiSko hmim : oiskro meint thom oarbt hSmim oikla hgSm mn hSmim : oiSbo hmim mel harz hlok oSob oiHsro hmim mqzh HmSim omat iom : otnH htbh bHdS hSbiei bSbeh eSr iom lHdS el hri arrT : ohmim hio hlok oHsor ed hHdS heSiri beSiri baHd lHdS nrao raSi hhrim : oihi mqz arbeim iom oiptH nH at Hlon htbh aSr eSh : oiSlH at herb oiza izoa oSob ed ibSt hmim mel harz : oiSlH at hionh mato lraot hqlo hmim mel pni hadmh : ola mzah hionh mnoH lkp rglh otSb alio al htbh ki mim el pni kl harz oiSlH ido oiqHh oiba ath alio al htbh : oiHl eod Sbet imim aHrim oisp SlH at hionh mn htbh : otba alio hionh let erb ohnh elh cit Trp bpih oide nH ki qlo hmim mel harz : oiiHl eod Sbet imim aHrim oiSlH at hionh ola isph Sob alio eod : oihi baHt oSS maot Snh braSon baHd lHdS Hrbo hmim mel harz oisr nH at mksh htbh oira ohnh Hrbo pni hadmh : obHdS hSni bSbeh oeSrim iom lHdS ibSh harz : oidbr alhim al nH lamr : za mn htbh ath oaStk obnik onSi bnik atk : kl hHih aSr atk mkl bSr beop obbhmh obkl hrmS hrmS el harz hoza atk oSrzo barz opro orbo el harz : oiza nH obnio oaSto onSi bnio ato : kl hHih kl hrmS okl heop kl romS el harz lmSpHtihm izao mn htbh : oibn nH mcbH lihoh oiqH mkl hbhmh hThorh omkl heop hThr oiel elt bmcbH : oirH ihoh at riH hniHH oiamr ihoh al lbo la asp lqll eod at hadmh bebor hadm ki izr lb hadm re mnerio ola asp eod lhkot at kl Hi kaSr eSiti : ed kl imi harz cre oqzir oqr oHm oqiz oHrp oiom olilh la iSbto :

9

oibrk alhim at nH oat bnio oiamr lhm pro orbo omlao at harz : omorakm oHtkm ihih el kl Hit harz oel kl eop hSmim bkl aSr trmS hadmh obkl dgi him bidkm ntno : kl rmS aSr hoa Hi lkm ihih laklh kirq eSb ntti lkm at kl : ak bSr bnpSo dmo la taklo : oak at dmkm lnpStikm adrS mid kl Hih adrSno omid hadm mid aiS aHio adrS at npS hadm : Spk dm hadm badm dmo iSpk ki bzlm alhim eSh at hadm : oatm pro orbo Srzo barz orbo bh : oiamr alhim al nH oal bnio ato lamr : oani hnni mqim at briti atkm oat crekm aHrikm : oat kl npS hHih aSr atkm beop bbhmh obkl Hit harz atkm mkl izai htbh lkl Hit harz : ohqmti at briti atkm ola ikrt kl bSr eod mmi hmbol ola ihih eod mbol lSHt harz : oiamr alhim cat aot hbrit aSr ani ntn bini obinikm obin kl npS Hih aSr atkm ldrt eolm : at qSti ntti benn ohith laot brit bini obin harz : ohih benni enn el harz onrath hqSt benn : ockrti at briti aSr bini obinikm obin kl npS Hih bkl bSr ola ihih eod hmim lmbol lSHt kl bSr : ohith hqSt benn oraitih lckr brit eolm bin alhim obin kl npS Hih bkl bSr aSr el harz : oiamr alhim al nH cat aot hbrit aSr hqmti bini obin kl bSr aSr el harz : oihio bni nH hizaim mn htbh Sm oHm oipt oHm hoa abi knen : SlSh alh bni nH omalh npzh kl harz : oiHl nH aiS hadmh oiTe krm : oiSt mn hiin oiSkr oitgl btok ahlh : oira Hm abi knen at erot abio oigd lSni aHio bHoz : oiqH Sm oipt at hSmlh oiSimo el Skm Snihm oilko aHrnit oikso at erot abihm opnihm aHrnit oerot abihm la rao : oiiqz nH miino oide at aSr eSh lo bno hqTn : oiamr aror knen ebd ebdim ihih laHio : oiamr brok ihoh alhi Sm oihi knen ebd lmo : ipt alhim lipt oiSkn bahli Sm oihi knen ebd lmo : oiHi nH aHr hmbol SlS maot Snh oHmSim Snh : oihio kl imi nH tSe maot Snh oHmSim Snh oimt :

10

oalh toldt bni nH Sm Hm oipt oioldo lhm bnim aHr hmbol : bni ipt gmr omgog omdi oion otbl omSk otirs : obni gmr aSknc oript otgrmh : obni ion aliSh otrSiS ktim oddnim : malh nprdo aii hgoim barztm aiS llSno lmSpHtm bgoihm : obni Hm koS omzrim opoT oknen : obni koS sba oHoilh osbth oremh osbtka obni remh Sba oddn : okoS ild at nmrd hoa hHl lhiot gbr barz : hoa hih gbr zid lpni ihoh el kn iamr knmrd gbor zid lpni ihoh : othi raSit mmlkto bbl oark oakd oklnh barz Sner : mn harz hhoa iza aSor oibn at ninoh oat rHbt eir oat klH : oat rsn bin ninoh obin klH hoa heir hgdlh : omzrim ild at lodim oat enmim oat lhbim oat nptHim : oat ptrsim oat kslHim aSr izao mSm plStim oat kptrim : oknen ild at zidn bkro oat Ht : oat hibosi oat hamri oat hgrgSi : oat hHoi oat herqi oat hsini : oat harodi oat hzmri oat hHmti oaHr npzo mSpHot hkneni : oihi gbol hkneni mzidn bakh grrh ed ech bakh sdmh oemrh oadmh ozbim ed lSe : alh bni Hm lmSpHtm llSntm barztm bgoihm : olSm ild gm hoa abi kl bni ebr aHi ipt hgdol : bni Sm eilm oaSor oarpkSd olod oarm : obni arm eoz oHol ogtr omS : oarpkSd ild at SlH oSlH ild at ebr : olebr ild Sni bnim Sm haHd plg ki bimio nplgh harz oSm aHio iqTn : oiqTn ild at almodd oat Slp oat Hzrmot oat irH : oat hdorm oat aocl oat dqlh : oat eobl oat abimal oat Sba : oat aopr oat Hoilh oat iobb kl alh bni iqTn : oihi moSbm mmSa bakh sprh hr hqdm : alh bni Sm lmSpHtm llSntm barztm lgoihm : alh mSpHt bni nH ltoldtm bgoihm omalh nprdo hgoim barz aHr hmbol :

11

oihi kl harz Sph aHt odbrim aHdim : oihi bnsem mqdm oimzao bqeh barz Sner oiSbo Sm : oiamro aiS al reho hbh nlbnh lbnim onSrph lSrph othi lhm hlbnh labn ohHmr hih lhm lHmr : oiamro hbh nbnh lno eir omgdl oraSo bSmim oneSh lno Sm pn npoz el pni kl harz : oird ihoh lrat at heir oat hmgdl aSr bno bni hadm : oiamr ihoh hn em aHd oSph aHt lklm och hHlm leSot oeth la ibzr mhm kl aSr icmo leSot : hbh nrdh onblh Sm Sptm aSr la iSmeo aiS Spt reho : oipz ihoh atm mSm el pni kl harz oiHdlo lbnt heir : el kn qra Smh bbl ki Sm bll ihoh Spt kl harz omSm hpizm ihoh el pni kl harz : alh toldt Sm Sm bn mat Snh oiold at arpkSd Sntim aHr hmbol : oiHi Sm aHri holido at arpkSd HmS maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oarpkSd Hi HmS oSlSim Snh oiold at SlH : oiHi arpkSd aHri holido at SlH SlS Snim oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oSlH Hi SlSim Snh oiold at ebr : oiHi SlH aHri holido at ebr SlS Snim oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi ebr arbe oSlSim Snh oiold at plg : oiHi ebr aHri holido at plg SlSim Snh oarbe maot Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi plg SlSim Snh oiold at reo : oiHi plg aHri holido at reo tSe Snim omatim Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi reo Stim oSlSim Snh oiold at Srog : oiHi reo aHri holido at Srog Sbe Snim omatim Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi Srog SlSim Snh oiold at nHor : oiHi Srog aHri holido at nHor matim Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi nHor tSe oeSrim Snh oiold at trH : oiHi nHor aHri holido at trH tSe eSrh Snh omat Snh oiold bnim obnot : oiHi trH Sbeim Snh oiold at abrm at nHor oat hrn : oalh toldt trH trH holid at abrm at nHor oat hrn ohrn holid at loT : oimt hrn el pni trH abio barz moldto baor kSdim : oiqH abrm onHor lhm nSim Sm aSt abrm Sri oSm aSt nHor mlkh bt hrn abi mlkh oabi iskh : othi Sri eqrh ain lh old : oiqH trH at abrm bno oat loT bn hrn bn bno oat Sri klto aSt abrm bno oizao atm maor kSdim llkt arzh knen oibao ed Hrn oiSbo Sm : oihio imi trH HmS Snim omatim Snh oimt trH bHrn :

12

oiamr ihoh al abrm lk lk marzk ommoldtk ombit abik al harz aSr arak : oaeSk lgoi gdol oabrkk oagdlh Smk ohih brkh : oabrkh mbrkik omqllk aar onbrko bk kl mSpHt hadmh : oilk abrm kaSr dbr alio ihoh oilk ato loT oabrm bn HmS Snim oSbeim Snh bzato mHrn : oiqH abrm at Sri aSto oat loT bn aHio oat kl rkoSm aSr rkSo oat hnpS aSr eSo bHrn oizao llkt arzh knen oibao arzh knen : oiebr abrm barz ed mqom Skm ed alon morh ohkneni ac barz : oira ihoh al abrm oiamr lcrek atn at harz hcat oibn Sm mcbH lihoh hnrah alio : oietq mSm hhrh mqdm lbit al oiT ahlh bit al mim ohei mqdm oibn Sm mcbH lihoh oiqra bSm ihoh : oise abrm hlok onsoe hngbh : oihi reb barz oird abrm mzrimh lgor Sm ki kbd hreb barz : oihi kaSr hqrib lboa mzrimh oiamr al Sri aSto hnh na ideti ki aSh ipt mrah at : ohih ki irao atk hmzrim oamro aSto cat ohrgo ati oatk iHio : amri na aHti at lmen iiTb li bebork oHith npSi bgllk : oihi kboa abrm mzrimh oirao hmzrim at haSh ki iph hoa mad : oirao ath Sri preh oihllo ath al preh otqH haSh bit preh : olabrm hiTib beborh oihi lo zan obqr oHmrim oebdim oSpHt oatnt ogmlim : oinge ihoh at preh ngeim gdlim oat bito el dbr Sri aSt abrm : oiqra preh labrm oiamr mh cat eSit li lmh la hgdt li ki aStk hoa : lmh amrt aHti hoa oaqH ath li laSh oeth hnh aStk qH olk : oizo elio preh anSim oiSlHo ato oat aSto oat kl aSr lo :

13

oiel abrm mmzrim hoa oaSto okl aSr lo oloT emo hngbh : oabrm kbd mad bmqnh bksp obchb : oilk lmseio mngb oed bit al ed hmqom aSr hih Sm ahlh btHlh bin bit al obin hei : al mqom hmcbH aSr eSh Sm braSnh oiqra Sm abrm bSm ihoh : ogm lloT hhlk at abrm hih zan obqr oahlim : ola nSa atm harz lSbt iHdo ki hih rkoSm rb ola iklo lSbt iHdo : oihi rib bin rei mqnh abrm obin rei mqnh loT ohkneni ohprci ac iSb barz : oiamr abrm al loT al na thi mribh bini obinik obin rei obin reik ki anSim aHim anHno : hla kl harz lpnik hprd na meli am hSmal oaimnh oam himin oaSmailh : oiSa loT at einio oira at kl kkr hirdn ki klh mSqh lpni SHt ihoh at sdm oat emrh kgn ihoh karz mzrim bakh zer : oibHr lo loT at kl kkr hirdn oise loT mqdm oiprdo aiS mel aHio : abrm iSb barz knen oloT iSb beri hkkr oiahl ed sdm : oanSi sdm reim oHTaim lihoh mad : oihoh amr al abrm aHri hprd loT memo Sa na einik orah mn hmqom aSr ath Sm zpnh ongbh oqdmh oimh : ki at kl harz aSr ath rah lk atnnh olcrek ed eolm : oSmti at crek kepr harz aSr am iokl aiS lmnot at epr harz gm crek imnh : qom hthlk barz larkh olrHbh ki lk atnnh : oiahl abrm oiba oiSb balni mmra aSr bHbron oibn Sm mcbH lihoh :

14

oihi bimi amrpl mlk Sner ariok mlk alsr kdrlemr mlk eilm otdel mlk goim : eSo mlHmh at bre mlk sdm oat brSe mlk emrh Snab mlk admh oSmabr mlk zbiim omlk ble hia zer : kl alh Hbro al emq hSdim hoa im hmlH : Stim eSrh Snh ebdo at kdrlemr oSlS eSrh Snh mrdo : obarbe eSrh Snh ba kdrlemr ohmlkim aSr ato oiko at rpaim beStrt qrnim oat hcocim bhm oat haimim bSoh qritim : oat hHri bhrrm Seir ed ail parn aSr el hmdbr : oiSbo oibao al ein mSpT hoa qdS oiko at kl Sdh hemlqi ogm at hamri hiSb bHzzn tmr : oiza mlk sdm omlk emrh omlk admh omlk zbiim omlk ble hoa zer oierko atm mlHmh bemq hSdim : at kdrlemr mlk eilm otdel mlk goim oamrpl mlk Sner oariok mlk alsr arbeh mlkim at hHmSh : oemq hSdim bart bart Hmr oinso mlk sdm oemrh oiplo Smh ohnSarim hrh nso : oiqHo at kl rkS sdm oemrh oat kl aklm oilko : oiqHo at loT oat rkSo bn aHi abrm oilko ohoa iSb bsdm : oiba hpliT oigd labrm hebri ohoa Skn balni mmra hamri aHi aSkl oaHi enr ohm beli brit abrm : oiSme abrm ki nSbh aHio oirq at Hnikio ilidi bito Smnh eSr oSlS maot oirdp ed dn : oiHlq elihm lilh hoa oebdio oikm oirdpm ed Hobh aSr mSmal ldmSq : oiSb at kl hrkS ogm at loT aHio orkSo hSib ogm at hnSim oat hem : oiza mlk sdm lqrato aHri Sobo mhkot at kdr lemr oat hmlkim aSr ato al emq Soh hoa emq hmlk : omlki zdq mlk Slm hozia lHm oiin ohoa khn lal elion : oibrkho oiamr brok abrm lal elion qnh Smim oarz : obrok al elion aSr mgn zrik bidk oitn lo meSr mkl : oiamr mlk sdm al abrm tn li hnpS ohrkS qH lk : oiamr abrm al mlk sdm hrimti idi al ihoh al elion qnh Smim oarz : am mHoT oed Srok nel oam aqH mkl aSr lk ola tamr ani heSrti at abrm : bledi rq aSr aklo hnerim oHlq hanSim aSr hlko ati enr aSkl ommra hm iqHo Hlqm :

15

aHr hdbrim halh hih dbr ihoh al abrm bmHch lamr al tira abrm anki mgn lk Skrk hrbh mad : oiamr abrm adni ihoh mh ttn li oanki holk eriri obn mSq biti hoa dmSq aliecr : oiamr abrm hn li la ntth cre ohnh bn biti iorS ati : ohnh dbr ihoh alio lamr la iirSk ch ki am aSr iza mmeik hoa iirSk : oioza ato hHozh oiamr hbT na hSmimh ospr hkokbim am tokl lspr atm oiamr lo kh ihih crek : ohamn bihoh oiHSbh lo zdqh : oiamr alio ani ihoh aSr hozatik maor kSdim ltt lk at harz hcat lrSth : oiamr adni ihoh bmh ade ki airSnh : oiamr alio qHh li eglh mSlSt oec mSlSt oail mSlS otr ogocl : oiqH lo at kl alh oibtr atm btok oitn aiS btro lqrat reho oat hzpr la btr : oird heiT el hpgrim oiSb atm abrm : oihi hSmS lboa otrdmh nplh el abrm ohnh aimh HSkh gdlh nplt elio : oiamr labrm ide tde ki gr ihih crek barz la lhm oebdom oeno atm arbe maot Snh : ogm at hgoi aSr iebdo dn anki oaHri kn izao brkS gdol : oath tboa al abtik bSlom tqbr bSibh Tobh : odor rbiei iSobo hnh ki la Slm eon hamri ed hnh : oihi hSmS bah oelTh hih ohnh tnor eSn olpid aS aSr ebr bin hgcrim halh : biom hhoa krt ihoh at abrm brit lamr lcrek ntti at harz hcat mnhr mzrim ed hnhr hgdl nhr prt : at hqini oat hqnci oat hqdmni : oat hHti oat hprci oat hrpaim : oat hamri oat hkneni oat hgrgSi oat hibosi :

16

oSri aSt abrm la ildh lo olh SpHh mzrit oSmh hgr : otamr Sri al abrm hnh na ezrni ihoh mldt ba na al SpHti aoli abnh mmnh oiSme abrm lqol Sri : otqH Sri aSt abrm at hgr hmzrit SpHth mqz eSr Snim lSbt abrm barz knen ottn ath labrm aiSh lo laSh : oiba al hgr othr otra ki hrth otql gbrth beinih : otamr Sri al abrm Hmsi elik anki ntti SpHti bHiqk otra ki hrth oaql beinih iSpT ihoh bini obinik : oiamr abrm al Sri hnh SpHtk bidk eSi lh hTob beinik otenh Sri otbrH mpnih : oimzah mlak ihoh el ein hmim bmdbr el hein bdrk Sor : oiamr hgr SpHt Sri ai mch bat oanh tlki otamr mpni Sri gbrti anki brHt : oiamr lh mlak ihoh Sobi al gbrtk ohteni tHt idih : oiamr lh mlak ihoh hrbh arbh at crek ola ispr mrb : oiamr lh mlak ihoh hnk hrh oildt bn oqrat Smo iSmeal ki Sme ihoh al enik : ohoa ihih pra adm ido bkl oid kl bo oel pni kl aHio iSkn : otqra Sm ihoh hdbr alih ath al rai ki amrh hgm hlm raiti aHri rai : el kn qra lbar bar lHi rai hnh bin qdS obin brd : otld hgr labrm bn oiqra abrm Sm bno aSr ildh hgr iSmeal : oabrm bn Smnim Snh oSS Snim bldt hgr at iSmeal labrm :

17

oihi abrm bn tSeim Snh otSe Snim oira ihoh al abrm oiamr alio ani al Sdi hthlk lpni ohih tmim : oatnh briti bini obink oarbh aotk bmad mad : oipl abrm el pnio oidbr ato alhim lamr : ani hnh briti atk ohiit lab hmon goim : ola iqra eod at Smk abrm ohih Smk abrhm ki ab hmon goim nttik : ohprti atk bmad mad onttik lgoim omlkim mmk izao : ohqmti at briti bini obink obin crek aHrik ldrtm lbrit eolm lhiot lk lalhim olcrek aHrik : ontti lk olcrek aHrik at arz mgrik at kl arz knen laHct eolm ohiiti lhm lalhim : oiamr alhim al abrhm oath at briti tSmr ath ocrek aHrik ldrtm : cat briti aSr tSmro bini obinikm obin crek aHrik hmol lkm kl ckr : onmltm at bSr erltkm ohih laot brit bini obinikm : obn Smnt imim imol lkm kl ckr ldrtikm ilid bit omqnt ksp mkl bn nkr aSr la mcrek hoa : hmol imol ilid bitk omqnt kspk ohith briti bbSrkm lbrit eolm : oerl ckr aSr la imol at bSr erlto onkrth hnpS hhoa memih at briti hpr : oiamr alhim al abrhm Sri aStk la tqra at Smh Sri ki Srh Smh : obrkti ath ogm ntti mmnh lk bn obrktih ohith lgoim mlki emim mmnh ihio : oipl abrhm el pnio oizHq oiamr blbo hlbn mah Snh iold oam Srh hbt tSeim Snh tld : oiamr abrhm al halhim lo iSmeal iHih lpnik : oiamr alhim abl Srh aStk ildt lk bn oqrat at Smo izHq ohqmti at briti ato lbrit eolm lcreo aHrio : oliSmeal Smetik hnh brkti ato ohpriti ato ohrbiti ato bmad mad Snim eSr nSiam iolid onttio lgoi gdol : oat briti aqim at izHq aSr tld lk Srh lmoed hch bSnh haHrt : oikl ldbr ato oiel alhim mel abrhm : oiqH abrhm at iSmeal bno oat kl ilidi bito oat kl mqnt kspo kl ckr banSi bit abrhm oiml at bSr erltm bezm hiom hch kaSr dbr ato alhim : oabrhm bn tSeim otSe Snh bhmlo bSr erlto : oiSmeal bno bn SlS eSrh Snh bhmlo at bSr erlto : bezm hiom hch nmol abrhm oiSmeal bno : okl anSi bito ilid bit omqnt ksp mat bn nkr nmlo ato :

18

oira alio ihoh balni mmra ohoa iSb ptH hahl kHm hiom : oiSa einio oira ohnh SlSh anSim nzbim elio oira oirz lqratm mptH hahl oiStHo arzh : oiamr adni am na mzati Hn beinik al na tebr mel ebdk : iqH na meT mim orHzo rglikm ohSeno tHt hez : oaqHh pt lHm osedo lbkm aHr tebro ki el kn ebrtm el ebdkm oiamro kn teSh kaSr dbrt : oimhr abrhm hahlh al Srh oiamr mhri SlS saim qmH slt loSi oeSi egot : oal hbqr rz abrhm oiqH bn bqr rk oTob oitn al hner oimhr leSot ato : oiqH Hmah oHlb obn hbqr aSr eSh oitn lpnihm ohoa emd elihm tHt hez oiaklo : oiamro alio aih Srh aStk oiamr hnh bahl : oiamr Sob aSob alik ket Hih ohnh bn lSrh aStk oSrh Smet ptH hahl ohoa aHrio : oabrhm oSrh cqnim baim bimim Hdl lhiot lSrh arH knSim : otzHq Srh bqrbh lamr aHri blti hith li ednh oadni cqn : oiamr ihoh al abrhm lmh ch zHqh Srh lamr hap amnm ald oani cqnti : hipla mihoh dbr lmoed aSob alik ket Hih olSrh bn : otkHS Srh lamr la zHqti ki irah oiamr la ki zHqt : oiqmo mSm hanSim oiSqpo el pni sdm oabrhm hlk emm lSlHm : oihoh amr hmksh ani mabrhm aSr ani eSh : oabrhm hio ihih lgoi gdol oezom onbrko bo kl goii harz : ki idetio lmen aSr izoh at bnio oat bito aHrio oSmro drk ihoh leSot zdqh omSpT lmen hbia ihoh el abrhm at aSr dbr elio : oiamr ihoh ceqt sdm oemrh ki rbh oHTatm ki kbdh mad : ardh na oarah hkzeqth hbah ali eSo klh oam la adeh : oipno mSm hanSim oilko sdmh oabrhm eodno emd lpni ihoh : oigS abrhm oiamr hap tsph zdiq em rSe : aoli iS HmSim zdiqm btok heir hap tsph ola tSa lmqom lmen HmSim hzdiqm aSr bqrbh : Hllh lk meSt kdbr hch lhmit zdiq em rSe ohih kzdiq krSe Hllh lk hSpT kl harz la ieSh mSpT : oiamr ihoh am amza bsdm HmSim zdiqm btok heir onSati lkl hmqom beborm : oien abrhm oiamr hnh na hoalti ldbr al adni oanki epr oapr : aoli iHsron HmSim hzdiqm HmSh htSHit bHmSh at kl heir oiamr la aSHit am amza Sm arbeim oHmSh : oisp eod ldbr alio oiamr aoli imzaon Sm arbeim oiamr la aeSh bebor harbeim : oiamr al na iHr ladni oadbrh aoli imzaon Sm SlSim oiamr la aeSh am amza Sm SlSim : oiamr hnh na hoalti ldbr al adni aoli imzaon Sm eSrim oiamr la aSHit bebor heSrim : oiamr al na iHr ladni oadbrh ak hpem aoli imzaon Sm eSrh oiamr la aSHit bebor heSrh : oilk ihoh kaSr klh ldbr al abrhm oabrhm Sb lmqmo :

19

oibao Sni hmlakim sdmh berb oloT iSb bSer sdm oira loT oiqm lqratm oiStHo apim arzh : oiamr hnh na adni soro na al bit ebdkm olino orHzo rglikm ohSkmtm ohlktm ldrkkm oiamro la ki brHob nlin : oipzr bm mad oisro alio oibao al bito oieS lhm mSth omzot aph oiaklo : Trm iSkbo oanSi heir anSi sdm nsbo el hbit mner oed cqn kl hem mqzh : oiqrao al loT oiamro lo aih hanSim aSr bao alik hlilh hoziam alino ondeh atm : oiza alhm loT hptHh ohdlt sgr aHrio : oiamr al na aHi treo : hnh na li Sti bnot aSr la ideo aiS aoziah na athn alikm oeSo lhn kTob beinikm rq lanSim hal al teSo dbr ki el kn bao bzl qrti : oiamro gS hlah oiamro haHd ba lgor oiSpT SpoT eth nre lk mhm oipzro baiS bloT mad oigSo lSbr hdlt : oiSlHo hanSim at idm oibiao at loT alihm hbith oat hdlt sgro : oat hanSim aSr ptH hbit hko bsnorim mqTn oed gdol oilao lmza hptH : oiamro hanSim al loT ed mi lk ph Htn obnik obntik okl aSr lk beir hoza mn hmqom : ki mSHtim anHno at hmqom hch ki gdlh zeqtm at pni ihoh oiSlHno ihoh lSHth : oiza loT oidbr al Htnio lqHi bntio oiamr qomo zao mn hmqom hch ki mSHit ihoh at heir oihi kmzHq beini Htnio : okmo hSHr elh oiaizo hmlakim bloT lamr qom qH at aStk oat Sti bntik hnmzat pn tsph beon heir : oitmhmh oiHcqo hanSim bido obid aSto obid Sti bntio bHmlt ihoh elio oizaho oinHho mHoz leir : oihi khoziam atm hHozh oiamr hmlT el npSk al tbiT aHrik oal temd bkl hkkr hhrh hmlT pn tsph : oiamr loT alhm al na adni : hnh na mza ebdk Hn beinik otgdl Hsdk aSr eSit emdi lhHiot at npSi oanki la aokl lhmlT hhrh pn tdbqni hreh omti : hnh na heir hcat qrbh lnos Smh ohia mzer amlTh na Smh hla mzer hoa otHi npSi : oiamr alio hnh nSati pnik gm ldbr hch lblti hpki at heir aSr dbrt : mhr hmlT Smh ki la aokl leSot dbr ed bak Smh el kn qra Sm heir zoer : hSmS iza el harz oloT ba zerh : oihoh hmTir el sdm oel emrh gprit oaS mat ihoh mn hSmim : oihpk at herim hal oat kl hkkr oat kl iSbi herim ozmH hadmh : otbT aSto maHrio othi nzib mlH : oiSkm abrhm bbqr al hmqom aSr emd Sm at pni ihoh : oiSqp el pni sdm oemrh oel kl pni arz hkkr oira ohnh elh qiTr harz kqiTr hkbSn : oihi bSHt alhim at eri hkkr oickr alhim at abrhm oiSlH at loT mtok hhpkh bhpk at herim aSr iSb bhn loT : oiel loT mzoer oiSb bhr oSti bntio emo ki ira lSbt bzoer oiSb bmerh hoa oSti bntio : otamr hbkirh al hzeirh abino cqn oaiS ain barz lboa elino kdrk kl harz : lkh nSqh at abino iin onSkbh emo onHih mabino cre : otSqin at abihn iin blilh hoa otba hbkirh otSkb at abih ola ide bSkbh obqomh : oihi mmHrt otamr hbkirh al hzeirh hn Skbti amS at abi nSqno iin gm hlilh obai Skbi emo onHih mabino cre : otSqin gm blilh hhoa at abihn iin otqm hzeirh otSkb emo ola ide bSkbh obqmh : othrin Sti bnot loT mabihn : otld hbkirh bn otqra Smo moab hoa abi moab ed hiom : ohzeirh gm hoa ildh bn otqra Smo bn emi hoa abi bni emon ed hiom :

20

oise mSm abrhm arzh hngb oiSb bin qdS obin Sor oigr bgrr : oiamr abrhm al Srh aSto aHti hoa oiSlH abimlk mlk grr oiqH at Srh : oiba alhim al abimlk bHlom hlilh oiamr lo hnk mt el haSh aSr lqHt ohoa belt bel : oabimlk la qrb alih oiamr adni hgoi gm zdiq thrg : hla hoa amr li aHti hoa ohia gm hoa amrh aHi hoa btm lbbi obnqin kpi eSiti cat : oiamr alio halhim bHlm gm anki ideti ki btm lbbk eSit cat oaHSk gm anki aotk mHTo li el kn la nttik lnge alih : oeth hSb aSt haiS ki nbia hoa oitpll bedk oHih oam aink mSib de ki mot tmot ath okl aSr lk : oiSkm abimlk bbqr oiqra lkl ebdio oidbr at kl hdbrim halh bacnihm oiirao hanSim mad : oiqra abimlk labrhm oiamr lo mh eSit lno omh HTati lk ki hbat eli oel mmlkti HTah gdlh meSim aSr la ieSo eSit emdi : oiamr abimlk al abrhm mh rait ki eSit at hdbr hch : oiamr abrhm ki amrti rq ain irat alhim bmqom hch ohrgoni el dbr aSti : ogm amnh aHti bt abi hoa ak la bt ami othi li laSh : oihi kaSr hteo ati alhim mbit abi oamr lh ch Hsdk aSr teSi emdi al kl hmqom aSr nboa Smh amri li aHi hoa : oiqH abimlk zan obqr oebdim oSpHt oitn labrhm oiSb lo at Srh aSto : oiamr abimlk hnh arzi lpnik bTob beinik Sb : olSrh amr hnh ntti alp ksp laHik hnh hoa lk ksot einim lkl aSr atk oat kl onkHt : oitpll abrhm al halhim oirpa alhim at abimlk oat aSto oamhtio oildo : ki ezr ezr ihoh bed kl rHm lbit abimlk el dbr Srh aSt abrhm :

21

oihoh pqd at Srh kaSr amr oieS ihoh lSrh kaSr dbr : othr otld Srh labrhm bn lcqnio lmoed aSr dbr ato alhim : oiqra abrhm at Sm bno hnold lo aSr ildh lo Srh izHq : oiml abrhm at izHq bno bn Smnt imim kaSr zoh ato alhim : oabrhm bn mat Snh bhold lo at izHq bno : otamr Srh zHq eSh li alhim kl hSme izHq li : otamr mi mll labrhm hiniqh bnim Srh ki ildti bn lcqnio : oigdl hild oigml oieS abrhm mSth gdol biom hgml at izHq : otra Srh at bn hgr hmzrit aSr ildh labrhm mzHq : otamr labrhm grS hamh hcat oat bnh ki la iirS bn hamh hcat em bni em izHq : oire hdbr mad beini abrhm el aodt bno : oiamr alhim al abrhm al ire beinik el hner oel amtk kl aSr tamr alik Srh Sme bqlh ki bizHq iqra lk cre : ogm at bn hamh lgoi aSimno ki crek hoa : oiSkm abrhm bbqr oiqH lHm oHmt mim oitn al hgr Sm el Skmh oat hild oiSlHh otlk otte bmdbr bar Sbe : oiklo hmim mn hHmt otSlk at hild tHt aHd hSiHm : otlk otSb lh mngd hrHq kmTHoi qSt ki amrh al arah bmot hild otSb mngd otSa at qlh otbk : oiSme alhim at qol hner oiqra mlak alhim al hgr mn hSmim oiamr lh mh lk hgr al tirai ki Sme alhim al qol hner baSr hoa Sm : qomi Sai at hner ohHciqi at idk bo ki lgoi gdol aSimno : oipqH alhim at einih otra bar mim otlk otmla at hHmt mim otSq at hner : oihi alhim at hner oigdl oiSb bmdbr oihi rbh qSt : oiSb bmdbr parn otqH lo amo aSh marz mzrim : oihi bet hhoa oiamr abimlk opikl Sr zbao al abrhm lamr alhim emk bkl aSr ath eSh : oeth hSbeh li balhim hnh am tSqr li olnini olnkdi kHsd aSr eSiti emk teSh emdi oem harz aSr grth bh : oiamr abrhm anki aSbe : ohokH abrhm at abimlk el adot bar hmim aSr gclo ebdi abimlk : oiamr abimlk la ideti mi eSh at hdbr hch ogm ath la hgdt li ogm anki la Smeti blti hiom : oiqH abrhm zan obqr oitn labimlk oikrto Snihm brit : oizb abrhm at Sbe kbSt hzan lbdhn : oiamr abimlk al abrhm mh hnh Sbe kbSt halh aSr hzbt lbdnh : oiamr ki at Sbe kbSt tqH midi bebor thih li ledh ki Hprti at hbar hcat : el kn qra lmqom hhoa bar Sbe ki Sm nSbeo Snihm : oikrto brit bbar Sbe oiqm abimlk opikl Sr zbao oiSbo al arz plStim : oiTe aSl bbar Sbe oiqra Sm bSm ihoh al eolm : oigr abrhm barz plStim imim rbim :

22

oihi aHr hdbrim halh ohalhim nsh at abrhm oiamr alio abrhm oiamr hnni : oiamr qH na at bnk at iHidk aSr ahbt at izHq olk lk al arz hmrih ohelho Sm lelh el aHd hhrim aSr amr alik : oiSkm abrhm bbqr oiHbS at Hmro oiqH at Sni nerio ato oat izHq bno oibqe ezi elh oiqm oilk al hmqom aSr amr lo halhim : biom hSliSi oiSa abrhm at einio oira at hmqom mrHq : oiamr abrhm al nerio Sbo lkm ph em hHmor oani ohner nlkh ed kh onStHoh onSobh alikm : oiqH abrhm at ezi helh oiSm el izHq bno oiqH bido at haS oat hmaklt oilko Snihm iHdo : oiamr izHq al abrhm abio oiamr abi oiamr hnni bni oiamr hnh haS ohezim oaih hSh lelh : oiamr abrhm alhim irah lo hSh lelh bni oilko Snihm iHdo : oibao al hmqom aSr amr lo halhim oibn Sm abrhm at hmcbH oierk at hezim oieqd at izHq bno oiSm ato el hmcbH mmel lezim : oiSlH abrhm at ido oiqH at hmaklt lSHT at bno : oiqra alio mlak ihoh mn hSmim oiamr abrhm abrhm oiamr hnni : oiamr al tSlH idk al hner oal teS lo maomh ki eth ideti ki ira alhim ath ola HSkt at bnk at iHidk mmni : oiSa abrhm at einio oira ohnh ail aHr naHc bsbk bqrnio oilk abrhm oiqH at hail oielho lelh tHt bno : oiqra abrhm Sm hmqom hhoa ihoh irah aSr iamr hiom bhr ihoh irah : oiqra mlak ihoh al abrhm Snit mn hSmim : oiamr bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki ien aSr eSit at hdbr hch ola HSkt at bnk at iHidk : ki brk abrkk ohrbh arbh at crek kkokbi hSmim okHol aSr el Spt him oirS crek at Ser aibio : ohtbrko bcrek kl goii harz eqb aSr Smet bqli : oiSb abrhm al nerio oiqmo oilko iHdo al bar Sbe oiSb abrhm bbar Sbe : oihi aHri hdbrim halh oigd labrhm lamr hnh ildh mlkh gm hoa bnim lnHor aHik : at eoz bkro oat boc aHio oat qmoal abi arm : oat kSd oat Hco oat pldS oat idlp oat btoal : obtoal ild at rbqh Smnh alh ildh mlkh lnHor aHi abrhm : opilgSo oSmh raomh otld gm hoa at TbH oat gHm oat tHS oat mekh :

23

oihio Hii Srh mah Snh oeSrim Snh oSbe Snim Sni Hii Srh : otmt Srh bqrit arbe hoa Hbron barz knen oiba abrhm lspd lSrh olbkth : oiqm abrhm mel pni mto oidbr al bni Ht lamr : gr otoSb anki emkm tno li aHct qbr emkm oaqbrh mti mlpni : oieno bni Ht at abrhm lamr lo : Smeno adni nSia alhim ath btokno bmbHr qbrino qbr at mtk aiS mmno at qbro la iklh mmk mqbr mtk : oiqm abrhm oiStHo lem harz lbni Ht : oidbr atm lamr am iS at npSkm lqbr at mti mlpni Smeoni opgeo li bepron bn zHr : oitn li at mert hmkplh aSr lo aSr bqzh Sdho bksp mla itnnh li btokkm laHct qbr : oepron iSb btok bni Ht oien epron hHti at abrhm bacni bni Ht lkl bai Ser eiro lamr : la adni Smeni hSdh ntti lk ohmerh aSr bo lk nttih leini bni emi nttih lk qbr mtk : oiStHo abrhm lpni em harz : oidbr al epron bacni em harz lamr ak am ath lo Smeni ntti ksp hSdh qH mmni oaqbrh at mti Smh : oien epron at abrhm lamr lo : adni Smeni arz arbe mat Sql ksp bini obink mh hoa oat mtk qbr : oiSme abrhm al epron oiSql abrhm leprn at hksp aSr dbr bacni bni Ht arbe maot Sql ksp ebr lsHr : oiqm Sdh epron aSr bmkplh aSr lpni mmra hSdh ohmerh aSr bo okl hez aSr bSdh aSr bkl gblo sbib : labrhm lmqnh leini bni Ht bkl bai Ser eiro : oaHri kn qbr abrhm at Srh aSto al mert Sdh hmkplh el pni mmra hoa Hbron barz knen : oiqm hSdh ohmerh aSr bo labrhm laHct qbr mat bni Ht :

24

oabrhm cqn ba bimim oihoh brk at abrhm bkl : oiamr abrhm al ebdo cqn bito hmSl bkl aSr lo Sim na idk tHt irki : oaSbiek bihoh alhi hSmim oalhi harz aSr la tqH aSh lbni mbnot hkneni aSr anki ioSb bqrbo : ki al arzi oal moldti tlk olqHt aSh lbni lizHq : oiamr alio hebd aoli la tabh haSh llkt aHri al harz hcat hhSb aSib at bnk al harz aSr izat mSm : oiamr alio abrhm hSmr lk pn tSib at bni Smh : ihoh alhi hSmim aSr lqHni mbit abi omarz moldti oaSr dbr li oaSr nSbe li lamr lcrek atn at harz hcat hoa iSlH mlako lpnik olqHt aSh lbni mSm : oam la tabh haSh llkt aHrik onqit mSbeti cat rq at bni la tSb Smh : oiSm hebd at ido tHt irk abrhm adnio oiSbe lo el hdbr hch : oiqH hebd eSrh gmlim mgmli adnio oilk okl Tob adnio bido oiqm oilk al arm nhrim al eir nHor : oibrk hgmlim mHoz leir al bar hmim let erb let zat hSabt : oiamr ihoh alhi adni abrhm hqrh na lpni hiom oeSh Hsd em adni abrhm : hnh anki nzb el ein hmim obnot anSi heir izat lSab mim : ohih hner aSr amr alih hTi na kdk oaSth oamrh Sth ogm gmlik aSqh ath hkHt lebdk lizHq obh ade ki eSit Hsd em adni : oihi hoa Trm klh ldbr ohnh rbqh izat aSr ildh lbtoal bn mlkh aSt nHor aHi abrhm okdh el Skmh : ohner Tbt mrah mad btolh oaiS la ideh otrd heinh otmla kdh otel : oirz hebd lqrath oiamr hgmiaini na meT mim mkdk : otamr Sth adni otmhr otrd kdh el idh otSqho : otkl lhSqto otamr gm lgmlik aSab ed am klo lStt : otmhr oter kdh al hSqt otrz eod al hbar lSab otSab lkl gmlio : ohaiS mStah lh mHriS ldet hhzliH ihoh drko am la : oihi kaSr klo hgmlim lStot oiqH haiS ncm chb bqe mSqlo oSni zmidim el idih eSrh chb mSqlm : oiamr bt mi at hgidi na li hiS bit abik mqom lno llin : otamr alio bt btoal anki bn mlkh aSr ildh lnHor : otamr alio gm tbn gm mspoa rb emno gm mqom llon : oiqd haiS oiStHo lihoh : oiamr brok ihoh alhi adni abrhm aSr la ecb Hsdo oamto mem adni anki bdrk nHni ihoh bit aHi adni : otrz hner otgd lbit amh kdbrim halh : olrbqh aH oSmo lbn oirz lbn al haiS hHozh al hein : oihi krat at hncm oat hzmdim el idi aHto okSmeo at dbri rbqh aHto lamr kh dbr ali haiS oiba al haiS ohnh emd el hgmlim el hein : oiamr boa brok ihoh lmh temd bHoz oanki pniti hbit omqom lgmlim : oiba haiS hbith oiptH hgmlim oitn tbn omspoa lgmlim omim lrHz rglio orgli hanSim aSr ato : oiiSm lpnio lakl oiamr la akl ed am dbrti dbri oiamr dbr : oiamr ebd abrhm anki : oihoh brk at adni mad oigdl oitn lo zan obqr oksp ochb oebdm oSpHt ogmlim oHmrim : otld Srh aSt adni bn ladni aHri cqnth oitn lo at kl aSr lo : oiSbeni adni lamr la tqH aSh lbni mbnot hkneni aSr anki iSb barzo : am la al bit abi tlk oal mSpHti olqHt aSh lbni : oamr al adni ali la tlk haSh aHri : oiamr ali ihoh aSr hthlkti lpnio iSlH mlako atk ohzliH drkk olqHt aSh lbni mmSpHti ombit abi : ac tnqh malti ki tboa al mSpHti oam la itno lk ohiit nqi malti : oaba hiom al hein oamr ihoh alhi adni abrhm am iSk na mzliH drki aSr anki hlk elih : hnh anki nzb el ein hmim ohih helmh hizat lSab oamrti alih hSqini na meT mim mkdk : oamrh ali gm ath Sth ogm lgmlik aSab hoa haSh aSr hkiH ihoh lbn adni : ani Trm aklh ldbr al lbi ohnh rbqh izat okdh el Skmh otrd heinh otSab oamr alih hSqini na : otmhr otord kdh melih otamr Sth ogm gmlik aSqh oaSt ogm hgmlim hSqth : oaSal ath oamr bt mi at otamr bt btoal bn nHor aSr ildh lo mlkh oaSm hncm el aph ohzmidim el idih : oaqd oaStHoh lihoh oabrk at ihoh alhi adni abrhm aSr hnHni bdrk amt lqHt at bt aHi adni lbno : oeth am iSkm eSim Hsd oamt at adni hgido li oam la hgido li oapnh el imin ao el Smal : oien lbn obtoal oiamro mihoh iza hdbr la nokl dbr alik re ao Tob : hnh rbqh lpnik qH olk othi aSh lbn adnik kaSr dbr ihoh : oihi kaSr Sme ebd abrhm at dbrihm oiStHo arzh lihoh : oioza hebd kli ksp okli chb obgdim oitn lrbqh omgdnt ntn laHih olamh : oiaklo oiSto hoa ohanSim aSr emo oilino oiqomo bbqr oiamr SlHni ladni : oiamr aHih oamh tSb hner atno imim ao eSor aHr tlk : oiamr alhm al taHro ati oihoh hzliH drki SlHoni oalkh ladni : oiamro nqra lner onSalh at pih : oiqrao lrbqh oiamro alih htlki em haiS hch otamr alk : oiSlHo at rbqh aHtm oat mnqth oat ebd abrhm oat anSio : oibrko at rbqh oiamro lh aHtno at hii lalpi rbbh oiirS crek at Ser Snaio : otqm rbqh onertih otrkbnh el hgmlim otlknh aHri haiS oiqH hebd at rbqh oilk : oizHq ba mboa bar lHi rai ohoa ioSb barz hngb : oiza izHq lSoH bSdh lpnot erb oiSa einio oira ohnh gmlim baim : otSa rbqh at einih otra at izHq otpl mel hgml : otamr al hebd mi haiS hlch hhlk bSdh lqratno oiamr hebd hoa adni otqH hzeip ottks : oispr hebd lizHq at kl hdbrim aSr eSh : oibah izHq hahlh Srh amo oiqH at rbqh othi lo laSh oiahbh oinHm izHq aHri amo :

25

oisp abrhm oiqH aSh oSmh qTorh : otld lo at cmrn oat iqSn oat mdn oat mdin oat iSbq oat SoH : oiqSn ild at Sba oat ddn obni ddn hio aSorm olToSim olamim : obni mdin eiph oepr oHnk oabide oaldeh kl alh bni qTorh : oitn abrhm at kl aSr lo lizHq : olbni hpilgSim aSr labrhm ntn abrhm mtnt oiSlHm mel izHq bno beodno Hi qdmh al arz qdm : oalh imi Sni Hii abrhm aSr Hi mat Snh oSbeim Snh oHmS Snim : oigoe oimt abrhm bSibh Tobh cqn oSbe oiasp al emio : oiqbro ato izHq oiSmeal bnio al mert hmkplh al Sdh eprn bn zHr hHti aSr el pni mmra : hSdh aSr qnh abrhm mat bni Ht Smh qbr abrhm oSrh aSto : oihi aHri mot abrhm oibrk alhim at izHq bno oiSb izHq em bar lHi rai : oalh tldt iSmeal bn abrhm aSr ildh hgr hmzrit SpHt Srh labrhm : oalh Smot bni iSmeal bSmtm ltoldtm bkr iSmeal nbit oqdr oadbal ombSm : omSme odomh omSa : Hdd otima iTor npiS oqdmh : alh hm bni iSmeal oalh Smtm bHzrihm obTirtm Snim eSr nSiam lamtm : oalh Sni Hii iSmeal mat Snh oSlSim Snh oSbe Snim oigoe oimt oiasp al emio : oiSkno mHoilh ed Sor aSr el pni mzrim bakh aSorh el pni kl aHio npl : oalh toldt izHq bn abrhm abrhm holid at izHq : oihi izHq bn arbeim Snh bqHto at rbqh bt btoal harmi mpdn arm aHot lbn harmi lo laSh : oietr izHq lihoh lnkH aSto ki eqrh hoa oietr lo ihoh othr rbqh aSto : oitrzzo hbnim bqrbh otamr am kn lmh ch anki otlk ldrS at ihoh : oiamr ihoh lh Sni giim bbTnk oSni lamim mmeik iprdo olam mlam iamz orb iebd zeir : oimlao imih lldt ohnh tomm bbTnh : oiza hraSon admoni klo kadrt Ser oiqrao Smo eSo : oaHri kn iza aHio oido aHct beqb eSo oiqra Smo ieqb oizHq bn SSim Snh bldt atm : oigdlo hnerim oihi eSo aiS ide zid aiS Sdh oieqb aiS tm iSb ahlim : oiahb izHq at eSo ki zid bpio orbqh ahbt at ieqb : oicd ieqb ncid oiba eSo mn hSdh ohoa eip : oiamr eSo al ieqb hleiTni na mn hadm hadm hch ki eip anki el kn qra Smo adom : oiamr ieqb mkrh kiom at bkrtk li : oiamr eSo hnh anki holk lmot olmh ch li bkrh : oiamr ieqb hSbeh li kiom oiSbe lo oimkr at bkrto lieqb : oieqb ntn leSo lHm oncid edSim oiakl oiSt oiqm oilk oibc eSo at hbkrh :

26

oihi reb barz mlbd hreb hraSon aSr hih bimi abrhm oilk izHq al abimlk mlk plStim grrh : oira alio ihoh oiamr al trd mzrimh Skn barz aSr amr alik : gor barz hcat oahih emk oabrkk ki lk olcrek atn at kl harzt hal ohqmti at hSbeh aSr nSbeti labrhm abik : ohrbiti at crek kkokbi hSmim ontti lcrek at kl harzt hal ohtbrko bcrek kl goii harz : eqb aSr Sme abrhm bqli oiSmr mSmrti mzoti Hqoti otorti : oiSb izHq bgrr : oiSalo anSi hmqom laSto oiamr aHti hoa ki ira lamr aSti pn ihrgni anSi hmqom el rbqh ki Tobt mrah hia : oihi ki arko lo Sm himim oiSqp abimlk mlk plStim bed hHlon oira ohnh izHq mzHq at rbqh aSto : oiqra abimlk lizHq oiamr ak hnh aStk hoa oaik amrt aHti hoa oiamr alio izHq ki amrti pn amot elih : oiamr abimlk mh cat eSit lno kmeT Skb aHd hem at aStk ohbat elino aSm : oizo abimlk at kl hem lamr hnge baiS hch obaSto mot iomt : oicre izHq barz hhoa oimza bSnh hhoa mah Serim oibrkho ihoh : oigdl haiS oilk hlok ogdl ed ki gdl mad : oihi lo mqnh zan omqnh bqr oebdh rbh oiqnao ato plStim : okl hbart aSr Hpro ebdi abio bimi abrhm abio stmom plStim oimlaom epr : oiamr abimlk al izHq lk memno ki ezmt mmno mad : oilk mSm izHq oiHn bnHl grr oiSb Sm : oiSb izHq oiHpr at bart hmim aSr Hpro bimi abrhm abio oistmom plStim aHri mot abrhm oiqra lhn Smot kSmt aSr qra lhn abio : oiHpro ebdi izHq bnHl oimzao Sm bar mim Hiim : oiribo rei grr em rei izHq lamr lno hmim oiqra Sm hbar eSq ki hteSqo emo : oiHpro bar aHrt oiribo gm elih oiqra Smh STnh : oietq mSm oiHpr bar aHrt ola rbo elih oiqra Smh rHbot oiamr ki eth hrHib ihoh lno oprino barz : oiel mSm bar Sbe : oira alio ihoh blilh hhoa oiamr anki alhi abrhm abik al tira ki atk anki obrktik ohrbiti at crek bebor abrhm ebdi : oibn Sm mcbH oiqra bSm ihoh oiT Sm ahlo oikro Sm ebdi izHq bar : oabimlk hlk alio mgrr oaHct mreho opikl Sr zbao : oiamr alhm izHq mdoe batm ali oatm Snatm ati otSlHoni matkm : oiamro rao raino ki hih ihoh emk onamr thi na alh binotino binino obink onkrth brit emk : am teSh emno reh kaSr la ngenok okaSr eSino emk rq Tob onSlHk bSlom ath eth brok ihoh : oieS lhm mSth oiaklo oiSto : oiSkimo bbqr oiSbeo aiS laHio oiSlHm izHq oilko mato bSlom : oihi biom hhoa oibao ebdi izHq oigdo lo el adot hbar aSr Hpro oiamro lo mzano mim : oiqra ath Sbeh el kn Sm heir bar Sbe ed hiom hch : oihi eSo bn arbeim Snh oiqH aSh at ihodit bt bari hHti oat bSmt bt ailn hHti : othiin mrt roH lizHq olrbqh :

27

oihi ki cqn izHq otkhin einio mrat oiqra at eSo bno hgdl oiamr alio bni oiamr alio hnni : oiamr hnh na cqnti la ideti iom moti : oeth Sa na klik tlik oqStk oza hSdh ozodh li zidh : oeSh li mTemim kaSr ahbti ohbiah li oaklh bebor tbrkk npSi bTrm amot : orbqh Smet bdbr izHq al eSo bno oilk eSo hSdh lzod zid lhbia : orbqh amrh al ieqb bnh lamr hnh Smeti at abik mdbr al eSo aHik lamr : hbiah li zid oeSh li mTemim oaklh oabrkkh lpni ihoh lpni moti : oeth bni Sme bqli laSr ani mzoh atk : lk na al hzan oqH li mSm Sni gdii ecim Tbim oaeSh atm mTemim labik kaSr ahb : ohbat labik oakl bebr aSr ibrkk lpni moto : oiamr ieqb al rbqh amo hn eSo aHi aiS Ser oanki aiS Hlq : aoli imSni abi ohiiti beinio kmtete ohbati eli qllh ola brkh : otamr lo amo eli qlltk bni ak Sme bqli olk qH li : oilk oiqH oiba lamo oteS amo mTemim kaSr ahb abio : otqH rbqh at bgdi eSo bnh hgdl hHmdt aSr ath bbit otlbS at ieqb bnh hqTn : oat ert gdii hecim hlbiSh el idio oel Hlqt zoario : ottn at hmTemim oat hlHm aSr eSth bid ieqb bnh : oiba al abio oiamr abi oiamr hnni mi ath bni : oiamr ieqb al abio anki eSo bkrk eSiti kaSr dbrt ali qom na Sbh oaklh mzidi bebor tbrkni npSk : oiamr izHq al bno mh ch mhrt lmza bni oiamr ki hqrh ihoh alhik lpni : oiamr izHq al ieqb gSh na oamSk bni hath ch bni eSo am la : oigS ieqb al izHq abio oimSho oiamr hql qol ieqb ohidim idi eSo : ola hkiro ki hio idio kidi eSo aHio Sert oibrkho : oiamr ath ch bni eSo oiamr ani : oiamr hgSh li oaklh mzid bni lmen tbrkk npSi oigS lo oiakl oiba lo iin oiSt : oiamr alio izHq abio gSh na oSqh li bni : oigS oiSq lo oirH at riH bgdio oibrkho oiamr rah riH bni kriH Sdh aSr brko ihoh : oitn lk halhim mTl hSmim omSmni harz orb dgn otirS : iebdok emim oiStHo lk lamim hoh gbir laHik oiStHoo lk bni amk arrik aror ombrkik brok : oihi kaSr klh izHq lbrk at ieqb oihi ak iza iza ieqb mat pni izHq abio oeSo aHio ba mzido : oieS gm hoa mTemim oiba labio oiamr labio iqm abi oiakl mzid bno bebor tbrkni npSk : oiamr lo izHq abio mi ath oiamr ani bnk bkrk eSo : oiHrd izHq Hrdh gdlh ed mad oiamr mi apoa hoa hzd zid oiba li oakl mkl bTrm tboa oabrkho gm brok ihih : kSme eSo at dbri abio oizeq zeqh gdlh omrh ed mad oiamr labio brkni gm ani abi : oiamr ba aHik bmrmh oiqH brktk : oiamr hki qra Smo ieqb oieqbni ch pemim at bkrti lqH ohnh eth lqH brkti oiamr hla azlt li brkh : oien izHq oiamr leSo hn gbir Smtio lk oat kl aHio ntti lo lebdim odgn otirS smktio olkh apoa mh aeSh bni : oiamr eSo al abio hbrkh aHt hoa lk abi brkni gm ani abi oiSa eSo qlo oibk : oien izHq abio oiamr alio hnh mSmni harz ihih moSbk omTl hSmim mel : oel Hrbk tHih oat aHik tebd ohih kaSr trid oprqt elo mel zoark : oiSTm eSo at ieqb el hbrkh aSr brko abio oiamr eSo blbo iqrbo imi abl abi oahrgh at ieqb aHi : oigd lrbqh at dbri eSo bnh hgdl otSlH otqra lieqb bnh hqTn otamr alio hnh eSo aHik mtnHm lk lhrgk : oeth bni Sme bqli oqom brH lk al lbn aHi Hrnh : oiSbt emo imim aHdim ed aSr tSob Hmt aHik : ed Sob ap aHik mmk oSkH at aSr eSit lo oSlHti olqHtik mSm lmh aSkl gm Snikm iom aHd : otamr rbqh al izHq qzti bHii mpni bnot Ht am lqH ieqb aSh mbnot Ht kalh mbnot harz lmh li Hiim :

28

oiqra izHq al ieqb oibrk ato oizoho oiamr lo la tqH aSh mbnot knen : qom lk pdnh arm bith btoal abi amk oqH lk mSm aSh mbnot lbn aHi amk : oal Sdi ibrk atk oiprk oirbk ohiit lqhl emim : oitn lk at brkt abrhm lk olcrek atk lrStk at arz mgrik aSr ntn alhim labrhm : oiSlH izHq at ieqb oilk pdnh arm al lbn bn btoal harmi aHi rbqh am ieqb oeSo : oira eSo ki brk izHq at ieqb oSlH ato pdnh arm lqHt lo mSm aSh bbrko ato oizo elio lamr la tqH aSh mbnot knen : oiSme ieqb al abio oal amo oilk pdnh arm : oira eSo ki reot bnot knen beini izHq abio : oilk eSo al iSmeal oiqH at mHlt bt iSmeal bn abrhm aHot nbiot el nSio lo laSh : oiza ieqb mbar Sbe oilk Hrnh : oipge bmqom oiln Sm ki ba hSmS oiqH mabni hmqom oiSm mraStio oiSkb bmqom hhoa : oiHlm ohnh slm mzb arzh oraSo mgie hSmimh ohnh mlaki alhim elim oirdim bo : ohnh ihoh nzb elio oiamr ani ihoh alhi abrhm abik oalhi izHq harz aSr ath Skb elih lk atnnh olcrek : ohih crek kepr harz oprzt imh oqdmh ozpnh ongbh onbrko bk kl mSpHt hadmh obcrek : ohnh anki emk oSmrtik bkl aSr tlk ohSbtik al hadmh hcat ki la aecbk ed aSr am eSiti at aSr dbrti lk : oiiqz ieqb mSnto oiamr akn iS ihoh bmqom hch oanki la ideti : oiira oiamr mh nora hmqom hch ain ch ki am bit alhim och Ser hSmim : oiSkm ieqb bbqr oiqH at habn aSr Sm mraStio oiSm ath mzbh oizq Smn el raSh : oiqra at Sm hmqom hhoa bit al oaolm loc Sm heir lraSnh : oidr ieqb ndr lamr am ihih alhim emdi oSmrni bdrk hch aSr anki holk ontn li lHm lakl obgd llbS : oSbti bSlom al bit abi ohih ihoh li lalhim : ohabn hcat aSr Smti mzbh ihih bit alhim okl aSr ttn li eSr aeSrno lk :

29

oiSa ieqb rglio oilk arzh bni qdm : oira ohnh bar bSdh ohnh Sm SlSh edri zan rbzim elih ki mn hbar hhoa iSqo hedrim ohabn gdlh el pi hbar : onaspo Smh kl hedrim ogllo at habn mel pi hbar ohSqo at hzan ohSibo at habn el pi hbar lmqmh : oiamr lhm ieqb aHi main atm oiamro mHrn anHno : oiamr lhm hidetm at lbn bn nHor oiamro ideno : oiamr lhm hSlom lo oiamro Slom ohnh rHl bto bah em hzan : oiamr hn eod hiom gdol la et hasp hmqnh hSqo hzan olko reo : oiamro la nokl ed aSr iaspo kl hedrim ogllo at habn mel pi hbar ohSqino hzan : eodno mdbr emm orHl bah em hzan aSr labih ki reh hoa : oihi kaSr rah ieqb at rHl bt lbn aHi amo oat zan lbn aHi amo oigS ieqb oigl at habn mel pi hbar oiSq at zan lbn aHi amo : oiSq ieqb lrHl oiSa at qlo oibk : oigd ieqb lrHl ki aHi abih hoa oki bn rbqh hoa otrz otgd labih : oihi kSme lbn at Sme ieqb bn aHto oirz lqrato oiHbq lo oinSq lo oibiaho al bito oispr llbn at kl hdbrim halh : oiamr lo lbn ak ezmi obSri ath oiSb emo HdS imim : oiamr lbn lieqb hki aHi ath oebdtni Hnm hgidh li mh mSkrtk : ollbn Sti bnot Sm hgdlh lah oSm hqTnh rHl : oeini lah rkot orHl hith ipt tar oipt mrah : oiahb ieqb at rHl oiamr aebdk Sbe Snim brHl btk hqTnh : oiamr lbn Tob tti ath lk mtti ath laiS aHr Sbh emdi : oiebd ieqb brHl Sbe Snim oihio beinio kimim aHdim bahbto ath : oiamr ieqb al lbn hbh at aSti ki mlao imi oaboah alih : oiasp lbn at kl anSi hmqom oieS mSth : oihi berb oiqH at lah bto oiba ath alio oiba alih : oitn lbn lh at clph SpHto llah bto SpHh : oihi bbqr ohnh hoa lah oiamr al lbn mh cat eSit li hla brHl ebdti emk olmh rmitni : oiamr lbn la ieSh kn bmqomno ltt hzeirh lpni hbkirh : mla Sbe cat ontnh lk gm at cat bebdh aSr tebd emdi eod Sbe Snim aHrot : oieS ieqb kn oimla Sbe cat oitn lo at rHl bto lo laSh : oitn lbn lrHl bto at blhh SpHto lh lSpHh : oiba gm al rHl oiahb gm at rHl mlah oiebd emo eod Sbe Snim aHrot : oira ihoh ki Snoah lah oiptH at rHmh orHl eqrh : othr lah otld bn otqra Smo raobn ki amrh ki rah ihoh benii ki eth iahbni aiSi : othr eod otld bn otamr ki Sme ihoh ki Snoah anki oitn li gm at ch otqra Smo Smeon : othr eod otld bn otamr eth hpem iloh aiSi ali ki ildti lo SlSh bnim el kn qra Smo loi : othr eod otld bn otamr hpem aodh at ihoh el kn qrah Smo ihodh otemd mldt :

30

otra rHl ki la ildh lieqb otqna rHl baHth otamr al ieqb hbh li bnim oam ain mth anki : oiHr ap ieqb brHl oiamr htHt alhim anki aSr mne mmk pri bTn : otamr hnh amti blhh ba alih otld el brki oabnh gm anki mmnh : ottn lo at blhh SpHth laSh oiba alih ieqb : othr blhh otld lieqb bn : otamr rHl dnni alhim ogm Sme bqli oitn li bn el kn qrah Smo dn : othr eod otld blhh SpHt rHl bn Sni lieqb : otamr rHl nptoli alhim nptlti em aHti gm iklti otqra Smo nptli : otra lah ki emdh mldt otqH at clph SpHth ottn ath lieqb laSh : otld clph SpHt lah lieqb bn : otamr lah bgd otqra at Smo gd : otld clph SpHt lah bn Sni lieqb : otamr lah baSri ki aSroni bnot otqra at Smo aSr : oilk raobn bimi qzir HTim oimza dodaim bSdh oiba atm al lah amo otamr rHl al lah tni na li mdodai bnk : otamr lh hmeT qHtk at aiSi olqHt gm at dodai bni otamr rHl lkn iSkb emk hlilh tHt dodai bnk : oiba ieqb mn hSdh berb otza lah lqrato otamr ali tboa ki Skr Skrtik bdodai bni oiSkb emh blilh hoa : oiSme alhim al lah othr otld lieqb bn HmiSi : otamr lah ntn alhim Skri aSr ntti SpHti laiSi otqra Smo iSSkr : othr eod lah otld bn SSi lieqb : otamr lah cbdni alhim ati cbd Tob hpem icblni aiSi ki ildti lo SSh bnim otqra at Smo cblon : oaHr ildh bt otqra at Smh dinh : oickr alhim at rHl oiSme alih alhim oiptH at rHmh : othr otld bn otamr asp alhim at Hrpti : otqra at Smo iosp lamr isp ihoh li bn aHr : oihi kaSr ildh rHl at iosp oiamr ieqb al lbn SlHni oalkh al mqomi olarzi : tnh at nSi oat ildi aSr ebdti atk bhn oalkh ki ath idet at ebdti aSr ebdtik : oiamr alio lbn am na mzati Hn beinik nHSti oibrkni ihoh bgllk : oiamr nqbh Skrk eli oatnh : oiamr alio ath idet at aSr ebdtik oat aSr hih mqnk ati : ki meT aSr hih lk lpni oiprz lrb oibrk ihoh atk lrgli oeth mti aeSh gm anki lbiti : oiamr mh atn lk oiamr ieqb la ttn li maomh am teSh li hdbr hch aSobh areh zank aSmr : aebr bkl zank hiom hsr mSm kl Sh nqd oTloa okl Sh Hom bkSbim oTloa onqd becim ohih Skri : oenth bi zdqti biom mHr ki tboa el Skri lpnik kl aSr ainno nqd oTloa becim oHom bkSbim gnob hoa ati : oiamr lbn hn lo ihi kdbrk : oisr biom hhoa at htiSim heqdim ohTlaim oat kl hecim hnqdot ohTlat kl aSr lbn bo okl Hom bkSbim oitn bid bnio : oiSm drk SlSt imim bino obin ieqb oieqb reh at zan lbn hnotrt : oiqH lo ieqb mql lbnh lH oloc oermon oipzl bhn pzlot lbnot mHSp hlbn aSr el hmqlot : oizg at hmqlot aSr pzl brhTim bSqtot hmim aSr tban hzan lStot lnkH hzan oiHmnh bban lStot : oiHmo hzan al hmqlot otldn hzan eqdim nqdim oTlaim : ohkSbim hprid ieqb oitn pni hzan al eqd okl Hom bzan lbn oiSt lo edrim lbdo ola Stm el zan lbn : ohih bkl iHm hzan hmqSrot oSm ieqb at hmqlot leini hzan brhTim liHmnh bmqlot : obheTip hzan la iSim ohih heTpim llbn ohqSrim lieqb : oiprz haiS mad mad oihi lo zan rbot oSpHot oebdim ogmlim oHmrim :

31

oiSme at dbri bni lbn lamr lqH ieqb at kl aSr labino omaSr labino eSh at kl hkbd hch : oira ieqb at pni lbn ohnh ainno emo ktmol SlSom : oiamr ihoh al ieqb Sob al arz abotik olmoldtk oahih emk : oiSlH ieqb oiqra lrHl ollah hSdh al zano : oiamr lhn rah anki at pni abikn ki ainno ali ktml SlSm oalhi abi hih emdi : oatnh idetn ki bkl kHi ebdti at abikn : oabikn htl bi ohHlp at mSkrti eSrt mnim ola ntno alhim lhre emdi : am kh iamr nqdim ihih Skrk oildo kl hzan nqdim oam kh iamr eqdim ihih Skrk oildo kl hzan eqdim : oizl alhim at mqnh abikm oitn li : oihi bet iHm hzan oaSa eini oara bHlom ohnh hetdim helim el hzan eqdim nqdim obrdim : oiamr ali mlak halhim bHlom ieqb oamr hnni : oiamr Sa na einik orah kl hetdim helim el hzan eqdim nqdim obrdim ki raiti at kl aSr lbn eSh lk : anki hal bit al aSr mSHt Sm mzbh aSr ndrt li Sm ndr eth qom za mn harz hcat oSob al arz moldtk : oten rHl olah otamrnh lo heod lno Hlq onHlh bbit abino : hloa nkriot nHSbno lo ki mkrno oiakl gm akol at kspno : ki kl heSr aSr hzil alhim mabino lno hoa olbnino oeth kl aSr amr alhim alik eSh : oiqm ieqb oiSa at bnio oat nSio el hgmlim : oinhg at kl mqnho oat kl rkSo aSr rkS mqnh qnino aSr rkS bpdn arm lboa al izHq abio arzh knen : olbn hlk lgcc at zano otgnb rHl at htrpim aSr labih : oignb ieqb at lb lbn harmi el bli hgid lo ki brH hoa : oibrH hoa okl aSr lo oiqm oiebr at hnhr oiSm at pnio hr hgled : oigd llbn biom hSliSi ki brH ieqb : oiqH at aHio emo oirdp aHrio drk Sbet imim oidbq ato bhr hgled : oiba alhim al lbn harmi bHlm hlilh oiamr lo hSmr lk pn tdbr em ieqb mTob ed re : oiSg lbn at ieqb oieqb tqe at ahlo bhr olbn tqe at aHio bhr hgled : oiamr lbn lieqb mh eSit otgnb at lbbi otnhg at bnti kSbiot Hrb : lmh nHbat lbrH otgnb ati ola hgdt li oaSlHk bSmHh obSrim btp obknor : ola nTStni lnSq lbni olbnti eth hsklt eSo : iS lal idi leSot emkm re oalhi abikm amS amr ali lamr hSmr lk mdbr em ieqb mTob ed re : oeth hlk hlkt ki nksp nkspth lbit abik lmh gnbt at alhi : oien ieqb oiamr llbn ki irati ki amrti pn tgcl at bnotik memi : em aSr tmza at alhik la iHih ngd aHino hkr lk mh emdi oqH lk ola ide ieqb ki rHl gnbtm : oiba lbn bahl ieqb obahl lah obahl Sti hamht ola mza oiza mahl lah oiba bahl rHl : orHl lqHh at htrpim otSmm bkr hgml otSb elihm oimSS lbn at kl hahl ola mza : otamr al abih al iHr beini adni ki loa aokl lqom mpnik ki drk nSim li oiHpS ola mza at htrpim : oiHr lieqb oirb blbn oien ieqb oiamr llbn mh pSei mh HTati ki dlqt aHri : ki mSSt at kl kli mh mzat mkl kli bitk Sim kh ngd aHi oaHik oiokiHo bin Snino : ch eSrim Snh anki emk rHlik oecik la Sklo oaili zank la aklti : Trph la hbati alik anki aHTnh midi tbqSnh gnbti iom ognbti lilh : hiiti biom aklni Hrb oqrH blilh otdd Snti meini : ch li eSrim Snh bbitk ebdtik arbe eSrh Snh bSti bntik oSS Snim bzank otHlp at mSkrti eSrt mnim : loli alhi abi alhi abrhm opHd izHq hih li ki eth riqm SlHtni at enii oat igie kpi rah alhim oiokH amS : oien lbn oiamr al ieqb hbnot bnti ohbnim bni ohzan zani okl aSr ath rah li hoa olbnti mh aeSh lalh hiom ao lbnihn aSr ildo : oeth lkh nkrth brit ani oath ohih led bini obink : oiqH ieqb abn oirimh mzbh : oiamr ieqb laHio lqTo abnim oiqHo abnim oieSo gl oiaklo Sm el hgl : oiqra lo lbn igr Shdota oieqb qra lo gled : oiamr lbn hgl hch ed bini obink hiom el kn qra Smo gled : ohmzph aSr amr izp ihoh bini obink ki nstr aiS mreho : am tenh at bnti oam tqH nSim el bnti ain aiS emno rah alhim ed bini obink : oiamr lbn lieqb hnh hgl hch ohnh hmzbh aSr iriti bini obink : ed hgl hch oedh hmzbh am ani la aebr alik at hgl hch oam ath la tebr ali at hgl hch oat hmzbh hcat lreh : alhi abrhm oalhi nHor iSpTo binino alhi abihm oiSbe ieqb bpHd abio izHq : oicbH ieqb cbH bhr oiqra laHio lakl lHm oiaklo lHm oilino bhr : oiSkm lbn bbqr oinSq lbnio olbnotio oibrk athm oilk oiSb lbn lmqmo :

32

oieqb hlk ldrko oipgeo bo mlaki alhim : oiamr ieqb kaSr ram mHnh alhim ch oiqra Sm hmqom hhoa mHnim : oiSlH ieqb mlakim lpnio al eSo aHio arzh Seir Sdh adom : oizo atm lamr kh tamron ladni leSo kh amr ebdk ieqb em lbn grti oaHr ed eth : oihi li Sor oHmor zan oebd oSpHh oaSlHh lhgid ladni lmza Hn beinik : oiSbo hmlakim al ieqb lamr bano al aHik al eSo ogm hlk lqratk oarbe maot aiS emo : oiira ieqb mad oizr lo oiHz at hem aSr ato oat hzan oat hbqr ohgmlim lSni mHnot : oiamr am iboa eSo al hmHnh haHt ohkho ohih hmHnh hnSar lpliTh : oiamr ieqb alhi abi abrhm oalhi abi izHq ihoh hamr ali Sob larzk olmoldtk oaiTibh emk : qTnti mkl hHsdim omkl hamt aSr eSit at ebdk ki bmqli ebrti at hirdn hch oeth hiiti lSni mHnot : hzilni na mid aHi mid eSo ki ira anki ato pn iboa ohkni am el bnim : oath amrt hiTb aiTib emk oSmti at crek kHol him aSr la ispr mrb : oiln Sm blilh hhoa oiqH mn hba bido mnHh leSo aHio : ecim matim otiSim eSrim rHlim matim oailim eSrim : gmlim miniqot obnihm SlSim prot arbeim oprim eSrh atnt eSrim oeirm eSrh : oitn bid ebdio edr edr lbdo oiamr al ebdio ebro lpni oroH tSimo bin edr obin edr : oizo at hraSon lamr ki ipgSk eSo aHi oSalk lamr lmi ath oanh tlk olmi alh lpnik : oamrt lebdk lieqb mnHh hoa SloHh ladni leSo ohnh gm hoa aHrino : oizo gm at hSni gm at hSliSi gm at kl hhlkim aHri hedrim lamr kdbr hch tdbron al eSo bmzakm ato : oamrtm gm hnh ebdk ieqb aHrino ki amr akprh pnio bmnHh hhlkt lpni oaHri kn arah pnio aoli iSa pni : otebr hmnHh el pnio ohoa ln blilh hhoa bmHnh : oiqm blilh hoa oiqH at Sti nSio oat Sti SpHtio oat aHd eSr ildio oiebr at mebr ibq : oiqHm oiebrm at hnHl oiebr at aSr lo : oiotr ieqb lbdo oiabq aiS emo ed elot hSHr : oira ki la ikl lo oige bkp irko otqe kp irk ieqb bhabqo emo : oiamr SlHni ki elh hSHr oiamr la aSlHk ki am brktni : oiamr alio mh Smk oiamr ieqb : oiamr la ieqb iamr eod Smk ki am iSral ki Srit em alhim oem anSim otokl : oiSal ieqb oiamr hgidh na Smk oiamr lmh ch tSal lSmi oibrk ato Sm : oiqra ieqb Sm hmqom pnial ki raiti alhim pnim al pnim otnzl npSi : oicrH lo hSmS kaSr ebr at pnoal ohoa zle el irko : el kn la iaklo bni iSral at gid hnSh aSr el kp hirk ed hiom hch ki nge bkp irk ieqb bgid hnSh :

33

oiSa ieqb einio oira ohnh eSo ba oemo arbe maot aiS oiHz at hildim el lah oel rHl oel Sti hSpHot : oiSm at hSpHot oat ildihn raSnh oat lah oildih aHrnim oat rHl oat iosp aHrnim : ohoa ebr lpnihm oiStHo arzh Sbe pemim ed gSto ed aHio : oirz eSo lqrato oiHbqho oipl el zoaro oiSqho oibko : oiSa at einio oira at hnSim oat hildim oiamr mi alh lk oiamr hildim aSr Hnn alhim at ebdk : otgSn hSpHot hnh oildihn otStHoin : otgS gm lah oildih oiStHoo oaHr ngS iosp orHl oiStHoo : oiamr mi lk kl hmHnh hch aSr pgSti oiamr lmza Hn beini adni : oiamr eSo iS li rb aHi ihi lk aSr lk : oiamr ieqb al na am na mzati Hn beinik olqHt mnHti midi ki el kn raiti pnik krat pni alhim otrzni : qH na at brkti aSr hbat lk ki Hnni alhim oki iS li kl oipzr bo oiqH : oiamr nseh onlkh oalkh lngdk : oiamr alio adni ide ki hildim rkim ohzan ohbqr elot eli odpqom iom aHd omto kl hzan : iebr na adni lpni ebdo oani atnhlh laTi lrgl hmlakh aSr lpni olrgl hildim ed aSr aba al adni Seirh : oiamr eSo azigh na emk mn hem aSr ati oiamr lmh ch amza Hn beini adni : oiSb biom hhoa eSo ldrko Seirh : oieqb nse skth oibn lo bit olmqnho eSh skt el kn qra Sm hmqom skot : oiba ieqb Slm eir Skm aSr barz knen bbao mpdn arm oiHn at pni heir : oiqn at Hlqt hSdh aSr nTh Sm ahlo mid bni Hmor abi Skm bmah qSiTh : oizb Sm mcbH oiqra lo al alhi iSral :

34

otza dinh bt lah aSr ildh lieqb lraot bbnot harz : oira ath Skm bn Hmor hHoi nSia harz oiqH ath oiSkb ath oienh : otdbq npSo bdinh bt ieqb oiahb at hner oidbr el lb hner : oiamr Skm al Hmor abio lamr qH li at hildh hcat laSh : oieqb Sme ki Tma at dinh bto obnio hio at mqnho bSdh ohHrS ieqb ed bam : oiza Hmor abi Skm al ieqb ldbr ato : obni ieqb bao mn hSdh kSmem oitezbo hanSim oiHr lhm mad ki nblh eSh biSral lSkb at bt ieqb okn la ieSh : oidbr Hmor atm lamr Skm bni HSqh npSo bbtkm tno na ath lo laSh : ohtHtno atno bntikm ttno lno oat bntino tqHo lkm : oatno tSbo oharz thih lpnikm Sbo osHroh ohaHco bh : oiamr Skm al abih oal aHih amza Hn beinikm oaSr tamro ali atn : hrbo eli mad mhr omtn oatnh kaSr tamro ali otno li at hner laSh : oieno bni ieqb at Skm oat Hmor abio bmrmh oidbro aSr Tma at dinh aHtm : oiamro alihm la nokl leSot hdbr hch ltt at aHtno laiS aSr lo erlh ki Hrph hoa lno : ak bcat naot lkm am thio kmno lhml lkm kl ckr : ontno at bntino lkm oat bntikm nqH lno oiSbno atkm ohiino lem aHd : oam la tSmeo alino lhmol olqHno at btno ohlkno : oiiTbo dbrihm beini Hmor obeini Skm bn Hmor : ola aHr hner leSot hdbr ki Hpz bbt ieqb ohoa nkbd mkl bit abio : oiba Hmor oSkm bno al Ser eirm oidbro al anSi eirm lamr : hanSim halh Slmim hm atno oiSbo barz oisHro ath oharz hnh rHbt idim lpnihm at bntm nqH lno lnSim oat bntino ntn lhm : ak bcat iato lno hanSim lSbt atno lhiot lem aHd bhmol lno kl ckr kaSr hm nmlim : mqnhm oqninm okl bhmtm hloa lno hm ak naoth lhm oiSbo atno : oiSmeo al Hmor oal Skm bno kl izai Ser eiro oimlo kl ckr kl izai Ser eiro : oihi biom hSliSi bhiotm kabim oiqHo Sni bni ieqb Smeon oloi aHi dinh aiS Hrbo oibao el heir bTH oihrgo kl ckr : oat Hmor oat Skm bno hrgo lpi Hrb oiqHo at dinh mbit Skm oizao : bni ieqb bao el hHllim oibco heir aSr Tmao aHotm : at zanm oat bqrm oat Hmrihm oat aSr beir oat aSr bSdh lqHo : oat kl Hilm oat kl Tpm oat nSihm Sbo oibco oat kl aSr bbit : oiamr ieqb al Smeon oal loi ekrtm ati lhbaiSni biSb harz bkneni obprci oani mti mspr onaspo eli ohkoni onSmdti ani obiti : oiamro hkconh ieSh at aHotno :

35

oiamr alhim al ieqb qom elh bit al oSb Sm oeSh Sm mcbH lal hnrah alik bbrHk mpni eSo aHik : oiamr ieqb al bito oal kl aSr emo hsro at alhi hnkr aSr btkkm ohThro ohHlipo Smltikm : onqomh onelh bit al oaeSh Sm mcbH lal henh ati biom zrti oihi emdi bdrk aSr hlkti : oitno al ieqb at kl alhi hnkr aSr bidm oat hncmim aSr bacnihm oiTmn atm ieqb tHt halh aSr em Skm : oiseo oihi Htt alhim el herim aSr sbibtihm ola rdpo aHri bni ieqb : oiba ieqb loch aSr barz knen hoa bit al hoa okl hem aSr emo : oibn Sm mcbH oiqra lmqom al bit al ki Sm nglo alio halhim bbrHo mpni aHio : otmt dbrh minqt rbqh otqbr mtHt lbit al tHt halon oiqra Smo alon bkot : oira alhim al ieqb eod bbao mpdn arm oibrk ato : oiamr lo alhim Smk ieqb la iqra Smk eod ieqb ki am iSral ihih Smk oiqra at Smo iSral : oiamr lo alhim ani al Sdi prh orbh goi oqhl goim ihih mmk omlkim mHlzik izao : oat harz aSr ntti labrhm olizHq lk atnnh olcrek aHrik atn at harz : oiel melio alhim bmqom aSr dbr ato : oizb ieqb mzbh bmqom aSr dbr ato mzbt abn oisk elih nsk oizq elih Smn : oiqra ieqb at Sm hmqom aSr dbr ato Sm alhim bit al : oiseo mbit al oihi eod kbrt harz lboa aprth otld rHl otqS bldth : oihi bhqSth bldth otamr lh hmildt al tirai ki gm ch lk bn : oihi bzat npSh ki mth otqra Smo bn aoni oabio qra lo bnimin : otmt rHl otqbr bdrk aprth hoa bit lHm : oizb ieqb mzbh el qbrth hoa mzbt qbrt rHl ed hiom : oise iSral oiT ahlh mhlah lmgdl edr : oihi bSkn iSral barz hhoa oilk raobn oiSkb at blhh pilgS abio oiSme iSral oihio bni ieqb Snim eSr : bni lah bkor ieqb raobn oSmeon oloi oihodh oiSSkr ocblon : bni rHl iosp obnimn : obni blhh SpHt rHl dn onptli : obni clph SpHt lah gd oaSr alh bni ieqb aSr ild lo bpdn arm : oiba ieqb al izHq abio mmra qrit harbe hoa Hbron aSr gr Sm abrhm oizHq : oihio imi izHq mat Snh oSmnim Snh : oigoe izHq oimt oiasp al emio cqn oSbe imim oiqbro ato eSo oieqb bnio :

36

oalh tldot eSo hoa adom : eSo lqH at nSio mbnot knen at edh bt ailon hHti oat ahlibmh bt enh bt zbeon hHoi : oat bSmt bt iSmeal aHot nbiot : otld edh leSo at alipc obSmt ildh at reoal : oahlibmh ildh at ieiS oat ielm oat qrH alh bni eSo aSr ildo lo barz knen : oiqH eSo at nSio oat bnio oat bntio oat kl npSot bito oat mqnho oat kl bhmto oat kl qnino aSr rkS barz knen oilk al arz mpni ieqb aHio : ki hih rkoSm rb mSbt iHdo ola iklh arz mgorihm lSat atm mpni mqnihm : oiSb eSo bhr Seir eSo hoa adom : oalh tldot eSo abi adom bhr Seir : alh Smot bni eSo alipc bn edh aSt eSo reoal bn bSmt aSt eSo : oihio bni alipc timn aomr zpo ogetm oqnc : otmne hith pilgS lalipc bn eSo otld lalipc at emlq alh bni edh aSt eSo : oalh bni reoal nHt ocrH Smh omch alh hio bni bSmt aSt eSo : oalh hio bni ahlibmh bt enh bt zbeon aSt eSo otld leSo at ieiS oat ielm oat qrH : alh alopi bni eSo bni alipc bkor eSo alop timn alop aomr alop zpo alop qnc : alop qrH alop getm alop emlq alh alopi alipc barz adom alh bni edh : oalh bni reoal bn eSo alop nHt alop crH alop Smh alop mch alh alopi reoal barz adom alh bni bSmt aSt eSo : oalh bni ahlibmh aSt eSo alop ieoS alop ielm alop qrH alh alopi ahlibmh bt enh aSt eSo : alh bni eSo oalh alopihm hoa adom : alh bni Seir hHri iSbi harz loTn oSobl ozbeon oenh : odSon oazr odiSn alh alopi hHri bni Seir barz adom : oihio bni loTn Hri ohimm oaHot loTn tmne : oalh bni Sobl elon omnHt oeibl Spo oaonm : oalh bni zbeon oaih oenh hoa enh aSr mza at himm bmdbr breto at hHmrim lzbeon abio : oalh bni enh dSn oahlibmh bt enh : oalh bni diSn Hmdn oaSbn oitrn okrn : alh bni azr blhn oceon oeqn : alh bni diSn eoz oarn : alh alopi hHri alop loTn alop Sobl alop zbeon alop enh : alop dSn alop azr alop diSn alh alopi hHri lalpihm barz Seir : oalh hmlkim aSr mlko barz adom lpni mlk mlk lbni iSral : oimlk badom ble bn beor oSm eiro dnhbh : oimt ble oimlk tHtio iobb bn crH mbzrh : oimt iobb oimlk tHtio HSm marz htimni : oimt HSm oimlk tHtio hdd bn bdd hmkh at mdin bSdh moab oSm eiro eoit : oimt hdd oimlk tHtio Smlh mmSrqh : oimt Smlh oimlk tHtio Saol mrHbot hnhr : oimt Saol oimlk tHtio bel Hnn bn ekbor : oimt bel Hnn bn ekbor oimlk tHtio hdr oSm eiro peo oSm aSto mhiTbal bt mTrd bt mi chb : oalh Smot alopi eSo lmSpHtm lmqmtm bSmtm alop tmne alop eloh alop itt : alop ahlibmh alop alh alop pinn : alop qnc alop timn alop mbzr : alop mgdial alop eirm alh alopi adom lmSbtm barz aHctm hoa eSo abi adom :

37

oiSb ieqb barz mgori abio barz knen : alh tldot ieqb iosp bn Sbe eSrh Snh hih reh at aHio bzan ohoa ner at bni blhh oat bni clph nSi abio oiba iosp at dbtm reh al abihm : oiSral ahb at iosp mkl bnio ki bn cqnim hoa lo oeSh lo ktnt psim : oirao aHio ki ato ahb abihm mkl aHio oiSnao ato ola iklo dbro lSlm : oiHlm iosp Hlom oigd laHio oiospo eod Sna ato : oiamr alihm Smeo na hHlom hch aSr Hlmti : ohnh anHno malmim almim btok hSdh ohnh qmh almti ogm nzbh ohnh tsbinh almtikm otStHoin lalmti : oiamro lo aHio hmlk tmlk elino am mSol tmSl bno oiospo eod Sna ato el Hlmtio oel dbrio : oiHlm eod Hlom aHr oispr ato laHio oiamr hnh Hlmti Hlom eod ohnh hSmS ohirH oaHd eSr kokbim mStHoim li : oispr al abio oal aHio oiger bo abio oiamr lo mh hHlom hch aSr Hlmt hboa nboa ani oamk oaHik lhStHot lk arzh : oiqnao bo aHio oabio Smr at hdbr : oilko aHio lreot at zan abihm bSkm : oiamr iSral al iosp hloa aHik reim bSkm lkh oaSlHk alihm oiamr lo hnni : oiamr lo lk na rah at Slom aHik oat Slom hzan ohSbni dbr oiSlHho memq Hbron oiba Skmh : oimzaho aiS ohnh teh bSdh oiSalho haiS lamr mh tbqS : oiamr at aHi anki mbqS hgidh na li aiph hm reim : oiamr haiS nseo mch ki Smeti amrim nlkh dtinh oilk iosp aHr aHio oimzam bdtn : oirao ato mrHq obTrm iqrb alihm oitnklo ato lhmito : oiamro aiS al aHio hnh bel hHlmot hlch ba : oeth lko onhrgho onSlkho baHd hbrot oamrno Hih reh akltho onrah mh ihio Hlmtio : oiSme raobn oizlho midm oiamr la nkno npS : oiamr alhm raobn al tSpko dm hSliko ato al hbor hch aSr bmdbr oid al tSlHo bo lmen hzil ato midm lhSibo al abio : oihi kaSr ba iosp al aHio oipSiTo at iosp at ktnto at ktnt hpsim aSr elio : oiqHho oiSlko ato hbrh ohbor rq ain bo mim : oiSbo lakl lHm oiSao einihm oirao ohnh arHt iSmealim bah mgled ogmlihm nSaim nkat ozri olT holkim lhorid mzrimh : oiamr ihodh al aHio mh bze ki nhrg at aHino oksino at dmo : lko onmkrno liSmealim oidno al thi bo ki aHino bSrno hoa oiSmeo aHio : oiebro anSim mdinim sHrim oimSko oielo at iosp mn hbor oimkro at iosp liSmealim beSrim ksp oibiao at iosp mzrimh : oiSb raobn al hbor ohnh ain iosp bbor oiqre at bgdio : oiSb al aHio oiamr hild ainno oani anh ani ba : oiqHo at ktnt iosp oiSHTo Seir ecim oiTblo at hktnt bdm : oiSlHo at ktnt hpsim oibiao al abihm oiamro cat mzano hkr na hktnt bnk hoa am la : oikirh oiamr ktnt bni Hih reh akltho Trp Trp iosp : oiqre ieqb Smltio oiSm Sq bmtnio oitabl el bno imim rbim : oiqmo kl bnio okl bntio lnHmo oiman lhtnHm oiamr ki ard al bni abl Salh oibk ato abio : ohmdnim mkro ato al mzrim lpoTipr sris preh Sr hTbHim :

38

oihi bet hhoa oird ihodh mat aHio oiT ed aiS edlmi oSmo Hirh : oira Sm ihodh bt aiS kneni oSmo Soe oiqHh oiba alih : othr otld bn oiqra at Smo er : othr eod otld bn otqra at Smo aonn : otsp eod otld bn otqra at Smo Slh ohih bkcib bldth ato : oiqH ihodh aSh ler bkoro oSmh tmr : oihi er bkor ihodh re beini ihoh oimtho ihoh : oiamr ihodh laonn ba al aSt aHik oibm ath ohqm cre laHik : oide aonn ki la lo ihih hcre ohih am ba al aSt aHio oSHt arzh lblti ntn cre laHio : oire beini ihoh aSr eSh oimt gm ato : oiamr ihodh ltmr klto Sbi almnh bit abik ed igdl Slh bni ki amr pn imot gm hoa kaHio otlk tmr otSb bit abih : oirbo himim otmt bt Soe aSt ihodh oinHm ihodh oiel el gcci zano hoa oHirh reho hedlmi tmnth : oigd ltmr lamr hnh Hmik elh tmnth lgc zano : otsr bgdi almnoth melih otks bzeip ottelp otSb bptH einim aSr el drk tmnth ki rath ki gdl Slh ohoa la ntnh lo laSh : oirah ihodh oiHSbh lconh ki ksth pnih : oiT alih al hdrk oiamr hbh na aboa alik ki la ide ki klto hoa otamr mh ttn li ki tboa ali : oiamr anki aSlH gdi ecim mn hzan otamr am ttn erbon ed SlHk : oiamr mh herbon aSr atn lk otamr Htmk optilk omTk aSr bidk oitn lh oiba alih othr lo : otqm otlk otsr zeiph melih otlbS bgdi almnoth : oiSlH ihodh at gdi hecim bid reho hedlmi lqHt herbon mid haSh ola mzah : oiSal at anSi mqmh lamr aih hqdSh hoa beinim el hdrk oiamro la hith bch qdSh : oiSb al ihodh oiamr la mzatih ogm anSi hmqom amro la hith bch qdSh : oiamr ihodh tqH lh pn nhih lboc hnh SlHti hgdi hch oath la mzath : oihi kmSlS HdSim oigd lihodh lamr cnth tmr kltk ogm hnh hrh lcnonim oiamr ihodh hoziaoh otSrp : hoa mozat ohia SlHh al Hmih lamr laiS aSr alh lo anki hrh otamr hkr na lmi hHtmt ohptilim ohmTh halh : oikr ihodh oiamr zdqh mmni ki el kn la nttih lSlh bni ola isp eod ldeth : oihi bet ldth ohnh taomim bbTnh : oihi bldth oitn id otqH hmildt otqSr el ido Sni lamr ch iza raSnh : oihi kmSib ido ohnh iza aHio otamr mh przt elik prz oiqra Smo prz : oaHr iza aHio aSr el ido hSni oiqra Smo crH :

39

oiosp hord mzrimh oiqnho poTipr sris preh Sr hTbHim aiS mzri mid hiSmealim aSr hordho Smh : oihi ihoh at iosp oihi aiS mzliH oihi bbit adnio hmzri : oira adnio ki ihoh ato okl aSr hoa eSh ihoh mzliH bido : oimza iosp Hn beinio oiSrt ato oipqdho el bito okl iS lo ntn bido : oihi mac hpqid ato bbito oel kl aSr iS lo oibrk ihoh at bit hmzri bgll iosp oihi brkt ihoh bkl aSr iS lo bbit obSdh : oiecb kl aSr lo bid iosp ola ide ato maomh ki am hlHm aSr hoa aokl oihi iosp iph tar oiph mrah : oihi aHr hdbrim halh otSa aSt adnio at einih al iosp otamr Skbh emi : oiman oiamr al aSt adnio hn adni la ide ati mh bbit okl aSr iS lo ntn bidi : ainno gdol bbit hch mmni ola HSk mmni maomh ki am aotk baSr at aSto oaik aeSh hreh hgdlh hcat oHTati lalhim : oihi kdbrh al iosp iom iom ola Sme alih lSkb azlh lhiot emh : oihi khiom hch oiba hbith leSot mlakto oain aiS manSi hbit Sm bbit : ottpSho bbgdo lamr Skbh emi oiecb bgdo bidh oins oiza hHozh : oihi kraoth ki ecb bgdo bidh oins hHozh : otqra lanSi bith otamr lhm lamr rao hbia lno aiS ebri lzHq bno ba ali lSkb emi oaqra bqol gdol : oihi kSmeo ki hrimti qoli oaqra oiecb bgdo azli oins oiza hHozh : otnH bgdo azlh ed boa adnio al bito : otdbr alio kdbrim halh lamr ba ali hebd hebri aSr hbat lno lzHq bi : oihi khrimi qoli oaqra oiecb bgdo azli oins hHozh : oihi kSme adnio at dbri aSto aSr dbrh alio lamr kdbrim halh eSh li ebdk oiHr apo : oiqH adni iosp ato oitnho al bit hshr mqom aSr asori hmlk asorim oihi Sm bbit hshr : oihi ihoh at iosp oiT alio Hsd oitn Hno beini Sr bit hshr : oitn Sr bit hshr bid iosp at kl hasirm aSr bbit hshr oat kl aSr eSim Sm hoa hih eSh : ain Sr bit hshr rah at kl maomh bido baSr ihoh ato oaSr hoa eSh ihoh mzliH :

40

oihi aHr hdbrim halh HTao mSqh mlk mzrim ohaph ladnihm lmlk mzrim : oiqzp preh el Sni srisio el Sr hmSqim oel Sr haopim : oitn atm bmSmr bit Sr hTbHim al bit hshr mqom aSr iosp asor Sm : oipqd Sr hTbHim at iosp atm oiSrt atm oihio imim bmSmr : oiHlmo Hlom Snihm aiS Hlmo blilh aHd aiS kptron Hlmo hmSqh ohaph aSr lmlk mzrim aSr asorim bbit hshr : oiba alihm iosp bbqr oira atm ohnm cepim : oiSal at srisi preh aSr ato bmSmr bit adnio lamr mdoe pnikm reim hiom : oiamro alio Hlom Hlmno optr ain ato oiamr alhm iosp hloa lalhim ptrnim spro na li : oispr Sr hmSqim at Hlmo liosp oiamr lo bHlomi ohnh gpn lpni : obgpn SlSh Srigm ohia kprHt elth nzh hbSilo aSkltih enbim : okos preh bidi oaqH at henbim oaSHT atm al kos preh oatn at hkos el kp preh : oiamr lo iosp ch ptrno SlSt hSrgim SlSt imim hm : beod SlSt imim iSa preh at raSk ohSibk el knk ontt kos preh bido kmSpT hraSon aSr hiit mSqho : ki am ckrtni atk kaSr iiTb lk oeSit na emdi Hsd ohckrtni al preh ohozatni mn hbit hch : ki gnb gnbti marz hebrim ogm ph la eSiti maomh ki Smo ati bbor : oira Sr hapim ki Tob ptr oiamr al iosp ap ani bHlomi ohnh SlSh sli Hri el raSi : obsl helion mkl makl preh meSh aph oheop akl atm mn hsl mel raSi : oien iosp oiamr ch ptrno SlSt hslim SlSt imim hm : beod SlSt imim iSa preh at raSk melik otlh aotk el ez oakl heop at bSrk melik : oihi biom hSliSi iom hldt at preh oieS mSth lkl ebdio oiSa at raS Sr hmSqim oat raS Sr hapim btok ebdio : oiSb at Sr hmSqim el mSqho oitn hkos el kp preh : oat Sr hapim tlh kaSr ptr lhm iosp : ola ckr Sr hmSqim at iosp oiSkHho :

41

oihi mqz Sntim imim opreh Hlm ohnh emd el hiar : ohnh mn hiar elt Sbe prot ipot mrah obriat bSr otreinh baHo : ohnh Sbe prot aHrot elot aHrihn mn hiar reot mrah odqot bSr otemdnh azl hprot el Spt hiar : otaklnh hprot reot hmrah odqt hbSr at Sbe hprot ipt hmrah ohbriat oiiqz preh : oiiSn oiHlm Snit ohnh Sbe Sblim elot bqnh aHd briaot oTbot : ohnh Sbe Sblim dqot oSdopt qdim zmHot aHrihn : otblenh hSblim hdqot at Sbe hSblim hbriaot ohmlaot oiiqz preh ohnh Hlom : oihi bbqr otpem roHo oiSlH oiqra at kl HrTmi mzrim oat kl Hkmih oispr preh lhm at Hlmo oain potr aotm lpreh : oidbr Sr hmSqim at preh lamr at HTai ani mckir hiom : preh qzp el ebdio oitn ati bmSmr bit Sr hTbHim ati oat Sr hapim : onHlmh Hlom blilh aHd ani ohoa aiS kptron Hlmo Hlmno : oSm atno ner ebri ebd lSr hTbHim onspr lo oiptr lno at Hlmtino aiS kHlmo ptr : oihi kaSr ptr lno kn hih ati hSib el kni oato tlh : oiSlH preh oiqra at iosp oirizho mn hbor oiglH oiHlp Smltio oiba al preh : oiamr preh al iosp Hlom Hlmti optr ain ato oani Smeti elik lamr tSme Hlom lptr ato : oien iosp at preh lamr bledi alhim ienh at Slom preh : oidbr preh al iosp bHlmi hnni emd el Spt hiar : ohnh mn hiar elt Sbe prot briaot bSr oipt tar otreinh
