baHo : ohnh Sbe prot aHrot elot aHrihn dlot oreot tar mad orqot bSr la raiti khnh bkl arz mzrim lre : otaklnh hprot hrqot ohreot at Sbe hprot hraSnot hbriat : otbanh al qrbnh ola node ki bao al qrbnh omraihn re kaSr btHlh oaiqz : oara bHlmi ohnh Sbe Sblim elt bqnh aHd mlat oTbot : ohnh Sbe Sblim znmot dqot Sdpot qdim zmHot aHrihm : otblen hSblim hdqt at Sbe hSblim hTbot oamr al hHrTmim oain mgid li : oiamr iosp al preh Hlom preh aHd hoa at aSr halhim eSh hgid lpreh : Sbe prt hTbt Sbe Snim hnh oSbe hSblim hTbt Sbe Snim hnh Hlom aHd hoa : oSbe hprot hrqot ohret helt aHrihn Sbe Snim hnh oSbe hSblim hrqot Sdpot hqdim ihio Sbe Sni reb : hoa hdbr aSr dbrti al preh aSr halhim eSh hrah at preh : hnh Sbe Snim baot Sbe gdol bkl arz mzrim : oqmo Sbe Sni reb aHrihn onSkH kl hSbe barz mzrim oklh hreb at harz : ola iode hSbe barz mpni hreb hhoa aHri kn ki kbd hoa mad : oel hSnot hHlom al preh pemim ki nkon hdbr mem halhim ommhr halhim leSto : oeth ira preh aiS nbon oHkm oiSitho el arz mzrim : ieSh preh oipqd pqdim el harz oHmS at arz mzrim bSbe Sni hSbe : oiqbzo at kl akl hSnim hTbt hbat halh oizbro br tHt id preh akl berim oSmro : ohih hakl lpqdon larz lSbe Sni hreb aSr thiin barz mzrim ola tkrt harz breb : oiiTb hdbr beini preh obeini kl ebdio : oiamr preh al ebdio hnmza kch aiS aSr roH alhim bo : oiamr preh al iosp aHri hodie alhim aotk at kl cat ain nbon oHkm kmok : ath thih el biti oel pik iSq kl emi rq hksa agdl mmk : oiamr preh al iosp rah ntti atk el kl arz mzrim : oisr preh at Tbeto mel ido oitn ath el id iosp oilbS ato bgdi SS oiSm rbd hchb el zoaro : oirkb ato bmrkbt hmSnh aSr lo oiqrao lpnio abrk onton ato el kl arz mzrim : oiamr preh al iosp ani preh obledik la irim aiS at ido oat rglo bkl arz mzrim : oiqra preh Sm iosp zpnt penH oitn lo at asnt bt poTi pre khn an laSh oiza iosp el arz mzrim : oiosp bn SlSim Snh bemdo lpni preh mlk mzrim oiza iosp mlpni preh oiebr bkl arz mzrim : oteS harz bSbe Sni hSbe lqmzim : oiqbz at kl akl Sbe Snim aSr hio barz mzrim oitn akl berim akl Sdh heir aSr sbibtih ntn btokh : oizbr iosp br kHol him hrbh mad ed ki Hdl lspr ki ain mspr : oliosp ild Sni bnim bTrm tboa Snt hreb aSr ildh lo asnt bt poTi pre khn aon : oiqra iosp at Sm hbkor mnSh ki nSni alhim at kl emli oat kl bit abi : oat Sm hSni qra aprim ki hprni alhim barz enii : otklinh Sbe Sni hSbe aSr hih barz mzrim : otHlinh Sbe Sni hreb lboa kaSr amr iosp oihi reb bkl harzot obkl arz mzrim hih lHm : otreb kl arz mzrim oizeq hem al preh llHm oiamr preh lkl mzrim lko al iosp aSr iamr lkm teSo : ohreb hih el kl pni harz oiptH iosp at kl aSr bhm oiSbr lmzrim oiHcq hreb barz mzrim : okl harz bao mzrimh lSbr al iosp ki Hcq hreb bkl harz :

42

oira ieqb ki iS Sbr bmzrim oiamr ieqb lbnio lmh ttrao : oiamr hnh Smeti ki iS Sbr bmzrim rdo Smh oSbro lno mSm onHih ola nmot : oirdo aHi iosp eSrh lSbr br mmzrim : oat bnimin aHi iosp la SlH ieqb at aHio ki amr pn iqrano ason : oibao bni iSral lSbr btok hbaim ki hih hreb barz knen : oiosp hoa hSliT el harz hoa hmSbir lkl em harz oibao aHi iosp oiStHoo lo apim arzh : oira iosp at aHio oikrm oitnkr alihm oidbr atm qSot oiamr alhm main batm oiamro marz knen lSbr akl : oikr iosp at aHio ohm la hkrho : oickr iosp at hHlmot aSr Hlm lhm oiamr alhm mrglim atm lraot at erot harz batm : oiamro alio la adni oebdik bao lSbr akl : klno bni aiS aHd nHno knim anHno la hio ebdik mrglim : oiamr alhm la ki erot harz batm lraot : oiamro Snim eSr ebdik aHim anHno bni aiS aHd barz knen ohnh hqTn at abino hiom ohaHd ainno : oiamr alhm iosp hoa aSr dbrti alkm lamr mrglim atm : bcat tbHno Hi preh am tzao mch ki am bboa aHikm hqTn hnh : SlHo mkm aHd oiqH at aHikm oatm hasro oibHno dbrikm hamt atkm oam la Hi preh ki mrglim atm : oiasp atm al mSmr SlSt imim : oiamr alhm iosp biom hSliSi cat eSo oHio at halhim ani ira : am knim atm aHikm aHd iasr bbit mSmrkm oatm lko hbiao Sbr rebon btikm : oat aHikm hqTn tbiao ali oiamno dbrikm ola tmoto oieSo kn : oiamro aiS al aHio abl aSmim anHno el aHino aSr raino zrt npSo bhtHnno alino ola Smeno el kn bah alino hzrh hcat : oien raobn atm lamr hloa amrti alikm lamr al tHTao bild ola Smetm ogm dmo hnh ndrS : ohm la ideo ki Sme iosp ki hmliz bintm : oisb melihm oibk oiSb alhm oidbr alhm oiqH matm at Smeon oiasr ato leinihm : oizo iosp oimlao at klihm br olhSib kspihm aiS al Sqo oltt lhm zdh ldrk oieS lhm kn : oiSao at Sbrm el Hmrihm oilko mSm : oiptH haHd at Sqo ltt mspoa lHmro bmlon oira at kspo ohnh hoa bpi amtHto : oiamr al aHio hoSb kspi ogm hnh bamtHti oiza lbm oiHrdo aiS al aHio lamr mh cat eSh alhim lno : oibao al ieqb abihm arzh knen oigido lo at kl hqrt atm lamr : dbr haiS adni harz atno qSot oitn atno kmrglim at harz : onamr alio knim anHno la hiino mrglim : Snim eSr anHno aHim bni abino haHd ainno ohqTn hiom at abino barz knen : oiamr alino haiS adni harz bcat ade ki knim atm aHikm haHd hniHo ati oat rebon btikm qHo olko : ohbiao at aHikm hqTn ali oadeh ki la mrglim atm ki knim atm at aHikm atn lkm oat harz tsHro : oihi hm mriqim Sqihm ohnh aiS zror kspo bSqo oirao at zrrot kspihm hmh oabihm oiirao : oiamr alhm ieqb abihm ati Skltm iosp ainno oSmeon ainno oat bnimn tqHo eli hio klnh : oiamr raobn al abio lamr at Sni bni tmit am la abiano alik tnh ato el idi oani aSibno alik : oiamr la ird bni emkm ki aHio mt ohoa lbdo nSar oqraho ason bdrk aSr tlko bh ohordtm at Sibti bigon Saolh :

43

ohreb kbd barz : oihi kaSr klo lakl at hSbr aSr hbiao mmzrim oiamr alihm abihm Sbo Sbro lno meT akl : oiamr alio ihodh lamr hed hed bno haiS lamr la trao pni blti aHikm atkm : am iSk mSlH at aHino atno nrdh onSbrh lk akl : oam aink mSlH la nrd ki haiS amr alino la trao pni blti aHikm atkm : oiamr iSral lmh hretm li lhgid laiS heod lkm aH : oiamro Saol Sal haiS lno olmoldtno lamr heod abikm Hi hiS lkm aH ongd lo el pi hdbrim halh hidoe nde ki iamr horido at aHikm : oiamr ihodh al iSral abio SlHh hner ati onqomh onlkh onHih ola nmot gm anHno gm ath gm Tpno : anki aerbno midi tbqSno am la hbiatio alik ohzgtio lpnik oHTati lk kl himim : ki lola htmhmhno ki eth Sbno ch pemim : oiamr alhm iSral abihm am kn apoa cat eSo qHo mcmrt harz bklikm ohorido laiS mnHh meT zri omeT dbS nkat olT bTnim oSqdim : oksp mSnh qHo bidkm oat hksp hmoSb bpi amtHtikm tSibo bidkm aoli mSgh hoa : oat aHikm qHo oqomo Sobo al haiS : oal Sdi itn lkm rHmim lpni haiS oSlH lkm at aHikm aHr oat bnimin oani kaSr Sklti Sklti : oiqHo hanSim at hmnHh hcat omSnh ksp lqHo bidm oat bnimn oiqmo oirdo mzrim oiemdo lpni iosp : oira iosp atm at bnimin oiamr laSr el bito hba at hanSim hbith oTbH TbH ohkn ki ati iaklo hanSim bzhrim : oieS haiS kaSr amr iosp oiba haiS at hanSim bith iosp : oiirao hanSim ki hobao bit iosp oiamro el dbr hksp hSb bamtHtino btHlh anHno mobaim lhtgll elino olhtnpl elino olqHt atno lebdim oat Hmrino : oigSo al haiS aSr el bit iosp oidbro alio ptH hbit : oiamro bi adni ird irdno btHlh lSbr akl : oihi ki bano al hmlon onptHh at amtHtino ohnh ksp aiS bpi amtHto kspno bmSqlo onSb ato bidno : oksp aHr hordno bidno lSbr akl la ideno mi Sm kspno bamtHtino : oiamr Slom lkm al tirao alhikm oalhi abikm ntn lkm mTmon bamtHtikm kspkm ba ali oioza alhm at Smeon : oiba haiS at hanSim bith iosp oitn mim oirHzo rglihm oitn mspoa lHmrihm : oikino at hmnHh ed boa iosp bzhrim ki Smeo ki Sm iaklo lHm : oiba iosp hbith oibiao lo at hmnHh aSr bidm hbith oiStHoo lo arzh : oiSal lhm lSlom oiamr hSlom abikm hcqn aSr amrtm heodno Hi : oiamro Slom lebdk labino eodno Hi oiqdo oiStHo : oiSa einio oira at bnimin aHio bn amo oiamr hch aHikm hqTn aSr amrtm ali oiamr alhim iHnk bni : oimhr iosp ki nkmro rHmio al aHio oibqS lbkot oiba hHdrh oibk Smh : oirHz pnio oiza oitapq oiamr Simo lHm : oiSimo lo lbdo olhm lbdm olmzrim haklim ato lbdm ki la ioklon hmzrim lakl at hebrim lHm ki toebh hoa lmzrim : oiSbo lpnio hbkr kbkrto ohzeir kzerto oitmho hanSim aiS al reho : oiSa mSat mat pnio alhm otrb mSat bnimn mmSat klm HmS idot oiSto oiSkro emo :

44

oizo at aSr el bito lamr mla at amtHt hanSim akl kaSr ioklon Sat oSim ksp aiS bpi amtHto : oat gbiei gbie hksp tSim bpi amtHt hqTn oat ksp Sbro oieS kdbr iosp aSr dbr : hbqr aor ohanSim SlHo hmh oHmrihm : hm izao at heir la hrHiqo oiosp amr laSr el bito qom rdp aHri hanSim ohSgtm oamrt alhm lmh Slmtm reh tHt Tobh : hloa ch aSr iSth adni bo ohoa nHS inHS bo hretm aSr eSitm : oiSgm oidbr alhm at hdbrim halh : oiamro alio lmh idbr adni kdbrim halh Hlilh lebdik meSot kdbr hch : hn ksp aSr mzano bpi amtHtino hSibno alik marz knen oaik ngnb mbit adnik ksp ao chb : aSr imza ato mebdik omt ogm anHno nhih ladni lebdim : oiamr gm eth kdbrikm kn hoa aSr imza ato ihih li ebd oatm thio nqim : oimhro oiordo aiS at amtHto arzh oiptHo aiS amtHto : oiHpS bgdol hHl obqTn klh oimza hgbie bamtHt bnimn : oiqreo Smltm oiems aiS el Hmro oiSbo heirh : oiba ihodh oaHio bith iosp ohoa eodno Sm oiplo lpnio arzh : oiamr lhm iosp mh hmeSh hch aSr eSitm hloa idetm ki nHS inHS aiS aSr kmni : oiamr ihodh mh namr ladni mh ndbr omh nzTdq halhim mza at eon ebdik hnno ebdim ladni gm anHno gm aSr nmza hgbie bido : oiamr Hlilh li meSot cat haiS aSr nmza hgbie bido hoa ihih li ebd oatm elo lSlom al abikm : oigS alio ihodh oiamr bi adni idbr na ebdk dbr bacni adni oal iHr apk bebdk ki kmok kpreh : adni Sal at ebdio lamr hiS lkm ab ao aH : onamr al adni iS lno ab cqn oild cqnim qTn oaHio mt oiotr hoa lbdo lamo oabio ahbo : otamr al ebdik hordho ali oaSimh eini elio : onamr al adni la iokl hner lecb at abio oecb at abio omt : otamr al ebdik am la ird aHikm hqTn atkm la tspon lraot pni : oihi ki elino al ebdk abi ongd lo at dbri adni : oiamr abino Sbo Sbro lno meT akl : onamr la nokl lrdt am iS aHino hqTn atno oirdno ki la nokl lraot pni haiS oaHino hqTn ainno atno : oiamr ebdk abi alino atm idetm ki Snim ildh li aSti : oiza haHd mati oamr ak Trp Trp ola raitio ed hnh : olqHtm gm at ch mem pni oqrho ason ohordtm at Sibti breh Salh : oeth kbai al ebdk abi ohner ainno atno onpSo qSorh bnpSo : ohih kraoto ki ain hner omt ohorido ebdik at Sibt ebdk abino bigon Salh : ki ebdk erb at hner mem abi lamr am la abiano alik oHTati labi kl himim : oeth iSb na ebdk tHt hner ebd ladni ohner iel em aHio : ki aik aelh al abi ohner ainno ati pn arah bre aSr imza at abi :

45

ola ikl iosp lhtapq lkl hnzbim elio oiqra hoziao kl aiS meli ola emd aiS ato bhtode iosp al aHio : oitn at qlo bbki oiSmeo mzrim oiSme bit preh : oiamr iosp al aHio ani iosp heod abi Hi ola iklo aHio lenot ato ki nbhlo mpnio : oiamr iosp al aHio gSo na ali oigSo oiamr ani iosp aHikm aSr mkrtm ati mzrimh : oeth al tezbo oal iHr beinikm ki mkrtm ati hnh ki lmHih SlHni alhim lpnikm : ki ch Sntim hreb bqrb harz oeod HmS Snim aSr ain HriS oqzir : oiSlHni alhim lpnikm lSom lkm Sarit barz olhHiot lkm lpliTh gdlh : oeth la atm SlHtm ati hnh ki halhim oiSimni lab lpreh oladon lkl bito omSl bkl arz mzrim : mhro oelo al abi oamrtm alio kh amr bnk iosp Smni alhim ladon lkl mzrim rdh ali al temd : oiSbt barz gSn ohiit qrob ali ath obnik obni bnik ozank obqrk okl aSr lk : oklklti atk Sm ki eod HmS Snim reb pn torS ath obitk okl aSr lk : ohnh einikm raot oeini aHi bnimin ki pi hmdbr alikm : ohgdtm labi at kl kbodi bmzrim oat kl aSr raitm omhrtm ohordtm at abi hnh : oipl el zoari bnimn aHio oibk obnimn bkh el zoario : oinSq lkl aHio oibk elihm oaHri kn dbro aHio ato : ohql nSme bit preh lamr bao aHi iosp oiiTb beini preh obeini ebdio : oiamr preh al iosp amr al aHik cat eSo Teno at beirkm olko bao arzh knen : oqHo at abikm oat btikm obao ali oatnh lkm at Tob arz mzrim oaklo at Hlb harz : oath zoith cat eSo qHo lkm marz mzrim eglot lTpkm olnSikm onSatm at abikm obatm : oeinkm al tHs el klikm ki Tob kl arz mzrim lkm hoa : oieSo kn bni iSral oitn lhm iosp eglot el pi preh oitn lhm zdh ldrk : lklm ntn laiS Hlpot Smlt olbnimn ntn SlS maot ksp oHmS Hlpt Smlt : olabio SlH kcat eSrh Hmrim nSaim mTob mzrim oeSr atnt nSat br olHm omcon labio ldrk : oiSlH at aHio oilko oiamr alhm al trgco bdrk : oielo mmzrim oibao arz knen al ieqb abihm : oigdo lo lamr eod iosp Hi oki hoa mSl bkl arz mzrim oipg lbo ki la hamin lhm : oidbro alio at kl dbri iosp aSr dbr alhm oira at heglot aSr SlH iosp lSat ato otHi roH ieqb abihm : oiamr iSral rb eod iosp bni Hi alkh oarano bTrm amot :

46

oise iSral okl aSr lo oiba barh Sbe oicbH cbHim lalhi abio izHq : oiamr alhim liSral bmrat hlilh oiamr ieqb ieqb oiamr hnni : oiamr anki hal alhi abik al tira mrdh mzrimh ki lgoi gdol aSimk Sm : anki ard emk mzrimh oanki aelk gm elh oiosp iSit ido el einik : oiqm ieqb mbar Sbe oiSao bni iSral at ieqb abihm oat Tpm oat nSihm beglot aSr SlH preh lSat ato : oiqHo at mqnihm oat rkoSm aSr rkSo barz knen oibao mzrimh ieqb okl creo ato : bnio obni bnio ato bntio obnot bnio okl creo hbia ato mzrimh : oalh Smot bni iSral hbaim mzrimh ieqb obnio bkr ieqb raobn : obni raobn Hnok oploa oHzron okrmi : obni Smeon imoal oimin oahd oikin ozHr oSaol bn hknenit : obni loi grSon qht omrri : obni ihodh er oaonn oSlh oprz ocrH oimt er oaonn barz knen oihio bni prz Hzron oHmol : obni iSSkr tole opoh oiob oSmron : obni cboln srd oalon oiHlal : alh bni lah aSr ildh lieqb bpdn arm oat dinh bto kl npS bnio obnotio SlSim oSlS : obni gd zpion oHgi Soni oazbn eri oarodi oarali : obni aSr imnh oiSoh oiSoi obrieh oSrH aHtm obni brieh Hbr omlkial : alh bni clph aSr ntn lbn llah bto otld at alh lieqb SS eSrh npS : bni rHl aSt ieqb iosp obnimn : oiold liosp barz mzrim aSr ildh lo asnt bt poTi pre khn an at mnSh oat aprim : obni bnimn ble obkr oaSbl gra onemn aHi oraS mpim oHpim oard : alh bni rHl aSr ild lieqb kl npS arbeh eSr : obni dn HSim : obni nptli iHzal ogoni oizr oSlm : alh bni blhh aSr ntn lbn lrHl bto otld at alh lieqb kl npS Sbeh : kl hnpS hbah lieqb mzrimh izai irko mlbd nSi bni ieqb kl npS SSim oSS : obni iosp aSr ild lo bmzrim npS Snim kl hnpS lbit ieqb hbah mzrimh Sbeim : oat ihodh SlH lpnio al iosp lhort lpnio gSnh oibao arzh gSn : oiasr iosp mrkbto oiel lqrat iSral abio gSnh oira alio oipl el zoario oibk el zoario eod : oiamr iSral al iosp amoth hpem aHri raoti at pnik ki eodk Hi : oiamr iosp al aHio oal bit abio aelh oagidh lpreh oamrh alio aHi obit abi aSr barz knen bao ali : ohanSim rei zan ki anSi mqnh hio ozanm obqrm okl aSr lhm hbiao : ohih ki iqra lkm preh oamr mh meSikm : oamrtm anSi mqnh hio ebdik mneorino oed eth gm anHno gm abtino bebor tSbo barz gSn ki toebt mzrim kl reh zan :

47

oiba iosp oigd lpreh oiamr abi oaHi ozanm obqrm okl aSr lhm bao marz knen ohnm barz gSn : omqzh aHio lqH HmSh anSim oizgm lpni preh : oiamr preh al aHio mh meSikm oiamro al preh reh zan ebdik gm anHno gm abotino : oiamro al preh lgor barz bano ki ain mreh lzan aSr lebdik ki kbd hreb barz knen oeth iSbo na ebdik barz gSn : oiamr preh al iosp lamr abik oaHik bao alik : arz mzrim lpnik hoa bmiTb harz hoSb at abik oat aHik iSbo barz gSn oam idet oiS bm anSi Hil oSmtm Sri mqnh el aSr li : oiba iosp at ieqb abio oiemdho lpni preh oibrk ieqb at preh : oiamr preh al ieqb kmh imi Sni Hiik : oiamr ieqb al preh imi Sni mgori SlSim omat Snh meT oreim hio imi Sni Hii ola hSigo at imi Sni Hii abti bimi mgorihm : oibrk ieqb at preh oiza mlpni preh : oioSb iosp at abio oat aHio oitn lhm aHch barz mzrim bmiTb harz barz remss kaSr zoh preh : oiklkl iosp at abio oat aHio oat kl bit abio lHm lpi hTp : olHm ain bkl harz ki kbd hreb mad otlh arz mzrim oarz knen mpni hreb : oilqT iosp at kl hksp hnmza barz mzrim obarz knen bSbr aSr hm Sbrim oiba iosp at hksp bith preh : oitm hksp marz mzrim omarz knen oibao kl mzrim al iosp lamr hbh lno lHm olmh nmot ngdk ki aps ksp : oiamr iosp hbo mqnikm oatnh lkm bmqnikm am aps ksp : oibiao at mqnihm al iosp oitn lhm iosp lHm bsosim obmqnh hzan obmqnh hbqr obHmrim oinhlm blHm bkl mqnhm bSnh hhoa : ottm hSnh hhoa oibao alio bSnh hSnit oiamro lo la nkHd madni ki am tm hksp omqnh hbhmh al adni la nSar lpni adni blti am goitno oadmtno : lmh nmot leinik gm anHno gm admtno qnh atno oat admtno blHm onhih anHno oadmtno ebdim lpreh otn cre onHih ola nmot ohadmh la tSm : oiqn iosp at kl admt mzrim lpreh ki mkro mzrim aiS Sdho ki Hcq elhm hreb othi harz lpreh : oat hem hebir ato lerim mqzh gbol mzrim oed qzho : rq admt hkhnim la qnh ki Hq lkhnim mat preh oaklo at Hqm aSr ntn lhm preh el kn la mkro at admtm : oiamr iosp al hem hn qniti atkm hiom oat admtkm lpreh ha lkm cre ocretm at hadmh : ohih btboat onttm HmiSit lpreh oarbe hidt ihih lkm lcre hSdh olaklkm olaSr bbtikm olakl lTpkm : oiamro hHitno nmza Hn beini adni ohiino ebdim lpreh : oiSm ath iosp lHq ed hiom hch el admt mzrim lpreh lHmS rq admt hkhnim lbdm la hith lpreh : oiSb iSral barz mzrim barz gSn oiaHco bh oipro oirbo mad : oiHi ieqb barz mzrim Sbe eSrh Snh oihi imi ieqb Sni Hiio Sbe Snim oarbeim omat Snh : oiqrbo imi iSral lmot oiqra lbno liosp oiamr lo am na mzati Hn beinik Sim na idk tHt irki oeSit emdi Hsd oamt al na tqbrni bmzrim : oSkbti em abti onSatni mmzrim oqbrtni bqbrtm oiamr anki aeSh kdbrk : oiamr hSbeh li oiSbe lo oiStHo iSral el raS hmTh :

48

oihi aHri hdbrim halh oiamr liosp hnh abik Hlh oiqH at Sni bnio emo at mnSh oat aprim : oigd lieqb oiamr hnh bnk iosp ba alik oitHcq iSral oiSb el hmTh : oiamr ieqb al iosp al Sdi nrah ali bloc barz knen oibrk ati : oiamr ali hnni mprk ohrbitk onttik lqhl emim ontti at harz hcat lcrek aHrik aHct eolm : oeth Sni bnik hnoldim lk barz mzrim ed bai alik mzrimh li hm aprim omnSh kraobn oSmeon ihio li : omoldtk aSr holdt aHrihm lk ihio el Sm aHihm iqrao bnHltm : oani bbai mpdn mth eli rHl barz knen bdrk beod kbrt arz lba aprth oaqbrh Sm bdrk aprt hoa bit lHm : oira iSral at bni iosp oiamr mi alh : oiamr iosp al abio bni hm aSr ntn li alhim bch oiamr qHm na ali oabrkm : oeini iSral kbdo mcqn la iokl lraot oigS atm alio oiSq lhm oiHbq lhm : oiamr iSral al iosp rah pnik la pllti ohnh hrah ati alhim gm at crek : oioza iosp atm mem brkio oiStHo lapio arzh : oiqH iosp at Snihm at aprim bimino mSmal iSral oat mnSh bSmalo mimin iSral oigS alio : oiSlH iSral at imino oiSt el raS aprim ohoa hzeir oat Smalo el raS mnSh Skl at idio ki mnSh hbkor : oibrk at iosp oiamr halhim aSr hthlko abti lpnio abrhm oizHq halhim hreh ati meodi ed hiom hch : hmlak hgal ati mkl re ibrk at hnerim oiqra bhm Smi oSm abti abrhm oizHq oidgo lrb bqrb harz : oira iosp ki iSit abio id imino el raS aprim oire beinio oitmk id abio lhsir ath mel raS aprim el raS mnSh : oiamr iosp al abio la kn abi ki ch hbkr Sim imink el raSo : oiman abio oiamr ideti bni ideti gm hoa ihih lem ogm hoa igdl oaolm aHio hqTn igdl mmno ocreo ihih mla hgoim : oibrkm biom hhoa lamor bk ibrk iSral lamr iSmk alhim kaprim okmnSh oiSm at aprim lpni mnSh : oiamr iSral al iosp hnh anki mt ohih alhim emkm ohSib atkm al arz abtikm : oani ntti lk Skm aHd el aHik aSr lqHti mid hamri bHrbi obqSti :

49

oiqra ieqb al bnio oiamr haspo oagidh lkm at aSr iqra atkm baHrit himim : hqbzo oSmeo bni ieqb oSmeo al iSral abikm : raobn bkri ath kHi oraSit aoni itr Sat oitr ec : pHc kmim al totr ki elit mSkbi abik ac Hllt izoei elh : Smeon oloi aHim kli Hms mkrtihm : bsdm al tba npSi bqhlm al tHd kbdi ki bapm hrgo aiS obrznm eqro Sor : aror apm ki ec oebrtm ki qSth aHlqm bieqb oapizm biSral : ihodh ath iodok aHik idk berp aibik iStHoo lk bni abik : gor arih ihodh mTrp bni elit kre rbz karih oklbia mi iqimno : la isor SbT mihodh omHqq mbin rglio ed ki iba Silh olo iqht emim : asri lgpn eirh olSrqh bni atno kbs biin lbSo obdm enbim soth : Hklili einim miin olbn Snim mHlb : cboln lHop imim iSkn ohoa lHop aniot oirkto el zidn : iSSkr Hmr grm rbz bin hmSptim : oira mnHh ki Tob oat harz ki nemh oiT Skmo lsbl oihi lms ebd : dn idin emo kaHd SbTi iSral : ihi dn nHS eli drk Spipn eli arH hnSk eqbi sos oipl rkbo aHor : liSoetk qoiti ihoh : gd gdod igodno ohoa igd eqb : maSr Smnh lHmo ohoa itn medni mlk : nptli ailh SlHh hntn amri Spr : bn prt iosp bn prt eli ein bnot zedh eli Sor : oimrrho orbo oiSTmho beli Hzim : otSb baitn qSto oipco crei idio midi abir ieqb mSm reh abn iSral : mal abik oiecrk oat Sdi oibrkk brkt Smim mel brkt thom rbzt tHt brkt Sdim orHm : brkt abik gbro el brkt hori ed taot gbet eolm thiin lraS iosp olqdqd ncir aHio : bnimin cab iTrp bbqr iakl ed olerb iHlq Sll : kl alh SbTi iSral Snim eSr ocat aSr dbr lhm abihm oibrk aotm aiS aSr kbrkto brk atm : oizo aotm oiamr alhm ani nasp al emi qbro ati al abti al hmerh aSr bSdh epron hHti : bmerh aSr bSdh hmkplh aSr el pni mmra barz knen aSr qnh abrhm at hSdh mat eprn hHti laHct qbr : Smh qbro at abrhm oat Srh aSto Smh qbro at izHq oat rbqh aSto oSmh qbrti at lah : mqnh hSdh ohmerh aSr bo mat bni Ht : oikl ieqb lzot at bnio oiasp rglio al hmTh oigoe oiasp al emio :

50

oipl iosp el pni abio oibk elio oiSq lo : oizo iosp at ebdio at hrpaim lHnT at abio oiHnTo hrpaim at iSral : oimlao lo arbeim iom ki kn imlao imi hHnTim oibko ato mzrim Sbeim iom : oiebro imi bkito oidbr iosp al bit preh lamr am na mzati Hn beinikm dbro na bacni preh lamr : abi hSbieni lamr hnh anki mt bqbri aSr kriti li barz knen Smh tqbrni oeth aelh na oaqbrh at abi oaSobh : oiamr preh elh oqbr at abik kaSr hSbiek : oiel iosp lqbr at abio oielo ato kl ebdi preh cqni bito okl cqni arz mzrim : okl bit iosp oaHio obit abio rq Tpm ozanm obqrm ecbo barz gSn : oiel emo gm rkb gm prSim oihi hmHnh kbd mad : oibao ed grn haTd aSr bebr hirdn oispdo Sm mspd gdol okbd mad oieS labio abl Sbet imim : oira ioSb harz hkneni at habl bgrn haTd oiamro abl kbd ch lmzrim el kn qra Smh abl mzrim aSr bebr hirdn : oieSo bnio lo kn kaSr zom : oiSao ato bnio arzh knen oiqbro ato bmert Sdh hmkplh aSr qnh abrhm at hSdh laHct qbr mat eprn hHti el pni mmra : oiSb iosp mzrimh hoa oaHio okl helim ato lqbr at abio aHri qbro at abio : oirao aHi iosp ki mt abihm oiamro lo iSTmno iosp ohSb iSib lno at kl hreh aSr gmlno ato : oizoo al iosp lamr abik zoh lpni moto lamr : kh tamro liosp ana Sa na pSe aHik oHTatm ki reh gmlok oeth Sa na lpSe ebdi alhi abik oibk iosp bdbrm alio : oilko gm aHio oiplo lpnio oiamro hnno lk lebdim : oiamr alhm iosp al tirao ki htHt alhim ani : oatm HSbtm eli reh alhim HSbh lTbh lmen eSh kiom hch lhHit em rb : oeth al tirao anki aklkl atkm oat Tpkm oinHm aotm oidbr el lbm : oiSb iosp bmzrim hoa obit abio oiHi iosp mah oeSr Snim : oira iosp laprim bni SlSim gm bni mkir bn mnSh ildo el brki iosp : oiamr iosp al aHio anki mt oalhim pqd ipqd atkm ohelh atkm mn harz hcat al harz aSr nSbe labrhm lizHq olieqb : oiSbe iosp at bni iSral lamr pqd ipqd alhim atkm oheltm at ezmti mch : oimt iosp bn mah oeSr Snim oiHnTo ato oiiSm baron bmzrim :

Smot

1

oalh Smot bni iSral hbaim mzrimh at ieqb aiS obito bao : raobn Smeon loi oihodh : iSSkr cboln obnimn : dn onptli gd oaSr : oihi kl npS izai irk ieqb Sbeim npS oiosp hih bmzrim : oimt iosp okl aHio okl hdor hhoa : obni iSral pro oiSrzo oirbo oiezmo bmad mad otmla harz atm : oiqm mlk HdS el mzrim aSr la ide at iosp : oiamr al emo hnh em bni iSral rb oezom mmno : hbh ntHkmh lo pn irbh ohih ki tqranh mlHmh onosp gm hoa el Snaino onlHm bno oelh mn harz : oiSimo elio Sri msim lmen ento bsbltm oibn eri msknot lpreh at ptm oat remss : okaSr ieno ato kn irbh okn iprz oiqzo mpni bni iSral : oiebdo mzrim at bni iSral bprk : oimrro at Hiihm bebdh qSh bHmr oblbnim obkl ebdh bSdh at kl ebdtm aSr ebdo bhm bprk : oiamr mlk mzrim lmildt hebrit aSr Sm haHt Sprh oSm hSnit poeh : oiamr bildkn at hebriot oraitn el habnim am bn hoa ohmtn ato oam bt hia oHih : otiran hmildt at halhim ola eSo kaSr dbr alihn mlk mzrim otHiin at hildim : oiqra mlk mzrim lmildt oiamr lhn mdoe eSitn hdbr hch otHiin at hildim : otamrn hmildt al preh ki la knSim hmzrit hebrit ki Hiot hnh bTrm tboa alhn hmildt oildo : oiiTb alhim lmildt oirb hem oiezmo mad : oihi ki irao hmildt at halhim oieS lhm btim : oizo preh lkl emo lamr kl hbn hilod hiarh tSlikho okl hbt tHion :

2

oilk aiS mbit loi oiqH at bt loi : othr haSh otld bn otra ato ki Tob hoa otzpnho SlSh irHim : ola iklh eod hzpino otqH lo tbt gma otHmrh bHmr obcpt otSm bh at hild otSm bsop el Spt hiar : ottzb aHto mrHq ldeh mh ieSh lo : otrd bt preh lrHz el hiar onertih hlkt el id hiar otra at htbh btok hsop otSlH at amth otqHh : otptH otraho at hild ohnh ner bkh otHml elio otamr mildi hebrim ch : otamr aHto al bt preh halk oqrati lk aSh minqt mn hebrit otinq lk at hild : otamr lh bt preh lki otlk helmh otqra at am hild : otamr lh bt preh hiliki at hild hch ohinqho li oani atn at Skrk otqH haSh hild otniqho : oigdl hild otbaho lbt preh oihi lh lbn otqra Smo mSh otamr ki mn hmim mSitho : oihi bimim hhm oigdl mSh oiza al aHio oira bsbltm oira aiS mzri mkh aiS ebri maHio : oipn kh okh oira ki ain aiS oik at hmzri oiTmnho bHol : oiza biom hSni ohnh Sni anSim ebrim nzim oiamr lrSe lmh tkh rek : oiamr mi Smk laiS Sr oSpT elino hlhrgni ath amr kaSr hrgt at hmzri oiira mSh oiamr akn node hdbr : oiSme preh at hdbr hch oibqS lhrg at mSh oibrH mSh mpni preh oiSb barz mdin oiSb el hbar : olkhn mdin Sbe bnot otbanh otdlnh otmlanh at hrhTim lhSqot zan abihn : oibao hreim oigrSom oiqm mSh oioSen oiSq at zanm : otbanh al reoal abihn oiamr mdoe mhrtn ba hiom : otamrn aiS mzri hzilno mid hreim ogm dlh dlh lno oiSq at hzan : oiamr al bntio oaio lmh ch ecbtn at haiS qran lo oiakl lHm : oioal mSh lSbt at haiS oitn at zprh bto lmSh : otld bn oiqra at Smo grSm ki amr gr hiiti barz nkrih : oihi bimim hrbim hhm oimt mlk mzrim oianHo bni iSral mn hebdh oiceqo otel Soetm al halhim mn hebdh : oiSme alhim at naqtm oickr alhim at brito at abrhm at izHq oat ieqb : oira alhim at bni iSral oide alhim :

3

omSh hih reh at zan itro Htno khn mdin oinhg at hzan aHr hmdbr oiba al hr halhim Hrbh : oira mlak ihoh alio blbt aS mtok hsnh oira ohnh hsnh ber baS ohsnh ainno akl : oiamr mSh asrh na oarah at hmrah hgdl hch mdoe la iber hsnh : oira ihoh ki sr lraot oiqra alio alhim mtok hsnh oiamr mSh mSh oiamr hnni : oiamr al tqrb hlm Sl nelik mel rglik ki hmqom aSr ath eomd elio admt qdS hoa : oiamr anki alhi abik alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb oistr mSh pnio ki ira mhbiT al halhim : oiamr ihoh rah raiti at eni emi aSr bmzrim oat zeqtm Smeti mpni ngSio ki ideti at mkabio : oard lhzilo mid mzrim olhelto mn harz hhoa al arz Tobh orHbh al arz cbt Hlb odbS al mqom hkneni ohHti ohamri ohprci ohHoi ohibosi : oeth hnh zeqt bni iSral bah ali ogm raiti at hlHz aSr mzrim lHzim atm : oeth lkh oaSlHk al preh ohoza at emi bni iSral mmzrim : oiamr mSh al halhim mi anki ki alk al preh oki aozia at bni iSral mmzrim : oiamr ki ahih emk och lk haot ki anki SlHtik bhoziak at hem mmzrim tebdon at halhim el hhr hch : oiamr mSh al halhim hnh anki ba al bni iSral oamrti lhm alhi abotikm SlHni alikm oamro li mh Smo mh amr alhm : oiamr alhim al mSh ahih aSr ahih oiamr kh tamr lbni iSral ahih SlHni alikm : oiamr eod alhim al mSh kh tamr al bni iSral ihoh alhi abtikm alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb SlHni alikm ch Smi lelm och ckri ldr dr : lk oaspt at cqni iSral oamrt alhm ihoh alhi abtikm nrah ali alhi abrhm izHq oieqb lamr pqd pqdti atkm oat heSoi lkm bmzrim : oamr aelh atkm meni mzrim al arz hkneni ohHti ohamri ohprci ohHoi ohibosi al arz cbt Hlb odbS : oSmeo lqlk obat ath ocqni iSral al mlk mzrim oamrtm alio ihoh alhi hebriim nqrh elino oeth nlkh na drk SlSt imim bmdbr oncbHh lihoh alhino : oani ideti ki la itn atkm mlk mzrim lhlk ola bid Hcqh : oSlHti at idi ohkiti at mzrim bkl nplati aSr aeSh bqrbo oaHri kn iSlH atkm : ontti at Hn hem hch beini mzrim ohih ki tlkon la tlko riqm : oSalh aSh mSknth omgrt bith kli ksp okli chb oSmlt oSmtm el bnikm oel bntikm onzltm at mzrim :

4

oien mSh oiamr ohn la iamino li ola iSmeo bqli ki iamro la nrah alik ihoh : oiamr alio ihoh mch bidk oiamr mTh : oiamr hSlikho arzh oiSlikho arzh oihi lnHS oins mSh mpnio : oiamr ihoh al mSh SlH idk oaHc bcnbo oiSlH ido oiHcq bo oihi lmTh bkpo : lmen iamino ki nrah alik ihoh alhi abtm alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb : oiamr ihoh lo eod hba na idk bHiqk oiba ido bHiqo oiozah ohnh ido mzret kSlg : oiamr hSb idk al Hiqk oiSb ido al Hiqo oiozah mHiqo ohnh Sbh kbSro : ohih am la iamino lk ola iSmeo lql hat hraSon ohamino lql hat haHron : ohih am la iamino gm lSni hatot halh ola iSmeon lqlk olqHt mmimi hiar oSpkt hibSh ohio hmim aSr tqH mn hiar ohio ldm bibSt : oiamr mSh al ihoh bi adni la aiS dbrim anki gm mtmol gm mSlSm gm mac dbrk al ebdk ki kbd ph okbd lSon anki : oiamr ihoh alio mi Sm ph ladm ao mi iSom alm ao HrS ao pqH ao eor hla anki ihoh : oeth lk oanki ahih em pik ohoritik aSr tdbr : oiamr bi adni SlH na bid tSlH : oiHr ap ihoh bmSh oiamr hla ahrn aHik hloi ideti ki dbr idbr hoa ogm hnh hoa iza lqratk orak oSmH blbo : odbrt alio oSmt at hdbrim bpio oanki ahih em pik oem piho ohoriti atkm at aSr teSon : odbr hoa lk al hem ohih hoa ihih lk lph oath thih lo lalhim : oat hmTh hch tqH bidk aSr teSh bo at hatt : oilk mSh oiSb al itr Htno oiamr lo alkh na oaSobh al aHi aSr bmzrim oarah heodm Hiim oiamr itro lmSh lk lSlom : oiamr ihoh al mSh bmdin lk Sb mzrim ki mto kl hanSim hmbqSim at npSk : oiqH mSh at aSto oat bnio oirkbm el hHmr oiSb arzh mzrim oiqH mSh at mTh halhim bido : oiamr ihoh al mSh blktk lSob mzrimh rah kl hmptim aSr Smti bidk oeSitm lpni preh oani aHcq at lbo ola iSlH at hem : oamrt al preh kh amr ihoh bni bkri iSral : oamr alik SlH at bni oiebdni otman lSlHo hnh anki hrg at bnk bkrk : oihi bdrk bmlon oipgSho ihoh oibqS hmito : otqH zprh zr otkrt at erlt bnh otge lrglio otamr ki Htn dmim ath li : oirp mmno ac amrh Htn dmim lmolt : oiamr ihoh al ahrn lk lqrat mSh hmdbrh oilk oipgSho bhr halhim oiSq lo : oigd mSh lahrn at kl dbri ihoh aSr SlHo oat kl hatt aSr zoho : oilk mSh oahrn oiaspo at kl cqni bni iSral : oidbr ahrn at kl hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh al mSh oieS hatt leini hem : oiamn hem oiSmeo ki pqd ihoh at bni iSral oki rah at enim oiqdo oiStHoo :

5

oaHr bao mSh oahrn oiamro al preh kh amr ihoh alhi iSral SlH at emi oiHgo li bmdbr : oiamr preh mi ihoh aSr aSme bqlo lSlH at iSral la ideti at ihoh ogm at iSral la aSlH : oiamro alhi hebrim nqra elino nlkh na drk SlSt imim bmdbr oncbHh lihoh alhino pn ipgeno bdbr ao bHrb : oiamr alhm mlk mzrim lmh mSh oahrn tprieo at hem mmeSio lko lsbltikm : oiamr preh hn rbim eth em harz ohSbtm atm msbltm : oizo preh biom hhoa at hngSim bem oat STrio lamr : la taspon ltt tbn lem llbn hlbnim ktmol SlSm hm ilko oqSSo lhm tbn : oat mtknt hlbnim aSr hm eSim tmol SlSm tSimo elihm la tgreo mmno ki nrpim hm el kn hm zeqim lamr nlkh ncbHh lalhino : tkbd hebdh el hanSim oieSo bh oal iSeo bdbri Sqr : oizao ngSi hem oSTrio oiamro al hem lamr kh amr preh ainni ntn lkm tbn : atm lko qHo lkm tbn maSr tmzao ki ain ngre mebdtkm dbr : oipz hem bkl arz mzrim lqSS qS ltbn : ohngSim azim lamr klo meSikm dbr iom biomo kaSr bhiot htbn : oiko STri bni iSral aSr Smo elhm ngSi preh lamr mdoe la klitm Hqkm llbn ktmol SlSm gm tmol gm hiom : oibao STri bni iSral oizeqo al preh lamr lmh teSh kh lebdik : tbn ain ntn lebdik olbnim amrim lno eSo ohnh ebdik mkim oHTat emk : oiamr nrpim atm nrpim el kn atm amrim nlkh ncbHh lihoh : oeth lko ebdo otbn la intn lkm otkn lbnim ttno : oirao STri bni iSral atm bre lamr la tgreo mlbnikm dbr iom biomo : oipgeo at mSh oat ahrn nzbim lqratm bzatm mat preh : oiamro alhm ira ihoh elikm oiSpT aSr hbaStm at riHno beini preh obeini ebdio ltt Hrb bidm lhrgno : oiSb mSh al ihoh oiamr adni lmh hreth lem hch lmh ch SlHtni : omac bati al preh ldbr bSmk hre lem hch ohzl la hzlt at emk :

6

oiamr ihoh al mSh eth trah aSr aeSh lpreh ki bid Hcqh iSlHm obid Hcqh igrSm marzo : oidbr alhim al mSh oiamr alio ani ihoh : oara al abrhm al izHq oal ieqb bal Sdi oSmi ihoh la nodeti lhm : ogm hqmti at briti atm ltt lhm at arz knen at arz mgrihm aSr gro bh : ogm ani Smeti at naqt bni iSral aSr mzrim mebdim atm oackr at briti : lkn amr lbni iSral ani ihoh ohozati atkm mtHt sblt mzrim ohzlti atkm mebdtm ogalti atkm bcroe nToih obSpTim gdlim : olqHti atkm li lem ohiiti lkm lalhim oidetm ki ani ihoh alhikm hmozia atkm mtHt sblot mzrim : ohbati atkm al harz aSr nSati at idi ltt ath labrhm lizHq olieqb ontti ath lkm morSh ani ihoh : oidbr mSh kn al bni iSral ola Smeo al mSh mqzr roH omebdh qSh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : ba dbr al preh mlk mzrim oiSlH at bni iSral marzo : oidbr mSh lpni ihoh lamr hn bni iSral la Smeo ali oaik iSmeni preh oani erl Sptim : oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn oizom al bni iSral oal preh mlk mzrim lhozia at bni iSral marz mzrim : alh raSi bit abtm bni raobn bkr iSral Hnok oploa Hzron okrmi alh mSpHt raobn : obni Smeon imoal oimin oahd oikin ozHr oSaol bn hknenit alh mSpHt Smeon : oalh Smot bni loi ltldtm grSon oqht omrri oSni Hii loi Sbe oSlSim omat Snh : bni grSon lbni oSmei lmSpHtm : obni qht emrm oizhr oHbron oecial oSni Hii qht SlS oSlSim omat Snh : obni mrri mHli omoSi alh mSpHt hloi ltldtm : oiqH emrm at iokbd ddto lo laSh otld lo at ahrn oat mSh oSni Hii emrm Sbe oSlSim omat Snh : obni izhr qrH onpg ockri : obni ecial miSal oalzpn ostri : oiqH ahrn at aliSbe bt emindb aHot nHSon lo laSh otld lo at ndb oat abihoa at alecr oat aitmr : obni qrH asir oalqnh oabiasp alh mSpHt hqrHi : oalecr bn ahrn lqH lo mbnot poTial lo laSh otld lo at pinHs alh raSi abot hloim lmSpHtm : hoa ahrn omSh aSr amr ihoh lhm hoziao at bni iSral marz mzrim el zbatm : hm hmdbrim al preh mlk mzrim lhozia at bni iSral mmzrim hoa mSh oahrn : oihi biom dbr ihoh al mSh barz mzrim : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr ani ihoh dbr al preh mlk mzrim at kl aSr ani dbr alik : oiamr mSh lpni ihoh hn ani erl Sptim oaik iSme ali preh :

7

oiamr ihoh al mSh rah nttik alhim lpreh oahrn aHik ihih nbiak : ath tdbr at kl aSr azok oahrn aHik idbr al preh oSlH at bni iSral marzo : oani aqSh at lb preh ohrbiti at atti oat mopti barz mzrim : ola iSme alkm preh ontti at idi bmzrim ohozati at zbati at emi bni iSral marz mzrim bSpTim gdlim : oideo mzrim ki ani ihoh bnTti at idi el mzrim ohozati at bni iSral mtokm : oieS mSh oahrn kaSr zoh ihoh atm kn eSo : omSh bn Smnim Snh oahrn bn SlS oSmnim Snh bdbrm al preh : oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : ki idbr alkm preh lamr tno lkm mopt oamrt al ahrn qH at mTk ohSlk lpni preh ihi ltnin : oiba mSh oahrn al preh oieSo kn kaSr zoh ihoh oiSlk ahrn at mTho lpni preh olpni ebdio oihi ltnin : oiqra gm preh lHkmim olmkSpim oieSo gm hm HrTmi mzrim blhTihm kn : oiSliko aiS mTho oihio ltninm oible mTh ahrn at mTtm : oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh kbd lb preh man lSlH hem : lk al preh bbqr hnh iza hmimh onzbt lqrato el Spt hiar ohmTh aSr nhpk lnHS tqH bidk : oamrt alio ihoh alhi hebrim SlHni alik lamr SlH at emi oiebdni bmdbr ohnh la Smet ed kh : kh amr ihoh bcat tde ki ani ihoh hnh anki mkh bmTh aSr bidi el hmim aSr biar onhpko ldm : ohdgh aSr biar tmot obaS hiar onlao mzrim lStot mim mn hiar : oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn qH mTk onTh idk el mimi mzrim el nhrtm el iarihm oel agmihm oel kl mqoh mimihm oihio dm ohih dm bkl arz mzrim obezim obabnim : oieSo kn mSh oahrn kaSr zoh ihoh oirm bmTh oik at hmim aSr biar leini preh oleini ebdio oihpko kl hmim aSr biar ldm : ohdgh aSr biar mth oibaS hiar ola iklo mzrim lStot mim mn hiar oihi hdm bkl arz mzrim : oieSo kn HrTmi mzrim blTihm oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh : oipn preh oiba al bito ola St lbo gm lcat : oiHpro kl mzrim sbibt hiar mim lStot ki la iklo lStt mmimi hiar : oimla Sbet imim aHri hkot ihoh at hiar :

8

oiamr ihoh al mSh ba al preh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh SlH at emi oiebdni : oam man ath lSlH hnh anki ngp at kl gbolk bzprdeim : oSrz hiar zprdeim oelo obao bbitk obHdr mSkbk oel mTtk obbit ebdik obemk obtnorik obmSarotik : obkh obemk obkl ebdik ielo hzprdeim : oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at idk bmTk el hnhrt el hiarim oel hagmim ohel at hzprdeim el arz mzrim : oiT ahrn at ido el mimi mzrim otel hzprde otks at arz mzrim : oieSo kn hHrTmim blTihm oielo at hzprdeim el arz mzrim : oiqra preh lmSh olahrn oiamr hetiro al ihoh oisr hzprdeim mmni omemi oaSlHh at hem oicbHo lihoh : oiamr mSh lpreh htpar eli lmti aetir lk olebdik olemk lhkrit hzprdeim mmk ombtik rq biar tSarnh : oiamr lmHr oiamr kdbrk lmen tde ki ain kihoh alhino : osro hzprdeim mmk ombtik omebdik omemk rq biar tSarnh : oiza mSh oahrn mem preh oizeq mSh al ihoh el dbr hzprdeim aSr Sm lpreh : oieS ihoh kdbr mSh oimto hzprdeim mn hbtim mn hHzrt omn hSdt : oizbro atm Hmrm Hmrm otbaS harz : oira preh ki hith hroHh ohkbd at lbo ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at mTk ohk at epr harz ohih lknm bkl arz mzrim : oieSo kn oiT ahrn at ido bmTho oik at epr harz othi hknm badm obbhmh kl epr harz hih knim bkl arz mzrim : oieSo kn hHrTmim blTihm lhozia at hknim ola iklo othi hknm badm obbhmh : oiamro hHrTmim al preh azbe alhim hoa oiHcq lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh hSkm bbqr ohtizb lpni preh hnh ioza hmimh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh SlH emi oiebdni : ki am aink mSlH at emi hnni mSliH bk obebdik obemk obbtik at herb omlao bti mzrim at herb ogm hadmh aSr hm elih : ohpliti biom hhoa at arz gSn aSr emi emd elih lblti hiot Sm erb lmen tde ki ani ihoh bqrb harz : oSmti pdt bin emi obin emk lmHr ihih hat hch : oieS ihoh kn oiba erb kbd bith preh obit ebdio obkl arz mzrim tSHt harz mpni herb : oiqra preh al mSh olahrn oiamr lko cbHo lalhikm barz : oiamr mSh la nkon leSot kn ki toebt mzrim ncbH lihoh alhino hn ncbH at toebt mzrim leinihm ola isqlno : drk SlSt imim nlk bmdbr ocbHno lihoh alhino kaSr iamr alino : oiamr preh anki aSlH atkm ocbHtm lihoh alhikm bmdbr rq hrHq la trHiqo llkt hetiro bedi : oiamr mSh hnh anki ioza memk ohetrti al ihoh osr herb mpreh mebdio omemo mHr rq al isp preh htl lblti SlH at hem lcbH lihoh : oiza mSh mem preh oietr al ihoh : oieS ihoh kdbr mSh oisr herb mpreh mebdio omemo la nSar aHd : oikbd preh at lbo gm bpem hcat ola SlH at hem :

9

oiamr ihoh al mSh ba al preh odbrt alio kh amr ihoh alhi hebrim SlH at emi oiebdni : ki am man ath lSlH oeodk mHciq bm : hnh id ihoh hoih bmqnk aSr bSdh bsosim bHmrim bgmlim bbqr obzan dbr kbd mad : ohplh ihoh bin mqnh iSral obin mqnh mzrim ola imot mkl lbni iSral dbr : oiSm ihoh moed lamr mHr ieSh ihoh hdbr hch barz : oieS ihoh at hdbr hch mmHrt oimt kl mqnh mzrim ommqnh bni iSral la mt aHd : oiSlH preh ohnh la mt mmqnh iSral ed aHd oikbd lb preh ola SlH at hem : oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn qHo lkm mla Hpnikm piH kbSn ocrqo mSh hSmimh leini preh : ohih labq el kl arz mzrim ohih el hadm oel hbhmh lSHin prH abebet bkl arz mzrim : oiqHo at piH hkbSn oiemdo lpni preh oicrq ato mSh hSmimh oihi SHin abebet prH badm obbhmh : ola iklo hHrTmim lemd lpni mSh mpni hSHin ki hih hSHin bHrTmm obkl mzrim : oiHcq ihoh at lb preh ola Sme alhm kaSr dbr ihoh al mSh : oiamr ihoh al mSh hSkm bbqr ohtizb lpni preh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh alhi hebrim SlH at emi oiebdni : ki bpem hcat ani SlH at kl mgpti al lbk obebdik obemk bebor tde ki ain kmni bkl harz : ki eth SlHti at idi oak aotk oat emk bdbr otkHd mn harz : oaolm bebor cat hemdtik bebor hratk at kHi olmen spr Smi bkl harz : eodk mstoll bemi lblti SlHm : hnni mmTir ket mHr brd kbd mad aSr la hih kmho bmzrim lmn hiom hosdh oed eth : oeth SlH hec at mqnk oat kl aSr lk bSdh kl hadm ohbhmh aSr imza bSdh ola iasp hbith oird elhm hbrd omto : hira at dbr ihoh mebdi preh hnis at ebdio oat mqnho al hbtim : oaSr la Sm lbo al dbr ihoh oiecb at ebdio oat mqnho bSdh : oiamr ihoh al mSh nTh at idk el hSmim oihi brd bkl arz mzrim el hadm oel hbhmh oel kl eSb hSdh barz mzrim : oiT mSh at mTho el hSmim oihoh ntn qlt obrd othlk aS arzh oimTr ihoh brd el arz mzrim : oihi brd oaS mtlqHt btok hbrd kbd mad aSr la hih kmho bkl arz mzrim mac hith lgoi : oik hbrd bkl arz mzrim at kl aSr bSdh madm oed bhmh oat kl eSb hSdh hkh hbrd oat kl ez hSdh Sbr : rq barz gSn aSr Sm bni iSral la hih brd : oiSlH preh oiqra lmSh olahrn oiamr alhm HTati hpem ihoh hzdiq oani oemi hrSeim : hetiro al ihoh orb mhit qlt alhim obrd oaSlHh atkm ola tspon lemd : oiamr alio mSh kzati at heir aprS at kpi al ihoh hqlot iHdlon ohbrd la ihih eod lmen tde ki lihoh harz : oath oebdik ideti ki Trm tiraon mpni ihoh alhim : ohpSth ohSerh nkth ki hSerh abib ohpSth gbel : ohHTh ohksmt la nko ki apilt hnh : oiza mSh mem preh at heir oiprS kpio al ihoh oiHdlo hqlot ohbrd omTr la ntk arzh : oira preh ki Hdl hmTr ohbrd ohqlt oisp lHTa oikbd lbo hoa oebdio : oiHcq lb preh ola SlH at bni iSral kaSr dbr ihoh bid mSh :

10

oiamr ihoh al mSh ba al preh ki ani hkbdti at lbo oat lb ebdio lmen Sti atti alh bqrbo : olmen tspr bacni bnk obn bnk at aSr htellti bmzrim oat atti aSr Smti bm oidetm ki ani ihoh : oiba mSh oahrn al preh oiamro alio kh amr ihoh alhi hebrim ed mti mant lent mpni SlH emi oiebdni : ki am man ath lSlH at emi hnni mbia mHr arbh bgblk : oksh at ein harz ola iokl lrat at harz oakl at itr hplTh hnSart lkm mn hbrd oakl at kl hez hzmH lkm mn hSdh : omlao btik obti kl ebdik obti kl mzrim aSr la rao abtik oabot abtik miom hiotm el hadmh ed hiom hch oipn oiza mem preh : oiamro ebdi preh alio ed mti ihih ch lno lmoqS SlH at hanSim oiebdo at ihoh alhihm hTrm tde ki abdh mzrim : oioSb at mSh oat ahrn al preh oiamr alhm lko ebdo at ihoh alhikm mi omi hhlkim : oiamr mSh bnerino obcqnino nlk bbnino obbnotno bzanno obbqrno nlk ki Hg ihoh lno : oiamr alhm ihi kn ihoh emkm kaSr aSlH atkm oat Tpkm rao ki reh ngd pnikm : la kn lko na hgbrim oebdo at ihoh ki ath atm mbqSim oigrS atm mat pni preh : oiamr ihoh al mSh nTh idk el arz mzrim barbh oiel el arz mzrim oiakl at kl eSb harz at kl aSr hSair hbrd : oiT mSh at mTho el arz mzrim oihoh nhg roH qdim barz kl hiom hhoa okl hlilh hbqr hih oroH hqdim nSa at harbh : oiel harbh el kl arz mzrim oinH bkl gbol mzrim kbd mad lpnio la hih kn arbh kmho oaHrio la ihih kn : oiks at ein kl harz otHSk harz oiakl at kl eSb harz oat kl pri hez aSr hotir hbrd ola notr kl irq bez obeSb hSdh bkl arz mzrim : oimhr preh lqra lmSh olahrn oiamr HTati lihoh alhikm olkm : oeth Sa na HTati ak hpem ohetiro lihoh alhikm oisr meli rq at hmot hch : oiza mem preh oietr al ihoh : oihpk ihoh roH im Hcq mad oiSa at harbh oitqeho imh sop la nSar arbh aHd bkl gbol mzrim : oiHcq ihoh at lb preh ola SlH at bni iSral : oiamr ihoh al mSh nTh idk el hSmim oihi HSk el arz mzrim oimS HSk : oiT mSh at ido el hSmim oihi HSk aplh bkl arz mzrim SlSt imim : la rao aiS at aHio ola qmo aiS mtHtio SlSt imim olkl bni iSral hih aor bmoSbtm : oiqra preh al mSh oiamr lko ebdo at ihoh rq zankm obqrkm izg gm Tpkm ilk emkm : oiamr mSh gm ath ttn bidno cbHim oelot oeSino lihoh alhino : ogm mqnno ilk emno la tSar prsh ki mmno nqH lebd at ihoh alhino oanHno la nde mh nebd at ihoh ed bano Smh : oiHcq ihoh at lb preh ola abh lSlHm : oiamr lo preh lk meli hSmr lk al tsp raot pni ki biom ratk pni tmot : oiamr mSh kn dbrt la asp eod raot pnik :

11

oiamr ihoh al mSh eod nge aHd abia el preh oel mzrim aHri kn iSlH atkm mch kSlHo klh grS igrS atkm mch : dbr na bacni hem oiSalo aiS mat reho oaSh mat reoth kli ksp okli chb : oitn ihoh at Hn hem beini mzrim gm haiS mSh gdol mad barz mzrim beini ebdi preh obeini hem : oiamr mSh kh amr ihoh kHzt hlilh ani ioza btok mzrim : omt kl bkor barz mzrim mbkor preh hiSb el ksao ed bkor hSpHh aSr aHr hrHim okl bkor bhmh : ohith zeqh gdlh bkl arz mzrim aSr kmho la nhith okmho la tsp : olkl bni iSral la iHrz klb lSno lmaiS oed bhmh lmen tdeon aSr iplh ihoh bin mzrim obin iSral : oirdo kl ebdik alh ali ohStHoo li lamr za ath okl hem aSr brglik oaHri kn aza oiza mem preh bHri ap : oiamr ihoh al mSh la iSme alikm preh lmen rbot mopti barz mzrim : omSh oahrn eSo at kl hmptim halh lpni preh oiHcq ihoh at lb preh ola SlH at bni iSral marzo :

12

oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn barz mzrim lamr : hHdS hch lkm raS HdSim raSon hoa lkm lHdSi hSnh : dbro al kl edt iSral lamr beSr lHdS hch oiqHo lhm aiS Sh lbit abt Sh lbit : oam imeT hbit mhit mSh olqH hoa oSkno hqrb al bito bmkst npSt aiS lpi aklo tkso el hSh : Sh tmim ckr bn Snh ihih lkm mn hkbSim omn hecim tqHo : ohih lkm lmSmrt ed arbeh eSr iom lHdS hch oSHTo ato kl qhl edt iSral bin herbim : olqHo mn hdm ontno el Sti hmcoct oel hmSqop el hbtim aSr iaklo ato bhm : oaklo at hbSr blilh hch zli aS omzot el mrrim iaklho : al taklo mmno na obSl mbSl bmim ki am zli aS raSo el kreio oel qrbo : ola totiro mmno ed bqr ohntr mmno ed bqr baS tSrpo : okkh taklo ato mtnikm Hgrim nelikm brglikm omqlkm bidkm oakltm ato bHpcon psH hoa lihoh : oebrti barz mzrim blilh hch ohkiti kl bkor barz mzrim madm oed bhmh obkl alhi mzrim aeSh SpTim ani ihoh : ohih hdm lkm lat el hbtim aSr atm Sm oraiti at hdm opsHti elkm ola ihih bkm ngp lmSHit bhkti barz mzrim : ohih hiom hch lkm lckron oHgtm ato Hg lihoh ldrtikm Hqt eolm tHgho : Sbet imim mzot taklo ak biom hraSon tSbito Sar mbtikm ki kl akl Hmz onkrth hnpS hhoa miSral miom hraSn ed iom hSbei : obiom hraSon mqra qdS obiom hSbiei mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakh la ieSh bhm ak aSr iakl lkl npS hoa lbdo ieSh lkm : oSmrtm at hmzot ki bezm hiom hch hozati at zbaotikm marz mzrim oSmrtm at hiom hch ldrtikm Hqt eolm : braSn barbeh eSr iom lHdS berb taklo mzt ed iom haHd oeSrim lHdS berb : Sbet imim Sar la imza bbtikm ki kl akl mHmzt onkrth hnpS hhoa medt iSral bgr obacrH harz : kl mHmzt la taklo bkl moSbtikm taklo mzot : oiqra mSh lkl cqni iSral oiamr alhm mSko oqHo lkm zan lmSpHtikm oSHTo hpsH : olqHtm agdt acob oTbltm bdm aSr bsp ohgetm al hmSqop oal Sti hmcoct mn hdm aSr bsp oatm la tzao aiS mptH bito ed bqr : oebr ihoh lngp at mzrim orah at hdm el hmSqop oel Sti hmcoct opsH ihoh el hptH ola itn hmSHit lba al btikm lngp : oSmrtm at hdbr hch lHq lk olbnik ed eolm : ohih ki tbao al harz aSr itn ihoh lkm kaSr dbr oSmrtm at hebdh hcat : ohih ki iamro alikm bnikm mh hebdh hcat lkm : oamrtm cbH psH hoa lihoh aSr psH el bti bni iSral bmzrim bngpo at mzrim oat btino hzil oiqd hem oiStHoo : oilko oieSo bni iSral kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh oahrn kn eSo : oihi bHzi hlilh oihoh hkh kl bkor barz mzrim mbkr preh hiSb el ksao ed bkor hSbi aSr bbit hbor okl bkor bhmh : oiqm preh lilh hoa okl ebdio okl mzrim othi zeqh gdlh bmzrim ki ain bit aSr ain Sm mt : oiqra lmSh olahrn lilh oiamr qomo zao mtok emi gm atm gm bni iSral olko ebdo at ihoh kdbrkm : gm zankm gm bqrkm qHo kaSr dbrtm olko obrktm gm ati : otHcq mzrim el hem lmhr lSlHm mn harz ki amro klno mtim : oiSa hem at bzqo Trm iHmz mSartm zrrt bSmltm el Skmm : obni iSral eSo kdbr mSh oiSalo mmzrim kli ksp okli chb oSmlt : oihoh ntn at Hn hem beini mzrim oiSalom oinzlo at mzrim : oiseo bni iSral mremss skth kSS maot alp rgli hgbrim lbd mTp : ogm erb rb elh atm ozan obqr mqnh kbd mad : oiapo at hbzq aSr hoziao mmzrim egt mzot ki la Hmz ki grSo mmzrim ola iklo lhtmhmh ogm zdh la eSo lhm : omoSb bni iSral aSr iSbo bmzrim SlSim Snh oarbe maot Snh : oihi mqz SlSim Snh oarbe maot Snh oihi bezm hiom hch izao kl zbaot ihoh marz mzrim : lil Smrim hoa lihoh lhoziam marz mzrim hoa hlilh hch lihoh Smrim lkl bni iSral ldrtm : oiamr ihoh al mSh oahrn cat Hqt hpsH kl bn nkr la iakl bo : okl ebd aiS mqnt ksp omlth ato ac iakl bo : toSb oSkir la iakl bo : bbit aHd iakl la tozia mn hbit mn hbSr Hozh oezm la tSbro bo : kl edt iSral ieSo ato : oki igor atk gr oeSh psH lihoh hmol lo kl ckr oac iqrb leSto ohih kacrH harz okl erl la iakl bo : torh aHt ihih lacrH olgr hgr btokkm : oieSo kl bni iSral kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh oat ahrn kn eSo : oihi bezm hiom hch hozia ihoh at bni iSral marz mzrim el zbatm :

13

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : qdS li kl bkor pTr kl rHm bbni iSral badm obbhmh li hoa : oiamr mSh al hem ckor at hiom hch aSr izatm mmzrim mbit ebdim ki bHcq id hozia ihoh atkm mch ola iakl Hmz : hiom atm izaim bHdS habib : ohih ki ibiak ihoh al arz hkneni ohHti ohamri ohHoi ohibosi aSr nSbe labtik ltt lk arz cbt Hlb odbS oebdt at hebdh hcat bHdS hch : Sbet imim takl mzt obiom hSbiei Hg lihoh : mzot iakl at Sbet himim ola irah lk Hmz ola irah lk Sar bkl gblk : ohgdt lbnk biom hhoa lamr bebor ch eSh ihoh li bzati mmzrim : ohih lk laot el idk olckron bin einik lmen thih tort ihoh bpik ki bid Hcqh hozak ihoh mmzrim : oSmrt at hHqh hcat lmoedh mimim imimh : ohih ki ibak ihoh al arz hkneni kaSr nSbe lk olabtik ontnh lk : ohebrt kl pTr rHm lihoh okl pTr Sgr bhmh aSr ihih lk hckrim lihoh : okl pTr Hmr tpdh bSh oam la tpdh oerpto okl bkor adm bbnik tpdh : ohih ki iSalk bnk mHr lamr mh cat oamrt alio bHcq id hoziano ihoh mmzrim mbit ebdim : oihi ki hqSh preh lSlHno oihrg ihoh kl bkor barz mzrim mbkr adm oed bkor bhmh el kn ani cbH lihoh kl pTr rHm hckrim okl bkor bni apdh : ohih laot el idkh olToTpt bin einik ki bHcq id hoziano ihoh mmzrim : oihi bSlH preh at hem ola nHm alhim drk arz plStim ki qrob hoa ki amr alhim pn inHm hem bratm mlHmh oSbo mzrimh : oisb alhim at hem drk hmdbr im sop oHmSim elo bni iSral marz mzrim : oiqH mSh at ezmot iosp emo ki hSbe hSbie at bni iSral lamr pqd ipqd alhim atkm ohelitm at ezmti mch atkm : oiseo mskt oiHno batm bqzh hmdbr : oihoh hlk lpnihm iomm bemod enn lnHtm hdrk olilh bemod aS lhair lhm llkt iomm olilh : la imiS emod henn iomm oemod haS lilh lpni hem :

14

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oiSbo oiHno lpni pi hHirt bin mgdl obin him lpni bel zpn nkHo tHno el him : oamr preh lbni iSral nbkim hm barz sgr elihm hmdbr : oHcqti at lb preh ordp aHrihm oakbdh bpreh obkl Hilo oideo mzrim ki ani ihoh oieSo kn : oigd lmlk mzrim ki brH hem oihpk lbb preh oebdio al hem oiamro mh cat eSino ki SlHno at iSral mebdno : oiasr at rkbo oat emo lqH emo : oiqH SS maot rkb bHor okl rkb mzrim oSlSm el klo : oiHcq ihoh at lb preh mlk mzrim oirdp aHri bni iSral obni iSral izaim bid rmh : oirdpo mzrim aHrihm oiSigo aotm Hnim el him kl sos rkb preh oprSio oHilo el pi hHirt lpni bel zpn : opreh hqrib oiSao bni iSral at einihm ohnh mzrim nse aHrihm oiirao mad oizeqo bni iSral al ihoh : oiamro al mSh hmbli ain qbrim bmzrim lqHtno lmot bmdbr mh cat eSit lno lhoziano mmzrim : hla ch hdbr aSr dbrno alik bmzrim lamr Hdl mmno onebdh at mzrim ki Tob lno ebd at mzrim mmtno bmdbr : oiamr mSh al hem al tirao htizbo orao at iSoet ihoh aSr ieSh lkm hiom ki aSr raitm at mzrim hiom la tsipo lratm eod ed eolm : ihoh ilHm lkm oatm tHriSon : oiamr ihoh al mSh mh tzeq ali dbr al bni iSral oiseo : oath hrm at mTk onTh at idk el him obqeho oibao bni iSral btok him bibSh : oani hnni mHcq at lb mzrim oibao aHrihm oakbdh bpreh obkl Hilo brkbo obprSio : oideo mzrim ki ani ihoh bhkbdi bpreh brkbo obprSio : oise mlak halhim hhlk lpni mHnh iSral oilk maHrihm oise emod henn mpnihm oiemd maHrihm : oiba bin mHnh mzrim obin mHnh iSral oihi henn ohHSk oiar at hlilh ola qrb ch al ch kl hlilh : oiT mSh at ido el him oiolk ihoh at him broH qdim ech kl hlilh oiSm at him lHrbh oibqeo hmim : oibao bni iSral btok him bibSh ohmim lhm Hmh miminm omSmalm : oirdpo mzrim oibao aHrihm kl sos preh rkbo oprSio al tok him : oihi baSmrt hbqr oiSqp ihoh al mHnh mzrim bemod aS oenn oihm at mHnh mzrim : oisr at apn mrkbtio oinhgho bkbdt oiamr mzrim anosh mpni iSral ki ihoh nlHm lhm bmzrim : oiamr ihoh al mSh nTh at idk el him oiSbo hmim el mzrim el rkbo oel prSio : oiT mSh at ido el him oiSb him lpnot bqr laitno omzrim nsim lqrato oiner ihoh at mzrim btok him : oiSbo hmim oikso at hrkb oat hprSim lkl Hil preh hbaim aHrihm bim la nSar bhm ed aHd : obni iSral hlko bibSh btok him ohmim lhm Hmh miminm omSmalm : oioSe ihoh biom hhoa at iSral mid mzrim oira iSral at mzrim mt el Spt him : oira iSral at hid hgdlh aSr eSh ihoh bmzrim oiirao hem at ihoh oiamino bihoh obmSh ebdo :

15

ac iSir mSh obni iSral at hSirh hcat lihoh oiamro lamr aSirh lihoh ki gah gah sos orkbo rmh bim : eci ocmrt ih oihi li liSoeh ch ali oanoho alhi abi oarmmnho : ihoh aiS mlHmh ihoh Smo : mrkbt preh oHilo irh bim ombHr SlSio Tbeo bim sop : thmt iksimo irdo bmzolt kmo abn : imink ihoh nadri bkH imink ihoh trez aoib : obrb gaonk thrs qmik tSlH Hrnk iaklmo kqS : obroH apik nermo mim nzbo kmo nd nclim qpao thmt blb im : amr aoib ardp aSig aHlq Sll tmlamo npSi ariq Hrbi toriSmo idi : nSpt broHk ksmo im zllo keoprt bmim adirim : mi kmkh balm ihoh mi kmkh nadr bqdS nora thlt eSh pla : nTit imink tblemo arz : nHit bHsdk em co galt nhlt beck al noh qdSk : Smeo emim irgcon Hil aHc iSbi plSt : ac nbhlo alopi adom aili moab iaHcmo red nmgo kl iSbi knen : tpl elihm aimth opHd bgdl croek idmo kabn ed iebr emk ihoh ed iebr em co qnit : tbamo otTemo bhr nHltk mkon lSbtk pelt ihoh mqdS adni konno idik : ihoh imlk lelm oed : ki ba sos preh brkbo obprSio bim oiSb ihoh elhm at mi him obni iSral hlko bibSh btok him : otqH mrim hnbiah aHot ahrn at htp bidh otzan kl hnSim aHrih btpim obmHlt : oten lhm mrim Siro lihoh ki gah gah sos orkbo rmh bim : oise mSh at iSral mim sop oizao al mdbr Sor oilko SlSt imim bmdbr ola mzao mim : oibao mrth ola iklo lStt mim mmrh ki mrim hm el kn qra Smh mrh : oilno hem el mSh lamr mh nSth : oizeq al ihoh oiorho ihoh ez oiSlk al hmim oimtqo hmim Sm Sm lo Hq omSpT oSm nsho : oiamr am Smoe tSme lqol ihoh alhik ohiSr beinio teSh ohacnt lmzotio oSmrt kl Hqio kl hmHlh aSr Smti bmzrim la aSim elik ki ani ihoh rpak : oibao ailmh oSm Stim eSrh eint mim oSbeim tmrim oiHno Sm el hmim :

16

oiseo mailm oibao kl edt bni iSral al mdbr sin aSr bin ailm obin sini bHmSh eSr iom lHdS hSni lzatm marz mzrim : oilino kl edt bni iSral el mSh oel ahrn bmdbr : oiamro alhm bni iSral mi itn motno bid ihoh barz mzrim bSbtno el sir hbSr baklno lHm lSbe ki hozatm atno al hmdbr hch lhmit at kl hqhl hch breb : oiamr ihoh al mSh hnni mmTir lkm lHm mn hSmim oiza hem olqTo dbr iom biomo lmen ansno hilk btorti am la : ohih biom hSSi ohkino at aSr ibiao ohih mSnh el aSr ilqTo iom iom : oiamr mSh oahrn al kl bni iSral erb oidetm ki ihoh hozia atkm marz mzrim : obqr oraitm at kbod ihoh bSmeo at tlntikm el ihoh onHno mh ki tlono elino : oiamr mSh btt ihoh lkm berb bSr lakl olHm bbqr lSbe bSme ihoh at tlntikm aSr atm mlinm elio onHno mh la elino tlntikm ki el ihoh : oiamr mSh al ahrn amr al kl edt bni iSral qrbo lpni ihoh ki Sme at tlntikm : oihi kdbr ahrn al kl edt bni iSral oipno al hmdbr ohnh kbod ihoh nrah benn : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : Smeti at tlont bni iSral dbr alhm lamr bin herbim taklo bSr obbqr tSbeo lHm oidetm ki ani ihoh alhikm : oihi berb otel hSlo otks at hmHnh obbqr hith Skbt hTl sbib lmHnh : otel Skbt hTl ohnh el pni hmdbr dq mHsps dq kkpr el harz : oirao bni iSral oiamro aiS al aHio mn hoa ki la ideo mh hoa oiamr mSh alhm hoa hlHm aSr ntn ihoh lkm laklh : ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh lqTo mmno aiS lpi aklo emr lglglt mspr npStikm aiS laSr bahlo tqHo : oieSo kn bni iSral oilqTo hmrbh ohmmeiT : oimdo bemr ola hedip hmrbh ohmmeiT la hHsir aiS lpi aklo lqTo : oiamr mSh alhm aiS al iotr mmno ed bqr : ola Smeo al mSh oiotro anSim mmno ed bqr oirm toleim oibaS oiqzp elhm mSh : oilqTo ato bbqr bbqr aiS kpi aklo oHm hSmS onms : oihi biom hSSi lqTo lHm mSnh Sni hemr laHd oibao kl nSiai hedh oigido lmSh : oiamr alhm hoa aSr dbr ihoh Sbton Sbt qdS lihoh mHr at aSr tapo apo oat aSr tbSlo bSlo oat kl hedp hniHo lkm lmSmrt ed hbqr : oiniHo ato ed hbqr kaSr zoh mSh ola hbaiS ormh la hith bo : oiamr mSh aklho hiom ki Sbt hiom lihoh hiom la tmzaho bSdh : SSt imim tlqTho obiom hSbiei Sbt la ihih bo : oihi biom hSbiei izao mn hem llqT ola mzao : oiamr ihoh al mSh ed anh mantm lSmr mzoti otorti : rao ki ihoh ntn lkm hSbt el kn hoa ntn lkm biom hSSi lHm iomim Sbo aiS tHtio al iza aiS mmqmo biom hSbiei : oiSbto hem biom hSbei : oiqrao bit iSral at Smo mn ohoa kcre gd lbn oTemo kzpiHt bdbS : oiamr mSh ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh mla hemr mmno lmSmrt ldrtikm lmen irao at hlHm aSr haklti atkm bmdbr bhoziai atkm marz mzrim : oiamr mSh al ahrn qH znznt aHt otn Smh mla hemr mn ohnH ato lpni ihoh lmSmrt ldrtikm : kaSr zoh ihoh al mSh oiniHho ahrn lpni hedt lmSmrt : obni iSral aklo at hmn arbeim Snh ed bam al arz noSbt at hmn aklo ed bam al qzh arz knen : ohemr eSrit haiph hoa :

17

oiseo kl edt bni iSral mmdbr sin lmseihm el pi ihoh oiHno brpidim oain mim lStt hem : oirb hem em mSh oiamro tno lno mim onSth oiamr lhm mSh mh tribon emdi mh tnson at ihoh : oizma Sm hem lmim oiln hem el mSh oiamr lmh ch helitno mmzrim lhmit ati oat bni oat mqni bzma : oizeq mSh al ihoh lamr mh aeSh lem hch eod meT osqlni : oiamr ihoh al mSh ebr lpni hem oqH atk mcqni iSral omTk aSr hkit bo at hiar qH bidk ohlkt : hnni emd lpnik Sm el hzor bHrb ohkit bzor oizao mmno mim oSth hem oieS kn mSh leini cqni iSral : oiqra Sm hmqom msh omribh el rib bni iSral oel nstm at ihoh lamr hiS ihoh bqrbno am ain : oiba emlq oilHm em iSral brpidm : oiamr mSh al ihoSe bHr lno anSim oza hlHm bemlq mHr anki nzb el raS hgbeh omTh halhim bidi : oieS ihoSe kaSr amr lo mSh lhlHm bemlq omSh ahrn oHor elo raS hgbeh : ohih kaSr irim mSh ido ogbr iSral okaSr iniH ido ogbr emlq : oidi mSh kbdim oiqHo abn oiSimo tHtio oiSb elih oahrn oHor tmko bidio mch aHd omch aHd oihi idio amonh ed ba hSmS : oiHlS ihoSe at emlq oat emo lpi Hrb : oiamr ihoh al mSh ktb cat ckron bspr oSim bacni ihoSe ki mHh amHh at ckr emlq mtHt hSmim : oibn mSh mcbH oiqra Smo ihoh nsi : oiamr ki id el ks ih mlHmh lihoh bemlq mdr dr :

18

oiSme itro khn mdin Htn mSh at kl aSr eSh alhim lmSh oliSral emo ki hozia ihoh at iSral mmzrim : oiqH itro Htn mSh at zprh aSt mSh aHr SloHih : oat Sni bnih aSr Sm haHd grSm ki amr gr hiiti barz nkrih : oSm haHd aliecr ki alhi abi becri oizlni mHrb preh : oiba itro Htn mSh obnio oaSto al mSh al hmdbr aSr hoa Hnh Sm hr halhim : oiamr al mSh ani Htnk itro ba alik oaStk oSni bnih emh : oiza mSh lqrat Htno oiStHo oiSq lo oiSalo aiS lreho lSlom oibao hahlh : oispr mSh lHtno at kl aSr eSh ihoh lpreh olmzrim el aodt iSral at kl htlah aSr mzatm bdrk oizlm ihoh : oiHd itro el kl hTobh aSr eSh ihoh liSral aSr hzilo mid mzrim : oiamr itro brok ihoh aSr hzil atkm mid mzrim omid preh aSr hzil at hem mtHt id mzrim : eth ideti ki gdol ihoh mkl halhim ki bdbr aSr cdo elihm : oiqH itro Htn mSh elh ocbHim lalhim oiba ahrn okl cqni iSral lakl lHm em Htn mSh lpni halhim : oihi mmHrt oiSb mSh lSpT at hem oiemd hem el mSh mn hbqr ed herb : oira Htn mSh at kl aSr hoa eSh lem oiamr mh hdbr hch aSr ath eSh lem mdoe ath ioSb lbdk okl hem nzb elik mn bqr ed erb : oiamr mSh lHtno ki iba ali hem ldrS alhim : ki ihih lhm dbr ba ali oSpTti bin aiS obin reho ohodeti at Hqi halhim oat tortio : oiamr Htn mSh alio la Tob hdbr aSr ath eSh : nbl tbl gm ath gm hem hch aSr emk ki kbd mmk hdbr la tokl eSho lbdk : eth Sme bqli aiezk oihi alhim emk hih ath lem mol halhim ohbat ath at hdbrim al halhim : ohchrth athm at hHqim oat htort ohodet lhm at hdrk ilko bh oat hmeSh aSr ieSon : oath tHch mkl hem anSi Hil irai alhim anSi amt Snai bze oSmt elhm Sri alpim Sri maot Sri HmSim oSri eSrt : oSpTo at hem bkl et ohih kl hdbr hgdl ibiao alik okl hdbr hqTn iSpTo hm ohql melik onSao atk : am at hdbr hch teSh ozok alhim oiklt emd ogm kl hem hch el mqmo iba bSlom : oiSme mSh lqol Htno oieS kl aSr amr : oibHr mSh anSi Hil mkl iSral oitn atm raSim el hem Sri alpim Sri maot Sri HmSim oSri eSrt : oSpTo at hem bkl et at hdbr hqSh ibiaon al mSh okl hdbr hqTn iSpoTo hm : oiSlH mSh at Htno oilk lo al arzo :

19

bHdS hSliSi lzat bni iSral marz mzrim biom hch bao mdbr sini : oiseo mrpidim oibao mdbr sini oiHno bmdbr oiHn Sm iSral ngd hhr : omSh elh al halhim oiqra alio ihoh mn hhr lamr kh tamr lbit ieqb otgid lbni iSral : atm raitm aSr eSiti lmzrim oaSa atkm el knpi nSrim oaba atkm ali : oeth am Smoe tSmeo bqli oSmrtm at briti ohiitm li sglh mkl hemim ki li kl harz : oatm thio li mmlkt khnim ogoi qdoS alh hdbrim aSr tdbr al bni iSral : oiba mSh oiqra lcqni hem oiSm lpnihm at kl hdbrim halh aSr zoho ihoh : oieno kl hem iHdo oiamro kl aSr dbr ihoh neSh oiSb mSh at dbri hem al ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh hnh anki ba alik beb henn bebor iSme hem bdbri emk ogm bk iamino leolm oigd mSh at dbri hem al ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh lk al hem oqdStm hiom omHr okbso Smltm : ohio nknim liom hSliSi ki biom hSliSi ird ihoh leini kl hem el hr sini : ohgblt at hem sbib lamr hSmro lkm elot bhr onge bqzho kl hnge bhr mot iomt : la tge bo id ki sqol isql ao irh iirh am bhmh am aiS la iHih bmSk hibl hmh ielo bhr : oird mSh mn hhr al hem oiqdS at hem oikbso Smltm : oiamr al hem hio nknim lSlSt imim al tgSo al aSh : oihi biom hSliSi bhit hbqr oihi qlt obrqim oenn kbd el hhr oql Spr Hcq mad oiHrd kl hem aSr bmHnh : oioza mSh at hem lqrat halhim mn hmHnh oitizbo btHtit hhr : ohr sini eSn klo mpni aSr ird elio ihoh baS oiel eSno keSn hkbSn oiHrd kl hhr mad : oihi qol hSopr holk oHcq mad mSh idbr ohalhim ienno bqol : oird ihoh el hr sini al raS hhr oiqra ihoh lmSh al raS hhr oiel mSh : oiamr ihoh al mSh rd hed bem pn ihrso al ihoh lraot onpl mmno rb : ogm hkhnim hngSim al ihoh itqdSo pn iprz bhm ihoh : oiamr mSh al ihoh la iokl hem lelt al hr sini ki ath hedth bno lamr hgbl at hhr oqdSto : oiamr alio ihoh lk rd oelit ath oahrn emk ohkhnim ohem al ihrso lelt al ihoh pn iprz bm : oird mSh al hem oiamr alhm :

20

oidbr alhim at kl hdbrim halh lamr : anki ihoh alhik aSr hozatik marz mzrim mbit ebdim : la ihih lk alhim aHrim el pni : la teSh lk psl okl tmonh aSr bSmim mmel oaSr barz mtHt oaSr bmim mtHt larz : la tStHoh lhm ola tebdm ki anki ihoh alhik al qna pqd eon abt el bnim el SlSim oel rbeim lSnai : oeSh Hsd lalpim lahbi olSmri mzoti : la tSa at Sm ihoh alhik lSoa ki la inqh ihoh at aSr iSa at Smo lSoa : ckor at iom hSbt lqdSo : SSt imim tebd oeSit kl mlaktk : oiom hSbiei Sbt lihoh alhik la teSh kl mlakh ath obnk obtk ebdk oamtk obhmtk ogrk aSr bSerik : ki SSt imim eSh ihoh at hSmim oat harz at him oat kl aSr bm oinH biom hSbiei el kn brk ihoh at iom hSbt oiqdSho : kbd at abik oat amk lmen iarkon imik el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : la trzH : la tnap : la tgnb : la tenh brek ed Sqr : la tHmd bit rek la tHmd aSt rek oebdo oamto oSoro oHmro okl aSr lrek : okl hem raim at hqolt oat hlpidm oat qol hSpr oat hhr eSn oira hem oineo oiemdo mrHq : oiamro al mSh dbr ath emno onSmeh oal idbr emno alhim pn nmot : oiamr mSh al hem al tirao ki lbebor nsot atkm ba halhim obebor thih irato el pnikm lblti tHTao : oiemd hem mrHq omSh ngS al herpl aSr Sm halhim : oiamr ihoh al mSh kh tamr al bni iSral atm raitm ki mn hSmim dbrti emkm : la teSon ati alhi ksp oalhi chb la teSo lkm : mcbH admh teSh li ocbHt elio at eltik oat Slmik at zank oat bqrk bkl hmqom aSr ackir at Smi aboa alik obrktik : oam mcbH abnim teSh li la tbnh athn gcit ki Hrbk hnpt elih otHllh : ola telh bmelt el mcbHi aSr la tglh erotk elio :

21

oalh hmSpTim aSr tSim lpnihm : ki tqnh ebd ebri SS Snim iebd obSbet iza lHpSi Hnm : am bgpo iba bgpo iza am bel aSh hoa oizah aSto emo : am adnio itn lo aSh oildh lo bnim ao bnot haSh oildih thih ladnih ohoa iza bgpo : oam amr iamr hebd ahbti at adni at aSti oat bni la aza HpSi : ohgiSo adnio al halhim ohgiSo al hdlt ao al hmcoch orze adnio at acno bmrze oebdo lelm : oki imkr aiS at bto lamh la tza kzat hebdim : am reh beini adnih aSr la iedh ohpdh lem nkri la imSl lmkrh bbgdo bh : oam lbno iiednh kmSpT hbnot ieSh lh : am aHrt iqH lo Sarh ksoth oenth la igre : oam SlS alh la ieSh lh oizah Hnm ain ksp : mkh aiS omt mot iomt : oaSr la zdh ohalhim anh lido oSmti lk mqom aSr inos Smh : oki icd aiS el reho lhrgo bermh mem mcbHi tqHno lmot : omkh abio oamo mot iomt : ognb aiS omkro onmza bido mot iomt : omqll abio oamo mot iomt : oki iribn anSim ohkh aiS at reho babn ao bagrp ola imot onpl lmSkb : am iqom ohthlk bHoz el mSento onqh hmkh rq Sbto itn orpa irpa : oki ikh aiS at ebdo ao at amto bSbT omt tHt ido nqm inqm : ak am iom ao iomim iemd la iqm ki kspo hoa : oki inzo anSim ongpo aSh hrh oizao ildih ola ihih ason enoS ienS kaSr iSit elio bel haSh ontn bpllim : oam ason ihih ontth npS tHt npS : ein tHt ein Sn tHt Sn id tHt id rgl tHt rgl : koih tHt koih pze tHt pze Hborh tHt Hborh : oki ikh aiS at ein ebdo ao at ein amto oSHth lHpSi iSlHno tHt eino : oam Sn ebdo ao Sn amto ipil lHpSi iSlHno tHt Sno : oki igH Sor at aiS ao at aSh omt sqol isql hSor ola iakl at bSro obel hSor nqi : oam Sor ngH hoa mtml SlSm ohoed bbelio ola iSmrno ohmit aiS ao aSh hSor isql ogm belio iomt : am kpr ioSt elio ontn pdin npSo kkl aSr ioSt elio : ao bn igH ao bt igH kmSpT hch ieSh lo : am ebd igH hSor ao amh ksp SlSim Sqlim itn ladnio ohSor isql : oki iptH aiS bor ao ki ikrh aiS br ola iksno onpl Smh Sor ao Hmor : bel hbor iSlm ksp iSib lbelio ohmt ihih lo : oki igp Sor aiS at Sor reho omt omkro at hSor hHi oHzo at kspo ogm at hmt iHzon : ao node ki Sor ngH hoa mtmol SlSm ola iSmrno belio Slm iSlm Sor tHt hSor ohmt ihih lo :

22

ki ignb aiS Sor ao Sh oTbHo ao mkro HmSh bqr iSlm tHt hSor oarbe zan tHt hSh : am bmHtrt imza hgnb ohkh omt ain lo dmim : am crHh hSmS elio dmim lo Slm iSlm am ain lo onmkr bgnbto : am hmza tmza bido hgnbh mSor ed Hmor ed Sh Hiim Snim iSlm : ki iber aiS Sdh ao krm oSlH at beirh ober bSdh aHr miTb Sdho omiTb krmo iSlm : ki tza aS omzah qzim onakl gdiS ao hqmh ao hSdh Slm iSlm hmber at hberh : ki itn aiS al reho ksp ao klim lSmr ognb mbit haiS am imza hgnb iSlm Snim : am la imza hgnb onqrb bel hbit al halhim am la SlH ido bmlakt reho : el kl dbr pSe el Sor el Hmor el Sh el Slmh el kl abdh aSr iamr ki hoa ch ed halhim iba dbr Snihm aSr irSien alhim iSlm Snim lreho : ki itn aiS al reho Hmor ao Sor ao Sh okl bhmh lSmr omt ao nSbr ao nSbh ain rah : Sbet ihoh thih bin Snihm am la SlH ido bmlakt reho olqH belio ola iSlm : oam gnb ignb memo iSlm lbelio : am Trp iTrp ibaho ed hTrph la iSlm : oki iSal aiS mem reho onSbr ao mt belio ain emo Slm iSlm : am belio emo la iSlm am Skir hoa ba bSkro : oki ipth aiS btolh aSr la arSh oSkb emh mhr imhrnh lo laSh : am man iman abih ltth lo ksp iSql kmhr hbtolt : mkSph la tHih : kl Skb em bhmh mot iomt : cbH lalhim iHrm blti lihoh lbdo : ogr la tonh ola tlHzno ki grim hiitm barz mzrim : kl almnh oitom la tenon : am enh tenh ato ki am zeq izeq ali Sme aSme zeqto : oHrh api ohrgti atkm bHrb ohio nSikm almnot obnikm itmim : am ksp tloh at emi at heni emk la thih lo knSh la tSimon elio nSk : am Hbl tHbl Slmt rek ed ba hSmS tSibno lo : ki hoa ksoth lbdh hoa Smlto lero bmh iSkb ohih ki izeq ali oSmeti ki Hnon ani : alhim la tqll onSia bemk la tar : mlatk odmek la taHr bkor bnik ttn li : kn teSh lSrk lzank Sbet imim ihih em amo biom hSmini ttno li : oanSi qdS thion li obSr bSdh Trph la taklo lklb tSlkon ato :

23

la tSa Sme Soa al tSt idk em rSe lhit ed Hms : la thih aHri rbim lret ola tenh el rb lnTt aHri rbim lhTt : odl la thdr bribo : ki tpge Sor aibk ao Hmro teh hSb tSibno lo : ki trah Hmor Snak rbz tHt mSao oHdlt mecb lo ecb tecb emo : la tTh mSpT abink bribo : mdbr Sqr trHq onqi ozdiq al thrg ki la azdiq rSe : oSHd la tqH ki hSHd ieor pqHim oislp dbri zdiqim : ogr la tlHz oatm idetm at npS hgr ki grim hiitm barz mzrim : oSS Snim tcre at arzk oaspt at tboath : ohSbiet tSmTnh onTSth oaklo abini emk oitrm takl Hit hSdh kn teSh lkrmk lcitk : SSt imim teSh meSik obiom hSbiei tSbt lmen inoH Sork oHmrk oinpS bn amtk ohgr : obkl aSr amrti alikm tSmro oSm alhim aHrim la tckiro la iSme el pik : SlS rglim tHg li bSnh : at Hg hmzot tSmr Sbet imim takl mzot kaSr zoitk lmoed HdS habib ki bo izat mmzrim ola irao pni riqm : oHg hqzir bkori meSik aSr tcre bSdh oHg hasp bzat hSnh baspk at meSik mn hSdh : SlS pemim bSnh irah kl ckork al pni hadn ihoh : la tcbH el Hmz dm cbHi ola ilin Hlb Hgi ed bqr : raSit bkori admtk tbia bit ihoh alhik la tbSl gdi bHlb amo : hnh anki SlH mlak lpnik lSmrk bdrk olhbiak al hmqom aSr hknti : hSmr mpnio oSme bqlo al tmr bo ki la iSa lpSekm ki Smi bqrbo : ki am Sme tSme bqlo oeSit kl aSr adbr oaibti at aibik ozrti at zrrik : ki ilk mlaki lpnik ohbiak al hamri ohHti ohprci ohkneni hHoi ohibosi ohkHdtio : la tStHoh lalhihm ola tebdm ola teSh kmeSihm ki hrs thrsm oSbr tSbr mzbtihm : oebdtm at ihoh alhikm obrk at lHmk oat mimik ohsrti mHlh mqrbk : la thih mSklh oeqrh barzk at mspr imik amla : at aimti aSlH lpnik ohmti at kl hem aSr tba bhm ontti at kl aibik alik erp : oSlHti at hzreh lpnik ogrSh at hHoi at hkneni oat hHti mlpnik : la agrSno mpnik bSnh aHt pn thih harz Smmh orbh elik Hit hSdh : meT meT agrSno mpnik ed aSr tprh onHlt at harz : oSti at gblk mim sop oed im plStim ommdbr ed hnhr ki atn bidkm at iSbi harz ogrStmo mpnik : la tkrt lhm olalhihm brit : la iSbo barzk pn iHTiao atk li ki tebd at alhihm ki ihih lk lmoqS :

24

oal mSh amr elh al ihoh ath oahrn ndb oabihoa oSbeim mcqni iSral ohStHoitm mrHq : ongS mSh lbdo al ihoh ohm la igSo ohem la ielo emo : oiba mSh oispr lem at kl dbri ihoh oat kl hmSpTim oien kl hem qol aHd oiamro kl hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh neSh : oiktb mSh at kl dbri ihoh oiSkm bbqr oibn mcbH tHt hhr oStim eSrh mzbh lSnim eSr SbTi iSral : oiSlH at neri bni iSral oielo elt oicbHo cbHim Slmim lihoh prim : oiqH mSh Hzi hdm oiSm bagnt oHzi hdm crq el hmcbH : oiqH spr hbrit oiqra bacni hem oiamro kl aSr dbr ihoh neSh onSme : oiqH mSh at hdm oicrq el hem oiamr hnh dm hbrit aSr krt ihoh emkm el kl hdbrim halh : oiel mSh oahrn ndb oabihoa oSbeim mcqni iSral : oirao at alhi iSral otHt rglio kmeSh lbnt hspir okezm hSmim lThr : oal azili bni iSral la SlH ido oiHco at halhim oiaklo oiSto : oiamr ihoh al mSh elh ali hhrh ohih Sm oatnh lk at lHt habn ohtorh ohmzoh aSr ktbti lhortm : oiqm mSh oihoSe mSrto oiel mSh al hr halhim : oal hcqnim amr Sbo lno bch ed aSr nSob alikm ohnh ahrn oHor emkm mi bel dbrim igS alhm : oiel mSh al hhr oiks henn at hhr : oiSkn kbod ihoh el hr sini oiksho henn SSt imim oiqra al mSh biom hSbiei mtok henn : omrah kbod ihoh kaS aklt braS hhr leini bni iSral : oiba mSh btok henn oiel al hhr oihi mSh bhr arbeim iom oarbeim lilh :

25

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oiqHo li tromh mat kl aiS aSr idbno lbo tqHo at tromti : ocat htromh aSr tqHo matm chb oksp onHSt : otklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS oecim : oert ailm madmim oert tHSim oezi STim : Smn lmar bSmim lSmn hmSHh olqTrt hsmim : abni Shm oabni mlaim lapd olHSn : oeSo li mqdS oSknti btokm : kkl aSr ani mrah aotk at tbnit hmSkn oat tbnit kl klio okn teSo : oeSo aron ezi STim amtim oHzi arko oamh oHzi rHbo oamh oHzi qmto : ozpit ato chb Thor mbit omHoz tzpno oeSit elio cr chb sbib : oizqt lo arbe Tbet chb ontth el arbe pemtio oSti Tbet el zleo haHt oSti Tbet el zleo hSnit : oeSit bdi ezi STim ozpit atm chb : ohbat at hbdim bTbet el zlet harn lSat at harn bhm : bTbet harn ihio hbdim la isro mmno : ontt al harn at hedt aSr atn alik : oeSit kprt chb Thor amtim oHzi arkh oamh oHzi rHbh : oeSit Snim krbim chb mqSh teSh atm mSni qzot hkprt : oeSh krob aHd mqzh mch okrob aHd mqzh mch mn hkprt teSo at hkrbim el Sni qzotio : ohio hkrbim prSi knpim lmelh skkim bknpihm el hkprt opnihm aiS al aHio al hkprt ihio pni hkrbim : ontt at hkprt el harn mlmelh oal harn ttn at hedt aSr atn alik : onoedti lk Sm odbrti atk mel hkprt mbin Sni hkrbim aSr el arn hedt at kl aSr azoh aotk al bni iSral : oeSit SlHn ezi STim amtim arko oamh rHbo oamh oHzi qmto : ozpit ato chb Thor oeSit lo cr chb sbib : oeSit lo msgrt TpH sbib oeSit cr chb lmsgrto sbib : oeSit lo arbe Tbet chb ontt at hTbet el arbe hpat aSr larbe rglio : lemt hmsgrt thiin hTbet lbtim lbdim lSat at hSlHn : oeSit at hbdim ezi STim ozpit atm chb onSa bm at hSlHn : oeSit qertio okptio oqSotio omnqitio aSr isk bhn chb Thor teSh atm : ontt el hSlHn lHm pnim lpni tmid : oeSit mnrt chb Thor mqSh teSh hmnorh irkh oqnh gbieih kptrih oprHih mmnh ihio : oSSh qnim izaim mzdih SlSh qni mnrh mzdh haHd oSlSh qni mnrh mzdh hSni : SlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh haHd kptr oprH oSlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh haHd kptr oprH kn lSSt hqnim hizaim mn hmnrh : obmnrh arbeh gbeim mSqdim kptrih oprHih : okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh lSSt hqnim hizaim mn hmnrh : kptrihm oqntm mmnh ihio klh mqSh aHt chb Thor : oeSit at nrtih Sbeh ohelh at nrtih ohair el ebr pnih : omlqHih omHttih chb Thor : kkr chb Thor ieSh ath at kl hklim halh : orah oeSh btbnitm aSr ath mrah bhr :

26

oat hmSkn teSh eSr iriet SS mScr otklt oargmn otlet Sni krbim meSh HSb teSh atm : ark hirieh haHt Smnh oeSrim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt lkl hiriet : HmS hiriet thiin Hbrt aSh al aHth oHmS iriet Hbrt aSh al aHth : oeSit llat tklt el Spt hirieh haHt mqzh bHbrt okn teSh bSpt hirieh hqizonh bmHbrt hSnit : HmSim llat teSh birieh haHt oHmSim llat teSh bqzh hirieh aSr bmHbrt hSnit mqbilt hllat aSh al aHth : oeSit HmSim qrsi chb oHbrt at hiriet aSh al aHth bqrsim ohih hmSkn aHd : oeSit iriet ecim lahl el hmSkn eSti eSrh iriet teSh atm : ark hirieh haHt SlSim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt leSti eSrh iriet : oHbrt at HmS hiriet lbd oat SS hiriet lbd okplt at hirieh hSSit al mol pni hahl : oeSit HmSim llat el Spt hirieh haHt hqiznh bHbrt oHmSim llat el Spt hirieh hHbrt hSnit : oeSit qrsi nHSt HmSim ohbat at hqrsim bllat oHbrt at hahl ohih aHd : osrH hedp biriet hahl Hzi hirieh hedpt tsrH el aHri hmSkn : ohamh mch ohamh mch bedp bark iriet hahl ihih sroH el zdi hmSkn mch omch lksto : oeSit mksh lahl ert ailm madmim omksh ert tHSim mlmelh : oeSit at hqrSim lmSkn ezi STim emdim : eSr amot ark hqrS oamh oHzi hamh rHb hqrS haHd : Sti idot lqrS haHd mSlbt aSh al aHth kn teSh lkl qrSi hmSkn : oeSit at hqrSim lmSkn eSrim qrS lpat ngbh timnh : oarbeim adni ksp teSh tHt eSrim hqrS Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio : olzle hmSkn hSnit lpat zpon eSrim qrS : oarbeim adnihm ksp Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd : olirkti hmSkn imh teSh SSh qrSim : oSni qrSim teSh lmqzet hmSkn birktim : oihio tamim mlmTh oiHdo ihio tmim el raSo al hTbet haHt kn ihih lSnihm lSni hmqzet ihio : ohio Smnh qrSim oadnihm ksp SSh eSr adnim Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd : oeSit briHm ezi STim HmSh lqrSi zle hmSkn haHd : oHmSh briHm lqrSi zle hmSkn hSnit oHmSh briHm lqrSi zle hmSkn lirktim imh : ohbriH htikn btok hqrSim mbrH mn hqzh al hqzh : oat hqrSim tzph chb oat Tbetihm teSh chb btim lbriHm ozpit at hbriHm chb : ohqmt at hmSkn kmSpTo aSr hrait bhr : oeSit prkt tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh HSb ieSh ath krbim : ontth ath el arbeh emodi STim mzpim chb ooihm chb el arbeh adni ksp : ontth at hprkt tHt hqrsim ohbat Smh mbit lprkt at aron hedot ohbdilh hprkt lkm bin hqdS obin qdS hqdSim : ontt at hkprt el aron hedt bqdS hqdSim : oSmt at hSlHn mHoz lprkt oat hmnrh nkH hSlHn el zle hmSkn timnh ohSlHn ttn el zle zpon : oeSit msk lptH hahl tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh rqm : oeSit lmsk HmSh emodi STim ozpit atm chb ooihm chb oizqt lhm HmSh adni nHSt :

27

oeSit at hmcbH ezi STim HmS amot ark oHmS amot rHb rboe ihih hmcbH oSlS amot qmto : oeSit qrntio el arbe pntio mmno thiin qrntio ozpit ato nHSt : oeSit sirtio ldSno oieio omcrqtio omclgtio omHttio lkl klio teSh nHSt : oeSit lo mkbr meSh rSt nHSt oeSit el hrSt arbe Tbet nHSt el arbe qzotio : ontth ath tHt krkb hmcbH mlmTh ohith hrSt ed Hzi hmcbH : oeSit bdim lmcbH bdi ezi STim ozpit atm nHSt : ohoba at bdio bTbet ohio hbdim el Sti zlet hmcbH bSat ato : nbob lHt teSh ato kaSr hrah atk bhr kn ieSo : oeSit at Hzr hmSkn lpat ngb timnh qleim lHzr SS mScr mah bamh ark lpah haHt : oemdio eSrim oadnihm eSrim nHSt ooi hemdim oHSqihm ksp : okn lpat zpon bark qleim mah ark oemdo eSrim oadnihm eSrim nHSt ooi hemdim oHSqihm ksp : orHb hHzr lpat im qleim HmSim amh emdihm eSrh oadnihm eSrh : orHb hHzr lpat qdmh mcrHh HmSim amh : oHmS eSrh amh qleim lktp emdihm SlSh oadnihm SlSh : olktp hSnit HmS eSrh qleim emdihm SlSh oadnihm SlSh : olSer hHzr msk eSrim amh tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh rqm emdihm arbeh oadnihm arbeh : kl emodi hHzr sbib mHSqim ksp ooihm ksp oadnihm nHSt : ark hHzr mah bamh orHb HmSim bHmSim oqmh HmS amot SS mScr oadnihm nHSt : lkl kli hmSkn bkl ebdto okl itdtio okl itdt hHzr nHSt : oath tzoh at bni iSral oiqHo alik Smn cit ck ktit lmaor lhelt nr tmid : bahl moed mHoz lprkt aSr el hedt ierk ato ahrn obnio merb ed bqr lpni ihoh Hqt eolm ldrtm mat bni iSral :

28

oath hqrb alik at ahrn aHik oat bnio ato mtok bni iSral lkhno li ahrn ndb oabihoa alecr oaitmr bni ahrn : oeSit bgdi qdS lahrn aHik lkbod oltpart : oath tdbr al kl Hkmi lb aSr mlatio roH Hkmh oeSo at bgdi ahrn lqdSo lkhno li : oalh hbgdim aSr ieSo HSn oapod omeil oktnt tSbz mznpt oabnT oeSo bgdi qdS lahrn aHik olbnio lkhno li : ohm iqHo at hchb oat htklt oat hargmn oat tolet hSni oat hSS : oeSo at hapd chb tklt oargmn tolet Sni oSS mScr meSh HSb : Sti ktpt Hbrt ihih lo al Sni qzotio oHbr : oHSb apdto aSr elio kmeSho mmno ihih chb tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr : olqHt at Sti abni Shm optHt elihm Smot bni iSral : SSh mSmtm el habn haHt oat Smot hSSh hnotrim el habn hSnit ktoldtm : meSh HrS abn ptoHi Htm tptH at Sti habnim el Smt bni iSral msbt mSbzot chb teSh atm : oSmt at Sti habnim el ktpt hapd abni ckrn lbni iSral onSa ahrn at Smotm lpni ihoh el Sti ktpio lckrn : oeSit mSbzt chb : oSti SrSrt chb Thor mgblt teSh atm meSh ebt ontth at SrSrt hebtt el hmSbzt : oeSit HSn mSpT meSh HSb kmeSh apd teSno chb tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr teSh ato : rboe ihih kpol crt arko ocrt rHbo : omlat bo mlat abn arbeh Torim abn Tor adm pTdh obrqt hTor haHd : ohTor hSni npk spir oihlm : ohTor hSliSi lSm Sbo oaHlmh : ohTor hrbiei trSiS oShm oiSph mSbzim chb ihio bmloatm : ohabnim thiin el Smt bni iSral Stim eSrh el Smtm ptoHi Hotm aiS el Smo thiin lSni eSr SbT : oeSit el hHSn SrSt gblt meSh ebt chb Thor : oeSit el hHSn Sti Tbeot chb ontt at Sti hTbeot el Sni qzot hHSn : ontth at Sti ebtt hchb el Sti hTbet al qzot hHSn : oat Sti qzot Sti hebtt ttn el Sti hmSbzot ontth el ktpot hapd al mol pnio : oeSit Sti Tbeot chb oSmt atm el Sni qzot hHSn el Spto aSr al ebr hapd bith : oeSit Sti Tbeot chb ontth atm el Sti ktpot hapod mlmTh mmol pnio lemt mHbrto mmel lHSb hapod : oirkso at hHSn mTbeto al Tbet hapd bptil tklt lhiot el HSb hapod ola icH hHSn mel hapod : onSa ahrn at Smot bni iSral bHSn hmSpT el lbo bbao al hqdS lckrn lpni ihoh tmid : ontt al HSn hmSpT at haorim oat htmim ohio el lb ahrn bbao lpni ihoh onSa ahrn at mSpT bni iSral el lbo lpni ihoh tmid : oeSit at meil hapod klil tklt : ohih pi raSo btoko Sph ihih lpio sbib meSh arg kpi tHra ihih lo la iqre : oeSit el Solio rmni tklt oargmn otolet Sni el Solio sbib opemni chb btokm sbib : pemn chb ormon pemn chb ormon el Soli hmeil sbib : ohih el ahrn lSrt onSme qolo bbao al hqdS lpni ihoh obzato ola imot : oeSit ziz chb Thor optHt elio ptoHi Htm qdS lihoh : oSmt ato el ptil tklt ohih el hmznpt al mol pni hmznpt ihih : ohih el mzH ahrn onSa ahrn at eon hqdSim aSr iqdiSo bni iSral lkl mtnt qdSihm ohih el mzHo tmid lrzon lhm lpni ihoh : oSbzt hktnt SS oeSit mznpt SS oabnT teSh meSh rqm : olbni ahrn teSh ktnt oeSit lhm abnTim omgbeot teSh lhm lkbod oltpart : ohlbSt atm at ahrn aHik oat bnio ato omSHt atm omlat at idm oqdSt atm okhno li : oeSh lhm mknsi bd lksot bSr eroh mmtnim oed irkim ihio : ohio el ahrn oel bnio bbam al ahl moed ao bgStm al hmcbH lSrt bqdS ola iSao eon omto Hqt eolm lo olcreo aHrio :

29

och hdbr aSr teSh lhm lqdS atm lkhn li lqH pr aHd bn bqr oailm Snim tmimm : olHm mzot oHlt mzt blolt bSmn orqiqi mzot mSHim bSmn slt HTim teSh atm : ontt aotm el sl aHd ohqrbt atm bsl oat hpr oat Sni hailm : oat ahrn oat bnio tqrib al ptH ahl moed orHzt atm bmim : olqHt at hbgdim ohlbSt at ahrn at hktnt oat meil hapd oat hapd oat hHSn oapdt lo bHSb hapd : oSmt hmznpt el raSo ontt at ncr hqdS el hmznpt : olqHt at Smn hmSHh oizqt el raSo omSHt ato : oat bnio tqrib ohlbStm ktnt : oHgrt atm abnT ahrn obnio oHbSt lhm mgbet ohith lhm khnh lHqt eolm omlat id ahrn oid bnio : ohqrbt at hpr lpni ahl moed osmk ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hpr : oSHTt at hpr lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed : olqHt mdm hpr ontth el qrnt hmcbH bazbek oat kl hdm tSpk al isod hmcbH : olqHt at kl hHlb hmksh at hqrb oat hitrt el hkbd oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn ohqTrt hmcbHh : oat bSr hpr oat ero oat prSo tSrp baS mHoz lmHnh HTat hoa : oat hail haHd tqH osmko ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail : oSHTt at hail olqHt at dmo ocrqt el hmcbH sbib : oat hail tntH lntHio orHzt qrbo okreio ontt el ntHio oel raSo : ohqTrt at kl hail hmcbHh elh hoa lihoh riH niHoH aSh lihoh hoa : olqHt at hail hSni osmk ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail : oSHTt at hail olqHt mdmo ontth el tnok acn ahrn oel tnok acn bnio himnit oel bhn idm himnit oel bhn rglm himnit ocrqt at hdm el hmcbH sbib : olqHt mn hdm aSr el hmcbH omSmn hmSHh ohcit el ahrn oel bgdio oel bnio oel bgdi bnio ato oqdS hoa obgdio obnio obgdi bnio ato : olqHt mn hail hHlb ohalih oat hHlb hmksh at hqrb oat itrt hkbd oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn oat Soq himin ki ail mlaim hoa : okkr lHm aHt oHlt lHm Smn aHt orqiq aHd msl hmzot aSr lpni ihoh : oSmt hkl el kpi ahrn oel kpi bnio ohnpt atm tnoph lpni ihoh : olqHt atm midm ohqTrt hmcbHh el helh lriH niHoH lpni ihoh aSh hoa lihoh : olqHt at hHch mail hmlaim aSr lahrn ohnpt ato tnoph lpni ihoh ohih lk lmnh : oqdSt at Hch htnoph oat Soq htromh aSr honp oaSr horm mail hmlaim maSr lahrn omaSr lbnio : ohih lahrn olbnio lHq eolm mat bni iSral ki tromh hoa otromh ihih mat bni iSral mcbHi Slmihm tromtm lihoh : obgdi hqdS aSr lahrn ihio lbnio aHrio lmSHh bhm olmla bm at idm : Sbet imim ilbSm hkhn tHtio mbnio aSr
