iba al ahl moed lSrt bqdS : oat ail hmlaim tqH obSlt at bSro bmqm qdS : oakl ahrn obnio at bSr hail oat hlHm aSr bsl ptH ahl moed : oaklo atm aSr kpr bhm lmla at idm lqdS atm ocr la iakl ki qdS hm : oam iotr mbSr hmlaim omn hlHm ed hbqr oSrpt at hnotr baS la iakl ki qdS hoa : oeSit lahrn olbnio kkh kkl aSr zoiti atkh Sbet imim tmla idm : opr HTat teSh liom el hkprim oHTat el hmcbH bkprk elio omSHt ato lqdSo : Sbet imim tkpr el hmcbH oqdSt ato ohih hmcbH qdS qdSim kl hnge bmcbH iqdS : och aSr teSh el hmcbH kbSim bni Snh Snim liom tmid : at hkbS haHd teSh bbqr oat hkbS hSni teSh bin herbim : oeSrn slt blol bSmn ktit rbe hhin onsk rbeit hhin iin lkbS haHd : oat hkbS hSni teSh bin herbim kmnHt hbqr oknskh teSh lh lriH niHH aSh lihoh : elt tmid ldrtikm ptH ahl moed lpni ihoh aSr aoed lkm Smh ldbr alik Sm : onedti Smh lbni iSral onqdS bkbdi : oqdSti at ahl moed oat hmcbH oat ahrn oat bnio aqdS lkhn li : oSknti btok bni iSral ohiiti lhm lalhim : oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm aSr hozati atm marz mzrim lSkni btokm ani ihoh alhihm :

30

oeSit mcbH mqTr qTrt ezi STim teSh ato : amh arko oamh rHbo rboe ihih oamtim qmto mmno qrntio : ozpit ato chb Thor at ggo oat qirtio sbib oat qrntio oeSit lo cr chb sbib : oSti Tbet chb teSh lo mtHt lcro el Sti zletio teSh el Sni zdio ohih lbtim lbdim lSat ato bhmh : oeSit at hbdim ezi STim ozpit atm chb : ontth ato lpni hprkt aSr el arn hedt lpni hkprt aSr el hedt aSr aoed lk Smh : ohqTir elio ahrn qTrt smim bbqr bbqr bhiTibo at hnrt iqTirnh : obhelt ahrn at hnrt bin herbim iqTirnh qTrt tmid lpni ihoh ldrtikm : la telo elio qTrt crh oelh omnHh onsk la tsko elio : okpr ahrn el qrntio aHt bSnh mdm HTat hkprim aHt bSnh ikpr elio ldrtikm qdS qdSim hoa lihoh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : ki tSa at raS bni iSral lpqdihm ontno aiS kpr npSo lihoh bpqd atm ola ihih bhm ngp bpqd atm : ch itno kl hebr el hpqdim mHzit hSql bSql hqdS eSrim grh hSql mHzit hSql tromh lihoh : kl hebr el hpqdim mbn eSrim Snh omelh itn tromt ihoh : heSir la irbh ohdl la imeiT mmHzit hSql ltt at tromt ihoh lkpr el npStikm : olqHt at ksp hkprim mat bni iSral ontt ato el ebdt ahl moed ohih lbni iSral lckron lpni ihoh lkpr el npStikm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : oeSit kior nHSt okno nHSt lrHzh ontt ato bin ahl moed obin hmcbH ontt Smh mim : orHzo ahrn obnio mmno at idihm oat rglihm : bbam al ahl moed irHzo mim ola imto ao bgStm al hmcbH lSrt lhqTir aSh lihoh : orHzo idihm orglihm ola imto ohith lhm Hq eolm lo olcreo ldrtm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : oath qH lk bSmim raS mr dror HmS maot oqnmn bSm mHzito HmSim omatim oqnh bSm HmSim omatim : oqdh HmS maot bSql hqdS oSmn cit hin : oeSit ato Smn mSHt qdS rqH mrqHt meSh rqH Smn mSHt qdS ihih : omSHt bo at ahl moed oat aron hedt : oat hSlHn oat kl klio oat hmnrh oat klih oat mcbH hqTrt : oat mcbH helh oat kl klio oat hkir oat kno : oqdSt atm ohio qdS qdSim kl hnge bhm iqdS : oat ahrn oat bnio tmSH oqdSt atm lkhn li : oal bni iSral tdbr lamr Smn mSHt qdS ihih ch li ldrtikm : el bSr adm la iisk obmtknto la teSo kmho qdS hoa qdS ihih lkm : aiS aSr irqH kmho oaSr itn mmno el cr onkrt memio : oiamr ihoh al mSh qH lk smim nTp oSHlt oHlbnh smim olbnh ckh bd bbd ihih : oeSit ath qTrt rqH meSh roqH mmlH Thor qdS : oSHqt mmnh hdq ontth mmnh lpni hedt bahl moed aSr aoed lk Smh qdS qdSim thih lkm : ohqTrt aSr teSh bmtknth la teSo lkm qdS thih lk lihoh : aiS aSr ieSh kmoh lhriH bh onkrt memio :

31

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : rah qrati bSm bzlal bn aori bn Hor lmTh ihodh : oamla ato roH alhim bHkmh obtbonh obdet obkl mlakh : lHSb mHSbt leSot bchb obksp obnHSt : obHrSt abn lmlat obHrSt ez leSot bkl mlakh : oani hnh ntti ato at ahliab bn aHismk lmTh dn oblb kl Hkm lb ntti Hkmh oeSo at kl aSr zoitk : at ahl moed oat harn ledt oat hkprt aSr elio oat kl kli hahl : oat hSlHn oat klio oat hmnrh hThrh oat kl klih oat mcbH hqTrt : oat mcbH helh oat kl klio oat hkior oat kno : oat bgdi hSrd oat bgdi hqdS lahrn hkhn oat bgdi bnio lkhn : oat Smn hmSHh oat qTrt hsmim lqdS kkl aSr zoitk ieSo : oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr : oath dbr al bni iSral lamr ak at Sbtti tSmro ki aot hoa bini obinikm ldrtikm ldet ki ani ihoh mqdSkm : oSmrtm at hSbt ki qdS hoa lkm mHllih mot iomt ki kl heSh bh mlakh onkrth hnpS hhoa mqrb emih : SSt imim ieSh mlakh obiom hSbiei Sbt Sbton qdS lihoh kl heSh mlakh biom hSbt mot iomt : oSmro bni iSral at hSbt leSot at hSbt ldrtm brit eolm : bini obin bni iSral aot hoa lelm ki SSt imim eSh ihoh at hSmim oat harz obiom hSbiei Sbt oinpS : oitn al mSh kklto ldbr ato bhr sini Sni lHt hedt lHt abn ktbim bazbe alhim :

32

oira hem ki bSS mSh lrdt mn hhr oiqhl hem el ahrn oiamro alio qom eSh lno alhim aSr ilko lpnino ki ch mSh haiS aSr helno marz mzrim la ideno mh hih lo : oiamr alhm ahrn prqo ncmi hchb aSr bacni nSikm bnikm obntikm ohbiao ali : oitprqo kl hem at ncmi hchb aSr bacnihm oibiao al ahrn : oiqH midm oizr ato bHrT oieSho egl mskh oiamro alh alhik iSral aSr helok marz mzrim : oira ahrn oibn mcbH lpnio oiqra ahrn oiamr Hg lihoh mHr : oiSkimo mmHrt oielo elt oigSo Slmim oiSb hem lakl oSto oiqmo lzHq : oidbr ihoh al mSh lk rd ki SHt emk aSr helit marz mzrim : sro mhr mn hdrk aSr zoitm eSo lhm egl mskh oiStHoo lo oicbHo lo oiamro alh alhik iSral aSr helok marz mzrim : oiamr ihoh al mSh raiti at hem hch ohnh em qSh erp hoa : oeth hniHh li oiHr api bhm oaklm oaeSh aotk lgoi gdol : oiHl mSh at pni ihoh alhio oiamr lmh ihoh iHrh apk bemk aSr hozat marz mzrim bkH gdol obid Hcqh : lmh iamro mzrim lamr breh hoziam lhrg atm bhrim olkltm mel pni hadmh Sob mHron apk ohnHm el hreh lemk : ckr labrhm lizHq oliSral ebdik aSr nSbet lhm bk otdbr alhm arbh at crekm kkokbi hSmim okl harz hcat aSr amrti atn lcrekm onHlo lelm : oinHm ihoh el hreh aSr dbr leSot lemo : oipn oird mSh mn hhr oSni lHt hedt bido lHt ktbim mSni ebrihm mch omch hm ktbim : ohlHt meSh alhim hmh ohmktb mktb alhim hoa Hrot el hlHt : oiSme ihoSe at qol hem breh oiamr al mSh qol mlHmh bmHnh : oiamr ain qol enot gborh oain qol enot HloSh qol enot anki Sme : oihi kaSr qrb al hmHnh oira at hegl omHlt oiHr ap mSh oiSlk mido at hlHt oiSbr atm tHt hhr : oiqH at hegl aSr eSo oiSrp baS oiTHn ed aSr dq oicr el pni hmim oiSq at bni iSral : oiamr mSh al ahrn mh eSh lk hem hch ki hbat elio HTah gdlh : oiamr ahrn al iHr ap adni ath idet at hem ki bre hoa : oiamro li eSh lno alhim aSr ilko lpnino ki ch mSh haiS aSr helno marz mzrim la ideno mh hih lo : oamr lhm lmi chb htprqo oitno li oaSlkho baS oiza hegl hch : oira mSh at hem ki pre hoa ki preh ahrn lSmzh bqmihm : oiemd mSh bSer hmHnh oiamr mi lihoh ali oiaspo alio kl bni loi : oiamr lhm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral Simo aiS Hrbo el irko ebro oSobo mSer lSer bmHnh ohrgo aiS at aHio oaiS at reho oaiS at qrbo : oieSo bni loi kdbr mSh oipl mn hem biom hhoa kSlSt alpi aiS : oiamr mSh mlao idkm hiom lihoh ki aiS bbno obaHio oltt elikm hiom brkh : oihi mmHrt oiamr mSh al hem atm HTatm HTah gdlh oeth aelh al ihoh aoli akprh bed HTatkm : oiSb mSh al ihoh oiamr ana HTa hem hch HTah gdlh oieSo lhm alhi chb : oeth am tSa HTatm oam ain mHni na msprk aSr ktbt : oiamr ihoh al mSh mi aSr HTa li amHno mspri : oeth lk nHh at hem al aSr dbrti lk hnh mlaki ilk lpnik obiom pqdi opqdti elihm HTatm : oigp ihoh at hem el aSr eSo at hegl aSr eSh ahrn :

33

oidbr ihoh al mSh lk elh mch ath ohem aSr helit marz mzrim al harz aSr nSbeti labrhm lizHq olieqb lamr lcrek atnnh : oSlHti lpnik mlak ogrSti at hkneni hamri ohHti ohprci hHoi ohibosi : al arz cbt Hlb odbS ki la aelh bqrbk ki em qSh erp ath pn aklk bdrk : oiSme hem at hdbr hre hch oitablo ola Sto aiS edio elio : oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al bni iSral atm em qSh erp rge aHd aelh bqrbk oklitik oeth hord edik melik oadeh mh aeSh lk : oitnzlo bni iSral at edim mhr Horb : omSh iqH at hahl onTh lo mHoz lmHnh hrHq mn hmHnh oqra lo ahl moed ohih kl mbqS ihoh iza al ahl moed aSr mHoz lmHnh : ohih kzat mSh al hahl iqomo kl hem onzbo aiS ptH ahlo ohbiTo aHri mSh ed bao hahlh : ohih kba mSh hahlh ird emod henn oemd ptH hahl odbr em mSh : orah kl hem at emod henn emd ptH hahl oqm kl hem ohStHoo aiS ptH ahlo : odbr ihoh al mSh pnim al pnim kaSr idbr aiS al reho oSb al hmHnh omSrto ihoSe bn non ner la imiS mtok hahl : oiamr mSh al ihoh rah ath amr ali hel at hem hch oath la hodetni at aSr tSlH emi oath amrt idetik bSm ogm mzat Hn beini : oeth am na mzati Hn beinik hodeni na at drkk oadek lmen amza Hn beinik orah ki emk hgoi hch : oiamr pni ilko ohnHti lk : oiamr alio am ain pnik hlkim al telno mch : obmh iode apoa ki mzati Hn beinik ani oemk hloa blktk emno onplino ani oemk mkl hem aSr el pni hadmh : oiamr ihoh al mSh gm at hdbr hch aSr dbrt aeSh ki mzat Hn beini oadek bSm : oiamr hrani na at kbdk : oiamr ani aebir kl Tobi el pnik oqrati bSm ihoh lpnik oHnti at aSr aHn orHmti at aSr arHm : oiamr la tokl lrat at pni ki la irani hadm oHi : oiamr ihoh hnh mqom ati onzbt el hzor : ohih bebr kbdi oSmtik bnqrt hzor oSkti kpi elik ed ebri : ohsrti at kpi orait at aHri opni la irao :

34

oiamr ihoh al mSh psl lk Sni lHt abnim kraSnim oktbti el hlHt at hdbrim aSr hio el hlHt hraSnim aSr Sbrt : ohih nkon lbqr oelit bbqr al hr sini onzbt li Sm el raS hhr : oaiS la ielh emk ogm aiS al ira bkl hhr gm hzan ohbqr al ireo al mol hhr hhoa : oipsl Sni lHt abnim kraSnim oiSkm mSh bbqr oiel al hr sini kaSr zoh ihoh ato oiqH bido Sni lHt abnim : oird ihoh benn oitizb emo Sm oiqra bSm ihoh : oiebr ihoh el pnio oiqra ihoh ihoh al rHom oHnon ark apim orb Hsd oamt : nzr Hsd lalpim nSa eon opSe oHTah onqh la inqh pqd eon abot el bnim oel bni bnim el SlSim oel rbeim : oimhr mSh oiqd arzh oiStHo : oiamr am na mzati Hn beinik adni ilk na adni bqrbno ki em qSh erp hoa oslHt leonno olHTatno onHltno : oiamr hnh anki krt brit ngd kl emk aeSh nplat aSr la nbrao bkl harz obkl hgoim orah kl hem aSr ath bqrbo at meSh ihoh ki nora hoa aSr ani eSh emk : Smr lk at aSr anki mzok hiom hnni grS mpnik at hamri ohkneni ohHti ohprci ohHoi ohibosi : hSmr lk pn tkrt brit lioSb harz aSr ath ba elih pn ihih lmoqS bqrbk : ki at mcbHtm ttzon oat mzbtm tSbron oat aSrio tkrton : ki la tStHoh lal aHr ki ihoh qna Smo al qna hoa : pn tkrt brit lioSb harz ocno aHri alhihm ocbHo lalhihm oqra lk oaklt mcbHo : olqHt mbntio lbnik ocno bntio aHri alhihn ohcno at bnik aHri alhihn : alhi mskh la teSh lk : at Hg hmzot tSmr Sbet imim takl mzot aSr zoitk lmoed HdS habib ki bHdS habib izat mmzrim : kl pTr rHm li okl mqnk tckr pTr Sor oSh : opTr Hmor tpdh bSh oam la tpdh oerpto kl bkor bnik tpdh ola irao pni riqm : SSt imim tebd obiom hSbiei tSbt bHriS obqzir tSbt : oHg Sbet teSh lk bkori qzir HTim oHg hasip tqopt hSnh : SlS pemim bSnh irah kl ckork at pni hadn ihoh alhi iSral : ki aoriS goim mpnik ohrHbti at gbolk ola iHmd aiS at arzk beltk lraot at pni ihoh alhik SlS pemim bSnh : la tSHT el Hmz dm cbHi ola ilin lbqr cbH Hg hpsH : raSit bkori admtk tbia bit ihoh alhik la tbSl gdi bHlb amo : oiamr ihoh al mSh ktb lk at hdbrim halh ki el pi hdbrim halh krti atk brit oat iSral : oihi Sm em ihoh arbeim iom oarbeim lilh lHm la akl omim la Sth oiktb el hlHt at dbri hbrit eSrt hdbrim : oihi brdt mSh mhr sini oSni lHt hedt bid mSh brdto mn hhr omSh la ide ki qrn eor pnio bdbro ato : oira ahrn okl bni iSral at mSh ohnh qrn eor pnio oiirao mgSt alio : oiqra alhm mSh oiSbo alio ahrn okl hnSaim bedh oidbr mSh alhm : oaHri kn ngSo kl bni iSral oizom at kl aSr dbr ihoh ato bhr sini : oikl mSh mdbr atm oitn el pnio msoh : obba mSh lpni ihoh ldbr ato isir at hmsoh ed zato oiza odbr al bni iSral at aSr izoh : orao bni iSral at pni mSh ki qrn eor pni mSh ohSib mSh at hmsoh el pnio ed bao ldbr ato :

35

oiqhl mSh at kl edt bni iSral oiamr alhm alh hdbrim aSr zoh ihoh leSt atm : SSt imim teSh mlakh obiom hSbiei ihih lkm qdS Sbt Sbton lihoh kl heSh bo mlakh iomt : la tbero aS bkl mSbtikm biom hSbt : oiamr mSh al kl edt bni iSral lamr ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh lamr : qHo matkm tromh lihoh kl ndib lbo ibiah at tromt ihoh chb oksp onHSt : otklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS oecim : oert ailm madmim oert tHSim oezi STim : oSmn lmaor obSmim lSmn hmSHh olqTrt hsmim : oabni Shm oabni mlaim lapod olHSn : okl Hkm lb bkm ibao oieSo at kl aSr zoh ihoh : at hmSkn at ahlo oat mksho at qrsio oat qrSio at briHo at emdio oat adnio : at harn oat bdio at hkprt oat prkt hmsk : at hSlHn oat bdio oat kl klio oat lHm hpnim : oat mnrt hmaor oat klih oat nrtih oat Smn hmaor : oat mcbH hqTrt oat bdio oat Smn hmSHh oat qTrt hsmim oat msk hptH lptH hmSkn : at mcbH helh oat mkbr hnHSt aSr lo at bdio oat kl klio at hkir oat kno : at qlei hHzr at emdio oat adnih oat msk Ser hHzr : at itdt hmSkn oat itdt hHzr oat mitrihm : at bgdi hSrd lSrt bqdS at bgdi hqdS lahrn hkhn oat bgdi bnio lkhn : oizao kl edt bni iSral mlpni mSh : oibao kl aiS aSr nSao lbo okl aSr ndbh roHo ato hbiao at tromt ihoh lmlakt ahl moed olkl ebdto olbgdi hqdS : oibao hanSim el hnSim kl ndib lb hbiao HH oncm oTbet okomc kl kli chb okl aiS aSr hnip tnopt chb lihoh : okl aiS aSr nmza ato tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS oecim oert ailm madmim oert tHSim hbiao : kl mrim tromt ksp onHSt hbiao at tromt ihoh okl aSr nmza ato ezi STim lkl mlakt hebdh hbiao : okl aSh Hkmt lb bidih Too oibiao mToh at htklt oat hargmn at tolet hSni oat hSS : okl hnSim aSr nSa lbn atnh bHkmh Too at hecim : ohnSam hbiao at abni hShm oat abni hmlaim lapod olHSn : oat hbSm oat hSmn lmaor olSmn hmSHh olqTrt hsmim : kl aiS oaSh aSr ndb lbm atm lhbia lkl hmlakh aSr zoh ihoh leSot bid mSh hbiao bni iSral ndbh lihoh : oiamr mSh al bni iSral rao qra ihoh bSm bzlal bn aori bn Hor lmTh ihodh : oimla ato roH alhim bHkmh btbonh obdet obkl mlakh : olHSb mHSbt leSt bchb obksp obnHSt : obHrSt abn lmlat obHrSt ez leSot bkl mlakt mHSbt : olhort ntn blbo hoa oahliab bn aHismk lmTh dn : mla atm Hkmt lb leSot kl mlakt HrS oHSb orqm btklt obargmn btolet hSni obSS oarg eSi kl mlakh oHSbi mHSbt :

36

oeSh bzlal oahliab okl aiS Hkm lb aSr ntn ihoh Hkmh otbonh bhmh ldet leSt at kl mlakt ebdt hqdS lkl aSr zoh ihoh : oiqra mSh al bzlal oal ahliab oal kl aiS Hkm lb aSr ntn ihoh Hkmh blbo kl aSr nSao lbo lqrbh al hmlakh leSt ath : oiqHo mlpni mSh at kl htromh aSr hbiao bni iSral lmlakt ebdt hqdS leSt ath ohm hbiao alio eod ndbh bbqr bbqr : oibao kl hHkmim heSim at kl mlakt hqdS aiS aiS mmlakto aSr hmh eSim : oiamro al mSh lamr mrbim hem lhbia mdi hebdh lmlakh aSr zoh ihoh leSt ath : oizo mSh oiebiro qol bmHnh lamr aiS oaSh al ieSo eod mlakh ltromt hqdS oikla hem mhbia : ohmlakh hith dim lkl hmlakh leSot ath ohotr : oieSo kl Hkm lb beSi hmlakh at hmSkn eSr iriet SS mScr otklt oargmn otolet Sni krbim meSh HSb eSh atm : ark hirieh haHt Smnh oeSrim bamh orHb arbe bamh hirieh haHt mdh aHt lkl hiriet : oiHbr at HmS hiriet aHt al aHt oHmS iriet Hbr aHt al aHt : oieS llat tklt el Spt hirieh haHt mqzh bmHbrt kn eSh bSpt hirieh hqizonh bmHbrt hSnit : HmSim llat eSh birieh haHt oHmSim llat eSh bqzh hirieh aSr bmHbrt hSnit mqbilt hllat aHt al aHt : oieS HmSim qrsi chb oiHbr at hiret aHt al aHt bqrsim oihi hmSkn aHd : oieS iriet ecim lahl el hmSkn eSti eSrh iriet eSh atm : ark hirieh haHt SlSim bamh oarbe amot rHb hirieh haHt mdh aHt leSti eSrh iriet : oiHbr at HmS hiriet lbd oat SS hiriet lbd : oieS llat HmSim el Spt hirieh hqiznh bmHbrt oHmSim llat eSh el Spt hirieh hHbrt hSnit : oieS qrsi nHSt HmSim lHbr at hahl lhit aHd : oieS mksh lahl ert alim madmim omksh ert tHSim mlmelh : oieS at hqrSim lmSkn ezi STim emdim : eSr amt ark hqrS oamh oHzi hamh rHb hqrS haHd : Sti idt lqrS haHd mSlbt aHt al aHt kn eSh lkl qrSi hmSkn : oieS at hqrSim lmSkn eSrim qrSim lpat ngb timnh : oarbeim adni ksp eSh tHt eSrim hqrSim Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd lSti idtio : olzle hmSkn hSnit lpat zpon eSh eSrim qrSim : oarbeim adnihm ksp Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd oSni adnim tHt hqrS haHd : olirkti hmSkn imh eSh SSh qrSim : oSni qrSim eSh lmqzet hmSkn birktim : ohio toamm mlmTh oiHdo ihio tmim al raSo al hTbet haHt kn eSh lSnihm lSni hmqzet : ohio Smnh qrSim oadnihm ksp SSh eSr adnim Sni adnim Sni adnim tHt hqrS haHd : oieS briHi ezi STim HmSh lqrSi zle hmSkn haHt : oHmSh briHm lqrSi zle hmSkn hSnit oHmSh briHm lqrSi hmSkn lirktim imh : oieS at hbriH htikn lbrH btok hqrSim mn hqzh al hqzh : oat hqrSim zph chb oat Tbetm eSh chb btim lbriHm oizp at hbriHm chb : oieS at hprkt tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh HSb eSh ath krbim : oieS lh arbeh emodi STim oizpm chb ooihm chb oizq lhm arbeh adni ksp : oieS msk lptH hahl tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr meSh rqm : oat emodio HmSh oat ooihm ozph raSihm oHSqihm chb oadnihm HmSh nHSt :

37

oieS bzlal at harn ezi STim amtim oHzi arko oamh oHzi rHbo oamh oHzi qmto : oizpho chb Thor mbit omHoz oieS lo cr chb sbib : oizq lo arbe Tbet chb el arbe pemtio oSti Tbet el zleo haHt oSti Tbeot el zleo hSnit : oieS bdi ezi STim oizp atm chb : oiba at hbdim bTbet el zlet harn lSat at harn : oieS kprt chb Thor amtim oHzi arkh oamh oHzi rHbh : oieS Sni krbim chb mqSh eSh atm mSni qzot hkprt : krob aHd mqzh mch okrob aHd mqzh mch mn hkprt eSh at hkrbim mSni qzooto : oihio hkrbim prSi knpim lmelh skkim bknpihm el hkprt opnihm aiS al aHio al hkprt hio pni hkrbim : oieS at hSlHn ezi STim amtim arko oamh rHbo oamh oHzi qmto : oizp ato chb Thor oieS lo cr chb sbib : oieS lo msgrt TpH sbib oieS cr chb lmsgrto sbib : oizq lo arbe Tbet chb oitn at hTbet el arbe hpat aSr larbe rglio : lemt hmsgrt hio hTbet btim lbdim lSat at hSlHn : oieS at hbdim ezi STim oizp atm chb lSat at hSlHn : oieS at hklim aSr el hSlHn at qertio oat kptio oat mnqitio oat hqSot aSr isk bhn chb Thor : oieS at hmnrh chb Thor mqSh eSh at hmnrh irkh oqnh gbieih kptrih oprHih mmnh hio : oSSh qnim izaim mzdih SlSh qni mnrh mzdh haHd oSlSh qni mnrh mzdh hSni : SlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh haHd kptr oprH oSlSh gbeim mSqdim bqnh aHd kptr oprH kn lSSt hqnim hizaim mn hmnrh : obmnrh arbeh gbeim mSqdim kptrih oprHih : okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh okptr tHt Sni hqnim mmnh lSSt hqnim hizaim mmnh : kptrihm oqntm mmnh hio klh mqSh aHt chb Thor : oieS at nrtih Sbeh omlqHih omHttih chb Thor : kkr chb Thor eSh ath oat kl klih : oieS at mcbH hqTrt ezi STim amh arko oamh rHbo rboe oamtim qmto mmno hio qrntio : oizp ato chb Thor at ggo oat qirtio sbib oat qrntio oieS lo cr chb sbib : oSti Tbet chb eSh lo mtHt lcro el Sti zletio el Sni zdio lbtim lbdim lSat ato bhm : oieS at hbdim ezi STim oizp atm chb : oieS at Smn hmSHh qdS oat qTrt hsmim Thor meSh rqH :

38

oieS at mcbH helh ezi STim HmS amot arko oHmS amot rHbo rboe oSlS amot qmto : oieS qrntio el arbe pntio mmno hio qrntio oizp ato nHSt : oieS at kl kli hmcbH at hsirt oat hieim oat hmcrqt at hmclgt oat hmHtt kl klio eSh nHSt : oieS lmcbH mkbr meSh rSt nHSt tHt krkbo mlmTh ed Hzio : oizq arbe Tbet barbe hqzot lmkbr hnHSt btim lbdim : oieS at hbdim ezi STim oizp atm nHSt : oiba at hbdim bTbet el zlet hmcbH lSat ato bhm nbob lHt eSh ato : oieS at hkior nHSt oat kno nHSt bmrat hzbat aSr zbao ptH ahl moed : oieS at hHzr lpat ngb timnh qlei hHzr SS mScr mah bamh : emodihm eSrim oadnihm eSrim nHSt ooi hemdim oHSqihm ksp : olpat zpon mah bamh emodihm eSrim oadnihm eSrim nHSt ooi hemodim oHSqihm ksp : olpat im qleim HmSim bamh emodihm eSrh oadnihm eSrh ooi hemdim oHSoqihm ksp : olpat qdmh mcrHh HmSim amh : qleim HmS eSrh amh al hktp emodihm SlSh oadnihm SlSh : olktp hSnit mch omch lSer hHzr qleim HmS eSrh amh emdihm SlSh oadnihm SlSh : kl qlei hHzr sbib SS mScr : ohadnim lemdim nHSt ooi hemodim oHSoqihm ksp ozpoi raSihm ksp ohm mHSqim ksp kl emdi hHzr : omsk Ser hHzr meSh rqm tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr oeSrim amh ark oqomh brHb HmS amot lemt qlei hHzr : oemdihm arbeh oadnihm arbeh nHSt ooihm ksp ozpoi raSihm oHSqihm ksp : okl hitdt lmSkn olHzr sbib nHSt : alh pqodi hmSkn mSkn hedt aSr pqd el pi mSh ebdt hloim bid aitmr bn ahrn hkhn : obzlal bn aori bn Hor lmTh ihodh eSh at kl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oato ahliab bn aHismk lmTh dn HrS oHSb orqm btklt obargmn obtolet hSni obSS : kl hchb heSoi lmlakh bkl mlakt hqdS oihi chb htnoph tSe oeSrim kkr oSbe maot oSlSim Sql bSql hqdS : oksp pqodi hedh mat kkr oalp oSbe maot oHmSh oSbeim Sql bSql hqdS : bqe lglglt mHzit hSql bSql hqdS lkl hebr el hpqdim mbn eSrim Snh omelh lSS maot alp oSlSt alpim oHmS maot oHmSim : oihi mat kkr hksp lzqt at adni hqdS oat adni hprkt mat adnim lmat hkkr kkr ladn : oat halp oSbe hmaot oHmSh oSbeim eSh ooim lemodim ozph raSihm oHSq atm : onHSt htnoph Sbeim kkr oalpim oarbe maot Sql : oieS bh at adni ptH ahl moed oat mcbH hnHSt oat mkbr hnHSt aSr lo oat kl kli hmcbH : oat adni hHzr sbib oat adni Ser hHzr oat kl itdt hmSkn oat kl itdt hHzr sbib :

39

omn htklt ohargmn otolet hSni eSo bgdi Srd lSrt bqdS oieSo at bgdi hqdS aSr lahrn kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieS at hapd chb tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr : oirqeo at pHi hchb oqzz ptilm leSot btok htklt obtok hargmn obtok tolet hSni obtok hSS meSh HSb : ktpt eSo lo Hbrt el Sni qzooto Hbr : oHSb apdto aSr elio mmno hoa kmeSho chb tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieSo at abni hShm msbt mSbzt chb mptHt ptoHi Hotm el Smot bni iSral : oiSm atm el ktpt hapd abni ckron lbni iSral kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieS at hHSn meSh HSb kmeSh apd chb tklt oargmn otolet Sni oSS mScr : rboe hih kpol eSo at hHSn crt arko ocrt rHbo kpol : oimlao bo arbeh Tori abn Tor adm pTdh obrqt hTor haHd : ohTor hSni npk spir oihlm : ohTor hSliSi lSm Sbo oaHlmh : ohTor hrbiei trSiS Shm oiSph mosbt mSbzot chb bmlatm : ohabnim el Smt bni iSral hnh Stim eSrh el Smtm ptoHi Htm aiS el Smo lSnim eSr SbT : oieSo el hHSn SrSrt gblt meSh ebt chb Thor : oieSo Sti mSbzt chb oSti Tbet chb oitno at Sti hTbet el Sni qzot hHSn : oitno Sti hebtt hchb el Sti hTbet el qzot hHSn : oat Sti qzot Sti hebtt ntno el Sti hmSbzt oitnm el ktpt hapd al mol pnio : oieSo Sti Tbet chb oiSimo el Sni qzot hHSn el Spto aSr al ebr hapd bith : oieSo Sti Tbet chb oitnm el Sti ktpt hapd mlmTh mmol pnio lemt mHbrto mmel lHSb hapd : oirkso at hHSn mTbetio al Tbet hapd bptil tklt lhit el HSb hapd ola icH hHSn mel hapd kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieS at meil hapd meSh arg klil tklt : opi hmeil btoko kpi tHra Sph lpio sbib la iqre : oieSo el Soli hmeil rmoni tklt oargmn otolet Sni mScr : oieSo pemni chb Thor oitno at hpemnim btok hrmnim el Soli hmeil sbib btok hrmnim : pemn ormn pemn ormn el Soli hmeil sbib lSrt kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieSo at hktnt SS meSh arg lahrn olbnio : oat hmznpt SS oat pari hmgbet SS oat mknsi hbd SS mScr : oat habnT SS mScr otklt oargmn otolet Sni meSh rqm kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieSo at ziz ncr hqdS chb Thor oiktbo elio mktb ptoHi Hotm qdS lihoh : oitno elio ptil tklt ltt el hmznpt mlmelh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : otkl kl ebdt mSkn ahl moed oieSo bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo : oibiao at hmSkn al mSh at hahl oat kl klio qrsio qrSio briHo oemdio oadnio : oat mksh eort hailm hmadmim oat mksh ert htHSim oat prkt hmsk : at arn hedt oat bdio oat hkprt : at hSlHn at kl klio oat lHm hpnim : at hmnrh hThrh at nrtih nrt hmerkh oat kl klih oat Smn hmaor : oat mcbH hchb oat Smn hmSHh oat qTrt hsmim oat msk ptH hahl : at mcbH hnHSt oat mkbr hnHSt aSr lo at bdio oat kl klio at hkir oat kno : at qlei hHzr at emdih oat adnih oat hmsk lSer hHzr at mitrio oitdtih oat kl kli ebdt hmSkn lahl moed : at bgdi hSrd lSrt bqdS at bgdi hqdS lahrn hkhn oat bgdi bnio lkhn : kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bni iSral at kl hebdh : oira mSh at kl hmlakh ohnh eSo ath kaSr zoh ihoh kn eSo oibrk atm mSh :

40

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : biom hHdS hraSon baHd lHdS tqim at mSkn ahl moed : oSmt Sm at aron hedot oskt el harn at hprkt : ohbat at hSlHn oerkt at erko ohbat at hmnrh ohelit at nrtih : ontth at mcbH hchb lqTrt lpni aron hedt oSmt at msk hptH lmSkn : ontth at mcbH helh lpni ptH mSkn ahl moed : ontt at hkir bin ahl moed obin hmcbH ontt Sm mim : oSmt at hHzr sbib ontt at msk Ser hHzr : olqHt at Smn hmSHh omSHt at hmSkn oat kl aSr bo oqdSt ato oat kl klio ohih qdS : omSHt at mcbH helh oat kl klio oqdSt at hmcbH ohih hmcbH qdS qdSim : omSHt at hkir oat kno oqdSt ato : ohqrbt at ahrn oat bnio al ptH ahl moed orHzt atm bmim : ohlbSt at ahrn at bgdi hqdS omSHt ato oqdSt ato okhn li : oat bnio tqrib ohlbSt atm ktnt : omSHt atm kaSr mSHt at abihm okhno li ohith lhit lhm mSHtm lkhnt eolm ldrtm : oieS mSh kkl aSr zoh ihoh ato kn eSh : oihi bHdS hraSon bSnh hSnit baHd lHdS hoqm hmSkn : oiqm mSh at hmSkn oitn at adnio oiSm at qrSio oitn at briHio oiqm at emodio : oiprS at hahl el hmSkn oiSm at mksh hahl elio mlmelh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqH oitn at hedt al harn oiSm at hbdim el harn oitn at hkprt el harn mlmelh : oiba at harn al hmSkn oiSm at prkt hmsk oisk el aron hedot kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oitn at hSlHn bahl moed el irk hmSkn zpnh mHoz lprkt : oierk elio erk lHm lpni ihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiSm at hmnrh bahl moed nkH hSlHn el irk hmSkn ngbh : oiel hnrt lpni ihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiSm at mcbH hchb bahl moed lpni hprkt : oiqTr elio qTrt smim kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiSm at msk hptH lmSkn : oat mcbH helh Sm ptH mSkn ahl moed oiel elio at helh oat hmnHh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiSm at hkir bin ahl moed obin hmcbH oitn Smh mim lrHzh : orHzo mmno mSh oahrn obnio at idihm oat rglihm : bbam al ahl moed obqrbtm al hmcbH irHzo kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqm at hHzr sbib lmSkn olmcbH oitn at msk Ser hHzr oikl mSh at hmlakh : oiks henn at ahl moed okbod ihoh mla at hmSkn : ola ikl mSh lboa al ahl moed ki Skn elio henn okbod ihoh mla at hmSkn : obhelot henn mel hmSkn iseo bni iSral bkl mseihm : oam la ielh henn ola iseo ed iom helto : ki enn ihoh el hmSkn iomm oaS thih lilh bo leini kl bit iSral bkl mseihm :

oiqra

1

oiqra al mSh oidbr ihoh alio mahl moed lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm adm ki iqrib mkm qrbn lihoh mn hbhmh mn hbqr omn hzan tqribo at qrbnkm : am elh qrbno mn hbqr ckr tmim iqribno al ptH ahl moed iqrib ato lrzno lpni ihoh : osmk ido el raS helh onrzh lo lkpr elio : oSHT at bn hbqr lpni ihoh ohqribo bni ahrn hkhnim at hdm ocrqo at hdm el hmcbH sbib aSr ptH ahl moed : ohpSiT at helh ontH ath lntHih : ontno bni ahrn hkhn aS el hmcbH oerko ezim el haS : oerko bni ahrn hkhnim at hntHim at hraS oat hpdr el hezim aSr el haS aSr el hmcbH : oqrbo okreio irHz bmim ohqTir hkhn at hkl hmcbHh elh aSh riH niHoH lihoh : oam mn hzan qrbno mn hkSbim ao mn hecim lelh ckr tmim iqribno : oSHT ato el irk hmcbH zpnh lpni ihoh ocrqo bni ahrn hkhnim at dmo el hmcbH sbib : ontH ato lntHio oat raSo oat pdro oerk hkhn atm el hezim aSr el haS aSr el hmcbH : ohqrb ohkreim irHz bmim ohqrib hkhn at hkl ohqTir hmcbHh elh hoa aSh riH niHH lihoh : oam mn heop elh qrbno lihoh ohqrib mn htrim ao mn bni hionh at qrbno : ohqribo hkhn al hmcbH omlq at raSo ohqTir hmcbHh onmzh dmo el qir hmcbH : ohsir at mrato bnzth ohSlik ath azl hmcbH qdmh al mqom hdSn : oSse ato bknpio la ibdil ohqTir ato hkhn hmcbHh el hezim aSr el haS elh hoa aSh riH niHH lihoh :

2

onpS ki tqrib qrbn mnHh lihoh slt ihih qrbno oizq elih Smn ontn elih lbnh : ohbiah al bni ahrn hkhnim oqmz mSm mla qmzo mslth omSmnh el kl lbnth ohqTir hkhn at ackrth hmcbHh aSh riH niHH lihoh : ohnotrt mn hmnHh lahrn olbnio qdS qdSim maSi ihoh : oki tqrb qrbn mnHh maph tnor slt Hlot mzt blolt bSmn orqiqi mzot mSHim bSmn : oam mnHh el hmHbt qrbnk slt blolh bSmn mzh thih : ptot ath ptim oizqt elih Smn mnHh hoa : oam mnHt mrHSt qrbnk slt bSmn teSh : ohbat at hmnHh aSr ieSh malh lihoh ohqribh al hkhn ohgiSh al hmcbH : ohrim hkhn mn hmnHh at ackrth ohqTir hmcbHh aSh riH niHH lihoh : ohnotrt mn hmnHh lahrn olbnio qdS qdSim maSi ihoh : kl hmnHh aSr tqribo lihoh la teSh Hmz ki kl Sar okl dbS la tqTiro mmno aSh lihoh : qrbn raSit tqribo atm lihoh oal hmcbH la ielo lriH niHH : okl qrbn mnHtk bmlH tmlH ola tSbit mlH brit alhik mel mnHtk el kl qrbnk tqrib mlH : oam tqrib mnHt bkorim lihoh abib qloi baS grS krml tqrib at mnHt bkorik : ontt elih Smn oSmt elih lbnh mnHh hoa : ohqTir hkhn at ackrth mgrSh omSmnh el kl lbnth aSh lihoh :

3

oam cbH Slmim qrbno am mn hbqr hoa mqrib am ckr am nqbh tmim iqribno lpni ihoh : osmk ido el raS qrbno oSHTo ptH ahl moed ocrqo bni ahrn hkhnim at hdm el hmcbH sbib : ohqrib mcbH hSlmim aSh lihoh at hHlb hmksh at hqrb oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb : oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elhn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hkliot isirnh : ohqTiro ato bni ahrn hmcbHh el helh aSr el hezim aSr el haS aSh riH niHH lihoh : oam mn hzan qrbno lcbH Slmim lihoh ckr ao nqbh tmim iqribno : am kSb hoa mqrib at qrbno ohqrib ato lpni ihoh : osmk at ido el raS qrbno oSHT ato lpni ahl moed ocrqo bni ahrn at dmo el hmcbH sbib : ohqrib mcbH hSlmim aSh lihoh Hlbo halih tmimh lemt hezh isirnh oat hHlb hmksh at hqrb oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb : oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elhn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hklit isirnh : ohqTiro hkhn hmcbHh lHm aSh lihoh : oam ec qrbno ohqribo lpni ihoh : osmk at ido el raSo oSHT ato lpni ahl moed ocrqo bni ahrn at dmo el hmcbH sbib : ohqrib mmno qrbno aSh lihoh at hHlb hmksh at hqrb oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb : oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elhn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hklit isirnh : ohqTirm hkhn hmcbHh lHm aSh lriH niHH kl Hlb lihoh : Hqt eolm ldrtikm bkl moSbtikm kl Hlb okl dm la taklo :

4

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr npS ki tHTa bSggh mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oeSh maHt mhnh : am hkhn hmSiH iHTa laSmt hem ohqrib el HTato aSr HTa pr bn bqr tmim lihoh lHTat : ohbia at hpr al ptH ahl moed lpni ihoh osmk at ido el raS hpr oSHT at hpr lpni ihoh : olqH hkhn hmSiH mdm hpr ohbia ato al ahl moed : oTbl hkhn at azbeo bdm ohch mn hdm Sbe pemim lpni ihoh at pni prkt hqdS : ontn hkhn mn hdm el qrnot mcbH qTrt hsmim lpni ihoh aSr bahl moed oat kl dm hpr iSpk al isod mcbH helh aSr ptH ahl moed : oat kl Hlb pr hHTat irim mmno at hHlb hmksh el hqrb oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb : oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hkliot isirnh : kaSr iorm mSor cbH hSlmim ohqTirm hkhn el mcbH helh : oat eor hpr oat kl bSro el raSo oel kreio oqrbo oprSo : ohozia at kl hpr al mHoz lmHnh al mqom Thor al Spk hdSn oSrp ato el ezim baS el Spk hdSn iSrp : oam kl edt iSral iSgo onelm dbr meini hqhl oeSo aHt mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oaSmo : onodeh hHTat aSr HTao elih ohqribo hqhl pr bn bqr lHTat ohbiao ato lpni ahl moed : osmko cqni hedh at idihm el raS hpr lpni ihoh oSHT at hpr lpni ihoh : ohbia hkhn hmSiH mdm hpr al ahl moed : oTbl hkhn azbeo mn hdm ohch Sbe pemim lpni ihoh at pni hprkt : omn hdm itn el qrnt hmcbH aSr lpni ihoh aSr bahl moed oat kl hdm iSpk al isod mcbH helh aSr ptH ahl moed : oat kl Hlbo irim mmno ohqTir hmcbHh : oeSh lpr kaSr eSh lpr hHTat kn ieSh lo okpr elhm hkhn onslH lhm : ohozia at hpr al mHoz lmHnh oSrp ato kaSr Srp at hpr hraSon HTat hqhl hoa : aSr nSia iHTa oeSh aHt mkl mzot ihoh alhio aSr la teSinh bSggh oaSm : ao hode alio HTato aSr HTa bh ohbia at qrbno Seir ecim ckr tmim : osmk ido el raS hSeir oSHT ato bmqom aSr iSHT at helh lpni ihoh HTat hoa : olqH hkhn mdm hHTat bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat dmo iSpk al isod mcbH helh : oat kl Hlbo iqTir hmcbHh kHlb cbH hSlmim okpr elio hkhn mHTato onslH lo : oam npS aHt tHTa bSggh mem harz beSth aHt mmzot ihoh aSr la teSinh oaSm : ao hode alio HTato aSr HTa ohbia qrbno Seirt ecim tmimh nqbh el HTato aSr HTa : osmk at ido el raS hHTat oSHT at hHTat bmqom helh : olqH hkhn mdmh bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat kl dmh iSpk al isod hmcbH : oat kl Hlbh isir kaSr hosr Hlb mel cbH hSlmim ohqTir hkhn hmcbHh lriH niHH lihoh okpr elio hkhn onslH lo : oam kbS ibia qrbno lHTat nqbh tmimh ibianh : osmk at ido el raS hHTat oSHT ath lHTat bmqom aSr iSHT at helh : olqH hkhn mdm hHTat bazbeo ontn el qrnt mcbH helh oat kl dmh iSpk al isod hmcbH : oat kl Hlbh isir kaSr iosr Hlb hkSb mcbH hSlmim ohqTir hkhn atm hmcbHh el aSi ihoh okpr elio hkhn el HTato aSr HTa onslH lo :

5

onpS ki tHTa oSmeh qol alh ohoa ed ao rah ao ide am loa igid onSa eono : ao npS aSr tge bkl dbr Tma ao bnblt Hih Tmah ao bnblt bhmh Tmah ao bnblt Srz Tma onelm mmno ohoa Tma oaSm : ao ki ige bTmat adm lkl Tmato aSr iTma bh onelm mmno ohoa ide oaSm : ao npS ki tSbe lbTa bSptim lhre ao lhiTib lkl aSr ibTa hadm bSbeh onelm mmno ohoa ide oaSm laHt malh : ohih ki iaSm laHt malh ohtodh aSr HTa elih : ohbia at aSmo lihoh el HTato aSr HTa nqbh mn hzan kSbh ao Seirt ecim lHTat okpr elio hkhn mHTato : oam la tgie ido di Sh ohbia at aSmo aSr HTa Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh lihoh aHd lHTat oaHd lelh : ohbia atm al hkhn ohqrib at aSr lHTat raSonh omlq at raSo mmol erpo ola ibdil : ohch mdm hHTat el qir hmcbH ohnSar bdm imzh al isod hmcbH HTat hoa : oat hSni ieSh elh kmSpT okpr elio hkhn mHTato aSr HTa onslH lo : oam la tSig ido lSti trim ao lSni bni ionh ohbia at qrbno aSr HTa eSirt haph slt lHTat la iSim elih Smn ola itn elih lbnh ki HTat hia : ohbiah al hkhn oqmz hkhn mmnh mloa qmzo at ackrth ohqTir hmcbHh el aSi ihoh HTat hoa : okpr elio hkhn el HTato aSr HTa maHt malh onslH lo ohith lkhn kmnHh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : npS ki tmel mel oHTah bSggh mqdSi ihoh ohbia at aSmo lihoh ail tmim mn hzan berkk ksp Sqlim bSql hqdS laSm : oat aSr HTa mn hqdS iSlm oat HmiSto iosp elio ontn ato lkhn ohkhn ikpr elio bail haSm onslH lo : oam npS ki tHTa oeSth aHt mkl mzot ihoh aSr la teSinh ola ide oaSm onSa eono : ohbia ail tmim mn hzan berkk laSm al hkhn okpr elio hkhn el Sggto aSr Sgg ohoa la ide onslH lo : aSm hoa aSm aSm lihoh :

6

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : npS ki tHTa omelh mel bihoh okHS bemito bpqdon ao btSomt id ao bgcl ao eSq at emito : ao mza abdh okHS bh onSbe el Sqr el aHt mkl aSr ieSh hadm lHTa bhnh : ohih ki iHTa oaSm ohSib at hgclh aSr gcl ao at heSq aSr eSq ao at hpqdon aSr hpqd ato ao at habdh aSr mza : ao mkl aSr iSbe elio lSqr oSlm ato braSo oHmStio isp elio laSr hoa lo itnno biom aSmto : oat aSmo ibia lihoh ail tmim mn hzan berkk laSm al hkhn : okpr elio hkhn lpni ihoh onslH lo el aHt mkl aSr ieSh laSmh bh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zo at ahrn oat bnio lamr cat tort helh hoa helh el moqdh el hmcbH kl hlilh ed hbqr oaS hmcbH toqd bo : olbS hkhn mdo bd omknsi bd ilbS el bSro ohrim at hdSn aSr takl haS at helh el hmcbH oSmo azl hmcbH : opST at bgdio olbS bgdim aHrim ohozia at hdSn al mHoz lmHnh al mqom Thor : ohaS el hmcbH toqd bo la tkbh ober elih hkhn ezim bbqr bbqr oerk elih helh ohqTir elih Hlbi hSlmim : aS tmid toqd el hmcbH la tkbh : ocat tort hmnHh hqrb ath bni ahrn lpni ihoh al pni hmcbH : ohrim mmno bqmzo mslt hmnHh omSmnh oat kl hlbnh aSr el hmnHh ohqTir hmcbH riH niHH ackrth lihoh : ohnotrt mmnh iaklo ahrn obnio mzot takl bmqom qdS bHzr ahl moed iakloh : la taph Hmz Hlqm ntti ath maSi qdS qdSim hoa kHTat okaSm : kl ckr bbni ahrn iaklnh Hq eolm ldrtikm maSi ihoh kl aSr ige bhm iqdS : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : ch qrbn ahrn obnio aSr iqribo lihoh biom hmSH ato eSirt haph slt mnHh tmid mHzith bbqr omHzith berb : el mHbt bSmn teSh mrbkt tbianh tpini mnHt ptim tqrib riH niHH lihoh : ohkhn hmSiH tHtio mbnio ieSh ath Hq eolm lihoh klil tqTr : okl mnHt khn klil thih la takl : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oal bnio lamr cat tort hHTat bmqom aSr tSHT helh tSHT hHTat lpni ihoh qdS qdSim hoa : hkhn hmHTa ath iaklnh bmqom qdS takl bHzr ahl moed : kl aSr ige bbSrh iqdS oaSr ich mdmh el hbgd aSr ich elih tkbs bmqom qdS : okli HrS aSr tbSl bo iSbr oam bkli nHSt bSlh omrq oSTp bmim : kl ckr bkhnim iakl ath qdS qdSim hoa : okl HTat aSr ioba mdmh al ahl moed lkpr bqdS la takl baS tSrp :

7

ocat tort haSm qdS qdSim hoa : bmqom aSr iSHTo at helh iSHTo at haSm oat dmo icrq el hmcbH sbib : oat kl Hlbo iqrib mmno at halih oat hHlb hmksh at hqrb : oat Sti hklit oat hHlb aSr elihn aSr el hkslim oat hitrt el hkbd el hklit isirnh : ohqTir atm hkhn hmcbHh aSh lihoh aSm hoa : kl ckr bkhnim iaklno bmqom qdoS iakl qdS qdSim hoa : kHTat kaSm torh aHt lhm hkhn aSr ikpr bo lo ihih : ohkhn hmqrib at elt aiS eor helh aSr hqrib lkhn lo ihih : okl mnHh aSr taph btnor okl neSh bmrHSt oel mHbt lkhn hmqrib ath lo thih : okl mnHh blolh bSmn oHrbh lkl bni ahrn thih aiS kaHio : ocat tort cbH hSlmim aSr iqrib lihoh : am el todh iqribno ohqrib el cbH htodh Hlot mzot blolt bSmn orqiqi mzot mSHim bSmn oslt mrbkt Hlt blolt bSmn : el Hlt lHm Hmz iqrib qrbno el cbH todt Slmio : ohqrib mmno aHd mkl qrbn tromh lihoh lkhn hcrq at dm hSlmim lo ihih : obSr cbH todt Slmio biom qrbno iakl la iniH mmno ed bqr : oam ndr ao ndbh cbH qrbno biom hqribo at cbHo iakl ommHrt ohnotr mmno iakl : ohnotr mbSr hcbH biom hSliSi baS iSrp : oam hakl iakl mbSr cbH Slmio biom hSliSi la irzh hmqrib ato la iHSb lo pgol ihih ohnpS haklt mmno eonh tSa : ohbSr aSr ige bkl Tma la iakl baS iSrp ohbSr kl Thor iakl bSr : ohnpS aSr takl bSr mcbH hSlmim aSr lihoh oTmato elio onkrth hnpS hhoa memih : onpS ki tge bkl Tma bTmat adm ao bbhmh Tmah ao bkl Sqz Tma oakl mbSr cbH hSlmim aSr lihoh onkrth hnpS hhoa memih : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr kl Hlb Sor okSb oec la taklo : oHlb nblh oHlb Trph ieSh lkl mlakh oakl la taklho : ki kl akl Hlb mn hbhmh aSr iqrib mmnh aSh lihoh onkrth hnpS haklt memih : okl dm la taklo bkl moSbtikm leop olbhmh : kl npS aSr takl kl dm onkrth hnpS hhoa memih : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr hmqrib at cbH Slmio lihoh ibia at qrbno lihoh mcbH Slmio : idio tbiainh at aSi ihoh at hHlb el hHch ibiano at hHch lhnip ato tnoph lpni ihoh : ohqTir hkhn at hHlb hmcbHh ohih hHch lahrn olbnio : oat Soq himin ttno tromh lkhn mcbHi Slmikm : hmqrib at dm hSlmim oat hHlb mbni ahrn lo thih Soq himin lmnh : ki at Hch htnoph oat Soq htromh lqHti mat bni iSral mcbHi Slmihm oatn atm lahrn hkhn olbnio lHq eolm mat bni iSral : cat mSHt ahrn omSHt bnio maSi ihoh biom hqrib atm lkhn lihoh : aSr zoh ihoh ltt lhm biom mSHo atm mat bni iSral Hqt eolm ldrtm : cat htorh lelh lmnHh olHTat olaSm olmloaim olcbH hSlmim : aSr zoh ihoh at mSh bhr sini biom zoto at bni iSral lhqrib at qrbnihm lihoh bmdbr sini :

8

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : qH at ahrn oat bnio ato oat hbgdim oat Smn hmSHh oat pr hHTat oat Sni hailim oat sl hmzot : oat kl hedh hqhl al ptH ahl moed : oieS mSh kaSr zoh ihoh ato otqhl hedh al ptH ahl moed : oiamr mSh al hedh ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh leSot : oiqrb mSh at ahrn oat bnio oirHz atm bmim : oitn elio at hktnt oiHgr ato babnT oilbS ato at hmeil oitn elio at hapd oiHgr ato bHSb hapd oiapd lo bo : oiSm elio at hHSn oitn al hHSn at haorim oat htmim : oiSm at hmznpt el raSo oiSm el hmznpt al mol pnio at ziz hchb ncr hqdS kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqH mSh at Smn hmSHh oimSH at hmSkn oat kl aSr bo oiqdS atm : oic mmno el hmcbH Sbe pemim oimSH at hmcbH oat kl klio oat hkir oat kno lqdSm : oizq mSmn hmSHh el raS ahrn oimSH ato lqdSo : oiqrb mSh at bni ahrn oilbSm ktnt oiHgr atm abnT oiHbS lhm mgbeot kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oigS at pr hHTat oismk ahrn obnio at idihm el raS pr hHTat : oiSHT oiqH mSh at hdm oitn el qrnot hmcbH sbib bazbeo oiHTa at hmcbH oat hdm izq al isod hmcbH oiqdSho lkpr elio : oiqH at kl hHlb aSr el hqrb oat itrt hkbd oat Sti hklit oat Hlbhn oiqTr mSh hmcbHh : oat hpr oat ero oat bSro oat prSo Srp baS mHoz lmHnh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqrb at ail helh oismko ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail : oiSHT oicrq mSh at hdm el hmcbH sbib : oat hail ntH lntHio oiqTr mSh at hraS oat hntHim oat hpdr : oat hqrb oat hkreim rHz bmim oiqTr mSh at kl hail hmcbHh elh hoa lriH niHH aSh hoa lihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqrb at hail hSni ail hmlaim oismko ahrn obnio at idihm el raS hail : oiSHT oiqH mSh mdmo oitn el tnok acn ahrn himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit : oiqrb at bni ahrn oitn mSh mn hdm el tnok acnm himnit oel bhn idm himnit oel bhn rglm himnit oicrq mSh at hdm el hmcbH sbib : oiqH at hHlb oat halih oat kl hHlb aSr el hqrb oat itrt hkbd oat Sti hklit oat Hlbhn oat Soq himin : omsl hmzot aSr lpni ihoh lqH Hlt mzh aHt oHlt lHm Smn aHt orqiq aHd oiSm el hHlbim oel Soq himin : oitn at hkl el kpi ahrn oel kpi bnio oinp atm tnoph lpni ihoh : oiqH mSh atm mel kpihm oiqTr hmcbHh el helh mlaim hm lriH niHH aSh hoa lihoh : oiqH mSh at hHch oinipho tnoph lpni ihoh mail hmlaim lmSh hih lmnh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqH mSh mSmn hmSHh omn hdm aSr el hmcbH oic el ahrn el bgdio oel bnio oel bgdi bnio ato oiqdS at ahrn at bgdio oat bnio oat bgdi bnio ato : oiamr mSh al ahrn oal bnio bSlo at hbSr ptH ahl moed oSm taklo ato oat hlHm aSr bsl hmlaim kaSr zoiti lamr ahrn obnio iaklho : ohnotr bbSr oblHm baS tSrpo : omptH ahl moed la tzao Sbet imim ed iom mlat imi mlaikm ki Sbet imim imla at idkm : kaSr eSh biom hch zoh ihoh leSt lkpr elikm : optH ahl moed tSbo iomm olilh Sbet imim oSmrtm at mSmrt ihoh ola tmoto ki kn zoiti : oieS ahrn obnio at kl hdbrim aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh :

9

oihi biom hSmini qra mSh lahrn olbnio olcqni iSral : oiamr al ahrn qH lk egl bn bqr lHTat oail lelh tmimm ohqrb lpni ihoh : oal bni iSral tdbr lamr qHo Seir ecim lHTat oegl okbS bni Snh tmimm lelh : oSor oail lSlmim lcbH lpni ihoh omnHh blolh bSmn ki hiom ihoh nrah alikm : oiqHo at aSr zoh mSh al pni ahl moed oiqrbo kl hedh oiemdo lpni ihoh : oiamr mSh ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh teSo oira alikm kbod ihoh : oiamr mSh al ahrn qrb al hmcbH oeSh at HTatk oat eltk okpr bedk obed hem oeSh at qrbn hem okpr bedm kaSr zoh ihoh : oiqrb ahrn al hmcbH oiSHT at egl hHTat aSr lo : oiqrbo bni ahrn at hdm alio oiTbl azbeo bdm oitn el qrnot hmcbH oat hdm izq al isod hmcbH : oat hHlb oat hklit oat hitrt mn hkbd mn hHTat hqTir hmcbHh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oat hbSr oat heor Srp baS mHoz lmHnh : oiSHT at helh oimzao bni ahrn alio at hdm oicrqho el hmcbH sbib : oat helh hmziao alio lntHih oat hraS oiqTr el hmcbH : oirHz at hqrb oat hkreim oiqTr el helh hmcbHh : oiqrb at qrbn hem oiqH at Seir hHTat aSr lem oiSHTho oiHTaho kraSon : oiqrb at helh oieSh kmSpT : oiqrb at hmnHh oimla kpo mmnh oiqTr el hmcbH mlbd elt hbqr : oiSHT at hSor oat hail cbH hSlmim aSr lem oimzao bni ahrn at hdm alio oicrqho el hmcbH sbib : oat hHlbim mn hSor omn hail halih ohmksh ohklit oitrt hkbd : oiSimo at hHlbim el hHcot oiqTr hHlbim hmcbHh : oat hHcot oat Soq himin hnip ahrn tnoph lpni ihoh kaSr zoh mSh : oiSa ahrn at ido al hem oibrkm oird meSt hHTat ohelh ohSlmim : oiba mSh oahrn al ahl moed oizao oibrko at hem oira kbod ihoh al kl hem : otza aS mlpni ihoh otakl el hmcbH at helh oat hHlbim oira kl hem oirno oiplo el pnihm :

10

oiqHo bni ahrn ndb oabihoa aiS mHtto oitno bhn aS oiSimo elih qTrt oiqrbo lpni ihoh aS crh aSr la zoh atm : otza aS mlpni ihoh otakl aotm oimto lpni ihoh : oiamr mSh al ahrn hoa aSr dbr ihoh lamr bqrbi aqdS oel pni kl hem akbd oidm ahrn : oiqra mSh al miSal oal alzpn bni ecial dd ahrn oiamr alhm qrbo Sao at aHikm mat pni hqdS al mHoz lmHnh : oiqrbo oiSam bktntm al mHoz lmHnh kaSr dbr mSh : oiamr mSh al ahrn olalecr olaitmr bnio raSikm al tpreo obgdikm la tprmo ola tmto oel kl hedh iqzp oaHikm kl bit iSral ibko at hSrph aSr Srp ihoh : omptH ahl moed la tzao pn tmto ki Smn mSHt ihoh elikm oieSo kdbr mSh : oidbr ihoh al ahrn lamr : iin oSkr al tSt ath obnik atk bbakm al ahl moed ola tmto Hqt eolm ldrtikm : olhbdil bin hqdS obin hHl obin hTma obin hThor : olhort at bni iSral at kl hHqim aSr dbr ihoh alihm bid mSh : oidbr mSh al ahrn oal alecr oal aitmr bnio hnotrim qHo at hmnHh hnotrt maSi ihoh oakloh mzot azl hmcbH ki qdS qdSim hoa : oakltm ath bmqom qdS ki Hqk oHq bnik hoa maSi ihoh ki kn zoiti : oat Hch htnoph oat Soq htromh taklo bmqom Thor ath obnik obntik atk ki Hqk oHq bnik ntno mcbHi Slmi bni iSral : Soq htromh oHch htnoph el aSi hHlbim ibiao lhnip tnoph lpni ihoh ohih lk olbnik atk lHq eolm kaSr zoh ihoh : oat Seir hHTat drS drS mSh ohnh Srp oiqzp el alecr oel aitmr bni ahrn hnotrm lamr : mdoe la akltm at hHTat bmqom hqdS ki qdS qdSim hoa oath ntn lkm lSat at eon hedh lkpr elihm lpni ihoh : hn la hoba at dmh al hqdS pnimh akol taklo ath bqdS kaSr zoiti : oidbr ahrn al mSh hn hiom hqribo at HTatm oat eltm lpni ihoh otqranh ati kalh oaklti HTat hiom hiiTb beini ihoh : oiSme mSh oiiTb beinio :

11

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr alhm : dbro al bni iSral lamr cat hHih aSr taklo mkl hbhmh aSr el harz : kl mprst prsh oSset Sse prst melt grh bbhmh ath taklo : ak at ch la taklo mmeli hgrh ommprisi hprsh at hgml ki melh grh hoa oprsh ainno mpris Tma hoa lkm : oat hSpn ki melh grh hoa oprsh la ipris Tma hoa lkm : oat harnbt ki melt grh hoa oprsh la hprish Tmah hoa lkm : oat hHcir ki mpris prsh hoa oSse Sse prsh ohoa grh la igr Tma hoa lkm : mbSrm la taklo obnbltm la tgeo Tmaim hm lkm : at ch taklo mkl aSr bmim kl aSr lo snpir oqSqSt bmim bimim obnHlim atm taklo : okl aSr ain lo snpir oqSqSt bimim obnHlim mkl Srz hmim omkl npS hHih aSr bmim Sqz hm lkm : oSqz ihio lkm mbSrm la taklo oat nbltm tSqzo : kl aSr ain lo snpir oqSqSt bmim Sqz hoa lkm : oat alh tSqzo mn heop la iaklo Sqz hm at hnSr oat hprs oat hecnih : oat hdah oat haih lminh : at kl erb lmino : oat bt hienh oat htHms oat hSHp oat hnz lminho : oat hkos oat hSlk oat hinSop : oat htnSmt oat hqat oat hrHm : oat hHsidh hanph lminh oat hdokipt oat heTlp : kl Srz heop hhlk el arbe Sqz hoa lkm : ak at ch taklo mkl Srz heop hhlk el arbe aSr la kreim mmel lrglio lntr bhn el harz : at alh mhm taklo at harbh lmino oat hslem lminho oat hHrgl lminho oat hHgb lminho : okl Srz heop aSr lo arbe rglim Sqz hoa lkm : olalh tTmao kl hnge bnbltm iTma ed herb : okl hnSa mnbltm ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb : lkl hbhmh aSr hoa mprst prsh oSse ainnh Sset ogrh ainnh melh Tmaim hm lkm kl hnge bhm iTma : okl holk el kpio bkl hHih hhlkt el arbe Tmaim hm lkm kl hnge bnbltm iTma ed herb : ohnSa at nbltm ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb Tmaim hmh lkm : och lkm hTma bSrz hSrz el harz hHld ohekbr ohzb lminho : ohanqh ohkH ohlTah ohHmT ohtnSmt : alh hTmaim lkm bkl hSrz kl hnge bhm bmtm iTma ed herb : okl aSr ipl elio mhm bmtm iTma mkl kli ez ao bgd ao eor ao Sq kl kli aSr ieSh mlakh bhm bmim ioba oTma ed herb oThr : okl kli HrS aSr ipl mhm al toko kl aSr btoko iTma oato tSbro : mkl hakl aSr iakl aSr iboa elio mim iTma okl mSqh aSr iSth bkl kli iTma : okl aSr ipl mnbltm elio iTma tnor okirim itz Tmaim hm oTmaim ihio lkm : ak mein obor mqoh mim ihih Thor onge bnbltm iTma : oki ipl mnbltm el kl cre croe aSr icre Thor hoa : oki itn mim el cre onpl mnbltm elio Tma hoa lkm : oki imot mn hbhmh aSr hia lkm laklh hnge bnblth iTma ed herb : ohakl mnblth ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb ohnSa at nblth ikbs bgdio oTma ed herb : okl hSrz hSrz el harz Sqz hoa la iakl : kl holk el gHon okl holk el arbe ed kl mrbh rglim lkl hSrz hSrz el harz la taklom ki Sqz hm : al tSqzo at npStikm bkl hSrz hSrz ola tTmao bhm onTmtm bm : ki ani ihoh alhikm ohtqdStm ohiitm qdSim ki qdoS ani ola tTmao at npStikm bkl hSrz hrmS el harz : ki ani ihoh hmelh atkm marz mzrim lhit lkm lalhim ohiitm qdSim ki qdoS ani : cat tort hbhmh oheop okl npS hHih hrmSt bmim olkl npS hSrzt el harz : lhbdil bin hTma obin hThr obin hHih hnaklt obin hHih aSr la takl :

12

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr aSh ki tcrie oildh ckr oTmah Sbet imim kimi ndt doth tTma : obiom hSmini imol bSr erlto : oSlSim iom oSlSt imim tSb bdmi Thrh bkl qdS la tge oal hmqdS la tba ed mlat imi Thrh : oam nqbh tld oTmah Sbeim kndth oSSim iom oSSt imim tSb el dmi Thrh : obmlat imi Thrh lbn ao lbt tbia kbS bn Snto lelh obn ionh ao tr lHTat al ptH ahl moed al hkhn : ohqribo lpni ihoh okpr elih oThrh mmqr dmih cat tort hildt lckr ao lnqbh : oam la tmza idh di Sh olqHh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh aHd lelh oaHd lHTat okpr elih hkhn oThrh :

13

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : adm ki ihih beor bSro Sat ao spHt ao bhrt ohih beor bSro lnge zret ohoba al ahrn hkhn ao al aHd mbnio hkhnim : orah hkhn at hnge beor hbSr oSer bnge hpk lbn omrah hnge emq meor bSro nge zret hoa oraho hkhn oTma ato : oam bhrt lbnh hoa beor bSro oemq ain mrah mn heor oSerh la hpk lbn ohsgir hkhn at hnge Sbet imim : oraho hkhn biom hSbiei ohnh hnge emd beinio la pSh hnge beor ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim Snit : orah hkhn ato biom hSbiei Snit ohnh khh hnge ola pSh hnge beor oThro hkhn mspHt hia okbs bgdio oThr : oam pSh tpSh hmspHt beor aHri hrato al hkhn lThrto onrah Snit al hkhn : orah hkhn ohnh pSth hmspHt beor oTmao hkhn zret hoa : nge zret ki thih badm ohoba al hkhn : orah hkhn ohnh Sat lbnh beor ohia hpkh Ser lbn omHit bSr Hi bSat : zret noSnt hoa beor bSro oTmao hkhn la isgrno ki Tma hoa : oam proH tprH hzret beor oksth hzret at kl eor hnge mraSo oed rglio lkl mrah eini hkhn : orah hkhn ohnh ksth hzret at kl bSro oThr at hnge klo hpk lbn Thor hoa : obiom hraot bo bSr Hi iTma : orah hkhn at hbSr hHi oTmao hbSr hHi Tma hoa zret hoa : ao ki iSob hbSr hHi onhpk llbn oba al hkhn : oraho hkhn ohnh nhpk hnge llbn oThr hkhn at hnge Thor hoa : obSr ki ihih bo bero SHin onrpa : ohih bmqom hSHin Sat lbnh ao bhrt lbnh admdmt onrah al hkhn : orah hkhn ohnh mrah Spl mn heor oSerh hpk lbn oTmao hkhn nge zret hia bSHin prHh : oam iranh hkhn ohnh ain bh Ser lbn oSplh ainnh mn heor ohia khh ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim : oam pSh tpSh beor oTma hkhn ato nge hoa : oam tHtih temd hbhrt la pSth zrbt hSHin hoa oThro hkhn : ao bSr ki ihih bero mkot aS ohith mHit hmkoh bhrt lbnh admdmt ao lbnh : orah ath hkhn ohnh nhpk Ser lbn bbhrt omrah emq mn heor zret hoa bmkoh prHh oTma ato hkhn nge zret hoa : oam iranh hkhn ohnh ain bbhrt Ser lbn oSplh ainnh mn heor ohoa khh ohsgiro hkhn Sbet imim : oraho hkhn biom hSbiei am pSh tpSh beor oTma hkhn ato nge zret hoa : oam tHtih temd hbhrt la pSth beor ohoa khh Sat hmkoh hoa oThro hkhn ki zrbt hmkoh hoa : oaiS ao aSh ki ihih bo nge braS ao bcqn : orah hkhn at hnge ohnh mraho emq mn heor obo Ser zhb dq oTma ato hkhn ntq hoa zret hraS ao hcqn hoa : oki irah hkhn at nge hntq ohnh ain mraho emq mn heor oSer SHr ain bo ohsgir hkhn at nge hntq Sbet imim : orah hkhn at hnge biom hSbiei ohnh la pSh hntq ola hih bo Ser zhb omrah hntq ain emq mn heor : ohtglH oat hntq la iglH ohsgir hkhn at hntq Sbet imim Snit : orah hkhn at hntq biom hSbiei ohnh la pSh hntq beor omraho ainno emq mn heor oThr ato hkhn okbs bgdio oThr : oam pSh ipSh hntq beor aHri Thrto : oraho hkhn ohnh pSh hntq beor la ibqr hkhn lSer hzhb Tma hoa : oam beinio emd hntq oSer SHr zmH bo nrpa hntq Thor hoa oThro hkhn : oaiS ao aSh ki ihih beor bSrm bhrt bhrt lbnt : orah hkhn ohnh beor bSrm bhrt khot lbnt bhq hoa prH beor Thor hoa : oaiS ki imrT raSo qrH hoa Thor hoa : oam mpat pnio imrT raSo gbH hoa Thor hoa : oki ihih bqrHt ao bgbHt nge lbn admdm zret prHt hoa bqrHto ao bgbHto : orah ato hkhn ohnh Sat hnge lbnh admdmt bqrHto ao bgbHto kmrah zret eor bSr : aiS zroe hoa Tma hoa Tma iTmano hkhn braSo ngeo : ohzroe aSr bo hnge bgdio ihio prmim oraSo ihih proe oel Spm ieTh oTma Tma iqra : kl imi aSr hnge bo iTma Tma hoa bdd iSb mHoz lmHnh moSbo : ohbgd ki ihih bo nge zret bbgd zmr ao bbgd pStim : ao bSti ao berb lpStim olzmr ao beor ao bkl mlakt eor : ohih hnge irqrq ao admdm bbgd ao beor ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor nge zret hoa ohrah at hkhn : orah hkhn at hnge ohsgir at hnge Sbet imim : orah at hnge biom hSbiei ki pSh hnge bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao beor lkl aSr ieSh heor lmlakh zret mmart hnge Tma hoa : oSrp at hbgd ao at hSti ao at herb bzmr ao bpStim ao at kl kli heor aSr ihih bo hnge ki zret mmart hoa baS tSrp : oam irah hkhn ohnh la pSh hnge bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor : ozoh hkhn okbso at aSr bo hnge ohsgiro Sbet imim Snit : orah hkhn aHri hkbs at hnge ohnh la hpk hnge at eino ohnge la pSh Tma hoa baS tSrpno pHtt hoa bqrHto ao bgbHto : oam rah hkhn ohnh khh hnge aHri hkbs ato oqre ato mn hbgd ao mn heor ao mn hSti ao mn herb : oam trah eod bbgd ao bSti ao berb ao bkl kli eor prHt hoa baS tSrpno at aSr bo hnge : ohbgd ao hSti ao herb ao kl kli heor aSr tkbs osr mhm hnge okbs Snit oThr : cat tort nge zret bgd hzmr ao hpStim ao hSti ao herb ao kl kli eor lThro ao lTmao :

14

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : cat thih tort hmzre biom Thrto ohoba al hkhn : oiza hkhn al mHoz lmHnh orah hkhn ohnh nrpa nge hzret mn hzroe : ozoh hkhn olqH lmThr Sti zprim Hiot Throt oez arc oSni tolet oacb : ozoh hkhn oSHT at hzpor haHt al kli HrS el mim Hiim : at hzpr hHih iqH ath oat ez harc oat Sni htolet oat hacb oTbl aotm oat hzpr hHih bdm hzpr hSHTh el hmim hHiim : ohch el hmThr mn hzret Sbe pemim oThro oSlH at hzpr hHih el pni hSdh : okbs hmThr at bgdio oglH at kl Sero orHz bmim oThr oaHr iboa al hmHnh oiSb mHoz lahlo Sbet imim : ohih biom hSbiei iglH at kl Sero at raSo oat cqno oat gbt einio oat kl Sero iglH okbs at bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oThr : obiom hSmini iqH Sni kbSim tmimim okbSh aHt bt Snth tmimh oSlSh eSrnim slt mnHh blolh bSmn olg aHd Smn : ohemid hkhn hmThr at haiS hmThr oatm lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed : olqH hkhn at hkbS haHd ohqrib ato laSm oat lg hSmn ohnip atm tnoph lpni ihoh : oSHT at hkbS bmqom aSr iSHT at hHTat oat helh bmqom hqdS ki kHTat haSm hoa lkhn qdS qdSim hoa : olqH hkhn mdm haSm ontn hkhn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit : olqH hkhn mlg hSmn oizq el kp hkhn hSmalit : oTbl hkhn at azbeo himnit mn hSmn aSr el kpo hSmalit ohch mn hSmn bazbeo Sbe pemim lpni ihoh : omitr hSmn aSr el kpo itn hkhn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit el dm haSm : ohnotr bSmn aSr el kp hkhn itn el raS hmThr okpr elio hkhn lpni ihoh : oeSh hkhn at hHTat okpr el hmThr mTmato oaHr iSHT at helh : ohelh hkhn at helh oat hmnHh hmcbHh okpr elio hkhn oThr : oam dl hoa oain ido mSgt olqH kbS aHd aSm ltnoph lkpr elio oeSron slt aHd blol bSmn lmnHh olg Smn : oSti trim ao Sni bni ionh aSr tSig ido ohih aHd HTat ohaHd elh : ohbia atm biom hSmini lThrto al hkhn al ptH ahl moed lpni ihoh : olqH hkhn at kbS haSm oat lg hSmn ohnip atm hkhn tnoph lpni ihoh : oSHT at kbS haSm olqH hkhn mdm haSm ontn el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit : omn hSmn izq hkhn el kp hkhn hSmalit : ohch hkhn bazbeo himnit mn hSmn aSr el kpo hSmalit Sbe pemim lpni ihoh : ontn hkhn mn hSmn aSr el kpo el tnok acn hmThr himnit oel bhn ido himnit oel bhn rglo himnit el mqom dm haSm : ohnotr mn hSmn aSr el kp hkhn itn el raS hmThr lkpr elio lpni ihoh : oeSh at haHd mn htrim ao mn bni hionh maSr tSig ido : at aSr tSig ido at haHd HTat oat haHd elh el hmnHh okpr hkhn el hmThr lpni ihoh : cat tort aSr bo nge zret aSr la tSig ido bThrto : oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : ki tbao al arz knen aSr ani ntn lkm laHch ontti nge zret bbit arz aHctkm : oba aSr lo hbit ohgid lkhn lamr knge nrah li bbit : ozoh hkhn opno at hbit bTrm iba hkhn lraot at hnge ola iTma kl aSr bbit oaHr kn iba hkhn lraot at hbit : orah at hnge ohnh hnge bqirt hbit Sqerort irqrqt ao admdmt omraihn Spl mn hqir : oiza hkhn mn hbit al ptH hbit ohsgir at hbit Sbet imim : oSb hkhn biom hSbiei orah ohnh pSh hnge bqirt hbit : ozoh hkhn oHlzo at habnim aSr bhn hnge ohSliko athn al mHoz leir al mqom Tma : oat hbit iqze mbit sbib oSpko at hepr aSr hqzo al mHoz leir al mqom Tma : olqHo abnim aHrot ohbiao al tHt habnim oepr aHr iqH oTH at hbit : oam iSob hnge oprH bbit aHr Hlz at habnim oaHri hqzot at hbit oaHri hToH : oba hkhn orah ohnh pSh hnge bbit zret mmart hoa bbit Tma hoa : ontz at hbit at abnio oat ezio oat kl epr hbit ohozia al mHoz leir al mqom Tma : ohba al hbit kl imi hsgir ato iTma ed herb : ohSkb bbit ikbs at bgdio ohakl bbit ikbs at bgdio : oam ba iba hkhn orah ohnh la pSh hnge bbit aHri hTH at hbit oThr hkhn at hbit ki nrpa hnge : olqH lHTa at hbit Sti zprim oez arc oSni tolet oacb : oSHT at hzpr haHt al kli HrS el mim Hiim : olqH at ez harc oat hacb oat Sni htolet oat hzpr hHih oTbl atm bdm hzpr hSHoTh obmim hHiim ohch al hbit Sbe pemim : oHTa at hbit bdm hzpor obmim hHiim obzpr hHih obez harc obacb obSni htolet : oSlH at hzpr hHih al mHoz leir al pni hSdh okpr el hbit oThr : cat htorh lkl nge hzret olntq : olzret hbgd olbit : olSat olspHt olbhrt : lhort biom hTma obiom hThr cat tort hzret :

15

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : dbro al bni iSral oamrtm alhm aiS aiS ki ihih cb mbSro cobo Tma hoa : ocat thih Tmato bcobo rr bSro at cobo ao hHtim bSro mcobo Tmato hoa : kl hmSkb aSr iSkb elio hcb iTma okl hkli aSr iSb elio iTma : oaiS aSr ige bmSkbo ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : ohiSb el hkli aSr iSb elio hcb ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : ohnge bbSr hcb ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : oki irq hcb bThor okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : okl hmrkb aSr irkb elio hcb iTma : okl hnge bkl aSr ihih tHtio iTma ed herb ohnoSa aotm ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : okl aSr ige bo hcb oidio la STp bmim okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : okli HrS aSr ige bo hcb iSbr okl kli ez iSTp bmim : oki iThr hcb mcobo ospr lo Sbet imim lThrto okbs bgdio orHz bSro bmim Hiim oThr : obiom hSmini iqH lo Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh oba lpni ihoh al ptH ahl moed ontnm al hkhn : oeSh atm hkhn aHd HTat ohaHd elh okpr elio hkhn lpni ihoh mcobo : oaiS ki tza mmno Skbt cre orHz bmim at kl bSro oTma ed herb : okl bgd okl eor aSr ihih elio Skbt cre okbs bmim oTma ed herb : oaSh aSr iSkb aiS ath Skbt cre orHzo bmim oTmao ed herb : oaSh ki thih cbh dm ihih cbh bbSrh Sbet imim thih bndth okl hnge bh iTma ed herb : okl aSr tSkb elio bndth iTma okl aSr tSb elio iTma : okl hnge bmSkbh ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : okl hnge bkl kli aSr tSb elio ikbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : oam el hmSkb hoa ao el hkli aSr hoa iSbt elio bngeo bo iTma ed herb : oam Skb iSkb aiS ath othi ndth elio oTma Sbet imim okl hmSkb aSr iSkb elio iTma : oaSh ki icob cob dmh imim rbim bla et ndth ao ki tcob el ndth kl imi cob Tmath kimi ndth thih Tmah hoa : kl hmSkb aSr tSkb elio kl imi cobh kmSkb ndth ihih lh okl hkli aSr tSb elio Tma ihih kTmat ndth : okl hnoge bm iTma okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb : oam Thrh mcobh osprh lh Sbet imim oaHr tThr : obiom hSmini tqH lh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh ohbiah aotm al hkhn al ptH ahl moed : oeSh hkhn at haHd HTat oat haHd elh okpr elih hkhn lpni ihoh mcob Tmath : ohcrtm at bni iSral mTmatm ola imto bTmatm bTmam at mSkni aSr btokm : cat tort hcb oaSr tza mmno Skbt cre lTmah bh : ohdoh bndth ohcb at cobo lckr olnqbh olaiS aSr iSkb em Tmah :

16

oidbr ihoh al mSh aHri mot Sni bni ahrn bqrbtm lpni ihoh oimto : oiamr ihoh al mSh dbr al ahrn aHik oal iba bkl et al hqdS mbit lprkt al pni hkprt aSr el harn ola imot ki benn arah el hkprt : bcat iba ahrn al hqdS bpr bn bqr lHTat oail lelh : ktnt bd qdS ilbS omknsi bd ihio el bSro obabnT bd iHgr obmznpt bd iznp bgdi qdS hm orHz bmim at bSro olbSm : omat edt bni iSral iqH Sni Seiri ecim lHTat oail aHd lelh : ohqrib ahrn at pr hHTat aSr lo okpr bedo obed bito : olqH at Sni hSeirm ohemid atm lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed : ontn ahrn el Sni hSeirm gorlot gorl aHd lihoh ogorl aHd lecacl : ohqrib ahrn at hSeir aSr elh elio hgorl lihoh oeSho HTat : ohSeir aSr elh elio hgorl lecacl iemd Hi lpni ihoh lkpr elio lSlH ato lecacl hmdbrh : ohqrib ahrn at pr hHTat aSr lo okpr bedo obed bito oSHT at pr hHTat aSr lo : olqH mla hmHth gHli aS mel hmcbH mlpni ihoh omla Hpnio qTrt smim dqh ohbia mbit lprkt : ontn at hqTrt el haS lpni ihoh oksh enn hqTrt at hkprt aSr el hedot ola imot : olqH mdm hpr ohch bazbeo el pni hkprt qdmh olpni hkprt ich Sbe pemim mn hdm bazbeo : oSHT at Seir hHTat aSr lem ohbia at dmo al mbit lprkt oeSh at dmo kaSr eSh ldm hpr ohch ato el hkprt olpni hkprt : okpr el hqdS mTmat bni iSral ompSeihm lkl HTatm okn ieSh lahl moed hSkn atm btok Tmatm : okl adm la ihih bahl moed bbao lkpr bqdS ed zato okpr bedo obed bito obed kl qhl iSral : oiza al hmcbH aSr lpni ihoh okpr elio olqH mdm hpr omdm hSeir ontn el qrnot hmcbH sbib : ohch elio mn hdm bazbeo Sbe pemim oThro oqdSo mTmat bni iSral : oklh mkpr at hqdS oat ahl moed oat hmcbH ohqrib at hSeir hHi : osmk ahrn at Sti ido el raS hSeir hHi ohtodh elio at kl eont bni iSral oat kl pSeihm lkl HTatm ontn atm el raS hSeir oSlH bid aiS eti hmdbrh : onSa hSeir elio at kl eontm al arz gcrh oSlH at hSeir bmdbr : oba ahrn al ahl moed opST at bgdi hbd aSr lbS bbao al hqdS ohniHm Sm : orHz at bSro bmim bmqom qdoS olbS at bgdio oiza oeSh at elto oat elt hem okpr bedo obed hem : oat Hlb hHTat iqTir hmcbHh : ohmSlH at hSeir lecacl ikbs bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oaHri kn iboa al hmHnh : oat pr hHTat oat Seir hHTat aSr hoba at dmm lkpr bqdS iozia al mHoz lmHnh oSrpo baS at ertm oat bSrm oat prSm : ohSrp atm ikbs bgdio orHz at bSro bmim oaHri kn iboa al hmHnh : ohith lkm lHqt eolm bHdS hSbiei beSor lHdS teno at npStikm okl mlakh la teSo hacrH ohgr hgr btokkm : ki biom hch ikpr elikm lThr atkm mkl HTatikm lpni ihoh tThro : Sbt Sbton hia lkm oenitm at npStikm Hqt eolm : okpr hkhn aSr imSH ato oaSr imla at ido lkhn tHt abio olbS at bgdi hbd bgdi hqdS : okpr at mqdS hqdS oat ahl moed oat hmcbH ikpr oel hkhnim oel kl em hqhl ikpr : ohith cat lkm lHqt eolm lkpr el bni iSral mkl HTatm aHt bSnh oieS kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh :

17

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oal bnio oal kl bni iSral oamrt alihm ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh lamr : aiS aiS mbit iSral aSr iSHT Sor ao kSb ao ec bmHnh ao aSr iSHT mHoz lmHnh : oal ptH ahl moed la hbiao lhqrib qrbn lihoh lpni mSkn ihoh dm iHSb laiS hhoa dm Spk onkrt haiS hhoa mqrb emo : lmen aSr ibiao bni iSral at cbHihm aSr hm cbHim el pni hSdh ohbiam lihoh al ptH ahl moed al hkhn ocbHo cbHi Slmim lihoh aotm : ocrq hkhn at hdm el mcbH ihoh ptH ahl moed ohqTir hHlb lriH niHH lihoh : ola icbHo eod at cbHihm lSeirm aSr hm cnim aHrihm Hqt eolm thih cat lhm ldrtm : oalhm tamr aiS aiS mbit iSral omn hgr aSr igor btokm aSr ielh elh ao cbH : oal ptH ahl moed la ibiano leSot ato lihoh onkrt haiS hhoa memio : oaiS aiS mbit iSral omn hgr hgr btokm aSr iakl kl dm ontti pni bnpS haklt at hdm ohkrti ath mqrb emh : ki npS hbSr bdm hoa oani nttio lkm el hmcbH lkpr el npStikm ki hdm hoa bnpS ikpr : el kn amrti lbni iSral kl npS mkm la takl dm ohgr hgr btokkm la iakl dm : oaiS aiS mbni iSral omn hgr hgr btokm aSr izod zid Hih ao eop aSr iakl oSpk at dmo oksho bepr : ki npS kl bSr dmo bnpSo hoa oamr lbni iSral dm kl bSr la taklo ki npS kl bSr dmo hoa kl aklio ikrt : okl npS aSr takl nblh oTrph bacrH obgr okbs bgdio orHz bmim oTma ed herb oThr : oam la ikbs obSro la irHz onSa eono :

18

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ani ihoh alhikm : kmeSh arz mzrim aSr iSbtm bh la teSo okmeSh arz knen aSr ani mbia atkm Smh la teSo obHqtihm la tlko : at mSpTi teSo oat Hqti tSmro llkt bhm ani ihoh alhikm : oSmrtm at Hqti oat mSpTi aSr ieSh atm hadm oHi bhm ani ihoh : aiS aiS al kl Sar bSro la tqrbo lglot eroh ani ihoh : erot abik oerot amk la tglh amk hoa la tglh eroth : erot aSt abik la tglh erot abik hoa : erot aHotk bt abik ao bt amk moldt bit ao moldt Hoz la tglh erotn : erot bt bnk ao bt btk la tglh erotn ki erotk hnh : erot bt aSt abik moldt abik aHotk hoa la tglh eroth : erot aHot abik la tglh Sar abik hoa : erot aHot amk la tglh ki Sar amk hoa : erot aHi abik la tglh al aSto la tqrb ddtk hoa : erot kltk la tglh aSt bnk hoa la tglh eroth : erot aSt aHik la tglh erot aHik hoa : erot aSh obth la tglh at bt bnh oat bt bth la tqH lglot eroth Sarh hnh cmh hoa : oaSh al aHth la tqH lzrr lglot eroth elih bHiih : oal aSh bndt Tmath la tqrb lglot eroth : oal aSt emitk la ttn Skbtk lcre lTmah bh : omcrek la ttn lhebir lmlk ola tHll at Sm alhik ani ihoh : oat ckr la tSkb mSkbi aSh toebh hoa : obkl bhmh la ttn Skbtk lTmah bh oaSh la temd lpni bhmh lrbeh tbl hoa : al tTmao bkl alh ki bkl alh nTmao hgoim aSr ani mSlH mpnikm : otTma harz oapqd eonh elih otqa harz at iSbih : oSmrtm atm at Hqti oat mSpTi ola teSo mkl htoebt halh hacrH ohgr hgr btokkm : ki at kl htoebt hal eSo anSi harz aSr lpnikm otTma harz : ola tqia harz atkm bTmakm ath kaSr qah at hgoi aSr lpnikm : ki kl aSr ieSh mkl htoebot halh onkrto hnpSot heSt mqrb emm : oSmrtm at mSmrti lblti eSot mHqot htoebt aSr neSo lpnikm ola tTmao bhm ani ihoh alhikm :

19

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al kl edt bni iSral oamrt alhm qdSim thio ki qdoS ani ihoh alhikm : aiS amo oabio tirao oat Sbtti tSmro ani ihoh alhikm : al tpno al halilim oalhi mskh la teSo lkm ani ihoh alhikm : oki tcbHo cbH Slmim lihoh lrznkm tcbHho : biom cbHkm iakl ommHrt ohnotr ed iom hSliSi baS iSrp : oam hakl iakl biom hSliSi pgol hoa la irzh : oaklio eono iSa ki at qdS ihoh Hll onkrth hnpS hhoa memih : obqzrkm at qzir arzkm la tklh pat Sdk lqzr olqT qzirk la tlqT : okrmk la teoll oprT krmk la tlqT leni olgr tecb atm ani ihoh alhikm : la tgnbo ola tkHSo ola tSqro aiS bemito : ola tSbeo bSmi lSqr oHllt at Sm alhik ani ihoh : la teSq at rek ola tgcl la tlin pelt Skir atk ed bqr : la tqll HrS olpni eor la ttn mkSl oirat malhik ani ihoh : la teSo eol bmSpT la tSa pni dl ola thdr pni gdol bzdq tSpT emitk : la tlk rkil bemik la temd el dm rek ani ihoh : la tSna at aHik blbbk hokH tokiH at emitk ola tSa elio HTa : la tqm ola tTr at bni emk oahbt lrek kmok ani ihoh : at Hqti tSmro bhmtk la trbie klaim Sdk la tcre klaim obgd klaim SeTnc la ielh elik : oaiS ki iSkb at aSh Skbt cre ohoa SpHh nHrpt laiS ohpdh la npdth ao HpSh la ntn lh bqrt thih la iomto ki la HpSh : ohbia at aSmo lihoh al ptH ahl moed ail aSm : okpr elio hkhn bail haSm lpni ihoh el HTato aSr HTa onslH lo mHTato aSr HTa : oki tbao al harz onTetm kl ez makl oerltm erlto at prio SlS Snim ihih lkm erlim la iakl : obSnh hrbiet ihih kl prio qdS hlolim lihoh : obSnh hHmiSt taklo at prio lhosip lkm tboato ani ihoh alhikm : la taklo el hdm la tnHSo ola teonno : la tqpo pat raSkm ola tSHit at pat cqnk : oSrT lnpS la ttno bbSrkm oktbt qeqe la ttno bkm ani ihoh : al tHll at btk lhcnoth ola tcnh harz omlah harz cmh : at Sbtti tSmro omqdSi tirao ani ihoh : al tpno al habt oal hidenim al tbqSo lTmah bhm ani ihoh alhikm : mpni Sibh tqom ohdrt pni cqn oirat malhik ani ihoh : oki igor atk gr barzkm la tono ato : kacrH mkm ihih lkm hgr hgr atkm oahbt lo kmok ki grim hiitm barz mzrim ani ihoh alhikm : la teSo eol bmSpT bmdh bmSql obmSorh : macni zdq abni zdq aipt zdq ohin zdq ihih lkm ani ihoh alhikm aSr hozati atkm marz mzrim : oSmrtm at kl Hqti oat kl mSpTi oeSitm atm ani ihoh :

20

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : oal bni iSral tamr aiS aiS mbni iSral omn hgr hgr biSral aSr itn mcreo lmlk mot iomt em harz irgmho babn : oani atn at pni baiS hhoa ohkrti ato mqrb emo ki mcreo ntn lmlk lmen Tma at mqdSi olHll at Sm qdSi : oam helm ielimo em harz at einihm mn haiS hhoa btto mcreo lmlk lblti hmit ato : oSmti ani at pni baiS hhoa obmSpHto ohkrti ato oat kl hcnim aHrio lcnot aHri hmlk mqrb emm : ohnpS aSr tpnh al habt oal hidenim lcnot aHrihm ontti at pni bnpS hhoa ohkrti ato mqrb emo : ohtqdStm ohiitm qdSim ki ani ihoh alhikm : oSmrtm at Hqti oeSitm atm ani ihoh mqdSkm : ki aiS aiS aSr iqll at abio oat amo mot iomt abio oamo qll dmio bo : oaiS aSr inap at aSt aiS aSr inap at aSt reho mot iomt hnap ohnapt : oaiS aSr iSkb at aSt abio erot abio glh mot iomto Snihm dmihm bm : oaiS aSr iSkb at klto mot iomto Snihm tbl eSo dmihm bm : oaiS aSr iSkb at ckr mSkbi aSh toebh eSo Snihm mot iomto dmihm bm : oaiS aSr iqH at aSh oat amh cmh hoa baS iSrpo ato oathn ola thih cmh btokkm : oaiS aSr itn Skbto bbhmh mot iomt oat hbhmh thrgo : oaSh aSr tqrb al kl bhmh lrbeh ath ohrgt at haSh oat hbhmh mot iomto dmihm bm : oaiS aSr iqH at aHto bt abio ao bt amo orah at eroth ohia trah at eroto Hsd hoa onkrto leini bni emm erot aHto glh eono iSa : oaiS aSr iSkb at aSh doh oglh at eroth at mqrh herh ohia glth at mqor dmih onkrto Snihm mqrb emm : oerot aHot amk oaHot abik la tglh ki at Saro herh eonm iSao : oaiS aSr iSkb at ddto erot ddo glh HTam iSao eririm imto : oaiS aSr iqH at aSt aHio ndh hoa erot aHio glh eririm ihio : oSmrtm at kl Hqti oat kl mSpTi oeSitm atm ola tqia atkm harz aSr ani mbia atkm Smh lSbt bh : ola tlko bHqt hgoi aSr ani mSlH mpnikm ki at kl alh eSo oaqz bm : oamr lkm atm tirSo at admtm oani atnnh lkm lrSt ath arz cbt Hlb odbS ani ihoh alhikm aSr hbdlti atkm mn hemim : ohbdltm bin hbhmh hThrh lTmah obin heop hTma lThr ola tSqzo at npStikm bbhmh obeop obkl aSr trmS hadmh aSr hbdlti lkm lTma : ohiitm li qdSim ki qdoS ani ihoh oabdl atkm mn hemim lhiot li : oaiS ao aSh ki ihih bhm aob ao ideni mot iomto babn irgmo atm dmihm bm :

21

oiamr ihoh al mSh amr al hkhnim bni ahrn oamrt alhm lnpS la iTma bemio : ki am lSaro hqrb alio lamo olabio olbno olbto olaHio : olaHto hbtolh hqrobh alio aSr la hith laiS lh iTma : la iTma bel bemio lhHlo : la iqrHh qrHh braSm opat cqnm la iglHo obbSrm la iSrTo SrTt : qdSim ihio lalhihm ola iHllo Sm alhihm ki at aSi ihoh lHm alhihm hm mqribm ohio qdS : aSh cnh oHllh la iqHo oaSh groSh maiSh la iqHo ki qdS hoa lalhio : oqdSto ki at lHm alhik hoa mqrib qdS ihih lk ki qdoS ani ihoh mqdSkm : obt aiS khn ki tHl lcnot at abih hia mHllt baS tSrp : ohkhn hgdol maHio aSr iozq el raSo Smn hmSHh omla at ido llbS at hbgdim at raSo la ipre obgdio la iprm : oel kl npSt mt la iba labio olamo la iTma : omn hmqdS la iza ola iHll at mqdS alhio ki ncr Smn mSHt alhio elio ani ihoh : ohoa aSh bbtolih iqH : almnh ogroSh oHllh cnh at alh la iqH ki am btolh memio iqH aSh : ola iHll creo bemio ki ani ihoh mqdSo : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn lamr aiS mcrek ldrtm aSr ihih bo mom la iqrb lhqrib lHm alhio : ki kl aiS aSr bo mom la iqrb aiS eor ao psH ao Hrm ao Sroe : ao aiS aSr ihih bo Sbr rgl ao Sbr id : ao gbn ao dq ao tbll beino ao grb ao ilpt ao mroH aSk : kl aiS aSr bo mom mcre ahrn hkhn la igS lhqrib at aSi ihoh mom bo at lHm alhio la igS lhqrib : lHm alhio mqdSi hqdSim omn hqdSim iakl : ak al hprkt la iba oal hmcbH la igS ki mom bo ola iHll at mqdSi ki ani ihoh mqdSm : oidbr mSh al ahrn oal bnio oal kl bni iSral :

22

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oal bnio oincro mqdSi bni iSral ola iHllo at Sm qdSi aSr hm mqdSim li ani ihoh : amr alhm ldrtikm kl aiS aSr iqrb mkl crekm al hqdSim aSr iqdiSo bni iSral lihoh oTmato elio onkrth hnpS hhoa mlpni ani ihoh : aiS aiS mcre ahrn ohoa zroe ao cb bqdSim la iakl ed aSr iThr ohnge bkl Tma npS ao aiS aSr tza mmno Skbt cre : ao aiS aSr ige bkl Srz aSr iTma lo ao badm aSr iTma lo lkl Tmato : npS aSr tge bo oTmah ed herb ola iakl mn hqdSim ki am rHz bSro bmim : oba hSmS oThr oaHr iakl mn hqdSim ki lHmo hoa : nblh oTrph la iakl lTmah bh ani ihoh : oSmro at mSmrti ola iSao elio HTa omto bo ki iHllho ani ihoh mqdSm : okl cr la iakl qdS toSb khn oSkir la iakl qdS : okhn ki iqnh npS qnin kspo hoa iakl bo oilid bito hm iaklo blHmo : obt khn ki thih laiS cr hoa btromt hqdSim la takl : obt khn ki thih almnh ogroSh ocre ain lh oSbh al bit abih kneorih mlHm abih takl okl cr la iakl bo : oaiS ki iakl qdS bSggh oisp HmSito elio ontn lkhn at hqdS : ola iHllo at qdSi bni iSral at aSr irimo lihoh : ohSiao aotm eon aSmh baklm at qdSihm ki ani ihoh mqdSm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oal bnio oal kl bni iSral oamrt alhm aiS aiS mbit iSral omn hgr biSral aSr iqrib qrbno lkl ndrihm olkl ndbotm aSr iqribo lihoh lelh : lrznkm tmim ckr bbqr bkSbim obecim : kl aSr bo mom la tqribo ki la lrzon ihih lkm : oaiS ki iqrib cbH Slmim lihoh lpla ndr ao lndbh bbqr ao bzan tmim ihih lrzon kl mom la ihih bo : eort ao Sbor ao Hroz ao iblt ao grb ao ilpt la tqribo alh lihoh oaSh la ttno mhm el hmcbH lihoh : oSor oSh Sroe oqloT ndbh teSh ato olndr la irzh : omeok oktot ontoq okrot la tqribo lihoh obarzkm la teSo : omid bn nkr la tqribo at lHm alhikm mkl alh ki mSHtm bhm mom bm la irzo lkm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : Sor ao kSb ao ec ki iold ohih Sbet imim tHt amo omiom hSmini ohlah irzh lqrbn aSh lihoh : oSor ao Sh ato oat bno la tSHTo biom aHd : oki tcbHo cbH todh lihoh lrznkm tcbHo : biom hhoa iakl la totiro mmno ed bqr ani ihoh : oSmrtm mzoti oeSitm atm ani ihoh : ola tHllo at Sm qdSi onqdSti btok bni iSral ani ihoh mqdSkm : hmozia atkm marz mzrim lhiot lkm lalhim ani ihoh :

23

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm moedi ihoh aSr tqrao atm mqrai qdS alh hm moedi : SSt imim teSh mlakh obiom hSbiei Sbt Sbton mqra qdS kl mlakh la teSo Sbt hoa lihoh bkl moSbtikm : alh moedi ihoh mqrai qdS aSr tqrao atm bmoedm : bHdS hraSon barbeh eSr lHdS bin herbim psH lihoh : obHmSh eSr iom lHdS hch Hg hmzot lihoh Sbet imim mzot taklo : biom hraSon mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : ohqrbtm aSh lihoh Sbet imim biom hSbiei mqra qdS kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki tbao al harz aSr ani ntn lkm oqzrtm at qzirh ohbatm at emr raSit qzirkm al hkhn : ohnip at hemr lpni ihoh lrznkm mmHrt hSbt inipno hkhn : oeSitm biom hnipkm at hemr kbS tmim bn Snto lelh lihoh : omnHto Sni eSrnim slt blolh bSmn aSh lihoh riH niHH onskh iin rbiet hhin : olHm oqli okrml la taklo ed ezm hiom hch ed hbiakm at qrbn alhikm Hqt eolm ldrtikm bkl mSbtikm : osprtm lkm mmHrt hSbt miom hbiakm at emr htnoph Sbe Sbtot tmimt thiinh : ed mmHrt hSbt hSbiet tspro HmSim iom ohqrbtm mnHh HdSh lihoh : mmoSbtikm tbiao lHm tnoph Stim Sni eSrnim slt thiinh Hmz tapinh bkorim lihoh : ohqrbtm el hlHm Sbet kbSim tmimm bni Snh opr bn bqr aHd oailm Snim ihio elh lihoh omnHtm onskihm aSh riH niHH lihoh : oeSitm Seir ecim aHd lHTat oSni kbSim bni Snh lcbH Slmim : ohnip hkhn atm el lHm hbkorim tnoph lpni ihoh el Sni kbSim qdS ihio lihoh lkhn : oqratm bezm hiom hch mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo Hqt eolm bkl moSbtikm ldrtikm : obqzrkm at qzir arzkm la tklh pat Sdk bqzrk olqT qzirk la tlqT leni olgr tecb atm ani ihoh alhikm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr bHdS hSbiei baHd lHdS ihih lkm Sbton ckron troeh mqra qdS : kl mlakt ebdh la teSo ohqrbtm aSh lihoh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : ak beSor lHdS hSbiei hch iom hkprim hoa mqra qdS ihih lkm oenitm at npStikm ohqrbtm aSh lihoh : okl mlakh la teSo bezm hiom hch ki iom kprim hoa lkpr elikm lpni ihoh alhikm : ki kl hnpS aSr la tenh bezm hiom hch onkrth memih : okl hnpS aSr teSh kl mlakh bezm hiom hch ohabdti at hnpS hhoa mqrb emh : kl mlakh la teSo Hqt eolm ldrtikm bkl mSbtikm : Sbt Sbton hoa lkm oenitm at npStikm btSeh lHdS berb merb ed erb tSbto Sbtkm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr bHmSh eSr iom lHdS hSbiei hch Hg hskot Sbet imim lihoh : biom hraSon mqra qdS kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : Sbet imim tqribo aSh lihoh biom hSmini mqra qdS ihih lkm ohqrbtm aSh lihoh ezrt hoa kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : alh moedi ihoh aSr tqrao atm mqrai qdS lhqrib aSh lihoh elh omnHh cbH onskim dbr iom biomo : mlbd Sbtt ihoh omlbd mtnotikm omlbd kl ndrikm omlbd kl ndbotikm aSr ttno lihoh : ak bHmSh eSr iom lHdS hSbiei baspkm at tboat harz tHgo at Hg ihoh Sbet imim biom hraSon Sbton obiom hSmini Sbton : olqHtm lkm biom hraSon pri ez hdr kpt tmrim oenp ez ebt oerbi nHl oSmHtm lpni ihoh alhikm Sbet imim : oHgtm ato Hg lihoh Sbet imim bSnh Hqt eolm ldrtikm bHdS hSbiei tHgo ato : bskt tSbo Sbet imim kl hacrH biSral iSbo bskt : lmen ideo drtikm ki bskot hoSbti at bni iSral bhoziai aotm marz mzrim ani ihoh alhikm : oidbr mSh at medi ihoh al bni iSral :

24

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zo at bni iSral oiqHo alik Smn cit ck ktit lmaor lhelt nr tmid : mHoz lprkt hedt bahl moed ierk ato ahrn merb ed bqr lpni ihoh tmid Hqt eolm ldrtikm : el hmnrh hThrh ierk at hnrot lpni ihoh tmid : olqHt slt oapit ath Stim eSrh Hlot Sni eSrnim ihih hHlh haHt : oSmt aotm Stim merkot SS hmerkt el hSlHn hThr lpni ihoh : ontt el hmerkt lbnh ckh ohith llHm lackrh aSh lihoh : biom hSbt biom hSbt ierkno lpni ihoh tmid mat bni iSral brit eolm : ohith lahrn olbnio oaklho bmqom qdS ki qdS qdSim hoa lo maSi ihoh Hq eolm : oiza bn aSh iSralit ohoa bn aiS mzri btok bni iSral oinzo bmHnh bn hiSralit oaiS hiSrali : oiqb bn haSh hiSralit at hSm oiqll oibiao ato al mSh oSm amo Slmit bt dbri lmTh dn : oiniHho bmSmr lprS lhm el pi ihoh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : hoza at hmqll al mHoz lmHnh osmko kl hSmeim at idihm el raSo orgmo ato kl hedh : oal bni iSral tdbr lamr aiS aiS ki iqll alhio onSa HTao : onqb Sm ihoh mot iomt rgom irgmo bo kl hedh kgr kacrH bnqbo Sm iomt : oaiS ki ikh kl npS adm mot iomt : omkh npS bhmh iSlmnh npS tHt npS : oaiS ki itn mom bemito kaSr eSh kn ieSh lo : Sbr tHt Sbr ein tHt ein Sn tHt Sn kaSr itn mom badm kn intn bo : omkh bhmh iSlmnh omkh adm iomt : mSpT aHd ihih lkm kgr kacrH ihih ki ani ihoh alhikm : oidbr mSh al bni iSral oioziao at hmqll al mHoz lmHnh oirgmo ato abn obni iSral eSo kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh :

25

oidbr ihoh al mSh bhr sini lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki tbao al harz aSr ani ntn lkm oSbth harz Sbt lihoh : SS Snim tcre Sdk oSS Snim tcmr krmk oaspt at tboath : obSnh hSbiet Sbt Sbton ihih larz Sbt lihoh Sdk la tcre okrmk la tcmr : at spiH qzirk la tqzor oat enbi ncirk la tbzr Snt Sbton ihih larz : ohith Sbt harz lkm laklh lk olebdk olamtk olSkirk oltoSbk hgrim emk : olbhmtk olHih aSr barzk thih kl tboath lakl : osprt lk Sbe Sbtt Snim Sbe Snim Sbe pemim ohio lk imi Sbe Sbtt hSnim tSe oarbeim Snh : ohebrt Sopr troeh bHdS hSbei beSor lHdS biom hkprim tebiro Sopr bkl arzkm : oqdStm at Snt hHmSim Snh oqratm dror barz lkl iSbih iobl hoa thih lkm oSbtm aiS al aHcto oaiS al mSpHto tSbo : iobl hoa Snt hHmSim Snh thih lkm la tcreo ola tqzro at spiHih ola tbzro at ncrih : ki iobl hoa qdS thih lkm mn hSdh taklo at tboath : bSnt hiobl hcat tSbo aiS al aHcto : oki tmkro mmkr lemitk ao qnh mid emitk al tono aiS at aHio : bmspr Snim aHr hiobl tqnh mat emitk bmspr Sni tboat imkr lk : lpi rb hSnim trbh mqnto olpi meT hSnim tmeiT mqnto ki mspr tboat hoa mkr lk : ola tono aiS at emito oirat malhik ki ani ihoh alhikm : oeSitm at Hqti oat mSpTi tSmro oeSitm atm oiSbtm el harz lbTH : ontnh harz prih oakltm lSbe oiSbtm lbTH elih : oki tamro mh nakl bSnh hSbiet hn la ncre ola nasp at tboatno : ozoiti at brkti lkm bSnh hSSit oeSt at htboah lSlS hSnim : ocretm at hSnh hSmint oakltm mn htboah iSn ed hSnh htSiet ed boa tboath taklo iSn : oharz la tmkr lzmtt ki li harz ki grim otoSbim atm emdi : obkl arz aHctkm galh ttno larz : ki imok aHik omkr maHcto oba galo hqrb alio ogal at mmkr aHio : oaiS ki la ihih lo gal ohSigh ido omza kdi galto : oHSb at Sni mmkro ohSib at hedp laiS aSr mkr lo oSb laHcto : oam la mzah ido di hSib lo ohih mmkro bid hqnh ato ed Snt hiobl oiza bibl oSb laHcto : oaiS ki imkr bit moSb eir Homh ohith galto ed tm Snt mmkro imim thih galto : oam la igal ed mlat lo Snh tmimh oqm hbit aSr beir aSr la Hmh lzmitt lqnh ato ldrtio la iza bibl : obti hHzrim aSr ain lhm Hmh sbib el Sdh harz iHSb galh thih lo obibl iza : oeri hloim bti eri aHctm galt eolm thih lloim : oaSr igal mn hloim oiza mmkr bit oeir aHcto bibl ki bti eri hloim hoa aHctm btok bni iSral : oSdh mgrS erihm la imkr ki aHct eolm hoa lhm : oki imok aHik omTh ido emk ohHcqt bo gr otoSb oHi emk : al tqH mato nSk otrbit oirat malhik oHi aHik emk : at kspk la ttn lo bnSk obmrbit la ttn aklk : ani ihoh alhikm aSr hozati atkm marz mzrim ltt lkm at arz knen lhiot lkm lalhim : oki imok aHik emk onmkr lk la tebd bo ebdt ebd : kSkir ktoSb ihih emk ed Snt hibl iebd emk : oiza memk hoa obnio emo oSb al mSpHto oal aHct abtio iSob : ki ebdi hm aSr hozati atm marz mzrim la imkro mmkrt ebd : la trdh bo bprk oirat malhik : oebdk oamtk aSr ihio lk mat hgoim aSr sbibtikm mhm tqno ebd oamh : ogm mbni htoSbim hgrim emkm mhm tqno ommSpHtm aSr emkm aSr holido barzkm ohio lkm laHch : ohtnHltm atm lbnikm aHrikm lrSt aHch lelm bhm tebdo obaHikm bni iSral aiS baHio la trdh bo bprk : oki tSig id gr otoSb emk omk aHik emo onmkr lgr toSb emk ao leqr mSpHt gr : aHri nmkr galh thih lo aHd maHio igalno : ao ddo ao bn ddo igalno ao mSar bSro mmSpHto igalno ao hSigh ido ongal : oHSb em qnho mSnt hmkro lo ed Snt hibl ohih ksp mmkro bmspr Snim kimi Skir ihih emo : am eod rbot bSnim lpihn iSib galto mksp mqnto : oam meT nSar bSnim ed Snt hibl oHSb lo kpi Snio iSib at galto : kSkir Snh bSnh ihih emo la irdno bprk leinik : oam la igal balh oiza bSnt hibl hoa obnio emo : ki li bni iSral ebdim ebdi hm aSr hozati aotm marz mzrim ani ihoh alhikm :

26

la teSo lkm alilm opsl omzbh la tqimo lkm oabn mSkit la ttno barzkm lhStHot elih ki ani ihoh alhikm : at Sbtti tSmro omqdSi tirao ani ihoh : am bHqti tlko oat mzoti tSmro oeSitm atm : ontti gSmikm betm ontnh harz ibolh oez hSdh itn prio : ohSig lkm diS at bzir obzir iSig at cre oakltm lHmkm lSbe oiSbtm lbTH barzkm : ontti Slom barz oSkbtm oain mHrid ohSbti Hih reh mn harz oHrb la tebr barzkm : ordptm at aibikm onplo lpnikm lHrb : ordpo mkm HmSh mah omah mkm rbbh irdpo onplo aibikm lpnikm lHrb : opniti alikm ohpriti atkm ohrbiti atkm ohqimti at briti atkm : oakltm iSn noSn oiSn mpni HdS toziao : ontti mSkni btokkm ola tgel npSi atkm : ohthlkti btokkm ohiiti lkm lalhim oatm thio li lem : ani ihoh alhikm aSr hozati atkm marz mzrim mhit lhm ebdim oaSbr mTt elkm oaolk atkm qommiot : oam la tSmeo li ola teSo at kl hmzot halh : oam bHqti tmaso oam at mSpTi tgel npSkm lblti eSot at kl mzoti lhprkm at briti : ap ani aeSh cat lkm ohpqdti elikm bhlh at hSHpt oat hqdHt mklot einim omdibt npS ocretm lriq crekm oaklho aibikm : ontti pni bkm ongptm lpni aibikm ordo bkm Snaikm onstm oain rdp atkm : oam ed alh la tSmeo li oispti lisrh atkm Sbe el HTatikm : oSbrti at gaon eckm ontti at Smikm kbrcl oat arzkm knHSh : otm lriq kHkm ola ttn arzkm at ibolh oez harz la itn prio : oam tlko emi qri ola tabo lSme li oispti elikm mkh Sbe kHTatikm : ohSlHti bkm at Hit hSdh oSklh atkm ohkrith
