at bhmtkm ohmeiTh atkm onSmo drkikm : oam balh la tosro li ohlktm emi qri : ohlkti ap ani emkm bqri ohkiti atkm gm ani Sbe el HTatikm : ohbati elikm Hrb nqmt nqm brit onasptm al erikm oSlHti dbr btokkm onttm bid aoib : bSbri lkm mTh lHm oapo eSr nSim lHmkm btnor aHd ohSibo lHmkm bmSql oakltm ola tSbeo : oam bcat la tSmeo li ohlktm emi bqri : ohlkti emkm bHmt qri oisrti atkm ap ani Sbe el HTatikm : oakltm bSr bnikm obSr bntikm taklo : ohSmdti at bmtikm ohkrti at Hmnikm ontti at pgrikm el pgri glolikm ogelh npSi atkm : ontti at erikm Hrbh ohSmoti at mqdSikm ola ariH briH niHHkm : ohSmti ani at harz oSmmo elih aibikm hiSbim bh : oatkm acrh bgoim ohriqti aHrikm Hrb ohith arzkm Smmh oerikm ihio Hrbh : ac trzh harz at Sbttih kl imi hSmh oatm barz aibikm ac tSbt harz ohrzt at Sbttih : kl imi hSmh tSbt at aSr la Sbth bSbttikm bSbtkm elih : ohnSarim bkm ohbati mrk blbbm barzt aibihm ordp atm qol elh ndp onso mnst Hrb onplo oain rdp : okSlo aiS baHio kmpni Hrb ordp ain ola thih lkm tqomh lpni aibikm : oabdtm bgoim oaklh atkm arz aibikm : ohnSarim bkm imqo beonm barzt aibikm oap beont abtm atm imqo : ohtodo at eonm oat eon abtm bmelm aSr melo bi oap aSr hlko emi bqri : ap ani alk emm bqri ohbati atm barz aibihm ao ac ikne lbbm herl oac irzo at eonm : ockrti at briti ieqob oap at briti izHq oap at briti abrhm ackr oharz ackr : oharz tecb mhm otrz at Sbttih bhSmh mhm ohm irzo at eonm ien obien bmSpTi maso oat Hqti gelh npSm : oap gm cat bhiotm barz aibihm la mastim ola geltim lkltm lhpr briti atm ki ani ihoh alhihm : ockrti lhm brit raSnim aSr hozati atm marz mzrim leini hgoim lhit lhm lalhim ani ihoh : alh hHqim ohmSpTim ohtort aSr ntn ihoh bino obin bni iSral bhr sini bid mSh :

27

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm aiS ki ipla ndr berkk npSt lihoh : ohih erkk hckr mbn eSrim Snh oed bn SSim Snh ohih erkk HmSim Sql ksp bSql hqdS : oam nqbh hoa ohih erkk SlSim Sql : oam mbn HmS Snim oed bn eSrim Snh ohih erkk hckr eSrim Sqlim olnqbh eSrt Sqlim : oam mbn HdS oed bn HmS Snim ohih erkk hckr HmSh Sqlim ksp olnqbh erkk SlSt Sqlim ksp : oam mbn SSim Snh omelh am ckr ohih erkk HmSh eSr Sql olnqbh eSrh Sqlim : oam mk hoa merkk ohemido lpni hkhn oherik ato hkhn el pi aSr tSig id hndr ierikno hkhn : oam bhmh aSr iqribo mmnh qrbn lihoh kl aSr itn mmno lihoh ihih qdS : la iHlipno ola imir ato Tob bre ao re bTob oam hmr imir bhmh bbhmh ohih hoa otmorto ihih qdS : oam kl bhmh Tmah aSr la iqribo mmnh qrbn lihoh ohemid at hbhmh lpni hkhn : oherik hkhn ath bin Tob obin re kerkk hkhn kn ihih : oam gal igalnh oisp HmiSto el erkk : oaiS ki iqdS at bito qdS lihoh oheriko hkhn bin Tob obin re kaSr ierik ato hkhn kn iqom : oam hmqdiS igal at bito oisp HmiSit ksp erkk elio ohih lo : oam mSdh aHcto iqdiS aiS lihoh ohih erkk lpi creo cre Hmr Serim bHmSim Sql ksp : am mSnt hibl iqdiS Sdho kerkk iqom : oam aHr hibl iqdiS Sdho oHSb lo hkhn at hksp el pi hSnim hnotrt ed Snt hibl ongre merkk : oam gal igal at hSdh hmqdiS ato oisp HmSit ksp erkk elio oqm lo : oam la igal at hSdh oam mkr at hSdh laiS aHr la igal eod : ohih hSdh bzato bibl qdS lihoh kSdh hHrm lkhn thih aHcto : oam at Sdh mqnto aSr la mSdh aHcto iqdiS lihoh : oHSb lo hkhn at mkst herkk ed Snt hibl ontn at herkk biom hhoa qdS lihoh : bSnt hiobl iSob hSdh laSr qnho mato laSr lo aHct harz : okl erkk ihih bSql hqdS eSrim grh ihih hSql : ak bkor aSr ibkr lihoh bbhmh la iqdiS aiS ato am Sor am Sh lihoh hoa : oam bbhmh hTmah opdh berkk oisp HmSto elio oam la igal onmkr berkk : ak kl Hrm aSr iHrm aiS lihoh mkl aSr lo madm obhmh omSdh aHcto la imkr ola igal kl Hrm qdS qdSim hoa lihoh : kl Hrm aSr iHrm mn hadm la ipdh mot iomt : okl meSr harz mcre harz mpri hez lihoh hoa qdS lihoh : oam gal igal aiS mmeSro HmSito isp elio : okl meSr bqr ozan kl aSr iebr tHt hSbT heSiri ihih qdS lihoh : la ibqr bin Tob lre ola imirno oam hmr imirno ohih hoa otmorto ihih qdS la igal : alh hmzot aSr zoh ihoh at mSh al bni iSral bhr sini :

bmdbr

1

oidbr ihoh al mSh bmdbr sini bahl moed baHd lHdS hSni bSnh hSnit lzatm marz mzrim lamr : Sao at raS kl edt bni iSral lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smot kl ckr lglgltm : mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba biSral tpqdo atm lzbatm ath oahrn : oatkm ihio aiS aiS lmTh aiS raS lbit abtio hoa : oalh Smot hanSim aSr iemdo atkm lraobn alizor bn Sdiaor : lSmeon Slmial bn zoriSdi : lihodh nHSon bn emindb : liSSkr ntnal bn zoer : lcboln aliab bn Hln : lbni iosp laprim aliSme bn emihod lmnSh gmlial bn pdhzor : lbnimn abidn bn gdeni : ldn aHiecr bn emiSdi : laSr pgeial bn ekrn : lgd alisp bn deoal : lnptli aHire bn einn : alh qriai hedh nSiai mTot abotm raSi alpi iSral hm : oiqH mSh oahrn at hanSim halh aSr nqbo bSmot : oat kl hedh hqhilo baHd lHdS hSni oitildo el mSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smot mbn eSrim Snh omelh lglgltm : kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh oipqdm bmdbr sini : oihio bni raobn bkr iSral toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smot lglgltm kl ckr mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh raobn SSh oarbeim alp oHmS maot : lbni Smeon toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm pqdio bmspr Smot lglgltm kl ckr mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh Smeon tSeh oHmSim alp oSlS maot : lbni gd toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smot mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh gd HmSh oarbeim alp oSS maot oHmSim : lbni ihodh toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh ihodh arbeh oSbeim alp oSS maot : lbni iSSkr toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh iSSkr arbeh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : lbni cboln toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh cboln Sbeh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : lbni iosp lbni aprim toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh aprim arbeim alp oHmS maot : lbni mnSh toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smot mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh mnSh Snim oSlSim alp omatim : lbni bnimn toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh bnimn HmSh oSlSim alp oarbe maot : lbni dn toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh dn Snim oSSim alp oSbe maot : lbni aSr toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh aSr aHd oarbeim alp oHmS maot : bni nptli toldtm lmSpHtm lbit abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba : pqdihm lmTh nptli SlSh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : alh hpqdim aSr pqd mSh oahrn onSiai iSral Snim eSr aiS aiS aHd lbit abtio hio : oihio kl pqodi bni iSral lbit abtm mbn eSrim Snh omelh kl iza zba biSral : oihio kl hpqdim SS maot alp oSlSt alpim oHmS maot oHmSim : ohloim lmTh abtm la htpqdo btokm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : ak at mTh loi la tpqd oat raSm la tSa btok bni iSral : oath hpqd at hloim el mSkn hedt oel kl klio oel kl aSr lo hmh iSao at hmSkn oat kl klio ohm iSrtho osbib lmSkn iHno : obnse hmSkn iorido ato hloim obHnt hmSkn iqimo ato hloim ohcr hqrb iomt : oHno bni iSral aiS el mHnho oaiS el dglo lzbatm : ohloim iHno sbib lmSkn hedt ola ihih qzp el edt bni iSral oSmro hloim at mSmrt mSkn hedot : oieSo bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo :

2

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : aiS el dglo batt lbit abtm iHno bni iSral mngd sbib lahl moed iHno : ohHnim qdmh mcrHh dgl mHnh ihodh lzbatm onSia lbni ihodh nHSon bn emindb : ozbao opqdihm arbeh oSbeim alp oSS maot : ohHnim elio mTh iSSkr onSia lbni iSSkr ntnal bn zoer : ozbao opqdio arbeh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : mTh cboln onSia lbni cboln aliab bn Hln : ozbao opqdio Sbeh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : kl hpqdim lmHnh ihodh mat alp oSmnim alp oSSt alpim oarbe maot lzbatm raSnh iseo : dgl mHnh raobn timnh lzbatm onSia lbni raobn alizor bn Sdiaor : ozbao opqdio SSh oarbeim alp oHmS maot : ohHonm elio mTh Smeon onSia lbni Smeon Slmial bn zori Sdi : ozbao opqdihm tSeh oHmSim alp oSlS maot : omTh gd onSia lbni gd alisp bn deoal : ozbao opqdihm HmSh oarbeim alp oSS maot oHmSim : kl hpqdim lmHnh raobn mat alp oaHd oHmSim alp oarbe maot oHmSim lzbatm oSnim iseo : onse ahl moed mHnh hloim btok hmHnt kaSr iHno kn iseo aiS el ido ldglihm : dgl mHnh aprim lzbatm imh onSia lbni aprim aliSme bn emihod : ozbao opqdihm arbeim alp oHmS maot : oelio mTh mnSh onSia lbni mnSh gmlial bn pdhzor : ozbao opqdihm Snim oSlSim alp omatim : omTh bnimn onSia lbni bnimn abidn bn gdeni : ozbao opqdihm HmSh oSlSim alp oarbe maot : kl hpqdim lmHnh aprim mat alp oSmnt alpim omah lzbatm oSlSim iseo : dgl mHnh dn zpnh lzbatm onSia lbni dn aHiecr bn emiSdi : ozbao opqdihm Snim oSSim alp oSbe maot : ohHnim elio mTh aSr onSia lbni aSr pgeial bn ekrn : ozbao opqdihm aHd oarbeim alp oHmS maot : omTh nptli onSia lbni nptli aHire bn einn : ozbao opqdihm SlSh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : kl hpqdim lmHnh dn mat alp oSbeh oHmSim alp oSS maot laHrnh iseo ldglihm : alh pqodi bni iSral lbit abtm kl pqodi hmHnt lzbatm SS maot alp oSlSt alpim oHmS maot oHmSim : ohloim la htpqdo btok bni iSral kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oieSo bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn Hno ldglihm okn nseo aiS lmSpHtio el bit abtio :

3

oalh toldt ahrn omSh biom dbr ihoh at mSh bhr sini : oalh Smot bni ahrn hbkor ndb oabihoa alecr oaitmr : alh Smot bni ahrn hkhnim hmSHim aSr mla idm lkhn : oimt ndb oabihoa lpni ihoh bhqrbm aS crh lpni ihoh bmdbr sini obnim la hio lhm oikhn alecr oaitmr el pni ahrn abihm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : hqrb at mTh loi ohemdt ato lpni ahrn hkhn oSrto ato : oSmro at mSmrto oat mSmrt kl hedh lpni ahl moed lebd at ebdt hmSkn : oSmro at kl kli ahl moed oat mSmrt bni iSral lebd at ebdt hmSkn : ontth at hloim lahrn olbnio ntonm ntonm hmh lo mat bni iSral : oat ahrn oat bnio tpqd oSmro at khntm ohcr hqrb iomt : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : oani hnh lqHti at hloim mtok bni iSral tHt kl bkor pTr rHm mbni iSral ohio li hloim : ki li kl bkor biom hkti kl bkor barz mzrim hqdSti li kl bkor biSral madm ed bhmh li ihio ani ihoh : oidbr ihoh al mSh bmdbr sini lamr : pqd at bni loi lbit abtm lmSpHtm kl ckr mbn HdS omelh tpqdm : oipqd atm mSh el pi ihoh kaSr zoh : oihio alh bni loi bSmtm grSon oqht omrri : oalh Smot bni grSon lmSpHtm lbni oSmei : obni qht lmSpHtm emrm oizhr Hbron oecial : obni mrri lmSpHtm mHli omoSi alh hm mSpHt hloi lbit abtm : lgrSon mSpHt hlbni omSpHt hSmei alh hm mSpHt hgrSni : pqdihm bmspr kl ckr mbn HdS omelh pqdihm Sbet alpim oHmS maot : mSpHt hgrSni aHri hmSkn iHno imh : onSia bit ab lgrSni alisp bn lal : omSmrt bni grSon bahl moed hmSkn ohahl mksho omsk ptH ahl moed : oqlei hHzr oat msk ptH hHzr aSr el hmSkn oel hmcbH sbib oat mitrio lkl ebdto : olqht mSpHt hemrmi omSpHt hizhri omSpHt hHbrni omSpHt heciali alh hm mSpHt hqhti : bmspr kl ckr mbn HdS omelh Smnt alpim oSS maot Smri mSmrt hqdS : mSpHt bni qht iHno el irk hmSkn timnh : onSia bit ab lmSpHt hqhti alizpn bn ecial : omSmrtm harn ohSlHn ohmnrh ohmcbHt okli hqdS aSr iSrto bhm ohmsk okl ebdto : onSia nSiai hloi alecr bn ahrn hkhn pqdt Smri mSmrt hqdS : lmrri mSpHt hmHli omSpHt hmoSi alh hm mSpHt mrri : opqdihm bmspr kl ckr mbn HdS omelh SSt alpim omatim : onSia bit ab lmSpHt mrri zorial bn abiHil el irk hmSkn iHno zpnh : opqdt mSmrt bni mrri qrSi hmSkn obriHio oemdio oadnio okl klio okl ebdto : oemdi hHzr sbib oadnihm oitdtm omitrihm : ohHnim lpni hmSkn qdmh lpni ahl moed mcrHh mSh oahrn obnio Smrim mSmrt hmqdS lmSmrt bni iSral ohcr hqrb iomt : kl pqodi hloim aSr pqd mSh oahrn el pi ihoh lmSpHtm kl ckr mbn HdS omelh Snim oeSrim alp : oiamr ihoh al mSh pqd kl bkr ckr lbni iSral mbn HdS omelh oSa at mspr Smtm : olqHt at hloim li ani ihoh tHt kl bkr bbni iSral oat bhmt hloim tHt kl bkor bbhmt bni iSral : oipqd mSh kaSr zoh ihoh ato at kl bkr bbni iSral : oihi kl bkor ckr bmspr Smot mbn HdS omelh lpqdihm Snim oeSrim alp SlSh oSbeim omatim : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : qH at hloim tHt kl bkor bbni iSral oat bhmt hloim tHt bhmtm ohio li hloim ani ihoh : oat pdoii hSlSh ohSbeim ohmatim hedpim el hloim mbkor bni iSral : olqHt HmSt HmSt Sqlim lglglt bSql hqdS tqH eSrim grh hSql : ontth hksp lahrn olbnio pdoii hedpim bhm : oiqH mSh at ksp hpdiom mat hedpim el pdoii hloim : mat bkor bni iSral lqH at hksp HmSh oSSim oSlS maot oalp bSql hqdS : oitn mSh at ksp hpdim lahrn olbnio el pi ihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh :

4

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : nSa at raS bni qht mtok bni loi lmSpHtm lbit abtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh kl ba lzba leSot mlakh bahl moed : cat ebdt bni qht bahl moed qdS hqdSim : oba ahrn obnio bnse hmHnh ohordo at prkt hmsk okso bh at arn hedt : ontno elio ksoi eor tHS oprSo bgd klil tklt mlmelh oSmo bdio : oel SlHn hpnim iprSo bgd tklt ontno elio at hqert oat hkpt oat hmnqit oat qSot hnsk olHm htmid elio ihih : oprSo elihm bgd tolet Sni okso ato bmksh eor tHS oSmo at bdio : olqHo bgd tklt okso at mnrt hmaor oat nrtih oat mlqHih oat mHttih oat kl kli Smnh aSr iSrto lh bhm : ontno ath oat kl klih al mksh eor tHS ontno el hmoT : oel mcbH hchb iprSo bgd tklt okso ato bmksh eor tHS oSmo at bdio : olqHo at kl kli hSrt aSr iSrto bm bqdS ontno al bgd tklt okso aotm bmksh eor tHS ontno el hmoT : odSno at hmcbH oprSo elio bgd argmn : ontno elio at kl klio aSr iSrto elio bhm at hmHtt at hmclgt oat hieim oat hmcrqt kl kli hmcbH oprSo elio ksoi eor tHS oSmo bdio : oklh ahrn obnio lkst at hqdS oat kl kli hqdS bnse hmHnh oaHri kn ibao bni qht lSat ola igeo al hqdS omto alh mSa bni qht bahl moed : opqdt alecr bn ahrn hkhn Smn hmaor oqTrt hsmim omnHt htmid oSmn hmSHh pqdt kl hmSkn okl aSr bo bqdS obklio : oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : al tkrito at SbT mSpHt hqhti mtok hloim : ocat eSo lhm oHio ola imto bgStm at qdS hqdSim ahrn obnio ibao oSmo aotm aiS aiS el ebdto oal mSao : ola ibao lraot kble at hqdS omto : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : nSa at raS bni grSon gm hm lbit abtm lmSpHtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh ed bn HmSim Snh tpqd aotm kl hba lzba zba lebd ebdh bahl moed : cat ebdt mSpHt hgrSni lebd olmSa : onSao at iriet hmSkn oat ahl moed mksho omksh htHS aSr elio mlmelh oat msk ptH ahl moed : oat qlei hHzr oat msk ptH Ser hHzr aSr el hmSkn oel hmcbH sbib oat mitrihm oat kl kli ebdtm oat kl aSr ieSh lhm oebdo : el pi ahrn obnio thih kl ebdt bni hgrSni lkl mSam olkl ebdtm opqdtm elhm bmSmrt at kl mSam : cat ebdt mSpHt bni hgrSni bahl moed omSmrtm bid aitmr bn ahrn hkhn : bni mrri lmSpHtm lbit abtm tpqd atm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh tpqdm kl hba lzba lebd at ebdt ahl moed : ocat mSmrt mSam lkl ebdtm bahl moed qrSi hmSkn obriHio oemodio oadnio : oemodi hHzr sbib oadnihm oitdtm omitrihm lkl klihm olkl ebdtm obSmt tpqdo at kli mSmrt mSam : cat ebdt mSpHt bni mrri lkl ebdtm bahl moed bid aitmr bn ahrn hkhn : oipqd mSh oahrn onSiai hedh at bni hqhti lmSpHtm olbit abtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh kl hba lzba lebdh bahl moed : oihio pqdihm lmSpHtm alpim Sbe maot oHmSim : alh pqodi mSpHt hqhti kl hebd bahl moed aSr pqd mSh oahrn el pi ihoh bid mSh : opqodi bni grSon lmSpHotm olbit abtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh kl hba lzba lebdh bahl moed : oihio pqdihm lmSpHtm lbit abtm alpim oSS maot oSlSim : alh pqodi mSpHt bni grSon kl hebd bahl moed aSr pqd mSh oahrn el pi ihoh : opqodi mSpHt bni mrri lmSpHtm lbit abtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh kl hba lzba lebdh bahl moed : oihio pqdihm lmSpHtm SlSt alpim omatim : alh pqodi mSpHt bni mrri aSr pqd mSh oahrn el pi ihoh bid mSh : kl hpqdim aSr pqd mSh oahrn onSiai iSral at hloim lmSpHtm olbit abtm : mbn SlSim Snh omelh oed bn HmSim Snh kl hba lebd ebdt ebdh oebdt mSa bahl moed : oihio pqdihm Smnt alpim oHmS maot oSmnim : el pi ihoh pqd aotm bid mSh aiS aiS el ebdto oel mSao opqdio aSr zoh ihoh at mSh :

5

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zo at bni iSral oiSlHo mn hmHnh kl zroe okl cb okl Tma lnpS : mckr ed nqbh tSlHo al mHoz lmHnh tSlHom ola iTmao at mHnihm aSr ani Skn btokm : oieSo kn bni iSral oiSlHo aotm al mHoz lmHnh kaSr dbr ihoh al mSh kn eSo bni iSral : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral aiS ao aSh ki ieSo mkl HTat hadm lmel mel bihoh oaSmh hnpS hhoa : ohtodo at HTatm aSr eSo ohSib at aSmo braSo oHmiSto isp elio ontn laSr aSm lo : oam ain laiS gal lhSib haSm alio haSm hmoSb lihoh lkhn mlbd ail hkprim aSr ikpr bo elio : okl tromh lkl qdSi bni iSral aSr iqribo lkhn lo ihih : oaiS at qdSio lo ihio aiS aSr itn lkhn lo ihih : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm aiS aiS ki tSTh aSto omelh bo mel : oSkb aiS ath Skbt cre onelm meini aiSh onstrh ohia nTmah oed ain bh ohoa la ntpSh : oebr elio roH qnah oqna at aSto ohoa nTmah ao ebr elio roH qnah oqna at aSto ohia la nTmah : ohbia haiS at aSto al hkhn ohbia at qrbnh elih eSirt haiph qmH Serim la izq elio Smn ola itn elio lbnh ki mnHt qnat hoa mnHt ckron mckrt eon : ohqrib ath hkhn ohemdh lpni ihoh : olqH hkhn mim qdSim bkli HrS omn hepr aSr ihih bqrqe hmSkn iqH hkhn ontn al hmim : ohemid hkhn at haSh lpni ihoh opre at raS haSh ontn el kpih at mnHt hckron mnHt qnat hoa obid hkhn ihio mi hmrim hmarrim : ohSbie ath hkhn oamr al haSh am la Skb aiS atk oam la STit Tmah tHt aiSk hnqi mmi hmrim hmarrim halh : oat ki STit tHt aiSk oki nTmat oitn aiS bk at Skbto mbledi aiSk : ohSbie hkhn at haSh bSbet halh oamr hkhn laSh itn ihoh aotk lalh olSbeh btok emk btt ihoh at irkk nplt oat bTnk zbh : obao hmim hmarrim halh bmeik lzbot bTn olnpl irk oamrh haSh amn amn : oktb at halt halh hkhn bspr omHh al mi hmrim : ohSqh at haSh at mi hmrim hmarrim obao bh hmim hmarrim lmrim : olqH hkhn mid haSh at mnHt hqnat ohnip at hmnHh lpni ihoh ohqrib ath al hmcbH : oqmz hkhn mn hmnHh at ackrth ohqTir hmcbHh oaHr iSqh at haSh at hmim : ohSqh at hmim ohith am nTmah otmel mel baiSh obao bh hmim hmarrim lmrim ozbth bTnh onplh irkh ohith haSh lalh bqrb emh : oam la nTmah haSh oThrh hoa onqth oncreh cre : cat tort hqnat aSr tSTh aSh tHt aiSh onTmah : ao aiS aSr tebr elio roH qnah oqna at aSto ohemid at haSh lpni ihoh oeSh lh hkhn at kl htorh hcat : onqh haiS meon ohaSh hhoa tSa at eonh :

6

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm aiS ao aSh ki ipla lndr ndr ncir lhcir lihoh : miin oSkr icir Hmz iin oHmz Skr la iSth okl mSrt enbim la iSth oenbim lHim oibSim la iakl : kl imi ncro mkl aSr ieSh mgpn hiin mHrznim oed cg la iakl : kl imi ndr ncro ter la iebr el raSo ed mlat himm aSr icir lihoh qdS ihih gdl pre Ser raSo : kl imi hciro lihoh el npS mt la iba : labio olamo laHio olaHto la iTma lhm bmtm ki ncr alhio el raSo : kl imi ncro qdS hoa lihoh : oki imot mt elio bpte ptam oTma raS ncro oglH raSo biom Thrto biom hSbiei iglHno : obiom hSmini iba Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh al hkhn al ptH ahl moed : oeSh hkhn aHd lHTat oaHd lelh okpr elio maSr HTa el hnpS oqdS at raSo biom hhoa : ohcir lihoh at imi ncro ohbia kbS bn Snto laSm ohimim hraSnim iplo ki Tma ncro : ocat tort hncir biom mlat imi ncro ibia ato al ptH ahl moed : ohqrib at qrbno lihoh kbS bn Snto tmim aHd lelh okbSh aHt bt Snth tmimh lHTat oail aHd tmim lSlmim : osl mzot slt Hlt blolt bSmn orqiqi mzot mSHim bSmn omnHtm onskihm : ohqrib hkhn lpni ihoh oeSh at HTato oat elto : oat hail ieSh cbH Slmim lihoh el sl hmzot oeSh hkhn at mnHto oat nsko : oglH hncir ptH ahl moed at raS ncro olqH at Ser raS ncro ontn el haS aSr tHt cbH hSlmim : olqH hkhn at hcre bSlh mn hail oHlt mzh aHt mn hsl orqiq mzh aHd ontn el kpi hncir aHr htglHo at ncro : ohnip aotm hkhn tnoph lpni ihoh qdS hoa lkhn el Hch htnoph oel Soq htromh oaHr iSth hncir iin : cat tort hncir aSr idr qrbno lihoh el ncro mlbd aSr tSig ido kpi ndro aSr idr kn ieSh el tort ncro : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oal bnio lamr kh tbrko at bni iSral amor lhm : ibrkk ihoh oiSmrk : iar ihoh pnio alik oiHnk : iSa ihoh pnio alik oiSm lk Slom : oSmo at Smi el bni iSral oani abrkm :

7

oihi biom klot mSh lhqim at hmSkn oimSH ato oiqdS ato oat kl klio oat hmcbH oat kl klio oimSHm oiqdS atm : oiqribo nSiai iSral raSi bit abtm hm nSiai hmTt hm hemdim el hpqdim : oibiao at qrbnm lpni ihoh SS eglt zb oSni eSr bqr eglh el Sni hnSaim oSor laHd oiqribo aotm lpni hmSkn : oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr : qH matm ohio lebd at ebdt ahl moed ontth aotm al hloim aiS kpi ebdto : oiqH mSh at heglt oat hbqr oitn aotm al hloim : at Sti heglt oat arbet hbqr ntn lbni grSon kpi ebdtm : oat arbe heglt oat Smnt hbqr ntn lbni mrri kpi ebdtm bid aitmr bn ahrn hkhn : olbni qht la ntn ki ebdt hqdS elhm bktp iSao : oiqribo hnSaim at Hnkt hmcbH biom hmSH ato oiqribo hnSiam at qrbnm lpni hmcbH : oiamr ihoh al mSh nSia aHd liom nSia aHd liom iqribo at qrbnm lHnkt hmcbH : oihi hmqrib biom hraSon at qrbno nHSon bn emindb lmTh ihodh : oqrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etodim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn nHSon bn emindb : biom hSni hqrib ntnal bn zoer nSia iSSkr : hqrb at qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etodim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn ntnal bn zoer : biom hSliSi nSia lbni cboln aliab bn Hln : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn aliab bn Hln : biom hrbiei nSia lbni raobn alizor bn Sdiaor : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn alizor bn Sdiaor : biom hHmiSi nSia lbni Smeon Slmial bn zoriSdi : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn Slmial bn zoriSdi : biom hSSi nSia lbni gd alisp bn deoal : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn alisp bn deoal : biom hSbiei nSia lbni aprim aliSme bn emihod : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn aliSme bn emihod : biom hSmini nSia lbni mnSh gmlial bn pdhzor : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn gmlial bn pdhzor : biom htSiei nSia lbni bnimn abidn bn gdeni : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn abidn bn gdeni : biom heSiri nSia lbni dn aHiecr bn emiSdi : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn aHiecr bn emiSdi : biom eSti eSr iom nSia lbni aSr pgeial bn ekrn : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn pgeial bn ekrn : biom Snim eSr iom nSia lbni nptli aHire bn einn : qrbno qert ksp aHt SlSim omah mSqlh mcrq aHd ksp Sbeim Sql bSql hqdS Snihm mlaim slt blolh bSmn lmnHh : kp aHt eSrh chb mlah qTrt : pr aHd bn bqr ail aHd kbS aHd bn Snto lelh : Seir ecim aHd lHTat : olcbH hSlmim bqr Snim ailm HmSh etdim HmSh kbSim bni Snh HmSh ch qrbn aHire bn einn : cat Hnkt hmcbH biom hmSH ato mat nSiai iSral qert ksp Stim eSrh mcrqi ksp Snim eSr kpot chb Stim eSrh : SlSim omah hqerh haHt ksp oSbeim hmcrq haHd kl ksp hklim alpim oarbe maot bSql hqdS : kpot chb Stim eSrh mlat qTrt eSrh eSrh hkp bSql hqdS kl chb hkpot eSrim omah : kl hbqr lelh Snim eSr prim ailm Snim eSr kbSim bni Snh Snim eSr omnHtm oSeiri ecim Snim eSr lHTat : okl bqr cbH hSlmim eSrim oarbeh prim ailm SSim etdim SSim kbSim bni Snh SSim cat Hnkt hmcbH aHri hmSH ato : obba mSh al ahl moed ldbr ato oiSme at hqol mdbr alio mel hkprt aSr el arn hedt mbin Sni hkrbim oidbr alio :

8

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al ahrn oamrt alio bheltk at hnrt al mol pni hmnorh iairo Sbet hnrot : oieS kn ahrn al mol pni hmnorh helh nrtih kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : och meSh hmnrh mqSh chb ed irkh ed prHh mqSh hoa kmrah aSr hrah ihoh at mSh kn eSh at hmnrh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : qH at hloim mtok bni iSral oThrt atm : okh teSh lhm lThrm hch elihm mi HTat ohebiro ter el kl bSrm okbso bgdihm ohThro : olqHo pr bn bqr omnHto slt blolh bSmn opr Sni bn bqr tqH lHTat : ohqrbt at hloim lpni ahl moed ohqhlt at kl edt bni iSral : ohqrbt at hloim lpni ihoh osmko bni iSral at idihm el hloim : ohnip ahrn at hloim tnoph lpni ihoh mat bni iSral ohio lebd at ebdt ihoh : ohloim ismko at idihm el raS hprim oeSh at haHd HTat oat haHd elh lihoh lkpr el hloim : ohemdt at hloim lpni ahrn olpni bnio ohnpt atm tnoph lihoh : ohbdlt at hloim mtok bni iSral ohio li hloim : oaHri kn ibao hloim lebd at ahl moed oThrt atm ohnpt atm tnoph : ki ntnim ntnim hmh li mtok bni iSral tHt pTrt kl rHm bkor kl mbni iSral lqHti atm li : ki li kl bkor bbni iSral badm obbhmh biom hkti kl bkor barz mzrim hqdSti atm li : oaqH at hloim tHt kl bkor bbni iSral : oatnh at hloim ntnim lahrn olbnio mtok bni iSral lebd at ebdt bni iSral bahl moed olkpr el bni iSral ola ihih bbni iSral ngp bgSt bni iSral al hqdS : oieS mSh oahrn okl edt bni iSral lloim kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh lloim kn eSo lhm bni iSral : oitHTao hloim oikbso bgdihm oinp ahrn atm tnoph lpni ihoh oikpr elihm ahrn lThrm : oaHri kn bao hloim lebd at ebdtm bahl moed lpni ahrn olpni bnio kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh el hloim kn eSo lhm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : cat aSr lloim mbn HmS oeSrim Snh omelh iboa lzba zba bebdt ahl moed : ombn HmSim Snh iSob mzba hebdh ola iebd eod : oSrt at aHio bahl moed lSmr mSmrt oebdh la iebd kkh teSh lloim bmSmrtm :

9

oidbr ihoh al mSh bmdbr sini bSnh hSnit lzatm marz mzrim bHdS hraSon lamr : oieSo bni iSral at hpsH bmoedo : barbeh eSr iom bHdS hch bin herbim teSo ato bmoedo kkl Hqtio okkl mSpTio teSo ato : oidbr mSh al bni iSral leSt hpsH : oieSo at hpsH braSon barbeh eSr iom lHdS bin herbim bmdbr sini kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bni iSral : oihi anSim aSr hio Tmaim lnpS adm ola iklo leSt hpsH biom hhoa oiqrbo lpni mSh olpni ahrn biom hhoa : oiamro hanSim hhmh alio anHno Tmaim lnpS adm lmh ngre lblti hqrb at qrbn ihoh bmedo btok bni iSral : oiamr alhm mSh emdo oaSmeh mh izoh ihoh lkm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr aiS aiS ki ihih Tma lnpS ao bdrk rHqh lkm ao ldrtikm oeSh psH lihoh : bHdS hSni barbeh eSr iom bin herbim ieSo ato el mzot omrrim iaklho : la iSairo mmno ed bqr oezm la iSbro bo kkl Hqt hpsH ieSo ato : ohaiS aSr hoa Thor obdrk la hih oHdl leSot hpsH onkrth hnpS hhoa memih ki qrbn ihoh la hqrib bmedo HTao iSa haiS hhoa : oki igor atkm gr oeSh psH lihoh kHqt hpsH okmSpTo kn ieSh Hqh aHt ihih lkm olgr olacrH harz : obiom hqim at hmSkn ksh henn at hmSkn lahl hedt oberb ihih el hmSkn kmrah aS ed bqr : kn ihih tmid henn iksno omrah aS lilh : olpi helt henn mel hahl oaHri kn iseo bni iSral obmqom aSr iSkn Sm henn Sm iHno bni iSral : el pi ihoh iseo bni iSral oel pi ihoh iHno kl imi aSr iSkn henn el hmSkn iHno : obharik henn el hmSkn imim rbim oSmro bni iSral at mSmrt ihoh ola iseo : oiS aSr ihih henn imim mspr el hmSkn el pi ihoh iHno oel pi ihoh iseo : oiS aSr ihih henn merb ed bqr onelh henn bbqr onseo ao iomm olilh onelh henn onseo : ao imim ao HdS ao imim bharik henn el hmSkn lSkn elio iHno bni iSral ola iseo obhelto iseo : el pi ihoh iHno oel pi ihoh iseo at mSmrt ihoh Smro el pi ihoh bid mSh :

10

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : eSh lk Sti Hzozrt ksp mqSh teSh atm ohio lk lmqra hedh olmse at hmHnot : otqeo bhn onoedo alik kl hedh al ptH ahl moed : oam baHt itqeo onoedo alik hnSiaim raSi alpi iSral : otqetm troeh onseo hmHnot hHnim qdmh : otqetm troeh Snit onseo hmHnot hHnim timnh troeh itqeo lmseihm : obhqhil at hqhl ttqeo ola trieo : obni ahrn hkhnim itqeo bHzzrot ohio lkm lHqt eolm ldrtikm : oki tbao mlHmh barzkm el hzr hzrr atkm ohretm bHzzrot onckrtm lpni ihoh alhikm onoSetm maibikm : obiom SmHtkm obmoedikm obraSi HdSikm otqetm bHzzrt el eltikm oel cbHi Slmikm ohio lkm lckron lpni alhikm ani ihoh alhikm : oihi bSnh hSnit bHdS hSni beSrim bHdS nelh henn mel mSkn hedt : oiseo bni iSral lmseihm mmdbr sini oiSkn henn bmdbr parn : oiseo braSnh el pi ihoh bid mSh : oise dgl mHnh bni ihodh braSnh lzbatm oel zbao nHSon bn emindb : oel zba mTh bni iSSkr ntnal bn zoer : oel zba mTh bni cboln aliab bn Hlon : ohord hmSkn onseo bni grSon obni mrri nSai hmSkn : onse dgl mHnh raobn lzbatm oel zbao alizor bn Sdiaor : oel zba mTh bni Smeon Slmial bn zori Sdi : oel zba mTh bni gd alisp bn deoal : onseo hqhtim nSai hmqdS ohqimo at hmSkn ed bam : onse dgl mHnh bni aprim lzbatm oel zbao aliSme bn emihod : oel zba mTh bni mnSh gmlial bn pdhzor : oel zba mTh bni bnimn abidn bn gdeoni : onse dgl mHnh bni dn masp lkl hmHnt lzbatm oel zbao aHiecr bn emiSdi : oel zba mTh bni aSr pgeial bn ekrn : oel zba mTh bni nptli aHire bn einn : alh msei bni iSral lzbatm oiseo : oiamr mSh lHbb bn reoal hmdini Htn mSh nseim anHno al hmqom aSr amr ihoh ato atn lkm lkh atno ohTbno lk ki ihoh dbr Tob el iSral : oiamr alio la alk ki am al arzi oal moldti alk : oiamr al na tecb atno ki el kn idet Hntno bmdbr ohiit lno leinim : ohih ki tlk emno ohih hTob hhoa aSr iiTib ihoh emno ohTbno lk : oiseo mhr ihoh drk SlSt imim oaron brit ihoh nse lpnihm drk SlSt imim ltor lhm mnoHh : oenn ihoh elihm iomm bnsem mn hmHnh : oihi bnse harn oiamr mSh qomh ihoh oipzo aibik oinso mSnaik mpnik : obnHh iamr Sobh ihoh rbbot alpi iSral :

11

oihi hem kmtannim re bacni ihoh oiSme ihoh oiHr apo otber bm aS ihoh otakl bqzh hmHnh : oizeq hem al mSh oitpll mSh al ihoh otSqe haS : oiqra Sm hmqom hhoa tberh ki berh bm aS ihoh : ohaspsp aSr bqrbo htaoo taoh oiSbo oibko gm bni iSral oiamro mi iaklno bSr : ckrno at hdgh aSr nakl bmzrim Hnm at hqSaim oat habTHim oat hHzir oat hbzlim oat hSomim : oeth npSno ibSh ain kl blti al hmn einino : ohmn kcre gd hoa oeino kein hbdlH : STo hem olqTo oTHno brHim ao dko bmdkh obSlo bpror oeSo ato egot ohih Temo kTem lSd hSmn : obrdt hTl el hmHnh lilh ird hmn elio : oiSme mSh at hem bkh lmSpHtio aiS lptH ahlo oiHr ap ihoh mad obeini mSh re : oiamr mSh al ihoh lmh hret lebdk olmh la mzti Hn beinik lSom at mSa kl hem hch eli : hanki hriti at kl hem hch am anki ildtiho ki tamr ali Saho bHiqk kaSr iSa hamn at hinq el hadmh aSr nSbet labtio : main li bSr ltt lkl hem hch ki ibko eli lamr tnh lno bSr onaklh : la aokl anki lbdi lSat at kl hem hch ki kbd mmni : oam kkh at eSh li hrgni na hrg am mzati Hn beinik oal arah breti : oiamr ihoh al mSh asph li Sbeim aiS mcqni iSral aSr idet ki hm cqni hem oSTrio olqHt atm al ahl moed ohtizbo Sm emk : oirdti odbrti emk Sm oazlti mn hroH aSr elik oSmti elihm onSao atk bmSa hem ola tSa ath lbdk : oal hem tamr htqdSo lmHr oakltm bSr ki bkitm bacni ihoh lamr mi iaklno bSr ki Tob lno bmzrim ontn ihoh lkm bSr oakltm : la iom aHd taklon ola iomim ola HmSh imim ola eSrh imim ola eSrim iom : ed HdS imim ed aSr iza mapkm ohih lkm lcra ien ki mastm at ihoh aSr bqrbkm otbko lpnio lamr lmh ch izano mmzrim : oiamr mSh SS maot alp rgli hem aSr anki bqrbo oath amrt bSr atn lhm oaklo HdS imim : hzan obqr iSHT lhm omza lhm am at kl dgi him iasp lhm omza lhm : oiamr ihoh al mSh hid ihoh tqzr eth trah hiqrk dbri am la : oiza mSh oidbr al hem at dbri ihoh oiasp Sbeim aiS mcqni hem oiemd atm sbibt hahl : oird ihoh benn oidbr alio oiazl mn hroH aSr elio oitn el Sbeim aiS hcqnim oihi knoH elihm hroH oitnbao ola ispo : oiSaro Sni anSim bmHnh Sm haHd aldd oSm hSni midd otnH elihm hroH ohmh bktbim ola izao hahlh oitnbao bmHnh : oirz hner oigd lmSh oiamr aldd omidd mtnbaim bmHnh : oien ihoSe bn non mSrt mSh mbHrio oiamr adni mSh klam : oiamr lo mSh hmqna ath li omi itn kl em ihoh nbiaim ki itn ihoh at roHo elihm : oiasp mSh al hmHnh hoa ocqni iSral : oroH nse mat ihoh oigc Sloim mn him oiTS el hmHnh kdrk iom kh okdrk iom kh sbibot hmHnh okamtim el pni harz : oiqm hem kl hiom hhoa okl hlilh okl iom hmHrt oiaspo at hSlo hmmeiT asp eSrh Hmrim oiSTHo lhm SToH sbibot hmHnh : hbSr eodno bin Snihm Trm ikrt oap ihoh Hrh bem oik ihoh bem mkh rbh mad : oiqra at Sm hmqom hhoa qbrot htaoh ki Sm qbro at hem hmtaoim : mqbrot htaoh nseo hem Hzrot oihio bHzrot :

12

otdbr mrim oahrn bmSh el adot haSh hkSit aSr lqH ki aSh kSit lqH : oiamro hrq ak bmSh dbr ihoh hla gm bno dbr oiSme ihoh : ohaiS mSh eno mad mkl hadm aSr el pni hadmh : oiamr ihoh ptam al mSh oal ahrn oal mrim zao SlStkm al ahl moed oizao SlStm : oird ihoh bemod enn oiemd ptH hahl oiqra ahrn omrim oizao Snihm : oiamr Smeo na dbri am ihih nbiakm ihoh bmrah alio atode bHlom adbr bo : la kn ebdi mSh bkl biti namn hoa : ph al ph adbr bo omrah ola bHidt otmnt ihoh ibiT omdoe la iratm ldbr bebdi bmSh : oiHr ap ihoh bm oilk : ohenn sr mel hahl ohnh mrim mzret kSlg oipn ahrn al mrim ohnh mzret : oiamr ahrn al mSh bi adni al na tSt elino HTat aSr noalno oaSr HTano : al na thi kmt aSr bzato mrHm amo oiakl Hzi bSro : oizeq mSh al ihoh lamr al na rpa na lh : oiamr ihoh al mSh oabih irq irq bpnih hla tklm Sbet imim tsgr Sbet imim mHoz lmHnh oaHr tasp : otsgr mrim mHoz lmHnh Sbet imim ohem la nse ed hasp mrim : oaHr nseo hem mHzrot oiHno bmdbr parn :

13

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : SlH lk anSim oitro at arz knen aSr ani ntn lbni iSral aiS aHd aiS aHd lmTh abtio tSlHo kl nSia bhm : oiSlH atm mSh mmdbr parn el pi ihoh klm anSim raSi bni iSral hmh : oalh Smotm lmTh raobn Smoe bn ckor : lmTh Smeon SpT bn Hori : lmTh ihodh klb bn ipnh : lmTh iSSkr igal bn iosp : lmTh aprim hoSe bn non : lmTh bnimn plTi bn rpoa : lmTh cboln gdial bn sodi : lmTh iosp lmTh mnSh gdi bn sosi : lmTh dn emial bn gmli : lmTh aSr stor bn mikal : lmTh nptli nHbi bn opsi : lmTh gd gaoal bn mki : alh Smot hanSim aSr SlH mSh ltor at harz oiqra mSh lhoSe bn non ihoSe : oiSlH atm mSh ltor at arz knen oiamr alhm elo ch bngb oelitm at hhr : oraitm at harz mh hoa oat hem hiSb elih hHcq hoa hrph hmeT hoa am rb : omh harz aSr hoa iSb bh hTobh hoa am reh omh herim aSr hoa ioSb bhnh hbmHnim am bmbzrim : omh harz hSmnh hoa am rch hiS bh ez am ain ohtHcqtm olqHtm mpri harz ohimim imi bkori enbim : oielo oitro at harz mmdbr zn ed rHb lba Hmt : oielo bngb oiba ed Hbron oSm aHimn SSi otlmi ilidi henq oHbron Sbe Snim nbnth lpni zen mzrim : oibao ed nHl aSkl oikrto mSm cmorh oaSkol enbim aHd oiSaho bmoT bSnim omn hrmnim omn htanim : lmqom hhoa qra nHl aSkol el adot haSkol aSr krto mSm bni iSral : oiSbo mtor harz mqz arbeim iom : oilko oibao al mSh oal ahrn oal kl edt bni iSral al mdbr parn qdSh oiSibo aotm dbr oat kl hedh oiraom at pri harz : oispro lo oiamro bano al harz aSr SlHtno ogm cbt Hlb odbS hoa och prih : aps ki ec hem hiSb barz oherim bzrot gdlt mad ogm ildi henq raino Sm : emlq ioSb barz hngb ohHti ohibosi ohamri ioSb bhr ohkneni iSb el him oel id hirdn : oihs klb at hem al mSh oiamr elh nelh oirSno ath ki ikol nokl lh : ohanSim aSr elo emo amro la nokl lelot al hem ki Hcq hoa mmno : oioziao dbt harz aSr tro ath al bni iSral lamr harz aSr ebrno bh ltor ath arz aklt ioSbih hoa okl hem aSr raino btokh anSi mdot : oSm raino at hnpilim bni enq mn hnplim onhi beinino kHgbim okn hiino beinihm :

14

otSa kl hedh oitno at qolm oibko hem blilh hhoa : oilno el mSh oel ahrn kl bni iSral oiamro alhm kl hedh lo mtno barz mzrim ao bmdbr hch lo mtno : olmh ihoh mbia atno al harz hcat lnpl bHrb nSino oTpno ihio lbc hloa Tob lno Sob mzrimh : oiamro aiS al aHio ntnh raS onSobh mzrimh : oipl mSh oahrn el pnihm lpni kl qhl edt bni iSral : oihoSe bn non oklb bn ipnh mn htrim at harz qreo bgdihm : oiamro al kl edt bni iSral lamr harz aSr ebrno bh ltor ath Tobh harz mad mad : am Hpz bno ihoh ohbia atno al harz hcat ontnh lno arz aSr hoa cbt Hlb odbS : ak bihoh al tmrdo oatm al tirao at em harz ki lHmno hm sr zlm melihm oihoh atno al tiram : oiamro kl hedh lrgom atm babnim okbod ihoh nrah bahl moed al kl bni iSral : oiamr ihoh al mSh ed anh inazni hem hch oed anh la iamino bi bkl hatot aSr eSiti bqrbo : akno bdbr oaorSno oaeSh atk lgoi gdol oezom mmno : oiamr mSh al ihoh oSmeo mzrim ki helit bkHk at hem hch mqrbo : oamro al ioSb harz hcat Smeo ki ath ihoh bqrb hem hch aSr ein bein nrah ath ihoh oennk emd elhm obemd enn ath hlk lpnihm iomm obemod aS lilh : ohmth at hem hch kaiS aHd oamro hgoim aSr Smeo at Smek lamr : mblti iklt ihoh lhbia at hem hch al harz aSr nSbe lhm oiSHTm bmdbr : oeth igdl na kH adni kaSr dbrt lamr : ihoh ark apim orb Hsd nSa eon opSe onqh la inqh pqd eon abot el bnim el SlSim oel rbeim : slH na leon hem hch kgdl Hsdk okaSr nSath lem hch mmzrim oed hnh : oiamr ihoh slHti kdbrk : oaolm Hi ani oimla kbod ihoh at kl harz : ki kl hanSim hraim at kbdi oat atti aSr eSiti bmzrim obmdbr oinso ati ch eSr pemim ola Smeo bqoli : am irao at harz aSr nSbeti labtm okl mnazi la iraoh : oebdi klb eqb hith roH aHrt emo oimla aHri ohbiatio al harz aSr ba Smh ocreo iorSnh : ohemlqi ohkneni ioSb bemq mHr pno oseo lkm hmdbr drk im sop : oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : ed mti ledh hreh hcat aSr hmh mlinim eli at tlnot bni iSral aSr hmh mlinim eli Smeti : amr alhm Hi ani nam ihoh am la kaSr dbrtm bacni kn aeSh lkm : bmdbr hch iplo pgrikm okl pqdikm lkl msprkm mbn eSrim Snh omelh aSr hlintm eli : am atm tbao al harz aSr nSati at idi lSkn atkm bh ki am klb bn ipnh oihoSe bn non : oTpkm aSr amrtm lbc ihih ohbiati atm oideo at harz aSr mastm bh : opgrikm atm iplo bmdbr hch : obnikm ihio reim bmdbr arbeim Snh onSao at cnotikm ed tm pgrikm bmdbr : bmspr himim aSr trtm at harz arbeim iom iom lSnh iom lSnh tSao at eontikm arbeim Snh oidetm at tnoati : ani ihoh dbrti am la cat aeSh lkl hedh hreh hcat hnoedim eli bmdbr hch itmo oSm imto : ohanSim aSr SlH mSh ltor at harz oiSbo oilono elio at kl hedh lhozia dbh el harz : oimto hanSim mozai dbt harz reh bmgph lpni ihoh : oihoSe bn non oklb bn ipnh Hio mn hanSim hhm hhlkim ltor at harz : oidbr mSh at hdbrim halh al kl bni iSral oitablo hem mad : oiSkmo bbqr oielo al raS hhr lamr hnno oelino al hmqom aSr amr ihoh ki HTano : oiamr mSh lmh ch atm ebrim at pi ihoh ohoa la tzlH : al telo ki ain ihoh bqrbkm ola tngpo lpni aibikm : ki hemlqi ohkneni Sm lpnikm onpltm bHrb ki el kn Sbtm maHri ihoh ola ihih ihoh emkm : oieplo lelot al raS hhr oaron brit ihoh omSh la mSo mqrb hmHnh : oird hemlqi ohkneni hiSb bhr hhoa oikom oiktom ed hHrmh :

15

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki tbao al arz moSbtikm aSr ani ntn lkm : oeSitm aSh lihoh elh ao cbH lpla ndr ao bndbh ao bmedikm leSot riH niHH lihoh mn hbqr ao mn hzan : ohqrib hmqrib qrbno lihoh mnHh slt eSron blol brbeit hhin Smn : oiin lnsk rbieit hhin teSh el helh ao lcbH lkbS haHd : ao lail teSh mnHh slt Sni eSrnim blolh bSmn SlSit hhin : oiin lnsk SlSit hhin tqrib riH niHH lihoh : oki teSh bn bqr elh ao cbH lpla ndr ao Slmim lihoh : ohqrib el bn hbqr mnHh slt SlSh eSrnim blol bSmn Hzi hhin : oiin tqrib lnsk Hzi hhin aSh riH niHH lihoh : kkh ieSh lSor haHd ao lail haHd ao lSh bkbSim ao becim : kmspr aSr teSo kkh teSo laHd kmsprm : kl hacrH ieSh kkh at alh lhqrib aSh riH niHH lihoh : oki igor atkm gr ao aSr btokkm ldrtikm oeSh aSh riH niHH lihoh kaSr teSo kn ieSh : hqhl Hqh aHt lkm olgr hgr Hqt eolm ldrtikm kkm kgr ihih lpni ihoh : torh aHt omSpT aHd ihih lkm olgr hgr atkm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm bbakm al harz aSr ani mbia atkm Smh : ohih baklkm mlHm harz trimo tromh lihoh : raSit erstkm Hlh trimo tromh ktromt grn kn trimo ath : mraSit erstikm ttno lihoh tromh ldrtikm : oki tSgo ola teSo at kl hmzot halh aSr dbr ihoh al mSh : at kl aSr zoh ihoh alikm bid mSh mn hiom aSr zoh ihoh ohlah ldrtikm : ohih am meini hedh neSth lSggh oeSo kl hedh pr bn bqr aHd lelh lriH niHH lihoh omnHto onsko kmSpT oSeir ecim aHd lHTt : okpr hkhn el kl edt bni iSral onslH lhm ki Sggh hoa ohm hbiao at qrbnm aSh lihoh oHTatm lpni ihoh el Sggtm : onslH lkl edt bni iSral olgr hgr btokm ki lkl hem bSggh : oam npS aHt tHTa bSggh ohqribh ec bt Snth lHTat : okpr hkhn el hnpS hSggt bHTah bSggh lpni ihoh lkpr elio onslH lo : hacrH bbni iSral olgr hgr btokm torh aHt ihih lkm leSh bSggh : ohnpS aSr teSh bid rmh mn hacrH omn hgr at ihoh hoa mgdp onkrth hnpS hhoa mqrb emh : ki dbr ihoh bch oat mzoto hpr hkrt tkrt hnpS hhoa eonh bh : oihio bni iSral bmdbr oimzao aiS mqSS ezim biom hSbt : oiqribo ato hmzaim ato mqSS ezim al mSh oal ahrn oal kl hedh : oiniHo ato bmSmr ki la prS mh ieSh lo : oiamr ihoh al mSh mot iomt haiS rgom ato babnim kl hedh mHoz lmHnh : oiziao ato kl hedh al mHoz lmHnh oirgmo ato babnim oimt kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm oeSo lhm zizt el knpi bgdihm ldrtm ontno el zizt hknp ptil tklt : ohih lkm lzizt oraitm ato ockrtm at kl mzot ihoh oeSitm atm ola ttro aHri lbbkm oaHri einikm aSr atm cnim aHrihm : lmen tckro oeSitm at kl mzoti ohiitm qdSim lalhikm : ani ihoh alhikm aSr hozati atkm marz mzrim lhiot lkm lalhim ani ihoh alhikm :

16

oiqH qrH bn izhr bn qht bn loi odtn oabirm bni aliab oaon bn plt bni raobn : oiqmo lpni mSh oanSim mbni iSral HmSim omatim nSiai edh qrai moed anSi Sm : oiqhlo el mSh oel ahrn oiamro alhm rb lkm ki kl hedh klm qdSim obtokm ihoh omdoe ttnSao el qhl ihoh : oiSme mSh oipl el pnio : oidbr al qrH oal kl edto lamr bqr oide ihoh at aSr lo oat hqdoS ohqrib alio oat aSr ibHr bo iqrib alio : cat eSo qHo lkm mHtot qrH okl edto : otno bhn aS oSimo elihn qTrt lpni ihoh mHr ohih haiS aSr ibHr ihoh hoa hqdoS rb lkm bni loi : oiamr mSh al qrH Smeo na bni loi : hmeT mkm ki hbdil alhi iSral atkm medt iSral lhqrib atkm alio lebd at ebdt mSkn ihoh olemd lpni hedh lSrtm : oiqrb atk oat kl aHik bni loi atk obqStm gm khnh : lkn ath okl edtk hnedim el ihoh oahrn mh hoa ki tlono elio : oiSlH mSh lqra ldtn olabirm bni aliab oiamro la nelh : hmeT ki helitno marz cbt Hlb odbS lhmitno bmdbr ki tStrr elino gm hStrr : ap la al arz cbt Hlb odbS hbiatno ottn lno nHlt Sdh okrm heini hanSim hhm tnqr la nelh : oiHr lmSh mad oiamr al ihoh al tpn al mnHtm la Hmor aHd mhm nSati ola hreti at aHd mhm : oiamr mSh al qrH ath okl edtk hio lpni ihoh ath ohm oahrn mHr : oqHo aiS mHtto onttm elihm qTrt ohqrbtm lpni ihoh aiS mHtto HmSim omatim mHtt oath oahrn aiS mHtto : oiqHo aiS mHtto oitno elihm aS oiSimo elihm qTrt oiemdo ptH ahl moed omSh oahrn : oiqhl elihm qrH at kl hedh al ptH ahl moed oira kbod ihoh al kl hedh : oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : hbdlo mtok hedh hcat oaklh atm krge : oiplo el pnihm oiamro al alhi hroHt lkl bSr haiS aHd iHTa oel kl hedh tqzp : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al hedh lamr helo msbib lmSkn qrH dtn oabirm : oiqm mSh oilk al dtn oabirm oilko aHrio cqni iSral : oidbr al hedh lamr soro na mel ahli hanSim hrSeim halh oal tgeo bkl aSr lhm pn tspo bkl HTatm : oielo mel mSkn qrH dtn oabirm msbib odtn oabirm izao nzbim ptH ahlihm onSihm obnihm oTpm : oiamr mSh bcat tdeon ki ihoh SlHni leSot at kl hmeSim halh ki la mlbi : am kmot kl hadm imton alh opqdt kl hadm ipqd elihm la ihoh SlHni : oam briah ibra ihoh opzth hadmh at pih obleh atm oat kl aSr lhm oirdo Hiim Salh oidetm ki nazo hanSim halh at ihoh : oihi kklto ldbr at kl hdbrim halh otbqe hadmh aSr tHtihm : otptH harz at pih otble atm oat btihm oat kl hadm aSr lqrH oat kl hrkoS : oirdo hm okl aSr lhm Hiim Salh otks elihm harz oiabdo mtok hqhl : okl iSral aSr sbibtihm nso lqlm ki amro pn tbleno harz : oaS izah mat ihoh otakl at hHmSim omatim aiS mqribi hqTrt : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : amr al alecr bn ahrn hkhn oirm at hmHtt mbin hSrph oat haS crh hlah ki qdSo : at mHtot hHTaim halh bnpStm oeSo atm rqei pHim zpoi lmcbH ki hqribm lpni ihoh oiqdSo oihio laot lbni iSral : oiqH alecr hkhn at mHtot hnHSt aSr hqribo hSrpim oirqeom zpoi lmcbH : ckron lbni iSral lmen aSr la iqrb aiS cr aSr la mcre ahrn hoa lhqTir qTrt lpni ihoh ola ihih kqrH okedto kaSr dbr ihoh bid mSh lo : oilno kl edt bni iSral mmHrt el mSh oel ahrn lamr atm hmtm at em ihoh : oihi bhqhl hedh el mSh oel ahrn oipno al ahl moed ohnh ksho henn oira kbod ihoh : oiba mSh oahrn al pni ahl moed : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : hrmo mtok hedh hcat oaklh atm krge oiplo el pnihm : oiamr mSh al ahrn qH at hmHth otn elih aS mel hmcbH oSim qTrt oholk mhrh al hedh okpr elihm ki iza hqzp mlpni ihoh hHl hngp : oiqH ahrn kaSr dbr mSh oirz al tok hqhl ohnh hHl hngp bem oitn at hqTrt oikpr el hem : oiemd bin hmtim obin hHiim otezr hmgph : oihio hmtim bmgph arbeh eSr alp oSbe maot mlbd hmtim el dbr qrH : oiSb ahrn al mSh al ptH ahl moed ohmgph nezrh :

17

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oqH matm mTh mTh lbit ab mat kl nSiahm lbit abtm Snim eSr mTot aiS at Smo tktb el mTho : oat Sm ahrn tktb el mTh loi ki mTh aHd lraS bit abotm : ohnHtm bahl moed lpni hedot aSr aoed lkm Smh : ohih haiS aSr abHr bo mTho iprH ohSkti meli at tlnot bni iSral aSr hm mlinm elikm : oidbr mSh al bni iSral oitno alio kl nSiaihm mTh lnSia aHd mTh lnSia aHd lbit abtm Snim eSr mTot omTh ahrn btok mTotm : oinH mSh at hmTt lpni ihoh bahl hedt : oihi mmHrt oiba mSh al ahl hedot ohnh prH mTh ahrn lbit loi oiza prH oizz ziz oigml Sqdim : oiza mSh at kl hmTt mlpni ihoh al kl bni iSral oirao oiqHo aiS mTho : oiamr ihoh al mSh hSb at mTh ahrn lpni hedot lmSmrt laot lbni mri otkl tlontm meli ola imto : oieS mSh kaSr zoh ihoh ato kn eSh : oiamro bni iSral al mSh lamr hn goeno abdno klno abdno : kl hqrb hqrb al mSkn ihoh imot ham tmno lgoe :

18

oiamr ihoh al ahrn ath obnik obit abik atk tSao at eon hmqdS oath obnik atk tSao at eon khntkm : ogm at aHik mTh loi SbT abik hqrb atk oiloo elik oiSrtok oath obnik atk lpni ahl hedt : oSmro mSmrtk omSmrt kl hahl ak al kli hqdS oal hmcbH la iqrbo ola imto gm hm gm atm : onloo elik oSmro at mSmrt ahl moed lkl ebdt hahl ocr la iqrb alikm : oSmrtm at mSmrt hqdS oat mSmrt hmcbH ola ihih eod qzp el bni iSral : oani hnh lqHti at aHikm hloim mtok bni iSral lkm mtnh ntnim lihoh lebd at ebdt ahl moed : oath obnik atk tSmro at khntkm lkl dbr hmcbH olmbit lprkt oebdtm ebdt mtnh atn at khntkm ohcr hqrb iomt : oidbr ihoh al ahrn oani hnh ntti lk at mSmrt tromti lkl qdSi bni iSral lk nttim lmSHh olbnik lHq eolm : ch ihih lk mqdS hqdSim mn haS kl qrbnm lkl mnHtm olkl HTatm olkl aSmm aSr iSibo li qdS qdSim lk hoa olbnik : bqdS hqdSim taklno kl ckr iakl ato qdS ihih lk : och lk tromt mtnm lkl tnopt bni iSral lk nttim olbnik olbntik atk lHq eolm kl Thor bbitk iakl ato : kl Hlb izhr okl Hlb tiroS odgn raSitm aSr itno lihoh lk nttim : bkori kl aSr barzm aSr ibiao lihoh lk ihih kl Thor bbitk iaklno : kl Hrm biSral lk ihih : kl pTr rHm lkl bSr aSr iqribo lihoh badm obbhmh ihih lk ak pdh tpdh at bkor hadm oat bkor hbhmh hTmah tpdh : opdoio mbn HdS tpdh berkk ksp HmSt Sqlim bSql hqdS eSrim grh hoa : ak bkor Sor ao bkor kSb ao bkor ec la tpdh qdS hm at dmm tcrq el hmcbH oat Hlbm tqTir aSh lriH niHH lihoh : obSrm ihih lk kHch htnoph okSoq himin lk ihih : kl tromt hqdSim aSr irimo bni iSral lihoh ntti lk olbnik olbntik atk lHq eolm brit mlH eolm hoa lpni ihoh lk olcrek atk : oiamr ihoh al ahrn barzm la tnHl oHlq la ihih lk btokm ani Hlqk onHltk btok bni iSral : olbni loi hnh ntti kl meSr biSral lnHlh Hlp ebdtm aSr hm ebdim at ebdt ahl moed : ola iqrbo eod bni iSral al ahl moed lSat HTa lmot : oebd hloi hoa at ebdt ahl moed ohm iSao eonm Hqt eolm ldrtikm obtok bni iSral la inHlo nHlh : ki at meSr bni iSral aSr irimo lihoh tromh ntti lloim lnHlh el kn amrti lhm btok bni iSral la inHlo nHlh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : oal hloim tdbr oamrt alhm ki tqHo mat bni iSral at hmeSr aSr ntti lkm matm bnHltkm ohrmtm mmno tromt ihoh meSr mn hmeSr : onHSb lkm tromtkm kdgn mn hgrn okmlah mn hiqb : kn trimo gm atm tromt ihoh mkl meSrtikm aSr tqHo mat bni iSral onttm mmno at tromt ihoh lahrn hkhn : mkl mtntikm trimo at kl tromt ihoh mkl Hlbo at mqdSo mmno : oamrt alhm bhrimkm at Hlbo mmno onHSb lloim ktboat grn oktboat iqb : oakltm ato bkl mqom atm obitkm ki Skr hoa lkm Hlp ebdtkm bahl moed : ola tSao elio HTa bhrimkm at Hlbo mmno oat qdSi bni iSral la tHllo ola tmoto :

19

oidbr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn lamr : cat Hqt htorh aSr zoh ihoh lamr dbr al bni iSral oiqHo alik prh admh tmimh aSr ain bh mom aSr la elh elih el : onttm ath al alecr hkhn ohozia ath al mHoz lmHnh oSHT ath lpnio : olqH alecr hkhn mdmh bazbeo ohch al nkH pni ahl moed mdmh Sbe pemim : oSrp at hprh leinio at erh oat bSrh oat dmh el prSh iSrp : olqH hkhn ez arc oacob oSni tolet ohSlik al tok Srpt hprh : okbs bgdio hkhn orHz bSro bmim oaHr iboa al hmHnh oTma hkhn ed herb : ohSrp ath ikbs bgdio bmim orHz bSro bmim oTma ed herb : oasp aiS Thor at apr hprh ohniH mHoz lmHnh bmqom Thor ohith ledt bni iSral lmSmrt lmi ndh HTat hoa : okbs hasp at apr hprh at bgdio oTma ed herb ohith lbni iSral olgr hgr btokm lHqt eolm : hnge bmt lkl npS adm oTma Sbet imim : hoa itHTa bo biom hSliSi obiom hSbiei iThr oam la itHTa biom hSliSi obiom hSbiei la iThr : kl hnge bmt bnpS hadm aSr imot ola itHTa at mSkn ihoh Tma onkrth hnpS hhoa miSral ki mi ndh la crq elio Tma ihih eod Tmato bo : cat htorh adm ki imot bahl kl hba al hahl okl aSr bahl iTma Sbet imim : okl kli ptoH aSr ain zmid ptil elio Tma hoa : okl aSr ige el pni hSdh bHll Hrb ao bmt ao bezm adm ao bqbr iTma Sbet imim : olqHo lTma mepr Srpt hHTat ontn elio mim Hiim al kli : olqH acob oTbl bmim aiS Thor ohch el hahl oel kl hklim oel hnpSot aSr hio Sm oel hnge bezm ao bHll ao bmt ao bqbr : ohch hThr el hTma biom hSliSi obiom hSbiei oHTao biom hSbiei okbs bgdio orHz bmim oThr berb : oaiS aSr iTma ola itHTa onkrth hnpS hhoa mtok hqhl ki at mqdS ihoh Tma mi ndh la crq elio Tma hoa : ohith lhm lHqt eolm omch mi hndh ikbs bgdio ohnge bmi hndh iTma ed herb : okl aSr ige bo hTma iTma ohnpS hnget tTma ed herb :

20

oibao bni iSral kl hedh mdbr zn bHdS hraSon oiSb hem bqdS otmt Sm mrim otqbr Sm : ola hih mim ledh oiqhlo el mSh oel ahrn : oirb hem em mSh oiamro lamr olo goeno bgoe aHino lpni ihoh : olmh hbatm at qhl ihoh al hmdbr hch lmot Sm anHno obeirno : olmh helitno mmzrim lhbia atno al hmqom hre hch la mqom cre otanh ogpn ormon omim ain lStot : oiba mSh oahrn mpni hqhl al ptH ahl moed oiplo el pnihm oira kbod ihoh alihm : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : qH at hmTh ohqhl at hedh ath oahrn aHik odbrtm al hsle leinihm ontn mimio ohozat lhm mim mn hsle ohSqit at hedh oat beirm : oiqH mSh at hmTh mlpni ihoh kaSr zoho : oiqhlo mSh oahrn at hqhl al pni hsle oiamr lhm Smeo na hmrim hmn hsle hch nozia lkm mim : oirm mSh at ido oik at hsle bmTho pemim oizao mim rbim otSt hedh obeirm : oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn ien la hamntm bi lhqdiSni leini bni iSral lkn la tbiao at hqhl hch al harz aSr ntti lhm : hmh mi mribh aSr rbo bni iSral at ihoh oiqdS bm : oiSlH mSh mlakim mqdS al mlk adom kh amr aHik iSral ath idet at kl htlah aSr mzatno : oirdo abtino mzrimh onSb bmzrim imim rbim oireo lno mzrim olabtino : onzeq al ihoh oiSme qlno oiSlH mlak oizano mmzrim ohnh anHno bqdS eir qzh gbolk : nebrh na barzk la nebr bSdh obkrm ola nSth mi bar drk hmlk nlk la nTh imin oSmaol ed aSr nebr gbolk : oiamr alio adom la tebr bi pn bHrb aza lqratk : oiamro alio bni iSral bmslh nelh oam mimik nSth ani omqni ontti mkrm rq ain dbr brgli aebrh : oiamr la tebr oiza adom lqrato bem kbd obid Hcqh : oiman adom ntn at iSral ebr bgblo oiT iSral melio : oiseo mqdS oibao bni iSral kl hedh hr hhr : oiamr ihoh al mSh oal ahrn bhr hhr el gbol arz adom lamr : iasp ahrn al emio ki la iba al harz aSr ntti lbni iSral el aSr mritm at pi lmi mribh : qH at ahrn oat alecr bno ohel atm hr hhr : ohpST at ahrn at bgdio ohlbStm at alecr bno oahrn iasp omt Sm : oieS mSh kaSr zoh ihoh oielo al hr hhr leini kl hedh : oipST mSh at ahrn at bgdio oilbS atm at alecr bno oimt ahrn Sm braS hhr oird mSh oalecr mn hhr : oirao kl hedh ki goe ahrn oibko at ahrn SlSim iom kl bit iSral :

21

oiSme hkneni mlk erd iSb hngb ki ba iSral drk hatrim oilHm biSral oiSb mmno Sbi : oidr iSral ndr lihoh oiamr am ntn ttn at hem hch bidi ohHrmti at erihm : oiSme ihoh bqol iSral oitn at hkneni oiHrm athm oat erihm oiqra Sm hmqom Hrmh : oiseo mhr hhr drk im sop lsbb at arz adom otqzr npS hem bdrk : oidbr hem balhim obmSh lmh helitno mmzrim lmot bmdbr ki ain lHm oain mim onpSno qzh blHm hqlql : oiSlH ihoh bem at hnHSim hSrpim oinSko at hem oimt em rb miSral : oiba hem al mSh oiamro HTano ki dbrno bihoh obk htpll al ihoh oisr melino at hnHS oitpll mSh bed hem : oiamr ihoh al mSh eSh lk Srp oSim ato el ns ohih kl hnSok orah ato oHi : oieS mSh nHS nHSt oiSmho el hns ohih am nSk hnHS at aiS ohbiT al nHS hnHSt oHi : oiseo bni iSral oiHno babt : oiseo mabt oiHno beii hebrim bmdbr aSr el pni moab mmcrH hSmS : mSm nseo oiHno bnHl crd : mSm nseo oiHno mebr arnon aSr bmdbr hiza mgbol hamri ki arnon gbol moab bin moab obin hamri : el kn iamr bspr mlHmt ihoh at ohb bsoph oat hnHlim arnon : oaSd hnHlim aSr nTh lSbt er onSen lgbol moab : omSm barh hoa hbar aSr amr ihoh lmSh asp at hem oatnh lhm mim : ac iSir iSral at hSirh hcat eli bar eno lh : bar Hproh Srim kroh ndibi hem bmHqq bmSentm ommdbr mtnh : ommtnh nHlial omnHlial bmot : ombmot hgia aSr bSdh moab raS hpsgh onSqph el pni hiSimn : oiSlH iSral mlakim al siHn mlk hamri lamr : aebrh barzk la nTh bSdh obkrm la nSth mi bar bdrk hmlk nlk ed aSr nebr gblk : ola ntn siHn at iSral ebr bgblo oiasp siHn at kl emo oiza lqrat iSral hmdbrh oiba ihzh oilHm biSral : oikho iSral lpi Hrb oiirS at arzo marnn ed ibq ed bni emon ki ec gbol bni emon : oiqH iSral at kl herim halh oiSb iSral bkl eri hamri bHSbon obkl bntih : ki HSbon eir siHn mlk hamri hoa ohoa nlHm bmlk moab hraSon oiqH at kl arzo mido ed arnn : el kn iamro hmSlim bao HSbon tbnh otkonn eir siHon : ki aS izah mHSbon lhbh mqrit siHn aklh er moab beli bmot arnn : aoi lk moab abdt em kmoS ntn bnio pliTm obntio bSbit lmlk amri siHon : onirm abd HSbon ed dibon onSim ed npH aSr ed midba : oiSb iSral barz hamri : oiSlH mSh lrgl at iecr oilkdo bntih oiirS at hamri aSr Sm : oipno oielo drk hbSn oiza eog mlk hbSn lqratm hoa okl emo lmlHmh adrei : oiamr ihoh al mSh al tira ato ki bidk ntti ato oat kl emo oat arzo oeSit lo kaSr eSit lsiHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon : oiko ato oat bnio oat kl emo ed blti hSair lo Srid oiirSo at arzo :

22

oiseo bni iSral oiHno berbot moab mebr lirdn irHo : oira blq bn zpor at kl aSr eSh iSral lamri : oigr moab mpni hem mad ki rb hoa oiqz moab mpni bni iSral : oiamr moab al cqni mdin eth ilHko hqhl at kl sbibtino klHk hSor at irq hSdh oblq bn zpor mlk lmoab bet hhoa : oiSlH mlakim al blem bn beor ptorh aSr el hnhr arz bni emo lqra lo lamr hnh em iza mmzrim hnh ksh at ein harz ohoa iSb mmli : oeth lkh na arh li at hem hch ki ezom hoa mmni aoli aokl nkh bo oagrSno mn harz ki ideti at aSr tbrk mbrk oaSr tar ioar : oilko cqni moab ocqni mdin oqsmim bidm oibao al blem oidbro alio dbri blq : oiamr alihm lino ph hlilh ohSbti atkm dbr kaSr idbr ihoh ali oiSbo Sri moab em blem : oiba alhim al blem oiamr mi hanSim halh emk : oiamr blem al halhim blq bn zpr mlk moab SlH ali : hnh hem hiza mmzrim oiks at ein harz eth lkh qbh li ato aoli aokl lhlHm bo ogrStio : oiamr alhim al blem la tlk emhm la tar at hem ki brok hoa : oiqm blem bbqr oiamr al Sri blq lko al arzkm ki man ihoh ltti lhlk emkm : oiqomo Sri moab oibao al blq oiamro man blem hlk emno : oisp eod blq SlH Srim rbim onkbdim malh : oibao al blem oiamro lo kh amr blq bn zpor al na tmne mhlk ali : ki kbd akbdk mad okl aSr tamr ali aeSh olkh na qbh li at hem hch : oien blem oiamr al ebdi blq am itn li blq mla bito ksp ochb la aokl lebr at pi ihoh alhi leSot qTnh ao gdolh : oeth Sbo na bch gm atm hlilh oadeh mh isp ihoh dbr emi : oiba alhim al blem lilh oiamr lo am lqra lk bao hanSim qom lk atm oak at hdbr aSr adbr alik ato teSh : oiqm blem bbqr oiHbS at atno oilk em Sri moab : oiHr ap alhim ki holk hoa oitizb mlak ihoh bdrk lSTn lo ohoa rkb el atno oSni nerio emo : otra haton at mlak ihoh nzb bdrk oHrbo Sloph bido otT haton mn hdrk otlk bSdh oik blem at haton lhTth hdrk : oiemd mlak ihoh bmSeol hkrmim gdr mch ogdr mch : otra haton at mlak ihoh otlHz al hqir otlHz at rgl blem al hqir oisp lhkth : oiosp mlak ihoh ebor oiemd bmqom zr aSr ain drk lnTot imin oSmaol : otra haton at mlak ihoh otrbz tHt blem oiHr ap blem oik at haton bmql : oiptH ihoh at pi haton otamr lblem mh eSiti lk ki hkitni ch SlS rglim : oiamr blem laton ki htellt bi lo iS Hrb bidi ki eth hrgtik : otamr haton al blem hloa anki atnk aSr rkbt eli meodk ed hiom hch hhskn hsknti leSot lk kh oiamr la : oigl ihoh at eini blem oira at mlak ihoh nzb bdrk oHrbo Slph bido oiqd oiStHo lapio : oiamr alio mlak ihoh el mh hkit at atnk ch SloS rglim hnh anki izati lSTn ki irT hdrk lngdi : otrani haton otT lpni ch SlS rglim aoli nTth mpni ki eth gm atkh hrgti oaoth hHiiti : oiamr blem al mlak ihoh HTati ki la ideti ki ath nzb lqrati bdrk oeth am re beinik aSobh li : oiamr mlak ihoh al blem lk em hanSim oaps at hdbr aSr adbr alik ato tdbr oilk blem em Sri blq : oiSme blq ki ba blem oiza lqrato al eir moab aSr el gbol arnn aSr bqzh hgbol : oiamr blq al blem hla SlH SlHti alik lqra lk lmh la hlkt ali hamnm la aokl kbdk : oiamr blem al blq hnh bati alik eth hikol aokl dbr maomh hdbr aSr iSim alhim bpi ato adbr : oilk blem em blq oibao qrit Hzot : oicbH blq bqr ozan oiSlH lblem olSrim aSr ato : oihi bbqr oiqH blq at blem oielho bmot bel oira mSm qzh hem :

23

oiamr blem al blq bnh li bch Sbeh mcbHt ohkn li bch Sbeh prim oSbeh ailim : oieS blq kaSr dbr blem oiel blq oblem pr oail bmcbH : oiamr blem lblq htizb el eltk oalkh aoli iqrh ihoh lqrati odbr mh irani ohgdti lk oilk Spi : oiqr alhim al blem oiamr alio at Sbet hmcbHt erkti oael pr oail bmcbH : oiSm ihoh dbr bpi blem oiamr Sob al blq okh tdbr : oiSb alio ohnh nzb el elto hoa okl Sri moab : oiSa mSlo oiamr mn arm inHni blq mlk moab mhrri qdm lkh arh li ieqb olkh cemh iSral : mh aqb la qbh al omh acem la cem ihoh : ki mraS zrim arano omgbeot aSorno hn em lbdd iSkn obgoim la itHSb : mi mnh epr ieqb omspr at rbe iSral tmt npSi mot iSrim othi aHriti kmho : oiamr blq al blem mh eSit li lqb aibi lqHtik ohnh brkt brk : oien oiamr hla at aSr iSim ihoh bpi ato aSmr ldbr : oiamr alio blq lk na ati al mqom aHr aSr trano mSm aps qzho trah oklo la trah oqbno li mSm : oiqHho Sdh zpim al raS hpsgh oibn Sbeh mcbHt oiel pr oail bmcbH : oiamr al blq htizb kh el eltk oanki aqrh kh : oiqr ihoh al blem oiSm dbr bpio oiamr Sob al blq okh tdbr : oiba alio ohno nzb el elto oSri moab ato oiamr lo blq mh dbr ihoh : oiSa mSlo oiamr qom blq oSme hacinh edi bno zpr : la aiS al oikcb obn adm oitnHm hhoa amr ola ieSh odbr ola iqimnh : hnh brk lqHti obrk ola aSibnh : la hbiT aon bieqb ola rah eml biSral ihoh alhio emo otroet mlk bo : al moziam mmzrim ktoept ram lo : ki la nHS bieqb ola qsm biSral ket iamr lieqb oliSral mh pel al : hn em klbia iqom okari itnSa la iSkb ed iakl Trp odm Hllim iSth : oiamr blq al blem gm qb la tqbno gm brk la tbrkno : oien blem oiamr al blq hla dbrti alik lamr kl aSr idbr ihoh ato aeSh : oiamr blq al blem lkh na aqHk al mqom aHr aoli iiSr beini halhim oqbto li mSm : oiqH blq at blem raS hpeor hnSqp el pni hiSimn : oiamr blem al blq bnh li bch Sbeh mcbHt ohkn li bch Sbeh prim oSbeh ailim : oieS blq kaSr amr blem oiel pr oail bmcbH :

24

oira blem ki Tob beini ihoh lbrk at iSral ola hlk kpem bpem lqrat nHSim oiSt al hmdbr pnio : oiSa blem at einio oira at iSral Skn lSbTio othi elio roH alhim : oiSa mSlo oiamr nam blem bno ber onam hgbr Stm hein : nam Sme amri al aSr mHch Sdi iHch npl ogloi einim : mh Tbo ahlik ieqb mSkntik iSral : knHlim nTio kgnt eli nhr kahlim nTe ihoh karcim eli mim : icl mim mdlio ocreo bmim rbim oirm magg mlko otnSa mlkto : al moziao mmzrim ktoept ram lo iakl goim zrio oezmtihm igrm oHzio imHz : kre Skb kari oklbia mi iqimno mbrkik brok oarrik aror : oiHr ap blq al blem oispq at kpio oiamr blq al blem lqb aibi qratik ohnh brkt brk ch SlS pemim : oeth brH lk al mqomk amrti kbd akbdk ohnh mnek ihoh mkbod : oiamr blem al blq hla gm al mlakik aSr SlHt ali dbrti lamr : am itn li blq mla bito ksp ochb la aokl lebr at pi ihoh leSot Tobh ao reh mlbi aSr idbr ihoh ato adbr : oeth hnni holk lemi lkh aiezk aSr ieSh hem hch lemk baHrit himim : oiSa mSlo oiamr nam blem bno ber onam hgbr Stm hein : nam Sme amri al oide det elion mHch Sdi iHch npl ogloi einim : arano ola eth aSorno ola qrob drk kokb mieqb oqm SbT miSral omHz pati moab oqrqr kl bni St : ohih adom irSh ohih irSh Seir aibio oiSral eSh Hil : oird mieqb ohabid Srid meir : oira at emlq oiSa mSlo oiamr raSit goim emlq oaHrito edi abd : oira at hqini oiSa mSlo oiamr aitn moSbk oSim bsle qnk : ki am ihih lber qin ed mh aSor tSbk : oiSa mSlo oiamr aoi mi iHih mSmo al : ozim mid ktim oeno aSor oeno ebr ogm hoa edi abd : oiqm blem oilk oiSb lmqmo ogm blq hlk ldrko :

25

oiSb iSral bSTim oiHl hem lcnot al bnot moab : otqran lem lcbHi alhihn oiakl hem oiStHoo lalhihn : oizmd iSral lbel peor oiHr ap ihoh biSral : oiamr ihoh al mSh qH at kl raSi hem ohoqe aotm lihoh ngd hSmS oiSb Hron ap ihoh miSral : oiamr mSh al SpTi iSral hrgo aiS anSio hnzmdim lbel peor : ohnh aiS mbni iSral ba oiqrb al aHio at hmdinit leini mSh oleini kl edt bni iSral ohmh bkim ptH ahl moed : oira pinHs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn oiqm mtok hedh oiqH rmH bido : oiba aHr aiS iSral al hqbh oidqr at Snihm at aiS iSral oat haSh al qbth otezr hmgph mel bni iSral : oihio hmtim bmgph arbeh oeSrim alp : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : pinHs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn hSib at Hmti mel bni iSral bqnao at qnati btokm ola kliti at bni iSral bqnati : lkn amr hnni ntn lo at briti Slom : ohith lo olcreo aHrio brit khnt eolm tHt aSr qna lalhio oikpr el bni iSral : oSm aiS iSral hmkh aSr hkh at hmdinit cmri bn sloa nSia bit ab lSmeni : oSm haSh hmkh hmdinit kcbi bt zor raS amot bit ab bmdin hoa : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zror at hmdinim ohkitm aotm : ki zrrim hm lkm bnklihm aSr nklo lkm el dbr peor oel dbr kcbi bt nSia mdin aHtm hmkh biom hmgph el dbr peor :

26

oihi aHri hmgph oiamr ihoh al mSh oal alecr bn ahrn hkhn lamr : Sao at raS kl edt bni iSral mbn eSrim Snh omelh lbit abtm kl iza zba biSral : oidbr mSh oalecr hkhn atm berbt moab el irdn irHo lamr : mbn eSrim Snh omelh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh obni iSral hizaim marz mzrim : raobn bkor iSral bni raobn Hnok mSpHt hHnki lploa mSpHt hplai : lHzrn mSpHt hHzroni lkrmi mSpHt hkrmi : alh mSpHt hraobni oihio pqdihm SlSh oarbeim alp oSbe maot oSlSim : obni ploa aliab : obni aliab nmoal odtn oabirm hoa dtn oabirm qroai hedh aSr hzo el mSh oel ahrn bedt qrH bhztm el ihoh : otptH harz at pih otble atm oat qrH bmot hedh bakl haS at HmSim omatim aiS oihio lns : obni qrH la mto : bni Smeon lmSpHtm lnmoal mSpHt hnmoali limin mSpHt himini likin mSpHt hikini : lcrH mSpHt hcrHi lSaol mSpHt hSaoli : alh mSpHt hSmeni Snim oeSrim alp omatim : bni gd lmSpHtm lzpon mSpHt hzponi lHgi mSpHt hHgi lSoni mSpHt hSoni : lacni mSpHt hacni leri mSpHt heri : larod mSpHt harodi larali mSpHt harali : alh mSpHt bni gd lpqdihm arbeim alp oHmS maot : bni ihodh er oaonn oimt er oaonn barz knen : oihio bni ihodh lmSpHtm lSlh mSpHt hSlni lprz mSpHt hprzi lcrH mSpHt hcrHi : oihio bni prz lHzrn mSpHt hHzrni lHmol mSpHt hHmoli : alh mSpHt ihodh lpqdihm SSh oSbeim alp oHmS maot : bni iSSkr lmSpHtm tole mSpHt htolei lpoh mSpHt hponi : liSob mSpHt hiSobi lSmrn mSpHt hSmrni : alh mSpHt iSSkr lpqdihm arbeh oSSim alp oSlS maot : bni cboln lmSpHtm lsrd mSpHt hsrdi lalon mSpHt halni liHlal mSpHt hiHlali : alh mSpHt hcbolni lpqdihm SSim alp oHmS maot : bni iosp lmSpHtm mnSh oaprim : bni mnSh lmkir mSpHt hmkiri omkir holid at gled lgled mSpHt hgledi : alh bni gled aiecr mSpHt haiecri lHlq mSpHt hHlqi : oaSrial mSpHt haSrali oSkm mSpHt hSkmi : oSmide mSpHt hSmidei oHpr mSpHt hHpri : ozlpHd bn Hpr la hio lo bnim ki am bnot oSm bnot zlpHd mHlh oneh Hglh mlkh otrzh : alh mSpHt mnSh opqdihm Snim oHmSim alp oSbe maot : alh bni aprim lmSpHtm lSotlH mSpHt hStlHi lbkr mSpHt hbkri ltHn mSpHt htHni : oalh bni SotlH lern mSpHt herni : alh mSpHt bni aprim lpqdihm Snim oSlSim alp oHmS maot alh bni iosp lmSpHtm : bni bnimn lmSpHtm lble mSpHt hblei laSbl mSpHt haSbli laHirm mSpHt haHirmi : lSpopm mSpHt hSopmi lHopm mSpHt hHopmi : oihio bni ble ard onemn mSpHt hardi lnemn mSpHt hnemi : alh bni bnimn lmSpHtm opqdihm HmSh oarbeim alp oSS maot : alh bni dn lmSpHtm lSoHm mSpHt hSoHmi alh mSpHt dn lmSpHtm : kl mSpHt hSoHmi lpqdihm arbeh oSSim alp oarbe maot : bni aSr lmSpHtm limnh mSpHt himnh liSoi mSpHt hiSoi lbrieh mSpHt hbriei : lbni brieh lHbr mSpHt hHbri lmlkial mSpHt hmlkiali : oSm bt aSr SrH : alh mSpHt bni aSr lpqdihm SlSh oHmSim alp oarbe maot : bni nptli lmSpHtm liHzal mSpHt hiHzali lgoni mSpHt hgoni : lizr mSpHt hizri lSlm mSpHt hSlmi : alh mSpHt nptli lmSpHtm opqdihm HmSh oarbeim alp oarbe maot : alh pqodi bni iSral SS maot alp oalp Sbe maot oSlSim : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : lalh tHlq harz bnHlh bmspr Smot : lrb trbh nHlto olmeT tmeiT nHlto aiS lpi pqdio itn nHlto : ak bgorl iHlq at harz lSmot mTot abtm inHlo : el pi hgorl tHlq nHlto bin rb lmeT : oalh pqodi hloi lmSpHtm lgrSon mSpHt hgrSni lqht mSpHt hqhti lmrri mSpHt hmrri : alh mSpHt loi mSpHt hlbni mSpHt hHbrni mSpHt hmHli mSpHt hmoSi mSpHt hqrHi oqht hold at emrm : oSm aSt emrm iokbd bt loi aSr ildh ath lloi bmzrim otld lemrm at ahrn oat mSh oat mrim aHtm : oiold lahrn at ndb oat abihoa at alecr oat aitmr : oimt ndb oabihoa bhqribm aS crh lpni ihoh : oihio pqdihm SlSh oeSrim alp kl ckr mbn HdS omelh ki la htpqdo btok bni iSral ki la ntn lhm nHlh btok bni iSral : alh pqodi mSh oalecr hkhn aSr pqdo at bni iSral berbt moab el irdn irHo : obalh la hih aiS mpqodi mSh oahrn hkhn aSr pqdo at bni iSral bmdbr sini : ki amr ihoh lhm mot imto bmdbr ola notr mhm aiS ki am klb bn ipnh oihoSe bn non :

27

otqrbnh bnot zlpHd bn Hpr bn gled bn mkir bn mnSh lmSpHt mnSh bn iosp oalh Smot bntio mHlh neh oHglh omlkh otrzh : otemdnh lpni mSh olpni alecr hkhn olpni hnSiam okl hedh ptH ahl moed lamr : abino mt bmdbr ohoa la hih btok hedh hnoedim el ihoh bedt qrH ki bHTao mt obnim la hio lo : lmh igre Sm abino mtok mSpHto ki ain lo bn tnh lno aHch btok aHi abino : oiqrb mSh at mSpTn lpni ihoh : oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr : kn bnot zlpHd dbrt ntn ttn lhm aHct nHlh btok aHi abihm ohebrt at nHlt abihn lhn : oal bni iSral tdbr lamr aiS ki imot obn ain lo ohebrtm at nHlto lbto : oam ain lo bt onttm at nHlto laHio : oam ain lo aHim onttm at nHlto laHi abio : oam ain aHim labio onttm at nHlto lSaro hqrb alio mmSpHto oirS ath ohith lbni iSral lHqt mSpT kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiamr ihoh al mSh elh al hr hebrim hch orah at harz aSr ntti lbni iSral : oraith ath onaspt al emik gm ath kaSr nasp ahrn aHik : kaSr mritm pi bmdbr zn bmribt hedh lhqdiSni bmim leinihm hm mi mribt qdS mdbr zn : oidbr mSh al ihoh lamr : ipqd ihoh alhi hroHt lkl bSr aiS el hedh : aSr iza lpnihm oaSr iba lpnihm oaSr ioziam oaSr ibiam ola thih edt ihoh kzan aSr ain lhm reh : oiamr ihoh al mSh qH lk at ihoSe bn non aiS aSr roH bo osmkt at idk elio : ohemdt ato lpni alecr hkhn olpni kl hedh ozoith ato leinihm : ontth mhodk elio lmen iSmeo kl edt bni iSral : olpni alecr hkhn iemd oSal lo bmSpT haorim lpni ihoh el pio izao oel pio ibao hoa okl bni iSral ato okl hedh : oieS mSh kaSr zoh ihoh ato oiqH at ihoSe oiemdho lpni alecr hkhn olpni kl hedh : oismk at idio elio oizoho kaSr dbr ihoh bid mSh :

28

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zo at bni iSral oamrt alhm at qrbni lHmi laSi riH niHHi tSmro lhqrib li bmoedo : oamrt lhm ch haSh aSr tqribo lihoh kbSim bni Snh tmimm Snim liom elh tmid : at hkbS aHd teSh bbqr oat hkbS hSni teSh bin herbim : oeSirit haiph slt lmnHh blolh bSmn ktit rbiet hhin : elt tmid heSih bhr sini lriH niHH aSh lihoh : onsko rbiet hhin lkbS haHd bqdS hsk nsk Skr lihoh : oat hkbS hSni teSh bin herbim kmnHt hbqr oknsko teSh aSh riH niHH lihoh : obiom hSbt Sni kbSim bni Snh tmimm oSni eSrnim slt mnHh blolh bSmn onsko : elt Sbt bSbto el elt htmid onskh : obraSi HdSikm tqribo elh lihoh prim bni bqr Snim oail aHd kbSim bni Snh Sbeh tmimm : oSlSh eSrnim slt mnHh blolh bSmn lpr haHd oSni eSrnim slt mnHh blolh bSmn lail haHd : oeSrn eSron slt mnHh blolh bSmn lkbS haHd elh riH niHH aSh lihoh : onskihm Hzi hhin ihih lpr oSliSt hhin lail orbiet hhin lkbS iin cat elt HdS bHdSo lHdSi hSnh : oSeir ecim aHd lHTat lihoh el elt htmid ieSh onsko : obHdS hraSon barbeh eSr iom lHdS psH lihoh : obHmSh eSr iom lHdS hch Hg Sbet imim mzot iakl : biom hraSon mqra qdS kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : ohqrbtm aSh elh lihoh prim bni bqr Snim oail aHd oSbeh kbSim bni Snh tmimm ihio lkm : omnHtm slt blolh bSmn SlSh eSrnim lpr oSni eSrnim lail teSo : eSron eSron teSh lkbS haHd lSbet hkbSim : oSeir HTat aHd lkpr elikm : mlbd elt hbqr aSr lelt htmid teSo at alh : kalh teSo liom Sbet imim lHm aSh riH niHH lihoh el eolt htmid ieSh onsko : obiom hSbiei mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : obiom hbkorim bhqribkm mnHh HdSh lihoh bSbetikm mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : ohqrbtm eolh lriH niHH lihoh prim bni bqr Snim ail aHd Sbeh kbSim bni Snh : omnHtm slt blolh bSmn SlSh eSrnim lpr haHd Sni eSrnim lail haHd : eSron eSron lkbS haHd lSbet hkbSim : Seir ecim aHd lkpr elikm : mlbd elt htmid omnHto teSo tmimm ihio lkm onskihm :

29

obHdS hSbiei baHd lHdS mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo iom troeh ihih lkm : oeSitm elh lriH niHH lihoh pr bn bqr aHd ail aHd kbSim bni Snh Sbeh tmimm : omnHtm slt blolh bSmn SlSh eSrnim lpr Sni eSrnim lail : oeSron aHd lkbS haHd lSbet hkbSim : oSeir ecim aHd HTat lkpr elikm : mlbd elt hHdS omnHth oelt htmid omnHth onskihm kmSpTm lriH niHH aSh lihoh : obeSor lHdS hSbiei hch mqra qdS ihih lkm oenitm at npStikm kl mlakh la teSo : ohqrbtm elh lihoh riH niHH pr bn bqr aHd ail aHd kbSim bni Snh Sbeh tmimm ihio lkm : omnHtm slt blolh bSmn SlSh eSrnim lpr Sni eSrnim lail haHd : eSron eSron lkbS haHd lSbet hkbSim : Seir ecim aHd HTat mlbd HTat hkprim oelt htmid omnHth onskihm : obHmSh eSr iom lHdS hSbiei mqra qdS ihih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo oHgtm Hg lihoh Sbet imim : ohqrbtm elh aSh riH niHH lihoh prim bni bqr SlSh eSr ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm ihio : omnHtm slt blolh bSmn SlSh eSrnim lpr haHd lSlSh eSr prim Sni eSrnim lail haHd lSni hailm : oeSron eSron lkbS haHd larbeh eSr kbSim : oSeir ecim aHd HTat mlbd elt htmid mnHth onskh : obiom hSni prim bni bqr Snim eSr ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : omnHtm onskihm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir ecim aHd HTat mlbd elt htmid omnHth onskihm : obiom hSliSi prim eSti eSr ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : omnHtm onskihm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir HTat aHd mlbd elt htmid omnHth onskh : obiom hrbiei prim eSrh ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : mnHtm onskihm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir ecim aHd HTat mlbd elt htmid mnHth onskh : obiom hHmiSi prim tSeh ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : omnHtm onskihm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir HTat aHd mlbd elt htmid omnHth onskh : obiom hSSi prim Smnh ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : omnHtm onskihm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir HTat aHd mlbd elt htmid mnHth onskih : obiom hSbiei prim Sbeh ailm Snim kbSim bni Snh arbeh eSr tmimm : omnHtm onskhm lprim lailm olkbSim bmsprm kmSpTm : oSeir HTat aHd mlbd elt htmid mnHth onskh : biom hSmini ezrt thih lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSo : ohqrbtm elh aSh riH niHH lihoh pr aHd ail aHd kbSim bni Snh Sbeh tmimm : mnHtm onskihm lpr lail olkbSim bmsprm kmSpT : oSeir HTat aHd mlbd elt htmid omnHth onskh : alh teSo lihoh bmoedikm lbd mndrikm ondbtikm leltikm olmnHtikm olnskikm olSlmikm : oiamr mSh al bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh :

30

oidbr mSh al raSi hmTot lbni iSral lamr ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh : aiS ki idr ndr lihoh ao hSbe Sbeh lasr asr el npSo la iHl dbro kkl hiza mpio ieSh : oaSh ki tdr ndr lihoh oasrh asr bbit abih bnerih : oSme abih at ndrh oasrh aSr asrh el npSh ohHriS lh abih oqmo kl ndrih okl asr aSr asrh el npSh iqom : oam hnia abih ath biom Smeo kl ndrih oasrih aSr asrh el npSh la iqom oihoh islH lh ki hnia abih ath : oam hio thih laiS ondrih elih ao mbTa Sptih aSr asrh el npSh : oSme aiSh biom Smeo ohHriS lh oqmo ndrih oasrh aSr asrh el npSh iqmo : oam biom Sme aiSh inia aoth ohpr at ndrh aSr elih oat mbTa Sptih aSr asrh el npSh oihoh islH lh : ondr almnh ogroSh kl aSr asrh el npSh iqom elih : oam bit aiSh ndrh ao asrh asr el npSh bSbeh : oSme aiSh ohHrS lh la hnia ath oqmo kl ndrih okl asr aSr asrh el npSh iqom : oam hpr ipr atm aiSh biom Smeo kl moza Sptih lndrih olasr npSh la iqom aiSh hprm oihoh islH lh : kl ndr okl Sbet asr lent npS aiSh iqimno oaiSh iprno : oam hHrS iHriS lh aiSh miom al iom ohqim at kl ndrih ao at kl asrih aSr elih hqim atm ki hHrS lh biom Smeo : oam hpr ipr atm aHri Smeo onSa at eonh : alh hHqim aSr zoh ihoh at mSh bin aiS laSto bin ab lbto bnerih bit abih :

31

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : nqm nqmt bni iSral mat hmdinim aHr tasp al emik : oidbr mSh al hem lamr hHlzo matkm anSim lzba oihio el mdin ltt nqmt ihoh bmdin : alp lmTh alp lmTh lkl mTot iSral tSlHo lzba : oimsro malpi iSral alp lmTh Snim eSr alp Hlozi zba : oiSlH atm mSh alp lmTh lzba atm oat pinHs bn alecr hkhn lzba okli hqdS oHzzrot htroeh bido : oizbao el mdin kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh oihrgo kl ckr : oat mlki mdin hrgo el Hllihm at aoi oat rqm oat zor oat Hor oat rbe HmSt mlki mdin oat blem bn beor hrgo bHrb : oiSbo bni iSral at nSi mdin oat Tpm oat kl bhmtm oat kl mqnhm oat kl Hilm bcco : oat kl erihm bmoSbtm oat kl Tirtm Srpo baS : oiqHo at kl hSll oat kl hmlqoH badm obbhmh : oibao al mSh oal alecr hkhn oal edt bni iSral at hSbi oat hmlqoH oat hSll al hmHnh al erbt moab aSr el irdn irHo : oizao mSh oalecr hkhn okl nSiai hedh lqratm al mHoz lmHnh : oiqzp mSh el pqodi hHil Sri halpim oSri hmaot hbaim mzba hmlHmh : oiamr alihm mSh hHiitm kl nqbh : hn hnh hio lbni iSral bdbr blem lmsr mel bihoh el dbr peor othi hmgph bedt ihoh : oeth hrgo kl ckr bTp okl aSh idet aiS lmSkb ckr hrgo : okl hTp bnSim aSr la ideo mSkb ckr hHio lkm : oatm Hno mHoz lmHnh Sbet imim kl hrg npS okl nge bHll ttHTao biom hSliSi obiom hSbiei atm oSbikm : okl bgd okl kli eor okl meSh ecim okl kli ez ttHTao : oiamr alecr hkhn al anSi hzba hbaim lmlHmh cat Hqt htorh aSr zoh ihoh at mSh : ak at hchb oat hksp at hnHSt at hbrcl at hbdil oat heprt : kl dbr aSr iba baS tebiro baS oThr ak bmi ndh itHTa okl aSr la iba baS tebiro bmim : okbstm bgdikm biom hSbiei oThrtm oaHr tbao al hmHnh : oiamr ihoh al mSh lamr : Sa at raS mlqoH hSbi badm obbhmh ath oalecr hkhn oraSi abot hedh : oHzit at hmlqoH bin tpSi hmlHmh hizaim lzba obin kl hedh : ohrmt mks lihoh mat anSi hmlHmh hizaim lzba aHd npS mHmS hmaot mn hadm omn hbqr omn hHmrim omn hzan : mmHzitm tqHo ontth lalecr hkhn tromt ihoh : ommHzt bni iSral tqH aHd aHc mn hHmSim mn hadm mn hbqr mn hHmrim omn hzan mkl hbhmh ontth atm lloim Smri mSmrt mSkn ihoh : oieS mSh oalecr hkhn kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oihi hmlqoH itr hbc aSr bcco em hzba zan SS maot alp oSbeim alp oHmSt alpim : obqr Snim oSbeim alp : oHmrim aHd oSSim alp : onpS adm mn hnSim aSr la ideo mSkb ckr kl npS Snim oSlSim alp : othi hmHzh Hlq hizaim bzba mspr hzan SlS maot alp oSlSim alp oSbet alpim oHmS maot : oihi hmks lihoh mn hzan SS maot HmS oSbeim : ohbqr SSh oSlSim alp omksm lihoh Snim oSbeim : oHmrim SlSim alp oHmS maot omksm lihoh aHd oSSim : onpS adm SSh eSr alp omksm lihoh Snim oSlSim npS : oitn mSh at mks tromt ihoh lalecr hkhn kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : ommHzit bni iSral aSr Hzh mSh mn hanSim hzbaim : othi mHzt hedh mn hzan SlS maot alp oSlSim alp Sbet alpim oHmS maot : obqr SSh oSlSim alp : oHmrim SlSim alp oHmS maot : onpS adm SSh eSr alp : oiqH mSh mmHzt bni iSral at haHc aHd mn hHmSim mn hadm omn hbhmh oitn atm lloim Smri mSmrt mSkn ihoh kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqrbo al mSh hpqdim aSr lalpi hzba Sri halpim oSri hmaot : oiamro al mSh ebdik nSao at raS anSi hmlHmh aSr bidno ola npqd mmno aiS : onqrb at qrbn ihoh aiS aSr mza kli chb azedh ozmid Tbet egil okomc lkpr el npStino lpni ihoh : oiqH mSh oalecr hkhn at hchb matm kl kli meSh : oihi kl chb htromh aSr hrimo lihoh SSh eSr alp Sbe maot oHmSim Sql mat Sri halpim omat Sri hmaot : anSi hzba bcco aiS lo : oiqH mSh oalecr hkhn at hchb mat Sri halpim ohmaot oibao ato al ahl moed ckron lbni iSral lpni ihoh :

32

omqnh rb hih lbni raobn olbni gd ezom mad oirao at arz iecr oat arz gled ohnh hmqom mqom mqnh : oibao bni gd obni raobn oiamro al mSh oal alecr hkhn oal nSiai hedh lamr : eTrot odibn oiecr onmrh oHSbon oalelh oSbm onbo oben : harz aSr hkh ihoh lpni edt iSral arz mqnh hoa olebdik mqnh : oiamro am mzano Hn beinik itn at harz hcat lebdik laHch al tebrno at hirdn : oiamr mSh lbni gd olbni raobn haHikm ibao lmlHmh oatm tSbo ph : olmh tnoaon at lb bni iSral mebr al harz aSr ntn lhm ihoh : kh eSo abtikm bSlHi atm mqdS brne lraot at harz : oielo ed nHl aSkol oirao at harz oiniao at lb bni iSral lblti ba al harz aSr ntn lhm ihoh : oiHr ap ihoh biom hhoa oiSbe lamr : am irao hanSim helim mmzrim mbn eSrim Snh omelh at hadmh aSr nSbeti labrhm lizHq olieqb ki la mlao aHri : blti klb bn ipnh hqnci oihoSe bn non ki mlao aHri ihoh : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oinem bmdbr arbeim Snh ed tm kl hdor heSh hre beini ihoh : ohnh qmtm tHt abtikm trbot anSim HTaim lspot eod el Hron ap ihoh al iSral : ki tSobn maHrio oisp eod lhniHo bmdbr oSHtm lkl hem hch : oigSo alio oiamro gdrt zan nbnh lmqnno ph oerim lTpno : oanHno nHlz HSim lpni bni iSral ed aSr am hbianm al mqomm oiSb Tpno beri hmbzr mpni iSbi harz : la nSob al btino ed htnHl bni iSral aiS nHlto : ki la nnHl atm mebr lirdn ohlah ki bah nHltno alino mebr hirdn mcrHh : oiamr alihm mSh am teSon at hdbr hch am tHlzo lpni ihoh lmlHmh : oebr lkm kl Hloz at hirdn lpni ihoh ed horiSo at aibio mpnio : onkbSh harz lpni ihoh oaHr tSbo ohiitm nqiim mihoh omiSral ohith harz hcat lkm laHch lpni ihoh : oam la teSon kn hnh HTatm lihoh odeo HTatkm aSr tmza atkm : bno lkm erim lTpkm ogdrt lznakm ohiza mpikm teSo : oiamr bni gd obni raobn al mSh lamr ebdik ieSo kaSr adni mzoh : Tpno nSino mqnno okl bhmtno ihio Sm beri hgled : oebdik iebro kl Hloz zba lpni ihoh lmlHmh kaSr adni dbr : oizo lhm mSh at alecr hkhn oat ihoSe bn non oat raSi abot hmTot lbni iSral : oiamr mSh alhm am iebro bni gd obni raobn atkm at hirdn kl Hloz lmlHmh lpni ihoh onkbSh harz lpnikm onttm lhm at arz hgled laHch : oam la iebro Hlozim atkm onaHco btkkm barz knen : oieno bni gd obni raobn lamr at aSr dbr ihoh al ebdik kn neSh : nHno nebr Hlozim lpni ihoh arz knen oatno aHct nHltno mebr lirdn : oitn lhm mSh lbni gd olbni raobn olHzi SbT mnSh bn iosp at mmlkt siHn mlk hamri oat mmlkt eog mlk hbSn harz lerih bgblt eri harz sbib : oibno bni gd at dibn oat eTrt oat erer : oat eTrt Sopn oat iecr oigbhh : oat bit nmrh oat bit hrn eri mbzr ogdrt zan : obni raobn bno at HSbon oat alela oat qritim : oat nbo oat bel meon mosbt Sm oat Sbmh oiqrao bSmt at Smot herim aSr bno : oilko bni mkir bn mnSh gledh oilkdh oiorS at hamri aSr bh : oitn mSh at hgled lmkir bn mnSh oiSb bh : oiair bn mnSh hlk oilkd at Hotihm oiqra athn Hot iair : onbH hlk oilkd at qnt oat bntih oiqra lh nbH bSmo :

33

alh msei bni iSral aSr izao marz mzrim lzbatm bid mSh oahrn : oiktb mSh at mozaihm lmseihm el pi ihoh oalh mseihm lmozaihm : oiseo mremss bHdS hraSon bHmSh eSr iom lHdS hraSon mmHrt hpsH izao bni iSral bid rmh leini kl mzrim : omzrim mqbrim at aSr hkh ihoh bhm kl bkor obalhihm eSh ihoh SpTim : oiseo bni iSral mremss oiHno bskt : oiseo mskt oiHno batm aSr bqzh hmdbr : oiseo matm oiSb el pi hHirt aSr el pni bel zpon oiHno lpni mgdl : oiseo mpni hHirt oiebro btok him hmdbrh oilko drk SlSt imim bmdbr atm oiHno bmrh : oiseo mmrh oibao ailmh obailm Stim eSrh eint mim oSbeim tmrim oiHno Sm : oiseo mailm oiHno el im sop : oiseo mim sop oiHno bmdbr sin : oiseo mmdbr sin oiHno bdpqh : oiseo mdpqh oiHno baloS : oiseo maloS oiHno brpidm ola hih Sm mim lem lStot : oiseo mrpidm oiHno bmdbr sini
