: oiseo mmdbr sini oiHno bqbrt htaoh : oiseo mqbrt htaoh oiHno bHzrt : oiseo mHzrt oiHno brtmh : oiseo mrtmh oiHno brmn prz : oiseo mrmn prz oiHno blbnh : oiseo mlbnh oiHno brsh : oiseo mrsh oiHno bqhlth : oiseo mqhlth oiHno bhr Spr : oiseo mhr Spr oiHno bHrdh : oiseo mHrdh oiHno bmqhlt : oiseo mmqhlt oiHno btHt : oiseo mtHt oiHno btrH : oiseo mtrH oiHno bmtqh : oiseo mmtqh oiHno bHSmnh : oiseo mHSmnh oiHno bmsrot : oiseo mmsrot oiHno bbni ieqn : oiseo mbni ieqn oiHno bHr hgdgd : oiseo mHr hgdgd oiHno biTbth : oiseo miTbth oiHno bebrnh : oiseo mebrnh oiHno bezion gbr : oiseo mezion gbr oiHno bmdbr zn hoa qdS : oiseo mqdS oiHno bhr hhr bqzh arz adom : oiel ahrn hkhn al hr hhr el pi ihoh oimt Sm bSnt harbeim lzat bni iSral marz mzrim bHdS hHmiSi baHd lHdS : oahrn bn SlS oeSrim omat Snh bmto bhr hhr : oiSme hkneni mlk erd ohoa iSb bngb barz knen bba bni iSral : oiseo mhr hhr oiHno bzlmnh : oiseo mzlmnh oiHno bponn : oiseo mponn oiHno babt : oiseo mabt oiHno beii hebrim bgbol moab : oiseo meiim oiHno bdibn gd : oiseo mdibn gd oiHno belmn dbltimh : oiseo melmn dbltimh oiHno bhri hebrim lpni nbo : oiseo mhri hebrim oiHno berbt moab el irdn irHo : oiHno el hirdn mbit hiSmt ed abl hSTim berbt moab : oidbr ihoh al mSh berbt moab el irdn irHo lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki atm ebrim at hirdn al arz knen : ohorStm at kl iSbi harz mpnikm oabdtm at kl mSkitm oat kl zlmi msktm tabdo oat kl bmtm tSmido : ohorStm at harz oiSbtm bh ki lkm ntti at harz lrSt ath : ohtnHltm at harz bgorl lmSpHtikm lrb trbo at nHlto olmeT tmeiT at nHlto al aSr iza lo Smh hgorl lo ihih lmTot abtikm ttnHlo : oam la toriSo at iSbi harz mpnikm ohih aSr totiro mhm lSkim beinikm olzninm bzdikm ozrro atkm el harz aSr atm iSbim bh : ohih kaSr dmiti leSot lhm aeSh lkm :

34

oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : zo at bni iSral oamrt alhm ki atm baim al harz knen cat harz aSr tpl lkm bnHlh arz knen lgbltih : ohih lkm pat ngb mmdbr zn el idi adom ohih lkm gbol ngb mqzh im hmlH qdmh : onsb lkm hgbol mngb lmelh eqrbim oebr znh ohih tozatio mngb lqdS brne oiza Hzr adr oebr ezmnh : onsb hgbol mezmon nHlh mzrim ohio tozatio himh : ogbol im ohih lkm him hgdol ogbol ch ihih lkm gbol im : och ihih lkm gbol zpon mn him hgdl ttao lkm hr hhr : mhr hhr ttao lba Hmt ohio tozat hgbl zddh : oiza hgbl cprnh ohio tozatio Hzr einn ch ihih lkm gbol zpon : ohtaoitm lkm lgbol qdmh mHzr einn Spmh : oird hgbl mSpm hrblh mqdm lein oird hgbol omHh el ktp im knrt qdmh : oird hgbol hirdnh ohio tozatio im hmlH cat thih lkm harz lgbltih sbib : oizo mSh at bni iSral lamr cat harz aSr ttnHlo ath bgorl aSr zoh ihoh ltt ltSet hmTot oHzi hmTh : ki lqHo mTh bni hraobni lbit abtm omTh bni hgdi lbit abtm oHzi mTh mnSh lqHo nHltm : Sni hmTot oHzi hmTh lqHo nHltm mebr lirdn irHo qdmh mcrHh : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : alh Smot hanSim aSr inHlo lkm at harz alecr hkhn oihoSe bn non : onSia aHd nSia aHd mmTh tqHo lnHl at harz : oalh Smot hanSim lmTh ihodh klb bn ipnh : olmTh bni Smeon Smoal bn emihod : lmTh bnimn alidd bn kslon : olmTh bni dn nSia bqi bn igli : lbni iosp lmTh bni mnSh nSia Hnial bn apd : olmTh bni aprim nSia qmoal bn SpTn : olmTh bni cboln nSia alizpn bn prnk : olmTh bni iSSkr nSia plTial bn ecn : olmTh bni aSr nSia aHihod bn Slmi : olmTh bni nptli nSia pdhal bn emihod : alh aSr zoh ihoh lnHl at bni iSral barz knen :

35

oidbr ihoh al mSh berbt moab el irdn irHo lamr : zo at bni iSral ontno lloim mnHlt aHctm erim lSbt omgrS lerim sbibtihm ttno lloim : ohio herim lhm lSbt omgrSihm ihio lbhmtm olrkSm olkl Hitm : omgrSi herim aSr ttno lloim mqir heir oHozh alp amh sbib : omdtm mHoz leir at pat qdmh alpim bamh oat pat ngb alpim bamh oat pat im alpim bamh oat pat zpon alpim bamh oheir btok ch ihih lhm mgrSi herim : oat herim aSr ttno lloim at SS eri hmqlT aSr ttno lns Smh hrzH oelihm ttno arbeim oStim eir : kl herim aSr ttno lloim arbeim oSmnh eir athn oat mgrSihn : oherim aSr ttno maHct bni iSral mat hrb trbo omat hmeT tmeiTo aiS kpi nHlto aSr inHlo itn merio lloim : oidbr ihoh al mSh lamr : dbr al bni iSral oamrt alhm ki atm ebrim at hirdn arzh knen : ohqritm lkm erim eri mqlT thiinh lkm ons Smh rzH mkh npS bSggh : ohio lkm herim lmqlT mgal ola imot hrzH ed emdo lpni hedh lmSpT : oherim aSr ttno SS eri mqlT thiinh lkm : at SlS herim ttno mebr lirdn oat SlS herim ttno barz knen eri mqlT thiinh : lbni iSral olgr oltoSb btokm thiinh SS herim halh lmqlT lnos Smh kl mkh npS bSggh : oam bkli brcl hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH : oam babn id aSr imot bh hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH : ao bkli ez id aSr imot bo hkho oimt rzH hoa mot iomt hrzH : gal hdm hoa imit at hrzH bpgeo bo hoa imitno : oam bSnah ihdpno ao hSlik elio bzdih oimt : ao baibh hkho bido oimt mot iomt hmkh rzH hoa gal hdm imit at hrzH bpgeo bo : oam bpte bla aibh hdpo ao hSlik elio kl kli bla zdih : ao bkl abn aSr imot bh bla raot oipl elio oimt ohoa la aoib lo ola mbqS reto : oSpTo hedh bin hmkh obin gal hdm el hmSpTim halh : ohzilo hedh at hrzH mid gal hdm ohSibo ato hedh al eir mqlTo aSr ns Smh oiSb bh ed mot hkhn hgdl aSr mSH ato bSmn hqdS : oam iza iza hrzH at gbol eir mqlTo aSr inos Smh : omza ato gal hdm mHoz lgbol eir mqlTo orzH gal hdm at hrzH ain lo dm : ki beir mqlTo iSb ed mot hkhn hgdl oaHri mot hkhn hgdl iSob hrzH al arz aHcto : ohio alh lkm lHqt mSpT ldrtikm bkl moSbtikm : kl mkh npS lpi edim irzH at hrzH oed aHd la ienh bnpS lmot : ola tqHo kpr lnpS rzH aSr hoa rSe lmot ki mot iomt : ola tqHo kpr lnos al eir mqlTo lSob lSbt barz ed mot hkhn : ola tHnipo at harz aSr atm bh ki hdm hoa iHnip at harz olarz la ikpr ldm aSr Spk bh ki am bdm Spko : ola tTma at harz aSr atm iSbim bh aSr ani Skn btokh ki ani ihoh Skn btok bni iSral :

36

oiqrbo raSi habot lmSpHt bni gled bn mkir bn mnSh mmSpHt bni iosp oidbro lpni mSh olpni hnSaim raSi abot lbni iSral : oiamro at adni zoh ihoh ltt at harz bnHlh bgorl lbni iSral oadni zoh bihoh ltt at nHlt zlpHd aHino lbntio : ohio laHd mbni SbTi bni iSral lnSim ongreh nHltn mnHlt abtino onosp el nHlt hmTh aSr thiinh lhm omgrl nHltno igre : oam ihih hibl lbni iSral onosph nHltn el nHlt hmTh aSr thiinh lhm omnHlt mTh abtino igre nHltn : oizo mSh at bni iSral el pi ihoh lamr kn mTh bni iosp dbrim : ch hdbr aSr zoh ihoh lbnot zlpHd lamr lTob beinihm thiinh lnSim ak lmSpHt mTh abihm thiinh lnSim : ola tsb nHlh lbni iSral mmTh al mTh ki aiS bnHlt mTh abtio idbqo bni iSral : okl bt irSt nHlh mmTot bni iSral laHd mmSpHt mTh abih thih laSh lmen iirSo bni iSral aiS nHlt abtio : ola tsb nHlh mmTh lmTh aHr ki aiS bnHlto idbqo mTot bni iSral : kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bnot zlpHd : othiinh mHlh trzh oHglh omlkh oneh bnot zlpHd lbni ddihn lnSim : mmSpHt bni mnSh bn iosp hio lnSim othi nHltn el mTh mSpHt abihn : alh hmzot ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh al bni iSral berbt moab el irdn irHo :

dbrim

1

alh hdbrim aSr dbr mSh al kl iSral bebr hirdn bmdbr berbh mol sop bin parn obin tpl olbn oHzrt odi chb : aHd eSr iom mHrb drk hr Seir ed qdS brne : oihi barbeim Snh beSti eSr HdS baHd lHdS dbr mSh al bni iSral kkl aSr zoh ihoh ato alhm : aHri hkto at siHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon oat eog mlk hbSn aSr ioSb beStrt badrei : bebr hirdn barz moab hoail mSh bar at htorh hcat lamr : ihoh alhino dbr alino bHrb lamr rb lkm Sbt bhr hch : pno oseo lkm obao hr hamri oal kl Sknio berbh bhr obSplh obngb obHop him arz hkneni ohlbnon ed hnhr hgdl nhr prt : rah ntti lpnikm at harz bao orSo at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lhm olcrem aHrihm : oamr alkm bet hhoa lamr la aokl lbdi Sat atkm : ihoh alhikm hrbh atkm ohnkm hiom kkokbi hSmim lrb : ihoh alhi abotkm isp elikm kkm alp pemim oibrk atkm kaSr dbr lkm : aikh aSa lbdi TrHkm omSakm oribkm : hbo lkm anSim Hkmim onbnim oideim lSbTikm oaSimm braSikm : oteno ati otamro Tob hdbr aSr dbrt leSot : oaqH at raSi SbTikm anSim Hkmim oideim oatn atm raSim elikm Sri alpim oSri maot oSri HmSim oSri eSrt oSTrim lSbTikm : oazoh at SpTikm bet hhoa lamr Sme bin aHikm oSpTtm zdq bin aiS obin aHio obin gro : la tkiro pnim bmSpT kqTn kgdl tSmeon la tgoro mpni aiS ki hmSpT lalhim hoa ohdbr aSr iqSh mkm tqrbon ali oSmetio : oazoh atkm bet hhoa at kl hdbrim aSr teSon : onse mHrb onlk at kl hmdbr hgdol ohnora hhoa aSr raitm drk hr hamri kaSr zoh ihoh alhino atno onba ed qdS brne : oamr alkm batm ed hr hamri aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno : rah ntn ihoh alhik lpnik at harz elh rS kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk al tira oal tHt : otqrbon ali klkm otamro nSlHh anSim lpnino oiHpro lno at harz oiSbo atno dbr at hdrk aSr nelh bh oat herim aSr nba alihn : oiiTb beini hdbr oaqH mkm Snim eSr anSim aiS aHd lSbT : oipno oielo hhrh oibao ed nHl aSkl oirglo ath : oiqHo bidm mpri harz oiordo alino oiSbo atno dbr oiamro Tobh harz aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno : ola abitm lelt otmro at pi ihoh alhikm : otrgno bahlikm otamro bSnat ihoh atno hoziano marz mzrim ltt atno bid hamri lhSmidno : anh anHno elim aHino hmso at lbbno lamr em gdol orm mmno erim gdlt obzort bSmim ogm bni enqim raino Sm : oamr alkm la terzon ola tiraon mhm : ihoh alhikm hhlk lpnikm hoa ilHm lkm kkl aSr eSh atkm bmzrim leinikm : obmdbr aSr rait aSr nSak ihoh alhik kaSr iSa aiS at bno bkl hdrk aSr hlktm ed bakm ed hmqom hch : obdbr hch ainkm maminm bihoh alhikm : hhlk lpnikm bdrk ltor lkm mqom lHntkm baS lilh lratkm bdrk aSr tlko bh obenn iomm : oiSme ihoh at qol dbrikm oiqzp oiSbe lamr : am irah aiS banSim halh hdor hre hch at harz hTobh aSr nSbeti ltt labtikm : colti klb bn ipnh hoa iranh olo atn at harz aSr drk bh olbnio ien aSr mla aHri ihoh : gm bi htanp ihoh bgllkm lamr gm ath la tba Sm : ihoSe bn non hemd lpnik hoa iba Smh ato Hcq ki hoa inHlnh at iSral : oTpkm aSr amrtm lbc ihih obnikm aSr la ideo hiom Tob ore hmh ibao Smh olhm atnnh ohm iirSoh : oatm pno lkm oseo hmdbrh drk im sop : oteno otamro ali HTano lihoh anHno nelh onlHmno kkl aSr zono ihoh alhino otHgro aiS at kli mlHmto othino lelt hhrh : oiamr ihoh ali amr lhm la telo ola tlHmo ki ainni bqrbkm ola tngpo lpni aibikm : oadbr alikm ola Smetm otmro at pi ihoh otcdo otelo hhrh : oiza hamri hiSb bhr hhoa lqratkm oirdpo atkm kaSr teSinh hdbrim oikto atkm bSeir ed Hrmh : otSbo otbko lpni ihoh ola Sme ihoh bqlkm ola hacin alikm : otSbo bqdS imim rbim kimim aSr iSbtm :

2

onpn onse hmdbrh drk im sop kaSr dbr ihoh ali onsb at hr Seir imim rbim : oiamr ihoh ali lamr : rb lkm sb at hhr hch pno lkm zpnh : oat hem zo lamr atm ebrim bgbol aHikm bni eSo hiSbim bSeir oiirao mkm onSmrtm mad : al ttgro bm ki la atn lkm marzm ed mdrk kp rgl ki irSh leSo ntti at hr Seir : akl tSbro matm bksp oakltm ogm mim tkro matm bksp oStitm : ki ihoh alhik brkk bkl meSh idk ide lktk at hmdbr hgdl hch ch arbeim Snh ihoh alhik emk la Hsrt dbr : onebr mat aHino bni eSo hiSbim bSeir mdrk herbh mailt omezin gbr onpn onebr drk mdbr moab : oiamr ihoh ali al tzr at moab oal ttgr bm mlHmh ki la atn lk marzo irSh ki lbni loT ntti at er irSh : hamim lpnim iSbo bh em gdol orb orm kenqim : rpaim iHSbo ap hm kenqim ohmabim iqrao lhm amim : obSeir iSbo hHrim lpnim obni eSo iirSom oiSmidom mpnihm oiSbo tHtm kaSr eSh iSral larz irSto aSr ntn ihoh lhm : eth qmo oebro lkm at nHl crd onebr at nHl crd : ohimim aSr hlkno mqdS brne ed aSr ebrno at nHl crd SlSim oSmnh Snh ed tm kl hdor anSi hmlHmh mqrb hmHnh kaSr nSbe ihoh lhm : ogm id ihoh hith bm lhmm mqrb hmHnh ed tmm : oihi kaSr tmo kl anSi hmlHmh lmot mqrb hem : oidbr ihoh ali lamr : ath ebr hiom at gbol moab at er : oqrbt mol bni emon al tzrm oal ttgr bm ki la atn marz bni emon lk irSh ki lbni loT nttih irSh : arz rpaim tHSb ap hoa rpaim iSbo bh lpnim ohemnim iqrao lhm cmcmim : em gdol orb orm kenqim oiSmidm ihoh mpnihm oiirSm oiSbo tHtm : kaSr eSh lbni eSo hiSbim bSeir aSr hSmid at hHri mpnihm oiirSm oiSbo tHtm ed hiom hch : oheoim hiSbim bHzrim ed ech kptrim hizaim mkptor hSmidm oiSbo tHtm : qomo seo oebro at nHl arnn rah ntti bidk at siHn mlk HSbon hamri oat arzo hHl rS ohtgr bo mlHmh : hiom hch aHl tt pHdk oiratk el pni hemim tHt kl hSmim aSr iSmeon Smek orgco oHlo mpnik : oaSlH mlakim mmdbr qdmot al siHon mlk HSbon dbri Slom lamr : aebrh barzk bdrk bdrk alk la asor imin oSmaol : akl bksp tSbrni oaklti omim bksp ttn li oStiti rq aebrh brgli : kaSr eSo li bni eSo hiSbim bSeir ohmoabim hiSbim ber ed aSr aebr at hirdn al harz aSr ihoh alhino ntn lno : ola abh siHn mlk HSbon hebrno bo ki hqSh ihoh alhik at roHo oamz at lbbo lmen tto bidk kiom hch : oiamr ihoh ali rah hHlti tt lpnik at siHn oat arzo hHl rS lrSt at arzo : oiza siHn lqratno hoa okl emo lmlHmh ihzh : oitnho ihoh alhino lpnino onk ato oat bno oat kl emo : onlkd at kl erio bet hhoa onHrm at kl eir mtm ohnSim ohTp la hSarno Srid : rq hbhmh bccno lno oSll herim aSr lkdno : merer aSr el Spt nHl arnn oheir aSr bnHl oed hgled la hith qrih aSr Sgbh mmno at hkl ntn ihoh alhino lpnino : rq al arz bni emon la qrbt kl id nHl ibq oeri hhr okl aSr zoh ihoh alhino :

3

onpn onel drk hbSn oiza eog mlk hbSn lqratno hoa okl emo lmlHmh adrei : oiamr ihoh ali al tira ato ki bidk ntti ato oat kl emo oat arzo oeSit lo kaSr eSit lsiHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon : oitn ihoh alhino bidno gm at eog mlk hbSn oat kl emo onkho ed blti hSair lo Srid : onlkd at kl erio bet hhoa la hith qrih aSr la lqHno matm SSim eir kl Hbl argb mmlkt eog bbSn : kl alh erim bzrot Homh gbhh dltim obriH lbd meri hprci hrbh mad : onHrm aotm kaSr eSino lsiHn mlk HSbon hHrm kl eir mtm hnSim ohTp : okl hbhmh oSll herim bcono lno : onqH bet hhoa at harz mid Sni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn mnHl arnn ed hr Hrmon : zidnim iqrao lHrmon Srin ohamri iqrao lo Snir : kl eri hmiSr okl hgled okl hbSn ed slkh oadrei eri mmlkt eog bbSn : ki rq eog mlk hbSn nSar mitr hrpaim hnh erSo erS brcl hlh hoa brbt bni emon tSe amot arkh oarbe amot rHbh bamt aiS : oat harz hcat irSno bet hhoa merer aSr el nHl arnn oHzi hr hgled oerio ntti lraobni olgdi : oitr hgled okl hbSn mmlkt eog ntti lHzi SbT hmnSh kl Hbl hargb lkl hbSn hhoa iqra arz rpaim : iair bn mnSh lqH at kl Hbl argb ed gbol hgSori ohmekti oiqra atm el Smo at hbSn Hot iair ed hiom hch : olmkir ntti at hgled : olraobni olgdi ntti mn hgled oed nHl arnn tok hnHl ogbl oed ibq hnHl gbol bni emon : oherbh ohirdn ogbl mknrt oed im herbh im hmlH tHt aSdt hpsgh mcrHh : oazo atkm bet hhoa lamr ihoh alhikm ntn lkm at harz hcat lrSth Hlozim tebro lpni aHikm bni iSral kl bni Hil : rq nSikm oTpkm omqnkm ideti ki mqnh rb lkm iSbo berikm aSr ntti lkm : ed aSr iniH ihoh laHikm kkm oirSo gm hm at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lhm bebr hirdn oSbtm aiS lirSto aSr ntti lkm : oat ihoSoe zoiti bet hhoa lamr einik hrat at kl aSr eSh ihoh alhikm lSni hmlkim halh kn ieSh ihoh lkl hmmlkot aSr ath ebr Smh : la tiraom ki ihoh alhikm hoa hnlHm lkm : oatHnn al ihoh bet hhoa lamr : adni ihoh ath hHlot lhraot at ebdk at gdlk oat idk hHcqh aSr mi al bSmim obarz aSr ieSh kmeSik okgbortk : aebrh na oarah at harz hTobh aSr bebr hirdn hhr hTob hch ohlbnon : oitebr ihoh bi lmenkm ola Sme ali oiamr ihoh ali rb lk al tosp dbr ali eod bdbr hch : elh raS hpsgh oSa einik imh ozpnh otimnh omcrHh orah beinik ki la tebr at hirdn hch : ozo at ihoSe oHcqho oamzho ki hoa iebr lpni hem hch ohoa inHil aotm at harz aSr trah : onSb bgia mol bit peor :

4

oeth iSral Sme al hHqim oal hmSpTim aSr anki mlmd atkm leSot lmen tHio obatm oirStm at harz aSr ihoh alhi abtikm ntn lkm : la tspo el hdbr aSr anki mzoh atkm ola tgreo mmno lSmr at mzot ihoh alhikm aSr anki mzoh atkm : einikm hrat at aSr eSh ihoh bbel peor ki kl haiS aSr hlk aHri bel peor hSmido ihoh alhik mqrbk : oatm hdbqim bihoh alhikm Hiim klkm hiom : rah lmdti atkm Hqim omSpTim kaSr zoni ihoh alhi leSot kn bqrb harz aSr atm baim Smh lrSth : oSmrtm oeSitm ki hoa Hkmtkm obintkm leini hemim aSr iSmeon at kl hHqim halh oamro rq em Hkm onbon hgoi hgdol hch : ki mi goi gdol aSr lo alhim qrbim alio kihoh alhino bkl qrano alio : omi goi gdol aSr lo Hqim omSpTim zdiqm kkl htorh hcat aSr anki ntn lpnikm hiom : rq hSmr lk oSmr npSk mad pn tSkH at hdbrim aSr rao einik opn isoro mlbbk kl imi Hiik ohodetm lbnik olbni bnik : iom aSr emdt lpni ihoh alhik bHrb bamr ihoh ali hqhl li at hem oaSmem at dbri aSr ilmdon lirah ati kl himim aSr hm Hiim el hadmh oat bnihm ilmdon : otqrbon otemdon tHt hhr ohhr ber baS ed lb hSmim HSk enn oerpl : oidbr ihoh alikm mtok haS qol dbrim atm Smeim otmonh ainkm raim colti qol : oigd lkm at brito aSr zoh atkm leSot eSrt hdbrim oiktbm el Sni lHot abnim : oati zoh ihoh bet hhoa llmd atkm Hqim omSpTim leStkm atm barz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth : onSmrtm mad lnpStikm ki la raitm kl tmonh biom dbr ihoh alikm bHrb mtok haS : pn tSHton oeSitm lkm psl tmont kl sml tbnit ckr ao nqbh : tbnit kl bhmh aSr barz tbnit kl zpor knp aSr teop bSmim : tbnit kl rmS badmh tbnit kl dgh aSr bmim mtHt larz : opn tSa einik hSmimh orait at hSmS oat hirH oat hkokbim kl zba hSmim ondHt ohStHoit lhm oebdtm aSr Hlq ihoh alhik atm lkl hemim tHt kl hSmim : oatkm lqH ihoh oioza atkm mkor hbrcl mmzrim lhiot lo lem nHlh kiom hch : oihoh htanp bi el dbrikm oiSbe lblti ebri at hirdn olblti ba al harz hTobh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh : ki anki mt barz hcat ainni ebr at hirdn oatm ebrim oirStm at harz hTobh hcat : hSmro lkm pn tSkHo at brit ihoh alhikm aSr krt emkm oeSitm lkm psl tmont kl aSr zok ihoh alhik : ki ihoh alhik aS aklh hoa al qna : ki tolid bnim obni bnim onoSntm barz ohSHtm oeSitm psl tmont kl oeSitm hre beini ihoh alhik lhkeiso : heidti bkm hiom at hSmim oat harz ki abd tabdon mhr mel harz aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth la tarikn imim elih ki hSmd tSmdon : ohpiz ihoh atkm bemim onSartm mti mspr bgoim aSr inhg ihoh atkm Smh : oebdtm Sm alhim meSh idi adm ez oabn aSr la iraon ola iSmeon ola iaklon ola iriHn : obqStm mSm at ihoh alhik omzat ki tdrSno bkl lbbk obkl npSk : bzr lk omzaok kl hdbrim halh baHrit himim oSbt ed ihoh alhik oSmet bqlo : ki al rHom ihoh alhik la irpk ola iSHitk ola iSkH at brit abtik aSr nSbe lhm : ki Sal na limim raSnim aSr hio lpnik lmn hiom aSr bra alhim adm el harz olmqzh hSmim oed qzh hSmim hnhih kdbr hgdol hch ao hnSme kmho : hSme em qol alhim mdbr mtok haS kaSr Smet ath oiHi : ao hnsh alhim lboa lqHt lo goi mqrb goi bmst batt obmoptim obmlHmh obid Hcqh obcroe nToih obmoraim gdlim kkl aSr eSh lkm ihoh alhikm bmzrim leinik : ath hrat ldet ki ihoh hoa halhim ain eod mlbdo : mn hSmim hSmiek at qlo lisrk oel harz hrak at aSo hgdolh odbrio Smet mtok haS : otHt ki ahb at abtik oibHr bcreo aHrio oiozak bpnio bkHo hgdl mmzrim : lhoriS goim gdlim oezmim mmk mpnik lhbiak ltt lk at arzm nHlh kiom hch : oidet hiom ohSbt al lbbk ki ihoh hoa halhim bSmim mmel oel harz mtHt ain eod : oSmrt at Hqio oat mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom aSr iiTb lk olbnik aHrik olmen tarik imim el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk kl himim : ac ibdil mSh SlS erim bebr hirdn mcrHh SmS : lns Smh rozH aSr irzH at reho bbli det ohoa la Sna lo mtmol SlSom ons al aHt mn herim hal oHi : at bzr bmdbr barz hmiSr lraobni oat ramt bgled lgdi oat goln bbSn lmnSi : ocat htorh aSr Sm mSh lpni bni iSral : alh hedt ohHqim ohmSpTim aSr dbr mSh al bni iSral bzatm mmzrim : bebr hirdn bgia mol bit peor barz siHn mlk hamri aSr ioSb bHSbon aSr hkh mSh obni iSral bzatm mmzrim : oiirSo at arzo oat arz eog mlk hbSn Sni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn mcrH SmS : merer aSr el Spt nHl arnn oed hr Sian hoa Hrmon : okl herbh ebr hirdn mcrHh oed im herbh tHt aSdt hpsgh :

5

oiqra mSh al kl iSral oiamr alhm Sme iSral at hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr anki dbr bacnikm hiom olmdtm atm oSmrtm leStm : ihoh alhino krt emno brit bHrb : la at abtino krt ihoh at hbrit hcat ki atno anHno alh ph hiom klno Hiim : pnim bpnim dbr ihoh emkm bhr mtok haS : anki emd bin ihoh obinikm bet hhoa lhgid lkm at dbr ihoh ki iratm mpni haS ola elitm bhr lamr : anki ihoh alhik aSr hozatik marz mzrim mbit ebdim : la ihih lk alhim aHrim el pni : la teSh lk psl kl tmonh aSr bSmim mmel oaSr barz mtHt oaSr bmim mtHt larz : la tStHoh lhm ola tebdm ki anki ihoh alhik al qna pqd eon abot el bnim oel SlSim oel rbeim lSnai : oeSh Hsd lalpim lahbi olSmri mzoto : la tSa at Sm ihoh alhik lSoa ki la inqh ihoh at aSr iSa at Smo lSoa : Smor at iom hSbt lqdSo kaSr zok ihoh alhik : SSt imim tebd oeSit kl mlaktk : oiom hSbiei Sbt lihoh alhik la teSh kl mlakh ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk oSork oHmrk okl bhmtk ogrk aSr bSerik lmen inoH ebdk oamtk kmok : ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim oizak ihoh alhik mSm bid Hcqh obcre nToih el kn zok ihoh alhik leSot at iom hSbt : kbd at abik oat amk kaSr zok ihoh alhik lmen iarikn imik olmen iiTb lk el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : la trzH : ola tnap : ola tgnb : ola tenh brek ed Soa : ola tHmd aSt rek ola ttaoh bit rek Sdho oebdo oamto Soro oHmro okl aSr lrek : at hdbrim halh dbr ihoh al kl qhlkm bhr mtok haS henn oherpl qol gdol ola isp oiktbm el Sni lHt abnim oitnm ali : oihi kSmekm at hqol mtok hHSk ohhr ber baS otqrbon ali kl raSi SbTikm ocqnikm : otamro hn hrano ihoh alhino at kbdo oat gdlo oat qlo Smeno mtok haS hiom hch raino ki idbr alhim at hadm oHi : oeth lmh nmot ki taklno haS hgdlh hcat am ispim anHno lSme at qol ihoh alhino eod omtno : ki mi kl bSr aSr Sme qol alhim Hiim mdbr mtok haS kmno oiHi : qrb ath oSme at kl aSr iamr ihoh alhino oat tdbr alino at kl aSr idbr ihoh alhino alik oSmeno oeSino : oiSme ihoh at qol dbrikm bdbrkm ali oiamr ihoh ali Smeti at qol dbri hem hch aSr dbro alik hiTibo kl aSr dbro : mi itn ohih lbbm ch lhm lirah ati olSmr at kl mzoti kl himim lmen iiTb lhm olbnihm lelm : lk amr lhm Sobo lkm lahlikm : oath ph emd emdi oadbrh alik at kl hmzoh ohHqim ohmSpTim aSr tlmdm oeSo barz aSr anki ntn lhm lrSth : oSmrtm leSot kaSr zoh ihoh alhikm atkm la tsro imin oSmal : bkl hdrk aSr zoh ihoh alhikm atkm tlko lmen tHion oTob lkm oharktm imim barz aSr tirSon :

6

ocat hmzoh hHqim ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh alhikm llmd atkm leSot barz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth : lmen tira at ihoh alhik lSmr at kl Hqtio omzotio aSr anki mzok ath obnk obn bnk kl imi Hiik olmen iarkn imik : oSmet iSral oSmrt leSot aSr iiTb lk oaSr trbon mad kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk arz cbt Hlb odbS : Sme iSral ihoh alhino ihoh aHd : oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl madk : ohio hdbrim halh aSr anki mzok hiom el lbbk : oSnntm lbnik odbrt bm bSbtk bbitk oblktk bdrk obSkbk obqomk : oqSrtm laot el idk ohio lTTpt bin einik : oktbtm el mcoct bitk obSerik : ohih ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr nSbe labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lk erim gdlt oTbt aSr la bnit : obtim mlaim kl Tob aSr la mlat obrt Hzobim aSr la Hzbt krmim ocitim aSr la nTet oaklt oSbet : hSmr lk pn tSkH at ihoh aSr hoziak marz mzrim mbit ebdim : at ihoh alhik tira oato tebd obSmo tSbe : la tlkon aHri alhim aHrim malhi hemim aSr sbibotikm : ki al qna ihoh alhik bqrbk pn iHrh ap ihoh alhik bk ohSmidk mel pni hadmh : la tnso at ihoh alhikm kaSr nsitm bmsh : Smor tSmron at mzot ihoh alhikm oedtio oHqio aSr zok : oeSit hiSr ohTob beini ihoh lmen iiTb lk obat oirSt at harz hTbh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik : lhdp at kl aibik mpnik kaSr dbr ihoh : ki iSalk bnk mHr lamr mh hedt ohHqim ohmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh alhino atkm : oamrt lbnk ebdim hiino lpreh bmzrim oioziano ihoh mmzrim bid Hcqh : oitn ihoh aott omptim gdlim oreim bmzrim bpreh obkl bito leinino : oaotno hozia mSm lmen hbia atno ltt lno at harz aSr nSbe labtino : oizono ihoh leSot at kl hHqim halh lirah at ihoh alhino lTob lno kl himim lHitno khiom hch : ozdqh thih lno ki nSmr leSot at kl hmzoh hcat lpni ihoh alhino kaSr zono :

7

ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth onSl goim rbim mpnik hHti ohgrgSi ohamri ohkneni ohprci ohHoi ohibosi Sbeh goim rbim oezomim mmk : ontnm ihoh alhik lpnik ohkitm hHrm tHrim atm la tkrt lhm brit ola tHnm : ola ttHtn bm btk la ttn lbno obto la tqH lbnk : ki isir at bnk maHri oebdo alhim aHrim oHrh ap ihoh bkm ohSmidk mhr : ki am kh teSo lhm mcbHtihm ttzo omzbtm tSbro oaSirhm tgdeon opsilihm tSrpon baS : ki em qdoS ath lihoh alhik bk bHr ihoh alhik lhiot lo lem sglh mkl hemim aSr el pni hadmh : la mrbkm mkl hemim HSq ihoh bkm oibHr bkm ki atm hmeT mkl hemim : ki mahbt ihoh atkm omSmro at hSbeh aSr nSbe labtikm hozia ihoh atkm bid Hcqh oipdk mbit ebdim mid preh mlk mzrim : oidet ki ihoh alhik hoa halhim hal hnamn Smr hbrit ohHsd lahbio olSmri mzoto lalp dor : omSlm lSnaio al pnio lhabido la iaHr lSnao al pnio iSlm lo : oSmrt at hmzoh oat hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr anki mzok hiom leSotm : ohih eqb tSmeon at hmSpTim halh oSmrtm oeSitm atm oSmr ihoh alhik lk at hbrit oat hHsd aSr nSbe labtik : oahbk obrkk ohrbk obrk pri bTnk opri admtk dgnk otirSk oizhrk Sgr alpik oeStrt zank el hadmh aSr nSbe labtik ltt lk : brok thih mkl hemim la ihih bk eqr oeqrh obbhmtk : ohsir ihoh mmk kl Hli okl mdoi mzrim hreim aSr idet la iSimm bk ontnm bkl Snaik : oaklt at kl hemim aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tHs eink elihm ola tebd at alhihm ki moqS hoa lk : ki tamr blbbk rbim hgoim halh mmni aikh aokl lhoriSm : la tira mhm ckr tckr at aSr eSh ihoh alhik lpreh olkl mzrim : hmst hgdlt aSr rao einik ohatt ohmptim ohid hHcqh ohcre hnToih aSr hozak ihoh alhik kn ieSh ihoh alhik lkl hemim aSr ath ira mpnihm : ogm at hzreh iSlH ihoh alhik bm ed abd hnSarim ohnstrim mpnik : la terz mpnihm ki ihoh alhik bqrbk al gdol onora : onSl ihoh alhik at hgoim hal mpnik meT meT la tokl kltm mhr pn trbh elik Hit hSdh : ontnm ihoh alhik lpnik ohmm mhomh gdlh ed hSmdm : ontn mlkihm bidk ohabdt at Smm mtHt hSmim la itizb aiS bpnik ed hSmdk atm : psili alhihm tSrpon baS la tHmd ksp ochb elihm olqHt lk pn toqS bo ki toebt ihoh alhik hoa : ola tbia toebh al bitk ohiit Hrm kmho Sqz tSqzno oteb ttebno ki Hrm hoa :

8

kl hmzoh aSr anki mzok hiom tSmron leSot lmen tHion orbitm obatm oirStm at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm : ockrt at kl hdrk aSr hlikk ihoh alhik ch arbeim Snh bmdbr lmen entk lnstk ldet at aSr blbbk htSmr mzoto am la : oienk oirebk oiaklk at hmn aSr la idet ola ideon abtik lmen hodek ki la el hlHm lbdo iHih hadm ki el kl moza pi ihoh iHih hadm : Smltk la blth melik orglk la bzqh ch arbeim Snh : oidet em lbbk ki kaSr iisr aiS at bno ihoh alhik misrk : oSmrt at mzot ihoh alhik llkt bdrkio olirah ato : ki ihoh alhik mbiak al arz Tobh arz nHli mim eint othmt izaim bbqeh obhr : arz HTh oSerh ogpn otanh ormon arz cit Smn odbS : arz aSr la bmsknt takl bh lHm la tHsr kl bh arz aSr abnih brcl omhrrih tHzb nHSt : oaklt oSbet obrkt at ihoh alhik el harz hTbh aSr ntn lk : hSmr lk pn tSkH at ihoh alhik lblti Smr mzotio omSpTio oHqtio aSr anki mzok hiom : pn takl oSbet obtim Tobim tbnh oiSbt : obqrk ozank irbin oksp ochb irbh lk okl aSr lk irbh : orm lbbk oSkHt at ihoh alhik hmoziak marz mzrim mbit ebdim : hmolikk bmdbr hgdl ohnora nHS Srp oeqrb ozmaon aSr ain mim hmozia lk mim mzor hHlmiS : hmaklk mn bmdbr aSr la ideon abtik lmen entk olmen nstk lhiTbk baHritk : oamrt blbbk kHi oezm idi eSh li at hHil hch : ockrt at ihoh alhik ki hoa hntn lk kH leSot Hil lmen hqim at brito aSr nSbe labtik kiom hch : ohih am SkH tSkH at ihoh alhik ohlkt aHri alhim aHrim oebdtm ohStHoit lhm hedti bkm hiom ki abd tabdon : kgoim aSr ihoh mabid mpnikm kn tabdon eqb la tSmeon bqol ihoh alhikm :

9

Sme iSral ath ebr hiom at hirdn lba lrSt goim gdlim oezmim mmk erim gdlt obzrt bSmim : em gdol orm bni enqim aSr ath idet oath Smet mi itizb lpni bni enq : oidet hiom ki ihoh alhik hoa hebr lpnik aS aklh hoa iSmidm ohoa ikniem lpnik ohorStm ohabdtm mhr kaSr dbr ihoh lk : al tamr blbbk bhdp ihoh alhik atm mlpnik lamr bzdqti hbiani ihoh lrSt at harz hcat obrSet hgoim halh ihoh moriSm mpnik : la bzdqtk obiSr lbbk ath ba lrSt at arzm ki brSet hgoim halh ihoh alhik moriSm mpnik olmen hqim at hdbr aSr nSbe ihoh labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb : oidet ki la bzdqtk ihoh alhik ntn lk at harz hTobh hcat lrSth ki em qSh erp ath : ckr al tSkH at aSr hqzpt at ihoh alhik bmdbr lmn hiom aSr izat marz mzrim ed bakm ed hmqom hch mmrim hiitm em ihoh : obHrb hqzptm at ihoh oitanp ihoh bkm lhSmid atkm : belti hhrh lqHt loHt habnim loHt hbrit aSr krt ihoh emkm oaSb bhr arbeim iom oarbeim lilh lHm la aklti omim la Stiti : oitn ihoh ali at Sni loHt habnim ktbim bazbe alhim oelihm kkl hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh emkm bhr mtok haS biom hqhl : oihi mqz arbeim iom oarbeim lilh ntn ihoh ali at Sni lHt habnim lHot hbrit : oiamr ihoh ali qom rd mhr mch ki SHt emk aSr hozat mmzrim sro mhr mn hdrk aSr zoitm eSo lhm mskh : oiamr ihoh ali lamr raiti at hem hch ohnh em qSh erp hoa : hrp mmni oaSmidm oamHh at Smm mtHt hSmim oaeSh aotk lgoi ezom orb mmno : oapn oard mn hhr ohhr ber baS oSni lHt hbrit el Sti idi : oara ohnh HTatm lihoh alhikm eSitm lkm egl mskh srtm mhr mn hdrk aSr zoh ihoh atkm : oatpS bSni hlHt oaSlkm mel Sti idi oaSbrm leinikm : oatnpl lpni ihoh kraSnh arbeim iom oarbeim lilh lHm la aklti omim la Stiti el kl HTatkm aSr HTatm leSot hre beini ihoh lhkeiso : ki igrti mpni hap ohHmh aSr qzp ihoh elikm lhSmid atkm oiSme ihoh ali gm bpem hhoa : obahrn htanp ihoh mad lhSmido oatpll gm bed ahrn bet hhoa : oat HTatkm aSr eSitm at hegl lqHti oaSrp ato baS oakt ato THon hiTb ed aSr dq lepr oaSlk at epro al hnHl hird mn hhr : obtberh obmsh obqbrt htaoh mqzpim hiitm at ihoh : obSlH ihoh atkm mqdS brne lamr elo orSo at harz aSr ntti lkm otmro at pi ihoh alhikm ola hamntm lo ola Smetm bqlo : mmrim hiitm em ihoh miom deti atkm : oatnpl lpni ihoh at arbeim hiom oat arbeim hlilh aSr htnplti ki amr ihoh lhSmid atkm : oatpll al ihoh oamr adni ihoh al tSHt emk onHltk aSr pdit bgdlk aSr hozat mmzrim bid Hcqh : ckr lebdik labrhm lizHq olieqb al tpn al qSi hem hch oal rSeo oal HTato : pn iamro harz aSr hozatno mSm mbli iklt ihoh lhbiam al harz aSr dbr lhm omSnato aotm hoziam lhmtm bmdbr : ohm emk onHltk aSr hozat bkHk hgdl obcrek hnToih :

10

bet hhoa amr ihoh ali psl lk Sni loHt abnim kraSnim oelh ali hhrh oeSit lk aron ez : oaktb el hlHt at hdbrim aSr hio el hlHt hraSnim aSr Sbrt oSmtm baron : oaeS aron ezi STim oapsl Sni lHt abnim kraSnim oael hhrh oSni hlHt bidi : oiktb el hlHt kmktb hraSon at eSrt hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh alikm bhr mtok haS biom hqhl oitnm ihoh ali : oapn oard mn hhr oaSm at hlHt baron aSr eSiti oihio Sm kaSr zoni ihoh : obni iSral nseo mbart bni ieqn mosrh Sm mt ahrn oiqbr Sm oikhn alecr bno tHtio : mSm nseo hgdgdh omn hgdgdh iTbth arz nHli mim : bet hhoa hbdil ihoh at SbT hloi lSat at aron brit ihoh lemd lpni ihoh lSrto olbrk bSmo ed hiom hch : el kn la hih lloi Hlq onHlh em aHio ihoh hoa nHlto kaSr dbr ihoh alhik lo : oanki emdti bhr kimim hraSnim arbeim iom oarbeim lilh oiSme ihoh ali gm bpem hhoa la abh ihoh hSHitk : oiamr ihoh ali qom lk lmse lpni hem oibao oirSo at harz aSr nSbeti labtm ltt lhm : oeth iSral mh ihoh alhik Sal memk ki am lirah at ihoh alhik llkt bkl drkio olahbh ato olebd at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk : lSmr at mzot ihoh oat Hqtio aSr anki mzok hiom lTob lk : hn lihoh alhik hSmim oSmi hSmim harz okl aSr bh : rq babtik HSq ihoh lahbh aotm oibHr bcrem aHrihm bkm mkl hemim kiom hch : omltm at erlt lbbkm oerpkm la tqSo eod : ki ihoh alhikm hoa alhi halhim oadni hadnim hal hgdl hgbr ohnora aSr la iSa pnim ola iqH SHd : eSh mSpT itom oalmnh oahb gr ltt lo lHm oSmlh : oahbtm at hgr ki grim hiitm barz mzrim : at ihoh alhik tira ato tebd obo tdbq obSmo tSbe : hoa thltk ohoa alhik aSr eSh atk at hgdlt oat hnorat halh aSr rao einik : bSbeim npS irdo abtik mzrimh oeth Smk ihoh alhik kkokbi hSmim lrb :

11

oahbt at ihoh alhik oSmrt mSmrto oHqtio omSpTio omzotio kl himim : oidetm hiom ki la at bnikm aSr la ideo oaSr la rao at mosr ihoh alhikm at gdlo at ido hHcqh ocreo hnToih : oat attio oat meSio aSr eSh btok mzrim lpreh mlk mzrim olkl arzo : oaSr eSh lHil mzrim lsosio olrkbo aSr hzip at mi im sop el pnihm brdpm aHrikm oiabdm ihoh ed hiom hch : oaSr eSh lkm bmdbr ed bakm ed hmqom hch : oaSr eSh ldtn olabirm bni aliab bn raobn aSr pzth harz at pih otblem oat btihm oat ahlihm oat kl hiqom aSr brglihm bqrb kl iSral : ki einikm hrat at kl meSh ihoh hgdl aSr eSh : oSmrtm at kl hmzoh aSr anki mzok hiom lmen tHcqo obatm oirStm at harz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth : olmen tariko imim el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm ltt lhm olcrem arz cbt Hlb odbS : ki harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth la karz mzrim hoa aSr izatm mSm aSr tcre at crek ohSqit brglk kgn hirq : oharz aSr atm ebrim Smh lrSth arz hrim obqet lmTr hSmim tSth mim : arz aSr ihoh alhik drS ath tmid eini ihoh alhik bh mrSit hSnh oed aHrit Snh : ohih am Sme tSmeo al mzoti aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom lahbh at ihoh alhikm olebdo bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm : ontti mTr arzkm beto iorh omlqoS oaspt dgnk otirSk oizhrk : ontti eSb bSdk lbhmtk oaklt oSbet : hSmro lkm pn ipth lbbkm osrtm oebdtm alhim aHrim ohStHoitm lhm : oHrh ap ihoh bkm oezr at hSmim ola ihih mTr ohadmh la ttn at ibolh oabdtm mhrh mel harz hTbh aSr ihoh ntn lkm : oSmtm at dbri alh el lbbkm oel npSkm oqSrtm atm laot el idkm ohio lToTpt bin einikm : olmdtm atm at bnikm ldbr bm bSbtk bbitk oblktk bdrk obSkbk obqomk : oktbtm el mcocot bitk obSerik : lmen irbo imikm oimi bnikm el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtikm ltt lhm kimi hSmim el harz : ki am Smr tSmron at kl hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzoh atkm leSth lahbh at ihoh alhikm llkt bkl drkio oldbqh bo : ohoriS ihoh at kl hgoim halh mlpnikm oirStm goim gdlim oezmim mkm : kl hmqom aSr tdrk kp rglkm bo lkm ihih mn hmdbr ohlbnon mn hnhr nhr prt oed him haHron ihih gblkm : la itizb aiS bpnikm pHdkm omorakm itn ihoh alhikm el pni kl harz aSr tdrko bh kaSr dbr lkm : rah anki ntn lpnikm hiom brkh oqllh : at hbrkh aSr tSmeo al mzot ihoh alhikm aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom : ohqllh am la tSmeo al mzot ihoh alhikm osrtm mn hdrk aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom llkt aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm : ohih ki ibiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth ontth at hbrkh el hr grcim oat hqllh el hr eibl : hla hmh bebr hirdn aHri drk mboa hSmS barz hkneni hiSb berbh mol hglgl azl aloni mrh : ki atm ebrim at hirdn lba lrSt at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lkm oirStm ath oiSbtm bh : oSmrtm leSot at kl hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr anki ntn lpnikm hiom :

12

alh hHqim ohmSpTim aSr tSmron leSot barz aSr ntn ihoh alhi abtik lk lrSth kl himim aSr atm Hiim el hadmh : abd tabdon at kl hmqmot aSr ebdo Sm hgoim aSr atm irSim atm at alhihm el hhrim hrmim oel hgbeot otHt kl ez renn : ontztm at mcbHtm oSbrtm at mzbtm oaSrihm tSrpon baS opsili alhihm tgdeon oabdtm at Smm mn hmqom hhoa : la teSon kn lihoh alhikm : ki am al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhikm mkl SbTikm lSom at Smo Sm lSkno tdrSo obat Smh : ohbatm Smh eltikm ocbHikm oat meSrtikm oat tromt idkm ondrikm ondbtikm obkrt bqrkm ozankm : oakltm Sm lpni ihoh alhikm oSmHtm bkl mSlH idkm atm obtikm aSr brkk ihoh alhik : la teSon kkl aSr anHno eSim ph hiom aiS kl hiSr beinio : ki la batm ed eth al hmnoHh oal hnHlh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : oebrtm at hirdn oiSbtm barz aSr ihoh alhikm mnHil atkm ohniH lkm mkl aibikm msbib oiSbtm bTH : ohih hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhikm bo lSkn Smo Sm Smh tbiao at kl aSr anki mzoh atkm eoltikm ocbHikm meSrtikm otrmt idkm okl mbHr ndrikm aSr tdro lihoh : oSmHtm lpni ihoh alhikm atm obnikm obntikm oebdikm oamhtikm ohloi aSr bSerikm ki ain lo Hlq onHlh atkm : hSmr lk pn telh eltik bkl mqom aSr trah : ki am bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh baHd SbTik Sm telh eltik oSm teSh kl aSr anki mzok : rq bkl aot npSk tcbH oaklt bSr kbrkt ihoh alhik aSr ntn lk bkl Serik hTma ohThor iaklno kzbi okail : rq hdm la taklo el harz tSpkno kmim : la tokl lakl bSerik meSr dgnk otirSk oizhrk obkrt bqrk ozank okl ndrik aSr tdr ondbtik otromt idk : ki am lpni ihoh alhik taklno bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi aSr bSerik oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik bkl mSlH idk : hSmr lk pn tecb at hloi kl imik el admtk : ki irHib ihoh alhik at gbolk kaSr dbr lk oamrt aklh bSr ki taoh npSk lakl bSr bkl aot npSk takl bSr : ki irHq mmk hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSom Smo Sm ocbHt mbqrk omzank aSr ntn ihoh lk kaSr zoitk oaklt bSerik bkl aot npSk : ak kaSr iakl at hzbi oat hail kn taklno hTma ohThor iHdo iaklno : rq Hcq lblti akl hdm ki hdm hoa hnpS ola takl hnpS em hbSr : la taklno el harz tSpkno kmim : la taklno lmen iiTb lk olbnik aHrik ki teSh hiSr beini ihoh : rq qdSik aSr ihio lk ondrik tSa obat al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh : oeSit eltik hbSr ohdm el mcbH ihoh alhik odm cbHik iSpk el mcbH ihoh alhik ohbSr takl : Smr oSmet at kl hdbrim halh aSr anki mzok lmen iiTb lk olbnik aHrik ed eolm ki teSh hTob ohiSr beini ihoh alhik : ki ikrit ihoh alhik at hgoim aSr ath ba Smh lrSt aotm mpnik oirSt atm oiSbt barzm : hSmr lk pn tnqS aHrihm aHri hSmdm mpnik opn tdrS lalhihm lamr aikh iebdo hgoim halh at alhihm oaeSh kn gm ani : la teSh kn lihoh alhik ki kl toebt ihoh aSr Sna eSo lalhihm ki gm at bnihm oat bntihm iSrpo baS lalhihm : at kl hdbr aSr anki mzoh atkm ato tSmro leSot la tsp elio ola tgre mmno :

13

ki iqom bqrbk nbia ao Hlm Hlom ontn alik aot ao mopt : oba haot ohmopt aSr dbr alik lamr nlkh aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm onebdm : la tSme al dbri hnbia hhoa ao al Holm hHlom hhoa ki mnsh ihoh alhikm atkm ldet hiSkm ahbim at ihoh alhikm bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm : aHri ihoh alhikm tlko oato tirao oat mzotio tSmro obqlo tSmeo oato tebdo obo tdbqon : ohnbia hhoa ao Hlm hHlom hhoa iomt ki dbr srh el ihoh alhikm hmozia atkm marz mzrim ohpdk mbit ebdim lhdiHk mn hdrk aSr zok ihoh alhik llkt bh obert hre mqrbk : ki isitk aHik bn amk ao bnk ao btk ao aSt Hiqk ao rek aSr knpSk bstr lamr nlkh onebdh alhim aHrim aSr la idet ath oabtik : malhi hemim aSr sbibtikm hqrbim alik ao hrHqim mmk mqzh harz oed qzh harz : la tabh lo ola tSme alio ola tHos eink elio ola tHml ola tksh elio : ki hrg thrgno idk thih bo braSonh lhmito oid kl hem baHrnh : osqlto babnim omt ki bqS lhdiHk mel ihoh alhik hmoziak marz mzrim mbit ebdim : okl iSral iSmeo oiraon ola iospo leSot kdbr hre hch bqrbk : ki tSme baHt erik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lSbt Sm lamr : izao anSim bni bliel mqrbk oidiHo at iSbi eirm lamr nlkh onebdh alhim aHrim aSr la idetm : odrSt oHqrt oSalt hiTb ohnh amt nkon hdbr neSth htoebh hcat bqrbk : hkh tkh at iSbi heir hhoa lpi Hrb hHrm ath oat kl aSr bh oat bhmth lpi Hrb : oat kl Sllh tqbz al tok rHbh oSrpt baS at heir oat kl Sllh klil lihoh alhik ohith tl eolm la tbnh eod : ola idbq bidk maomh mn hHrm lmen iSob ihoh mHron apo ontn lk rHmim orHmk ohrbk kaSr nSbe labtik : ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom leSot hiSr beini ihoh alhik :

14

bnim atm lihoh alhikm la ttgddo ola tSimo qrHh bin einikm lmt : ki em qdoS ath lihoh alhik obk bHr ihoh lhiot lo lem sglh mkl hemim aSr el pni hadmh : la takl kl toebh : cat hbhmh aSr taklo Sor Sh kSbim oSh ecim : ail ozbi oiHmor oaqo odiSn otao ocmr : okl bhmh mprst prsh oSset Sse Sti prsot melt grh bbhmh ath taklo : ak at ch la taklo mmeli hgrh ommprisi hprsh hSsoeh at hgml oat harnbt oat hSpn ki melh grh hmh oprsh la hpriso Tmaim hm lkm : oat hHcir ki mpris prsh hoa ola grh Tma hoa lkm mbSrm la taklo obnbltm la tgeo : at ch taklo mkl aSr bmim kl aSr lo snpir oqSqSt taklo : okl aSr ain lo snpir oqSqSt la taklo Tma hoa lkm : kl zpor Thrh taklo : och aSr la taklo mhm hnSr ohprs ohecnih : ohrah oat haih ohdih lminh : oat kl erb lmino : oat bt hienh oat htHms oat hSHp oat hnz lminho : at hkos oat hinSop ohtnSmt : ohqat oat hrHmh oat hSlk : ohHsidh ohanph lminh ohdokipt oheTlp : okl Srz heop Tma hoa lkm la iaklo : kl eop Thor taklo : la taklo kl nblh lgr aSr bSerik ttnnh oaklh ao mkr lnkri ki em qdoS ath lihoh alhik la tbSl gdi bHlb amo : eSr teSr at kl tboat crek hiza hSdh Snh Snh : oaklt lpni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr lSkn Smo Sm meSr dgnk tirSk oizhrk obkrt bqrk ozank lmen tlmd lirah at ihoh alhik kl himim : oki irbh mmk hdrk ki la tokl Sato ki irHq mmk hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSom Smo Sm ki ibrkk ihoh alhik : ontth bksp ozrt hksp bidk ohlkt al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo : ontth hksp bkl aSr taoh npSk bbqr obzan obiin obSkr obkl aSr tSalk npSk oaklt Sm lpni ihoh alhik oSmHt ath obitk : ohloi aSr bSerik la tecbno ki ain lo Hlq onHlh emk : mqzh SlS Snim tozia at kl meSr tboatk bSnh hhoa ohnHt bSerik : oba hloi ki ain lo Hlq onHlh emk ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bSerik oaklo oSbeo lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idk aSr teSh :

15

mqz Sbe Snim teSh SmTh : och dbr hSmTh SmoT kl bel mSh ido aSr iSh breho la igS at reho oat aHio ki qra SmTh lihoh : at hnkri tgS oaSr ihih lk at aHik tSmT idk : aps ki la ihih bk abion ki brk ibrkk ihoh barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh lrSth : rq am Smoe tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzok hiom : ki ihoh alhik brkk kaSr dbr lk ohebTt goim rbim oath la tebT omSlt bgoim rbim obk la imSlo : ki ihih bk abion maHd aHik baHd Serik barzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tamz at lbbk ola tqpz at idk maHik habion : ki ptH tptH at idk lo ohebT tebiTno di mHsro aSr iHsr lo : hSmr lk pn ihih dbr em lbbk bliel lamr qrbh Snt hSbe Snt hSmTh oreh eink baHik habion ola ttn lo oqra elik al ihoh ohih bk HTa : nton ttn lo ola ire lbbk bttk lo ki bgll hdbr hch ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSk obkl mSlH idk : ki la iHdl abion mqrb harz el kn anki mzok lamr ptH tptH at idk laHik lenik olabink barzk : ki imkr lk aHik hebri ao hebrih oebdk SS Snim obSnh hSbiet tSlHno HpSi memk : oki tSlHno HpSi memk la tSlHno riqm : heniq teniq lo mzank omgrnk omiqbk aSr brkk ihoh alhik ttn lo : ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim oipdk ihoh alhik el kn anki mzok at hdbr hch hiom : ohih ki iamr alik la aza memk ki ahbk oat bitk ki Tob lo emk : olqHt at hmrze ontth bacno obdlt ohih lk ebd eolm oap lamtk teSh kn : la iqSh beink bSlHk ato HpSi memk ki mSnh Skr Skir ebdk SS Snim obrkk ihoh alhik bkl aSr teSh : kl hbkor aSr iold bbqrk obzank hckr tqdiS lihoh alhik la tebd bbkr Sork ola tgc bkor zank : lpni ihoh alhik taklno Snh bSnh bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh ath obitk : oki ihih bo mom psH ao eor kl mom re la tcbHno lihoh alhik : bSerik taklno hTma ohThor iHdo kzbi okail : rq at dmo la takl el harz tSpkno kmim :

16

Smor at HdS habib oeSit psH lihoh alhik ki bHdS habib hoziak ihoh alhik mmzrim lilh : ocbHt psH lihoh alhik zan obqr bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh lSkn Smo Sm : la takl elio Hmz Sbet imim takl elio mzot lHm eni ki bHpcon izat marz mzrim lmen tckr at iom zatk marz mzrim kl imi Hiik : ola irah lk Sar bkl gblk Sbet imim ola ilin mn hbSr aSr tcbH berb biom hraSon lbqr : la tokl lcbH at hpsH baHd Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : ki am al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm tcbH at hpsH berb kboa hSmS moed zatk mmzrim : obSlt oaklt bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo opnit bbqr ohlkt lahlik : SSt imim takl mzot obiom hSbiei ezrt lihoh alhik la teSh mlakh : Sbeh Sbet tspr lk mhHl HrmS bqmh tHl lspr Sbeh Sbeot : oeSit Hg Sbeot lihoh alhik mst ndbt idk aSr ttn kaSr ibrkk ihoh alhik : oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi aSr bSerik ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bqrbk bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm : ockrt ki ebd hiit bmzrim oSmrt oeSit at hHqim halh : Hg hskt teSh lk Sbet imim baspk mgrnk omiqbk : oSmHt bHgk ath obnk obtk oebdk oamtk ohloi ohgr ohitom ohalmnh aSr bSerik : Sbet imim tHg lihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr ihoh ki ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl tboatk obkl meSh idik ohiit ak SmH : SloS pemim bSnh irah kl ckork at pni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr bHg hmzot obHg hSbeot obHg hskot ola irah at pni ihoh riqm : aiS kmtnt ido kbrkt ihoh alhik aSr ntn lk : SpTim oSTrim ttn lk bkl Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lSbTik oSpTo at hem mSpT zdq : la tTh mSpT la tkir pnim ola tqH SHd ki hSHd ieor eini Hkmim oislp dbri zdiqm : zdq zdq trdp lmen tHih oirSt at harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : la tTe lk aSrh kl ez azl mcbH ihoh alhik aSr teSh lk : ola tqim lk mzbh aSr Sna ihoh alhik :

17

la tcbH lihoh alhik Sor oSh aSr ihih bo mom kl dbr re ki toebt ihoh alhik hoa : ki imza bqrbk baHd Serik aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk aiS ao aSh aSr ieSh at hre beini ihoh alhik lebr brito : oilk oiebd alhim aHrim oiStHo lhm olSmS ao lirH ao lkl zba hSmim aSr la zoiti : ohgd lk oSmet odrSt hiTb ohnh amt nkon hdbr neSth htoebh hcat biSral : ohozat at haiS hhoa ao at haSh hhoa aSr eSo at hdbr hre hch al Serik at haiS ao at haSh osqltm babnim omto : el pi Snim edim ao SlSh edim iomt hmt la iomt el pi ed aHd : id hedim thih bo braSnh lhmito oid kl hem baHrnh obert hre mqrbk : ki ipla mmk dbr lmSpT bin dm ldm bin din ldin obin nge lnge dbri ribt bSerik oqmt oelit al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo : obat al hkhnim hloim oal hSpT aSr ihih bimim hhm odrSt ohgido lk at dbr hmSpT : oeSit el pi hdbr aSr igido lk mn hmqom hhoa aSr ibHr ihoh oSmrt leSot kkl aSr iorok : el pi htorh aSr iorok oel hmSpT aSr iamro lk teSh la tsor mn hdbr aSr igido lk imin oSmal : ohaiS aSr ieSh bcdon lblti Sme al hkhn hemd lSrt Sm at ihoh alhik ao al hSpT omt haiS hhoa obert hre miSral : okl hem iSmeo oirao ola icidon eod : ki tba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk oirSth oiSbth bh oamrt aSimh eli mlk kkl hgoim aSr sbibti : Som tSim elik mlk aSr ibHr ihoh alhik bo mqrb aHik tSim elik mlk la tokl ltt elik aiS nkri aSr la aHik hoa : rq la irbh lo sosim ola iSib at hem mzrimh lmen hrbot sos oihoh amr lkm la tspon lSob bdrk hch eod : ola irbh lo nSim ola isor lbbo oksp ochb la irbh lo mad : ohih kSbto el ksa mmlkto oktb lo at mSnh htorh hcat el spr mlpni hkhnim hloim : ohith emo oqra bo kl imi Hiio lmen ilmd lirah at ihoh alhio lSmr at kl dbri htorh hcat oat hHqim halh leStm : lblti rom lbbo maHio olblti sor mn hmzoh imin oSmaol lmen iarik imim el mmlkto hoa obnio bqrb iSral :

18

la ihih lkhnim hloim kl SbT loi Hlq onHlh em iSral aSi ihoh onHlto iaklon : onHlh la ihih lo bqrb aHio ihoh hoa nHlto kaSr dbr lo : och ihih mSpT hkhnim mat hem mat cbHi hcbH am Sor am Sh ontn lkhn hcre ohlHiim ohqbh : raSit dgnk tirSk oizhrk oraSit gc zank ttn lo : ki bo bHr ihoh alhik mkl SbTik lemd lSrt bSm ihoh hoa obnio kl himim : oki iba hloi maHd Serik mkl iSral aSr hoa gr Sm oba bkl aot npSo al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh : oSrt bSm ihoh alhio kkl aHio hloim hemdim Sm lpni ihoh : Hlq kHlq iaklo lbd mmkrio el habot : ki ath ba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk la tlmd leSot ktoebt hgoim hhm : la imza bk mebir bno obto baS qsm qsmim meonn omnHS omkSp : oHbr Hbr oSal aob oideni odrS al hmtim : ki toebt ihoh kl eSh alh obgll htoebt halh ihoh alhik moriS aotm mpnik : tmim thih em ihoh alhik : ki hgoim halh aSr ath iorS aotm al mennim oal qsmim iSmeo oath la kn ntn lk ihoh alhik : nbia mqrbk maHik kmni iqim lk ihoh alhik alio tSmeon : kkl aSr Salt mem ihoh alhik bHrb biom hqhl lamr la asp lSme at qol ihoh alhi oat haS hgdlh hcat la arah eod ola amot : oiamr ihoh ali hiTibo aSr dbro : nbia aqim lhm mqrb aHihm kmok ontti dbri bpio odbr alihm at kl aSr azono : ohih haiS aSr la iSme al dbri aSr idbr bSmi anki adrS memo : ak hnbia aSr icid ldbr dbr bSmi at aSr la zoitio ldbr oaSr idbr bSm alhim aHrim omt hnbia hhoa : oki tamr blbbk aikh nde at hdbr aSr la dbro ihoh : aSr idbr hnbia bSm ihoh ola ihih hdbr ola iboa hoa hdbr aSr la dbro ihoh bcdon dbro hnbia la tgor mmno :

19

ki ikrit ihoh alhik at hgoim aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk at arzm oirStm oiSbt berihm obbtihm : SloS erim tbdil lk btok arzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth : tkin lk hdrk oSlSt at gbol arzk aSr inHilk ihoh alhik ohih lnos Smh kl rzH : och dbr hrzH aSr inos Smh oHi aSr ikh at reho bbli det ohoa la Sna lo mtml SlSm : oaSr iba at reho bier lHTb ezim ondHh ido bgrcn lkrt hez onSl hbrcl mn hez omza at reho omt hoa inos al aHt herim halh oHi : pn irdp gal hdm aHri hrzH ki iHm lbbo ohSigo ki irbh hdrk ohkho npS olo ain mSpT mot ki la Sna hoa lo mtmol SlSom : el kn anki mzok lamr SlS erim tbdil lk : oam irHib ihoh alhik at gblk kaSr nSbe labtik ontn lk at kl harz aSr dbr ltt labtik : ki tSmr at kl hmzoh hcat leSth aSr anki mzok hiom lahbh at ihoh alhik ollkt bdrkio kl himim oispt lk eod SlS erim el hSlS halh : ola iSpk dm nqi bqrb arzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh ohih elik dmim : oki ihih aiS Sna lreho oarb lo oqm elio ohkho npS omt ons al aHt herim hal : oSlHo cqni eiro olqHo ato mSm ontno ato bid gal hdm omt : la tHos eink elio obert dm hnqi miSral oTob lk : la tsig gbol rek aSr gblo raSnim bnHltk aSr tnHl barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth : la iqom ed aHd baiS lkl eon olkl HTat bkl HTa aSr iHTa el pi Sni edim ao el pi SlSh edim iqom dbr : ki iqom ed Hms baiS lenot bo srh : oemdo Sni hanSim aSr lhm hrib lpni ihoh lpni hkhnim ohSpTim aSr ihio bimim hhm : odrSo hSpTim hiTb ohnh ed Sqr hed Sqr enh baHio : oeSitm lo kaSr cmm leSot laHio obert hre mqrbk : ohnSarim iSmeo oirao ola ispo leSot eod kdbr hre hch bqrbk : ola tHos eink npS bnpS ein bein Sn bSn id bid rgl brgl :

20

ki tza lmlHmh el aibik orait sos orkb em rb mmk la tira mhm ki ihoh alhik emk hmelk marz mzrim : ohih kqrbkm al hmlHmh ongS hkhn odbr al hem : oamr alhm Sme iSral atm qrbim hiom lmlHmh el aibikm al irk lbbkm al tirao oal tHpco oal terzo mpnihm : ki ihoh alhikm hhlk emkm lhlHm lkm em aibikm lhoSie atkm : odbro hSTrim al hem lamr mi haiS aSr bnh bit HdS ola Hnko ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iHnkno : omi haiS aSr nTe krm ola Hllo ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iHllno : omi haiS aSr arS aSh ola lqHh ilk oiSb lbito pn imot bmlHmh oaiS aHr iqHnh : oispo hSTrim ldbr al hem oamro mi haiS hira ork hlbb ilk oiSb lbito ola ims at lbb aHio klbbo : ohih kklt hSTrim ldbr al hem opqdo Sri zbaot braS hem : ki tqrb al eir lhlHm elih oqrat alih lSlom : ohih am Slom tenk optHh lk ohih kl hem hnmza bh ihio lk lms oebdok : oam la tSlim emk oeSth emk mlHmh ozrt elih : ontnh ihoh alhik bidk ohkit at kl ckorh lpi Hrb : rq hnSim ohTp ohbhmh okl aSr ihih beir kl Sllh tbc lk oaklt at Sll aibik aSr ntn ihoh alhik lk : kn teSh lkl herim hrHqt mmk mad aSr la meri hgoim halh hnh : rq meri hemim halh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh la tHih kl nSmh : ki hHrm tHrimm hHti ohamri hkneni ohprci hHoi ohibosi kaSr zok ihoh alhik : lmen aSr la ilmdo atkm leSot kkl toebtm aSr eSo lalhihm oHTatm lihoh alhikm : ki tzor al eir imim rbim lhlHm elih ltpSh la tSHit at ezh lndH elio grcn ki mmno takl oato la tkrt ki hadm ez hSdh lba mpnik bmzor : rq ez aSr tde ki la ez makl hoa ato tSHit okrt obnit mzor el heir aSr hoa eSh emk mlHmh ed rdth :

21

ki imza Hll badmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk lrSth npl bSdh la node mi hkho : oizao cqnik oSpTik omddo al herim aSr sbibt hHll : ohih heir hqrbh al hHll olqHo cqni heir hhoa eglt bqr aSr la ebd bh aSr la mSkh bel : ohordo cqni heir hhoa at heglh al nHl aitn aSr la iebd bo ola icre oerpo Sm at heglh bnHl : ongSo hkhnim bni loi ki bm bHr ihoh alhik lSrto olbrk bSm ihoh oel pihm ihih kl rib okl nge : okl cqni heir hhoa hqrbim al hHll irHzo at idihm el heglh heroph bnHl : oeno oamro idino la Spkh at hdm hch oeinino la rao : kpr lemk iSral aSr pdit ihoh oal ttn dm nqi bqrb emk iSral onkpr lhm hdm : oath tber hdm hnqi mqrbk ki teSh hiSr beini ihoh : ki tza lmlHmh el aibik ontno ihoh alhik bidk oSbit Sbio : orait bSbih aSt ipt tar oHSqt bh olqHt lk laSh : ohbath al tok bitk oglHh at raSh oeSth at zprnih : ohsirh at Smlt Sbih melih oiSbh bbitk obkth at abih oat amh irH imim oaHr kn tboa alih obelth ohith lk laSh : ohih am la Hpzt bh oSlHth lnpSh omkr la tmkrnh bksp la ttemr bh tHt aSr enith : ki thiin laiS Sti nSim haHt ahobh ohaHt Snoah oildo lo bnim hahobh ohSnoah ohih hbn hbkor lSniah : ohih biom hnHilo at bnio at aSr ihih lo la iokl lbkr at bn hahobh el pni bn hSnoah hbkr : ki at hbkr bn hSnoah ikir ltt lo pi Snim bkl aSr imza lo ki hoa raSit ano lo mSpT hbkrh : ki ihih laiS bn sorr omorh ainno Sme bqol abio obqol amo oisro ato ola iSme alihm : otpSo bo abio oamo ohoziao ato al cqni eiro oal Ser mqmo : oamro al cqni eiro bnno ch sorr omrh ainno Sme bqlno coll osba : orgmho kl anSi eiro babnim omt obert hre mqrbk okl iSral iSmeo oirao : oki ihih baiS HTa mSpT mot ohomt otlit ato el ez : la tlin nblto el hez ki qbor tqbrno biom hhoa ki qllt alhim tloi ola tTma at admtk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh :

22

la trah at Sor aHik ao at Sio ndHim ohtelmt mhm hSb tSibm laHik : oam la qrob aHik alik ola ideto oaspto al tok bitk ohih emk ed drS aHik ato ohSbto lo : okn teSh lHmro okn teSh lSmlto okn teSh lkl abdt aHik aSr tabd mmno omzath la tokl lhtelm : la trah at Hmor aHik ao Soro nplim bdrk ohtelmt mhm hqm tqim emo : la ihih kli gbr el aSh ola ilbS gbr Smlt aSh ki toebt ihoh alhik kl eSh alh : ki iqra qn zpor lpnik bdrk bkl ez ao el harz aprHim ao bizim oham rbzt el haprHim ao el hbizim la tqH ham el hbnim : SlH tSlH at ham oat hbnim tqH lk lmen iiTb lk oharkt imim : ki tbnh bit HdS oeSit meqh lggk ola tSim dmim bbitk ki ipl hnpl mmno : la tcre krmk klaim pn tqdS hmlah hcre aSr tcre otboat hkrm : la tHrS bSor obHmr iHdo : la tlbS SeTnc zmr opStim iHdo : gdlim teSh lk el arbe knpot ksotk aSr tksh bh : ki iqH aiS aSh oba alih oSnah : oSm lh elilt dbrim ohozia elih Sm re oamr at haSh hcat lqHti oaqrb alih ola mzati lh btolim : olqH abi hner oamh ohoziao at btoli hner al cqni heir hSerh : oamr abi hner al hcqnim at bti ntti laiS hch laSh oiSnah : ohnh hoa Sm elilt dbrim lamr la mzati lbtk btolim oalh btoli bti oprSo hSmlh lpni cqni heir : olqHo cqni heir hhoa at haiS oisro ato : oenSo ato mah ksp ontno labi hnerh ki hozia Sm re el btolt iSral olo thih laSh la iokl lSlHh kl imio : oam amt hih hdbr hch la nmzao btolim lner : ohoziao at hner al ptH bit abih osqloh anSi eirh babnim omth ki eSth nblh biSral lcnot bit abih obert hre mqrbk : ki imza aiS Skb em aSh belt bel omto gm Snihm haiS hSkb em haSh ohaSh obert hre miSral : ki ihih ner btolh marSh laiS omzah aiS beir oSkb emh : ohozatm at Snihm al Ser heir hhoa osqltm atm babnim omto at hner el dbr aSr la zeqh beir oat haiS el dbr aSr enh at aSt reho obert hre mqrbk : oam bSdh imza haiS at hner hmarSh ohHciq bh haiS oSkb emh omt haiS aSr Skb emh lbdo : olner la teSh dbr ain lner HTa mot ki kaSr iqom aiS el reho orzHo npS kn hdbr hch : ki bSdh mzah zeqh hner hmarSh oain moSie lh : ki imza aiS ner btolh aSr la arSh otpSh oSkb emh onmzao : ontn haiS hSkb emh labi hner HmSim ksp olo thih laSh tHt aSr enh la iokl SlHh kl imio : la iqH aiS at aSt abio ola iglh knp abio :

23

la iba pzoe dka okrot Spkh bqhl ihoh : la iba mmcr bqhl ihoh gm dor eSiri la iba lo bqhl ihoh : la iba emoni omoabi bqhl ihoh gm dor eSiri la iba lhm bqhl ihoh ed eolm : el dbr aSr la qdmo atkm blHm obmim bdrk bzatkm mmzrim oaSr Skr elik at blem bn beor mptor arm nhrim lqllk : ola abh ihoh alhik lSme al blem oihpk ihoh alhik lk at hqllh lbrkh ki ahbk ihoh alhik : la tdrS Slmm oTbtm kl imik leolm : la tteb admi ki aHik hoa la tteb mzri ki gr hiit barzo : bnim aSr ioldo lhm dor SliSi iba lhm bqhl ihoh : ki tza mHnh el aibik onSmrt mkl dbr re : ki ihih bk aiS aSr la ihih Thor mqrh lilh oiza al mHoz lmHnh la iba al tok hmHnh : ohih lpnot erb irHz bmim okba hSmS iba al tok hmHnh : oid thih lk mHoz lmHnh oizat Smh Hoz : oitd thih lk el acnk ohih bSbtk Hoz oHprth bh oSbt oksit at zatk : ki ihoh alhik mthlk bqrb mHnk lhzilk oltt aibik lpnik ohih mHnik qdoS ola irah bk erot dbr oSb maHrik : la tsgir ebd al adnio aSr inzl alik mem adnio : emk iSb bqrbk bmqom aSr ibHr baHd Serik bTob lo la tonno : la thih qdSh mbnot iSral ola ihih qdS mbni iSral : la tbia atnn conh omHir klb bit ihoh alhik lkl ndr ki toebt ihoh alhik gm Snihm : la tSik laHik nSk ksp nSk akl nSk kl dbr aSr iSk : lnkri tSik olaHik la tSik lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl mSlH idk el harz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth : ki tdr ndr lihoh alhik la taHr lSlmo ki drS idrSno ihoh alhik memk ohih bk HTa : oki tHdl lndr la ihih bk HTa : moza Sptik tSmr oeSit kaSr ndrt lihoh alhik ndbh aSr dbrt bpik : ki tba bkrm rek oaklt enbim knpSk Sbek oal klik la ttn : ki tba bqmt rek oqTpt mlilt bidk oHrmS la tnip el qmt rek :

24

ki iqH aiS aSh obelh ohih am la tmza Hn beinio ki mza bh erot dbr oktb lh spr kritt ontn bidh oSlHh mbito : oizah mbito ohlkh ohith laiS aHr : oSnah haiS haHron oktb lh spr kritt ontn bidh oSlHh mbito ao ki imot haiS haHron aSr lqHh lo laSh : la iokl belh hraSon aSr SlHh lSob lqHth lhiot lo laSh aHri aSr hTmah ki toebh hoa lpni ihoh ola tHTia at harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh : ki iqH aiS aSh HdSh la iza bzba ola iebr elio lkl dbr nqi ihih lbito Snh aHt oSmH at aSto aSr lqH : la iHbl rHim orkb ki npS hoa Hbl : ki imza aiS gnb npS maHio mbni iSral ohtemr bo omkro omt hgnb hhoa obert hre mqrbk : hSmr bnge hzret lSmr mad oleSot kkl aSr ioro atkm hkhnim hloim kaSr zoitm tSmro leSot : ckor at aSr eSh ihoh alhik lmrim bdrk bzatkm mmzrim : ki tSh brek mSat maomh la tba al bito lebT ebTo : bHoz temd ohaiS aSr ath nSh bo iozia alik at heboT hHozh : oam aiS eni hoa la tSkb bebTo : hSb tSib lo at heboT kba hSmS oSkb bSlmto obrkk olk thih zdqh lpni ihoh alhik : la teSq Skir eni oabion maHik ao mgrk aSr barzk bSerik : biomo ttn Skro ola tboa elio hSmS ki eni hoa oalio hoa nSa at npSo ola iqra elik al ihoh ohih bk HTa : la iomto abot el bnim obnim la iomto el abot aiS bHTao iomto : la tTh mSpT gr itom ola tHbl bgd almnh : ockrt ki ebd hiit bmzrim oipdk ihoh alhik mSm el kn anki mzok leSot at hdbr hch : ki tqzr qzirk bSdk oSkHt emr bSdh la tSob lqHto lgr litom olalmnh ihih lmen ibrkk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idik : ki tHbT citk la tpar aHrik lgr litom olalmnh ihih : ki tbzr krmk la teoll aHrik lgr litom olalmnh ihih : ockrt ki ebd hiit barz mzrim el kn anki mzok leSot at hdbr hch :

25

ki ihih rib bin anSim ongSo al hmSpT oSpTom ohzdiqo at hzdiq ohrSieo at hrSe : ohih am bn hkot hrSe ohpilo hSpT ohkho lpnio kdi rSeto bmspr : arbeim ikno la isip pn isip lhkto el alh mkh rbh onqlh aHik leinik : la tHsm Sor bdiSo : ki iSbo aHim iHdo omt aHd mhm obn ain lo la thih aSt hmt hHozh laiS cr ibmh iba elih olqHh lo laSh oibmh : ohih hbkor aSr tld iqom el Sm aHio hmt ola imHh Smo miSral : oam la iHpz haiS lqHt at ibmto oelth ibmto hSerh al hcqnim oamrh man ibmi lhqim laHio Sm biSral la abh ibmi : oqrao lo cqni eiro odbro alio oemd oamr la Hpzti lqHth : ongSh ibmto alio leini hcqnim oHlzh nelo mel rglo oirqh bpnio oenth oamrh kkh ieSh laiS aSr la ibnh at bit aHio : onqra Smo biSral bit Hloz hnel : ki inzo anSim iHdo aiS oaHio oqrbh aSt haHd lhzil at aiSh mid mkho oSlHh idh ohHciqh bmbSio : oqzth at kph la tHos eink : la ihih lk bkisk abn oabn gdolh oqTnh : la ihih lk bbitk aiph oaiph gdolh oqTnh : abn Slmh ozdq ihih lk aiph Slmh ozdq ihih lk lmen iariko imik el hadmh aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : ki toebt ihoh alhik kl eSh alh kl eSh eol : ckor at aSr eSh lk emlq bdrk bzatkm mmzrim : aSr qrk bdrk oicnb bk kl hnHSlim aHrik oath eip oige ola ira alhim : ohih bhniH ihoh alhik lk mkl aibik msbib barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh lrSth tmHh at ckr emlq mtHt hSmim la tSkH :

26

ohih ki tboa al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk nHlh oirSth oiSbt bh : olqHt mraSit kl pri hadmh aSr tbia marzk aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk oSmt bTna ohlkt al hmqom aSr ibHr ihoh alhik lSkn Smo Sm : obat al hkhn aSr ihih bimim hhm oamrt alio hgdti hiom lihoh alhik ki bati al harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtino ltt lno : olqH hkhn hTna midk ohniHo lpni mcbH ihoh alhik : oenit oamrt lpni ihoh alhik armi abd abi oird mzrimh oigr Sm bmti meT oihi Sm lgoi gdol ezom orb : oireo atno hmzrim oienono oitno elino ebdh qSh : onzeq al ihoh alhi abtino oiSme ihoh at qlno oira at enino oat emlno oat lHzno : oiozano ihoh mmzrim bid Hcqh obcre nToih obmra gdl obatot obmptim : oibano al hmqom hch oitn lno at harz hcat arz cbt Hlb odbS : oeth hnh hbati at raSit pri hadmh aSr ntth li ihoh ohnHto lpni ihoh alhik ohStHoit lpni ihoh alhik : oSmHt bkl hTob aSr ntn lk ihoh alhik olbitk ath ohloi ohgr aSr bqrbk : ki tklh leSr at kl meSr tboatk bSnh hSliSt Snt hmeSr ontth lloi lgr litom olalmnh oaklo bSerik oSbeo : oamrt lpni ihoh alhik berti hqdS mn hbit ogm nttio lloi olgr litom olalmnh kkl mzotk aSr zoitni la ebrti mmzotik ola SkHti : la aklti bani mmno ola berti mmno bTma ola ntti mmno lmt Smeti bqol ihoh alhi eSiti kkl aSr zoitni : hSqiph mmeon qdSk mn hSmim obrk at emk at iSral oat hadmh aSr ntth lno kaSr nSbet labtino arz cbt Hlb odbS : hiom hch ihoh alhik mzok leSot at hHqim halh oat hmSpTim oSmrt oeSit aotm bkl lbbk obkl npSk : at ihoh hamrt hiom lhiot lk lalhim ollkt bdrkio olSmr Hqio omzotio omSpTio olSme bqlo : oihoh hamirk hiom lhiot lo lem sglh kaSr dbr lk olSmr kl mzotio : olttk elion el kl hgoim aSr eSh lthlh olSm oltpart olhitk em qdS lihoh alhik kaSr dbr :

27

oizo mSh ocqni iSral at hem lamr Smr at kl hmzoh aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom : ohih biom aSr tebro at hirdn al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk ohqmt lk abnim gdlot oSdt atm bSid : oktbt elihn at kl dbri htorh hcat bebrk lmen aSr tba al harz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk arz cbt Hlb odbS kaSr dbr ihoh alhi abtik lk : ohih bebrkm at hirdn tqimo at habnim halh aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom bhr eibl oSdt aotm bSid : obnit Sm mcbH lihoh alhik mcbH abnim la tnip elihm brcl : abnim Slmot tbnh at mcbH ihoh alhik ohelit elio eolt lihoh alhik : ocbHt Slmim oaklt Sm oSmHt lpni ihoh alhik : oktbt el habnim at kl dbri htorh hcat bar hiTb : oidbr mSh ohkhnim hloim al kl iSral lamr hskt oSme iSral hiom hch nhiit lem lihoh alhik : oSmet bqol ihoh alhik oeSit at mzoto oat Hqio aSr anki mzok hiom : oizo mSh at hem biom hhoa lamr : alh iemdo lbrk at hem el hr grcim bebrkm at hirdn Smeon oloi oihodh oiSSkr oiosp obnimn : oalh iemdo el hqllh bhr eibl raobn gd oaSr ocboln dn onptli : oeno hloim oamro al kl aiS iSral qol rm : aror haiS aSr ieSh psl omskh toebt ihoh meSh idi HrS oSm bstr oeno kl hem oamro amn : aror mqlh abio oamo oamr kl hem amn : aror msig gbol reho oamr kl hem amn : aror mSgh eor bdrk oamr kl hem amn : aror mTh mSpT gr itom oalmnh oamr kl hem amn : aror Skb em aSt abio ki glh knp abio oamr kl hem amn : aror Skb em kl bhmh oamr kl hem amn : aror Skb em aHto bt abio ao bt amo oamr kl hem amn : aror Skb em Htnto oamr kl hem amn : aror mkh reho bstr oamr kl hem amn : aror lqH SHd lhkot npS dm nqi oamr kl hem amn : aror aSr la iqim at dbri htorh hcat leSot aotm oamr kl hem amn :

28

ohih am Smoe tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom ontnk ihoh alhik elion el kl goii harz : obao elik kl hbrkot halh ohSigk ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik : brok ath beir obrok ath bSdh : brok pri bTnk opri admtk opri bhmtk Sgr alpik oeStrot zank : brok Tnak omSartk : brok ath bbak obrok ath bzatk : itn ihoh at aibik hqmim elik ngpim lpnik bdrk aHd izao alik obSbeh drkim inoso lpnik : izo ihoh atk at hbrkh basmik obkl mSlH idk obrkk barz aSr ihoh alhik ntn lk : iqimk ihoh lo lem qdoS kaSr nSbe lk ki tSmr at mzot ihoh alhik ohlkt bdrkio : orao kl emi harz ki Sm ihoh nqra elik oirao mmk : ohotrk ihoh lTobh bpri bTnk obpri bhmtk obpri admtk el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik ltt lk : iptH ihoh lk at aozro hTob at hSmim ltt mTr arzk beto olbrk at kl meSh idk ohloit goim rbim oath la tloh : ontnk ihoh lraS ola lcnb ohiit rq lmelh ola thih lmTh ki tSme al mzot ihoh alhik aSr anki mzok hiom lSmr oleSot : ola tsor mkl hdbrim aSr anki mzoh atkm hiom imin oSmaol llkt aHri alhim aHrim lebdm : ohih am la tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr leSot at kl mzotio oHqtio aSr anki mzok hiom obao elik kl hqllot halh ohSigok : aror ath beir oaror ath bSdh : aror Tnak omSartk : aror pri bTnk opri admtk Sgr alpik oeStrot zank : aror ath bbak oaror ath bzatk : iSlH ihoh bk at hmarh at hmhomh oat hmgert bkl mSlH idk aSr teSh ed hSmdk oed abdk mhr mpni re mellik aSr ecbtni : idbq ihoh bk at hdbr ed klto atk mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth : ikkh ihoh bSHpt obqdHt obdlqt obHrHr obHrb obSdpon obirqon ordpok ed abdk : ohio Smik aSr el raSk nHSt oharz aSr tHtik brcl : itn ihoh at mTr arzk abq oepr mn hSmim ird elik ed hSmdk : itnk ihoh ngp lpni aibik bdrk aHd tza alio obSbeh drkim tnos lpnio ohiit lceoh lkl mmlkot harz : ohith nbltk lmakl lkl eop hSmim olbhmt harz oain mHrid : ikkh ihoh bSHin mzrim obeplim obgrb obHrs aSr la tokl lhrpa : ikkh ihoh bSgeon obeoron obtmhon lbb : ohiit mmSS bzhrim kaSr imSS heor baplh ola tzliH at drkik ohiit ak eSoq ogcol kl himim oain moSie : aSh tarS oaiS aHr iSglnh bit tbnh ola tSb bo krm tTe ola tHllno : Sork TboH leinik ola takl mmno Hmrk gcol mlpnik ola iSob lk zank ntnot laibik oain lk moSie : bnik obntik ntnim lem aHr oeinik raot oklot alihm kl hiom oain lal idk : pri admtk okl igiek iakl em aSr la idet ohiit rq eSoq orzoz kl himim : ohiit mSge mmrah einik aSr trah : ikkh ihoh bSHin re el hbrkim oel hSqim aSr la tokl lhrpa mkp rglk oed qdqdk : iolk ihoh atk oat mlkk aSr tqim elik al goi aSr la idet ath oabtik oebdt Sm alhim aHrim ez oabn : ohiit lSmh lmSl olSninh bkl hemim aSr inhgk ihoh Smh : cre rb tozia hSdh omeT tasp ki iHslno harbh : krmim tTe oebdt oiin la tSth ola tagr ki taklno htlet : citim ihio lk bkl gbolk oSmn la tsok ki iSl citk : bnim obnot tolid ola ihio lk ki ilko bSbi : kl ezk opri admtk iirS hzlzl : hgr aSr bqrbk ielh elik melh melh oath trd mTh mTh : hoa ilok oath la tlono hoa ihih lraS oath thih lcnb : obao elik kl hqllot halh ordpok ohSigok ed hSmdk ki la Smet bqol ihoh alhik lSmr mzotio oHqtio aSr zok : ohio bk laot olmopt obcrek ed eolm : tHt aSr la ebdt at ihoh alhik bSmHh obTob lbb mrb kl : oebdt at aibik aSr iSlHno ihoh bk breb obzma obeirm obHsr kl ontn el brcl el zoark ed hSmido atk : iSa ihoh elik goi mrHoq mqzh harz kaSr idah hnSr goi aSr la tSme lSno : goi ec pnim aSr la iSa pnim lcqn oner la iHn : oakl pri bhmtk opri admtk ed hSmdk aSr la iSair lk dgn tiroS oizhr Sgr alpik oeStrt zank ed habido atk : ohzr lk bkl Serik ed rdt Hmtik hgbhot ohbzrot aSr ath bTH bhn bkl arzk ohzr lk bkl Serik bkl arzk aSr ntn ihoh alhik lk : oaklt pri bTnk bSr bnik obntik aSr ntn lk ihoh alhik bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk : haiS hrk bk oheng mad tre eino baHio obaSt Hiqo obitr bnio aSr iotir : mtt laHd mhm mbSr bnio aSr iakl mbli hSair lo kl bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk bkl Serik : hrkh bk ohengh aSr la nsth kp rglh hzg el harz mhteng omrk tre einh baiS Hiqh obbnh obbth : obSlith hiozt mbin rglih obbnih aSr tld ki taklm bHsr kl bstr bmzor obmzoq aSr iziq lk aibk bSerik : am la tSmr leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat hktobim bspr hch lirah at hSm hnkbd ohnora hch at ihoh alhik : ohpla ihoh at mktk oat mkot crek mkot gdlot onamnot oHlim reim onamnim : ohSib bk at kl mdoh mzrim aSr igrt mpnihm odbqo bk : gm kl Hli okl mkh aSr la ktob bspr htorh hcat ielm ihoh elik ed hSmdk : onSartm bmti meT tHt aSr hiitm kkokbi hSmim lrb ki la Smet bqol ihoh alhik : ohih kaSr SS ihoh elikm lhiTib atkm olhrbot atkm kn iSiS ihoh elikm lhabid atkm olhSmid atkm onsHtm mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth : ohpizk ihoh bkl hemim mqzh harz oed qzh harz oebdt Sm alhim aHrim aSr la idet ath oabtik ez oabn : obgoim hhm la trgie ola ihih mnoH lkp rglk ontn ihoh lk Sm lb rgc oklion einim odabon npS : ohio Hiik tlaim lk mngd opHdt lilh oiomm ola tamin bHiik : bbqr tamr mi itn erb oberb tamr mi itn bqr mpHd lbbk aSr tpHd ommrah einik aSr trah : ohSibk ihoh mzrim baniot bdrk aSr amrti lk la tsip eod lrath ohtmkrtm Sm laibik lebdim olSpHot oain qnh :

29

alh dbri hbrit aSr zoh ihoh at mSh lkrt at bni iSral barz moab mlbd hbrit aSr krt atm bHrb : oiqra mSh al kl iSral oiamr alhm atm raitm at kl aSr eSh ihoh leinikm barz mzrim lpreh olkl ebdio olkl arzo : hmsot hgdlt aSr rao einik hatt ohmptim hgdlim hhm : ola ntn ihoh lkm lb ldet oeinim lraot oacnim lSme ed hiom hch : oaolk atkm arbeim Snh bmdbr la blo Slmtikm melikm onelk la blth mel rglk : lHm la akltm oiin oSkr la Stitm lmen tdeo ki ani ihoh alhikm : otbao al hmqom hch oiza siHn mlk HSbon oeog mlk hbSn lqratno lmlHmh onkm : onqH at arzm ontnh lnHlh lraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSi : oSmrtm at dbri hbrit hcat oeSitm atm lmen tSkilo at kl aSr teSon : atm nzbim hiom klkm lpni ihoh alhikm raSikm SbTikm cqnikm oSTrikm kl aiS iSral : Tpkm nSikm ogrk aSr bqrb mHnik mHTb ezik ed Sab mimik : lebrk bbrit ihoh alhik obalto aSr ihoh alhik krt emk hiom : lmen hqim atk hiom lo lem ohoa ihih lk lalhim kaSr dbr lk okaSr nSbe labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb : ola atkm lbdkm anki krt at hbrit hcat oat halh hcat : ki at aSr iSno ph emno emd hiom lpni ihoh alhino oat aSr ainno ph emno hiom : ki atm idetm at aSr iSbno barz mzrim oat aSr ebrno bqrb hgoim aSr ebrtm : otrao at Sqozihm oat gllihm ez oabn ksp ochb aSr emhm : pn iS bkm aiS ao aSh ao mSpHh ao SbT aSr lbbo pnh hiom mem ihoh alhino llkt lebd at alhi hgoim hhm pn iS bkm SrS prh raS olenh : ohih bSmeo at dbri halh hcat ohtbrk blbbo lamr Slom ihih li ki bSrrot lbi alk lmen spot hroh at hzmah : la iabh ihoh slH lo ki ac ieSn ap ihoh oqnato baiS hhoa orbzh bo kl halh hktobh bspr hch omHh ihoh at Smo mtHt hSmim : ohbdilo ihoh lreh mkl SbTi iSral kkl alot hbrit hktobh bspr htorh hch : oamr hdor haHron bnikm aSr iqomo maHrikm ohnkri aSr iba marz rHoqh orao at mkot harz hhoa oat tHlaih aSr Hlh ihoh bh : gprit omlH Srph kl arzh la tcre ola tzmH ola ielh bh kl eSb kmhpkt sdm oemrh admh ozbiim aSr hpk ihoh bapo obHmto : oamro kl hgoim el mh eSh ihoh kkh larz hcat mh Hri hap hgdol hch : oamro el aSr ecbo at brit ihoh alhi abtm aSr krt emm bhoziao atm marz mzrim : oilko oiebdo alhim aHrim oiStHoo lhm alhim aSr la ideom ola Hlq lhm : oiHr ap ihoh barz hhoa lhbia elih at kl hqllh hktobh bspr hch : oitSm ihoh mel admtm bap obHmh obqzp gdol oiSlkm al arz aHrt kiom hch : hnstrt lihoh alhino ohnglt lno olbnino ed eolm leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat :

30

ohih ki ibao elik kl hdbrim halh hbrkh ohqllh aSr ntti lpnik ohSbt al lbbk bkl hgoim aSr hdiHk ihoh alhik Smh : oSbt ed ihoh alhik oSmet bqlo kkl aSr anki mzok hiom ath obnik bkl lbbk obkl npSk : oSb ihoh alhik at Sbotk orHmk oSb oqbzk mkl hemim aSr hpizk ihoh alhik Smh : am ihih ndHk bqzh hSmim mSm iqbzk ihoh alhik omSm iqHk : ohbiak ihoh alhik al harz aSr irSo abtik oirSth ohiTbk ohrbk mabtik : oml ihoh alhik at lbbk oat lbb crek lahbh at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk lmen Hiik : ontn ihoh alhik at kl halot halh el aibik oel Snaik aSr rdpok : oath tSob oSmet bqol ihoh oeSit at kl mzotio aSr anki mzok hiom : ohotirk ihoh alhik bkl meSh idk bpri bTnk obpri bhmtk obpri admtk lTobh ki iSob ihoh lSoS elik lTob kaSr SS el abtik : ki tSme bqol ihoh alhik lSmr mzotio oHqtio hktobh bspr htorh hch ki tSob al ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk : ki hmzoh hcat aSr anki mzok hiom la nplat hoa mmk ola rHqh hoa : la bSmim hoa lamr mi ielh lno hSmimh oiqHh lno oiSmeno ath oneSnh : ola mebr lim hoa lamr mi iebr lno al ebr him oiqHh lno oiSmeno ath oneSnh : ki qrob alik hdbr mad bpik oblbbk leSto : rah ntti lpnik hiom at hHiim oat hTob oat hmot oat hre : aSr anki mzok hiom lahbh at ihoh alhik llkt bdrkio olSmr mzotio oHqtio omSpTio oHiit orbit obrkk ihoh alhik barz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth : oam ipnh lbbk ola tSme ondHt ohStHoit lalhim aHrim oebdtm : hgdti lkm hiom ki abd tabdon la tarikn imim el hadmh aSr ath ebr at hirdn lba Smh lrSth : heidti bkm hiom at hSmim oat harz hHiim ohmot ntti lpnik hbrkh ohqllh obHrt bHiim lmen tHih ath ocrek : lahbh at ihoh alhik lSme bqlo oldbqh bo ki hoa Hiik oark imik lSbt el hadmh aSr nSbe ihoh labtik labrhm lizHq olieqb ltt lhm :

31

oilk mSh oidbr at hdbrim halh al kl iSral : oiamr alhm bn mah oeSrim Snh anki hiom la aokl eod lzat olboa oihoh amr ali la tebr at hirdn hch : ihoh alhik hoa ebr lpnik hoa iSmid at hgoim halh mlpnik oirStm ihoSe hoa ebr lpnik kaSr dbr ihoh : oeSh ihoh lhm kaSr eSh lsiHon oleog mlki hamri olarzm aSr hSmid atm : ontnm ihoh lpnikm oeSitm lhm kkl hmzoh aSr zoiti atkm : Hcqo oamzo al tirao oal terzo mpnihm ki ihoh alhik hoa hhlk emk la irpk ola iecbk : oiqra mSh lihoSe oiamr alio leini kl iSral Hcq oamz ki ath tboa at hem hch al harz aSr nSbe ihoh labtm ltt lhm oath tnHilnh aotm : oihoh hoa hhlk lpnik hoa ihih emk la irpk ola iecbk la tira ola tHt : oiktb mSh at htorh hcat oitnh al hkhnim bni loi hnSaim at aron brit ihoh oal kl cqni iSral : oizo mSh aotm lamr mqz Sbe Snim bmed Snt hSmTh bHg hskot : bboa kl iSral lraot at pni ihoh alhik bmqom aSr ibHr tqra at htorh hcat ngd kl iSral bacnihm : hqhl at hem hanSim ohnSim ohTp ogrk aSr bSerik lmen iSmeo olmen ilmdo oirao at ihoh alhikm oSmro leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat : obnihm aSr la ideo iSmeo olmdo lirah at ihoh alhikm kl himim aSr atm Hiim el hadmh aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth : oiamr ihoh al mSh hn qrbo imik lmot qra at ihoSe ohtizbo bahl moed oazono oilk mSh oihoSe oitizbo bahl moed : oira ihoh bahl bemod enn oiemd emod henn el ptH hahl : oiamr ihoh al mSh hnk Skb em abtik oqm hem hch ocnh aHri alhi nkr harz aSr hoa ba Smh bqrbo oecbni ohpr at briti aSr krti ato : oHrh api bo biom hhoa oecbtim ohstrti pni mhm ohih lakl omzaho reot rbot ozrot oamr biom hhoa hla el ki ain alhi bqrbi mzaoni hreot halh : oanki hstr astir pni biom hhoa el kl hreh aSr eSh ki pnh al alhim aHrim : oeth ktbo lkm at hSirh hcat olmdh at bni iSral Simh bpihm lmen thih li hSirh hcat led bbni iSral : ki abiano al hadmh aSr nSbeti labtio cbt Hlb odbS oakl oSbe odSn opnh al alhim aHrim oebdom onazoni ohpr at briti : ohih ki tmzan ato reot rbot ozrot oenth hSirh hcat lpnio led ki la tSkH mpi creo ki ideti at izro aSr hoa eSh hiom bTrm abiano al harz aSr nSbeti : oiktb mSh at hSirh hcat biom hhoa oilmdh at bni iSral : oizo at ihoSe bn non oiamr Hcq oamz ki ath tbia at bni iSral al harz aSr nSbeti lhm oanki ahih emk : oihi kklot mSh lktb at dbri htorh hcat el spr ed tmm : oizo mSh at hloim nSai aron brit ihoh lamr : lqH at spr htorh hch oSmtm ato mzd aron brit ihoh alhikm ohih Sm bk led : ki anki ideti at mrik oat erpk hqSh hn beodni Hi emkm hiom mmrim hitm em ihoh oap ki aHri moti : hqhilo ali at kl cqni SbTikm oSTrikm oadbrh bacnihm at hdbrim halh oaeidh bm at hSmim oat harz : ki ideti aHri moti ki hSHt tSHton osrtm mn hdrk aSr zoiti atkm oqrat atkm hreh baHrit himim ki teSo at hre beini ihoh lhkeiso bmeSh idikm : oidbr mSh bacni kl qhl iSral at dbri hSirh hcat ed tmm :

32

hacino hSmim oadbrh otSme harz amri pi : ierp kmTr lqHi tcl kTl amrti kSeirm eli dSa okrbibim eli eSb : ki Sm ihoh aqra hbo gdl lalhino : hzor tmim pelo ki kl drkio mSpT al amonh oain eol zdiq oiSr hoa : SHt lo la bnio momm dor eqS optltl : h lihoh tgmlo cat em nbl ola Hkm hloa hoa abik qnk hoa eSk oiknnk : ckr imot eolm bino Snot dor odor Sal abik oigdk cqnik oiamro lk : bhnHl elion goim bhprido bni adm izb gblt emim lmspr bni iSral : ki Hlq ihoh emo ieqb Hbl nHlto : imzaho barz mdbr obtho ill iSmn isbbnho ibonnho izrnho kaiSon eino : knSr ieir qno el goclio irHp iprS knpio iqHho iSaho el abrto : ihoh bdd inHno oain emo al nkr : irkbho el bmoti arz oiakl tnobt Sdi oinqho dbS msle oSmn mHlmiS zor : Hmat bqr oHlb zan em Hlb krim oailim bni bSn oetodim em Hlb kliot HTh odm enb tSth Hmr : oiSmn iSron oibeT Smnt ebit kSit oiTS aloh eSho oinbl zor iSeto : iqnaho bcrim btoebt ikeisho : icbHo lSdim la alh alhim la ideom HdSim mqrb bao la Serom abtikm : zor ildk tSi otSkH al mHllk : oira ihoh oinaz mkes bnio obntio : oiamr astirh pni mhm arah mh aHritm ki dor thpkt hmh bnim la amn bm : hm qnaoni bla al kesoni bhblihm oani aqniam bla em bgoi nbl akeism : ki aS qdHh bapi otiqd ed Saol tHtit otakl arz oiblh otlhT mosdi hrim : asph elimo reot Hzi aklh bm : mci reb olHmi rSp oqTb mriri oSn bhmot aSlH bm em Hmt cHli epr : mHoz tSkl Hrb omHdrim aimh gm bHor gm btolh ionq em aiS Sibh : amrti apaihm aSbith manoS ckrm : loli kes aoib agor pn inkro zrimo pn iamro idino rmh ola ihoh pel kl cat : ki goi abd ezot hmh oain bhm tbonh : lo Hkmo iSkilo cat ibino laHritm : aikh irdp aHd alp oSnim iniso rbbh am la ki zorm mkrm oihoh hsgirm : ki la kzorno zorm oaibino plilim : ki mgpn sdm gpnm omSdmt emrh enbmo enbi roS aSklt mrrt lmo : Hmt tninm iinm oraS ptnim akcr : hla hoa kms emdi Htm baozrti : li nqm oSlm let tmoT rglm ki qrob iom aidm oHS etdt lmo : ki idin ihoh emo oel ebdio itnHm ki irah ki aclt id oaps ezor oecob : oamr ai alhimo zor Hsio bo : aSr Hlb cbHimo iaklo iSto iin nsikm iqomo oiecrkm ihi elikm strh : rao eth ki ani ani hoa oain alhim emdi ani amit oaHih mHzti oani arpa oain midi mzil : ki aSa al Smim idi oamrti Hi anki lelm : am Snoti brq Hrbi otaHc bmSpT idi aSib nqm lzri olmSnai aSlm : aSkir Hzi mdm oHrbi takl bSr mdm Hll oSbih mraS preot aoib : hrnino goim emo ki dm ebdio iqom onqm iSib lzrio okpr admto emo : oiba mSh oidbr at kl dbri hSirh hcat bacni hem hoa ohoSe bn non : oikl mSh ldbr at kl hdbrim halh al kl iSral : oiamr alhm Simo lbbkm lkl hdbrim aSr anki meid bkm hiom aSr tzom at bnikm lSmr leSot at kl dbri htorh hcat : ki la dbr rq hoa mkm ki hoa Hiikm obdbr hch tariko imim el hadmh aSr atm ebrim at hirdn Smh lrSth : oidbr ihoh al mSh bezm hiom hch lamr : elh al hr hebrim hch hr nbo aSr barz moab aSr el pni irHo orah at arz knen aSr ani ntn lbni iSral laHch : omt bhr aSr ath elh Smh ohasp al emik kaSr mt ahrn aHik bhr hhr oiasp al emio : el aSr meltm bi btok bni iSral bmi mribt qdS mdbr zn el aSr la qdStm aoti btok bni iSral : ki mngd trah at harz oSmh la tboa al harz aSr ani ntn lbni iSral :

33

ocat hbrkh aSr brk mSh aiS halhim at bni iSral lpni moto : oiamr ihoh msini ba ocrH mSeir lmo hopie mhr parn oath mrbbt qdS mimino aS dt lmo : ap Hbb emim kl qdSio bidk ohm tko lrglk iSa mdbrtik : torh zoh lno mSh morSh qhlt ieqb : oihi biSron mlk bhtasp raSi em iHd SbTi iSral : iHi raobn oal imt oihi mtio mspr : ocat lihodh oiamr Sme ihoh qol ihodh oal emo tbiano idio rb lo oecr mzrio thih : olloi amr tmik oaorik laiS Hsidk aSr nsito bmsh tribho el mi mribh : hamr labio olamo la raitio oat aHio la hkir oat bno la ide ki Smro amrtk obritk inzro : ioro mSpTik lieqb otortk liSral iSimo qTorh bapk oklil el mcbHk : brk ihoh Hilo opel idio trzh mHz mtnim qmio omSnaio mn iqomon : lbnimn amr idid ihoh iSkn lbTH elio Hpp elio kl hiom obin ktipio Skn : oliosp amr mbrkt ihoh arzo mmgd Smim mTl omthom rbzt tHt : ommgd tboat SmS ommgd grS irHim : omraS hrri qdm ommgd gbeot eolm : ommgd arz omlah orzon Skni snh tboath lraS iosp olqdqd ncir aHio : bkor Soro hdr lo oqrni ram qrnio bhm emim ingH iHdo apsi arz ohm rbbot aprim ohm alpi mnSh : olcboln amr SmH cboln bzatk oiSSkr bahlik : emim hr iqrao Sm icbHo cbHi zdq ki Spe imim iinqo oSponi Tmoni Hol : olgd amr brok mrHib gd klbia Skn oTrp croe ap qdqd : oira raSit lo ki Sm Hlqt mHqq spon oita raSi em zdqt ihoh eSh omSpTio em iSral : oldn amr dn gor arih icnq mn hbSn : olnptli amr nptli Sbe rzon omla brkt ihoh im odrom irSh : olaSr amr brok mbnim aSr ihi rzoi aHio oTbl bSmn rglo : brcl onHSt mnelik okimik dbak : ain kal iSron rkb Smim becrk obgaoto SHqim : menh alhi qdm omtHt cret eolm oigrS mpnik aoib oiamr hSmd : oiSkn iSral bTH bdd ein ieqb al arz dgn otiroS ap Smio ierpo Tl : aSrik iSral mi kmok em noSe bihoh mgn ecrk oaSr Hrb gaotk oikHSo aibik lk oath el bmotimo tdrk :

34

oiel mSh merbt moab al hr nbo raS hpsgh aSr el pni irHo oiraho ihoh at kl harz at hgled ed dn : oat kl nptli oat arz aprim omnSh oat kl arz ihodh ed him haHron : oat hngb oat hkkr bqet irHo eir htmrim ed zer : oiamr ihoh alio cat harz aSr nSbeti labrhm lizHq olieqb lamr lcrek atnnh hraitik beinik oSmh la tebr : oimt Sm mSh ebd ihoh barz moab el pi ihoh : oiqbr ato bgi barz moab mol bit peor ola ide aiS at qbrto ed hiom hch : omSh bn mah oeSrim Snh bmto la khth eino ola ns lHh : oibko bni iSral at mSh berbt moab SlSim iom oitmo imi bki abl mSh : oihoSe bn non mla roH Hkmh ki smk mSh at idio elio oiSmeo alio bni iSral oieSo kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : ola qm nbia eod biSral kmSh aSr ideo ihoh pnim al pnim : lkl hatot ohmoptim aSr SlHo ihoh leSot barz mzrim lpreh olkl ebdio olkl arzo : olkl hid hHcqh olkl hmora hgdol aSr eSh mSh leini kl iSral :

ihoSe

1

oihi aHri mot mSh ebd ihoh oiamr ihoh al ihoSe bn non mSrt mSh lamr : mSh ebdi mt oeth qom ebr at hirdn hch ath okl hem hch al harz aSr anki ntn lhm lbni iSral : kl mqom aSr tdrk kp rglkm bo lkm nttio kaSr dbrti al mSh : mhmdbr ohlbnon hch oed hnhr hgdol nhr prt kl arz hHtim oed him hgdol mboa hSmS ihih gbolkm : la itizb aiS lpnik kl imi Hiik kaSr hiiti em mSh ahih emk la arpk ola aecbk : Hcq oamz ki ath tnHil at hem hch at harz aSr nSbeti labotm ltt lhm : rq Hcq oamz mad lSmr leSot kkl htorh aSr zok mSh ebdi al tsor mmno imin oSmaol lmen tSkil bkl aSr tlk : la imoS spr htorh hch mpik ohgit bo iomm olilh lmen tSmr leSot kkl hktob bo ki ac tzliH at drkk oac tSkil : hloa zoitik Hcq oamz al terz oal tHt ki emk ihoh alhik bkl aSr tlk : oizo ihoSe at STri hem lamr : ebro bqrb hmHnh ozoo at hem lamr hkino lkm zidh ki beod SlSt imim atm ebrim at hirdn hch lboa lrSt at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lkm lrSth : olraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSh amr ihoSe lamr : ckor at hdbr aSr zoh atkm mSh ebd ihoh lamr ihoh alhikm mniH lkm ontn lkm at harz hcat : nSikm Tpkm omqnikm iSbo barz aSr ntn lkm mSh bebr hirdn oatm tebro HmSim lpni aHikm kl gbori hHil oecrtm aotm : ed aSr iniH ihoh laHikm kkm oirSo gm hmh at harz aSr ihoh alhikm ntn lhm oSbtm larz irStkm oirStm aoth aSr ntn lkm mSh ebd ihoh bebr hirdn mcrH hSmS : oieno at ihoSe lamr kl aSr zoitno neSh oal kl aSr tSlHno nlk : kkl aSr Smeno al mSh kn nSme alik rq ihih ihoh alhik emk kaSr hih em mSh : kl aiS aSr imrh at pik ola iSme at dbrik lkl aSr tzono iomt rq Hcq oamz :

2

oiSlH ihoSe bn non mn hSTim Snim anSim mrglim HrS lamr lko rao at harz oat iriHo oilko oibao bit aSh conh oSmh rHb oiSkbo Smh : oiamr lmlk iriHo lamr hnh anSim bao hnh hlilh mbni iSral lHpr at harz : oiSlH mlk iriHo al rHb lamr hoziai hanSim hbaim alik aSr bao lbitk ki lHpr at kl harz bao : otqH haSh at Sni hanSim otzpno otamr kn bao ali hanSim ola ideti main hmh : oihi hSer lsgor bHSk ohanSim
