izao la ideti anh hlko hanSim rdpo mhr aHrihm ki tSigom : ohia heltm hggh otTmnm bpSti hez herkot lh el hgg : ohanSim rdpo aHrihm drk hirdn el hmebrot ohSer sgro aHri kaSr izao hrdpim aHrihm : ohmh Trm iSkbon ohia elth elihm el hgg : otamr al hanSim ideti ki ntn ihoh lkm at harz oki nplh aimtkm elino oki nmgo kl iSbi harz mpnikm : ki Smeno at aSr hobiS ihoh at mi im sop mpnikm bzatkm mmzrim oaSr eSitm lSni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn lsiHn oleog aSr hHrmtm aotm : onSme oims lbbno ola qmh eod roH baiS mpnikm ki ihoh alhikm hoa alhim bSmim mmel oel harz mtHt : oeth hSbeo na li bihoh ki eSiti emkm Hsd oeSitm gm atm em bit abi Hsd onttm li aot amt : ohHitm at abi oat ami oat aHi oat aHoti oat kl aSr lhm ohzltm at npStino mmot : oiamro lh hanSim npSno tHtikm lmot am la tgido at dbrno ch ohih btt ihoh lno at harz oeSino emk Hsd oamt : otordm bHbl bed hHlon ki bith bqir hHomh obHomh hia ioSbt : otamr lhm hhrh lko pn ipgeo bkm hrdpim onHbtm Smh SlSt imim ed Sob hrdpim oaHr tlko ldrkkm : oiamro alih hanSim nqim anHno mSbetk hch aSr hSbetno : hnh anHno baim barz at tqot HoT hSni hch tqSri bHlon aSr hordtno bo oat abik oat amk oat aHik oat kl bit abik taspi alik hbith : ohih kl aSr iza mdlti bitk hHozh dmo braSo oanHno nqim okl aSr ihih atk bbit dmo braSno am id thih bo : oam tgidi at dbrno ch ohiino nqim mSbetk aSr hSbetno : otamr kdbrikm kn hoa otSlHm oilko otqSr at tqot hSni bHlon : oilko oibao hhrh oiSbo Sm SlSt imim ed Sbo hrdpim oibqSo hrdpim bkl hdrk ola mzao : oiSbo Sni hanSim oirdo mhhr oiebro oibao al ihoSe bn non oispro lo at kl hmzaot aotm : oiamro al ihoSe ki ntn ihoh bidno at kl harz ogm nmgo kl iSbi harz mpnino :

3

oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiseo mhSTim oibao ed hirdn hoa okl bni iSral oilno Sm Trm iebro : oihi mqzh SlSt imim oiebro hSTrim bqrb hmHnh : oizoo at hem lamr kraotkm at aron brit ihoh alhikm ohkhnim hloim nSaim ato oatm tseo mmqomkm ohlktm aHrio : ak rHoq ihih binikm obino kalpim amh bmdh al tqrbo alio lmen aSr tdeo at hdrk aSr tlko bh ki la ebrtm bdrk mtmol SlSom : oiamr ihoSe al hem htqdSo ki mHr ieSh ihoh bqrbkm nplaot : oiamr ihoSe al hkhnim lamr Sao at aron hbrit oebro lpni hem oiSao at aron hbrit oilko lpni hem : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe hiom hch aHl gdlk beini kl iSral aSr ideon ki kaSr hiiti em mSh ahih emk : oath tzoh at hkhnim nSai aron hbrit lamr kbakm ed qzh mi hirdn birdn temdo : oiamr ihoSe al bni iSral gSo hnh oSmeo at dbri ihoh alhikm : oiamr ihoSe bcat tdeon ki al Hi bqrbkm ohorS ioriS mpnikm at hkneni oat hHti oat hHoi oat hprci oat hgrgSi ohamri ohibosi : hnh aron hbrit adon kl harz ebr lpnikm birdn : oeth qHo lkm Sni eSr aiS mSbTi iSral aiS aHd aiS aHd lSbT : ohih knoH kpot rgli hkhnim nSai aron ihoh adon kl harz bmi hirdn mi hirdn ikrton hmim hirdim mlmelh oiemdo nd aHd : oihi bnse hem mahlihm lebr at hirdn ohkhnim nSai haron hbrit lpni hem : okboa nSai haron ed hirdn orgli hkhnim nSai haron nTblo bqzh hmim ohirdn mla el kl gdotio kl imi qzir : oiemdo hmim hirdim mlmelh qmo nd aHd hrHq mad badm heir aSr mzd zrtn ohirdim el im herbh im hmlH tmo nkrto ohem ebro ngd iriHo : oiemdo hkhnim nSai haron brit ihoh bHrbh btok hirdn hkn okl iSral ebrim bHrbh ed aSr tmo kl hgoi lebr at hirdn :

4

oihi kaSr tmo kl hgoi lebor at hirdn oiamr ihoh al ihoSe lamr : qHo lkm mn hem Snim eSr anSim aiS aHd aiS aHd mSbT : ozoo aotm lamr Sao lkm mch mtok hirdn mmzb rgli hkhnim hkin Stim eSrh abnim ohebrtm aotm emkm ohnHtm aotm bmlon aSr tlino bo hlilh : oiqra ihoSe al Snim heSr aiS aSr hkin mbni iSral aiS aHd aiS aHd mSbT : oiamr lhm ihoSe ebro lpni aron ihoh alhikm al tok hirdn ohrimo lkm aiS abn aHt el Skmo lmspr SbTi bni iSral : lmen thih cat aot bqrbkm ki iSalon bnikm mHr lamr mh habnim halh lkm : oamrtm lhm aSr nkrto mimi hirdn mpni aron brit ihoh bebro birdn nkrto mi hirdn ohio habnim halh lckron lbni iSral ed eolm : oieSo kn bni iSral kaSr zoh ihoSe oiSao Sti eSrh abnim mtok hirdn kaSr dbr ihoh al ihoSe lmspr SbTi bni iSral oiebrom emm al hmlon oinHom Sm : oStim eSrh abnim hqim ihoSe btok hirdn tHt mzb rgli hkhnim nSai aron hbrit oihio Sm ed hiom hch : ohkhnim nSai haron emdim btok hirdn ed tm kl hdbr aSr zoh ihoh at ihoSe ldbr al hem kkl aSr zoh mSh at ihoSe oimhro hem oiebro : oihi kaSr tm kl hem lebor oiebr aron ihoh ohkhnim lpni hem : oiebro bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh HmSim lpni bni iSral kaSr dbr alihm mSh : karbeim alp Hlozi hzba ebro lpni ihoh lmlHmh al erbot iriHo : biom hhoa gdl ihoh at ihoSe beini kl iSral oirao ato kaSr irao at mSh kl imi Hiio : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe lamr : zoh at hkhnim nSai aron hedot oielo mn hirdn : oizo ihoSe at hkhnim lamr elo mn hirdn : oihi belot hkhnim nSai aron brit ihoh mtok hirdn ntqo kpot rgli hkhnim al hHrbh oiSbo mi hirdn lmqomm oilko ktmol SlSom el kl gdotio : ohem elo mn hirdn beSor lHdS hraSon oiHno bglgl bqzh mcrH iriHo : oat Stim eSrh habnim halh aSr lqHo mn hirdn hqim ihoSe bglgl : oiamr al bni iSral lamr aSr iSalon bnikm mHr at abotm lamr mh habnim halh : ohodetm at bnikm lamr bibSh ebr iSral at hirdn hch : aSr hobiS ihoh alhikm at mi hirdn mpnikm ed ebrkm kaSr eSh ihoh alhikm lim sop aSr hobiS mpnino ed ebrno : lmen det kl emi harz at id ihoh ki Hcqh hia lmen iratm at ihoh alhikm kl himim :

5

oihi kSme kl mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn imh okl mlki hkneni aSr el him at aSr hobiS ihoh at mi hirdn mpni bni iSral ed ebrno oims lbbm ola hih bm eod roH mpni bni iSral : bet hhia amr ihoh al ihoSe eSh lk Hrbot zrim oSob ml at bni iSral Snit : oieS lo ihoSe Hrbot zrim oiml at bni iSral al gbet herlot : och hdbr aSr ml ihoSe kl hem hiza mmzrim hckrim kl anSi hmlHmh mto bmdbr bdrk bzatm mmzrim : ki mlim hio kl hem hizaim okl hem hildim bmdbr bdrk bzatm mmzrim la mlo : ki arbeim Snh hlko bni iSral bmdbr ed tm kl hgoi anSi hmlHmh hizaim mmzrim aSr la Smeo bqol ihoh aSr nSbe ihoh lhm lblti hraotm at harz aSr nSbe ihoh labotm ltt lno arz cbt Hlb odbS : oat bnihm hqim tHtm atm ml ihoSe ki erlim hio ki la mlo aotm bdrk : oihi kaSr tmo kl hgoi lhmol oiSbo tHtm bmHnh ed Hiotm : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe hiom gloti at Hrpt mzrim melikm oiqra Sm hmqom hhoa glgl ed hiom hch : oiHno bni iSral bglgl oieSo at hpsH barbeh eSr iom lHdS berb berbot iriHo : oiaklo mebor harz mmHrt hpsH mzot oqloi bezm hiom hch : oiSbt hmn mmHrt baklm mebor harz ola hih eod lbni iSral mn oiaklo mtboat arz knen bSnh hhia : oihi bhiot ihoSe biriHo oiSa einio oira ohnh aiS emd lngdo oHrbo Sloph bido oilk ihoSe alio oiamr lo hlno ath am lzrino : oiamr la ki ani Sr zba ihoh eth bati oipl ihoSe al pnio arzh oiStHo oiamr lo mh adni mdbr al ebdo : oiamr Sr zba ihoh al ihoSe Sl nelk mel rglk ki hmqom aSr ath emd elio qdS hoa oieS ihoSe kn :

6

oiriHo sgrt omsgrt mpni bni iSral ain ioza oain ba : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe rah ntti bidk at iriHo oat mlkh gbori hHil : osbtm at heir kl anSi hmlHmh hqip at heir pem aHt kh teSh SSt imim : oSbeh khnim iSao Sbeh Soprot hioblim lpni haron obiom hSbiei tsbo at heir Sbe pemim ohkhnim itqeo bSoprot : ohih bmSk bqrn hiobl bSmekm at qol hSopr irieo kl hem troeh gdolh onplh Homt heir tHtih oelo hem aiS ngdo : oiqra ihoSe bn non al hkhnim oiamr alhm Sao at aron hbrit oSbeh khnim iSao Sbeh Soprot ioblim lpni aron ihoh : oiamro al hem ebro osbo at heir ohHloz iebr lpni aron ihoh : oihi kamr ihoSe al hem oSbeh hkhnim nSaim Sbeh Soprot hioblim lpni ihoh ebro otqeo bSoprot oaron brit ihoh hlk aHrihm : ohHloz hlk lpni hkhnim tqeo hSoprot ohmasp hlk aHri haron hlok otqoe bSoprot : oat hem zoh ihoSe lamr la trieo ola tSmieo at qolkm ola iza mpikm dbr ed iom amri alikm hrieo ohrietm : oisb aron ihoh at heir hqp pem aHt oibao hmHnh oilino bmHnh : oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiSao hkhnim at aron ihoh : oSbeh hkhnim nSaim Sbeh Soprot hiblim lpni aron ihoh hlkim hlok otqeo bSoprot ohHloz hlk lpnihm ohmasp hlk aHri aron ihoh holk otqoe bSoprot : oisbo at heir biom hSni pem aHt oiSbo hmHnh kh eSo SSt imim : oihi biom hSbiei oiSkmo kelot hSHr oisbo at heir kmSpT hch Sbe pemim rq biom hhoa sbbo at heir Sbe pemim : oihi bpem hSbieit tqeo hkhnim bSoprot oiamr ihoSe al hem hrieo ki ntn ihoh lkm at heir : ohith heir Hrm hia okl aSr bh lihoh rq rHb hconh tHih hia okl aSr ath bbit ki hHbath at hmlakim aSr SlHno : orq atm Smro mn hHrm pn tHrimo olqHtm mn hHrm oSmtm at mHnh iSral lHrm oekrtm aoto : okl ksp ochb okli nHSt obrcl qdS hoa lihoh aozr ihoh iboa : oire hem oitqeo bSprot oihi kSme hem at qol hSopr oirieo hem troeh gdolh otpl hHomh tHtih oiel hem heirh aiS ngdo oilkdo at heir : oiHrimo at kl aSr beir maiS oed aSh mner oed cqn oed Sor oSh oHmor lpi Hrb : olSnim hanSim hmrglim at harz amr ihoSe bao bit haSh hconh ohoziao mSm at haSh oat kl aSr lh kaSr nSbetm lh : oibao hnerim hmrglim oiziao at rHb oat abih oat amh oat aHih oat kl aSr lh oat kl mSpHotih hoziao oiniHom mHoz lmHnh iSral : oheir Srpo baS okl aSr bh rq hksp ohchb okli hnHSt ohbrcl ntno aozr bit ihoh : oat rHb hconh oat bit abih oat kl aSr lh hHih ihoSe otSb bqrb iSral ed hiom hch ki hHbiah at hmlakim aSr SlH ihoSe lrgl at iriHo : oiSbe ihoSe bet hhia lamr aror haiS lpni ihoh aSr iqom obnh at heir hcat at iriHo bbkro iisdnh obzeiro izib dltih : oihi ihoh at ihoSe oihi Smeo bkl harz :

7

oimelo bni iSral mel bHrm oiqH ekn bn krmi bn cbdi bn crH lmTh ihodh mn hHrm oiHr ap ihoh bbni iSral : oiSlH ihoSe anSim miriHo hei aSr em bit aon mqdm lbit al oiamr alihm lamr elo orglo at harz oielo hanSim oirglo at hei : oiSbo al ihoSe oiamro alio al iel kl hem kalpim aiS ao kSlSt alpim aiS ielo oiko at hei al tige Smh at kl hem ki meT hmh : oielo mn hem Smh kSlSt alpim aiS oinso lpni anSi hei : oiko mhm anSi hei kSlSim oSSh aiS oirdpom lpni hSer ed hSbrim oikom bmord oims lbb hem oihi lmim : oiqre ihoSe Smltio oipl el pnio arzh lpni aron ihoh ed herb hoa ocqni iSral oielo epr el raSm : oiamr ihoSe ahh adni ihoh lmh hebrt hebir at hem hch at hirdn ltt atno bid hamri lhabidno olo hoalno onSb bebr hirdn : bi adni mh amr aHri aSr hpk iSral erp lpni aibio : oiSmeo hkneni okl iSbi harz onsbo elino ohkrito at Smno mn harz omh teSh lSmk hgdol : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe qm lk lmh ch ath npl el pnik : HTa iSral ogm ebro at briti aSr zoiti aotm ogm lqHo mn hHrm ogm gnbo ogm kHSo ogm Smo bklihm : ola iklo bni iSral lqom lpni aibihm erp ipno lpni aibihm ki hio lHrm la aosip lhiot emkm am la tSmido hHrm mqrbkm : qm qdS at hem oamrt htqdSo lmHr ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral Hrm bqrbk iSral la tokl lqom lpni aibik ed hsirkm hHrm mqrbkm : onqrbtm bbqr lSbTikm ohih hSbT aSr ilkdno ihoh iqrb lmSpHot ohmSpHh aSr ilkdnh ihoh tqrb lbtim ohbit aSr ilkdno ihoh iqrb lgbrim : ohih hnlkd bHrm iSrp baS ato oat kl aSr lo ki ebr at brit ihoh oki eSh nblh biSral : oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oiqrb at iSral lSbTio oilkd SbT ihodh : oiqrb at mSpHt ihodh oilkd at mSpHt hcrHi oiqrb at mSpHt hcrHi lgbrim oilkd cbdi : oiqrb at bito lgbrim oilkd ekn bn krmi bn cbdi bn crH lmTh ihodh : oiamr ihoSe al ekn bni Sim na kbod lihoh alhi iSral otn lo todh ohgd na li mh eSit al tkHd mmni : oien ekn at ihoSe oiamr amnh anki HTati lihoh alhi iSral okcat okcat eSiti : oarah bSll adrt Sner aHt Tobh omatim Sqlim ksp olSon chb aHd HmSim Sqlim mSqlo oaHmdm oaqHm ohnm Tmonim barz btok hahli ohksp tHtih : oiSlH ihoSe mlakim oirzo hahlh ohnh Tmonh bahlo ohksp tHtih : oiqHom mtok hahl oibaom al ihoSe oal kl bni iSral oizqm lpni ihoh : oiqH ihoSe at ekn bn crH oat hksp oat hadrt oat lSon hchb oat bnio oat bntio oat Soro oat Hmro oat zano oat ahlo oat kl aSr lo okl iSral emo oielo atm emq ekor : oiamr ihoSe mh ekrtno iekrk ihoh biom hch oirgmo ato kl iSral abn oiSrpo atm baS oisqlo atm babnim : oiqimo elio gl abnim gdol ed hiom hch oiSb ihoh mHron apo el kn qra Sm hmqom hhoa emq ekor ed hiom hch :

8

oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira oal tHt qH emk at kl em hmlHmh oqom elh hei rah ntti bidk at mlk hei oat emo oat eiro oat arzo : oeSit lei olmlkh kaSr eSit liriHo olmlkh rq Sllh obhmth tbco lkm Sim lk arb leir maHrih : oiqm ihoSe okl em hmlHmh lelot hei oibHr ihoSe SlSim alp aiS gbori hHil oiSlHm lilh : oizo atm lamr rao atm arbim leir maHri heir al trHiqo mn heir mad ohiitm klkm nknim : oani okl hem aSr ati nqrb al heir ohih ki izao lqratno kaSr braSnh onsno lpnihm : oizao aHrino ed htiqno aotm mn heir ki iamro nsim lpnino kaSr braSnh onsno lpnihm : oatm tqmo mhaorb ohorStm at heir ontnh ihoh alhikm bidkm : ohih ktpSkm at heir tzito at heir baS kdbr ihoh teSo rao zoiti atkm : oiSlHm ihoSe oilko al hmarb oiSbo bin bit al obin hei mim lei oiln ihoSe blilh hhoa btok hem : oiSkm ihoSe bbqr oipqd at hem oiel hoa ocqni iSral lpni hem hei : okl hem hmlHmh aSr ato elo oigSo oibao ngd heir oiHno mzpon lei ohgi bino obin hei : oiqH kHmSt alpim aiS oiSm aotm arb bin bit al obin hei mim leir : oiSimo hem at kl hmHnh aSr mzpon leir oat eqbo mim leir oilk ihoSe blilh hhoa btok hemq : oihi kraot mlk hei oimhro oiSkimo oizao anSi heir lqrat iSral lmlHmh hoa okl emo lmoed lpni herbh ohoa la ide ki arb lo maHri heir : oingeo ihoSe okl iSral lpnihm oinso drk hmdbr : oiceqo kl hem aSr beir lrdp aHrihm oirdpo aHri ihoSe ointqo mn heir : ola nSar aiS bei obit al aSr la izao aHri iSral oiecbo at heir ptoHh oirdpo aHri iSral : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe nTh bkidon aSr bidk al hei ki bidk atnnh oiT ihoSe bkidon aSr bido al heir : ohaorb qm mhrh mmqomo oirozo knTot ido oibao heir oilkdoh oimhro oizito at heir baS : oipno anSi hei aHrihm oirao ohnh elh eSn heir hSmimh ola hih bhm idim lnos hnh ohnh ohem hns hmdbr nhpk al hrodp : oihoSe okl iSral rao ki lkd harb at heir oki elh eSn heir oiSbo oiko at anSi hei : oalh izao mn heir lqratm oihio liSral btok alh mch oalh mch oiko aotm ed blti hSair lo Srid opliT : oat mlk hei tpSo Hi oiqrbo ato al ihoSe : oihi kklot iSral lhrg at kl iSbi hei bSdh bmdbr aSr rdpom bo oiplo klm lpi Hrb ed tmm oiSbo kl iSral hei oiko ath lpi Hrb : oihi kl hnplim biom hhoa maiS oed aSh Snim eSr alp kl anSi hei : oihoSe la hSib ido aSr nTh bkidon ed aSr hHrim at kl iSbi hei : rq hbhmh oSll heir hhia bcco lhm iSral kdbr ihoh aSr zoh at ihoSe : oiSrp ihoSe at hei oiSimh tl eolm Smmh ed hiom hch : oat mlk hei tlh el hez ed et herb okboa hSmS zoh ihoSe oirido at nblto mn hez oiSliko aoth al ptH Ser heir oiqimo elio gl abnim gdol ed hiom hch : ac ibnh ihoSe mcbH lihoh alhi iSral bhr eibl : kaSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh at bni iSral kktob bspr tort mSh mcbH abnim Slmot aSr la hnip elihn brcl oielo elio elot lihoh oicbHo Slmim : oiktb Sm el habnim at mSnh tort mSh aSr ktb lpni bni iSral : okl iSral ocqnio oSTrim oSpTio emdim mch omch laron ngd hkhnim hloim nSai aron brit ihoh kgr kacrH Hzio al mol hr grcim ohHzio al mol hr eibl kaSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh lbrk at hem iSral braSnh : oaHri kn qra at kl dbri htorh hbrkh ohqllh kkl hktob bspr htorh : la hih dbr mkl aSr zoh mSh aSr la qra ihoSe ngd kl qhl iSral ohnSim ohTp ohgr hhlk bqrbm :

9

oihi kSme kl hmlkim aSr bebr hirdn bhr obSplh obkl Hop him hgdol al mol hlbnon hHti ohamri hkneni hprci hHoi ohibosi : oitqbzo iHdo lhlHm em ihoSe oem iSral ph aHd : oiSbi gbeon Smeo at aSr eSh ihoSe liriHo olei : oieSo gm hmh bermh oilko oizTiro oiqHo Sqim blim lHmorihm onadot iin blim ombqeim omzrrim : onelot blot omTlaot brglihm oSlmot blot elihm okl lHm zidm ibS hih nqdim : oilko al ihoSe al hmHnh hglgl oiamro alio oal aiS iSral marz rHoqh bano oeth krto lno brit : oiamro aiS iSral al hHoi aoli bqrbi ath ioSb oaik akrot lk brit : oiamro al ihoSe ebdik anHno oiamr alhm ihoSe mi atm omain tbao : oiamro alio marz rHoqh mad bao ebdik lSm ihoh alhik ki Smeno Smeo oat kl aSr eSh bmzrim : oat kl aSr eSh lSni mlki hamri aSr bebr hirdn lsiHon mlk HSbon oleog mlk hbSn aSr beStrot : oiamro alino cqinino okl iSbi arzno lamr qHo bidkm zidh ldrk olko lqratm oamrtm alihm ebdikm anHno oeth krto lno brit : ch lHmno Hm hzTidno ato mbtino biom zatno llkt alikm oeth hnh ibS ohih nqdim : oalh nadot hiin aSr mlano HdSim ohnh htbqeo oalh Slmotino onelino blo mrb hdrk mad : oiqHo hanSim mzidm oat pi ihoh la Salo : oieS lhm ihoSe Slom oikrt lhm brit lHiotm oiSbeo lhm nSiai hedh : oihi mqzh SlSt imim aHri aSr krto lhm brit oiSmeo ki qrbim hm alio obqrbo hm iSbim : oiseo bni iSral oibao al erihm biom hSliSi oerihm gbeon ohkpirh obarot oqrit ierim : ola hkom bni iSral ki nSbeo lhm nSiai hedh bihoh alhi iSral oilno kl hedh el hnSiaim : oiamro kl hnSiaim al kl hedh anHno nSbeno lhm bihoh alhi iSral oeth la nokl lnge bhm : cat neSh lhm ohHih aotm ola ihih elino qzp el hSboeh aSr nSbeno lhm : oiamro alihm hnSiaim iHio oihio HTbi ezim oSabi mim lkl hedh kaSr dbro lhm hnSiaim : oiqra lhm ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr lmh rmitm atno lamr rHoqim anHno mkm mad oatm bqrbno iSbim : oeth arorim atm ola ikrt mkm ebd oHTbi ezim oSabi mim lbit alhi : oieno at ihoSe oiamro ki hgd hgd lebdik at aSr zoh ihoh alhik at mSh ebdo ltt lkm at kl harz olhSmid at kl iSbi harz mpnikm onira mad lnpStino mpnikm oneSh at hdbr hch : oeth hnno bidk kTob okiSr beinik leSot lno eSh : oieS lhm kn oizl aotm mid bni iSral ola hrgom : oitnm ihoSe biom hhoa HTbi ezim oSabi mim ledh olmcbH ihoh ed hiom hch al hmqom aSr ibHr :

10

oihi kSme adni zdq mlk iroSlm ki lkd ihoSe at hei oiHrimh kaSr eSh liriHo olmlkh kn eSh lei olmlkh oki hSlimo iSbi gbeon at iSral oihio bqrbm : oiirao mad ki eir gdolh gbeon kaHt eri hmmlkh oki hia gdolh mn hei okl anSih gbrim : oiSlH adni zdq mlk iroSlm al hohm mlk Hbron oal pram mlk irmot oal ipie mlk lkiS oal dbir mlk eglon lamr : elo ali oecrni onkh at gbeon ki hSlimh at ihoSe oat bni iSral : oiaspo oielo HmSt mlki hamri mlk iroSlm mlk Hbron mlk irmot mlk lkiS mlk eglon hm okl mHnihm oiHno el gbeon oilHmo elih : oiSlHo anSi gbeon al ihoSe al hmHnh hglglh lamr al trp idik mebdik elh alino mhrh ohoSieh lno oecrno ki nqbzo alino kl mlki hamri iSbi hhr : oiel ihoSe mn hglgl hoa okl em hmlHmh emo okl gbori hHil : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira mhm ki bidk nttim la iemd aiS mhm bpnik : oiba alihm ihoSe ptam kl hlilh elh mn hglgl : oihmm ihoh lpni iSral oikm mkh gdolh bgbeon oirdpm drk melh bit Horn oikm ed ecqh oed mqdh : oihi bnsm mpni iSral hm bmord bit Horn oihoh hSlik elihm abnim gdlot mn hSmim ed ecqh oimto rbim aSr mto babni hbrd maSr hrgo bni iSral bHrb : ac idbr ihoSe lihoh biom tt ihoh at hamri lpni bni iSral oiamr leini iSral SmS bgbeon dom oirH bemq ailon : oidm hSmS oirH emd ed iqm goi aibio hla hia ktobh el spr hiSr oiemd hSmS bHzi hSmim ola az lboa kiom tmim : ola hih kiom hhoa lpnio oaHrio lSme ihoh bqol aiS ki ihoh nlHm liSral : oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo al hmHnh hglglh : oinso HmSt hmlkim halh oiHbao bmerh bmqdh : oigd lihoSe lamr nmzao HmSt hmlkim nHbaim bmerh bmqdh : oiamr ihoSe glo abnim gdlot al pi hmerh ohpqido elih anSim lSmrm : oatm al temdo rdpo aHri aibikm ocnbtm aotm al ttnom lboa al erihm ki ntnm ihoh alhikm bidkm : oihi kklot ihoSe obni iSral lhkotm mkh gdolh mad ed tmm ohSridim Srdo mhm oibao al eri hmbzr : oiSbo kl hem al hmHnh al ihoSe mqdh bSlom la Hrz lbni iSral laiS at lSno : oiamr ihoSe ptHo at pi hmerh ohoziao ali at HmSt hmlkim halh mn hmerh : oieSo kn oiziao alio at HmSt hmlkim halh mn hmerh at mlk iroSlm at mlk Hbron at mlk irmot at mlk lkiS at mlk eglon : oihi khoziam at hmlkim halh al ihoSe oiqra ihoSe al kl aiS iSral oiamr al qzini anSi hmlHmh hhlkoa ato qrbo Simo at rglikm el zoari hmlkim halh oiqrbo oiSimo at rglihm el zoarihm : oiamr alihm ihoSe al tirao oal tHto Hcqo oamzo ki kkh ieSh ihoh lkl aibikm aSr atm nlHmim aotm : oikm ihoSe aHri kn oimitm oitlm el HmSh ezim oihio tloim el hezim ed herb : oihi let boa hSmS zoh ihoSe oiridom mel hezim oiSlkm al hmerh aSr nHbao Sm oiSmo abnim gdlot el pi hmerh ed ezm hiom hch : oat mqdh lkd ihoSe biom hhoa oikh lpi Hrb oat mlkh hHrm aotm oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair Srid oieS lmlk mqdh kaSr eSh lmlk iriHo : oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mmqdh lbnh oilHm em lbnh : oitn ihoh gm aoth bid iSral oat mlkh oikh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair bh Srid oieS lmlkh kaSr eSh lmlk iriHo : oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mlbnh lkiSh oiHn elih oilHm bh : oitn ihoh at lkiS bid iSral oilkdh biom hSni oikh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh kkl aSr eSh llbnh : ac elh hrm mlk gcr lecr at lkiS oikho ihoSe oat emo ed blti hSair lo Srid : oiebr ihoSe okl iSral emo mlkiS eglnh oiHno elih oilHmo elih : oilkdoh biom hhoa oikoh lpi Hrb oat kl hnpS aSr bh biom hhoa hHrim kkl aSr eSh llkiS : oiel ihoSe okl iSral emo meglonh Hbronh oilHmo elih : oilkdoh oikoh lpi Hrb oat mlkh oat kl erih oat kl hnpS aSr bh la hSair Srid kkl aSr eSh leglon oiHrm aoth oat kl hnpS aSr bh : oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo dbrh oilHm elih : oilkdh oat mlkh oat kl erih oikom lpi Hrb oiHrimo at kl npS aSr bh la hSair Srid kaSr eSh lHbron kn eSh ldbrh olmlkh okaSr eSh llbnh olmlkh : oikh ihoSe at kl harz hhr ohngb ohSplh ohaSdot oat kl mlkihm la hSair Srid oat kl hnSmh hHrim kaSr zoh ihoh alhi iSral : oikm ihoSe mqdS brne oed ech oat kl arz gSn oed gbeon : oat kl hmlkim halh oat arzm lkd ihoSe pem aHt ki ihoh alhi iSral nlHm liSral : oiSb ihoSe okl iSral emo al hmHnh hglglh :

11

oihi kSme ibin mlk Hzor oiSlH al iobb mlk mdon oal mlk Smron oal mlk akSp : oal hmlkim aSr mzpon bhr oberbh ngb knrot obSplh obnpot dor mim : hkneni mmcrH omim ohamri ohHti ohprci ohibosi bhr ohHoi tHt Hrmon barz hmzph : oizao hm okl mHnihm emm em rb kHol aSr el Spt him lrb osos orkb rb mad : oioedo kl hmlkim halh oibao oiHno iHdo al mi mrom lhlHm em iSral : oiamr ihoh al ihoSe al tira mpnihm ki mHr ket hcat anki ntn at klm Hllim lpni iSral at sosihm teqr oat mrkbtihm tSrp baS : oiba ihoSe okl em hmlHmh emo elihm el mi mrom ptam oiplo bhm : oitnm ihoh bid iSral oikom oirdpom ed zidon rbh oed mSrpot mim oed bqet mzph mcrHh oikm ed blti hSair lhm Srid : oieS lhm ihoSe kaSr amr lo ihoh at sosihm eqr oat mrkbtihm Srp baS : oiSb ihoSe bet hhia oilkd at Hzor oat mlkh hkh bHrb ki Hzor lpnim hia raS kl hmmlkot halh : oiko at kl hnpS aSr bh lpi Hrb hHrm la notr kl nSmh oat Hzor Srp baS : oat kl eri hmlkim halh oat kl mlkihm lkd ihoSe oikm lpi Hrb hHrim aotm kaSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh : rq kl herim hemdot el tlm la Srpm iSral colti at Hzor lbdh Srp ihoSe : okl Sll herim halh ohbhmh bcco lhm bni iSral rq at kl hadm hko lpi Hrb ed hSmdm aotm la hSairo kl nSmh : kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh ebdo kn zoh mSh at ihoSe okn eSh ihoSe la hsir dbr mkl aSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiqH ihoSe at kl harz hcat hhr oat kl hngb oat kl arz hgSn oat hSplh oat herbh oat hr iSral oSplth : mn hhr hHlq heolh Seir oed bel gd bbqet hlbnon tHt hr Hrmon oat kl mlkihm lkd oikm oimitm : imim rbim eSh ihoSe at kl hmlkim halh mlHmh : la hith eir aSr hSlimh al bni iSral blti hHoi iSbi gbeon at hkl lqHo bmlHmh : ki mat ihoh hith lHcq at lbm lqrat hmlHmh at iSral lmen hHrimm lblti hiot lhm tHnh ki lmen hSmidm kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh : oiba ihoSe bet hhia oikrt at henqim mn hhr mn Hbron mn dbr mn enb omkl hr ihodh omkl hr iSral em erihm hHrimm ihoSe : la notr enqim barz bni iSral rq bech bgt obaSdod nSaro : oiqH ihoSe at kl harz kkl aSr dbr ihoh al mSh oitnh ihoSe lnHlh liSral kmHlqtm lSbTihm oharz SqTh mmlHmh :

12

oalh mlki harz aSr hko bni iSral oirSo at arzm bebr hirdn mcrHh hSmS mnHl arnon ed hr Hrmon okl herbh mcrHh : siHon mlk hamri hioSb bHSbon mSl meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon otok hnHl oHzi hgled oed ibq hnHl gbol bni emon : oherbh ed im knrot mcrHh oed im herbh im hmlH mcrHh drk bit hiSmot omtimn tHt aSdot hpsgh : ogbol eog mlk hbSn mitr hrpaim hioSb beStrot obadrei : omSl bhr Hrmon obslkh obkl hbSn ed gbol hgSori ohmekti oHzi hgled gbol siHon mlk HSbon : mSh ebd ihoh obni iSral hkom oitnh mSh ebd ihoh irSh lraobni olgdi olHzi SbT hmnSh : oalh mlki harz aSr hkh ihoSe obni iSral bebr hirdn imh mbel gd bbqet hlbnon oed hhr hHlq helh Seirh oitnh ihoSe lSbTi iSral irSh kmHlqtm : bhr obSplh oberbh obaSdot obmdbr obngb hHti hamri ohkneni hprci hHoi ohibosi : mlk iriHo aHd mlk hei aSr mzd bit al aHd : mlk iroSlm aHd mlk Hbron aHd : mlk irmot aHd mlk lkiS aHd : mlk eglon aHd mlk gcr aHd : mlk dbr aHd mlk gdr aHd : mlk Hrmh aHd mlk erd aHd : mlk lbnh aHd mlk edlm aHd : mlk mqdh aHd mlk bit al aHd : mlk tpoH aHd mlk Hpr aHd : mlk apq aHd mlk lSron aHd : mlk mdon aHd mlk Hzor aHd : mlk Smron mraon aHd mlk akSp aHd : mlk tenk aHd mlk mgdo aHd : mlk qdS aHd mlk iqnem lkrml aHd : mlk dor lnpt dor aHd mlk goim lglgl aHd : mlk trzh aHd kl mlkim SlSim oaHd :

13

oihoSe cqn ba bimim oiamr ihoh alio ath cqnth bat bimim oharz nSarh hrbh mad lrSth : cat harz hnSart kl glilot hplStim okl hgSori : mn hSiHor aSr el pni mzrim oed gbol eqron zponh lkneni tHSb HmSt srni plStim hecti ohaSdodi haSqloni hgti oheqroni oheoim : mtimn kl arz hkneni omerh aSr lzidnim ed apqh ed gbol hamri : oharz hgbli okl hlbnon mcrH hSmS mbel gd tHt hr Hrmon ed lboa Hmt : kl iSbi hhr mn hlbnon ed mSrpt mim kl zidnim anki aoriSm mpni bni iSral rq hplh liSral bnHlh kaSr zoitik : oeth Hlq at harz hcat bnHlh ltSet hSbTim oHzi hSbT hmnSh : emo hraobni ohgdi lqHo nHltm aSr ntn lhm mSh bebr hirdn mcrHh kaSr ntn lhm mSh ebd ihoh : meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon oheir aSr btok hnHl okl hmiSr midba ed dibon : okl eri siHon mlk hamri aSr mlk bHSbon ed gbol bni emon : ohgled ogbol hgSori ohmekti okl hr Hrmon okl hbSn ed slkh : kl mmlkot eog bbSn aSr mlk beStrot obadrei hoa nSar mitr hrpaim oikm mSh oirSm : ola horiSo bni iSral at hgSori oat hmekti oiSb gSor omekt bqrb iSral ed hiom hch : rq lSbT hloi la ntn nHlh aSi ihoh alhi iSral hoa nHlto kaSr dbr lo : oitn mSh lmTh bni raobn lmSpHtm : oihi lhm hgbol meroer aSr el Spt nHl arnon oheir aSr btok hnHl okl hmiSr el midba : HSbon okl erih aSr bmiSr dibon obmot bel obit bel meon : oihzh oqdmt ompet : oqritim oSbmh ozrt hSHr bhr hemq : obit peor oaSdot hpsgh obit hiSmot : okl eri hmiSr okl mmlkot siHon mlk hamri aSr mlk bHSbon aSr hkh mSh ato oat nSiai mdin at aoi oat rqm oat zor oat Hor oat rbe nsiki siHon iSbi harz : oat blem bn beor hqosm hrgo bni iSral bHrb al Hllihm : oihi gbol bni raobn hirdn ogbol cat nHlt bni raobn lmSpHtm herim oHzrihn : oitn mSh lmTh gd lbni gd lmSpHtm : oihi lhm hgbol iecr okl eri hgled oHzi arz bni emon ed eroer aSr el pni rbh : omHSbon ed rmt hmzph obTnim ommHnim ed gbol ldbr : obemq bit hrm obit nmrh oskot ozpon itr mmlkot siHon mlk HSbon hirdn ogbl ed qzh im knrt ebr hirdn mcrHh : cat nHlt bni gd lmSpHtm herim oHzrihm : oitn mSh lHzi SbT mnSh oihi lHzi mTh bni mnSh lmSpHotm : oihi gbolm mmHnim kl hbSn kl mmlkot eog mlk hbSn okl Hot iair aSr bbSn SSim eir : oHzi hgled oeStrot oadrei eri mmlkot eog bbSn lbni mkir bn mnSh lHzi bni mkir lmSpHotm : alh aSr nHl mSh berbot moab mebr lirdn iriHo mcrHh : olSbT hloi la ntn mSh nHlh ihoh alhi iSral hoa nHltm kaSr dbr lhm :

14

oalh aSr nHlo bni iSral barz knen aSr nHlo aotm alecr hkhn oihoSe bn non oraSi abot hmTot lbni iSral : bgorl nHltm kaSr zoh ihoh bid mSh ltSet hmTot oHzi hmTh : ki ntn mSh nHlt Sni hmTot oHzi hmTh mebr lirdn olloim la ntn nHlh btokm : ki hio bni iosp Sni mTot mnSh oaprim ola ntno Hlq lloim barz ki am erim lSbt omgrSihm lmqnihm olqninm : kaSr zoh ihoh at mSh kn eSo bni iSral oiHlqo at harz : oigSo bni ihodh al ihoSe bglgl oiamr alio klb bn ipnh hqnci ath idet at hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al mSh aiS halhim el adoti oel adotik bqdS brne : bn arbeim Snh anki bSlH mSh ebd ihoh ati mqdS brne lrgl at harz oaSb ato dbr kaSr em lbbi : oaHi aSr elo emi hmsio at lb hem oanki mlati aHri ihoh alhi : oiSbe mSh biom hhoa lamr am la harz aSr drkh rglk bh lk thih lnHlh olbnik ed eolm ki mlat aHri ihoh alhi : oeth hnh hHih ihoh aoti kaSr dbr ch arbeim oHmS Snh mac dbr ihoh at hdbr hch al mSh aSr hlk iSral bmdbr oeth hnh anki hiom bn HmS oSmonim Snh : eodni hiom Hcq kaSr biom SlH aoti mSh kkHi ac okkHi eth lmlHmh olzat olboa : oeth tnh li at hhr hch aSr dbr ihoh biom hhoa ki ath Smet biom hhoa ki enqim Sm oerim gdlot bzrot aoli ihoh aoti ohorStim kaSr dbr ihoh : oibrkho ihoSe oitn at Hbron lklb bn ipnh lnHlh : el kn hith Hbron lklb bn ipnh hqnci lnHlh ed hiom hch ien aSr mla aHri ihoh alhi iSral : oSm Hbron lpnim qrit arbe hadm hgdol benqim hoa oharz SqTh mmlHmh :

15

oihi hgorl lmTh bni ihodh lmSpHtm al gbol adom mdbr zn ngbh mqzh timn : oihi lhm gbol ngb mqzh im hmlH mn hlSn hpnh ngbh : oiza al mngb lmelh eqrbim oebr znh oelh mngb lqdS brne oebr Hzron oelh adrh onsb hqrqeh : oebr ezmonh oiza nHl mzrim ohih tzaot hgbol imh ch ihih lkm gbol ngb : ogbol qdmh im hmlH ed qzh hirdn ogbol lpat zponh mlSon him mqzh hirdn : oelh hgbol bit Hglh oebr mzpon lbit herbh oelh hgbol abn bhn bn raobn : oelh hgbol dbrh memq ekor ozponh pnh al hglgl aSr nkH lmelh admim aSr mngb lnHl oebr hgbol al mi ein SmS ohio tzatio al ein rgl : oelh hgbol gi bn hnm al ktp hibosi mngb hia iroSlm oelh hgbol al raS hhr aSr el pni gi hnm imh aSr bqzh emq rpaim zpnh : otar hgbol mraS hhr al mein mi nptoH oiza al eri hr epron otar hgbol belh hia qrit ierim : onsb hgbol mbelh imh al hr Seir oebr al ktp hr ierim mzponh hia kslon oird bit SmS oebr tmnh : oiza hgbol al ktp eqron zponh otar hgbol Skronh oebr hr hbelh oiza ibnal ohio tzaot hgbol imh : ogbol im himh hgdol ogbol ch gbol bni ihodh sbib lmSpHtm : olklb bn ipnh ntn Hlq btok bni ihodh al pi ihoh lihoSe at qrit arbe abi henq hia Hbron : oirS mSm klb at SloSh bni henq at SSi oat aHimn oat tlmi ilidi henq : oiel mSm al iSbi dbr oSm dbr lpnim qrit spr : oiamr klb aSr ikh at qrit spr olkdh ontti lo at eksh bti laSh : oilkdh etnial bn qnc aHi klb oitn lo at eksh bto laSh : oihi bboah otsitho lSaol mat abih Sdh otznH mel hHmor oiamr lh klb mh lk : otamr tnh li brkh ki arz hngb nttni ontth li glt mim oitn lh at glt eliot oat glt tHtiot : cat nHlt mTh bni ihodh lmSpHtm : oihio herim mqzh lmTh bni ihodh al gbol adom bngbh qbzal oedr oigor : oqinh odimonh oededh : oqdS oHzor oitnn : cip oTlm obelot : oHzor Hdth oqriot Hzron hia Hzor : amm oSme omoldh : oHzr gdh oHSmon obit plT : oHzr Soel obar Sbe obciotih : belh oeiim oezm : oaltold oksil oHrmh : ozqlg omdmnh osnsnh : olbaot oSlHim oein ormon kl erim eSrim otSe oHzrihn : bSplh aStaol ozreh oaSnh : ocnoH oein gnim tpoH oheinm : irmot oedlm Sokh oecqh : oSerim oeditim ohgdrh ogdrtim erim arbe eSrh oHzrihn : znn oHdSh omgdl gd : odlen ohmzph oiqtal : lkiS obzqt oeglon : okbon olHms oktliS : ogdrot bit dgon onemh omqdh erim SS eSrh oHzrihn : lbnh oetr oeSn : oiptH oaSnh onzib : oqeilh oakcib omraSh erim tSe oHzrihn : eqron obntih oHzrih : meqron oimh kl aSr el id aSdod oHzrihn : aSdod bnotih oHzrih ech bnotih oHzrih ed nHl mzrim ohim hgbol ogbol : obhr Smir oitir oSokh : odnh oqrit snh hia dbr : oenb oaStmh oenim : ogSn oHln oglh erim aHt eSrh oHzrihn : arb oromh oaSen : oinim obit tpoH oapqh : oHmTh oqrit arbe hia Hbron ozier erim tSe oHzrihn : meon krml ocip oioTh : oicreal oiqdem ocnoH : hqin gbeh otmnh erim eSr oHzrihn : HlHol bit zor ogdor : omert obit enot oaltqn erim SS oHzrihn : qrit bel hia qrit ierim ohrbh erim Stim oHzrihn : bmdbr bit herbh mdin oskkh : ohnbSn oeir hmlH oein gdi erim SS oHzrihn : oat hibosi ioSbi iroSlm la ioklo bni ihodh lhoriSm oiSb hibosi at bni ihodh biroSlm ed hiom hch :

16

oiza hgorl lbni iosp mirdn iriHo lmi iriHo mcrHh hmdbr elh miriHo bhr bit al : oiza mbit al loch oebr al gbol harki eTrot : oird imh al gbol hiplTi ed gbol bit Horn tHton oed gcr ohio tzato imh : oinHlo bni iosp mnSh oaprim : oihi gbol bni aprim lmSpHtm oihi gbol nHltm mcrHh eTrot adr ed bit Horn elion : oiza hgbol himh hmkmtt mzpon onsb hgbol mcrHh tant Slh oebr aoto mmcrH inoHh : oird minoHh eTrot onerth opge biriHo oiza hirdn : mtpoH ilk hgbol imh nHl qnh ohio tzatio himh cat nHlt mTh bni aprim lmSpHtm : oherim hmbdlot lbni aprim btok nHlt bni mnSh kl herim oHzrihn : ola horiSo at hkneni hioSb bgcr oiSb hkneni bqrb aprim ed hiom hch oihi lms ebd :

17

oihi hgorl lmTh mnSh ki hoa bkor iosp lmkir bkor mnSh abi hgled ki hoa hih aiS mlHmh oihi lo hgled ohbSn : oihi lbni mnSh hnotrim lmSpHtm lbni abiecr olbni Hlq olbni aSrial olbni Skm olbni Hpr olbni Smide alh bni mnSh bn iosp hckrim lmSpHtm : olzlpHd bn Hpr bn gled bn mkir bn mnSh la hio lo bnim ki am bnot oalh Smot bntio mHlh oneh Hglh mlkh otrzh : otqrbnh lpni alecr hkhn olpni ihoSe bn non olpni hnSiaim lamr ihoh zoh at mSh ltt lno nHlh btok aHino oitn lhm al pi ihoh nHlh btok aHi abihn : oiplo Hbli mnSh eSrh lbd marz hgled ohbSn aSr mebr lirdn : ki bnot mnSh nHlo nHlh btok bnio oarz hgled hith lbni mnSh hnotrim : oihi gbol mnSh maSr hmkmtt aSr el pni Skm ohlk hgbol al himin al iSbi ein tpoH : lmnSh hith arz tpoH otpoH al gbol mnSh lbni aprim : oird hgbol nHl qnh ngbh lnHl erim halh laprim btok eri mnSh ogbol mnSh mzpon lnHl oihi tzatio himh : ngbh laprim ozponh lmnSh oihi him gbolo obaSr ipgeon mzpon obiSSkr mmcrH : oihi lmnSh biSSkr obaSr bit San obnotih oiblem obnotih oat iSbi dar obnotih oiSbi ein dr obntih oiSbi tenk obntih oiSbi mgdo obnotih SlSt hnpt : ola iklo bni mnSh lhoriS at herim halh oioal hkneni lSbt barz hcat : oihi ki Hcqo bni iSral oitno at hkneni lms ohorS la horiSo : oidbro bni iosp at ihoSe lamr mdoe ntth li nHlh gorl aHd oHbl aHd oani em rb ed aSr ed kh brkni ihoh : oiamr alihm ihoSe am em rb ath elh lk hierh obrat lk Sm barz hprci ohrpaim ki az lk hr aprim : oiamro bni iosp la imza lno hhr orkb brcl bkl hkneni hiSb barz hemq laSr bbit San obnotih olaSr bemq icreal : oiamr ihoSe al bit iosp laprim olmnSh lamr em rb ath okH gdol lk la ihih lk gorl aHd : ki hr ihih lk ki ier hoa obrato ohih lk tzatio ki toriS at hkneni ki rkb brcl lo ki Hcq hoa :

18

oiqhlo kl edt bni iSral Slh oiSkino Sm at ahl moed oharz nkbSh lpnihm : oiotro bbni iSral aSr la Hlqo at nHltm Sbeh SbTim : oiamr ihoSe al bni iSral ed anh atm mtrpim lboa lrSt at harz aSr ntn lkm ihoh alhi abotikm : hbo lkm SlSh anSim lSbT oaSlHm oiqmo oithlko barz oiktbo aoth lpi nHltm oibao ali : ohtHlqo ath lSbeh Hlqim ihodh iemd el gbolo mngb obit iosp iemdo el gbolm mzpon : oatm tktbo at harz Sbeh Hlqim ohbatm ali hnh oiriti lkm gorl ph lpni ihoh alhino : ki ain Hlq lloim bqrbkm ki khnt ihoh nHlto ogd oraobn oHzi SbT hmnSh lqHo nHltm mebr lirdn mcrHh aSr ntn lhm mSh ebd ihoh : oiqmo hanSim oilko oizo ihoSe at hhlkim lktb at harz lamr lko ohthlko barz oktbo aoth oSobo ali oph aSlik lkm gorl lpni ihoh bSlh : oilko hanSim oiebro barz oiktboh lerim lSbeh Hlqim el spr oibao al ihoSe al hmHnh Slh : oiSlk lhm ihoSe gorl bSlh lpni ihoh oiHlq Sm ihoSe at harz lbni iSral kmHlqtm : oiel gorl mTh bni bnimn lmSpHtm oiza gbol gorlm bin bni ihodh obin bni iosp : oihi lhm hgbol lpat zponh mn hirdn oelh hgbol al ktp iriHo mzpon oelh bhr imh ohih tzatio mdbrh bit aon : oebr mSm hgbol loch al ktp loch ngbh hia bit al oird hgbol eTrot adr el hhr aSr mngb lbit Hron tHton : otar hgbol onsb lpat im ngbh mn hhr aSr el pni bit Hron ngbh ohih tzatio al qrit bel hia qrit ierim eir bni ihodh cat pat im : opat ngbh mqzh qrit ierim oiza hgbol imh oiza al mein mi nptoH : oird hgbol al qzh hhr aSr el pni gi bn hnm aSr bemq rpaim zponh oird gi hnm al ktp hibosi ngbh oird ein rgl : otar mzpon oiza ein SmS oiza al glilot aSr nkH melh admim oird abn bhn bn raobn : oebr al ktp mol herbh zponh oird herbth : oebr hgbol al ktp bit Hglh zponh ohih tzaotio hgbol al lSon im hmlH zponh al qzh hirdn ngbh ch gbol ngb : ohirdn igbl ato lpat qdmh cat nHlt bni bnimn lgboltih sbib lmSpHtm : ohio herim lmTh bni bnimn lmSpHotihm iriHo obit Hglh oemq qziz : obit herbh ozmrim obit al : oheoim ohprh oeprh : okpr hemni ohepni ogbe erim Stim eSrh oHzrihn : gbeon ohrmh obarot : ohmzph ohkpirh ohmzh : orqm oirpal otralh : ozle halp ohibosi hia iroSlm gbet qrit erim arbe eSrh oHzrihn cat nHlt bni bnimn lmSpHtm :

19

oiza hgorl hSni lSmeon lmTh bni Smeon lmSpHotm oihi nHltm btok nHlt bni ihodh : oihi lhm bnHltm bar Sbe oSbe omoldh : oHzr Soel oblh oezm : oaltold obtol oHrmh : ozqlg obit hmrkbot oHzr sosh : obit lbaot oSroHn erim SlS eSrh oHzrihn : ein rmon oetr oeSn erim arbe oHzrihn : okl hHzrim aSr sbibot herim halh ed belt bar ramt ngb cat nHlt mTh bni Smeon lmSpHtm : mHbl bni ihodh nHlt bni Smeon ki hih Hlq bni ihodh rb mhm oinHlo bni Smeon btok nHltm : oiel hgorl hSliSi lbni cboln lmSpHtm oihi gbol nHltm ed Srid : oelh gbolm limh omrelh opge bdbSt opge al hnHl aSr el pni iqnem : oSb mSrid qdmh mcrH hSmS el gbol kslt tbr oiza al hdbrt oelh ipie : omSm ebr qdmh mcrHh gth Hpr eth qzin oiza rmon hmtar hneh : onsb ato hgbol mzpon Hntn ohio tzatio gi iptH al : oqTt onhll oSmron oidalh obit lHm erim Stim eSrh oHzrihn : cat nHlt bni cboln lmSpHotm herim halh oHzrihn : liSSkr iza hgorl hrbiei lbni iSSkr lmSpHotm : oihi gbolm icrealh ohksolt oSonm : oHprim oSian oanHrt : ohrbit oqSion oabz : ormt oein gnim oein Hdh obit pzz : opge hgbol btbor oSHzomh obit SmS ohio tzaot gbolm hirdn erim SS eSrh oHzrihn : cat nHlt mTh bni iSSkr lmSpHtm herim oHzrihn : oiza hgorl hHmiSi lmTh bni aSr lmSpHotm : oihi gbolm Hlqt oHli obTn oakSp : oalmlk oemed omSal opge bkrml himh obSiHor lbnt : oSb mcrH hSmS bit dgn opge bcblon obgi iptH al zponh bit hemq oneial oiza al kbol mSmal : oebrn orHb oHmon oqnh ed zidon rbh : oSb hgbol hrmh oed eir mbzr zr oSb hgbol Hsh oihio tzatio himh mHbl akcibh : oemh oapq orHb erim eSrim oStim oHzrihn : cat nHlt mTh bni aSr lmSpHtm herim halh oHzrihn : lbni nptli iza hgorl hSSi lbni nptli lmSpHtm : oihi gbolm mHlp malon bzennim oadmi hnqb oibnal ed lqom oihi tzatio hirdn : oSb hgbol imh acnot tbor oiza mSm Hoqqh opge bcblon mngb obaSr pge mim obihodh hirdn mcrH hSmS : oeri mbzr hzdim zr oHmt rqt oknrt : oadmh ohrmh oHzor : oqdS oadrei oein Hzor : oiraon omgdl al Hrm obit ent obit SmS erim tSe eSrh oHzrihn : cat nHlt mTh bni nptli lmSpHtm herim oHzrihn : lmTh bni dn lmSpHtm iza hgorl hSbiei : oihi gbol nHltm zreh oaStaol oeir SmS : oSelbin oailon oitlh : oailon otmnth oeqron : oaltqh ogbton obelt : oihd obni brq ogt rmon : omi hirqon ohrqon em hgbol mol ipo : oiza gbol bni dn mhm oielo bni dn oilHmo em lSm oilkdo aoth oiko aoth lpi Hrb oirSo aoth oiSbo bh oiqrao llSm dn kSm dn abihm : cat nHlt mTh bni dn lmSpHtm herim halh oHzrihn : oiklo lnHl at harz lgboltih oitno bni iSral nHlh lihoSe bn non btokm : el pi ihoh ntno lo at heir aSr Sal at tmnt srH bhr aprim oibnh at heir oiSb bh : alh hnHlt aSr nHlo alecr hkhn oihoSe bn non oraSi habot lmTot bni iSral bgorl bSlh lpni ihoh ptH ahl moed oiklo mHlq at harz :

20

oidbr ihoh al ihoSe lamr : dbr al bni iSral lamr tno lkm at eri hmqlT aSr dbrti alikm bid mSh : lnos Smh rozH mkh npS bSggh bbli det ohio lkm lmqlT mgal hdm : ons al aHt mherim halh oemd ptH Ser heir odbr bacni cqni heir hhia at dbrio oaspo ato heirh alihm ontno lo mqom oiSb emm : oki irdp gal hdm aHrio ola isgro at hrzH bido ki bbli det hkh at reho ola Sna hoa lo mtmol SlSom : oiSb beir hhia ed emdo lpni hedh lmSpT ed mot hkhn hgdol aSr ihih bimim hhm ac iSob hrozH oba al eiro oal bito al heir aSr ns mSm : oiqdSo at qdS bglil bhr nptli oat Skm bhr aprim oat qrit arbe hia Hbron bhr ihodh : omebr lirdn iriHo mcrHh ntno at bzr bmdbr bmiSr mmTh raobn oat ramt bgled mmTh gd oat glon bbSn mmTh mnSh : alh hio eri hmoedh lkl bni iSral olgr hgr btokm lnos Smh kl mkh npS bSggh ola imot bid gal hdm ed emdo lpni hedh :

21

oigSo raSi abot hloim al alecr hkhn oal ihoSe bn non oal raSi abot hmTot lbni iSral : oidbro alihm bSlh barz knen lamr ihoh zoh bid mSh ltt lno erim lSbt omgrSihn lbhmtno : oitno bni iSral lloim mnHltm al pi ihoh at herim halh oat mgrSihn : oiza hgorl lmSpHt hqhti oihi lbni ahrn hkhn mn hloim mmTh ihodh ommTh hSmeni ommTh bnimn bgorl erim SlS eSrh : olbni qht hnotrim mmSpHt mTh aprim ommTh dn omHzi mTh mnSh bgorl erim eSr : olbni grSon mmSpHot mTh iSSkr ommTh aSr ommTh nptli omHzi mTh mnSh bbSn bgorl erim SlS eSrh : lbni mrri lmSpHtm mmTh raobn ommTh gd ommTh cboln erim Stim eSrh : oitno bni iSral lloim at herim halh oat mgrSihn kaSr zoh ihoh bid mSh bgorl : oitno mmTh bni ihodh ommTh bni Smeon at herim halh aSr iqra athn bSm : oihi lbni ahrn mmSpHot hqhti mbni loi ki lhm hih hgorl raiSnh : oitno lhm at qrit arbe abi henoq hia Hbron bhr ihodh oat mgrSh sbibtih : oat Sdh heir oat Hzrih ntno lklb bn ipnh baHcto : olbni ahrn hkhn ntno at eir mqlT hrzH at Hbron oat mgrSh oat lbnh oat mgrSh : oat itr oat mgrSh oat aStme oat mgrSh : oat Hln oat mgrSh oat dbr oat mgrSh : oat ein oat mgrSh oat iTh oat mgrSh at bit SmS oat mgrSh erim tSe mat Sni hSbTim halh : ommTh bnimn at gbeon oat mgrSh at gbe oat mgrSh : at entot oat mgrSh oat elmon oat mgrSh erim arbe : kl eri bni ahrn hkhnim SlS eSrh erim omgrSihn : olmSpHot bni qht hloim hnotrim mbni qht oihi eri gorlm mmTh aprim : oitno lhm at eir mqlT hrzH at Skm oat mgrSh bhr aprim oat gcr oat mgrSh : oat qbzim oat mgrSh oat bit Horn oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommTh dn at altqa oat mgrSh at gbton oat mgrSh : at ailon oat mgrSh at gt rmon oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommHzit mTh mnSh at tenk oat mgrSh oat gt rmon oat mgrSh erim Stim : kl erim eSr omgrSihn lmSpHot bni qht hnotrim : olbni grSon mmSpHt hloim mHzi mTh mnSh at eir mqlT hrzH at glon bbSn oat mgrSh oat beStrh oat mgrSh erim Stim : ommTh iSSkr at qSion oat mgrSh at dbrt oat mgrSh : at irmot oat mgrSh at ein gnim oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommTh aSr at mSal oat mgrSh at ebdon oat mgrSh : at Hlqt oat mgrSh oat rHb oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommTh nptli at eir mqlT hrzH at qdS bglil oat mgrSh oat Hmt dar oat mgrSh oat qrtn oat mgrSh erim SlS : kl eri hgrSni lmSpHtm SlS eSrh eir omgrSihn : olmSpHot bni mrri hloim hnotrim mat mTh cboln at iqnem oat mgrSh at qrth oat mgrSh : at dmnh oat mgrSh at nhll oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommTh raobn at bzr oat mgrSh oat ihzh oat mgrSh : at qdmot oat mgrSh oat mipet oat mgrSh erim arbe : ommTh gd at eir mqlT hrzH at rmt bgled oat mgrSh oat mHnim oat mgrSh : at HSbon oat mgrSh at iecr oat mgrSh kl erim arbe : kl herim lbni mrri lmSpHtm hnotrim mmSpHot hloim oihi gorlm erim Stim eSrh : kl eri hloim btok aHct bni iSral erim arbeim oSmnh omgrSihn : thiinh herim halh eir eir omgrSih sbibtih kn lkl herim halh : oitn ihoh liSral at kl harz aSr nSbe ltt labotm oirSoh oiSbo bh : oinH ihoh lhm msbib kkl aSr nSbe labotm ola emd aiS bpnihm mkl aibihm at kl aibihm ntn ihoh bidm : la npl dbr mkl hdbr hTob aSr dbr ihoh al bit iSral hkl ba :

22

ac iqra ihoSe lraobni olgdi olHzi mTh mnSh : oiamr alihm atm Smrtm at kl aSr zoh atkm mSh ebd ihoh otSmeo bqoli lkl aSr zoiti atkm : la ecbtm at aHikm ch imim rbim ed hiom hch oSmrtm at mSmrt mzot ihoh alhikm : oeth hniH ihoh alhikm laHikm kaSr dbr lhm oeth pno olko lkm lahlikm al arz aHctkm aSr ntn lkm mSh ebd ihoh bebr hirdn : rq Smro mad leSot at hmzoh oat htorh aSr zoh atkm mSh ebd ihoh lahbh at ihoh alhikm ollkt bkl drkio olSmr mzotio oldbqh bo olebdo bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm : oibrkm ihoSe oiSlHm oilko al ahlihm : olHzi SbT hmnSh ntn mSh bbSn olHzio ntn ihoSe em aHihm mebr hirdn imh ogm ki SlHm ihoSe al ahlihm oibrkm : oiamr alihm lamr bnksim rbim Sobo al ahlikm obmqnh rb mad bksp obchb obnHSt obbrcl obSlmot hrbh mad Hlqo Sll aibikm em aHikm : oiSbo oilko bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh mat bni iSral mSlh aSr barz knen llkt al arz hgled al arz aHctm aSr naHco bh el pi ihoh bid mSh : oibao al glilot hirdn aSr barz knen oibno bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh Sm mcbH el hirdn mcbH gdol lmrah : oiSmeo bni iSral lamr hnh bno bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh at hmcbH al mol arz knen al glilot hirdn al ebr bni iSral : oiSmeo bni iSral oiqhlo kl edt bni iSral Slh lelot elihm lzba : oiSlHo bni iSral al bni raobn oal bni gd oal Hzi SbT mnSh al arz hgled at pinHs bn alecr hkhn : oeSrh nSaim emo nSia aHd nSia aHd lbit ab lkl mTot iSral oaiS raS bit abotm hmh lalpi iSral : oibao al bni raobn oal bni gd oal Hzi SbT mnSh al arz hgled oidbro atm lamr : kh amro kl edt ihoh mh hmel hch aSr meltm balhi iSral lSob hiom maHri ihoh bbnotkm lkm mcbH lmrdkm hiom bihoh : hmeT lno at eon peor aSr la hThrno mmno ed hiom hch oihi hngp bedt ihoh : oatm tSbo hiom maHri ihoh ohih atm tmrdo hiom bihoh omHr al kl edt iSral iqzp : oak am Tmah arz aHctkm ebro lkm al arz aHct ihoh aSr Skn Sm mSkn ihoh ohaHco btokno obihoh al tmrdo oatno al tmrdo bbntkm lkm mcbH mbledi mcbH ihoh alhino : hloa ekn bn crH mel mel bHrm oel kl edt iSral hih qzp ohoa aiS aHd la goe beono : oieno bni raobn obni gd oHzi SbT hmnSh oidbro at raSi alpi iSral : al alhim ihoh al alhim ihoh hoa ide oiSral hoa ide am bmrd oam bmel bihoh al toSieno hiom hch : lbnot lno mcbH lSob maHri ihoh oam lhelot elio eolh omnHh oam leSot elio cbHi Slmim ihoh hoa ibqS : oam la mdagh mdbr eSino at cat lamr mHr iamro bnikm lbnino lamr mh lkm olihoh alhi iSral : ogbol ntn ihoh binno obinikm bni raobn obni gd at hirdn ain lkm Hlq bihoh ohSbito bnikm at bnino lblti ira at ihoh : onamr neSh na lno lbnot at hmcbH la leolh ola lcbH : ki ed hoa binino obinikm obin drotino aHrino lebd at ebdt ihoh lpnio belotino obcbHino obSlmino ola iamro bnikm mHr lbnino ain lkm Hlq bihoh : onamr ohih ki iamro alino oal drtino mHr oamrno rao at tbnit mcbH ihoh aSr eSo abotino la leolh ola lcbH ki ed hoa binino obinikm : Hlilh lno mmno lmrd bihoh olSob hiom maHri ihoh lbnot mcbH lelh lmnHh olcbH mlbd mcbH ihoh alhino aSr lpni mSkno : oiSme pinHs hkhn onSiai hedh oraSi alpi iSral aSr ato at hdbrim aSr dbro bni raobn obni gd obni mnSh oiiTb beinihm : oiamr pinHs bn alecr hkhn al bni raobn oal bni gd oal bni mnSh hiom ideno ki btokno ihoh aSr la meltm bihoh hmel hch ac hzltm at bni iSral mid ihoh : oiSb pinHs bn alecr hkhn ohnSiaim mat bni raobn omat bni gd marz hgled al arz knen al bni iSral oiSbo aotm dbr : oiiTb hdbr beini bni iSral oibrko alhim bni iSral ola amro lelot elihm lzba lSHt at harz aSr bni raobn obni gd iSbim bh : oiqrao bni raobn obni gd lmcbH ki ed hoa bintino ki ihoh halhim :

23

oihi mimim rbim aHri aSr hniH ihoh liSral mkl aibihm msbib oihoSe cqn ba bimim : oiqra ihoSe lkl iSral lcqnio olraSio olSpTio olSTrio oiamr alhm ani cqnti bati bimim : oatm raitm at kl aSr eSh ihoh alhikm lkl hgoim halh mpnikm ki ihoh alhikm hoa hnlHm lkm : rao hplti lkm at hgoim hnSarim halh bnHlh lSbTikm mn hirdn okl hgoim aSr hkrti ohim hgdol mboa hSmS : oihoh alhikm hoa ihdpm mpnikm ohoriS atm mlpnikm oirStm at arzm kaSr dbr ihoh alhikm lkm : oHcqtm mad lSmr oleSot at kl hktob bspr tort mSh lblti sor mmno imin oSmaol : lblti boa bgoim halh hnSarim halh atkm obSm alhihm la tckiro ola tSbieo ola tebdom ola tStHoo lhm : ki am bihoh alhikm tdbqo kaSr eSitm ed hiom hch : oiorS ihoh mpnikm goim gdlim oezomim oatm la emd aiS bpnikm ed hiom hch : aiS aHd mkm irdp alp ki ihoh alhikm hoa hnlHm lkm kaSr dbr lkm : onSmrtm mad lnpStikm lahbh at ihoh alhikm : ki am Sob tSobo odbqtm bitr hgoim halh hnSarim halh atkm ohtHtntm bhm obatm bhm ohm bkm : idoe tdeo ki la iosip ihoh alhikm lhoriS at hgoim halh mlpnikm ohio lkm lpH olmoqS olSTT bzdikm olznnim beinikm ed abdkm mel hadmh hTobh hcat aSr ntn lkm ihoh alhikm : ohnh anki holk hiom bdrk kl harz oidetm bkl lbbkm obkl npSkm ki la npl dbr aHd mkl hdbrim hTobim aSr dbr ihoh alhikm elikm hkl bao lkm la npl mmno dbr aHd : ohih kaSr ba elikm kl hdbr hTob aSr dbr ihoh alhikm alikm kn ibia ihoh elikm at kl hdbr hre ed hSmido aotkm mel hadmh hTobh hcat aSr ntn lkm ihoh alhikm : bebrkm at brit ihoh alhikm aSr zoh atkm ohlktm oebdtm alhim aHrim ohStHoitm lhm oHrh ap ihoh bkm oabdtm mhrh mel harz hTobh aSr ntn lkm :

24

oiasp ihoSe at kl SbTi iSral Skmh oiqra lcqni iSral olraSio olSpTio olSTrio oitizbo lpni halhim : oiamr ihoSe al kl hem kh amr ihoh alhi iSral bebr hnhr iSbo abotikm meolm trH abi abrhm oabi nHor oiebdo alhim aHrim : oaqH at abikm at abrhm mebr hnhr oaolk aoto bkl arz knen oarb at creo oatn lo at izHq : oatn lizHq at ieqb oat eSo oatn leSo at hr Seir lrSt aoto oieqb obnio irdo mzrim : oaSlH at mSh oat ahrn oagp at mzrim kaSr eSiti bqrbo oaHr hozati atkm : oaozia at abotikm mmzrim otbao himh oirdpo mzrim aHri abotikm brkb obprSim im sop : oizeqo al ihoh oiSm mapl binikm obin hmzrim oiba elio at him oiksho otrainh einikm at aSr eSiti bmzrim otSbo bmdbr imim rbim : oabiah atkm al arz hamri hioSb bebr hirdn oilHmo atkm oatn aotm bidkm otirSo at arzm oaSmidm mpnikm : oiqm blq bn zpor mlk moab oilHm biSral oiSlH oiqra lblem bn beor lqll atkm : ola abiti lSme lblem oibrk brok atkm oazl atkm mido : otebro at hirdn otbao al iriHo oilHmo bkm beli iriHo hamri ohprci ohkneni ohHti ohgrgSi hHoi ohibosi oatn aotm bidkm : oaSlH lpnikm at hzreh otgrS aotm mpnikm Sni mlki hamri la bHrbk ola bqStk : oatn lkm arz aSr la iget bh oerim aSr la bnitm otSbo bhm krmim ocitim aSr la nTetm atm aklim : oeth irao at ihoh oebdo ato btmim obamt ohsiro at alhim aSr ebdo abotikm bebr hnhr obmzrim oebdo at ihoh : oam re beinikm lebd at ihoh bHro lkm hiom at mi tebdon am at alhim aSr ebdo abotikm aSr bebr hnhr oam at alhi hamri aSr atm iSbim barzm oanki obiti nebd at ihoh : oien hem oiamr Hlilh lno mecb at ihoh lebd alhim aHrim : ki ihoh alhino hoa hmelh atno oat abotino marz mzrim mbit ebdim oaSr eSh leinino at hatot hgdlot halh oiSmrno bkl hdrk aSr hlkno bh obkl hemim aSr ebrno bqrbm : oigrS ihoh at kl hemim oat hamri iSb harz mpnino gm anHno nebd at ihoh ki hoa alhino : oiamr ihoSe al hem la toklo lebd at ihoh ki alhim qdSim hoa al qnoa hoa la iSa lpSekm olHTaotikm : ki tecbo at ihoh oebdtm alhi nkr oSb ohre lkm oklh atkm aHri aSr hiTib lkm : oiamr hem al ihoSe la ki at ihoh nebd : oiamr ihoSe al hem edim atm bkm ki atm bHrtm lkm at ihoh lebd aoto oiamro edim : oeth hsiro at alhi hnkr aSr bqrbkm ohTo at lbbkm al ihoh alhi iSral : oiamro hem al ihoSe at ihoh alhino nebd obqolo nSme : oikrt ihoSe brit lem biom hhoa oiSm lo Hq omSpT bSkm : oiktb ihoSe at hdbrim halh bspr tort alhim oiqH abn gdolh oiqimh Sm tHt halh aSr bmqdS ihoh : oiamr ihoSe al kl hem hnh habn hcat thih bno ledh ki hia Smeh at kl amri ihoh aSr dbr emno ohith bkm ledh pn tkHSon balhikm : oiSlH ihoSe at hem aiS lnHlto : oihi aHri hdbrim halh oimt ihoSe bn non ebd ihoh bn mah oeSr Snim : oiqbro ato bgbol nHlto btmnt srH aSr bhr aprim mzpon lhr geS : oiebd iSral at ihoh kl imi ihoSe okl imi hcqnim aSr hariko imim aHri ihoSe oaSr ideo at kl meSh ihoh aSr eSh liSral : oat ezmot iosp aSr helo bni iSral mmzrim qbro bSkm bHlqt hSdh aSr qnh ieqb mat bni Hmor abi Skm bmah qSiTh oihio lbni iosp lnHlh : oalecr bn ahrn mt oiqbro ato bgbet pinHs bno aSr ntn lo bhr aprim :

SpTim

1

oihi aHri mot ihoSe oiSalo bni iSral bihoh lamr mi ielh lno al hkneni btHlh lhlHm bo : oiamr ihoh ihodh ielh hnh ntti at harz bido : oiamr ihodh lSmeon aHio elh ati bgorli onlHmh bkneni ohlkti gm ani atk bgorlk oilk ato Smeon : oiel ihodh oitn ihoh at hkneni ohprci bidm oikom bbcq eSrt alpim aiS : oimzao at adni bcq bbcq oilHmo bo oiko at hkneni oat hprci : oins adni bcq oirdpo aHrio oiaHco ato oiqzzo at bhnot idio orglio : oiamr adni bcq Sbeim mlkim bhnot idihm orglihm mqzzim hio mlqTim tHt SlHni kaSr eSiti kn Slm li alhim oibiaho iroSlm oimt Sm : oilHmo bni ihodh biroSlm oilkdo aoth oikoh lpi Hrb oat heir SlHo baS : oaHr irdo bni ihodh lhlHm bkneni ioSb hhr ohngb ohSplh : oilk ihodh al hkneni hioSb bHbron oSm Hbron lpnim qrit arbe oiko at SSi oat aHimn oat tlmi : oilk mSm al ioSbi dbir oSm dbir lpnim qrit spr : oiamr klb aSr ikh at qrit spr olkdh ontti lo at eksh bti laSh : oilkdh etnial bn qnc aHi klb hqTn mmno oitn lo at eksh bto laSh : oihi bboah otsitho lSaol mat abih hSdh otznH mel hHmor oiamr lh klb mh lk : otamr lo hbh li brkh ki arz hngb nttni ontth li glt mim oitn lh klb at glt elit oat glt tHtit : obni qini Htn mSh elo meir htmrim at bni ihodh mdbr ihodh aSr bngb erd oilk oiSb at hem : oilk ihodh at Smeon aHio oiko at hkneni ioSb zpt oiHrimo aoth oiqra at Sm heir Hrmh : oilkd ihodh at ech oat gbolh oat aSqlon oat gbolh oat eqron oat gbolh : oihi ihoh at ihodh oirS at hhr ki la lhoriS at iSbi hemq ki rkb brcl lhm : oitno lklb at Hbron kaSr dbr mSh oiorS mSm at SlSh bni henq : oat hibosi iSb iroSlm la horiSo bni bnimn oiSb hibosi at bni bnimn biroSlm ed hiom hch : oielo bit iosp gm hm bit al oihoh emm : oitiro bit iosp bbit al oSm heir lpnim loc : oirao hSmrim aiS ioza mn heir oiamro lo hrano na at mboa heir oeSino emk Hsd : oiram at mboa heir oiko at heir lpi Hrb oat haiS oat kl mSpHto SlHo : oilk haiS arz hHtim oibn eir oiqra Smh loc hoa Smh ed hiom hch : ola horiS mnSh at bit San oat bnotih oat tenk oat bntih oat iSb dor oat bnotih oat ioSbi iblem oat bntih oat ioSbi mgdo oat bnotih oioal hkneni lSbt barz hcat : oihi ki Hcq iSral oiSm at hkneni lms ohoriS la horiSo : oaprim la horiS at hkneni hioSb bgcr oiSb hkneni bqrbo bgcr : cboln la horiS at ioSbi qTron oat ioSbi nhll oiSb hkneni bqrbo oihio lms : aSr la horiS at iSbi eko oat ioSbi zidon oat aHlb oat akcib oat Hlbh oat apiq oat rHb : oiSb haSri bqrb hkneni iSbi harz ki la horiSo : nptli la horiS at iSbi bit SmS oat iSbi bit ent oiSb bqrb hkneni iSbi harz oiSbi bit SmS obit ent hio lhm lms : oilHzo hamri at bni dn hhrh ki la ntno lrdt lemq : oioal hamri lSbt bhr Hrs bailon obSelbim otkbd id bit iosp oihio lms : ogbol hamri mmelh eqrbim mhsle omelh :

2

oiel mlak ihoh mn hglgl al hbkim oiamr aelh atkm mmzrim oabia atkm al harz aSr nSbeti labtikm oamr la apr briti atkm leolm : oatm la tkrto brit lioSbi harz hcat mcbHotihm ttzon ola Smetm bqli mh cat eSitm : ogm amrti la agrS aotm mpnikm ohio lkm lzdim oalhihm ihio lkm lmoqS : oihi kdbr mlak ihoh at hdbrim halh al kl bni iSral oiSao hem at qolm oibko : oiqrao Sm hmqom hhoa bkim oicbHo Sm lihoh : oiSlH ihoSe at hem oilko bni iSral aiS lnHlto lrSt at harz : oiebdo hem at ihoh kl imi ihoSe okl imi hcqnim aSr hariko imim aHri ihoSoe aSr rao at kl meSh ihoh hgdol aSr eSh liSral : oimt ihoSe bn non ebd ihoh bn mah oeSr Snim : oiqbro aoto bgbol nHlto btmnt Hrs bhr aprim mzpon lhr geS : ogm kl hdor hhoa naspo al abotio oiqm dor aHr aHrihm aSr la ideo at ihoh ogm at hmeSh aSr eSh liSral : oieSo bni iSral at hre beini ihoh oiebdo at hbelim : oiecbo at ihoh alhi abotm hmozia aotm marz mzrim oilko aHri alhim aHrim malhi hemim aSr sbibotihm oiStHoo lhm oikeso at ihoh : oiecbo at ihoh oiebdo lbel oleStrot : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oitnm bid Ssim oiSso aotm oimkrm bid aoibihm msbib ola iklo eod lemd lpni aoibihm : bkl aSr izao id ihoh hith bm lreh kaSr dbr ihoh okaSr nSbe ihoh lhm oizr lhm mad : oiqm ihoh SpTim oioSieom mid Ssihm : ogm al SpTihm la Smeo ki cno aHri alhim aHrim oiStHoo lhm sro mhr mn hdrk aSr hlko abotm lSme mzot ihoh la eSo kn : oki hqim ihoh lhm SpTim ohih ihoh em hSpT ohoSiem mid aibihm kl imi hSopT ki inHm ihoh mnaqtm mpni lHzihm odHqihm : ohih bmot hSopT iSbo ohSHito mabotm llkt aHri alhim aHrim lebdm olhStHot lhm la hpilo mmellihm omdrkm hqSh : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oiamr ien aSr ebro hgoi hch at briti aSr zoiti at abotm ola Smeo lqoli : gm ani la aosip lhoriS aiS mpnihm mn hgoim aSr ecb ihoSe oimt : lmen nsot bm at iSral hSmrim hm at drk ihoh llkt bm kaSr Smro abotm am la : oinH ihoh at hgoim halh lblti horiSm mhr ola ntnm bid ihoSe :

3

oalh hgoim aSr hniH ihoh lnsot bm at iSral at kl aSr la ideo at kl mlHmot knen : rq lmen det drot bni iSral llmdm mlHmh rq aSr lpnim la ideom : HmSt srni plStim okl hkneni ohzidni ohHoi iSb hr hlbnon mhr bel Hrmon ed lboa Hmt : oihio lnsot bm at iSral ldet hiSmeo at mzot ihoh aSr zoh at abotm bid mSh : obni iSral iSbo bqrb hkneni hHti ohamri ohprci ohHoi ohibosi : oiqHo at bnotihm lhm lnSim oat bnotihm ntno lbnihm oiebdo at alhihm : oieSo bni iSral at hre beini ihoh oiSkHo at ihoh alhihm oiebdo at hbelim oat haSrot : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oimkrm bid koSn rSetim mlk arm nhrim oiebdo bni iSral at koSn rSetim Smnh Snim : oiceqo bni iSral al ihoh oiqm ihoh moSie lbni iSral oioSiem at etnial bn qnc aHi klb hqTn mmno : othi elio roH ihoh oiSpT at iSral oiza lmlHmh oitn ihoh bido at koSn rSetim mlk arm otec ido el koSn rSetim : otSqT harz arbeim Snh oimt etnial bn qnc : oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oiHcq ihoh at eglon mlk moab el iSral el ki eSo at hre beini ihoh : oiasp alio at bni emon oemlq oilk oik at iSral oiirSo at eir htmrim : oiebdo bni iSral at eglon mlk moab Smonh eSrh Snh : oiceqo bni iSral al ihoh oiqm ihoh lhm moSie at ahod bn gra bn himini aiS aTr id imino oiSlHo bni iSral bido mnHh leglon mlk moab : oieS lo ahod Hrb olh Sni piot gmd arkh oiHgr aoth mtHt lmdio el irk imino : oiqrb at hmnHh leglon mlk moab oeglon aiS bria mad : oihi kaSr klh lhqrib at hmnHh oiSlH at hem nSai hmnHh : ohoa Sb mn hpsilim aSr at hglgl oiamr dbr str li alik hmlk oiamr hs oizao melio kl hemdim elio : oahod ba alio ohoa iSb belit hmqrh aSr lo lbdo oiamr ahod dbr alhim li alik oiqm mel hksa : oiSlH ahod at id Smalo oiqH at hHrb mel irk imino oitqeh bbTno : oiba gm hnzb aHr hlhb oisgr hHlb bed hlhb ki la Slp hHrb mbTno oiza hprSdnh : oiza ahod hmsdronh oisgr dltot helih bedo onel : ohoa iza oebdio bao oirao ohnh dltot helih nelot oiamro ak msik hoa at rglio bHdr hmqrh : oiHilo ed boS ohnh ainno ptH dltot helih oiqHo at hmptH oiptHo ohnh adnihm npl arzh mt : oahod nmlT ed htmhmhm ohoa ebr at hpsilim oimlT hSeirth : oihi bboao oitqe bSopr bhr aprim oirdo emo bni iSral mn hhr ohoa lpnihm : oiamr alhm rdpo aHri ki ntn ihoh at aibikm at moab bidkm oirdo aHrio oilkdo at mebrot hirdn lmoab ola ntno aiS lebr : oiko at moab bet hhia keSrt alpim aiS kl Smn okl aiS Hil ola nmlT aiS : otkne moab biom hhoa tHt id iSral otSqT harz Smonim Snh : oaHrio hih Smgr bn ent oik at plStim SS maot aiS bmlmd hbqr oiSe gm hoa at iSral :

4

oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oahod mt : oimkrm ihoh bid ibin mlk knen aSr mlk bHzor oSr zbao sisra ohoa ioSb bHrSt hgoim : oizeqo bni iSral al ihoh ki tSe maot rkb brcl lo ohoa lHz at bni iSral bHcqh eSrim Snh : odborh aSh nbiah aSt lpidot hia SpTh at iSral bet hhia : ohia ioSbt tHt tmr dborh bin hrmh obin bit al bhr aprim oielo alih bni iSral lmSpT : otSlH otqra lbrq bn abinem mqdS nptli otamr alio hla zoh ihoh alhi iSral lk omSkt bhr tbor olqHt emk eSrt alpim aiS mbni nptli ombni cblon : omSkti alik al nHl qiSon at sisra Sr zba ibin oat rkbo oat hmono onttiho bidk : oiamr alih brq am tlki emi ohlkti oam la tlki emi la alk : otamr hlk alk emk aps ki la thih tpartk el hdrk aSr ath holk ki bid aSh imkr ihoh at sisra otqm dborh otlk em brq qdSh : oiceq brq at cboln oat nptli qdSh oiel brglio eSrt alpi aiS otel emo dborh : oHbr hqini nprd mqin mbni Hbb Htn mSh oiT ahlo ed alon bzenim aSr at qdS : oigdo lsisra ki elh brq bn abinem hr tbor : oiceq sisra at kl rkbo tSe maot rkb brcl oat kl hem aSr ato mHrSt hgoim al nHl qiSon : otamr dbrh al brq qom ki ch hiom aSr ntn ihoh at sisra bidk hla ihoh iza lpnik oird brq mhr tbor oeSrt alpim aiS aHrio : oihm ihoh at sisra oat kl hrkb oat kl hmHnh lpi Hrb lpni brq oird sisra mel hmrkbh oins brglio : obrq rdp aHri hrkb oaHri hmHnh ed HrSt hgoim oipl kl mHnh sisra lpi Hrb la nSar ed aHd : osisra ns brglio al ahl iel aSt Hbr hqini ki Slom bin ibin mlk Hzor obin bit Hbr hqini : otza iel lqrat sisra otamr alio sorh adni sorh ali al tira oisr alih hahlh otksho bSmikh : oiamr alih hSqini na meT mim ki zmati otptH at naod hHlb otSqho otksho : oiamr alih emd ptH hahl ohih am aiS iboa oSalk oamr hiS ph aiS oamrt ain : otqH iel aSt Hbr at itd hahl otSm at hmqbt bidh otboa alio blaT ottqe at hitd brqto otznH barz ohoa nrdm oiep oimt : ohnh brq rdp at sisra otza iel lqrato otamr lo lk oarak at haiS aSr ath mbqS oiba alih ohnh sisra npl mt ohitd brqto : oikne alhim biom hhoa at ibin mlk knen lpni bni iSral : otlk id bni iSral hlok oqSh el ibin mlk knen ed aSr hkrito at ibin mlk knen :

5

otSr dborh obrq bn abinem biom hhoa lamr : bpre preot biSral bhtndb em brko ihoh : Smeo mlkim hacino rcnim anki lihoh anki aSirh acmr lihoh alhi iSral : ihoh bzatk mSeir bzedk mSdh adom arz reSh gm Smim nTpo gm ebim nTpo mim : hrim nclo mpni ihoh ch sini mpni ihoh alhi iSral : bimi Smgr bn ent bimi iel Hdlo arHot ohlki ntibot ilko arHot eqlqlot : Hdlo prcon biSral Hdlo ed Sqmti dborh Sqmti am biSral : ibHr alhim HdSim ac lHm Serim mgn am irah ormH barbeim alp biSral : lbi lHoqqi iSral hmtndbim bem brko ihoh : rkbi atnot zHrot iSbi el mdin ohlki el drk SiHo : mqol mHzzim bin mSabim Sm itno zdqot ihoh zdqt prcno biSral ac irdo lSerim em ihoh : eori eori dborh eori eori dbri Sir qom brq oSbh Sbik bn abinem : ac ird Srid ladirim em ihoh ird li bgborim : mni aprim SrSm bemlq aHrik bnimin bemmik mni mkir irdo mHqqim omcboln mSkim bSbT spr : oSri biSSkr em dbrh oiSSkr kn brq bemq SlH brglio bplgot raobn gdlim Hqqi lb : lmh iSbt bin hmSptim lSme Srqot edrim lplgot raobn gdolim Hqri lb : gled bebr hirdn Skn odn lmh igor aniot aSr iSb lHop imim oel mprzio iSkon : cblon em Hrp npSo lmot onptli el mromi Sdh : bao mlkim nlHmo ac nlHmo mlki knen btenk el mi mgdo bze ksp la lqHo : mn Smim nlHmo hkokbim mmslotm nlHmo em sisra : nHl qiSon grpm nHl qdomim nHl qiSon tdrki npSi ec : ac hlmo eqbi sos mdhrot dhrot abirio : aoro mroc amr mlak ihoh aro aror iSbih ki la bao lecrt ihoh lecrt ihoh bgborim : tbrk mnSim iel aSt Hbr hqini mnSim bahl tbrk : mim Sal Hlb ntnh bspl adirim hqribh Hmah : idh litd tSlHnh oiminh lhlmot emlim ohlmh sisra mHqh raSo omHzh oHlph rqto : bin rglih kre npl Skb bin rglih kre npl baSr kre Sm npl Sdod : bed hHlon nSqph otibb am sisra bed haSnb mdoe bSS rkbo lboa mdoe aHro pemi mrkbotio : Hkmot Srotih teninh ap hia tSib amrih lh : hla imzao iHlqo Sll rHm rHmtim lraS gbr Sll zbeim lsisra Sll zbeim rqmh zbe rqmtim lzoari Sll : kn iabdo kl aoibik ihoh oahbio kzat hSmS bgbrto otSqT harz arbeim Snh :

6

oieSo bni iSral hre beini ihoh oitnm ihoh bid mdin Sbe Snim : otec id mdin el iSral mpni mdin eSo lhm bni iSral at hmnhrot aSr bhrim oat hmerot oat hmzdot : ohih am cre iSral oelh mdin oemlq obni qdm oelo elio : oiHno elihm oiSHito at ibol harz ed boak ech ola iSairo mHih biSral oSh oSor oHmor : ki hm omqnihm ielo oahlihm ibao kdi arbh lrb olhm olgmlihm ain mspr oibao barz lSHth : oidl iSral mad mpni mdin oiceqo bni iSral al ihoh : oihi ki ceqo bni iSral al ihoh el adot mdin : oiSlH ihoh aiS nbia al bni iSral oiamr lhm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki heliti atkm mmzrim oazia atkm mbit ebdim : oazl atkm mid mzrim omid kl lHzikm oagrS aotm mpnikm oatnh lkm at arzm : oamrh lkm ani ihoh alhikm la tirao at alhi hamri aSr atm ioSbim barzm ola Smetm bqoli : oiba mlak ihoh oiSb tHt halh aSr beprh aSr lioaS abi hecri ogdeon bno HbT HTim bgt lhnis mpni mdin : oira alio mlak ihoh oiamr alio ihoh emk gbor hHil : oiamr alio gdeon bi adni oiS ihoh emno olmh mzatno kl cat oaih kl nplatio aSr spro lno abotino lamr hla mmzrim helno ihoh oeth nTSno ihoh oitnno bkp mdin : oipn alio ihoh oiamr lk bkHk ch ohoSet at iSral mkp mdin hla SlHtik : oiamr alio bi adni bmh aoSie at iSral hnh alpi hdl bmnSh oanki hzeir bbit abi : oiamr alio ihoh ki ahih emk ohkit at mdin kaiS aHd : oiamr alio am na mzati Hn beinik oeSit li aot Sath mdbr emi : al na tmS mch ed bai alik ohzati at mnHti ohnHti lpnik oiamr anki aSb ed Sobk : ogdeon ba oieS gdi ecim oaipt qmH mzot hbSr Sm bsl ohmrq Sm bpror oioza alio al tHt halh oigS : oiamr alio mlak halhim qH at hbSr oat hmzot ohnH al hsle hlc oat hmrq Spok oieS kn : oiSlH mlak ihoh at qzh hmSent aSr bido oige bbSr obmzot otel haS mn hzor otakl at hbSr oat hmzot omlak ihoh hlk meinio : oira gdeon ki mlak ihoh hoa oiamr gdeon ahh adni ihoh ki el kn raiti mlak ihoh pnim al pnim : oiamr lo ihoh Slom lk al tira la tmot : oibn Sm gdeon mcbH lihoh oiqra lo ihoh Slom ed hiom hch eodno beprt abi hecri : oihi blilh hhoa oiamr lo ihoh qH at pr hSor aSr labik opr hSni Sbe Snim ohrst at mcbH hbel aSr labik oat haSrh aSr elio tkrt : obnit mcbH lihoh alhik el raS hmeoc hch bmerkh olqHt at hpr hSni ohelit eolh bezi haSrh aSr tkrt : oiqH gdeon eSrh anSim mebdio oieS kaSr dbr alio ihoh oihi kaSr ira at bit abio oat anSi heir meSot iomm oieS lilh : oiSkimo anSi heir bbqr ohnh ntz mcbH hbel ohaSrh aSr elio krth oat hpr hSni helh el hmcbH hbnoi : oiamro aiS al reho mi eSh hdbr hch oidrSo oibqSo oiamro gdeon bn ioaS eSh hdbr hch : oiamro anSi heir al ioaS hoza at bnk oimt ki ntz at mcbH hbel oki krt haSrh aSr elio : oiamr ioaS lkl aSr emdo elio hatm tribon lbel am atm toSieon aoto aSr irib lo iomt ed hbqr am alhim hoa irb lo ki ntz at mcbHo : oiqra lo biom hhoa irbel lamr irb bo hbel ki ntz at mcbHo : okl mdin oemlq obni qdm naspo iHdo oiebro oiHno bemq icreal : oroH ihoh lbSh at gdeon oitqe bSopr oiceq abiecr aHrio : omlakim SlH bkl mnSh oiceq gm hoa aHrio omlakim SlH baSr obcblon obnptli oielo lqratm : oiamr gdeon al halhim am iSk moSie bidi at iSral kaSr dbrt : hnh anki mzig at gct hzmr bgrn am Tl ihih el hgch lbdh oel kl harz Hrb oideti ki toSie bidi at iSral kaSr dbrt : oihi kn oiSkm mmHrt oicr at hgch oimz Tl mn hgch mloa hspl mim : oiamr gdeon al halhim al iHr apk bi oadbrh ak hpem ansh na rq hpem bgch ihi na Hrb al hgch lbdh oel kl harz ihih Tl : oieS alhim kn blilh hhoa oihi Hrb al hgch lbdh oel kl harz hih Tl :

7

oiSkm irbel hoa gdeon okl hem aSr ato oiHno el ein Hrd omHnh mdin hih lo mzpon mgbet hmorh bemq : oiamr ihoh al gdeon rb hem aSr atk mtti at mdin bidm pn itpar eli iSral lamr idi hoSieh li : oeth qra na bacni hem lamr mi ira oHrd iSb oizpr mhr hgled oiSb mn hem eSrim oSnim alp oeSrt alpim nSaro : oiamr ihoh al gdeon eod hem rb hord aotm al hmim oazrpno lk Sm ohih aSr amr alik ch ilk atk hoa ilk atk okl aSr amr alik ch la ilk emk hoa la ilk : oiord at hem al hmim oiamr ihoh al gdeon kl aSr ilq blSono mn hmim kaSr ilq hklb tzig aoto lbd okl aSr ikre el brkio lStot : oihi mspr hmlqqim bidm al pihm SlS maot aiS okl itr hem kreo el brkihm lStot mim : oiamr ihoh al gdeon bSlS maot haiS hmlqqim aoSie atkm ontti at mdin bidk okl hem ilko aiS lmqmo : oiqHo at zdh hem bidm oat Soprtihm oat kl aiS iSral SlH aiS lahlio obSlS maot haiS hHciq omHnh mdin hih lo mtHt bemq : oihi blilh hhoa oiamr alio ihoh qom rd bmHnh ki nttio bidk : oam ira ath lrdt rd ath oprh nerk al hmHnh : oSmet mh idbro oaHr tHcqnh idik oirdt bmHnh oird hoa oprh nero al qzh hHmSim aSr bmHnh : omdin oemlq okl bni qdm nplim bemq karbh lrb olgmlihm ain mspr kHol Sel Spt him lrb : oiba gdeon ohnh aiS mspr lreho Hlom oiamr hnh Hlom Hlmti ohnh zlol lHm Serim mthpk bmHnh mdin oiba ed hahl oikho oipl oihpkho lmelh onpl hahl : oien reho oiamr ain cat blti am Hrb gdeon bn ioaS aiS iSral ntn halhim bido at mdin oat kl hmHnh : oihi kSme gdeon at mspr hHlom oat Sbro oiStHo oiSb al mHnh iSral oiamr qomo ki ntn ihoh bidkm at mHnh mdin : oiHz at SlS maot haiS SlSh raSim oitn Soprot bid klm okdim rqim olpdim btok hkdim : oiamr alihm mmni trao okn teSo ohnh anki ba bqzh hmHnh ohih kaSr aeSh kn teSon : otqeti bSopr anki okl aSr ati otqetm bSoprot gm atm sbibot kl hmHnh oamrtm lihoh olgdeon : oiba gdeon omah aiS aSr ato bqzh hmHnh raS haSmrt htikonh ak hqm hqimo at hSmrim oitqeo bSoprot onpoz hkdim aSr bidm : oitqeo SlSt hraSim bSoprot oiSbro hkdim oiHciqo bid Smaolm blpdim obid iminm hSoprot ltqoe oiqrao Hrb lihoh olgdeon : oiemdo aiS tHtio sbib lmHnh oirz kl hmHnh oirieo oiniso : oitqeo SlS maot hSoprot oiSm ihoh at Hrb aiS breho obkl hmHnh oins hmHnh ed bit hSTh zrrth ed Spt abl mHolh el Tbt : oizeq aiS iSral mnptli omn aSr omn kl mnSh oirdpo aHri mdin : omlakim SlH gdeon bkl hr aprim lamr rdo lqrat mdin olkdo lhm at hmim ed bit brh oat hirdn oizeq kl aiS aprim oilkdo at hmim ed bit brh oat hirdn : oilkdo Sni Sri mdin at erb oat cab oihrgo at eorb bzor eorb oat cab hrgo biqb cab oirdpo al mdin oraS erb ocab hbiao al gdeon mebr lirdn :

8

oiamro alio aiS aprim mh hdbr hch eSit lno lblti qraot lno ki hlkt lhlHm bmdin oiribon ato bHcqh : oiamr alihm mh eSiti eth kkm hloa Tob ellot aprim mbzir abiecr : bidkm ntn alhim at Sri mdin at erb oat cab omh iklti eSot kkm ac rpth roHm melio bdbro hdbr hch : oiba gdeon hirdnh ebr hoa oSlS maot haiS aSr ato eipim ordpim : oiamr lanSi skot tno na kkrot lHm lem aSr brgli ki eipim hm oanki rdp aHri cbH ozlmne mlki mdin : oiamr Sri skot hkp cbH ozlmne eth bidk ki ntn lzbak lHm : oiamr gdeon lkn btt ihoh at cbH oat zlmne bidi odSti at bSrkm at qozi hmdbr oat hbrqnim : oiel mSm pnoal oidbr alihm kcat oieno aoto anSi pnoal kaSr eno anSi skot : oiamr gm lanSi pnoal lamr bSobi bSlom atz at hmgdl hch : ocbH ozlmne bqrqr omHnihm emm kHmSt eSr alp kl hnotrim mkl mHnh bni qdm ohnplim mah oeSrim alp aiS Slp Hrb : oiel gdeon drk hSkoni bahlim mqdm lnbH oigbhh oik at hmHnh ohmHnh hih bTH : oinoso cbH ozlmne oirdp aHrihm oilkd at Sni mlki mdin at cbH oat zlmne okl hmHnh hHrid : oiSb gdeon bn ioaS mn hmlHmh mlmelh hHrs : oilkd ner manSi skot oiSalho oiktb alio at Sri skot oat cqnih Sbeim oSbeh aiS : oiba al anSi skot oiamr hnh cbH ozlmne aSr Hrptm aoti lamr hkp cbH ozlmne eth bidk ki ntn lanSik hiepim lHm : oiqH at cqni heir oat qozi hmdbr oat hbrqnim oide bhm at anSi skot : oat mgdl pnoal ntz oihrg at anSi heir : oiamr al cbH oal zlmne aiph hanSim aSr hrgtm btbor oiamro kmok kmohm aHd ktar bni hmlk : oiamr aHi bni ami hm Hi ihoh lo hHitm aotm la hrgti atkm : oiamr litr bkoro qom hrg aotm ola Slp hner Hrbo ki ira ki eodno ner : oiamr cbH ozlmne qom ath opge bno ki kaiS gborto oiqm gdeon oihrg at cbH oat zlmne oiqH at hShrnim aSr bzoari gmlihm : oiamro aiS iSral al gdeon mSl bno gm ath gm bnk gm bn bnk ki hoSetno mid mdin : oiamr alhm gdeon la amSl ani bkm ola imSl bni bkm ihoh imSl bkm : oiamr alhm gdeon aSalh mkm Salh otno li aiS ncm Sllo ki ncmi chb lhm ki iSmealim hm : oiamro nton ntn oiprSo at hSmlh oiSliko Smh aiS ncm Sllo : oihi mSql ncmi hchb aSr Sal alp oSbe maot chb lbd mn hShrnim ohnTpot obgdi hargmn Sel mlki mdin olbd mn henqot aSr bzoari gmlihm : oieS aoto gdeon lapod oizg aoto beiro beprh oicno kl iSral aHrio Sm oihi lgdeon olbito lmoqS : oikne mdin lpni bni iSral ola ispo lSat raSm otSqT harz arbeim Snh bimi gdeon : oilk irbel bn ioaS oiSb bbito : olgdeon hio Sbeim bnim izai irko ki nSim rbot hio lo : opilgSo aSr bSkm ildh lo gm hia bn oiSm at Smo abimlk : oimt gdeon bn ioaS bSibh Tobh oiqbr bqbr ioaS abio beprh abi hecri : oihi kaSr mt gdeon oiSobo bni iSral oicno aHri hbelim oiSimo lhm bel brit lalhim : ola ckro bni iSral at ihoh alhihm hmzil aotm mid kl aibihm msbib : ola eSo Hsd em bit irbel gdeon kkl hTobh aSr eSh em iSral :

9

oilk abimlk bn irbel Skmh al aHi amo oidbr alihm oal kl mSpHt bit abi amo lamr : dbro na bacni kl beli Skm mh Tob lkm hmSl bkm Sbeim aiS kl bni irbel am mSl bkm aiS aHd ockrtm ki ezmkm obSrkm ani : oidbro aHi amo elio bacni kl beli Skm at kl hdbrim halh oiT lbm aHri abimlk ki amro aHino hoa : oitno lo Sbeim ksp mbit bel brit oiSkr bhm abimlk anSim riqim opHcim oilko aHrio : oiba bit abio eprth oihrg at aHio bni irbel Sbeim aiS el abn aHt oiotr iotm bn irbel hqTn ki nHba : oiaspo kl beli Skm okl bit mloa oilko oimliko at abimlk lmlk em alon mzb aSr bSkm : oigdo liotm oilk oiemd braS hr grcim oiSa qolo oiqra oiamr lhm Smeo ali beli Skm oiSme alikm alhim : hlok hlko hezim lmSH elihm mlk oiamro lcit mlokh elino : oiamr lhm hcit hHdlti at dSni aSr bi ikbdo alhim oanSim ohlkti lnoe el hezim : oiamro hezim ltanh lki at mlki elino : otamr lhm htanh hHdlti at mtqi oat tnobti hTobh ohlkti lnoe el hezim : oiamro hezim lgpn lki at mloki elino : otamr lhm hgpn hHdlti at tiroSi hmSmH alhim oanSim ohlkti lnoe el hezim : oiamro kl hezim al haTd lk ath mlk elino : oiamr haTd al hezim am bamt atm mSHim ati lmlk elikm bao Hso bzli oam ain tza aS mn haTd otakl at arci hlbnon : oeth am bamt obtmim eSitm otmliko at abimlk oam Tobh eSitm em irbel oem bito oam kgmol idio eSitm lo : aSr nlHm abi elikm oiSlk at npSo mngd oizl atkm mid mdin : oatm qmtm el bit abi hiom othrgo at bnio Sbeim aiS el abn aHt otmliko at abimlk bn amto el beli Skm ki aHikm hoa : oam bamt obtmim eSitm em irbel oem bito hiom hch SmHo babimlk oiSmH gm hoa bkm : oam ain tza aS mabimlk otakl at beli Skm oat bit mloa otza aS mbeli Skm ombit mloa otakl at abimlk : oins iotm oibrH oilk barh oiSb Sm mpni abimlk aHio : oiSr abimlk el iSral SlS Snim : oiSlH alhim roH reh bin abimlk obin beli Skm oibgdo beli Skm babimlk : lboa Hms Sbeim bni irbel odmm lSom el abimlk aHihm aSr hrg aotm oel beli Skm aSr Hcqo at idio lhrg at aHio : oiSimo lo beli Skm marbim el raSi hhrim oigclo at kl aSr iebr elihm bdrk oigd labimlk : oiba gel bn ebd oaHio oiebro bSkm oibTHo bo beli Skm : oizao hSdh oibzro at krmihm oidrko oieSo hlolim oibao bit alhihm oiaklo oiSto oiqllo at abimlk : oiamr gel bn ebd mi abimlk omi Skm ki nebdno hla bn irbel ocbl pqido ebdo at anSi Hmor abi Skm omdoe nebdno anHno : omi itn at hem hch bidi oasirh at abimlk oiamr labimlk rbh zbak ozah : oiSme cbl Sr heir at dbri gel bn ebd oiHr apo : oiSlH mlakim al abimlk btrmh lamr hnh gel bn ebd oaHio baim Skmh ohnm zrim at heir elik : oeth qom lilh ath ohem aSr atk oarb bSdh : ohih bbqr kcrH hSmS tSkim opSTt el heir ohnh hoa ohem aSr ato izaim alik oeSit lo kaSr tmza idk : oiqm abimlk okl hem aSr emo lilh oiarbo el Skm arbeh raSim : oiza gel bn ebd oiemd ptH Ser heir oiqm abimlk ohem aSr ato mn hmarb : oira gel at hem oiamr al cbl hnh em iord mraSi hhrim oiamr alio cbl at zl hhrim ath rah kanSim : oisp eod gel ldbr oiamr hnh em iordim mem Tbor harz oraS aHd ba mdrk alon meonnim : oiamr alio cbl aih apoa pik aSr tamr mi abimlk ki nebdno hla ch hem aSr masth bo za na eth ohlHm bo : oiza gel lpni beli Skm oilHm babimlk : oirdpho abimlk oins mpnio oiplo Hllim rbim ed ptH hSer : oiSb abimlk baromh oigrS cbl at gel oat aHio mSbt bSkm : oihi mmHrt oiza hem hSdh oigdo labimlk : oiqH at hem oiHzm lSlSh raSim oiarb bSdh oira ohnh hem iza mn heir oiqm elihm oikm : oabimlk ohraSim aSr emo pSTo oiemdo ptH Ser heir oSni hraSim pSTo el kl aSr bSdh oikom : oabimlk nlHm beir kl hiom hhoa oilkd at heir oat hem aSr bh hrg oitz at heir oicreh mlH : oiSmeo kl beli mgdl Skm oibao al zriH bit al brit : oigd labimlk ki htqbzo kl beli mgdl Skm : oiel abimlk hr zlmon hoa okl hem aSr ato oiqH abimlk at hqrdmot bido oikrt Sokt ezim oiSah oiSm el Skmo oiamr al hem aSr emo mh raitm eSiti mhro eSo kmoni : oikrto gm kl hem aiS Sokh oilko aHri abimlk oiSimo el hzriH oizito elihm at hzriH baS oimto gm kl anSi mgdl Skm kalp aiS oaSh : oilk abimlk al tbz oiHn btbz oilkdh : omgdl ec hih btok heir oinso Smh kl hanSim ohnSim okl beli heir oisgro bedm oielo el gg hmgdl : oiba abimlk ed hmgdl oilHm bo oigS ed ptH hmgdl lSrpo baS : otSlk aSh aHt plH rkb el raS abimlk otrz at glglto : oiqra mhrh al hner nSa klio oiamr lo Slp Hrbk omottni pn iamro li aSh hrgtho oidqrho nero oimt : oirao aiS iSral ki mt abimlk oilko aiS lmqmo : oiSb alhim at ret abimlk aSr eSh labio lhrg at Sbeim aHio : oat kl ret anSi Skm hSib alhim braSm otba alihm qllt iotm bn irbel :

10

oiqm aHri abimlk lhoSie at iSral tole bn poah bn dodo aiS iSSkr ohoa iSb bSmir bhr aprim : oiSpT at iSral eSrim oSlS Snh oimt oiqbr bSmir : oiqm aHrio iair hgledi oiSpT at iSral eSrim oStim Snh : oihi lo SlSim bnim rkbim el SlSim eirim oSlSim eirim lhm lhm iqrao Hot iair ed hiom hch aSr barz hgled : oimt iair oiqbr bqmon : oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oiebdo at hbelim oat heStrot oat alhi arm oat alhi zidon oat alhi moab oat alhi bni emon oat alhi plStim oiecbo at ihoh ola ebdoho : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oimkrm bid plStim obid bni emon : oirezo oirzzo at bni iSral bSnh hhia Smnh eSrh Snh at kl bni iSral aSr bebr hirdn barz hamri aSr bgled : oiebro bni emon at hirdn lhlHm gm bihodh obbnimin obbit aprim otzr liSral mad : oiceqo bni iSral al ihoh lamr HTano lk oki ecbno at alhino onebd at hbelim : oiamr ihoh al bni iSral hla mmzrim omn hamri omn bni emon omn plStim : ozidonim oemlq omeon lHzo atkm otzeqo ali oaoSieh atkm midm : oatm ecbtm aoti otebdo alhim aHrim lkn la aosip lhoSie atkm : lko oceqo al halhim aSr bHrtm bm hmh ioSieo lkm bet zrtkm : oiamro bni iSral al ihoh HTano eSh ath lno kkl hTob beinik ak hzilno na hiom hch : oisiro at alhi hnkr mqrbm oiebdo at ihoh otqzr npSo beml iSral : oizeqo bni emon oiHno bgled oiaspo bni iSral oiHno bmzph : oiamro hem Sri gled aiS al reho mi haiS aSr iHl lhlHm bbni emon ihih lraS lkl iSbi gled :

11

oiptH hgledi hih gbor Hil ohoa bn aSh conh oiold gled at iptH : otld aSt gled lo bnim oigdlo bni haSh oigrSo at iptH oiamro lo la tnHl bbit abino ki bn aSh aHrt ath : oibrH iptH mpni aHio oiSb barz Tob oitlqTo al iptH anSim riqim oizao emo : oihi mimim oilHmo bni emon em iSral : oihi kaSr nlHmo bni emon em iSral oilko cqni gled lqHt at iptH marz Tob : oiamro liptH lkh ohiith lno lqzin onlHmh bbni emon : oiamr iptH lcqni gled hla atm Snatm aoti otgrSoni mbit abi omdoe batm ali eth kaSr zr lkm : oiamro cqni gled al iptH lkn eth Sbno alik ohlkt emno onlHmt bbni emon ohiit lno lraS lkl iSbi gled : oiamr iptH al cqni gled am mSibim atm aoti lhlHm bbni emon ontn ihoh aotm lpni anki ahih lkm lraS : oiamro cqni gled al iptH ihoh ihih Sme binotino am la kdbrk kn neSh : oilk iptH em cqni gled oiSimo hem aoto elihm lraS olqzin oidbr iptH at kl dbrio lpni ihoh bmzph : oiSlH iptH mlakim al mlk bni emon lamr mh li olk ki bat ali lhlHm barzi : oiamr mlk bni emon al mlaki iptH ki lqH iSral at arzi beloto mmzrim marnon oed hibq oed hirdn oeth hSibh athn bSlom : oiosp eod iptH oiSlH mlakim al mlk bni emon : oiamr lo kh amr iptH la lqH iSral at arz moab oat arz bni emon : ki belotm mmzrim oilk iSral bmdbr ed im sop oiba qdSh : oiSlH iSral mlakim al mlk adom lamr aebrh na barzk ola Sme mlk adom ogm al mlk moab SlH ola abh oiSb iSral bqdS : oilk bmdbr oisb at arz adom oat arz moab oiba mmcrH SmS larz moab oiHnon bebr arnon ola bao bgbol moab ki arnon gbol moab : oiSlH iSral mlakim al siHon mlk hamri mlk HSbon oiamr lo iSral nebrh na barzk ed mqomi : ola hamin siHon at iSral ebr bgblo oiasp siHon at kl emo oiHno bihzh oilHm em iSral : oitn ihoh alhi iSral at siHon oat kl emo bid iSral oikom oiirS iSral at kl arz hamri ioSb harz hhia : oiirSo at kl gbol hamri marnon oed hibq omn hmdbr oed hirdn : oeth ihoh alhi iSral horiS at hamri mpni emo iSral oath tirSno : hla at aSr ioriSk kmoS alhik aoto tirS oat kl aSr horiS ihoh alhino mpnino aoto nirS : oeth hTob Tob ath mblq bn zpor mlk moab hrob rb em iSral am nlHm nlHm bm : bSbt iSral bHSbon obbnotih obereor obbnotih obkl herim aSr el idi arnon SlS maot Snh omdoe la hzltm bet hhia : oanki la HTati lk oath eSh ati reh lhlHm bi iSpT ihoh hSpT hiom bin bni iSral obin bni emon : ola Sme mlk bni emon al dbri iptH aSr SlH alio : othi el iptH roH ihoh oiebr at hgled oat mnSh oiebr at mzph gled ommzph gled ebr bni emon : oidr iptH ndr lihoh oiamr am nton ttn at bni emon bidi : ohih hioza aSr iza mdlti biti lqrati bSobi bSlom mbni emon ohih lihoh ohelitho eolh : oiebr iptH al bni emon lhlHm bm oitnm ihoh bido : oikm meroer oed boak mnit eSrim eir oed abl krmim mkh gdolh mad oikneo bni emon mpni bni iSral : oiba iptH hmzph al bito ohnh bto izat lqrato btpim obmHlot orq hia iHidh ain lo mmno bn ao bt : oihi kraoto aoth oiqre at bgdio oiamr ahh bti hkre hkretni oat hiit bekri oanki pziti pi al ihoh ola aokl lSob : otamr alio abi pzith at pik al ihoh eSh li kaSr iza mpik aHri aSr eSh lk ihoh nqmot maibik mbni emon : otamr al abih ieSh li hdbr hch hrph mmni Snim HdSim oalkh oirdti el hhrim oabkh el btoli anki oreiti : oiamr lki oiSlH aoth Sni HdSim otlk hia oreotih otbk el btolih el hhrim : oihi mqz Snim HdSim otSb al abih oieS lh at ndro aSr ndr ohia la ideh aiS othi Hq biSral : mimim imimh tlknh bnot iSral ltnot lbt iptH hgledi arbet imim bSnh :

12

oizeq aiS aprim oiebr zponh oiamro liptH mdoe ebrt lhlHm bbni emon olno la qrat llkt emk bitk nSrp elik baS : oiamr iptH alihm aiS rib hiiti ani oemi obni emon mad oaceq atkm ola hoSetm aoti midm : oarah ki aink moSie oaSimh npSi bkpi oaebrh al bni emon oitnm ihoh bidi olmh elitm ali hiom hch lhlHm bi : oiqbz iptH at kl anSi gled oilHm at aprim oiko anSi gled at aprim ki amro pliTi aprim atm gled btok aprim btok mnSh : oilkd gled at mebrot hirdn laprim ohih ki iamro pliTi aprim aebrh oiamro lo anSi gled haprti ath oiamr la : oiamro lo amr na Sblt oiamr sblt ola ikin ldbr kn oiaHco aoto oiSHToho al mebrot hirdn oipl bet hhia maprim arbeim oSnim alp : oiSpT iptH at iSral SS Snim oimt iptH hgledi oiqbr beri gled : oiSpT aHrio at iSral abzn mbit lHm : oihi lo SlSim bnim oSlSim bnot SlH hHozh oSlSim bnot hbia lbnio mn hHoz oiSpT at iSral Sbe Snim : oimt abzn oiqbr bbit lHm : oiSpT aHrio at iSral ailon hcbolni oiSpT at iSral eSr Snim : oimt ailon hcbolni oiqbr bailon barz cboln : oiSpT aHrio at iSral ebdon bn hll hpretoni : oihi lo arbeim bnim oSlSim bni bnim rkbim el Sbeim eirm oiSpT at iSral Smnh Snim : oimt ebdon bn hll hpretoni oiqbr bpreton barz aprim bhr hemlqi :

13
