oispo bni iSral leSot hre beini ihoh oitnm ihoh bid plStim arbeim Snh : oihi aiS aHd mzreh mmSpHt hdni oSmo mnoH oaSto eqrh ola ildh : oira mlak ihoh al haSh oiamr alih hnh na at eqrh ola ildt ohrit oildt bn : oeth hSmri na oal tSti iin oSkr oal takli kl Tma : ki hnk hrh oildt bn omorh la ielh el raSo ki ncir alhim ihih hner mn hbTn ohoa iHl lhoSie at iSral mid plStim : otba haSh otamr laiSh lamr aiS halhim ba ali omraho kmrah mlak halhim nora mad ola Saltiho ai mch hoa oat Smo la hgid li : oiamr li hnk hrh oildt bn oeth al tSti iin oSkr oal takli kl Tmah ki ncir alhim ihih hner mn hbTn ed iom moto : oietr mnoH al ihoh oiamr bi adoni aiS halhim aSr SlHt iboa na eod alino oiorno mh neSh lner hiold : oiSme halhim bqol mnoH oiba mlak halhim eod al haSh ohia ioSbt bSdh omnoH aiSh ain emh : otmhr haSh otrz otgd laiSh otamr alio hnh nrah ali haiS aSr ba biom ali : oiqm oilk mnoH aHri aSto oiba al haiS oiamr lo hath haiS aSr dbrt al haSh oiamr ani : oiamr mnoH eth iba dbrik mh ihih mSpT hner omeSho : oiamr mlak ihoh al mnoH mkl aSr amrti al haSh tSmr : mkl aSr iza mgpn hiin la takl oiin oSkr al tSt okl Tmah al takl kl aSr zoitih tSmr : oiamr mnoH al mlak ihoh nezrh na aotk oneSh lpnik gdi ecim : oiamr mlak ihoh al mnoH am tezrni la akl blHmk oam teSh elh lihoh telnh ki la ide mnoH ki mlak ihoh hoa : oiamr mnoH al mlak ihoh mi Smk ki iba dbrik okbdnok : oiamr lo mlak ihoh lmh ch tSal lSmi ohoa plai : oiqH mnoH at gdi hecim oat hmnHh oiel el hzor lihoh ompla leSot omnoH oaSto raim : oihi belot hlhb mel hmcbH hSmimh oiel mlak ihoh blhb hmcbH omnoH oaSto raim oiplo el pnihm arzh : ola isp eod mlak ihoh lhrah al mnoH oal aSto ac ide mnoH ki mlak ihoh hoa : oiamr mnoH al aSto mot nmot ki alhim raino : otamr lo aSto lo Hpz ihoh lhmitno la lqH midno elh omnHh ola hrano at kl alh oket la hSmieno kcat : otld haSh bn otqra at Smo SmSon oigdl hner oibrkho ihoh : otHl roH ihoh lpemo bmHnh dn bin zreh obin aStal :

14

oird SmSon tmnth oira aSh btmnth mbnot plStim : oiel oigd labio olamo oiamr aSh raiti btmnth mbnot plStim oeth qHo aoth li laSh : oiamr lo abio oamo hain bbnot aHik obkl emi aSh ki ath holk lqHt aSh mplStim herlim oiamr SmSon al abio aoth qH li ki hia iSrh beini : oabio oamo la ideo ki mihoh hia ki tanh hoa mbqS mplStim obet hhia plStim mSlim biSral : oird SmSon oabio oamo tmnth oibao ed krmi tmnth ohnh kpir ariot Sag lqrato : otzlH elio roH ihoh oiSseho kSse hgdi omaomh ain bido ola hgid labio olamo at aSr eSh : oird oidbr laSh otiSr beini SmSon : oiSb mimim lqHth oisr lraot at mplt harih ohnh edt dborim bgoit harih odbS : oirdho al kpio oilk hlok oakl oilk al abio oal amo oitn lhm oiaklo ola hgid lhm ki mgoit harih rdh hdbS : oird abiho al haSh oieS Sm SmSon mSth ki kn ieSo hbHorim : oihi kraotm aoto oiqHo SlSim mreim oihio ato : oiamr lhm SmSon aHodh na lkm Hidh am hgd tgido aoth li Sbet imi hmSth omzatm ontti lkm SlSim sdinim oSlSim Hlpt bgdim : oam la toklo lhgid li onttm atm li SlSim sdinim oSlSim Hlipot bgdim oiamro lo Hodh Hidtk onSmenh : oiamr lhm mhakl iza makl omec iza mtoq ola iklo lhgid hHidh SlSt imim : oihi biom hSbiei oiamro laSt SmSon pti at aiSk oigd lno at hHidh pn nSrp aotk oat bit abik baS hlirSno qratm lno hla : otbk aSt SmSon elio otamr rq Snatni ola ahbtni hHidh Hdt lbni emi oli la hgdth oiamr lh hnh labi olami la hgdti olk agid : otbk elio Sbet himim aSr hih lhm hmSth oihi biom hSbiei oigd lh ki hziqtho otgd hHidh lbni emh : oiamro lo anSi heir biom hSbiei bTrm iba hHrsh mh mtoq mdbS omh ec mari oiamr lhm lola HrStm beglti la mzatm Hidti : otzlH elio roH ihoh oird aSqlon oik mhm SlSim aiS oiqH at Hlizotm oitn hHlipot lmgidi hHidh oiHr apo oiel bit abiho : othi aSt SmSon lmreho aSr reh lo :

15

oihi mimim bimi qzir HTim oipqd SmSon at aSto bgdi ecim oiamr abah al aSti hHdrh ola ntno abih lboa : oiamr abih amr amrti ki Sna Snath oatnnh lmrek hla aHth hqTnh Tobh mmnh thi na lk tHtih : oiamr lhm SmSon nqiti hpem mplStim ki eSh ani emm reh : oilk SmSon oilkd SlS maot Soelim oiqH lpdim oipn cnb al cnb oiSm lpid aHd bin Sni hcnbot btok : oiber aS blpidim oiSlH bqmot plStim oiber mgdiS oed qmh oed krm cit : oiamro plStim mi eSh cat oiamro SmSon Htn htmni ki lqH at aSto oitnh lmreho oielo plStim oiSrpo aoth oat abih baS : oiamr lhm SmSon am teSon kcat ki am nqmti bkm oaHr aHdl : oik aotm Soq el irk mkh gdolh oird oiSb bseip sle eiTm : oielo plStim oiHno bihodh oinTSo blHi : oiamro aiS ihodh lmh elitm elino oiamro lasor at SmSon elino leSot lo kaSr eSh lno : oirdo SlSt alpim aiS mihodh al seip sle eiTm oiamro lSmSon hla idet ki mSlim bno plStim omh cat eSit lno oiamr lhm kaSr eSo li kn eSiti lhm : oiamro lo lasrk irdno lttk bid plStim oiamr lhm SmSon hSbeo li pn tpgeon bi atm : oiamro lo lamr la ki asr nasrk ontnok bidm ohmt la nmitk oiasrho bSnim ebtim HdSim oieloho mn hsle : hoa ba ed lHi oplStim hrieo lqrato otzlH elio roH ihoh othiinh hebtim aSr el croeotio kpStim aSr bero baS oimso asorio mel idio : oimza lHi Hmor Trih oiSlH ido oiqHh oik bh alp aiS : oiamr SmSon blHi hHmor Hmor Hmrtim blHi hHmor hkiti alp aiS : oihi kklto ldbr oiSlk hlHi mido oiqra lmqom hhoa rmt lHi : oizma mad oiqra al ihoh oiamr ath ntt bid ebdk at htSoeh hgdlh hcat oeth amot bzma onplti bid herlim : oibqe alhim at hmktS aSr blHi oizao mmno mim oiSt otSb roHo oiHi el kn qra Smh ein hqora aSr blHi ed hiom hch : oiSpT at iSral bimi plStim eSrim Snh :

16

oilk SmSon ecth oira Sm aSh conh oiba alih : lectim lamr ba SmSon hnh oisbo oiarbo lo kl hlilh bSer heir oitHrSo kl hlilh lamr ed aor hbqr ohrgnho : oiSkb SmSon ed Hzi hlilh oiqm bHzi hlilh oiaHc bdltot Ser heir obSti hmcocot oisem em hbriH oiSm el ktpio oielm al raS hhr aSr el pni Hbron : oihi aHri kn oiahb aSh bnHl Srq oSmh dlilh : oielo alih srni plStim oiamro lh pti aoto orai bmh kHo gdol obmh nokl lo oasrnho lento oanHno ntn lk aiS alp omah ksp : otamr dlilh al SmSon hgidh na li bmh kHk gdol obmh tasr lenotk : oiamr alih SmSon am iasrni bSbeh itrim lHim aSr la Hrbo oHliti ohiiti kaHd hadm : oielo lh srni plStim Sbeh itrim lHim aSr la Hrbo otasrho bhm : oharb iSb lh bHdr otamr alio plStim elik SmSon ointq at hitrim kaSr intq ptil hnert bhriHo aS ola node kHo : otamr dlilh al SmSon hnh htlt bi otdbr ali kcbim eth hgidh na li bmh tasr : oiamr alih am asor iasroni bebtim HdSim aSr la neSh bhm mlakh oHliti ohiiti kaHd hadm : otqH dlilh ebtim HdSim otasrho bhm otamr alio plStim elik SmSon oharb iSb bHdr ointqm mel cretio kHoT : otamr dlilh al SmSon ed hnh htlt bi otdbr ali kcbim hgidh li bmh tasr oiamr alih am targi at Sbe mHlpot raSi em hmskt : ottqe bitd otamr alio plStim elik SmSon oiiqz mSnto oise at hitd harg oat hmskt : otamr alio aik tamr ahbtik olbk ain ati ch SlS pemim htlt bi ola hgdt li bmh kHk gdol : oihi ki hziqh lo bdbrih kl himim otalzho otqzr npSo lmot : oigd lh at kl lbo oiamr lh morh la elh el raSi ki ncir alhim ani mbTn ami am glHti osr mmni kHi oHliti ohiiti kkl hadm : otra dlilh ki hgid lh at kl lbo otSlH otqra lsrni plStim lamr elo hpem ki hgid lh at kl lbo oelo alih srni plStim oielo hksp bidm : otiSnho el brkih otqra laiS otglH at Sbe mHlpot raSo otHl lenoto oisr kHo melio : otamr plStim elik SmSon oiqz mSnto oiamr aza kpem bpem oaner ohoa la ide ki ihoh sr melio : oiaHcoho plStim oinqro at einio oiorido aoto ecth oiasroho bnHStim oihi ToHn bbit hasirim : oiHl Ser raSo lzmH kaSr glH : osrni plStim naspo lcbH cbH gdol ldgon alhihm olSmHh oiamro ntn alhino bidno at SmSon aoibino : oirao ato hem oihllo at alhihm ki amro ntn alhino bidno at aoibno oat mHrib arzno oaSr hrbh at Hllino : oihi ki Tob lbm oiamro qrao lSmSon oiSHq lno oiqrao lSmSon mbit hasirim oizHq lpnihm oiemido aoto bin hemodim : oiamr SmSon al hner hmHciq bido hniHh aoti ohimSni at hemdim aSr hbit nkon elihm oaSen elihm : ohbit mla hanSim ohnSim oSmh kl srni plStim oel hgg kSlSt alpim aiS oaSh hraim bSHoq SmSon : oiqra SmSon al ihoh oiamr adni ihoh ckrni na oHcqni na ak hpem hch halhim oanqmh nqm aHt mSti eini mplStim : oilpt SmSon at Sni emodi htok aSr hbit nkon elihm oismk elihm aHd bimino oaHd bSmalo : oiamr SmSon tmot npSi em plStim oiT bkH oipl hbit el hsrnim oel kl hem aSr bo oihio hmtim aSr hmit bmoto rbim maSr hmit bHiio : oirdo aHio okl bit abiho oiSao ato oielo oiqbro aoto bin zreh obin aStal bqbr mnoH abio ohoa SpT at iSral eSrim Snh :

17

oihi aiS mhr aprim oSmo mikiho : oiamr lamo alp omah hksp aSr lqH lk oati alit ogm amrt bacni hnh hksp ati ani lqHtio otamr amo brok bni lihoh : oiSb at alp omah hksp lamo otamr amo hqdS hqdSti at hksp lihoh midi lbni leSot psl omskh oeth aSibno lk : oiSb at hksp lamo otqH amo matim ksp ottnho lzorp oieSho psl omskh oihi bbit mikiho : ohaiS mikh lo bit alhim oieS apod otrpim oimla at id aHd mbnio oihi lo lkhn : bimim hhm ain mlk biSral aiS hiSr beinio ieSh : oihi ner mbit lHm ihodh mmSpHt ihodh ohoa loi ohoa gr Sm : oilk haiS mheir mbit lHm ihodh lgor baSr imza oiba hr aprim ed bit mikh leSot drko : oiamr lo mikh main tboa oiamr alio loi anki mbit lHm ihodh oanki hlk lgor baSr amza : oiamr lo mikh Sbh emdi ohih li lab olkhn oanki atn lk eSrt ksp limim oerk bgdim omHitk oilk hloi : oioal hloi lSbt at haiS oihi hner lo kaHd mbnio : oimla mikh at id hloi oihi lo hner lkhn oihi bbit mikh : oiamr mikh eth ideti ki iiTib ihoh li ki hih li hloi lkhn :

18

bimim hhm ain mlk biSral obimim hhm SbT hdni mbqS lo nHlh lSbt ki la nplh lo ed hiom hhoa btok SbTi iSral bnHlh : oiSlHo bni dn mmSpHtm HmSh anSim mqzotm anSim bni Hil mzreh omaStal lrgl at harz olHqrh oiamro alhm lko Hqro at harz oibao hr aprim ed bit mikh oilino Sm : hmh em bit mikh ohmh hkiro at qol hner hloi oisoro Sm oiamro lo mi hbiak hlm omh ath eSh bch omh lk ph : oiamr alhm kch okch eSh li mikh oiSkrni oahi lo lkhn : oiamro lo Sal na balhim ondeh htzliH drkno aSr anHno hlkim elih : oiamr lhm hkhn lko lSlom nkH ihoh drkkm aSr tlko bh : oilko HmSt hanSim oibao liSh oirao at hem aSr bqrbh ioSbt lbTH kmSpT zdnim SqT obTH oain mklim dbr barz iorS ezr orHqim hmh mzdnim odbr ain lhm em adm : oibao al aHihm zreh oaStal oiamro lhm aHihm mh atm : oiamro qomh onelh elihm ki raino at harz ohnh Tobh mad oatm mHSim al tezlo llkt lba lrSt at harz : kbakm tbao al em bTH oharz rHbt idim ki ntnh alhim bidkm mqom aSr ain Sm mHsor kl dbr aSr barz : oiseo mSm mmSpHt hdni mzreh omaStal SS maot aiS Hgor kli mlHmh : oielo oiHno bqrit ierim bihodh el kn qrao lmqom hhoa mHnh dn ed hiom hch hnh aHri qrit ierim : oiebro mSm hr aprim oibao ed bit mikh : oieno HmSt hanSim hhlkim lrgl at harz liS oiamro al aHihm hidetm ki iS bbtim halh apod otrpim opsl omskh oeth deo mh teSo : oisoro Smh oibao al bit hner hloi bit mikh oiSalo lo lSlom : oSS maot aiS Hgorim kli mlHmtm nzbim ptH hSer aSr mbni dn : oielo HmSt hanSim hhlkim lrgl at harz bao Smh lqHo at hpsl oat hapod oat htrpim oat hmskh ohkhn nzb ptH hSer oSS maot haiS hHgor kli hmlHmh : oalh bao bit mikh oiqHo at psl hapod oat htrpim oat hmskh oiamr alihm hkhn mh atm eSim : oiamro lo hHrS Sim idk el pik olk emno ohih lno lab olkhn hTob hiotk khn lbit aiS aHd ao hiotk khn lSbT olmSpHh biSral : oiiTb lb hkhn oiqH at hapod oat htrpim oat hpsl oiba bqrb hem : oipno oilko oiSimo at hTp oat hmqnh oat hkbodh lpnihm : hmh hrHiqo mbit mikh ohanSim aSr bbtim aSr em bit mikh nceqo oidbiqo at bni dn : oiqrao al bni dn oisbo pnihm oiamro lmikh mh lk ki nceqt : oiamr at alhi aSr eSiti lqHtm oat hkhn otlko omh li eod omh ch tamro ali mh lk : oiamro alio bni dn al tSme qolk emno pn ipgeo bkm anSim mri npS oaspth npSk onpS bitk : oilko bni dn ldrkm oira mikh ki Hcqim hmh mmno oipn oiSb al bito : ohmh lqHo at aSr eSh mikh oat hkhn aSr hih lo oibao el liS el em SqT obTH oiko aotm lpi Hrb oat heir Srpo baS : oain mzil ki rHoqh hia mzidon odbr ain lhm em adm ohia bemq aSr lbit rHob oibno at heir oiSbo bh : oiqrao Sm heir dn bSm dn abihm aSr iold liSral oaolm liS Sm heir lraSnh : oiqimo lhm bni dn at hpsl oihontn bn grSm bn mnSh hoa obnio hio khnim lSbT hdni ed iom glot harz : oiSimo lhm at psl mikh aSr eSh kl imi hiot bit halhim bSlh :

19

oihi bimim hhm omlk ain biSral oihi aiS loi gr birkti hr aprim oiqH lo aSh pilgS mbit lHm ihodh : otcnh elio pilgSo otlk mato al bit abih al bit lHm ihodh othi Sm imim arbeh HdSim : oiqm aiSh oilk aHrih ldbr el lbh lhSibo onero emo ozmd Hmrim otbiaho bit abih oiraho abi hnerh oiSmH lqrato : oiHcq bo Htno abi hnerh oiSb ato SlSt imim oiaklo oiSto oilino Sm : oihi biom hrbiei oiSkimo bbqr oiqm llkt oiamr abi hnerh al Htno sed lbk pt lHm oaHr tlko : oiSbo oiaklo Snihm iHdo oiSto oiamr abi hnerh al haiS hoal na olin oiTb lbk : oiqm haiS llkt oipzr bo Htno oiSb oiln Sm : oiSkm bbqr biom hHmiSi llkt oiamr abi hnerh sed na lbbk ohtmhmho ed nTot hiom oiaklo Snihm : oiqm haiS llkt hoa opilgSo onero oiamr lo Htno abi hnerh hnh na rph hiom lerb lino na hnh Hnot hiom lin ph oiiTb lbbk ohSkmtm mHr ldrkkm ohlkt lahlk : ola abh haiS llon oiqm oilk oiba ed nkH ibos hia iroSlm oemo zmd Hmorim HboSim opilgSo emo : hm em ibos ohiom rd mad oiamr hner al adnio lkh na onsorh al eir hibosi hcat onlin bh : oiamr alio adnio la nsor al eir nkri aSr la mbni iSral hnh oebrno ed gbeh : oiamr lnero lk onqrbh baHd hmqmot olno bgbeh ao brmh : oiebro oilko otba lhm hSmS azl hgbeh aSr lbnimn : oisro Sm lboa llon bgbeh oiba oiSb brHob heir oain aiS masp aotm hbith llon : ohnh aiS cqn ba mn meSho mn hSdh berb ohaiS mhr aprim ohoa gr bgbeh oanSi hmqom bni imini : oiSa einio oira at haiS harH brHb heir oiamr haiS hcqn anh tlk omain tboa : oiamr alio ebrim anHno mbit lHm ihodh ed irkti hr aprim mSm anki oalk ed bit lHm ihodh oat bit ihoh ani hlk oain aiS masp aoti hbith : ogm tbn gm mspoa iS lHmorino ogm lHm oiin iS li olamtk olner em ebdik ain mHsor kl dbr : oiamr haiS hcqn Slom lk rq kl mHsork eli rq brHob al tln : oibiaho lbito oibol lHmorim oirHzo rglihm oiaklo oiSto : hmh miTibim at lbm ohnh anSi heir anSi bni bliel nsbo at hbit mtdpqim el hdlt oiamro al haiS bel hbit hcqn lamr hoza at haiS aSr ba al bitk ondeno : oiza alihm haiS bel hbit oiamr alhm al aHi al treo na aHri aSr ba haiS hch al biti al teSo at hnblh hcat : hnh bti hbtolh opilgSho aoziah na aotm oeno aotm oeSo lhm hTob beinikm olaiS hch la teSo dbr hnblh hcat : ola abo hanSim lSme lo oiHcq haiS bpilgSo oiza alihm hHoz oideo aoth oitello bh kl hlilh ed hbqr oiSlHoh belot hSHr : otba haSh lpnot hbqr otpl ptH bit haiS aSr adonih Sm ed haor : oiqm adnih bbqr oiptH dltot hbit oiza llkt ldrko ohnh haSh pilgSo nplt ptH hbit oidih el hsp : oiamr alih qomi onlkh oain enh oiqHh el hHmor oiqm haiS oilk lmqmo : oiba al bito oiqH at hmaklt oiHcq bpilgSo ointHh lezmih lSnim eSr ntHim oiSlHh bkl gbol iSral : ohih kl hrah oamr la nhith ola nrath kcat lmiom elot bni iSral marz mzrim ed hiom hch Simo lkm elih ezo odbro :

20

oizao kl bni iSral otqhl hedh kaiS aHd lmdn oed bar Sbe oarz hgled al ihoh hmzph : oitizbo pnot kl hem kl SbTi iSral bqhl em halhim arbe maot alp aiS rgli Slp Hrb : oiSmeo bni bnimn ki elo bni iSral hmzph oiamro bni iSral dbro aikh nhith hreh hcat : oien haiS hloi aiS haSh hnrzHh oiamr hgbeth aSr lbnimn bati ani opilgSi llon : oiqmo eli beli hgbeh oisbo eli at hbit lilh aoti dmo lhrg oat pilgSi eno otmt : oaHc bpilgSi oantHh oaSlHh bkl Sdh nHlt iSral ki eSo cmh onblh biSral : hnh klkm bni iSral hbo lkm dbr oezh hlm : oiqm kl hem kaiS aHd lamr la nlk aiS lahlo ola nsor aiS lbito : oeth ch hdbr aSr neSh lgbeh elih bgorl : olqHno eSrh anSim lmah lkl SbTi iSral omah lalp oalp lrbbh lqHt zdh lem leSot lboam lgbe bnimn kkl hnblh aSr eSh biSral : oiasp kl aiS iSral al heir kaiS aHd Hbrim : oiSlHo SbTi iSral anSim bkl SbTi bnimn lamr mh hreh hcat aSr nhith bkm : oeth tno at hanSim bni bliel aSr bgbeh onmitm onberh reh miSral ola abo bnimn lSme bqol aHihm bni iSral : oiaspo bni bnimn mn herim hgbeth lzat lmlHmh em bni iSral : oitpqdo bni bnimn biom hhoa mherim eSrim oSSh alp aiS Slp Hrb lbd miSbi hgbeh htpqdo Sbe maot aiS bHor : mkl hem hch Sbe maot aiS bHor aTr id imino kl ch qle babn al hSerh ola iHTa : oaiS iSral htpqdo lbd mbnimn arbe maot alp aiS Slp Hrb kl ch aiS mlHmh : oiqmo oielo bit al oiSalo balhim oiamro bni iSral mi ielh lno btHlh lmlHmh em bni bnimn oiamr ihoh ihodh btHlh : oiqomo bni iSral bbqr oiHno el hgbeh : oiza aiS iSral lmlHmh em bnimn oierko atm aiS iSral mlHmh al hgbeh : oizao bni bnimn mn hgbeh oiSHito biSral biom hhoa Snim oeSrim alp aiS arzh : oitHcq hem aiS iSral oispo lerk mlHmh bmqom aSr erko Sm biom hraSon : oielo bni iSral oibko lpni ihoh ed herb oiSalo bihoh lamr haosip lgSt lmlHmh em bni bnimn aHi oiamr ihoh elo alio : oiqrbo bni iSral al bni bnimn biom hSni : oiza bnimn lqratm mn hgbeh biom hSni oiSHito bbni iSral eod Smnt eSr alp aiS arzh kl alh Slpi Hrb : oielo kl bni iSral okl hem oibao bit al oibko oiSbo Sm lpni ihoh oizomo biom hhoa ed herb oielo elot oSlmim lpni ihoh : oiSalo bni iSral bihoh oSm aron brit halhim bimim hhm : opinHs bn alecr bn ahrn emd lpnio bimim hhm lamr haosp eod lzat lmlHmh em bni bnimn aHi am aHdl oiamr ihoh elo ki mHr atnno bidk : oiSm iSral arbim al hgbeh sbib : oielo bni iSral al bni bnimn biom hSliSi oierko al hgbeh kpem bpem : oizao bni bnimn lqrat hem hntqo mn heir oiHlo lhkot mhem Hllim kpem bpem bmslot aSr aHt elh bit al oaHt gbeth bSdh kSlSim aiS biSral : oiamro bni bnimn ngpim hm lpnino kbraSnh obni iSral amro nnosh ontqnho mn heir al hmslot : okl aiS iSral qmo mmqomo oierko bbel tmr oarb iSral mgiH mmqmo mmerh gbe : oibao mngd lgbeh eSrt alpim aiS bHor mkl iSral ohmlHmh kbdh ohm la ideo ki nget elihm hreh : oigp ihoh at bnimn lpni iSral oiSHito bni iSral bbnimn biom hhoa eSrim oHmSh alp omah aiS kl alh Slp Hrb : oirao bni bnimn ki ngpo oitno aiS iSral mqom lbnimn ki bTHo al harb aSr Smo al hgbeh : oharb hHiSo oipSTo al hgbeh oimSk harb oik at kl heir lpi Hrb : ohmoed hih laiS iSral em harb hrb lhelotm mSat heSn mn heir : oihpk aiS iSral bmlHmh obnimn hHl lhkot Hllim baiS iSral kSlSim aiS ki amro ak ngop ngp hoa lpnino kmlHmh hraSnh : ohmSat hHlh lelot mn heir emod eSn oipn bnimn aHrio ohnh elh klil heir hSmimh : oaiS iSral hpk oibhl aiS bnimn ki rah ki ngeh elio hreh : oipno lpni aiS iSral al drk hmdbr ohmlHmh hdbiqtho oaSr mherim mSHitim aoto btoko : ktro at bnimn hrdipho mnoHh hdrikho ed nkH hgbeh mmcrH SmS : oiplo mbnimn Smnh eSr alp aiS at kl alh anSi Hil : oipno oinso hmdbrh al sle hrmon oiellho bmslot HmSt alpim aiS oidbiqo aHrio ed gdem oiko mmno alpim aiS : oihi kl hnplim mbnimn eSrim oHmSh alp aiS Slp Hrb biom hhoa at kl alh anSi Hil : oipno oinso hmdbrh al sle hrmon SS maot aiS oiSbo bsle rmon arbeh HdSim : oaiS iSral Sbo al bni bnimn oikom lpi Hrb meir mtm ed bhmh ed kl hnmza gm kl herim hnmzaot SlHo baS :

21

oaiS iSral nSbe bmzph lamr aiS mmno la itn bto lbnimn laSh : oiba hem bit al oiSbo Sm ed herb lpni halhim oiSao qolm oibko bki gdol : oiamro lmh ihoh alhi iSral hith cat biSral lhpqd hiom miSral SbT aHd : oihi mmHrt oiSkimo hem oibno Sm mcbH oielo elot oSlmim : oiamro bni iSral mi aSr la elh bqhl mkl SbTi iSral al ihoh ki hSboeh hgdolh hith laSr la elh al ihoh hmzph lamr mot iomt : oinHmo bni iSral al bnimn aHio oiamro ngde hiom SbT aHd miSral : mh neSh lhm lnotrim lnSim oanHno nSbeno bihoh lblti tt lhm mbnotino lnSim : oiamro mi aHd mSbTi iSral aSr la elh al ihoh hmzph ohnh la ba aiS al hmHnh mibiS gled al hqhl : oitpqd hem ohnh ain Sm aiS mioSbi ibS gled : oiSlHo Sm hedh Snim eSr alp aiS mbni hHil oizoo aotm lamr lko ohkitm at ioSbi ibS gled lpi Hrb ohnSim ohTp : och hdbr aSr teSo kl ckr okl aSh idet mSkb ckr tHrimo : oimzao mioSbi ibiS gled arbe maot nerh btolh aSr la ideh aiS lmSkb ckr oibiao aotm al hmHnh Slh aSr barz knen : oiSlHo kl hedh oidbro al bni bnimn aSr bsle rmon oiqrao lhm Slom : oiSb bnimn bet hhia oitno lhm hnSim aSr Hio mnSi ibS gled ola mzao lhm kn : ohem nHm lbnimn ki eSh ihoh prz bSbTi iSral : oiamro cqni hedh mh neSh lnotrim lnSim ki nSmdh mbnimn aSh : oiamro irSt pliTh lbnimn ola imHh SbT miSral : oanHno la nokl ltt lhm nSim mbnotino ki nSbeo bni iSral lamr aror ntn aSh lbnimn : oiamro hnh Hg ihoh bSlo mimim imimh aSr mzponh lbit al mcrHh hSmS lmslh helh mbit al Skmh omngb llbonh : oizo at bni bnimn lamr lko oarbtm bkrmim : oraitm ohnh am izao bnot Silo lHol bmHlot oizatm mn hkrmim oHTptm lkm aiS aSto mbnot Silo ohlktm arz bnimn : ohih ki ibao abotm ao aHihm lrob alino oamrno alihm Hnono aotm ki la lqHno aiS aSto bmlHmh ki la atm nttm lhm ket taSmo : oieSo kn bni bnimn oiSao nSim lmsprm mn hmHllot aSr gclo oilko oiSobo al nHltm oibno at herim oiSbo bhm : oithlko mSm bni iSral bet hhia aiS lSbTo olmSpHto oizao mSm aiS lnHlto : bimim hhm ain mlk biSral aiS hiSr beinio ieSh :

Smoal a

1

oihi aiS aHd mn hrmtim zopim mhr aprim oSmo alqnh bn irHm bn alihoa bn tHo bn zop aprti : olo Sti nSim Sm aHt Hnh oSm hSnit pnnh oihi lpnnh ildim olHnh ain ildim : oelh haiS hhoa meiro mimim imimh lhStHot olcbH lihoh zbaot bSlh oSm Sni bni eli Hpni opnHs khnim lihoh : oihi hiom oicbH alqnh ontn lpnnh aSto olkl bnih obnotih mnot : olHnh itn mnh aHt apim ki at Hnh ahb oihoh sgr rHmh : okesth zrth gm kes bebor hremh ki sgr ihoh bed rHmh : okn ieSh Snh bSnh mdi elth bbit ihoh kn tkesnh otbkh ola takl : oiamr lh alqnh aiSh Hnh lmh tbki olmh la takli olmh ire lbbk hloa anki Tob lk meSrh bnim : otqm Hnh aHri aklh bSlh oaHri Sth oeli hkhn iSb el hksa el mcoct hikl ihoh : ohia mrt npS ottpll el ihoh obkh tbkh : otdr ndr otamr ihoh zbaot am rah trah beni amtk ockrtni ola tSkH at amtk ontth lamtk cre anSim onttio lihoh kl imi Hiio omorh la ielh el raSo : ohih ki hrbth lhtpll lpni ihoh oeli Smr at pih : oHnh hia mdbrt el lbh rq Sptih neot oqolh la iSme oiHSbh eli lSkrh : oiamr alih eli ed mti tStkrin hsiri at iink melik : oten Hnh otamr la adni aSh qSt roH anki oiin oSkr la Stiti oaSpk at npSi lpni ihoh : al ttn at amtk lpni bt bliel ki mrb SiHi okesi dbrti ed hnh : oien eli oiamr lki lSlom oalhi iSral itn at Sltk aSr Salt memo : otamr tmza SpHtk Hn beinik otlk haSh ldrkh otakl opnih la hio lh eod : oiSkmo bbqr oiStHoo lpni ihoh oiSbo oibao al bitm hrmth oide alqnh at Hnh aSto oickrh ihoh : oihi ltqpot himim othr Hnh otld bn otqra at Smo Smoal ki mihoh Saltio : oiel haiS alqnh okl bito lcbH lihoh at cbH himim oat ndro : oHnh la elth ki amrh laiSh ed igml hner ohbatio onrah at pni ihoh oiSb Sm ed eolm : oiamr lh alqnh aiSh eSi hTob beinik Sbi ed gmlk ato ak iqm ihoh at dbro otSb haSh otinq at bnh ed gmlh ato : otelho emh kaSr gmlto bprim SlSh oaiph aHt qmH onbl iin otbaho bit ihoh Slo ohner ner : oiSHTo at hpr oibiao at hner al eli : otamr bi adni Hi npSk adni ani haSh hnzbt emkh bch lhtpll al ihoh : al hner hch htpllti oitn ihoh li at Salti aSr Salti memo : ogm anki hSaltho lihoh kl himim aSr hih hoa Saol lihoh oiStHo Sm lihoh :

2

ottpll Hnh otamr elz lbi bihoh rmh qrni bihoh rHb pi el aoibi ki SmHti biSoetk : ain qdoS kihoh ki ain bltk oain zor kalhino : al trbo tdbro gbhh gbhh iza etq mpikm ki al deot ihoh ola ntkno ellot : qSt gbrim Htim onkSlim acro Hil : Sbeim blHm nSkro orebim Hdlo ed eqrh ildh Sbeh orbt bnim amllh : ihoh mmit omHih morid Saol oiel : ihoh moriS omeSir mSpil ap mromm : mqim mepr dl maSpt irim abion lhoSib em ndibim oksa kbod inHlm ki lihoh mzqi arz oiSt elihm tbl : rgli Hsido iSmr orSeim bHSk idmo ki la bkH igbr aiS : ihoh iHto mribo elo bSmim irem ihoh idin apsi arz oitn ec lmlko oirm qrn mSiHo : oilk alqnh hrmth el bito ohner hih mSrt at ihoh at pni eli hkhn : obni eli bni bliel la ideo at ihoh : omSpT hkhnim at hem kl aiS cbH cbH oba ner hkhn kbSl hbSr ohmclg SlS hSnim bido : ohkh bkior ao bdod ao bqlHt ao bpror kl aSr ielh hmclg iqH hkhn bo kkh ieSo lkl iSral hbaim Sm bSlh : gm bTrm iqTron at hHlb oba ner hkhn oamr laiS hcbH tnh bSr lzlot lkhn ola iqH mmk bSr mbSl ki am Hi : oiamr alio haiS qTr iqTiron kiom hHlb oqH lk kaSr taoh npSk oamr lo ki eth ttn oam la lqHti bHcqh : othi HTat hnerim gdolh mad at pni ihoh ki nazo hanSim at mnHt ihoh : oSmoal mSrt at pni ihoh ner Hgor apod bd : omeil qTn teSh lo amo ohelth lo mimim imimh beloth at aiSh lcbH at cbH himim : obrk eli at alqnh oat aSto oamr iSm ihoh lk cre mn haSh hcat tHt hSalh aSr Sal lihoh ohlko lmqmo : ki pqd ihoh at Hnh othr otld SlSh bnim oSti bnot oigdl hner Smoal em ihoh : oeli cqn mad oSme at kl aSr ieSon bnio lkl iSral oat aSr iSkbon at hnSim hzbaot ptH ahl moed : oiamr lhm lmh teSon kdbrim halh aSr anki Sme at dbrikm reim mat kl hem alh : al bni ki loa Tobh hSmeh aSr anki Sme mebrim em ihoh : am iHTa aiS laiS opllo alhim oam lihoh iHTa aiS mi itpll lo ola iSmeo lqol abihm ki Hpz ihoh lhmitm : ohner Smoal hlk ogdl oTob gm em ihoh ogm em anSim : oiba aiS alhim al eli oiamr alio kh amr ihoh hnglh ngliti al bit abik bhiotm bmzrim lbit preh : obHr ato mkl SbTi iSral li lkhn lelot el mcbHi lhqTir qTrt lSat apod lpni oatnh lbit abik at kl aSi bni iSral : lmh tbeTo bcbHi obmnHti aSr zoiti meon otkbd at bnik mmni lhbriakm mraSit kl mnHt iSral lemi : lkn nam ihoh alhi iSral amor amrti bitk obit abik ithlko lpni ed eolm oeth nam ihoh Hlilh li ki mkbdi akbd obci iqlo : hnh imim baim ogdeti at crek oat cre bit abik mhiot cqn bbitk : ohbTt zr meon bkl aSr iiTib at iSral ola ihih cqn bbitk kl himim : oaiS la akrit lk mem mcbHi lklot at einik oladib at npSk okl mrbit bitk imoto anSim : och lk haot aSr iba al Sni bnik al Hpni opinHs biom aHd imoto Snihm : ohqimti li khn namn kaSr blbbi obnpSi ieSh obniti lo bit namn ohthlk lpni mSiHi kl himim : ohih kl hnotr bbitk iboa lhStHot lo lagort ksp okkr lHm oamr spHni na al aHt hkhnot lakl pt lHm :

3

ohner Smoal mSrt at ihoh lpni eli odbr ihoh hih iqr bimim hhm ain Hcon nprz : oihi biom hhoa oeli Skb bmqmo oeino hHlo khot la iokl lraot : onr alhim Trm ikbh oSmoal Skb bhikl ihoh aSr Sm aron alhim : oiqra ihoh al Smoal oiamr hnni : oirz al eli oiamr hnni ki qrat li oiamr la qrati Sob Skb oilk oiSkb : oisp ihoh qra eod Smoal oiqm Smoal oilk al eli oiamr hnni ki qrat li oiamr la qrati bni Sob Skb : oSmoal Trm ide at ihoh oTrm iglh alio dbr ihoh : oisp ihoh qra Smoal bSlSit oiqm oilk al eli oiamr hnni ki qrat li oibn eli ki ihoh qra lner : oiamr eli lSmoal lk Skb ohih am iqra alik oamrt dbr ihoh ki Sme ebdk oilk Smoal oiSkb bmqomo : oiba ihoh oitizb oiqra kpem bpem Smoal Smoal oiamr Smoal dbr ki Sme ebdk : oiamr ihoh al Smoal hnh anki eSh dbr biSral aSr kl Smeo tzlinh Sti acnio : biom hhoa aqim al eli at kl aSr dbrti al bito hHl oklh : ohgdti lo ki SpT ani at bito ed eolm beon aSr ide ki mqllim lhm bnio ola khh bm : olkn nSbeti lbit eli am itkpr eon bit eli bcbH obmnHh ed eolm : oiSkb Smoal ed hbqr oiptH at dltot bit ihoh oSmoal ira mhgid at hmrah al eli : oiqra eli at Smoal oiamr Smoal bni oiamr hnni : oiamr mh hdbr aSr dbr alik al na tkHd mmni kh ieSh lk alhim okh iosip am tkHd mmni dbr mkl hdbr aSr dbr alik : oigd lo Smoal at kl hdbrim ola kHd mmno oiamr ihoh hoa hTob beino ieSh : oigdl Smoal oihoh hih emo ola hpil mkl dbrio arzh : oide kl iSral mdn oed bar Sbe ki namn Smoal lnbia lihoh : oisp ihoh lhrah bSlh ki nglh ihoh al Smoal bSlo bdbr ihoh :

4

oihi dbr Smoal lkl iSral oiza iSral lqrat plStim lmlHmh oiHno el habn hecr oplStim Hno bapq : oierko plStim lqrat iSral otTS hmlHmh oingp iSral lpni plStim oiko bmerkh bSdh karbet alpim aiS : oiba hem al hmHnh oiamro cqni iSral lmh ngpno ihoh hiom lpni plStim nqHh alino mSlh at aron brit ihoh oiba bqrbno oiSeno mkp aibino : oiSlH hem Slh oiSao mSm at aron brit ihoh zbaot iSb hkrbim oSm Sni bni eli em aron brit halhim Hpni opinHs : oihi kboa aron brit ihoh al hmHnh oireo kl iSral troeh gdolh othm harz : oiSmeo plStim at qol htroeh oiamro mh qol htroeh hgdolh hcat bmHnh hebrim oideo ki aron ihoh ba al hmHnh : oirao hplStim ki amro ba alhim al hmHnh oiamro aoi lno ki la hith kcat atmol SlSm : aoi lno mi izilno mid halhim hadirim halh alh hm halhim hmkim at mzrim bkl mkh bmdbr : htHcqo ohio lanSim plStim pn tebdo lebrim kaSr ebdo lkm ohiitm lanSim onlHmtm : oilHmo plStim oingp iSral oinso aiS lahlio othi hmkh gdolh mad oipl miSral SlSim alp rgli : oaron alhim nlqH oSni bni eli mto Hpni opinHs : oirz aiS bnimn mhmerkh oiba Slh biom hhoa omdio qreim oadmh el raSo : oiboa ohnh eli iSb el hksa ik drk mzph ki hih lbo Hrd el aron halhim ohaiS ba lhgid beir otceq kl heir : oiSme eli at qol hzeqh oiamr mh qol hhmon hch ohaiS mhr oiba oigd leli : oeli bn tSeim oSmnh Snh oeinio qmh ola ikol lraot : oiamr haiS al eli anki hba mn hmerkh oani mn hmerkh nsti hiom oiamr mh hih hdbr bni : oien hmbSr oiamr ns iSral lpni plStim ogm mgph gdolh hith bem ogm Sni bnik mto Hpni opinHs oaron halhim nlqHh : oihi khckiro at aron halhim oipl mel hksa aHrnit bed id hSer otSbr mprqto oimt ki cqn haiS okbd ohoa SpT at iSral arbeim Snh : oklto aSt pinHs hrh llt otSme at hSmeh al hlqH aron halhim omt Hmih oaiSh otkre otld ki nhpko elih zrih : oket moth otdbrnh hnzbot elih al tirai ki bn ildt ola enth ola Sth lbh : otqra lner ai kbod lamr glh kbod miSral al hlqH aron halhim oal Hmih oaiSh : otamr glh kbod miSral ki nlqH aron halhim :

5

oplStim lqHo at aron halhim oibaho mabn hecr aSdodh : oiqHo plStim at aron halhim oibiao ato bit dgon oizigo ato azl dgon : oiSkmo aSdodim mmHrt ohnh dgon npl lpnio arzh lpni aron ihoh oiqHo at dgon oiSbo ato lmqomo : oiSkmo bbqr mmHrt ohnh dgon npl lpnio arzh lpni aron ihoh oraS dgon oSti kpot idio krtot al hmptn rq dgon nSar elio : el kn la idrko khni dgon okl hbaim bit dgon el mptn dgon baSdod ed hiom hch : otkbd id ihoh al haSdodim oiSmm oik atm beplim at aSdod oat gbolih : oirao anSi aSdod ki kn oamro la iSb aron alhi iSral emno ki qSth ido elino oel dgon alhino : oiSlHo oiaspo at kl srni plStim alihm oiamro mh neSh laron alhi iSral oiamro gt isb aron alhi iSral oisbo at aron alhi iSral : oihi aHri hsbo ato othi id ihoh beir mhomh gdolh mad oik at anSi heir mqTn oed gdol oiStro lhm eplim : oiSlHo at aron halhim eqron oihi kboa aron halhim eqron oiceqo heqrnim lamr hsbo ali at aron alhi iSral lhmitni oat emi : oiSlHo oiaspo at kl srni plStim oiamro SlHo at aron alhi iSral oiSb lmqmo ola imit ati oat emi ki hith mhomt mot bkl heir kbdh mad id halhim Sm : ohanSim aSr la mto hko beplim otel Soet heir hSmim :

6

oihi aron ihoh bSdh plStim Sbeh HdSim : oiqrao plStim lkhnim olqsmim lamr mh neSh laron ihoh hodeno bmh nSlHno lmqomo : oiamro am mSlHim at aron alhi iSral al tSlHo ato riqm ki hSb tSibo lo aSm ac trpao onode lkm lmh la tsor ido mkm : oiamro mh haSm aSr nSib lo oiamro mspr srni plStim HmSh epli chb oHmSh ekbri chb ki mgph aHt lklm olsrnikm : oeSitm zlmi eplikm ozlmi ekbrikm hmSHitm at harz onttm lalhi iSral kbod aoli iql at ido melikm omel alhikm omel arzkm : olmh tkbdo at lbbkm kaSr kbdo mzrim opreh at lbm hloa kaSr htell bhm oiSlHom oilko : oeth qHo oeSo eglh HdSh aHt oSti prot elot aSr la elh elihm el oasrtm at hprot beglh ohSibtm bnihm maHrihm hbith : olqHtm at aron ihoh onttm ato al heglh oat kli hchb aSr hSbtm lo aSm tSimo bargc mzdo oSlHtm ato ohlk : oraitm am drk gbolo ielh bit SmS hoa eSh lno at hreh hgdolh hcat oam la oideno ki la ido ngeh bno mqrh hoa hih lno : oieSo hanSim kn oiqHo Sti prot elot oiasrom beglh oat bnihm klo bbit : oiSmo at aron ihoh al heglh oat hargc oat ekbri hchb oat zlmi THrihm : oiSrnh hprot bdrk el drk bit SmS bmslh aHt hlko hlk ogeo ola sro imin oSmaol osrni plStim hlkim aHrihm ed gbol bit SmS : obit SmS qzrim qzir HTim bemq oiSao at einihm oirao at haron oiSmHo lraot : oheglh bah al Sdh ihoSe bit hSmSi otemd Sm oSm abn gdolh oibqeo at ezi heglh oat hprot helo elh lihoh : ohloim horido at aron ihoh oat hargc aSr ato aSr bo kli chb oiSmo al habn hgdolh oanSi bit SmS helo elot oicbHo cbHim biom hhoa lihoh : oHmSh srni plStim rao oiSbo eqron biom hhoa : oalh THri hchb aSr hSibo plStim aSm lihoh laSdod aHd lech aHd laSqlon aHd lgt aHd leqron aHd : oekbri hchb mspr kl eri plStim lHmSt hsrnim meir mbzr oed kpr hprci oed abl hgdolh aSr hniHo elih at aron ihoh ed hiom hch bSdh ihoSe bit hSmSi : oik banSi bit SmS ki rao baron ihoh oik bem Sbeim aiS HmSim alp aiS oitablo hem ki hkh ihoh bem mkh gdolh : oiamro anSi bit SmS mi iokl lemd lpni ihoh halhim hqdoS hch oal mi ielh melino : oiSlHo mlakim al ioSbi qrit ierim lamr hSbo plStim at aron ihoh rdo helo ato alikm :

7

oibao anSi qrit ierim oielo at aron ihoh oibao ato al bit abindb bgbeh oat alecr bno qdSo lSmr at aron ihoh : oihi miom Sbt haron bqrit ierim oirbo himim oihio eSrim Snh oinho kl bit iSral aHri ihoh : oiamr Smoal al kl bit iSral lamr am bkl lbbkm atm Sbim al ihoh hsiro at alhi hnkr mtokkm oheStrot ohkino lbbkm al ihoh oebdho lbdo oizl atkm mid plStim : oisiro bni iSral at hbelim oat heStrt oiebdo at ihoh lbdo : oiamr Smoal qbzo at kl iSral hmzpth oatpll bedkm al ihoh : oiqbzo hmzpth oiSabo mim oiSpko lpni ihoh oizomo biom hhoa oiamro Sm HTano lihoh oiSpT Smoal at bni iSral bmzph : oiSmeo plStim ki htqbzo bni iSral hmzpth oielo srni plStim al iSral oiSmeo bni iSral oirao mpni plStim : oiamro bni iSral al Smoal al tHrS mmno mceq al ihoh alhino oiSeno mid plStim : oiqH Smoal Tlh Hlb aHd oielh eolh klil lihoh oiceq Smoal al ihoh bed iSral oienho ihoh : oihi Smoal melh heolh oplStim ngSo lmlHmh biSral oirem ihoh bqol gdol biom hhoa el plStim oihmm oingpo lpni iSral : oizao anSi iSral mn hmzph oirdpo at plStim oikom ed mtHt lbit kr : oiqH Smoal abn aHt oiSm bin hmzph obin hSn oiqra at Smh abn hecr oiamr ed hnh ecrno ihoh : oikneo hplStim ola ispo eod lboa bgbol iSral othi id ihoh bplStim kl imi Smoal : otSbnh herim aSr lqHo plStim mat iSral liSral meqron oed gt oat gboln hzil iSral mid plStim oihi Slom bin iSral obin hamri : oiSpT Smoal at iSral kl imi Hiio : ohlk mdi Snh bSnh osbb bit al ohglgl ohmzph oSpT at iSral at kl hmqomot halh : otSbto hrmth ki Sm bito oSm SpT at iSral oibn Sm mcbH lihoh :

8

oihi kaSr cqn Smoal oiSm at bnio SpTim liSral : oihi Sm bno hbkor ioal oSm mSnho abih SpTim bbar Sbe : ola hlko bnio bdrko oiTo aHri hbze oiqHo SHd oiTo mSpT : oitqbzo kl cqni iSral oibao al Smoal hrmth : oiamro alio hnh ath cqnt obnik la hlko bdrkik eth Simh lno mlk lSpTno kkl hgoim : oire hdbr beini Smoal kaSr amro tnh lno mlk lSpTno oitpll Smoal al ihoh : oiamr ihoh al Smoal Sme bqol hem lkl aSr iamro alik ki la atk maso ki ati maso mmlk elihm : kkl hmeSim aSr eSo miom helti atm mmzrim oed hiom hch oiecbni oiebdo alhim aHrim kn hmh eSim gm lk : oeth Sme bqolm ak ki hed teid bhm ohgdt lhm mSpT hmlk aSr imlk elihm : oiamr Smoal at kl dbri ihoh al hem hSalim mato mlk : oiamr ch ihih mSpT hmlk aSr imlk elikm at bnikm iqH oSm lo bmrkbto obprSio orzo lpni mrkbto : olSom lo Sri alpim oSri HmSim olHrS HriSo olqzr qziro oleSot kli mlHmto okli rkbo : oat bnotikm iqH lrqHot olTbHot olapot : oat Sdotikm oat krmikm ocitikm hTobim iqH ontn lebdio : ocreikm okrmikm ieSr ontn lsrisio olebdio : oat ebdikm oat SpHotikm oat bHorikm hTobim oat Hmorikm iqH oeSh lmlakto : zankm ieSr oatm thio lo lebdim : oceqtm biom hhoa mlpni mlkkm aSr bHrtm lkm ola ienh ihoh atkm biom hhoa : oimano hem lSme bqol Smoal oiamro la ki am mlk ihih elino : ohiino gm anHno kkl hgoim oSpTno mlkno oiza lpnino onlHm at mlHmtno : oiSme Smoal at kl dbri hem oidbrm bacni ihoh : oiamr ihoh al Smoal Sme bqolm ohmlkt lhm mlk oiamr Smoal al anSi iSral lko aiS leiro :

9

oihi aiS mbn imin oSmo qiS bn abial bn zror bn bkort bn apiH bn aiS imini gbor Hil : olo hih bn oSmo Saol bHor oTob oain aiS mbni iSral Tob mmno mSkmo omelh gbh mkl hem : otabdnh hatnot lqiS abi Saol oiamr qiS al Saol bno qH na atk at aHd mhnerim oqom lk bqS at hatnt : oiebr bhr aprim oiebr barz SlSh ola mzao oiebro barz Selim oain oiebr barz imini ola mzao : hmh bao barz zop oSaol amr lnero aSr emo lkh onSobh pn iHdl abi mn hatnot odag lno : oiamr lo hnh na aiS alhim beir hcat ohaiS nkbd kl aSr idbr boa iboa eth nlkh Sm aoli igid lno at drkno aSr hlkno elih : oiamr Saol lnero ohnh nlk omh nbia laiS ki hlHm acl mklino otSorh ain lhbia laiS halhim mh atno : oisp hner lenot at Saol oiamr hnh nmza bidi rbe Sql ksp ontti laiS halhim ohgid lno at drkno : lpnim biSral kh amr haiS blkto ldroS alhim lko onlkh ed hrah ki lnbia hiom iqra lpnim hrah : oiamr Saol lnero Tob dbrk lkh nlkh oilko al heir aSr Sm aiS halhim : hmh elim bmelh heir ohmh mzao nerot izaot lSab mim oiamro lhn hiS bch hrah : oteninh aotm otamrnh iS hnh lpnik mhr eth ki hiom ba leir ki cbH hiom lem bbmh : kbakm heir kn tmzaon ato bTrm ielh hbmth lakl ki la iakl hem ed bao ki hoa ibrk hcbH aHri kn iaklo hqraim oeth elo ki ato khiom tmzaon ato : oielo heir hmh baim btok heir ohnh Smoal iza lqratm lelot hbmh : oihoh glh at acn Smoal iom aHd lpni boa Saol lamr : ket mHr aSlH alik aiS marz bnimn omSHto lngid el emi iSral ohoSie at emi mid plStim ki raiti at emi ki bah zeqto ali : oSmoal rah at Saol oihoh enho hnh haiS aSr amrti alik ch iezr bemi : oigS Saol at Smoal btok hSer oiamr hgidh na li ai ch bit hrah : oien Smoal at Saol oiamr anki hrah elh lpni hbmh oakltm emi hiom oSlHtik bbqr okl aSr blbbk agid lk : olatnot habdot lk hiom SlSt himim al tSm at lbk lhm ki nmzao olmi kl Hmdt iSral hloa lk olkl bit abik : oien Saol oiamr hloa bn imini anki mqTni SbTi iSral omSpHti hzerh mkl mSpHot SbTi bnimn olmh dbrt ali kdbr hch : oiqH Smoal at Saol oat nero oibiam lSkth oitn lhm mqom braS hqroaim ohmh kSlSim aiS : oiamr Smoal lTbH tnh at hmnh aSr ntti lk aSr amrti alik Sim ath emk : oirm hTbH at hSoq ohelih oiSm lpni Saol oiamr hnh hnSar Sim lpnik akl ki lmoed Smor lk lamr hem qrati oiakl Saol em Smoal biom hhoa : oirdo mhbmh heir oidbr em Saol el hgg : oiSkmo oihi kelot hSHr oiqra Smoal al Saol hgg lamr qomh oaSlHk oiqm Saol oizao Snihm hoa oSmoal hHozh : hmh iordim bqzh heir oSmoal amr al Saol amr lner oiebr lpnino oiebr oath emd kiom oaSmiek at dbr alhim :

10

oiqH Smoal at pk hSmn oizq el raSo oiSqho oiamr hloa ki mSHk ihoh el nHlto lngid : blktk hiom memdi omzat Sni anSim em qbrt rHl bgbol bnimn bzlzH oamro alik nmzao hatnot aSr hlkt lbqS ohnh nTS abik at dbri hatnot odag lkm lamr mh aeSh lbni : oHlpt mSm ohlah obat ed alon tbor omzaok Sm SlSh anSim elim al halhim bit al aHd nSa SlSh gdiim oaHd nSa SlSt kkrot lHm oaHd nSa nbl iin : oSalo lk lSlom ontno lk Sti lHm olqHt midm : aHr kn tboa gbet halhim aSr Sm nzbi plStim oihi kbak Sm heir opget Hbl nbiaim irdim mhbmh olpnihm nbl otp oHlil oknor ohmh mtnbaim : ozlHh elik roH ihoh ohtnbit emm onhpkt laiS aHr : ohih ki tbainh hatot halh lk eSh lk aSr tmza idk ki halhim emk : oirdt lpni hglgl ohnh anki ird alik lhelot elot lcbH cbHi Slmim Sbet imim toHl ed boai alik ohodeti lk at aSr teSh : ohih khpnto Skmo llkt mem Smoal oihpk lo alhim lb aHr oibao kl hatot halh biom hhoa : oibao Sm hgbeth ohnh Hbl nbaim lqrato otzlH elio roH alhim oitnba btokm : oihi kl iodeo matmol SlSom oirao ohnh em nbaim nba oiamr hem aiS al reho mh ch hih lbn qiS hgm Saol bnbiaim : oien aiS mSm oiamr omi abihm el kn hith lmSl hgm Saol bnbaim : oikl mhtnbot oiba hbmh : oiamr dod Saol alio oal nero an hlktm oiamr lbqS at hatnot onrah ki ain onboa al Smoal : oiamr dod Saol hgidh na li mh amr lkm Smoal : oiamr Saol al dodo hgd hgid lno ki nmzao hatnot oat dbr hmlokh la hgid lo aSr amr Smoal : oizeq Smoal at hem al ihoh hmzph : oiamr al bni iSral kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki heliti at iSral mmzrim oazil atkm mid mzrim omid kl hmmlkot hlHzim atkm : oatm hiom mastm at alhikm aSr hoa moSie lkm mkl reotikm ozrtikm otamro lo ki mlk tSim elino oeth htizbo lpni ihoh lSbTikm olalpikm : oiqrb Smoal at kl SbTi iSral oilkd SbT bnimn : oiqrb at SbT bnimn lmSpHto otlkd mSpHt hmTri oilkd Saol bn qiS oibqSho ola nmza : oiSalo eod bihoh hba eod hlm aiS oiamr ihoh hnh hoa nHba al hklim : oirzo oiqHho mSm oitizb btok hem oigbh mkl hem mSkmo omelh : oiamr Smoal al kl hem hraitm aSr bHr bo ihoh ki ain kmho bkl hem oireo kl hem oiamro iHi hmlk : oidbr Smoal al hem at mSpT hmlkh oiktb bspr oinH lpni ihoh oiSlH Smoal at kl hem aiS lbito : ogm Saol hlk lbito gbeth oilko emo hHil aSr nge alhim blbm : obni bliel amro mh iSeno ch oibcho ola hbiao lo mnHh oihi kmHriS :

11

oiel nHS hemoni oiHn el ibS gled oiamro kl anSi ibiS al nHS krt lno brit onebdk : oiamr alihm nHS hemoni bcat akrt lkm bnqor lkm kl ein imin oSmtih Hrph el kl iSral : oiamro alio cqni ibiS hrp lno Sbet imim onSlHh mlakim bkl gbol iSral oam ain moSie atno oizano alik : oibao hmlakim gbet Saol oidbro hdbrim bacni hem oiSao kl hem at qolm oibko : ohnh Saol ba aHri hbqr mn hSdh oiamr Saol mh lem ki ibko oispro lo at dbri anSi ibiS : otzlH roH alhim el Saol bSmeo at hdbrim halh oiHr apo mad : oiqH zmd bqr ointHho oiSlH bkl gbol iSral bid hmlakim lamr aSr ainno iza aHri Saol oaHr Smoal kh ieSh lbqro oipl pHd ihoh el hem oizao kaiS aHd : oipqdm bbcq oihio bni iSral SlS maot alp oaiS ihodh SlSim alp : oiamro lmlakim hbaim kh tamron laiS ibiS gled mHr thih lkm tSoeh bHm hSmS oibao hmlakim oigido lanSi ibiS oiSmHo : oiamro anSi ibiS mHr nza alikm oeSitm lno kkl hTob beinikm : oihi mmHrt oiSm Saol at hem SlSh raSim oibao btok hmHnh baSmrt hbqr oiko at emon ed Hm hiom oihi hnSarim oipzo ola nSaro bm Snim iHd : oiamr hem al Smoal mi hamr Saol imlk elino tno hanSim onmitm : oiamr Saol la iomt aiS biom hch ki hiom eSh ihoh tSoeh biSral : oiamr Smoal al hem lko onlkh hglgl onHdS Sm hmlokh : oilko kl hem hglgl oimlko Sm at Saol lpni ihoh bglgl oicbHo Sm cbHim Slmim lpni ihoh oiSmH Sm Saol okl anSi iSral ed mad :

12

oiamr Smoal al kl iSral hnh Smeti bqlkm lkl aSr amrtm li oamlik elikm mlk : oeth hnh hmlk mthlk lpnikm oani cqnti oSbti obni hnm atkm oani hthlkti lpnikm mneri ed hiom hch : hnni eno bi ngd ihoh ongd mSiHo at Sor mi lqHti oHmor mi lqHti oat mi eSqti at mi rzoti omid mi lqHti kpr oaelim eini bo oaSib lkm : oiamro la eSqtno ola rzotno ola lqHt mid aiS maomh : oiamr alihm ed ihoh bkm oed mSiHo hiom hch ki la mzatm bidi maomh oiamr ed : oiamr Smoal al hem ihoh aSr eSh at mSh oat ahrn oaSr helh at abtikm marz mzrim : oeth htizbo oaSpTh atkm lpni ihoh at kl zdqot ihoh aSr eSh atkm oat abotikm : kaSr ba ieqb mzrim oiceqo abotikm al ihoh oiSlH ihoh at mSh oat ahrn oioziao at abtikm mmzrim oiSbom bmqom hch : oiSkHo at ihoh alhihm oimkr atm bid sisra Sr zba Hzor obid plStim obid mlk moab oilHmo bm : oiceqo al ihoh oiamr HTano ki ecbno at ihoh onebd at hbelim oat heStrot oeth hzilno mid aibino onebdk : oiSlH ihoh at irbel oat bdn oat iptH oat Smoal oizl atkm mid aibikm msbib otSbo bTH : otrao ki nHS mlk bni emon ba elikm otamro li la ki mlk imlk elino oihoh alhikm mlkkm : oeth hnh hmlk aSr bHrtm aSr Saltm ohnh ntn ihoh elikm mlk : am tirao at ihoh oebdtm ato oSmetm bqlo ola tmro at pi ihoh ohitm gm atm ogm hmlk aSr mlk elikm aHr ihoh alhikm : oam la tSmeo bqol ihoh omritm at pi ihoh ohith id ihoh bkm obabtikm : gm eth htizbo orao at hdbr hgdol hch aSr ihoh eSh leinikm : hloa qzir HTim hiom aqra al ihoh oitn qlot omTr odeo orao ki retkm rbh aSr eSitm beini ihoh lSaol lkm mlk : oiqra Smoal al ihoh oitn ihoh qlt omTr biom hhoa oiira kl hem mad at ihoh oat Smoal : oiamro kl hem al Smoal htpll bed ebdik al ihoh alhik oal nmot ki ispno el kl HTatino reh lSal lno mlk : oiamr Smoal al hem al tirao atm eSitm at kl hreh hcat ak al tsoro maHri ihoh oebdtm at ihoh bkl lbbkm : ola tsoro ki aHri htho aSr la ioeilo ola izilo ki tho hmh : ki la iTS ihoh at emo bebor Smo hgdol ki hoail ihoh leSot atkm lo lem : gm anki Hlilh li mHTa lihoh mHdl lhtpll bedkm ohoriti atkm bdrk hTobh ohiSrh : ak irao at ihoh oebdtm ato bamt bkl lbbkm ki rao at aSr hgdl emkm : oam hre treo gm atm gm mlkkm tspo :

13

bn Snh Saol bmlko oSti Snim mlk el iSral : oibHr lo Saol SlSt alpim miSral oihio em Saol alpim bmkmS obhr bit al oalp hio em iontn bgbet bnimin oitr hem SlH aiS lahlio : oik iontn at nzib plStim aSr bgbe oiSmeo plStim oSaol tqe bSopr bkl harz lamr iSmeo hebrim : okl iSral Smeo lamr hkh Saol at nzib plStim ogm nbaS iSral bplStim oizeqo hem aHri Saol hglgl : oplStim naspo lhlHm em iSral SlSim alp rkb oSSt alpim prSim oem kHol aSr el Spt him lrb oielo oiHno bmkmS qdmt bit aon : oaiS iSral rao ki zr lo ki ngS hem oitHbao hem bmerot obHoHim obsleim obzrHim obbrot : oebrim ebro at hirdn arz gd ogled oSaol eodno bglgl okl hem Hrdo aHrio : oiiHl Sbet imim lmoed aSr Smoal ola ba Smoal hglgl oipz hem melio : oiamr Saol hgSo ali helh ohSlmim oiel helh : oihi kklto lhelot helh ohnh Smoal ba oiza Saol lqrato lbrko : oiamr Smoal mh eSit oiamr Saol ki raiti ki npz hem meli oath la bat lmoed himim oplStim naspim mkmS : oamr eth irdo plStim ali hglgl opni ihoh la Hliti oatapq oaelh helh : oiamr Smoal al Saol nsklt la Smrt at mzot ihoh alhik aSr zok ki eth hkin ihoh at mmlktk al iSral ed eolm : oeth mmlktk la tqom bqS ihoh lo aiS klbbo oizoho ihoh lngid el emo ki la Smrt at aSr zok ihoh : oiqm Smoal oiel mn hglgl gbet bnimn oipqd Saol at hem hnmzaim emo kSS maot aiS : oSaol oiontn bno ohem hnmza emm iSbim bgbe bnimn oplStim Hno bmkmS : oiza hmSHit mmHnh plStim SlSh raSim hraS aHd ipnh al drk eprh al arz Soel : ohraS aHd ipnh drk bit Hron ohraS aHd ipnh drk hgbol hnSqp el gi hzbeim hmdbrh : oHrS la imza bkl arz iSral ki amr plStim pn ieSo hebrim Hrb ao Hnit : oirdo kl iSral hplStim llToS aiS at mHrSto oat ato oat qrdmo oat mHrSto : ohith hpzirh pim lmHrSt olatim olSlS qlSon olhqrdmim olhzib hdrbn : ohih biom mlHmt ola nmza Hrb oHnit bid kl hem aSr at Saol oat iontn otmza lSaol oliontn bno : oiza mzb plStim al mebr mkmS :

14

oihi hiom oiamr iontn bn Saol al hner nSa klio lkh onebrh al mzb plStim aSr mebr hlc olabio la hgid : oSaol ioSb bqzh hgbeh tHt hrmon aSr bmgron ohem aSr emo kSS maot aiS : oaHih bn aHTob aHi aikbod bn pinHs bn eli khn ihoh bSlo nSa apod ohem la ide ki hlk iontn : obin hmebrot aSr bqS iontn lebr el mzb plStim Sn hsle mhebr mch oSn hsle mhebr mch oSm haHd bozz oSm haHd snh : hSn haHd mzoq mzpon mol mkmS ohaHd mngb mol gbe : oiamr ihontn al hner nSa klio lkh onebrh al mzb herlim halh aoli ieSh ihoh lno ki ain lihoh mezor lhoSie brb ao bmeT : oiamr lo nSa klio eSh kl aSr blbbk nTh lk hnni emk klbbk : oiamr ihontn hnh anHno ebrim al hanSim onglino alihm : am kh iamro alino dmo ed hgieno alikm oemdno tHtino ola nelh alihm : oam kh iamro elo elino oelino ki ntnm ihoh bidno och lno haot : oiglo Snihm al mzb plStim oiamro plStim hnh ebrim izaim mn hHrim aSr htHbao Sm : oieno anSi hmzbh at iontn oat nSa klio oiamro elo alino onodieh atkm dbr oiamr iontn al nSa klio elh aHri ki ntnm ihoh bid iSral : oiel iontn el idio oel rglio onSa klio aHrio oiplo lpni iontn onSa klio mmott aHrio : othi hmkh hraSnh aSr hkh iontn onSa klio keSrim aiS kbHzi menh zmd Sdh : othi Hrdh bmHnh bSdh obkl hem hmzb ohmSHit Hrdo gm hmh otrgc harz othi lHrdt alhim : oirao hzpim lSaol bgbet bnimn ohnh hhmon nmog oilk ohlm : oiamr Saol lem aSr ato pqdo na orao mi hlk memno oipqdo ohnh ain iontn onSa klio : oiamr Saol laHih hgiSh aron halhim ki hih aron halhim biom hhoa obni iSral : oihi ed dbr Saol al hkhn ohhmon aSr bmHnh plStim oilk hlok orb oiamr Saol al hkhn asp idk : oiceq Saol okl hem aSr ato oibao ed hmlHmh ohnh hith Hrb aiS breho mhomh gdolh mad : ohebrim hio lplStim katmol SlSom aSr elo emm bmHnh sbib ogm hmh lhiot em iSral aSr em Saol oiontn : okl aiS iSral hmtHbaim bhr aprim Smeo ki nso plStim oidbqo gm hmh aHrihm bmlHmh : oioSe ihoh biom hhoa at iSral ohmlHmh ebrh at bit aon : oaiS iSral ngS biom hhoa oial Saol at hem lamr aror haiS aSr iakl lHm ed herb onqmti maibi ola Tem kl hem lHm : okl harz bao bier oihi dbS el pni hSdh : oiba hem al hier ohnh hlk dbS oain mSig ido al pio ki ira hem at hSbeh : oiontn la Sme bhSbie abio at hem oiSlH at qzh hmTh aSr bido oiTbl aoth biert hdbS oiSb ido al pio otranh einio : oien aiS mhem oiamr hSbe hSbie abik at hem lamr aror haiS aSr iakl lHm hiom oiep hem : oiamr iontn ekr abi at harz rao na ki aro eini ki Temti meT dbS hch : ap ki loa akl akl hiom hem mSll aibio aSr mza ki eth la rbth mkh bplStim : oiko biom hhoa bplStim mmkmS ailnh oiep hem mad : oieS hem al Sll oiqHo zan obqr obni bqr oiSHTo arzh oiakl hem el hdm : oigido lSaol lamr hnh hem HTaim lihoh lakl el hdm oiamr bgdtm glo ali hiom abn gdolh : oiamr Saol pzo bem oamrtm lhm hgiSo ali aiS Soro oaiS Siho oSHTtm bch oakltm ola tHTao lihoh lakl al hdm oigSo kl hem aiS Soro bido hlilh oiSHTo Sm : oibn Saol mcbH lihoh ato hHl lbnot mcbH lihoh : oiamr Saol nrdh aHri plStim lilh onbch bhm ed aor hbqr ola nSar bhm aiS oiamro kl hTob beinik eSh oiamr hkhn nqrbh hlm al halhim : oiSal Saol balhim hard aHri plStim httnm bid iSral ola enho biom hhoa : oiamr Saol gSo hlm kl pnot hem odeo orao bmh hith hHTat hcat hiom : ki Hi ihoh hmoSie at iSral ki am iSno biontn bni ki mot imot oain enho mkl hem : oiamr al kl iSral atm thio lebr aHd oani oiontn bni nhih lebr aHd oiamro hem al Saol hTob beinik eSh : oiamr Saol al ihoh alhi iSral hbh tmim oilkd iontn oSaol ohem izao : oiamr Saol hpilo bini obin iontn bni oilkd iontn : oiamr Saol al iontn hgidh li mh eSith oigd lo iontn oiamr Tem Temti bqzh hmTh aSr bidi meT dbS hnni amot : oiamr Saol kh ieSh alhim okh iosp ki mot tmot iontn : oiamr hem al Saol hiontn imot aSr eSh hiSoeh hgdolh hcat biSral Hlilh Hi ihoh am ipl mSert raSo arzh ki em alhim eSh hiom hch oipdo hem at iontn ola mt : oiel Saol maHri plStim oplStim hlko lmqomm : oSaol lkd hmlokh el iSral oilHm sbib bkl aibio bmoab obbni emon obadom obmlki zobh obplStim obkl aSr ipnh irSie : oieS Hil oik at emlq oizl at iSral mid Ssho : oihio bni Saol iontn oiSoi omlki Soe oSm Sti bntio Sm hbkirh mrb oSm hqTnh mikl : oSm aSt Saol aHinem bt aHimez oSm Sr zbao abinr bn nr dod Saol : oqiS abi Saol onr abi abnr bn abial : othi hmlHmh Hcqh el plStim kl imi Saol orah Saol kl aiS gbor okl bn Hil oiaspho alio :

15

oiamr Smoal al Saol ati SlH ihoh lmSHk lmlk el emo el iSral oeth Sme lqol dbri ihoh : kh amr ihoh zbaot pqdti at aSr eSh emlq liSral aSr Sm lo bdrk belto mmzrim : eth lk ohkith at emlq ohHrmtm at kl aSr lo ola tHml elio ohmth maiS ed aSh mell oed ionq mSor oed Sh mgml oed Hmor : oiSme Saol at hem oipqdm bTlaim matim alp rgli oeSrt alpim at aiS ihodh : oiba Saol ed eir emlq oirb bnHl : oiamr Saol al hqini lko sro rdo mtok emlqi pn aspk emo oath eSith Hsd em kl bni iSral belotm mmzrim oisr qini mtok emlq : oik Saol at emlq mHoilh boak Sor aSr el pni mzrim : oitpS at agg mlk emlq Hi oat kl hem hHrim lpi Hrb : oiHml Saol ohem el agg oel miTb hzan ohbqr ohmSnim oel hkrim oel kl hTob ola abo hHrimm okl hmlakh nmbch onms ath hHrimo : oihi dbr ihoh al Smoal lamr : nHmti ki hmlkti at Saol lmlk ki Sb maHri oat dbri la hqim oiHr lSmoal oiceq al ihoh kl hlilh : oiSkm Smoal lqrat Saol bbqr oigd lSmoal lamr ba Saol hkrmlh ohnh mzib lo id oisb oiebr oird hglgl : oiba Smoal al Saol oiamr lo Saol brok ath lihoh hqimti at dbr ihoh : oiamr Smoal omh qol hzan hch bacni oqol hbqr aSr anki Sme : oiamr Saol memlqi hbiaom aSr Hml hem el miTb hzan ohbqr lmen cbH lihoh alhik oat hiotr hHrmno : oiamr Smoal al Saol hrp oagidh lk at aSr dbr ihoh ali hlilh oiamro lo dbr : oiamr Smoal hloa am qTn ath beinik raS SbTi iSral ath oimSHk ihoh lmlk el iSral : oiSlHk ihoh bdrk oiamr lk ohHrmth at hHTaim at emlq onlHmt bo ed klotm atm : olmh la Smet bqol ihoh oteT al hSll oteS hre beini ihoh : oiamr Saol al Smoal aSr Smeti bqol ihoh oalk bdrk aSr SlHni ihoh oabia at agg mlk emlq oat emlq hHrmti : oiqH hem mhSll zan obqr raSit hHrm lcbH lihoh alhik bglgl : oiamr Smoal hHpz lihoh belot ocbHim kSme bqol ihoh hnh Sme mcbH Tob lhqSib mHlb ailim : ki HTat qsm mri oaon otrpim hpzr ien mast at dbr ihoh oimask mmlk : oiamr Saol al Smoal HTati ki ebrti at pi ihoh oat dbrik ki irati at hem oaSme bqolm : oeth Sa na at HTati oSob emi oaStHoh lihoh : oiamr Smoal al Saol la aSob emk ki masth at dbr ihoh oimask ihoh mhiot mlk el iSral : oisb Smoal llkt oiHcq bknp meilo oiqre : oiamr alio Smoal qre ihoh at mmlkot iSral melik hiom ontnh lrek hTob mmk : ogm nzH iSral la iSqr ola inHm ki la adm hoa lhnHm : oiamr HTati eth kbdni na ngd cqni emi ongd iSral oSob emi ohStHoiti lihoh alhik : oiSb Smoal aHri Saol oiStHo Saol lihoh : oiamr Smoal hgiSo ali at agg mlk emlq oilk alio agg mednt oiamr agg akn sr mr hmot : oiamr Smoal kaSr Sklh nSim Hrbk kn tSkl mnSim amk oiSsp Smoal at agg lpni ihoh bglgl : oilk Smoal hrmth oSaol elh al bito gbet Saol : ola isp Smoal lraot at Saol ed iom moto ki htabl Smoal al Saol oihoh nHm ki hmlik at Saol el iSral :

16

oiamr ihoh al Smoal ed mti ath mtabl al Saol oani mastio mmlk el iSral mla qrnk Smn olk aSlHk al iSi bit hlHmi ki raiti bbnio li mlk : oiamr Smoal aik alk oSme Saol ohrgni oiamr ihoh eglt bqr tqH bidk oamrt lcbH lihoh bati : oqrat liSi bcbH oanki aodiek at aSr teSh omSHt li at aSr amr alik : oieS Smoal at aSr dbr ihoh oiba bit lHm oiHrdo cqni heir lqrato oiamr Slm boak : oiamr Slom lcbH lihoh bati htqdSo obatm ati bcbH oiqdS at iSi oat bnio oiqra lhm lcbH : oihi bboam oira at aliab oiamr ak ngd ihoh mSiHo : oiamr ihoh al Smoal al tbT al mraho oal gbh qomto ki mastiho ki la aSr irah hadm ki hadm irah leinim oihoh irah llbb : oiqra iSi al abindb oiebrho lpni Smoal oiamr gm bch la bHr ihoh : oiebr iSi Smh oiamr gm bch la bHr ihoh : oiebr iSi Sbet bnio lpni Smoal oiamr Smoal al iSi la bHr ihoh balh : oiamr Smoal al iSi htmo hnerim oiamr eod Sar hqTn ohnh reh bzan oiamr Smoal al iSi SlHh oqHno ki la nsb ed bao ph : oiSlH oibiaho ohoa admoni em iph einim oTob rai oiamr ihoh qom mSHho ki ch hoa : oiqH Smoal at qrn hSmn oimSH ato bqrb aHio otzlH roH ihoh al dod mhiom hhoa omelh oiqm Smoal oilk hrmth : oroH ihoh srh mem Saol obetto roH reh mat ihoh : oiamro ebdi Saol alio hnh na roH alhim reh mbetk : iamr na adnno ebdik lpnik ibqSo aiS ide mngn bknor ohih bhiot elik roH alhim reh ongn bido oTob lk : oiamr Saol al ebdio rao na li aiS miTib lngn ohbiaotm ali : oien aHd mhnerim oiamr hnh raiti bn liSi bit hlHmi ide ngn ogbor Hil oaiS mlHmh onbon dbr oaiS tar oihoh emo : oiSlH Saol mlakim al iSi oiamr SlHh ali at dod bnk aSr bzan : oiqH iSi Hmor lHm onad iin ogdi ecim aHd oiSlH bid dod bno al Saol : oiba dod al Saol oiemd lpnio oiahbho mad oihi lo nSa klim : oiSlH Saol al iSi lamr iemd na dod lpni ki mza Hn beini : ohih bhiot roH alhim al Saol olqH dod at hknor ongn bido oroH lSaol oTob lo osrh melio roH hreh :

17

oiaspo plStim at mHnihm lmlHmh oiaspo Skh aSr lihodh oiHno bin Sokh obin ecqh baps dmim : oSaol oaiS iSral naspo oiHno bemq halh oierko mlHmh lqrat plStim : oplStim emdim al hhr mch oiSral emdim al hhr mch ohgia binihm : oiza aiS hbnim mmHnot plStim glit Smo mgt gbho SS amot ocrt : okobe nHSt el raSo oSrion qSqSim hoa lboS omSql hSrion HmSt alpim Sqlim nHSt : omzHt nHSt el rglio okidon nHSt bin ktpio : oHz Hnito kmnor argim olhbt Hnito SS maot Sqlim brcl onSa hznh hlk lpnio : oiemd oiqra al merkt iSral oiamr lhm lmh tzao lerk mlHmh hloa anki hplSti oatm ebdim lSaol bro lkm aiS oird ali : am iokl lhlHm ati ohkni ohiino lkm lebdim oam ani aokl lo ohkitio ohiitm lno lebdim oebdtm atno : oiamr hplSti ani Hrpti at merkot iSral hiom hch tno li aiS onlHmh iHd : oiSme Saol okl iSral at dbri hplSti halh oiHto oirao mad : odod bn aiS aprti hch mbit lHm ihodh oSmo iSi olo Smnh bnim ohaiS bimi Saol cqn ba banSim : oilko SlSt bni iSi hgdlim hlko aHri Saol lmlHmh oSm SlSt bnio aSr hlko bmlHmh aliab hbkor omSnho abindb ohSlSi Smh : odod hoa hqTn oSlSh hgdlim hlko aHri Saol : odod hlk oSb mel Saol lreot at zan abio bit lHm : oigS hplSti hSkm oherb oitizb arbeim iom : oiamr iSi ldod bno qH na laHik aipt hqlia hch oeSrh lHm hch ohrz hmHnh laHik : oat eSrt Hrzi hHlb halh tbia lSr halp oat aHik tpqd lSlom oat erbtm tqH : oSaol ohmh okl aiS iSral bemq halh nlHmim em plStim : oiSkm dod bbqr oiTS at hzan el Smr oiSa oilk kaSr zoho iSi oiba hmeglh ohHil hiza al hmerkh ohreo bmlHmh : oterk iSral oplStim merkh lqrat merkh : oiTS dod at hklim melio el id Somr hklim oirz hmerkh oiba oiSal laHio lSlom : ohoa mdbr emm ohnh aiS hbnim eolh glit hplSti Smo mgt mmerot plStim oidbr kdbrim halh oiSme dod : okl aiS iSral braotm at haiS oinso mpnio oiirao mad : oiamr aiS iSral hraitm haiS helh hch ki lHrp at iSral elh ohih haiS aSr ikno ieSrno hmlk eSr gdol oat bto itn lo oat bit abio ieSh HpSi biSral : oiamr dod al hanSim hemdim emo lamr mh ieSh laiS aSr ikh at hplSti hlc ohsir Hrph mel iSral ki mi hplSti herl hch ki Hrp merkot alhim Hiim : oiamr lo hem kdbr hch lamr kh ieSh laiS aSr ikno : oiSme aliab aHio hgdol bdbro al hanSim oiHr ap aliab bdod oiamr lmh ch irdt oel mi nTSt meT hzan hhnh bmdbr ani ideti at cdnk oat re lbbk ki lmen raot hmlHmh irdt : oiamr dod mh eSiti eth hloa dbr hoa : oisb mazlo al mol aHr oiamr kdbr hch oiSbho hem dbr kdbr hraSon : oiSmeo hdbrim aSr dbr dod oigdo lpni Saol oiqHho : oiamr dod al Saol al ipl lb adm elio ebdk ilk onlHm em hplSti hch : oiamr Saol al dod la tokl llkt al hplSti hch lhlHm emo ki ner ath ohoa aiS mlHmh mnerio : oiamr dod al Saol reh hih ebdk labio bzan oba hari oat hdob onSa Sh mhedr : oizati aHrio ohktio ohzlti mpio oiqm eli ohHcqti bcqno ohktio ohmitio : gm at hari gm hdob hkh ebdk ohih hplSti herl hch kaHd mhm ki Hrp merkt alhim Hiim : oiamr dod ihoh aSr hzlni mid hari omid hdb hoa izilni mid hplSti hch oiamr Saol al dod lk oihoh ihih emk : oilbS Saol at dod mdio ontn qobe nHSt el raSo oilbS ato Srion : oiHgr dod at Hrbo mel lmdio oial llkt ki la nsh oiamr dod al Saol la aokl llkt balh ki la nsiti oisrm dod melio : oiqH mqlo bido oibHr lo HmSh Hlqi abnim mn hnHl oiSm atm bkli hreim aSr lo obilqoT oqleo bido oigS al hplSti : oilk hplSti hlk oqrb al dod ohaiS nSa hznh lpnio : oibT hplSti oirah at dod oibcho ki hih ner oadmni em iph mrah : oiamr hplSti al dod hklb anki ki ath ba ali bmqlot oiqll hplSti at dod balhio : oiamr hplSti al dod lkh ali oatnh at bSrk leop hSmim olbhmt hSdh : oiamr dod al hplSti ath ba ali bHrb obHnit obkidon oanki ba alik bSm ihoh zbaot alhi merkot iSral aSr Hrpt : hiom hch isgrk ihoh bidi ohkitk ohsrti at raSk melik ontti pgr mHnh plStim hiom hch leop hSmim olHit harz oideo kl harz ki iS alhim liSral : oideo kl hqhl hch ki la bHrb obHnit ihoSie ihoh ki lihoh hmlHmh ontn atkm bidno : ohih ki qm hplSti oilk oiqrb lqrat dod oimhr dod oirz hmerkh lqrat hplSti : oiSlH dod at ido al hkli oiqH mSm abn oiqle oik at hplSti al mzHo otTbe habn bmzHo oipl el pnio arzh : oiHcq dod mn hplSti bqle obabn oik at hplSti oimitho oHrb ain bid dod : oirz dod oiemd al hplSti oiqH at Hrbo oiSlph mterh oimttho oikrt bh at raSo oirao hplStim ki mt gborm oinso : oiqmo anSi iSral oihodh oireo oirdpo at hplStim ed boak gia oed Seri eqron oiplo Hlli plStim bdrk Serim oed gt oed eqron : oiSbo bni iSral mdlq aHri plStim oiSso at mHnihm : oiqH dod at raS hplSti oibaho iroSlm oat klio Sm bahlo : okraot Saol at dod iza lqrat hplSti amr al abnr Sr hzba bn mi ch hner abnr oiamr abnr Hi npSk hmlk am ideti : oiamr hmlk Sal ath bn mi ch helm : okSob dod mhkot at hplSti oiqH ato abnr oibaho lpni Saol oraS hplSti bido : oiamr alio Saol bn mi ath hner oiamr dod bn ebdk iSi bit hlHmi :

18

oihi kklto ldbr al Saol onpS ihontn nqSrh bnpS dod oiahbo ihontn knpSo : oiqHho Saol biom hhoa ola ntno lSob bit abio : oikrt ihontn odod brit bahbto ato knpSo : oitpST ihontn at hmeil aSr elio oitnho ldod omdio oed Hrbo oed qSto oed Hgro : oiza dod bkl aSr iSlHno Saol iSkil oiSmho Saol el anSi hmlHmh oiiTb beini kl hem ogm beini ebdi Saol : oihi bboam bSob dod mhkot at hplSti otzanh hnSim mkl eri iSral lSor ohmHlot lqrat Saol hmlk btpim bSmHh obSlSim : oteninh hnSim hmSHqot otamrn hkh Saol balpo odod brbbtio : oiHr lSaol mad oire beinio hdbr hch oiamr ntno ldod rbbot oli ntno halpim oeod lo ak hmlokh : oihi Saol eon at dod mhiom hhoa ohlah : oihi mmHrt otzlH roH alhim reh al Saol oitnba btok hbit odod mngn bido kiom biom ohHnit bid Saol : oiTl Saol at hHnit oiamr akh bdod obqir oisb dod mpnio pemim : oira Saol mlpni dod ki hih ihoh emo omem Saol sr : oisrho Saol memo oiSmho lo Sr alp oiza oiba lpni hem : oihi dod lkl drko mSkil oihoh emo : oira Saol aSr hoa mSkil mad oigr mpnio : okl iSral oihodh ahb at dod ki hoa ioza oba lpnihm : oiamr Saol al dod hnh bti hgdolh mrb ath atn lk laSh ak hih li lbn Hil ohlHm mlHmot ihoh oSaol amr al thi idi bo othi bo id plStim : oiamr dod al Saol mi anki omi Hii mSpHt abi biSral ki ahih Htn lmlk : oihi bet tt at mrb bt Saol ldod ohia ntnh ledrial hmHlti laSh : otahb mikl bt Saol at dod oigdo lSaol oiSr hdbr beinio : oiamr Saol atnnh lo othi lo lmoqS othi bo id plStim oiamr Saol al dod bStim ttHtn bi hiom : oizo Saol at ebdo dbro al dod blT lamr hnh Hpz bk hmlk okl ebdio ahbok oeth htHtn bmlk : oidbro ebdi Saol bacni dod at hdbrim halh oiamr dod hnqlh beinikm htHtn bmlk oanki aiS rS onqlh : oigdo ebdi Saol lo lamr kdbrim halh dbr dod : oiamr Saol kh tamro ldod ain Hpz lmlk bmhr ki bmah erlot plStim lhnqm baibi hmlk oSaol HSb lhpil at dod bid plStim : oigdo ebdio ldod at hdbrim halh oiSr hdbr beini dod lhtHtn bmlk ola mlao himim : oiqm dod oilk hoa oanSio oik bplStim matim aiS oiba dod at erltihm oimlaom lmlk lhtHtn bmlk oitn lo Saol at mikl bto laSh : oira Saol oide ki ihoh em dod omikl bt Saol ahbtho : oiasp Saol lra mpni dod eod oihi Saol aib at dod kl himim : oizao Sri plStim oihi mdi zatm Skl dod mkl ebdi Saol oiiqr Smo mad :

19

oidbr Saol al iontn bno oal kl ebdio lhmit at dod oihontn bn Saol Hpz bdod mad : oigd ihontn ldod lamr mbqS Saol abi lhmitk oeth hSmr na bbqr oiSbt bstr onHbat : oani aza oemdti lid abi bSdh aSr ath Sm oani adbr bk al abi oraiti mh ohgdti lk : oidbr ihontn bdod Tob al Saol abio oiamr alio al iHTa hmlk bebdo bdod ki loa HTa lk oki meSio Tob lk mad : oiSm at npSo bkpo oik at hplSti oieS ihoh tSoeh gdolh lkl iSral rait otSmH olmh tHTa bdm nqi lhmit at dod Hnm : oiSme Saol bqol ihontn oiSbe Saol Hi ihoh am iomt : oiqra ihontn ldod oigd lo ihontn at kl hdbrim halh oiba ihontn at dod al Saol oihi lpnio katmol SlSom : otosp hmlHmh lhiot oiza dod oilHm bplStim oik bhm mkh gdolh oinso mpnio : othi roH ihoh reh al Saol ohoa bbito ioSb oHnito bido odod mngn bid : oibqS Saol lhkot bHnit bdod obqir oipTr mpni Saol oik at hHnit bqir odod ns oimlT blilh hoa : oiSlH Saol mlakim al bit dod lSmro olhmito bbqr otgd ldod mikl aSto lamr am aink mmlT at npSk hlilh mHr ath momt : otrd mikl at dod bed hHlon oilk oibrH oimlT : otqH mikl at htrpim otSm al hmTh oat kbir hecim Smh mraStio otks bbgd : oiSlH Saol mlakim lqHt at dod otamr Hlh hoa : oiSlH Saol at hmlakim lraot at dod lamr helo ato bmTh ali lhmto : oibao hmlakim ohnh htrpim al hmTh okbir hecim mraStio : oiamr Saol al mikl lmh kkh rmitni otSlHi at aibi oimlT otamr mikl al Saol hoa amr ali SlHni lmh amitk : odod brH oimlT oiba al Smoal hrmth oigd lo at kl aSr eSh lo Saol oilk hoa oSmoal oiSbo bnoit : oigd lSaol lamr hnh dod bnoit brmh : oiSlH Saol mlakim lqHt at dod oira at lhqt hnbiaim nbaim oSmoal emd nzb elihm othi el mlaki Saol roH alhim oitnbao gm hmh : oigdo lSaol oiSlH mlakim aHrim oitnbao gm hmh oisp Saol oiSlH mlakim SlSim oitnbao gm hmh : oilk gm hoa hrmth oiba ed bor hgdol aSr bSko oiSal oiamr aiph Smoal odod oiamr hnh bnoit brmh : oilk Sm al noit brmh othi elio gm hoa roH alhim oilk hlok oitnba ed bao bnoit brmh : oipST gm hoa bgdio oitnba gm hoa lpni Smoal oipl erm kl hiom hhoa okl hlilh el kn iamro hgm Saol bnbiam :

20

oibrH dod mnoit brmh oiba oiamr lpni ihontn mh eSiti mh eoni omh HTati lpni abik ki mbqS at npSi : oiamr lo Hlilh la tmot hnh lo eSh abi dbr gdol ao dbr qTn ola iglh at acni omdoe istir abi mmni at hdbr hch ain cat : oiSbe eod dod oiamr ide ide abik ki mzati Hn beinik oiamr al ide cat ihontn pn iezb oaolm Hi ihoh oHi npSk ki kpSe bini obin hmot : oiamr ihontn al dod mh tamr npSk oaeSh lk : oiamr dod al ihontn hnh HdS mHr oanki iSb aSb em hmlk lakol oSlHtni onstrti bSdh ed herb hSlSit : am pqd ipqdni abik oamrt nSal nSal mmni dod lroz bit lHm eiro ki cbH himim Sm lkl hmSpHh : am kh iamr Tob Slom lebdk oam Hrh iHrh lo de ki klth hreh memo : oeSit Hsd el ebdk ki bbrit ihoh hbat at ebdk emk oam iS bi eon hmitni ath oed abik lmh ch tbiani : oiamr ihontn Hlilh lk ki am ide ade ki klth hreh mem abi lboa elik ola ath agid lk : oiamr dod al ihontn mi igid li ao mh ienk abik qSh : oiamr ihontn al dod lkh onza hSdh oizao Snihm hSdh : oiamr ihontn al dod ihoh alhi iSral ki aHqr at abi ket mHr hSlSit ohnh Tob al dod ola ac aSlH alik ogliti at acnk : kh ieSh ihoh lihontn okh isip ki iiTb al abi at hreh elik ogliti at acnk oSlHtik ohlkt lSlom oihi ihoh emk kaSr hih em abi : ola am eodni Hi ola teSh emdi Hsd ihoh ola amot : ola tkrt at Hsdk mem biti ed eolm ola bhkrt ihoh at aibi dod aiS mel pni hadmh : oikrt ihontn em bit dod obqS ihoh mid aibi dod : oiosp ihontn lhSbie at dod bahbto ato ki ahbt npSo ahbo : oiamr lo ihontn mHr HdS onpqdt ki ipqd moSbk : oSlSt trd mad obat al hmqom aSr nstrt Sm biom hmeSh oiSbt azl habn hacl : oani SlSt hHzim zdh aorh lSlH li lmTrh : ohnh aSlH at hner lk mza at hHzim am amr amr lner hnh hHzim mmk ohnh qHno obah ki Slom lk oain dbr Hi ihoh : oam kh amr lelm hnh hHzim mmk ohlah lk ki SlHk ihoh : ohdbr aSr dbrno ani oath hnh ihoh bini obink ed eolm : oistr dod bSdh oihi hHdS oiSb hmlk el hlHm lakol : oiSb hmlk el moSbo kpem bpem al moSb hqir oiqm ihontn oiSb abnr mzd Saol oipqd mqom dod : ola dbr Saol maomh biom hhoa ki amr mqrh hoa blti Thor hoa ki la Thor : oihi mmHrt hHdS hSni oipqd mqom dod oiamr Saol al ihontn bno mdoe la ba bn iSi gm tmol gm hiom al hlHm : oien ihontn at Saol nSal nSal dod memdi ed bit lHm : oiamr SlHni na ki cbH mSpHh lno beir ohoa zoh li aHi oeth am mzati Hn beinik amlTh na oarah at aHi el kn la ba al SlHn hmlk : oiHr ap Saol bihontn oiamr lo bn neot hmrdot hloa ideti ki bHr ath lbn iSi lbStk olbSt erot amk : ki kl himim aSr bn iSi Hi el hadmh la tkon ath omlkotk oeth SlH oqH ato ali ki bn mot hoa : oien ihontn at Saol abio oiamr alio lmh iomt mh eSh : oiTl Saol at hHnit elio lhkto oide ihontn ki klh hia mem abio lhmit at dod : oiqm ihontn mem hSlHn bHri ap ola akl biom hHdS hSni lHm ki nezb al dod ki hklmo abio : oihi bbqr oiza ihontn hSdh lmoed dod oner qTn emo : oiamr lnero rz mza na at hHzim aSr anki morh hner rz ohoa irh hHzi lhebro : oiba hner ed mqom hHzi aSr irh ihontn oiqra ihontn aHri hner oiamr hloa hHzi mmk ohlah : oiqra ihontn aHri hner mhrh HoSh al temd oilqT ner ihontn at hHzi oiba al adnio : ohner la ide maomh ak ihontn odod ideo at hdbr : oitn ihontn at klio al hner aSr lo oiamr lo lk hbia heir : hner ba odod qm mazl hngb oipl lapio arzh oiStHo SlS pemim oiSqo aiS at reho oibko aiS at reho ed dod hgdil : oiamr ihontn ldod lk lSlom aSr nSbeno Snino anHno bSm ihoh lamr ihoh ihih bini obink obin crei obin crek ed eolm oiqm oilk oihontn ba heir :

21

oiba dod nbh al aHimlk hkhn oiHrd aHimlk lqrat dod oiamr lo mdoe ath lbdk oaiS ain atk : oiamr dod laHimlk hkhn hmlk zoni dbr oiamr ali aiS al ide maomh at hdbr aSr anki SlHk oaSr zoitk oat hnerim iodeti al mqom plni almoni : oeth mh iS tHt idk HmSh lHm tnh bidi ao hnmza : oien hkhn at dod oiamr ain lHm Hl al tHt idi ki am lHm qdS iS am nSmro hnerim ak maSh : oien dod at hkhn oiamr lo ki am aSh ezrh lno ktmol SlSm bzati oihio kli hnerim qdS ohoa drk Hl oap ki hiom iqdS bkli : oitn lo hkhn qdS ki la hih Sm lHm ki am lHm hpnim hmosrim mlpni ihoh lSom lHm Hm biom hlqHo : oSm aiS mebdi Saol biom hhoa nezr lpni ihoh oSmo dag hadmi abir hreim aSr lSaol : oiamr dod laHimlk oain iS ph tHt idk Hnit ao Hrb ki gm Hrbi ogm kli la lqHti bidi ki hih dbr hmlk nHoz : oiamr hkhn Hrb glit hplSti aSr hkit bemq halh hnh hia loTh bSmlh aHri hapod am ath tqH lk qH ki ain aHrt colth bch oiamr dod ain kmoh tnnh li : oiqm dod oibrH biom hhoa mpni Saol oiba al akiS mlk gt : oiamro ebdi akiS alio hloa ch dod mlk harz hloa lch ieno bmHlot lamr hkh Saol balpo odod brbbto : oiSm dod at hdbrim halh blbbo oira mad mpni akiS mlk gt : oiSno at Temo beinihm oithll bidm oito el dltot hSer oiord riro al cqno : oiamr akiS al ebdio hnh trao aiS mStge lmh tbiao ato ali : Hsr mSgeim ani ki hbatm at ch lhStge eli hch iboa al biti :

22

oilk dod mSm oimlT al mert edlm oiSmeo aHio okl bit abio oirdo alio Smh : oitqbzo alio kl aiS mzoq okl aiS aSr lo nSa okl aiS mr npS oihi elihm lSr oihio emo karbe maot aiS : oilk dod mSm mzph moab oiamr al mlk moab iza na abi oami atkm ed aSr ade mh ieSh li alhim : oinHm at pni mlk moab oiSbo emo kl imi hiot dod bmzodh : oiamr gd hnbia al dod la tSb bmzodh lk obat lk arz ihodh oilk dod oiba ier Hrt : oiSme Saol ki node dod oanSim aSr ato oSaol ioSb bgbeh tHt haSl brmh oHnito bido okl ebdio nzbim elio : oiamr Saol lebdio hnzbim elio Smeo na bni imini gm lklkm itn bn iSi Sdot okrmim lklkm iSim Sri alpim oSri maot : ki qSrtm klkm eli oain glh at acni bkrt bni em bn iSi oain Hlh mkm eli oglh at acni ki hqim bni at ebdi eli larb kiom hch : oien dag hadmi ohoa nzb el ebdi Saol oiamr raiti at bn iSi ba nbh al aHimlk bn aHTob : oiSal lo bihoh ozidh ntn lo oat Hrb glit hplSti ntn lo : oiSlH hmlk lqra at aHimlk bn aHiTob hkhn oat kl bit abio hkhnim aSr bnb oibao klm al hmlk : oiamr Saol Sme na bn aHiTob oiamr hnni adni : oiamr alo Saol lmh qSrtm eli ath obn iSi bttk lo lHm oHrb oSaol lo balhim lqom ali larb kiom hch : oien aHimlk at hmlk oiamr omi bkl ebdik kdod namn oHtn hmlk osr al mSmetk onkbd bbitk : hiom hHlti lSaol lo balhim Hlilh li al iSm hmlk bebdo dbr bkl bit abi ki la ide ebdk bkl cat dbr qTn ao gdol : oiamr hmlk mot tmot aHimlk ath okl bit abik : oiamr hmlk lrzim hnzbim elio sbo ohmito khni ihoh ki gm idm em dod oki ideo ki brH hoa ola glo at acno ola abo ebdi hmlk lSlH at idm lpge bkhni ihoh : oiamr hmlk ldoig sb ath opge bkhnim oisb doig hadmi oipge hoa bkhnim oimt biom hhoa Smnim oHmSh aiS nSa apod bd : oat nb eir hkhnim hkh lpi Hrb maiS oed aSh meoll oed ionq oSor oHmor oSh lpi Hrb : oimlT bn aHd laHimlk bn aHTob oSmo abitr oibrH aHri dod : oigd abitr ldod ki hrg Saol at khni ihoh : oiamr dod labitr ideti biom hhoa ki Sm doig hadmi ki hgd igid lSaol anki sbti bkl npS bit abik : Sbh ati al tira ki aSr ibqS at npSi ibqS at npSk ki mSmrt ath emdi :

23

oigdo ldod lamr hnh plStim nlHmim bqeilh ohmh Ssim at hgrnot : oiSal dod bihoh lamr halk ohkiti bplStim halh oiamr ihoh al dod lk ohkit bplStim ohoSet at qeilh : oiamro anSi dod alio hnh anHno ph bihodh iraim oap ki nlk qelh al merkot plStim : oiosp eod dod lSal bihoh oienho ihoh oiamr qom rd qeilh ki ani ntn at plStim bidk : oilk dod oanSo qeilh oilHm bplStim oinhg at mqnihm oik bhm mkh gdolh oiSe dod at iSbi qeilh : oihi bbrH abitr bn aHimlk al dod qeilh apod ird bido : oigd lSaol ki ba dod qeilh oiamr Saol nkr ato alhim bidi ki nsgr lboa beir dltim obriH : oiSme Saol at kl hem lmlHmh lrdt qeilh lzor al dod oal anSio : oide dod ki elio Saol mHriS hreh oiamr al abitr hkhn hgiSh hapod : oiamr dod ihoh alhi iSral Sme Sme ebdk ki mbqS Saol lboa al qeilh lSHt leir bebori : hisgrni beli qeilh bido hird Saol kaSr Sme ebdk ihoh alhi iSral hgd na lebdk oiamr ihoh ird : oiamr dod hisgro beli qeilh ati oat anSi bid Saol oiamr ihoh isgiro : oiqm dod oanSio kSS maot aiS oizao mqelh oithlko baSr ithlko olSaol hgd ki nmlT dod mqeilh oiHdl lzat : oiSb dod bmdbr bmzdot oiSb bhr bmdbr cip oibqSho Saol kl himim ola ntno alhim bido : oira dod ki iza Saol lbqS at npSo odod bmdbr cip bHrSh : oiqm ihontn bn Saol oilk al dod HrSh oiHcq at ido balhim : oiamr alio al tira ki la tmzak id Saol abi oath tmlk el iSral oanki ahih lk lmSnh ogm Saol abi ide kn : oikrto Snihm brit lpni ihoh oiSb dod bHrSh oihontn hlk lbito : oielo cpim al Saol hgbeth lamr hloa dod msttr emno bmzdot bHrSh bgbet hHkilh aSr mimin hiSimon : oeth lkl aot npSk hmlk lrdt rd olno hsgiro bid hmlk : oiamr Saol brokim atm lihoh ki Hmltm eli : lko na hkino eod odeo orao at mqomo aSr thih rglo mi raho Sm ki amr ali erom ierm hoa : orao odeo mkl hmHbaim aSr itHba Sm oSbtm ali al nkon ohlkti atkm ohih am iSno barz oHpSti ato bkl alpi ihodh : oiqomo oilko ciph lpni Saol odod oanSio bmdbr meon berbh al imin hiSimon : oilk Saol oanSio lbqS oigdo ldod oird hsle oiSb bmdbr meon oiSme Saol oirdp aHri dod mdbr meon : oilk Saol mzd hhr mch odod oanSio mzd hhr mch oihi dod nHpc llkt mpni Saol oSaol oanSio eTrim al dod oal anSio ltpSm : omlak ba al Saol lamr mhrh olkh ki pSTo plStim el harz : oiSb Saol mrdp aHri dod oilk lqrat plStim el kn qrao lmqom hhoa sle hmHlqot : oiel dod mSm oiSb bmzdot ein gdi :

24

oihi kaSr Sb Saol maHri plStim oigdo lo lamr hnh dod bmdbr ein gdi : oiqH Saol SlSt alpim aiS bHor mkl iSral oilk lbqS at dod oanSio el pni zori hielim : oiba al gdrot hzan el hdrk oSm merh oiba Saol lhsk at rglio odod oanSio birkti hmerh iSbim : oiamro anSi dod alio hnh hiom aSr amr ihoh alik hnh anki ntn at aibik bidk oeSit lo kaSr iTb beinik oiqm dod oikrt at knp hmeil aSr lSaol blT : oihi aHri kn oik lb dod ato el aSr krt at knp aSr lSaol : oiamr lanSio Hlilh li mihoh am aeSh at hdbr hch ladni lmSiH ihoh lSlH idi bo ki mSiH ihoh hoa : oiSse dod at anSio bdbrim ola ntnm lqom al Saol oSaol qm mhmerh oilk bdrk : oiqm dod aHri kn oiza mn hmerh oiqra aHri Saol lamr adni hmlk oibT Saol aHrio oiqd dod apim arzh oiStHo : oiamr dod lSaol lmh tSme at dbri adm lamr hnh dod mbqS retk : hnh hiom hch rao einik at aSr ntnk ihoh hiom bidi bmerh oamr lhrgk otHs elik oamr la aSlH idi badni ki mSiH ihoh hoa : oabi rah gm rah at knp meilk bidi ki bkrti at knp meilk ola hrgtik de orah ki ain bidi reh opSe ola HTati lk oath zdh at npSi lqHth : iSpT ihoh bini obink onqmni ihoh mmk oidi la thih bk : kaSr iamr mSl hqdmni mrSeim iza rSe oidi la thih bk : aHri mi iza mlk iSral aHri mi ath rdp aHri klb mt aHri preS aHd : ohih ihoh ldin oSpT bini obink oira oirb at ribi oiSpTni midk : oihi kklot dod ldbr at hdbrim halh al Saol oiamr Saol hqlk ch bni dod oiSa Saol qlo oibk : oiamr al dod zdiq ath mmni ki ath gmltni hTobh oani gmltik hreh : oat hgdt hiom at aSr eSith ati Tobh at aSr sgrni ihoh bidk ola hrgtni : oki imza aiS at aibo oSlHo bdrk Tobh oihoh iSlmk Tobh tHt hiom hch aSr eSith li : oeth hnh ideti ki mlk tmlok oqmh bidk mmlkt iSral : oeth hSbeh li bihoh am tkrit at crei aHri oam tSmid at Smi mbit abi : oiSbe dod lSaol oilk Saol al bito odod oanSio elo el hmzodh :

25

oimt Smoal oiqbzo kl iSral oispdo lo oiqbrho bbito brmh oiqm dod oird al mdbr parn : oaiS bmeon omeSho bkrml ohaiS gdol mad olo zan SlSt alpim oalp ecim oihi bgcc at zano bkrml : oSm haiS nbl oSm aSto abgil ohaSh Tobt Skl oipt tar ohaiS qSh ore mellim ohoa klbo : oiSme dod bmdbr ki gcc nbl at zano : oiSlH dod eSrh nerim oiamr dod lnerim elo krmlh obatm al nbl oSaltm lo bSmi lSlom : oamrtm kh lHi oath Slom obitk Slom okl aSr lk Slom : oeth Smeti ki gccim lk eth hreim aSr lk hio emno la hklmnom ola npqd lhm maomh kl imi hiotm bkrml : Sal at nerik oigido lk oimzao hnerim Hn beinik ki el iom Tob bno tnh na at aSr tmza idk lebdik olbnk ldod : oibao neri dod oidbro al nbl kkl hdbrim halh bSm dod oinoHo : oien nbl at ebdi dod oiamr mi dod omi bn iSi hiom rbo ebdim hmtprzim aiS mpni adnio : olqHti at lHmi oat mimi oat TbHti aSr TbHti lgcci ontti lanSim aSr la ideti ai mch hmh : oihpko neri dod ldrkm oiSbo oibao oigdo lo kkl hdbrim halh : oiamr dod lanSio Hgro aiS at Hrbo oiHgro aiS at Hrbo oiHgr gm dod at Hrbo oielo aHri dod karbe maot aiS omatim iSbo el hklim : olabigil aSt nbl hgid ner aHd mhnerim lamr hnh SlH dod mlakim mhmdbr lbrk at adnino oieT bhm : ohanSim Tbim lno mad ola hklmno ola pqdno maomh kl imi hthlkno atm bhiotno bSdh : Homh hio elino gm lilh gm iomm kl imi hiotno emm reim hzan : oeth dei orai mh teSi ki klth hreh al adnino oel kl bito ohoa bn bliel mdbr alio : otmhr abogil otqH matim lHm oSnim nbli iin oHmS zan eSoot oHmS saim qli omah zmqim omatim dblim otSm el hHmrim : otamr lnerih ebro lpni hnni aHrikm bah olaiSh nbl la hgidh : ohih hia rkbt el hHmor oirdt bstr hhr ohnh dod oanSio irdim lqrath otpgS atm : odod amr ak lSqr Smrti at kl aSr lch bmdbr ola npqd mkl aSr lo maomh oiSb li reh tHt Tobh : kh ieSh alhim laibi dod okh isip am aSair mkl aSr lo ed hbqr mStin bqir : otra abigil at dod otmhr otrd mel hHmor otpl lapi dod el pnih otStHo arz : otpl el rglio otamr bi ani adni heon otdbr na amtk bacnik oSme at dbri amtk : al na iSim adni at lbo al aiS hbliel hch el nbl ki kSmo kn hoa nbl Smo onblh emo oani amtk la raiti at neri adni aSr SlHt : oeth adni Hi ihoh oHi npSk aSr mnek ihoh mboa bdmim ohoSe idk lk oeth ihio knbl aibik ohmbqSim al adni reh : oeth hbrkh hcat aSr hbia SpHtk ladni ontnh lnerim hmthlkim brgli adni : Sa na lpSe amtk ki eSh ieSh ihoh ladni bit namn ki mlHmot ihoh adni nlHm oreh la tmza bk mimik : oiqm adm lrdpk olbqS at npSk ohith npS adni zrorh bzror hHiim at ihoh alhik oat npS aibik iqlenh btok kp hqle : ohih ki ieSh ihoh ladni kkl aSr dbr at hTobh elik ozok lngid el iSral : ola thih cat lk lpoqh olmkSol lb ladni olSpk dm Hnm olhoSie adni lo ohiTb ihoh ladni ockrt at amtk : oiamr dod labigl brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr SlHk hiom hch lqrati : obrok Temk obrokh at aSr kltni hiom hch mboa bdmim ohSe idi li : oaolm Hi ihoh alhi iSral aSr mneni mhre atk ki loli mhrt otbati lqrati ki am notr lnbl ed aor hbqr mStin bqir : oiqH dod midh at aSr hbiah lo olh amr eli lSlom lbitk rai Smeti bqolk oaSa pnik : otba abigil al nbl ohnh lo mSth bbito kmSth hmlk olb nbl Tob elio ohoa Skr ed mad ola hgidh lo dbr qTn ogdol ed aor hbqr : oihi bbqr bzat hiin mnbl otgd lo aSto at hdbrim halh oimt lbo bqrbo ohoa hih labn : oihi keSrt himim oigp ihoh at nbl oimt : oiSme dod ki mt nbl oiamr brok ihoh aSr rb at rib Hrpti mid nbl oat ebdo HSk mreh oat ret nbl hSib ihoh braSo oiSlH dod oidbr babigil lqHth lo laSh : oibao ebdi dod al abigil hkrmlh oidbro alih lamr dod SlHno alik lqHtk lo laSh : otqm otStHo apim arzh otamr hnh amtk lSpHh lrHz rgli ebdi adni : otmhr otqm abigil otrkb el hHmor oHmS nertih hhlkot lrglh otlk aHri mlaki dod othi lo laSh : oat aHinem lqH dod micreal othiin gm Stihn lo lnSim : oSaol ntn at mikl bto aSt dod lplTi bn liS aSr mglim :

26

oibao hcpim al Saol hgbeth lamr hloa dod msttr bgbet hHkilh el pni hiSimn : oiqm Saol oird al mdbr cip oato SlSt alpim aiS bHori iSral lbqS at dod bmdbr cip : oiHn Saol bgbet hHkilh aSr el pni hiSimn el hdrk odod iSb bmdbr oira ki ba Saol aHrio hmdbrh : oiSlH dod mrglim oide ki ba Saol al nkon : oiqm dod oiba al hmqom aSr Hnh Sm Saol oira dod at hmqom aSr Skb Sm Saol oabnr bn nr Sr zbao oSaol Skb bmegl ohem Hnim sbibto : oien dod oiamr al aHimlk hHti oal abiSi bn zroih aHi ioab lamr mi ird ati al Saol al hmHnh oiamr abiSi ani ard emk : oiba dod oabiSi al hem lilh ohnh Saol Skb iSn bmegl oHnito meokh barz mraSto oabnr ohem Skbim sbibto : oiamr abiSi al dod sgr alhim hiom at aoibk bidk oeth akno na bHnit obarz pem aHt ola aSnh lo : oiamr dod al abiSi al tSHitho ki mi SlH ido bmSiH ihoh onqh : oiamr dod Hi ihoh ki am ihoh igpno ao iomo iboa omt ao bmlHmh ird onsph : Hlilh li mihoh mSlH idi bmSiH ihoh oeth qH na at hHnit aSr mraSto oat zpHt hmim onlkh lno : oiqH dod at hHnit oat zpHt hmim mraSti Saol oilko lhm oain rah oain iode oain mqiz ki klm iSnim ki trdmt ihoh nplh elihm : oiebr dod hebr oiemd el raS hhr mrHq rb hmqom binihm : oiqra dod al hem oal abnr bn nr lamr hloa tenh abnr oien abnr oiamr mi ath qrat al hmlk : oiamr dod al abnr hloa aiS ath omi kmok biSral olmh la Smrt al adnik hmlk ki ba aHd hem lhSHit at hmlk adnik : la Tob hdbr hch aSr eSit Hi ihoh ki bni mot atm aSr la Smrtm el adnikm el mSiH ihoh oeth rah ai Hnit hmlk oat zpHt hmim aSr mraSto : oikr Saol at qol dod oiamr hqolk ch bni dod oiamr dod qoli adni hmlk : oiamr lmh ch adni rdp aHri ebdo ki mh eSiti omh bidi reh : oeth iSme na adni hmlk at dbri ebdo am ihoh hsitk bi irH mnHh oam bni hadm arorim hm lpni ihoh ki grSoni hiom mhstpH bnHlt ihoh lamr lk ebd alhim aHrim : oeth al ipl dmi arzh mngd pni ihoh ki iza mlk iSral lbqS at preS aHd kaSr irdp hqra bhrim : oiamr Saol HTati Sob bni dod ki la are lk eod tHt aSr iqrh npSi beinik hiom hch hnh hsklti oaSgh hrbh mad : oien dod oiamr hnh hHnit hmlk oiebr aHd mhnerim oiqHh : oihoh iSib laiS at zdqto oat amnto aSr ntnk ihoh hiom bid ola abiti lSlH idi bmSiH ihoh : ohnh kaSr gdlh npSk hiom hch beini kn tgdl npSi beini ihoh oizlni mkl zrh : oiamr Saol al dod brok ath bni dod gm eSh teSh ogm ikl tokl oilk dod ldrko oSaol Sb lmqomo :

27
