oiamr dod al lbo eth asph iom aHd bid Saol ain li Tob ki hmlT amlT al arz plStim onoaS mmni Saol lbqSni eod bkl gbol iSral onmlTti mido : oiqm dod oiebr hoa oSS maot aiS aSr emo al akiS bn meok mlk gt : oiSb dod em akiS bgt hoa oanSio aiS obito dod oSti nSio aHinem hicrealit oabigil aSt nbl hkrmlit : oigd lSaol ki brH dod gt ola iosp eod lbqSo : oiamr dod al akiS am na mzati Hn beinik itno li mqom baHt eri hSdh oaSbh Sm olmh iSb ebdk beir hmmlkh emk : oitn lo akiS biom hhoa at zqlg lkn hith zqlg lmlki ihodh ed hiom hch : oihi mspr himim aSr iSb dod bSdh plStim imim oarbeh HdSim : oiel dod oanSio oipSTo al hgSori ohgrci ohemlqi ki hnh iSbot harz aSr meolm boak Sorh oed arz mzrim : ohkh dod at harz ola iHih aiS oaSh olqH zan obqr oHmrim ogmlim obgdim oiSb oiba al akiS : oiamr akiS al pSTtm hiom oiamr dod el ngb ihodh oel ngb hirHmali oal ngb hqini : oaiS oaSh la iHih dod lhbia gt lamr pn igdo elino lamr kh eSh dod okh mSpTo kl himim aSr iSb bSdh plStim : oiamn akiS bdod lamr hbaS hbaiS bemo biSral ohih li lebd eolm :

28

oihi bimim hhm oiqbzo plStim at mHnihm lzba lhlHm biSral oiamr akiS al dod ide tde ki ati tza bmHnh ath oanSik : oiamr dod al akiS lkn ath tde at aSr ieSh ebdk oiamr akiS al dod lkn Smr lraSi aSimk kl himim : oSmoal mt oispdo lo kl iSral oiqbrho brmh obeiro oSaol hsir habot oat hidenim mharz : oiqbzo plStim oibao oiHno bSonm oiqbz Saol at kl iSral oiHno bglbe : oira Saol at mHnh plStim oira oiHrd lbo mad : oiSal Saol bihoh ola enho ihoh gm bHlmot gm baorim gm bnbiam : oiamr Saol lebdio bqSo li aSt belt aob oalkh alih oadrSh bh oiamro ebdio alio hnh aSt belt aob bein dor : oitHpS Saol oilbS bgdim aHrim oilk hoa oSni anSim emo oibao al haSh lilh oiamr qsomi na li baob oheli li at aSr amr alik : otamr haSh alio hnh ath idet at aSr eSh Saol aSr hkrit at habot oat hideni mn harz olmh ath mtnqS bnpSi lhmitni : oiSbe lh Saol bihoh lamr Hi ihoh am iqrk eon bdbr hch : otamr haSh at mi aelh lk oiamr at Smoal heli li : otra haSh at Smoal otceq bqol gdol otamr haSh al Saol lamr lmh rmitni oath Saol : oiamr lh hmlk al tirai ki mh rait otamr haSh al Saol alhim raiti elim mn harz : oiamr lh mh taro otamr aiS cqn elh ohoa eTh meil oide Saol ki Smoal hoa oiqd apim arzh oiStHo : oiamr Smoal al Saol lmh hrgctni lhelot ati oiamr Saol zr li mad oplStim nlHmim bi oalhim sr meli ola enni eod gm bid hnbiam gm bHlmot oaqrah lk lhodieni mh aeSh : oiamr Smoal olmh tSalni oihoh sr melik oihi erk : oieS ihoh lo kaSr dbr bidi oiqre ihoh at hmmlkh midk oitnh lrek ldod : kaSr la Smet bqol ihoh ola eSit Hron apo bemlq el kn hdbr hch eSh lk ihoh hiom hch : oitn ihoh gm at iSral emk bid plStim omHr ath obnik emi gm at mHnh iSral itn ihoh bid plStim : oimhr Saol oipl mla qomto arzh oira mad mdbri Smoal gm kH la hih bo ki la akl lHm kl hiom okl hlilh : otboa haSh al Saol otra ki nbhl mad otamr alio hnh Smeh SpHtk bqolk oaSim npSi bkpi oaSme at dbrik aSr dbrt ali : oeth Sme na gm ath bqol SpHtk oaSmh lpnik pt lHm oakol oihi bk kH ki tlk bdrk : oiman oiamr la akl oiprzo bo ebdio ogm haSh oiSme lqlm oiqm mharz oiSb al hmTh : olaSh egl mrbq bbit otmhr otcbHho otqH qmH otlS otpho mzot : otgS lpni Saol olpni ebdio oiaklo oiqmo oilko blilh hhoa :

29

oiqbzo plStim at kl mHnihm apqh oiSral Hnim bein aSr bicreal : osrni plStim ebrim lmaot olalpim odod oanSio ebrim baHrnh em akiS : oiamro Sri plStim mh hebrim halh oiamr akiS al Sri plStim hloa ch dod ebd Saol mlk iSral aSr hih ati ch imim ao ch Snim ola mzati bo maomh miom nplo ed hiom hch : oiqzpo elio Sri plStim oiamro lo Sri plStim hSb at haiS oiSb al mqomo aSr hpqdto Sm ola ird emno bmlHmh ola ihih lno lSTn bmlHmh obmh itrzh ch al adnio hloa braSi hanSim hhm : hloa ch dod aSr ieno lo bmHlot lamr hkh Saol balpo odod brbbto : oiqra akiS al dod oiamr alio Hi ihoh ki iSr ath oTob beini zatk obak ati bmHnh ki la mzati bk reh miom bak ali ed hiom hch obeini hsrnim la Tob ath : oeth Sob olk bSlom ola teSh re beini srni plStim : oiamr dod al akiS ki mh eSiti omh mzat bebdk miom aSr hiiti lpnik ed hiom hch ki la aboa onlHmti baibi adni hmlk : oien akiS oiamr al dod ideti ki Tob ath beini kmlak alhim ak Sri plStim amro la ielh emno bmlHmh : oeth hSkm bbqr oebdi adnik aSr bao atk ohSkmtm bbqr oaor lkm olko : oiSkm dod hoa oanSio llkt bbqr lSob al arz plStim oplStim elo icreal :

30

oihi bba dod oanSio zqlg biom hSliSi oemlqi pSTo al ngb oal zqlg oiko at zqlg oiSrpo ath baS : oiSbo at hnSim aSr bh mqTn oed gdol la hmito aiS oinhgo oilko ldrkm : oiba dod oanSio al heir ohnh Sroph baS onSihm obnihm obntihm nSbo : oiSa dod ohem aSr ato at qolm oibko ed aSr ain bhm kH lbkot : oSti nSi dod nSbo aHinem hicrelit oabigil aSt nbl hkrmli : otzr ldod mad ki amro hem lsqlo ki mrh npS kl hem aiS el bno oel bntio oitHcq dod bihoh alhio : oiamr dod al abitr hkhn bn aHimlk hgiSh na li hapd oigS abitr at hapd al dod : oiSal dod bihoh lamr ardp aHri hgdod hch haSgno oiamr lo rdp ki hSg tSig ohzl tzil : oilk dod hoa oSS maot aiS aSr ato oibao ed nHl hbSor ohnotrim emdo : oirdp dod hoa oarbe maot aiS oiemdo matim aiS aSr pgro mebr at nHl hbSor : oimzao aiS mzri bSdh oiqHo ato al dod oitno lo lHm oiakl oiSqho mim : oitno lo plH dblh oSni zmqim oiakl otSb roHo alio ki la akl lHm ola Sth mim SlSh imim oSlSh lilot : oiamr lo dod lmi ath oai mch ath oiamr ner mzri anki ebd laiS emlqi oiecbni adni ki Hliti hiom SlSh : anHno pSTno ngb hkrti oel aSr lihodh oel ngb klb oat zqlg Srpno baS : oiamr alio dod htordni al hgdod hch oiamr hSbeh li balhim am tmitni oam tsgrni bid adni oaordk al hgdod hch : oirdho ohnh nTSim el pni kl harz aklim oStim oHggim bkl hSll hgdol aSr lqHo marz plStim omarz ihodh : oikm dod mhnSp oed herb lmHrtm ola nmlT mhm aiS ki am arbe maot aiS ner aSr rkbo el hgmlim oinso : oizl dod at kl aSr lqHo emlq oat Sti nSio hzil dod : ola nedr lhm mn hqTn oed hgdol oed bnim obnot omSll oed kl aSr lqHo lhm hkl hSib dod : oiqH dod at kl hzan ohbqr nhgo lpni hmqnh hhoa oiamro ch Sll dod : oiba dod al matim hanSim aSr pgro mlkt aHri dod oiSibm bnHl hbSor oizao lqrat dod olqrat hem aSr ato oigS dod at hem oiSal lhm lSlom : oien kl aiS re obliel mhanSim aSr hlko em dod oiamro ien aSr la hlko emi la ntn lhm mhSll aSr hzlno ki am aiS at aSto oat bnio oinhgo oilko : oiamr dod la teSo kn aHi at aSr ntn ihoh lno oiSmr atno oitn at hgdod hba elino bidno : omi iSme lkm ldbr hch ki kHlq hird bmlHmh okHlq hiSb el hklim iHdo iHlqo : oihi mhiom hhoa omelh oiSmh lHq olmSpT liSral ed hiom hch : oiba dod al zqlg oiSlH mhSll lcqni ihodh lreho lamr hnh lkm brkh mSll aibi ihoh : laSr bbit al olaSr brmot ngb olaSr bitr : olaSr berer olaSr bSpmot olaSr baStme : olaSr brkl olaSr beri hirHmali olaSr beri hqini : olaSr bHrmh olaSr bbor eSn olaSr betk : olaSr bHbron olkl hmqmot aSr hthlk Sm dod hoa oanSio :

31

oplStim nlHmim biSral oinso anSi iSral mpni plStim oiplo Hllim bhr hglbe : oidbqo plStim at Saol oat bnio oiko plStim at ihontn oat abindb oat mlki Soe bni Saol : otkbd hmlHmh al Saol oimzaho hmorim anSim bqSt oiHl mad mhmorim : oiamr Saol lnSa klio Slp Hrbk odqrni bh pn iboao herlim halh odqrni ohtello bi ola abh nSa klio ki ira mad oiqH Saol at hHrb oipl elih : oira nSa klio ki mt Saol oipl gm hoa el Hrbo oimt emo : oimt Saol oSlSt bnio onSa klio gm kl anSio biom hhoa iHdo : oirao anSi iSral aSr bebr hemq oaSr bebr hirdn ki nso anSi iSral oki mto Saol obnio oiecbo at herim oinso oibao plStim oiSbo bhn : oihi mmHrt oibao plStim lpST at hHllim oimzao at Saol oat SlSt bnio nplim bhr hglbe : oikrto at raSo oipSiTo at klio oiSlHo barz plStim sbib lbSr bit ezbihm oat hem : oiSmo at klio bit eStrot oat goito tqeo bHomt bit Sn : oiSmeo alio iSbi ibiS gled at aSr eSo plStim lSaol : oiqomo kl aiS Hil oilko kl hlilh oiqHo at goit Saol oat goit bnio mHomt bit Sn oibao ibSh oiSrpo atm Sm : oiqHo at ezmtihm oiqbro tHt haSl bibSh oizmo Sbet imim :

Smoal b

1

oihi aHri mot Saol odod Sb mhkot at hemlq oiSb dod bzqlg imim Snim : oihi biom hSliSi ohnh aiS ba mn hmHnh mem Saol obgdio qreim oadmh el raSo oihi bbao al dod oipl arzh oiStHo : oiamr lo dod ai mch tboa oiamr alio mmHnh iSral nmlTti : oiamr alio dod mh hih hdbr hgd na li oiamr aSr ns hem mn hmlHmh ogm hrbh npl mn hem oimto ogm Saol oihontn bno mto : oiamr dod al hner hmgid lo aik idet ki mt Saol oihontn bno : oiamr hner hmgid lo nqra nqriti bhr hglbe ohnh Saol nSen el Hnito ohnh hrkb obeli hprSim hdbqho : oipn aHrio oirani oiqra ali oamr hnni : oiamr li mi ath oiamr alio emlqi anki : oiamr ali emd na eli omttni ki aHcni hSbz ki kl eod npSi bi : oaemd elio oamttho ki ideti ki la iHih aHri nplo oaqH hncr aSr el raSo oazedh aSr el creo oabiam al adni hnh : oiHcq dod bbgdo oiqrem ogm kl hanSim aSr ato : oispdo oibko oizmo ed herb el Saol oel ihontn bno oel em ihoh oel bit iSral ki nplo bHrb : oiamr dod al hner hmgid lo ai mch ath oiamr bn aiS gr emlqi anki : oiamr alio dod aik la irat lSlH idk lSHt at mSiH ihoh : oiqra dod laHd mhnerim oiamr gS pge bo oikho oimt : oiamr alio dod dmik el raSk ki pik enh bk lamr anki mtti at mSiH ihoh : oiqnn dod at hqinh hcat el Saol oel ihontn bno : oiamr llmd bni ihodh qSt hnh ktobh el spr hiSr : hzbi iSral el bmotik Hll aik nplo gborim : al tgido bgt al tbSro bHozt aSqlon pn tSmHnh bnot plStim pn telcnh bnot herlim : hri bglbe al Tl oal mTr elikm oSdi tromt ki Sm ngel mgn gborim mgn Saol bli mSiH bSmn : mdm Hllim mHlb gborim qSt ihontn la nSog aHor oHrb Saol la tSob riqm : Saol oihontn hnahbim ohneimm bHiihm obmotm la nprdo mnSrim qlo mariot gbro : bnot iSral al Saol bkinh hmlbSkm Sni em ednim hmelh edi chb el lboSkn : aik nplo gbrim btok hmlHmh ihontn el bmotik Hll : zr li elik aHi ihontn nemt li mad nplath ahbtk li mahbt nSim : aik nplo gborim oiabdo kli mlHmh :

2

oihi aHri kn oiSal dod bihoh lamr haelh baHt eri ihodh oiamr ihoh alio elh oiamr dod anh aelh oiamr Hbrnh : oiel Sm dod ogm Sti nSio aHinem hicrelit oabigil aSt nbl hkrmli : oanSio aSr emo helh dod aiS obito oiSbo beri Hbron : oibao anSi ihodh oimSHo Sm at dod lmlk el bit ihodh oigdo ldod lamr anSi ibiS gled aSr qbro at Saol : oiSlH dod mlakim al anSi ibiS gled oiamr alihm brkim atm lihoh aSr eSitm hHsd hch em adnikm em Saol otqbro ato : oeth ieS ihoh emkm Hsd oamt ogm anki aeSh atkm hTobh hcat aSr eSitm hdbr hch : oeth tHcqnh idikm ohio lbni Hil ki mt adnikm Saol ogm ati mSHo bit ihodh lmlk elihm : oabnr bn nr Sr zba aSr lSaol lqH at aiS bSt bn Saol oiebrho mHnim : oimlkho al hgled oal haSori oal icreal oel aprim oel bnimn oel iSral klh : bn arbeim Snh aiS bSt bn Saol bmlko el iSral oStim Snim mlk ak bit ihodh hio aHri dod : oihi mspr himim aSr hih dod mlk bHbron el bit ihodh Sbe Snim oSSh HdSim : oiza abnr bn nr oebdi aiS bSt bn Saol mmHnim gbeonh : oioab bn zroih oebdi dod izao oipgSom el brkt gbeon iHdo oiSbo alh el hbrkh mch oalh el hbrkh mch : oiamr abnr al ioab iqomo na hnerim oiSHqo lpnino oiamr ioab iqmo : oiqmo oiebro bmspr Snim eSr lbnimn olaiS bSt bn Saol oSnim eSr mebdi dod : oiHcqo aiS braS reho oHrbo bzd reho oiplo iHdo oiqra lmqom hhoa Hlqt hzrim aSr bgbeon : othi hmlHmh qSh ed mad biom hhoa oingp abnr oanSi iSral lpni ebdi dod : oihio Sm SlSh bni zroih ioab oabiSi oeShal oeShal ql brglio kaHd hzbim aSr bSdh : oirdp eShal aHri abnr ola nTh llkt el himin oel hSmaol maHri abnr : oipn abnr aHrio oiamr hath ch eShal oiamr anki : oiamr lo abnr nTh lk el imink ao el Smalk oaHc lk aHd mhnerim oqH lk at Hlzto ola abh eShal lsor maHrio : oisp eod abnr lamr al eShal sor lk maHri lmh akkh arzh oaik aSa pni al ioab aHik : oiman lsor oikho abnr baHri hHnit al hHmS otza hHnit maHrio oipl Sm oimt tHto oihi kl hba al hmqom aSr npl Sm eShal oimt oiemdo : oirdpo ioab oabiSi aHri abnr ohSmS bah ohmh bao ed gbet amh aSr el pni giH drk mdbr gbeon : oitqbzo bni bnimn aHri abnr oihio lagdh aHt oiemdo el raS gbeh aHt : oiqra abnr al ioab oiamr hlnzH takl Hrb hloa ideth ki mrh thih baHronh oed mti la tamr lem lSob maHri aHihm : oiamr ioab Hi halhim ki lola dbrt ki ac mhbqr nelh hem aiS maHri aHio : oitqe ioab bSopr oiemdo kl hem ola irdpo eod aHri iSral ola ispo eod lhlHm : oabnr oanSio hlko berbh kl hlilh hhoa oiebro at hirdn oilko kl hbtron oibao mHnim : oioab Sb maHri abnr oiqbz at kl hem oipqdo mebdi dod tSeh eSr aiS oeShal : oebdi dod hko mbnimn obanSi abnr SlS maot oSSim aiS mto : oiSao at eShal oiqbrho bqbr abio aSr bit lHm oilko kl hlilh ioab oanSio oiar lhm bHbron :

3

othi hmlHmh arkh bin bit Saol obin bit dod odod hlk oHcq obit Saol hlkim odlim : oildo ldod bnim bHbron oihi bkoro amnon laHinem hicrealt : omSnho klab labigl aSt nbl hkrmli ohSlSi abSlom bn mekh bt tlmi mlk gSor : ohrbiei adnih bn Hgit ohHmiSi SpTih bn abiTl : ohSSi itrem leglh aSt dod alh ildo ldod bHbron : oihi bhiot hmlHmh bin bit Saol obin bit dod oabnr hih mtHcq bbit Saol : olSaol plgS oSmh rzph bt aih oiamr al abnr mdoe bath al pilgS abi : oiHr labnr mad el dbri aiS bSt oiamr hraS klb anki aSr lihodh hiom aeSh Hsd em bit Saol abik al aHio oal mreho ola hmzitk bid dod otpqd eli eon haSh hiom : kh ieSh alhim labnr okh isip lo ki kaSr nSbe ihoh ldod ki kn aeSh lo : lhebir hmmlkh mbit Saol olhqim at ksa dod el iSral oel ihodh mdn oed bar Sbe : ola ikl eod lhSib at abnr dbr mirato ato : oiSlH abnr mlakim al dod tHto lamr lmi arz lamr krth britk ati ohnh idi emk lhsb alik at kl iSral : oiamr Tob ani akrt atk brit ak dbr aHd anki Sal matk lamr la trah at pni ki am lpni hbiak at mikl bt Saol bbak lraot at pni : oiSlH dod mlakim al aiS bSt bn Saol lamr tnh at aSti at mikl aSr arSti li bmah erlot plStim : oiSlH aiS bSt oiqHh mem aiS mem plTial bn loS : oilk ath aiSh hlok obkh aHrih ed bHrim oiamr alio abnr lk Sob oiSb : odbr abnr hih em cqni iSral lamr gm tmol gm SlSm hiitm mbqSim at dod lmlk elikm : oeth eSo ki ihoh amr al dod lamr bid dod ebdi hoSie at emi iSral mid plStim omid kl aibihm : oidbr gm abnr bacni bnimin oilk gm abnr ldbr bacni dod bHbron at kl aSr Tob beini iSral obeini kl bit bnimn : oiba abnr al dod Hbron oato eSrim anSim oieS dod labnr olanSim aSr ato mSth : oiamr abnr al dod aqomh oalkh oaqbzh al adni hmlk at kl iSral oikrto atk brit omlkt bkl aSr taoh npSk oiSlH dod at abnr oilk bSlom : ohnh ebdi dod oioab ba mhgdod oSll rb emm hbiao oabnr ainno em dod bHbron ki SlHo oilk bSlom : oioab okl hzba aSr ato bao oigdo lioab lamr ba abnr bn nr al hmlk oiSlHho oilk bSlom : oiba ioab al hmlk oiamr mh eSith hnh ba abnr alik lmh ch SlHto oilk hlok : idet at abnr bn nr ki lpttk ba oldet at mozak oat mboak oldet at kl aSr ath eSh : oiza ioab mem dod oiSlH mlakim aHri abnr oiSbo ato mbor hsrh odod la ide : oiSb abnr Hbron oiTho ioab al tok hSer ldbr ato bSli oikho Sm hHmS oimt bdm eSh al aHio : oiSme dod maHri kn oiamr nqi anki ommlkti mem ihoh ed eolm mdmi abnr bn nr : iHlo el raS ioab oal kl bit abio oal ikrt mbit ioab cb omzre omHciq bplk onpl bHrb oHsr lHm : oioab oabiSi aHio hrgo labnr el aSr hmit at eShal aHihm bgbeon bmlHmh : oiamr dod al ioab oal kl hem aSr ato qreo bgdikm oHgro Sqim ospdo lpni abnr ohmlk dod hlk aHri hmTh : oiqbro at abnr bHbron oiSa hmlk at qolo oibk al qbr abnr oibko kl hem : oiqnn hmlk al abnr oiamr hkmot nbl imot abnr : idk la asrot orglik la lnHStim hgSo knpol lpni bni eolh nplt oispo kl hem lbkot elio : oiba kl hem lhbrot at dod lHm beod hiom oiSbe dod lamr kh ieSh li alhim okh isip ki am lpni boa hSmS aTem lHm ao kl maomh : okl hem hkiro oiiTb beinihm kkl aSr eSh hmlk beini kl hem Tob : oideo kl hem okl iSral biom hhoa ki la hith mhmlk lhmit at abnr bn nr : oiamr hmlk al ebdio hloa tdeo ki Sr ogdol npl hiom hch biSral : oanki hiom rk omSoH mlk ohanSim halh bni zroih qSim mmni iSlm ihoh leSh hreh kreto :

4

oiSme bn Saol ki mt abnr bHbron oirpo idio okl iSral nbhlo : oSni anSim Sri gdodim hio bn Saol Sm haHd benh oSm hSni rkb bni rmon hbarti mbni bnimn ki gm barot tHSb el bnimn : oibrHo hbartim gtimh oihio Sm grim ed hiom hch : olihontn bn Saol bn nkh rglim bn HmS Snim hih bba Smet Saol oihontn micreal otSaho amnto otns oihi bHpch lnos oipl oipsH oSmo mpibSt : oilko bni rmon hbarti rkb obenh oibao kHm hiom al bit aiS bSt ohoa Skb at mSkb hzhrim : ohnh bao ed tok hbit lqHi HTim oikho al hHmS orkb obenh aHio nmlTo : oibao hbit ohoa Skb el mTto bHdr mSkbo oikho oimtho oisiro at raSo oiqHo at raSo oilko drk herbh kl hlilh : oibao at raS aiS bSt al dod Hbron oiamro al hmlk hnh raS aiS bSt bn Saol aibk aSr bqS at npSk oitn ihoh ladni hmlk nqmot hiom hch mSaol omcreo : oien dod at rkb oat benh aHio bni rmon hbarti oiamr lhm Hi ihoh aSr pdh at npSi mkl zrh : ki hmgid li lamr hnh mt Saol ohoa hih kmbSr beinio oaHch bo oahrgho bzqlg aSr ltti lo bSrh : ap ki anSim rSeim hrgo at aiS zdiq bbito el mSkbo oeth hloa abqS at dmo midkm oberti atkm mn harz : oizo dod at hnerim oihrgom oiqzzo at idihm oat rglihm oitlo el hbrkh bHbron oat raS aiS bSt lqHo oiqbro bqbr abnr bHbron :

5

oibao kl SbTi iSral al dod Hbronh oiamro lamr hnno ezmk obSrk anHno : gm atmol gm SlSom bhiot Saol mlk elino ath hiith mozia ohmbi at iSral oiamr ihoh lk ath treh at emi at iSral oath thih lngid el iSral : oibao kl cqni iSral al hmlk Hbronh oikrt lhm hmlk dod brit bHbron lpni ihoh oimSHo at dod lmlk el iSral : bn SlSim Snh dod bmlko arbeim Snh mlk : bHbron mlk el ihodh Sbe Snim oSSh HdSim obiroSlm mlk SlSim oSlS Snh el kl iSral oihodh : oilk hmlk oanSio iroSlm al hibsi ioSb harz oiamr ldod lamr la tboa hnh ki am hsirk heorim ohpsHim lamr la iboa dod hnh : oilkd dod at mzdt zion hia eir dod : oiamr dod biom hhoa kl mkh ibsi oige bznor oat hpsHim oat heorim Snao npS dod el kn iamro eor opsH la iboa al hbit : oiSb dod bmzdh oiqra lh eir dod oibn dod sbib mn hmloa obith : oilk dod hlok ogdol oihoh alhi zbaot emo : oiSlH Hirm mlk zr mlakim al dod oezi arcim oHrSi ez oHrSi abn qir oibno bit ldod : oide dod ki hkino ihoh lmlk el iSral oki nSa mmlkto bebor emo iSral : oiqH dod eod plgSim onSim miroSlm aHri bao mHbron oioldo eod ldod bnim obnot : oalh Smot hildim lo biroSlm Smoe oSobb ontn oSlmh : oibHr oaliSoe onpg oipie : oaliSme oalide oaliplT : oiSmeo plStim ki mSHo at dod lmlk el iSral oielo kl plStim lbqS at dod oiSme dod oird al hmzodh : oplStim bao oinTSo bemq rpaim : oiSal dod bihoh lamr haelh al plStim httnm bidi oiamr ihoh al dod elh ki ntn atn at hplStim bidk : oiba dod bbel przim oikm Sm dod oiamr prz ihoh at aibi lpni kprz mim el kn qra Sm hmqom hhoa bel przim : oiecbo Sm at ezbihm oiSam dod oanSio : oispo eod plStim lelot oinTSo bemq rpaim : oiSal dod bihoh oiamr la telh hsb al aHrihm obat lhm mmol bkaim : oihi bSmek at qol zedh braSi hbkaim ac tHrz ki ac iza ihoh lpnik lhkot bmHnh plStim : oieS dod kn kaSr zoho ihoh oik at plStim mgbe ed bak gcr :

6

oisp eod dod at kl bHor biSral SlSim alp : oiqm oilk dod okl hem aSr ato mbeli ihodh lhelot mSm at aron halhim aSr nqra Sm Sm ihoh zbaot iSb hkrbim elio : oirkbo at aron halhim al eglh HdSh oiSaho mbit abindb aSr bgbeh oeca oaHio bni abindb nhgim at heglh HdSh : oiSaho mbit abindb aSr bgbeh em aron halhim oaHio hlk lpni haron : odod okl bit iSral mSHqim lpni ihoh bkl ezi broSim obknrot obnblim obtpim obmneneim obzlzlim : oibao ed grn nkon oiSlH eca al aron halhim oiaHc bo ki SmTo hbqr : oiHr ap ihoh bech oikho Sm halhim el hSl oimt Sm em aron halhim : oiHr ldod el aSr prz ihoh prz bech oiqra lmqom hhoa prz ech ed hiom hch : oira dod at ihoh biom hhoa oiamr aik iboa ali aron ihoh : ola abh dod lhsir alio at aron ihoh el eir dod oiTho dod bit ebd adom hgti : oiSb aron ihoh bit ebd adm hgti SlSh HdSim oibrk ihoh at ebd adm oat kl bito : oigd lmlk dod lamr brk ihoh at bit ebd adm oat kl aSr lo bebor aron halhim oilk dod oiel at aron halhim mbit ebd adm eir dod bSmHh : oihi ki zedo nSai aron ihoh SSh zedim oicbH Sor omria : odod mkrkr bkl ec lpni ihoh odod Hgor apod bd : odod okl bit iSral melim at aron ihoh btroeh obqol Sopr : ohih aron ihoh ba eir dod omikl bt Saol nSqph bed hHlon otra at hmlk dod mpcc omkrkr lpni ihoh otbc lo blbh : oibao at aron ihoh oizgo ato bmqomo btok hahl aSr nTh lo dod oiel dod elot lpni ihoh oSlmim : oikl dod mhelot heolh ohSlmim oibrk at hem bSm ihoh zbaot : oiHlq lkl hem lkl hmon iSral lmaiS oed aSh laiS Hlt lHm aHt oaSpr aHd oaSiSh aHt oilk kl hem aiS lbito : oiSb dod lbrk at bito otza mikl bt Saol lqrat dod otamr mh nkbd hiom mlk iSral aSr nglh hiom leini amhot ebdio khglot nglot aHd hrqim : oiamr dod al mikl lpni ihoh aSr bHr bi mabik omkl bito lzot ati ngid el em ihoh el iSral oSHqti lpni ihoh : onqlti eod mcat ohiiti Spl beini oem hamhot aSr amrt emm akbdh : olmikl bt Saol la hih lh ild ed iom moth :

7

oihi ki iSb hmlk bbito oihoh hniH lo msbib mkl aibio : oiamr hmlk al ntn hnbia rah na anki ioSb bbit arcim oaron halhim iSb btok hirieh : oiamr ntn al hmlk kl aSr blbbk lk eSh ki ihoh emk : oihi blilh hhoa oihi dbr ihoh al ntn lamr : lk oamrt al ebdi al dod kh amr ihoh hath tbnh li bit lSbti : ki la iSbti bbit lmiom helti at bni iSral mmzrim oed hiom hch oahih mthlk bahl obmSkn : bkl aSr hthlkti bkl bni iSral hdbr dbrti at aHd SbTi iSral aSr zoiti lreot at emi at iSral lamr lmh la bnitm li bit arcim : oeth kh tamr lebdi ldod kh amr ihoh zbaot ani lqHtik mn hnoh maHr hzan lhiot ngid el emi el iSral : oahih emk bkl aSr hlkt oakrth at kl aibik mpnik oeSti lk Sm gdol kSm hgdlim aSr barz : oSmti mqom lemi liSral onTetio oSkn tHtio ola irgc eod ola isipo bni eolh lenoto kaSr braSonh : olmn hiom aSr zoiti SpTim el emi iSral ohniHti lk mkl aibik ohgid lk ihoh ki bit ieSh lk ihoh : ki imlao imik oSkbt at abtik ohqimti at crek aHrik aSr iza mmeik ohkinti at mmlkto : hoa ibnh bit lSmi oknnti at ksa mmlkto ed eolm : ani ahih lo lab ohoa ihih li lbn aSr bheoto ohkHtio bSbT anSim obngei bni adm : oHsdi la isor mmno kaSr hsrti mem Saol aSr hsrti mlpnik : onamn bitk ommlktk ed eolm lpnik ksak ihih nkon ed eolm : kkl hdbrim halh okkl hHcion hch kn dbr ntn al dod : oiba hmlk dod oiSb lpni ihoh oiamr mi anki adni ihoh omi biti ki hbiatni ed hlm : otqTn eod cat beinik adni ihoh otdbr gm al bit ebdk lmrHoq ocat tort hadm adni ihoh : omh iosip dod eod ldbr alik oath idet at ebdk adni ihoh : bebor dbrk oklbk eSit at kl hgdolh hcat lhodie at ebdk : el kn gdlt adni ihoh ki ain kmok oain alhim coltk bkl aSr Smeno bacnino : omi kemk kiSral goi aHd barz aSr hlko alhim lpdot lo lem olSom lo Sm oleSot lkm hgdolh onraot larzk mpni emk aSr pdit lk mmzrim goim oalhio : otkonn lk at emk iSral lk lem ed eolm oath ihoh hiit lhm lalhim : oeth ihoh alhim hdbr aSr dbrt el ebdk oel bito hqm ed eolm oeSh kaSr dbrt : oigdl Smk ed eolm lamr ihoh zbaot alhim el iSral obit ebdk dod ihih nkon lpnik : ki ath ihoh zbaot alhi iSral glith at acn ebdk lamr bit abnh lk el kn mza ebdk at lbo lhtpll alik at htplh hcat : oeth adni ihoh ath hoa halhim odbrik ihio amt otdbr al ebdk at hTobh hcat : oeth hoal obrk at bit ebdk lhiot leolm lpnik ki ath adni ihoh dbrt ombrktk ibrk bit ebdk leolm :

8

oihi aHri kn oik dod at plStim oikniem oiqH dod at mtg hamh mid plStim : oik at moab oimddm bHbl hSkb aotm arzh oimdd Sni Hblim lhmit omla hHbl lhHiot othi moab ldod lebdim nSai mnHh : oik dod at hddecr bn rHb mlk zobh blkto lhSib ido bnhr : oilkd dod mmno alp oSbe maot prSim oeSrim alp aiS rgli oieqr dod at kl hrkb oiotr mmno mah rkb : otba arm dmSq lecr lhddecr mlk zobh oik dod barm eSrim oSnim alp aiS : oiSm dod nzbim barm dmSq othi arm ldod lebdim noSai mnHh oiSe ihoh at dod bkl aSr hlk : oiqH dod at SlTi hchb aSr hio al ebdi hddecr oibiam iroSlm : ombTH ombrti eri hddecr lqH hmlk dod nHSt hrbh mad : oiSme tei mlk Hmt ki hkh dod at kl Hil hddecr : oiSlH tei at iorm bno al hmlk dod lSal lo lSlom olbrko el aSr nlHm bhddecr oikho ki aiS mlHmot tei hih hddecr obido hio kli ksp okli chb okli nHSt : gm atm hqdiS hmlk dod lihoh em hksp ohchb aSr hqdiS mkl hgoim aSr kbS : marm ommoab ombni emon omplStim omemlq omSll hddecr bn rHb mlk zobh : oieS dod Sm bSbo mhkoto at arm bgia mlH Smonh eSr alp : oiSm badom nzbim bkl adom Sm nzbim oihi kl adom ebdim ldod oioSe ihoh at dod bkl aSr hlk : oimlk dod el kl iSral oihi dod eSh mSpT ozdqh lkl emo : oioab bn zroih el hzba oihoSpT bn aHilod mckir : ozdoq bn aHiTob oaHimlk bn abitr khnim oSrih sopr : obniho bn ihoide ohkrti ohplti obni dod khnim hio :

9

oiamr dod hki iS eod aSr notr lbit Saol oaeSh emo Hsd bebor ihontn : olbit Saol ebd oSmo ziba oiqrao lo al dod oiamr hmlk alio hath ziba oiamr ebdk : oiamr hmlk haps eod aiS lbit Saol oaeSh emo Hsd alhim oiamr ziba al hmlk eod bn lihontn nkh rglim : oiamr lo hmlk aiph hoa oiamr ziba al hmlk hnh hoa bit mkir bn emial blo dbr : oiSlH hmlk dod oiqHho mbit mkir bn emial mlo dbr : oiba mpibSt bn ihontn bn Saol al dod oipl el pnio oiStHo oiamr dod mpibSt oiamr hnh ebdk : oiamr lo dod al tira ki eSh aeSh emk Hsd bebor ihontn abik ohSbti lk at kl Sdh Saol abik oath takl lHm el SlHni tmid : oiStHo oiamr mh ebdk ki pnit al hklb hmt aSr kmoni : oiqra hmlk al ziba ner Saol oiamr alio kl aSr hih lSaol olkl bito ntti lbn adnik : oebdt lo at hadmh ath obnik oebdik ohbat ohih lbn adnik lHm oaklo ompibSt bn adnik iakl tmid lHm el SlHni olziba HmSh eSr bnim oeSrim ebdim : oiamr ziba al hmlk kkl aSr izoh adni hmlk at ebdo kn ieSh ebdk ompibSt akl el SlHni kaHd mbni hmlk : olmpibSt bn qTn oSmo mika okl moSb bit ziba ebdim lmpibSt : ompibSt iSb biroSlm ki el SlHn hmlk tmid hoa akl ohoa psH Sti rglio :

10

oihi aHri kn oimt mlk bni emon oimlk Hnon bno tHtio : oiamr dod aeSh Hsd em Hnon bn nHS kaSr eSh abio emdi Hsd oiSlH dod lnHmo bid ebdio al abio oibao ebdi dod arz bni emon : oiamro Sri bni emon al Hnon adnihm hmkbd dod at abik beinik ki SlH lk mnHmim hloa bebor Hqor at heir olrglh olhpkh SlH dod at ebdio alik : oiqH Hnon at ebdi dod oiglH at Hzi cqnm oikrt at mdoihm bHzi ed Stotihm oiSlHm : oigdo ldod oiSlH lqratm ki hio hanSim nklmim mad oiamr hmlk Sbo birHo ed izmH cqnkm oSbtm : oirao bni emon ki nbaSo bdod oiSlHo bni emon oiSkro at arm bit rHob oat arm zoba eSrim alp rgli oat mlk mekh alp aiS oaiS Tob Snim eSr alp aiS : oiSme dod oiSlH at ioab oat kl hzba hgbrim : oizao bni emon oierko mlHmh ptH hSer oarm zoba orHob oaiS Tob omekh lbdm bSdh : oira ioab ki hith alio pni hmlHmh mpnim omaHor oibHr mkl bHori biSral oierk lqrat arm : oat itr hem ntn bid abSi aHio oierk lqrat bni emon : oiamr am tHcq arm mmni ohith li liSoeh oam bni emon iHcqo mmk ohlkti lhoSie lk : Hcq ontHcq bed emno obed eri alhino oihoh ieSh hTob beinio : oigS ioab ohem aSr emo lmlHmh barm oinso mpnio : obni emon rao ki ns arm oinso mpni abiSi oibao heir oiSb ioab mel bni emon oiba iroSlm : oira arm ki ngp lpni iSral oiaspo iHd : oiSlH hddecr oiza at arm aSr mebr hnhr oibao Hilm oSobk Sr zba hddecr lpnihm : oigd ldod oiasp at kl iSral oiebr at hirdn oiba Hlamh oierko arm lqrat dod oilHmo emo : oins arm mpni iSral oihrg dod marm Sbe maot rkb oarbeim alp prSim oat Sobk Sr zbao hkh oimt Sm : oirao kl hmlkim ebdi hddecr ki ngpo lpni iSral oiSlmo at iSral oiebdom oirao arm lhoSie eod at bni emon :

11

oihi ltSobt hSnh let zat hmlakim oiSlH dod at ioab oat ebdio emo oat kl iSral oiSHto at bni emon oizro el rbh odod ioSb biroSlm : oihi let herb oiqm dod mel mSkbo oithlk el gg bit hmlk oira aSh rHzt mel hgg ohaSh Tobt mrah mad : oiSlH dod oidrS laSh oiamr hloa cat bt Sbe bt aliem aSt aorih hHti : oiSlH dod mlakim oiqHh otboa alio oiSkb emh ohia mtqdSt mTmath otSb al bith : othr haSh otSlH otgd ldod otamr hrh anki : oiSlH dod al ioab SlH ali at aorih hHti oiSlH ioab at aorih al dod : oiba aorih alio oiSal dod lSlom ioab olSlom hem olSlom hmlHmh : oiamr dod laorih rd lbitk orHz rglik oiza aorih mbit hmlk otza aHrio mSat hmlk : oiSkb aorih ptH bit hmlk at kl ebdi adnio ola ird al bito : oigdo ldod lamr la ird aorih al bito oiamr dod al aorih hloa mdrk ath ba mdoe la irdt al bitk : oiamr aorih al dod haron oiSral oihodh iSbim bskot oadni ioab oebdi adni el pni hSdh Hnim oani aboa al biti lakl olStot olSkb em aSti Hik oHi npSk am aeSh at hdbr hch : oiamr dod al aorih Sb bch gm hiom omHr aSlHk oiSb aorih biroSlm biom hhoa ommHrt : oiqra lo dod oiakl lpnio oiSt oiSkrho oiza berb lSkb bmSkbo em ebdi adnio oal bito la ird : oihi bbqr oiktb dod spr al ioab oiSlH bid aorih : oiktb bspr lamr hbo at aorih al mol pni hmlHmh hHcqh oSbtm maHrio onkh omt : oihi bSmor ioab al heir oitn at aorih al hmqom aSr ide ki anSi Hil Sm : oizao anSi heir oilHmo at ioab oipl mn hem mebdi dod oimt gm aorih hHti : oiSlH ioab oigd ldod at kl dbri hmlHmh : oizo at hmlak lamr kklotk at kl dbri hmlHmh ldbr al hmlk : ohih am telh Hmt hmlk oamr lk mdoe ngStm al heir lhlHm hloa idetm at aSr iro mel hHomh : mi hkh at abimlk bn irbSt hloa aSh hSlikh elio plH rkb mel hHomh oimt btbz lmh ngStm al hHomh oamrt gm ebdk aorih hHti mt : oilk hmlak oiba oigd ldod at kl aSr SlHo ioab : oiamr hmlak al dod ki gbro elino hanSim oizao alino hSdh onhih elihm ed ptH hSer : oirao hmoraim al ebdk mel hHomh oimoto mebdi hmlk ogm ebdk aorih hHti mt : oiamr dod al hmlak kh tamr al ioab al ire beinik at hdbr hch ki kch okch takl hHrb hHcq mlHmtk al heir ohrsh oHcqho : otSme aSt aorih ki mt aorih aiSh otspd el belh : oiebr habl oiSlH dod oiasph al bito othi lo laSh otld lo bn oire hdbr aSr eSh dod beini ihoh :

12

oiSlH ihoh at ntn al dod oiba alio oiamr lo Sni anSim hio beir aHt aHd eSir oaHd raS : leSir hih zan obqr hrbh mad : olrS ain kl ki am kbSh aHt qTnh aSr qnh oiHih otgdl emo oem bnio iHdo mpto takl omkso tSth obHiqo tSkb othi lo kbt : oiba hlk laiS heSir oiHml lqHt mzano ombqro leSot larH hba lo oiqH at kbSt haiS hraS oieSh laiS hba alio : oiHr ap dod baiS mad oiamr al ntn Hi ihoh ki bn mot haiS heSh cat : oat hkbSh iSlm arbetim eqb aSr eSh at hdbr hch oel aSr la Hml : oiamr ntn al dod ath haiS kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki mSHtik lmlk el iSral oanki hzltik mid Saol : oatnh lk at bit adnik oat nSi adnik bHiqk oatnh lk at bit iSral oihodh oam meT oasph lk khnh okhnh : mdoe bcit at dbr ihoh leSot hre beino at aorih hHti hkit bHrb oat aSto lqHt lk laSh oato hrgt bHrb bni emon : oeth la tsor Hrb mbitk ed eolm eqb ki bctni otqH at aSt aorih hHti lhiot lk laSh : kh amr ihoh hnni mqim elik reh mbitk olqHti at nSik leinik ontti lreik oSkb em nSik leini hSmS hcat : ki ath eSit bstr oani aeSh at hdbr hch ngd kl iSral ongd hSmS : oiamr dod al ntn HTati lihoh oiamr ntn al dod gm ihoh hebir HTatk la tmot : aps ki naz nazt at aibi ihoh bdbr hch gm hbn hilod lk mot imot : oilk ntn al bito oigp ihoh at hild aSr ildh aSt aorih ldod oianS : oibqS dod at halhim bed hner oizm dod zom oba oln oSkb arzh : oiqmo cqni bito elio lhqimo mn harz ola abh ola bra atm lHm : oihi biom hSbiei oimt hild oirao ebdi dod lhgid lo ki mt hild ki amro hnh bhiot hild Hi dbrno alio ola Sme bqolno oaik namr alio mt hild oeSh reh : oira dod ki ebdio mtlHSim oibn dod ki mt hild oiamr dod al ebdio hmt hild oiamro mt : oiqm dod mharz oirHz oisk oiHlp Smlto oiba bit ihoh oiStHo oiba al bito oiSal oiSimo lo lHm oiakl : oiamro ebdio alio mh hdbr hch aSr eSith bebor hild Hi zmt otbk okaSr mt hild qmt otakl lHm : oiamr beod hild Hi zmti oabkh ki amrti mi iode iHnni ihoh oHi hild : oeth mt lmh ch ani zm haokl lhSibo eod ani hlk alio ohoa la iSob ali : oinHm dod at bt Sbe aSto oiba alih oiSkb emh otld bn oiqra at Smo Slmh oihoh ahbo : oiSlH bid ntn hnbia oiqra at Smo ididih bebor ihoh : oilHm ioab brbt bni emon oilkd at eir hmlokh : oiSlH ioab mlakim al dod oiamr nlHmti brbh gm lkdti at eir hmim : oeth asp at itr hem oHnh el heir olkdh pn alkd ani at heir onqra Smi elih : oiasp dod at kl hem oilk rbth oilHm bh oilkdh : oiqH at eTrt mlkm mel raSo omSqlh kkr chb oabn iqrh othi el raS dod oSll heir hozia hrbh mad : oat hem aSr bh hozia oiSm bmgrh obHrzi hbrcl obmgcrt hbrcl ohebir aotm bmlkn okn ieSh lkl eri bni emon oiSb dod okl hem iroSlm :

13

oihi aHri kn olabSlom bn dod aHot iph oSmh tmr oiahbh amnon bn dod : oizr lamnon lhtHlot bebor tmr aHto ki btolh hia oipla beini amnon leSot lh maomh : olamnon re oSmo iondb bn Smeh aHi dod oiondb aiS Hkm mad : oiamr lo mdoe ath kkh dl bn hmlk bbqr bbqr hloa tgid li oiamr lo amnon at tmr aHot abSlm aHi ani ahb : oiamr lo ihondb Skb el mSkbk ohtHl oba abik lraotk oamrt alio tba na tmr aHoti otbrni lHm oeSth leini at hbrih lmen aSr arah oaklti midh : oiSkb amnon oitHl oiba hmlk lrato oiamr amnon al hmlk tboa na tmr aHti otlbb leini Sti lbbot oabrh midh : oiSlH dod al tmr hbith lamr lki na bit amnon aHik oeSi lo hbrih : otlk tmr bit amnon aHih ohoa Skb otqH at hbzq otloS otlbb leinio otbSl at hlbbot : otqH at hmSrt otzq lpnio oiman lakol oiamr amnon hoziao kl aiS meli oizao kl aiS melio : oiamr amnon al tmr hbiai hbrih hHdr oabrh midk otqH tmr at hlbbot aSr eSth otba lamnon aHih hHdrh : otgS alio lakl oiHcq bh oiamr lh boai Skbi emi aHoti : otamr lo al aHi al tenni ki la ieSh kn biSral al teSh at hnblh hcat : oani anh aolik at Hrpti oath thih kaHd hnblim biSral oeth dbr na al hmlk ki la imneni mmk : ola abh lSme bqolh oiHcq mmnh oienh oiSkb ath : oiSnah amnon Snah gdolh mad ki gdolh hSnah aSr Snah mahbh aSr ahbh oiamr lh amnon qomi lki : otamr lo al aodt hreh hgdolh hcat maHrt aSr eSit emi lSlHni ola abh lSme lh : oiqra at nero mSrto oiamr SlHo na at cat meli hHozh onel hdlt aHrih : oelih ktnt psim ki kn tlbSn bnot hmlk hbtolt meilim oiza aoth mSrto hHoz onel hdlt aHrih : otqH tmr apr el raSh oktnt hpsim aSr elih qreh otSm idh el raSh otlk hlok oceqh : oiamr alih abSlom aHih haminon aHik hih emk oeth aHoti hHriSi aHik hoa al tSiti at lbk ldbr hch otSb tmr oSmmh bit abSlom aHih : ohmlk dod Sme at kl hdbrim halh oiHr lo mad : ola dbr abSlom em amnon lmre oed Tob ki Sna abSlom at amnon el dbr aSr enh at tmr aHto : oihi lSntim imim oihio gccim labSlom bbel Hzor aSr em aprim oiqra abSlom lkl bni hmlk : oiba abSlom al hmlk oiamr hnh na gccim lebdk ilk na hmlk oebdio em ebdk : oiamr hmlk al abSlom al bni al na nlk klno ola nkbd elik oiprz bo ola abh llkt oibrkho : oiamr abSlom ola ilk na atno amnon aHi oiamr lo hmlk lmh ilk emk : oiprz bo abSlom oiSlH ato at amnon oat kl bni hmlk : oizo abSlom at nerio lamr rao na kTob lb amnon biin oamrti alikm hko at amnon ohmtm ato al tirao hloa ki anki zoiti atkm Hcqo ohio lbni Hil : oieSo neri abSlom lamnon kaSr zoh abSlom oiqmo kl bni hmlk oirkbo aiS el prdo oinso : oihi hmh bdrk ohSmeh bah al dod lamr hkh abSlom at kl bni hmlk ola notr mhm aHd : oiqm hmlk oiqre at bgdio oiSkb arzh okl ebdio nzbim qrei bgdim : oien iondb bn Smeh aHi dod oiamr al iamr adni at kl hnerim bni hmlk hmito ki amnon lbdo mt ki el pi abSlom hith Simh miom ento at tmr aHto : oeth al iSm adni hmlk al lbo dbr lamr kl bni hmlk mto ki am amnon lbdo mt : oibrH abSlom oiSa hner hzph at eino oira ohnh em rb hlkim mdrk aHrio mzd hhr : oiamr iondb al hmlk hnh bni hmlk bao kdbr ebdk kn hih : oihi kklto ldbr ohnh bni hmlk bao oiSao qolm oibko ogm hmlk okl ebdio bko bki gdol mad : oabSlom brH oilk al tlmi bn emiHor mlk gSor oitabl el bno kl himim : oabSlom brH oilk gSor oihi Sm SlS Snim : otkl dod hmlk lzat al abSlom ki nHm el amnon ki mt :

14

oide ioab bn zrih ki lb hmlk el abSlom : oiSlH ioab tqoeh oiqH mSm aSh Hkmh oiamr alih htabli na olbSi na bgdi abl oal tsoki Smn ohiit kaSh ch imim rbim mtablt el mt : obat al hmlk odbrt alio kdbr hch oiSm ioab at hdbrim bpih : otamr haSh htqeit al hmlk otpl el apih arzh otStHo otamr hoSeh hmlk : oiamr lh hmlk mh lk otamr abl aSh almnh ani oimt aiSi : olSpHtk Sni bnim oinzo Snihm bSdh oain mzil binihm oiko haHd at haHd oimt ato : ohnh qmh kl hmSpHh el SpHtk oiamro tni at mkh aHio onmtho bnpS aHio aSr hrg onSmidh gm at hiorS okbo at gHlti aSr nSarh lblti Som laiSi Sm oSarit el pni hadmh : oiamr hmlk al haSh lki lbitk oani azoh elik : otamr haSh htqoeit al hmlk eli adni hmlk heon oel bit abi ohmlk oksao nqi : oiamr hmlk hmdbr alik ohbato ali ola isip eod lget bk : otamr ickr na hmlk at ihoh alhik mhrbit gal hdm lSHt ola iSmido at bni oiamr Hi ihoh am ipl mSert bnk arzh : otamr haSh tdbr na SpHtk al adni hmlk dbr oiamr dbri : otamr haSh olmh HSbth kcat el em alhim omdbr hmlk hdbr hch kaSm lblti hSib hmlk at ndHo : ki mot nmot okmim hngrim arzh aSr la iaspo ola iSa alhim npS oHSb mHSbot lblti idH mmno ndH : oeth aSr bati ldbr al hmlk adni at hdbr hch ki irani hem otamr SpHtk adbrh na al hmlk aoli ieSh hmlk at dbr amto : ki iSme hmlk lhzil at amto mkp haiS lhSmid ati oat bni iHd mnHlt alhim : otamr SpHtk ihih na dbr adni hmlk lmnoHh ki kmlak halhim kn adni hmlk lSme hTob ohre oihoh alhik ihi emk : oien hmlk oiamr al haSh al na tkHdi mmni dbr aSr anki Sal atk otamr haSh idbr na adni hmlk : oiamr hmlk hid ioab atk bkl cat oten haSh otamr Hi npSk adni hmlk am aS lhmin olhSmil mkl aSr dbr adni hmlk ki ebdk ioab hoa zoni ohoa Sm bpi SpHtk at kl hdbrim halh : lbebor sbb at pni hdbr eSh ebdk ioab at hdbr hch oadni Hkm kHkmt mlak halhim ldet at kl aSr barz : oiamr hmlk al ioab hnh na eSiti at hdbr hch olk hSb at hner at abSlom : oipl ioab al pnio arzh oiStHo oibrk at hmlk oiamr ioab hiom ide ebdk ki mzati Hn beinik adni hmlk aSr eSh hmlk at dbr ebdo : oiqm ioab oilk gSorh oiba at abSlom iroSlm : oiamr hmlk isb al bito opni la irah oisb abSlom al bito opni hmlk la rah : okabSlom la hih aiS iph bkl iSral lhll mad mkp rglo oed qdqdo la hih bo mom : obglHo at raSo ohih mqz imim limim aSr iglH ki kbd elio oglHo oSql at Ser raSo matim Sqlim babn hmlk : oioldo labSlom SloSh bnim obt aHt oSmh tmr hia hith aSh ipt mrah : oiSb abSlom biroSlm Sntim imim opni hmlk la rah : oiSlH abSlom al ioab lSlH ato al hmlk ola abh lboa alio oiSlH eod Snit ola abh lboa : oiamr al ebdio rao Hlqt ioab al idi olo Sm Serim lko ohoztih baS oizto ebdi abSlom at hHlqh baS : oiqm ioab oiba al abSlom hbith oiamr alio lmh hzito ebdk at hHlqh aSr li baS : oiamr abSlom al ioab hnh SlHti alik lamr ba hnh oaSlHh atk al hmlk lamr lmh bati mgSor Tob li ed ani Sm oeth arah pni hmlk oam iS bi eon ohmtni : oiba ioab al hmlk oigd lo oiqra al abSlom oiba al hmlk oiStHo lo el apio arzh lpni hmlk oiSq hmlk labSlom :

15

oihi maHri kn oieS lo abSlom mrkbh ossim oHmSim aiS rzim lpnio : ohSkim abSlom oemd el id drk hSer oihi kl haiS aSr ihih lo rib lboa al hmlk lmSpT oiqra abSlom alio oiamr ai mch eir ath oiamr maHd SbTi iSral ebdk : oiamr alio abSlom rah dbrk Tobim onkHim oSme ain lk mat hmlk : oiamr abSlom mi iSmni SpT barz oeli iboa kl aiS aSr ihih lo rib omSpT ohzdqtio : ohih bqrb aiS lhStHot lo oSlH at ido ohHciq lo onSq lo : oieS abSlom kdbr hch lkl iSral aSr ibao lmSpT al hmlk oignb abSlom at lb anSi iSral : oihi mqz arbeim Snh oiamr abSlom al hmlk alkh na oaSlm at ndri aSr ndrti lihoh bHbron : ki ndr ndr ebdk bSbti bgSor barm lamr am iSib iSibni ihoh iroSlm oebdti at ihoh : oiamr lo hmlk lk bSlom oiqm oilk Hbronh : oiSlH abSlom mrglim bkl SbTi iSral lamr kSmekm at qol hSpr oamrtm mlk abSlom bHbron : oat abSlom hlko matim aiS miroSlm qraim ohlkim ltmm ola ideo kl dbr : oiSlH abSlom at aHitpl hgilni ioez dod meiro mglh bcbHo at hcbHim oihi hqSr amz ohem holk orb at abSlom : oiba hmgid al dod lamr hih lb aiS iSral aHri abSlom : oiamr dod lkl ebdio aSr ato biroSlm qomo onbrHh ki la thih lno pliTh mpni abSlom mhro llkt pn imhr ohSgno ohdiH elino at hreh ohkh heir lpi Hrb : oiamro ebdi hmlk al hmlk kkl aSr ibHr adni hmlk hnh ebdik : oiza hmlk okl bito brglio oiecb hmlk at eSr nSim plgSim lSmr hbit : oiza hmlk okl hem brglio oiemdo bit hmrHq : okl ebdio ebrim el ido okl hkrti okl hplti okl hgtim SS maot aiS aSr bao brglo mgt ebrim el pni hmlk : oiamr hmlk al ati hgti lmh tlk gm ath atno Sob oSb em hmlk ki nkri ath ogm glh ath lmqomk : tmol boak ohiom anoek emno llkt oani holk el aSr ani holk Sob ohSb at aHik emk Hsd oamt : oien ati at hmlk oiamr Hi ihoh oHi adni hmlk ki am bmqom aSr ihih Sm adni hmlk am lmot am lHiim ki Sm ihih ebdk : oiamr dod al ati lk oebr oiebr ati hgti okl anSio okl hTp aSr ato : okl harz bokim qol gdol okl hem ebrim ohmlk ebr bnHl qdron okl hem ebrim el pni drk at hmdbr : ohnh gm zdoq okl hloim ato nSaim at aron brit halhim oizqo at aron halhim oiel abitr ed tm kl hem lebor mn heir : oiamr hmlk lzdoq hSb at aron halhim heir am amza Hn beini ihoh ohSbni ohrani ato oat noho : oam kh iamr la Hpzti bk hnni ieSh li kaSr Tob beinio : oiamr hmlk al zdoq hkhn hroah ath Sbh heir bSlom oaHimez bnk oihontn bn abitr Sni bnikm atkm : rao anki mtmhmh bebrot hmdbr ed boa dbr memkm lhgid li : oiSb zdoq oabitr at aron halhim iroSlm oiSbo Sm : odod elh bmelh hcitim elh obokh oraS lo Hpoi ohoa hlk iHp okl hem aSr ato Hpo aiS raSo oelo elh obkh : odod hgid lamr aHitpl bqSrim em abSlom oiamr dod skl na at ezt aHitpl ihoh : oihi dod ba ed hraS aSr iStHoh Sm lalhim ohnh lqrato HoSi harki qroe ktnto oadmh el raSo : oiamr lo dod am ebrt ati ohit eli lmSa : oam heir tSob oamrt labSlom ebdk ani hmlk ahih ebd abik oani mac oeth oani ebdk ohprth li at ezt aHitpl : ohloa emk Sm zdoq oabitr hkhnim ohih kl hdbr aSr tSme mbit hmlk tgid lzdoq olabitr hkhnim : hnh Sm emm Sni bnihm aHimez lzdoq oihontn labitr oSlHtm bidm ali kl dbr aSr tSmeo : oiba HoSi reh dod heir oabSlm iba iroSlm :

16

odod ebr meT mhraS ohnh ziba ner mpi bSt lqrato ozmd Hmrim HbSim oelihm matim lHm omah zmoqim omah qiz onbl iin : oiamr hmlk al ziba mh alh lk oiamr ziba hHmorim lbit hmlk lrkb olhlHm ohqiz lakol hnerim ohiin lStot hiep bmdbr : oiamr hmlk oaih bn adnik oiamr ziba al hmlk hnh ioSb biroSlm ki amr hiom iSibo li bit iSral at mmlkot abi : oiamr hmlk lzba hnh lk kl aSr lmpi bSt oiamr ziba hStHoiti amza Hn beinik adni hmlk : oba hmlk dod ed bHorim ohnh mSm aiS ioza mmSpHt bit Saol oSmo Smei bn gra iza izoa omqll : oisql babnim at dod oat kl ebdi hmlk dod okl hem okl hgbrim mimino omSmalo : okh amr Smei bqllo za za aiS hdmim oaiS hbliel : hSib elik ihoh kl dmi bit Saol aSr mlkt tHto oitn ihoh at hmlokh bid abSlom bnk ohnk bretk ki aiS dmim ath : oiamr abiSi bn zroih al hmlk lmh iqll hklb hmt hch at adni hmlk aebrh na oasirh at raSo : oiamr hmlk mh li olkm bni zrih ki iqll oki ihoh amr lo qll at dod omi iamr mdoe eSith kn : oiamr dod al abiSi oal kl ebdio hnh bni aSr iza mmei mbqS at npSi oap ki eth bn himini hnHo lo oiqll ki amr lo ihoh : aoli irah ihoh beoni ohSib ihoh li Tobh tHt qllto hiom hch : oilk dod oanSio bdrk oSmei hlk bzle hhr lemto hlok oiqll oisql babnim lemto oepr bepr : oiba hmlk okl hem aSr ato eipim oinpS Sm : oabSlom okl hem aiS iSral bao iroSlm oaHitpl ato : oihi kaSr ba HoSi harki reh dod al abSlom oiamr HoSi al abSlm iHi hmlk iHi hmlk : oiamr abSlom al HoSi ch Hsdk at rek lmh la hlkt at rek : oiamr HoSi al abSlm la ki aSr bHr ihoh ohem hch okl aiS iSral la ahih oato aSb : ohSnit lmi ani aebd hloa lpni bno kaSr ebdti lpni abik kn ahih lpnik : oiamr abSlom al aHitpl hbo lkm ezh mh neSh : oiamr aHitpl al abSlm boa al plgSi abik aSr hniH lSmor hbit oSme kl iSral ki nbaSt at abik oHcqo idi kl aSr atk : oiTo labSlom hahl el hgg oiba abSlom al plgSi abio leini kl iSral : oezt aHitpl aSr iez bimim hhm kaSr iSal bdbr halhim kn kl ezt aHitpl gm ldod gm labSlm :

17

oiamr aHitpl al abSlm abHrh na Snim eSr alp aiS oaqomh oardph aHri dod hlilh : oaboa elio ohoa ige orph idim ohHrdti ato ons kl hem aSr ato ohkiti at hmlk lbdo : oaSibh kl hem alik kSob hkl haiS aSr ath mbqS kl hem ihih Slom : oiiSr hdbr beini abSlm obeini kl cqni iSral : oiamr abSlom qra na gm lHoSi harki onSmeh mh bpio gm hoa : oiba HoSi al abSlom oiamr abSlom alio lamr kdbr hch dbr aHitpl hneSh at dbro am ain ath dbr : oiamr HoSi al abSlom la Tobh hezh aSr iez aHitpl bpem hcat : oiamr HoSi ath idet at abik oat anSio ki gbrim hmh omri npS hmh kdb Skol bSdh oabik aiS mlHmh ola ilin at hem : hnh eth hoa nHba baHt hpHtim ao baHd hmqomt ohih knpl bhm btHlh oSme hSme oamr hith mgph bem aSr aHri abSlm : ohoa gm bn Hil aSr lbo klb harih hms ims ki ide kl iSral ki gbor abik obni Hil aSr ato : ki iezti hasp iasp elik kl iSral mdn oed bar Sbe kHol aSr el him lrb opnik hlkim bqrb : obano alio baHt hmqomt aSr nmza Sm onHno elio kaSr ipl hTl el hadmh ola notr bo obkl hanSim aSr ato gm aHd : oam al eir iasp ohSiao kl iSral al heir hhia Hblim osHbno ato ed hnHl ed aSr la nmza Sm gm zror : oiamr abSlom okl aiS iSral Tobh ezt HoSi harki mezt aHitpl oihoh zoh lhpr at ezt aHitpl hTobh lbebor hbia ihoh al abSlom at hreh : oiamr HoSi al zdoq oal abitr hkhnim kcat okcat iez aHitpl at abSlm oat cqni iSral okcat okcat iezti ani : oeth SlHo mhrh ohgido ldod lamr al tln hlilh berbot hmdbr ogm ebor tebor pn ible lmlk olkl hem aSr ato : oihontn oaHimez emdim bein rgl ohlkh hSpHh ohgidh lhm ohm ilko ohgido lmlk dod ki la ioklo lhraot lboa heirh : oira atm ner oigd labSlm oilko Snihm mhrh oibao al bit aiS bbHorim olo bar bHzro oirdo Sm : otqH haSh otprS at hmsk el pni hbar otSTH elio hrpot ola node dbr : oibao ebdi abSlom al haSh hbith oiamro aih aHimez oihontn otamr lhm haSh ebro mikl hmim oibqSo ola mzao oiSbo iroSlm : oihi aHri lktm oielo mhbar oilko oigdo lmlk dod oiamro al dod qomo oebro mhrh at hmim ki kkh iez elikm aHitpl : oiqm dod okl hem aSr ato oiebro at hirdn ed aor hbqr ed aHd la nedr aSr la ebr at hirdn : oaHitpl rah ki la neSth ezto oiHbS at hHmor oiqm oilk al bito al eiro oizo al bito oiHnq oimt oiqbr bqbr abio : odod ba mHnimh oabSlm ebr at hirdn hoa okl aiS iSral emo : oat emSa Sm abSlm tHt ioab el hzba oemSa bn aiS oSmo itra hiSrali aSr ba al abigl bt nHS aHot zroih am ioab : oiHn iSral oabSlm arz hgled : oihi kboa dod mHnimh oSbi bn nHS mrbt bni emon omkir bn emial mla dbr obrcli hgledi mrglim : mSkb ospot okli iozr oHTim oSerim oqmH oqli opol oedSim oqli : odbS oHmah ozan oSpot bqr hgiSo ldod olem aSr ato lakol ki amro hem reb oeip ozma bmdbr :

18

oipqd dod at hem aSr ato oiSm elihm Sri alpim oSri maot : oiSlH dod at hem hSlSit bid ioab ohSlSit bid abiSi bn zroih aHi ioab ohSlSt bid ati hgti oiamr hmlk al hem iza aza gm ani emkm : oiamr hem la tza ki am ns nnos la iSimo alino lb oam imto Hzino la iSimo alino lb ki eth kmno eSrh alpim oeth Tob ki thih lno meir lecir : oiamr alihm hmlk aSr iiTb beinikm aeSh oiemd hmlk al id hSer okl hem izao lmaot olalpim : oizo hmlk at ioab oat abiSi oat ati lamr laT li lner labSlom okl hem Smeo bzot hmlk at kl hSrim el dbr abSlom : oiza hem hSdh lqrat iSral othi hmlHmh bier aprim : oingpo Sm em iSral lpni ebdi dod othi Sm hmgph gdolh biom hhoa eSrim alp : othi Sm hmlHmh npzot el pni kl harz oirb hier lakl bem maSr aklh hHrb biom hhoa : oiqra abSlom lpni ebdi dod oabSlom rkb el hprd oiba hprd tHt Sobk halh hgdolh oiHcq raSo balh oitn bin hSmim obin harz ohprd aSr tHtio ebr : oira aiS aHd oigd lioab oiamr hnh raiti at abSlm tloi balh : oiamr ioab laiS hmgid lo ohnh rait omdoe la hkito Sm arzh oeli ltt lk eSrh ksp oHgrh aHt : oiamr haiS al ioab ola anki Sql el kpi alp ksp la aSlH idi al bn hmlk ki bacnino zoh hmlk atk oat abiSi oat ati lamr Smro mi bner babSlom : ao eSiti bnpSo Sqr okl dbr la ikHd mn hmlk oath ttizb mngd : oiamr ioab la kn aHilh lpnik oiqH SlSh SbTim bkpo oitqem blb abSlom eodno Hi blb halh : oisbo eSrh nerim nSai kli ioab oiko at abSlom oimitho : oitqe ioab bSpr oiSb hem mrdp aHri iSral ki HSk ioab at hem : oiqHo at abSlom oiSliko ato bier al hpHt hgdol oizbo elio gl abnim gdol mad okl iSral nso aiS lahlo : oabSlm lqH oizb lo bHio at mzbt aSr bemq hmlk ki amr ain li bn bebor hckir Smi oiqra lmzbt el Smo oiqra lh id abSlm ed hiom hch : oaHimez bn zdoq amr arozh na oabSrh at hmlk ki SpTo ihoh mid aibio : oiamr lo ioab la aiS bSrh ath hiom hch obSrt biom aHr ohiom hch la tbSr ki el bn hmlk mt : oiamr ioab lkoSi lk hgd lmlk aSr raith oiStHo koSi lioab oirz : oisp eod aHimez bn zdoq oiamr al ioab oihi mh arzh na gm ani aHri hkoSi oiamr ioab lmh ch ath rz bni olkh ain bSorh mzat : oihi mh aroz oiamr lo roz oirz aHimez drk hkkr oiebr at hkoSi : odod ioSb bin Sni hSerim oilk hzph al gg hSer al hHomh oiSa at einio oira ohnh aiS rz lbdo : oiqra hzph oigd lmlk oiamr hmlk am lbdo bSorh bpio oilk hlok oqrb : oira hzph aiS aHr rz oiqra hzph al hSer oiamr hnh aiS rz lbdo oiamr hmlk gm ch mbSr : oiamr hzph ani rah at mrozt hraSon kmrzt aHimez bn zdoq oiamr hmlk aiS Tob ch oal bSorh Tobh iboa : oiqra aHimez oiamr al hmlk Slom oiStHo lmlk lapio arzh oiamr brok ihoh alhik aSr sgr at hanSim aSr nSao at idm badni hmlk : oiamr hmlk Slom lner labSlom oiamr aHimez raiti hhmon hgdol lSlH at ebd hmlk ioab oat ebdk ola ideti mh : oiamr hmlk sb htizb kh oisb oiemd : ohnh hkoSi ba oiamr hkoSi itbSr adni hmlk ki SpTk ihoh hiom mid kl hqmim elik : oiamr hmlk al hkoSi hSlom lner labSlom oiamr hkoSi ihio kner aibi adni hmlk okl aSr qmo elik lreh : oirgc hmlk oiel el elit hSer oibk okh amr blkto bni abSlom bni bni abSlom mi itn moti ani tHtik abSlom bni bni :

19

oigd lioab hnh hmlk bkh oitabl el abSlm : othi htSeh biom hhoa labl lkl hem ki Sme hem biom hhoa lamr nezb hmlk el bno : oitgnb hem biom hhoa lboa heir kaSr itgnb hem hnklmim bnosm bmlHmh : ohmlk laT at pnio oiceq hmlk qol gdol bni abSlom abSlom bni bni : oiba ioab al hmlk hbit oiamr hbSt hiom at pni kl ebdik hmmlTim at npSk hiom oat npS bnik obntik onpS nSik onpS plgSik : lahbh at Snaik olSna at ahbik ki hgdt hiom ki ain lk Srim oebdim ki ideti hiom ki la abSlom Hi oklno hiom mtim ki ac iSr beinik : oeth qom za odbr el lb ebdik ki bihoh nSbeti ki aink ioza am ilin aiS atk hlilh oreh lk cat mkl hreh aSr bah elik mnerik ed eth : oiqm hmlk oiSb bSer olkl hem hgido lamr hnh hmlk ioSb bSer oiba kl hem lpni hmlk oiSral ns aiS lahlio : oihi kl hem ndon bkl SbTi iSral lamr hmlk hzilno mkp aibino ohoa mlTno mkp plStim oeth brH mn harz mel abSlom : oabSlom aSr mSHno elino mt bmlHmh oeth lmh atm mHrSim lhSib at hmlk : ohmlk dod SlH al zdoq oal abitr hkhnim lamr dbro al cqni ihodh lamr lmh thio aHrnim lhSib at hmlk al bito odbr kl iSral ba al hmlk al bito : aHi atm ezmi obSri atm olmh thio aHrnim lhSib at hmlk : olemSa tmro hloa ezmi obSri ath kh ieSh li alhim okh iosip am la Sr zba thih lpni kl himim tHt ioab : oiT at lbb kl aiS ihodh kaiS aHd oiSlHo al hmlk Sob ath okl ebdik : oiSb hmlk oiba ed hirdn oihodh ba hglglh llkt lqrat hmlk lhebir at hmlk at hirdn : oimhr Smei bn gra bn himini aSr mbHorim oird em aiS ihodh lqrat hmlk dod : oalp aiS emo mbnimn oziba ner bit Saol oHmSt eSr bnio oeSrim ebdio ato ozlHo hirdn lpni hmlk : oebrh hebrh lebir at bit hmlk oleSot hTob beino oSmei bn gra npl lpni hmlk bebro birdn : oiamr al hmlk al iHSb li adni eon oal tckr at aSr heoh ebdk biom aSr iza adni hmlk miroSlm lSom hmlk al lbo : ki ide ebdk ki ani HTati ohnh bati hiom raSon lkl bit iosp lrdt lqrat adni hmlk : oien abiSi bn zroih oiamr htHt cat la iomt Smei ki qll at mSiH ihoh : oiamr dod mh li olkm bni zroih ki thio li hiom lSTn hiom iomt aiS biSral ki hloa ideti ki hiom ani mlk el iSral : oiamr hmlk al Smei la tmot oiSbe lo hmlk : ompbSt bn Saol ird lqrat hmlk ola eSh rglio ola eSh Spmo oat bgdio la kbs lmn hiom lkt hmlk ed hiom aSr ba bSlom : oihi ki ba iroSlm lqrat hmlk oiamr lo hmlk lmh la hlkt emi mpibSt : oiamr adni hmlk ebdi rmni ki amr ebdk aHbSh li hHmor oarkb elih oalk at hmlk ki psH ebdk : oirgl bebdk al adni hmlk oadni hmlk kmlak halhim oeSh hTob beinik : ki la hih kl bit abi ki am anSi mot ladni hmlk otSt at ebdk bakli SlHnk omh iS li eod zdqh olceq eod al hmlk : oiamr lo hmlk lmh tdbr eod dbrik amrti ath oziba tHlqo at hSdh : oiamr mpibSt al hmlk gm at hkl iqH aHri aSr ba adni hmlk bSlom al bito : obrcli hgledi ird mrglim oiebr at hmlk hirdn lSlHo at birdn : obrcli cqn mad bn Smnim Snh ohoa klkl at hmlk bSibto bmHnim ki aiS gdol hoa mad : oiamr hmlk al brcli ath ebr ati oklklti atk emdi biroSlm : oiamr brcli al hmlk kmh imi Sni Hii ki aelh at hmlk iroSlm : bn Smnim Snh anki hiom hade bin Tob lre am iTem ebdk at aSr akl oat aSr aSth am aSme eod bqol Srim oSrot olmh ihih ebdk eod lmSa al adni hmlk : kmeT iebr ebdk at hirdn at hmlk olmh igmlni hmlk hgmolh hcat : iSb na ebdk oamt beiri em qbr abi oami ohnh ebdk kmhm iebr em adni hmlk oeSh lo at aSr Tob beinik : oiamr hmlk ati iebr kmhm oani aeSh lo at hTob beinik okl aSr tbHr eli aeSh lk : oiebr kl hem at hirdn ohmlk ebr oiSq hmlk lbrcli oibrkho oiSb lmqmo : oiebr hmlk hglglh okmhn ebr emo okl em ihodh oiebiro at hmlk ogm Hzi em iSral : ohnh kl aiS iSral baim al hmlk oiamro al hmlk mdoe gnbok aHino aiS ihodh oiebro at hmlk oat bito at hirdn okl anSi dod emo : oien kl aiS ihodh el aiS iSral ki qrob hmlk ali olmh ch Hrh lk el hdbr hch hakol aklno mn hmlk am nSat nSa lno : oien aiS iSral at aiS ihodh oiamr eSr idot li bmlk ogm bdod ani mmk omdoe hqltni ola hih dbri raSon li lhSib at mlki oiqS dbr aiS ihodh mdbr aiS iSral :

20

oSm nqra aiS bliel oSmo Sbe bn bkri aiS imini oitqe bSpr oiamr ain lno Hlq bdod ola nHlh lno bbn iSi aiS lahlio iSral : oiel kl aiS iSral maHri dod aHri Sbe bn bkri oaiS ihodh dbqo bmlkm mn hirdn oed iroSlm : oiba dod al bito iroSlm oiqH hmlk at eSr nSim plgSim aSr hniH lSmr hbit oitnm bit mSmrt oiklklm oalihm la ba othiinh zrrot ed iom mtn almnot Hiot : oiamr hmlk al emSa hceq li at aiS ihodh SlSt imim oath ph emd : oilk emSa lhceiq at ihodh oiiHr mn hmoed aSr iedo : oiamr dod al abiSi eth ire lno Sbe bn bkri mn abSlom ath qH at ebdi adnik ordp aHrio pn mza lo erim bzrot ohzil einno : oizao aHrio anSi ioab ohkrti ohplti okl hgbrim oizao miroSlm lrdp aHri Sbe bn bkri : hm em habn hgdolh aSr bgbeon oemSa ba lpnihm oioab Hgor mdo lbSo oelo Hgor Hrb mzmdt el mtnio bterh ohoa iza otpl : oiamr ioab lemSa hSlom ath aHi otHc id imin ioab bcqn emSa lnSq lo : oemSa la nSmr bHrb aSr bid ioab oikho bh al hHmS oiSpk meio arzh ola Snh lo oimt oioab oabiSi aHio rdp aHri Sbe bn bkri : oaiS emd elio mneri ioab oiamr mi aSr Hpz bioab omi aSr ldod aHri ioab : oemSa mtgll bdm btok hmslh oira haiS ki emd kl hem oisb at emSa mn hmslh hSdh oiSlk elio bgd kaSr rah kl hba elio oemd : kaSr hgh mn hmslh ebr kl aiS aHri ioab lrdp aHri Sbe bn bkri : oiebr bkl SbTi iSral ablh obit mekh okl hbrim oiqlho oibao ap aHrio : oibao oizro elio bablh bit hmekh oiSpko sllh al heir otemd bHl okl hem aSr at ioab mSHitm lhpil hHomh : otqra aSh Hkmh mn heir Smeo Smeo amro na al ioab qrb ed hnh oadbrh alik : oiqrb alih otamr haSh hath ioab oiamr ani otamr lo Sme dbri amtk oiamr Sme anki : otamr lamr dbr idbro braSnh lamr Sal iSalo babl okn htmo : anki Slmi amoni iSral ath mbqS lhmit eir oam biSral lmh tble nHlt ihoh : oien ioab oiamr Hlilh Hlilh li am able oam aSHit : la kn hdbr ki aiS mhr aprim Sbe bn bkri Smo nSa ido bmlk bdod tno ato lbdo oalkh mel heir otamr haSh al ioab hnh raSo mSlk alik bed hHomh : otboa haSh al kl hem bHkmth oikrto at raS Sbe bn bkri oiSlko al ioab oitqe bSopr oipzo mel heir aiS lahlio oioab Sb iroSlm al hmlk : oioab al kl hzba iSral obnih bn ihoide el hkri oel hplti : oadrm el hms oihoSpT bn aHilod hmckir : oSia spr ozdoq oabitr khnim : ogm eira hiari hih khn ldod :

21

oihi reb bimi dod SlS Snim Snh aHri Snh oibqS dod at pni ihoh oiamr ihoh al Saol oal bit hdmim el aSr hmit at hgbenim : oiqra hmlk lgbenim oiamr alihm ohgbenim la mbni iSral hmh ki am mitr hamri obni iSral nSbeo lhm oibqS Saol lhktm bqnato lbni iSral oihodh : oiamr dod al hgbenim mh aeSh lkm obmh akpr obrko at nHlt ihoh : oiamro lo hgbenim ain li ksp ochb em Saol oem bito oain lno aiS lhmit biSral oiamr mh atm amrim aeSh lkm : oiamro al hmlk haiS aSr klno oaSr dmh lno nSmdno mhtizb bkl gbl iSral : intn lno Sbeh anSim mbnio ohoqenom lihoh bgbet Saol bHir ihoh oiamr hmlk ani atn : oiHml hmlk el mpibSt bn ihontn bn Saol el Sbet ihoh aSr bintm bin dod obin ihontn bn Saol : oiqH hmlk at Sni bni rzph bt aih aSr ildh lSaol at armni oat mpbSt oat HmSt bni mikl bt Saol aSr ildh ledrial bn brcli hmHlti : oitnm bid hgbenim oiqiem bhr lpni ihoh oiplo Sbetim iHd ohm hmto bimi qzir braSnim tHlt qzir Serim : otqH rzph bt aih at hSq otTho lh al hzor mtHlt qzir ed ntk mim elihm mn hSmim ola ntnh eop hSmim lnoH elihm iomm oat Hit hSdh lilh : oigd ldod at aSr eSth rzph bt aih plgS Saol : oilk dod oiqH at ezmot Saol oat ezmot ihontn bno mat beli ibiS gled aSr gnbo atm mrHb bit Sn aSr tlom Sm hplStim biom hkot plStim at Saol bglbe : oiel mSm at ezmot Saol oat ezmot ihontn bno oiaspo at ezmot hmoqeim : oiqbro at ezmot Saol oihontn bno barz bnimn bzle bqbr qiS abio oieSo kl aSr zoh hmlk oietr alhim larz aHri kn : othi eod mlHmh lplStim at iSral oird dod oebdio emo oilHmo at plStim oiep dod : oiSbo bnb aSr bilidi hrph omSql qino SlS maot mSql nHSt ohoa Hgor HdSh oiamr lhkot at dod : oiecr lo abiSi bn zroih oik at hplSti oimitho ac nSbeo anSi dod lo lamr la tza eod atno lmlHmh ola tkbh at nr iSral : oihi aHri kn othi eod hmlHmh bgob em plStim ac hkh sbki hHSti at sp aSr bildi hrph : othi eod hmlHmh bgob em plStim oik alHnn bn ieri argim bit hlHmi at glit hgti oez Hnito kmnor argim : othi eod mlHmh bgt oihi aiS mdin oazbet idio oazbeot rglio SS oSS eSrim oarbe mspr ogm hoa ild lhrph : oiHrp at iSral oikho ihontn bn Smei aHi dod : at arbet alh ildo lhrph bgt oiplo bid dod obid ebdio :

22

oidbr dod lihoh at dbri hSirh hcat biom hzil ihoh ato mkp kl aibio omkp Saol : oiamr ihoh slei omzdti omplTi li : alhi zori aHsh bo mgni oqrn iSei mSgbi omnosi mSei mHms tSeni : mhll aqra ihoh omaibi aoSe : ki appni mSbri mot nHli bliel ibetni : Hbli Saol sbni qdmni mqSi mot : bzr li aqra ihoh oal alhi aqra oiSme mhiklo qoli oSoeti bacnio : otgeS otreS harz mosdot hSmim irgco oitgeSo ki Hrh lo : elh eSn bapo oaS mpio takl gHlim bero mmno : oiT Smim oird oerpl tHt rglio : oirkb el krob oiep oira el knpi roH : oiSt HSk sbibtio skot HSrt mim ebi SHqim : mngh ngdo bero gHli aS : irem mn Smim ihoh oelion itn qolo : oiSlH Hzim oipizm brq oihmm : oirao apqi im iglo msdot tbl bgert ihoh mnSmt roH apo : iSlH mmrom iqHni imSni mmim rbim : izilni maibi ec mSnai ki amzo mmni : iqdmni biom aidi oihi ihoh mSen li : oiza lmrHb ati iHlzni ki Hpz bi : igmlni ihoh kzdqti kbr idi iSib li : ki Smrti drki ihoh ola rSeti malhi : ki kl mSpTo lngdi oHqtio la asor mmnh : oahih tmim lo oaStmrh meoni : oiSb ihoh li kzdqti kbri lngd einio : em Hsid ttHsd em gbor tmim ttmm : em nbr ttbr oem eqS ttpl : oat em eni toSie oeinik el rmim tSpil : ki ath niri ihoh oihoh igih HSki : ki bkh aroz gdod balhi adlg Sor : hal tmim drko amrt ihoh zroph mgn hoa lkl hHsim bo : ki mi al mbledi ihoh omi zor mbledi alhino : hal meoci Hil oitr tmim drko : mSoh rglio kailot oel bmoti iemdni : mlmd idi lmlHmh onHt qSt nHoSh creti : ottn li mgn iSek oentk trbni : trHib zedi tHtni ola medo qrsli : ardph aibi oaSmidm ola aSob ed klotm : oaklm oamHzm ola iqomon oiplo tHt rgli : otcrni Hil lmlHmh tkrie qmi tHtni : oaibi tth li erp mSnai oazmitm : iSeo oain mSie al ihoh ola enm : oaSHqm kepr arz kTiT Hozot adqm arqem : otplTni mribi emi tSmrni lraS goim em la ideti iebdni : bni nkr itkHSo li lSmoe acn iSmeo li : bni nkr iblo oiHgro mmsgrotm : Hi ihoh obrok zori oirm alhi zor iSei : hal hntn nqmt li omorid emim tHtni : omoziai maibi omqmi trommni maiS Hmsim tzilni : el kn aodk ihoh bgoim olSmk acmr : mgdil iSoeot mlko oeSh Hsd lmSiHo ldod olcreo ed eolm :

23

oalh dbri dod haHrnim nam dod bn iSi onam hgbr hqm el mSiH alhi ieqb oneim cmrot iSral : roH ihoh dbr bi omlto el lSoni : amr alhi iSral li dbr zor iSral moSl badm zdiq moSl irat alhim : okaor bqr icrH SmS bqr la ebot mngh mmTr dSa marz : ki la kn biti em al ki brit eolm Sm li erokh bkl oSmrh ki kl iSei okl Hpz ki la izmiH : obliel kqoz mnd klhm ki la bid iqHo : oaiS ige bhm imla brcl oez Hnit obaS Srop iSrpo bSbt : alh Smot hgbrim aSr ldod iSb bSbt tHkmni raS hSlSi hoa edino hezno el Smnh maot Hll bpem aHd : oaHro alecr bn ddi bn aHHi bSlSh gbrim em dod bHrpm bplStim naspo Sm lmlHmh oielo aiS iSral : hoa qm oik bplStim ed ki igeh ido otdbq ido al hHrb oieS ihoh tSoeh gdolh biom hhoa ohem iSbo aHrio ak lpST : oaHrio Sma bn aga hrri oiaspo plStim lHih othi Sm Hlqt hSdh mlah edSim ohem ns mpni plStim : oitizb btok hHlqh oizilh oik at plStim oieS ihoh tSoeh gdolh : oirdo SlSim mhSlSim raS oibao al qzir al dod al mert edlm oHit plStim Hnh bemq rpaim : odod ac bmzodh omzb plStim ac bit lHm : oitaoh dod oiamr mi iSqni mim mbar bit lHm aSr bSer : oibqeo SlSt hgbrim bmHnh plStim oiSabo mim mbar bit lHm aSr bSer oiSao oibao al dod ola abh lStotm oisk atm lihoh : oiamr Hlilh li ihoh meSti cat hdm hanSim hhlkim bnpSotm ola abh lStotm alh eSo SlSt hgbrim : oabiSi aHi ioab bn zroih hoa raS hSlSi ohoa eorr at Hnito el SlS maot Hll olo Sm bSlSh : mn hSlSh hki nkbd oihi lhm lSr oed hSlSh la ba : obniho bn ihoide bn aiS Hi rb pelim mqbzal hoa hkh at Sni aral moab ohoa ird ohkh at harih btok hbar biom hSlg : ohoa hkh at aiS mzri aSr mrah obid hmzri Hnit oird alio bSbT oigcl at hHnit mid hmzri oihrgho bHnito : alh eSh bniho bn ihoide olo Sm bSlSh hgbrim : mn hSlSim nkbd oal hSlSh la ba oiSmho dod al mSmeto : eSh al aHi ioab bSlSim alHnn bn ddo bit lHm : Smh hHrdi aliqa hHrdi : Hlz hplTi eira bn eqS htqoei : abiecr hentti mbni hHSti : zlmon haHHi mhri hnTpti : Hlb bn benh hnTpti ati bn ribi mgbet bni bnimn : bniho pretni hdi mnHli geS : abi elbon herbti ecmot hbrHmi : aliHba hSelbni bni iSn ihontn : Smh hhrri aHiam bn Srr harri : aliplT bn aHsbi bn hmekti aliem bn aHitpl hglni : Hzro hkrmli peri harbi : igal bn ntn mzbh bni hgdi : zlq hemni nHri hbarti nSai kli ioab bn zrih : eira hitri grb hitri : aorih hHti kl SlSim oSbeh :

24

oisp ap ihoh lHrot biSral oist at dod bhm lamr lk mnh at iSral oat ihodh : oiamr hmlk al ioab Sr hHil aSr ato SoT na bkl SbTi iSral mdn oed bar Sbe opqdo at hem oideti at mspr hem : oiamr ioab al hmlk oiosp ihoh alhik al hem khm okhm mah pemim oeini adni hmlk raot oadni hmlk lmh Hpz bdbr hch : oiHcq dbr hmlk al ioab oel Sri hHil oiza ioab oSri hHil lpni hmlk lpqd at hem at iSral : oiebro at hirdn oiHno beroer imin heir aSr btok hnHl hgd oal iecr : oibao hgledh oal arz tHtim HdSi oibao dnh ien osbib al zidon : oibao mbzr zr okl eri hHoi ohkneni oizao al ngb ihodh bar Sbe : oiSTo bkl harz oibao mqzh tSeh HdSim oeSrim iom iroSlm : oitn ioab at mspr mpqd hem al hmlk othi iSral Smnh maot alp aiS Hil Slp Hrb oaiS ihodh HmS maot alp aiS : oik lb dod ato aHri kn spr at hem oiamr dod al ihoh HTati mad aSr eSiti oeth ihoh hebr na at eon ebdk ki nsklti mad : oiqm dod bbqr odbr ihoh hih al gd hnbia Hch dod lamr : hlok odbrt al dod kh amr ihoh SlS anki noTl elik bHr lk aHt mhm oaeSh lk : oiba gd al dod oigd lo oiamr lo htboa lk Sbe Snim reb barzk am SlSh HdSim nsk lpni zrik ohoa rdpk oam hiot SlSt imim dbr barzk eth de orah mh aSib SlHi dbr : oiamr dod al gd zr li mad nplh na bid ihoh ki rbim rHmo obid adm al aplh : oitn ihoh dbr biSral mhbqr oed et moed oimt mn hem mdn oed bar Sbe Sbeim alp aiS : oiSlH ido hmlak iroSlm lSHth oinHm ihoh al hreh oiamr lmlak hmSHit bem rb eth hrp idk omlak ihoh hih em grn haornh hibsi : oiamr dod al ihoh brato at hmlak hmkh bem oiamr hnh anki HTati oanki heoiti oalh hzan mh eSo thi na idk bi obbit abi : oiba gd al dod biom hhoa oiamr lo elh hqm lihoh mcbH bgrn arnih hibsi : oiel dod kdbr gd kaSr zoh ihoh : oiSqp aronh oira at hmlk oat ebdio ebrim elio oiza aronh oiStHo lmlk apio arzh : oiamr aronh mdoe ba adni hmlk al ebdo oiamr dod lqnot memk at hgrn lbnot mcbH lihoh otezr hmgph mel hem : oiamr aronh al dod iqH oiel adni hmlk hTob beino rah hbqr lelh ohmrgim okli hbqr lezim : hkl ntn aronh hmlk lmlk oiamr aronh al hmlk ihoh alhik irzk : oiamr hmlk al aronh la ki qno aqnh maotk bmHir ola aelh lihoh alhi elot Hnm oiqn dod at hgrn oat hbqr bksp Sqlim HmSim : oibn Sm dod mcbH lihoh oiel elot oSlmim oietr ihoh larz otezr hmgph mel iSral :

mlkim a

1

ohmlk dod cqn ba bimim oiksho bbgdim ola iHm lo : oiamro lo ebdio ibqSo ladni hmlk nerh btolh oemdh lpni hmlk othi lo sknt oSkbh bHiqk oHm ladni hmlk : oibqSo nerh iph bkl gbol iSral oimzao at abiSg hSonmit oibao ath lmlk : ohnerh iph ed mad othi lmlk sknt otSrtho ohmlk la ideh : oadnih bn Hgit mtnSa lamr ani amlk oieS lo rkb oprSim oHmSim aiS rzim lpnio : ola ezbo abio mimio lamr mdoe kkh eSit ogm hoa Tob tar mad oato ildh aHri abSlom : oihio dbrio em ioab bn zroih oem abitr hkhn oiecro aHri adnih : ozdoq hkhn obniho bn ihoide ontn hnbia oSmei orei ohgborim aSr ldod la hio em adniho : oicbH adniho zan obqr omria em abn hcHlt aSr azl ein rgl oiqra at kl aHio bni hmlk olkl anSi ihodh ebdi hmlk : oat ntn hnbia obniho oat hgborim oat Slmh aHio la qra : oiamr ntn al bt Sbe am Slmh lamr hloa Smet ki mlk adniho bn Hgit oadnino dod la ide : oeth lki aiezk na ezh omlTi at npSk oat npS bnk Slmh : lki obai al hmlk dod oamrt alio hla ath adni hmlk nSbet lamtk lamr ki Slmh bnk imlk aHri ohoa iSb el ksai omdoe mlk adniho : hnh eodk mdbrt Sm em hmlk oani aboa aHrik omlati at dbrik : otba bt Sbe al hmlk hHdrh ohmlk cqn mad oabiSg hSonmit mSrt at hmlk : otqd bt Sbe otStHo lmlk oiamr hmlk mh lk : otamr lo adni ath nSbet bihoh alhik lamtk ki Slmh bnk imlk aHri ohoa iSb el ksai : oeth hnh adnih mlk oeth adni hmlk la idet : oicbH Sor omria ozan lrb oiqra lkl bni hmlk olabitr hkhn oliab Sr hzba olSlmh ebdk la qra : oath adni hmlk eini kl iSral elik lhgid lhm mi iSb el ksa adni hmlk aHrio : ohih kSkb adni hmlk em abtio ohiiti ani obni Slmh HTaim : ohnh eodnh mdbrt em hmlk ontn hnbia ba : oigido lmlk lamr hnh ntn hnbia oiba lpni hmlk oiStHo lmlk el apio arzh : oiamr ntn adni hmlk ath amrt adniho imlk aHri ohoa iSb el ksai : ki ird hiom oicbH Sor omria ozan lrb oiqra lkl bni hmlk olSri hzba olabitr hkhn ohnm aklim oStim lpnio oiamro iHi hmlk adniho : oli ani ebdk olzdq hkhn olbniho bn ihoide olSlmh ebdk la qra : am mat adni hmlk nhih hdbr hch ola hodet at ebdik mi iSb el ksa adni hmlk aHrio : oien hmlk dod oiamr qrao li lbt Sbe otba lpni hmlk otemd lpni hmlk : oiSbe hmlk oiamr Hi ihoh aSr pdh at npSi mkl zrh : ki kaSr nSbeti lk bihoh alhi iSral lamr ki Slmh bnk imlk aHri ohoa iSb el ksai tHti ki kn aeSh hiom hch : otqd bt Sbe apim arz otStHo lmlk otamr iHi adni hmlk dod lelm : oiamr hmlk dod qrao li lzdoq hkhn olntn hnbia olbniho bn ihoide oibao lpni hmlk : oiamr hmlk lhm qHo emkm at ebdi adnikm ohrkbtm at Slmh bni el hprdh aSr li ohordtm ato al gHon : omSH ato Sm zdoq hkhn ontn hnbia lmlk el iSral otqetm bSopr oamrtm iHi hmlk Slmh : oelitm aHrio oba oiSb el ksai ohoa imlk tHti oato zoiti lhiot ngid el iSral oel ihodh : oien bniho bn ihoide at hmlk oiamr amn kn iamr ihoh alhi adni hmlk : kaSr hih ihoh em adni hmlk kn ihi em Slmh oigdl at ksao mksa adni hmlk dod : oird zdoq hkhn ontn hnbia obniho bn ihoide ohkrti ohplti oirkbo at Slmh el prdt hmlk dod oilko ato el gHon : oiqH zdoq hkhn at qrn hSmn mn hahl oimSH at Slmh oitqeo bSopr oiamro kl hem iHi hmlk Slmh : oielo kl hem aHrio ohem mHllim bHllim oSmHim SmHh gdolh otbqe harz bqolm : oiSme adniho okl hqraim aSr ato ohm klo lakl oiSme ioab at qol hSopr oiamr mdoe qol hqrih homh : eodno mdbr ohnh iontn bn abitr hkhn ba oiamr adniho ba ki aiS Hil ath oTob tbSr : oien iontn oiamr ladniho abl adnino hmlk dod hmlik at Slmh : oiSlH ato hmlk at zdoq hkhn oat ntn hnbia obniho bn ihoide ohkrti ohplti oirkbo ato el prdt hmlk : oimSHo ato zdoq hkhn ontn hnbia lmlk bgHon oielo mSm SmHim othm hqrih hoa hqol aSr Smetm : ogm iSb Slmh el ksa hmlokh : ogm bao ebdi hmlk lbrk at adnino hmlk dod lamr iiTb alhik at Sm Slmh mSmk oigdl at ksao mksak oiStHo hmlk el hmSkb : ogm kkh amr hmlk brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr ntn hiom iSb el ksai oeini raot : oiHrdo oiqmo kl hqraim aSr ladniho oilko aiS ldrko : oadniho ira mpni Slmh oiqm oilk oiHcq bqrnot hmcbH : oigd lSlmh lamr hnh adniho ira at hmlk Slmh ohnh aHc bqrnot hmcbH lamr iSbe li kiom hmlk Slmh am imit at ebdo bHrb : oiamr Slmh am ihih lbn Hil la ipl mSerto arzh oam reh tmza bo omt : oiSlH hmlk Slmh oirdho mel hmcbH oiba oiStHo lmlk Slmh oiamr lo Slmh lk lbitk :

2

oiqrbo imi dod lmot oizo at Slmh bno lamr : anki hlk bdrk kl harz oHcqt ohiit laiS : oSmrt at mSmrt ihoh alhik llkt bdrkio lSmr Hqtio mzotio omSpTio oedotio kktob btort mSh lmen tSkil at kl aSr teSh oat kl aSr tpnh Sm : lmen iqim ihoh at dbro aSr dbr eli lamr am iSmro bnik at drkm llkt lpni bamt bkl lbbm obkl npSm lamr la ikrt lk aiS mel ksa iSral : ogm ath idet at aSr eSh li ioab bn zroih aSr eSh lSni Sri zbaot iSral labnr bn nr olemSa bn itr oihrgm oiSm dmi mlHmh bSlm oitn dmi mlHmh bHgrto aSr bmtnio obnelo aSr brglio : oeSit kHkmtk ola tord Sibto bSlm Sal : olbni brcli hgledi teSh Hsd ohio bakli SlHnk ki kn qrbo ali bbrHi mpni abSlom aHik : ohnh emk Smei bn gra bn himini mbHrim ohoa qllni qllh nmrzt biom lkti mHnim ohoa ird lqrati hirdn oaSbe lo bihoh lamr am amitk bHrb : oeth al tnqho ki aiS Hkm ath oidet at aSr teSh lo ohordt at Sibto bdm Saol : oiSkb dod em abtio oiqbr beir dod : ohimim aSr mlk dod el iSral arbeim Snh bHbron mlk Sbe Snim obiroSlm mlk SlSim oSlS Snim : oSlmh iSb el ksa dod abio otkn mlkto mad : oiba adniho bn Hgit al bt Sbe am Slmh otamr hSlom bak oiamr Slom : oiamr dbr li alik otamr dbr : oiamr at idet ki li hith hmlokh oeli Smo kl iSral pnihm lmlk otsb hmlokh othi laHi ki mihoh hith lo : oeth Salh aHt anki Sal matk al tSbi at pni otamr alio dbr : oiamr amri na lSlmh hmlk ki la iSib at pnik oitn li at abiSg hSonmit laSh : otamr bt Sbe Tob anki adbr elik al hmlk : otba bt Sbe al hmlk Slmh ldbr lo el adniho oiqm hmlk lqrath oiStHo lh oiSb el ksao oiSm ksa lam hmlk otSb limino : otamr Salh aHt qTnh anki Salt matk al tSb at pni oiamr lh hmlk Sali ami ki la aSib at pnik : otamr itn at abiSg hSnmit ladniho aHik laSh : oien hmlk Slmh oiamr lamo olmh at Salt at abiSg hSnmit ladniho oSali lo at hmlokh ki hoa aHi hgdol mmni olo olabitr hkhn olioab bn zroih : oiSbe hmlk Slmh bihoh lamr kh ieSh li alhim okh iosip ki bnpSo dbr adniho at hdbr hch : oeth Hi ihoh aSr hkinni oioSibini el ksa dod abi oaSr eSh li bit kaSr dbr ki hiom iomt adniho : oiSlH hmlk Slmh bid bniho bn ihoide oipge bo oimt : olabitr hkhn amr hmlk entt lk el Sdik ki aiS mot ath obiom hch la amitk ki nSat at aron adni ihoh lpni dod abi oki htenit bkl aSr htenh abi : oigrS Slmh at abitr mhiot khn lihoh lmla at dbr ihoh aSr dbr el bit eli bSlh : ohSmeh bah ed ioab ki ioab nTh aHri adnih oaHri abSlom la nTh oins ioab al ahl ihoh oiHcq bqrnot hmcbH : oigd lmlk Slmh ki ns ioab al ahl ihoh ohnh azl hmcbH oiSlH Slmh at bniho bn ihoide lamr lk pge bo : oiba bniho al ahl ihoh oiamr alio kh amr hmlk za oiamr la ki ph amot oiSb bniho at hmlk dbr lamr kh dbr ioab okh enni : oiamr lo hmlk eSh kaSr dbr opge bo oqbrto ohsirt dmi Hnm aSr Spk ioab meli omel bit abi : ohSib ihoh at dmo el raSo aSr pge bSni anSim zdqim oTbim mmno oihrgm bHrb oabi dod la ide at abnr bn nr Sr zba iSral oat emSa bn itr Sr zba ihodh : oSbo dmihm braS ioab obraS creo lelm oldod olcreo olbito olksao ihih Slom ed eolm mem ihoh : oiel bniho bn ihoide oipge bo oimtho oiqbr bbito bmdbr : oitn hmlk at bniho bn ihoide tHtio el hzba oat zdoq hkhn ntn hmlk tHt abitr : oiSlH hmlk oiqra lSmei oiamr lo bnh lk bit biroSlm oiSbt Sm ola tza mSm anh oanh : ohih biom zatk oebrt at nHl qdron ide tde ki mot tmot dmk ihih braSk : oiamr Smei lmlk Tob hdbr kaSr dbr adni hmlk kn ieSh ebdk oiSb Smei biroSlm imim rbim : oihi mqz SlS Snim oibrHo Sni ebdim lSmei al akiS bn mekh mlk gt oigido lSmei lamr hnh ebdik bgt : oiqm Smei oiHbS at Hmro oilk gth al akiS lbqS at ebdio oilk Smei oiba at ebdio mgt : oigd lSlmh ki hlk Smei miroSlm gt oiSb : oiSlH hmlk oiqra lSmei oiamr alio hloa hSbetik bihoh oaed bk lamr biom zatk ohlkt anh oanh ide tde ki mot tmot otamr ali Tob hdbr Smeti : omdoe la Smrt at Sbet ihoh oat hmzoh aSr zoiti elik : oiamr hmlk al Smei ath idet at kl hreh aSr ide lbbk aSr eSit ldod abi ohSib ihoh at retk braSk : ohmlk Slmh brok oksa dod ihih nkon lpni ihoh ed eolm : oizo hmlk at bniho bn ihoide oiza oipge bo oimt ohmmlkh nkonh bid Slmh :

3

oitHtn Slmh at preh mlk mzrim oiqH at bt preh oibiah al eir dod ed klto lbnot at bito oat bit ihoh oat Homt iroSlm sbib : rq hem mcbHim bbmot ki la nbnh bit lSm ihoh ed himim hhm : oiahb Slmh at ihoh llkt bHqot dod abio rq bbmot hoa mcbH omqTir : oilk hmlk gbenh lcbH Sm ki hia hbmh hgdolh alp elot ielh Slmh el hmcbH hhoa : bgbeon nrah ihoh al Slmh bHlom hlilh oiamr alhim Sal mh atn lk : oiamr Slmh ath eSit em ebdk dod abi Hsd gdol kaSr hlk lpnik bamt obzdqh obiSrt lbb emk otSmr lo at hHsd hgdol hch ottn lo bn iSb el ksao kiom hch : oeth ihoh alhi ath hmlkt at ebdk tHt dod abi oanki ner qTn la ade zat oba : oebdk btok emk aSr bHrt em rb aSr la imnh ola ispr mrb : ontt lebdk lb Sme lSpT at emk lhbin bin Tob lre ki mi iokl lSpT at emk hkbd hch : oiiTb hdbr beini adni ki Sal Slmh at hdbr hch : oiamr alhim alio ien aSr Salt at hdbr hch ola Salt lk imim rbim ola Salt lk eSr ola Salt npS aibik oSalt lk hbin lSme mSpT : hnh eSiti kdbrik hnh ntti lk lb Hkm onbon aSr kmok la hih lpnik oaHrik la iqom kmok : ogm aSr la Salt ntti lk gm eSr gm kbod aSr la hih kmok aiS bmlkim kl imik : oam tlk bdrki lSmr Hqi omzoti kaSr hlk doid abik oharkti at imik : oiqz Slmh ohnh Hlom oiboa iroSlm oiemd lpni aron brit adni oiel elot oieS Slmim oieS mSth lkl ebdio : ac tbanh Stim nSim cnot al hmlk otemdnh lpnio : otamr haSh haHt bi adni ani ohaSh hcat iSbt bbit aHd oald emh bbit : oihi biom hSliSi lldti otld gm haSh hcat oanHno iHdo ain cr atno bbit colti Stim anHno bbit : oimt bn haSh hcat lilh aSr Skbh elio : otqm btok hlilh otqH at bni mazli oamtk iSnh otSkibho bHiqh oat bnh hmt hSkibh bHiqi : oaqm bbqr lhiniq at bni ohnh mt oatbonn alio bbqr ohnh la hih bni aSr ildti : otamr haSh haHrt la ki bni hHi obnk hmt ocat amrt la ki bnk hmt obni hHi otdbrnh lpni hmlk : oiamr hmlk cat amrt ch bni hHi obnk hmt ocat amrt la ki bnk hmt obni hHi : oiamr hmlk qHo li Hrb oibao hHrb lpni hmlk : oiamr hmlk gcro at hild hHi lSnim otno at hHzi laHt oat hHzi laHt : otamr haSh aSr bnh hHi al hmlk ki nkmro rHmih el bnh otamr bi adni tno lh at hilod hHi ohmt al tmitho ocat amrt gm li gm lk la ihih gcro : oien hmlk oiamr tno lh at hilod hHi ohmt la tmitho hia amo : oiSmeo kl iSral at hmSpT aSr SpT hmlk oirao mpni hmlk ki rao ki Hkmt alhim bqrbo leSot mSpT :

4

oihi hmlk Slmh mlk el kl iSral : oalh hSrim aSr lo ecriho bn zdoq hkhn : aliHrp oaHih bni SiSa sprim ihoSpT bn aHilod hmckir : obniho bn ihoide el hzba ozdoq oabitr khnim : oecriho bn ntn el hnzbim ocbod bn ntn khn reh hmlk : oaHiSr el hbit oadnirm bn ebda el hms : olSlmh Snim eSr nzbim el kl iSral oklklo at hmlk oat bito HdS bSnh ihih el aHd lklkl : oalh Smotm bn Hor bhr aprim : bn dqr bmqz obSelbim obit SmS oailon bit Hnn : bn Hsd barbot lo Skh okl arz Hpr : bn abindb kl npt dar Tpt bt Slmh hith lo laSh : bena bn aHilod tenk omgdo okl bit San aSr azl zrtnh mtHt licreal mbit San ed abl mHolh ed mebr liqmem : bn gbr brmt gled lo Hot iair bn mnSh aSr bgled lo Hbl argb aSr bbSn SSim erim gdlot Homh obriH nHSt : aHindb bn eda mHnimh : aHimez bnptli gm hoa lqH at bSmt bt Slmh laSh : bena bn HoSi baSr obelot : ihoSpT bn proH biSSkr : Smei bn ala bbnimn : gbr bn ari barz gled arz siHon mlk hamri oeg mlk hbSn onzib aHd aSr barz : ihodh oiSral rbim kHol aSr el him lrb aklim oStim oSmHim : oSlmh hih moSl bkl hmmlkot mn hnhr arz plStim oed gbol mzrim mgSim mnHh oebdim at Slmh kl imi Hiio : oihi lHm Slmh liom aHd SlSim kr slt oSSim kr qmH : eSrh bqr braim oeSrim bqr rei omah zan lbd mail ozbi oiHmor obrbrim abosim : ki hoa rdh bkl ebr hnhr mtpsH oed ech bkl mlki ebr hnhr oSlom hih lo mkl ebrio msbib : oiSb ihodh oiSral lbTH aiS tHt gpno otHt tanto mdn oed bar Sbe kl imi Slmh : oihi lSlmh arbeim alp arot sosim lmrkbo oSnim eSr alp prSim : oklklo hnzbim halh at hmlk Slmh oat kl hqrb al SlHn hmlk Slmh aiS HdSo la iedro dbr : ohSerim ohtbn lsosim olrkS ibao al hmqom aSr ihih Sm aiS kmSpTo : oitn alhim Hkmh lSlmh otbonh hrbh mad orHb lb kHol aSr el Spt him : otrb Hkmt Slmh mHkmt kl bni qdm omkl Hkmt mzrim : oiHkm mkl hadm maitn hacrHi ohimn oklkl odrde bni mHol oihi Smo bkl hgoim sbib : oidbr SlSt alpim mSl oihi Siro HmSh oalp : oidbr el hezim mn harc aSr blbnon oed hacob aSr iza bqir oidbr el hbhmh oel heop oel hrmS oel hdgim : oibao mkl hemim lSme at Hkmt Slmh mat kl mlki harz aSr Smeo at Hkmto :

5

oiSlH Hirm mlk zor at ebdio al Slmh ki Sme ki ato mSHo lmlk tHt abiho ki ahb hih Hirm ldod kl himim : oiSlH Slmh al Hirm lamr : ath idet at dod abi ki la ikl lbnot bit lSm ihoh alhio mpni hmlHmh aSr sbbho ed tt ihoh atm tHt kpot rglo : oeth hniH ihoh alhi li msbib ain STn oain pge re : ohnni amr lbnot bit lSm ihoh alhi kaSr dbr ihoh al dod abi lamr bnk aSr atn tHtik el ksak hoa ibnh hbit lSmi : oeth zoh oikrto li arcim mn hlbnon oebdi ihio em ebdik oSkr ebdik atn lk kkl aSr tamr ki ath idet ki ain bno aiS ide lkrt ezim kzdnim : oihi kSme Hirm at dbri Slmh oiSmH mad oiamr brok ihoh hiom aSr ntn ldod bn Hkm el hem hrb hch : oiSlH Hirm al Slmh lamr Smeti at aSr SlHt ali ani aeSh at kl Hpzk bezi arcim obezi broSim : ebdi irdo mn hlbnon imh oani aSimm dbrot bim ed hmqom aSr tSlH ali onpztim Sm oath tSa oath teSh at Hpzi ltt lHm biti : oihi Hirom ntn lSlmh ezi arcim oezi broSim kl Hpzo : oSlmh ntn lHirm eSrim alp kr HTim mklt lbito oeSrim kr Smn ktit kh itn Slmh lHirm Snh bSnh : oihoh ntn Hkmh lSlmh kaSr dbr lo oihi Slm bin Hirm obin Slmh oikrto brit Snihm : oiel hmlk Slmh ms mkl iSral oihi hms SlSim alp aiS : oiSlHm lbnonh eSrt alpim bHdS Hlipot HdS ihio blbnon Snim HdSim bbito oadnirm el hms : oihi lSlmh Sbeim alp nSa sbl oSmnim alp Hzb bhr : lbd mSri hnzbim lSlmh aSr el hmlakh SlSt alpim oSlS maot hrdim bem heSim bmlakh : oizo hmlk oiseo abnim gdlot abnim iqrot lisd hbit abni gcit : oipslo bni Slmh obni Hirom ohgblim oikino hezim ohabnim lbnot hbit :

6

oihi bSmonim Snh oarbe maot Snh lzat bni iSral marz mzrim bSnh hrbieit bHdS co hoa hHdS hSni lmlk Slmh el iSral oibn hbit lihoh : ohbit aSr bnh hmlk Slmh lihoh SSim amh arko oeSrim rHbo oSlSim amh qomto : ohaolm el pni hikl hbit eSrim amh arko el pni rHb hbit eSr bamh rHbo el pni hbit : oieS lbit Hloni Sqpim aTmim : oibn el qir hbit izoe sbib at qirot hbit sbib lhikl oldbir oieS zleot sbib : hizoe htHtnh HmS bamh rHbh ohtiknh SS bamh rHbh ohSliSit Sbe bamh rHbh ki mgreot ntn lbit sbib Hozh lblti aHc bqirot hbit : ohbit bhbnto abn Slmh mse nbnh omqbot ohgrcn kl kli brcl la nSme bbit bhbnto : ptH hzle htiknh al ktp hbit himnit oblolim ielo el htiknh omn htiknh al hSlSim : oibn at hbit oiklho oispn at hbit gbim oSdrt barcim : oibn at hizoe el kl hbit HmS amot qomto oiaHc at hbit bezi arcim : oihi dbr ihoh al Slmh lamr : hbit hch aSr ath bnh am tlk bHqti oat mSpTi teSh oSmrt at kl mzoti llkt bhm ohqmti at dbri atk aSr dbrti al dod abik : oSknti btok bni iSral ola aecb at emi iSral : oibn Slmh at hbit oiklho : oibn at qirot hbit mbith bzleot arcim mqrqe hbit ed qirot hspn zph ez mbit oizp at qrqe hbit bzleot broSim : oibn at eSrim amh mirkoti hbit bzleot arcim mn hqrqe ed hqirot oibn lo mbit ldbir lqdS hqdSim : oarbeim bamh hih hbit hoa hhikl lpni : oarc al hbit pnimh mqlet pqeim opTori zzim hkl arc ain abn nrah : odbir btok hbit mpnimh hkin lttn Sm at aron brit ihoh : olpni hdbir eSrim amh ark oeSrim amh rHb oeSrim amh qomto oizpho chb sgor oizp mcbH arc : oizp Slmh at hbit mpnimh chb sgor oiebr brtiqot chb lpni hdbir oizpho chb : oat kl hbit zph chb ed tm kl hbit okl hmcbH aSr ldbir zph chb : oieS bdbir Sni krobim ezi Smn eSr amot qomto : oHmS amot knp hkrob haHt oHmS amot knp hkrob hSnit eSr amot mqzot knpio oed qzot knpio : oeSr bamh hkrob hSni mdh aHt oqzb aHd lSni hkrbim : qomt hkrob haHd eSr bamh okn hkrob hSni : oitn at hkrobim btok hbit hpnimi oiprSo at knpi hkrbim otge knp haHd bqir oknp hkrob hSni nget bqir hSni oknpihm al tok hbit nget knp al knp : oizp at hkrobim chb : oat kl qirot hbit msb qle ptoHi mqleot krobim otmrt opTori zzim mlpnim olHizon : oat qrqe hbit zph chb lpnimh olHizon : oat ptH hdbir eSh dltot ezi Smn hail mcocot HmSit : oSti dltot ezi Smn oqle elihm mqleot krobim otmrot opTori zzim ozph chb oird el hkrobim oel htmrot at hchb : okn eSh lptH hhikl mcocot ezi Smn mat rbeit : oSti dltot ezi broSim Sni zleim hdlt haHt glilim oSni qleim hdlt hSnit glilim : oqle krobim otmrot opTri zzim ozph chb miSr el hmHqh : oibn at hHzr hpnimit SlSh Tori gcit oTor krtt arcim : bSnh hrbieit isd bit ihoh birH co : obSnh haHt eSrh birH bol hoa hHdS hSmini klh hbit lkl dbrio olkl mSpTo oibnho Sbe Snim :

7

oat bito bnh Slmh SlS eSrh Snh oikl at kl bito : oibn at bit ier hlbnon mah amh arko oHmSim amh rHbo oSlSim amh qomto el arbeh Tori emodi arcim okrtot arcim el hemodim : ospn barc mmel el hzlet aSr el hemodim arbeim oHmSh HmSh eSr hTor : oSqpim SlSh Torim omHch al mHch SlS pemim : okl hptHim ohmcocot rbeim Sqp omol mHch al mHch SlS pemim : oat aolm hemodim eSh HmSim amh arko oSlSim amh rHbo oaolm el pnihm oemdim oeb el pnihm : oaolm hksa aSr iSpT Sm alm hmSpT eSh ospon barc mhqrqe ed hqrqe : obito aSr iSb Sm Hzr haHrt mbit laolm kmeSh hch hih obit ieSh lbt preh aSr lqH Slmh kaolm hch : kl alh abnim iqrt kmdt gcit mgrrot bmgrh mbit omHoz ommsd ed hTpHot omHoz ed hHzr hgdolh : omisd abnim iqrot abnim gdlot abni eSr amot oabni Smnh amot : omlmelh abnim iqrot kmdot gcit oarc : oHzr hgdolh sbib SlSh Torim gcit oTor krtt arcim olHzr bit ihoh hpnimit olalm hbit : oiSlH hmlk Slmh oiqH at Hirm mzr : bn aSh almnh hoa mmTh nptli oabio aiS zri HrS nHSt oimla at hHkmh oat htbonh oat hdet leSot kl
