mlakh bnHSt oiboa al hmlk Slmh oieS at kl mlakto : oizr at Sni hemodim nHSt Smnh eSrh amh qomt hemod haHd oHoT Stim eSrh amh isb at hemod hSni : oSti ktrt eSh ltt el raSi hemodim mzq nHSt HmS amot qomt hktrt haHt oHmS amot qomt hktrt hSnit : Sbkim meSh Sbkh gdlim meSh SrSrot lktrt aSr el raS hemodim Sbeh lktrt haHt oSbeh lktrt hSnit : oieS at hemodim oSni Torim sbib el hSbkh haHt lksot at hktrt aSr el raS hrmnim okn eSh lktrt hSnit : oktrt aSr el raS hemodim meSh SoSn baolm arbe amot : oktrt el Sni hemodim gm mmel mlemt hbTn aSr lebr Sbkh ohrmonim matim Trim sbib el hktrt hSnit : oiqm at hemdim lalm hhikl oiqm at hemod himni oiqra at Smo ikin oiqm at hemod hSmali oiqra at Smo bec : oel raS hemodim meSh SoSn ottm mlakt hemodim : oieS at him mozq eSr bamh mSpto ed Spto egl sbib oHmS bamh qomto oqoh SlSim bamh isb ato sbib : opqeim mtHt lSpto sbib sbbim ato eSr bamh mqpim at him sbib Sni Torim hpqeim izqim bizqto : emd el Sni eSr bqr SlSh pnim zponh oSlSh pnim imh oSlSh pnim ngbh oSlSh pnim mcrHh ohim elihm mlmelh okl aHrihm bith : oebio TpH oSpto kmeSh Spt kos prH SoSn alpim bt ikil : oieS at hmknot eSr nHSt arbe bamh ark hmkonh haHt oarbe bamh rHbh oSlS bamh qomth : och meSh hmkonh msgrt lhm omsgrt bin hSlbim : oel hmsgrot aSr bin hSlbim ariot bqr okrobim oel hSlbim kn mmel omtHt lariot olbqr liot meSh mord : oarbeh aopni nHSt lmkonh haHt osrni nHSt oarbeh pemtio ktpt lhm mtHt lkir hktpt izqot mebr aiS liot : opiho mbit lktrt omelh bamh opih egl meSh kn amh oHzi hamh ogm el pih mqleot omsgrtihm mrbeot la eglot : oarbet haopnim lmtHt lmsgrot oidot haopnim bmkonh oqomt haopn haHd amh oHzi hamh : omeSh haopnim kmeSh aopn hmrkbh idotm ogbihm oHSqihm oHSrihm hkl mozq : oarbe ktpot al arbe pnot hmknh haHt mn hmknh ktpih : obraS hmkonh Hzi hamh qomh egl sbib oel raS hmknh idtih omsgrtih mmnh : oiptH el hlHt idtih oel omsgrtih krobim ariot otmrt kmer aiS oliot sbib : kcat eSh at eSr hmknot mozq aHd mdh aHt qzb aHd lklhnh : oieS eSrh kirot nHSt arbeim bt ikil hkior haHd arbe bamh hkior haHd kior aHd el hmknh haHt leSr hmkonot : oitn at hmknot HmS el ktp hbit mimin oHmS el ktp hbit mSmalo oat him ntn mktp hbit himnit qdmh mmol ngb : oieS Hirom at hkirot oat hieim oat hmcrqot oikl Hirm leSot at kl hmlakh aSr eSh lmlk Slmh bit ihoh : emdim Snim oglt hktrt aSr el raS hemdim Stim ohSbkot Stim lksot at Sti glt hktrt aSr el raS hemodim : oat hrmnim arbe maot lSti hSbkot Sni Torim rmnim lSbkh haHt lksot at Sti glt hktrt aSr el pni hemodim : oat hmknot eSr oat hkirt eSrh el hmknot : oat him haHd oat hbqr Snim eSr tHt him : oat hsirot oat hieim oat hmcrqot oat kl hklim hahl aSr eSh Hirm lmlk Slmh bit ihoh nHSt mmrT : bkkr hirdn izqm hmlk bmebh hadmh bin skot obin zrtn : oinH Slmh at kl hklim mrb mad mad la nHqr mSql hnHSt : oieS Slmh at kl hklim aSr bit ihoh at mcbH hchb oat hSlHn aSr elio lHm hpnim chb : oat hmnrot HmS mimin oHmS mSmaol lpni hdbir chb sgor ohprH ohnrt ohmlqHim chb : ohspot ohmcmrot ohmcrqot ohkpot ohmHtot chb sgor ohptot ldltot hbit hpnimi lqdS hqdSim ldlti hbit lhikl chb : otSlm kl hmlakh aSr eSh hmlk Slmh bit ihoh oiba Slmh at qdSi dod abio at hksp oat hchb oat hklim ntn bazrot bit ihoh :

8

ac iqhl Slmh at cqni iSral at kl raSi hmTot nSiai habot lbni iSral al hmlk Slmh iroSlm lhelot at aron brit ihoh meir dod hia zion : oiqhlo al hmlk Slmh kl aiS iSral birH hatnim bHg hoa hHdS hSbiei : oibao kl cqni iSral oiSao hkhnim at haron : oielo at aron ihoh oat ahl moed oat kl kli hqdS aSr bahl oielo atm hkhnim ohloim : ohmlk Slmh okl edt iSral hnoedim elio ato lpni haron mcbHim zan obqr aSr la ispro ola imno mrb : oibao hkhnim at aron brit ihoh al mqomo al dbir hbit al qdS hqdSim al tHt knpi hkrobim : ki hkrobim prSim knpim al mqom haron oisko hkrbim el haron oel bdio mlmelh : oiarko hbdim oirao raSi hbdim mn hqdS el pni hdbir ola irao hHozh oihio Sm ed hiom hch : ain baron rq Sni lHot habnim aSr hnH Sm mSh bHrb aSr krt ihoh em bni iSral bzatm marz mzrim : oihi bzat hkhnim mn hqdS ohenn mla at bit ihoh : ola iklo hkhnim lemd lSrt mpni henn ki mla kbod ihoh at bit ihoh : ac amr Slmh ihoh amr lSkn berpl : bnh bniti bit cbl lk mkon lSbtk eolmim : oisb hmlk at pnio oibrk at kl qhl iSral okl qhl iSral emd : oiamr brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr dbr bpio at dod abi obido mla lamr : mn hiom aSr hozati at emi at iSral mmzrim la bHrti beir mkl SbTi iSral lbnot bit lhiot Smi Sm oabHr bdod lhiot el emi iSral : oihi em lbb dod abi lbnot bit lSm ihoh alhi iSral : oiamr ihoh al dod abi ien aSr hih em lbbk lbnot bit lSmi hTibt ki hih em lbbk : rq ath la tbnh hbit ki am bnk hiza mHlzik hoa ibnh hbit lSmi : oiqm ihoh at dbro aSr dbr oaqm tHt dod abi oaSb el ksa iSral kaSr dbr ihoh oabnh hbit lSm ihoh alhi iSral : oaSm Sm mqom laron aSr Sm brit ihoh aSr krt em abtino bhoziao atm marz mzrim : oiemd Slmh lpni mcbH ihoh ngd kl qhl iSral oiprS kpio hSmim : oiamr ihoh alhi iSral ain kmok alhim bSmim mmel oel harz mtHt Smr hbrit ohHsd lebdik hhlkim lpnik bkl lbm : aSr Smrt lebdk dod abi at aSr dbrt lo otdbr bpik obidk mlat kiom hch : oeth ihoh alhi iSral Smr lebdk dod abi at aSr dbrt lo lamr la ikrt lk aiS mlpni iSb el ksa iSral rq am iSmro bnik at drkm llkt lpni kaSr hlkt lpni : oeth alhi iSral iamn na dbrik aSr dbrt lebdk dod abi : ki hamnm iSb alhim el harz hnh hSmim oSmi hSmim la iklklok ap ki hbit hch aSr bniti : opnit al tplt ebdk oal tHnto ihoh alhi lSme al hrnh oal htplh aSr ebdk mtpll lpnik hiom : lhiot eink ptHot al hbit hch lilh oiom al hmqom aSr amrt ihih Smi Sm lSme al htplh aSr itpll ebdk al hmqom hch : oSmet al tHnt ebdk oemk iSral aSr itpllo al hmqom hch oath tSme al mqom Sbtk al hSmim oSmet oslHt : at aSr iHTa aiS lreho onSa bo alh lhalto oba alh lpni mcbHk bbit hch : oath tSme hSmim oeSit oSpTt at ebdik lhrSie rSe ltt drko braSo olhzdiq zdiq ltt lo kzdqto : bhngp emk iSral lpni aoib aSr iHTao lk oSbo alik ohodo at Smk ohtpllo ohtHnno alik bbit hch : oath tSme hSmim oslHt lHTat emk iSral ohSbtm al hadmh aSr ntt labotm : bhezr Smim ola ihih mTr ki iHTao lk ohtpllo al hmqom hch ohodo at Smk omHTatm iSobon ki tenm : oath tSme hSmim oslHt lHTat ebdik oemk iSral ki torm at hdrk hTobh aSr ilko bh ontth mTr el arzk aSr ntth lemk lnHlh : reb ki ihih barz dbr ki ihih Sdpon irqon arbh Hsil ki ihih ki izr lo aibo barz Serio kl nge kl mHlh : kl tplh kl tHnh aSr thih lkl hadm lkl emk iSral aSr ideon aiS nge lbbo oprS kpio al hbit hch : oath tSme hSmim mkon Sbtk oslHt oeSit ontt laiS kkl drkio aSr tde at lbbo ki ath idet lbdk at lbb kl bni hadm : lmen iraok kl himim aSr hm Hiim el pni hadmh aSr ntth labtino : ogm al hnkri aSr la memk iSral hoa oba marz rHoqh lmen Smk : ki iSmeon at Smk hgdol oat idk hHcqh ocrek hnToih oba ohtpll al hbit hch : ath tSme hSmim mkon Sbtk oeSit kkl aSr iqra alik hnkri lmen ideon kl emi harz at Smk lirah atk kemk iSral oldet ki Smk nqra el hbit hch aSr bniti : ki iza emk lmlHmh el aibo bdrk aSr tSlHm ohtpllo al ihoh drk heir aSr bHrt bh ohbit aSr bnti lSmk : oSmet hSmim at tpltm oat tHntm oeSit mSpTm : ki iHTao lk ki ain adm aSr la iHTa oanpt bm onttm lpni aoib oSbom Sbihm al arz haoib rHoqh ao qrobh : ohSibo al lbm barz aSr nSbo Sm oSbo ohtHnno alik barz Sbihm lamr HTano oheoino rSeno : oSbo alik bkl lbbm obkl npSm barz aibihm aSr Sbo atm ohtpllo alik drk arzm aSr ntth labotm heir aSr bHrt ohbit aSr bnit lSmk : oSmet hSmim mkon Sbtk at tpltm oat tHntm oeSit mSpTm : oslHt lemk aSr HTao lk olkl pSeihm aSr pSeo bk onttm lrHmim lpni Sbihm orHmom : ki emk onHltk hm aSr hozat mmzrim mtok kor hbrcl : lhiot einik ptHot al tHnt ebdk oal tHnt emk iSral lSme alihm bkl qram alik : ki ath hbdltm lk lnHlh mkl emi harz kaSr dbrt bid mSh ebdk bhoziak at abtino mmzrim adni ihoh : oihi kklot Slmh lhtpll al ihoh at kl htplh ohtHnh hcat qm mlpni mcbH ihoh mkre el brkio okpio prSot hSmim : oiemd oibrk at kl qhl iSral qol gdol lamr : brok ihoh aSr ntn mnoHh lemo iSral kkl aSr dbr la npl dbr aHd mkl dbro hTob aSr dbr bid mSh ebdo : ihi ihoh alhino emno kaSr hih em abtino al iecbno oal iTSno : lhTot lbbno alio llkt bkl drkio olSmr mzotio oHqio omSpTio aSr zoh at abtino : oihio dbri alh aSr htHnnti lpni ihoh qrbim al ihoh alhino iomm olilh leSot mSpT ebdo omSpT emo iSral dbr iom biomo : lmen det kl emi harz ki ihoh hoa halhim ain eod : ohih lbbkm Slm em ihoh alhino llkt bHqio olSmr mzotio kiom hch : ohmlk okl iSral emo cbHim cbH lpni ihoh : oicbH Slmh at cbH hSlmim aSr cbH lihoh bqr eSrim oSnim alp ozan mah oeSrim alp oiHnko at bit ihoh hmlk okl bni iSral : biom hhoa qdS hmlk at tok hHzr aSr lpni bit ihoh ki eSh Sm at helh oat hmnHh oat Hlbi hSlmim ki mcbH hnHSt aSr lpni ihoh qTn mhkil at helh oat hmnHh oat Hlbi hSlmim : oieS Slmh bet hhia at hHg okl iSral emo qhl gdol mlboa Hmt ed nHl mzrim lpni ihoh alhino Sbet imim oSbet imim arbeh eSr iom : biom hSmini SlH at hem oibrko at hmlk oilko lahlihm SmHim oTobi lb el kl hTobh aSr eSh ihoh ldod ebdo oliSral emo :

9

oihi kklot Slmh lbnot at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk oat kl HSq Slmh aSr Hpz leSot : oira ihoh al Slmh Snit kaSr nrah alio bgbeon : oiamr ihoh alio Smeti at tpltk oat tHntk aSr htHnnth lpni hqdSti at hbit hch aSr bnth lSom Smi Sm ed eolm ohio eini olbi Sm kl himim : oath am tlk lpni kaSr hlk dod abik btm lbb obiSr leSot kkl aSr zoitik Hqi omSpTi tSmr : ohqmti at ksa mmlktk el iSral lelm kaSr dbrti el dod abik lamr la ikrt lk aiS mel ksa iSral : am Sob tSbon atm obnikm maHri ola tSmro mzoti Hqti aSr ntti lpnikm ohlktm oebdtm alhim aHrim ohStHoitm lhm : ohkrti at iSral mel pni hadmh aSr ntti lhm oat hbit aSr hqdSti lSmi aSlH mel pni ohih iSral lmSl olSninh bkl hemim : ohbit hch ihih elion kl ebr elio iSm oSrq oamro el mh eSh ihoh kkh larz hcat olbit hch : oamro el aSr ecbo at ihoh alhihm aSr hozia at abtm marz mzrim oiHcqo balhim aHrim oiStHo lhm oiebdm el kn hbia ihoh elihm at kl hreh hcat : oihi mqzh eSrim Snh aSr bnh Slmh at Sni hbtim at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk : Hirm mlk zr nSa at Slmh bezi arcim obezi broSim obchb lkl Hpzo ac itn hmlk Slmh lHirm eSrim eir barz hglil : oiza Hirm mzr lraot at herim aSr ntn lo Slmh ola iSro beinio : oiamr mh herim halh aSr ntth li aHi oiqra lhm arz kbol ed hiom hch : oiSlH Hirm lmlk mah oeSrim kkr chb : och dbr hms aSr helh hmlk Slmh lbnot at bit ihoh oat bito oat hmloa oat Homt iroSlm oat Hzr oat mgdo oat gcr : preh mlk mzrim elh oilkd at gcr oiSrph baS oat hkneni hiSb beir hrg oitnh SlHim lbto aSt Slmh : oibn Slmh at gcr oat bit Hrn tHton : oat belt oat tmr bmdbr barz : oat kl eri hmsknot aSr hio lSlmh oat eri hrkb oat eri hprSim oat HSq Slmh aSr HSq lbnot biroSlm oblbnon obkl arz mmSlto : kl hem hnotr mn hamri hHti hprci hHoi ohibosi aSr la mbni iSral hmh : bnihm aSr ntro aHrihm barz aSr la iklo bni iSral lhHrimm oielm Slmh lms ebd ed hiom hch : ombni iSral la ntn Slmh ebd ki hm anSi hmlHmh oebdio oSrio oSlSio oSri rkbo oprSio : alh Sri hnzbim aSr el hmlakh lSlmh HmSim oHmS maot hrdim bem heSim bmlakh : ak bt preh elth meir dod al bith aSr bnh lh ac bnh at hmloa : ohelh Slmh SlS pemim bSnh elot oSlmim el hmcbH aSr bnh lihoh ohqTir ato aSr lpni ihoh oSlm at hbit : oani eSh hmlk Slmh bezion gbr aSr at alot el Spt im sop barz adom : oiSlH Hirm bani at ebdio anSi aniot idei him em ebdi Slmh : oibao aopirh oiqHo mSm chb arbe maot oeSrim kkr oibao al hmlk Slmh :

10

omlkt Sba Smet at Sme Slmh lSm ihoh otba lnsto bHidot : otba iroSlmh bHil kbd mad gmlim nSaim bSmim ochb rb mad oabn iqrh otba al Slmh otdbr alio at kl aSr hih em lbbh : oigd lh Slmh at kl dbrih la hih dbr nelm mn hmlk aSr la hgid lh : otra mlkt Sba at kl Hkmt Slmh ohbit aSr bnh : omakl SlHno omoSb ebdio omemd mSrto omlbSihm omSqio oelto aSr ielh bit ihoh ola hih bh eod roH : otamr al hmlk amt hih hdbr aSr Smeti barzi el dbrik oel Hkmtk : ola hamnti ldbrim ed aSr bati otrainh eini ohnh la hgd li hHzi hospt Hkmh oTob al hSmoeh aSr Smeti : aSri anSik aSri ebdik alh hemdim lpnik tmid hSmeim at Hkmtk : ihi ihoh alhik brok aSr Hpz bk lttk el ksa iSral bahbt ihoh at iSral lelm oiSimk lmlk leSot mSpT ozdqh : ottn lmlk mah oeSrim kkr chb obSmim hrbh mad oabn iqrh la ba kbSm hhoa eod lrb aSr ntnh mlkt Sba lmlk Slmh : ogm ani Hirm aSr nSa chb maopir hbia mapir ezi almgim hrbh mad oabn iqrh : oieS hmlk at ezi halmgim msed lbit ihoh olbit hmlk oknrot onblim lSrim la ba kn ezi almgim ola nrah ed hiom hch : ohmlk Slmh ntn lmlkt Sba at kl Hpzh aSr Salh mlbd aSr ntn lh kid hmlk Slmh otpn otlk larzh hia oebdih : oihi mSql hchb aSr ba lSlmh bSnh aHt SS maot SSim oSS kkr chb : lbd manSi htrim omsHr hrklim okl mlki herb opHot harz : oieS hmlk Slmh matim znh chb SHoT SS maot chb ielh el hznh haHt : oSlS maot mgnim chb SHoT SlSt mnim chb ielh el hmgn haHt oitnm hmlk bit ier hlbnon : oieS hmlk ksa Sn gdol oizpho chb mopc : SS melot lksh oraS egl lksh maHrio oidt mch omch al mqom hSbt oSnim ariot emdim azl hidot : oSnim eSr ariim emdim Sm el SS hmelot mch omch la neSh kn lkl mmlkot : okl kli mSqh hmlk Slmh chb okl kli bit ier hlbnon chb sgor ain ksp la nHSb bimi Slmh lmaomh : ki ani trSiS lmlk bim em ani Hirm aHt lSlS Snim tboa ani trSiS nSat chb oksp Snhbim oqpim otkiim : oigdl hmlk Slmh mkl mlki harz leSr olHkmh : okl harz mbqSim at pni Slmh lSme at Hkmto aSr ntn alhim blbo : ohmh mbaim aiS mnHto kli ksp okli chb oSlmot onSq obSmim sosim oprdim dbr Snh bSnh : oiasp Slmh rkb oprSim oihi lo alp oarbe maot rkb oSnim eSr alp prSim oinHm beri hrkb oem hmlk biroSlm : oitn hmlk at hksp biroSlm kabnim oat harcim ntn kSqmim aSr bSplh lrb : omoza hsosim aSr lSlmh mmzrim omqoh sHri hmlk iqHo mqoh bmHir : otelh otza mrkbh mmzrim bSS maot ksp osos bHmSim omah okn lkl mlki hHtim olmlki arm bidm izao :

11

ohmlk Slmh ahb nSim nkriot rbot oat bt preh moabiot emniot admit zdnit Htit : mn hgoim aSr amr ihoh al bni iSral la tbao bhm ohm la ibao bkm akn iTo at lbbkm aHri alhihm bhm dbq Slmh lahbh : oihi lo nSim Srot Sbe maot oplgSim SlS maot oiTo nSio at lbo : oihi let cqnt Slmh nSio hTo at lbbo aHri alhim aHrim ola hih lbbo Slm em ihoh alhio klbb doid abio : oilk Slmh aHri eStrt alhi zdnim oaHri mlkm Sqz emnim : oieS Slmh hre beini ihoh ola mla aHri ihoh kdod abio : ac ibnh Slmh bmh lkmoS Sqz moab bhr aSr el pni iroSlm olmlk Sqz bni emon : okn eSh lkl nSio hnkriot mqTirot omcbHot lalhihn : oitanp ihoh bSlmh ki nTh lbbo mem ihoh alhi iSral hnrah alio pemim : ozoh alio el hdbr hch lblti lkt aHri alhim aHrim ola Smr at aSr zoh ihoh : oiamr ihoh lSlmh ien aSr hith cat emk ola Smrt briti oHqti aSr zoiti elik qre aqre at hmmlkh melik onttih lebdk : ak bimik la aeSnh lmen dod abik mid bnk aqrenh : rq at kl hmmlkh la aqre SbT aHd atn lbnk lmen dod ebdi olmen iroSlm aSr bHrti : oiqm ihoh STn lSlmh at hdd hadmi mcre hmlk hoa badom : oihi bhiot dod at adom belot ioab Sr hzba lqbr at hHllim oik kl ckr badom : ki SSt HdSim iSb Sm ioab okl iSral ed hkrit kl ckr badom : oibrH add hoa oanSim admiim mebdi abio ato lboa mzrim ohdd ner qTn : oiqmo mmdin oibao parn oiqHo anSim emm mparn oibao mzrim al preh mlk mzrim oitn lo bit olHm amr lo oarz ntn lo : oimza hdd Hn beini preh mad oitn lo aSh at aHot aSto aHot tHpnis hgbirh : otld lo aHot tHpnis at gnbt bno otgmlho tHpns btok bit preh oihi gnbt bit preh btok bni preh : ohdd Sme bmzrim ki Skb dod em abtio oki mt ioab Sr hzba oiamr hdd al preh SlHni oalk al arzi : oiamr lo preh ki mh ath Hsr emi ohnk mbqS llkt al arzk oiamr la ki SlH tSlHni : oiqm alhim lo STn at rcon bn alide aSr brH mat hddecr mlk zobh adnio : oiqbz elio anSim oihi Sr gdod bhrg dod atm oilko dmSq oiSbo bh oimlko bdmSq : oihi STn liSral kl imi Slmh oat hreh aSr hdd oiqz biSral oimlk el arm : oirbem bn nbT aprti mn hzrdh oSm amo zroeh aSh almnh ebd lSlmh oirm id bmlk : och hdbr aSr hrim id bmlk Slmh bnh at hmloa sgr at prz eir dod abio : ohaiS irbem gbor Hil oira Slmh at hner ki eSh mlakh hoa oipqd ato lkl sbl bit iosp : oihi bet hhia oirbem iza miroSlm oimza ato aHih hSilni hnbia bdrk ohoa mtksh bSlmh HdSh oSnihm lbdm bSdh : oitpS aHih bSlmh hHdSh aSr elio oiqreh Snim eSr qreim : oiamr lirbem qH lk eSrh qreim ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hnni qre at hmmlkh mid Slmh ontti lk at eSrh hSbTim : ohSbT haHd ihih lo lmen ebdi dod olmen iroSlm heir aSr bHrti bh mkl SbTi iSral : ien aSr ecboni oiStHoo leStrt alhi zdnin lkmoS alhi moab olmlkm alhi bni emon ola hlko bdrki leSot hiSr beini oHqti omSpTi kdod abio : ola aqH at kl hmmlkh mido ki nSia aStno kl imi Hiio lmen dod ebdi aSr bHrti ato aSr Smr mzoti oHqti : olqHti hmlokh mid bno onttih lk at eSrt hSbTim : olbno atn SbT aHd lmen hiot nir ldoid ebdi kl himim lpni biroSlm heir aSr bHrti li lSom Smi Sm : oatk aqH omlkt bkl aSr taoh npSk ohiit mlk el iSral : ohih am tSme at kl aSr azok ohlkt bdrki oeSit hiSr beini lSmor Hqoti omzoti kaSr eSh dod ebdi ohiiti emk obniti lk bit namn kaSr bniti ldod ontti lk at iSral : oaenh at cre dod lmen cat ak la kl himim : oibqS Slmh lhmit at irbem oiqm irbem oibrH mzrim al SiSq mlk mzrim oihi bmzrim ed mot Slmh : oitr dbri Slmh okl aSr eSh oHkmto hloa hm ktbim el spr dbri Slmh : ohimim aSr mlk Slmh biroSlm el kl iSral arbeim Snh : oiSkb Slmh em abtio oiqbr beir dod abio oimlk rHbem bno tHtio :

12

oilk rHbem Skm ki Skm ba kl iSral lhmlik ato : oihi kSme irbem bn nbT ohoa eodno bmzrim aSr brH mpni hmlk Slmh oiSb irbem bmzrim : oiSlHo oiqrao lo oibao irbem okl qhl iSral oidbro al rHbem lamr : abik hqSh at elno oath eth hql mebdt abik hqSh omelo hkbd aSr ntn elino onebdk : oiamr alihm lko ed SlSh imim oSobo ali oilko hem : oioez hmlk rHbem at hcqnim aSr hio emdim at pni Slmh abio bhito Hi lamr aik atm noezim lhSib at hem hch dbr : oidbr alio lamr am hiom thih ebd lem hch oebdtm oenitm odbrt alihm dbrim Tobim ohio lk ebdim kl himim : oiecb at ezt hcqnim aSr iezho oioez at hildim aSr gdlo ato aSr hemdim lpnio : oiamr alihm mh atm noezim onSib dbr at hem hch aSr dbro ali lamr hql mn hel aSr ntn abik elino : oidbro alio hildim aSr gdlo ato lamr kh tamr lem hch aSr dbro alik lamr abik hkbid at elno oath hql melino kh tdbr alihm qTni ebh mmtni abi : oeth abi hemis elikm el kbd oani aosip el elkm abi isr atkm bSoTim oani aisr atkm beqrbim : oibo irbem okl hem al rHbem biom hSliSi kaSr dbr hmlk lamr Sobo ali biom hSliSi : oien hmlk at hem qSh oiecb at ezt hcqnim aSr iezho : oidbr alihm kezt hildim lamr abi hkbid at elkm oani asip el elkm abi isr atkm bSoTim oani aisr atkm beqrbim : ola Sme hmlk al hem ki hith sbh mem ihoh lmen hqim at dbro aSr dbr ihoh bid aHih hSilni al irbem bn nbT : oira kl iSral ki la Sme hmlk alihm oiSbo hem at hmlk dbr lamr mh lno Hlq bdod ola nHlh bbn iSi lahlik iSral eth rah bitk dod oilk iSral lahlio : obni iSral hiSbim beri ihodh oimlk elihm rHbem : oiSlH hmlk rHbem at adrm aSr el hms oirgmo kl iSral bo abn oimt ohmlk rHbem htamz lelot bmrkbh lnos iroSlm : oipSeo iSral bbit dod ed hiom hch : oihi kSme kl iSral ki Sb irbem oiSlHo oiqrao ato al hedh oimliko ato el kl iSral la hih aHri bit dod colti SbT ihodh lbdo : oibao rHbem iroSlm oiqhl at kl bit ihodh oat SbT bnimn mah oSmnim alp bHor eSh mlHmh lhlHm em bit iSral lhSib at hmlokh lrHbem bn Slmh : oihi dbr halhim al Smeih aiS halhim lamr : amr al rHbem bn Slmh mlk ihodh oal kl bit ihodh obnimin oitr hem lamr : kh amr ihoh la telo ola tlHmon em aHikm bni iSral Sobo aiS lbito ki mati nhih hdbr hch oiSmeo at dbr ihoh oiSbo llkt kdbr ihoh : oibn irbem at Skm bhr aprim oiSb bh oiza mSm oibn at pnoal : oiamr irbem blbo eth tSob hmmlkh lbit dod : am ielh hem hch leSot cbHim bbit ihoh biroSlm oSb lb hem hch al adnihm al rHbem mlk ihodh ohrgni oSbo al rHbem mlk ihodh : oioez hmlk oieS Sni egli chb oiamr alhm rb lkm melot iroSlm hnh alhik iSral aSr helok marz mzrim : oiSm at haHd bbit al oat haHd ntn bdn : oihi hdbr hch lHTat oilko hem lpni haHd ed dn : oieS at bit bmot oieS khnim mqzot hem aSr la hio mbni loi : oieS irbem Hg bHdS hSmini bHmSh eSr iom lHdS kHg aSr bihodh oiel el hmcbH kn eSh bbit al lcbH leglim aSr eSh ohemid bbit al at khni hbmot aSr eSh : oiel el hmcbH aSr eSh bbit al bHmSh eSr iom bHdS hSmini bHdS aSr bda mlbd oieS Hg lbni iSral oiel el hmcbH lhqTir :

13

ohnh aiS alhim ba mihodh bdbr ihoh al bit al oirbem emd el hmcbH lhqTir : oiqra el hmcbH bdbr ihoh oiamr mcbH mcbH kh amr ihoh hnh bn nold lbit dod iaSiho Smo ocbH elik at khni hbmot hmqTrim elik oezmot adm iSrpo elik : ontn biom hhoa mopt lamr ch hmopt aSr dbr ihoh hnh hmcbH nqre onSpk hdSn aSr elio : oihi kSme hmlk at dbr aiS halhim aSr qra el hmcbH bbit al oiSlH irbem at ido mel hmcbH lamr tpSho otibS ido aSr SlH elio ola ikl lhSibh alio : ohmcbH nqre oiSpk hdSn mn hmcbH kmopt aSr ntn aiS halhim bdbr ihoh : oien hmlk oiamr al aiS halhim Hl na at pni ihoh alhik ohtpll bedi otSb idi ali oiHl aiS halhim at pni ihoh otSb id hmlk alio othi kbraSnh : oidbr hmlk al aiS halhim bah ati hbith osedh oatnh lk mtt : oiamr aiS halhim al hmlk am ttn li at Hzi bitk la aba emk ola akl lHm ola aSth mim bmqom hch : ki kn zoh ati bdbr ihoh lamr la takl lHm ola tSth mim ola tSob bdrk aSr hlkt : oilk bdrk aHr ola Sb bdrk aSr ba bh al bit al : onbia aHd cqn iSb bbit al oiboa bno oispr lo at kl hmeSh aSr eSh aiS halhim hiom bbit al at hdbrim aSr dbr al hmlk oisprom labihm : oidbr alhm abihm ai ch hdrk hlk oirao bnio at hdrk aSr hlk aiS halhim aSr ba mihodh : oiamr al bnio HbSo li hHmor oiHbSo lo hHmor oirkb elio : oilk aHri aiS halhim oimzaho iSb tHt halh oiamr alio hath aiS halhim aSr bat mihodh oiamr ani : oiamr alio lk ati hbith oakl lHm : oiamr la aokl lSob atk olboa atk ola akl lHm ola aSth atk mim bmqom hch : ki dbr ali bdbr ihoh la takl lHm ola tSth Sm mim la tSob llkt bdrk aSr hlkt bh : oiamr lo gm ani nbia kmok omlak dbr ali bdbr ihoh lamr hSbho atk al bitk oiakl lHm oiSt mim kHS lo : oiSb ato oiakl lHm bbito oiSt mim : oihi hm iSbim al hSlHn oihi dbr ihoh al hnbia aSr hSibo : oiqra al aiS halhim aSr ba mihodh lamr kh amr ihoh ien ki mrit pi ihoh ola Smrt at hmzoh aSr zok ihoh alhik : otSb otakl lHm otSt mim bmqom aSr dbr alik al takl lHm oal tSt mim la tboa nbltk al qbr abtik : oihi aHri aklo lHm oaHri Stoto oiHbS lo hHmor lnbia aSr hSibo : oilk oimzaho arih bdrk oimitho othi nblto mSlkt bdrk ohHmor emd azlh oharih emd azl hnblh : ohnh anSim ebrim oirao at hnblh mSlkt bdrk oat harih emd azl hnblh oibao oidbro beir aSr hnbia hcqn iSb bh : oiSme hnbia aSr hSibo mn hdrk oiamr aiS halhim hoa aSr mrh at pi ihoh oitnho ihoh larih oiSbrho oimtho kdbr ihoh aSr dbr lo : oidbr al bnio lamr HbSo li at hHmor oiHbSo : oilk oimza at nblto mSlkt bdrk oHmor oharih emdim azl hnblh la akl harih at hnblh ola Sbr at hHmor : oiSa hnbia at nblt aiS halhim oinHho al hHmor oiSibho oiba al eir hnbia hcqn lspd olqbro : oinH at nblto bqbro oispdo elio hoi aHi : oihi aHri qbro ato oiamr al bnio lamr bmoti oqbrtm ati bqbr aSr aiS halhim qbor bo azl ezmtio hniHo at ezmti : ki hih ihih hdbr aSr qra bdbr ihoh el hmcbH aSr bbit al oel kl bti hbmot aSr beri Smron : aHr hdbr hch la Sb irbem mdrko hreh oiSb oieS mqzot hem khni bmot hHpz imla at ido oihi khni bmot : oihi bdbr hch lHTat bit irbem olhkHid olhSmid mel pni hadmh :

14

bet hhia Hlh abih bn irbem : oiamr irbem laSto qomi na ohStnit ola ideo ki ati aSt irbem ohlkt Slh hnh Sm aHih hnbia hoa dbr eli lmlk el hem hch : olqHt bidk eSrh lHm onqdim obqbq dbS obat alio hoa igid lk mh ihih lner : oteS kn aSt irbem otqm otlk Slh otba bit aHih oaHiho la ikl lraot ki qmo einio mSibo : oihoh amr al aHiho hnh aSt irbem bah ldrS dbr memk al bnh ki Hlh hoa kch okch tdbr alih oihi kbah ohia mtnkrh : oihi kSme aHiho at qol rglih bah bptH oiamr bai aSt irbem lmh ch at mtnkrh oanki SloH alik qSh : lki amri lirbem kh amr ihoh alhi iSral ien aSr hrimtik mtok hem oatnk ngid el emi iSral : oaqre at hmmlkh mbit dod oatnh lk ola hiit kebdi dod aSr Smr mzoti oaSr hlk aHri bkl lbbo leSot rq hiSr beini : otre leSot mkl aSr hio lpnik otlk oteSh lk alhim aHrim omskot lhkeisni oati hSlkt aHri gok : lkn hnni mbia reh al bit irbem ohkrti lirbem mStin bqir ezor oecob biSral oberti aHri bit irbem kaSr iber hgll ed tmo : hmt lirbem beir iaklo hklbim ohmt bSdh iaklo eop hSmim ki ihoh dbr : oat qomi lki lbitk bbah rglik heirh omt hild : ospdo lo kl iSral oqbro ato ki ch lbdo iba lirbem al qbr ien nmza bo dbr Tob al ihoh alhi iSral bbit irbem : ohqim ihoh lo mlk el iSral aSr ikrit at bit irbem ch hiom omh gm eth : ohkh ihoh at iSral kaSr inod hqnh bmim ontS at iSral mel hadmh hTobh hcat aSr ntn labotihm ocrm mebr lnhr ien aSr eSo at aSrihm mkeisim at ihoh : oitn at iSral bgll HTaot irbem aSr HTa oaSr hHTia at iSral : otqm aSt irbem otlk otba trzth hia bah bsp hbit ohner mt : oiqbro ato oispdo lo kl iSral kdbr ihoh aSr dbr bid ebdo aHiho hnbia : oitr dbri irbem aSr nlHm oaSr mlk hnm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : ohimim aSr mlk irbem eSrim oStim Snh oiSkb em abtio oimlk ndb bno tHtio : orHbem bn Slmh mlk bihodh bn arbeim oaHt Snh rHbem bmlko oSbe eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm heir aSr bHr ihoh lSom at Smo Sm mkl SbTi iSral oSm amo nemh hemnit : oieS ihodh hre beini ihoh oiqnao ato mkl aSr eSo abtm bHTatm aSr HTao : oibno gm hmh lhm bmot omzbot oaSrim el kl gbeh gbhh otHt kl ez renn : ogm qdS hih barz eSo kkl htoebt hgoim aSr horiS ihoh mpni bni iSral : oihi bSnh hHmiSit lmlk rHbem elh SoSq mlk mzrim el iroSlm : oiqH at azrot bit ihoh oat aozrot bit hmlk oat hkl lqH oiqH at kl mgni hchb aSr eSh Slmh : oieS hmlk rHbem tHtm mgni nHSt ohpqid el id Sri hrzim hSmrim ptH bit hmlk : oihi mdi ba hmlk bit ihoh iSaom hrzim ohSibom al ta hrzim : oitr dbri rHbem okl aSr eSh hla hmh ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : omlHmh hith bin rHbem obin irbem kl himim : oiSkb rHbem em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod oSm amo nemh hemnit oimlk abim bno tHtio :

15

obSnt Smnh eSrh lmlk irbem bn nbT mlk abim el ihodh : SlS Snim mlk biroSlm oSm amo mekh bt abiSlom : oilk bkl HTaot abio aSr eSh lpnio ola hih lbbo Slm em ihoh alhio klbb dod abio : ki lmen dod ntn ihoh alhio lo nir biroSlm lhqim at bno aHrio olhemid at iroSlm : aSr eSh dod at hiSr beini ihoh ola sr mkl aSr zoho kl imi Hiio rq bdbr aorih hHti : omlHmh hith bin rHbem obin irbem kl imi Hiio : oitr dbri abim okl aSr eSh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh omlHmh hith bin abim obin irbem : oiSkb abim em abtio oiqbro ato beir dod oimlk asa bno tHtio : obSnt eSrim lirbem mlk iSral mlk asa mlk ihodh : oarbeim oaHt Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo mekh bt abiSlom : oieS asa hiSr beini ihoh kdod abio : oiebr hqdSim mn harz oisr at kl hgllim aSr eSo abtio : ogm at mekh amo oisrh mgbirh aSr eSth mplzt laSrh oikrt asa at mplzth oiSrp bnHl qdron : ohbmot la sro rq lbb asa hih Slm em ihoh kl imio : oiba at qdSi abio oqdSo bit ihoh ksp ochb oklim : omlHmh hith bin asa obin beSa mlk iSral kl imihm : oiel beSa mlk iSral el ihodh oibn at hrmh lblti tt iza oba lasa mlk ihodh : oiqH asa at kl hksp ohchb hnotrim baozrot bit ihoh oat aozrot bit mlk oitnm bid ebdio oiSlHm hmlk asa al bn hdd bn Tbrmn bn Hcion mlk arm hiSb bdmSq lamr : brit bini obink bin abi obin abik hnh SlHti lk SHd ksp ochb lk hprh at britk at beSa mlk iSral oielh meli : oiSme bn hdd al hmlk asa oiSlH at Sri hHilim aSr lo el eri iSral oik at eion oat dn oat abl bit mekh oat kl knrot el kl arz nptli : oihi kSme beSa oiHdl mbnot at hrmh oiSb btrzh : ohmlk asa hSmie at kl ihodh ain nqi oiSao at abni hrmh oat ezih aSr bnh beSa oibn bm hmlk asa at gbe bnimn oat hmzph : oitr kl dbri asa okl gborto okl aSr eSh oherim aSr bnh hla hmh ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh rq let cqnto Hlh at rglio : oiSkb asa em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod abio oimlk ihoSpT bno tHtio : ondb bn irbem mlk el iSral bSnt Stim lasa mlk ihodh oimlk el iSral Sntim : oieS hre beini ihoh oilk bdrk abio obHTato aSr hHTia at iSral : oiqSr elio beSa bn aHih lbit iSSkr oikho beSa bgbton aSr lplStim ondb okl iSral zrim el gbton : oimtho beSa bSnt SlS lasa mlk ihodh oimlk tHtio : oihi kmlko hkh at kl bit irbem la hSair kl nSmh lirbem ed hSmdo kdbr ihoh aSr dbr bid ebdo aHih hSilni : el HTaot irbem aSr HTa oaSr hHTia at iSral bkeso aSr hkeis at ihoh alhi iSral : oitr dbri ndb okl aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : omlHmh hith bin asa obin beSa mlk iSral kl imihm : bSnt SlS lasa mlk ihodh mlk beSa bn aHih el kl iSral btrzh eSrim oarbe Snh : oieS hre beini ihoh oilk bdrk irbem obHTato aSr hHTia at iSral :

16

oihi dbr ihoh al ihoa bn Hnni el beSa lamr : ien aSr hrimtik mn hepr oatnk ngid el emi iSral otlk bdrk irbem otHTa at emi iSral lhkeisni bHTatm : hnni mbeir aHri beSa oaHri bito ontti at bitk kbit irbem bn nbT : hmt lbeSa beir iaklo hklbim ohmt lo bSdh iaklo eop hSmim : oitr dbri beSa oaSr eSh ogborto hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb beSa em abtio oiqbr btrzh oimlk alh bno tHtio : ogm bid ihoa bn Hnni hnbia dbr ihoh hih al beSa oal bito oel kl hreh aSr eSh beini ihoh lhkeiso bmeSh idio lhiot kbit irbem oel aSr hkh ato : bSnt eSrim oSS Snh lasa mlk ihodh mlk alh bn beSa el iSral btrzh Sntim : oiqSr elio ebdo cmri Sr mHzit hrkb ohoa btrzh Sth Skor bit arza aSr el hbit btrzh : oiba cmri oikho oimitho bSnt eSrim oSbe lasa mlk ihodh oimlk tHtio : oihi bmlko kSbto el ksao hkh at kl bit beSa la hSair lo mStin bqir ogalio oreho : oiSmd cmri at kl bit beSa kdbr ihoh aSr dbr al beSa bid ihoa hnbia : al kl HTaot beSa oHTaot alh bno aSr HTao oaSr hHTiao at iSral lhkeis at ihoh alhi iSral bhblihm : oitr dbri alh okl aSr eSh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : bSnt eSrim oSbe Snh lasa mlk ihodh mlk cmri Sbet imim btrzh ohem Hnim el gbton aSr lplStim : oiSme hem hHnim lamr qSr cmri ogm hkh at hmlk oimlko kl iSral at emri Sr zba el iSral biom hhoa bmHnh : oielh emri okl iSral emo mgbton oizro el trzh : oihi kraot cmri ki nlkdh heir oiba al armon bit hmlk oiSrp elio at bit mlk baS oimt : el HTatio aSr HTa leSot hre beini ihoh llkt bdrk irbem obHTato aSr eSh lhHTia at iSral : oitr dbri cmri oqSro aSr qSr hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : ac iHlq hem iSral lHzi Hzi hem hih aHri tbni bn gint lhmliko ohHzi aHri emri : oiHcq hem aSr aHri emri at hem aSr aHri tbni bn gint oimt tbni oimlk emri : bSnt SlSim oaHt Snh lasa mlk ihodh mlk emri el iSral Stim eSrh Snh btrzh mlk SS Snim : oiqn at hhr Smron mat Smr bkkrim ksp oibn at hhr oiqra at Sm heir aSr bnh el Sm Smr adni hhr Smron : oieSh emri hre beini ihoh oire mkl aSr lpnio : oilk bkl drk irbem bn nbT obHTatio aSr hHTia at iSral lhkeis at ihoh alhi iSral bhblihm : oitr dbri emri aSr eSh ogborto aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb emri em abtio oiqbr bSmron oimlk aHab bno tHtio : oaHab bn emri mlk el iSral bSnt SlSim oSmnh Snh lasa mlk ihodh oimlk aHab bn emri el iSral bSmron eSrim oStim Snh : oieS aHab bn emri hre beini ihoh mkl aSr lpnio : oihi hnql lkto bHTaot irbem bn nbT oiqH aSh at aicbl bt atbel mlk zidnim oilk oiebd at hbel oiStHo lo : oiqm mcbH lbel bit hbel aSr bnh bSmron : oieS aHab at haSrh oiosp aHab leSot lhkeis at ihoh alhi iSral mkl mlki iSral aSr hio lpnio : bimio bnh Hial bit hali at iriHh babirm bkro isdh obSgib zeiro hzib dltih kdbr ihoh aSr dbr bid ihoSe bn non :

17

oiamr aliho htSbi mtSbi gled al aHab Hi ihoh alhi iSral aSr emdti lpnio am ihih hSnim halh Tl omTr ki am lpi dbri : oihi dbr ihoh alio lamr : lk mch opnit lk qdmh onstrt bnHl krit aSr el pni hirdn : ohih mhnHl tSth oat herbim zoiti lklklk Sm : oilk oieS kdbr ihoh oilk oiSb bnHl krit aSr el pni hirdn : oherbim mbiaim lo lHm obSr bbqr olHm obSr berb omn hnHl iSth : oihi mqz imim oiibS hnHl ki la hih gSm barz : oihi dbr ihoh alio lamr : qom lk zrpth aSr lzidon oiSbt Sm hnh zoiti Sm aSh almnh lklklk : oiqm oilk zrpth oiba al ptH heir ohnh Sm aSh almnh mqSSt ezim oiqra alih oiamr qHi na li meT mim bkli oaSth : otlk lqHt oiqra alih oiamr lqHi na li pt lHm bidk : otamr Hi ihoh alhik am iS li meog ki am mla kp qmH bkd omeT Smn bzpHt ohnni mqSSt Snim ezim obati oeSitiho li olbni oaklnho omtno : oiamr alih aliho al tirai bai eSi kdbrk ak eSi li mSm egh qTnh braSnh ohozat li olk olbnk teSi baHrnh : ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral kd hqmH la tklh ozpHt hSmn la tHsr ed iom ttn ihoh gSm el pni hadmh : otlk oteSh kdbr aliho otakl hoa ohia obith imim : kd hqmH la klth ozpHt hSmn la Hsr kdbr ihoh aSr dbr bid aliho : oihi aHr hdbrim halh Hlh bn haSh belt hbit oihi Hlio Hcq mad ed aSr la notrh bo nSmh : otamr al aliho mh li olk aiS halhim bat ali lhckir at eoni olhmit at bni : oiamr alih tni li at bnk oiqHho mHiqh oielho al helih aSr hoa iSb Sm oiSkbho el mTto : oiqra al ihoh oiamr ihoh alhi hgm el halmnh aSr ani mtgorr emh hreot lhmit at bnh : oitmdd el hild SlS pemim oiqra al ihoh oiamr ihoh alhi tSb na npS hild hch el qrbo : oiSme ihoh bqol aliho otSb npS hild el qrbo oiHi : oiqH aliho at hild oirdho mn helih hbith oitnho lamo oiamr aliho rai Hi bnk : otamr haSh al aliho eth ch ideti ki aiS alhim ath odbr ihoh bpik amt :

18

oihi imim rbim odbr ihoh hih al aliho bSnh hSliSit lamr lk hrah al aHab oatnh mTr el pni hadmh : oilk aliho lhraot al aHab ohreb Hcq bSmron : oiqra aHab al ebdiho aSr el hbit oebdiho hih ira at ihoh mad : oihi bhkrit aicbl at nbiai ihoh oiqH ebdiho mah nbaim oiHbiam HmSim aiS bmerh oklklm lHm omim : oiamr aHab al ebdiho lk barz al kl meini hmim oal kl hnHlim aoli nmza Hzir onHih sos oprd oloa nkrit mhbhmh : oiHlqo lhm at harz lebr bh aHab hlk bdrk aHd lbdo oebdiho hlk bdrk aHd lbdo : oihi ebdiho bdrk ohnh aliho lqrato oikrho oipl el pnio oiamr hath ch adni aliho : oiamr lo ani lk amr ladnik hnh aliho : oiamr mh HTati ki ath ntn at ebdk bid aHab lhmitni : Hi ihoh alhik am iS goi ommlkh aSr la SlH adni Sm lbqSk oamro ain ohSbie at hmmlkh oat hgoi ki la imzakh : oeth ath amr lk amr ladnik hnh aliho : ohih ani alk matk oroH ihoh iSak el aSr la ade obati lhgid laHab ola imzak ohrgni oebdk ira at ihoh mneri : hla hgd ladni at aSr eSiti bhrg aicbl at nbiai ihoh oaHba mnbiai ihoh mah aiS HmSim HmSim aiS bmerh oaklklm lHm omim : oeth ath amr lk amr ladnik hnh aliho ohrgni : oiamr aliho Hi ihoh zbaot aSr emdti lpnio ki hiom arah alio : oilk ebdiho lqrat aHab oigd lo oilk aHab lqrat aliho : oihi kraot aHab at aliho oiamr aHab alio hath ch ekr iSral : oiamr la ekrti at iSral ki am ath obit abik becbkm at mzot ihoh otlk aHri hbelim : oeth SlH qbz ali at kl iSral al hr hkrml oat nbiai hbel arbe maot oHmSim onbiai haSrh arbe maot akli SlHn aicbl : oiSlH aHab bkl bni iSral oiqbz at hnbiaim al hr hkrml : oigS aliho al kl hem oiamr ed mti atm psHim el Sti hsepim am ihoh halhim lko aHrio oam hbel lko aHrio ola eno hem ato dbr : oiamr aliho al hem ani notrti nbia lihoh lbdi onbiai hbel arbe maot oHmSim aiS : oitno lno Snim prim oibHro lhm hpr haHd ointHho oiSimo el hezim oaS la iSimo oani aeSh at hpr haHd ontti el hezim oaS la aSim : oqratm bSm alhikm oani aqra bSm ihoh ohih halhim aSr ienh baS hoa halhim oien kl hem oiamro Tob hdbr : oiamr aliho lnbiai hbel bHro lkm hpr haHd oeSo raSnh ki atm hrbim oqrao bSm alhikm oaS la tSimo : oiqHo at hpr aSr ntn lhm oieSo oiqrao bSm hbel mhbqr oed hzhrim lamr hbel enno oain qol oain enh oipsHo el hmcbH aSr eSh : oihi bzhrim oihtl bhm aliho oiamr qrao bqol gdol ki alhim hoa ki SiH oki Sig lo oki drk lo aoli iSn hoa oiqz : oiqrao bqol gdol oitgddo kmSpTm bHrbot obrmHim ed Spk dm elihm : oihi kebr hzhrim oitnbao ed lelot hmnHh oain qol oain enh oain qSb : oiamr aliho lkl hem gSo ali oigSo kl hem alio oirpa at mcbH ihoh hhros : oiqH aliho Stim eSrh abnim kmspr SbTi bni ieqb aSr hih dbr ihoh alio lamr iSral ihih Smk : oibnh at habnim mcbH bSm ihoh oieS telh kbit satim cre sbib lmcbH : oierk at hezim ointH at hpr oiSm el hezim : oiamr mlao arbeh kdim mim oizqo el helh oel hezim oiamr Sno oiSno oiamr SlSo oiSlSo : oilko hmim sbib lmcbH ogm at htelh mla mim : oihi belot hmnHh oigS aliho hnbia oiamr ihoh alhi abrhm izHq oiSral hiom iode ki ath alhim biSral oani ebdk obdbrik eSiti at kl hdbrim halh : enni ihoh enni oideo hem hch ki ath ihoh halhim oath hsbt at lbm aHrnit : otpl aS ihoh otakl at helh oat hezim oat habnim oat hepr oat hmim aSr btelh lHkh : oira kl hem oiplo el pnihm oiamro ihoh hoa halhim ihoh hoa halhim : oiamr aliho lhm tpSo at nbiai hbel aiS al imlT mhm oitpSom oiordm aliho al nHl qiSon oiSHTm Sm : oiamr aliho laHab elh akl oSth ki qol hmon hgSm : oielh aHab lakl olStot oaliho elh al raS hkrml oighr arzh oiSm pnio bin brko : oiamr al nero elh na hbT drk im oiel oibT oiamr ain maomh oiamr Sb Sbe pemim : oihi bSbeit oiamr hnh eb qTnh kkp aiS elh mim oiamr elh amr al aHab asr ord ola iezrkh hgSm : oihi ed kh oed kh ohSmim htqdro ebim oroH oihi gSm gdol oirkb aHab oilk icrealh : oid ihoh hith al aliho oiSns mtnio oirz lpni aHab ed bakh icrealh :

19

oigd aHab laicbl at kl aSr eSh aliho oat kl aSr hrg at kl hnbiaim bHrb : otSlH aicbl mlak al aliho lamr kh ieSon alhim okh iospon ki ket mHr aSim at npSk knpS aHd mhm : oira oiqm oilk al npSo oiba bar Sbe aSr lihodh oinH at nero Sm : ohoa hlk bmdbr drk iom oiba oiSb tHt rtm aHt oiSal at npSo lmot oiamr rb eth ihoh qH npSi ki la Tob anki mabti : oiSkb oiiSn tHt rtm aHd ohnh ch mlak nge bo oiamr lo qom akol : oibT ohnh mraStio egt rzpim ozpHt mim oiakl oiSt oiSb oiSkb : oiSb mlak ihoh Snit oige bo oiamr qom akl ki rb mmk hdrk : oiqm oiakl oiSth oilk bkH hakilh hhia arbeim iom oarbeim lilh ed hr halhim Hrb : oiba Sm al hmerh oiln Sm ohnh dbr ihoh alio oiamr lo mh lk ph aliho : oiamr qna qnati lihoh alhi zbaot ki ecbo britk bni iSral at mcbHtik hrso oat nbiaik hrgo bHrb oaotr ani lbdi oibqSo at npSi lqHth : oiamr za oemdt bhr lpni ihoh ohnh ihoh ebr oroH gdolh oHcq mprq hrim omSbr sleim lpni ihoh la broH ihoh oaHr hroH reS la breS ihoh : oaHr hreS aS la baS ihoh oaHr haS qol dmmh dqh : oihi kSme aliho oilT pnio badrto oiza oiemd ptH hmerh ohnh alio qol oiamr mh lk ph aliho : oiamr qna qnati lihoh alhi zbaot ki ecbo britk bni iSral at mcbHtik hrso oat nbiaik hrgo bHrb oaotr ani lbdi oibqSo at npSi lqHth : oiamr ihoh alio lk Sob ldrkk mdbrh dmSq obat omSHt at Hcal lmlk el arm : oat ihoa bn nmSi tmSH lmlk el iSral oat aliSe bn SpT mabl mHolh tmSH lnbia tHtik : ohih hnmlT mHrb Hcal imit ihoa ohnmlT mHrb ihoa imit aliSe : ohSarti biSral Sbet alpim kl hbrkim aSr la kreo lbel okl hph aSr la nSq lo : oilk mSm oimza at aliSe bn SpT ohoa HrS Snim eSr zmdim lpnio ohoa bSnim heSr oiebr aliho alio oiSlk adrto alio : oiecb at hbqr oirz aHri aliho oiamr aSqh na labi olami oalkh aHrik oiamr lo lk Sob ki mh eSiti lk : oiSb maHrio oiqH at zmd hbqr oicbHho obkli hbqr bSlm hbSr oitn lem oiaklo oiqm oilk aHri aliho oiSrtho :

20

obn hdd mlk arm qbz at kl Hilo oSlSim oSnim mlk ato osos orkb oiel oizr el Smron oilHm bh : oiSlH mlakim al aHab mlk iSral heirh : oiamr lo kh amr bn hdd kspk ochbk li hoa onSik obnik hTobim li hm : oien mlk iSral oiamr kdbrk adni hmlk lk ani okl aSr li : oiSbo hmlakim oiamro kh amr bn hdd lamr ki SlHti alik lamr kspk ochbk onSik obnik li ttn : ki am ket mHr aSlH at ebdi alik oHpSo at bitk oat bti ebdik ohih kl mHmd einik iSimo bidm olqHo : oiqra mlk iSral lkl cqni harz oiamr deo na orao ki reh ch mbqS ki SlH ali lnSi olbni olkspi olchbi ola mneti mmno : oiamro alio kl hcqnim okl hem al tSme oloa tabh : oiamr lmlaki bn hdd amro ladni hmlk kl aSr SlHt al ebdk braSnh aeSh ohdbr hch la aokl leSot oilko hmlakim oiSbho dbr : oiSlH alio bn hdd oiamr kh ieSon li alhim okh iospo am iSpq epr Smron lSelim lkl hem aSr brgli : oien mlk iSral oiamr dbro al ithll Hgr kmptH : oihi kSme at hdbr hch ohoa Sth hoa ohmlkim bskot oiamr al ebdio Simo oiSimo el heir : ohnh nbia aHd ngS al aHab mlk iSral oiamr kh amr ihoh hrait at kl hhmon hgdol hch hnni ntno bidk hiom oidet ki ani ihoh : oiamr aHab bmi oiamr kh amr ihoh bneri Sri hmdinot oiamr mi iasr hmlHmh oiamr ath : oipqd at neri Sri hmdinot oihio matim Snim oSlSim oaHrihm pqd at kl hem kl bni iSral Sbet alpim : oizao bzhrim obn hdd Sth Skor bskot hoa ohmlkim SlSim oSnim mlk ecr ato : oizao neri Sri hmdinot braSnh oiSlH bn hdd oigido lo lamr anSim izao mSmron : oiamr am lSlom izao tpSom Hiim oam lmlHmh izao Hiim tpSom : oalh izao mn heir neri Sri hmdinot ohHil aSr aHrihm : oiko aiS aiSo oinso arm oirdpm iSral oimlT bn hdd mlk arm el sos oprSim : oiza mlk iSral oik at hsos oat hrkb ohkh barm mkh gdolh : oigS hnbia al mlk iSral oiamr lo lk htHcq ode orah at aSr teSh ki ltSobt hSnh mlk arm elh elik : oebdi mlk arm amro alio alhi hrim alhihm el kn Hcqo mmno oaolm nlHm atm bmiSor am la nHcq mhm : oat hdbr hch eSh hsr hmlkim aiS mmqmo oSim pHot tHtihm : oath tmnh lk Hil kHil hnpl maotk osos ksos orkb krkb onlHmh aotm bmiSor am la nHcq mhm oiSme lqlm oieS kn : oihi ltSobt hSnh oipqd bn hdd at arm oiel apqh lmlHmh em iSral : obni iSral htpqdo oklklo oilko lqratm oiHno bni iSral ngdm kSni HSpi ecim oarm mlao at harz : oigS aiS halhim oiamr al mlk iSral oiamr kh amr ihoh ien aSr amro arm alhi hrim ihoh ola alhi emqim hoa ontti at kl hhmon hgdol hch bidk oidetm ki ani ihoh : oiHno alh nkH alh Sbet imim oihi biom hSbiei otqrb hmlHmh oiko bni iSral at arm mah alp rgli biom aHd : oinso hnotrim apqh al heir otpl hHomh el eSrim oSbeh alp aiS hnotrim obn hdd ns oiba al heir Hdr bHdr : oiamro alio ebdio hnh na Smeno ki mlki bit iSral ki mlki Hsd hm nSimh na Sqim bmtnino oHblim braSno onza al mlk iSral aoli iHih at npSk : oiHgro Sqim bmtnihm oHblim braSihm oibao al mlk iSral oiamro ebdk bn hdd amr tHi na npSi oiamr heodno Hi aHi hoa : ohanSim inHSo oimhro oiHlTo hmmno oiamro aHik bn hdd oiamr bao qHho oiza alio bn hdd oielho el hmrkbh : oiamr alio herim aSr lqH abi mat abik aSib oHozot tSim lk bdmSq kaSr Sm abi bSmron oani bbrit aSlHk oikrt lo brit oiSlHho : oaiS aHd mbni hnbiaim amr al reho bdbr ihoh hkini na oiman haiS lhkto : oiamr lo ien aSr la Smet bqol ihoh hnk holk mati ohkk harih oilk mazlo oimzaho harih oikho : oimza aiS aHr oiamr hkini na oikho haiS hkh opze : oilk hnbia oiemd lmlk el hdrk oitHpS bapr el einio : oihi hmlk ebr ohoa zeq al hmlk oiamr ebdk iza bqrb hmlHmh ohnh aiS sr oiba ali aiS oiamr Smr at haiS hch am hpqd ipqd ohith npSk tHt npSo ao kkr ksp tSqol : oihi ebdk eSh hnh ohnh ohoa ainno oiamr alio mlk iSral kn mSpTk ath Hrzt : oimhr oisr at hapr mel einio oikr ato mlk iSral ki mhnbaim hoa : oiamr alio kh amr ihoh ien SlHt at aiS Hrmi mid ohith npSk tHt npSo oemk tHt emo : oilk mlk iSral el bito sr ocep oiba Smronh :

21

oihi aHr hdbrim halh krm hih lnbot hicreali aSr bicreal azl hikl aHab mlk Smron : oidbr aHab al nbot lamr tnh li at krmk oihi li lgn irq ki hoa qrob azl biti oatnh lk tHtio krm Tob mmno am Tob beinik atnh lk ksp mHir ch : oiamr nbot al aHab Hlilh li mihoh mtti at nHlt abti lk : oiba aHab al bito sr ocep el hdbr aSr dbr alio nbot hicreali oiamr la atn lk at nHlt aboti oiSkb el mTto oisb at pnio ola akl lHm : otba alio aicbl aSto otdbr alio mh ch roHk srh oaink akl lHm : oidbr alih ki adbr al nbot hicreali oamr lo tnh li at krmk bksp ao am Hpz ath atnh lk krm tHtio oiamr la atn lk at krmi : otamr alio aicbl aSto ath eth teSh mlokh el iSral qom akl lHm oiTb lbk ani atn lk at krm nbot hicreali : otktb sprim bSm aHab otHtm bHtmo otSlH hsprim al hcqnim oal hHrim aSr beiro hiSbim at nbot : otktb bsprim lamr qrao zom ohoSibo at nbot braS hem : ohoSibo Snim anSim bni bliel ngdo oiedho lamr brkt alhim omlk ohoziaho osqlho oimt : oieSo anSi eiro hcqnim ohHrim aSr hiSbim beiro kaSr SlHh alihm aicbl kaSr ktob bsprim aSr SlHh alihm : qrao zom ohSibo at nbot braS hem : oibao Sni hanSim bni bliel oiSbo ngdo oiedho anSi hbliel at nbot ngd hem lamr brk nbot alhim omlk oizaho mHoz leir oisqlho babnim oimt : oiSlHo al aicbl lamr sql nbot oimt : oihi kSme aicbl ki sql nbot oimt otamr aicbl al aHab qom rS at krm nbot hicreali aSr man ltt lk bksp ki ain nbot Hi ki mt : oihi kSme aHab ki mt nbot oiqm aHab lrdt al krm nbot hicreali lrSto : oihi dbr ihoh al aliho htSbi lamr : qom rd lqrat aHab mlk iSral aSr bSmron hnh bkrm nbot aSr ird Sm lrSto : odbrt alio lamr kh amr ihoh hrzHt ogm irSt odbrt alio lamr kh amr ihoh bmqom aSr lqqo hklbim at dm nbot ilqo hklbim at dmk gm ath : oiamr aHab al aliho hmzatni aibi oiamr mzati ien htmkrk leSot hre beini ihoh : hnni mbi alik reh oberti aHrik ohkrti laHab mStin bqir oezor oecob biSral : ontti at bitk kbit irbem bn nbT okbit beSa bn aHih al hkes aSr hkest otHTa at iSral : ogm laicbl dbr ihoh lamr hklbim iaklo at aicbl bHl icreal : hmt laHab beir iaklo hklbim ohmt bSdh iaklo eop hSmim : rq la hih kaHab aSr htmkr leSot hre beini ihoh aSr hsth ato aicbl aSto : oiteb mad llkt aHri hgllim kkl aSr eSo hamri aSr horiS ihoh mpni bni iSral : oihi kSme aHab at hdbrim halh oiqre bgdio oiSm Sq el bSro oizom oiSkb bSq oihlk aT : oihi dbr ihoh al aliho htSbi lamr : hrait ki nkne aHab mlpni ien ki nkne mpni la abi hreh bimio bimi bno abia hreh el bito :

22

oiSbo SlS Snim ain mlHmh bin arm obin iSral : oihi bSnh hSliSit oird ihoSpT mlk ihodh al mlk iSral : oiamr mlk iSral al ebdio hidetm ki lno rmt gled oanHno mHSim mqHt ath mid mlk arm : oiamr al ihoSpT htlk ati lmlHmh rmt gled oiamr ihoSpT al mlk iSral kmoni kmok kemi kemk ksosi ksosik : oiamr ihoSpT al mlk iSral drS na kiom at dbr ihoh : oiqbz mlk iSral at hnbiaim karbe maot aiS oiamr alhm halk el rmt gled lmlHmh am aHdl oiamro elh oitn adni bid hmlk : oiamr ihoSpT hain ph nbia lihoh eod ondrSh maoto : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT eod aiS aHd ldrS at ihoh mato oani Snatio ki la itnba eli Tob ki am re mikiho bn imlh oiamr ihoSpT al iamr hmlk kn : oiqra mlk iSral al sris aHd oiamr mhrh mikiho bn imlh : omlk iSral oihoSpT mlk ihodh iSbim aiS el ksao mlbSim bgdim bgrn ptH Ser Smron okl hnbiaim mtnbaim lpnihm : oieS lo zdqih bn knenh qrni brcl oiamr kh amr ihoh balh tngH at arm ed kltm : okl hnbaim nbaim kn lamr elh rmt gled ohzlH ontn ihoh bid hmlk : ohmlak aSr hlk lqra mikiho dbr alio lamr hnh na dbri hnbiaim ph aHd Tob al hmlk ihi na dbrik kdbr aHd mhm odbrt Tob : oiamr mikiho Hi ihoh ki at aSr iamr ihoh ali ato adbr : oiboa al hmlk oiamr hmlk alio mikiho hnlk al rmt gled lmlHmh am nHdl oiamr alio elh ohzlH ontn ihoh bid hmlk : oiamr alio hmlk ed kmh pemim ani mSbek aSr la tdbr ali rq amt bSm ihoh : oiamr raiti at kl iSral npzim al hhrim kzan aSr ain lhm reh oiamr ihoh la adnim lalh iSobo aiS lbito bSlom : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT hloa amrti alik loa itnba eli Tob ki am re : oiamr lkn Sme dbr ihoh raiti at ihoh iSb el ksao okl zba hSmim emd elio mimino omSmalo : oiamr ihoh mi ipth at aHab oiel oipl brmt gled oiamr ch bkh och amr bkh : oiza hroH oiemd lpni ihoh oiamr ani aptno oiamr ihoh alio bmh : oiamr aza ohiiti roH Sqr bpi kl nbiaio oiamr tpth ogm tokl za oeSh kn : oeth hnh ntn ihoh roH Sqr bpi kl nbiaik alh oihoh dbr elik reh : oigS zdqiho bn knenh oikh at mikiho el hlHi oiamr ai ch ebr roH ihoh mati ldbr aotk : oiamr mikiho hnk rah biom hhoa aSr tba Hdr bHdr lhHbh : oiamr mlk iSral qH at mikiho ohSibho al amn Sr heir oal ioaS bn hmlk : oamrt kh amr hmlk Simo at ch bit hkla ohakilho lHm lHz omim lHz ed bai bSlom : oiamr mikiho am Sob tSob bSlom la dbr ihoh bi oiamr Smeo emim klm : oiel mlk iSral oihoSpT mlk ihodh rmt gled : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT htHpS oba bmlHmh oath lbS bgdik oitHpS mlk iSral oiboa bmlHmh : omlk arm zoh at Sri hrkb aSr lo SlSim oSnim lamr la tlHmo at qTn oat gdol ki am at mlk iSral lbdo : oihi kraot Sri hrkb at ihoSpT ohmh amro ak mlk iSral hoa oisro elio lhlHm oiceq ihoSpT : oihi kraot Sri hrkb ki la mlk iSral hoa oiSobo maHrio : oaiS mSk bqSt ltmo oikh at mlk iSral bin hdbqim obin hSrin oiamr lrkbo hpk idk ohoziani mn hmHnh ki hHliti : otelh hmlHmh biom hhoa ohmlk hih memd bmrkbh nkH arm oimt berb oizq dm hmkh al Hiq hrkb : oiebr hrnh bmHnh kba hSmS lamr aiS al eiro oaiS al arzo : oimt hmlk oiboa Smron oiqbro at hmlk bSmron : oiSTp at hrkb el brkt Smron oilqo hklbim at dmo ohcnot rHzo kdbr ihoh aSr dbr : oitr dbri aHab okl aSr eSh obit hSn aSr bnh okl herim aSr bnh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb aHab em abtio oimlk aHciho bno tHtio : oihoSpT bn asa mlk el ihodh bSnt arbe laHab mlk iSral : ihoSpT bn SlSim oHmS Snh bmlko oeSrim oHmS Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ecobh bt SlHi : oilk bkl drk asa abio la sr mmno leSot hiSr beini ihoh ak hbmot la sro eod hem mcbHim omqTrim bbmot : oiSlm ihoSpT em mlk iSral : oitr dbri ihoSpT ogborto aSr eSh oaSr nlHm hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oitr hqdS aSr nSar bimi asa abio ber mn harz : omlk ain badom nzb mlk : ihoSpT eSr aniot trSiS llkt aopirh lchb ola hlk ki nSbrh aniot bezion gbr : ac amr aHciho bn aHab al ihoSpT ilko ebdi em ebdik baniot ola abh ihoSpT : oiSkb ihoSpT em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod abio oimlk ihorm bno tHtio : aHciho bn aHab mlk el iSral bSmron bSnt Sbe eSrh lihoSpT mlk ihodh oimlk el iSral Sntim : oieS hre beini ihoh oilk bdrk abio obdrk amo obdrk irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral : oiebd at hbel oiStHoh lo oikes at ihoh alhi iSral kkl aSr eSh abio :

mlkim b

1

oipSe moab biSral aHri mot aHab : oipl aHcih bed hSbkh belito aSr bSmron oiHl oiSlH mlakim oiamr alhm lko drSo bbel cbob alhi eqron am aHih mHli ch : omlak ihoh dbr al alih htSbi qom elh lqrat mlaki mlk Smron odbr alhm hmbli ain alhim biSral atm hlkim ldrS bbel cbob alhi eqron : olkn kh amr ihoh hmTh aSr elit Sm la trd mmnh ki mot tmot oilk alih : oiSobo hmlakim alio oiamr alihm mh ch Sbtm : oiamro alio aiS elh lqratno oiamr alino lko Sobo al hmlk aSr SlH atkm odbrtm alio kh amr ihoh hmbli ain alhim biSral ath SlH ldrS bbel cbob alhi eqron lkn hmTh aSr elit Sm la trd mmnh ki mot tmot : oidbr alhm mh mSpT haiS aSr elh lqratkm oidbr alikm at hdbrim halh : oiamro alio aiS bel Ser oacor eor acor bmtnio oiamr alih htSbi hoa : oiSlH alio Sr HmSim oHmSio oiel alio ohnh iSb el raS hhr oidbr alio aiS halhim hmlk dbr rdh : oienh aliho oidbr al Sr hHmSim oam aiS alhim ani trd aS mn hSmim otakl atk oat HmSik otrd aS mn hSmim otakl ato oat HmSio : oiSb oiSlH alio Sr HmSim aHr oHmSio oien oidbr alio aiS halhim kh amr hmlk mhrh rdh : oien alih oidbr alihm am aiS halhim ani trd aS mn hSmim otakl atk oat HmSik otrd aS alhim mn hSmim otakl ato oat HmSio : oiSb oiSlH Sr HmSim SlSim oHmSio oiel oiba Sr hHmSim hSliSi oikre el brkio lngd aliho oitHnn alio oidbr alio aiS halhim tiqr na npSi onpS ebdik alh HmSim beinik : hnh irdh aS mn hSmim otakl at Sni Sri hHmSim hraSnim oat HmSihm oeth tiqr npSi beinik : oidbr mlak ihoh al aliho rd aoto al tira mpnio oiqm oird aoto al hmlk : oidbr alio kh amr ihoh ien aSr SlHt mlakim ldrS bbel cbob alhi eqron hmbli ain alhim biSral ldrS bdbro lkn hmTh aSr elit Sm la trd mmnh ki mot tmot : oimt kdbr ihoh aSr dbr aliho oimlk ihorm tHtio bSnt Stim lihorm bn ihoSpT mlk ihodh ki la hih lo bn : oitr dbri aHciho aSr eSh hloa hmh ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral :

2

oihi bhelot ihoh at aliho bserh hSmim oilk aliho oaliSe mn hglgl : oiamr aliho al aliSe Sb na ph ki ihoh SlHni ed bit al oiamr aliSe Hi ihoh oHi npSk am aecbk oirdo bit al : oizao bni hnbiaim aSr bit al al aliSe oiamro alio hidet ki hiom ihoh lqH at adnik mel raSk oiamr gm ani ideti hHSo : oiamr lo aliho aliSe Sb na ph ki ihoh SlHni iriHo oiamr Hi ihoh oHi npSk am aecbk oibao iriHo : oigSo bni hnbiaim aSr biriHo al aliSe oiamro alio hidet ki hiom ihoh lqH at adnik mel raSk oiamr gm ani ideti hHSo : oiamr lo aliho Sb na ph ki ihoh SlHni hirdnh oiamr Hi ihoh oHi npSk am aecbk oilko Snihm : oHmSim aiS mbni hnbiaim hlko oiemdo mngd mrHoq oSnihm emdo el hirdn : oiqH aliho at adrto oiglm oikh at hmim oiHzo hnh ohnh oiebro Snihm bHrbh : oihi kebrm oaliho amr al aliSe Sal mh aeSh lk bTrm alqH memk oiamr aliSe oihi na pi Snim broHk ali : oiamr hqSit lSaol am trah ati lqH matk ihi lk kn oam ain la ihih : oihi hmh hlkim hlok odbr ohnh rkb aS ososi aS oiprdo bin Snihm oiel aliho bserh hSmim : oaliSe rah ohoa mzeq abi abi rkb iSral oprSio ola raho eod oiHcq bbgdio oiqrem lSnim qreim : oirm at adrt aliho aSr nplh melio oiSb oiemd el Spt hirdn : oiqH at adrt aliho aSr nplh melio oikh at hmim oiamr aih ihoh alhi aliho ap hoa oikh at hmim oiHzo hnh ohnh oiebr aliSe : oiraho bni hnbiaim aSr biriHo mngd oiamro nHh roH aliho el aliSe oibao lqrato oiStHoo lo arzh : oiamro alio hnh na iS at ebdik HmSim anSim bni Hil ilko na oibqSo at adnik pn nSao roH ihoh oiSlkho baHd hhrim ao baHt hgiaot oiamr la tSlHo : oipzro bo ed bS oiamr SlHo oiSlHo HmSim aiS oibqSo SlSh imim ola mzaho : oiSbo alio ohoa iSb biriHo oiamr alhm hloa amrti alikm al tlko : oiamro anSi heir al aliSe hnh na moSb heir Tob kaSr adni rah ohmim reim oharz mSklt : oiamr qHo li zlHit HdSh oSimo Sm mlH oiqHo alio : oiza al moza hmim oiSlk Sm mlH oiamr kh amr ihoh rpati lmim halh la ihih mSm eod mot omSklt : oirpo hmim ed hiom hch kdbr aliSe aSr dbr : oiel mSm bit al ohoa elh bdrk onerim qTnim izao mn heir oitqlso bo oiamro lo elh qrH elh qrH : oipn aHrio oiram oiqllm bSm ihoh otzanh Stim dbim mn hier otbqenh mhm arbeim oSni ildim : oilk mSm al hr hkrml omSm Sb Smron :

3

oihorm bn aHab mlk el iSral bSmron bSnt Smnh eSrh lihoSpT mlk ihodh oimlk Stim eSrh Snh : oieSh hre beini ihoh rq la kabio okamo oisr at mzbt hbel aSr eSh abio : rq bHTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral dbq la sr mmnh : omiSe mlk moab hih nqd ohSib lmlk iSral mah alp krim omah alp ailim zmr : oihi kmot aHab oipSe mlk moab bmlk iSral : oiza hmlk ihorm biom hhoa mSmron oipqd at kl iSral : oilk oiSlH al ihoSpT mlk ihodh lamr mlk moab pSe bi htlk ati al moab lmlHmh oiamr aelh kmoni kmok kemi kemk ksosi ksosik : oiamr ai ch hdrk nelh oiamr drk mdbr adom : oilk mlk iSral omlk ihodh omlk adom oisbo drk Sbet imim ola hih mim lmHnh olbhmh aSr brglihm : oiamr mlk iSral ahh ki qra ihoh lSlSt hmlkim halh ltt aotm bid moab : oiamr ihoSpT hain ph nbia lihoh ondrSh at ihoh maoto oien aHd mebdi mlk iSral oiamr ph aliSe bn SpT aSr izq mim el idi aliho : oiamr ihoSpT iS aoto dbr ihoh oirdo alio mlk iSral oihoSpT omlk adom : oiamr aliSe al mlk iSral mh li olk lk al nbiai abik oal nbiai amk oiamr lo mlk iSral al ki qra ihoh lSlSt hmlkim halh ltt aotm bid moab : oiamr aliSe Hi ihoh zbaot aSr emdti lpnio ki loli pni ihoSpT mlk ihodh ani nSa am abiT alik oam arak : oeth qHo li mngn ohih kngn hmngn othi elio id ihoh : oiamr kh amr ihoh eSh hnHl hch gbim gbim : ki kh amr ihoh la trao roH ola trao gSm ohnHl hhoa imla mim oStitm atm omqnikm obhmtkm : onql cat beini ihoh ontn at moab bidkm : ohkitm kl eir mbzr okl eir mbHor okl ez Tob tpilo okl meini mim tstmo okl hHlqh hTobh tkabo babnim : oihi bbqr kelot hmnHh ohnh mim baim mdrk adom otmla harz at hmim : okl moab Smeo ki elo hmlkim lhlHm bm oizeqo mkl Hgr Hgrh omelh oiemdo el hgbol : oiSkimo bbqr ohSmS crHh el hmim oirao moab mngd at hmim admim kdm : oiamro dm ch hHrb nHrbo hmlkim oiko aiS at reho oeth lSll moab : oibao al mHnh iSral oiqmo iSral oiko at moab oinso mpnihm oibo bh ohkot at moab : oherim ihrso okl Hlqh Tobh iSliko aiS abno omlaoh okl mein mim istmo okl ez Tob ipilo ed hSair abnih bqir HrSt oisbo hqleim oikoh : oira mlk moab ki Hcq mmno hmlHmh oiqH aoto Sbe maot aiS Slp Hrb lhbqie al mlk adom ola iklo : oiqH at bno hbkor aSr imlk tHtio oielho elh el hHmh oihi qzp gdol el iSral oiseo melio oiSbo larz :

4

oaSh aHt mnSi bni hnbiaim zeqh al aliSe lamr ebdk aiSi mt oath idet ki ebdk hih ira at ihoh ohnSh ba lqHt at Sni ildi lo lebdim : oiamr alih aliSe mh aeSh lk hgidi li mh iS lki bbit otamr ain lSpHtk kl bbit ki am asok Smn : oiamr lki Sali lk klim mn hHoz mat kl Sknki klim rqim al tmeiTi : obat osgrt hdlt bedk obed bnik oizqt el kl hklim halh ohmla tsiei : otlk mato otsgr hdlt bedh obed bnih hm mgSim alih ohia mizqt : oihi kmlat hklim otamr al bnh hgiSh ali eod kli oiamr alih ain eod kli oiemd hSmn : otba otgd laiS halhim oiamr lki mkri at hSmn oSlmi at nSiki oat bniki tHii bnotr : oihi hiom oiebr aliSe al Sonm oSm aSh gdolh otHcq bo lakl lHm oihi mdi ebro isr Smh lakl lHm : otamr al aiSh hnh na ideti ki aiS alhim qdoS hoa ebr elino tmid : neSh na elit qir qTnh onSim lo Sm mTh oSlHn oksa omnorh ohih bbao alino isor Smh : oihi hiom oiba Smh oisr al helih oiSkb Smh : oiamr al gHci nero qra lSonmit hcat oiqra lh otemd lpnio : oiamr lo amr na alih hnh Hrdt alino at kl hHrdh hcat mh leSot lk hiS ldbr lk al hmlk ao al Sr hzba otamr btok emi anki iSbt : oiamr omh leSot lh oiamr giHci abl bn ain lh oaiSh cqn : oiamr qra lh oiqra lh otemd bptH : oiamr lmoed hch ket Hih ati Hbqt bn otamr al adni aiS halhim al tkcb bSpHtk : othr haSh otld bn lmoed hch ket Hih aSr dbr alih aliSe : oigdl hild oihi hiom oiza al abio al hqzrim : oiamr al abio raSi raSi oiamr al hner Saho al amo : oiSaho oibiaho al amo oiSb el brkih ed hzhrim oimt : otel otSkbho el mTt aiS halhim otsgr bedo otza : otqra al aiSh otamr SlHh na li aHd mn hnerim oaHt hatnot oarozh ed aiS halhim oaSobh : oiamr mdoe ati hlkti alio hiom la HdS ola Sbt otamr Slom : otHbS haton otamr al nerh nhg olk al tezr li lrkb ki am amrti lk : otlk otboa al aiS halhim al hr hkrml oihi kraot aiS halhim ath mngd oiamr al giHci nero hnh hSonmit hlc : eth roz na lqrath oamr lh hSlom lk hSlom laiSk hSlom lild otamr Slom : otba al aiS halhim al hhr otHcq brglio oigS giHci lhdph oiamr aiS halhim hrph lh ki npSh mrh lh oihoh helim mmni ola hgid li : otamr hSalti bn mat adni hla amrti la tSlh ati : oiamr lgiHci Hgr mtnik oqH mSenti bidk olk ki tmza aiS la tbrkno oki ibrkk aiS la tenno oSmt mSenti el pni hner : otamr am hner Hi ihoh oHi npSk am aecbk oiqm oilk aHrih : ogHci ebr lpnihm oiSm at hmSent el pni hner oain qol oain qSb oiSb lqrato oigd lo lamr la hqiz hner : oiba aliSe hbith ohnh hner mt mSkb el mTto : oiba oisgr hdlt bed Snihm oitpll al ihoh : oiel oiSkb el hild oiSm pio el pio oeinio el einio okpio el kpo oighr elio oiHm bSr hild : oiSb oilk bbit aHt hnh oaHt hnh oiel oighr elio oicorr hner ed Sbe pemim oipqH hner at einio : oiqra al giHci oiamr qra al hSnmit hcat oiqrah otboa alio oiamr Sai bnk : otba otpl el rglio otStHo arzh otSa at bnh otza : oaliSe Sb hglglh ohreb barz obni hnbiaim iSbim lpnio oiamr lnero Spt hsir hgdolh obSl ncid lbni hnbiaim : oiza aHd al hSdh llqT art oimza gpn Sdh oilqT mmno pqet Sdh mla bgdo oiba oiplH al sir hncid ki la ideo : oizqo lanSim lakol oihi kaklm mhncid ohmh zeqo oiamro mot bsir aiS halhim ola iklo lakl : oiamr oqHo qmH oiSlk al hsir oiamr zq lem oiaklo ola hih dbr re bsir : oaiS ba mbel SlSh oiba laiS halhim lHm bkorim eSrim lHm Serim okrml bzqlno oiamr tn lem oiaklo : oiamr mSrto mh atn ch lpni mah aiS oiamr tn lem oiaklo ki kh amr ihoh akl ohotr : oitn lpnihm oiaklo oiotro kdbr ihoh :

5

onemn Sr zba mlk arm hih aiS gdol lpni adnio onSa pnim ki bo ntn ihoh tSoeh larm ohaiS hih gbor Hil mzre : oarm izao gdodim oiSbo marz iSral nerh qTnh othi lpni aSt nemn : otamr al gbrth aHli adni lpni hnbia aSr bSmron ac iasp ato mzreto : oiba oigd ladnio lamr kcat okcat dbrh hnerh aSr marz iSral : oiamr mlk arm lk ba oaSlHh spr al mlk iSral oilk oiqH bido eSr kkri ksp oSSt alpim chb oeSr Hlipot bgdim : oiba hspr al mlk iSral lamr oeth kboa hspr hch alik hnh SlHti alik at nemn ebdi oaspto mzreto : oihi kqra mlk iSral at hspr oiqre bgdio oiamr halhim ani lhmit olhHiot ki ch SlH ali lasp aiS mzreto ki ak deo na orao ki mtanh hoa li : oihi kSme aliSe aiS halhim ki qre mlk iSral at bgdio oiSlH al hmlk lamr lmh qret bgdik iba na ali oide ki iS nbia biSral : oiba nemn bsoso obrkbo oiemd ptH hbit laliSe : oiSlH alio aliSe mlak lamr hlok orHzt Sbe pemim birdn oiSb bSrk lk oThr : oiqzp nemn oilk oiamr hnh amrti ali iza izoa oemd oqra bSm ihoh alhio ohnip ido al hmqom oasp hmzre : hla Tob abnh oprpr nhrot dmSq mkl mimi iSral hla arHz bhm oThrti oipn oilk bHmh : oigSo ebdio oidbro alio oiamro abi dbr gdol hnbia dbr alik hloa teSh oap ki amr alik rHz oThr : oird oiTbl birdn Sbe pemim kdbr aiS halhim oiSb bSro kbSr ner qTn oiThr : oiSb al aiS halhim hoa okl mHnho oiba oiemd lpnio oiamr hnh na ideti ki ain alhim bkl harz ki am biSral oeth qH na brkh mat ebdk : oiamr Hi ihoh aSr emdti lpnio am aqH oipzr bo lqHt oiman : oiamr nemn ola itn na lebdk mSa zmd prdim admh ki loa ieSh eod ebdk elh ocbH lalhim aHrim ki am lihoh : ldbr hch islH ihoh lebdk bboa adni bit rmon lhStHot Smh ohoa nSen el idi ohStHoiti bit rmn bhStHoiti bit rmn islH na ihoh lebdk bdbr hch : oiamr lo lk lSlom oilk mato kbrt arz : oiamr giHci ner aliSe aiS halhim hnh HSk adni at nemn harmi hch mqHt mido at aSr hbia Hi ihoh ki am rzti aHrio olqHti mato maomh : oirdp giHci aHri nemn oirah nemn rz aHrio oipl mel hmrkbh lqrato oiamr hSlom : oiamr Slom adni SlHni lamr hnh eth ch bao ali Sni nerim mhr aprim mbni hnbiaim tnh na lhm kkr ksp oSti Hlpot bgdim : oiamr nemn hoal qH kkrim oiprz bo oizr kkrim ksp bSni HrTim oSti Hlpot bgdim oitn al Sni nerio oiSao lpnio : oiba al hepl oiqH midm oipqd bbit oiSlH at hanSim oilko : ohoa ba oiemd al adnio oiamr alio aliSe man gHci oiamr la hlk ebdk anh oanh : oiamr alio la lbi hlk kaSr hpk aiS mel mrkbto lqratk het lqHt at hksp olqHt bgdim ocitim okrmim ozan obqr oebdim oSpHot : ozret nemn tdbq bk obcrek leolm oiza mlpnio mzre kSlg :

6

oiamro bni hnbiaim al aliSe hnh na hmqom aSr anHno iSbim Sm lpnik zr mmno : nlkh na ed hirdn onqHh mSm aiS qorh aHt oneSh lno Sm mqom lSbt Sm oiamr lko : oiamr haHd hoal na olk at ebdik oiamr ani alk : oilk atm oibao hirdnh oigcro hezim : oihi haHd mpil hqorh oat hbrcl npl al hmim oizeq oiamr ahh adni ohoa Saol : oiamr aiS halhim anh npl oiraho at hmqom oiqzb ez oiSlk Smh oizp hbrcl : oiamr hrm lk oiSlH ido oiqHho : omlk arm hih nlHm biSral oioez al ebdio lamr al mqom plni almni tHnti : oiSlH aiS halhim al mlk iSral lamr hSmr mebr hmqom hch ki Sm arm nHtim : oiSlH mlk iSral al hmqom aSr amr lo aiS halhim ohchirh onSmr Sm la aHt ola Stim : oiser lb mlk arm el hdbr hch oiqra al ebdio oiamr alihm hloa tgido li mi mSlno al mlk iSral : oiamr aHd mebdio loa adni hmlk ki aliSe hnbia aSr biSral igid lmlk iSral at hdbrim aSr tdbr bHdr mSkbk : oiamr lko orao aikh hoa oaSlH oaqHho oigd lo lamr hnh bdtn : oiSlH Smh sosim orkb oHil kbd oibao lilh oiqpo el heir : oiSkm mSrt aiS halhim lqom oiza ohnh Hil sobb at heir osos orkb oiamr nero alio ahh adni aikh neSh : oiamr al tira ki rbim aSr atno maSr aotm : oitpll aliSe oiamr ihoh pqH na at einio oirah oipqH ihoh at eini hner oira ohnh hhr mla sosim orkb aS sbibt aliSe : oirdo alio oitpll aliSe al ihoh oiamr hk na at hgoi hch bsnorim oikm bsnorim kdbr aliSe : oiamr alhm aliSe la ch hdrk ola ch heir lko aHri oaolikh atkm al haiS aSr tbqSon oilk aotm Smronh : oihi kbam Smron oiamr aliSe ihoh pqH at eini alh oirao oipqH ihoh at einihm oirao ohnh btok Smron : oiamr mlk iSral al aliSe krato aotm hakh akh abi : oiamr la tkh haSr Sbit bHrbk obqStk ath mkh Sim lHm omim lpnihm oiaklo oiSto oilko al adnihm : oikrh lhm krh gdolh oiaklo oiSto oiSlHm oilko al adnihm ola ispo eod gdodi arm lboa barz iSral : oihi aHri kn oiqbz bn hdd mlk arm at kl mHnho oiel oizr el Smron : oihi reb gdol bSmron ohnh zrim elih ed hiot raS Hmor bSmnim ksp orbe hqb Hriionim bHmSh ksp : oihi mlk iSral ebr el hHmh oaSh zeqh alio lamr hoSieh adni hmlk : oiamr al ioSek ihoh main aoSiek hmn hgrn ao mn hiqb : oiamr lh hmlk mh lk otamr haSh hcat amrh ali tni at bnk onaklno hiom oat bni nakl mHr : onbSl at bni onaklho oamr alih biom haHr tni at bnk onaklno otHba at bnh : oihi kSme hmlk at dbri haSh oiqre at bgdio ohoa ebr el hHmh oira hem ohnh hSq el bSro mbit : oiamr kh ieSh li alhim okh iosp am iemd raS aliSe bn SpT elio hiom : oaliSe iSb bbito ohcqnim iSbim ato oiSlH aiS mlpnio bTrm iba hmlak alio ohoa amr al hcqnim hraitm ki SlH bn hmrzH hch lhsir at raSi rao kba hmlak sgro hdlt olHztm ato bdlt hloa qol rgli adnio aHrio : eodno mdbr emm ohnh hmlak ird alio oiamr hnh cat hreh mat ihoh mh aoHil lihoh eod :

7

oiamr aliSe Smeo dbr ihoh kh amr ihoh ket mHr sah slt bSql osatim Serim bSql bSer Smron : oien hSliS aSr lmlk nSen el ido at aiS halhim oiamr hnh ihoh eSh arbot bSmim hihih hdbr hch oiamr hnkh rah beinik omSm la takl : oarbeh anSim hio mzreim ptH hSer oiamro aiS al reho mh anHno iSbim ph ed mtno : am amrno nboa heir ohreb beir omtno Sm oam iSbno ph omtno oeth lko onplh al mHnh arm am iHino nHih oam imitno omtno : oiqomo bnSp lboa al mHnh arm oibao ed qzh mHnh arm ohnh ain Sm aiS : oadni hSmie at mHnh arm qol rkb qol sos qol Hil gdol oiamro aiS al aHio hnh Skr elino mlk iSral at mlki hHtim oat mlki mzrim lboa elino : oiqomo oinoso bnSp oiecbo at ahlihm oat sosihm oat Hmrihm hmHnh kaSr hia oinso al npSm : oibao hmzreim halh ed qzh hmHnh oibao al ahl aHd oiaklo oiSto oiSao mSm ksp ochb obgdim oilko oiTmno oiSbo oibao al ahl aHr oiSao mSm oilko oiTmno : oiamro aiS al reho la kn anHno eSim hiom hch iom bSrh hoa oanHno mHSim oHkino ed aor hbqr omzano eoon oeth lko onbah ongidh bit hmlk : oibao oiqrao al Ser heir oigido lhm lamr bano al mHnh arm ohnh ain Sm aiS oqol adm ki am hsos asor ohHmor asor oahlim kaSr hmh : oiqra hSerim oigido bit hmlk pnimh : oiqm hmlk lilh oiamr al ebdio agidh na lkm at aSr eSo lno arm ideo ki rebim anHno oizao mn hmHnh lhHbh bhSdh lamr ki izao mn heir ontpSm Hiim oal heir nba : oien aHd mebdio oiamr oiqHo na HmSh mn hsosim hnSarim aSr nSaro bh hnm kkl hhmon iSral aSr nSaro bh hnm kkl hmon iSral aSr tmo onSlHh onrah : oiqHo Sni rkb sosim oiSlH hmlk aHri mHnh arm lamr lko orao : oilko aHrihm ed hirdn ohnh kl hdrk mlah bgdim oklim aSr hSliko arm bhHpcm oiSbo hmlakim oigdo lmlk : oiza hem oibco at mHnh arm oihi sah slt bSql osatim Serim bSql kdbr ihoh : ohmlk hpqid at hSliS aSr nSen el ido el hSer oirmsho hem bSer oimt kaSr dbr aiS halhim aSr dbr brdt hmlk alio : oihi kdbr aiS halhim al hmlk lamr satim Serim bSql osah slt bSql ihih ket mHr bSer Smron : oien hSliS at aiS halhim oiamr ohnh ihoh eSh arbot bSmim hihih kdbr hch oiamr hnk rah beinik omSm la takl : oihi lo kn oirmso ato hem bSer oimt :

8

oaliSe dbr al haSh aSr hHih at bnh lamr qomi olki ati obitk ogori baSr tgori ki qra ihoh lreb ogm ba al harz Sbe Snim : otqm haSh oteS kdbr aiS halhim otlk hia obith otgr barz plStim Sbe Snim : oihi mqzh Sbe Snim otSb haSh marz plStim otza lzeq al hmlk al bith oal Sdh : ohmlk mdbr al gHci ner aiS halhim lamr sprh na li at kl hgdlot aSr eSh aliSe : oihi hoa mspr lmlk at aSr hHih at hmt ohnh haSh aSr hHih at bnh zeqt al hmlk el bith oel Sdh oiamr gHci adni hmlk cat haSh och bnh aSr hHih aliSe : oiSal hmlk laSh otspr lo oitn lh hmlk sris aHd lamr hSib at kl aSr lh oat kl tboat hSdh miom ecbh at harz oed eth : oiba aliSe dmSq obn hdd mlk arm Hlh oigd lo lamr ba aiS halhim ed hnh : oiamr hmlk al Hchal qH bidk mnHh olk lqrat aiS halhim odrSt at ihoh maoto lamr haHih mHli ch : oilk Hcal lqrato oiqH mnHh bido okl Tob dmSq mSa arbeim gml oiba oiemd lpnio oiamr bnk bn hdd mlk arm SlHni alik lamr haHih mHli ch : oiamr alio aliSe lk amr la Hih tHih ohrani ihoh ki mot imot : oiemd at pnio oiSm ed bS oibk aiS halhim : oiamr Hcal mdoe adni bkh oiamr ki ideti at aSr teSh lbni iSral reh mbzrihm tSlH baS obHrihm bHrb thrg oellihm trTS ohrtihm tbqe : oiamr Hchal ki mh ebdk hklb ki ieSh hdbr hgdol hch oiamr aliSe hrani ihoh atk mlk el arm : oilk mat aliSe oiba al adnio oiamr lo mh amr lk aliSe oiamr amr li Hih tHih : oihi mmHrt oiqH hmkbr oiTbl bmim oiprS el pnio oimt oimlk Hchal tHtio : obSnt HmS liorm bn aHab mlk iSral oihoSpT mlk ihodh mlk ihorm bn ihoSpT mlk ihodh : bn SlSim oStim Snh hih bmlko oSmnh Snh mlk biroSlm : oilk bdrk mlki iSral kaSr eSo bit aHab ki bt aHab hith lo laSh oieS hre beini ihoh : ola abh ihoh lhSHit at ihodh lmen dod ebdo kaSr amr lo ltt lo nir lbnio kl himim : bimio pSe adom mtHt id ihodh oimlko elihm mlk : oiebr iorm zeirh okl hrkb emo oihi hoa qm lilh oikh at adom hsbib alio oat Sri hrkb oins hem lahlio : oipSe adom mtHt id ihodh ed hiom hch ac tpSe lbnh bet hhia : oitr dbri iorm okl aSr eSh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb iorm em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod oimlk aHciho bno tHtio : bSnt Stim eSrh Snh liorm bn aHab mlk iSral mlk aHciho bn ihorm mlk ihodh : bn eSrim oStim Snh aHciho bmlko oSnh aHt mlk biroSlm oSm amo etliho bt emri mlk iSral : oilk bdrk bit aHab oieS hre beini ihoh kbit aHab ki Htn bit aHab hoa : oilk at iorm bn aHab lmlHmh em Hchal mlk arm brmt gled oiko armim at iorm : oiSb iorm hmlk lhtrpa bicreal mn hmkim aSr ikho armim brmh bhlHmo at Hchal mlk arm oaHciho bn ihorm mlk ihodh ird lraot at iorm bn aHab bicreal ki Hlh hoa :

9

oaliSe hnbia qra laHd mbni hnbiaim oiamr lo Hgr mtnik oqH pk hSmn hch bidk olk rmt gled : obat Smh orah Sm ihoa bn ihoSpT bn nmSi obat ohqmto mtok aHio ohbiat ato Hdr bHdr : olqHt pk hSmn oizqt el raSo oamrt kh amr ihoh mSHtik lmlk al iSral optHt hdlt onsth ola tHkh : oilk hner hner hnbia rmt gled : oiba ohnh Sri hHil iSbim oiamr dbr li alik hSr oiamr ihoa al mi mklno oiamr alik hSr : oiqm oiba hbith oizq hSmn al raSo oiamr lo kh amr ihoh alhi iSral mSHtik lmlk al em ihoh al iSral : ohkith at bit aHab adnik onqmti dmi ebdi hnbiaim odmi kl ebdi ihoh mid aicbl : oabd kl bit aHab ohkrti laHab mStin bqir oezor oecob biSral : ontti at bit aHab kbit irbem bn nbT okbit beSa bn aHih : oat aicbl iaklo hklbim bHlq icreal oain qbr oiptH hdlt oins : oihoa iza al ebdi adnio oiamr lo hSlom mdoe ba hmSge hch alik oiamr alihm atm idetm at haiS oat SiHo : oiamro Sqr hgd na lno oiamr kcat okcat amr ali lamr kh amr ihoh mSHtik lmlk al iSral : oimhro oiqHo aiS bgdo oiSimo tHtio al grm hmelot oitqeo bSopr oiamro mlk ihoa : oitqSr ihoa bn ihoSpT bn nmSi al iorm oiorm hih Smr brmt gled hoa okl iSral mpni Hcal mlk arm : oiSb ihorm hmlk lhtrpa bicreal mn hmkim aSr ikho armim bhlHmo at Hcal mlk arm oiamr ihoa am iS npSkm al iza pliT mn heir llkt lgid bicreal : oirkb ihoa oilk icrealh ki iorm Skb Smh oaHcih mlk ihodh ird lraot at iorm : ohzph emd el hmgdl bicreal oira at Spet ihoa bbao oiamr Spet ani rah oiamr ihorm qH rkb oSlH lqratm oiamr hSlom : oilk rkb hsos lqrato oiamr kh amr hmlk hSlom oiamr ihoa mh lk olSlom sb al aHri oigd hzph lamr ba hmlak ed hm ola Sb : oiSlH rkb sos Sni oiba alhm oiamr kh amr hmlk Slom oiamr ihoa mh lk olSlom sb al aHri : oigd hzph lamr ba ed alihm ola Sb ohmnhg kmnhg ihoa bn nmSi ki bSgeon inhg : oiamr ihorm asr oiasr rkbo oiza ihorm mlk iSral oaHciho mlk ihodh aiS brkbo oizao lqrat ihoa oimzaho bHlqt nbot hicreali : oihi kraot ihorm at ihoa oiamr hSlom ihoa oiamr mh hSlom ed cnoni aicbl amk okSpih hrbim : oihpk ihorm idio oins oiamr al aHciho mrmh aHcih : oihoa mla ido bqSt oik at ihorm bin creio oiza hHzi mlbo oikre brkbo : oiamr al bdqr SlSh Sa hSlkho bHlqt Sdh nbot hicreali ki ckr ani oath at rkbim zmdim aHri aHab abio oihoh nSa elio at hmSa hch : am la at dmi nbot oat dmi bnio raiti amS nam ihoh oSlmti lk bHlqh hcat nam ihoh oeth Sa hSlkho bHlqh kdbr ihoh : oaHcih mlk ihodh rah oins drk bit hgn oirdp aHrio ihoa oiamr gm ato hkho al hmrkbh bmelh gor aSr at iblem oins mgdo oimt Sm : oirkbo ato ebdio iroSlmh oiqbro ato bqbrto em abtio beir dod : obSnt aHt eSrh Snh liorm bn aHab mlk aHcih el ihodh : oiboa ihoa icrealh oaicbl Smeh otSm bpok einih otiTb at raSh otSqp bed hHlon : oihoa ba bSer otamr hSlom cmri hrg adnio : oiSa pnio al hHlon oiamr mi ati mi oiSqipo alio Snim SlSh srisim : oiamr SmTho oiSmToh oic mdmh al hqir oal hsosim oirmsnh : oiba oiakl oiSt oiamr pqdo na at harorh hcat oqbroh ki bt mlk hia : oilko lqbrh ola mzao bh ki am hglglt ohrglim okpot hidim : oiSbo oigido lo oiamr dbr ihoh hoa aSr dbr bid ebdo aliho htSbi lamr bHlq icreal iaklo hklbim at bSr aicbl : ohit nblt aicbl kdmn el pni hSdh bHlq icreal aSr la iamro cat aicbl :

10

olaHab Sbeim bnim bSmron oiktb ihoa sprim oiSlH Smron al Sri icreal hcqnim oal hamnim aHab lamr : oeth kba hspr hch alikm oatkm bni adnikm oatkm hrkb ohsosim oeir mbzr ohnSq : oraitm hTob ohiSr mbni adnikm oSmtm el ksa abio ohlHmo el bit adnikm : oirao mad mad oiamro hnh Sni hmlkim la emdo lpnio oaik nemd anHno : oiSlH aSr el hbit oaSr el heir ohcqnim ohamnim al ihoa lamr ebdik anHno okl aSr tamr alino neSh la nmlik aiS hTob beinik eSh : oiktb alihm spr Snit lamr am li atm olqli atm Smeim qHo at raSi anSi bni adnikm obao ali ket mHr icrealh obni hmlk Sbeim aiS at gdli heir mgdlim aotm : oihi kba hspr alihm oiqHo at bni hmlk oiSHTo Sbeim aiS oiSimo at raSihm bdodim oiSlHo alio icrealh : oiba hmlak oigd lo lamr hbiao raSi bni hmlk oiamr Simo atm Sni zbrim ptH hSer ed hbqr : oihi bbqr oiza oiemd oiamr al kl hem zdqim atm hnh ani qSrti el adni oahrgho omi hkh at kl alh : deo apoa ki la ipl mdbr ihoh arzh aSr dbr ihoh el bit aHab oihoh eSh at aSr dbr bid ebdo aliho : oik ihoa at kl hnSarim lbit aHab bicreal okl gdlio omideio okhnio ed blti hSair lo Srid : oiqm oiba oilk Smron hoa bit eqd hreim bdrk : oihoa mza at aHi aHciho mlk ihodh oiamr mi atm oiamro aHi aHciho anHno onrd lSlom bni hmlk obni hgbirh : oiamr tpSom Hiim oitpSom Hiim oiSHTom al bor bit eqd arbeim oSnim aiS ola hSair aiS mhm : oilk mSm oimza at ihondb bn rkb lqrato oibrkho oiamr alio hiS at lbbk iSr kaSr lbbi em lbbk oiamr ihondb iS oiS tnh at idk oitn ido oielho alio al hmrkbh : oiamr lkh ati orah bqnati lihoh oirkbo ato brkbo : oiba Smron oik at kl hnSarim laHab bSmron ed hSmido kdbr ihoh aSr dbr al aliho : oiqbz ihoa at kl hem oiamr alhm aHab ebd at hbel meT ihoa iebdno hrbh : oeth kl nbiai hbel kl ebdio okl khnio qrao ali aiS al ipqd ki cbH gdol li lbel kl aSr ipqd la iHih oihoa eSh beqbh lmen habid at ebdi hbel : oiamr ihoa qdSo ezrh lbel oiqrao : oiSlH ihoa bkl iSral oibao kl ebdi hbel ola nSar aiS aSr la ba oibao bit hbel oimla bit hbel ph lph : oiamr laSr el hmltHh hoza lboS lkl ebdi hbel oiza lhm hmlboS : oiba ihoa oihondb bn rkb bit hbel oiamr lebdi hbel HpSo orao pn iS ph emkm mebdi ihoh ki am ebdi hbel lbdm : oibao leSot cbHim oelot oihoa Sm lo bHoz Smnim aiS oiamr haiS aSr imlT mn hanSim aSr ani mbia el idikm npSo tHt npSo : oihi kklto leSot helh oiamr ihoa lrzim olSlSim bao hkom aiS al iza oikom lpi Hrb oiSlko hrzim ohSlSim oilko ed eir bit hbel : oizao at mzbot bit hbel oiSrpoh : oitzo at mzbt hbel oitzo at bit hbel oiSmho lmHraot ed hiom : oiSmd ihoa at hbel miSral : rq HTai irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral la sr ihoa maHrihm egli hchb aSr bit al oaSr bdn : oiamr ihoh al ihoa ien aSr hTibt leSot hiSr beini kkl aSr blbbi eSit lbit aHab bni rbeim iSbo lk el ksa iSral : oihoa la Smr llkt btort ihoh alhi iSral bkl lbbo la sr mel HTaot irbem aSr hHTia at iSral : bimim hhm hHl ihoh lqzot biSral oikm Hcal bkl gbol iSral : mn hirdn mcrH hSmS at kl arz hgled hgdi ohraobni ohmnSi merer aSr el nHl arnn ohgled ohbSn : oitr dbri ihoa okl aSr eSh okl gborto hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb ihoa em abtio oiqbro ato bSmron oimlk ihoaHc bno tHtio : ohimim aSr mlk ihoa el iSral eSrim oSmnh Snh bSmron :

11

oetlih am aHciho orath ki mt bnh otqm otabd at kl cre hmmlkh : otqH ihoSbe bt hmlk iorm aHot aHciho at ioaS bn aHcih otgnb ato mtok bni hmlk hmmottim ato oat minqto bHdr hmTot oistro ato mpni etliho ola homt : oihi ath bit ihoh mtHba SS Snim oetlih mlkt el harz : obSnh hSbieit SlH ihoide oiqH at Sri hmaiot lkri olrzim oiba atm alio bit ihoh oikrt lhm brit oiSbe atm bbit ihoh oira atm at bn hmlk : oizom lamr ch hdbr aSr teSon hSlSit mkm bai hSbt oSmri mSmrt bit hmlk : ohSlSit bSer sor ohSlSit bSer aHr hrzim oSmrtm at mSmrt hbit msH : oSti hidot bkm kl izai hSbt oSmro at mSmrt bit ihoh al hmlk : ohqptm el hmlk sbib aiS oklio bido ohba al hSdrot iomt ohio at hmlk bzato obbao : oieSo Sri hmaiot kkl aSr zoh ihoide hkhn oiqHo aiS at anSio bai hSbt em izai hSbt oibao al ihoide hkhn : oitn hkhn lSri hmaiot at hHnit oat hSlTim aSr lmlk dod aSr bbit ihoh : oiemdo hrzim aiS oklio bido mktp hbit himnit ed ktp hbit hSmalit lmcbH olbit el hmlk sbib : oioza at bn hmlk oitn elio at hncr oat hedot oimlko ato oimSHho oiko kp oiamro iHi hmlk : otSme etlih at qol hrzin hem otba al hem bit ihoh : otra ohnh hmlk emd el hemod kmSpT ohSrim ohHzzrot al hmlk okl em harz SmH otqe bHzzrot otqre etlih at bgdih otqra qSr qSr : oizo ihoide hkhn at Sri hmaiot pqdi hHil oiamr alihm hoziao ath al mbit lSdrt ohba aHrih hmt bHrb ki amr hkhn al tomt bit ihoh : oiSmo lh idim otboa drk mboa hsosim bit hmlk otomt Sm : oikrt ihoide at hbrit bin ihoh obin hmlk obin hem lhiot lem lihoh obin hmlk obin hem : oibao kl em harz bit hbel oitzho at mcbHto oat zlmio Sbro hiTb oat mtn khn hbel hrgo lpni hmcbHot oiSm hkhn pqdot el bit ihoh : oiqH at Sri hmaot oat hkri oat hrzim oat kl em harz oirido at hmlk mbit ihoh oiboao drk Ser hrzim bit hmlk oiSb el ksa hmlkim : oiSmH kl em harz oheir SqTh oat etliho hmito bHrb bit mlk : bn Sbe Snim ihoaS bmlko :

12

bSnt Sbe lihoa mlk ihoaS oarbeim Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo zbih mbar Sbe : oieS ihoaS hiSr beini ihoh kl imio aSr horho ihoide hkhn : rq hbmot la sro eod hem mcbHim omqTrim bbmot : oiamr ihoaS al hkhnim kl ksp hqdSim aSr ioba bit ihoh ksp eobr aiS ksp npSot erko kl ksp aSr ielh el lb aiS lhbia bit ihoh : iqHo lhm hkhnim aiS mat mkro ohm iHcqo at bdq hbit lkl aSr imza Sm bdq : oihi bSnt eSrim oSlS Snh lmlk ihoaS la Hcqo hkhnim at bdq hbit : oiqra hmlk ihoaS lihoide hkhn olkhnim oiamr alhm mdoe ainkm mHcqim at bdq hbit oeth al tqHo ksp mat mkrikm ki lbdq hbit ttnho : oiato hkhnim lblti qHt ksp mat hem olblti Hcq at bdq hbit : oiqH ihoide hkhn aron aHd oiqb Hr bdlto oitn ato azl hmcbH bimin bboa aiS bit ihoh ontno Smh hkhnim Smri hsp at kl hksp hmoba bit ihoh : oihi kraotm ki rb hksp baron oiel spr hmlk ohkhn hgdol oizro oimno at hksp hnmza bit ihoh : ontno at hksp hmtkn el id eSi hmlakh hpqdim bit ihoh oioziaho lHrSi hez olbnim heSim bit ihoh : olgdrim olHzbi habn olqnot ezim oabni mHzb lHcq at bdq bit ihoh olkl aSr iza el hbit lHcqh : ak la ieSh bit ihoh spot ksp mcmrot mcrqot Hzzrot kl kli chb okli ksp mn hksp hmoba bit ihoh : ki leSi hmlakh itnho oHcqo bo at bit ihoh : ola iHSbo at hanSim aSr itno at hksp el idm ltt leSi hmlakh ki bamnh hm eSim : ksp aSm oksp HTaot la ioba bit ihoh lkhnim ihio : ac ielh Hcal mlk arm oilHm el gt oilkdh oiSm Hcal pnio lelot el iroSlm : oiqH ihoaS mlk ihodh at kl hqdSim aSr hqdiSo ihoSpT oihorm oaHciho abtio mlki ihodh oat qdSio oat kl hchb hnmza bazrot bit ihoh obit hmlk oiSlH lHcal mlk arm oiel mel iroSlm : oitr dbri ioaS okl aSr eSh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiqmo ebdio oiqSro qSr oiko at ioaS bit mla hiord sla : oiocbd bn Smet oihocbd bn Smr ebdio hkho oimt oiqbro ato em abtio beir dod oimlk amzih bno tHtio :

13

bSnt eSrim oSlS Snh lioaS bn aHciho mlk ihodh mlk ihoaHc bn ihoa el iSral bSmron Sbe eSrh Snh : oieS hre beini ihoh oilk aHr HTat irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral la sr mmnh : oiHr ap ihoh biSral oitnm bid Hcal mlk arm obid bn hdd bn Hcal kl himim : oiHl ihoaHc at pni ihoh oiSme alio ihoh ki rah at lHz iSral ki lHz atm mlk arm : oitn ihoh liSral moSie oizao mtHt id arm oiSbo bni iSral bahlihm ktmol SlSom : ak la sro mHTaot bit irbem aSr hHTi at iSral bh hlk ogm haSrh emdh bSmron : ki la hSair lihoaHc em ki am HmSim prSim oeSrh rkb oeSrt alpim rgli ki abdm mlk arm oiSmm kepr ldS : oitr dbri ihoaHc okl aSr eSh ogborto hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb ihoaHc em abtio oiqbrho bSmron oimlk ioaS bno tHtio : bSnt SlSim oSbe Snh lioaS mlk ihodh mlk ihoaS bn ihoaHc el iSral bSmron SS eSrh Snh : oieSh hre beini ihoh la sr mkl HTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral bh hlk : oitr dbri ioaS okl aSr eSh ogborto aSr nlHm em amzih mlk ihodh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb ioaS em abtio oirbem iSb el ksao oiqbr ioaS bSmron em mlki iSral : oaliSe Hlh at Hlio aSr imot bo oird alio ioaS mlk iSral oibk el pnio oiamr abi abi rkb iSral oprSio : oiamr lo aliSe qH qSt oHzim oiqH alio qSt oHzim : oiamr lmlk iSral hrkb idk el hqSt oirkb ido oiSm aliSe idio el idi hmlk : oiamr ptH hHlon qdmh oiptH oiamr aliSe irh oior oiamr Hz tSoeh lihoh oHz tSoeh barm ohkit at arm bapq ed klh : oiamr qH hHzim oiqH oiamr lmlk iSral hk arzh oik SlS pemim oiemd : oiqzp elio aiS halhim oiamr lhkot HmS ao SS pemim ac hkit at arm ed klh oeth SlS pemim tkh at arm : oimt aliSe oiqbrho ogdodi moab ibao barz ba Snh : oihi hm qbrim aiS ohnh rao at hgdod oiSliko at haiS bqbr aliSe oilk oige haiS bezmot aliSe oiHi oiqm el rglio : oHcal mlk arm lHz at iSral kl imi ihoaHc : oiHn ihoh atm oirHmm oipn alihm lmen brito at abrhm izHq oieqb ola abh hSHitm ola hSlikm mel pnio ed eth : oimt Hcal mlk arm oimlk bn hdd bno tHtio : oiSb ihoaS bn ihoaHc oiqH at herim mid bn hdd bn Hcal aSr lqH mid ihoaHc abio bmlHmh SlS pemim hkho ioaS oiSb at eri iSral :

14

bSnt Stim lioaS bn ioaHc mlk iSral mlk amziho bn ioaS mlk ihodh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh hih bmlko oeSrim otSe Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ihoedin mn iroSlm : oieS hiSr beini ihoh rq la kdod abio kkl aSr eSh ioaS abio eSh : rq hbmot la sro eod hem mcbHim omqTrim bbmot : oihi kaSr Hcqh hmmlkh bido oik at ebdio hmkim at hmlk abio : oat bni hmkim la hmit kktob bspr tort mSh aSr zoh ihoh lamr la iomto abot el bnim obnim la iomto el abot ki am aiS bHTao imot : hoa hkh at adom bgia hmlH eSrt alpim otpS at hsle bmlHmh oiqra at Smh iqtal ed hiom hch : ac SlH amzih mlakim al ihoaS bn ihoaHc bn ihoa mlk iSral lamr lkh ntrah pnim : oiSlH ihoaS mlk iSral al amziho mlk ihodh lamr hHoH aSr blbnon SlH al harc aSr blbnon lamr tnh at btk lbni laSh otebr Hit hSdh aSr blbnon otrms at hHoH : hkh hkit at adom onSak
