lbk hkbd oSb bbitk olmh ttgrh breh onplth ath oihodh emk : ola Sme amziho oiel ihoaS mlk iSral oitrao pnim hoa oamziho mlk ihodh bbit SmS aSr lihodh : oingp ihodh lpni iSral oinso aiS lahlo : oat amziho mlk ihodh bn ihoaS bn aHciho tpS ihoaS mlk iSral bbit SmS oibao iroSlm oiprz bHomt iroSlm bSer aprim ed Ser hpnh arbe maot amh : olqH at kl hchb ohksp oat kl hklim hnmzaim bit ihoh obazrot bit hmlk oat bni hterbot oiSb Smronh : oitr dbri ihoaS aSr eSh ogborto oaSr nlHm em amziho mlk ihodh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb ihoaS em abtio oiqbr bSmron em mlki iSral oimlk irbem bno tHtio : oiHi amziho bn ioaS mlk ihodh aHri mot ihoaS bn ihoaHc mlk iSral HmS eSrh Snh : oitr dbri amziho hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiqSro elio qSr biroSlm oins lkiSh oiSlHo aHrio lkiSh oimtho Sm : oiSao ato el hsosim oiqbr biroSlm em abtio beir dod : oiqHo kl em ihodh at ecrih ohoa bn SS eSrh Snh oimlko ato tHt abio amziho : hoa bnh at ailt oiSbh lihodh aHri Skb hmlk em abtio : bSnt HmS eSrh Snh lamziho bn ioaS mlk ihodh mlk irbem bn ioaS mlk iSral bSmron arbeim oaHt Snh : oieS hre beini ihoh la sr mkl HTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral : hoa hSib at gbol iSral mlboa Hmt ed im herbh kdbr ihoh alhi iSral aSr dbr bid ebdo ionh bn amti hnbia aSr mgt hHpr : ki rah ihoh at eni iSral mrh mad oaps ezor oaps ecob oain ecr liSral : ola dbr ihoh lmHot at Sm iSral mtHt hSmim oioSiem bid irbem bn ioaS : oitr dbri irbem okl aSr eSh ogborto aSr nlHm oaSr hSib at dmSq oat Hmt lihodh biSral hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb irbem em abtio em mlki iSral oimlk ckrih bno tHtio :

15

bSnt eSrim oSbe Snh lirbem mlk iSral mlk ecrih bn amzih mlk ihodh : bn SS eSrh Snh hih bmlko oHmSim oStim Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ikliho miroSlm : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh amziho abio : rq hbmot la sro eod hem mcbHim omqTrim bbmot : oinge ihoh at hmlk oihi mzre ed iom mto oiSb bbit hHpSit oiotm bn hmlk el hbit SpT at em harz : oitr dbri ecriho okl aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb ecrih em abtio oiqbro ato em abtio beir dod oimlk iotm bno tHtio : bSnt SlSim oSmnh Snh lecriho mlk ihodh mlk ckriho bn irbem el iSral bSmron SSh HdSim : oieS hre beini ihoh kaSr eSo abtio la sr mHTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral : oiqSr elio Slm bn ibS oikho qbl em oimitho oimlk tHtio : oitr dbri ckrih hnm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : hoa dbr ihoh aSr dbr al ihoa lamr bni rbieim iSbo lk el ksa iSral oihi kn : Slom bn ibiS mlk bSnt SlSim otSe Snh lecih mlk ihodh oimlk irH imim bSmron : oiel mnHm bn gdi mtrzh oiba Smron oik at Slom bn ibiS bSmron oimitho oimlk tHtio : oitr dbri Slom oqSro aSr qSr hnm ktbim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : ac ikh mnHm at tpsH oat kl aSr bh oat gbolih mtrzh ki la ptH oik at kl hhrotih bqe : bSnt SlSim otSe Snh lecrih mlk ihodh mlk mnHm bn gdi el iSral eSr Snim bSmron : oieS hre beini ihoh la sr mel HTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral kl imio : ba pol mlk aSor el harz oitn mnHm lpol alp kkr ksp lhiot idio ato lhHciq hmmlkh bido : oiza mnHm at hksp el iSral el kl gbori hHil ltt lmlk aSor HmSim Sqlim ksp laiS aHd oiSb mlk aSor ola emd Sm barz : oitr dbri mnHm okl aSr eSh hloa hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : oiSkb mnHm em abtio oimlk pqHih bno tHtio : bSnt HmSim Snh lecrih mlk ihodh mlk pqHih bn mnHm el iSral bSmron Sntim : oieS hre beini ihoh la sr mHTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral : oiqSr elio pqH bn rmliho SliSo oikho bSmron barmon bit mlk at argb oat harih oemo HmSim aiS mbni gledim oimitho oimlk tHtio : oitr dbri pqHih okl aSr eSh hnm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : bSnt HmSim oStim Snh lecrih mlk ihodh mlk pqH bn rmliho el iSral bSmron eSrim Snh : oieS hre beini ihoh la sr mn HTaot irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral : bimi pqH mlk iSral ba tglt plasr mlk aSor oiqH at eion oat abl bit mekh oat inoH oat qdS oat Hzor oat hgled oat hglilh kl arz nptli oiglm aSorh : oiqSr qSr hoSe bn alh el pqH bn rmliho oikho oimitho oimlk tHtio bSnt eSrim liotm bn ecih : oitr dbri pqH okl aSr eSh hnm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki iSral : bSnt Stim lpqH bn rmliho mlk iSral mlk iotm bn eciho mlk ihodh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh hih bmlko oSS eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo iroSa bt zdoq : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh eciho abio eSh : rq hbmot la sro eod hem mcbHim omqTrim bbmot hoa bnh at Ser bit ihoh helion : oitr dbri iotm aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : bimim hhm hHl ihoh lhSliH bihodh rzin mlk arm oat pqH bn rmliho : oiSkb iotm em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod abio oimlk aHc bno tHtio :

16

bSnt Sbe eSrh Snh lpqH bn rmliho mlk aHc bn iotm mlk ihodh : bn eSrim Snh aHc bmlko oSS eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm ola eSh hiSr beini ihoh alhio kdod abio : oilk bdrk mlki iSral ogm at bno hebir baS ktebot hgoim aSr horiS ihoh atm mpni bni iSral : oicbH oiqTr bbmot oel hgbeot otHt kl ez renn : ac ielh rzin mlk arm opqH bn rmliho mlk iSral iroSlm lmlHmh oizro el aHc ola iklo lhlHm : bet hhia hSib rzin mlk arm at ailt larm oinSl at hihodim mailot oarmim bao ailt oiSbo Sm ed hiom hch : oiSlH aHc mlakim al tglt plsr mlk aSor lamr ebdk obnk ani elh ohoSeni mkp mlk arm omkp mlk iSral hqomim eli : oiqH aHc at hksp oat hchb hnmza bit ihoh obazrot bit hmlk oiSlH lmlk aSor SHd : oiSme alio mlk aSor oiel mlk aSor al dmSq oitpSh oiglh qirh oat rzin hmit : oilk hmlk aHc lqrat tglt plasr mlk aSor domSq oira at hmcbH aSr bdmSq oiSlH hmlk aHc al aorih hkhn at dmot hmcbH oat tbnito lkl meSho : oibn aorih hkhn at hmcbH kkl aSr SlH hmlk aHc mdmSq kn eSh aorih hkhn ed boa hmlk aHc mdmSq : oiba hmlk mdmSq oira hmlk at hmcbH oiqrb hmlk el hmcbH oiel elio : oiqTr at elto oat mnHto oisk at nsko oicrq at dm hSlmim aSr lo el hmcbH : oat hmcbH hnHSt aSr lpni ihoh oiqrb mat pni hbit mbin hmcbH ombin bit ihoh oitn ato el irk hmcbH zponh : oizoho hmlk aHc at aorih hkhn lamr el hmcbH hgdol hqTr at elt hbqr oat mnHt herb oat elt hmlk oat mnHto oat elt kl em harz omnHtm onskihm okl dm elh okl dm cbH elio tcrq omcbH hnHSt ihih li lbqr : oieS aorih hkhn kkl aSr zoh hmlk aHc : oiqzz hmlk aHc at hmsgrot hmknot oisr melihm oat hkir oat him hord mel hbqr hnHSt aSr tHtih oitn ato el mrzpt abnim : oat misk hSbt aSr bno bbit oat mboa hmlk hHizonh hsb bit ihoh mpni mlk aSor : oitr dbri aHc aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb aHc em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir dod oimlk Hcqiho bno tHtio :

17

bSnt Stim eSrh laHc mlk ihodh mlk hoSe bn alh bSmron el iSral tSe Snim : oieS hre beini ihoh rq la kmlki iSral aSr hio lpnio : elio elh Slmnasr mlk aSor oihi lo hoSe ebd oiSb lo mnHh : oimza mlk aSor bhoSe qSr aSr SlH mlakim al soa mlk mzrim ola helh mnHh lmlk aSor kSnh bSnh oiezrho mlk aSor oiasrho bit kla : oiel mlk aSor bkl harz oiel Smron oizr elih SlS Snim : bSnt htSieit lhoSe lkd mlk aSor at Smron oigl at iSral aSorh oiSb atm bHlH obHbor nhr gocn oeri mdi : oihi ki HTao bni iSral lihoh alhihm hmelh atm marz mzrim mtHt id preh mlk mzrim oiirao alhim aHrim : oilko bHqot hgoim aSr horiS ihoh mpni bni iSral omlki iSral aSr eSo : oiHpao bni iSral dbrim aSr la kn el ihoh alhihm oibno lhm bmot bkl erihm mmgdl nozrim ed eir mbzr : oizbo lhm mzbot oaSrim el kl gbeh gbhh otHt kl ez renn : oiqTro Sm bkl bmot kgoim aSr hglh ihoh mpnihm oieSo dbrim reim lhkeis at ihoh : oiebdo hgllim aSr amr ihoh lhm la teSo at hdbr hch : oied ihoh biSral obihodh bid kl nbiao kl Hch lamr Sbo mdrkikm hreim oSmro mzoti Hqoti kkl htorh aSr zoiti at abtikm oaSr SlHti alikm bid ebdi hnbiaim : ola Smeo oiqSo at erpm kerp abotm aSr la hamino bihoh alhihm : oimaso at Hqio oat brito aSr krt at abotm oat edotio aSr heid bm oilko aHri hhbl oihblo oaHri hgoim aSr sbibtm aSr zoh ihoh atm lblti eSot khm : oiecbo at kl mzot ihoh alhihm oieSo lhm mskh Snim eglim oieSo aSirh oiStHoo lkl zba hSmim oiebdo at hbel : oiebiro at bnihm oat bnotihm baS oiqsmo qsmim oinHSo oitmkro leSot hre beini ihoh lhkeiso : oitanp ihoh mad biSral oisrm mel pnio la nSar rq SbT ihodh lbdo : gm ihodh la Smr at mzot ihoh alhihm oilko bHqot iSral aSr eSo : oimas ihoh bkl cre iSral oienm oitnm bid Ssim ed aSr hSlikm mpnio : ki qre iSral mel bit dod oimliko at irbem bn nbT oida irbem at iSral maHri ihoh ohHTiam HTah gdolh : oilko bni iSral bkl HTaot irbem aSr eSh la sro mmnh : ed aSr hsir ihoh at iSral mel pnio kaSr dbr bid kl ebdio hnbiaim oigl iSral mel admto aSorh ed hiom hch : oiba mlk aSor mbbl omkoth omeoa omHmt osproim oiSb beri Smron tHt bni iSral oirSo at Smron oiSbo berih : oihi btHlt Sbtm Sm la irao at ihoh oiSlH ihoh bhm at hariot oihio hrgim bhm : oiamro lmlk aSor lamr hgoim aSr hglit otoSb beri Smron la ideo at mSpT alhi harz oiSlH bm at hariot ohnm mmitim aotm kaSr ainm ideim at mSpT alhi harz : oizo mlk aSor lamr hliko Smh aHd mhkhnim aSr hglitm mSm oilko oiSbo Sm oirm at mSpT alhi harz : oiba aHd mhkhnim aSr hglo mSmron oiSb bbit al oihi morh atm aik iirao at ihoh : oihio eSim goi goi alhio oiniHo bbit hbmot aSr eSo hSmrnim goi goi berihm aSr hm iSbim Sm : oanSi bbl eSo at skot bnot oanSi kot eSo at nrgl oanSi Hmt eSo at aSima : oheoim eSo nbHc oat trtq ohsproim Srpim at bnihm baS ladrmlk oenmlk alh sprim : oihio iraim at ihoh oieSo lhm mqzotm khni bmot oihio eSim lhm bbit hbmot : at ihoh hio iraim oat alhihm hio ebdim kmSpT hgoim aSr hglo atm mSm : ed hiom hch hm eSim kmSpTim hraSnim ainm iraim at ihoh oainm eSim kHqtm okmSpTm oktorh okmzoh aSr zoh ihoh at bni ieqb aSr Sm Smo iSral : oikrt ihoh atm brit oizom lamr la tirao alhim aHrim ola tStHoo lhm ola tebdom ola tcbHo lhm : ki am at ihoh aSr helh atkm marz mzrim bkH gdol obcroe nToih ato tirao olo tStHoo olo tcbHo : oat hHqim oat hmSpTim ohtorh ohmzoh aSr ktb lkm tSmron leSot kl himim ola tirao alhim aHrim : ohbrit aSr krti atkm la tSkHo ola tirao alhim aHrim : ki am at ihoh alhikm tirao ohoa izil atkm mid kl aibikm : ola Smeo ki am kmSpTm hraSon hm eSim : oihio hgoim halh iraim at ihoh oat psilihm hio ebdim gm bnihm obni bnihm kaSr eSo abtm hm eSim ed hiom hch :

18

oihi bSnt SlS lhoSe bn alh mlk iSral mlk Hcqih bn aHc mlk ihodh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh hih bmlko oeSrim otSe Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo abi bt ckrih : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh dod abio : hoa hsir at hbmot oSbr at hmzbt okrt at haSrh oktt nHS hnHSt aSr eSh mSh ki ed himim hhmh hio bni iSral mqTrim lo oiqra lo nHStn : bihoh alhi iSral bTH oaHrio la hih kmho bkl mlki ihodh oaSr hio lpnio : oidbq bihoh la sr maHrio oiSmr mzotio aSr zoh ihoh at mSh : ohih ihoh emo bkl aSr iza iSkil oimrd bmlk aSor ola ebdo : hoa hkh at plStim ed ech oat gbolih mmgdl nozrim ed eir mbzr : oihi bSnh hrbieit lmlk Hcqiho hia hSnh hSbieit lhoSe bn alh mlk iSral elh Slmnasr mlk aSor el Smron oizr elih : oilkdh mqzh SlS Snim bSnt SS lHcqih hia Snt tSe lhoSe mlk iSral nlkdh Smron : oigl mlk aSor at iSral aSorh oinHm bHlH obHbor nhr gocn oeri mdi : el aSr la Smeo bqol ihoh alhihm oiebro at brito at kl aSr zoh mSh ebd ihoh ola Smeo ola eSo : obarbe eSrh Snh lmlk Hcqih elh snHrib mlk aSor el kl eri ihodh hbzrot oitpSm : oiSlH Hcqih mlk ihodh al mlk aSor lkiSh lamr HTati Sob meli at aSr ttn eli aSa oiSm mlk aSor el Hcqih mlk ihodh SlS maot kkr ksp oSlSim kkr chb : oitn Hcqih at kl hksp hnmza bit ihoh obazrot bit hmlk : bet hhia qzz Hcqih at dltot hikl ihoh oat hamnot aSr zph Hcqih mlk ihodh oitnm lmlk aSor : oiSlH mlk aSor at trtn oat rb sris oat rb Sqh mn lkiS al hmlk Hcqiho bHil kbd iroSlm oielo oibao iroSlm oielo oibao oiemdo btelt hbrkh helionh aSr bmslt Sdh kobs : oiqrao al hmlk oiza alhm aliqim bn Hlqiho aSr el hbit oSbnh hspr oioaH bn asp hmckir : oiamr alhm rb Sqh amro na al Hcqiho kh amr hmlk hgdol mlk aSor mh hbTHon hch aSr bTHt : amrt ak dbr Sptim ezh ogborh lmlHmh eth el mi bTHt ki mrdt bi : eth hnh bTHt lk el mSent hqnh hrzoz hch el mzrim aSr ismk aiS elio oba bkpo onqbh kn preh mlk mzrim lkl hbTHim elio : oki tamron ali al ihoh alhino bTHno hloa hoa aSr hsir Hcqiho at bmtio oat mcbHtio oiamr lihodh oliroSlm lpni hmcbH hch tStHoo biroSlm : oeth hterb na at adni at mlk aSor oatnh lk alpim sosim am tokl ltt lk rkbim elihm : oaik tSib at pni pHt aHd ebdi adni hqTnim otbTH lk el mzrim lrkb olprSim : eth hmbledi ihoh eliti el hmqom hch lhSHto ihoh amr ali elh el harz hcat ohSHith : oiamr aliqim bn Hlqiho oSbnh oioaH al rb Sqh dbr na al ebdik armit ki Smeim anHno oal tdbr emno ihodit bacni hem aSr el hHmh : oiamr alihm rb Sqh hel adnik oalik SlHni adni ldbr at hdbrim halh hla el hanSim hiSbim el hHmh lakl at Hrihm olStot at Sinihm emkm : oiemd rb Sqh oiqra bqol gdol ihodit oidbr oiamr Smeo dbr hmlk hgdol mlk aSor : kh amr hmlk al iSia lkm Hcqiho ki la iokl lhzil atkm mido : oal ibTH atkm Hcqiho al ihoh lamr hzl izilno ihoh ola tntn at heir hcat bid mlk aSor : al tSmeo al Hcqiho ki kh amr mlk aSor eSo ati brkh ozao ali oaklo aiS gpno oaiS tanto oSto aiS mi boro : ed bai olqHti atkm al arz karzkm arz dgn otiroS arz lHm okrmim arz cit izhr odbS oHio ola tmto oal tSmeo al Hcqiho ki isit atkm lamr ihoh izilno : hhzl hzilo alhi hgoim aiS at arzo mid mlk aSor : aih alhi Hmt oarpd aih alhi sproim hne oeoh ki hzilo at Smron midi : mi bkl alhi harzot aSr hzilo at arzm midi ki izil ihoh at iroSlm midi : ohHriSo hem ola eno ato dbr ki mzot hmlk hia lamr la tenho : oiba aliqim bn Hlqih aSr el hbit oSbna hspr oioaH bn asp hmckir al Hcqiho qroei bgdim oigdo lo dbri rb Sqh :

19

oihi kSme hmlk Hcqiho oiqre at bgdio oitks bSq oiba bit ihoh : oiSlH at aliqim aSr el hbit oSbna hspr oat cqni hkhnim mtksim bSqim al iSeiho hnbia bn amoz : oiamro alio kh amr Hcqiho iom zrh otokHh onazh hiom hch ki bao bnim ed mSbr okH ain lldh : aoli iSme ihoh alhik at kl dbri rb Sqh aSr SlHo mlk aSor adnio lHrp alhim Hi ohokiH bdbrim aSr Sme ihoh alhik onSat tplh bed hSarit hnmzah : oibao ebdi hmlk Hcqiho al iSeiho : oiamr lhm iSeiho kh tamron al adnikm kh amr ihoh al tira mpni hdbrim aSr Smet aSr gdpo neri mlk aSor ati : hnni ntn bo roH oSme Smoeh oSb larzo ohpltio bHrb barzo : oiSb rb Sqh oimza at mlk aSor nlHm el lbnh ki Sme ki nse mlkiS : oiSme al trhqh mlk koS lamr hnh iza lhlHm atk oiSb oiSlH mlakim al Hcqiho lamr : kh tamron al Hcqiho mlk ihodh lamr al iSak alhik aSr ath bTH bo lamr la tntn iroSlm bid mlk aSor : hnh ath Smet at aSr eSo mlki aSor lkl harzot lhHrimm oath tnzl : hhzilo atm alhi hgoim aSr SHto aboti at gocn oat Hrn orzp obni edn aSr btlaSr : aio mlk Hmt omlk arpd omlk leir sproim hne oeoh : oiqH Hcqiho at hsprim mid hmlakim oiqram oiel bit ihoh oiprSho Hcqiho lpni ihoh : oitpll Hcqiho lpni ihoh oiamr ihoh alhi iSral iSb hkrbim ath hoa halhim lbdk lkl mmlkot harz ath eSit at hSmim oat harz : hTh ihoh acnk oSme pqH ihoh einik orah oSme at dbri snHrib aSr SlHo lHrp alhim Hi : amnm ihoh hHribo mlki aSor at hgoim oat arzm : ontno at alhihm baS ki la alhim hmh ki am meSh idi adm ez oabn oiabdom : oeth ihoh alhino hoSieno na mido oideo kl mmlkot harz ki ath ihoh alhim lbdk : oiSlH iSeiho bn amoz al Hcqiho lamr kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aSr htpllt ali al snHrb mlk aSor Smeti : ch hdbr aSr dbr ihoh elio bch lk legh lk btolt bt zion aHrik raS hnieh bt iroSlm : at mi Hrpt ogdpt oel mi hrimot qol otSa mrom einik el qdoS iSral : bid mlakik Hrpt adni otamr brkb rkbi ani eliti mrom hrim irkti lbnon oakrt qomt arcio mbHor brSio oaboah mlon qzh ier krmlo : ani qrti oStiti mim crim oaHrb bkp pemi kl iari mzor : hla Smet lmrHoq ath eSiti lmimi qdm oizrtih eth hbiatih othi lhSot glim nzim erim bzrot : oiSbihn qzri id Hto oibSo hio eSb Sdh oirq dSa Hzir ggot oSdph lpni qmh : oSbtk ozatk obak ideti oat htrgck ali : ien htrgck ali oSannk elh bacni oSmti HHi bapk omtgi bSptik ohSbtik bdrk aSr bat bh : och lk haot akol hSnh spiH obSnh hSnit sHiS obSnh hSliSit creo oqzro onTeo krmim oaklo prim : oisph pliTt bit ihodh hnSarh SrS lmTh oeSh pri lmelh : ki miroSlm tza Sarit opliTh mhr zion qnat ihoh teSh cat : lkn kh amr ihoh al mlk aSor la iba al heir hcat ola iorh Sm Hz ola iqdmnh mgn ola iSpk elih sllh : bdrk aSr iba bh iSob oal heir hcat la iba nam ihoh : ognoti al heir hcat lhoSieh lmeni olmen dod ebdi : oihi blilh hhoa oiza mlak ihoh oik bmHnh aSor mah Smonim oHmSh alp oiSkimo bbqr ohnh klm pgrim mtim : oise oilk oiSb snHrib mlk aSor oiSb bninoh : oihi hoa mStHoh bit nsrk alhio oadrmlk oSrazr hkho bHrb ohmh nmlTo arz arrT oimlk asr Hdn bno tHtio :

20

bimim hhm Hlh Hcqiho lmot oiba alio iSeiho bn amoz hnbia oiamr alio kh amr ihoh zo lbitk ki mt ath ola tHih : oisb at pnio al hqir oitpll al ihoh lamr : anh ihoh ckr na at aSr hthlkti lpnik bamt oblbb Slm ohTob beinik eSiti oibk Hcqiho bki gdol : oihi iSeiho la iza heir htiknh odbr ihoh hih alio lamr : Sob oamrt al Hcqiho ngid emi kh amr ihoh alhi dod abik Smeti at tpltk raiti at dmetk hnni rpa lk biom hSliSi telh bit ihoh : ohspti el imik HmS eSrh Snh omkp mlk aSor azilk oat heir hcat ognoti el heir hcat lmeni olmen dod ebdi : oiamr iSeiho qHo dblt tanim oiqHo oiSimo el hSHin oiHi : oiamr Hcqiho al iSeiho mh aot ki irpa ihoh li oeliti biom hSliSi bit ihoh : oiamr iSeiho ch lk haot mat ihoh ki ieSh ihoh at hdbr aSr dbr hlk hzl eSr melot am iSob eSr melot : oiamr iHcqiho nql lzl lnTot eSr melot la ki iSob hzl aHrnit eSr melot : oiqra iSeiho hnbia al ihoh oiSb at hzl bmelot aSr irdh bmelot aHc aHrnit eSr melot : bet hhia SlH bradk bladn bn bladn mlk bbl sprim omnHh al Hcqiho ki Sme ki Hlh Hcqiho : oiSme elihm Hcqiho oiram at kl bit nkth at hksp oat hchb oat hbSmim oat Smn hTob oat bit klio oat kl aSr nmza baozrtio la hih dbr aSr la hram Hcqiho bbito obkl mmSlto : oiba iSeiho hnbia al hmlk Hcqiho oiamr alio mh amro hanSim halh omain ibao alik oiamr Hcqiho marz rHoqh bao mbbl : oiamr mh rao bbitk oiamr Hcqiho at kl aSr bbiti rao la hih dbr aSr la hraitm bazrti : oiamr iSeiho al Hcqiho Sme dbr ihoh : hnh imim baim onSa kl aSr bbitk oaSr azro abtik ed hiom hch bblh la iotr dbr amr ihoh : ombnik aSr izao mmk aSr tolid iqH ohio srisim bhikl mlk bbl : oiamr Hcqiho al iSeiho Tob dbr ihoh aSr dbrt oiamr hloa am Slom oamt ihih bimi : oitr dbri Hcqiho okl gborto oaSr eSh at hbrkh oat htelh oiba at hmim heirh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb Hcqiho em abtio oimlk mnSh bno tHtio :

21

bn Stim eSrh Snh mnSh bmlko oHmSim oHmS Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo Hpzi bh : oieS hre beini ihoh ktoebt hgoim aSr horiS ihoh mpni bni iSral : oiSb oibn at hbmot aSr abd Hcqiho abio oiqm mcbHt lbel oieS aSrh kaSr eSh aHab mlk iSral oiStHo lkl zba hSmim oiebd atm : obnh mcbHt bbit ihoh aSr amr ihoh biroSlm aSim at Smi : oibn mcbHot lkl zba hSmim bSti Hzrot bit ihoh : ohebir at bno baS oeonn onHS oeSh aob oidenim hrbh leSot hre beini ihoh lhkeis : oiSm at psl haSrh aSr eSh bbit aSr amr ihoh al dod oal Slmh bno bbit hch obiroSlm aSr bHrti mkl SbTi iSral aSim at Smi leolm : ola asip lhnid rgl iSral mn hadmh aSr ntti labotm rq am iSmro leSot kkl aSr zoitim olkl htorh aSr zoh atm ebdi mSh : ola Smeo oitem mnSh leSot at hre mn hgoim aSr hSmid ihoh mpni bni iSral : oidbr ihoh bid ebdio hnbiaim lamr : ien aSr eSh mnSh mlk ihodh htebot halh hre mkl aSr eSo hamri aSr lpnio oiHTa gm at ihodh bglolio : lkn kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hnni mbia reh el iroSlm oihodh aSr kl Smeio tzlnh Sti acnio : onTiti el iroSlm at qo Smron oat mSqlt bit aHab omHiti at iroSlm kaSr imHh at hzlHt mHh ohpk el pnih : onTSti at Sarit nHlti onttim bid aibihm ohio lbc olmSsh lkl aibihm : ien aSr eSo at hre beini oihio mkesim ati mn hiom aSr izao abotm mmzrim oed hiom hch : ogm dm nqi Spk mnSh hrbh mad ed aSr mla at iroSlm ph lph lbd mHTato aSr hHTia at ihodh leSot hre beini ihoh : oitr dbri mnSh okl aSr eSh oHTato aSr HTa hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb mnSh em abtio oiqbr bgn bito bgn eca oimlk amon bno tHtio : bn eSrim oStim Snh amon bmlko oStim Snim mlk biroSlm oSm amo mSlmt bt Hroz mn iTbh : oieS hre beini ihoh kaSr eSh mnSh abio : oilk bkl hdrk aSr hlk abio oiebd at hgllim aSr ebd abio oiStHo lhm : oiecb at ihoh alhi abtio ola hlk bdrk ihoh : oiqSro ebdi amon elio oimito at hmlk bbito : oik em harz at kl hqSrim el hmlk amon oimliko em harz at iaSiho bno tHtio : oitr dbri amon aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiqbr ato bqbrto bgn eca oimlk iaSiho bno tHtio :

22

bn Smnh Snh iaSiho bmlko oSlSim oaHt Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ididh bt edih mbzqt : oieS hiSr beini ihoh oilk bkl drk dod abio ola sr imin oSmaol : oihi bSmnh eSrh Snh lmlk iaSiho SlH hmlk at Spn bn azliho bn mSlm hspr bit ihoh lamr : elh al Hlqiho hkhn hgdol oitm at hksp hmoba bit ihoh aSr aspo Smri hsp mat hem : oitnh el id eSi hmlakh hmpqdim bbit ihoh oitno ato leSi hmlakh aSr bbit ihoh lHcq bdq hbit : lHrSim olbnim olgdrim olqnot ezim oabni mHzb lHcq at hbit : ak la iHSb atm hksp hntn el idm ki bamonh hm eSim : oiamr Hlqiho hkhn hgdol el Spn hspr spr htorh mzati bbit ihoh oitn Hlqih at hspr al Spn oiqraho : oiba Spn hspr al hmlk oiSb at hmlk dbr oiamr htiko ebdik at hksp hnmza bbit oitnho el id eSi hmlakh hmpqdim bit ihoh : oigd Spn hspr lmlk lamr spr ntn li Hlqih hkhn oiqraho Spn lpni hmlk : oihi kSme hmlk at dbri spr htorh oiqre at bgdio : oizo hmlk at Hlqih hkhn oat aHiqm bn Spn oat ekbor bn mikih oat Spn hspr oat eSih ebd hmlk lamr : lko drSo at ihoh bedi obed hem obed kl ihodh el dbri hspr hnmza hch ki gdolh Hmt ihoh aSr hia nzth bno el aSr la Smeo abtino el dbri hspr hch leSot kkl hktob elino : oilk Hlqiho hkhn oaHiqm oekbor oSpn oeSih al Hldh hnbiah aSt Slm bn tqoh bn HrHs Smr hbgdim ohia iSbt biroSlm bmSnh oidbro alih : otamr alihm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral amro laiS aSr SlH atkm ali : kh amr ihoh hnni mbia reh al hmqom hch oel iSbio at kl dbri hspr aSr qra mlk ihodh : tHt aSr ecboni oiqTro lalhim aHrim lmen hkeisni bkl meSh idihm onzth Hmti bmqom hch ola tkbh : oal mlk ihodh hSlH atkm ldrS at ihoh kh tamro alio kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hdbrim aSr Smet : ien rk lbbk otkne mpni ihoh bSmek aSr dbrti el hmqom hch oel iSbio lhiot lSmh olqllh otqre at bgdik otbkh lpni ogm anki Smeti nam ihoh : lkn hnni aspk el abtik onaspt al qbrtik bSlom ola trainh einik bkl hreh aSr ani mbia el hmqom hch oiSibo at hmlk dbr :

23

oiSlH hmlk oiaspo alio kl cqni ihodh oiroSlm : oiel hmlk bit ihoh okl aiS ihodh okl iSbi iroSlm ato ohkhnim ohnbiaim okl hem lmqTn oed gdol oiqra bacnihm at kl dbri spr hbrit hnmza bbit ihoh : oiemd hmlk el hemod oikrt at hbrit lpni ihoh llkt aHr ihoh olSmr mzotio oat edotio oat Hqtio bkl lb obkl npS lhqim at dbri hbrit hcat hktbim el hspr hch oiemd kl hem bbrit : oizo hmlk at Hlqiho hkhn hgdol oat khni hmSnh oat Smri hsp lhozia mhikl ihoh at kl hklim heSoim lbel olaSrh olkl zba hSmim oiSrpm mHoz liroSlm bSdmot qdron onSa at eprm bit al : ohSbit at hkmrim aSr ntno mlki ihodh oiqTr bbmot beri ihodh omsbi iroSlm oat hmqTrim lbel lSmS olirH olmclot olkl zba hSmim : oiza at haSrh mbit ihoh mHoz liroSlm al nHl qdron oiSrp ath bnHl qdron oidq lepr oiSlk at eprh el qbr bni hem : oitz at bti hqdSim aSr bbit ihoh aSr hnSim argot Sm btim laSrh : oiba at kl hkhnim meri ihodh oiTma at hbmot aSr qTro Smh hkhnim mgbe ed bar Sbe ontz at bmot hSerim aSr ptH Ser ihoSe Sr heir aSr el Smaol aiS bSer heir : ak la ielo khni hbmot al mcbH ihoh biroSlm ki am aklo mzot btok aHihm : oTma at htpt aSr bgi bni hnm lblti lhebir aiS at bno oat bto baS lmlk : oiSbt at hsosim aSr ntno mlki ihodh lSmS mba bit ihoh al lSkt ntn mlk hsris aSr bprorim oat mrkbot hSmS Srp baS : oat hmcbHot aSr el hgg elit aHc aSr eSo mlki ihodh oat hmcbHot aSr eSh mnSh bSti Hzrot bit ihoh ntz hmlk oirz mSm ohSlik at eprm al nHl qdron : oat hbmot aSr el pni iroSlm aSr mimin lhr hmSHit aSr bnh Slmh mlk iSral leStrt Sqz zidnim olkmoS Sqz moab olmlkm toebt bni emon Tma hmlk : oSbr at hmzbot oikrt at haSrim oimla at mqomm ezmot adm : ogm at hmcbH aSr bbit al hbmh aSr eSh irbem bn nbT aSr hHTia at iSral gm at hmcbH hhoa oat hbmh ntz oiSrp at hbmh hdq lepr oSrp aSrh : oipn iaSiho oira at hqbrim aSr Sm bhr oiSlH oiqH at hezmot mn hqbrim oiSrp el hmcbH oiTmaho kdbr ihoh aSr qra aiS halhim aSr qra at hdbrim halh : oiamr mh hzion hlc aSr ani rah oiamro alio anSi heir hqbr aiS halhim aSr ba mihodh oiqra at hdbrim halh aSr eSit el hmcbH bit al : oiamr hniHo lo aiS al ine ezmtio oimlTo ezmtio at ezmot hnbia aSr ba mSmron : ogm at kl bti hbmot aSr beri Smron aSr eSo mlki iSral lhkeis hsir iaSiho oieS lhm kkl hmeSim aSr eSh bbit al : oicbH at kl khni hbmot aSr Sm el hmcbHot oiSrp at ezmot adm elihm oiSb iroSlm : oizo hmlk at kl hem lamr eSo psH lihoh alhikm kktob el spr hbrit hch : ki la neSh kpsH hch mimi hSpTim aSr SpTo at iSral okl imi mlki iSral omlki ihodh : ki am bSmnh eSrh Snh lmlk iaSiho neSh hpsH hch lihoh biroSlm : ogm at habot oat hidenim oat htrpim oat hgllim oat kl hSqzim aSr nrao barz ihodh obiroSlm ber iaSiho lmen hqim at dbri htorh hktbim el hspr aSr mza Hlqiho hkhn bit ihoh : okmho la hih lpnio mlk aSr Sb al ihoh bkl lbbo obkl npSo obkl mado kkl tort mSh oaHrio la qm kmho : ak la Sb ihoh mHron apo hgdol aSr Hrh apo bihodh el kl hkesim aSr hkeiso mnSh : oiamr ihoh gm at ihodh asir mel pni kaSr hsrti at iSral omasti at heir hcat aSr bHrti at iroSlm oat hbit aSr amrti ihih Smi Sm : oitr dbri iaSiho okl aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : bimio elh preh nkh mlk mzrim el mlk aSor el nhr prt oilk hmlk iaSiho lqrato oimitho bmgdo krato ato : oirkbho ebdio mt mmgdo oibaho iroSlm oiqbrho bqbrto oiqH em harz at ihoaHc bn iaSiho oimSHo ato oimliko ato tHt abio : bn eSrim oSlS Snh ihoaHc bmlko oSlSh HdSim mlk biroSlm oSm amo HmoTl bt irmiho mlbnh : oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSo abtio : oiasrho preh nkh brblh barz Hmt bmlk biroSlm oitn enS el harz mah kkr ksp okkr chb : oimlk preh nkh at aliqim bn iaSiho tHt iaSiho abio oisb at Smo ihoiqim oat ihoaHc lqH oiba mzrim oimt Sm : ohksp ohchb ntn ihoiqim lpreh ak herik at harz ltt at hksp el pi preh aiS kerko ngS at hksp oat hchb at em harz ltt lpreh nkh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh ihoiqim bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo cbidh bt pdih mn romh : oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSo abtio :

24

bimio elh nbkdnazr mlk bbl oihi lo ihoiqim ebd SlS Snim oiSb oimrd bo : oiSlH ihoh bo at gdodi kSdim oat gdodi arm oat gdodi moab oat gdodi bni emon oiSlHm bihodh lhabido kdbr ihoh aSr dbr bid ebdio hnbiaim : ak el pi ihoh hith bihodh lhsir mel pnio bHTat mnSh kkl aSr eSh : ogm dm hnqi aSr Spk oimla at iroSlm dm nqi ola abh ihoh lslH : oitr dbri ihoiqim okl aSr eSh hla hm ktobim el spr dbri himim lmlki ihodh : oiSkb ihoiqim em abtio oimlk ihoikin bno tHtio : ola hsip eod mlk mzrim lzat marzo ki lqH mlk bbl mnHl mzrim ed nhr prt kl aSr hith lmlk mzrim : bn Smnh eSrh Snh ihoikin bmlko oSlSh HdSim mlk biroSlm oSm amo nHSta bt alntn miroSlm : oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh abio : bet hhia elh ebdi nbkdnazr mlk bbl iroSlm otba heir bmzor : oiba nbokdnazr mlk bbl el heir oebdio zrim elih : oiza ihoikin mlk ihodh el mlk bbl hoa oamo oebdio oSrio osrisio oiqH ato mlk bbl bSnt Smnh lmlko : oioza mSm at kl aozrot bit ihoh oaozrot bit hmlk oiqzz at kl kli hchb aSr eSh Slmh mlk iSral bhikl ihoh kaSr dbr ihoh : ohglh at kl iroSlm oat kl hSrim oat kl gbori hHil eSrh alpim golh okl hHrS ohmsgr la nSar colt dlt em harz : oigl at ihoikin bblh oat am hmlk oat nSi hmlk oat srisio oat aoli harz holik golh miroSlm bblh : oat kl anSi hHil Sbet alpim ohHrS ohmsgr alp hkl gborim eSi mlHmh oibiam mlk bbl golh bblh : oimlk mlk bbl at mtnih ddo tHtio oisb at Smo zdqiho : bn eSrim oaHt Snh zdqiho bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo HmiTl bt irmiho mlbnh : oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh ihoiqim : ki el ap ihoh hith biroSlm obihodh ed hSlko atm mel pnio oimrd zdqiho bmlk bbl :

25

oihi bSnt htSieit lmlko bHdS heSiri beSor lHdS ba nbkdnazr mlk bbl hoa okl Hilo el iroSlm oiHn elih oibno elih diq sbib : otba heir bmzor ed eSti eSrh Snh lmlk zdqiho : btSeh lHdS oiHcq hreb beir ola hih lHm lem harz : otbqe heir okl anSi hmlHmh hlilh drk Ser bin hHmtim aSr el gn hmlk okSdim el heir sbib oilk drk herbh : oirdpo Hil kSdim aHr hmlk oiSgo ato berbot irHo okl Hilo npzo melio : oitpSo at hmlk oielo ato al mlk bbl rblth oidbro ato mSpT : oat bni zdqiho SHTo leinio oat eini zdqiho eor oiasrho bnHStim oibaho bbl : obHdS hHmiSi bSbeh lHdS hia Snt tSe eSrh Snh lmlk nbkdnazr mlk bbl ba nbocradn rb TbHim ebd mlk bbl iroSlm : oiSrp at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk oat kl bti iroSlm oat kl bit gdol Srp baS : oat Homt iroSlm sbib ntzo kl Hil kSdim aSr rb TbHim : oat itr hem hnSarim beir oat hnplim aSr nplo el hmlk bbl oat itr hhmon hglh nbocradn rb TbHim : omdlt harz hSair rb TbHim lkrmim oligbim : oat emodi hnHSt aSr bit ihoh oat hmknot oat im hnHSt aSr bbit ihoh Sbro kSdim oiSao at nHStm bblh : oat hsirt oat hieim oat hmcmrot oat hkpot oat kl kli hnHSt aSr iSrto bm lqHo : oat hmHtot oat hmcrqot aSr chb chb oaSr ksp ksp lqH rb TbHim : hemodim Snim him haHd ohmknot aSr eSh Slmh lbit ihoh la hih mSql lnHSt kl hklim halh : Smnh eSrh amh qomt hemod haHd oktrt elio nHSt oqomt hktrt SlS amh oSbkh ormnim el hktrt sbib hkl nHSt okalh lemod hSni el hSbkh : oiqH rb TbHim at Srih khn hraS oat zpniho khn mSnh oat SlSt Smri hsp : omn heir lqH sris aHd aSr hoa pqid el anSi hmlHmh oHmSh anSim mrai pni hmlk aSr nmzao beir oat hspr Sr hzba hmzba at em harz oSSim aiS mem harz hnmzaim beir : oiqH atm nbocradn rb TbHim oilk atm el mlk bbl rblth : oik atm mlk bbl oimitm brblh barz Hmt oigl ihodh mel admto : ohem hnSar barz ihodh aSr hSair nbokdnazr mlk bbl oipqd elihm at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn : oiSmeo kl Sri hHilim hmh ohanSim ki hpqid mlk bbl at gdliho oibao al gdliho hmzph oiSmeal bn ntnih oioHnn bn qrH oSrih bn tnHmt hnTpti oiacniho bn hmekti hmh oanSihm : oiSbe lhm gdliho olanSihm oiamr lhm al tirao mebdi hkSdim Sbo barz oebdo at mlk bbl oiTb lkm : oihi bHdS hSbiei ba iSmeal bn ntnih bn aliSme mcre hmlokh oeSrh anSim ato oiko at gdliho oimt oat hihodim oat hkSdim aSr hio ato bmzph : oiqmo kl hem mqTn oed gdol oSri hHilim oibao mzrim ki irao mpni kSdim : oihi bSlSim oSbe Snh lglot ihoikin mlk ihodh bSnim eSr HdS beSrim oSbeh lHdS nSa aoil mrdk mlk bbl bSnt mlko at raS ihoikin mlk ihodh mbit kla : oidbr ato Tbot oitn at ksao mel ksa hmlkim aSr ato bbbl : oSna at bgdi klao oakl lHm tmid lpnio kl imi Hiio : oarHto arHt tmid ntnh lo mat hmlk dbr iom biomo kl imi Hio :

iSeiho

1

Hcon iSeiho bn amoz aSr Hch el ihodh oiroSlm bimi eciho iotm aHc iHcqiho mlki ihodh : Smeo Smim ohacini arz ki ihoh dbr bnim gdlti orommti ohm pSeo bi : ide Sor qnho oHmor abos belio iSral la ide emi la htbonn : hoi goi HTa em kbd eon cre mreim bnim mSHitim ecbo at ihoh nazo at qdoS iSral ncro aHor : el mh tko eod tosipo srh kl raS lHli okl lbb doi : mkp rgl oed raS ain bo mtm pze oHborh omkh Trih la cro ola HbSo ola rkkh bSmn : arzkm Smmh erikm Srpot aS admtkm lngdkm crim aklim ath oSmmh kmhpkt crim : onotrh bt zion kskh bkrm kmlonh bmqSh keir nzorh : loli ihoh zbaot hotir lno Srid kmeT ksdm hiino lemrh dmino : Smeo dbr ihoh qzini sdm hacino tort alhino em emrh : lmh li rb cbHikm iamr ihoh Sbeti elot ailim oHlb mriaim odm prim okbSim oetodim la Hpzti : ki tbao lraot pni mi bqS cat midkm rms Hzri : la tosipo hbia mnHt Soa qTrt toebh hia li HdS oSbt qra mqra la aokl aon oezrh : HdSikm omoedikm Snah npSi hio eli lTrH nlaiti nSa : obprSkm kpikm aelim eini mkm gm ki trbo tplh ainni Sme idikm dmim mlao : rHzo hcko hsiro re mellikm mngd eini Hdlo hre : lmdo hiTb drSo mSpT aSro Hmoz SpTo itom ribo almnh : lko na onokHh iamr ihoh am ihio HTaikm kSnim kSlg ilbino am iadimo ktole kzmr ihio : am tabo oSmetm Tob harz taklo : oam tmano omritm Hrb taklo ki pi ihoh dbr : aikh hith lconh qrih namnh mlati mSpT zdq ilin bh oeth mrzHim : kspk hih lsigim sbak mhol bmim : Srik sorrim oHbri gnbim klo ahb SHd ordp Slmnim itom la iSpTo orib almnh la iboa alihm : lkn nam hadon ihoh zbaot abir iSral hoi anHm mzri oanqmh maoibi : oaSibh idi elik oazrp kbr sigik oasirh kl bdilik : oaSibh SpTik kbraSnh oiezik kbtHlh aHri kn iqra lk eir hzdq qrih namnh : zion bmSpT tpdh oSbih bzdqh : oSbr pSeim oHTaim iHdo oecbi ihoh iklo : ki ibSo mailim aSr Hmdtm otHpro mhgnot aSr bHrtm : ki thio kalh nblt elh okgnh aSr mim ain lh : ohih hHsn lnert opelo lnizoz obero Snihm iHdo oain mkbh :

2

hdbr aSr Hch iSeiho bn amoz el ihodh oiroSlm : ohih baHrit himim nkon ihih hr bit ihoh braS hhrim onSa mgbeot onhro alio kl hgoim : ohlko emim rbim oamro lko onelh al hr ihoh al bit alhi ieqb oirno mdrkio onlkh barHtio ki mzion tza torh odbr ihoh miroSlm : oSpT bin hgoim ohokiH lemim rbim oktto Hrbotm latim oHnitotihm lmcmrot la iSa goi al goi Hrb ola ilmdo eod mlHmh : bit ieqb lko onlkh baor ihoh : ki nTSth emk bit ieqb ki mlao mqdm oennim kplStim obildi nkrim iSpiqo : otmla arzo ksp ochb oain qzh lazrtio otmla arzo sosim oain qzh lmrkbtio : otmla arzo alilim lmeSh idio iStHoo laSr eSo azbetio : oiSH adm oiSpl aiS oal tSa lhm : boa bzor ohTmn bepr mpni pHd ihoh omhdr gano : eini gbhot adm Spl oSH rom anSim onSgb ihoh lbdo biom hhoa : ki iom lihoh zbaot el kl gah orm oel kl nSa oSpl : oel kl arci hlbnon hrmim ohnSaim oel kl aloni hbSn : oel kl hhrim hrmim oel kl hgbeot hnSaot : oel kl mgdl gbh oel kl Homh bzorh : oel kl aniot trSiS oel kl Skiot hHmdh : oSH gbhot hadm oSpl rom anSim onSgb ihoh lbdo biom hhoa : ohalilim klil iHlp : obao bmerot zrim obmHlot epr mpni pHd ihoh omhdr gaono bqomo lerz harz : biom hhoa iSlik hadm at alili kspo oat alili chbo aSr eSo lo lhStHot lHpr prot oleTlpim : lboa bnqrot hzrim obsepi hsleim mpni pHd ihoh omhdr gaono bqomo lerz harz : Hdlo lkm mn hadm aSr nSmh bapo ki bmh nHSb hoa :

3

ki hnh hadon ihoh zbaot msir miroSlm omihodh mSen omSenh kl mSen lHm okl mSen mim : gbor oaiS mlHmh SopT onbia oqsm ocqn : Sr HmSim onSoa pnim oioez oHkm HrSim onbon lHS : ontti nerim Srihm otelolim imSlo bm : ongS hem aiS baiS oaiS breho irhbo hner bcqn ohnqlh bnkbd : ki itpS aiS baHio bit abio Smlh lkh qzin thih lno ohmkSlh hcat tHt idk : iSa biom hhoa lamr la ahih HbS obbiti ain lHm oain Smlh la tSimni qzin em : ki kSlh iroSlm oihodh npl ki lSonm omellihm al ihoh lmrot eni kbodo : hkrt pnihm enth bm oHTatm ksdm hgido la kHdo aoi lnpSm ki gmlo lhm reh : amro zdiq ki Tob ki pri mellihm iaklo : aoi lrSe re ki gmol idio ieSh lo : emi ngSio meoll onSim mSlo bo emi maSrik mteim odrk arHtik bleo : nzb lrib ihoh oemd ldin emim : ihoh bmSpT iboa em cqni emo oSrio oatm bertm hkrm gclt heni bbtikm : mlkm tdkao emi opni eniim tTHno nam adni ihoh zbaot : oiamr ihoh ien ki gbho bnot zion otlknh nToot gron omSqrot einim hlok oTpop tlknh obrglihm teksnh : oSpH adni qdqd bnot zion oihoh pthn ierh : biom hhoa isir adni at tpart heksim ohSbisim ohShrnim : hnTpot ohSrot ohrelot : hparim ohzedot ohqSrim obti hnpS ohlHSim : hTbeot oncmi hap : hmHlzot ohmeTpot ohmTpHot ohHriTim : hglinim ohsdinim ohznipot ohrdidim : ohih tHt bSm mq ihih otHt Hgorh nqph otHt meSh mqSh qrHh otHt ptigil mHgrt Sq ki tHt ipi : mtik bHrb iplo ogbortk bmlHmh : oano oablo ptHih onqth larz tSb :

4

ohHciqo Sbe nSim baiS aHd biom hhoa lamr lHmno nakl oSmltno nlbS rq iqra Smk elino asp Hrptno : biom hhoa ihih zmH ihoh lzbi olkbod opri harz lgaon oltpart lpliTt iSral : ohih hnSar bzion ohnotr biroSlm qdoS iamr lo kl hktob lHiim biroSlm : am rHz adni at zat bnot zion oat dmi iroSlm idiH mqrbh broH mSpT obroH ber : obra ihoh el kl mkon hr zion oel mqrah enn iomm oeSn ongh aS lhbh lilh ki el kl kbod Hph : oskh thih lzl iomm mHrb olmHsh olmstor mcrm ommTr :

5

aSirh na lididi Sirt dodi lkrmo krm hih lididi bqrn bn Smn : oiecqho oisqlho oiTeho Srq oibn mgdl btoko ogm iqb Hzb bo oiqo leSot enbim oieS baSim : oeth ioSb iroSlm oaiS ihodh SpTo na bini obin krmi : mh leSot eod lkrmi ola eSiti bo mdoe qoiti leSot enbim oieS baSim : oeth aodieh na atkm at aSr ani eSh lkrmi hsr mSokto ohih lber prz gdro ohih lmrms : oaSitho bth la icmr ola iedr oelh Smir oSit oel hebim azoh mhmTir elio mTr : ki krm ihoh zbaot bit iSral oaiS ihodh nTe SeSoeio oiqo lmSpT ohnh mSpH lzdqh ohnh zeqh : hoi mgiei bit bbit Sdh bSdh iqribo ed aps mqom ohoSbtm lbdkm bqrb harz : bacni ihoh zbaot am la btim rbim lSmh ihio gdlim oTobim main ioSb : ki eSrt zmdi krm ieSo bt aHt ocre Hmr ieSh aiph : hoi mSkimi bbqr Skr irdpo maHri bnSp iin idliqm : ohih knor onbl tp oHlil oiin mStihm oat pel ihoh la ibiTo omeSh idio la rao : lkn glh emi mbli det okbodo mti reb ohmono zHh zma : lkn hrHibh Saol npSh operh pih lbli Hq oird hdrh ohmonh oSaonh oelc bh : oiSH adm oiSpl aiS oeini gbhim tSplnh : oigbh ihoh zbaot bmSpT ohal hqdoS nqdS bzdqh : oreo kbSim kdbrm oHrbot mHim grim iaklo : hoi mSki heon bHbli hSoa okebot heglh HTah : hamrim imhr iHiSh meSho lmen nrah otqrb otboah ezt qdoS iSral ondeh : hoi hamrim lre Tob olTob re Smim HSk laor oaor lHSk Smim mr lmtoq omtoq lmr : hoi Hkmim beinihm ongd pnihm nbnim : hoi gborim lStot iin oanSi Hil lmsk Skr : mzdiqi rSe eqb SHd ozdqt zdiqim isiro mmno : lkn kakl qS lSon aS oHSS lhbh irph SrSm kmq ihih oprHm kabq ielh ki maso at tort ihoh zbaot oat amrt qdoS iSral nazo : el kn Hrh ap ihoh bemo oiT ido elio oikho oirgco hhrim othi nbltm ksoHh bqrb Hozot bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih : onSa ns lgoim mrHoq oSrq lo mqzh harz ohnh mhrh ql iboa : ain eip oain koSl bo la inom ola iiSn ola nptH acor Hlzio ola ntq Srok nelio : aSr Hzio Snonim okl qSttio drkot prsot sosio kzr nHSbo oglglio ksoph : Sagh lo klbia oSag kkpirim oinhm oiaHc Trp oipliT oain mzil : oinhm elio biom hhoa knhmt im onbT larz ohnh HSk zr oaor HSk beripih :

6

bSnt mot hmlk eciho oarah at adni iSb el ksa rm onSa oSolio mlaim at hhikl : Srpim emdim mmel lo SS knpim SS knpim laHd bStim iksh pnio obStim iksh rglio obStim ieopp : oqra ch al ch oamr qdoS qdoS qdoS ihoh zbaot mla kl harz kbodo : oineo amot hspim mqol hqora ohbit imla eSn : oamr aoi li ki ndmiti ki aiS Tma Sptim anki obtok em Tma Sptim anki ioSb ki at hmlk ihoh zbaot rao eini : oiep ali aHd mn hSrpim obido rzph bmlqHim lqH mel hmcbH : oige el pi oiamr hnh nge ch el Sptik osr eonk oHTatk tkpr : oaSme at qol adni amr at mi aSlH omi ilk lno oamr hnni SlHni : oiamr lk oamrt lem hch Smeo Smoe oal tbino orao rao oal tdeo : hSmn lb hem hch oacnio hkbd oeinio hSe pn irah beinio obacnio iSme olbbo ibin oSb orpa lo : oamr ed mti adni oiamr ed aSr am Sao erim main ioSb obtim main adm ohadmh tSah Smmh : orHq ihoh at hadm orbh hecobh bqrb harz : oeod bh eSrih oSbh ohith lber kalh okalon aSr bSlkt mzbt bm cre qdS mzbth :

7

oihi bimi aHc bn iotm bn eciho mlk ihodh elh rzin mlk arm opqH bn rmliho mlk iSral iroSlm lmlHmh elih ola ikl lhlHm elih : oigd lbit dod lamr nHh arm el aprim oine lbbo olbb emo knoe ezi ier mpni roH : oiamr ihoh al iSeiho za na lqrat aHc ath oSar iSob bnk al qzh telt hbrkh helionh al mslt Sdh kobs : oamrt alio hSmr ohSqT al tira olbbk al irk mSni cnbot haodim heSnim halh bHri ap rzin oarm obn rmliho : ien ki iez elik arm reh aprim obn rmliho lamr : nelh bihodh onqiznh onbqenh alino onmlik mlk btokh at bn Tbal : kh amr adni ihoh la tqom ola thih : ki raS arm dmSq oraS dmSq rzin obeod SSim oHmS Snh iHt aprim mem : oraS aprim Smron oraS Smron bn rmliho am la tamino ki la tamno : oiosp ihoh dbr al aHc lamr : Sal lk aot mem ihoh alhik hemq Salh ao hgbh lmelh : oiamr aHc la aSal ola ansh at ihoh : oiamr Smeo na bit dod hmeT mkm hlaot anSim ki tlao gm at alhi : lkn itn adni hoa lkm aot hnh helmh hrh oildt bn oqrat Smo emno al : Hmah odbS iakl ldeto maos bre obHor bTob : ki bTrm ide hner mas bre obHr bTob tecb hadmh aSr ath qz mpni Sni mlkih : ibia ihoh elik oel emk oel bit abik imim aSr la bao lmiom sor aprim mel ihodh at mlk aSor : ohih biom hhoa iSrq ihoh lcbob aSr bqzh iari mzrim oldborh aSr barz aSor : obao onHo klm bnHli hbtot obnqiqi hsleim obkl hnezozim obkl hnhllim : biom hhoa iglH adni bter hSkirh bebri nhr bmlk aSor at hraS oSer hrglim ogm at hcqn tsph : ohih biom hhoa iHih aiS eglt bqr oSti zan : ohih mrb eSot Hlb iakl Hmah ki Hmah odbS iakl kl hnotr bqrb harz : ohih biom hhoa ihih kl mqom aSr ihih Sm alp gpn balp ksp lSmir olSit ihih : bHzim obqSt iboa Smh ki Smir oSit thih kl harz : okl hhrim aSr bmedr iedron la tboa Smh irat Smir oSit ohih lmSlH Sor olmrms Sh :

8

oiamr ihoh ali qH lk glion gdol oktb elio bHrT anoS lmhr Sll HS bc : oaeidh li edim namnim at aorih hkhn oat ckriho bn ibrkiho : oaqrb al hnbiah othr otld bn oiamr ihoh ali qra Smo mhr Sll HS bc : ki bTrm ide hner qra abi oami iSa at Hil dmSq oat Sll Smron lpni mlk aSor : oisp ihoh dbr ali eod lamr : ien ki mas hem hch at mi hSlH hhlkim laT omSoS at rzin obn rmliho : olkn hnh adni melh elihm at mi hnhr hezomim ohrbim at mlk aSor oat kl kbodo oelh el kl apiqio ohlk el kl gdotio : oHlp bihodh STp oebr ed zoar igie ohih mTot knpio mla rHb arzk emno al : reo emim oHto ohacino kl mrHqi arz htacro oHto htacro oHto : ezo ezh otpr dbro dbr ola iqom ki emno al : ki kh amr ihoh ali bHcqt hid oisrni mlkt bdrk hem hch lamr : la tamron qSr lkl aSr iamr hem hch qSr oat morao la tirao ola terizo : at ihoh zbaot ato tqdiSo ohoa morakm ohoa merzkm : ohih lmqdS olabn ngp olzor mkSol lSni bti iSral lpH olmoqS lioSb iroSlm : okSlo bm rbim onplo onSbro onoqSo onlkdo : zor teodh Htom torh blmdi : oHkiti lihoh hmstir pnio mbit ieqb oqoiti lo : hnh anki ohildim aSr ntn li ihoh latot olmoptim biSral mem ihoh zbaot hSkn bhr zion : oki iamro alikm drSo al habot oal hidenim hmzpzpim ohmhgim hloa em al alhio idrS bed hHiim al hmtim : ltorh olteodh am la iamro kdbr hch aSr ain lo SHr : oebr bh nqSh oreb ohih ki ireb ohtqzp oqll bmlko obalhio opnh lmelh : oal arz ibiT ohnh zrh oHSkh meop zoqh oaplh mndH :

9

ki la moep laSr mozq lh ket hraSon hql arzh cblon oarzh nptli ohaHron hkbid drk him ebr hirdn glil hgoim : hem hhlkim bHSk rao aor gdol iSbi barz zlmot aor ngh elihm : hrbit hgoi la hgdlt hSmHh SmHo lpnik kSmHt bqzir kaSr igilo bHlqm Sll : ki at el sblo oat mTh Skmo SbT hngS bo hHtt kiom mdin : ki kl saon san breS oSmlh mgollh bdmim ohith lSrph maklt aS : ki ild ild lno bn ntn lno othi hmSrh el Skmo oiqra Smo pla ioez al gbor abied Sr Slom : lmrbh hmSrh olSlom ain qz el ksa dod oel mmlkto lhkin ath olsedh bmSpT obzdqh meth oed eolm qnat ihoh zbaot teSh cat : dbr SlH adni bieqb onpl biSral : oideo hem klo aprim oioSb Smron bgaoh obgdl lbb lamr : lbnim nplo ogcit nbnh Sqmim gdeo oarcim nHlip : oiSgb ihoh at zri rzin elio oat aibio isksk : arm mqdm oplStim maHor oiaklo at iSral bkl ph bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih : ohem la Sb ed hmkho oat ihoh zbaot la drSo : oikrt ihoh miSral raS ocnb kph oagmon iom aHd : cqn onSoa pnim hoa hraS onbia morh Sqr hoa hcnb : oihio maSri hem hch mteim omaSrio mbleim : el kn el bHorio la iSmH adni oat itmio oat almntio la irHm ki klo Hnp omre okl ph dbr nblh bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih : ki berh kaS rSeh Smir oSit takl otzt bsbki hier oitabko gaot eSn : bebrt ihoh zbaot netm arz oihi hem kmaklt aS aiS al aHio la iHmlo : oigcr el imin oreb oiakl el Smaol ola Sbeo aiS bSr creo iaklo : mnSh at aprim oaprim at mnSh iHdo hmh el ihodh bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih :

10

hoi hHqqim Hqqi aon omktbim eml ktbo : lhTot mdin dlim olgcl mSpT enii emi lhiot almnot Sllm oat itomim ibco : omh teSo liom pqdh olSoah mmrHq tboa el mi tnoso lecrh oanh tecbo kbodkm : blti kre tHt asir otHt hrogim iplo bkl cat la Sb apo oeod ido nToih : hoi aSor SbT api omTh hoa bidm cemi : bgoi Hnp aSlHno oel em ebrti azono lSll Sll olbc bc olSimo mrms kHmr Hozot : ohoa la kn idmh olbbo la kn iHSb ki lhSmid blbbo olhkrit goim la meT : ki iamr hla Sri iHdo mlkim : hla kkrkmiS klno am la karpd Hmt am la kdmSq Smron : kaSr mzah idi lmmlkt halil opsilihm miroSlm omSmron : hla kaSr eSiti lSmron olalilih kn aeSh liroSlm olezbih : ohih ki ibze adni at kl meSho bhr zion obiroSlm apqd el pri gdl lbb mlk aSor oel tpart rom einio : ki amr bkH idi eSiti obHkmti ki nbnoti oasir gbolt emim oetidtihm SoSti oaorid kabir ioSbim : otmza kqn idi lHil hemim okasp bizim ecbot kl harz ani aspti ola hih ndd knp opzh ph omzpzp : hitpar hgrcn el hHzb bo am itgdl hmSor el mnipo khnip SbT at mrimio khrim mTh la ez : lkn iSlH hadon ihoh zbaot bmSmnio rcon otHt kbdo iqd iqd kiqod aS : ohih aor iSral laS oqdoSo llhbh oberh oaklh Sito oSmiro biom aHd : okbod iero okrmlo mnpS oed bSr iklh ohih kmss nss : oSar ez iero mspr ihio oner iktbm : ohih biom hhoa la iosip eod Sar iSral opliTt bit ieqb lhSen el mkho onSen el ihoh qdoS iSral bamt : Sar iSob Sar ieqb al al gbor : ki am ihih emk iSral kHol him Sar iSob bo klion Hroz SoTp zdqh : ki klh onHrzh adni ihoh zbaot eSh bqrb kl harz : lkn kh amr adni ihoh zbaot al tira emi iSb zion maSor bSbT ikkh omTho iSa elik bdrk mzrim : ki eod meT mcer oklh cem oapi el tblitm : oeorr elio ihoh zbaot SoT kmkt mdin bzor eorb omTho el him onSao bdrk mzrim : ohih biom hhoa isor sblo mel Skmk oelo mel zoark oHbl el mpni Smn : ba el eit ebr bmgron lmkmS ipqid klio : ebro mebrh gbe mlon lno Hrdh hrmh gbet Saol nsh : zhli qolk bt glim hqSibi liSh enih entot : nddh mdmnh iSbi hgbim heico : eod hiom bnb lemd inpp ido hr bit zion gbet iroSlm : hnh hadon ihoh zbaot msep parh bmerzh ormi hqomh gdoeim ohgbhim iSplo : onqp sbki hier bbrcl ohlbnon badir ipol :

11

oiza HTr mgce iSi onzr mSrSio iprh : onHh elio roH ihoh roH Hkmh obinh roH ezh ogborh roH det oirat ihoh : ohriHo birat ihoh ola lmrah einio iSpoT ola lmSme acnio iokiH : oSpT bzdq dlim ohokiH bmiSor lenoi arz ohkh arz bSbT pio obroH Sptio imit rSe : ohih zdq acor mtnio ohamonh acor Hlzio : ogr cab em kbS onmr em gdi irbz oegl okpir omria iHdo oner qTn nhg bm : oprh odb treinh iHdo irbzo ildihn oarih kbqr iakl tbn : oSeSe ionq el Hr ptn oel maort zpeoni gmol ido hdh : la ireo ola iSHito bkl hr qdSi ki mlah harz deh at ihoh kmim lim mksim : ohih biom hhoa SrS iSi aSr emd lns emim alio goim idrSo ohith mnHto kbod : ohih biom hhoa iosip adni Snit ido lqnot at Sar emo aSr iSar maSor ommzrim omptros omkoS omeilm omSner omHmt omaii him : onSa ns lgoim oasp ndHi iSral onpzot ihodh iqbz marbe knpot harz : osrh qnat aprim ozrri ihodh ikrto aprim la iqna at ihodh oihodh la izr at aprim : oepo bktp plStim imh iHdo ibco at bni qdm adom omoab mSloH idm obni emon mSmetm : ohHrim ihoh at lSon im mzrim ohnip ido el hnhr beim roHo ohkho lSbeh nHlim ohdrik bnelim : ohith mslh lSar emo aSr iSar maSor kaSr hith liSral biom elto marz mzrim :

12

oamrt biom hhoa aodk ihoh ki anpt bi iSb apk otnHmni : hnh al iSoeti abTH ola apHd ki eci ocmrt ih ihoh oihi li liSoeh : oSabtm mim bSSon mmeini hiSoeh : oamrtm biom hhoa hodo lihoh qrao bSmo hodieo bemim eliltio hckiro ki nSgb Smo : cmro ihoh ki gaot eSh midet cat bkl harz : zhli orni ioSbt zion ki gdol bqrbk qdoS iSral :

13

mSa bbl aSr Hch iSeiho bn amoz : el hr nSph Sao ns hrimo qol lhm hnipo id oibao ptHi ndibim : ani zoiti lmqdSi gm qrati gbori lapi elici gaoti : qol hmon bhrim dmot em rb qol Saon mmlkot goim naspim ihoh zbaot mpqd zba mlHmh : baim marz mrHq mqzh hSmim ihoh okli cemo lHbl kl harz : hililo ki qrob iom ihoh kSd mSdi iboa : el kn kl idim trpinh okl lbb anoS ims : onbhlo zirim oHblim iaHcon kioldh iHilon aiS al reho itmho pni lhbim pnihm : hnh iom ihoh ba akcri oebrh oHron ap lSom harz lSmh oHTaih iSmid mmnh : ki kokbi hSmim oksilihm la ihlo aorm HSk hSmS bzato oirH la igih aoro : opqdti el tbl reh oel rSeim eonm ohSbti gaon cdim ogaot erizim aSpil : aoqir anoS mpc oadm mktm aopir : el kn Smim argic otreS harz mmqomh bebrt ihoh zbaot obiom Hron apo : ohih kzbi mdH okzan oain mqbz aiS al emo ipno oaiS al arzo inoso : kl hnmza idqr okl hnsph ipol bHrb : oellihm irTSo leinihm iSso btihm onSihm tSglnh : hnni meir elihm at mdi aSr ksp la iHSbo ochb la iHpzo bo : oqStot nerim trTSnh opri bTn la irHmo el bnim la tHos einm : ohith bbl zbi mmlkot tpart gaon kSdim kmhpkt alhim at sdm oat emrh : la tSb lnzH ola tSkn ed dor odor ola ihl Sm erbi oreim la irbzo Sm : orbzo Sm ziim omlao btihm aHim oSkno Sm bnot ienh oSeirim irqdo Sm : oenh aiim balmnotio otnim bhikli eng oqrob lboa eth oimih la imSko :

14

ki irHm ihoh at ieqb obHr eod biSral ohniHm el admtm onloh hgr elihm onspHo el bit ieqb : olqHom emim ohbiaom al mqomm ohtnHlom bit iSral el admt ihoh lebdim olSpHot ohio Sbim lSbihm ordo bngSihm : ohih biom hniH ihoh lk mezbk omrgck omn hebdh hqSh aSr ebd bk : onSat hmSl hch el mlk bbl oamrt aik Sbt ngS Sbth mdhbh : Sbr ihoh mTh rSeim SbT mSlim : mkh emim bebrh mkt blti srh rdh bap goim mrdp bli HSk : nHh SqTh kl harz pzHo rnh : gm broSim SmHo lk arci lbnon mac Skbt la ielh hkrt elino : Saol mtHt rgch lk lqrat boak eorr lk rpaim kl etodi arz hqim mksaotm kl mlki goim : klm ieno oiamro alik gm ath Hlit kmono alino nmSlt : hord Saol gaonk hmit nblik tHtik ize rmh omksik toleh : aik nplt mSmim hill bn SHr ngdet larz HolS el goim : oath amrt blbbk hSmim aelh mmel lkokbi al arim ksai oaSb bhr moed birkti zpon : aelh el bmti eb admh lelion : ak al Saol tord al irkti bor : raik alik iSgiHo alik itbonno hch haiS mrgic harz mreiS mmlkot : Sm tbl kmdbr oerio hrs asirio la ptH bith : kl mlki goim klm Skbo bkbod aiS bbito : oath hSlkt mqbrk knzr nteb lboS hrgim mTeni Hrb iordi al abni bor kpgr mobs : la tHd atm bqborh ki arzk SHt emk hrgt la iqra leolm cre mreim : hkino lbnio mTbH beon abotm bl iqmo oirSo arz omlao pni tbl erim : oqmti elihm nam ihoh zbaot ohkrti lbbl Sm oSar onin onkd nam ihoh : oSmtih lmorS qpd oagmi mim oTaTatih bmTaTa hSmd nam ihoh zbaot : nSbe ihoh zbaot lamr am la kaSr dmiti kn hith okaSr iezti hia tqom : lSbr aSor barzi oel hri abosno osr melihm elo osblo mel Skmo isor : cat hezh hieozh el kl harz ocat hid hnToih el kl hgoim : ki ihoh zbaot iez omi ipr oido hnToih omi iSibnh : bSnt mot hmlk aHc hih hmSa hch : al tSmHi plSt klk ki nSbr SbT mkk ki mSrS nHS iza zpe oprio Srp meopp : oreo bkori dlim oabionim lbTH irbzo ohmti breb SrSk oSaritk ihrg : hilili Ser ceqi eir nmog plSt klk ki mzpon eSn ba oain bodd bmoedio : omh ienh mlaki goi ki ihoh isd zion obh iHso enii emo :

15

mSa moab ki blil Sdd er moab ndmh ki blil Sdd qir moab ndmh : elh hbit odibn hbmot lbki el nbo oel midba moab iilil bkl raSio qrHh kl cqn groeh : bHoztio Hgro Sq el ggotih obrHbtih klh iilil ird bbki : otceq HSbon oalelh ed ihz nSme qolm el kn Hlzi moab irieo npSo ireh lo : lbi lmoab iceq briHh ed zer eglt SlSih ki melh hloHit bbki ielh bo ki drk Hornim ceqt Sbr ieero : ki mi nmrim mSmot ihio ki ibS Hzir klh dSa irq la hih : el kn itrh eSh opqdtm el nHl herbim iSaom : ki hqiph hceqh at gbol moab ed aglim illth obar ailim illth : ki mi dimon mlao dm ki aSit el dimon nospot lpliTt moab arih olSarit admh :

16

SlHo kr mSl arz msle mdbrh al hr bt zion : ohih keop nodd qn mSlH thiinh bnot moab mebrt larnon : hbiao ezh eSo plilh Siti klil zlk btok zhrim stri ndHim ndd al tgli : igoro bk ndHi moab hoi str lmo mpni Sodd ki aps hmz klh Sd tmo rms mn harz : ohokn bHsd ksa oiSb elio bamt bahl dod SpT odrS mSpT omhr zdq : Smeno gaon moab ga mad gaoto ogaono oebrto la kn bdio : lkn iilil moab lmoab klh iilil laSiSi qir HrSt thgo ak nkaim : ki Sdmot HSbon amll gpn Sbmh beli goim hlmo Sroqih ed iecr ngeo teo mdbr SlHotih nTSo ebro im : el kn abkh bbki iecr gpn Sbmh ariok dmeti HSbon oalelh ki el qizk oel qzirk hidd npl : onasp SmHh ogil mn hkrml obkrmim la irnn la iree iin biqbim la idrk hdrk hidd hSbti : el kn mei lmoab kknor ihmo oqrbi lqir HrS : ohih ki nrah ki nlah moab el hbmh oba al mqdSo lhtpll ola iokl : ch hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al moab mac : oeth dbr ihoh lamr bSlS Snim kSni Skir onqlh kbod moab bkl hhmon hrb oSar meT mcer loa kbir :

17

mSa dmSq hnh dmSq mosr meir ohith mei mplh : ecbot eri erer ledrim thiinh orbzo oain mHrid : onSbt mbzr maprim ommlkh mdmSq oSar arm kkbod bni iSral ihio nam ihoh zbaot : ohih biom hhoa idl kbod ieqb omSmn bSro irch : ohih kasp qzir qmh ocreo Sblim iqzor ohih kmlqT Sblim bemq rpaim : onSar bo eollt knqp cit Snim SlSh grgrim braS amir arbeh HmSh bsepih prih nam ihoh alhi iSral : biom hhoa iSeh hadm el eSho oeinio al qdoS iSral trainh : ola iSeh al hmcbHot meSh idio oaSr eSo azbetio la irah ohaSrim ohHmnim : biom hhoa ihio eri meco kecobt hHrS ohamir aSr ecbo mpni bni iSral ohith Smmh : ki SkHt alhi iSek ozor meck la ckrt el kn tTei nTei nemnim ocmrt cr tcreno : biom nTek tSgSgi obbqr crek tpriHi nd qzir biom nHlh okab anoS : hoi hmon emim rbim khmot imim ihmion oSaon lamim kSaon mim kbirim iSaon : lamim kSaon mim rbim iSaon oger bo ons mmrHq ordp kmz hrim lpni roH okglgl lpni soph : let erb ohnh blhh bTrm bqr ainno ch Hlq Sosino ogorl lbccino :

18

hoi arz zlzl knpim aSr mebr lnhri koS : hSlH bim zirim obkli gma el pni mim lko mlakim qlim al goi mmSk omorT al em nora mn hoa ohlah goi qo qo ombosh aSr bcao nhrim arzo : kl iSbi tbl oSkni arz knSa ns hrim trao oktqe Sopr tSmeo : ki kh amr ihoh ali aSqoTh oabiTh bmkoni kHm zH eli aor keb Tl bHm qzir : ki lpni qzir ktm prH obsr gml ihih nzh okrt hclclim bmcmrot oat hnTiSot hsir htc : iecbo iHdo leiT hrim olbhmt harz oqz elio heiT okl bhmt harz elio tHrp : bet hhia iobl Si lihoh zbaot em mmSk omorT omem nora mn hoa ohlah goi qo qo ombosh aSr bcao nhrim arzo al mqom Sm ihoh zbaot hr zion :

19

mSa mzrim hnh ihoh rkb el eb ql oba mzrim oneo alili mzrim mpnio olbb mzrim ims bqrbo : oskskti mzrim bmzrim onlHmo aiS baHio oaiS breho eir beir mmlkh bmmlkh : onbqh roH mzrim bqrbo oezto able odrSo al halilim oal haTim oal habot oal hidenim : oskrti at mzrim bid adnim qSh omlk ec imSl bm nam hadon ihoh zbaot : onSto mim mhim onhr iHrb oibS : ohacniHo nhrot dllo oHrbo iari mzor qnh osop qmlo : erot el iaor el pi iaor okl mcre iaor iibS ndp oainno : oano hdigim oablo kl mSliki biaor Hkh oprSi mkmrt el pni mim amllo : obSo ebdi pStim Sriqot oargim Hori : ohio Sttih mdkaim kl eSi Skr agmi npS : ak aolim Sri zen Hkmi iezi preh ezh nberh aik tamro al preh bn Hkmim ani bn mlki qdm : aim apoa Hkmik oigido na lk oideo mh iez ihoh zbaot el mzrim : noalo Sri zen nSao Sri np hteo at mzrim pnt SbTih : ihoh msk bqrbh roH eoeim ohteo at mzrim bkl meSho khteot Skor bqiao : ola ihih lmzrim meSh aSr ieSh raS ocnb kph oagmon : biom hhoa ihih mzrim knSim oHrd opHd mpni tnopt id ihoh zbaot aSr hoa mnip elio : ohith admt ihodh lmzrim lHga kl aSr ickir ath alio ipHd mpni ezt ihoh zbaot aSr hoa ioez elio : biom hhoa ihio HmS erim barz mzrim mdbrot Spt knen onSbeot lihoh zbaot eir hhrs iamr laHt : biom hhoa ihih mcbH lihoh btok arz mzrim omzbh azl gbolh lihoh : ohih laot oled lihoh zbaot barz mzrim ki izeqo al ihoh mpni lHzim oiSlH lhm moSie orb ohzilm : onode ihoh lmzrim oideo mzrim at ihoh biom hhoa oebdo cbH omnHh ondro ndr lihoh oSlmo : ongp ihoh at mzrim ngp orpoa oSbo ed ihoh onetr lhm orpam : biom hhoa thih mslh mmzrim aSorh oba aSor bmzrim omzrim baSor oebdo mzrim at aSor : biom hhoa ihih iSral SliSih lmzrim olaSor brkh bqrb harz : aSr brko ihoh zbaot lamr brok emi mzrim omeSh idi aSor onHlti iSral :

20

bSnt ba trtn aSdodh bSlH ato srgon mlk aSor oilHm baSdod oilkdh : bet hhia dbr ihoh bid iSeiho bn amoz lamr lk optHt hSq mel mtnik onelk tHlz mel rglik oieS kn hlk erom oiHp : oiamr ihoh kaSr hlk ebdi iSeiho erom oiHp SlS Snim aot omopt el mzrim oel koS : kn inhg mlk aSor at Sbi mzrim oat glot koS nerim ocqnim erom oiHp oHSopi St erot mzrim : oHto obSo mkoS mbTm omn mzrim tpartm : oamr iSb hai hch biom hhoa hnh kh mbTno aSr nsno Sm lecrh lhnzl mpni mlk aSor oaik nmlT anHno :

21

mSa mdbr im ksopot bngb lHlp mmdbr ba marz norah : Hcot qSh hgd li hbogd bogd ohSodd Sodd eli eilm zori mdi kl anHth hSbti : el kn mlao mtni HlHlh zirim aHconi kziri ioldh neoiti mSme nbhlti mraot : teh lbbi plzot bettni at nSp HSqi Sm li lHrdh : erk hSlHn zph hzpit akol Sth qomo hSrim mSHo mgn : ki kh amr ali adni lk hemd hmzph aSr irah igid : orah rkb zmd prSim rkb Hmor rkb gml ohqSib qSb rb qSb : oiqra arih el mzph adni anki emd tmid iomm oel mSmrti anki nzb kl hlilot : ohnh ch ba rkb aiS zmd prSim oien oiamr nplh nplh bbl okl psili alhih Sbr larz : mdSti obn grni aSr Smeti mat ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hgdti lkm : mSa domh ali qra mSeir Smr mh mlilh Smr mh mlil : amr Smr ath bqr ogm lilh am tbeion beio Sbo atio : mSa berb bier berb tlino arHot ddnim : lqrat zma htio mim iSbi arz tima blHmo qdmo ndd : ki mpni Hrbot nddo mpni Hrb nToSh ompni qSt drokh ompni kbd mlHmh : ki kh amr adni ali beod Snh kSni Skir oklh kl kbod qdr : oSar mspr qSt gbori bni qdr imeTo ki ihoh alhi iSral dbr :

22

mSa gia Hcion mh lk apoa ki elit klk lggot : tSaot mlah eir homih qrih elich Hllik la Hlli Hrb ola mti mlHmh : kl qzinik nddo iHd mqSt asro kl nmzaik asro iHdo mrHoq brHo : el kn amrti Seo mni amrr bbki al taizo lnHmni el Sd bt emi : ki iom mhomh ombosh ombokh ladni ihoh zbaot bgia Hcion mqrqr qr oSoe al hhr : oeilm nSa aSph brkb adm prSim oqir erh mgn : oihi mbHr emqik mlao rkb ohprSim St Sto hSerh : oigl at msk ihodh otbT biom hhoa al nSq bit hier : oat bqiei eir dod raitm ki rbo otqbzo at mi hbrkh htHtonh : oat bti iroSlm sprtm ottzo hbtim lbzr hHomh : omqoh eSitm bin hHmtim lmi hbrkh hiSnh ola hbTtm al eSih oizrh mrHoq la raitm : oiqra adni ihoh zbaot biom hhoa lbki olmspd olqrHh olHgr Sq : ohnh SSon oSmHh hrg bqr oSHT zan akl bSr oStot iin akol oSto ki mHr nmot : onglh bacni ihoh zbaot am ikpr heon hch lkm ed tmton amr adni ihoh zbaot : kh amr adni ihoh zbaot lk ba al hskn hch el Sbna aSr el hbit : mh lk ph omi lk ph ki Hzbt lk ph qbr Hzbi mrom qbro Hqqi bsle mSkn lo : hnh ihoh mTlTlk TlTlh gbr oeTk eTh : znop iznpk znph kdor al arz rHbt idim Smh tmot oSmh mrkbot kbodk qlon bit adnik : ohdptik mmzbk ommemdk ihrsk : ohih biom hhoa oqrati lebdi laliqim bn Hlqiho : ohlbStio ktntk oabnTk aHcqno ommSltk atn bido ohih lab lioSb iroSlm olbit ihodh : ontti mptH bit dod el Skmo optH oain sgr osgr oain ptH : otqetio itd bmqom namn ohih lksa kbod lbit abio : otlo elio kl kbod bit abio hzazaim ohzpeot kl kli hqTn mkli hagnot oed kl kli hnblim : biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot tmoS hitd htqoeh bmqom namn ongdeh onplh onkrt hmSa aSr elih ki ihoh dbr :

23

mSa zr hililo aniot trSiS ki Sdd mbit mboa marz ktim nglh lmo : dmo iSbi ai sHr zidon ebr im mlaok : obmim rbim cre SHr qzir iaor tboath othi sHr goim : boSi zidon ki amr im meoc him lamr la Hlti ola ildti ola gdlti bHorim rommti btolot : kaSr Sme lmzrim iHilo kSme zr : ebro trSiSh hililo iSbi ai : hcat lkm elich mimi qdm qdmth ibloh rglih mrHoq lgor : mi iez cat el zr hmeTirh aSr sHrih Srim knenih nkbdi arz : ihoh zbaot iezh lHll gaon kl zbi lhql kl nkbdi arz : ebri arzk kiar bt trSiS ain mcH eod : ido nTh el him hrgic mmlkot ihoh zoh al knen lSmd mecnih : oiamr la tosipi eod leloc hmeSqh btolt bt zidon ktiim qomi ebri gm Sm la inoH lk : hn arz kSdim ch hem la hih aSor isdh lziim hqimo bHinio erro armnotih Smh lmplh : hililo aniot trSiS ki Sdd meckn : ohih biom hhoa onSkHt zr Sbeim Snh kimi mlk aHd mqz Sbeim Snh ihih lzr kSirt hconh : qHi knor sbi eir conh nSkHh hiTibi ngn hrbi Sir lmen tckri : ohih mqz Sbeim Snh ipqd ihoh at zr oSbh latnnh ocnth at kl mmlkot harz el pni hadmh : ohih sHrh oatnnh qdS lihoh la iazr ola iHsn ki liSbim lpni ihoh ihih sHrh lakl lSbeh olmksh etiq :

24

hnh ihoh boqq harz obolqh oeoh pnih ohpiz iSbih : ohih kem kkhn kebd kadnio kSpHh kgbrth kqonh kmokr kmloh kloh knSh kaSr nSa bo : hboq tboq harz ohboc tboc ki ihoh dbr at hdbr hch : ablh nblh harz amllh nblh tbl amllo mrom em harz : oharz Hnph tHt iSbih ki ebro tort Hlpo Hq hpro brit eolm : el kn alh aklh arz oiaSmo iSbi bh el kn Hro iSbi arz onSar anoS mcer : abl tiroS amllh gpn nanHo kl SmHi lb : Sbt mSoS tpim Hdl Saon elicim Sbt mSoS knor : bSir la iSto iin imr Skr lStio : nSbrh qrit tho sgr kl bit mboa : zoHh el hiin bHozot erbh kl SmHh glh mSoS harz : nSar beir Smh oSaih ikt Ser : ki kh ihih bqrb harz btok hemim knqp cit keollt am klh bzir : hmh iSao qolm irno bgaon ihoh zhlo mim : el kn barim kbdo ihoh baii him Sm ihoh alhi iSral : mknp harz cmrt Smeno zbi lzdiq oamr rci li rci li aoi li bgdim bgdo obgd bogdim bgdo : pHd opHt opH elik ioSb harz : ohih hns mqol hpHd ipl al hpHt oheolh mtok hpHt ilkd bpH ki arbot mmrom nptHo oireSo mosdi arz : reh htreeh harz por htporrh arz moT htmoTTh arz : noe tnoe arz kSkor ohtnoddh kmlonh okbd elih pSeh onplh ola tsip qom : ohih biom hhoa ipqd ihoh el zba hmrom bmrom oel mlki hadmh el hadmh : oaspo asph asir el bor osgro el msgr omrb imim ipqdo : oHprh hlbnh oboSh hHmh ki mlk ihoh zbaot bhr zion obiroSlm ongd cqnio kbod :

25

ihoh alhi ath arommk aodh Smk ki eSit pla ezot mrHoq amonh amn : ki Smt meir lgl qrih bzorh lmplh armon crim meir leolm la ibnh : el kn ikbdok em ec qrit goim erizim iiraok : ki hiit meoc ldl meoc labion bzr lo mHsh mcrm zl mHrb ki roH erizim kcrm qir : kHrb bzion Saon crim tknie Hrb bzl eb cmir erizim ienh : oeSh ihoh zbaot lkl hemim bhr hch mSth Smnim mSth Smrim Smnim mmHim Smrim mcqqim : oble bhr hch pni hloT hloT el kl hemim ohmskh hnsokh el kl hgoim : ble hmot lnzH omHh adni ihoh dmeh mel kl pnim oHrpt emo isir mel kl harz ki ihoh dbr : oamr biom hhoa hnh alhino ch qoino lo oioSieno ch ihoh qoino lo ngilh onSmHh biSoeto : ki tnoH id ihoh bhr hch ondoS moab tHtio khdoS mtbn bmi mdmnh : oprS idio bqrbo kaSr iprS hSHh lSHot ohSpil gaoto em arbot idio : ombzr mSgb Homtik hSH hSpil hgie larz ed epr :

26

biom hhoa ioSr hSir hch barz ihodh eir ec lno iSoeh iSit Homot oHl : ptHo Serim oiba goi zdiq Smr amnim : izr smok tzr Slom Slom ki bk bToH : bTHo bihoh edi ed ki bih ihoh zor eolmim : ki hSH iSbi mrom qrih nSgbh iSpilnh iSpilh ed arz igienh ed epr : trmsnh rgl rgli eni pemi dlim : arH lzdiq miSrim iSr megl zdiq tpls : ap arH mSpTik ihoh qoinok lSmk olckrk taot npS : npSi aoitik blilh ap roHi bqrbi aSHrk ki kaSr mSpTik larz zdq lmdo iSbi tbl : iHn rSe bl lmd zdq barz nkHot ieol obl irah gaot ihoh : ihoh rmh idk bl iHcion iHco oibSo qnat em ap aS zrik taklm : ihoh tSpt Slom lno ki gm kl meSino pelt lno : ihoh alhino belono adnim coltk lbd bk nckir Smk : mtim bl iHio rpaim bl iqmo lkn pqdt otSmidm otabd kl ckr lmo : ispt lgoi ihoh ispt lgoi nkbdt rHqt kl qzoi arz : ihoh bzr pqdok zqon lHS mosrk lmo : kmo hrh tqrib lldt tHil tceq bHblih kn hiino mpnik ihoh : hrino Hlno kmo ildno roH iSoet bl neSh arz obl iplo iSbi tbl : iHio mtik nblti iqomon hqizo ornno Skni epr ki Tl aort Tlk oarz rpaim tpil : lk emi ba bHdrik osgr dltik bedk Hbi kmeT rge ed iebor cem : ki hnh ihoh iza mmqomo lpqd eon iSb harz elio oglth harz at dmih ola tksh eod el hrogih :

27

biom hhoa ipqd ihoh bHrbo hqSh ohgdolh ohHcqh el loitn nHS brH oel loitn nHS eqlton ohrg at htnin aSr bim : biom hhoa krm Hmd eno lh : ani ihoh nzrh lrgeim aSqnh pn ipqd elih lilh oiom azrnh : Hmh ain li mi itnni Smir Sit bmlHmh apSeh bh azitnh iHd : ao iHcq bmeoci ieSh Slom li Slom ieSh li : hbaim iSrS ieqb iziz oprH iSral omlao pni tbl tnobh : hkmkt mkho hkho am khrg hrgio hrg : bsasah bSlHh tribnh hgh broHo hqSh biom qdim : lkn bcat ikpr eon ieqb och kl pri hsr HTato bSomo kl abni mcbH kabni gr mnpzot la iqmo aSrim oHmnim : ki eir bzorh bdd noh mSlH onecb kmdbr Sm ireh egl oSm irbz oklh sepih : bibS qzirh tSbrnh nSim baot mairot aoth ki la em binot hoa el kn la irHmno eSho oizro la iHnno : ohih biom hhoa iHbT ihoh mSblt hnhr ed nHl mzrim oatm tlqTo laHd aHd bni iSral : ohih biom hhoa itqe bSopr gdol obao habdim barz aSor ohndHim barz mzrim ohStHoo lihoh bhr hqdS biroSlm :

28

hoi eTrt gaot Skri aprim oziz nbl zbi tparto aSr el raS gia Smnim hlomi iin : hnh Hcq oamz ladni kcrm brd Ser qTb kcrm mim kbirim STpim hniH larz bid : brglim trmsnh eTrt gaot Skori aprim : ohith zizt nbl zbi tparto aSr el raS gia Smnim kbkorh bTrm qiz aSr irah hrah aoth beodh bkpo iblenh : biom hhoa ihih ihoh zbaot leTrt zbi olzpirt tparh lSar emo : olroH mSpT lioSb el hmSpT olgborh mSibi mlHmh Serh : ogm alh biin Sgo obSkr teo khn onbia Sgo bSkr nbleo mn hiin teo mn hSkr Sgo brah pqo plilih : ki kl SlHnot mlao qia zah bli mqom : at mi iorh deh oat mi ibin Smoeh gmoli mHlb etiqi mSdim : ki zo lzo zo lzo qo lqo qo lqo ceir Sm ceir Sm : ki blegi Sph oblSon aHrt idbr al hem hch : aSr amr alihm cat hmnoHh hniHo leip ocat hmrgeh ola aboa Smoe : ohih lhm dbr ihoh zo lzo zo lzo qo lqo qo lqo ceir Sm ceir Sm lmen ilko okSlo aHor onSbro onoqSo onlkdo : lkn Smeo dbr ihoh anSi lzon mSli hem hch aSr biroSlm : ki amrtm krtno brit at mot oem Saol eSino Hch SiT SoTp ki ebr la iboano ki Smno kcb mHsno obSqr nstrno : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni isd bzion abn abn bHn pnt iqrt mosd mosd hmamin la iHiS : oSmti mSpT lqo ozdqh lmSqlt oieh brd mHsh kcb ostr mim iSTpo : okpr britkm at mot oHcotkm at Saol la tqom SoT SoTp ki iebr ohiitm lo lmrms : mdi ebro iqH atkm ki bbqr bbqr iebr biom oblilh ohih rq coeh hbin Smoeh : ki qzr hmze mhStre ohmskh zrh khtkns : ki khr przim iqom ihoh kemq bgbeon irgc leSot meSho cr meSho olebd ebdto nkrih ebdto : oeth al ttlozzo pn iHcqo mosrikm ki klh onHrzh Smeti mat adni ihoh zbaot el kl harz : hacino oSmeo qoli hqSibo oSmeo amrti : hkl hiom iHrS hHrS lcre iptH oiSdd admto : hloa am Soh pnih ohpiz qzH okmn icrq oSm HTh Sorh oSerh nsmn oksmt gblto : oisro lmSpT alhio iorno : ki la bHroz iodS qzH oaopn eglh el kmn iosb ki bmTh iHbT qzH okmn bSbT : lHm iodq ki la lnzH adoS idoSno ohmm glgl eglto oprSio la idqno : gm cat mem ihoh zbaot izah hplia ezh hgdil toSih :

29

hoi arial arial qrit Hnh dod spo Snh el Snh Hgim inqpo : ohziqoti larial ohith tanih oanih ohith li karial : oHniti kdor elik ozrti elik mzb ohqimti elik mzrt : oSplt marz tdbri omepr tSH amrtk ohih kaob marz qolk omepr amrtk tzpzp : ohih kabq dq hmon crik okmz ebr hmon erizim ohih lpte ptam : mem ihoh zbaot tpqd brem obreS oqol gdol soph oserh olhb aS aoklh : ohih kHlom Hcon lilh hmon kl hgoim hzbaim el arial okl zbih omzdth ohmziqim lh : ohih kaSr iHlm hreb ohnh aokl ohqiz oriqh npSo okaSr iHlm hzma ohnh Sth ohqiz ohnh eip onpSo Soqqh kn ihih hmon kl hgoim hzbaim el hr zion : htmhmho otmho hSteSeo oSeo Skro ola iin neo ola Skr : ki nsk elikm ihoh roH trdmh oiezm at einikm at hnbiaim oat raSikm hHcim ksh : othi lkm Hcot hkl kdbri hspr hHtom aSr itno ato al iode hspr lamr qra na ch oamr la aokl ki Htom hoa : ontn hspr el aSr la ide spr lamr qra na ch oamr la ideti spr : oiamr adni ien ki ngS hem hch bpio obSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni othi iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdh : lkn hnni iosp lhplia at hem hch hpla opla oabdh Hkmt Hkmio obint nbnio tsttr : hoi hmemiqim mihoh lstr ezh ohih bmHSk meSihm oiamro mi rano omi iodeno : hpkkm am kHmr hizr iHSb ki iamr meSh leSho la eSni oizr amr liozro la hbin : hloa eod meT mcer oSb lbnon lkrml ohkrml lier iHSb : oSmeo biom hhoa hHrSim dbri spr omapl omHSk eini eorim trainh : oispo enoim bihoh SmHh oabioni adm bqdoS iSral igilo : ki aps eriz oklh lz onkrto kl Sqdi aon : mHTiai adm bdbr olmokiH bSer iqSon oiTo btho zdiq : lkn kh amr ihoh al bit ieqb aSr pdh at abrhm la eth iboS ieqb ola eth pnio iHoro : ki brato ildio meSh idi bqrbo iqdiSo Smi ohqdiSo at qdoS ieqb oat alhi iSral ierizo : oideo tei roH binh orognim ilmdo lqH :

30

hoi bnim sorrim nam ihoh leSot ezh ola mni olnsk mskh ola roHi lmen spot HTat el HTat : hhlkim lrdt mzrim opi la Salo leoc bmeoc preh olHsot bzl mzrim : ohih lkm meoc preh lbSt ohHsot bzl mzrim lklmh : ki hio bzen Srio omlakio Hns igieo : kl hbaiS el em la ioeilo lmo la lecr ola lhoeil ki lbSt ogm lHrph : mSa bhmot ngb barz zrh ozoqh lbia oliS mhm apeh oSrp meopp iSao el ktp eirim Hilhm oel dbSt gmlim aozrtm el em la ioeilo : omzrim hbl oriq iecro lkn qrati lcat rhb hm Sbt : eth boa ktbh el loH atm oel spr Hqh othi liom aHron led ed eolm : ki em mri hoa bnim kHSim bnim la abo Smoe tort ihoh : aSr amro lraim la trao olHcim la tHco lno nkHot dbro lno Hlqot Hco mhtlot : soro mni drk hTo mni arH hSbito mpnino at qdoS iSral : lkn kh amr qdoS iSral ien maskm bdbr hch otbTHo beSq onloc otSeno elio : lkn ihih lkm heon hch kprz npl nbeh bHomh nSgbh aSr ptam lpte iboa Sbrh : oSbrh kSbr nbl iozrim ktot la iHml ola imza bmktto HrS lHtot aS miqod olHSp mim mgba : ki kh amr adni ihoh qdoS iSral bSobh onHt toSeon bhSqT obbTHh thih gbortkm ola abitm : otamro la ki el sos nnos el kn tnoson oel ql nrkb el kn iqlo rdpikm : alp aHd mpni gert aHd mpni gert HmSh tnso ed am notrtm ktrn el raS hhr okns el hgbeh : olkn iHkh ihoh lHnnkm olkn irom lrHmkm ki alhi mSpT ihoh aSri kl Hoki lo : ki em bzion iSb biroSlm bko la tbkh Hnon iHnk lqol ceqk kSmeto enk : ontn lkm adni lHm zr omim lHz ola iknp eod morik ohio einik raot at morik : oacnik tSmenh dbr maHrik lamr ch hdrk lko bo ki tamino oki tSmailo : oTmatm at zpoi psili kspk oat apdt mskt chbk tcrm kmo doh za tamr lo : ontn mTr crek aSr tcre at hadmh olHm tboat hadmh ohih dSn oSmn ireh mqnik biom hhoa kr nrHb : ohalpim oheirim ebdi hadmh blil Hmiz iaklo aSr crh brHt obmcrh : ohih el kl hr gbh oel kl gbeh nSah plgim ibli mim biom hrg rb bnpl mgdlim : ohih aor hlbnh kaor hHmh oaor hHmh ihih Sbetim kaor Sbet himim biom HbS ihoh at Sbr emo omHz mkto irpa : hnh Sm ihoh ba mmrHq ber apo okbd mSah Sptio mlao cem olSono kaS aklt : oroHo knHl SoTp ed zoar iHzh lhnph goim bnpt Soa orsn mteh el lHii emim : hSir ihih lkm klil htqdS Hg oSmHt lbb kholk bHlil lboa bhr ihoh al zor iSral : ohSmie ihoh at hod qolo onHt croeo irah bcep ap olhb aS aoklh npz ocrm oabn brd : ki mqol ihoh iHt aSor bSbT ikh : ohih kl mebr mTh mosdh aSr iniH ihoh elio btpim obknrot obmlHmot tnoph nlHm bh : ki erok matmol tpth gm hoa lmlk hokn hemiq hrHb mdrth aS oezim hrbh nSmt ihoh knHl gprit berh bh :

31

hoi hirdim mzrim lecrh el sosim iSeno oibTHo el rkb ki rb oel prSim ki ezmo mad ola Seo el qdoS iSral oat ihoh la drSo : ogm hoa Hkm oiba re oat dbrio la hsir oqm el bit mreim oel ecrt peli aon : omzrim adm ola al ososihm bSr ola roH oihoh iTh ido okSl eocr onpl ecr oiHdo klm iklion : ki kh amr ihoh ali kaSr ihgh harih ohkpir el Trpo aSr iqra elio mla reim mqolm la iHt omhmonm la ienh kn ird ihoh zbaot lzba el hr zion oel gbeth : kzprim epot kn ign ihoh zbaot el iroSlm gnon ohzil psH ohmliT : Sobo laSr hemiqo srh bni iSral : ki biom hhoa imason aiS alili kspo oalili chbo aSr eSo lkm idikm HTa : onpl aSor bHrb la aiS oHrb la adm taklno ons lo mpni Hrb obHorio lms ihio : osleo mmgor iebor oHto mns Srio nam ihoh aSr aor lo bzion otnor lo biroSlm :

32

hn lzdq imlk mlk olSrim lmSpT iSro : ohih aiS kmHba roH ostr crm kplgi mim bzion kzl sle kbd barz eiph : ola tSeinh eini raim oacni Smeim tqSbnh : olbb nmhrim ibin ldet olSon elgim tmhr ldbr zHot : la iqra eod lnbl ndib olkili la iamr Soe : ki nbl nblh idbr olbo ieSh aon leSot Hnp oldbr al ihoh toeh lhriq npS reb omSqh zma iHsir : okli klio reim hoa cmot iez lHbl enoim bamri Sqr obdbr abion mSpT : ondib ndibot iez ohoa el ndibot iqom : nSim Sannot qmnh Smenh qoli bnot bTHot hacnh amrti : imim el Snh trgcnh bTHot ki klh bzir asp bli iboa : Hrdo Sannot rgch bTHot pSTh oerh oHgorh el Hlzim : el Sdim spdim el Sdi Hmd el gpn prih : el admt emi qoz Smir telh ki el kl bti mSoS qrih elich : ki armon nTS hmon eir ecb epl obHn hih bed merot ed eolm mSoS praim mreh edrim : ed ierh elino roH mmrom ohih mdbr lkrml okrml lier iHSb : oSkn bmdbr mSpT ozdqh bkrml tSb : ohih meSh hzdqh Slom oebdt hzdqh hSqT obTH ed eolm : oiSb emi bnoh Slom obmSknot mbTHim obmnoHt Sannot : obrd brdt hier obSplh tSpl heir : aSrikm crei el kl mim mSlHi rgl hSor ohHmor :

33

hoi Sodd oath la Sdod obogd ola bgdo bo khtmk Sodd toSd knltk lbgd ibgdo bk : ihoh Hnno lk qoino hih crem lbqrim ap iSoetno bet zrh : mqol hmon nddo emim mrommtk npzo goim : oasp Sllkm asp hHsil kmSq gbim Soqq bo : nSgb ihoh ki Skn mrom mla zion mSpT ozdqh : ohih amont etik Hsn iSoet Hkmt odet irat ihoh hia aozro : hn aralm zeqo Hzh mlaki Slom mr ibkion : nSmo mslot Sbt ebr arH hpr brit mas erim la HSb anoS : abl amllh arz hHpir lbnon qml hih hSron kerbh oner bSn okrml : eth aqom iamr ihoh eth aromm eth anSa : thro HSS tldo qS roHkm aS taklkm : ohio emim mSrpot Sid qozim ksoHim baS izto : Smeo rHoqim aSr eSiti odeo qrobim gbrti : pHdo bzion HTaim aHch redh Hnpim mi igor lno aS aoklh mi igor lno moqdi eolm : hlk zdqot odbr miSrim mas bbze meSqot ner kpio mtmk bSHd aTm acno mSme dmim oezm einio mraot bre : hoa mromim iSkn mzdot sleim mSgbo lHmo ntn mimio namnim : mlk bipio tHcinh einik trainh arz mrHqim : lbk ihgh aimh aih spr aih Sql aih spr at hmgdlim : at em noec la trah em emqi Sph mSmoe nleg lSon ain binh : Hch zion qrit moedno einik trainh iroSlm noh Sann ahl bl izen bl ise itdtio lnzH okl Hblio bl intqo : ki am Sm adir ihoh lno mqom nhrim iarim rHbi idim bl tlk bo ani SiT ozi adir la iebrno : ki ihoh SpTno ihoh mHqqno ihoh mlkno hoa ioSieno : nTSo Hblik bl iHcqo kn trnm bl prSo ns ac Hlq ed Sll mrbh psHim bcco bc : obl iamr Skn Hliti hem hiSb bh nSa eon :

34

qrbo goim lSme olamim hqSibo tSme harz omlah tbl okl zazaih : ki qzp lihoh el kl hgoim oHmh el kl zbam hHrimm ntnm lTbH : oHllihm iSlko opgrihm ielh baSm onmso hrim mdmm : onmqo kl zba hSmim onglo kspr hSmim okl zbam ibol knbl elh mgpn oknblt mtanh : ki roth bSmim Hrbi hnh el adom trd oel em Hrmi lmSpT : Hrb lihoh mlah dm hdSnh mHlb mdm krim oetodim mHlb kliot ailim ki cbH lihoh bbzrh oTbH gdol barz adom : oirdo ramim emm oprim em abirim oroth arzm mdm oeprm mHlb idSn : ki iom nqm lihoh Snt Slomim lrib zion : onhpko nHlih lcpt oeprh lgprit ohith arzh lcpt berh : lilh oiomm la tkbh leolm ielh eSnh mdor ldor tHrb lnzH nzHim ain ebr bh : oirSoh qat oqpod oinSop oerb iSkno bh onTh elih qo tho oabni bho : Hrih oain Sm mlokh iqrao okl Srih ihio aps : oelth armntih sirim qmoS oHoH bmbzrih ohith noh tnim Hzir lbnot ienh : opgSo ziim at aiim oSeir el reho iqra ak Sm hrgieh lilit omzah lh mnoH : Smh qnnh qpoc otmlT obqeh odgrh bzlh ak Sm nqbzo diot aSh reoth : drSo mel spr ihoh oqrao aHt mhnh la nedrh aSh reoth la pqdo ki pi hoa zoh oroHo hoa qbzn : ohoa hpil lhn gorl oido Hlqth lhm bqo ed eolm iirSoh ldor odor iSkno bh :

35

iSSom mdbr ozih otgl erbh otprH kHbzlt : prH tprH otgl ap gilt ornn kbod hlbnon ntn lh hdr hkrml ohSron hmh irao kbod ihoh hdr alhino : Hcqo idim rpot obrkim kSlot amzo : amro lnmhri lb Hcqo al tirao hnh alhikm nqm iboa gmol alhim hoa iboa oiSekm : ac tpqHnh eini eorim oacni HrSim tptHnh : ac idlg kail psH otrn lSon alm ki nbqeo bmdbr mim onHlim berbh : ohih hSrb lagm ozmaon lmboei mim bnoh tnim rbzh Hzir lqnh ogma : ohih Sm mslol odrk odrk hqdS iqra lh la iebrno Tma ohoa lmo hlk drk oaoilim la iteo : la ihih Sm arih opriz Hiot bl ielnh la tmza Sm ohlko gaolim : opdoii ihoh iSbon obao zion brnh oSmHt eolm el raSm SSon oSmHh iSigo onso igon oanHh :

36

oihi barbe eSrh Snh lmlk Hcqiho elh snHrib mlk aSor el kl eri ihodh hbzrot oitpSm : oiSlH mlk aSor at rb Sqh mlkiS iroSlmh al hmlk Hcqiho bHil kbd oiemd btelt hbrkh helionh bmslt Sdh kobs : oiza alio aliqim bn Hlqiho aSr el hbit oSbna hspr oioaH bn asp hmckir : oiamr alihm rb Sqh amro na al Hcqiho kh amr hmlk hgdol mlk aSor mh hbTHon hch aSr bTHt : amrti ak dbr Sptim ezh ogborh lmlHmh eth el mi bTHt ki mrdt bi : hnh bTHt el mSent hqnh hrzoz hch el mzrim aSr ismk aiS elio oba bkpo onqbh kn preh mlk mzrim lkl hbTHim elio : oki tamr ali al ihoh alhino bTHno hloa hoa aSr hsir Hcqiho at bmtio oat mcbHtio oiamr lihodh oliroSlm lpni hmcbH hch tStHoo : oeth hterb na at adni hmlk aSor oatnh lk alpim sosim am tokl ltt lk rkbim elihm : oaik tSib at pni pHt aHd ebdi adni hqTnim otbTH lk el mzrim lrkb olprSim : oeth hmbledi ihoh eliti el harz hcat lhSHith ihoh amr ali elh al harz hcat ohSHith : oiamr aliqim oSbna oioaH al rb Sqh dbr na al ebdik armit ki Smeim anHno oal tdbr alino ihodit bacni hem aSr el hHomh : oiamr rb Sqh hal adnik oalik SlHni adni ldbr at hdbrim halh hla el hanSim hiSbim el hHomh lakl at Hraihm olStot at Sinihm emkm : oiemd rb Sqh oiqra bqol gdol ihodit oiamr Smeo at dbri hmlk hgdol mlk aSor : kh amr hmlk al iSa lkm Hcqiho ki la iokl lhzil atkm : oal ibTH atkm Hcqiho al ihoh lamr hzl izilno ihoh la tntn heir hcat bid mlk aSor : al tSmeo al Hcqiho ki kh amr hmlk aSor eSo ati brkh ozao ali oaklo aiS gpno oaiS tanto oSto aiS mi boro : ed bai olqHti atkm al arz karzkm arz dgn otiroS arz lHm okrmim : pn isit atkm Hcqiho lamr ihoh izilno hhzilo alhi hgoim aiS at arzo mid mlk aSor : aih alhi Hmt oarpd aih alhi sproim oki hzilo at Smron midi : mi bkl alhi harzot halh aSr hzilo at arzm midi ki izil ihoh at iroSlm midi : oiHriSo ola eno ato dbr ki mzot hmlk hia lamr la tenho : oiba aliqim bn Hlqiho aSr el hbit oSbna hsopr oioaH bn asp hmckir al Hcqiho qroei bgdim oigido lo at dbri rb Sqh :

37

oihi kSme hmlk Hcqiho oiqre at bgdio oitks bSq oiba bit ihoh : oiSlH at aliqim aSr el hbit oat Sbna hsopr oat cqni hkhnim mtksim bSqim al iSeiho bn amoz hnbia : oiamro alio kh amr Hcqiho iom zrh otokHh onazh hiom hch ki bao bnim ed mSbr okH ain lldh : aoli iSme ihoh alhik at dbri rb Sqh aSr SlHo mlk aSor adnio lHrp alhim Hi ohokiH bdbrim aSr Sme ihoh alhik onSat tplh bed hSarit hnmzah : oibao ebdi hmlk Hcqiho al iSeiho : oiamr alihm iSeiho kh tamron al adnikm kh amr ihoh al tira mpni hdbrim aSr Smet aSr gdpo neri mlk aSor aoti : hnni notn bo roH oSme Smoeh oSb al arzo ohpltio bHrb barzo : oiSb rb Sqh oimza at mlk aSor nlHm el lbnh ki Sme ki nse mlkiS : oiSme el trhqh mlk koS lamr iza lhlHm atk oiSme oiSlH mlakim al Hcqiho lamr : kh tamron al Hcqiho mlk ihodh lamr al iSak alhik aSr ath boTH bo lamr la tntn iroSlm bid mlk aSor : hnh ath Smet aSr eSo mlki aSor lkl harzot lhHrimm oath tnzl : hhzilo aotm alhi hgoim aSr hSHito aboti at gocn oat Hrn orzp obni edn aSr btlSr : aih mlk Hmt omlk arpd omlk leir sproim hne oeoh : oiqH Hcqiho at hsprim mid hmlakim oiqraho oiel bit ihoh oiprSho Hcqiho lpni ihoh : oitpll Hcqiho al ihoh lamr : ihoh zbaot alhi iSral iSb hkrbim ath hoa halhim lbdk lkl mmlkot harz ath eSit at hSmim oat harz : hTh ihoh acnk oSme pqH ihoh eink orah oSme at kl dbri snHrib aSr SlH lHrp alhim Hi : amnm ihoh hHribo mlki aSor at kl harzot oat arzm : ontn at alhihm baS ki la alhim hmh ki am meSh idi adm ez oabn oiabdom : oeth ihoh alhino hoSieno mido oideo kl mmlkot harz ki ath ihoh lbdk : oiSlH iSeiho bn amoz al Hcqiho lamr kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aSr htpllt ali al snHrib mlk aSor : ch hdbr aSr dbr ihoh elio bch lk legh lk btolt bt zion aHrik raS hnieh bt iroSlm : at mi Hrpt ogdpt oel mi hrimoth qol otSa mrom einik al qdoS iSral : bid ebdik Hrpt adni otamr brb rkbi ani eliti mrom hrim irkti lbnon oakrt qomt arcio mbHr brSio oaboa mrom qzo ier krmlo : ani qrti oStiti mim oaHrb bkp pemi kl iari mzor : hloa Smet lmrHoq aoth eSiti mimi qdm oizrtih eth hbatih othi lhSaot glim nzim erim bzrot : oiSbihn qzri id Hto obSo hio eSb Sdh oirq dSa Hzir ggot oSdmh lpni qmh : oSbtk ozatk oboak ideti oat htrgck ali : ien htrgck ali oSannk elh bacni oSmti HHi bapk omtgi bSptik ohSibtik bdrk aSr bat bh : och lk haot akol hSnh spiH obSnh hSnit SHis obSnh hSliSit creo oqzro onTeo krmim oakol prim : oisph pliTt bit ihodh hnSarh SrS lmTh oeSh pri lmelh : ki miroSlm tza Sarit opliTh mhr zion qnat ihoh zbaot teSh cat : lkn kh amr ihoh al mlk aSor la iboa al heir hcat ola iorh Sm Hz ola iqdmnh mgn ola iSpk elih sllh : bdrk aSr ba bh iSob oal heir hcat la iboa nam ihoh : ognoti el heir hcat lhoSieh lmeni olmen dod ebdi : oiza mlak ihoh oikh bmHnh aSor mah oSmnim oHmSh alp oiSkimo bbqr ohnh klm pgrim mtim : oise oilk oiSb snHrib mlk aSor oiSb bninoh : oihi hoa mStHoh bit nsrk alhio oadrmlk oSrazr bnio hkho bHrb ohmh nmlTo arz arrT oimlk asr Hdn bno tHtio :

38

bimim hhm Hlh Hcqiho lmot oiboa alio iSeiho bn amoz hnbia oiamr alio kh amr ihoh zo lbitk ki mt ath ola tHih : oisb Hcqiho pnio al hqir oitpll al ihoh : oiamr anh ihoh ckr na at aSr hthlkti lpnik bamt oblb Slm ohTob beinik eSiti oibk Hcqiho bki gdol : oihi dbr ihoh al iSeiho lamr : hlok oamrt al Hcqiho kh amr ihoh alhi dod abik Smeti at tpltk raiti at dmetk hnni iosp el imik HmS eSrh Snh : omkp mlk aSor azilk oat heir hcat ognoti el heir hcat : och lk haot mat ihoh aSr ieSh ihoh at hdbr hch aSr dbr : hnni mSib at zl hmelot aSr irdh bmelot aHc bSmS aHrnit eSr melot otSb hSmS eSr melot bmelot aSr irdh : mktb lHcqiho mlk ihodh bHlto oiHi mHlio : ani amrti bdmi imi alkh bSeri Saol pqdti itr Snoti : amrti la arah ih ih barz hHiim la abiT adm eod em ioSbi Hdl : dori nse onglh mni kahl rei qpdti karg Hii mdlh ibzeni miom ed lilh tSlimni : Soiti ed bqr kari kn iSbr kl ezmoti miom ed lilh tSlimni : ksos egor kn azpzp ahgh kionh dlo eini lmrom adni eSqh li erbni : mh adbr oamr li ohoa eSh addh kl Snoti el mr npSi : adni elihm iHio olkl bhn Hii roHi otHlimni ohHini : hnh lSlom mr li mr oath HSqt npSi mSHt bli ki hSlkt aHri gok kl HTai : ki la Saol todk mot ihllk la iSbro iordi bor al amtk : Hi Hi hoa iodk kmoni hiom ab lbnim iodie al amtk : ihoh lhoSieni ongnoti nngn kl imi Hiino el bit ihoh : oiamr iSeiho iSao dblt tanim oimrHo el hSHin oiHi : oiamr Hcqiho mh aot ki aelh bit ihoh :

39
