bet hhia SlH mrdk bladn bn bladn mlk bbl sprim omnHh al Hcqiho oiSme ki Hlh oiHcq : oiSmH elihm Hcqiho oiram at bit nkth at hksp oat hchb oat hbSmim oat hSmn hTob oat kl bit klio oat kl aSr nmza bazrtio la hih dbr aSr la hram Hcqiho bbito obkl mmSlto : oiba iSeiho hnbia al hmlk Hcqiho oiamr alio mh amro hanSim halh omain ibao alik oiamr Hcqiho marz rHoqh bao ali mbbl : oiamr mh rao bbitk oiamr Hcqiho at kl aSr bbiti rao la hih dbr aSr la hraitim baozrti : oiamr iSeiho al Hcqiho Sme dbr ihoh zbaot : hnh imim baim onSa kl aSr bbitk oaSr azro abtik ed hiom hch bbl la iotr dbr amr ihoh : ombnik aSr izao mmk aSr tolid iqHo ohio srisim bhikl mlk bbl : oiamr Hcqiho al iSeiho Tob dbr ihoh aSr dbrt oiamr ki ihih Slom oamt bimi :

40

nHmo nHmo emi iamr alhikm : dbro el lb iroSlm oqrao alih ki mlah zbah ki nrzh eonh ki lqHh mid ihoh kplim bkl HTatih : qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro berbh mslh lalhino : kl gia inSa okl hr ogbeh iSplo ohih heqb lmiSor ohrksim lbqeh : onglh kbod ihoh orao kl bSr iHdo ki pi ihoh dbr : qol amr qra oamr mh aqra kl hbSr Hzir okl Hsdo kziz hSdh : ibS Hzir nbl ziz ki roH ihoh nSbh bo akn Hzir hem : ibS Hzir nbl ziz odbr alhino iqom leolm : el hr gbh eli lk mbSrt zion hrimi bkH qolk mbSrt iroSlm hrimi al tirai amri leri ihodh hnh alhikm : hnh adni ihoh bHcq iboa ocreo mSlh lo hnh Skro ato opelto lpnio : kreh edro ireh bcreo iqbz Tlaim obHiqo iSa elot inhl : mi mdd bSelo mim oSmim bcrt tkn okl bSlS epr harz oSql bpls hrim ogbeot bmacnim : mi tkn at roH ihoh oaiS ezto iodieno : at mi noez oibinho oilmdho barH mSpT oilmdho det odrk tbonot iodieno : hn goim kmr mdli okSHq macnim nHSbo hn aiim kdq iTol : olbnon ain di ber oHito ain di eolh : kl hgoim kain ngdo maps otho nHSbo lo : oal mi tdmion al omh dmot terko lo : hpsl nsk HrS ozrp bchb irqeno ortqot ksp zorp : hmskn tromh ez la irqb ibHr HrS Hkm ibqS lo lhkin psl la imoT : hloa tdeo hloa tSmeo hloa hgd mraS lkm hloa hbintm mosdot harz : hiSb el Hog harz oiSbih kHgbim hnoTh kdq Smim oimtHm kahl lSbt : hnotn rocnim lain SpTi arz ktho eSh : ap bl nTeo ap bl creo ap bl SrS barz gcem ogm nSp bhm oibSo oserh kqS tSam : oal mi tdmioni oaSoh iamr qdoS : Sao mrom einikm orao mi bra alh hmozia bmspr zbam lklm bSm iqra mrb aonim oamiz kH aiS la nedr : lmh tamr ieqb otdbr iSral nstrh drki mihoh omalhi mSpTi iebor : hloa idet am la Smet alhi eolm ihoh bora qzot harz la iiep ola iige ain Hqr ltbonto : ntn liep kH olain aonim ezmh irbh : oiepo nerim oigeo obHorim kSol ikSlo : oqoi ihoh iHlipo kH ielo abr knSrim irozo ola iigeo ilko ola iiepo :

41

hHriSo ali aiim olamim iHlipo kH igSo ac idbro iHdo lmSpT nqrbh : mi heir mmcrH zdq iqraho lrglo itn lpnio goim omlkim ird itn kepr Hrbo kqS ndp qSto : irdpm iebor Slom arH brglio la iboa : mi pel oeSh qra hdrot mraS ani ihoh raSon oat aHrnim ani hoa : rao aiim oiirao qzot harz iHrdo qrbo oiation : aiS at reho iecro olaHio iamr Hcq : oiHcq HrS at zrp mHliq pTiS at holm pem amr ldbq Tob hoa oiHcqho bmsmrim la imoT : oath iSral ebdi ieqb aSr bHrtik cre abrhm ahbi : aSr hHcqtik mqzot harz omazilih qratik oamr lk ebdi ath bHrtik ola mastik : al tira ki emk ani al tSte ki ani alhik amztik ap ecrtik ap tmktik bimin zdqi : hn ibSo oiklmo kl hnHrim bk ihio kain oiabdo anSi ribk : tbqSm ola tmzam anSi mztk ihio kain okaps anSi mlHmtk : ki ani ihoh alhik mHciq imink hamr lk al tira ani ecrtik : al tirai tolet ieqb mti iSral ani ecrtik nam ihoh ogalk qdoS iSral : hnh Smtik lmorg Hroz HdS bel pipiot tdoS hrim otdq ogbeot kmz tSim : tcrm oroH tSam oserh tpiz aotm oath tgil bihoh bqdoS iSral tthll : heniim ohabionim mbqSim mim oain lSonm bzma nSth ani ihoh aenm alhi iSral la aecbm : aptH el Spiim nhrot obtok bqeot meinot aSim mdbr lagm mim oarz zih lmozai mim : atn bmdbr arc STh ohds oez Smn aSim berbh broS tdhr otaSor iHdo : lmen irao oideo oiSimo oiSkilo iHdo ki id ihoh eSth cat oqdoS iSral brah : qrbo ribkm iamr ihoh hgiSo ezmotikm iamr mlk ieqb : igiSo oigido lno at aSr tqrinh hraSnot mh hnh hgido onSimh lbno ondeh aHritn ao hbaot hSmieno : hgido hatiot laHor ondeh ki alhim atm ap tiTibo otreo onSteh onra iHdo : hn atm main opelkm mape toebh ibHr bkm : heiroti mzpon oiat mmcrH SmS iqra bSmi oiba sgnim kmo Hmr okmo iozr irms TiT : mi hgid mraS ondeh omlpnim onamr zdiq ap ain mgid ap ain mSmie ap ain Sme amrikm : raSon lzion hnh hnm oliroSlm mbSr atn : oara oain aiS omalh oain ioez oaSalm oiSibo dbr : hn klm aon aps meSihm roH otho nskihm :

42

hn ebdi atmk bo bHiri rzth npSi ntti roHi elio mSpT lgoim iozia : la izeq ola iSa ola iSmie bHoz qolo : qnh rzoz la iSbor opSth khh la ikbnh lamt iozia mSpT : la ikhh ola iroz ed iSim barz mSpT oltorto aiim iiHilo : kh amr hal ihoh bora hSmim onoTihm rqe harz ozazaih ntn nSmh lem elih oroH lhlkim bh : ani ihoh qratik bzdq oaHcq bidk oazrk oatnk lbrit em laor goim : lpqH einim eorot lhozia mmsgr asir mbit kla iSbi HSk : ani ihoh hoa Smi okbodi laHr la atn othlti lpsilim : hraSnot hnh bao oHdSot ani mgid bTrm tzmHnh aSmie atkm : Siro lihoh Sir HdS thlto mqzh harz iordi him omlao aiim oiSbihm : iSao mdbr oerio Hzrim tSb qdr irno iSbi sle mraS hrim izoHo : iSimo lihoh kbod othlto baiim igido : ihoh kgbor iza kaiS mlHmot ieir qnah irie ap izriH el aibio itgbr : hHSiti meolm aHriS atapq kioldh apeh aSm oaSap iHd : aHrib hrim ogbeot okl eSbm aobiS oSmti nhrot laiim oagmim aobiS : oholkti eorim bdrk la ideo bntibot la ideo adrikm aSim mHSk lpnihm laor omeqSim lmiSor alh hdbrim eSitm ola ecbtim : nsgo aHor ibSo bSt hbTHim bpsl hamrim lmskh atm alhino : hHrSim Smeo oheorim hbiTo lraot : mi eor ki am ebdi oHrS kmlaki aSlH mi eor kmSlm oeor kebd ihoh : rait rbot ola tSmr pqoH acnim ola iSme : ihoh Hpz lmen zdqo igdil torh oiadir : ohoa em bcoc oSsoi hpH bHorim klm obbti klaim hHbao hio lbc oain mzil mSsh oain amr hSb : mi bkm iacin cat iqSb oiSme laHor : mi ntn lmSosh ieqb oiSral lbccim hloa ihoh co HTano lo ola abo bdrkio hlok ola Smeo btorto : oiSpk elio Hmh apo oecoc mlHmh otlhTho msbib ola ide otber bo ola iSim el lb :

43

oeth kh amr ihoh brak ieqb oizrk iSral al tira ki galtik qrati bSmk li ath : ki tebr bmim atk ani obnhrot la iSTpok ki tlk bmo aS la tkoh olhbh la tber bk : ki ani ihoh alhik qdoS iSral moSiek ntti kprk mzrim koS osba tHtik : maSr iqrt beini nkbdt oani ahbtik oatn adm tHtik olamim tHt npSk : al tira ki atk ani mmcrH abia crek ommerb aqbzk : amr lzpon tni oltimn al tklai hbiai bni mrHoq obnoti mqzh harz : kl hnqra bSmi olkbodi bratio izrtio ap eSitio : hozia em eor oeinim iS oHrSim oacnim lmo : kl hgoim nqbzo iHdo oiaspo lamim mi bhm igid cat oraSnot iSmieno itno edihm oizdqo oiSmeo oiamro amt : atm edi nam ihoh oebdi aSr bHrti lmen tdeo otamino li otbino ki ani hoa lpni la nozr al oaHri la ihih : anki anki ihoh oain mbledi moSie : anki hgdti ohoSeti ohSmeti oain bkm cr oatm edi nam ihoh oani al : gm miom ani hoa oain midi mzil apel omi iSibnh : kh amr ihoh galkm qdoS iSral lmenkm SlHti bblh ohordti briHim klm okSdim baniot rntm : ani ihoh qdoSkm bora iSral mlkkm : kh amr ihoh hnotn bim drk obmim ecim ntibh : hmozia rkb osos Hil oecoc iHdo iSkbo bl iqomo deko kpSth kbo : al tckro raSnot oqdmniot al ttbnno : hnni eSh HdSh eth tzmH hloa tdeoh ap aSim bmdbr drk biSmon nhrot : tkbdni Hit hSdh tnim obnot ienh ki ntti bmdbr mim nhrot biSimn lhSqot emi bHiri : em co izrti li thlti ispro : ola ati qrat ieqb ki iget bi iSral : la hbiat li Sh eltik ocbHik la kbdtni la hebdtik bmnHh ola hogetik blbonh : la qnit li bksp qnh oHlb cbHik la hroitni ak hebdtni bHTaotik hogetni beontik : anki anki hoa mHh pSeik lmeni oHTatik la ackr : hckirni nSpTh iHd spr ath lmen tzdq : abik hraSon HTa omlizik pSeo bi : oaHll Sri qdS oatnh lHrm ieqb oiSral lgdopim :

44

oeth Sme ieqb ebdi oiSral bHrti bo : kh amr ihoh eSk oizrk mbTn iecrk al tira ebdi ieqb oiSron bHrti bo : ki azq mim el zma onclim el ibSh azq roHi el crek obrkti el zazaik : ozmHo bbin Hzir kerbim el ibli mim : ch iamr lihoh ani och iqra bSm ieqb och iktb ido lihoh obSm iSral iknh : kh amr ihoh mlk iSral ogalo ihoh zbaot ani raSon oani aHron ombledi ain alhim : omi kmoni iqra oigidh oierkh li mSomi em eolm oatiot oaSr tbanh igido lmo : al tpHdo oal trho hla mac hSmetik ohgdti oatm edi hiS aloh mbledi oain zor bl ideti : izri psl klm tho oHmodihm bl ioeilo oedihm hmh bl irao obl ideo lmen ibSo : mi izr al opsl nsk lblti hoeil : hn kl Hbrio ibSo oHrSim hmh madm itqbzo klm iemdo ipHdo ibSo iHd : HrS brcl mezd opel bpHm obmqbot izrho oipelho bcroe kHo gm reb oain kH la Sth mim oiiep : HrS ezim nTh qo itarho bSrd ieSho bmqzeot obmHogh itarho oieSho ktbnit aiS ktpart adm lSbt bit : lkrt lo arcim oiqH trch oalon oiamz lo bezi ier nTe arn ogSm igdl : ohih ladm lber oiqH mhm oiHm ap iSiq oaph lHm ap ipel al oiStHo eSho psl oisgd lmo : Hzio Srp bmo aS el Hzio bSr iakl izlh zli oiSbe ap iHm oiamr haH Hmoti raiti aor : oSarito lal eSh lpslo isgod lo oiStHo oitpll alio oiamr hzilni ki ali ath : la ideo ola ibino ki TH mraot einihm mhSkil lbtm : ola iSib al lbo ola det ola tbonh lamr Hzio Srpti bmo aS oap apiti el gHlio lHm azlh bSr oakl oitro ltoebh aeSh lbol ez asgod : reh apr lb hotl hTho ola izil at npSo ola iamr hloa Sqr bimini : ckr alh ieqb oiSral ki ebdi ath izrtik ebd li ath iSral la tnSni : mHiti keb pSeik okenn HTaotik Sobh ali ki galtik : rno Smim ki eSh ihoh hrieo tHtiot arz pzHo hrim rnh ier okl ez bo ki gal ihoh ieqb obiSral itpar : kh amr ihoh galk oizrk mbTn anki ihoh eSh kl nTh Smim lbdi rqe harz mi ati : mpr atot bdim oqsmim iholl mSib Hkmim aHor odetm iSkl : mqim dbr ebdo oezt mlakio iSlim hamr liroSlm toSb oleri ihodh tbninh oHrbotih aqomm : hamr lzolh Hrbi onhrtik aobiS : hamr lkorS rei okl Hpzi iSlm olamr liroSlm tbnh ohikl tosd :

45

kh amr ihoh lmSiHo lkorS aSr hHcqti bimino lrd lpnio goim omtni mlkim aptH lptH lpnio dltim oSerim la isgro : ani lpnik alk ohdorim aoSr dltot nHoSh aSbr obriHi brcl agde : ontti lk aozrot HSk omTmni mstrim lmen tde ki ani ihoh hqora bSmk alhi iSral : lmen ebdi ieqb oiSral bHiri oaqra lk bSmk aknk ola idetni : ani ihoh oain eod colti ain alhim aacrk ola idetni : lmen ideo mmcrH SmS ommerbh ki aps bledi ani ihoh oain eod : iozr aor obora HSk eSh Slom obora re ani ihoh eSh kl alh : hreipo Smim mmel oSHqim iclo zdq tptH arz oipro iSe ozdqh tzmiH iHd ani ihoh bratio : hoi rb at izro HrS at HrSi admh hiamr Hmr lizro mh teSh opelk ain idim lo : hoi amr lab mh tolid olaSh mh tHilin : kh amr ihoh qdoS iSral oizro hatiot Saloni el bni oel pel idi tzoni : anki eSiti arz oadm elih brati ani idi nTo Smim okl zbam zoiti : anki heirtho bzdq okl drkio aiSr hoa ibnh eiri ogloti iSlH la bmHir ola bSHd amr ihoh zbaot : kh amr ihoh igie mzrim osHr koS osbaim anSi mdh elik iebro olk ihio aHrik ilko bcqim iebro oalik iStHoo alik itpllo ak bk al oain eod aps alhim : akn ath al msttr alhi iSral moSie : boSo ogm nklmo klm iHdo hlko bklmh HrSi zirim : iSral noSe bihoh tSoet eolmim la tbSo ola tklmo ed eolmi ed : ki kh amr ihoh bora hSmim hoa halhim izr harz oeSh hoa konnh la tho brah lSbt izrh ani ihoh oain eod : la bstr dbrti bmqom arz HSk la amrti lcre ieqb tho bqSoni ani ihoh dbr zdq mgid miSrim : hqbzo obao htngSo iHdo pliTi hgoim la ideo hnSaim at ez pslm omtpllim al al la ioSie : hgido ohgiSo ap ioezo iHdo mi hSmie cat mqdm mac hgidh hloa ani ihoh oain eod alhim mbledi al zdiq omoSie ain colti : pno ali ohoSeo kl apsi arz ki ani al oain eod : bi nSbeti iza mpi zdqh dbr ola iSob ki li tkre kl brk tSbe kl lSon : ak bihoh li amr zdqot oec edio iboa oibSo kl hnHrim bo : bihoh izdqo oithllo kl cre iSral :

46

kre bl qrs nbo hio ezbihm lHih olbhmh nSatikm emosot mSa leiph : qrso kreo iHdo la iklo mlT mSa onpSm bSbi hlkh : Smeo ali bit ieqb okl Sarit bit iSral hemsim mni bTn hnSaim mni rHm : oed cqnh ani hoa oed Sibh ani asbl ani eSiti oani aSa oani asbl oamlT : lmi tdmioni otSoo otmSloni ondmh : hclim chb mkis oksp bqnh iSqlo iSkro zorp oieSho al isgdo ap iStHoo : iSaho el ktp isblho oiniHho tHtio oiemd mmqomo la imiS ap izeq alio ola ienh mzrto la ioSieno : ckro cat ohtaSSo hSibo poSeim el lb : ckro raSnot meolm ki anki al oain eod alhim oaps kmoni : mgid mraSit aHrit omqdm aSr la neSo amr ezti tqom okl Hpzi aeSh : qra mmcrH eiT marz mrHq aiS ezto ap dbrti ap abianh izrti ap aeSnh : Smeo ali abiri lb hrHoqim mzdqh : qrbti zdqti la trHq otSoeti la taHr ontti bzion tSoeh liSral tparti :

47

rdi oSbi el epr btolt bt bbl Sbi larz ain ksa bt kSdim ki la tosipi iqrao lk rkh oengh : qHi rHim oTHni qmH gli zmtk HSpi Sbl gli Soq ebri nhrot : tgl erotk gm trah Hrptk nqm aqH ola apge adm : galno ihoh zbaot Smo qdoS iSral : Sbi domm obai bHSk bt kSdim ki la tosipi iqrao lk gbrt mmlkot : qzpti el emi Hllti nHlti oatnm bidk la Smt lhm rHmim el cqn hkbdt elk mad : otamri leolm ahih gbrt ed la Smt alh el lbk la ckrt aHrith : oeth Smei cat edinh hioSbt lbTH hamrh blbbh ani oapsi eod la aSb almnh ola ade Skol : otbanh lk Sti alh rge biom aHd Skol oalmn ktmm bao elik brb kSpik bezmt Hbrik mad : otbTHi bretk amrt ain rani Hkmtk odetk hia Sobbtk otamri blbk ani oapsi eod : oba elik reh la tdei SHrh otpl elik hoh la tokli kprh otba elik ptam Soah la tdei : emdi na bHbrik obrb kSpik baSr iget mneorik aoli tokli hoeil aoli terozi : nlait brb eztik iemdo na oioSiek hbro Smim hHcim bkokbim modiem lHdSim maSr ibao elik : hnh hio kqS aS Srptm la izilo at npSm mid lhbh ain gHlt lHmm aor lSbt ngdo : kn hio lk aSr iget sHrik mneorik aiS lebro teo ain moSiek :

48

Smeo cat bit ieqb hnqraim bSm iSral ommi ihodh izao hnSbeim bSm ihoh obalhi iSral ickiro la bamt ola bzdqh : ki meir hqdS nqrao oel alhi iSral nsmko ihoh zbaot Smo : hraSnot mac hgdti ompi izao oaSmiem ptam eSiti otbanh : mdeti ki qSh ath ogid brcl erpk omzHk nHoSh : oagid lk mac bTrm tboa hSmetik pn tamr ezbi eSm opsli onski zom : Smet Hch klh oatm hloa tgido hSmetik HdSot meth onzrot ola idetm : eth nbrao ola mac olpni iom ola Smetm pn tamr hnh idetin : gm la Smet gm la idet gm mac la ptHh acnk ki ideti bgod tbgod opSe mbTn qra lk : lmen Smi aarik api othlti aHTm lk lblti hkritk : hnh zrptik ola bksp bHrtik bkor eni : lmeni lmeni aeSh ki aik iHl okbodi laHr la atn : Sme ali ieqb oiSral mqrai ani hoa ani raSon ap ani aHron : ap idi isdh arz oimini TpHh Smim qra ani alihm iemdo iHdo : hqbzo klkm oSmeo mi bhm hgid at alh ihoh ahbo ieSh Hpzo bbbl ocreo kSdim : ani ani dbrti ap qratio hbiatio ohzliH drko : qrbo ali Smeo cat la mraS bstr dbrti met hioth Sm ani oeth adni ihoh SlHni oroHo : kh amr ihoh galk qdoS iSral ani ihoh alhik mlmdk lhoeil mdrikk bdrk tlk : loa hqSbt lmzoti oihi knhr Slomk ozdqtk kgli him : oihi kHol crek ozazai meik kmetio la ikrt ola iSmd Smo mlpni : zao mbbl brHo mkSdim bqol rnh hgido hSmieo cat hoziaoh ed qzh harz amro gal ihoh ebdo ieqb : ola zmao bHrbot holikm mim mzor hcil lmo oibqe zor oicbo mim : ain Slom amr ihoh lrSeim :

49

Smeo aiim ali ohqSibo lamim mrHoq ihoh mbTn qrani mmei ami hckir Smi : oiSm pi kHrb Hdh bzl ido hHbiani oiSimni lHz bror baSpto hstirni : oiamr li ebdi ath iSral aSr bk atpar : oani amrti lriq igeti ltho ohbl kHi kliti akn mSpTi at ihoh opelti at alhi : oeth amr ihoh izri mbTn lebd lo lSobb ieqb alio oiSral la iasp oakbd beini ihoh oalhi hih eci : oiamr nql mhiotk li ebd lhqim at SbTi ieqb onziri iSral lhSib onttik laor goim lhiot iSoeti ed qzh harz : kh amr ihoh gal iSral qdoSo lbch npS lmteb goi lebd mSlim mlkim irao oqmo Srim oiStHoo lmen ihoh aSr namn qdS iSral oibHrk : kh amr ihoh bet rzon enitik obiom iSoeh ecrtik oazrk oatnk lbrit em lhqim arz lhnHil nHlot Smmot : lamr lasorim zao laSr bHSk hglo el drkim ireo obkl Spiim mreitm : la irebo ola izmao ola ikm Srb oSmS ki mrHmm inhgm oel mboei mim inhlm : oSmti kl hri ldrk omslti irmon : hnh alh mrHoq ibao ohnh alh mzpon omim oalh marz sinim : rno Smim ogili arz ipzHo hrim rnh ki nHm ihoh emo oenio irHm : otamr zion ecbni ihoh oadni SkHni : htSkH aSh eolh mrHm bn bTnh gm alh tSkHnh oanki la aSkHk : hn el kpim Hqtik Homtik ngdi tmid : mhro bnik mhrsik omHrbik mmk izao : Sai sbib einik orai klm nqbzo bao lk Hi ani nam ihoh ki klm kedi tlbSi otqSrim kklh : ki Hrbtik oSmmtik oarz hrstik ki eth tzri mioSb orHqo mbleik : eod iamro bacnik bni Sklik zr li hmqom gSh li oaSbh : oamrt blbbk mi ild li at alh oani Skolh oglmodh glh osorh oalh mi gdl hn ani nSarti lbdi alh aiph hm : kh amr adni ihoh hnh aSa al goim idi oal emim arim nsi ohbiao bnik bHzn obntik el ktp tnSanh : ohio mlkim amnik oSrotihm miniqtik apim arz iStHoo lk oepr rglik ilHko oidet ki ani ihoh aSr la ibSo qoi : hiqH mgbor mlqoH oam Sbi zdiq imlT : ki kh amr ihoh gm Sbi gbor iqH omlqoH eriz imlT oat iribk anki arib oat bnik anki aoSie : ohaklti at monik at bSrm okesis dmm iSkron oideo kl bSr ki ani ihoh moSiek ogalk abir ieqb :

50

kh amr ihoh ai ch spr kritot amkm aSr SlHtih ao mi mnoSi aSr mkrti atkm lo hn beontikm nmkrtm obpSeikm SlHh amkm : mdoe bati oain aiS qrati oain eonh hqzor qzrh idi mpdot oam ain bi kH lhzil hn bgerti aHrib im aSim nhrot mdbr tbaS dgtm main mim otmt bzma : albiS Smim qdrot oSq aSim ksotm : adni ihoh ntn li lSon lmodim ldet leot at iep dbr ieir bbqr bbqr ieir li acn lSme klmodim : adni ihoh ptH li acn oanki la mriti aHor la nsogti : goi ntti lmkim olHii lmrTim pni la hstrti mklmot orq : oadni ihoh iecr li el kn la nklmti el kn Smti pni kHlmiS oade ki la aboS : qrob mzdiqi mi irib ati nemdh iHd mi bel mSpTi igS ali : hn adni ihoh iecr li mi hoa irSieni hn klm kbgd iblo eS iaklm : mi bkm ira ihoh Sme bqol ebdo aSr hlk HSkim oain ngh lo ibTH bSm ihoh oiSen balhio : hn klkm qdHi aS macri ciqot lko baor aSkm obciqot bertm midi hith cat lkm lmezbh tSkbon :

51

Smeo ali rdpi zdq mbqSi ihoh hbiTo al zor Hzbtm oal mqbt bor nqrtm : hbiTo al abrhm abikm oal Srh tHollkm ki aHd qratio oabrkho oarbho : ki nHm ihoh zion nHm kl Hrbtih oiSm mdbrh kedn oerbth kgn ihoh SSon oSmHh imza bh todh oqol cmrh : hqSibo ali emi olaomi ali hacino ki torh mati tza omSpTi laor emim argie : qrob zdqi iza iSei ocrei emim iSpTo ali aiim iqoo oal crei iiHlon : Sao lSmim einikm ohbiTo al harz mtHt ki Smim keSn nmlHo oharz kbgd tblh oiSbih kmo kn imoton oiSoeti leolm thih ozdqti la tHt : Smeo ali idei zdq em torti blbm al tirao Hrpt anoS omgdptm al tHto : ki kbgd iaklm eS okzmr iaklm ss ozdqti leolm thih oiSoeti ldor dorim : eori eori lbSi ec croe ihoh eori kimi qdm drot eolmim hloa at hia hmHzbt rhb mHollt tnin : hloa at hia hmHrbt im mi thom rbh hSmh memqi im drk lebr gaolim : opdoii ihoh iSobon obao zion brnh oSmHt eolm el raSm SSon oSmHh iSigon nso igon oanHh : anki anki hoa mnHmkm mi at otirai manoS imot ombn adm Hzir intn : otSkH ihoh eSk noTh Smim oisd arz otpHd tmid kl hiom mpni Hmt hmziq kaSr konn lhSHit oaih Hmt hmziq : mhr zeh lhptH ola imot lSHt ola iHsr lHmo : oanki ihoh alhik rge him oihmo glio ihoh zbaot Smo : oaSim dbri bpik obzl idi ksitik lnTe Smim olisd arz olamr lzion emi ath : hteorri hteorri qomi iroSlm aSr Stit mid ihoh at kos Hmto at qbet kos htrelh Stit mzit : ain mnhl lh mkl bnim ildh oain mHciq bidh mkl bnim gdlh : Stim hnh qratik mi inod lk hSd ohSbr ohreb ohHrb mi anHmk : bnik elpo Skbo braS kl Hozot ktoa mkmr hmlaim Hmt ihoh gert alhik : lkn Smei na cat enih oSkrt ola miin : kh amr adnik ihoh oalhik irib emo hnh lqHti midk at kos htrelh at qbet kos Hmti la tosipi lStoth eod : oSmtih bid mogik aSr amro lnpSk SHi onebrh otSimi karz gok okHoz lebrim :

52

eori eori lbSi eck zion lbSi bgdi tpartk iroSlm eir hqdS ki la iosip iba bk eod erl oTma : htneri mepr qomi Sbi iroSlm htptHo mosri zoark Sbih bt zion : ki kh amr ihoh Hnm nmkrtm ola bksp tgalo : ki kh amr adni ihoh mzrim ird emi braSnh lgor Sm oaSor baps eSqo : oeth mh li ph nam ihoh ki lqH emi Hnm mSlo ihililo nam ihoh otmid kl hiom Smi mnaz : lkn ide emi Smi lkn biom hhoa ki ani hoa hmdbr hnni : mh naoo el hhrim rgli mbSr mSmie Slom mbSr Tob mSmie iSoeh amr lzion mlk alhik : qol zpik nSao qol iHdo irnno ki ein bein irao bSob ihoh zion : pzHo rnno iHdo Hrbot iroSlm ki nHm ihoh emo gal iroSlm : HSp ihoh at croe qdSo leini kl hgoim orao kl apsi arz at iSoet alhino : soro soro zao mSm Tma al tgeo zao mtokh hbro nSai kli ihoh : ki la bHpcon tzao obmnosh la tlkon ki hlk lpnikm ihoh omaspkm alhi iSral : hnh iSkil ebdi irom onSa ogbh mad : kaSr Smmo elik rbim kn mSHt maiS mraho otaro mbni adm : kn ich goim rbim elio iqpzo mlkim pihm ki aSr la spr lhm rao oaSr la Smeo htbonno :

53

mi hamin lSmetno ocroe ihoh el mi nglth : oiel kionq lpnio okSrS marz zih la tar lo ola hdr onraho ola mrah onHmdho : nbch oHdl aiSim aiS mkabot oidoe Hli okmstr pnim mmno nbch ola HSbnho : akn Hlino hoa nSa omkabino sblm oanHno HSbnho ngoe mkh alhim omenh : ohoa mHll mpSeno mdka meontino mosr Slomno elio obHbrto nrpa lno : klno kzan teino aiS ldrko pnino oihoh hpgie bo at eon klno : ngS ohoa nenh ola iptH pio kSh lTbH iobl okrHl lpni gccih nalmh ola iptH pio : mezr ommSpT lqH oat doro mi iSoHH ki ngcr marz Hiim mpSe emi nge lmo : oitn at rSeim qbro oat eSir bmtio el la Hms eSh ola mrmh bpio : oihoh Hpz dkao hHli am tSim aSm npSo irah cre iarik imim oHpz ihoh bido izlH : meml npSo irah iSbe bdeto izdiq zdiq ebdi lrbim oeontm hoa isbl : lkn aHlq lo brbim oat ezomim iHlq Sll tHt aSr herh lmot npSo oat pSeim nmnh ohoa HTa rbim nSa olpSeim ipgie :

54

rni eqrh la ildh pzHi rnh ozhli la Hlh ki rbim bni Sommh mbni beolh amr ihoh : hrHibi mqom ahlk oirieot mSknotik iTo al tHSki hariki mitrik oitdtik Hcqi : ki imin oSmaol tprzi ocrek goim iirS oerim nSmot ioSibo : al tirai ki la tboSi oal tklmi ki la tHpiri ki bSt elomik tSkHi oHrpt almnotik la tckri eod : ki belik eSik ihoh zbaot Smo ogalk qdoS iSral alhi kl harz iqra : ki kaSh ecobh oezobt roH qrak ihoh oaSt neorim ki tmas amr alhik : brge qTn ecbtik obrHmim gdlim aqbzk : bSzp qzp hstrti pni rge mmk obHsd eolm rHmtik amr galk ihoh : ki mi nH cat li aSr nSbeti mebr mi nH eod el harz kn nSbeti mqzp elik omger bk : ki hhrim imoSo ohgbeot tmoTnh oHsdi matk la imoS obrit Slomi la tmoT amr mrHmk ihoh : enih serh la nHmh hnh anki mrbiz bpok abnik oisdtik bspirim : oSmti kdkd SmStik oSerik labni aqdH okl gbolk labni Hpz : okl bnik lmodi ihoh orb Slom bnik : bzdqh tkonni rHqi meSq ki la tirai ommHth ki la tqrb alik : hn gor igor aps maoti mi gr atk elik ipol : hn anki brati HrS npH baS pHm omozia kli lmeSho oanki brati mSHit lHbl : kl kli iozr elik la izlH okl lSon tqom atk lmSpT trSiei cat nHlt ebdi ihoh ozdqtm mati nam ihoh :

55

hoi kl zma lko lmim oaSr ain lo ksp lko Sbro oaklo olko Sbro bloa ksp obloa mHir iin oHlb : lmh tSqlo ksp bloa lHm oigiekm bloa lSbeh Smeo Smoe ali oaklo Tob otteng bdSn npSkm : hTo acnkm olko ali Smeo otHi npSkm oakrth lkm brit eolm Hsdi dod hnamnim : hn ed laomim nttio ngid omzoh lamim : hn goi la tde tqra ogoi la ideok alik irozo lmen ihoh alhik olqdoS iSral ki park : drSo ihoh bhmzao qraho bhioto qrob : iecb rSe drko oaiS aon mHSbtio oiSb al ihoh oirHmho oal alhino ki irbh lsloH : ki la mHSboti mHSbotikm ola drkikm drki nam ihoh : ki gbho Smim marz kn gbho drki mdrkikm omHSbti mmHSbtikm : ki kaSr ird hgSm ohSlg mn hSmim oSmh la iSob ki am hroh at harz oholidh ohzmiHh ontn cre lcre olHm lakl : kn ihih dbri aSr iza mpi la iSob ali riqm ki am eSh at aSr Hpzti ohzliH aSr SlHtio : ki bSmHh tzao obSlom toblon hhrim ohgbeot ipzHo lpnikm rnh okl ezi hSdh imHao kp : tHt hnezoz ielh broS tHt hsrpd ielh hds ohih lihoh lSm laot eolm la ikrt :

56

kh amr ihoh Smro mSpT oeSo zdqh ki qrobh iSoeti lboa ozdqti lhglot : aSri anoS ieSh cat obn adm iHciq bh Smr Sbt mHllo oSmr ido meSot kl re : oal iamr bn hnkr hnloh al ihoh lamr hbdl ibdilni ihoh mel emo oal iamr hsris hn ani ez ibS : ki kh amr ihoh lsrisim aSr iSmro at Sbtoti obHro baSr Hpzti omHciqim bbriti : ontti lhm bbiti obHomti id oSm Tob mbnim ombnot Sm eolm atn lo aSr la ikrt : obni hnkr hnloim el ihoh lSrto olahbh at Sm ihoh lhiot lo lebdim kl Smr Sbt mHllo omHciqim bbriti : ohbiaotim al hr qdSi oSmHtim bbit tplti eoltihm ocbHihm lrzon el mcbHi ki biti bit tplh iqra lkl hemim : nam adni ihoh mqbz ndHi iSral eod aqbz elio lnqbzio : kl Hito Sdi atio lakl kl Hito bier : zpo eorim klm la ideo klm klbim almim la ioklo lnbH hcim Skbim ahbi lnom : ohklbim eci npS la ideo Sbeh ohmh reim la ideo hbin klm ldrkm pno aiS lbzeo mqzho : atio aqHh iin onsbah Skr ohih kch iom mHr gdol itr mad :

57

hzdiq abd oain aiS Sm el lb oanSi Hsd naspim bain mbin ki mpni hreh nasp hzdiq : iboa Slom inoHo el mSkbotm hlk nkHo : oatm qrbo hnh bni ennh cre mnap otcnh : el mi ttengo el mi trHibo ph tariko lSon hloa atm ildi pSe cre Sqr : hnHmim balim tHt kl ez renn SHTi hildim bnHlim tHt sepi hsleim : bHlqi nHl Hlqk hm hm gorlk gm lhm Spkt nsk helit mnHh hel alh anHm : el hr gbh onSa Smt mSkbk gm Sm elit lcbH cbH : oaHr hdlt ohmcoch Smt ckronk ki mati glit oteli hrHbt mSkbk otkrt lk mhm ahbt mSkbm id Hcit : otSri lmlk bSmn otrbi rqHik otSlHi zrik ed mrHq otSpili ed Saol : brb drkk iget la amrt noaS Hit idk mzat el kn la Hlit : oat mi dagt otirai ki tkcbi oaoti la ckrt la Smt el lbk hla ani mHSh omelm oaoti la tirai : ani agid zdqtk oat meSik ola ioeilok : bceqk izilk qbozik oat klm iSa roH iqH hbl ohHosh bi inHl arz oiirS hr qdSi : oamr slo slo pno drk hrimo mkSol mdrk emi : ki kh amr rm onSa Skn ed oqdoS Smo mrom oqdoS aSkon oat dka oSpl roH lhHiot roH Splim olhHiot lb ndkaim : ki la leolm arib ola lnzH aqzop ki roH mlpni ieTop onSmot ani eSiti : beon bzeo qzpti oakho hstr oaqzp oilk Sobb bdrk lbo : drkio raiti oarpaho oanHho oaSlm nHmim lo olablio : bora nob Sptim Slom Slom lrHoq olqrob amr ihoh orpatio : ohrSeim kim ngrS ki hSqT la iokl oigrSo mimio rpS oTiT : ain Slom amr alhi lrSeim :

58

qra bgron al tHSk kSopr hrm qolk ohgd lemi pSem olbit ieqb HTatm : oaoti iom iom idrSon odet drki iHpzon kgoi aSr zdqh eSh omSpT alhio la ecb iSaloni mSpTi zdq qrbt alhim iHpzon : lmh zmno ola rait enino npSno ola tde hn biom zmkm tmzao Hpz okl ezbikm tngSo : hn lrib omzh tzomo olhkot bagrp rSe la tzomo kiom lhSmie bmrom qolkm : hkch ihih zom abHrho iom enot adm npSo hlkp kagmn raSo oSq oapr izie hlch tqra zom oiom rzon lihoh : hloa ch zom abHrho ptH Hrzbot rSe htr agdot moTh oSlH rzozim HpSim okl moTh tntqo : hloa prs lreb lHmk oeniim mrodim tbia bit ki trah erm oksito ombSrk la ttelm : ac ibqe kSHr aork oarktk mhrh tzmH ohlk lpnik zdqk kbod ihoh iaspk : ac tqra oihoh ienh tSoe oiamr hnni am tsir mtokk moTh SlH azbe odbr aon : otpq lreb npSk onpS nenh tSbie ocrH bHSk aork oapltk kzhrim : onHk ihoh tmid ohSbie bzHzHot npSk oezmtik iHliz ohiit kgn roh okmoza mim aSr la ikcbo mimio : obno mmk Hrbot eolm mosdi dor odor tqomm oqra lk gdr prz mSbb ntibot lSbt : am tSib mSbt rglk eSot Hpzik biom qdSi oqrat lSbt eng lqdoS ihoh mkbd okbdto meSot drkik mmzoa Hpzk odbr dbr : ac tteng el ihoh ohrkbtik el bmoti arz ohakltik nHlt ieqb abik ki pi ihoh dbr :

59

hn la qzrh id ihoh mhoSie ola kbdh acno mSmoe : ki am eontikm hio mbdlim binkm lbin alhikm oHTaotikm hstiro pnim mkm mSmoe : ki kpikm ngalo bdm oazbeotikm beon Sptotikm dbro Sqr lSonkm eolh thgh : ain qra bzdq oain nSpT bamonh bToH el tho odbr Soa hro eml oholid aon : bizi zpeoni bqeo oqori ekbiS iargo hakl mbizihm imot ohcorh tbqe apeh : qorihm la ihio lbgd ola itkso bmeSihm meSihm meSi aon opel Hms bkpihm : rglihm lre irzo oimhro lSpk dm nqi mHSbotihm mHSbot aon Sd oSbr bmslotm : drk Slom la ideo oain mSpT bmeglotm ntibotihm eqSo lhm kl drk bh la ide Slom : el kn rHq mSpT mmno ola tSigno zdqh nqoh laor ohnh HSk lnghot baplot nhlk : ngSSh keorim qir okain einim ngSSh kSlno bzhrim knSp baSmnim kmtim : nhmh kdbim klno okionim hgh nhgh nqoh lmSpT oain liSoeh rHqh mmno : ki rbo pSeino ngdk oHTaotino enth bno ki pSeino atno oeontino idenom : pSe okHS bihoh onsog maHr alhino dbr eSq osrh hro ohgo mlb dbri Sqr : ohsg aHor mSpT ozdqh mrHoq temd ki kSlh brHob amt onkHh la tokl lboa : othi hamt nedrt osr mre mStoll oira ihoh oire beinio ki ain mSpT : oira ki ain aiS oiStomm ki ain mpgie otoSe lo creo ozdqto hia smktho : oilbS zdqh kSrin okobe iSoeh braSo oilbS bgdi nqm tlbSt oieT kmeil qnah : kel gmlot kel iSlm Hmh lzrio gmol laibio laiim gmol iSlm : oiirao mmerb at Sm ihoh ommcrH SmS at kbodo ki iboa knhr zr roH ihoh nssh bo : oba lzion goal olSbi pSe bieqb nam ihoh : oani cat briti aotm amr ihoh roHi aSr elik odbri aSr Smti bpik la imoSo mpik ompi crek ompi cre crek amr ihoh meth oed eolm :

60

qomi aori ki ba aork okbod ihoh elik crH : ki hnh hHSk iksh arz oerpl lamim oelik icrH ihoh okbodo elik irah : ohlko goim laork omlkim lngh crHk : Sai sbib einik orai klm nqbzo bao lk bnik mrHoq ibao obntik el zd tamnh : ac trai onhrt opHd orHb lbbk ki ihpk elik hmon im Hil goim ibao lk : Spet gmlim tksk bkri mdin oeiph klm mSba ibao chb olbonh iSao othlt ihoh ibSro : kl zan qdr iqbzo lk aili nbiot iSrtonk ielo el rzon mcbHi obit tparti apar : mi alh keb teopinh okionim al arbtihm : ki li aiim iqoo oaniot trSiS braSnh lhbia bnik mrHoq kspm ochbm atm lSm ihoh alhik olqdoS iSral ki park : obno bni nkr Hmtik omlkihm iSrtonk ki bqzpi hkitik obrzoni rHmtik : optHo Serik tmid iomm olilh la isgro lhbia alik Hil goim omlkihm nhogim : ki hgoi ohmmlkh aSr la iebdok iabdo ohgoim Hrb iHrbo : kbod hlbnon alik iboa broS tdhr otaSor iHdo lpar mqom mqdSi omqom rgli akbd : ohlko alik SHoH bni menik ohStHoo el kpot rglik kl mnazik oqrao lk eir ihoh zion qdoS iSral : tHt hiotk ecobh oSnoah oain eobr oSmtik lgaon eolm mSoS dor odor : oinqt Hlb goim oSd mlkim tinqi oidet ki ani ihoh moSiek ogalk abir ieqb : tHt hnHSt abia chb otHt hbrcl abia ksp otHt hezim nHSt otHt habnim brcl oSmti pqdtk Slom ongSik zdqh : la iSme eod Hms barzk Sd oSbr bgbolik oqrat iSoeh Homtik oSerik thlh : la ihih lk eod hSmS laor iomm olngh hirH la iair lk ohih lk ihoh laor eolm oalhik ltpartk : la iboa eod SmSk oirHk la iasp ki ihoh ihih lk laor eolm oSlmo imi ablk : oemk klm zdiqim leolm iirSo arz nzr mTeo meSh idi lhtpar : hqTn ihih lalp ohzeir lgoi ezom ani ihoh beth aHiSnh :

61

roH adni ihoh eli ien mSH ihoh ati lbSr enoim SlHni lHbS lnSbri lb lqra lSboim dror olasorim pqH qoH : lqra Snt rzon lihoh oiom nqm lalhino lnHm kl ablim : lSom labli zion ltt lhm par tHt apr Smn SSon tHt abl meTh thlh tHt roH khh oqra lhm aili hzdq mTe ihoh lhtpar : obno Hrbot eolm Smmot raSnim iqommo oHdSo eri Hrb Smmot dor odor : oemdo crim oreo zankm obni nkr akrikm okrmikm : oatm khni ihoh tqrao mSrti alhino iamr lkm Hil goim taklo obkbodm ttimro : tHt bStkm mSnh oklmh irno Hlqm lkn barzm mSnh iirSo SmHt eolm thih lhm : ki ani ihoh ahb mSpT Sna gcl beolh ontti peltm bamt obrit eolm akrot lhm : onode bgoim crem ozazaihm btok hemim kl raihm ikirom ki hm cre brk ihoh : SoS aSiS bihoh tgl npSi balhi ki hlbiSni bgdi iSe meil zdqh ieTni kHtn ikhn par okklh tedh klih : ki karz tozia zmHh okgnh croeih tzmiH kn adni ihoh izmiH zdqh othlh ngd kl hgoim :

62

lmen zion la aHSh olmen iroSlm la aSqoT ed iza kngh zdqh oiSoeth klpid iber : orao goim zdqk okl mlkim kbodk oqra lk Sm HdS aSr pi ihoh iqbno : ohiit eTrt tpart bid ihoh oznop mlokh bkp alhik : la iamr lk eod ecobh olarzk la iamr eod Smmh ki lk iqra Hpzi bh olarzk beolh ki Hpz ihoh bk oarzk tbel : ki ibel bHor btolh ibelok bnik omSoS Htn el klh iSiS elik alhik : el Homtik iroSlm hpqdti Smrim kl hiom okl hlilh tmid la iHSo hmckrim at ihoh al dmi lkm : oal ttno dmi lo ed ikonn oed iSim at iroSlm thlh barz : nSbe ihoh bimino obcroe eco am atn at dgnk eod makl laibik oam iSto bni nkr tiroSk aSr iget bo : ki maspio iaklho ohllo at ihoh omqbzio iStho bHzrot qdSi : ebro ebro bSerim pno drk hem slo slo hmslh sqlo mabn hrimo ns el hemim : hnh ihoh hSmie al qzh harz amro lbt zion hnh iSek ba hnh Skro ato opelto lpnio : oqrao lhm em hqdS gaoli ihoh olk iqra droSh eir la necbh :

63

mi ch ba madom Hmoz bgdim mbzrh ch hdor blboSo zeh brb kHo ani mdbr bzdqh rb lhoSie : mdoe adm llboSk obgdik kdrk bgt : porh drkti lbdi omemim ain aiS ati oadrkm bapi oarmsm bHmti oic nzHm el bgdi okl mlboSi agalti : ki iom nqm blbi oSnt gaoli bah : oabiT oain ecr oaStomm oain somk otoSe li crei oHmti hia smktni : oabos emim bapi oaSkrm bHmti oaorid larz nzHm : Hsdi ihoh ackir thlt ihoh kel kl aSr gmlno ihoh orb Tob lbit iSral aSr gmlm krHmio okrb Hsdio : oiamr ak emi hmh bnim la iSqro oihi lhm lmoSie : bkl zrtm la zr omlak pnio hoSiem bahbto obHmlto hoa galm oinTlm oinSam kl imi eolm : ohmh mro oezbo at roH qdSo oihpk lhm laoib hoa nlHm bm : oickr imi eolm mSh emo aih hmelm mim at rei zano aih hSm bqrbo at roH qdSo : molik limin mSh croe tparto boqe mim mpnihm leSot lo Sm eolm : molikm bthmot ksos bmdbr la ikSlo : kbhmh bbqeh trd roH ihoh tniHno kn nhgt emk leSot lk Sm tpart : hbT mSmim orah mcbl qdSk otpartk aih qnatk ogbortk hmon meik orHmik ali htapqo : ki ath abino ki abrhm la ideno oiSral la ikirno ath ihoh abino galno meolm Smk : lmh tteno ihoh mdrkik tqSiH lbno miratk Sob lmen ebdik SbTi nHltk : lmzer irSo em qdSk zrino bosso mqdSk : hiino meolm la mSlt bm la nqra Smk elihm :

64

loa qret Smim irdt mpnik hrim nclo : kqdH aS hmsim mim tbeh aS lhodie Smk lzrik mpnik goim irgco : beSotk noraot la nqoh irdt mpnik hrim nclo : omeolm la Smeo la hacino ein la rath alhim coltk ieSh lmHkh lo : pget at SS oeSh zdq bdrkik ickrok hn ath qzpt onHTa bhm eolm onoSe : onhi kTma klno okbgd edim kl zdqtino onbl kelh klno oeonno kroH iSano : oain qora bSmk mteorr lhHciq bk ki hstrt pnik mmno otmogno bid eonno : oeth ihoh abino ath anHno hHmr oath izrno omeSh idk klno : al tqzp ihoh ed mad oal led tckr eon hn hbT na emk klno : eri qdSk hio mdbr zion mdbr hith iroSlm Smmh : bit qdSno otpartno aSr hllok abtino hih lSrpt aS okl mHmdino hih lHrbh : hel alh ttapq ihoh tHSh otenno ed mad :

65

ndrSti lloa Salo nmzati lla bqSni amrti hnni hnni al goi la qra bSmi : prSti idi kl hiom al em sorr hhlkim hdrk la Tob aHr mHSbtihm : hem hmkeisim aoti el pni tmid cbHim bgnot omqTrim el hlbnim : hiSbim bqbrim obnzorim ilino haklim bSr hHcir oprq pglim klihm : hamrim qrb alik al tgS bi ki qdStik alh eSn bapi aS iqdt kl hiom : hnh ktobh lpni la aHSh ki am Slmti oSlmti el Hiqm : eontikm oeont abotikm iHdo amr ihoh aSr qTro el hhrim oel hgbeot Hrponi omdti peltm raSnh el Hiqm : kh amr ihoh kaSr imza htiroS baSkol oamr al tSHitho ki brkh bo kn aeSh lmen ebdi lblti hSHit hkl : ohozati mieqb cre omihodh iorS hri oirSoh bHiri oebdi iSkno Smh : ohih hSron lnoh zan oemq ekor lrbz bqr lemi aSr drSoni : oatm ecbi ihoh hSkHim at hr qdSi herkim lgd SlHn ohmmlaim lmni mmsk : omniti atkm lHrb oklkm lTbH tkreo ien qrati ola enitm dbrti ola Smetm oteSo hre beini obaSr la Hpzti bHrtm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnh ebdi iaklo oatm trebo hnh ebdi iSto oatm tzmao hnh ebdi iSmHo oatm tbSo : hnh ebdi irno mTob lb oatm tzeqo mkab lb omSbr roH tililo : ohnHtm Smkm lSboeh lbHiri ohmitk adni ihoh olebdio iqra Sm aHr : aSr hmtbrk barz itbrk balhi amn ohnSbe barz iSbe balhi amn ki nSkHo hzrot hraSnot oki nstro meini : ki hnni bora Smim HdSim oarz HdSh ola tckrnh hraSnot ola telinh el lb : ki am SiSo ogilo edi ed aSr ani bora ki hnni bora at iroSlm gilh oemh mSoS : oglti biroSlm oSSti bemi ola iSme bh eod qol bki oqol ceqh : la ihih mSm eod eol imim ocqn aSr la imla at imio ki hner bn mah Snh imot ohHoTa bn mah Snh iqll : obno btim oiSbo onTeo krmim oaklo prim : la ibno oaHr iSb la iTeo oaHr iakl ki kimi hez imi emi omeSh idihm iblo bHiri : la iigeo lriq ola ildo lbhlh ki cre broki ihoh hmh ozazaihm atm : ohih Trm iqrao oani aenh eod hm mdbrim oani aSme : cab oTlh ireo kaHd oarih kbqr iakl tbn onHS epr lHmo la ireo ola iSHito bkl hr qdSi amr ihoh :

66

kh amr ihoh hSmim ksai oharz hdm rgli ai ch bit aSr tbno li oai ch mqom mnoHti : oat kl alh idi eSth oihio kl alh nam ihoh oal ch abiT al eni onkh roH oHrd el dbri : SoHT hSor mkh aiS cobH hSh erp klb melh mnHh dm Hcir mckir lbnh mbrk aon gm hmh bHro bdrkihm obSqozihm npSm Hpzh : gm ani abHr btellihm omgortm abia lhm ien qrati oain eonh dbrti ola Smeo oieSo hre beini obaSr la Hpzti bHro : Smeo dbr ihoh hHrdim al dbro amro aHikm Snaikm mndikm lmen Smi ikbd ihoh onrah bSmHtkm ohm ibSo : qol Saon meir qol mhikl qol ihoh mSlm gmol laibio : bTrm tHil ildh bTrm iboa Hbl lh ohmliTh ckr : mi Sme kcat mi rah kalh hioHl arz biom aHd am iold goi pem aHt ki Hlh gm ildh zion at bnih : hani aSbir ola aolid iamr ihoh am ani hmolid oezrti amr alhik : SmHo at iroSlm ogilo bh kl ahbih SiSo ath mSoS kl hmtablim elih : lmen tinqo oSbetm mSd tnHmih lmen tmzo ohtengtm mcic kbodh : ki kh amr ihoh hnni nTh alih knhr Slom oknHl SoTp kbod goim oinqtm el zd tnSao oel brkim tSeSeo : kaiS aSr amo tnHmno kn anki anHmkm obiroSlm tnHmo : oraitm oSS lbkm oezmotikm kdSa tprHnh onodeh id ihoh at ebdio ocem at aibio : ki hnh ihoh baS iboa oksoph mrkbtio lhSib bHmh apo ogerto blhbi aS : ki baS ihoh nSpT obHrbo at kl bSr orbo Hlli ihoh : hmtqdSim ohmThrim al hgnot aHr aHd btok akli bSr hHcir ohSqz ohekbr iHdo ispo nam ihoh : oanki meSihm omHSbtihm bah lqbz at kl hgoim ohlSnot obao orao at kbodi : oSmti bhm aot oSlHti mhm pliTim al hgoim trSiS pol olod mSki qSt tbl oion haiim hrHqim aSr la Smeo at Smei ola rao at kbodi ohgido at kbodi bgoim : ohbiao at kl aHikm mkl hgoim mnHh lihoh bsosim obrkb obzbim obprdim obkrkrot el hr qdSi iroSlm amr ihoh kaSr ibiao bni iSral at hmnHh bkli Thor bit ihoh : ogm mhm aqH lkhnim lloim amr ihoh : ki kaSr hSmim hHdSim oharz hHdSh aSr ani eSh emdim lpni nam ihoh kn iemd crekm oSmkm : ohih mdi HdS bHdSo omdi Sbt bSbto iboa kl bSr lhStHot lpni amr ihoh : oizao orao bpgri hanSim hpSeim bi ki toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh ohio draon lkl bSr :

irmiho

1

dbri irmiho bn Hlqiho mn hkhnim aSr bentot barz bnimn : aSr hih dbr ihoh alio bimi iaSiho bn amon mlk ihodh bSlS eSrh Snh lmlko : oihi bimi ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh ed tm eSti eSrh Snh lzdqiho bn iaSiho mlk ihodh ed glot iroSlm bHdS hHmiSi : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bTrm azork bbTn idetik obTrm tza mrHm hqdStik nbia lgoim nttik : oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh la ideti dbr ki ner anki : oiamr ihoh ali al tamr ner anki ki el kl aSr aSlHk tlk oat kl aSr azok tdbr : al tira mpnihm ki atk ani lhzlk nam ihoh : oiSlH ihoh at ido oige el pi oiamr ihoh ali hnh ntti dbri bpik : rah hpqdtik hiom hch el hgoim oel hmmlkot lntoS olntoz olhabid olhros lbnot olnToe : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr mh ath rah irmiho oamr mql Sqd ani rah : oiamr ihoh ali hiTbt lraot ki Sqd ani el dbri leSto : oihi dbr ihoh ali Snit lamr mh ath rah oamr sir npoH ani rah opnio mpni zponh : oiamr ihoh ali mzpon tptH hreh el kl iSbi harz : ki hnni qra lkl mSpHot mmlkot zponh nam ihoh obao ontno aiS ksao ptH Seri iroSlm oel kl Homtih sbib oel kl eri ihodh : odbrti mSpTi aotm el kl retm aSr ecboni oiqTro lalhim aHrim oiStHoo lmeSi idihm : oath tacr mtnik oqmt odbrt alihm at kl aSr anki azok al tHt mpnihm pn aHtk lpnihm : oani hnh nttik hiom leir mbzr olemod brcl olHmot nHSt el kl harz lmlki ihodh lSrih lkhnih olem harz : onlHmo alik ola ioklo lk ki atk ani nam ihoh lhzilk :

2

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : hlk oqrat bacni iroSlm lamr kh amr ihoh ckrti lk Hsd neorik ahbt kloltik lktk aHri bmdbr barz la croeh : qdS iSral lihoh raSit tboath kl aklio iaSmo reh tba alihm nam ihoh : Smeo dbr ihoh bit ieqb okl mSpHot bit iSral : kh amr ihoh mh mzao abotikm bi eol ki rHqo meli oilko aHri hhbl oihblo : ola amro aih ihoh hmelh atno marz mzrim hmolik atno bmdbr barz erbh oSoHh barz zih ozlmot barz la ebr bh aiS ola iSb adm Sm : oabia atkm al arz hkrml lakl prih oTobh otbao otTmao at arzi onHlti Smtm ltoebh : hkhnim la amro aih ihoh otpSi htorh la ideoni ohreim pSeo bi ohnbiaim nbao bbel oaHri la ioelo hlko : lkn ed arib atkm nam ihoh oat bni bnikm arib : ki ebro aii ktiim orao oqdr SlHo ohtbonno mad orao hn hith kcat : hhimir goi alhim ohmh la alhim oemi hmir kbodo bloa ioeil : Smo Smim el cat oSero Hrbo mad nam ihoh : ki Stim reot eSh emi ati ecbo mqor mim Hiim lHzb lhm barot bart nSbrim aSr la iklo hmim : hebd iSral am ilid bit hoa mdoe hih lbc : elio iSago kprim ntno qolm oiSito arzo lSmh erio nzth mbli iSb : gm bni np otHpns ireok qdqd : hloa cat teSh lk ecbk at ihoh alhik bet molikk bdrk : oeth mh lk ldrk mzrim lStot mi SHor omh lk ldrk aSor lStot mi nhr : tisrk retk omSbotik tokHk odei orai ki re omr ecbk at ihoh alhik ola pHdti alik nam adni ihoh zbaot : ki meolm Sbrti elk ntqti mosrtik otamri la aebd ki el kl gbeh gbhh otHt kl ez renn at zeh cnh : oanki nTetik Srq klh cre amt oaik nhpkt li sori hgpn nkrih : ki am tkbsi bntr otrbi lk brit nktm eonk lpni nam adni ihoh : aik tamri la nTmati aHri hbelim la hlkti rai drkk bgia dei mh eSit bkrh qlh mSrkt drkih : prh lmd mdbr baot npSo Saph roH tanth mi iSibnh kl mbqSih la iiepo bHdSh imzaonh : mnei rglk miHp ogornk mzmah otamri noaS loa ki ahbti crim oaHrihm alk : kbSt gnb ki imza kn hbiSo bit iSral hmh mlkihm Srihm okhnihm onbiaihm : amrim lez abi ath olabn at ildtni ki pno ali erp ola pnim obet retm iamro qomh ohoSieno : oaih alhik aSr eSit lk iqomo am ioSieok bet retk ki mspr erik hio alhik ihodh : lmh tribo ali klkm pSetm bi nam ihoh : lSoa hkiti at bnikm mosr la lqHo aklh Hrbkm nbiaikm karih mSHit : hdor atm rao dbr ihoh hmdbr hiiti liSral am arz maplih mdoe amro emi rdno loa nboa eod alik : htSkH btolh edih klh qSrih oemi SkHoni imim ain mspr : mh tiTbi drkk lbqS ahbh lkn gm at hreot lmdti at drkik : gm bknpik nmzao dm npSot abionim nqiim la bmHtrt mzatim ki el kl alh : otamri ki nqiti ak Sb apo mmni hnni nSpT aotk el amrk la HTati : mh tcli mad lSnot at drkk gm mmzrim tboSi kaSr bSt maSor : gm mat ch tzai oidik el raSk ki mas ihoh bmbTHik ola tzliHi lhm :

3

lamr hn iSlH aiS at aSto ohlkh mato ohith laiS aHr hiSob alih eod hloa Hnop tHnp harz hhia oat cnit reim rbim oSob ali nam ihoh : Sai einik el Spim orai aiph la Sglt el drkim iSbt lhm kerbi bmdbr otHnipi arz bcnotik obretk : oimneo rbbim omlqoS loa hih omzH aSh conh hih lk mant hklm : hloa meth qrati li abi alop neri ath : hinTr leolm am iSmr lnzH hnh dbrti oteSi hreot otokl : oiamr ihoh ali bimi iaSiho hmlk hrait aSr eSth mSbh iSral hlkh hia el kl hr gbh oal tHt kl ez renn otcni Sm : oamr aHri eSoth at kl alh ali tSob ola Sbh otrah bgodh aHoth ihodh : oara ki el kl adot aSr naph mSbh iSral SlHtih oatn at spr krittih alih ola irah bgdh ihodh aHoth otlk otcn gm hia : ohih mql cnoth otHnp at harz otnap at habn oat hez : ogm bkl cat la Sbh ali bgodh aHoth ihodh bkl lbh ki am bSqr nam ihoh : oiamr ihoh ali zdqh npSh mSbh iSral mbgdh ihodh : hlk oqrat at hdbrim halh zponh oamrt Sobh mSbh iSral nam ihoh loa apil pni bkm ki Hsid ani nam ihoh la aTor leolm : ak dei eonk ki bihoh alhik pSet otpcri at drkik lcrim tHt kl ez renn obqoli la Smetm nam ihoh : Sobo bnim Sobbim nam ihoh ki anki belti bkm olqHti atkm aHd meir oSnim mmSpHh ohbati atkm zion : ontti lkm reim klbi oreo atkm deh ohSkil : ohih ki trbo opritm barz bimim hhmh nam ihoh la iamro eod aron brit ihoh ola ielh el lb ola ickro bo ola ipqdo ola ieSh eod : bet hhia iqrao liroSlm ksa ihoh onqoo alih kl hgoim lSm ihoh liroSlm ola ilko eod aHri Srrot lbm hre : bimim hhmh ilko bit ihodh el bit iSral oibao iHdo marz zpon el harz aSr hnHlti at abotikm : oanki amrti aik aSitk bbnim oatn lk arz Hmdh nHlt zbi zbaot goim oamr abi tqrao li omaHri la tSobo : akn bgdh aSh mreh kn bgdtm bi bit iSral nam ihoh : qol el Spiim nSme bki tHnoni bni iSral ki heoo at drkm SkHo at ihoh alhihm : Sobo bnim Sobbim arph mSobtikm hnno atno lk ki ath ihoh alhino : akn lSqr mgbeot hmon hrim akn bihoh alhino tSoet iSral : ohbSt aklh at igie abotino mneorino at zanm oat bqrm at bnihm oat bnotihm : nSkbh bbStno otksno klmtno ki lihoh alhino HTano anHno oabotino mneorino oed hiom hch ola Smeno bqol ihoh alhino :

4

am tSob iSral nam ihoh ali tSob oam tsir Sqozik mpni ola tnod : onSbet Hi ihoh bamt bmSpT obzdqh ohtbrko bo goim obo ithllo : ki kh amr ihoh laiS ihodh oliroSlm niro lkm nir oal tcreo al qozim : hmlo lihoh ohsro erlot lbbkm aiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm pn tza kaS Hmti oberh oain mkbh mpni re mellikm : hgido bihodh obiroSlm hSmieo oamro otqeo Sopr barz qrao mlao oamro haspo onboah al eri hmbzr : Sao ns zionh heico al temdo ki reh anki mbia mzpon oSbr gdol : elh arih msbko omSHit goim nse iza mmqmo lSom arzk lSmh erik tzinh main ioSb : el cat Hgro Sqim spdo ohililo ki la Sb Hron ap ihoh mmno : ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh iabd lb hmlk olb hSrim onSmo hkhnim ohnbiaim itmho : oamr ahh adni ihoh akn hSa hSat lem hch oliroSlm lamr Slom ihih lkm ongeh Hrb ed hnpS : bet hhia iamr lem hch oliroSlm roH zH Spiim bmdbr drk bt emi loa lcrot oloa lhbr : roH mla malh iboa li eth gm ani adbr mSpTim aotm : hnh kennim ielh oksoph mrkbotio qlo mnSrim sosio aoi lno ki Sddno : kbsi mreh lbk iroSlm lmen toSei ed mti tlin bqrbk mHSbot aonk : ki qol mgid mdn omSmie aon mhr aprim : hckiro lgoim hnh hSmieo el iroSlm nzrim baim marz hmrHq oitno el eri ihodh qolm : kSmri Sdi hio elih msbib ki ati mrth nam ihoh : drkk omellik eSo alh lk cat retk ki mr ki nge ed lbk : mei mei aHolh qirot lbi hmh li lbi la aHriS ki qol Sopr Smeti npSi troet mlHmh : Sbr el Sbr nqra ki Sddh kl harz ptam Sddo ahli rge irieti : ed mti arah ns aSmeh qol Sopr : ki aoil emi aoti la ideo bnim sklim hmh ola nbonim hmh Hkmim hmh lhre olhiTib la ideo : raiti at harz ohnh tho obho oal hSmim oain aorm : raiti hhrim ohnh reSim okl hgbeot htqlqlo : raiti ohnh ain hadm okl eop hSmim nddo : raiti ohnh hkrml hmdbr okl erio ntzo mpni ihoh mpni Hron apo : ki kh amr ihoh Smmh thih kl harz oklh la aeSh : el cat tabl harz oqdro hSmim mmel el ki dbrti cmti ola nHmti ola aSob mmnh : mqol prS ormh qSt brHt kl heir bao bebim obkpim elo kl heir ecobh oain ioSb bhn aiS : oati Sdod mh teSi ki tlbSi Sni ki tedi edi chb ki tqrei bpok einik lSoa ttipi maso bk egbim npSk ibqSo : ki qol kHolh Smeti zrh kmbkirh qol bt zion ttipH tprS kpih aoi na li ki eiph npSi lhrgim :

5

SoTTo bHozot iroSlm orao na odeo obqSo brHobotih am tmzao aiS am iS eSh mSpT mbqS amonh oaslH lh : oam Hi ihoh iamro lkn lSqr iSbeo : ihoh einik hloa lamonh hkith atm ola Hlo klitm mano qHt mosr Hcqo pnihm msle mano lSob : oani amrti ak dlim hm noalo ki la ideo drk ihoh mSpT alhihm : alkh li al hgdlim oadbrh aotm ki hmh ideo drk ihoh mSpT alhihm ak hmh iHdo Sbro el ntqo mosrot : el kn hkm arih mier cab erbot iSddm nmr Sqd el erihm kl hioza mhnh iTrp ki rbo pSeihm ezmo mSbotihm : ai lcat asloH lk bnik ecboni oiSbeo bla alhim oaSbe aotm oinapo obit conh itgddo : sosim micnim mSkim hio aiS al aSt reho izhlo : hel alh loa apqd nam ihoh oam bgoi aSr kch la ttnqm npSi : elo bSrotih oSHto oklh al teSo hsiro nTiSotih ki loa lihoh hmh : ki bgod bgdo bi bit iSral obit ihodh nam ihoh : kHSo bihoh oiamro la hoa ola tboa elino reh oHrb oreb loa nrah : ohnbiaim ihio lroH ohdbr ain bhm kh ieSh lhm : lkn kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot ien dbrkm at hdbr hch hnni ntn dbri bpik laS ohem hch ezim oakltm : hnni mbia elikm goi mmrHq bit iSral nam ihoh goi aitn hoa goi meolm hoa goi la tde lSno ola tSme mh idbr : aSpto kqbr ptoH klm gborim : oakl qzirk olHmk iaklo bnik obnotik iakl zank obqrk iakl gpnk otantk irSS eri mbzrik aSr ath boTH bhnh bHrb : ogm bimim hhmh nam ihoh la aeSh atkm klh : ohih ki tamro tHt mh eSh ihoh alhino lno at kl alh oamrt alihm kaSr ecbtm aoti otebdo alhi nkr barzkm kn tebdo crim barz la lkm : hgido cat bbit ieqb ohSmieoh bihodh lamr : Smeo na cat em skl oain lb einim lhm ola irao acnim lhm ola iSmeo : haoti la tirao nam ihoh am mpni la tHilo aSr Smti Hol gbol lim Hq eolm ola iebrnho oitgeSo ola ioklo ohmo glio ola iebrnho : olem hch hih lb sorr omorh sro oilko : ola amro blbbm nira na at ihoh alhino hntn gSm oirh omlqoS beto Sbeot Hqot qzir iSmr lno : eonotikm hTo alh oHTaotikm mneo hTob mkm : ki nmzao bemi rSeim iSor kSk iqoSim hzibo mSHit anSim ilkdo : kklob mla eop kn btihm mlaim mrmh el kn gdlo oieSiro : Smno eSto gm ebro dbri re din la dno din itom oizliHo omSpT abionim la SpTo : hel alh la apqd nam ihoh am bgoi aSr kch la ttnqm npSi : Smh oSerorh nhith barz : hnbiaim nbao bSqr ohkhnim irdo el idihm oemi ahbo kn omh teSo laHrith :

6

heco bni bnimn mqrb iroSlm obtqoe tqeo Sopr oel bit hkrm Sao mSat ki reh nSqph mzpon oSbr gdol : hnoh ohmengh dmiti bt zion : alih ibao reim oedrihm tqeo elih ahlim sbib reo aiS at ido : qdSo elih mlHmh qomo onelh bzhrim aoi lno ki pnh hiom ki inTo zlli erb : qomo onelh blilh onSHith armnotih : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot krto ezh oSpko el iroSlm sllh hia heir hpqd klh eSq bqrbh : khqir bor mimih kn hqrh reth Hms oSd iSme bh el pni tmid Hli omkh : hosri iroSlm pn tqe npSi mmk pn aSimk Smmh arz loa noSbh : kh amr ihoh zbaot eoll ieollo kgpn Sarit iSral hSb idk kbozr el slslot : el mi adbrh oaeidh oiSmeo hnh erlh acnm ola ioklo lhqSib hnh dbr ihoh hih lhm lHrph la iHpzo bo : oat Hmt ihoh mlati nlaiti hkil Spk el eoll bHoz oel sod bHorim iHdo ki gm aiS em aSh ilkdo cqn em mla imim : onsbo btihm laHrim Sdot onSim iHdo ki aTh at idi el iSbi harz nam ihoh : ki mqTnm oed gdolm klo boze bze omnbia oed khn klo eSh Sqr : oirpao at Sbr emi el nqlh lamr Slom Slom oain Slom : hbiSo ki toebh eSo gm boS la iboSo gm hklim la ideo lkn iplo bnplim bet pqdtim ikSlo amr ihoh : kh amr ihoh emdo el drkim orao oSalo lntbot eolm ai ch drk hTob olko bh omzao mrgoe lnpSkm oiamro la nlk : ohqmti elikm zpim hqSibo lqol Sopr oiamro la nqSib : lkn Smeo hgoim odei edh at aSr bm : Smei harz hnh anki mbia reh al hem hch pri mHSbotm ki el dbri la hqSibo otorti oimaso bh : lmh ch li lbonh mSba tboa oqnh hTob marz mrHq elotikm la lrzon ocbHikm la erbo li : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni ntn al hem hch mkSlim okSlo bm abot obnim iHdo Skn oreo iabdo : kh amr ihoh hnh em ba marz zpon ogoi gdol ieor mirkti arz : qSt okidon iHciqo akcri hoa ola irHmo qolm kim ihmh oel sosim irkbo erok kaiS lmlHmh elik bt zion : Smeno at Smeo rpo idino zrh hHciqtno Hil kioldh : al tzai hSdh obdrk al tlki ki Hrb laib mgor msbib : bt emi Hgri Sq ohtplSi bapr abl iHid eSi lk mspd tmrorim ki ptam iba hSdd elino : bHon nttik bemi mbzr otde obHnt at drkm : klm sri sorrim hlki rkil nHSt obrcl klm mSHitim hmh : nHr mpH maStm eprt lSoa zrp zrop oreim la ntqo : ksp nmas qrao lhm ki mas ihoh bhm :

7

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : emd bSer bit ihoh oqrat Sm at hdbr hch oamrt Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh hbaim bSerim halh lhStHot lihoh : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hiTibo drkikm omellikm oaSknh atkm bmqom hch : al tbTHo lkm al dbri hSqr lamr hikl ihoh hikl ihoh hikl ihoh hmh : ki am hiTib tiTibo at drkikm oat mellikm am eSo teSo mSpT bin aiS obin reho : gr itom oalmnh la teSqo odm nqi al tSpko bmqom hch oaHri alhim aHrim la tlko lre lkm : oSknti atkm bmqom hch barz aSr ntti labotikm lmn eolm oed eolm : hnh atm bTHim lkm el dbri hSqr lblti hoeil : hgnb rzH onap ohSbe lSqr oqTr lbel ohlk aHri alhim aHrim aSr la idetm : obatm oemdtm lpni bbit hch aSr nqra Smi elio oamrtm nzlno lmen eSot at kl htoebot halh : hmert przim hih hbit hch aSr nqra Smi elio beinikm gm anki hnh raiti nam ihoh : ki lko na al mqomi aSr bSilo aSr Sknti Smi Sm braSonh orao at aSr eSiti lo mpni ret emi iSral : oeth ien eSotkm at kl hmeSim halh nam ihoh oadbr alikm hSkm odbr ola Smetm oaqra atkm ola enitm : oeSiti lbit aSr nqra Smi elio aSr atm bTHim bo olmqom aSr ntti lkm olabotikm kaSr eSiti lSlo : ohSlkti atkm mel pni kaSr hSlkti at kl aHikm at kl cre aprim : oath al ttpll bed hem hch oal tSa bedm rnh otplh oal tpge bi ki ainni Sme atk : haink rah mh hmh eSim beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm : hbnim mlqTim ezim ohabot mberim at haS ohnSim lSot bzq leSot konim lmlkt hSmim ohsk nskim lalhim aHrim lmen hkesni : hati hm mkesim nam ihoh hloa atm lmen bSt pnihm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnh api oHmti ntkt al hmqom hch el hadm oel hbhmh oel ez hSdh oel pri hadmh oberh ola tkbh : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral elotikm spo el cbHikm oaklo bSr : ki la dbrti at abotikm ola zoitim biom hozia aotm marz mzrim el dbri eolh ocbH : ki am at hdbr hch zoiti aotm lamr Smeo bqoli ohiiti lkm lalhim oatm thio li lem ohlktm bkl hdrk aSr azoh atkm lmen iiTb lkm : ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm oilko bmezot bSrrot lbm hre oihio laHor ola lpnim : lmn hiom aSr izao abotikm marz mzrim ed hiom hch oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbiaim iom hSkm oSlH : oloa Smeo ali ola hTo at acnm oiqSo at erpm hreo mabotm : odbrt alihm at kl hdbrim halh ola iSmeo alik oqrat alihm ola ienokh : oamrt alihm ch hgoi aSr loa Smeo bqol ihoh alhio ola lqHo mosr abdh hamonh onkrth mpihm : gci ncrk ohSliki oSai el Spim qinh ki mas ihoh oiTS at dor ebrto : ki eSo bni ihodh hre beini naom ihoh Smo Sqozihm bbit aSr nqra Smi elio lTmao : obno bmot htpt aSr bgia bn hnm lSrp at bnihm oat bntihm baS aSr la zoiti ola elth el lbi : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ola iamr eod htpt ogia bn hnm ki am gia hhrgh oqbro btpt main mqom : ohith nblt hem hch lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz oain mHrid : ohSbti meri ihodh omHzot iroSlm qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh ki lHrbh thih harz :

8

bet hhia nam ihoh oiziao at ezmot mlki ihodh oat ezmot Srio oat ezmot hkhnim oat ezmot hnbiaim oat ezmot ioSbi iroSlm mqbrihm : oSTHom lSmS olirH olkl zba hSmim aSr ahbom oaSr ebdom oaSr hlko aHrihm oaSr drSom oaSr hStHoo lhm la iaspo ola iqbro ldmn el pni hadmh ihio : onbHr mot mHiim lkl hSarit hnSarim mn hmSpHh hreh hcat bkl hmqmot hnSarim aSr hdHtim Sm nam ihoh zbaot : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh hiplo ola iqomo am iSob ola iSob : mdoe Sobbh hem hch iroSlm mSbh nzHt hHciqo btrmit mano lSob : hqSbti oaSme loa kn idbro ain aiS nHm el reto lamr mh eSiti klh Sb bmrzotm ksos SoTp bmlHmh : gm Hsidh bSmim ideh moedih otr osos oegor Smro at et banh oemi la ideo at mSpT ihoh : aikh tamro Hkmim anHno otort ihoh atno akn hnh lSqr eSh eT Sqr sprim : hbiSo Hkmim Hto oilkdo hnh bdbr ihoh maso oHkmt mh lhm : lkn atn at nSihm laHrim Sdotihm liorSim ki mqTn oed gdol klh bze bze mnbia oed khn klh eSh Sqr : oirpo at Sbr bt emi el nqlh lamr Slom Slom oain Slom : hbSo ki toebh eSo gm boS la ibSo ohklm la ideo lkn iplo bnplim bet pqdtm ikSlo amr ihoh : asp asipm nam ihoh ain enbim bgpn oain tanim btanh ohelh nbl oatn lhm iebrom : el mh anHno iSbim haspo onboa al eri hmbzr ondmh Sm ki ihoh alhino hdmno oiSqno mi raS ki HTano lihoh : qoh lSlom oain Tob let mrph ohnh beth : mdn nSme nHrt sosio mqol mzhlot abirio reSh kl harz oiboao oiaklo arz omloah eir oiSbi bh : ki hnni mSlH bkm nHSim zpenim aSr ain lhm lHS onSko atkm nam ihoh : mbligiti eli igon eli lbi doi : hnh qol Soet bt emi marz mrHqim hihoh ain bzion am mlkh ain bh mdoe hkesoni bpslihm bhbli nkr : ebr qzir klh qiz oanHno loa noSeno : el Sbr bt emi hSbrti qdrti Smh hHcqtni : hzri ain bgled am rpa ain Sm ki mdoe la elth arkt bt emi :

9

mi itn raSi mim oeini mqor dmeh oabkh iomm olilh at Hlli bt emi : mi itnni bmdbr mlon arHim oaecbh at emi oalkh matm ki klm mnapim ezrt bgdim : oidrko at lSonm qStm Sqr ola lamonh gbro barz ki mreh al reh izao oati la ideo nam ihoh : aiS mreho hSmro oel kl aH al tbTHo ki kl aH eqob ieqb okl re rkil ihlk : oaiS breho ihtlo oamt la idbro lmdo lSonm dbr Sqr heoh nlao : Sbtk btok mrmh bmrmh mano det aoti nam ihoh : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni zorpm obHntim ki aik aeSh mpni bt emi : Hz SoHT lSonm mrmh dbr bpio Slom at reho idbr obqrbo iSim arbo : hel alh la apqd bm nam ihoh am bgoi aSr kch la ttnqm npSi : el hhrim aSa bki onhi oel naot mdbr qinh ki nzto mbli aiS ebr ola Smeo qol mqnh meop hSmim oed bhmh nddo hlko : ontti at iroSlm lglim meon tnim oat eri ihodh atn Smmh mbli ioSb : mi haiS hHkm oibn at cat oaSr dbr pi ihoh alio oigdh el mh abdh harz nzth kmdbr mbli ebr : oiamr ihoh el ecbm at torti aSr ntti lpnihm ola Smeo bqoli ola hlko bh : oilko aHri Srrot lbm oaHri hbelim aSr lmdom abotm : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni makilm at hem hch lenh ohSqitim mi raS : ohpzotim bgoim aSr la ideo hmh oabotm oSlHti aHrihm at hHrb ed kloti aotm : kh amr ihoh zbaot htbonno oqrao lmqonnot otboainh oal hHkmot SlHo otboanh : otmhrnh otSnh elino nhi otrdnh einino dmeh oepepino iclo mim : ki qol nhi nSme mzion aik Sddno bSno mad ki ecbno arz ki hSliko mSknotino : ki Smenh nSim dbr ihoh otqH acnkm dbr pio olmdnh bnotikm nhi oaSh reoth qinh : ki elh mot bHlonino ba barmnotino lhkrit eoll mHoz bHorim mrHbot : dbr kh nam ihoh onplh nblt hadm kdmn el pni hSdh okemir maHri hqzr oain masp : kh amr ihoh al ithll Hkm bHkmto oal ithll hgbor bgborto al ithll eSir beSro : ki am bcat ithll hmthll hSkl oide aoti ki ani ihoh eSh Hsd mSpT ozdqh barz ki balh Hpzti nam ihoh : hnh imim baim nam ihoh opqdti el kl mol berlh : el mzrim oel ihodh oel adom oel bni emon oel moab oel kl qzozi pah hiSbim bmdbr ki kl hgoim erlim okl bit iSral erli lb :

10

Smeo at hdbr aSr dbr ihoh elikm bit iSral : kh amr ihoh al drk hgoim al tlmdo omatot hSmim al tHto ki iHto hgoim mhmh : ki Hqot hemim hbl hoa ki ez mier krto meSh idi HrS bmezd : bksp obchb iipho bmsmrot obmqbot iHcqom oloa ipiq : ktmr mqSh hmh ola idbro nSoa inSoa ki la izedo al tirao mhm ki la ireo ogm hiTib ain aotm : main kmok ihoh gdol ath ogdol Smk bgborh : mi la irak mlk hgoim ki lk iath ki bkl Hkmi hgoim obkl mlkotm main kmok : obaHt ibero oikslo mosr hblim ez hoa : ksp mrqe mtrSiS ioba ochb maopc meSh HrS oidi zorp tklt oargmn lboSm meSh Hkmim klm : oihoh alhim amt hoa alhim Hiim omlk eolm mqzpo treS harz ola iklo goim cemo : kdnh tamron lhom alhia di Smia oarqa la ebdo iabdo marea omn tHot Smia alh : eSh arz bkHo mkin tbl bHkmto obtbonto nTh Smim : lqol tto hmon mim bSmim oielh nSaim mqzh arz brqim lmTr eSh oioza roH mazrtio : nber kl adm mdet hbiS kl zorp mpsl ki Sqr nsko ola roH bm : hbl hmh meSh teteim bet pqdtm iabdo : la kalh Hlq ieqb ki iozr hkl hoa oiSral SbT nHlto ihoh zbaot Smo : aspi marz knetk iSbti bmzor : ki kh amr ihoh hnni qole at ioSbi harz bpem hcat ohzroti lhm lmen imzao : aoi li el Sbri nHlh mkti oani amrti ak ch Hli oaSano : ahli Sdd okl mitri ntqo bni izani oainm ain nTh eod ahli omqim irieoti : ki nbero hreim oat ihoh la drSo el kn la hSkilo okl mreitm npozh : qol Smoeh hnh bah oreS gdol marz zpon lSom at eri ihodh Smmh meon tnim : ideti ihoh ki la ladm drko la laiS hlk ohkin at zedo : isrni ihoh ak bmSpT al bapk pn tmeTni : Spk Hmtk el hgoim aSr la ideok oel mSpHot aSr bSmk la qrao ki aklo at ieqb oaklho oiklho oat noho hSmo :

11

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : Smeo at dbri hbrit hcat odbrtm al aiS ihodh oel iSbi iroSlm : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aror haiS aSr la iSme at dbri hbrit hcat : aSr zoiti at abotikm biom hoziai aotm marz mzrim mkor hbrcl lamr Smeo bqoli oeSitm aotm kkl aSr azoh atkm ohiitm li lem oanki ahih lkm lalhim : lmen hqim at hSboeh aSr nSbeti labotikm ltt lhm arz cbt Hlb odbS kiom hch oaen oamr amn ihoh : oiamr ihoh ali qra at kl hdbrim halh beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm lamr Smeo at dbri hbrit hcat oeSitm aotm : ki hed hedti babotikm biom heloti aotm marz mzrim oed hiom hch hSkm ohed lamr Smeo bqoli : ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm oilko aiS bSrirot lbm hre oabia elihm at kl dbri hbrit hcat aSr zoiti leSot ola eSo : oiamr ihoh ali nmza qSr baiS ihodh obiSbi iroSlm : Sbo el eont abotm hraSnim aSr mano lSmoe at dbri ohmh hlko aHri alhim aHrim lebdm hpro bit iSral obit ihodh at briti aSr krti at abotm : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni mbia alihm reh aSr la ioklo lzat mmnh oceqo ali ola aSme alihm : ohlko eri ihodh oiSbi iroSlm oceqo al halhim aSr hm mqTrim lhm ohoSe la ioSieo lhm bet retm : ki mspr erik hio alhik ihodh omspr Hzot iroSlm Smtm mcbHot lbSt mcbHot lqTr lbel : oath al ttpll bed hem hch oal tSa bedm rnh otplh ki ainni Sme bet qram ali bed retm : mh lididi bbiti eSoth hmcmth hrbim obSr qdS iebro melik ki retki ac telci : cit renn iph pri tar qra ihoh Smk lqol hmolh gdlh hzit aS elih oreo dliotio : oihoh zbaot hnoTe aotk dbr elik reh bgll ret bit iSral obit ihodh aSr eSo lhm lhkesni lqTr lbel : oihoh hodieni oadeh ac hraitni mellihm : oani kkbS alop iobl lTboH ola ideti ki eli HSbo mHSbot nSHith ez blHmo onkrtno marz Hiim oSmo la ickr eod : oihoh zbaot SpT zdq bHn kliot olb arah nqmtk mhm ki alik gliti at ribi : lkn kh amr ihoh el anSi entot hmbqSim at npSk lamr la tnba bSm ihoh ola tmot bidno : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni pqd elihm hbHorim imto bHrb bnihm obnotihm imto breb : oSarit la thih lhm ki abia reh al anSi entot Snt pqdtm :

12

zdiq ath ihoh ki arib alik ak mSpTim adbr aotk mdoe drk rSeim zlHh Slo kl bgdi bgd : nTetm gm SrSo ilko gm eSo pri qrob ath bpihm orHoq mkliotihm : oath ihoh idetni trani obHnt lbi atk htqm kzan lTbHh ohqdSm liom hrgh : ed mti tabl harz oeSb kl hSdh iibS mret iSbi bh spth bhmot oeop ki amro la irah at aHritno : ki at rglim rzth oilaok oaik ttHrh at hsosim obarz Slom ath boTH oaik teSh bgaon hirdn : ki gm aHik obit abik gm hmh bgdo bk gm hmh qrao aHrik mla al tamn bm ki idbro alik Tobot : ecbti at biti nTSti at nHlti ntti at iddot npSi bkp aibih : hith li nHlti karih bier ntnh eli bqolh el kn Snatih : heiT zboe nHlti li heiT sbib elih lko aspo kl Hit hSdh htio laklh : reim rbim SHto krmi bsso at Hlqti ntno at Hlqt Hmdti lmdbr Smmh : Smh lSmmh ablh eli Smmh nSmh kl harz ki ain aiS Sm el lb : el kl Spim bmdbr bao Sddim ki Hrb lihoh aklh mqzh arz oed qzh harz ain Slom lkl bSr : creo HTim oqzim qzro nHlo la ioelo obSo mtboatikm mHron ap ihoh : kh amr ihoh el kl Skni hreim hngeim bnHlh aSr hnHlti at emi at iSral hnni ntSm mel admtm oat bit ihodh atoS mtokm : ohih aHri ntSi aotm aSob orHmtim ohSbtim aiS lnHlto oaiS larzo : ohih am lmd ilmdo at drki emi lhSbe bSmi Hi ihoh kaSr lmdo at emi lhSbe bbel onbno btok emi : oam la iSmeo ontSti at hgoi hhoa ntoS oabd nam ihoh :

13

kh amr ihoh ali hlok oqnit lk acor pStim oSmto el mtnik obmim la tbaho : oaqnh at hacor kdbr ihoh oaSm el mtni : oihi dbr ihoh ali Snit lamr : qH at hacor aSr qnit aSr el mtnik oqom lk prth oTmnho Sm bnqiq hsle : oalk oaTmnho bprt kaSr zoh ihoh aoti : oihi mqz imim rbim oiamr ihoh ali qom lk prth oqH mSm at hacor aSr zoitik lTmno Sm : oalk prth oaHpr oaqH at hacor mn hmqom aSr Tmntio Smh ohnh nSHt hacor la izlH lkl : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : kh amr ihoh kkh aSHit at gaon ihodh oat gaon iroSlm hrb : hem hch hre hmanim lSmoe at dbri hhlkim bSrrot lbm oilko aHri alhim aHrim lebdm olhStHot lhm oihi kacor hch aSr la izlH lkl : ki kaSr idbq hacor al mtni aiS kn hdbqti ali at kl bit iSral oat kl bit ihodh nam ihoh lhiot li lem olSm olthlh oltpart ola Smeo : oamrt alihm at hdbr hch kh amr ihoh alhi iSral kl nbl imla iin oamro alik hide la nde ki kl nbl imla iin : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh hnni mmla at kl iSbi harz hcat oat hmlkim hiSbim ldod el ksao oat hkhnim oat hnbiaim oat kl iSbi iroSlm Skron : onpztim aiS al aHio ohabot ohbnim iHdo nam ihoh la aHmol ola aHos ola arHm mhSHitm : Smeo ohacino al tgbho ki ihoh dbr : tno lihoh alhikm kbod bTrm iHSk obTrm itngpo rglikm el hri nSp oqoitm laor oSmh lzlmot iSit lerpl : oam la tSmeoh bmstrim tbkh npSi mpni goh odme tdme otrd eini dmeh ki nSbh edr ihoh : amr lmlk olgbirh hSpilo Sbo ki ird mraSotikm eTrt tpartkm : eri hngb sgro oain ptH hglt ihodh klh hglt Slomim : Sai einikm orai hbaim mzpon aih hedr ntn lk zan tpartk : mh tamri ki ipqd elik oat lmdt atm elik alpim lraS hloa Hblim iaHcok kmo aSt ldh : oki tamri blbbk mdoe qrani alh brb eonk nglo Solik nHmso eqbik : hihpk koSi eoro onmr Hbrbrtio gm atm toklo lhiTib lmdi hre : oapizm kqS eobr lroH mdbr : ch gorlk mnt mdik mati nam ihoh aSr SkHt aoti otbTHi bSqr : ogm ani HSpti Solik el pnik onrah qlonk : napik omzhlotik cmt cnotk el gbeot bSdh raiti Sqozik aoi lk iroSlm la tThri aHri mti ed :

14

aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho el dbri hbzrot : ablh ihodh oSerih amllo qdro larz ozoHt iroSlm elth : oadrihm SlHo zeorihm lmim bao el gbim la mzao mim Sbo klihm riqm bSo ohklmo oHpo raSm : bebor hadmh Hth ki la hih gSm barz bSo akrim Hpo raSm : ki gm ailt bSdh ildh oecob ki la hih dSa : opraim emdo el Spim Sapo roH ktnim klo einihm ki ain eSb : am eonino eno bno ihoh eSh lmen Smk ki rbo mSobtino lk HTano : mqoh iSral moSieo bet zrh lmh thih kgr barz okarH nTh llon : lmh thih kaiS ndhm kgbor la iokl lhoSie oath bqrbno ihoh oSmk elino nqra al tnHno : kh amr ihoh lem hch kn ahbo lnoe rglihm la HSko oihoh la rzm eth ickr eonm oipqd HTatm : oiamr ihoh ali al ttpll bed hem hch lTobh : ki izmo ainni Sme al rntm oki ielo elh omnHh ainni rzm ki bHrb obreb obdbr anki mklh aotm : oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh hnbaim amrim lhm la trao Hrb oreb la ihih lkm ki Slom amt atn lkm bmqom hch : oiamr ihoh ali Sqr hnbaim nbaim bSmi la SlHtim ola zoitim ola dbrti alihm Hcon Sqr oqsm oalol otrmot lbm hmh mtnbaim lkm : lkn kh amr ihoh el hnbaim hnbaim bSmi oani la SlHtim ohmh amrim Hrb oreb la ihih barz hcat bHrb obreb itmo hnbaim hhmh : ohem aSr hmh nbaim lhm ihio mSlkim bHzot iroSlm mpni hreb ohHrb oain mqbr lhmh hmh nSihm obnihm obntihm oSpkti elihm at retm : oamrt alihm at hdbr hch trdnh eini dmeh lilh oiomm oal tdminh ki Sbr gdol nSbrh btolt bt emi mkh nHlh mad : am izati hSdh ohnh Hlli Hrb oam bati heir ohnh tHloai reb ki gm nbia gm khn sHro al arz ola ideo : hmas mast at ihodh am bzion gelh npSk mdoe hkitno oain lno mrpa qoh lSlom oain Tob olet mrpa ohnh beth : ideno ihoh rSeno eon abotino ki HTano lk : al tnaz lmen Smk al tnbl ksa kbodk ckr al tpr britk atno : hiS bhbli hgoim mgSmim oam hSmim itno rbbim hla ath hoa ihoh alhino onqoh lk ki ath eSit at kl alh :

15

oiamr ihoh ali am iemd mSh oSmoal lpni ain npSi al hem hch SlH mel pni oizao : ohih ki iamro alik anh nza oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh aSr lmot lmot oaSr lHrb lHrb oaSr lreb lreb oaSr lSbi lSbi : opqdti elihm arbe mSpHot nam ihoh at hHrb lhrg oat hklbim lsHb oat eop hSmim oat bhmt harz lakl olhSHit : onttim lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz bgll mnSh bn iHcqiho mlk ihodh el aSr eSh biroSlm : ki mi iHml elik iroSlm omi inod lk omi isor lSal lSlm lk : at nTSt ati nam ihoh aHor tlki oaT at idi elik oaSHitk nlaiti hnHm : oacrm bmcrh bSeri harz Sklti abdti at emi mdrkihm loa Sbo : ezmo li almnto mHol imim hbati lhm el am bHor Sdd bzhrim hplti elih ptam eir obhlot : amllh ildt hSbeh npHh npSh bah SmSh bed iomm boSh oHprh oSaritm lHrb atn lpni aibihm nam ihoh : aoi li ami ki ildtni aiS rib oaiS mdon lkl harz la nSiti ola nSo bi klh mqlloni : amr ihoh am la Srotk lTob am loa hpgeti bk bet reh obet zrh at haib : hire brcl brcl mzpon onHSt : Hilk oaozrotik lbc atn la bmHir obkl HTaotik obkl gbolik : ohebrti at aibik barz la idet ki aS qdHh bapi elikm toqd : ath idet ihoh ckrni opqdni ohnqm li mrdpi al lark apk tqHni de Sati elik Hrph : nmzao dbrik oaklm oihi dbrik li lSSon olSmHt lbbi ki nqra Smk eli ihoh alhi zbaot : la iSbti bsod mSHqim oaelc mpni idk bdd iSbti ki cem mlatni : lmh hih kabi nzH omkti anoSh manh hrpa hio thih li kmo akcb mim la namno : lkn kh amr ihoh am tSob oaSibk lpni temd oam tozia iqr mcoll kpi thih iSbo hmh alik oath la tSob alihm : onttik lem hch lHomt nHSt bzorh onlHmo alik ola ioklo lk ki atk ani lhoSiek olhzilk nam ihoh : ohzltik mid reim opdtik mkp erzim :

16

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : la tqH lk aSh ola ihio lk bnim obnot bmqom hch : ki kh amr ihoh el hbnim oel hbnot hilodim bmqom hch oel amtm hildot aotm oel abotm hmoldim aotm barz hcat : mmoti tHlaim imto la ispdo ola iqbro ldmn el pni hadmh ihio obHrb obreb iklo ohith nbltm lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz : ki kh amr ihoh al tboa bit mrcH oal tlk lspod oal tnd lhm ki aspti at Slomi mat hem hch nam ihoh at hHsd oat hrHmim : omto gdlim oqTnim barz hcat la iqbro ola ispdo lhm ola itgdd ola iqrH lhm : ola iprso lhm el abl lnHmo el mt ola iSqo aotm kos tnHomim el abio oel amo : obit mSth la tboa lSbt aotm lakl olStot : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mSbit mn hmqom hch leinikm obimikm qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh : ohih ki tgid lem hch at kl hdbrim halh oamro alik el mh dbr ihoh elino at kl hreh hgdolh hcat omh eonno omh HTatno aSr HTano lihoh alhino : oamrt alihm el aSr ecbo abotikm aoti nam ihoh oilko aHri alhim aHrim oiebdom oiStHoo lhm oati ecbo oat torti la Smro : oatm hretm leSot mabotikm ohnkm hlkim aiS aHri Srrot lbo hre lblti Sme ali : ohTlti atkm mel harz hcat el harz aSr la idetm atm oabotikm oebdtm Sm at alhim aHrim iomm olilh aSr la atn lkm Hninh : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ola iamr eod Hi ihoh aSr helh at bni iSral marz mzrim : ki am Hi ihoh aSr helh at bni iSral marz zpon omkl harzot aSr hdiHm Smh ohSbtim el admtm aSr ntti labotm : hnni SlH ldogim rbim nam ihoh odigom oaHri kn aSlH lrbim zidim ozdom mel kl hr omel kl gbeh omnqiqi hsleim : ki eini el kl drkihm la nstro mlpni ola nzpn eonm mngd eini : oSlmti raSonh mSnh eonm oHTatm el Hllm at arzi bnblt Sqozihm otoebotihm mlao at nHlti : ihoh eci omeci omnosi biom zrh alik goim ibao mapsi arz oiamro ak Sqr nHlo abotino hbl oain bm moeil : hieSh lo adm alhim ohmh la alhim : lkn hnni modiem bpem hcat aodiem at idi oat gborti oideo ki Smi ihoh :

17

HTat ihodh ktobh beT brcl bzprn Smir HroSh el loH lbm olqrnot mcbHotikm : kckr bnihm mcbHotm oaSrihm el ez renn el gbeot hgbhot : hrri bSdh Hilk kl aozrotik lbc atn bmtik bHTat bkl gbolik : oSmTth obk mnHltk aSr ntti lk ohebdtik at aibik barz aSr la idet ki aS qdHtm bapi ed eolm toqd : kh amr ihoh aror hgbr aSr ibTH badm oSm bSr creo omn ihoh isor lbo : ohih kerer berbh ola irah ki iboa Tob oSkn Hrrim bmdbr arz mlHh ola tSb : brok hgbr aSr ibTH bihoh ohih ihoh mbTHo : ohih kez Stol el mim oel iobl iSlH SrSio ola ira ki iba Hm ohih elho renn obSnt bzrt la idag ola imiS meSot pri : eqb hlb mkl oanS hoa mi ideno : ani ihoh Hqr lb bHn kliot oltt laiS kdrko kpri mellio : qra dgr ola ild eSh eSr ola bmSpT bHzi imo iecbno obaHrito ihih nbl : ksa kbod mrom mraSon mqom mqdSno : mqoh iSral ihoh kl ecbik ibSo isori barz iktbo ki ecbo mqor mim Hiim at ihoh : rpani ihoh oarpa hoSieni oaoSeh ki thlti ath : hnh hmh amrim ali aih dbr ihoh iboa na : oani la azti mreh aHrik oiom anoS la htaoiti ath idet moza Spti nkH pnik hih : al thih li lmHth mHsi ath biom reh : ibSo rdpi oal abSh ani iHto hmh oal aHth ani hbia elihm iom reh omSnh Sbron Sbrm : kh amr ihoh ali hlk oemdt bSer bni em aSr ibao bo mlki ihodh oaSr izao bo obkl Seri iroSlm : oamrt alihm Smeo dbr ihoh mlki ihodh okl ihodh okl iSbi iroSlm hbaim bSerim halh : kh amr ihoh hSmro bnpSotikm oal tSao mSa biom hSbt ohbatm bSeri iroSlm : ola toziao mSa mbtikm biom hSbt okl mlakh la teSo oqdStm at iom hSbt kaSr zoiti at abotikm : ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm oiqSo at erpm lblti Some olblti qHt mosr : ohih am Sme tSmeon ali nam ihoh lblti hbia mSa bSeri heir hcat biom hSbt olqdS at iom hSbt lblti eSot bh kl mlakh : obao bSeri heir hcat mlkim oSrim iSbim el ksa dod rkbim brkb obsosim hmh oSrihm aiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm oiSbh heir hcat leolm : obao meri ihodh omsbibot iroSlm omarz bnimn omn hSplh omn hhr omn hngb mbaim eolh ocbH omnHh olbonh ombai todh bit ihoh : oam la tSmeo ali lqdS at iom hSbt olblti Sat mSa oba bSeri iroSlm biom hSbt ohzti aS bSerih oaklh armnot iroSlm ola tkbh :

18

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : qom oirdt bit hiozr oSmh aSmiek at dbri : oard bit hiozr ohnho eSh mlakh el habnim : onSHt hkli aSr hoa eSh bHmr bid hiozr oSb oieSho kli aHr kaSr iSr beini hiozr leSot : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamor : hkiozr hch la aokl leSot lkm bit iSral nam ihoh hnh kHmr bid hiozr kn atm bidi bit iSral : rge adbr el goi oel mmlkh lntoS olntoz olhabid : oSb hgoi hhoa mreto aSr dbrti elio onHmti el hreh aSr HSbti leSot lo : orge adbr el goi oel mmlkh lbnt olnTe : oeSh hreh beini lblti Sme bqoli onHmti el hTobh aSr amrti lhiTib aoto : oeth amr na al aiS ihodh oel ioSbi iroSlm lamr kh amr ihoh hnh anki iozr elikm reh oHSb elikm mHSbh Sobo na aiS mdrko hreh ohiTibo drkikm omellikm : oamro noaS ki aHri mHSbotino nlk oaiS Srrot lbo hre neSh : lkn kh amr ihoh Salo na bgoim mi Sme kalh Serrt eSth mad btolt iSral : hiecb mzor Sdi Slg lbnon am intSo mim crim qrim noclim : ki SkHni emi lSoa iqTro oikSlom bdrkihm Sbili eolm llkt ntibot drk la slolh : lSom arzm lSmh Sroqt eolm kl eobr elih iSm oinid braSo : kroH qdim apizm lpni aoib erp ola pnim aram biom aidm : oiamro lko onHSbh el irmiho mHSbot ki la tabd torh mkhn oezh mHkm odbr mnbia lko onkho blSon oal nqSibh al kl dbrio : hqSibh ihoh ali oSme lqol iribi : hiSlm tHt Tobh reh ki kro SoHh lnpSi ckr emdi lpnik ldbr elihm Tobh lhSib at Hmtk mhm : lkn tn at bnihm lreb ohgrm el idi Hrb othinh nSihm Sklot oalmnot oanSihm ihio hrgi mot bHorihm mki Hrb bmlHmh : tSme ceqh mbtihm ki tbia elihm gdod ptam ki kro SiHh llkdni opHim Tmno lrgli : oath ihoh idet at kl eztm eli lmot al tkpr el eonm oHTatm mlpnik al tmHi ohio mkSlim lpnik bet apk eSh bhm :

19

kh amr ihoh hlok oqnit bqbq iozr HrS omcqni hem omcqni hkhnim : oizat al gia bn hnm aSr ptH Ser hHrsot oqrat Sm at hdbrim aSr adbr alik : oamrt Smeo dbr ihoh mlki ihodh oiSbi iroSlm kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbia reh el hmqom hch aSr kl Smeh tzlnh acnio : ien aSr ecbni oinkro at hmqom hch oiqTro bo lalhim aHrim aSr la ideom hmh oabotihm omlki ihodh omlao at hmqom hch dm nqim : obno at bmot hbel lSrp at bnihm baS elot lbel aSr la zoiti ola dbrti ola elth el lbi : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ola iqra lmqom hch eod htpt ogia bn hnm ki am gia hhrgh : obqti at ezt ihodh oiroSlm bmqom hch ohpltim bHrb lpni aibihm obid mbqSi npSm ontti at nbltm lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz : oSmti at heir hcat lSmh olSrqh kl ebr elih iSm oiSrq el kl mkth : ohakltim at bSr bnihm oat bSr bntihm oaiS bSr reho iaklo bmzor obmzoq aSr iziqo lhm aibihm ombqSi npSm : oSbrt hbqbq leini hanSim hhlkim aotk : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh zbaot kkh aSbr at hem hch oat heir hcat kaSr iSbr at kli hiozr aSr la iokl lhrph eod obtpt iqbro main mqom lqbor : kn aeSh lmqom hch nam ihoh olioSbio oltt at heir hcat ktpt : ohio bti iroSlm obti mlki ihodh kmqom htpt hTmaim lkl hbtim aSr qTro el ggtihm lkl zba hSmim ohsk nskim lalhim aHrim : oiba irmiho mhtpt aSr SlHo ihoh Sm lhnba oiemd bHzr bit ihoh oiamr al kl hem : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbi al heir hcat oel kl erih at kl hreh aSr dbrti elih ki hqSo at erpm lblti Smoe at dbri :

20

oiSme pSHor bn amr hkhn ohoa pqid ngid bbit ihoh at irmiho nba at hdbrim halh : oikh pSHor at irmiho hnbia oitn ato el hmhpkt aSr bSer bnimn helion aSr bbit ihoh : oihi mmHrt oiza pSHor at irmiho mn hmhpkt oiamr alio irmiho la pSHor qra ihoh Smk ki am mgor msbib : ki kh amr ihoh hnni ntnk lmgor lk olkl ahbik onplo bHrb aibihm oeinik raot oat kl ihodh atn bid mlk bbl ohglm bblh ohkm bHrb : ontti at kl Hsn heir hcat oat kl igieh oat kl iqrh oat kl aozrot mlki ihodh atn bid aibihm obccom olqHom ohbiaom bblh : oath pSHor okl iSbi bitk tlko bSbi obbl tboa oSm tmot oSm tqbr ath okl ahbik aSr nbat lhm bSqr : ptitni ihoh oapt Hcqtni otokl hiiti lSHoq kl hiom klh leg li : ki mdi adbr aceq Hms oSd aqra ki hih dbr ihoh li lHrph olqls kl hiom : oamrti la ackrno ola adbr eod bSmo ohih blbi kaS bert ezr bezmti onlaiti klkl ola aokl : ki Smeti dbt rbim mgor msbib hgido ongidno kl anoS Slomi Smri zlei aoli ipth onoklh lo onqHh nqmtno mmno : oihoh aoti kgbor eriz el kn rdpi ikSlo ola iklo bSo mad ki la hSkilo klmt eolm la tSkH : oihoh zbaot bHn zdiq rah kliot olb arah nqmtk mhm ki alik gliti at ribi : Siro lihoh hllo at ihoh ki hzil at npS abion mid mreim : aror hiom aSr ildti bo iom aSr ildtni ami al ihi brok : aror haiS aSr bSr at abi lamr ild lk bn ckr SmH SmHho : ohih haiS hhoa kerim aSr hpk ihoh ola nHm oSme ceqh bbqr otroeh bet zhrim : aSr la mottni mrHm othi li ami qbri orHmh hrt eolm : lmh ch mrHm izati lraot eml oigon oiklo bbSt imi :

21

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bSlH alio hmlk zdqiho at pSHor bn mlkih oat zpnih bn meSih hkhn lamr : drS na bedno at ihoh ki nbokdrazr mlk bbl nlHm elino aoli ieSh ihoh aotno kkl nplatio oielh melino : oiamr irmiho alihm kh tamrn al zdqiho : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hnni msb at kli hmlHmh aSr bidkm aSr atm nlHmim bm at mlk bbl oat hkSdim hzrim elikm mHoz lHomh oaspti aotm al tok heir hcat : onlHmti ani atkm bid nToih obcroe Hcqh obap obHmh obqzp gdol : ohkiti at ioSbi heir hcat oat hadm oat hbhmh bdbr gdol imto : oaHri kn nam ihoh atn at zdqiho mlk ihodh oat ebdio oat hem oat hnSarim beir hcat mn hdbr mn hHrb omn hreb bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl obid aibihm obid mbqSi npSm ohkm lpi Hrb la iHos elihm ola iHml ola irHm : oal hem hch tamr kh amr ihoh hnni ntn lpnikm at drk hHiim oat drk hmot : hiSb beir hcat imot bHrb obreb obdbr ohioza onpl el hkSdim hzrim elikm iHih ohith lo npSo lSll : ki Smti pni beir hcat lreh ola lTobh nam ihoh bid mlk bbl tntn oSrph baS : olbit mlk ihodh Smeo dbr ihoh : bit dod kh amr ihoh dino lbqr mSpT ohzilo gcol mid eoSq pn tza kaS Hmti oberh oain mkbh mpni re mellihm : hnni alik iSbt hemq zor hmiSr nam ihoh hamrim mi iHt elino omi iboa bmeonotino : opqdti elikm kpri mellikm nam ihoh ohzti aS bierh oaklh kl sbibih :

22

kh amr ihoh rd bit mlk ihodh odbrt Sm at hdbr hch : oamrt Sme dbr ihoh mlk ihodh hiSb el ksa dod ath oebdik oemk hbaim bSerim halh : kh amr ihoh eSo mSpT ozdqh ohzilo gcol mid eSoq ogr itom oalmnh al tno al tHmso odm nqi al tSpko bmqom hch : ki am eSo teSo at hdbr hch obao bSeri hbit hch mlkim iSbim ldod el ksao rkbim brkb obsosim hoa oebdo oemo : oam la tSmeo at hdbrim halh bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki lHrbh ihih hbit hch : ki kh amr ihoh el bit mlk ihodh gled ath li raS hlbnon am la aSitk mdbr erim la noSbh : oqdSti elik mSHtim aiS oklio okrto mbHr arcik ohpilo el haS : oebro goim rbim el heir hcat oamro aiS al reho el mh eSh ihoh kkh leir hgdolh hcat : oamro el aSr ecbo at brit ihoh alhihm oiStHoo lalhim aHrim oiebdom : al tbko lmt oal tndo lo bko bko lhlk ki la iSob eod orah at arz moldto : ki kh amr ihoh al Slm bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hmlk tHt iaSiho abio aSr iza mn hmqom hch la iSob Sm eod : ki bmqom aSr hglo ato Sm imot oat harz hcat la irah eod : hoi bnh bito bla zdq oeliotio bla mSpT breho iebd Hnm opelo la itn lo : hamr abnh li bit mdot oeliot mroHim oqre lo Hloni ospon barc omSoH bSSr : htmlk ki ath mtHrh barc abik hloa akl oSth oeSh mSpT ozdqh ac Tob lo : dn din eni oabion ac Tob hloa hia hdet ati nam ihoh : ki ain einik olbk ki am el bzek oel dm hnqi lSpok oel heSq oel hmrozh leSot : lkn kh amr ihoh al ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh la ispdo lo hoi aHi ohoi aHot la ispdo lo hoi adon ohoi hdh : qbort Hmor iqbr sHob ohSlk mhlah lSeri iroSlm : eli hlbnon ozeqi obbSn tni qolk ozeqi mebrim ki nSbro kl mahbik : dbrti alik bSlotik amrt la aSme ch drkk mneorik ki la Smet bqoli : kl reik treh roH omahbik bSbi ilko ki ac tbSi onklmt mkl retk : iSbti blbnon mqnnti barcim mh nHnt bba lk Hblim Hil kildh : Hi ani nam ihoh ki am ihih kniho bn ihoiqim mlk ihodh Hotm el id imini ki mSm atqnk : onttik bid mbqSi npSk obid aSr ath igor mpnihm obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl obid hkSdim : ohTlti atk oat amk aSr ildtk el harz aHrt aSr la ildtm Sm oSm tmoto : oel harz aSr hm mnSaim at npSm lSob Sm Smh la iSobo : hezb nbch npoz haiS hch kniho am kli ain Hpz bo mdoe hoTlo hoa ocreo ohSlko el harz aSr la ideo : arz arz arz Smei dbr ihoh : kh amr ihoh ktbo at haiS hch eriri gbr la izlH bimio ki la izlH mcreo aiS iSb el ksa dod omSl eod bihodh :

23

hoi reim mabdim ompzim at zan mreiti nam ihoh : lkn kh amr ihoh alhi iSral el hreim hreim at emi atm hpztm at zani otdHom ola pqdtm atm hnni pqd elikm at re mellikm nam ihoh : oani aqbz at Sarit zani mkl harzot aSr hdHti atm Sm ohSbti athn el nohn opro orbo : ohqmti elihm reim oreom ola iirao eod ola iHto ola ipqdo nam ihoh : hnh imim baim nam ihoh ohqmti ldod zmH zdiq omlk mlk ohSkil oeSh mSpT ozdqh barz : bimio toSe ihodh oiSral iSkn lbTH och Smo aSr iqrao ihoh zdqno : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ola iamro eod Hi ihoh aSr helh at bni iSral marz mzrim : ki am Hi ihoh aSr helh oaSr hbia at cre bit iSral marz zponh omkl harzot aSr hdHtim Sm oiSbo el admtm : lnbaim nSbr lbi bqrbi rHpo kl ezmoti hiiti kaiS Skor okgbr ebro iin mpni ihoh ompni dbri qdSo : ki mnapim mlah harz ki mpni alh ablh harz ibSo naot mdbr othi mroztm reh ogbortm la kn : ki gm nbia gm khn Hnpo gm bbiti mzati retm nam ihoh : lkn ihih drkm lhm kHlqlqot baplh idHo onplo bh ki abia elihm reh Snt pqdtm nam ihoh : obnbiai Smron raiti tplh hnbao bbel oiteo at emi at iSral : obnbai iroSlm raiti Serorh naop ohlk bSqr oHcqo idi mreim lblti Sbo aiS mreto hio li klm ksdm oiSbih kemrh : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot el hnbaim hnni makil aotm lenh ohSqtim mi raS ki mat nbiai iroSlm izah Hnph lkl harz : kh amr ihoh zbaot al tSmeo el dbri hnbaim hnbaim lkm mhblim hmh atkm Hcon lbm idbro la mpi ihoh : amrim amor lmnazi dbr ihoh Slom ihih lkm okl hlk bSrrot lbo amro la tboa elikm reh : ki mi emd bsod ihoh oira oiSme at dbro mi hqSib dbri oiSme : hnh sert ihoh Hmh izah oser mtHoll el raS rSeim iHol : la iSob ap ihoh ed eSto oed hqimo mcmot lbo baHrit himim ttbonno bh binh : la SlHti at hnbaim ohm rzo la dbrti alihm ohm nbao : oam emdo bsodi oiSmeo dbri at emi oiSbom mdrkm hre omre mellihm : halhi mqrb ani nam ihoh ola alhi mrHq : am istr aiS bmstrim oani la arano nam ihoh hloa at hSmim oat harz ani mla nam ihoh : Smeti at aSr amro hnbaim hnbaim bSmi Sqr lamr Hlmti Hlmti : ed mti hiS blb hnbaim nbai hSqr onbiai trmt lbm : hHSbim lhSkiH at emi Smi bHlomtm aSr ispro aiS lreho kaSr SkHo abotm at Smi bbel : hnbia aSr ato Hlom ispr Hlom oaSr dbri ato idbr dbri amt mh ltbn at hbr nam ihoh : hloa kh dbri kaS nam ihoh
