okpTiS ipzz sle : lkn hnni el hnbaim nam ihoh mgnbi dbri aiS mat reho : hnni el hnbiam nam ihoh hlqHim lSonm oinamo nam : hnni el nbai Hlmot Sqr nam ihoh oisprom oiteo at emi bSqrihm obpHcotm oanki la SlHtim ola zoitim ohoeil la ioeilo lem hch nam ihoh : oki iSalk hem hch ao hnbia ao khn lamr mh mSa ihoh oamrt alihm at mh mSa onTSti atkm nam ihoh : ohnbia ohkhn ohem aSr iamr mSa ihoh opqdti el haiS hhoa oel bito : kh tamro aiS el reho oaiS al aHio mh enh ihoh omh dbr ihoh : omSa ihoh la tckro eod ki hmSa ihih laiS dbro ohpktm at dbri alhim Hiim ihoh zbaot alhino : kh tamr al hnbia mh enk ihoh omh dbr ihoh : oam mSa ihoh tamro lkn kh amr ihoh ien amrkm at hdbr hch mSa ihoh oaSlH alikm lamr la tamro mSa ihoh : lkn hnni onSiti atkm nSa onTSti atkm oat heir aSr ntti lkm olabotikm mel pni : ontti elikm Hrpt eolm oklmot eolm aSr la tSkH :

24

hrani ihoh ohnh Sni dodai tanim moedim lpni hikl ihoh aHri hglot nbokdrazr mlk bbl at ikniho bn ihoiqim mlk ihodh oat Sri ihodh oat hHrS oat hmsgr miroSlm oibam bbl : hdod aHd tanim Tbot mad ktani hbkrot ohdod aHd tanim reot mad aSr la taklnh mre : oiamr ihoh ali mh ath rah irmiho oamr tanim htanim hTbot Tbot mad ohreot reot mad aSr la taklnh mre : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral ktanim hTbot halh kn akir at glot ihodh aSr SlHti mn hmqom hch arz kSdim lTobh : oSmti eini elihm lTobh ohSbtim el harz hcat obnitim ola ahrs onTetim ola atoS : ontti lhm lb ldet ati ki ani ihoh ohio li lem oanki ahih lhm lalhim ki iSbo ali bkl lbm : oktanim hreot aSr la taklnh mre ki kh amr ihoh kn atn at zdqiho mlk ihodh oat Srio oat Sarit iroSlm hnSarim barz hcat ohiSbim barz mzrim : onttim lcoeh lreh lkl mmlkot harz lHrph olmSl lSninh olqllh bkl hmqmot aSr adiHm Sm : oSlHti bm at hHrb at hreb oat hdbr ed tmm mel hadmh aSr ntti lhm olabotihm :

25

hdbr aSr hih el irmiho el kl em ihodh bSnh hrbeit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hia hSnh hraSnit lnbokdrazr mlk bbl : aSr dbr irmiho hnbia el kl em ihodh oal kl iSbi iroSlm lamr : mn SlS eSrh Snh liaSiho bn amon mlk ihodh oed hiom hch ch SlS oeSrim Snh hih dbr ihoh ali oadbr alikm aSkim odbr ola Smetm : oSlH ihoh alikm at kl ebdio hnbaim hSkm oSlH ola Smetm ola hTitm at acnkm lSme : lamr Sobo na aiS mdrko hreh omre mellikm oSbo el hadmh aSr ntn ihoh lkm olabotikm lmn eolm oed eolm : oal tlko aHri alhim aHrim lebdm olhStHot lhm ola tkeiso aoti bmeSh idikm ola are lkm : ola Smetm ali nam ihoh lmen hkesoni bmeSh idikm lre lkm : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot ien aSr la Smetm at dbri : hnni SlH olqHti at kl mSpHot zpon nam ihoh oal nbokdrazr mlk bbl ebdi ohbatim el harz hcat oel iSbih oel kl hgoim halh sbib ohHrmtim oSmtim lSmh olSrqh olHrbot eolm : ohabdti mhm qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh qol rHim oaor nr : ohith kl harz hcat lHrbh lSmh oebdo hgoim halh at mlk bbl Sbeim Snh : ohih kmlaot Sbeim Snh apqd el mlk bbl oel hgoi hhoa nam ihoh at eonm oel arz kSdim oSmti ato lSmmot eolm : ohbaiti el harz hhia at kl dbri aSr dbrti elih at kl hktob bspr hch aSr nba irmiho el kl hgoim : ki ebdo bm gm hmh goim rbim omlkim gdolim oSlmti lhm kpelm okmeSh idihm : ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral ali qH at kos hiin hHmh hcat midi ohSqith ato at kl hgoim aSr anki SlH aotk alihm : oSto ohtgeSo ohthllo mpni hHrb aSr anki SlH bintm : oaqH at hkos mid ihoh oaSqh at kl hgoim aSr SlHni ihoh alihm : at iroSlm oat eri ihodh oat mlkih at Srih ltt atm lHrbh lSmh lSrqh olqllh kiom hch : at preh mlk mzrim oat ebdio oat Srio oat kl emo : oat kl herb oat kl mlki arz heoz oat kl mlki arz plStim oat aSqlon oat ech oat eqron oat Sarit aSdod : at adom oat moab oat bni emon : oat kl mlki zr oat kl mlki zidon oat mlki hai aSr bebr him : oat ddn oat tima oat boc oat kl qzozi pah : oat kl mlki erb oat kl mlki herb hSknim bmdbr : oat kl mlki cmri oat kl mlki eilm oat kl mlki mdi : oat kl mlki hzpon hqrbim ohrHqim aiS al aHio oat kl hmmlkot harz aSr el pni hadmh omlk SSk iSth aHrihm : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral Sto oSkro oqio onplo ola tqomo mpni hHrb aSr anki SlH binikm : ohih ki imano lqHt hkos midk lStot oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh zbaot Sto tSto : ki hnh beir aSr nqra Smi elih anki mHl lhre oatm hnqh tnqo la tnqo ki Hrb ani qra el kl iSbi harz nam ihoh zbaot : oath tnba alihm at kl hdbrim halh oamrt alihm ihoh mmrom iSag ommeon qdSo itn qolo Sag iSag el noho hidd kdrkim ienh al kl iSbi harz : ba Saon ed qzh harz ki rib lihoh bgoim nSpT hoa lkl bSr hrSeim ntnm lHrb nam ihoh : kh amr ihoh zbaot hnh reh izat mgoi al goi oser gdol ieor mirkti arz : ohio Hlli ihoh biom hhoa mqzh harz oed qzh harz la ispdo ola iaspo ola iqbro ldmn el pni hadmh ihio : hililo hreim oceqo ohtplSo adiri hzan ki mlao imikm lTboH otpozotikm onpltm kkli Hmdh : oabd mnos mn hreim opliTh madiri hzan : qol zeqt hreim oillt adiri hzan ki Sdd ihoh at mreitm : ondmo naot hSlom mpni Hron ap ihoh : ecb kkpir sko ki hith arzm lSmh mpni Hron hionh ompni Hron apo :

26

braSit mmlkot ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hih hdbr hch mat ihoh lamr : kh amr ihoh emd bHzr bit ihoh odbrt el kl eri ihodh hbaim lhStHot bit ihoh at kl hdbrim aSr zoitik ldbr alihm al tgre dbr : aoli iSmeo oiSbo aiS mdrko hreh onHmti al hreh aSr anki HSb leSot lhm mpni re mellihm : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh am la tSmeo ali llkt btorti aSr ntti lpnikm : lSme el dbri ebdi hnbaim aSr anki SlH alikm ohSkm oSlH ola Smetm : ontti at hbit hch kSlh oat heir hcath atn lqllh lkl goii harz : oiSmeo hkhnim ohnbaim okl hem at irmiho mdbr at hdbrim halh bbit ihoh : oihi kklot irmiho ldbr at kl aSr zoh ihoh ldbr al kl hem oitpSo ato hkhnim ohnbaim okl hem lamr mot tmot : mdoe nbit bSm ihoh lamr kSlo ihih hbit hch oheir hcat tHrb main ioSb oiqhl kl hem al irmiho bbit ihoh : oiSmeo Sri ihodh at hdbrim halh oielo mbit hmlk bit ihoh oiSbo bptH Ser ihoh hHdS : oiamro hkhnim ohnbaim al hSrim oal kl hem lamr mSpT mot laiS hch ki nba al heir hcat kaSr Smetm bacnikm : oiamr irmiho al kl hSrim oal kl hem lamr ihoh SlHni lhnba al hbit hch oal heir hcat at kl hdbrim aSr Smetm : oeth hiTibo drkikm omellikm oSmeo bqol ihoh alhikm oinHm ihoh al hreh aSr dbr elikm : oani hnni bidkm eSo li kTob okiSr beinikm : ak ide tdeo ki am mmtim atm ati ki dm nqi atm ntnim elikm oal heir hcat oal iSbih ki bamt SlHni ihoh elikm ldbr bacnikm at kl hdbrim halh : oiamro hSrim okl hem al hkhnim oal hnbiaim ain laiS hch mSpT mot ki bSm ihoh alhino dbr alino : oiqmo anSim mcqni harz oiamro al kl qhl hem lamr : mikih hmorSti hih nba bimi Hcqiho mlk ihodh oiamr al kl em ihodh lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot zion Sdh tHrS oiroSlim eiim thih ohr hbit lbmot ier : hhmt hmtho Hcqiho mlk ihodh okl ihodh hla ira at ihoh oiHl at pni ihoh oinHm ihoh al hreh aSr dbr elihm oanHno eSim reh gdolh el npSotino : ogm aiS hih mtnba bSm ihoh aoriho bn Smeiho mqrit hierim oinba el heir hcat oel harz hcat kkl dbri irmiho : oiSme hmlk ihoiqim okl gborio okl hSrim at dbrio oibqS hmlk hmito oiSme aoriho oira oibrH oiba mzrim : oiSlH hmlk ihoiqim anSim mzrim at alntn bn ekbor oanSim ato al mzrim : oioziao at aoriho mmzrim oibaho al hmlk ihoiqim oikho bHrb oiSlk at nblto al qbri bni hem : ak id aHiqm bn Spn hith at irmiho lblti tt ato bid hem lhmito :

27

braSit mmlkt ihoiqm bn iaoSiho mlk ihodh hih hdbr hch al irmih mat ihoh lamr : kh amr ihoh ali eSh lk mosrot omTot onttm el zoark : oSlHtm al mlk adom oal mlk moab oal mlk bni emon oal mlk zr oal mlk zidon bid mlakim hbaim iroSlm al zdqiho mlk ihodh : ozoit atm al adnihm lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral kh tamro al adnikm : anki eSiti at harz at hadm oat hbhmh aSr el pni harz bkHi hgdol obcroei hnToih onttih laSr iSr beini : oeth anki ntti at kl harzot halh bid nbokdnazr mlk bbl ebdi ogm at Hit hSdh ntti lo lebdo : oebdo ato kl hgoim oat bno oat bn bno ed ba et arzo gm hoa oebdo bo goim rbim omlkim gdlim : ohih hgoi ohmmlkh aSr la iebdo ato at nbokdnazr mlk bbl oat aSr la itn at zoaro bel mlk bbl bHrb obreb obdbr apqd el hgoi hhoa nam ihoh ed tmi atm bido : oatm al tSmeo al nbiaikm oal qsmikm oal Hlmtikm oal ennikm oal kSpikm aSr hm amrim alikm lamr la tebdo at mlk bbl : ki Sqr hm nbaim lkm lmen hrHiq atkm mel admtkm ohdHti atkm oabdtm : ohgoi aSr ibia at zoaro bel mlk bbl oebdo ohnHtio el admto nam ihoh oebdh oiSb bh : oal zdqih mlk ihodh dbrti kkl hdbrim halh lamr hbiao at zoarikm bel mlk bbl oebdo ato oemo oHio : lmh tmoto ath oemk bHrb breb obdbr kaSr dbr ihoh al hgoi aSr la iebd at mlk bbl : oal tSmeo al dbri hnbaim hamrim alikm lamr la tebdo at mlk bbl ki Sqr hm nbaim lkm : ki la SlHtim nam ihoh ohm nbaim bSmi lSqr lmen hdiHi atkm oabdtm atm ohnbaim hnbaim lkm : oal hkhnim oal kl hem hch dbrti lamr kh amr ihoh al tSmeo al dbri nbiaikm hnbaim lkm lamr hnh kli bit ihoh moSbim mbblh eth mhrh ki Sqr hmh nbaim lkm : al tSmeo alihm ebdo at mlk bbl oHio lmh thih heir hcat Hrbh : oam nbaim hm oam iS dbr ihoh atm ipgeo na bihoh zbaot lblti bao hklim hnotrim bbit ihoh obit mlk ihodh obiroSlm bblh : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot al hemdim oel him oel hmknot oel itr hklim hnotrim beir hcat : aSr la lqHm nbokdnazr mlk bbl bgloto at ikonih bn ihoiqim mlk ihodh miroSlm bblh oat kl Hri ihodh oiroSlm : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral el hklim hnotrim bit ihoh obit mlk ihodh oiroSlm : bblh iobao oSmh ihio ed iom pqdi atm nam ihoh ohelitim ohSibtim al hmqom hch :

28

oihi bSnh hhia braSit mmlkt zdqih mlk ihodh bSnt hrbeit bHdS hHmiSi amr ali Hnnih bn ecor hnbia aSr mgbeon bbit ihoh leini hkhnim okl hem lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lamr Sbrti at el mlk bbl : beod Sntim imim ani mSib al hmqom hch at kl kli bit ihoh aSr lqH nbokdnazr mlk bbl mn hmqom hch oibiam bbl : oat iknih bn ihoiqim mlk ihodh oat kl glot ihodh hbaim bblh ani mSib al hmqom hch nam ihoh ki aSbr at el mlk bbl : oiamr irmih hnbia al Hnnih hnbia leini hkhnim oleini kl hem hemdim bbit ihoh : oiamr irmih hnbia amn kn ieSh ihoh iqm ihoh at dbrik aSr nbat lhSib kli bit ihoh okl hgolh mbbl al hmqom hch : ak Sme na hdbr hch aSr anki dbr bacnik obacni kl hem : hnbiaim aSr hio lpni olpnik mn heolm oinbao al arzot rbot oel mmlkot gdlot lmlHmh olreh oldbr : hnbia aSr inba lSlom bba dbr hnbia iode hnbia aSr SlHo ihoh bamt : oiqH Hnnih hnbia at hmoTh mel zoar irmih hnbia oiSbrho : oiamr Hnnih leini kl hem lamr kh amr ihoh kkh aSbr at el nbkdnazr mlk bbl beod Sntim imim mel zoar kl hgoim oilk irmih hnbia ldrko : oihi dbr ihoh al irmih aHri Sbor Hnnih hnbia at hmoTh mel zoar irmih hnbia lamr : hlok oamrt al Hnnih lamr kh amr ihoh moTt ez Sbrt oeSit tHtihn mTot brcl : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral el brcl ntti el zoar kl hgoim halh lebd at nbkdnazr mlk bbl oebdho ogm at Hit hSdh ntti lo : oiamr irmih hnbia al Hnnih hnbia Sme na Hnnih la SlHk ihoh oath hbTHt at hem hch el Sqr : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni mSlHk mel pni hadmh hSnh ath mt ki srh dbrt al ihoh : oimt Hnnih hnbia bSnh hhia bHdS hSbiei :

29

oalh dbri hspr aSr SlH irmih hnbia miroSlm al itr cqni hgolh oal hkhnim oal hnbiaim oal kl hem aSr hglh nbokdnazr miroSlm bblh : aHri zat iknih hmlk ohgbirh ohsrisim Sri ihodh oiroSlm ohHrS ohmsgr miroSlm : bid aleSh bn Spn ogmrih bn Hlqih aSr SlH zdqih mlk ihodh al nbokdnazr mlk bbl bblh lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lkl hgolh aSr hgliti miroSlm bblh : bno btim oSbo onTeo gnot oaklo at prin : qHo nSim oholido bnim obnot oqHo lbnikm nSim oat bnotikm tno lanSim otldnh bnim obnot orbo Sm oal tmeTo : odrSo at Slom heir aSr hgliti atkm Smh ohtpllo bedh al ihoh ki bSlomh ihih lkm Slom : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral al iSiao lkm nbiaikm aSr bqrbkm oqsmikm oal tSmeo al Hlmtikm aSr atm mHlmim : ki bSqr hm nbaim lkm bSmi la SlHtim nam ihoh : ki kh amr ihoh ki lpi mlat lbbl Sbeim Snh apqd atkm ohqmti elikm at dbri hTob lhSib atkm al hmqom hch : ki anki ideti at hmHSbt aSr anki HSb elikm nam ihoh mHSbot Slom ola lreh ltt lkm aHrit otqoh : oqratm ati ohlktm ohtplltm ali oSmeti alikm : obqStm ati omzatm ki tdrSni bkl lbbkm : onmzati lkm nam ihoh oSbti at Sbitkm oqbzti atkm mkl hgoim omkl hmqomot aSr hdHti atkm Sm nam ihoh ohSbti atkm al hmqom aSr hgliti atkm mSm : ki amrtm hqim lno ihoh nbaim bblh : ki kh amr ihoh al hmlk hioSb al ksa dod oal kl hem hioSb beir hcat aHikm aSr la izao atkm bgolh : kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni mSlH bm at hHrb at hreb oat hdbr ontti aotm ktanim hSerim aSr la taklnh mre : ordpti aHrihm bHrb breb obdbr onttim lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz lalh olSmh olSrqh olHrph bkl hgoim aSr hdHtim Sm : tHt aSr la Smeo al dbri nam ihoh aSr SlHti alihm at ebdi hnbaim hSkm oSlH ola Smetm nam ihoh : oatm Smeo dbr ihoh kl hgolh aSr SlHti miroSlm bblh : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral al aHab bn qolih oal zdqiho bn meSih hnbaim lkm bSmi Sqr hnni ntn atm bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl ohkm leinikm : olqH mhm qllh lkl glot ihodh aSr bbbl lamr iSmk ihoh kzdqiho okaHb aSr qlm mlk bbl baS : ien aSr eSo nblh biSral oinapo at nSi reihm oidbro dbr bSmi Sqr aSr loa zoitm oanki hoide oed nam ihoh : oal Smeiho hnHlmi tamr lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lamr ien aSr ath SlHt bSmkh sprim al kl hem aSr biroSlm oal zpnih bn meSih hkhn oal kl hkhnim lamr : ihoh ntnk khn tHt ihoide hkhn lhiot pqdim bit ihoh lkl aiS mSge omtnba ontth ato al hmhpkt oal hzinq : oeth lmh la gert birmiho hentti hmtnba lkm : ki el kn SlH alino bbl lamr arkh hia bno btim oSbo onTeo gnot oaklo at prihn : oiqra zpnih hkhn at hspr hch bacni irmiho hnbia : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr : SlH el kl hgolh lamr kh amr ihoh al Smeih hnHlmi ien aSr nba lkm Smeih oani la SlHtio oibTH atkm el Sqr : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni pqd el Smeih hnHlmi oel creo la ihih lo aiS ioSb btok hem hch ola irah bTob aSr ani eSh lemi nam ihoh ki srh dbr el ihoh :

30

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral lamr ktb lk at kl hdbrim aSr dbrti alik al spr : ki hnh imim baim nam ihoh oSbti at Sbot emi iSral oihodh amr ihoh ohSbtim al harz aSr ntti labotm oirSoh : oalh hdbrim aSr dbr ihoh al iSral oal ihodh : ki kh amr ihoh qol Hrdh Smeno pHd oain Slom : Salo na orao am ild ckr mdoe raiti kl gbr idio el Hlzio kioldh onhpko kl pnim lirqon : hoi ki gdol hiom hhoa main kmho oet zrh hia lieqb ommnh ioSe : ohih biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot aSbr elo mel zoark omosrotik antq ola iebdo bo eod crim : oebdo at ihoh alhihm oat dod mlkm aSr aqim lhm : oath al tira ebdi ieqb nam ihoh oal tHt iSral ki hnni moSiek mrHoq oat crek marz Sbim oSb ieqb oSqT oSann oain mHrid : ki atk ani nam ihoh lhoSiek ki aeSh klh bkl hgoim aSr hpzotik Sm ak atk la aeSh klh oisrtik lmSpT onqh la anqk : ki kh amr ihoh anoS lSbrk nHlh mktk : ain dn dink lmcor rpaot telh ain lk : kl mahbik SkHok aotk la idrSo ki mkt aoib hkitik mosr akcri el rb eonk ezmo HTatik : mh tceq el Sbrk anoS mkabk el rb eonk ezmo HTatik eSiti alh lk : lkn kl aklik iaklo okl zrik klm bSbi ilko ohio Sasik lmSsh okl bccik atn lbc : ki aelh arkh lk ommkotik arpak nam ihoh ki ndHh qrao lk zion hia drS ain lh : kh amr ihoh hnni Sb Sbot ahli ieqob omSkntio arHm onbnth eir el tlh oarmon el mSpTo iSb : oiza mhm todh oqol mSHqim ohrbtim ola imeTo ohkbdtim ola izero : ohio bnio kqdm oedto lpni tkon opqdti el kl lHzio : ohih adiro mmno omSlo mqrbo iza ohqrbtio ongS ali ki mi hoa ch erb at lbo lgSt ali nam ihoh : ohiitm li lem oanki ahih lkm lalhim : hnh sert ihoh Hmh izah ser mtgorr el raS rSeim iHol : la iSob Hron ap ihoh ed eSto oed hqimo mcmot lbo baHrit himim ttbonno bh :

31

bet hhia nam ihoh ahih lalhim lkl mSpHot iSral ohmh ihio li lem : kh amr ihoh mza Hn bmdbr em Sridi Hrb hlok lhrgieo iSral : mrHoq ihoh nrah li oahbt eolm ahbtik el kn mSktik Hsd : eod abnk onbnit btolt iSral eod tedi tpik oizat bmHol mSHqim : eod tTei krmim bhri Smron nTeo nTeim oHllo : ki iS iom qrao nzrim bhr aprim qomo onelh zion al ihoh alhino : ki kh amr ihoh rno lieqb SmHh ozhlo braS hgoim hSmieo hllo oamro hoSe ihoh at emk at Sarit iSral : hnni mbia aotm marz zpon oqbztim mirkti arz bm eor opsH hrh oildt iHdo qhl gdol iSobo hnh : bbki ibao obtHnonim aobilm aolikm al nHli mim bdrk iSr la ikSlo bh ki hiiti liSral lab oaprim bkri hoa : Smeo dbr ihoh goim ohgido baiim mmrHq oamro mcrh iSral iqbzno oSmro kreh edro : ki pdh ihoh at ieqb ogalo mid Hcq mmno : obao ornno bmrom zion onhro al Tob ihoh el dgn oel tirS oel izhr oel bni zan obqr ohith npSm kgn roh ola iosipo ldabh eod : ac tSmH btolh bmHol obHrim ocqnim iHdo ohpkti ablm lSSon onHmtim oSmHtim migonm : oroiti npS hkhnim dSn oemi at Tobi iSbeo nam ihoh : kh amr ihoh qol brmh nSme nhi bki tmrorim rHl mbkh el bnih manh lhnHm el bnih ki ainno : kh amr ihoh mnei qolk mbki oeinik mdmeh ki iS Skr lpeltk nam ihoh oSbo marz aoib : oiS tqoh laHritk nam ihoh oSbo bnim lgbolm : Smoe Smeti aprim mtnodd isrtni oaosr kegl la lmd hSbni oaSobh ki ath ihoh alhi : ki aHri Sobi nHmti oaHri hodei spqti el irk bSti ogm nklmti ki nSati Hrpt neori : hbn iqir li aprim am ild SeSoeim ki mdi dbri bo ckr ackrno eod el kn hmo mei lo rHm arHmno nam ihoh : hzibi lk zinim Smi lk tmrorim Sti lbk lmslh drk hlkti Sobi btolt iSral Sbi al erik alh : ed mti ttHmqin hbt hSobbh ki bra ihoh HdSh barz nqbh tsobb gbr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral eod iamro at hdbr hch barz ihodh oberio bSobi at Sbotm ibrkk ihoh noh zdq hr hqdS : oiSbo bh ihodh okl erio iHdo akrim onseo bedr : ki hroiti npS eiph okl npS dabh mlati : el cat hqizti oarah oSnti erbh li : hnh imim baim nam ihoh ocreti at bit iSral oat bit ihodh cre adm ocre bhmh : ohih kaSr Sqdti elihm lntoS olntoz olhrs olhabid olhre kn aSqd elihm lbnot olnToe nam ihoh : bimim hhm la iamro eod abot aklo bsr oSni bnim tqhinh : ki am aiS beono imot kl hadm hakl hbsr tqhinh Snio : hnh imim baim nam ihoh okrti at bit iSral oat bit ihodh brit HdSh : la kbrit aSr krti at abotm biom hHciqi bidm lhoziam marz mzrim aSr hmh hpro at briti oanki belti bm nam ihoh : ki cat hbrit aSr akrt at bit iSral aHri himim hhm nam ihoh ntti at torti bqrbm oel lbm aktbnh ohiiti lhm lalhim ohmh ihio li lem : ola ilmdo eod aiS at reho oaiS at aHio lamr deo at ihoh ki kolm ideo aoti lmqTnm oed gdolm nam ihoh ki aslH leonm olHTatm la ackr eod : kh amr ihoh ntn SmS laor iomm Hqt irH okokbim laor lilh rge him oihmo glio ihoh zbaot Smo : am imSo hHqim halh mlpni nam ihoh gm cre iSral iSbto mhiot goi lpni kl himim : kh amr ihoh am imdo Smim mlmelh oiHqro mosdi arz lmTh gm ani amas bkl cre iSral el kl aSr eSo nam ihoh : hnh imim nam ihoh onbnth heir lihoh mmgdl Hnnal Ser hpnh : oiza eod qoh hmdh ngdo el gbet grb onsb geth : okl hemq hpgrim ohdSn okl hSrmot ed nHl qdron ed pnt Ser hsosim mcrHh qdS lihoh la intS ola ihrs eod leolm :

32

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bSnt heSrit lzdqiho mlk ihodh hia hSnh Smnh eSrh Snh lnbokdrazr : oac Hil mlk bbl zrim el iroSlm oirmiho hnbia hih kloa bHzr hmTrh aSr bit mlk ihodh : aSr klao zdqiho mlk ihodh lamr mdoe ath nba lamr kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid mlk bbl olkdh : ozdqiho mlk ihodh la imlT mid hkSdim ki hntn intn bid mlk bbl odbr pio em pio oeinio at eino trainh : obbl iolk at zdqiho oSm ihih ed pqdi ato nam ihoh ki tlHmo at hkSdim la tzliHo : oiamr irmiho hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : hnh Hnmal bn Slm ddk ba alik lamr qnh lk at Sdi aSr bentot ki lk mSpT hgalh lqnot : oiba ali Hnmal bn ddi kdbr ihoh al Hzr hmTrh oiamr ali qnh na at Sdi aSr bentot aSr barz bnimin ki lk mSpT hirSh olk hgalh qnh lk oade ki dbr ihoh hoa : oaqnh at hSdh mat Hnmal bn ddi aSr bentot oaSqlh lo at hksp Sbeh Sqlim oeSrh hksp : oaktb bspr oaHtm oaed edim oaSql hksp bmacnim : oaqH at spr hmqnh at hHtom hmzoh ohHqim oat hgloi : oatn at hspr hmqnh al brok bn nrih bn mHsih leini Hnmal ddi oleini hedim hktbim bspr hmqnh leini kl hihodim hiSbim bHzr hmTrh : oazoh at brok leinihm lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lqoH at hsprim halh at spr hmqnh hch oat hHtom oat spr hgloi hch onttm bkli HrS lmen iemdo imim rbim : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral eod iqno btim oSdot okrmim barz hcat : oatpll al ihoh aHri tti at spr hmqnh al brok bn nrih lamr : ahh adni ihoh hnh ath eSit at hSmim oat harz bkHk hgdol obcrek hnToih la ipla mmk kl dbr : eSh Hsd lalpim omSlm eon abot al Hiq bnihm aHrihm hal hgdol hgbor ihoh zbaot Smo : gdl hezh orb helilih aSr einik pqHot el kl drki bni adm ltt laiS kdrkio okpri mellio : aSr Smt atot omptim barz mzrim ed hiom hch obiSral obadm oteSh lk Sm kiom hch : otza at emk at iSral marz mzrim batot obmoptim obid Hcqh obacroe nToih obmora gdol : ottn lhm at harz hcat aSr nSbet labotm ltt lhm arz cbt Hlb odbS : oibao oirSo ath ola Smeo bqolk obtrotk la hlko at kl aSr zoith lhm leSot la eSo otqra atm at kl hreh hcat : hnh hsllot bao heir llkdh oheir ntnh bid hkSdim hnlHmim elih mpni hHrb ohreb ohdbr oaSr dbrt hih ohnk rah : oath amrt ali adni ihoh qnh lk hSdh bksp ohed edim oheir ntnh bid hkSdim : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr : hnh ani ihoh alhi kl bSr hmmni ipla kl dbr : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid hkSdim obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl olkdh : obao hkSdim hnlHmim el heir hcat ohzito at heir hcat baS oSrpoh oat hbtim aSr qTro el ggotihm lbel ohsko nskim lalhim aHrim lmen hkesni : ki hio bni iSral obni ihodh ak eSim hre beini mnertihm ki bni iSral ak mkesim ati bmeSh idihm nam ihoh : ki el api oel Hmti hith li heir hcat lmn hiom aSr bno aoth oed hiom hch lhsirh mel pni : el kl ret bni iSral obni ihodh aSr eSo lhkesni hmh mlkihm Srihm khnihm onbiaihm oaiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm : oipno ali erp ola pnim olmd atm hSkm olmd oainm Smeim lqHt mosr : oiSimo Sqozihm bbit aSr nqra Smi elio lTmao : oibno at bmot hbel aSr bgia bn hnm lhebir at bnihm oat bnotihm lmlk aSr la zoitim ola elth el lbi leSot htoebh hcat lmen hHTi at ihodh : oeth lkn kh amr ihoh alhi iSral al heir hcat aSr atm amrim ntnh bid mlk bbl bHrb obreb obdbr : hnni mqbzm mkl harzot aSr hdHtim Sm bapi obHmti obqzp gdol ohSbtim al hmqom hch ohSbtim lbTH : ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim : ontti lhm lb aHd odrk aHd lirah aoti kl himim lTob lhm olbnihm aHrihm : okrti lhm brit eolm aSr la aSob maHrihm lhiTibi aotm oat irati atn blbbm lblti sor meli : oSSti elihm lhTib aotm onTetim barz hcat bamt bkl lbi obkl npSi : ki kh amr ihoh kaSr hbati al hem hch at kl hreh hgdolh hcat kn anki mbia elihm at kl hTobh aSr anki dbr elihm : onqnh hSdh barz hcat aSr atm amrim Smmh hia main adm obhmh ntnh bid hkSdim : Sdot bksp iqno oktob bspr oHtom ohed edim barz bnimn obsbibi iroSlm oberi ihodh oberi hhr oberi hSplh oberi hngb ki aSib at Sbotm nam ihoh :

33

oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho Snit ohoa eodno ezor bHzr hmTrh lamr : kh amr ihoh eSh ihoh iozr aoth lhkinh ihoh Smo : qra ali oaenk oagidh lk gdlot obzrot la idetm : ki kh amr ihoh alhi iSral el bti heir hcat oel bti mlki ihodh hntzim al hsllot oal hHrb : baim lhlHm at hkSdim olmlam at pgri hadm aSr hkiti bapi obHmti oaSr hstrti pni mheir hcat el kl retm : hnni melh lh arkh omrpa orpatim ogliti lhm etrt Slom oamt : ohSbti at Sbot ihodh oat Sbot iSral obntim kbraSnh : oThrtim mkl eonm aSr HTao li oslHti lkol eonotihm aSr HTao li oaSr pSeo bi : ohith li lSm SSon lthlh oltpart lkl goii harz aSr iSmeo at kl hTobh aSr anki eSh atm opHdo orgco el kl hTobh oel kl hSlom aSr anki eSh lh : kh amr ihoh eod iSme bmqom hch aSr atm amrim Hrb hoa main adm omain bhmh beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm hnSmot main adm omain ioSb omain bhmh : qol SSon oqol SmHh qol Htn oqol klh qol amrim hodo at ihoh zbaot ki Tob ihoh ki leolm Hsdo mbaim todh bit ihoh ki aSib at Sbot harz kbraSnh amr ihoh : kh amr ihoh zbaot eod ihih bmqom hch hHrb main adm oed bhmh obkl erio noh reim mrbzim zan : beri hhr beri hSplh oberi hngb obarz bnimn obsbibi iroSlm oberi ihodh ed tebrnh hzan el idi monh amr ihoh : hnh imim baim nam ihoh ohqmti at hdbr hTob aSr dbrti al bit iSral oel bit ihodh : bimim hhm obet hhia azmiH ldod zmH zdqh oeSh mSpT ozdqh barz : bimim hhm toSe ihodh oiroSlm tSkon lbTH och aSr iqra lh ihoh zdqno : ki kh amr ihoh la ikrt ldod aiS iSb el ksa bit iSral : olkhnim hloim la ikrt aiS mlpni melh eolh omqTir mnHh oeSh cbH kl himim : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamor : kh amr ihoh am tpro at briti hiom oat briti hlilh olblti hiot iomm olilh betm : gm briti tpr at dod ebdi mhiot lo bn mlk el ksao oat hloim hkhnim mSrti : aSr la ispr zba hSmim ola imd Hol him kn arbh at cre dod ebdi oat hloim mSrti ati : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr : hloa rait mh hem hch dbro lamr Sti hmSpHot aSr bHr ihoh bhm oimasm oat emi inazon mhiot eod goi lpnihm : kh amr ihoh am la briti iomm olilh Hqot Smim oarz la Smti : gm cre ieqob odod ebdi amas mqHt mcreo mSlim al cre abrhm iSHq oieqb ki aSob at Sbotm orHmtim :

34

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh onbokdrazr mlk bbl okl Hilo okl mmlkot arz mmSlt ido okl hemim nlHmim el iroSlm oel kl erih lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hlk oamrt al zdqiho mlk ihodh oamrt alio kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at heir hcat bid mlk bbl oSrph baS : oath la tmlT mido ki tpS ttpS obido tntn oeinik at eini mlk bbl trainh opiho at pik idbr obbl tboa : ak Sme dbr ihoh zdqiho mlk ihodh kh amr ihoh elik la tmot bHrb : bSlom tmot okmSrpot abotik hmlkim hraSnim aSr hio lpnik kn iSrpo lk ohoi adon ispdo lk ki dbr ani dbrti nam ihoh : oidbr irmiho hnbia al zdqiho mlk ihodh at kl hdbrim halh biroSlm : oHil mlk bbl nlHmim el iroSlm oel kl eri ihodh hnotrot al lkiS oal ecqh ki hnh nSaro beri ihodh eri mbzr : hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh aHri krt hmlk zdqiho brit at kl hem aSr biroSlm lqra lhm dror : lSlH aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto hebri ohebrih HpSim lblti ebd bm bihodi aHiho aiS : oiSmeo kl hSrim okl hem aSr bao bbrit lSlH aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto HpSim lblti ebd bm eod oiSmeo oiSlHo : oiSobo aHri kn oiSbo at hebdim oat hSpHot aSr SlHo HpSim oikbiSom lebdim olSpHot : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral anki krti brit at abotikm biom hozai aotm marz mzrim mbit ebdim lamr : mqz Sbe Snim tSlHo aiS at aHio hebri aSr imkr lk oebdk SS Snim oSlHto HpSi memk ola Smeo abotikm ali ola hTo at acnm : otSbo atm hiom oteSo at hiSr beini lqra dror aiS lreho otkrto brit lpni bbit aSr nqra Smi elio : otSbo otHllo at Smi otSbo aiS at ebdo oaiS at SpHto aSr SlHtm HpSim lnpSm otkbSo atm lhiot lkm lebdim olSpHot : lkn kh amr ihoh atm la Smetm ali lqra dror aiS laHio oaiS lreho hnni qra lkm dror nam ihoh al hHrb al hdbr oal hreb ontti atkm lcoeh lkl mmlkot harz : ontti at hanSim hebrim at brti aSr la hqimo at dbri hbrit aSr krto lpni hegl aSr krto lSnim oiebro bin btrio : Sri ihodh oSri iroSlm hsrsim ohkhnim okl em harz hebrim bin btri hegl : ontti aotm bid aibihm obid mbqSi npSm ohith nbltm lmakl leop hSmim olbhmt harz : oat zdqiho mlk ihodh oat Srio atn bid aibihm obid mbqSi npSm obid Hil mlk bbl helim melikm : hnni mzoh nam ihoh ohSbtim al heir hcat onlHmo elih olkdoh oSrph baS oat eri ihodh atn Smmh main iSb :

35

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh bimi ihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh lamr : hlok al bit hrkbim odbrt aotm ohbaotm bit ihoh al aHt hlSkot ohSqit aotm iin : oaqH at iacnih bn irmiho bn Hbznih oat aHio oat kl bnio oat kl bit hrkbim : oaba atm bit ihoh al lSkt bni Hnn bn igdliho aiS halhim aSr azl lSkt hSrim aSr mmel llSkt meSiho bn Slm Smr hsp : oatn lpni bni bit hrkbim gbeim mlaim iin oksot oamr alihm Sto iin : oiamro la nSth iin ki iondb bn rkb abino zoh elino lamr la tSto iin atm obnikm ed eolm : obit la tbno ocre la tcreo okrm la tTeo ola ihih lkm ki bahlim tSbo kl imikm lmen tHio imim rbim el pni hadmh aSr atm grim Sm : onSme bqol ihondb bn rkb abino lkl aSr zono lblti Stot iin kl imino anHno nSino bnino obntino : olblti bnot btim lSbtno okrm oSdh ocre la ihih lno : onSb bahlim onSme oneS kkl aSr zono iondb abino : oihi belot nbokdrazr mlk bbl al harz onamr bao onboa iroSlm mpni Hil hkSdim ompni Hil arm onSb biroSlm : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hlk oamrt laiS ihodh olioSbi iroSlm hloa tqHo mosr lSme al dbri nam ihoh : hoqm at dbri ihondb bn rkb aSr zoh at bnio lblti Stot iin ola Sto ed hiom hch ki Smeo at mzot abihm oanki dbrti alikm hSkm odbr ola Smetm ali : oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbaim hSkim oSlH lamr Sbo na aiS mdrko hreh ohiTibo mellikm oal tlko aHri alhim aHrim lebdm oSbo al hadmh aSr ntti lkm olabtikm ola hTitm at acnkm ola Smetm ali : ki hqimo bni ihondb bn rkb at mzot abihm aSr zom ohem hch la Smeo ali : lkn kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbia al ihodh oal kl ioSbi iroSlm at kl hreh aSr dbrti elihm ien dbrti alihm ola Smeo oaqra lhm ola eno : olbit hrkbim amr irmiho kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral ien aSr Smetm el mzot ihondb abikm otSmro at kl mzotio oteSo kkl aSr zoh atkm : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral la ikrt aiS liondb bn rkb emd lpni kl himim :

36

oihi bSnh hrbiet lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh hih hdbr hch al irmiho mat ihoh lamr : qH lk mglt spr oktbt alih at kl hdbrim aSr dbrti alik el iSral oel ihodh oel kl hgoim miom dbrti alik mimi iaSiho oed hiom hch : aoli iSmeo bit ihodh at kl hreh aSr anki HSb leSot lhm lmen iSobo aiS mdrko hreh oslHti leonm olHTatm : oiqra irmiho at brok bn nrih oiktb brok mpi irmiho at kl dbri ihoh aSr dbr alio el mglt spr : oizoh irmiho at brok lamr ani ezor la aokl lboa bit ihoh : obat ath oqrat bmglh aSr ktbt mpi at dbri ihoh bacni hem bit ihoh biom zom ogm bacni kl ihodh hbaim merihm tqram : aoli tpl tHntm lpni ihoh oiSbo aiS mdrko hreh ki gdol hap ohHmh aSr dbr ihoh al hem hch : oieS brok bn nrih kkl aSr zoho irmiho hnbia lqra bspr dbri ihoh bit ihoh : oihi bSnh hHmSit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh bHdS htSei qrao zom lpni ihoh kl hem biroSlm okl hem hbaim meri ihodh biroSlm : oiqra brok bspr at dbri irmiho bit ihoh blSkt gmriho bn Spn hspr bHzr helion ptH Ser bit ihoh hHdS bacni kl hem : oiSme mkiho bn gmriho bn Spn at kl dbri ihoh mel hspr : oird bit hmlk el lSkt hspr ohnh Sm kl hSrim ioSbim aliSme hspr odliho bn Smeiho oalntn bn ekbor ogmriho bn Spn ozdqiho bn Hnniho okl hSrim : oigd lhm mkiho at kl hdbrim aSr Sme bqra brok bspr bacni hem : oiSlHo kl hSrim al brok at ihodi bn ntniho bn Slmiho bn koSi lamr hmglh aSr qrat bh bacni hem qHnh bidk olk oiqH brok bn nriho at hmglh bido oiba alihm : oiamro alio Sb na oqranh bacnino oiqra brok bacnihm : oihi kSmem at kl hdbrim pHdo aiS al reho oiamro al brok hgid ngid lmlk at kl hdbrim halh : oat brok Salo lamr hgd na lno aik ktbt at kl hdbrim halh mpio : oiamr lhm brok mpio iqra ali at kl hdbrim halh oani ktb el hspr bdio : oiamro hSrim al brok lk hstr ath oirmiho oaiS al ide aiph atm : oibao al hmlk Hzrh oat hmglh hpqdo blSkt aliSme hspr oigido bacni hmlk at kl hdbrim : oiSlH hmlk at ihodi lqHt at hmglh oiqHh mlSkt aliSme hspr oiqrah ihodi bacni hmlk obacni kl hSrim hemdim mel hmlk : ohmlk ioSb bit hHrp bHdS htSiei oat haH lpnio mbert : oihi kqroa ihodi SlS dltot oarbeh iqreh bter hspr ohSlk al haS aSr al haH ed tm kl hmglh el haS aSr el haH : ola pHdo ola qreo at bgdihm hmlk okl ebdio hSmeim at kl hdbrim halh : ogm alntn odliho ogmriho hpgeo bmlk lblti Srp at hmglh ola Sme alihm : oizoh hmlk at irHmal bn hmlk oat Sriho bn ecrial oat Slmiho bn ebdal lqHt at brok hspr oat irmiho hnbia oistrm ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho aHri Srp hmlk at hmglh oat hdbrim aSr ktb brok mpi irmiho lamr : Sob qH lk mglh aHrt oktb elih at kl hdbrim hraSnim aSr hio el hmglh hraSnh aSr Srp ihoiqim mlk ihodh : oel ihoiqim mlk ihodh tamr kh amr ihoh ath Srpt at hmglh hcat lamr mdoe ktbt elih lamr ba iboa mlk bbl ohSHit at harz hcat ohSbit mmnh adm obhmh : lkn kh amr ihoh el ihoiqim mlk ihodh la ihih lo ioSb el ksa dod onblto thih mSlkt lHrb biom olqrH blilh : opqdti elio oel creo oel ebdio at eonm ohbati elihm oel iSbi iroSlm oal aiS ihodh at kl hreh aSr dbrti alihm ola Smeo : oirmiho lqH mglh aHrt oitnh al brok bn nriho hspr oiktb elih mpi irmiho at kl dbri hspr aSr Srp ihoiqim mlk ihodh baS oeod nosp elihm dbrim rbim khmh :

37

oimlk mlk zdqiho bn iaSiho tHt kniho bn ihoiqim aSr hmlik nbokdrazr mlk bbl barz ihodh : ola Sme hoa oebdio oem harz al dbri ihoh aSr dbr bid irmiho hnbia : oiSlH hmlk zdqiho at ihokl bn Slmih oat zpniho bn meSih hkhn al irmiho hnbia lamr htpll na bedno al ihoh alhino : oirmiho ba oiza btok hem ola ntno ato bit hklia : oHil preh iza mmzrim oiSmeo hkSdim hzrim el iroSlm at Smem oielo mel iroSlm : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral kh tamro al mlk ihodh hSlH atkm ali ldrSni hnh Hil preh hiza lkm lecrh Sb larzo mzrim : oSbo hkSdim onlHmo el heir hcat olkdh oSrph baS : kh amr ihoh al tSao npStikm lamr hlk ilko melino hkSdim ki la ilko : ki am hkitm kl Hil kSdim hnlHmim atkm onSaro bm anSim mdqrim aiS bahlo iqomo oSrpo at heir hcat baS : ohih bhelot Hil hkSdim mel iroSlm mpni Hil preh : oiza irmiho miroSlm llkt arz bnimn lHlq mSm btok hem : oihi hoa bSer bnimn oSm bel pqdt oSmo iraiih bn Slmih bn Hnnih oitpS at irmiho hnbia lamr al hkSdim ath npl : oiamr irmiho Sqr ainni npl el hkSdim ola Sme alio oitpS iraiih birmiho oibaho al hSrim : oiqzpo hSrim el irmiho ohko ato ontno aoto bit hasor bit ihontn hspr ki ato eSo lbit hkla : ki ba irmiho al bit hbor oal hHniot oiSb Sm irmiho imim rbim : oiSlH hmlk zdqiho oiqHho oiSalho hmlk bbito bstr oiamr hiS dbr mat ihoh oiamr irmiho iS oiamr bid mlk bbl tntn : oiamr irmiho al hmlk zdqiho mh HTati lk olebdik olem hch ki nttm aoti al bit hkla : oaio nbiaikm aSr nbao lkm lamr la iba mlk bbl elikm oel harz hcat : oeth Sme na adni hmlk tpl na tHnti lpnik oal tSbni bit ihontn hspr ola amot Sm : oizoh hmlk zdqiho oipqdo at irmiho bHzr hmTrh ontn lo kkr lHm liom mHoz hapim ed tm kl hlHm mn heir oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh :

38

oiSme SpTih bn mtn ogdliho bn pSHor oiokl bn Slmiho opSHor bn mlkih at hdbrim aSr irmiho mdbr al kl hem lamr : kh amr ihoh hiSb beir hcat imot bHrb breb obdbr ohiza al hkSdim iHih ohith lo npSo lSll oHi : kh amr ihoh hntn tntn heir hcat bid Hil mlk bbl olkdh : oiamro hSrim al hmlk iomt na at haiS hch ki el kn hoa mrpa at idi anSi hmlHmh hnSarim beir hcat oat idi kl hem ldbr alihm kdbrim halh ki haiS hch ainno drS lSlom lem hch ki am lreh : oiamr hmlk zdqiho hnh hoa bidkm ki ain hmlk iokl atkm dbr : oiqHo at irmiho oiSlko ato al hbor mlkiho bn hmlk aSr bHzr hmTrh oiSlHo at irmiho bHblim obbor ain mim ki am TiT oiTbe irmiho bTiT : oiSme ebd mlk hkoSi aiS sris ohoa bbit hmlk ki ntno at irmiho al hbor ohmlk ioSb bSer bnimn : oiza ebd mlk mbit hmlk oidbr al hmlk lamr : adni hmlk hreo hanSim halh at kl aSr eSo lirmiho hnbia at aSr hSliko al hbor oimt tHtio mpni hreb ki ain hlHm eod beir : oizoh hmlk at ebd mlk hkoSi lamr qH bidk mch SlSim anSim ohelit at irmiho hnbia mn hbor bTrm imot : oiqH ebd mlk at hanSim bido oiba bit hmlk al tHt haozr oiqH mSm bloi hsHbot obloi mlHim oiSlHm al irmiho al hbor bHblim : oiamr ebd mlk hkoSi al irmiho Sim na bloai hsHbot ohmlHim tHt azlot idik mtHt lHblim oieS irmiho kn : oimSko at irmiho bHblim oielo ato mn hbor oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh : oiSlH hmlk zdqiho oiqH at irmiho hnbia alio al mboa hSliSi aSr bbit ihoh oiamr hmlk al irmiho Sal ani atk dbr al tkHd mmni dbr : oiamr irmiho al zdqiho ki agid lk hloa hmt tmitni oki aiezk la tSme ali : oiSbe hmlk zdqiho al irmiho bstr lamr Hi ihoh at aSr eSh lno at hnpS hcat am amitk oam atnk bid hanSim halh aSr mbqSim at npSk : oiamr irmiho al zdqiho kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral am iza tza al Sri mlk bbl oHith npSk oheir hcat la tSrp baS oHith ath obitk : oam la tza al Sri mlk bbl ontnh heir hcat bid hkSdim oSrpoh baS oath la tmlT midm : oiamr hmlk zdqiho al irmiho ani dag at hihodim aSr nplo al hkSdim pn itno ati bidm ohtello bi : oiamr irmiho la itno Sme na bqol ihoh laSr ani dbr alik oiiTb lk otHi npSk : oam man ath lzat ch hdbr aSr hrani ihoh : ohnh kl hnSim aSr nSaro bbit mlk ihodh mozaot al Sri mlk bbl ohnh amrot hsitok oiklo lk anSi Slmk hTbeo bbz rglk nsgo aHor : oat kl nSik oat bnik mozaim al hkSdim oath la tmlT midm ki bid mlk bbl ttpS oat heir hcat tSrp baS : oiamr zdqiho al irmiho aiS al ide bdbrim halh ola tmot : oki iSmeo hSrim ki dbrti atk obao alik oamro alik hgidh na lno mh dbrt al hmlk al tkHd mmno ola nmitk omh dbr alik hmlk : oamrt alihm mpil ani tHnti lpni hmlk lblti hSibni bit ihontn lmot Sm : oibao kl hSrim al irmiho oiSalo ato oigd lhm kkl hdbrim halh aSr zoh hmlk oiHrSo mmno ki la nSme hdbr : oiSb irmiho bHzr hmTrh ed iom aSr nlkdh iroSlm ohih kaSr nlkdh iroSlm :

39

bSnh htSeit lzdqiho mlk ihodh bHdS heSri ba nbokdrazr mlk bbl okl Hilo al iroSlm oizro elih : beSti eSrh Snh lzdqiho bHdS hrbiei btSeh lHdS hbqeh heir : oibao kl Sri mlk bbl oiSbo bSer htok nrgl Sr azr smgr nbo Sr skim rb sris nrgl Sr azr rb mg okl Sarit Sri mlk bbl : oihi kaSr ram zdqiho mlk ihodh okl anSi hmlHmh oibrHo oizao lilh mn heir drk gn hmlk bSer bin hHmtim oiza drk herbh : oirdpo Hil kSdim aHrihm oiSgo at zdqiho berbot irHo oiqHo ato oielho al nbokdrazr mlk bbl rblth barz Hmt oidbr ato mSpTim : oiSHT mlk bbl at bni zdqiho brblh leinio oat kl Hri ihodh SHT mlk bbl : oat eini zdqiho eor oiasrho bnHStim lbia ato bblh : oat bit hmlk oat bit hem Srpo hkSdim baS oat Hmot iroSlm ntzo : oat itr hem hnSarim beir oat hnplim aSr nplo elio oat itr hem hnSarim hglh nbocr adn rb TbHim bbl : omn hem hdlim aSr ain lhm maomh hSair nbocradn rb TbHim barz ihodh oitn lhm krmim oigbim biom hhoa : oizo nbokdrazr mlk bbl el irmiho bid nbocradn rb TbHim lamr : qHno oeinik Sim elio oal teS lo maomh re ki am kaSr idbr alik kn eSh emo : oiSlH nbocradn rb TbHim onboScbn rb sris onrgl Sr azr rb mg okl rbi mlk bbl : oiSlHo oiqHo at irmiho mHzr hmTrh oitno ato al gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn lhozaho al hbit oiSb btok hem : oal irmiho hih dbr ihoh bhito ezor bHzr hmTrh lamr : hlok oamrt lebd mlk hkoSi lamr kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni mbi at dbri al heir hcat lreh ola lTobh ohio lpnik biom hhoa : ohzltik biom hhoa nam ihoh ola tntn bid hanSim aSr ath igor mpnihm : ki mlT amlTk obHrb la tpl ohith lk npSk lSll ki bTHt bi nam ihoh :

40

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho mat ihoh aHr SlH ato nbocradn rb TbHim mn hrmh bqHto ato ohoa asor bacqim btok kl glot iroSlm oihodh hmglim bblh : oiqH rb TbHim lirmiho oiamr alio ihoh alhik dbr at hreh hcat al hmqom hch : oiba oieS ihoh kaSr dbr ki HTatm lihoh ola Smetm bqolo ohih lkm dbr hch : oeth hnh ptHtik hiom mn hacqim aSr el idk am Tob beinik lboa ati bbl ba oaSim at eini elik oam re beinik lboa ati bbl Hdl rah kl harz lpnik al Tob oal hiSr beinik llkt Smh lk : oeodno la iSob oSbh al gdlih bn aHiqm bn Spn aSr hpqid mlk bbl beri ihodh oSb ato btok hem ao al kl hiSr beinik llkt lk oitn lo rb TbHim arHh omSat oiSlHho : oiba irmiho al gdlih bn aHiqm hmzpth oiSb ato btok hem hnSarim barz : oiSmeo kl Sri hHilim aSr bSdh hmh oanSihm ki hpqid mlk bbl at gdliho bn aHiqm barz oki hpqid ato anSim onSim oTp omdlt harz maSr la hglo bblh : oibao al gdlih hmzpth oiSmeal bn ntniho oioHnn oiontn bni qrH oSrih bn tnHmt obni eopi hnTpti oicniho bn hmekti hmh oanSihm : oiSbe lhm gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn olanSihm lamr al tirao mebod hkSdim Sbo barz oebdo at mlk bbl oiiTb lkm : oani hnni iSb bmzph lemd lpni hkSdim aSr ibao alino oatm aspo iin oqiz oSmn oSmo bklikm oSbo berikm aSr tpStm : ogm kl hihodim aSr bmoab obbni emon obadom oaSr bkl harzot Smeo ki ntn mlk bbl Sarit lihodh oki hpqid elihm at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn : oiSbo kl hihodim mkl hmqmot aSr ndHo Sm oibao arz ihodh al gdliho hmzpth oiaspo iin oqiz hrbh mad : oioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr bSdh bao al gdliho hmzpth : oiamro alio hide tde ki belis mlk bni emon SlH at iSmeal bn ntnih lhktk npS ola hamin lhm gdliho bn aHiqm : oioHnn bn qrH amr al gdliho bstr bmzph lamr alkh na oakh at iSmeal bn ntnih oaiS la ide lmh ikkh npS onpzo kl ihodh hnqbzim alik oabdh Sarit ihodh : oiamr gdliho bn aHiqm al ioHnn bn qrH al teS at hdbr hch ki Sqr ath dbr al iSmeal :

41

oihi bHdS hSbiei ba iSmeal bn ntnih bn aliSme mcre hmlokh orbi hmlk oeSrh anSim ato al gdliho bn aHiqm hmzpth oiaklo Sm lHm iHdo bmzph : oiqm iSmeal bn ntnih oeSrt hanSim aSr hio ato oiko at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn bHrb oimt ato aSr hpqid mlk bbl barz : oat kl hihodim aSr hio ato at gdliho bmzph oat hkSdim aSr nmzao Sm at anSi hmlHmh hkh iSmeal : oihi biom hSni lhmit at gdliho oaiS la ide : oibao anSim mSkm mSlo omSmron Smnim aiS mglHi cqn oqrei bgdim omtgddim omnHh olbonh bidm lhbia bit ihoh : oiza iSmeal bn ntnih lqratm mn hmzph hlk hlk obkh oihi kpgS atm oiamr alihm bao al gdliho bn aHiqm : oihi kboam al tok heir oiSHTm iSmeal bn ntnih al tok hbor hoa ohanSim aSr ato : oeSrh anSim nmzao bm oiamro al iSmeal al tmtno ki iS lno mTmnim bSdh HTim oSerim oSmn odbS oiHdl ola hmitm btok aHihm : ohbor aSr hSlik Sm iSmeal at kl pgri hanSim aSr hkh bid gdliho hoa aSr eSh hmlk asa mpni beSa mlk iSral ato mla iSmeal bn ntniho Hllim : oiSb iSmeal at kl Sarit hem aSr bmzph at bnot hmlk oat kl hem hnSarim bmzph aSr hpqid nbocradn rb TbHim at gdliho bn aHiqm oiSbm iSmeal bn ntnih oilk lebr al bni emon : oiSme ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr ato at kl hreh aSr eSh iSmeal bn ntnih : oiqHo at kl hanSim oilko lhlHm em iSmeal bn ntnih oimzao ato al mim rbim aSr bgbeon : oihi kraot kl hem aSr at iSmeal at ioHnn bn qrH oat kl Sri hHilim aSr ato oiSmHo : oisbo kl hem aSr Sbh iSmeal mn hmzph oiSbo oilko al ioHnn bn qrH : oiSmeal bn ntnih nmlT bSmnh anSim mpni ioHnn oilk al bni emon : oiqH ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim aSr ato at kl Sarit hem aSr hSib mat iSmeal bn ntnih mn hmzph aHr hkh at gdlih bn aHiqm gbrim anSi hmlHmh onSim oTp osrsim aSr hSib mgbeon : oilko oiSbo bgrot kmohm aSr azl bit lHm llkt lboa mzrim : mpni hkSdim ki irao mpnihm ki hkh iSmeal bn ntnih at gdliho bn aHiqm aSr hpqid mlk bbl barz :

42

oigSo kl Sri hHilim oioHnn bn qrH oicnih bn hoSeih okl hem mqTn oed gdol : oiamro al irmiho hnbia tpl na tHntno lpnik ohtpll bedno al ihoh alhik bed kl hSarit hcat ki nSarno meT mhrbh kaSr einik raot atno : oigd lno ihoh alhik at hdrk aSr nlk bh oat hdbr aSr neSh : oiamr alihm irmiho hnbia Smeti hnni mtpll al ihoh alhikm kdbrikm ohih kl hdbr aSr ienh ihoh atkm agid lkm la amne mkm dbr : ohmh amro al irmiho ihi ihoh bno led amt onamn am la kkl hdbr aSr iSlHk ihoh alhik alino kn neSh : am Tob oam re bqol ihoh alhino aSr ano SlHim atk alio nSme lmen aSr iiTb lno ki nSme bqol ihoh alhino : oihi mqz eSrt imim oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho : oiqra al ioHnn bn qrH oal kl Sri hHilim aSr ato olkl hem lmqTn oed gdol : oiamr alihm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral aSr SlHtm ati alio lhpil tHntkm lpnio : am Sob tSbo barz hcat obniti atkm ola ahrs onTeti atkm ola atoS ki nHmti al hreh aSr eSiti lkm : al tirao mpni mlk bbl aSr atm iraim mpnio al tirao mmno nam ihoh ki atkm ani lhoSie atkm olhzil atkm mido : oatn lkm rHmim orHm atkm ohSib atkm al admtkm : oam amrim atm la nSb barz hcat lblti Sme bqol ihoh alhikm : lamr la ki arz mzrim nboa aSr la nrah mlHmh oqol Sopr la nSme ollHm la nreb oSm nSb : oeth lkn Smeo dbr ihoh Sarit ihodh kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral am atm Som tSmon pnikm lba mzrim obatm lgor Sm : ohith hHrb aSr atm iraim mmnh Sm tSig atkm barz mzrim ohreb aSr atm dagim mmno Sm idbq aHrikm mzrim oSm tmto : oihio kl hanSim aSr Smo at pnihm lboa mzrim lgor Sm imoto bHrb breb obdbr ola ihih lhm Srid opliT mpni hreh aSr ani mbia elihm : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral kaSr ntk api oHmti el iSbi iroSlm kn ttk Hmti elikm bbakm mzrim ohiitm lalh olSmh olqllh olHrph ola trao eod at hmqom hch : dbr ihoh elikm Sarit ihodh al tbao mzrim ide tdeo ki heidti bkm hiom : ki htetim bnpSotikm ki atm SlHtm ati al ihoh alhikm lamr htpll bedno al ihoh alhino okkl aSr iamr ihoh alhino kn hgd lno oeSino : oagd lkm hiom ola Smetm bqol ihoh alhikm olkl aSr SlHni alikm : oeth ide tdeo ki bHrb breb obdbr tmoto bmqom aSr Hpztm lboa lgor Sm :

43

oihi kklot irmiho ldbr al kl hem at kl dbri ihoh alhihm aSr SlHo ihoh alhihm alihm at kl hdbrim halh : oiamr ecrih bn hoSeih oioHnn bn qrH okl hanSim hcdim amrim al irmiho Sqr ath mdbr la SlHk ihoh alhino lamr la tbao mzrim lgor Sm : ki brok bn nrih msit atk bno lmen tt atno bid hkSdim lhmit atno olhglot atno bbl : ola Sme ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim okl hem bqol ihoh lSbt barz ihodh : oiqH ioHnn bn qrH okl Sri hHilim at kl Sarit ihodh aSr Sbo mkl hgoim aSr ndHo Sm lgor barz ihodh : at hgbrim oat hnSim oat hTp oat bnot hmlk oat kl hnpS aSr hniH nbocradn rb TbHim at gdliho bn aHiqm bn Spn oat irmiho hnbia oat brok bn nriho : oibao arz mzrim ki la Smeo bqol ihoh oibao ed tHpnHs : oihi dbr ihoh al irmiho btHpnHs lamr : qH bidk abnim gdlot oTmntm bmlT bmlbn aSr bptH bit preh btHpnHs leini anSim ihodim : oamrt alihm kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni SlH olqHti at nbokdrazr mlk bbl ebdi oSmti ksao mmel labnim halh aSr Tmnti onTh at Sproro elihm : obah ohkh at arz mzrim aSr lmot lmot oaSr lSbi lSbi oaSr lHrb lHrb : ohzti aS bbti alhi mzrim oSrpm oSbm oeTh at arz mzrim kaSr ieTh hreh at bgdo oiza mSm bSlom : oSbr at mzbot bit SmS aSr barz mzrim oat bti alhi mzrim iSrp baS :

44

hdbr aSr hih al irmiho al kl hihodim hiSbim barz mzrim hiSbim bmgdl obtHpnHs obnp obarz ptros lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral atm raitm at kl hreh aSr hbati el iroSlm oel kl eri ihodh ohnm Hrbh hiom hch oain bhm ioSb : mpni retm aSr eSo lhkesni llkt lqTr lebd lalhim aHrim aSr la ideom hmh atm oabtikm : oaSlH alikm at kl ebdi hnbiaim hSkim oSlH lamr al na teSo at dbr htebh hcat aSr Snati : ola Smeo ola hTo at acnm lSob mretm lblti qTr lalhim aHrim : ottk Hmti oapi otber beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm othiinh lHrbh lSmmh kiom hch : oeth kh amr ihoh alhi zbaot alhi iSral lmh atm eSim reh gdolh al npStkm lhkrit lkm aiS oaSh eoll oionq mtok ihodh lblti hotir lkm Sarit : lhkesni bmeSi idikm lqTr lalhim aHrim barz mzrim aSr atm baim lgor Sm lmen hkrit lkm olmen hiotkm lqllh olHrph bkl goii harz : hSkHtm at reot abotikm oat reot mlki ihodh oat reot nSio oat retkm oat ret nSikm aSr eSo barz ihodh obHzot iroSlm : la dkao ed hiom hch ola irao ola hlko btorti obHqti aSr ntti lpnikm olpni abotikm : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni Sm pni bkm lreh olhkrit at kl ihodh : olqHti at Sarit ihodh aSr Smo pnihm lboa arz mzrim lgor Sm otmo kl barz mzrim iplo bHrb breb itmo mqTn oed gdol bHrb obreb imto ohio lalh lSmh olqllh olHrph : opqdti el hioSbim barz mzrim kaSr pqdti el iroSlm bHrb breb obdbr : ola ihih pliT oSrid lSarit ihodh hbaim lgor Sm barz mzrim olSob arz ihodh aSr hmh mnSaim at npSm lSob lSbt Sm ki la iSobo ki am plTim : oieno at irmiho kl hanSim hideim ki mqTrot nSihm lalhim aHrim okl hnSim hemdot qhl gdol okl hem hiSbim barz mzrim bptros lamr : hdbr aSr dbrt alino bSm ihoh ainno Smeim alik : ki eSh neSh at kl hdbr aSr iza mpino lqTr lmlkt hSmim ohsik lh nskim kaSr eSino anHno oabtino mlkino oSrino beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm onSbe lHm onhih Tobim oreh la raino : omn ac Hdlno lqTr lmlkt hSmim ohsk lh nskim Hsrno kl obHrb obreb tmno : oki anHno mqTrim lmlkt hSmim olhsk lh nskim hmbledi anSino eSino lh konim lhezbh ohsk lh nskim : oiamr irmiho al kl hem el hgbrim oel hnSim oel kl hem henim ato dbr lamr : hloa at hqTr aSr qTrtm beri ihodh obHzot iroSlm atm oabotikm mlkikm oSrikm oem harz atm ckr ihoh otelh el lbo : ola iokl ihoh eod lSat mpni re mellikm mpni htoebt aSr eSitm othi arzkm lHrbh olSmh olqllh main ioSb khiom hch : mpni aSr qTrtm oaSr HTatm lihoh ola Smetm bqol ihoh obtrto obHqtio obedotio la hlktm el kn qrat atkm hreh hcat kiom hch : oiamr irmiho al kl hem oal kl hnSim Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh aSr barz mzrim : kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral lamr atm onSikm otdbrnh bpikm obidikm mlatm lamr eSh neSh at ndrino aSr ndrno lqTr lmlkt hSmim olhsk lh nskim hqim tqimnh at ndrikm oeSh teSinh at ndrikm : lkn Smeo dbr ihoh kl ihodh hiSbim barz mzrim hnni nSbeti bSmi hgdol amr ihoh am ihih eod Smi nqra bpi kl aiS ihodh amr Hi adni ihoh bkl arz mzrim : hnni Sqd elihm lreh ola lTobh otmo kl aiS ihodh aSr barz mzrim bHrb obreb ed klotm : opliTi Hrb iSbon mn arz mzrim arz ihodh mti mspr oideo kl Sarit ihodh hbaim larz mzrim lgor Sm dbr mi iqom mmni omhm : ocat lkm haot nam ihoh ki pqd ani elikm bmqom hch lmen tdeo ki qom iqomo dbri elikm lreh : kh amr ihoh hnni ntn at preh Hpre mlk mzrim bid aibio obid mbqSi npSo kaSr ntti at zdqiho mlk ihodh bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl aibo ombqS npSo :

45

hdbr aSr dbr irmiho hnbia al brok bn nrih bktbo at hdbrim halh el spr mpi irmiho bSnh hrbeit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh lamr : kh amr ihoh alhi iSral elik brok : amrt aoi na li ki isp ihoh igon el mkabi igeti banHti omnoHh la mzati : kh tamr alio kh amr ihoh hnh aSr bniti ani hrs oat aSr nTeti ani ntS oat kl harz hia : oath tbqS lk gdlot al tbqS ki hnni mbia reh el kl bSr nam ihoh ontti lk at npSk lSll el kl hmqmot aSr tlk Sm :

46

aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia el hgoim : lmzrim el Hil preh nko mlk mzrim aSr hih el nhr prt bkrkmS aSr hkh nbokdrazr mlk bbl bSnt hrbieit lihoiqim bn iaSiho mlk ihodh : erko mgn oznh ogSo lmlHmh : asro hsosim oelo hprSim ohtizbo bkobeim mrqo hrmHim lbSo hsrint : mdoe raiti hmh Htim nsgim aHor ogborihm ikto omnos nso ola hpno mgor msbib nam ihoh : al inos hql oal imlT hgbor zponh el id nhr prt kSlo onplo : mi ch kiar ielh knhrot itgeSo mimio : mzrim kiar ielh oknhrot itgeSo mim oiamr aelh aksh arz abidh eir oiSbi bh : elo hsosim ohthllo hrkb oizao hgborim koS opoT tpSi mgn olodim tpSi drki qSt : ohiom hhoa ladni ihoh zbaot iom nqmh lhnqm mzrio oaklh Hrb oSbeh oroth mdmm ki cbH ladni ihoh zbaot barz zpon al nhr prt : eli gled oqHi zri btolt bt mzrim lSoa hrbiti rpaot telh ain lk : Smeo goim qlonk ozoHtk mlah harz ki gbor bgbor kSlo iHdio nplo Snihm : hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia lboa nbokdrazr mlk bbl lhkot at arz mzrim : hgido bmzrim ohSmieo bmgdol ohSmieo bnp obtHpnHs amro htizb ohkn lk ki aklh Hrb sbibik : mdoe nsHp abirik la emd ki ihoh hdpo : hrbh koSl gm npl aiS al reho oiamro qomh onSbh al emno oal arz moldtno mpni Hrb hionh : qrao Sm preh mlk mzrim Saon hebir hmoed : Hi ani nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo ki ktbor bhrim okkrml bim iboa : kli golh eSi lk ioSbt bt mzrim ki np lSmh thih onzth main ioSb : eglh iph pih mzrim qrz mzpon ba ba : gm Skrih bqrbh kegli mrbq ki gm hmh hpno nso iHdio la emdo ki iom aidm ba elihm et pqdtm : qolh knHS ilk ki bHil ilko obqrdmot bao lh kHTbi ezim : krto ierh nam ihoh ki la iHqr ki rbo marbh oain lhm mspr : hbiSh bt mzrim ntnh bid em zpon : amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni poqd al amon mna oel preh oel mzrim oel alhih oel mlkih oel preh oel hbTHim bo : onttim bid mbqSi npSm obid nbokdrazr mlk bbl obid ebdio oaHri kn tSkn kimi qdm nam ihoh : oath al tira ebdi ieqb oal tHt iSral ki hnni moSek mrHoq oat crek marz Sbim oSb ieqob oSqT oSann oain mHrid : ath al tira ebdi ieqb nam ihoh ki atk ani ki aeSh klh bkl hgoim aSr hdHtik Smh oatk la aeSh klh oisrtik lmSpT onqh la anqk :

47

aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia al plStim bTrm ikh preh at ech : kh amr ihoh hnh mim elim mzpon ohio lnHl SoTp oiSTpo arz omloah eir oiSbi bh oceqo hadm ohill kl ioSb harz : mqol SeTt prsot abirio mreS lrkbo hmon glglio la hpno abot al bnim mrpion idim : el hiom hba lSdod at kl plStim lhkrit lzr olzidon kl Srid ecr ki Sdd ihoh at plStim Sarit ai kptor : bah qrHh al ech ndmth aSqlon Sarit emqm ed mti ttgoddi : hoi Hrb lihoh ed anh la tSqTi haspi al terk hrgei odmi : aik tSqTi oihoh zoh lh al aSqlon oal Hop him Sm iedh :

48

lmoab kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hoi al nbo ki Sddh hbiSh nlkdh qritim hbiSh hmSgb oHth : ain eod thlt moab bHSbon HSbo elih reh lko onkritnh mgoi gm mdmn tdmi aHrik tlk Hrb : qol zeqh mHronim Sd oSbr gdol : nSbrh moab hSmieo ceqh zeorih : ki melh hlHot bbki ielh bki ki bmord Hornim zri zeqt Sbr Smeo : nso mlTo npSkm othiinh keroer bmdbr : ki ien bTHk bmeSik obaozrotik gm at tlkdi oiza kmiS bgolh khnio oSrio iHd : oiba Sdd al kl eir oeir la tmlT oabd hemq onSmd hmiSr aSr amr ihoh : tno ziz lmoab ki nza tza oerih lSmh thiinh main ioSb bhn : aror eSh mlakt ihoh rmih oaror mne Hrbo mdm : Sann moab mneorio oSqT hoa al Smrio ola horq mkli al kli obgolh la hlk el kn emd Temo bo oriHo la nmr : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh oSlHti lo zeim ozeho oklio iriqo onblihm inpzo : obS moab mkmoS kaSr bSo bit iSral mbit al mbTHm : aik tamro gborim anHno oanSi Hil lmlHmh : Sdd moab oerih elh ombHr bHorio irdo lTbH nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo : qrob aid moab lboa oreto mhrh mad : ndo lo kl sbibio okl idei Smo amro aikh nSbr mTh ec mql tparh : rdi mkbod iSbi bzma iSbt bt dibon ki Sdd moab elh bk SHt mbzrik : al drk emdi ozpi ioSbt eroer Sali ns onmlTh amri mh nhith : hbiS moab ki Hth hilili oceqi hgido barnon ki Sdd moab : omSpT ba al arz hmiSr al Hlon oal ihzh oel mopet : oel dibon oel nbo oel bit dbltim : oel qritim oel bit gmol oel bit meon : oel qriot oel bzrh oel kl eri arz moab hrHqot ohqrbot : ngdeh qrn moab ocreo nSbrh nam ihoh : hSkirho ki el ihoh hgdil ospq moab bqiao ohih lSHq gm hoa : oam loa hSHq hih lk iSral am bgnbim nmzah ki mdi dbrik bo ttnodd : ecbo erim oSkno bsle iSbi moab ohio kionh tqnn bebri pi pHt : Smeno gaon moab gah mad gbho ogaono ogaoto orm lbo : ani ideti nam ihoh ebrto ola kn bdio la kn eSo : el kn el moab ailil olmoab klh aceq al anSi qir HrS ihgh : mbki iecr abkh lk hgpn Sbmh nTiStik ebro im ed im iecr ngeo el qizk oel bzirk Sdd npl : onasph SmHh ogil mkrml omarz moab oiin miqbim hSbti la idrk hidd hidd la hidd : mceqt HSbon ed alelh ed ihz ntno qolm mzer ed Hrnim eglt SlSih ki gm mi nmrim lmSmot ihio : ohSbti lmoab nam ihoh melh bmh omqTir lalhio : el kn lbi lmoab kHllim ihmh olbi al anSi qir HrS kHlilim ihmh el kn itrt eSh abdo : ki kl raS qrHh okl cqn greh el kl idim gddt oel mtnim Sq : el kl ggot moab obrHbtih klh mspd ki Sbrti at moab kkli ain Hpz bo nam ihoh : aik Hth hililo aik hpnh erp moab boS ohih moab lSHq olmHth lkl sbibio : ki kh amr ihoh hnh knSr idah oprS knpio al moab : nlkdh hqriot ohmzdot ntpSh ohih lb gbori moab biom hhoa klb aSh mzrh : onSmd moab mem ki el ihoh hgdil : pHd opHt opH elik ioSb moab nam ihoh : hnis mpni hpHd ipl al hpHt ohelh mn hpHt ilkd bpH ki abia alih al moab Snt pqdtm nam ihoh : bzl HSbon emdo mkH nsim ki aS iza mHSbon olhbh mbin siHon otakl pat moab oqdqd bni Saon : aoi lk moab abd em kmoS ki lqHo bnik bSbi obntik bSbih : oSbti Sbot moab baHrit himim nam ihoh ed hnh mSpT moab :

49

lbni emon kh amr ihoh hbnim ain liSral am iorS ain lo mdoe irS mlkm at gd oemo berio iSb : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh ohSmeti al rbt bni emon troet mlHmh ohith ltl Smmh obntih baS tztnh oirS iSral at irSio amr ihoh : hilili HSbon ki Sddh ei zeqnh bnot rbh Hgrnh Sqim spdnh ohtSoTTnh bgdrot ki mlkm bgolh ilk khnio oSrio iHdio : mh tthlli bemqim cb emqk hbt hSobbh hbTHh bazrtih mi iboa ali : hnni mbia elik pHd nam adni ihoh zbaot mkl sbibik ondHtm aiS lpnio oain mqbz lndd : oaHri kn aSib at Sbot bni emon nam ihoh : ladom kh amr ihoh zbaot hain eod Hkmh btimn abdh ezh mbnim nsrHh Hkmtm : nso hpno hemiqo lSbt iSbi ddn ki aid eSo hbati elio et pqdtio : am bzrim bao lk la iSaro eollot am gnbim blilh hSHito dim : ki ani HSpti at eSo gliti at mstrio onHbh la iokl Sdd creo oaHio oSknio oainno : ecbh itmik ani aHih oalmntik eli tbTHo : ki kh amr ihoh hnh aSr ain mSpTm lStot hkos Sto iSto oath hoa nqh tnqh la tnqh ki Sth tSth : ki bi nSbeti nam ihoh ki lSmh lHrph lHrb olqllh thih bzrh okl erih thiinh lHrbot eolm : Smoeh Smeti mat ihoh ozir bgoim SloH htqbzo obao elih oqomo lmlHmh : ki hnh qTn nttik bgoim bcoi badm : tplztk hSia atk cdon lbk Skni bHgoi hsle tpSi mrom gbeh ki tgbih knSr qnk mSm aoridk nam ihoh : ohith adom lSmh kl ebr elih iSm oiSrq el kl mkoth : kmhpkt sdm oemrh oSknih amr ihoh la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm : hnh karih ielh mgaon hirdn al noh aitn ki argieh arizno melih omi bHor alih apqd ki mi kmoni omi ieidni omi ch reh aSr iemd lpni : lkn Smeo ezt ihoh aSr iez al adom omHSbotio aSr HSb al iSbi timn am la isHbom zeiri hzan am la iSim elihm nohm : mqol nplm reSh harz zeqh bim sop nSme qolh : hnh knSr ielh oidah oiprS knpio el bzrh ohih lb gbori adom biom hhoa klb aSh mzrh : ldmSq boSh Hmt oarpd ki Smeh reh Smeo nmgo bim dagh hSqT la iokl : rpth dmSq hpnth lnos orTT hHciqh zrh oHblim aHcth kioldh : aik la ecbh eir thlh qrit mSoSi : lkn iplo bHorih brHbtih okl anSi hmlHmh idmo biom hhoa nam ihoh zbaot : ohzti aS bHomt dmSq oaklh armnot bn hdd : lqdr olmmlkot Hzor aSr hkh nbokdrazor mlk bbl kh amr ihoh qomo elo al qdr oSddo at bni qdm : ahlihm ozanm iqHo irieotihm okl klihm ogmlihm iSao lhm oqrao elihm mgor msbib : nso ndo mad hemiqo lSbt iSbi Hzor nam ihoh ki iez elikm nbokdrazr mlk bbl ezh oHSb elihm mHSbh : qomo elo al goi Slio ioSb lbTH nam ihoh la dltim ola briH lo bdd iSkno : ohio gmlihm lbc ohmon mqnihm lSll ocrtim lkl roH qzozi pah omkl ebrio abia at aidm nam ihoh : ohith Hzor lmeon tnim Smmh ed eolm la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm : aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmiho hnbia al eilm braSit mlkot zdqih mlk ihodh lamr : kh amr ihoh zbaot hnni Sbr at qSt eilm raSit gbortm : ohbati al eilm arbe roHot marbe qzot hSmim ocrtim lkl hrHot halh ola ihih hgoi aSr la iboa Sm ndHi eolm : ohHtti at eilm lpni aibihm olpni mbqSi npSm ohbati elihm reh at Hron api nam ihoh oSlHti aHrihm at hHrb ed kloti aotm : oSmti ksai beilm ohabdti mSm mlk oSrim nam ihoh : ohih baHrit himim aSob at Sbit eilm nam ihoh :

50

hdbr aSr dbr ihoh al bbl al arz kSdim bid irmiho hnbia : hgido bgoim ohSmieo oSao ns hSmieo al tkHdo amro nlkdh bbl hbiS bl Ht mrdk hbiSo ezbih Hto glolih : ki elh elih goi mzpon hoa iSit at arzh lSmh ola ihih ioSb bh madm oed bhmh ndo hlko : bimim hhmh obet hhia nam ihoh ibao bni iSral hmh obni ihodh iHdo hlok obko ilko oat ihoh alhihm ibqSo : zion iSalo drk hnh pnihm bao onloo al ihoh brit eolm la tSkH : zan abdot hih emi reihm hteom hrim Sobbim mhr al gbeh hlko SkHo rbzm : kl mozaihm aklom ozrihm amro la naSm tHt aSr HTao lihoh noh zdq omqoh abotihm ihoh : ndo mtok bbl omarz kSdim izao ohio ketodim lpni zan : ki hnh anki meir omelh el bbl qhl goim gdlim marz zpon oerko lh mSm tlkd Hzio kgbor mSkil la iSob riqm : ohith kSdim lSll kl Sllih iSbeo nam ihoh : ki tSmHi ki telci Ssi nHlti ki tpoSi keglh dSh otzhli kabrim : boSh amkm mad Hprh ioldtkm hnh aHrit goim mdbr zih oerbh : mqzp ihoh la tSb ohith Smmh klh kl ebr el bbl iSm oiSrq el kl mkotih : erko el bbl sbib kl drki qSt ido alih al tHmlo al Hz ki lihoh HTah : hrieo elih sbib ntnh idh nplo aSoitih nhrso Homotih ki nqmt ihoh hia hnqmo bh kaSr eSth eSo lh : krto core mbbl otpS mgl bet qzir mpni Hrb hionh aiS al emo ipno oaiS larzo inso : Sh pcorh iSral ariot hdiHo hraSon aklo mlk aSor och haHron ezmo nbokdrazr mlk bbl : lkn kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral hnni pqd al mlk bbl oal arzo kaSr pqdti al mlk aSor : oSbbti at iSral al noho oreh hkrml ohbSn obhr aprim ohgled tSbe npSo : bimim hhm obet hhia nam ihoh ibqS at eon iSral oainno oat HTat ihodh ola tmzainh ki aslH laSr aSair : el harz mrtim elh elih oal ioSbi pqod Hrb ohHrm aHrihm nam ihoh oeSh kkl aSr zoitik : qol mlHmh barz oSbr gdol : aik ngde oiSbr pTiS kl harz aik hith lSmh bbl bgoim : iqSti lk ogm nlkdt bbl oat la idet nmzat ogm ntpSt ki bihoh htgrit : ptH ihoh at aozro oioza at kli cemo ki mlakh hia ladni ihoh zbaot barz kSdim : bao lh mqz ptHo mabsih sloh kmo ermim ohHrimoh al thi lh Sarit : Hrbo kl prih irdo lTbH hoi elihm ki ba iomm et pqdtm : qol nsim oplTim marz bbl lhgid bzion at nqmt ihoh alhino nqmt hiklo : hSmieo al bbl rbim kl drki qSt Hno elih sbib al ihi pliTh Slmo lh kpelh kkl aSr eSth eSo lh ki al ihoh cdh al qdoS iSral : lkn iplo bHorih brHbtih okl anSi mlHmth idmo biom hhoa nam ihoh : hnni alik cdon nam adni ihoh zbaot ki ba iomk et pqdtik : okSl cdon onpl oain lo mqim ohzti aS berio oaklh kl sbibtio : kh amr ihoh zbaot eSoqim bni iSral obni ihodh iHdo okl Sbihm hHciqo bm mano SlHm : galm Hcq ihoh zbaot Smo rib irib at ribm lmen hrgie at harz ohrgic liSbi bbl : Hrb el kSdim nam ihoh oal iSbi bbl oal Srih oal Hkmih : Hrb al hbdim onalo Hrb al gborih oHto : Hrb al sosio oal rkbo oal kl herb aSr btokh ohio lnSim Hrb al aozrtih obcco : Hrb al mimih oibSo ki arz pslim hia obaimim ithllo : lkn iSbo ziim at aiim oiSbo bh bnot ienh ola tSb eod lnzH ola tSkon ed dor odor : kmhpkt alhim at sdm oat emrh oat Sknih nam ihoh la iSb Sm aiS ola igor bh bn adm : hnh em ba mzpon ogoi gdol omlkim rbim iero mirkti arz : qSt okidn iHciqo akcri hmh ola irHmo qolm kim ihmh oel sosim irkbo erok kaiS lmlHmh elik bt bbl : Sme mlk bbl at Smem orpo idio zrh hHciqtho Hil kioldh : hnh karih ielh mgaon hirdn al noh aitn ki argeh arozm melih omi bHor alih apqd ki mi kmoni omi ioedni omi ch reh aSr iemd lpni : lkn Smeo ezt ihoh aSr iez al bbl omHSbotio aSr HSb al arz kSdim am la isHbom zeiri hzan am la iSim elihm noh : mqol ntpSh bbl nreSh harz oceqh bgoim nSme :

51

kh amr ihoh hnni meir el bbl oal iSbi lb qmi roH mSHit : oSlHti lbbl crim ocroh oibqqo at arzh ki hio elih msbib biom reh : al idrk idrk hdrk qSto oal itel bsrino oal tHmlo al bHrih hHrimo kl zbah : onplo Hllim barz kSdim omdqrim bHozotih : ki la almn iSral oihodh malhio mihoh zbaot ki arzm mlah aSm mqdoS iSral : nso mtok bbl omlTo aiS npSo al tdmo beonh ki et nqmh hia lihoh gmol hoa mSlm lh : kos chb bbl bid ihoh mSkrt kl harz miinh Sto goim el kn ithllo goim : ptam nplh bbl otSbr hililo elih qHo zri lmkaobh aoli trpa : rpano at bbl ola nrpth ecboh onlk aiS larzo ki nge al hSmim mSpTh onSa ed SHqim : hozia ihoh at zdqtino bao onsprh bzion at meSh ihoh alhino : hbro hHzim mlao hSlTim heir ihoh at roH mlki mdi ki el bbl mcmto lhSHith ki nqmt ihoh hia nqmt hiklo : al Homt bbl Sao ns hHciqo hmSmr hqimo Smrim hkino harbim ki gm cmm ihoh gm eSh at aSr dbr al iSbi bbl : Sknti el mim rbim rbt aozrt ba qzk amt bzek : nSbe ihoh zbaot bnpSo ki am mlatik adm kilq oeno elik hidd : eSh arz bkHo mkin tbl bHkmto obtbonto nTh Smim : lqol tto hmon mim bSmim oiel nSaim mqzh arz brqim lmTr eSh oioza roH mazrtio : nber kl adm mdet hbiS kl zrp mpsl ki Sqr nsko ola roH bm : hbl hmh meSh teteim bet pqdtm iabdo : la kalh Hlq ieqob ki iozr hkl hoa oSbT nHlto ihoh zbaot Smo : mpz ath li kli mlHmh onpzti bk goim ohSHti bk mmlkot : onpzti bk sos orkbo onpzti bk rkb orkbo : onpzti bk aiS oaSh onpzti bk cqn oner onpzti bk bHor obtolh : onpzti bk reh oedro onpzti bk akr ozmdo onpzti bk pHot osgnim : oSlmti lbbl olkl ioSbi kSdim at kl retm aSr eSo bzion leinikm nam ihoh : hnni alik hr hmSHit nam ihoh hmSHit at kl harz onTiti at idi elik oglgltik mn hsleim onttik lhr Srph : ola iqHo mmk abn lpnh oabn lmosdot ki Smmot eolm thih nam ihoh : Sao ns barz tqeo Sopr bgoim qdSo elih goim hSmieo elih mmlkot arrT mni oaSknc pqdo elih Tpsr helo sos kilq smr : qdSo elih goim at mlki mdi at pHotih oat kl sgnih oat kl arz mmSlto : otreS harz otHl ki qmh el bbl mHSbot ihoh lSom at arz bbl lSmh main ioSb : Hdlo gbori bbl lhlHm iSbo bmzdot nSth gbortm hio lnSim hzito mSkntih nSbro briHih : rz lqrat rz iroz omgid lqrat mgid lhgid lmlk bbl ki nlkdh eiro mqzh : ohmebrot ntpSo oat hagmim Srpo baS oanSi hmlHmh nbhlo : ki kh amr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral bt bbl kgrn et hdrikh eod meT obah et hqzir lh : aklno hmmno nbokdrazr mlk bbl hzigno kli riq bleno ktnin mla krSo medni hdiHno : Hmsi oSari el bbl tamr iSbt zion odmi al iSbi kSdim tamr iroSlm : lkn kh amr ihoh hnni rb at ribk onqmti at nqmtk ohHrbti at imh ohbSti at mqorh : ohith bbl lglim meon tnim Smh oSrqh main ioSb : iHdo kkprim iSago nero kgori ariot : bHmm aSit at mStihm ohSkrtim lmen ielco oiSno Snt eolm ola iqizo nam ihoh : aoridm kkrim lTboH kailim em etodim : aik nlkdh SSk ottpS thlt kl harz aik hith lSmh bbl bgoim : elh el bbl him bhmon glio nksth : hio erih lSmh arz zih oerbh arz la iSb bhn kl aiS ola iebr bhn bn adm : opqdti el bl bbbl ohzati at bleo mpio ola inhro alio eod goim gm Homt bbl nplh : zao mtokh emi omlTo aiS at npSo mHron ap ihoh : opn irk lbbkm otirao bSmoeh hnSmet barz oba bSnh hSmoeh oaHrio bSnh hSmoeh oHms barz omSl el mSl : lkn hnh imim baim opqdti el psili bbl okl arzh tboS okl Hllih iplo btokh : ornno el bbl Smim oarz okl aSr bhm ki mzpon iboa lh hSoddim nam ihoh : gm bbl lnpl Hlli iSral gm lbbl nplo Hlli kl harz : plTim mHrb hlko al temdo ckro mrHoq at ihoh oiroSlm telh el lbbkm : bSno ki Smeno Hrph ksth klmh pnino ki bao crim el mqdSi bit ihoh : lkn hnh imim baim nam ihoh opqdti el psilih obkl arzh ianq Hll : ki telh bbl hSmim oki tbzr mrom ech mati ibao Sddim lh nam ihoh : qol ceqh mbbl oSbr gdol marz kSdim : ki Sdd ihoh at bbl oabd mmnh qol gdol ohmo glihm kmim rbim ntn Saon qolm : ki ba elih el bbl Sodd onlkdo gborih Htth qStotm ki al gmlot ihoh Slm iSlm : ohSkrti Srih oHkmih pHotih osgnih ogborih oiSno Snt eolm ola iqizo nam hmlk ihoh zbaot Smo : kh amr ihoh zbaot Hmot bbl hrHbh erer tterer oSerih hgbhim baS izto oigeo emim bdi riq olamim bdi aS oiepo : hdbr aSr zoh irmiho hnbia at Srih bn nrih bn mHsih blkto at zdqiho mlk ihodh bbl bSnt hrbeit lmlko oSrih Sr mnoHh : oiktb irmiho at kl hreh aSr tboa al bbl al spr aHd at kl hdbrim halh hktbim al bbl : oiamr irmiho al Srih kbak bbl orait oqrat at kl hdbrim halh : oamrt ihoh ath dbrt al hmqom hch lhkrito lblti hiot bo ioSb lmadm oed bhmh ki Smmot eolm thih : ohih kkltk lqra at hspr hch tqSr elio abn ohSlkto al tok prt : oamrt kkh tSqe bbl ola tqom mpni hreh aSr anki mbia elih oiepo ed hnh dbri irmiho :

52

bn eSrim oaHt Snh zdqiho bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo HmiTl bt irmiho mlbnh : oieS hre beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh ihoiqim : ki el ap ihoh hith biroSlm oihodh ed hSliko aotm mel pnio oimrd zdqiho bmlk bbl : oihi bSnh htSeit lmlko bHdS heSiri beSor lHdS ba nbokdrazr mlk bbl hoa okl Hilo el iroSlm oiHno elih oibno elih diq sbib : otba heir bmzor ed eSti eSrh Snh lmlk zdqiho : bHdS hrbiei btSeh lHdS oiHcq hreb beir ola hih lHm lem harz : otbqe heir okl anSi hmlHmh ibrHo oizao mheir lilh drk Ser bin hHmtim aSr el gn hmlk okSdim el heir sbib oilko drk herbh : oirdpo Hil kSdim aHri hmlk oiSigo at zdqiho berbt irHo okl Hilo npzo melio : oitpSo at hmlk oielo ato al mlk bbl rblth barz Hmt oidbr ato mSpTim : oiSHT mlk bbl at bni zdqiho leinio ogm at kl Sri ihodh SHT brblth : oat eini zdqiho eor oiasrho bnHStim oibaho mlk bbl bblh oitnho bbit hpqdt ed iom moto : obHdS hHmiSi beSor lHdS hia Snt tSe eSrh Snh lmlk nbokdrazr mlk bbl ba nbocradn rb TbHim emd lpni mlk bbl biroSlm : oiSrp at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk oat kl bti iroSlm oat kl bit hgdol Srp baS : oat kl Hmot iroSlm sbib ntzo kl Hil kSdim aSr at rb TbHim : omdlot hem oat itr hem hnSarim beir oat hnplim aSr nplo al mlk bbl oat itr hamon hglh nbocradn rb TbHim : omdlot harz hSair nbocradn rb TbHim lkrmim oligbim : oat emodi hnHSt aSr lbit ihoh oat hmknot oat im hnHSt aSr bbit ihoh Sbro kSdim oiSao at kl nHStm bblh : oat hsrot oat hieim oat hmcmrot oat hmcrqt oat hkpot oat kl kli hnHSt aSr iSrto bhm lqHo : oat hspim oat hmHtot oat hmcrqot oat hsirot oat hmnrot oat hkpot oat hmnqiot aSr chb chb oaSr ksp ksp lqH rb TbHim : hemodim Snim him aHd ohbqr Snim eSr nHSt aSr tHt hmknot aSr eSh hmlk Slmh lbit ihoh la hih mSql lnHStm kl hklim halh : ohemodim Smnh eSrh amh qomh hemd haHd oHoT Stim eSrh amh isbno oebio arbe azbeot nbob : oktrt elio nHSt oqomt hktrt haHt HmS amot oSbkh ormonim el hkotrt sbib hkl nHSt okalh lemod hSni ormonim : oihio hrmnim tSeim oSSh roHh kl hrmonim mah el hSbkh sbib : oiqH rb TbHim at Srih khn hraS oat zpnih khn hmSnh oat SlSt Smri hsp : omn heir lqH sris aHd aSr hih pqid el anSi hmlHmh oSbeh anSim mrai pni hmlk aSr nmzao beir oat spr Sr hzba hmzba at em harz oSSim aiS mem harz hnmzaim btok heir : oiqH aotm nbocradn rb TbHim oilk aotm al mlk bbl rblth : oikh aotm mlk bbl oimtm brblh barz Hmt oigl ihodh mel admto : ch hem aSr hglh nbokdrazr bSnt Sbe ihodim SlSt alpim oeSrim oSlSh : bSnt Smonh eSrh lnbokdrazr miroSlm npS Smnh maot SlSim oSnim : bSnt SlS oeSrim lnbokdrazr hglh nbocradn rb TbHim ihodim npS Sbe maot arbeim oHmSh kl npS arbet alpim oSS maot : oihi bSlSim oSbe Snh lglot ihoikn mlk ihodh bSnim eSr HdS beSrim oHmSh lHdS nSa aoil mrdk mlk bbl bSnt mlkto at raS ihoikin mlk ihodh oiza aoto mbit hklia : oidbr ato Tbot oitn at ksao mmel lksa mlkim aSr ato bbbl : oSnh at bgdi klao oakl lHm lpnio tmid kl imi Hio : oarHto arHt tmid ntnh lo mat mlk bbl dbr iom biomo ed iom moto kl imi Hiio :

iHcqal

1

oihi bSlSim Snh brbiei bHmSh lHdS oani btok hgolh el nhr kbr nptHo hSmim oarah mraot alhim : bHmSh lHdS hia hSnh hHmiSit lglot hmlk ioikin : hih hih dbr ihoh al iHcqal bn boci hkhn barz kSdim el nhr kbr othi elio Sm id ihoh : oara ohnh roH serh bah mn hzpon enn gdol oaS mtlqHt ongh lo sbib omtokh kein hHSml mtok haS : omtokh dmot arbe Hiot och mraihn dmot adm lhnh : oarbeh pnim laHt oarbe knpim laHt lhm : orglihm rgl iSrh okp rglihm kkp rgl egl onzzim kein nHSt qll : oido adm mtHt knpihm el arbet rbeihm opnihm oknpihm larbetm : Hbrt aSh al aHoth knpihm la isbo blktn aiS al ebr pnio ilko : odmot pnihm pni adm opni arih al himin larbetm opni Sor mhSmaol larbetn opni nSr larbetn : opnihm oknpihm prdot mlmelh laiS Stim Hbrot aiS oStim mksot at goitihnh : oaiS al ebr pnio ilko al aSr ihih Smh hroH llkt ilko la isbo blktn : odmot hHiot mraihm kgHli aS berot kmrah hlpdim hia mthlkt bin hHiot ongh laS omn haS ioza brq : ohHiot rzoa oSob kmrah hbcq : oara hHiot ohnh aopn aHd barz azl hHiot larbet pnio : mrah haopnim omeSihm kein trSiS odmot aHd larbetn omraihm omeSihm kaSr ihih haopn btok haopn : el arbet rbeihn blktm ilko la isbo blktn : ogbihn ogbh lhm oirah lhm ogbtm mlat einim sbib larbetn : oblkt hHiot ilko haopnim azlm obhnSa hHiot mel harz inSao haopnim : el aSr ihih Sm hroH llkt ilko Smh hroH llkt ohaopnim inSao lemtm ki roH hHih baopnim : blktm ilko obemdm iemdo obhnSam mel harz inSao haopnim lemtm ki roH hHih baopnim : odmot el raSi hHih rqie kein hqrH hnora nToi el raSihm mlmelh : otHt hrqie knpihm iSrot aSh al aHoth laiS Stim mksot lhnh olaiS Stim mksot lhnh at goitihm : oaSme at qol knpihm kqol mim rbim kqol Sdi blktm qol hmlh kqol mHnh bemdm trpinh knpihn : oihi qol mel lrqie aSr el raSm bemdm trpinh knpihn : ommel lrqie aSr el raSm kmrah abn spir dmot ksa oel dmot hksa dmot kmrah adm elio mlmelh : oara kein HSml kmrah aS bit lh sbib mmrah mtnio olmelh ommrah mtnio olmTh raiti kmrah aS ongh lo sbib : kmrah hqSt aSr ihih benn biom hgSm kn mrah hngh sbib hoa mrah dmot kbod ihoh oarah oapl el pni oaSme qol mdbr :

2

oiamr ali bn adm emd el rglik oadbr atk : otba bi roH kaSr dbr ali otemdni el rgli oaSme at mdbr ali : oiamr ali bn adm SolH ani aotk al bni iSral al goim hmordim aSr mrdo bi hmh oabotm pSeo bi ed ezm hiom hch : ohbnim qSi pnim oHcqi lb ani SolH aotk alihm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh : ohmh am iSmeo oam iHdlo ki bit mri hmh oideo ki nbia hih btokm : oath bn adm al tira mhm omdbrihm al tira ki srbim oslonim aotk oal eqrbim ath ioSb mdbrihm al tira ompnihm al tHt ki bit mri hmh : odbrt at dbri alihm am iSmeo oam iHdlo ki mri hmh : oath bn adm Sme at aSr ani mdbr alik al thi mri kbit hmri pzh pik oakl at aSr ani ntn alik : oarah ohnh id SloHh ali ohnh bo mglt spr : oiprS aoth lpni ohia ktobh pnim oaHor oktob alih qnim ohgh ohi :

3

oiamr ali bn adm at aSr tmza akol akol at hmglh hcat olk dbr al bit iSral : oaptH at pi oiaklni at hmglh hcat : oiamr ali bn adm bTnk takl omeik tmla at hmglh hcat aSr ani ntn alik oaklh othi bpi kdbS lmtoq : oiamr ali bn adm lk ba al bit iSral odbrt bdbri alihm : ki la al em emqi Sph okbdi lSon ath SloH al bit iSral : la al emim rbim emqi Sph okbdi lSon aSr la tSme dbrihm am la alihm SlHtik hmh iSmeo alik : obit iSral la iabo lSme alik ki ainm abim lSme ali ki kl bit iSral Hcqi mzH oqSi lb hmh : hnh ntti at pnik Hcqim lemt pnihm oat mzHk Hcq lemt mzHm : kSmir Hcq mzr ntti mzHk la tira aotm ola tHt mpnihm ki bit mri hmh : oiamr ali bn adm at kl dbri aSr adbr alik qH blbbk obacnik Sme : olk ba al hgolh al bni emk odbrt alihm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh am iSmeo oam iHdlo : otSani roH oaSme aHri qol reS gdol brok kbod ihoh mmqomo : oqol knpi hHiot mSiqot aSh al aHoth oqol haopnim lemtm oqol reS gdol : oroH nSatni otqHni oalk mr bHmt roHi oid ihoh eli Hcqh : oaboa al hgolh tl abib hiSbim al nhr kbr oaSr hmh ioSbim Sm oaSb Sm Sbet imim mSmim btokm : oihi mqzh Sbet imim oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm zph nttik lbit iSral oSmet mpi dbr ohchrt aotm mmni : bamri lrSe mot tmot ola hchrto ola dbrt lhchir rSe mdrko hrSeh lHito hoa rSe beono imot odmo midk abqS : oath ki hchrt rSe ola Sb mrSeo omdrko hrSeh hoa beono imot oath at npSk hzlt : obSob zdiq mzdqo oeSh eol ontti mkSol lpnio hoa imot ki la hchrto bHTato imot ola tckrn zdqto aSr eSh odmo midk abqS : oath ki hchrto zdiq lblti HTa zdiq ohoa la HTa Hio iHih ki nchr oath at npSk hzlt : othi eli Sm id ihoh oiamr ali qom za al hbqeh oSm adbr aotk : oaqom oaza al hbqeh ohnh Sm kbod ihoh emd kkbod aSr raiti el nhr kbr oapl el pni : otba bi roH otemdni el rgli oidbr ati oiamr ali ba hsgr btok bitk : oath bn adm hnh ntno elik ebotim oasrok bhm ola tza btokm : olSonk adbiq al Hkk onalmt ola thih lhm laiS mokiH ki bit mri hmh : obdbri aotk aptH at pik oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh hSme iSme ohHdl iHdl ki bit mri hmh :

4

oath bn adm qH lk lbnh ontth aoth lpnik oHqot elih eir at iroSlm : ontth elih mzor obnit elih diq oSpkt elih sllh ontth elih mHnot oSim elih krim sbib : oath qH lk mHbt brcl ontth aoth qir brcl bink obin heir ohkinth at pnik alih ohith bmzor ozrt elih aot hia lbit iSral : oath Skb el zdk hSmali oSmt at eon bit iSral elio mspr himim aSr tSkb elio tSa at eonm : oani ntti lk at Sni eonm lmspr imim SlS maot otSeim iom onSat eon bit iSral : oklit at alh oSkbt el zdk himoni Snit onSat at eon bit ihodh arbeim iom iom lSnh iom lSnh nttio lk : oal mzor iroSlm tkin pnik ocrek HSoph onbat elih : ohnh ntti elik ebotim ola thpk mzdk al zdk ed klotk imi mzork : oath qH lk HTin oSerim opol oedSim odHn oksmim ontth aotm bkli aHd oeSit aotm lk llHm mspr himim aSr ath Sokb el zdk SlS maot otSeim iom taklno : omaklk aSr taklno bmSqol eSrim Sql liom met ed et taklno : omim bmSorh tSth SSit hhin met ed et tSth : oegt Serim taklnh ohia bglli zat hadm tegnh leinihm : oiamr ihoh kkh iaklo bni iSral at lHmm Tma bgoim aSr adiHm Sm : oamr ahh adni ihoh hnh npSi la mTmah onblh oTrph la aklti mneori oed eth ola ba bpi bSr pgol : oiamr ali rah ntti lk at zpoei hbqr tHt glli hadm oeSit at lHmk elihm : oiamr ali bn adm hnni Sbr mTh lHm biroSlm oaklo lHm bmSql obdagh omim bmSorh obSmmon iSto : lmen iHsro lHm omim onSmo aiS oaHio onmqo beonm :

5

oath bn adm qH lk Hrb Hdh ter hglbim tqHnh lk ohebrt el raSk oel cqnk olqHt lk macni mSql oHlqtm : SlSit baor tbeir btok heir kmlat imi hmzor olqHt at hSlSit tkh bHrb sbibotih ohSlSit tcrh lroH oHrb ariq aHrihm : olqHt mSm meT bmspr ozrt aotm bknpik : omhm eod tqH ohSlkt aotm al tok haS oSrpt atm baS mmno tza aS al kl bit iSral : kh amr adni ihoh cat iroSlm btok hgoim Smtih osbibotih arzot : otmr at mSpTi lrSeh mn hgoim oat Hqoti mn harzot aSr sbibotih ki bmSpTi maso oHqoti la hlko bhm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien hmnkm mn hgoim aSr sbibotikm bHqoti la hlktm oat mSpTi la eSitm okmSpTi hgoim aSr sbibotikm la eSitm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik gm ani oeSiti btokk mSpTim leini hgoim : oeSiti bk at aSr la eSiti oat aSr la aeSh kmho eod ien kl toebtik : lkn abot iaklo bnim btokk obnim iaklo abotm oeSiti bk SpTim ocriti at kl Saritk lkl roH : lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la ien at mqdSi Tmat bkl Sqozik obkl toebtik ogm ani agre ola tHos eini ogm ani la aHmol : SlStik bdbr imoto obreb iklo btokk ohSlSit bHrb iplo sbibotik ohSliSit lkl roH acrh oHrb ariq aHrihm : oklh api ohnHoti Hmti bm ohnHmti oideo ki ani ihoh dbrti bqnati bkloti Hmti bm : oatnk lHrbh olHrph bgoim aSr sbibotik leini kl eobr : ohith Hrph ogdoph mosr omSmh lgoim aSr sbibotik beSoti bk SpTim bap obHmh obtkHot Hmh ani ihoh dbrti : bSlHi at Hzi hreb hreim bhm aSr hio lmSHit aSr aSlH aotm lSHtkm oreb asp elikm oSbrti lkm mTh lHm : oSlHti elikm reb oHih reh oSklk odbr odm iebr bk oHrb abia elik ani ihoh dbrti :

6

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik al hri iSral ohnba alihm : oamrt hri iSral Smeo dbr adni ihoh kh amr adni ihoh lhrim olgbeot lapiqim olgait hnni ani mbia elikm Hrb oabdti bmotikm : onSmo mcbHotikm onSbro Hmnikm ohplti Hllikm lpni glolikm : ontti at pgri bni iSral lpni glolihm ocriti at ezmotikm sbibot mcbHotikm : bkl moSbotikm herim tHrbnh ohbmot tiSmnh lmen iHrbo oiaSmo mcbHotikm onSbro onSbto glolikm ongdeo Hmnikm onmHo meSikm : onpl Hll btokkm oidetm ki ani ihoh : ohotrti bhiot lkm pliTi Hrb bgoim bhcrotikm barzot : ockro pliTikm aoti bgoim aSr nSbo Sm aSr nSbrti at lbm hconh aSr sr meli oat einihm hcnot aHri glolihm onqTo bpnihm al hreot aSr eSo lkl toebtihm : oideo ki ani ihoh la al Hnm dbrti leSot lhm hreh hcat : kh amr adni ihoh hkh bkpk orqe brglk oamr aH al kl toebot reot bit iSral aSr bHrb breb obdbr iplo : hrHoq bdbr imot ohqrob bHrb ipol ohnSar ohnzor breb imot okliti Hmti bm : oidetm ki ani ihoh bhiot Hllihm btok glolihm sbibot mcbHotihm al kl gbeh rmh bkl raSi hhrim otHt kl ez renn otHt kl alh ebth mqom aSr ntno Sm riH niHH lkl glolihm : onTiti at idi elihm ontti at harz Smmh omSmh mmdbr dblth bkl moSbotihm oideo ki ani ihoh :

7

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : oath bn adm kh amr adni ihoh ladmt iSral qz ba hqz el arbet knpot harz : eth hqz elik oSlHti api bk oSpTtik kdrkik ontti elik at kl toebtik : ola tHos eini elik ola aHmol ki drkik elik atn otoebotik btokk thiin oidetm ki ani ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh reh aHt reh hnh bah : qz ba ba hqz hqiz alik hnh bah : bah hzpirh alik ioSb harz ba het qrob hiom mhomh ola hd hrim : eth mqrob aSpok Hmti elik okliti api bk oSpTtik kdrkik ontti elik at kl toebotik : ola tHos eini ola aHmol kdrkik elik atn otoebotik btokk thiin oidetm ki ani ihoh mkh : hnh hiom hnh bah izah hzprh zz hmTh prH hcdon : hHms qm lmTh rSe la mhm ola mhmonm ola mhmhm ola nh bhm : ba het hgie hiom hqonh al iSmH ohmokr al itabl ki Hron al kl hmonh : ki hmokr al hmmkr la iSob oeod bHiim Hitm ki Hcon al kl hmonh la iSob oaiS beono Hito la itHcqo : tqeo btqoe ohkin hkl oain hlk lmlHmh ki Hroni al kl hmonh : hHrb bHoz ohdbr ohreb mbit aSr bSdh bHrb imot oaSr beir reb odbr iaklno : oplTo pliTihm ohio al hhrim kioni hgaiot klm hmot aiS beono : kl hidim trpinh okl brkim tlknh mim : oHgro Sqim oksth aotm plzot oal kl pnim boSh obkl raSihm qrHh : kspm bHozot iSliko ochbm lndh ihih kspm ochbm la iokl lhzilm biom ebrt ihoh npSm la iSbeo omeihm la imlao ki mkSol eonm hih : ozbi edio lgaon Smho ozlmi toebtm Sqozihm eSo bo el kn nttio lhm lndh : onttio bid hcrim lbc olrSei harz lSll oHllh : ohsboti pni mhm oHllo at zponi obao bh prizim oHlloh : eSh hrtoq ki harz mlah mSpT dmim oheir mlah Hms : ohbati rei goim oirSo at btihm ohSbti gaon ecim onHlo mqdSihm : qpdh ba obqSo Slom oain : hoh el hoh tboa oSmeh al Smoeh thih obqSo Hcon mnbia otorh tabd mkhn oezh mcqnim : hmlk itabl onSia ilbS Smmh oidi em harz tbhlnh mdrkm aeSh aotm obmSpTihm aSpTm oideo ki ani ihoh :

8

oihi bSnh hSSit bSSi bHmSh lHdS ani ioSb bbiti ocqni ihodh ioSbim lpni otpl eli Sm id adni ihoh : oarah ohnh dmot kmrah aS mmrah mtnio olmTh aS ommtnio olmelh kmrah chr kein hHSmlh : oiSlH tbnit id oiqHni bzizt raSi otSa ati roH bin harz obin hSmim otba ati iroSlmh bmraot alhim al ptH Ser hpnimit hponh zponh aSr Sm moSb sml hqnah hmqnh : ohnh Sm kbod alhi iSral kmrah aSr raiti bbqeh : oiamr ali bn adm Sa na einik drk zponh oaSa eini drk zponh ohnh mzpon lSer hmcbH sml hqnah hch bbah : oiamr ali bn adm hrah ath mhm eSim toebot gdlot aSr bit iSral eSim ph lrHqh mel mqdSi oeod tSob trah toebot gdlot : oiba ati al ptH hHzr oarah ohnh Hr aHd bqir : oiamr ali bn adm Htr na bqir oaHtr bqir ohnh ptH aHd : oiamr ali ba orah at htoebot hreot aSr hm eSim ph : oaboa oarah ohnh kl tbnit rmS obhmh Sqz okl gloli bit iSral mHqh el hqir sbib sbib : oSbeim aiS mcqni bit iSral oiacniho bn Spn emd btokm emdim lpnihm oaiS mqTrto bido oetr enn hqTrt elh : oiamr ali hrait bn adm aSr cqni bit iSral eSim bHSk aiS bHdri mSkito ki amrim ain ihoh rah atno ecb ihoh at harz : oiamr ali eod tSob trah toebot gdlot aSr hmh eSim : oiba ati al ptH Ser bit ihoh aSr al hzponh ohnh Sm hnSim iSbot mbkot at htmoc : oiamr ali hrait bn adm eod tSob trah toebot gdlot malh : oiba ati al Hzr bit ihoh hpnimit ohnh ptH hikl ihoh bin haolm obin hmcbH keSrim oHmSh aiS aHrihm al hikl ihoh opnihm qdmh ohmh mStHoitm qdmh lSmS : oiamr ali hrait bn adm hnql lbit ihodh meSot at htoebot aSr eSo ph ki mlao at harz Hms oiSbo lhkeisni ohnm SlHim at hcmorh al apm : ogm ani aeSh bHmh la tHos eini ola aHml oqrao bacni qol gdol ola aSme aotm :

9
