oiqra bacni qol gdol lamr qrbo pqdot heir oaiS kli mSHto bido : ohnh SSh anSim baim mdrk Ser helion aSr mpnh zponh oaiS kli mpzo bido oaiS aHd btokm lbS bdim oqst hspr bmtnio oibao oiemdo azl mcbH hnHSt : okbod alhi iSral nelh mel hkrob aSr hih elio al mptn hbit oiqra al haiS hlbS hbdim aSr qst hspr bmtnio : oiamr ihoh alo ebr btok heir btok iroSlm ohtoit to el mzHot hanSim hnanHim ohnanqim el kl htoebot hneSot btokh : olalh amr bacni ebro beir aHrio ohko el tHs einikm oal tHmlo : cqn bHor obtolh oTp onSim thrgo lmSHit oel kl aiS aSr elio hto al tgSo ommqdSi tHlo oiHlo banSim hcqnim aSr lpni hbit : oiamr alihm Tmao at hbit omlao at hHzrot Hllim zao oizao ohko beir : oihi khkotm onaSar ani oaplh el pni oaceq oamr ahh adni ihoh hmSHit ath at kl Sarit iSral bSpkk at Hmtk el iroSlm : oiamr ali eon bit iSral oihodh gdol bmad mad otmla harz dmim oheir mlah mTh ki amro ecb ihoh at harz oain ihoh rah : ogm ani la tHos eini ola aHml drkm braSm ntti : ohnh haiS lbS hbdim aSr hqst bmtnio mSib dbr lamr eSiti kaSr zoitni :

10

oarah ohnh al hrqie aSr el raS hkrbim kabn spir kmrah dmot ksa nrah elihm : oiamr al haiS lbS hbdim oiamr ba al binot lglgl al tHt lkrob omla Hpnik gHli aS mbinot lkrbim ocrq el heir oiba leini : ohkrbim emdim mimin lbit bbao haiS ohenn mla at hHzr hpnimit : oirm kbod ihoh mel hkrob el mptn hbit oimla hbit at henn ohHzr mlah at ngh kbod ihoh : oqol knpi hkrobim nSme ed hHzr hHiznh kqol al Sdi bdbro : oihi bzoto at haiS lbS hbdim lamr qH aS mbinot lglgl mbinot lkrobim oiba oiemd azl haopn : oiSlH hkrob at ido mbinot lkrobim al haS aSr binot hkrbim oiSa oitn al Hpni lbS hbdim oiqH oiza : oira lkrbim tbnit id adm tHt knpihm : oarah ohnh arbeh aopnim azl hkrobim aopn aHd azl hkrob aHd oaopn aHd azl hkrob aHd omrah haopnim kein abn trSiS : omraihm dmot aHd larbetm kaSr ihih haopn btok haopn : blktm al arbet rbeihm ilko la isbo blktm ki hmqom aSr ipnh hraS aHrio ilko la isbo blktm : okl bSrm ogbhm oidihm oknpihm ohaopnim mlaim einim sbib larbetm aopnihm : laopnim lhm qora hglgl bacni : oarbeh pnim laHd pni haHd pni hkrob opni hSni pni adm ohSliSi pni arih ohrbiei pni nSr : oirmo hkrobim hia hHih aSr raiti bnhr kbr : oblkt hkrobim ilko haopnim azlm obSat hkrobim at knpihm lrom mel harz la isbo haopnim gm hm mazlm : bemdm iemdo obromm iromo aotm ki roH hHih bhm : oiza kbod ihoh mel mptn hbit oiemd el hkrobim : oiSao hkrobim at knpihm oiromo mn harz leini bzatm ohaopnim lemtm oiemd ptH Ser bit ihoh hqdmoni okbod alhi iSral elihm mlmelh : hia hHih aSr raiti tHt alhi iSral bnhr kbr oade ki krobim hmh : arbeh arbeh pnim laHd oarbe knpim laHd odmot idi adm tHt knpihm : odmot pnihm hmh hpnim aSr raiti el nhr kbr mraihm oaotm aiS al ebr pnio ilko :

11

otSa ati roH otba ati al Ser bit ihoh hqdmoni hponh qdimh ohnh bptH hSer eSrim oHmSh aiS oarah btokm at iacnih bn ecr oat plTiho bn bniho Sri hem : oiamr ali bn adm alh hanSim hHSbim aon ohiezim ezt re beir hcat : hamrim la bqrob bnot btim hia hsir oanHno hbSr : lkn hnba elihm hnba bn adm : otpl eli roH ihoh oiamr ali amr kh amr ihoh kn amrtm bit iSral omelot roHkm ani idetih : hrbitm Hllikm beir hcat omlatm Hoztih Hll : lkn kh amr adni ihoh Hllikm aSr Smtm btokh hmh hbSr ohia hsir oatkm hozia mtokh : Hrb iratm oHrb abia elikm nam adni ihoh : ohozati atkm mtokh ontti atkm bid crim oeSiti bkm SpTim : bHrb tplo el gbol iSral aSpoT atkm oidetm ki ani ihoh : hia la thih lkm lsir oatm thio btokh lbSr al gbol iSral aSpT atkm : oidetm ki ani ihoh aSr bHqi la hlktm omSpTi la eSitm okmSpTi hgoim aSr sbibotikm eSitm : oihi khnbai oplTiho bn bnih mt oapl el pni oaceq qol gdol oamr ahh adni ihoh klh ath eSh at Sarit iSral : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm aHik aHik anSi galtk okl bit iSral klh aSr amro lhm iSbi iroSlm rHqo mel ihoh lno hia ntnh harz lmorSh : lkn amr kh amr adni ihoh ki hrHqtim bgoim oki hpizotim barzot oahi lhm lmqdS meT barzot aSr bao Sm : lkn amr kh amr adni ihoh oqbzti atkm mn hemim oaspti atkm mn harzot aSr npzotm bhm ontti lkm at admt iSral : obao Smh ohsiro at kl Sqozih oat kl toebtih mmnh : onnti lhm lb aHd oroH HdSh atn bqrbkm ohsrti lb habn mbSrm ontti lhm lb bSr : lmen bHqti ilko oat mSpTi iSmro oeSo atm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim : oal lb Sqozihm otoebotihm lbm hlk drkm braSm ntti nam adni ihoh : oiSao hkrobim at knpihm ohaopnim lemtm okbod alhi iSral elihm mlmelh : oiel kbod ihoh mel tok heir oiemd el hhr aSr mqdm leir : oroH nSatni otbani kSdimh al hgolh bmrah broH alhim oiel meli hmrah aSr raiti : oadbr al hgolh at kl dbri ihoh aSr hrani :

12

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm btok bit hmri ath iSb aSr einim lhm lraot ola rao acnim lhm lSme ola Smeo ki bit mri hm : oath bn adm eSh lk kli golh oglh iomm leinihm oglit mmqomk al mqom aHr leinihm aoli irao ki bit mri hmh : ohozat klik kkli golh iomm leinihm oath tza berb leinihm kmozai golh : leinihm Htr lk bqir ohozat bo : leinihm el ktp tSa belTh tozia pnik tksh ola trah at harz ki mopt nttik lbit iSral : oaeS kn kaSr zoiti kli hozati kkli golh iomm oberb Htrti li bqir bid belTh hozati el ktp nSati leinihm : oihi dbr ihoh ali bbqr lamr : bn adm hla amro alik bit iSral bit hmri mh ath eSh : amr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnSia hmSa hch biroSlm okl bit iSral aSr hmh btokm : amr ani moptkm kaSr eSiti kn ieSh lhm bgolh bSbi ilko : ohnSia aSr btokm al ktp iSa belTh oiza bqir iHtro lhozia bo pnio iksh ien aSr la irah lein hoa at harz : oprSti at rSti elio ontpS bmzodti ohbati ato bblh arz kSdim oaoth la irah oSm imot : okl aSr sbibtio ecrh okl agpio acrh lkl roH oHrb ariq aHrihm : oideo ki ani ihoh bhpizi aotm bgoim ocriti aotm barzot : ohotrti mhm anSi mspr mHrb mreb omdbr lmen ispro at kl toebotihm bgoim aSr bao Sm oideo ki ani ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm lHmk breS takl omimik brgch obdagh tSth : oamrt al em harz kh amr adni ihoh lioSbi iroSlm al admt iSral lHmm bdagh iaklo omimihm bSmmon iSto lmen tSm arzh mmlah mHms kl hiSbim bh : oherim hnoSbot tHrbnh oharz Smmh thih oidetm ki ani ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm mh hmSl hch lkm el admt iSral lamr iarko himim oabd kl Hcon : lkn amr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hSbti at hmSl hch ola imSlo ato eod biSral ki am dbr alihm qrbo himim odbr kl Hcon : ki la ihih eod kl Hcon Soa omqsm Hlq btok bit iSral : ki ani ihoh adbr at aSr adbr dbr oieSh la tmSk eod ki bimikm bit hmri adbr dbr oeSitio nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnh bit iSral amrim hHcon aSr hoa Hch limim rbim oletim rHoqot hoa nba : lkn amr alihm kh amr adni ihoh la tmSk eod kl dbri aSr adbr dbr oieSh nam adni ihoh :

13

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnba al nbiai iSral hnbaim oamrt lnbiai mlbm Smeo dbr ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh hoi el hnbiaim hnblim aSr hlkim aHr roHm olblti rao : kSelim bHrbot nbiaik iSral hio : la elitm bprzot otgdro gdr el bit iSral lemd bmlHmh biom ihoh : Hco Soa oqsm kcb hamrim nam ihoh oihoh la SlHm oiHlo lqim dbr : hloa mHch Soa Hcitm omqsm kcb amrtm oamrim nam ihoh oani la dbrti : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien dbrkm Soa oHcitm kcb lkn hnni alikm nam adni ihoh : ohith idi al hnbiaim hHcim Soa ohqsmim kcb bsod emi la ihio obktb bit iSral la iktbo oal admt iSral la ibao oidetm ki ani adni ihoh : ien obien hTeo at emi lamr Slom oain Slom ohoa bnh Hiz ohnm THim ato tpl : amr al THi tpl oipl hih gSm SoTp oatnh abni algbiS tplnh oroH serot tbqe : ohnh npl hqir hloa iamr alikm aih hTiH aSr THtm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh obqeti roH serot bHmti ogSm STp bapi ihih oabni algbiS bHmh lklh : ohrsti at hqir aSr THtm tpl ohgetiho al harz onglh isdo onplh oklitm btokh oidetm ki ani ihoh : okliti at Hmti bqir obTHim ato tpl oamr lkm ain hqir oain hTHim ato : nbiai iSral hnbaim al iroSlm ohHcim lh Hcon Slm oain Slm nam adni ihoh : oath bn adm Sim pnik al bnot emk hmtnbaot mlbhn ohnba elihn : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hoi lmtprot kstot el kl azili idi oeSot hmspHot el raS kl qomh lzodd npSot hnpSot tzoddnh lemi onpSot lknh tHiinh : otHllnh ati al emi bSeli Serim obptoti lHm lhmit npSot aSr la tmotnh olHiot npSot aSr la tHiinh bkcbkm lemi Smei kcb : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni al kstotiknh aSr atnh mzddot Sm at hnpSot lprHot oqreti atm mel croetikm oSlHti at hnpSot aSr atm mzddot at npSim lprHt : oqreti at mspHtikm ohzlti at emi midkn ola ihio eod bidkn lmzodh oidetn ki ani ihoh : ien hkaot lb zdiq Sqr oani la hkabtio olHcq idi rSe lblti Sob mdrko hre lhHito : lkn Soa la tHcinh oqsm la tqsmnh eod ohzlti at emi midkn oidetn ki ani ihoh :

14

oiboa ali anSim mcqni iSral oiSbo lpni : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hanSim halh helo glolihm el lbm omkSol eonm ntno nkH pnihm hadrS adrS lhm : lkn dbr aotm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh aiS aiS mbit iSral aSr ielh at glolio al lbo omkSol eono iSim nkH pnio oba al hnbia ani ihoh neniti lo bh brb glolio : lmen tpS at bit iSral blbm aSr ncro meli bglolihm klm : lkn amr al bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh Sobo ohSibo mel glolikm omel kl toebtikm hSibo pnikm : ki aiS aiS mbit iSral omhgr aSr igor biSral oincr maHri oiel glolio al lbo omkSol eono iSim nkH pnio oba al hnbia ldrS lo bi ani ihoh nenh lo bi : ontti pni baiS hhoa ohSmtiho laot olmSlim ohkrtio mtok emi oidetm ki ani ihoh : ohnbia ki ipth odbr dbr ani ihoh ptiti at hnbia hhoa onTiti at idi elio ohSmdtio mtok emi iSral : onSao eonm keon hdrS keon hnbia ihih : lmen la iteo eod bit iSral maHri ola iTmao eod bkl pSeihm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm arz ki tHTa li lmel mel onTiti idi elih oSbrti lh mTh lHm ohSlHti bh reb ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh : ohio SlSt hanSim halh btokh nH dnal oaiob hmh bzdqtm inzlo npSm nam adni ihoh : lo Hih reh aebir barz oSklth ohith Smmh mbli eobr mpni hHih : SlSt hanSim halh btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh am bnim oam bnot izilo hmh lbdm inzlo oharz thih Smmh : ao Hrb abia el harz hhia oamrti Hrb tebr barz ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh : oSlSt hanSim halh btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh la izilo bnim obnot ki hm lbdm inzlo : ao dbr aSlH al harz hhia oSpkti Hmti elih bdm lhkrit mmnh adm obhmh : onH dnal oaiob btokh Hi ani nam adni ihoh am bn am bt izilo hmh bzdqtm izilo npSm : ki kh amr adni ihoh ap ki arbet SpTi hreim Hrb oreb oHih reh odbr SlHti al iroSlm lhkrit mmnh adm obhmh : ohnh notrh bh plTh hmozaim bnim obnot hnm iozaim alikm oraitm at drkm oat elilotm onHmtm el hreh aSr hbati el iroSlm at kl aSr hbati elih : onHmo atkm ki trao at drkm oat elilotm oidetm ki la Hnm eSiti at kl aSr eSiti bh nam adni ihoh :

15

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm mh ihih ez hgpn mkl ez hcmorh aSr hih bezi hier : hiqH mmno ez leSot lmlakh am iqHo mmno itd ltlot elio kl kli : hnh laS ntn laklh at Sni qzotio aklh haS otoko nHr hizlH lmlakh : hnh bhioto tmim la ieSh lmlakh ap ki aS akltho oiHr oneSh eod lmlakh : lkn kh amr adni ihoh kaSr ez hgpn bez hier aSr nttio laS laklh kn ntti at iSbi iroSlm : ontti at pni bhm mhaS izao ohaS taklm oidetm ki ani ihoh bSomi at pni bhm : ontti at harz Smmh ien melo mel nam adni ihoh :

16

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hode at iroSlm at toebtih : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh liroSlm mkrtik omldtik marz hkneni abik hamri oamk Htit : omoldotik biom holdt atk la krt Srk obmim la rHzt lmSei ohmlH la hmlHt ohHtl la Htlt : la Hsh elik ein leSot lk aHt malh lHmlh elik otSlki al pni hSdh bgel npSk biom hldt atk : oaebr elik oarak mtbosst bdmik oamr lk bdmik Hii oamr lk bdmik Hii : rbbh kzmH hSdh nttik otrbi otgdli otbai bedi ediim Sdim nkno oSerk zmH oat erm oerih : oaebr elik oarak ohnh etk et ddim oaprS knpi elik oaksh erotk oaSbe lk oaboa bbrit atk nam adni ihoh othii li : oarHzk bmim oaSTp dmik melik oaskk bSmn : oalbiSk rqmh oanelk tHS oaHbSk bSS oaksk mSi : oaedk edi oatnh zmidim el idik orbid el gronk : oatn ncm el apk oegilim el acnik oeTrt tpart braSk : otedi chb oksp omlboSk SSi omSi orqmh slt odbS oSmn aklti otipi bmad mad otzlHi lmlokh : oiza lk Sm bgoim bipik ki klil hoa bhdri aSr Smti elik nam adni ihoh : otbTHi bipik otcni el Smk otSpki at tcnotik el kl eobr lo ihi : otqHi mbgdik oteSi lk bmot Tlaot otcni elihm la baot ola ihih : otqHi kli tpartk mchbi omkspi aSr ntti lk oteSi lk zlmi ckr otcni bm : otqHi at bgdi rqmtk otksim oSmni oqTrti ntti lpnihm : olHmi aSr ntti lk slt oSmn odbS hakltik onttiho lpnihm lriH niHH oihi nam adni ihoh : otqHi at bnik oat bnotik aSr ildt li otcbHim lhm lakol hmeT mtcntk : otSHTi at bni ottnim bhebir aotm lhm : oat kl toebtik otcntik la ckrti at imi neorik bhiotk erm oerih mtbosst bdmk hiit : oihi aHri kl retk aoi aoi lk nam adni ihoh : otbni lk gb oteSi lk rmh bkl rHob : al kl raS drk bnit rmtk ottebi at ipik otpSqi at rglik lkl eobr otrbi at tcntk : otcni al bni mzrim Sknik gdli bSr otrbi at tcntk lhkeisni : ohnh nTiti idi elik oagre Hqk oatnk bnpS Snaotik bnot plStim hnklmot mdrkk cmh : otcni al bni aSor mblti Sbetk otcnim ogm la Sbet : otrbi at tcnotk al arz knen kSdimh ogm bcat la Sbet : mh amlh lbtk nam adni ihoh beSotk at kl alh meSh aSh conh SlTt : bbnotik gbk braS kl drk ormtk eSiti bkl rHob ola hiiti kconh lqls atnn : haSh hmnapt tHt aiSh tqH at crim : lkl cnot itno ndh oat ntt at ndnik lkl mahbik otSHdi aotm lboa alik msbib btcnotik : oihi bk hpk mn hnSim btcnotik oaHrik la conh obttk atnn oatnn la ntn lk othi lhpk : lkn conh Smei dbr ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh ien hSpk nHStk otglh erotk btcnotik el mahbik oel kl gloli toebotik okdmi bnik aSr ntt lhm : lkn hnni mqbz at kl mahbik aSr erbt elihm oat kl aSr ahbt el kl aSr Snat oqbzti atm elik msbib ogliti erotk alhm orao at kl erotk : oSpTtik mSpTi napot oSpkt dm onttik dm Hmh oqnah : ontti aotk bidm ohrso gbk ontzo rmtik ohpSiTo aotk bgdik olqHo kli tpartk ohniHok eirm oerih : ohelo elik qhl orgmo aotk babn obtqok bHrbotm : oSrpo btik baS oeSo bk SpTim leini nSim rbot ohSbtik mconh ogm atnn la ttni eod : ohnHti Hmti bk osrh qnati mmk oSqTti ola akes eod : ien aSr la ckrti at imi neorik otrgci li bkl alh ogm ani ha drkk braS ntti nam adni ihoh ola eSiti at hcmh el kl toebtik : hnh kl hmSl elik imSl lamr kamh bth : bt amk at gelt aiSh obnih oaHot aHotk at aSr gelo anSihn obnihn amkn Htit oabikn amri : oaHotk hgdolh Smron hia obnotih hioSbt el Smaolk oaHotk hqTnh mmk hioSbt mimink sdm obnotih : ola bdrkihn hlkt obtoebotihn eSiti kmeT qT otSHti mhn bkl drkik : Hi ani nam adni ihoh am eSth sdm aHotk hia obnotih kaSr eSit at obnotik : hnh ch hih eon sdm aHotk gaon Sbet lHm oSlot hSqT hih lh olbnotih oid eni oabion la hHciqh : otgbhinh oteSinh toebh lpni oasir athn kaSr raiti : oSmron kHzi HTatik la HTah otrbi at toebotik mhnh otzdqi at aHotk bkl toebtik aSr eSiti : gm at Sai klmtk aSr pllt laHotk bHTatik aSr htebt mhn tzdqnh mmk ogm at boSi oSai klmtk bzdqtk aHiotk : oSbti at Sbothn at Sbit sdm obnotih oat Sbit Smron obnotih oSbit Sbitik btokhnh : lmen tSai klmtk onklmt mkl aSr eSit bnHmk atn : oaHotik sdm obnotih tSbn lqdmtn oSmron obnotih tSbn lqdmtn oat obnotik tSbinh lqdmtkn : oloa hith sdm aHotk lSmoeh bpik biom gaonik : bTrm tglh retk kmo et Hrpt bnot arm okl sbibotih bnot plStim hSaTot aotk msbib : at cmtk oat toebotik at nSatim nam ihoh : ki kh amr adni ihoh oeSit aotk kaSr eSit aSr bcit alh lhpr brit : ockrti ani at briti aotk bimi neorik ohqmoti lk brit eolm : ockrt at drkik onklmt bqHtk at aHotik hgdlot mmk al hqTnot mmk ontti athn lk lbnot ola mbritk : ohqimoti ani at briti atk oidet ki ani ihoh : lmen tckri obSt ola ihih lk eod ptHon ph mpni klmtk bkpri lk lkl aSr eSit nam adni ihoh :

17

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Hod Hidh omSl mSl al bit iSral : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnSr hgdol gdol hknpim ark habr mla hnozh aSr lo hrqmh ba al hlbnon oiqH at zmrt harc : at raS iniqotio qTp oibiaho al arz knen beir rklim Smo : oiqH mcre harz oitnho bSdh cre qH el mim rbim zpzph Smo : oizmH oihi lgpn srHt Splt qomh lpnot dliotio alio oSrSio tHtio ihio othi lgpn oteS bdim otSlH parot : oihi nSr aHd gdol gdol knpim orb nozh ohnh hgpn hcat kpnh SrSih elio odliotio SlHh lo lhSqot aoth mergot mTeh : al Sdh Tob al mim rbim hia Stolh leSot enp olSat pri lhiot lgpn adrt : amr kh amr adni ihoh tzlH hloa at SrSih intq oat prih iqoss oibS kl Trpi zmHh tibS ola bcre gdolh obem rb lmSaot aoth mSrSih : ohnh Stolh htzlH hloa kget bh roH hqdim tibS ibS el ergt zmHh tibS : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : amr na lbit hmri hla idetm mh alh amr hnh ba mlk bbl iroSlm oiqH at mlkh oat Srih oiba aotm alio bblh : oiqH mcre hmlokh oikrt ato brit oiba ato balh oat aili harz lqH : lhiot mmlkh Splh lblti htnSa lSmr at brito lemdh : oimrd bo lSlH mlakio mzrim ltt lo sosim oem rb hizlH himlT heSh alh ohpr brit onmlT : Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la bmqom hmlk hmmlik ato aSr bch at alto oaSr hpr at brito ato btok bbl imot : ola bHil gdol obqhl rb ieSh aoto preh bmlHmh bSpk sllh obbnot diq lhkrit npSot rbot : obch alh lhpr brit ohnh ntn ido okl alh eSh la imlT : lkn kh amr adni ihoh Hi ani am la alti aSr bch obriti aSr hpir onttio braSo : oprSti elio rSti ontpS bmzodti ohbiaotiho bblh onSpTti ato Sm melo aSr mel bi : oat kl mbrHo bkl agpio bHrb iplo ohnSarim lkl roH iprSo oidetm ki ani ihoh dbrti : kh amr adni ihoh olqHti ani mzmrt harc hrmh ontti mraS inqotio rk aqTp oStlti ani el hr gbh otlol : bhr mrom iSral aStlno onSa enp oeSh pri ohih larc adir oSkno tHtio kl zpor kl knp bzl dliotio tSknh : oideo kl ezi hSdh ki ani ihoh hSplti ez gbh hgbhti ez Spl hobSti ez lH ohprHti ez ibS ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti :

18

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : mh lkm atm mSlim at hmSl hch el admt iSral lamr abot iaklo bsr oSni hbnim tqhinh : Hi ani nam adni ihoh am ihih lkm eod mSl hmSl hch biSral : hn kl hnpSot li hnh knpS hab oknpS hbn li hnh hnpS hHTat hia tmot : oaiS ki ihih zdiq oeSh mSpT ozdqh : al hhrim la akl oeinio la nSa al gloli bit iSral oat aSt reho la Tma oal aSh ndh la iqrb : oaiS la ionh Hblto Hob iSib gclh la igcl lHmo lreb itn oeirm iksh bgd : bnSk la itn otrbit la iqH meol iSib ido mSpT amt ieSh bin aiS laiS : bHqoti ihlk omSpTi Smr leSot amt zdiq hoa Hih iHih nam adni ihoh : oholid bn priz Spk dm oeSh aH maHd malh : ohoa at kl alh la eSh ki gm al hhrim akl oat aSt reho Tma : eni oabion honh gclot gcl Hbl la iSib oal hglolim nSa einio toebh eSh : bnSk ntn otrbit lqH oHi la iHih at kl htoebot halh eSh mot iomt dmio bo ihih : ohnh holid bn oira at kl HTat abio aSr eSh oira ola ieSh khn : el hhrim la akl oeinio la nSa al gloli bit iSral at aSt reho la Tma : oaiS la honh Hbl la Hbl ogclh la gcl lHmo lreb ntn oerom ksh bgd : meni hSib ido nSk otrbit la lqH mSpTi eSh bHqoti hlk hoa la imot beon abio Hih iHih : abio ki eSq eSq gcl gcl aH oaSr la Tob eSh btok emio ohnh mt beono : oamrtm mde la nSa hbn beon hab ohbn mSpT ozdqh eSh at kl Hqoti Smr oieSh atm Hih iHih : hnpS hHTat hia tmot bn la iSa beon hab oab la iSa beon hbn zdqt hzdiq elio thih orSet rSe elio thih : ohrSe ki iSob mkl HTato aSr eSh oSmr at kl Hqoti oeSh mSpT ozdqh Hih iHih la imot : kl pSeio aSr eSh la ickro lo bzdqto aSr eSh iHih : hHpz aHpz mot rSe nam adni ihoh hloa bSobo mdrkio oHih : obSob zdiq mzdqto oeSh eol kkl htoebot aSr eSh hrSe ieSh oHi kl zdqto aSr eSh la tckrnh bmelo aSr mel obHTato aSr HTa bm imot : oamrtm la itkn drk adni Smeo na bit iSral hdrki la itkn hla drkikm la itkno : bSob zdiq mzdqto oeSh eol omt elihm beolo aSr eSh imot : obSob rSe mrSeto aSr eSh oieS mSpT ozdqh hoa at npSo iHih : oirah oiSob mkl pSeio aSr eSh Hio iHih la imot : oamro bit iSral la itkn drk adni hdrki la itkno bit iSral hla drkikm la itkn : lkn aiS kdrkio aSpT atkm bit iSral nam adni ihoh Sobo ohSibo mkl pSeikm ola ihih lkm lmkSol eon : hSliko melikm at kl pSeikm aSr pSetm bm oeSo lkm lb HdS oroH HdSh olmh tmto bit iSral : ki la aHpz bmot hmt nam adni ihoh ohSibo oHio :

19

oath Sa qinh al nSiai iSral : oamrt mh amk lbia bin ariot rbzh btok kprim rbth gorih : otel aHd mgrih kpir hih oilmd lTrp Trp adm akl : oiSmeo alio goim bSHtm ntpS oibaho bHHim al arz mzrim : otra ki noHlh abdh tqoth otqH aHd mgrih kpir Smtho : oithlk btok ariot kpir hih oilmd lTrp Trp adm akl : oide almnotio oerihm hHrib otSm arz omlah mqol Sagto : oitno elio goim sbib mmdinot oiprSo elio rStm bSHtm ntpS : oitnho bsogr bHHim oibaho al mlk bbl ibaho bmzdot lmen la iSme qolo eod al hri iSral : amk kgpn bdmk el mim Stolh prih oenph hith mmim rbim : oihio lh mTot ec al SbTi mSlim otgbh qomto el bin ebtim oira bgbho brb dlitio : ottS bHmh larz hSlkh oroH hqdim hobiS prih htprqo oibSo mTh ech aS akltho : oeth Stolh bmdbr barz zih ozma : otza aS mmTh bdih prih aklh ola hih bh mTh ec SbT lmSol qinh hia othi lqinh :

20

oihi bSnh hSbieit bHmSi beSor lHdS bao anSim mcqni iSral ldrS at ihoh oiSbo lpni : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm dbr at cqni iSral oamrt alhm kh amr adni ihoh hldrS ati atm baim Hi ani am adrS lkm nam adni ihoh : htSpT atm htSpoT bn adm at toebt abotm hodiem : oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh biom bHri biSral oaSa idi lcre bit ieqb oaode lhm barz mzrim oaSa idi lhm lamr ani ihoh alhikm : biom hhoa nSati idi lhm lhoziam marz mzrim al arz aSr trti lhm cbt Hlb odbS zbi hia lkl harzot : oamr alhm aiS Sqozi einio hSliko obgloli mzrim al tTmao ani ihoh alhikm : oimro bi ola abo lSme ali aiS at Sqozi einihm la hSliko oat gloli mzrim la ecbo oamr lSpk Hmti elihm lklot api bhm btok arz mzrim : oaeS lmen Smi lblti hHl leini hgoim aSr hmh btokm aSr nodeti alihm leinihm lhoziam marz mzrim : oaoziam marz mzrim oabam al hmdbr : oatn lhm at Hqoti oat mSpTi hodeti aotm aSr ieSh aotm hadm oHi bhm : ogm at Sbtoti ntti lhm lhiot laot bini obinihm ldet ki ani ihoh mqdSm : oimro bi bit iSral bmdbr bHqoti la hlko oat mSpTi maso aSr ieSh atm hadm oHi bhm oat Sbtti Hllo mad oamr lSpk Hmti elihm bmdbr lklotm : oaeSh lmen Smi lblti hHl leini hgoim aSr hozatim leinihm : ogm ani nSati idi lhm bmdbr lblti hbia aotm al harz aSr ntti cbt Hlb odbS zbi hia lkl harzot : ien bmSpTi maso oat Hqoti la hlko bhm oat Sbtoti Hllo ki aHri glolihm lbm hlk : otHs eini elihm mSHtm ola eSiti aotm klh bmdbr : oamr al bnihm bmdbr bHoqi abotikm al tlko oat mSpTihm al tSmro obglolihm al tTmao : ani ihoh alhikm bHqoti lko oat mSpTi Smro oeSo aotm : oat Sbtoti qdSo ohio laot bini obinikm ldet ki ani ihoh alhikm : oimro bi hbnim bHqoti la hlko oat mSpTi la Smro leSot aotm aSr ieSh aotm hadm oHi bhm at Sbtoti Hllo oamr lSpk Hmti elihm lklot api bm bmdbr : ohSbti at idi oaeS lmen Smi lblti hHl leini hgoim aSr hozati aotm leinihm : gm ani nSati at idi lhm bmdbr lhpiz atm bgoim olcrot aotm barzot : ien mSpTi la eSo oHqoti maso oat Sbtoti Hllo oaHri gloli abotm hio einihm : ogm ani ntti lhm Hqim la Tobim omSpTim la iHio bhm : oaTma aotm bmtnotm bhebir kl pTr rHm lmen aSmm lmen aSr ideo aSr ani ihoh : lkn dbr al bit iSral bn adm oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh eod cat gdpo aoti abotikm bmelm bi mel : oabiam al harz aSr nSati at idi ltt aoth lhm oirao kl gbeh rmh okl ez ebt oicbHo Sm at cbHihm oitno Sm kes qrbnm oiSimo Sm riH niHoHihm oisiko Sm at nskihm : oamr alhm mh hbmh aSr atm hbaim Sm oiqra Smh bmh ed hiom hch : lkn amr al bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh hbdrk abotikm atm nTmaim oaHri Sqozihm atm cnim : obSat mtntikm bhebir bnikm baS atm nTmaim lkl glolikm ed hiom oani adrS lkm bit iSral Hi ani nam adni ihoh am adrS lkm : ohelh el roHkm hio la thih aSr atm amrim nhih kgoim kmSpHot harzot lSrt ez oabn : Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la bid Hcqh obcroe nToih obHmh Spokh amlok elikm : ohozati atkm mn hemim oqbzti atkm mn harzot aSr npoztm bm bid Hcqh obcroe nToih obHmh Spokh : ohbati atkm al mdbr hemim onSpTti atkm Sm pnim al pnim : kaSr nSpTti at abotikm bmdbr arz mzrim kn aSpT atkm nam adni ihoh : ohebrti atkm tHt hSbT ohbati atkm bmsrt hbrit : obroti mkm hmrdim ohpoSeim bi marz mgorihm aozia aotm oal admt iSral la iboa oidetm ki ani ihoh : oatm bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh aiS glolio lko ebdo oaHr am ainkm Smeim ali oat Sm qdSi la tHllo eod bmtnotikm obglolikm : ki bhr qdSi bhr mrom iSral nam adni ihoh Sm iebdni kl bit iSral klh barz Sm arzm oSm adroS at tromtikm oat raSit mSaotikm bkl qdSikm : briH niHH arzh atkm bhoziai atkm mn hemim oqbzti atkm mn harzot aSr npztm bm onqdSti bkm leini hgoim : oidetm ki ani ihoh bhbiai atkm al admt iSral al harz aSr nSati at idi ltt aoth labotikm : ockrtm Sm at drkikm oat kl elilotikm aSr nTmatm bm onqTtm bpnikm bkl reotikm aSr eSitm : oidetm ki ani ihoh beSoti atkm lmen Smi la kdrkikm hreim okelilotikm hnSHtot bit iSral nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik drk timnh ohTp al drom ohnba al ier hSdh ngb : oamrt lier hngb Sme dbr ihoh kh amr adni ihoh hnni mzit bk aS oaklh bk kl ez lH okl ez ibS la tkbh lhbt Slhbt onzrbo bh kl pnim mngb zponh : orao kl bSr ki ani ihoh bertih la tkbh : oamr ahh adni ihoh hmh amrim li hla mmSl mSlim hoa :

21

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik al iroSlm ohTp al mqdSim ohnba al admt iSral : oamrt ladmt iSral kh amr ihoh hnni alik ohozati Hrbi mterh ohkrti mmk zdiq orSe : ien aSr hkrti mmk zdiq orSe lkn tza Hrbi mterh al kl bSr mngb zpon : oideo kl bSr ki ani ihoh hozati Hrbi mterh la tSob eod : oath bn adm hanH bSbron mtnim obmrirot tanH leinihm : ohih ki iamro alik el mh ath nanH oamrt al Smoeh ki bah onms kl lb orpo kl idim okhth kl roH okl brkim tlknh mim hnh bah onhith nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnba oamrt kh amr adni amr Hrb Hrb hoHdh ogm mroTh : lmen TbH TbH hoHdh lmen hih lh brq mrTh ao nSiS SbT bni mast kl ez : oitn ath lmrTh ltpS bkp hia hoHdh Hrb ohia mrTh ltt aoth bid horg : ceq ohill bn adm ki hia hith bemi hia bkl nSiai iSral mgori al Hrb hio at emi lkn spq al irk : ki bHn omh am gm SbT mast la ihih nam adni ihoh : oath bn adm hnba ohk kp al kp otkpl Hrb SliSth Hrb Hllim hia Hrb Hll hgdol hHdrt lhm : lmen lmog lb ohrbh hmkSlim el kl Serihm ntti abHt Hrb aH eSoih lbrq meTh lTbH : htaHdi himini hSimi hSmili anh pnik medot : ogm ani akh kpi al kpi ohniHti Hmti ani ihoh dbrti : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : oath bn adm Sim lk Snim drkim lboa Hrb mlk bbl marz aHd izao Snihm oid bra braS drk eir bra : drk tSim lboa Hrb at rbt bni emon oat ihodh biroSlm bzorh : ki emd mlk bbl al am hdrk braS Sni hdrkim lqsm qsm qlql bHzim Sal btrpim rah bkbd : bimino hih hqsm iroSlm lSom krim lptH ph brzH lhrim qol btroeh lSom krim el Serim lSpk sllh lbnot diq : ohih lhm kqsom Soa beinihm Sbei Sbeot lhm ohoa mckir eon lhtpS : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien hckrkm eonkm bhglot pSeikm lhraot HTaotikm bkl elilotikm ien hckrkm bkp ttpSo : oath Hll rSe nSia iSral aSr ba iomo bet eon qz : kh amr adni ihoh hsir hmznpt ohrim heTrh cat la cat hSplh hgbh ohgbh hSpil : eoh eoh eoh aSimnh gm cat la hih ed ba aSr lo hmSpT onttio : oath bn adm hnba oamrt kh amr adni ihoh al bni emon oal Hrptm oamrt Hrb Hrb ptoHh lTbH mroTh lhkil lmen brq : bHcot lk Soa bqsm lk kcb ltt aotk al zoari Hlli rSeim aSr ba iomm bet eon qz : hSb al terh bmqom aSr nbrat barz mkrotik aSpT atk : oSpkti elik cemi baS ebrti apiH elik onttik bid anSim berim HrSi mSHit : laS thih laklh dmk ihih btok harz la tckri ki ani ihoh dbrti :

22

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : oath bn adm htSpT htSpT at eir hdmim ohodeth at kl toebotih : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh eir Spkt dm btokh lboa eth oeSth glolim elih lTmah : bdmk aSr Spkt aSmt obglolik aSr eSit Tmat otqribi imik otboa ed Snotik el kn nttik Hrph lgoim oqlsh lkl harzot : hqrbot ohrHqot mmk itqlso bk Tmat hSm rbt hmhomh : hnh nSiai iSral aiS lcreo hio bk lmen Spk dm : ab oam hqlo bk lgr eSo beSq btokk itom oalmnh hono bk : qdSi bcit oat Sbtti Hllt : anSi rkil hio bk lmen Spk dm oal hhrim aklo bk cmh eSo btokk : erot ab glh bk Tmat hndh eno bk : oaiS at aSt reho eSh toebh oaiS at klto Tma bcmh oaiS at aHto bt abio enh bk : SHd lqHo bk lmen Spk dm nSk otrbit lqHt otbzei reik beSq oati SkHt nam adni ihoh : ohnh hkiti kpi al bzek aSr eSit oel dmk aSr hio btokk : hiemd lbk am tHcqnh idik limim aSr ani eSh aotk ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti : ohpizoti aotk bgoim ocritik barzot ohtmti Tmatk mmk : onHlt bk leini goim oidet ki ani ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hio li bit iSral lsog klm nHSt obdil obrcl oeoprt btok kor sgim ksp hio : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien hiot klkm lsgim lkn hnni qbz atkm al tok iroSlm : qbzt ksp onHSt obrcl oeoprt obdil al tok kor lpHt elio aS lhntik kn aqbz bapi obHmti ohnHti ohtkti atkm : oknsti atkm onpHti elikm baS ebrti ontktm btokh : khtok ksp btok kor kn ttko btokh oidetm ki ani ihoh Spkti Hmti elikm : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm amr lh at arz la mThrh hia la gSmh biom cem : qSr nbiaih btokh kari Soag Trp Trp npS aklo Hsn oiqr iqHo almnotih hrbo btokh : khnih Hmso torti oiHllo qdSi bin qdS lHl la hbdilo obin hTma lThor la hodieo omSbtoti helimo einihm oaHl btokm : Srih bqrbh kcabim Trpi Trp lSpk dm labd npSot lmen bze bze : onbiaih THo lhm tpl Hcim Soa oqsmim lhm kcb amrim kh amr adni ihoh oihoh la dbr : em harz eSqo eSq ogclo gcl oeni oabion hono oat hgr eSqo bla mSpT : oabqS mhm aiS gdr gdr oemd bprz lpni bed harz lblti SHth ola mzati : oaSpk elihm cemi baS ebrti klitim drkm braSm ntti nam adni ihoh :

23

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Stim nSim bnot am aHt hio : otcninh bmzrim bneorihn cno Smh meko Sdihn oSm eSo ddi btolihn : oSmotn ahlh hgdolh oahlibh aHoth othiinh li otldnh bnim obnot oSmotn Smron ahlh oiroSlm ahlibh : otcn ahlh tHti otegb el mahbih al aSor qrobim : lbSi tklt pHot osgnim bHori Hmd klm prSim rkbi sosim : ottn tcnotih elihm mbHr bni aSor klm obkl aSr egbh bkl glolihm nTmah : oat tcnotih mmzrim la ecbh ki aoth Skbo bneorih ohmh eSo ddi btolih oiSpko tcnotm elih : lkn nttih bid mahbih bid bni aSor aSr egbh elihm : hmh glo eroth bnih obnotih lqHo oaoth bHrb hrgo othi Sm lnSim oSpoTim eSo bh : otra aHoth ahlibh otSHt egbth mmnh oat tcnotih mcnoni aHoth : al bni aSor egbh pHot osgnim qrbim lbSi mklol prSim rkbi sosim bHori Hmd klm : oara ki nTmah drk aHd lStihn : otosp al tcnotih otra anSi mHqh el hqir zlmi kSdiim Hqqim bSSr : Hgori acor bmtnihm sroHi Tbolim braSihm mrah SliSim klm dmot bni bbl kSdim arz moldtm : otegb elihm lmrah einih otSlH mlakim alihm kSdimh : oibao alih bni bbl lmSkb ddim oiTmao aoth btcnotm otTma bm otqe npSh mhm : otgl tcnotih otgl at eroth otqe npSi melih kaSr nqeh npSi mel aHoth : otrbh at tcnotih lckr at imi neorih aSr cnth barz mzrim : otegbh el plgSihm aSr bSr Hmorim bSrm ocrmt sosim crmtm : otpqdi at cmt neorik beSot mmzrim ddik lmen Sdi neorik : lkn ahlibh kh amr adni ihoh hnni meir at mahbik elik at aSr nqeh npSk mhm ohbatim elik msbib : bni bbl okl kSdim pqod oSoe oqoe kl bni aSor aotm bHori Hmd pHot osgnim klm SlSim oqroaim rkbi sosim klm : obao elik hzn rkb oglgl obqhl emim znh omgn oqobe iSimo elik sbib ontti lpnihm mSpT oSpTok bmSpTihm : ontti qnati bk oeSo aotk bHmh apk oacnik isiro oaHritk bHrb tpol hmh bnik obnotik iqHo oaHritk takl baS : ohpSiTok at bgdik olqHo kli tpartk : ohSbti cmtk mmk oat cnotk marz mzrim ola tSai einik alihm omzrim la tckri eod : ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni ntnk bid aSr Snat bid aSr nqeh npSk mhm : oeSo aotk bSnah olqHo kl igiek oecbok eirm oerih onglh erot cnonik ocmtk otcnotik : eSh alh lk bcnotk aHri goim el aSr nTmat bglolihm : bdrk aHotk hlkt ontti kosh bidk : kh amr adni ihoh kos aHotk tSti hemqh ohrHbh thih lzHq olleg mrbh lhkil : Skron oigon tmlai kos Smh oSmmh kos aHotk Smron : oStit aoth omzit oat HrSih tgrmi oSdik tntqi ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien SkHt aoti otSliki aoti aHri gok ogm at Sai cmtk oat tcnotik : oiamr ihoh ali bn adm htSpoT at ahlh oat ahlibh ohgd lhn at toebotihn : ki napo odm bidihn oat glolihn napo ogm at bnihn aSr ildo li hebiro lhm laklh : eod cat eSo li Tmao at mqdSi biom hhoa oat Sbtoti Hllo : obSHTm at bnihm lglolihm oibao al mqdSi biom hhoa lHllo ohnh kh eSo btok biti : oap ki tSlHnh lanSim baim mmrHq aSr mlak SloH alihm ohnh bao laSr rHzt kHlt einik oedit edi : oiSbt el mTh kbodh oSlHn erok lpnih oqTrti oSmni Smt elih : oqol hmon Slo bh oal anSim mrb adm mobaim sobaim mmdbr oitno zmidim al idihn oeTrt tpart el raSihn : oamr lblh naopim et icnh tcnotih ohia : oiboa alih kboa al aSh conh kn bao al ahlh oal ahlibh aSt hcmh : oanSim zdiqm hmh iSpTo aothm mSpT napot omSpT Spkot dm ki napt hnh odm bidihn : ki kh amr adni ihoh helh elihm qhl ontn athn lceoh olbc : orgmo elihn abn qhl obra aothn bHrbotm bnihm obnotihm ihrgo obtihn baS iSrpo : ohSbti cmh mn harz onosro kl hnSim ola teSinh kcmtknh : ontno cmtknh elikn oHTai glolikn tSainh oidetm ki ani adni ihoh :

24

oihi dbr ihoh ali bSnh htSieit bHdS heSiri beSor lHdS lamr : bn adm ktob lk at Sm hiom at ezm hiom hch smk mlk bbl al iroSlm bezm hiom hch : omSl al bit hmri mSl oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh Spt hsir Spt ogm izq bo mim : asp ntHih alih kl ntH Tob irk oktp mbHr ezmim mla : mbHr hzan lqoH ogm dor hezmim tHtih rtH rtHih gm bSlo ezmih btokh : lkn kh amr adni ihoh aoi eir hdmim sir aSr Hlath bh oHlath la izah mmnh lntHih lntHih hoziah la npl elih gorl : ki dmh btokh hih el zHiH sle Smtho la Spktho el harz lksot elio epr : lhelot Hmh lnqm nqm ntti at dmh el zHiH sle lblti hksot : lkn kh amr adni ihoh aoi eir hdmim gm ani agdil hmdorh : hrbh hezim hdlq haS htm hbSr ohrqH hmrqHh ohezmot iHro : ohemidh el gHlih rqh lmen tHm oHrh nHSth ontkh btokh Tmath ttm Hlath : tanim hlat ola tza mmnh rbt Hlath baS Hlath : bTmatk cmh ien Thrtik ola Thrt mTmatk la tThri eod ed hniHi at Hmti bk : ani ihoh dbrti bah oeSiti la apre ola aHos ola anHm kdrkik okelilotik SpTok nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnni lqH mmk at mHmd einik bmgph ola tspd ola tbkh oloa tboa dmetk : hanq dm mtim abl la teSh park HboS elik onelik tSim brglik ola teTh el Spm olHm anSim la takl : oadbr al hem bbqr otmt aSti berb oaeS bbqr kaSr zoiti : oiamro ali hem hla tgid lno mh alh lno ki ath eSh : oamr alihm dbr ihoh hih ali lamr : amr lbit iSral kh amr adni ihoh hnni mHll at mqdSi gaon eckm mHmd einikm omHml npSkm obnikm obnotikm aSr ecbtm bHrb iplo : oeSitm kaSr eSiti el Spm la teTo olHm anSim la taklo : oparkm el raSikm onelikm brglikm la tspdo ola tbko onmqtm beontikm onhmtm aiS al aHio : ohih iHcqal lkm lmopt kkl aSr eSh teSo bbah oidetm ki ani adni ihoh : oath bn adm hloa biom qHti mhm at mecm mSoS tpartm at mHmd einihm oat mSa npSm bnihm obnotihm : biom hhoa iboa hpliT alik lhSmeot acnim : biom hhoa iptH pik at hpliT otdbr ola talm eod ohiit lhm lmopt oideo ki ani ihoh :

25

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik al bni emon ohnba elihm : oamrt lbni emon Smeo dbr adni ihoh kh amr adni ihoh ien amrk haH al mqdSi ki nHl oal admt iSral ki nSmh oal bit ihodh ki hlko bgolh : lkn hnni ntnk lbni qdm lmorSh oiSbo Tirotihm bk ontno bk mSknihm hmh iaklo prik ohmh iSto Hlbk : ontti at rbh lnoh gmlim oat bni emon lmrbz zan oidetm ki ani ihoh : ki kh amr adni ihoh ien mHak id orqek brgl otSmH bkl SaTk bnpS al admt iSral : lkn hnni nTiti at idi elik onttik lbg lgoim ohkrtik mn hemim ohabdtik mn harzot aSmidk oidet ki ani ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh ien amr moab oSeir hnh kkl hgoim bit ihodh : lkn hnni ptH at ktp moab mherim merio mqzho zbi arz bit hiSimt bel meon oqritmh : lbni qdm el bni emon onttih lmorSh lmen la tckr bni emon bgoim : obmoab aeSh SpTim oideo ki ani ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh ien eSot adom bnqm nqm lbit ihodh oiaSmo aSom onqmo bhm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh onTti idi el adom ohkrti mmnh adm obhmh onttih Hrbh mtimn oddnh bHrb iplo : ontti at nqmti badom bid emi iSral oeSo badom kapi okHmti oideo at nqmti nam adni ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh ien eSot plStim bnqmh oinqmo nqm bSaT bnpS lmSHit aibt eolm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni noTh idi el plStim ohkrti at krtim ohabdti at Sarit Hop him : oeSiti bm nqmot gdlot btokHot Hmh oideo ki ani ihoh btti at nqmti bm :

26

oihi beSti eSrh Snh baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm ien aSr amrh zr el iroSlm haH nSbrh dltot hemim nsbh ali amlah hHrbh : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik zr oheliti elik goim rbim khelot him lglio : oSHto Hmot zr ohrso mgdlih osHiti eprh mmnh ontti aoth lzHiH sle : mSTH Hrmim thih btok him ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh ohith lbc lgoim : obnotih aSr bSdh bHrb thrgnh oideo ki ani ihoh : ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni mbia al zr nbokdrazr mlk bbl mzpon mlk mlkim bsos obrkb obprSim oqhl oem rb : bnotik bSdh bHrb ihrg ontn elik diq oSpk elik sllh ohqim elik znh : omHi qblo itn bHmotik omgdltik itz bHrbotio : mSpet sosio iksk abqm mqol prS oglgl orkb treSnh Homotik bbao bSerik kmboai eir mbqeh : bprsot sosio irms at kl Hozotik emk bHrb ihrg omzbot eck larz trd : oSllo Hilk obcco rkltk ohrso Homotik obti Hmdtk itzo oabnik oezik oeprk btok mim iSimo : ohSbti hmon Sirik oqol knorik la iSme eod : onttik lzHiH sle mSTH Hrmim thih la tbnh eod ki ani ihoh dbrti nam adni ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh lzor hla mqol mpltk banq Hll bhrg hrg btokk ireSo haiim : oirdo mel ksaotm kl nSiai him ohsiro at meilihm oat bgdi rqmtm ipSTo Hrdot ilbSo el harz iSbo oHrdo lrgeim oSmmo elik : onSao elik qinh oamro lk aik abdt noSbt mimim heir hhllh aSr hith Hcqh bim hia oiSbih aSr ntno Htitm lkl ioSbih : eth iHrdo hain iom mpltk onbhlo haiim aSr bim mzatk : ki kh amr adni ihoh btti atk eir nHrbt kerim aSr la noSbo bhelot elik at thom oksok hmim hrbim : ohordtik at iordi bor al em eolm ohoSbtik barz tHtiot kHrbot meolm at iordi bor lmen la tSbi ontti zbi barz Hiim : blhot atnk oaink otbqSi ola tmzai eod leolm nam adni ihoh :

27

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : oath bn adm Sa el zr qinh : oamrt lzor hiSbti el mboat im rklt hemim al aiim rbim kh amr adni ihoh zor at amrt ani klilt ipi : blb imim gbolik bnik kllo ipik : broSim mSnir bno lk at kl lHtim arc mlbnon lqHo leSot trn elik : alonim mbSn eSo mSoTik qrSk eSo Sn bt aSrim maii ktim : SS brqmh mmzrim hih mprSk lhiot lk lns tklt oargmn maii aliSh hih mksk : iSbi zidon oarod hio STim lk Hkmik zor hio bk hmh Hblik : cqni gbl oHkmih hio bk mHciqi bdqk kl aniot him omlHihm hio bk lerb merbk : prs olod opoT hio bHilk anSi mlHmtk mgn okobe tlo bk hmh ntno hdrk : bni arod oHilk el Homotik sbib ogmdim bmgdlotik hio SlTihm tlo el Homotik sbib hmh kllo ipik : trSiS sHrtk mrb kl hon bksp brcl bdil oeoprt ntno ecbonik : ion tbl omSk hmh rklik bnpS adm okli nHSt ntno merbk : mbit togrmh sosim oprSim oprdim ntno ecbonik : bni ddn rklik aiim rbim sHrt idk qrnot Sn ohobnim hSibo aSkrk : arm sHrtk mrb meSik bnpk argmn orqmh oboz oramt okdkd ntno becbonik : ihodh oarz iSral hmh rklik bHTi mnit opng odbS oSmn ozri ntno merbk : dmSq sHrtk brb meSik mrb kl hon biin Hlbon ozmr zHr : odn oion maocl becbonik ntno brcl eSot qdh oqnh bmerbk hih : ddn rkltk bbgdi HpS lrkbh : erb okl nSiai qdr hmh sHri idk bkrim oailim oetodim bm sHrik : rkli Sba oremh hmh rklik braS kl bSm obkl abn iqrh ochb ntno ecbonik : Hrn oknh oedn rkli Sba aSor klmd rkltk : hmh rklik bmkllim bglomi tklt orqmh obgnci brmim bHblim HbSim oarcim bmrkltk : aniot trSiS Srotik merbk otmlai otkbdi mad blb imim : bmim rbim hbiaok hSTim atk roH hqdim Sbrk blb imim : honk oecbonik merbk mlHik oHblik mHciqi bdqk oerbi merbk okl anSi mlHmtk aSr bk obkl qhlk aSr btokk iplo blb imim biom mpltk : lqol ceqt Hblik ireSo mgrSot : oirdo maniotihm kl tpSi mSoT mlHim kl Hbli him al harz iemdo : ohSmieo elik bqolm oiceqo mrh oielo epr el raSihm bapr itplSo : ohqriHo alik qrHh oHgro Sqim obko alik bmr npS mspd mr : onSao alik bnihm qinh oqonno elik mi kzor kdmh btok him : bzat ecbonik mimim hSbet emim rbim brb honik omerbik heSrt mlki arz : et nSbrt mimim bmemqi mim merbk okl qhlk btokk nplo : kl iSbi haiim Smmo elik omlkihm Sero Ser remo pnim : sHrim bemim Srqo elik blhot hiit oaink ed eolm :

28

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm amr lngid zr kh amr adni ihoh ien gbh lbk otamr al ani moSb alhim iSbti blb imim oath adm ola al ottn lbk klb alhim : hnh Hkm ath mdnal kl stom la emmok : bHkmtk obtbontk eSit lk Hil oteS chb oksp baozrotik : brb Hkmtk brkltk hrbit Hilk oigbh lbbk bHilk : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien ttk at lbbk klb alhim : lkn hnni mbia elik crim erizi goim ohriqo Hrbotm el ipi Hkmtk oHllo ipetk : lSHt iordok omth mmoti Hll blb imim : hamr tamr alhim ani lpni hrgk oath adm ola al bid mHllik : moti erlim tmot bid crim ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sa qinh el mlk zor oamrt lo kh amr adni ihoh ath Hotm tknit mla Hkmh oklil ipi : bedn gn alhim hiit kl abn iqrh msktk adm pTdh oihlm trSiS Shm oiSph spir npk obrqt ochb mlakt tpik onqbik bk biom hbrak konno : at krob mmSH hsokk onttik bhr qdS alhim hiit btok abni aS hthlkt : tmim ath bdrkik miom hbrak ed nmza eolth bk : brb rkltk mlo tokk Hms otHTa oaHllk mhr alhim oabdk krob hskk mtok abni aS : gbh lbk bipik SHt Hkmtk el ipetk el arz hSlktik lpni mlkim nttik lraoh bk : mrb eonik beol rkltk Hllt mqdSik oaoza aS mtokk hia akltk oatnk lapr el harz leini kl raik : kl iodeik bemim Smmo elik blhot hiit oaink ed eolm : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik al zidon ohnba elih : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik zidon onkbdti btokk oideo ki ani ihoh beSoti bh SpTim onqdSti bh : oSlHti bh dbr odm bHozotih onpll Hll btokh bHrb elih msbib oideo ki ani ihoh : ola ihih eod lbit iSral slon mmair oqoz mkab mkl sbibtm hSaTim aotm oideo ki ani adni ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh bqbzi at bit iSral mn hemim aSr npzo bm onqdSti bm leini hgoim oiSbo el admtm aSr ntti lebdi lieqb : oiSbo elih lbTH obno btim onTeo krmim oiSbo lbTH beSoti SpTim bkl hSaTim atm msbibotm oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm :

29

bSnh heSrit beSri bSnim eSr lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik el preh mlk mzrim ohnba elio oel mzrim klh : dbr oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni elik preh mlk mzrim htnim hgdol hrbz btok iario aSr amr li iari oani eSitni : ontti HHiim blHiik ohdbqti dgt iarik bqSqStik ohelitik mtok iarik oat kl dgt iarik bqSqStik tdbq : onTStik hmdbrh aotk oat kl dgt iarik el pni hSdh tpol la tasp ola tqbz lHit harz oleop hSmim nttik laklh : oideo kl iSbi mzrim ki ani ihoh ien hiotm mSent qnh lbit iSral : btpSm bk bkpk troz obqet lhm kl ktp obhSenm elik tSbr ohemdt lhm kl mtnim : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni mbia elik Hrb ohkrti mmk adm obhmh : ohith arz mzrim lSmmh oHrbh oideo ki ani ihoh ien amr iar li oani eSiti : lkn hnni alik oal iarik ontti at arz mzrim lHrbot Hrb Smmh mmgdl sonh oed gbol koS : la tebr bh rgl adm orgl bhmh la tebr bh ola tSb arbeim Snh : ontti at arz mzrim Smmh btok arzot nSmot oerih btok erim mHrbot thiin Smmh arbeim Snh ohpzti at mzrim bgoim ocritim barzot : ki kh amr adni ihoh mqz arbeim Snh aqbz at mzrim mn hemim aSr npzo Smh : oSbti at Sbot mzrim ohSbti atm arz ptros el arz mkortm ohio Sm mmlkh Splh : mn hmmlkot thih Splh ola ttnSa eod el hgoim ohmeTtim lblti rdot bgoim : ola ihih eod lbit iSral lmbTH mckir eon bpnotm aHrihm oideo ki ani adni ihoh : oihi beSrim oSbe Snh braSon baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm nbokdrazr mlk bbl hebid at Hilo ebdh gdlh al zr kl raS mqrH okl ktp mroTh oSkr la hih lo olHilo mzr el hebdh aSr ebd elih : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni ntn lnbokdrazr mlk bbl at arz mzrim onSa hmnh oSll Sllh obcc bch ohith Skr lHilo : pelto aSr ebd bh ntti lo at arz mzrim aSr eSo li nam adni ihoh : biom hhoa azmiH qrn lbit iSral olk atn ptHon ph btokm oideo ki ani ihoh :

30

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnba oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hililo hh liom : ki qrob iom oqrob iom lihoh iom enn et goim ihih : obah Hrb bmzrim ohith HlHlh bkoS bnpl Hll bmzrim olqHo hmonh onhrso isodtih : koS opoT olod okl herb okob obni arz hbrit atm bHrb iplo : kh amr ihoh onplo smki mzrim oird gaon ech mmgdl sonh bHrb iplo bh nam adni ihoh : onSmo btok arzot nSmot oerio btok erim nHrbot thiinh : oideo ki ani ihoh btti aS bmzrim onSbro kl ecrih : biom hhoa izao mlakim mlpni bzim lhHrid at koS bTH ohith HlHlh bhm biom mzrim ki hnh bah : kh amr adni ihoh ohSbti at hmon mzrim bid nbokdrazr mlk bbl : hoa oemo ato erizi goim mobaim lSHt harz ohriqo Hrbotm el mzrim omlao at harz Hll : ontti iarim Hrbh omkrti at harz bid reim ohSmti arz omlah bid crim ani ihoh dbrti : kh amr adni ihoh ohabdti glolim ohSbti alilim mnp onSia marz mzrim la ihih eod ontti irah barz mzrim : ohSmti at ptros ontti aS bzen oeSiti SpTim bna : oSpkti Hmti el sin meoc mzrim ohkrti at hmon na : ontti aS bmzrim Hol tHil sin ona thih lhbqe onp zri iomm : bHori aon opi bst bHrb iplo ohnh bSbi tlknh : obtHpnHs HSk hiom bSbri Sm at mTot mzrim onSbt bh gaon ech hia enn iksnh obnotih bSbi tlknh : oeSiti SpTim bmzrim oideo ki ani ihoh : oihi baHt eSrh Snh braSon bSbeh lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm at croe preh mlk mzrim Sbrti ohnh la HbSh ltt rpaot lSom Htol lHbSh lHcqh ltpS bHrb : lkn kh amr adni ihoh hnni al preh mlk mzrim oSbrti at cretio at hHcqh oat hnSbrt ohplti at hHrb mido : ohpzoti at mzrim bgoim ocritm barzot : oHcqti at creot mlk bbl ontti at Hrbi bido oSbrti at creot preh onaq naqot Hll lpnio : ohHcqti at creot mlk bbl ocreot preh tplnh oideo ki ani ihoh btti Hrbi bid mlk bbl onTh aoth al arz mzrim : ohpzoti at mzrim bgoim ocriti aotm barzot oideo ki ani ihoh :

31

oihi baHt eSrh Snh bSliSi baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm amr al preh mlk mzrim oal hmono al mi dmit bgdlk : hnh aSor arc blbnon iph enp oHrS mzl ogbh qomh obin ebtim hith zmrto : mim gdloho thom rmmtho at nhrtih hlk sbibot mTeh oat teltih SlHh al kl ezi hSdh : el kn gbha qmto mkl ezi hSdh otrbinh sreptio otarknh parto mmim rbim bSlHo : bseptio qnno kl eop hSmim otHt partio ildo kl Hit hSdh obzlo iSbo kl goim rbim : oiip bgdlo bark dliotio ki hih SrSo al mim rbim : arcim la emmho bgn alhim broSim la dmo al septio oermnim la hio kpartio kl ez bgn alhim la dmh alio bipio : iph eSitio brb dliotio oiqnaho kl ezi edn aSr bgn halhim : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ien aSr gbht bqomh oitn zmrto al bin ebotim orm lbbo bgbho : oatnho bid ail goim eSo ieSh lo krSeo grStho : oikrtho crim erizi goim oiTSho al hhrim obkl gaiot nplo dliotio otSbrnh partio bkl apiqi harz oirdo mzlo kl emi harz oiTSho : el mplto iSkno kl eop hSmim oal partio hio kl Hit hSdh : lmen aSr la igbho bqomtm kl ezi mim ola itno at zmrtm al bin ebtim ola iemdo alihm bgbhm kl Sti mim ki klm ntno lmot al arz tHtit btok bni adm al iordi bor : kh amr adni ihoh biom rdto Saolh hablti ksti elio at thom oamne nhrotih oiklao mim rbim oaqdr elio lbnon okl ezi hSdh elio elph : mqol mplto hreSti goim bhordi ato Saolh at iordi bor oinHmo barz tHtit kl ezi edn mbHr oTob lbnon kl Sti mim : gm hm ato irdo Salh al Hlli Hrb ocreo iSbo bzlo btok goim : al mi dmit kkh bkbod obgdl bezi edn ohordt at ezi edn al arz tHtit btok erlim tSkb at Hlli Hrb hoa preh okl hmonh nam adni ihoh :

32

oihi bSti eSrh Snh bSni eSr HdS baHd lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sa qinh el preh mlk mzrim oamrt alio kpir goim ndmit oath ktnim bimim otgH bnhrotik otdlH mim brglik otrps nhrotm : kh amr adni ihoh oprSti elik at rSti bqhl emim rbim ohelok bHrmi : onTStik barz el pni hSdh aTilk ohSknti elik kl eop hSmim ohSbeti mmk Hit kl harz : ontti at bSrk el hhrim omlati hgaiot rmotk : ohSqiti arz zptk mdmk al hhrim oapqim imlaon mmk : oksiti bkbotk Smim ohqdrti at kkbihm SmS benn aksno oirH la iair aoro : kl maori aor bSmim aqdirm elik ontti HSk el arzk nam adni ihoh : ohkesti lb emim rbim bhbiai Sbrk bgoim el arzot aSr la idetm : ohSmoti elik emim rbim omlkihm iSero elik Ser beoppi Hrbi el pnihm oHrdo lrgeim aiS lnpSo biom mpltk : ki kh amr adni ihoh Hrb mlk bbl tboak : bHrbot gborim apil hmonk erizi goim klm oSddo at gaon mzrim onSmd kl hmonh : ohabdti at kl bhmth mel mim rbim ola tdlHm rgl adm eod oprsot bhmh la tdlHm : ac aSqie mimihm onhrotm kSmn aolik nam adni ihoh : btti at arz mzrim Smmh onSmh arz mmlah bhkoti at kl ioSbi bh oideo ki ani ihoh : qinh hia oqonnoh bnot hgoim tqonnh aoth el mzrim oel kl hmonh tqonnh aoth nam adni ihoh : oihi bSti eSrh Snh bHmSh eSr lHdS hih dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm nhh el hmon mzrim ohordho aoth obnot goim adrm al arz tHtiot at iordi bor : mmi nemt rdh ohSkbh at erlim : btok Hlli Hrb iplo Hrb ntnh mSko aoth okl hmonih : idbro lo ali gborim mtok Saol at ecrio irdo Skbo herlim Hlli Hrb : Sm aSor okl qhlh sbibotio qbrtio klm Hllim hnplim bHrb : aSr ntno qbrtih birkti bor oihi qhlh sbibot qbrth klm Hllim nplim bHrb aSr ntno Htit barz Hiim : Sm eilm okl hmonh sbibot qbrth klm Hllim hnplim bHrb aSr irdo erlim al arz tHtiot aSr ntno Htitm barz Hiim oiSao klmtm at iordi bor : btok Hllim ntno mSkb lh bkl hmonh sbibotio qbrth klm erlim Hlli Hrb ki ntn Htitm barz Hiim oiSao klmtm at iordi bor btok Hllim ntn : Sm mSk tbl okl hmonh sbibotio qbrotih klm erlim mHlli Hrb ki ntno Htitm barz Hiim : ola iSkbo at gborim nplim merlim aSr irdo Saol bkli mlHmtm oitno at Hrbotm tHt raSihm othi eontm el ezmotm ki Htit gborim barz Hiim : oath btok erlim tSbr otSkb at Hlli Hrb : Smh adom mlkih okl nSiaih aSr ntno bgbortm at Hlli Hrb hmh at erlim iSkbo oat irdi bor : Smh nsiki zpon klm okl zdni aSr irdo at Hllim bHtitm mgbortm boSim oiSkbo erlim at Hlli Hrb oiSao klmtm at iordi bor : aotm irah preh onHm el kl hmonh Hlli Hrb preh okl Hilo nam adni ihoh : ki ntti at Htito barz Hiim ohSkb btok erlim at Hlli Hrb preh okl hmonh nam adni ihoh :

33

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm dbr al bni emk oamrt alihm arz ki abia elih Hrb olqHo em harz aiS aHd mqzihm ontno ato lhm lzph : orah at hHrb bah el harz otqe bSopr ohchir at hem : oSme hSme at qol hSopr ola nchr otboa Hrb otqHho dmo braSo ihih : at qol hSopr Sme ola nchr dmo bo ihih ohoa nchr npSo mlT : ohzph ki irah at hHrb bah ola tqe bSopr ohem la nchr otboa Hrb otqH mhm npS hoa beono nlqH odmo mid hzph adrS : oath bn adm zph nttik lbit iSral oSmet mpi dbr ohchrt atm mmni : bamri lrSe rSe mot tmot ola dbrt lhchir rSe mdrko hoa rSe beono imot odmo midk abqS : oath ki hchrt rSe mdrko lSob mmnh ola Sb mdrko hoa beono imot oath npSk hzlt : oath bn adm amr al bit iSral kn amrtm lamr ki pSeino oHTatino elino obm anHno nmqim oaik nHih : amr alihm Hi ani nam adni ihoh am aHpz bmot hrSe ki am bSob rSe mdrko oHih Sobo Sobo mdrkikm hreim olmh tmoto bit iSral : oath bn adm amr al bni emk zdqt hzdiq la tzilno biom pSeo orSet hrSe la ikSl bh biom Sobo mrSeo ozdiq la iokl lHiot bh biom HTato : bamri lzdiq Hih iHih ohoa bTh el zdqto oeSh eol kl zdqto la tckrnh obeolo aSr eSh bo imot : obamri lrSe mot tmot oSb mHTato oeSh mSpT ozdqh : Hbl iSib rSe gclh iSlm bHqot hHiim hlk lblti eSot eol Hio iHih la imot : kl HTato aSr HTa la tckrnh lo mSpT ozdqh eSh Hio iHih : oamro bni emk la itkn drk adni ohmh drkm la itkn : bSob zdiq mzdqto oeSh eol omt bhm : obSob rSe mrSeto oeSh mSpT ozdqh elihm hoa iHih : oamrtm la itkn drk adni aiS kdrkio aSpoT atkm bit iSral : oihi bSti eSrh Snh beSri bHmSh lHdS lglotno ba ali hpliT miroSlm lamr hkth heir : oid ihoh hith ali berb lpni boa hpliT oiptH at pi ed boa ali bbqr oiptH pi ola nalmti eod : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm iSbi hHrbot halh el admt iSral amrim lamr aHd hih abrhm oiirS at harz oanHno rbim lno ntnh harz lmorSh : lkn amr alhm kh amr adni ihoh el hdm taklo oeinkm tSao al glolikm odm tSpko oharz tirSo : emdtm el Hrbkm eSitn toebh oaiS at aSt reho Tmatm oharz tirSo : kh tamr alhm kh amr adni ihoh Hi ani am la aSr bHrbot bHrb iplo oaSr el pni hSdh lHih nttio laklo oaSr bmzdot obmerot bdbr imoto : ontti at harz Smmh omSmh onSbt gaon ech oSmmo hri iSral main eobr : oideo ki ani ihoh btti at harz Smmh omSmh el kl toebtm aSr eSo : oath bn adm bni emk hndbrim bk azl hqirot obptHi hbtim odbr Hd at aHd aiS at aHio lamr bao na oSmeo mh hdbr hioza mat ihoh : oiboao alik kmboa em oiSbo lpnik emi oSmeo at dbrik oaotm la ieSo ki egbim bpihm hmh eSim aHri bzem lbm hlk : ohnk lhm kSir egbim iph qol omTb ngn oSmeo at dbrik oeSim ainm aotm : obbah hnh bah oideo ki nbia hih btokm :

34

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm hnba el roei iSral hnba oamrt alihm lreim kh amr adni ihoh hoi rei iSral aSr hio reim aotm hloa hzan ireo hreim : at hHlb taklo oat hzmr tlbSo hbriah tcbHo hzan la treo : at hnHlot la Hcqtm oat hHolh la rpatm olnSbrt la HbStm oat hndHt la hSbtm oat habdt la bqStm obHcqh rditm atm obprk : otpozinh mbli reh othiinh laklh lkl Hit hSdh otpozinh : iSgo zani bkl hhrim oel kl gbeh rmh oel kl pni harz npzo zani oain dorS oain mbqS : lkn reim Smeo at dbr ihoh : Hi ani nam adni ihoh am la ien hiot zani lbc othiinh zani laklh lkl Hit hSdh main reh ola drSo rei at zani oireo hreim aotm oat zani la reo : lkn hreim Smeo dbr ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh hnni al hreim odrSti at zani midm ohSbtim mreot zan ola ireo eod hreim aotm ohzlti zani mpihm ola thiin lhm laklh : ki kh amr adni ihoh hnni ani odrSti at zani obqrtim : kbqrt reh edro biom hioto btok zano nprSot kn abqr at zani ohzlti athm mkl hmqomt aSr npzo Sm biom enn oerpl : ohozatim mn hemim oqbztim mn harzot ohbiatim al admtm oreitim al hri iSral bapiqim obkl moSbi harz : bmreh Tob areh atm obhri mrom iSral ihih nohm Sm trbznh bnoh Tob omreh Smn treinh al hri iSral : ani areh zani oani arbizm nam adni ihoh : at habdt abqS oat hndHt aSib olnSbrt aHbS oat hHolh aHcq oat hSmnh oat hHcqh aSmid arenh bmSpT : oatnh zani kh amr adni ihoh hnni SpT bin Sh lSh lailim oletodim : hmeT mkm hmreh hTob treo oitr mreikm trmso brglikm omSqe mim tSto oat hnotrim brglikm trpSon : ozani mrms rglikm treinh omrpS rglikm tStinh : lkn kh amr adni ihoh alihm hnni ani oSpTti bin Sh brih obin Sh rch : ien bzd obktp thdpo obqrnikm tngHo kl hnHlot ed aSr hpizotm aotnh al hHozh : ohoSeti lzani ola thiinh eod lbc oSpTti bin Sh lSh : ohqmti elihm reh aHd oreh athn at ebdi doid hoa ireh atm ohoa ihih lhn lreh : oani ihoh ahih lhm lalhim oebdi dod nSia btokm ani ihoh dbrti : okrti lhm brit Slom ohSbti Hih reh mn harz oiSbo bmdbr lbTH oiSno bierim : ontti aotm osbibot gbeti brkh ohordti hgSm beto gSmi brkh ihio : ontn ez hSdh at prio oharz ttn ibolh ohio el admtm lbTH oideo ki ani ihoh bSbri at mTot elm ohzltim mid hebdim bhm : ola ihio eod bc lgoim oHit harz la taklm oiSbo lbTH oain mHrid : ohqmti lhm mTe lSm ola ihio eod aspi reb barz ola iSao eod klmt hgoim : oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm atm ohmh emi bit iSral nam adni ihoh : oatn zani zan mreiti adm atm ani alhikm nam adni ihoh :

35

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik el hr Seir ohnba elio : oamrt lo kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik hr Seir onTiti idi elik onttik Smmh omSmh : erik Hrbh aSim oath Smmh thih oidet ki ani ihoh : ien hiot lk aibt eolm otgr at bni iSral el idi Hrb bet aidm bet eon qz : lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh ki ldm aeSk odm irdpk am la dm Snat odm irdpk : ontti at hr Seir lSmmh oSmmh ohkrti mmno ebr oSb : omlati at hrio Hllio gbeotik ogiaotik okl apiqik Hlli Hrb iplo bhm : Smmot eolm atnk oerik la tiSbnh oidetm ki ani ihoh : ien amrk at Sni hgoim oat Sti harzot li thiinh oirSnoh oihoh Sm hih : lkn Hi ani nam adni ihoh oeSiti kapk okqnatk aSr eSith mSnatik bm onodeti bm kaSr aSpTk : oidet ki ani ihoh Smeti at kl nazotik aSr amrt el hri iSral lamr Smmh lno ntno laklh : otgdilo eli bpikm ohetrtm eli dbrikm ani Smeti : kh amr adni ihoh kSmH kl harz Smmh aeSh lk : kSmHtk lnHlt bit iSral el aSr Smmh kn aeSh lk Smmh thih hr Seir okl adom klh oideo ki ani ihoh :

36

oath bn adm hnba al hri iSral oamrt hri iSral Smeo dbr ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh ien amr haoib elikm haH obmot eolm lmorSh hith lno : lkn hnba oamrt kh amr adni ihoh ien bien Smot oSap atkm msbib lhiotkm morSh lSarit hgoim otelo el Spt lSon odbt em : lkn hri iSral Smeo dbr adni ihoh kh amr adni ihoh lhrim olgbeot lapiqim olgaiot olHrbot hSmmot olerim hnecbot aSr hio lbc olleg lSarit hgoim aSr msbib : lkn kh amr adni ihoh am la baS qnati dbrti el Sarit hgoim oel adom kla aSr ntno at arzi lhm lmorSh bSmHt kl lbb bSaT npS lmen mgrSh lbc : lkn hnba el admt iSral oamrt lhrim olgbeot lapiqim olgaiot kh amr adni ihoh hnni bqnati obHmti dbrti ien klmt goim nSatm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh ani nSati at idi am la hgoim aSr lkm msbib hmh klmtm iSao : oatm hri iSral enpkm ttno oprikm tSao lemi iSral ki qrbo lboa : ki hnni alikm opniti alikm onebdtm oncretm : ohrbiti elikm adm kl bit iSral klh onSbo herim ohHrbot tbninh : ohrbiti elikm adm obhmh orbo opro ohoSbti atkm kqdmotikm ohiTbti mraStikm oidetm ki ani ihoh : oholkti elikm adm at emi iSral oirSok ohiit lhm lnHlh ola tosp eod lSklm : kh amr adni ihoh ien amrim lkm aklt adm ati omSklt goik hiit : lkn adm la takli eod ogoik la tkSli eod nam adni ihoh : ola aSmie alik eod klmt hgoim oHrpt emim la tSai eod ogoik la tkSli eod nam adni ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm bit iSral iSbim el admtm oiTmao aoth bdrkm obelilotm kTmat hndh hith drkm lpni : oaSpk Hmti elihm el hdm aSr Spko el harz obglolihm Tmaoh : oapiz atm bgoim oicro barzot kdrkm okelilotm SpTtim : oiboa al hgoim aSr bao Sm oiHllo at Sm qdSi bamr lhm em ihoh alh omarzo izao : oaHml el Sm qdSi aSr Hlloho bit iSral bgoim aSr bao Smh : lkn amr lbit iSral kh amr adni ihoh la lmenkm ani eSh bit iSral ki am lSm qdSi aSr Hlltm bgoim aSr batm Sm : oqdSti at Smi hgdol hmHll bgoim aSr Hlltm btokm oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh nam adni ihoh bhqdSi bkm leinihm : olqHti atkm mn hgoim oqbzti atkm mkl harzot ohbati atkm al admtkm : ocrqti elikm mim Thorim oThrtm mkl Tmaotikm omkl glolikm aThr atkm : ontti lkm lb HdS oroH HdSh atn bqrbkm ohsrti at lb habn mbSrkm ontti lkm lb bSr : oat roHi atn bqrbkm oeSiti at aSr bHqi tlko omSpTi tSmro oeSitm : oiSbtm barz aSr ntti labtikm ohiitm li lem oanki ahih lkm lalhim : ohoSeti atkm mkl Tmaotikm oqrati al hdgn ohrbiti ato ola atn elikm reb : ohrbiti at pri hez otnobt hSdh lmen aSr la tqHo eod Hrpt reb bgoim : ockrtm at drkikm hreim omellikm aSr la Tobim onqTtm bpnikm el eontikm oel toebtikm : la lmenkm ani eSh nam adni ihoh iode lkm boSo ohklmo mdrkikm bit iSral : kh amr adni ihoh biom Thri atkm mkl eonotikm ohoSbti at herim onbno hHrbot : oharz hnSmh tebd tHt aSr hith Smmh leini kl eobr : oamro harz hlco hnSmh hith kgn edn oherim hHrbot ohnSmot ohnhrsot bzorot iSbo : oideo hgoim aSr iSaro sbibotikm ki ani ihoh bniti hnhrsot nTeti hnSmh ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti : kh amr adni ihoh eod cat adrS lbit iSral leSot lhm arbh atm kzan adm : kzan qdSim kzan iroSlm bmoedih kn thiinh herim hHrbot mlaot zan adm oideo ki ani ihoh :

37

hith eli id ihoh oiozani broH ihoh oiniHni btok hbqeh ohia mlah ezmot : ohebirni elihm sbib sbib ohnh rbot mad el pni hbqeh ohnh ibSot mad : oiamr ali bn adm htHiinh hezmot halh oamr adni ihoh ath idet : oiamr ali hnba el hezmot halh oamrt alihm hezmot hibSot Smeo dbr ihoh : kh amr adni ihoh lezmot halh hnh ani mbia bkm roH oHiitm : ontti elikm gdim ohelti elikm bSr oqrmti elikm eor ontti bkm roH oHiitm oidetm ki ani ihoh : onbati kaSr zoiti oihi qol khnbai ohnh reS otqrbo ezmot ezm al ezmo : oraiti ohnh elihm gdim obSr elh oiqrm elihm eor mlmelh oroH ain bhm : oiamr ali hnba al hroH hnba bn adm oamrt al hroH kh amr adni ihoh marbe roHot bai hroH opHi bhrogim halh oiHio : ohnbati kaSr zoni otboa bhm hroH oiHio oiemdo el rglihm Hil gdol mad mad : oiamr ali bn adm hezmot halh kl bit iSral hmh hnh amrim ibSo ezmotino oabdh tqotno ngcrno lno : lkn hnba oamrt alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani ptH at qbrotikm oheliti atkm mqbrotikm emi ohbati atkm al admt iSral : oidetm ki ani ihoh bptHi at qbrotikm obheloti atkm mqbrotikm emi : ontti roHi bkm oHiitm ohnHti atkm el admtkm oidetm ki ani ihoh dbrti oeSiti nam ihoh : oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : oath bn adm qH lk ez aHd oktb elio lihodh olbni iSral Hbro olqH ez aHd oktob elio liosp ez aprim okl bit iSral Hbro : oqrb atm aHd al aHd lk lez aHd ohio laHdim bidk : okaSr iamro alik bni emk lamr hloa tgid lno mh alh lk : dbr alhm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani lqH at ez iosp aSr bid aprim oSbTi iSral Hbro ontti aotm elio at ez ihodh oeSitm lez aHd ohio aHd bidi : ohio hezim aSr tktb elihm bidk leinihm : odbr alihm kh amr adni ihoh hnh ani lqH at bni iSral mbin hgoim aSr hlko Sm oqbzti atm msbib ohbati aotm al admtm : oeSiti atm lgoi aHd barz bhri iSral omlk aHd ihih lklm lmlk ola ihih eod lSni goim ola iHzo eod lSti mmlkot eod : ola iTmao eod bglolihm obSqozihm obkl pSeihm ohoSeti atm mkl moSbtihm aSr HTao bhm oThrti aotm ohio li lem oani ahih lhm lalhim : oebdi dod mlk elihm oroeh aHd ihih lklm obmSpTi ilko oHqti iSmro oeSo aotm : oiSbo el harz aSr ntti lebdi lieqb aSr iSbo bh abotikm oiSbo elih hmh obnihm obni bnihm ed eolm odod ebdi nSia lhm leolm : okrti lhm brit Slom brit eolm ihih aotm onttim ohrbiti aotm ontti at mqdSi btokm leolm : ohih mSkni elihm ohiiti lhm lalhim ohmh ihio li lem : oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh mqdS at iSral bhiot mqdSi btokm leolm :

38

oihi dbr ihoh ali lamr : bn adm Sim pnik al gog arz hmgog nSia raS mSk otbl ohnba elio : oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik gog nSia raS mSk otbl : oSobbtik ontti HHim blHiik ohozati aotk oat kl Hilk sosim oprSim lbSi mklol klm qhl rb znh omgn tpSi Hrbot klm : prs koS opoT atm klm mgn okobe : gmr okl agpih bit togrmh irkti zpon oat kl agpio emim rbim atk : hkn ohkn lk ath okl qhlk hnqhlim elik ohiit lhm lmSmr : mimim rbim tpqd baHrit hSnim tboa al arz mSobbt mHrb mqbzt memim rbim el hri iSral aSr hio lHrbh tmid ohia memim hozah oiSbo lbTH klm : oelit kSah tboa kenn lksot harz thih ath okl agpik oemim rbim aotk : kh amr adni ihoh ohih biom hhoa ielo dbrim el lbbk oHSbt mHSbt reh : oamrt aelh el arz prcot aboa hSqTim iSbi lbTH klm iSbim bain Homh obriH odltim ain lhm : lSll Sll olbc bc lhSib idk el Hrbot noSbt oal em masp mgoim eSh mqnh oqnin iSbi el Tbor harz : Sba oddn osHri trSiS okl kprih iamro lk hlSll Sll ath ba hlbc bc hqhlt qhlk lSat ksp ochb lqHt mqnh oqnin lSll Sll gdol : lkn hnba bn adm oamrt lgog kh amr adni ihoh hloa biom hhoa bSbt emi iSral lbTH tde : obat mmqomk mirkti zpon ath oemim rbim atk rkbi sosim klm qhl gdol oHil rb : oelit el emi iSral kenn lksot harz baHrit himim thih ohbaotik el arzi lmen det hgoim ati bhqdSi bk leinihm gog : kh amr adni ihoh hath hoa aSr dbrti bimim qdmonim bid ebdi nbiai iSral hnbaim bimim hhm Snim lhbia atk elihm : ohih biom hhoa biom boa gog el admt iSral nam adni ihoh telh Hmti bapi : obqnati baS ebrti dbrti am la biom hhoa ihih reS gdol el admt iSral : oreSo mpni dgi him oeop hSmim oHit hSdh okl hrmS hrmS el hadmh okl hadm aSr el pni hadmh onhrso hhrim onplo hmdrgot okl Homh larz tpol : oqrati elio lkl hri Hrb nam adni ihoh Hrb aiS baHio thih : onSpTti ato bdbr obdm ogSm SoTp oabni algbiS aS ogprit amTir elio oel agpio oel emim rbim aSr ato : ohtgdlti ohtqdSti onodeti leini goim rbim oideo ki ani ihoh :

39

oath bn adm hnba el gog oamrt kh amr adni ihoh hnni alik gog nSia raS mSk otbl : oSbbtik oSSatik ohelitik mirkti zpon ohbaotk el hri iSral : ohkiti qStk mid Smaolk oHzik mid imink apil : el hri iSral tpol ath okl agpik oemim aSr atk leiT zpor kl knp oHit hSdh nttik laklh : el pni hSdh tpol ki ani dbrti nam adni ihoh : oSlHti aS bmgog obiSbi haiim lbTH oideo ki ani ihoh : oat Sm qdSi aodie btok emi iSral ola aHl at Sm qdSi eod oideo hgoim ki ani ihoh qdoS biSral : hnh bah onhith nam adni ihoh hoa hiom aSr dbrti : oizao iSbi eri iSral obero ohSiqo bnSq omgn oznh bqSt obHzim obmql id obrmH obero bhm aS Sbe Snim : ola iSao ezim mn hSdh ola iHTbo mn hierim ki bnSq ibero aS oSllo at Sllihm obcco at bccihm nam adni ihoh : ohih biom hhoa atn lgog mqom Sm qbr biSral gi hebrim qdmt him oHsmt hia at hebrim oqbro Sm at gog oat kl hmonh oqrao gia hmon gog : oqbrom bit iSral lmen Thr at harz Sbeh HdSim : oqbro kl em harz ohih lhm lSm iom hkbdi nam adni ihoh : oanSi tmid ibdilo ebrim barz mqbrim at hebrim at hnotrim el pni harz lThrh mqzh Sbeh HdSim iHqro : oebro hebrim barz orah ezm adm obnh azlo zion ed qbro ato hmqbrim al gia hmon gog : ogm Sm eir hmonh oThro harz : oath bn adm kh amr adni ihoh amr lzpor kl knp olkl Hit hSdh hqbzo obao haspo msbib el cbHi aSr ani cbH lkm cbH gdol el hri iSral oakltm bSr oStitm dm : bSr gborim taklo odm nSiai harz tSto ailim krim oetodim prim mriai bSn klm : oakltm Hlb lSbeh oStitm dm lSkron mcbHi aSr cbHti lkm : oSbetm el SlHni sos orkb gbor okl aiS mlHmh nam adni ihoh : ontti at kbodi bgoim orao kl hgoim at mSpTi aSr eSiti oat idi aSr Smti bhm : oideo bit iSral ki ani ihoh alhihm mn hiom hhoa ohlah : oideo hgoim ki beonm glo bit iSral el aSr melo bi oastr pni mhm oatnm bid zrihm oiplo bHrb klm : kTmatm okpSeihm eSiti atm oastr pni mhm : lkn kh amr adni ihoh eth aSib at Sbit ieqb orHmti kl bit iSral oqnati lSm qdSi : onSo at klmtm oat kl melm aSr melo bi bSbtm el admtm lbTH oain mHrid : bSobbi aotm mn hemim oqbzti atm marzot aibihm onqdSti bm leini hgoim rbim : oideo ki ani ihoh alhihm bhgloti atm al hgoim oknstim el admtm ola aotir eod mhm Sm : ola astir eod pni mhm aSr Spkti at roHi el bit iSral nam adni ihoh :

40

beSrim oHmS Snh lglotno braS hSnh beSor lHdS barbe eSrh Snh aHr aSr hkth heir bezm hiom hch hith eli id ihoh oiba ati Smh : bmraot alhim hbiani al arz iSral oiniHni al hr gbh mad oelio kmbnh eir mngb : oibia aoti Smh ohnh aiS mraho kmrah nHSt optil pStim bido oqnh hmdh ohoa emd bSer : oidbr ali haiS bn adm rah beinik obacnik Sme oSim lbk lkl aSr ani mrah aotk ki lmen hraotkh hbath hnh hgd at kl aSr ath rah lbit iSral : ohnh Homh mHoz lbit sbib sbib obid haiS qnh hmdh SS amot bamh oTpH oimd at rHb hbnin qnh aHd oqomh qnh aHd : oiboa al Ser aSr pnio drk hqdimh oiel bmelto oimd at sp hSer qnh aHd rHb oat sp aHd qnh aHd rHb : ohta qnh aHd ark oqnh aHd rHb obin htaim HmS amot osp hSer mazl aolm hSer mhbit qnh aHd : oimd at alm hSer mhbit qnh aHd : oimd at alm hSer Smnh amot oailo Stim amot oalm hSer mhbit : otai hSer drk hqdim SlSh mph oSlSh mph mdh aHt lSlStm omdh aHt lailm mph ompo : oimd at rHb ptH hSer eSr amot ark hSer SloS eSrh amot : ogbol lpni htaot amh aHt oamh aHt gbol mph ohta SS amot mpo oSS amot mpo : oimd at hSer mgg hta lggo rHb eSrim oHmS amot ptH ngd ptH : oieS at ailim SSim amh oal ail hHzr hSer sbib sbib : oel pni hSer hiaton el lpni alm hSer hpnimi HmSim amh : oHlonot aTmot al htaim oal alihmh lpnimh lSer sbib sbib okn lalmot oHlonot sbib sbib lpnimh oal ail tmrim : oibiani al hHzr hHizonh ohnh lSkot orzph eSoi lHzr sbib sbib SlSim lSkot al hrzph : ohrzph al ktp hSerim lemt ark hSerim hrzph htHtonh : oimd rHb mlpni hSer htHtonh lpni hHzr hpnimi mHoz mah amh hqdim ohzpon : ohSer aSr pnio drk hzpon lHzr hHizonh mdd arko orHbo : otao SloSh mpo oSlSh mpo oailo oalmo hih kmdt hSer hraSon HmSim amh arko orHb HmS oeSrim bamh : oHlono oalmo otmro kmdt hSer aSr pnio drk hqdim obmelot Sbe ielo bo oailmo lpnihm : oSer lHzr hpnimi ngd hSer lzpon olqdim oimd mSer al Ser mah amh : oiolkni drk hdrom ohnh Ser drk hdrom omdd ailo oailmo kmdot halh : oHlonim lo olailmo sbib sbib khHlnot halh HmSim amh ark orHb HmS oeSrim amh : omelot Sbeh eloto oalmo lpnihm otmrim lo aHd mpo oaHd mpo al ailo : oSer lHzr hpnimi drk hdrom oimd mSer al hSer drk hdrom mah amot : oibiani al Hzr hpnimi bSer hdrom oimd at hSer hdrom kmdot halh : otao oailo oalmo kmdot halh oHlonot lo olalmo sbib sbib HmSim amh ark orHb eSrim oHmS amot : oalmot sbib sbib ark HmS oeSrim amh orHb HmS amot : oalmo al Hzr hHzonh otmrim al ailo omelot Smonh melo : oibiani al hHzr hpnimi drk hqdim oimd at hSer kmdot halh : otao oalo oalmo kmdot halh oHlonot lo olalmo sbib sbib ark HmSim amh orHb HmS oeSrim amh : oalmo lHzr hHizonh otmrim al alo mpo ompo oSmnh melot melo : oibiani al Ser hzpon omdd kmdot halh : tao alo oalmo oHlonot lo sbib sbib ark HmSim amh orHb HmS oeSrim amh : oailo lHzr hHizonh otmrim al ailo mpo ompo oSmnh melot melo : olSkh optHh bailim hSerim Sm idiHo at helh : obalm hSer Snim SlHnot mpo oSnim SlHnot mph lSHoT alihm heolh ohHTat ohaSm : oal hktp mHozh leolh lptH hSer hzponh Snim SlHnot oal hktp haHrt aSr lalm hSer Snim SlHnot : arbeh SlHnot mph oarbeh SlHnot mph lktp hSer Smonh SlHnot alihm iSHTo : oarbeh SlHnot leolh abni gcit ark amh aHt oHzi orHb amh aHt oHzi ogbh amh aHt alihm oiniHo at hklim aSr iSHTo at heolh bm ohcbH : ohSptim TpH aHd moknim bbit sbib sbib oal hSlHnot bSr hqrbn : omHozh lSer hpnimi lSkot Srim bHzr hpnimi aSr al ktp Ser hzpon opnihm drk hdrom aHd al ktp Ser hqdim pni drk hzpn : oidbr ali ch hlSkh aSr pnih drk hdrom lkhnim Smri mSmrt hbit : ohlSkh aSr pnih drk hzpon lkhnim Smri mSmrt hmcbH hmh bni zdoq hqrbim mbni loi al ihoh lSrto : oimd at hHzr ark mah amh orHb mah amh mrbet ohmcbH lpni hbit : oibani al alm hbit oimd al alm HmS amot mph oHmS amot mph orHb hSer SlS amot mpo oSlS amot mpo : ark halm eSrim amh orHb eSti eSrh amh obmelot aSr ielo alio oemdim al hailim aHd mph oaHd mph :

41

oibiani al hhikl oimd at hailim SS amot rHb mpo oSS amot rHb mpo rHb hahl : orHb hptH eSr amot oktpot hptH HmS amot mpo oHmS amot mpo oimd arko arbeim amh orHb eSrim amh : oba lpnimh oimd ail hptH Stim amot ohptH SS amot orHb hptH Sbe amot : oimd at arko eSrim amh orHb eSrim amh al pni hhikl oiamr ali ch qdS hqdSim : oimd qir hbit SS amot orHb hzle arbe amot sbib sbib lbit sbib : ohzleot zle al zle SloS oSlSim pemim obaot bqir aSr lbit lzleot sbib sbib lhiot aHocim ola ihio aHocim bqir hbit : orHbh onsbh lmelh lmelh lzleot ki mosb hbit lmelh lmelh sbib sbib lbit el kn rHb lbit lmelh okn htHtonh ielh el helionh ltikonh : oraiti lbit gbh sbib sbib misdot hzleot mlo hqnh SS amot azilh : rHb hqir aSr lzle al hHoz HmS amot oaSr mnH bit zleot aSr lbit : obin hlSkot rHb eSrim amh sbib lbit sbib sbib : optH hzle lmnH ptH aHd drk hzpon optH aHd ldrom orHb mqom hmnH HmS amot sbib sbib : ohbnin aSr al pni hgcrh pat drk him rHb Sbeim amh oqir hbnin HmS amot rHb sbib sbib oarko tSeim amh : omdd at hbit ark mah amh ohgcrh ohbnih oqirotih ark mah amh : orHb pni hbit ohgcrh lqdim mah amh : omdd ark hbnin al pni hgcrh aSr el aHrih oatoqiha mpo ompo mah amh ohhikl hpnimi oalmi hHzr : hspim ohHlonim haTmot ohatiqim sbib lSlStm ngd hsp SHip ez sbib sbib oharz ed hHlnot ohHlnot mksot : el mel hptH oed hbit hpnimi olHoz oal kl hqir sbib sbib bpnimi obHizon mdot : oeSoi krobim otmrim otmrh bin krob lkrob oSnim pnim lkrob : opni adm al htmrh mpo opni kpir al htmrh mpo eSoi al kl hbit sbib sbib : mharz ed mel hptH hkrobim ohtmrim eSoim oqir hhikl : hhikl mcoct rbeh opni hqdS hmrah kmrah : hmcbH ez SloS amot gbh oarko Stim amot omqzeotio lo oarko oqirtio ez oidbr ali ch hSlHn aSr lpni ihoh : oStim dltot lhikl olqdS : oStim dltot ldltot Stim mosbot dltot Stim ldlt aHt oSti dltot laHrt : oeSoih alihn al dltot hhikl krobim otmrim kaSr eSoim lqirot oeb ez al pni haolm mhHoz : oHlonim aTmot otmrim mpo ompo al ktpot haolm ozleot hbit ohebim :

42

oiozani al hHzr hHizonh hdrk drk hzpon oibani al hlSkh aSr ngd hgcrh oaSr ngd hbnin al hzpon : al pni ark amot hmah ptH hzpon ohrHb HmSim amot : ngd heSrim aSr lHzr hpnimi ongd rzph aSr lHzr hHizonh atiq al pni atiq bSlSim : olpni hlSkot mhlk eSr amot rHb al hpnimit drk amh aHt optHihm lzpon : ohlSkot heliont qzrot ki ioklo atiqim mhnh mhtHtnot omhtknot bnin : ki mSlSot hnh oain lhn emodim kemodi hHzrot el kn nazl mhtHtonot omhtiknot mharz : ogdr aSr lHoz lemt hlSkot drk hHzr hHzonh al pni hlSkot arko HmSim amh : ki ark hlSkot aSr lHzr hHzonh HmSim amh ohnh el pni hhikl mah amh : omtHth lSkot halh hmboa mhqdim bbao lhnh mhHzr hHznh : brHb gdr hHzr drk hqdim al pni hgcrh oal pni hbnin lSkot : odrk lpnihm kmrah hlSkot aSr drk hzpon karkn kn rHbn okl mozaihn okmSpTihn okptHihn : okptHi hlSkot aSr drk hdrom ptH braS drk drk bpni hgdrt hginh drk hqdim bboan : oiamr ali lSkot hzpon lSkot hdrom aSr al pni hgcrh hnh lSkot hqdS aSr iaklo Sm hkhnim aSr qrobim lihoh qdSi hqdSim Sm iniHo qdSi hqdSim ohmnHh ohHTat ohaSm ki hmqom qdS : bbam hkhnim ola izao mhqdS al hHzr hHizonh oSm iniHo bgdihm aSr iSrto bhn ki qdS hnh ilbSo bgdim aHrim oqrbo al aSr lem : oklh at mdot hbit hpnimi ohoziani drk hSer aSr pnio drk hqdim omddo sbib sbib : mdd roH hqdim bqnh hmdh HmS amot qnim bqnh hmdh sbib : mdd roH hzpon HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh sbib : at roH hdrom mdd HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh : sbb al roH him mdd HmS maot qnim bqnh hmdh : larbe roHot mddo Homh lo sbib sbib ark HmS maot orHb HmS maot lhbdil bin hqdS lHl :

43

oiolkni al hSer Ser aSr pnh drk hqdim : ohnh kbod alhi iSral ba mdrk hqdim oqolo kqol mim rbim oharz hairh mkbdo : okmrah hmrah aSr raiti kmrah aSr raiti bbai lSHt at heir omraot kmrah aSr raiti al nhr kbr oapl al pni : okbod ihoh ba al hbit drk Ser aSr pnio drk hqdim : otSani roH otbiani al hHzr hpnimi ohnh mla kbod ihoh hbit : oaSme mdbr ali mhbit oaiS hih emd azli : oiamr ali bn adm at mqom ksai oat mqom kpot rgli aSr aSkn Sm btok bni iSral leolm ola iTmao eod bit iSral Sm qdSi hmh omlkihm bcnotm obpgri mlkihm bmotm : bttm spm at spi omcoctm azl mcocti ohqir bini obinihm oTmao at Sm qdSi btoebotm aSr eSo oakl atm bapi : eth irHqo at cnotm opgri mlkihm mmni oSknti btokm leolm : ath bn adm hgd at bit iSral at hbit oiklmo meonotihm omddo at tknit : oam nklmo mkl aSr eSo zort hbit otkonto omozaio omobaio okl zorto oat kl Hqtio okl zorto okl torto hode aotm oktb leinihm oiSmro at kl zorto oat kl Hqtio oeSo aotm : cat tort hbit el raS hhr kl gblo sbib sbib qdS qdSim hnh cat tort hbit : oalh mdot hmcbH bamot amh amh oTpH oHiq hamh oamh rHb ogbolh al Spth sbib crt haHd och gb hmcbH : omHiq harz ed hecrh htHtonh Stim amot orHb amh aHt omhecrh hqTnh ed hecrh hgdolh arbe amot orHb hamh : ohhral arbe amot omharail olmelh hqrnot arbe : oharail Stim eSrh ark bStim eSrh rHb rboe al arbet rbeio : ohecrh arbe eSrh ark barbe eSrh rHb al arbet rbeih ohgbol sbib aoth Hzi hamh ohHiq lh amh sbib omeltho pnot qdim : oiamr ali bn adm kh amr adni ihoh alh Hqot hmcbH biom heSoto lhelot elio eolh olcrq elio dm : ontth al hkhnim hloim aSr hm mcre zdoq hqrbim ali nam adni ihoh lSrtni pr bn bqr lHTat : olqHt mdmo ontth el arbe qrntio oal arbe pnot hecrh oal hgbol sbib oHTat aoto okprtho : olqHt at hpr hHTat oSrpo bmpqd hbit mHoz lmqdS : obiom hSni tqrib Seir ecim tmim lHTat oHTao at hmcbH kaSr HTao bpr : bklotk mHTa tqrib pr bn bqr tmim oail mn hzan tmim : ohqrbtm lpni ihoh ohSliko hkhnim elihm mlH ohelo aotm elh lihoh : Sbet imim teSh Seir HTat liom opr bn bqr oail mn hzan tmimim ieSo : Sbet imim ikpro at hmcbH oThro ato omlao ido : oiklo at himim ohih biom hSmini ohlah ieSo hkhnim el hmcbH at eolotikm oat Slmikm orzati atkm nam adni ihoh :

44

oiSb ati drk Ser hmqdS hHizon hpnh qdim ohoa sgor : oiamr ali ihoh hSer hch sgor ihih la iptH oaiS la iba bo ki ihoh alhi iSral ba bo ohih sgor : at hnSia nSia hoa iSb bo lakol lHm lpni ihoh mdrk alm hSer iboa omdrko iza : oibiani drk Ser hzpon al pni hbit oara ohnh mla kbod ihoh at bit ihoh oapl al pni : oiamr ali ihoh bn adm Sim lbk orah beinik obacnik Sme at kl aSr ani mdbr atk lkl Hqot bit ihoh olkl torto oSmt lbk lmboa hbit bkl mozai hmqdS : oamrt al mri al bit iSral kh amr adni ihoh rb lkm mkl toebotikm bit iSral : bhbiakm bni nkr erli lb oerli bSr lhiot bmqdSi lHllo at biti bhqribkm at lHmi Hlb odm oipro at briti al kl toebotikm : ola Smrtm mSmrt qdSi otSimon lSmri mSmrti bmqdSi lkm : kh amr adni ihoh kl bn nkr erl lb oerl bSr la iboa al mqdSi lkl bn nkr aSr btok bni iSral : ki am hloim aSr rHqo meli bteot iSral aSr teo meli aHri glolihm onSao eonm : ohio bmqdSi mSrtim pqdot al Seri hbit omSrtim at hbit hmh iSHTo at helh oat hcbH lem ohmh iemdo lpnihm lSrtm : ien aSr iSrto aotm lpni glolihm ohio lbit iSral lmkSol eon el kn nSati idi elihm nam adni ihoh onSao eonm : ola igSo ali lkhn li olgSt el kl qdSi al qdSi hqdSim onSao klmtm otoebotm aSr eSo : ontti aotm Smri mSmrt hbit lkl ebdto olkl aSr ieSh bo : ohkhnim hloim bni zdoq aSr Smro at mSmrt mqdSi bteot bni iSral meli hmh iqrbo ali lSrtni oemdo lpni lhqrib li Hlb odm nam adni ihoh : hmh ibao al mqdSi ohmh iqrbo al SlHni lSrtni oSmro at mSmrti : ohih bboam al Seri hHzr hpnimit bgdi pStim ilbSo ola ielh elihm zmr bSrtm bSeri hHzr hpnimit obith : pari pStim ihio el raSm omknsi pStim ihio el mtnihm la iHgro bice : obzatm al hHzr hHizonh al hHzr hHizonh al hem ipSTo at bgdihm aSr hmh mSrtm bm ohniHo aotm blSkt hqdS olbSo bgdim aHrim ola iqdSo at hem bbgdihm : oraSm la iglHo opre la iSlHo ksom iksmo at raSihm : oiin la iSto kl khn bboam al hHzr hpnimit : oalmnh ogroSh la iqHo lhm lnSim ki am btolt mcre bit iSral ohalmnh aSr thih almnh mkhn iqHo : oat emi ioro bin qdS lHl obin Tma lThor iodem : oel rib hmh iemdo lSpT bmSpTi oSpTho oat torti oat Hqti bkl moedi iSmro oat Sbtoti iqdSo : oal mt adm la iboa lTmah ki am lab olam olbn olbt laH olaHot aSr la hith laiS iTmao : oaHri Thrto Sbet imim ispro lo : obiom bao al hqdS al hHzr hpnimit lSrt bqdS iqrib HTato nam adni ihoh : ohith lhm lnHlh ani nHltm oaHch la ttno lhm biSral ani aHctm : hmnHh ohHTat ohaSm hmh iaklom okl Hrm biSral lhm ihih : oraSit kl bkori kl okl tromt kl mkl tromotikm lkhnim ihih oraSit ersotikm ttno lkhn lhniH brkh al bitk : kl nblh oTrph mn heop omn hbhmh la iaklo hkhnim :

45

obhpilkm at harz bnHlh trimo tromh lihoh qdS mn harz ark HmSh oeSrim alp ark orHb eSrh alp qdS hoa bkl gbolh sbib : ihih mch al hqdS HmS maot bHmS maot mrbe sbib oHmSim amh mgrS lo sbib : omn hmdh hcat tmod ark HmS oeSrim alp orHb eSrt alpim obo ihih hmqdS qdS qdSim : qdS mn harz hoa lkhnim mSrti hmqdS ihih hqrbim lSrt at ihoh ohih lhm mqom lbtim omqdS lmqdS : oHmSh oeSrim alp ark oeSrt alpim rHb ihih lloim mSrti hbit lhm laHch eSrim lSkt : oaHct heir ttno HmSt alpim rHb oark HmSh oeSrim alp lemt tromt hqdS lkl bit iSral ihih : olnSia mch omch ltromt hqdS olaHct heir al pni tromt hqdS oal pni aHct heir mpat im imh ompat qdmh qdimh oark lemot aHd hHlqim mgbol im al gbol qdimh : larz ihih lo laHch biSral ola iono eod nSiai at emi oharz itno lbit iSral lSbTihm : kh amr adni ihoh rb lkm nSiai iSral Hms oSd hsiro omSpT ozdqh eSo hrimo grStikm mel emi nam adni ihoh : macni zdq oaipt zdq obt zdq ihi lkm : haiph ohbt tkn aHd ihih lSat meSr hHmr hbt oeSirt hHmr haiph al hHmr ihih mtknto : ohSql eSrim grh eSrim Sqlim HmSh oeSrim Sqlim eSrh oHmSh Sql hmnh ihih lkm : cat htromh aSr trimo SSit haiph mHmr hHTim oSSitm haiph mHmr hSerim : oHq hSmn hbt hSmn meSr hbt mn hkr eSrt hbtim Hmr ki eSrt hbtim Hmr : oSh aHt mn hzan mn hmatim mmSqh iSral lmnHh oleolh olSlmim lkpr elihm nam adni ihoh : kl hem harz ihio al htromh hcat lnSia biSral : oel hnSia ihih heolot ohmnHh ohnsk bHgim obHdSim obSbtot bkl moedi bit iSral hoa ieSh at hHTat oat hmnHh oat heolh oat hSlmim lkpr bed bit iSral : kh amr adni ihoh braSon baHd lHdS tqH pr bn bqr tmim oHTat at hmqdS : olqH hkhn mdm hHTat ontn al mcoct hbit oal arbe pnot hecrh lmcbH oel mcoct Ser hHzr hpnimit : okn teSh bSbeh bHdS maiS Sgh ompti okprtm at hbit : braSon barbeh eSr iom lHdS ihih lkm hpsH Hg Sbeot imim mzot iakl : oeSh hnSia biom hhoa bedo obed kl em harz pr HTat : oSbet imi hHg ieSh eolh lihoh Sbet prim oSbet ailim tmimm liom Sbet himim oHTat Seir ecim liom : omnHh aiph lpr oaiph lail ieSh oSmn hin laiph : bSbiei bHmSh eSr iom lHdS bHg ieSh kalh Sbet himim kHTat kelh okmnHh okSmn :

46

kh amr adni ihoh Ser hHzr hpnimit hpnh qdim ihih sgor SSt imi hmeSh obiom hSbt iptH obiom hHdS iptH : oba hnSia drk aolm hSer mHoz oemd el mcoct hSer oeSo hkhnim at eolto oat Slmio ohStHoh el mptn hSer oiza ohSer la isgr ed herb : ohStHoo em harz ptH hSer hhoa bSbtot obHdSim lpni ihoh : ohelh aSr iqrb hnSia lihoh biom hSbt SSh kbSim tmimm oail tmim : omnHh aiph lail olkbSim mnHh mtt ido oSmn hin laiph : obiom hHdS pr bn bqr tmimm oSSt kbSm oail tmimm ihio : oaiph lpr oaiph lail ieSh mnHh olkbSim kaSr tSig ido oSmn hin laiph : obboa hnSia drk aolm hSer iboa obdrko iza : obboa em harz lpni ihoh bmoedim hba drk Ser zpon lhStHot iza drk Ser ngb ohba drk Ser ngb iza drk Ser zponh la iSob drk hSer aSr ba bo ki nkHo izao : ohnSia btokm bboam iboa obzatm izao : obHgim obmoedim thih hmnHh aiph lpr oaiph lail olkbSim mtt ido oSmn hin laiph : oki ieSh hnSia ndbh eolh ao Slmim ndbh lihoh optH lo at hSer hpnh qdim oeSh at elto oat Slmio kaSr ieSh biom hSbt oiza osgr at hSer aHri zato : okbS bn Snto tmim teSh eolh liom lihoh bbqr bbqr teSh ato : omnHh teSh elio bbqr bbqr SSit haiph oSmn SliSit hhin lrs at hslt mnHh lihoh Hqot eolm tmid : oeSo at hkbS oat hmnHh oat hSmn bbqr bbqr eolt tmid : kh amr adni ihoh ki itn hnSia mtnh laiS mbnio nHlto hia lbnio thih aHctm hia bnHlh : oki itn mtnh mnHlto laHd mebdio ohith lo ed Snt hdror oSbt lnSia ak nHlto bnio lhm thih : ola iqH hnSia mnHlt hem lhontm maHctm maHcto inHl at bnio lmen aSr la ipzo emi aiS maHcto : oibiani bmboa aSr el ktp hSer al hlSkot hqdS al hkhnim hpnot zponh ohnh Sm mqom birktm imh : oiamr ali ch hmqom aSr ibSlo Sm hkhnim at haSm oat hHTat aSr iapo at hmnHh lblti hozia al hHzr hHizonh lqdS at hem : oioziani al hHzr hHiznh oiebirni al arbet mqzoei hHzr ohnh Hzr bmqze hHzr Hzr bmqze hHzr : barbet mqzeot hHzr Hzrot qTrot arbeim ark oSlSim rHb mdh aHt larbetm mhqzeot : oTor sbib bhm sbib larbetm ombSlot eSoi mtHt hTirot sbib : oiamr ali alh bit hmbSlim aSr ibSlo Sm mSrti hbit at cbH hem :

47
