lmnzH al hnHilot mcmor ldod amri hacinh ihoh binh hgigi : hqSibh lqol Soei mlki oalhi ki alik atpll : ihoh bqr tSme qoli bqr aerk lk oazph : ki la al Hpz rSe ath la igrk re : la itizbo hollim lngd einik Snat kl peli aon : tabd dbri kcb aiS dmim omrmh iteb ihoh : oani brb Hsdk aboa bitk aStHoh al hikl qdSk biratk : ihoh nHni bzdqtk lmen Sorri hoSr lpni drkk : ki ain bpiho nkonh qrbm hoot qbr ptoH gronm lSonm iHliqon : haSimm alhim iplo mmezotihm brb pSeihm hdiHmo ki mro bk : oiSmHo kl Hosi bk leolm irnno otsk elimo oielzo bk ahbi Smk : ki ath tbrk zdiq ihoh kznh rzon teTrno :

6

lmnzH bnginot el hSminit mcmor ldod ihoh al bapk tokiHni oal bHmtk tisrni : Hnni ihoh ki amll ani rpani ihoh ki nbhlo ezmi : onpSi nbhlh mad oat ihoh ed mti : Sobh ihoh Hlzh npSi hoSieni lmen Hsdk : ki ain bmot ckrk bSaol mi iodh lk : igeti banHti aSHh bkl lilh mTti bdmeti erSi amsh : eSSh mkes eini etqh bkl zorri : soro mmni kl peli aon ki Sme ihoh qol bkii : Sme ihoh tHnti ihoh tplti iqH : ibSo oibhlo mad kl aibi iSbo ibSo rge :

7

Sgion ldod aSr Sr lihoh el dbri koS bn imini ihoh alhi bk Hsiti hoSieni mkl rdpi ohzilni : pn iTrp karih npSi prq oain mzil : ihoh alhi am eSiti cat am iS eol bkpi : am gmlti Solmi re oaHlzh zorri riqm : irdp aoib npSi oiSg oirms larz Hii okbodi lepr iSkn slh : qomh ihoh bapk hnSa bebrot zorri oeorh ali mSpT zoit : oedt lamim tsobbk oelih lmrom Sobh : ihoh idin emim SpTni ihoh kzdqi oktmi eli : igmr na re rSeim otkonn zdiq obHn lbot okliot alhim zdiq : mgni el alhim moSie iSri lb : alhim SopT zdiq oal cem bkl iom : am la iSob Hrbo ilToS qSto drk oikonnh : olo hkin kli mot Hzio ldlqim ipel : hnh iHbl aon ohrh eml oild Sqr : bor krh oiHprho oipl bSHt ipel : iSob emlo braSo oel qdqdo Hmso ird : aodh ihoh kzdqo oacmrh Sm ihoh elion :

8

lmnzH el hgtit mcmor ldod ihoh adnino mh adir Smk bkl harz aSr tnh hodk el hSmim : mpi eollim oinqim isdt ec lmen zorrik lhSbit aoib omtnqm : ki arah Smik meSi azbetik irH okokbim aSr konnth : mh anoS ki tckrno obn adm ki tpqdno : otHsrho meT malhim okbod ohdr teTrho : tmSilho bmeSi idik kl Sth tHt rglio : znh oalpim klm ogm bhmot Sdi : zpor Smim odgi him ebr arHot imim : ihoh adnino mh adir Smk bkl harz :

9

lmnzH elmot lbn mcmor ldod aodh ihoh bkl lbi asprh kl nplaotik : aSmHh oaelzh bk acmrh Smk elion : bSob aoibi aHor ikSlo oiabdo mpnik : ki eSit mSpTi odini iSbt lksa SopT zdq : gert goim abdt rSe Smm mHit leolm oed : haoib tmo Hrbot lnzH oerim ntSt abd ckrm hmh : oihoh leolm iSb konn lmSpT ksao : ohoa iSpT tbl bzdq idin lamim bmiSrim : oihi ihoh mSgb ldk mSgb letot bzrh : oibTHo bk iodei Smk ki la ecbt drSik ihoh : cmro lihoh iSb zion hgido bemim elilotio : ki drS dmim aotm ckr la SkH zeqt eniim : Hnnni ihoh rah enii mSnai mrommi mSeri mot : lmen asprh kl thltik bSeri bt zion agilh biSoetk : Tbeo goim bSHt eSo brSt co Tmno nlkdh rglm : node ihoh mSpT eSh bpel kpio noqS rSe hgion slh : iSobo rSeim lSaolh kl goim SkHi alhim : ki la lnzH iSkH abion tqot enoim tabd led : qomh ihoh al iec anoS iSpTo goim el pnik : Sith ihoh morh lhm ideo goim anoS hmh slh :

10

lmh ihoh temd brHoq telim letot bzrh : bgaot rSe idlq eni itpSo bmcmot co HSbo : ki hll rSe el taot npSo obze brk naz ihoh : rSe kgbh apo bl idrS ain alhim kl mcmotio : iHilo drko bkl et mrom mSpTik mngdo kl zorrio ipiH bhm : amr blbo bl amoT ldr odr aSr la bre : alh piho mla omrmot otk tHt lSono eml oaon : iSb bmarb Hzrim bmstrim ihrg nqi einio lHlkh izpno : iarb bmstr karih bskh iarb lHTop eni iHTp eni bmSko brSto : odkh iSH onpl bezomio Hlkaim : amr blbo SkH al hstir pnio bl rah lnzH : qomh ihoh al nSa idk al tSkH eniim : el mh naz rSe alhim amr blbo la tdrS : rath ki ath eml okes tbiT ltt bidk elik iecb Hlkh itom ath hiit eocr : Sbr croe rSe ore tdroS rSeo bl tmza : ihoh mlk eolm oed abdo goim marzo : taot enoim Smet ihoh tkin lbm tqSib acnk : lSpT itom odk bl iosip eod lerz anoS mn harz :

11

lmnzH ldod bihoh Hsiti aik tamro lnpSi nodo hrkm zpor : ki hnh hrSeim idrkon qSt konno Hzm el itr lirot bmo apl liSri lb : ki hStot ihrson zdiq mh pel : ihoh bhikl qdSo ihoh bSmim ksao einio iHco epepio ibHno bni adm : ihoh zdiq ibHn orSe oahb Hms Snah npSo : imTr el rSeim pHim aS ogprit oroH clepot mnt kosm : ki zdiq ihoh zdqot ahb iSr iHco pnimo :

12

lmnzH el hSminit mcmor ldod hoSieh ihoh ki gmr Hsid ki pso amonim mbni adm : Soa idbro aiS at reho Spt Hlqot blb olb idbro : ikrt ihoh kl Spti Hlqot lSon mdbrt gdlot : aSr amro llSnno ngbir Sptino atno mi adon lno : mSd eniim manqt abionim eth aqom iamr ihoh aSit biSe ipiH lo : amrot ihoh amrot Throt ksp zrop belil larz mcqq Sbetim : ath ihoh tSmrm tzrno mn hdor co leolm : sbib rSeim ithlkon krm clot lbni adm :

13

lmnzH mcmor ldod ed anh ihoh tSkHni nzH ed anh tstir at pnik mmni : ed anh aSit ezot bnpSi igon blbbi iomm ed anh irom aibi eli : hbiTh enni ihoh alhi hairh eini pn aiSn hmot : pn iamr aibi ikltio zri igilo ki amoT : oani bHsdk bTHti igl lbi biSoetk : aSirh lihoh ki gml eli :

14

lmnzH ldod amr nbl blbo ain alhim hSHito hteibo elilh ain eSh Tob : ihoh mSmim hSqip el bni adm lraot hiS mSkil drS at alhim : hkl sr iHdo nalHo ain eSh Tob ain gm aHd : hla ideo kl peli aon akli emi aklo lHm ihoh la qrao : Sm pHdo pHd ki alhim bdor zdiq : ezt eni tbiSo ki ihoh mHsho : mi itn mzion iSoet iSral bSob ihoh Sbot emo igl ieqb iSmH iSral :

15

mcmor ldod ihoh mi igor bahlk mi iSkn bhr qdSk : holk tmim opel zdq odbr amt blbbo : la rgl el lSno la eSh lreho reh oHrph la nSa el qrbo : nbch beinio nmas oat irai ihoh ikbd nSbe lhre ola imr : kspo la ntn bnSk oSHd el nqi la lqH eSh alh la imoT leolm :

16

mktm ldod Smrni al ki Hsiti bk : amrt lihoh adni ath Tobti bl elik : lqdoSim aSr barz hmh oadiri kl Hpzi bm : irbo ezbotm aHr mhro bl asik nskihm mdm obl aSa at Smotm el Spti : ihoh mnt Hlqi okosi ath tomik gorli : Hblim nplo li bnemim ap nHlt Sprh eli : abrk at ihoh aSr iezni ap lilot isroni klioti : Soiti ihoh lngdi tmid ki mimini bl amoT : lkn SmH lbi oigl kbodi ap bSri iSkn lbTH : ki la tecb npSi lSaol la ttn Hsidk lraot SHt : todieni arH Hiim Sbe SmHot at pnik nemot bimink nzH :

17

tplh ldod Smeh ihoh zdq hqSibh rnti hacinh tplti bla Spti mrmh : mlpnik mSpTi iza einik tHcinh miSrim : bHnt lbi pqdt lilh zrptni bl tmza cmti bl iebr pi : lpelot adm bdbr Sptik ani Smrti arHot priz : tmk aSri bmeglotik bl nmoTo pemi : ani qratik ki tenni al hT acnk li Sme amrti : hplh Hsdik moSie Hosim mmtqommim bimink : Smrni kaiSon bt ein bzl knpik tstirni : mpni rSeim co Sdoni aibi bnpS iqipo eli : Hlbmo sgro pimo dbro bgaot : aSrino eth sbboni einihm iSito lnTot barz : dmino karih iksop lTrop okkpir iSb bmstrim : qomh ihoh qdmh pnio hkrieho plTh npSi mrSe Hrbk : mmtim idk ihoh mmtim mHld Hlqm bHiim ozpink tmla bTnm iSbeo bnim ohniHo itrm leollihm : ani bzdq aHch pnik aSbeh bhqiz tmontk :

18

lmnzH lebd ihoh ldod aSr dbr lihoh at dbri hSirh hcat biom hzil ihoh aoto mkp kl aibio omid Saol oiamr arHmk ihoh Hcqi : ihoh slei omzodti omplTi ali zori aHsh bo mgni oqrn iSei mSgbi : mhll aqra ihoh omn aibi aoSe : apponi Hbli mot onHli bliel ibetoni : Hbli Saol sbboni qdmoni moqSi mot : bzr li aqra ihoh oal alhi aSoe iSme mhiklo qoli oSoeti lpnio tboa bacnio : otgeS otreS harz omosdi hrim irgco oitgeSo ki Hrh lo : elh eSn bapo oaS mpio takl gHlim bero mmno : oiT Smim oird oerpl tHt rglio : oirkb el krob oiep oida el knpi roH : iSt HSk stro sbibotio skto HSkt mim ebi SHqim : mngh ngdo ebio ebro brd ogHli aS : oirem bSmim ihoh oelion itn qlo brd ogHli aS : oiSlH Hzio oipizm obrqim rb oihmm : oirao apiqi mim oiglo mosdot tbl mgertk ihoh mnSmt roH apk : iSlH mmrom iqHni imSni mmim rbim : izilni maibi ec omSnai ki amzo mmni : iqdmoni biom aidi oihi ihoh lmSen li : oioziani lmrHb iHlzni ki Hpz bi : igmlni ihoh kzdqi kbr idi iSib li : ki Smrti drki ihoh ola rSeti malhi : ki kl mSpTio lngdi oHqtio la asir mni : oahi tmim emo oaStmr meoni : oiSb ihoh li kzdqi kbr idi lngd einio : em Hsid ttHsd em gbr tmim ttmm : em nbr ttbrr oem eqS ttptl : ki ath em eni toSie oeinim rmot tSpil : ki ath tair nri ihoh alhi igih HSki : ki bk arz gdod obalhi adlg Sor : hal tmim drko amrt ihoh zroph mgn hoa lkl hHsim bo : ki mi aloh mbledi ihoh omi zor colti alhino : hal hmacrni Hil oitn tmim drki : mSoh rgli kailot oel bmti iemidni : mlmd idi lmlHmh onHth qSt nHoSh croeti : ottn li mgn iSek oimink tsedni oenotk trbni : trHib zedi tHti ola medo qrsli : ardop aoibi oaSigm ola aSob ed klotm : amHzm ola iklo qom iplo tHt rgli : otacrni Hil lmlHmh tkrie qmi tHti : oaibi ntth li erp omSnai azmitm : iSoeo oain moSie el ihoh ola enm : oaSHqm kepr el pni roH kTiT Hozot ariqm : tplTni mribi em tSimni lraS goim em la ideti iebdoni : lSme acn iSmeo li bni nkr ikHSo li : bni nkr iblo oiHrgo mmsgrotihm : Hi ihoh obrok zori oirom alohi iSei : hal hnotn nqmot li oidbr emim tHti : mplTi maibi ap mn qmi trommni maiS Hms tzilni : el kn aodk bgoim ihoh olSmk acmrh : mgdl iSoeot mlko oeSh Hsd lmSiHo ldod olcreo ed eolm :

19

lmnzH mcmor ldod hSmim msprim kbod al omeSh idio mgid hrqie : iom liom ibie amr olilh llilh iHoh det : ain amr oain dbrim bli nSme qolm : bkl harz iza qom obqzh tbl mlihm lSmS Sm ahl bhm : ohoa kHtn iza mHpto iSiS kgbor lroz arH : mqzh hSmim mozao otqopto el qzotm oain nstr mHmto : tort ihoh tmimh mSibt npS edot ihoh namnh mHkimt pti : pqodi ihoh iSrim mSmHi lb mzot ihoh brh mairt einim : irat ihoh Thorh eomdt led mSpTi ihoh amt zdqo iHdo : hnHmdim mchb ompc rb omtoqim mdbS onpt zopim : gm ebdk nchr bhm bSmrm eqb rb : Sgiaot mi ibin mnstrot nqni : gm mcdim HSk ebdk al imSlo bi ac aitm onqiti mpSe rb : ihio lrzon amri pi ohgion lbi lpnik ihoh zori ogali :

20

lmnzH mcmor ldod ienk ihoh biom zrh iSgbk Sm alhi ieqb : iSlH ecrk mqdS omzion isedk : ickr kl mnHtk oeoltk idSnh slh : itn lk klbbk okl eztk imla : nrnnh biSoetk obSm alhino ndgl imla ihoh kl mSalotik : eth ideti ki hoSie ihoh mSiHo ienho mSmi qdSo bgbrot iSe imino : alh brkb oalh bsosim oanHno bSm ihoh alhino nckir : hmh kreo onplo oanHno qmno onteodd : ihoh hoSieh hmlk ienno biom qrano :

21

lmnzH mcmor ldod ihoh beck iSmH mlk obiSoetk mh igil mad : taot lbo ntth lo oarSt Sptio bl mnet slh : ki tqdmno brkot Tob tSit lraSo eTrt pc : Hiim Sal mmk ntth lo ark imim eolm oed : gdol kbodo biSoetk hod ohdr tSoh elio : ki tSitho brkot led tHdho bSmHh at pnik : ki hmlk bTH bihoh obHsd elion bl imoT : tmza idk lkl aibik imink tmza Snaik : tSitmo ktnor aS let pnik ihoh bapo iblem otaklm aS : primo marz tabd ocrem mbni adm : ki nTo elik reh HSbo mcmh bl ioklo : ki tSitmo Skm bmitrik tkonn el pnihm : romh ihoh beck nSirh oncmrh gbortk :

22

lmnzH el ailt hSHr mcmor ldod ali ali lmh ecbtni rHoq miSoeti dbri Sagti : alhi aqra iomm ola tenh olilh ola domih li : oath qdoS ioSb thlot iSral : bk bTHo abtino bTHo otplTmo : alik ceqo onmlTo bk bTHo ola boSo : oanki tolet ola aiS Hrpt adm obcoi em : kl rai ilego li ipTiro bSph inieo raS : gl al ihoh iplTho izilho ki Hpz bo : ki ath gHi mbTn mbTiHi el Sdi ami : elik hSlkti mrHm mbTn ami ali ath : al trHq mmni ki zrh qrobh ki ain eocr : sbboni prim rbim abiri bSn ktroni : pzo eli pihm arih Trp oSag : kmim nSpkti ohtprdo kl ezmoti hih lbi kdong nms btok mei : ibS kHrS kHi olSoni mdbq mlqoHi olepr mot tSptni : ki sbboni klbim edt mreim hqiponi kari idi orgli : aspr kl ezmoti hmh ibiTo irao bi : iHlqo bgdi lhm oel lboSi ipilo gorl : oath ihoh al trHq ailoti lecrti HoSh : hzilh mHrb npSi mid klb iHidti : hoSieni mpi arih omqrni rmim enitni : asprh Smk laHi btok qhl ahllk : irai ihoh hlloho kl cre ieqb kbdoho ogoro mmno kl cre iSral : ki la bch ola Sqz enot eni ola hstir pnio mmno obSoeo alio Sme : matk thlti bqhl rb ndri aSlm ngd iraio : iaklo enoim oiSbeo ihllo ihoh drSio iHi lbbkm led : ickro oiSbo al ihoh kl apsi arz oiStHoo lpnik kl mSpHot goim : ki lihoh hmlokh omSl bgoim : aklo oiStHoo kl dSni arz lpnio ikreo kl iordi epr onpSo la Hih : cre iebdno ispr ladni ldor : ibao oigido zdqto lem nold ki eSh :

23

mcmor ldod ihoh rei la aHsr : bnaot dSa irbizni el mi mnHot inhlni : npSi iSobb inHni bmegli zdq lmen Smo : gm ki alk bgia zlmot la aira re ki ath emdi SbTk omSentk hmh inHmni : terk lpni SlHn ngd zrri dSnt bSmn raSi kosi roih : ak Tob oHsd irdponi kl imi Hii oSbti bbit ihoh lark imim :

24

ldod mcmor lihoh harz omloah tbl oiSbi bh : ki hoa el imim isdh oel nhrot ikonnh : mi ielh bhr ihoh omi iqom bmqom qdSo : nqi kpim obr lbb aSr la nSa lSoa npSi ola nSbe lmrmh : iSa brkh mat ihoh ozdqh malhi iSeo : ch dor drSo mbqSi pnik ieqb slh : Sao Serim raSikm ohnSao ptHi eolm oiboa mlk hkbod : mi ch mlk hkbod ihoh ecoc ogbor ihoh gbor mlHmh : Sao Serim raSikm oSao ptHi eolm oiba mlk hkbod : mi hoa ch mlk hkbod ihoh zbaot hoa mlk hkbod slh :

25

ldod alik ihoh npSi aSa : alhi bk bTHti al aboSh al ielzo aibi li : gm kl qoik la ibSo ibSo hbogdim riqm : drkik ihoh hodieni arHotik lmdni : hdrikni bamtk olmdni ki ath alhi iSei aotk qoiti kl hiom : ckr rHmik ihoh oHsdik ki meolm hmh : HTaot neori opSei al tckr kHsdk ckr li ath lmen Tobk ihoh : Tob oiSr ihoh el kn iorh HTaim bdrk : idrk enoim bmSpT oilmd enoim drko : kl arHot ihoh Hsd oamt lnzri brito oedtio : lmen Smk ihoh oslHt leoni ki rb hoa : mi ch haiS ira ihoh iorno bdrk ibHr : npSo bTob tlin ocreo iirS arz : sod ihoh liraio obrito lhodiem : eini tmid al ihoh ki hoa iozia mrSt rgli : pnh ali oHnni ki iHid oeni ani : zrot lbbi hrHibo mmzoqoti hoziani : rah enii oemli oSa lkl HTaoti : rah aoibi ki rbo oSnat Hms Snaoni : Smrh npSi ohzilni al aboS ki Hsiti bk : tm oiSr izroni ki qoitik : pdh alhim at iSral mkl zrotio :

26

ldod SpTni ihoh ki ani btmi hlkti obihoh bTHti la amed : bHnni ihoh onsni zroph klioti olbi : ki Hsdk lngd eini ohthlkti bamtk : la iSbti em mti Soa oem nelmim la aboa : Snati qhl mreim oem rSeim la aSb : arHz bnqion kpi oasbbh at mcbHk ihoh : lSme bqol todh olspr kl nplaotik : ihoh ahbti meon bitk omqom mSkn kbodk : al tasp em HTaim npSi oem anSi dmim Hii : aSr bidihm cmh oiminm mlah SHd : oani btmi alk pdni oHnni : rgli emdh bmiSor bmqhlim abrk ihoh :

27

ldod ihoh aori oiSei mmi aira ihoh meoc Hii mmi apHd : bqrb eli mreim lakl at bSri zri oaibi li hmh kSlo onplo : am tHnh eli mHnh la iira lbi am tqom eli mlHmh bcat ani boTH : aHt Salti mat ihoh aoth abqS Sbti bbit ihoh kl imi Hii lHcot bnem ihoh olbqr bhiklo : ki izpnni bskh biom reh istrni bstr ahlo bzor irommni : oeth irom raSi el aibi sbiboti oacbHh bahlo cbHi troeh aSirh oacmrh lihoh : Sme ihoh qoli aqra oHnni oenni : lk amr lbi bqSo pni at pnik ihoh abqS : al tstr pnik mmni al tT bap ebdk ecrti hiit al tTSni oal tecbni alhi iSei : ki abi oami ecboni oihoh iaspni : horni ihoh drkk onHni barH miSor lmen Sorri : al ttnni bnpS zri ki qmo bi edi Sqr oipH Hms : lola hamnti lraot bTob ihoh barz Hiim : qoh al ihoh Hcq oiamz lbk oqoh al ihoh :

28

ldod alik ihoh aqra zori al tHrS mmni pn tHSh mmni onmSlti em iordi bor : Sme qol tHnoni bSoei alik bnSai idi al dbir qdSk : al tmSkni em rSeim oem peli aon dbri Slom em reihm oreh blbbm : tn lhm kpelm okre mellihm kmeSh idihm tn lhm hSb gmolm lhm : ki la ibino al pelt ihoh oal meSh idio ihrsm ola ibnm : brok ihoh ki Sme qol tHnoni : ihoh eci omgni bo bTH lbi onecrti oielc lbi omSiri ahodno : ihoh ec lmo omeoc iSoeot mSiHo hoa : hoSieh at emk obrk at nHltk orem onSam ed heolm :

29

mcmor ldod hbo lihoh bni alim hbo lihoh kbod oec : hbo lihoh kbod Smo hStHoo lihoh bhdrt qdS : qol ihoh el hmim al hkbod hreim ihoh el mim rbim : qol ihoh bkH qol ihoh bhdr : qol ihoh Sbr arcim oiSbr ihoh at arci hlbnon : oirqidm kmo egl lbnon oSrin kmo bn ramim : qol ihoh Hzb lhbot aS : qol ihoh iHil mdbr iHil ihoh mdbr qdS : qol ihoh iHoll ailot oiHSp ierot obhiklo klo amr kbod : ihoh lmbol iSb oiSb ihoh mlk leolm : ihoh ec lemo itn ihoh ibrk at emo bSlom :

30

mcmor Sir Hnkt hbit ldod arommk ihoh ki dlitni ola SmHt aibi li : ihoh alhi Soeti alik otrpani : ihoh helit mn Saol npSi Hiitni miordi bor : cmro lihoh Hsidio ohodo lckr qdSo : ki rge bapo Hiim brzono berb ilin bki olbqr rnh : oani amrti bSloi bl amoT leolm : ihoh brzonk hemdth lhrri ec hstrt pnik hiiti nbhl : alik ihoh aqra oal adni atHnn : mh bze bdmi brdti al SHt hiodk epr higid amtk : Sme ihoh oHnni ihoh hih ecr li : hpkt mspdi lmHol li ptHt Sqi otacrni SmHh : lmen icmrk kbod ola idm ihoh alhi leolm aodk :

31

lmnzH mcmor ldod bk ihoh Hsiti al aboSh leolm bzdqtk plTni : hTh ali acnk mhrh hzilni hih li lzor meoc lbit mzodot lhoSieni : ki slei omzodti ath olmen Smk tnHni otnhlni : toziani mrSt co Tmno li ki ath meoci : bidk apqid roHi pdith aoti ihoh al amt : Snati hSmrim hbli Soa oani al ihoh bTHti : agilh oaSmHh bHsdk aSr rait at enii idet bzrot npSi : ola hsgrtni bid aoib hemdt bmrHb rgli : Hnni ihoh ki zr li eSSh bkes eini npSi obTni : ki klo bigon Hii oSnoti banHh kSl beoni kHi oezmi eSSo : mkl zrri hiiti Hrph olSkni mad opHd lmidei rai bHoz nddo mmni : nSkHti kmt mlb hiiti kkli abd : ki Smeti dbt rbim mgor msbib bhosdm iHd eli lqHt npSi cmmo : oani elik bTHti ihoh amrti alhi ath : bidk etti hzilni mid aoibi omrdpi : hairh pnik el ebdk hoSieni bHsdk : ihoh al aboSh ki qratik ibSo rSeim idmo lSaol : talmnh Spti Sqr hdbrot el zdiq etq bgaoh oboc : mh rb Tobk aSr zpnt liraik pelt lHsim bk ngd bni adm : tstirm bstr pnik mrksi aiS tzpnm bskh mrib lSnot : brok ihoh ki hplia Hsdo li beir mzor : oani amrti bHpci ngrcti mngd einik akn Smet qol tHnoni bSoei alik : ahbo at ihoh kl Hsidio amonim nzr ihoh omSlm el itr eSh gaoh : Hcqo oiamz lbbkm kl hmiHlim lihoh :

32

ldod mSkil aSri nSoi pSe ksoi HTah : aSri adm la iHSb ihoh lo eon oain broHo rmih : ki hHrSti blo ezmi bSagti kl hiom : ki iomm olilh tkbd eli idk nhpk lSdi bHrbni qiz slh : HTati aodiek oeoni la ksiti amrti aodh eli pSei lihoh oath nSat eon HTati slh : el cat itpll kl Hsid alik let mza rq lSTp mim rbim alio la igieo : ath str li mzr tzrni rni plT tsobbni slh : aSkilk oaork bdrk co tlk aiezh elik eini : al thio ksos kprd ain hbin bmtg orsn edio lblom bl qrb alik : rbim mkaobim lrSe ohboTH bihoh Hsd isobbno : SmHo bihoh ogilo zdiqim ohrnino kl iSri lb :

33

rnno zdiqim bihoh liSrim naoh thlh : hodo lihoh bknor bnbl eSor cmro lo : Siro lo Sir HdS hiTibo ngn btroeh : ki iSr dbr ihoh okl meSho bamonh : ahb zdqh omSpT Hsd ihoh mlah harz : bdbr ihoh Smim neSo obroH pio kl zbam : kns knd mi him ntn bazrot thomot : iirao mihoh kl harz mmno igoro kl iSbi tbl : ki hoa amr oihi hoa zoh oiemd : ihoh hpir ezt goim hnia mHSbot emim : ezt ihoh leolm temd mHSbot lbo ldr odr : aSri hgoi aSr ihoh alhio hem bHr lnHlh lo : mSmim hbiT ihoh rah at kl bni hadm : mmkon Sbto hSgiH al kl iSbi harz : hizr iHd lbm hmbin al kl meSihm : ain hmlk noSe brb Hil gbor la inzl brb kH : Sqr hsos ltSoeh obrb Hilo la imlT : hnh ein ihoh al iraio lmiHlim lHsdo : lhzil mmot npSm olHiotm breb : npSno Hkth lihoh ecrno omgnno hoa : ki bo iSmH lbno ki bSm qdSo bTHno : ihi Hsdk ihoh elino kaSr iHlno lk :

34

ldod bSnoto at Temo lpni abimlk oigrSho oilk abrkh at ihoh bkl et tmid thlto bpi : bihoh tthll npSi iSmeo enoim oiSmHo : gdlo lihoh ati onrommh Smo iHdo : drSti at ihoh oenni omkl mgoroti hzilni : hbiTo alio onhro opnihm al iHpro : ch eni qra oihoh Sme omkl zrotio hoSieo : Hnh mlak ihoh sbib liraio oiHlzm : Temo orao ki Tob ihoh aSri hgbr iHsh bo : irao at ihoh qdSio ki ain mHsor liraio : kpirim rSo orebo odrSi ihoh la iHsro kl Tob : lko bnim Smeo li irat ihoh almdkm : mi haiS hHpz Hiim ahb imim lraot Tob : nzr lSonk mre oSptik mdbr mrmh : sor mre oeSh Tob bqS Slom ordpho : eini ihoh al zdiqim oacnio al Soetm : pni ihoh beSi re lhkrit marz ckrm : zeqo oihoh Sme omkl zrotm hzilm : qrob ihoh lnSbri lb oat dkai roH ioSie : rbot reot zdiq omklm izilno ihoh : Smr kl ezmotio aHt mhnh la nSbrh : tmott rSe reh oSnai zdiq iaSmo : podh ihoh npS ebdio ola iaSmo kl hHsim bo :

35

ldod ribh ihoh at iribi lHm at lHmi : hHcq mgn oznh oqomh becrti : ohrq Hnit osgr lqrat rdpi amr lnpSi iSetk ani : ibSo oiklmo mbqSi npSi isgo aHor oiHpro HSbi reti : ihio kmz lpni roH omlak ihoh doHh : ihi drkm HSk oHlqlqot omlak ihoh rdpm : ki Hnm Tmno li SHt rStm Hnm Hpro lnpSi : tboaho Soah la ide orSto aSr Tmn tlkdo bSoah ipl bh : onpSi tgil bihoh tSiS biSoeto : kl ezmoti tamrnh ihoh mi kmok mzil eni mHcq mmno oeni oabion mgclo : iqomon edi Hms aSr la ideti iSaloni : iSlmoni reh tHt Tobh Skol lnpSi : oani bHlotm lboSi Sq eniti bzom npSi otplti el Hiqi tSob : kre kaH li hthlkti kabl am qdr SHoti : obzlei SmHo onaspo naspo eli nkim ola ideti qreo ola dmo : bHnpi legi meog Hrq eli Snimo : adni kmh trah hSibh npSi mSaihm mkpirim iHidti : aodk bqhl rb bem ezom ahllk : al iSmHo li aibi Sqr Snai Hnm iqrzo ein : ki la Slom idbro oel rgei arz dbri mrmot iHSbon : oirHibo eli pihm amro haH haH rath einino : raith ihoh al tHrS adni al trHq mmni : heirh ohqizh lmSpTi alhi oadni lribi : SpTni kzdqk ihoh alhi oal iSmHo li : al iamro blbm haH npSno al iamro blenoho : ibSo oiHpro iHdo SmHi reti ilbSo bSt oklmh hmgdilim eli : irno oiSmHo Hpzi zdqi oiamro tmid igdl ihoh hHpz Slom ebdo : olSoni thgh zdqk kl hiom thltk :

36

lmnzH lebd ihoh ldod nam pSe lrSe bqrb lbi ain pHd alhim lngd einio : ki hHliq alio beinio lmza eono lSna : dbri pio aon omrmh Hdl lhSkil lhiTib : aon iHSb el mSkbo itizb el drk la Tob re la imas : ihoh bhSmim Hsdk amontk ed SHqim : zdqtk khrri al mSpTk thom rbh adm obhmh toSie ihoh : mh iqr Hsdk alhim obni adm bzl knpik iHsion : iroin mdSn bitk onHl ednik tSqm : ki emk mqor Hiim baork nrah aor : mSk Hsdk lideik ozdqtk liSri lb : al tboani rgl gaoh oid rSeim al tndni : Sm nplo peli aon dHo ola iklo qom :

37

ldod al ttHr bmreim al tqna beSi eolh : ki kHzir mhrh imlo okirq dSa ibolon : bTH bihoh oeSh Tob Skn arz oreh amonh : ohteng el ihoh oitn lk mSalt lbk : gol el ihoh drkk obTH elio ohoa ieSh : ohozia kaor zdqk omSpTk kzhrim : dom lihoh ohtHoll lo al ttHr bmzliH drko baiS eSh mcmot : hrp map oecb Hmh al ttHr ak lhre : ki mreim ikrton oqoi ihoh hmh iirSo arz : oeod meT oain rSe ohtbonnt el mqomo oainno : oenoim iirSo arz ohtengo el rb Slom : cmm rSe lzdiq oHrq elio Snio : adni iSHq lo ki rah ki iba iomo : Hrb ptHo rSeim odrko qStm lhpil eni oabion lTboH iSri drk : Hrbm tboa blbm oqStotm tSbrnh : Tob meT lzdiq mhmon rSeim rbim : ki croeot rSeim tSbrnh osomk zdiqim ihoh : iode ihoh imi tmimm onHltm leolm thih : la ibSo bet reh obimi rebon iSbeo : ki rSeim iabdo oaibi ihoh kiqr krim klo beSn klo : loh rSe ola iSlm ozdiq Honn onotn : ki mbrkio iirSo arz omqllio ikrto : mihoh mzedi gbr konno odrko iHpz : ki ipl la ioTl ki ihoh somk ido : ner hiiti gm cqnti ola raiti zdiq necb ocreo mbqS lHm : kl hiom Honn omloh ocreo lbrkh : sor mre oeSh Tob oSkn leolm : ki ihoh ahb mSpT ola iecb at Hsidio leolm nSmro ocre rSeim nkrt : zdiqim iirSo arz oiSkno led elih : pi zdiq ihgh Hkmh olSono tdbr mSpT : tort alhio blbo la tmed aSrio : zoph rSe lzdiq ombqS lhmito : ihoh la iecbno bido ola irSieno bhSpTo : qoh al ihoh oSmr drko oirommk lrSt arz bhkrt rSeim trah : raiti rSe eriz omterh kacrH renn : oiebr ohnh ainno oabqSho ola nmza : Smr tm orah iSr ki aHrit laiS Slom : opSeim nSmdo iHdo aHrit rSeim nkrth : otSoet zdiqim mihoh meocm bet zrh : oiecrm ihoh oiplTm iplTm mrSeim oioSiem ki Hso bo :

38

mcmor ldod lhckir ihoh al bqzpk tokiHni obHmtk tisrni : ki Hzik nHto bi otnHt eli idk : ain mtm bbSri mpni cemk ain Slom bezmi mpni HTati : ki eonti ebro raSi kmSa kbd ikbdo mmni : hbaiSo nmqo Hborti mpni aolti : neoiti SHti ed mad kl hiom qdr hlkti : ki ksli mlao nqlh oain mtm bbSri : npogoti ondkiti ed mad Sagti mnhmt lbi : adni ngdk kl taoti oanHti mmk la nstrh : lbi sHrHr ecbni kHi oaor eini gm hm ain ati : ahbi orei mngd ngei iemdo oqrobi mrHq emdo : oinqSo mbqSi npSi odrSi reti dbro hoot omrmot kl hiom ihgo : oani kHrS la aSme okalm la iptH pio : oahi kaiS aSr la Sme oain bpio tokHot : ki lk ihoh hoHlti ath tenh adni alhi : ki amrti pn iSmHo li bmoT rgli eli hgdilo : ki ani lzle nkon omkaobi ngdi tmid : ki eoni agid adag mHTati : oaibi Hiim ezmo orbo Snai Sqr : omSlmi reh tHt Tobh iSTnoni tHt rdopi Tob : al tecbni ihoh alhi al trHq mmni : HoSh lecrti adni tSoeti :

39

lmnzH liditon mcmor ldod amrti aSmrh drki mHToa blSoni aSmrh lpi mHsom bed rSe lngdi : nalmti domih hHSiti mTob okabi nekr : Hm lbi bqrbi bhgigi tber aS dbrti blSoni : hodieni ihoh qzi omdt imi mh hia adeh mh Hdl ani : hnh TpHot ntth imi oHldi kain ngdk ak kl hbl kl adm nzb slh : ak bzlm ithlk aiS ak hbl ihmion izbr ola ide mi aspm : oeth mh qoiti adni toHlti lk hia : mkl pSei hzilni Hrpt nbl al tSimni : nalmti la aptH pi ki ath eSit : hsr meli ngek mtgrt idk ani kliti : btokHot el eon isrt aiS otms keS Hmodo ak hbl kl adm slh : Smeh tplti ihoh oSoeti hacinh al dmeti al tHrS ki gr anki emk toSb kkl aboti : hSe mmni oabligh bTrm alk oainni :

40

lmnzH ldod mcmor qoh qoiti ihoh oiT ali oiSme Soeti : oielni mbor Saon mTiT hion oiqm el sle rgli konn aSri : oitn bpi Sir HdS thlh lalhino irao rbim oiirao oibTHo bihoh : aSri hgbr aSr Sm ihoh mbTHo ola pnh al rhbim oSTi kcb : rbot eSit ath ihoh alhi nplatik omHSbtik alino ain erk alik agidh oadbrh ezmo mspr : cbH omnHh la Hpzt acnim krit li eolh oHTah la Salt : ac amrti hnh bati bmglt spr ktob eli : leSot rzonk alhi Hpzti otortk btok mei : bSrti zdq bqhl rb hnh Spti la akla ihoh ath idet : zdqtk la ksiti btok lbi amontk otSoetk amrti la kHdti Hsdk oamtk lqhl rb : ath ihoh la tkla rHmik mmni Hsdk oamtk tmid izroni : ki appo eli reot ed ain mspr hSigoni eonti ola iklti lraot ezmo mSerot raSi olbi ecbni : rzh ihoh lhzilni ihoh lecrti HoSh : ibSo oiHpro iHd mbqSi npSi lspoth isgo aHor oiklmo Hpzi reti : iSmo el eqb bStm hamrim li haH haH : iSiSo oiSmHo bk kl mbqSik iamro tmid igdl ihoh ahbi tSoetk : oani eni oabion adni iHSb li ecrti omplTi ath alhi al taHr :

41

lmnzH mcmor ldod aSri mSkil al dl biom reh imlTho ihoh : ihoh iSmrho oiHiho iaSr barz oal ttnho bnpS aibio : ihoh isedno el erS doi kl mSkbo hpkt bHlio : ani amrti ihoh Hnni rpah npSi ki HTati lk : aoibi iamro re li mti imot oabd Smo : oam ba lraot Soa idbr lbo iqbz aon lo iza lHoz idbr : iHd eli itlHSo kl Snai eli iHSbo reh li : dbr bliel izoq bo oaSr Skb la iosip lqom : gm aiS Slomi aSr bTHti bo aokl lHmi hgdil eli eqb : oath ihoh Hnni ohqimni oaSlmh lhm : bcat ideti ki Hpzt bi ki la irie aibi eli : oani btmi tmkt bi otzibni lpnik leolm : brok ihoh alhi iSral mheolm oed heolm amn oamn :

42

lmnzH mSkil lbni qrH kail terg el apiqi mim kn npSi terg alik alhim : zmah npSi lalhim lal Hi mti aboa oarah pni alhim : hith li dmeti lHm iomm olilh bamr ali kl hiom aih alhik : alh ackrh oaSpkh eli npSi ki aebr bsk addm ed bit alhim bqol rnh otodh hmon Hogg : mh tStoHHi npSi othmi eli hoHili lalhim ki eod aodno iSoeot pnio : alhi eli npSi tStoHH el kn ackrk marz irdn oHrmonim mhr mzer : thom al thom qora lqol znorik kl mSbrik oglik eli ebro : iomm izoh ihoh Hsdo oblilh Sirh emi tplh lal Hii : aomrh lal slei lmh SkHtni lmh qdr alk blHz aoib : brzH bezmoti Hrponi zorri bamrm ali kl hiom aih alhik : mh tStoHHi npSi omh thmi eli hoHili lalhim ki eod aodno iSoet pni oalhi :

43

SpTni alhim oribh ribi mgoi la Hsid maiS mrmh oeolh tplTni : ki ath alhi meoci lmh cnHtni lmh qdr athlk blHz aoib : SlH aork oamtk hmh inHoni ibiaoni al hr qdSk oal mSknotik : oaboah al mcbH alhim al al SmHt gili oaodk bknor alhim alhi : mh tStoHHi npSi omh thmi eli hoHili lalhim ki eod aodno iSoet pni oalhi :

44

lmnzH lbni qrH mSkil alhim bacnino Smeno abotino spro lno pel pelt bimihm bimi qdm : ath idk goim horSt otTem tre lamim otSlHm : ki la bHrbm irSo arz ocroem la hoSieh lmo ki imink ocroek oaor pnik ki rzitm : ath hoa mlki alhim zoh iSoeot ieqb : bk zrino nngH bSmk nbos qmino : ki la bqSti abTH oHrbi la toSieni : ki hoSetno mzrino omSnaino hbiSot : balhim hllno kl hiom oSmk leolm nodh slh : ap cnHt otklimno ola tza bzbaotino : tSibno aHor mni zr omSnaino Sso lmo : ttnno kzan makl obgoim critno : tmkr emk bla hon ola rbit bmHirihm : tSimno Hrph lSknino leg oqls lsbibotino : tSimno mSl bgoim mnod raS bl amim : kl hiom klmti ngdi obSt pni kstni : mqol mHrp omgdp mpni aoib omtnqm : kl cat batno ola SkHnok ola Sqrno bbritk : la nsog aHor lbno otT aSrino mni arHk : ki dkitno bmqom tnim otks elino bzlmot : am SkHno Sm alhino onprS kpino lal cr : hla alhim iHqr cat ki hoa ide telmot lb : ki elik hrgno kl hiom nHSbno kzan TbHh : eorh lmh tiSn adni hqizh al tcnH lnzH : lmh pnik tstir tSkH enino olHzno : ki SHh lepr npSno dbqh larz bTnno : qomh ecrth lno opdno lmen Hsdk :

45

lmnzH el SSnim lbni qrH mSkil Sir ididt rHS lbi dbr Tob amr ani meSi lmlk lSoni eT sopr mhir : ipipit mbni adm hozq Hn bSptotik el kn brkk alhim leolm : Hgor Hrbk el irk gbor hodk ohdrk : ohdrk zlH rkb el dbr amt oenoh zdq otork noraot imink : Hzik Snonim emim tHtik iplo blb aoibi hmlk : ksak alhim eolm oed SbT miSr SbT mlkotk : ahbt zdq otSna rSe el kn mSHk alhim alhik Smn SSon mHbrik : mr oahlot qzieot kl bgdtik mn hikli Sn mni SmHok : bnot mlkim biqrotik nzbh Sgl limink bktm aopir : Smei bt orai ohTi acnk oSkHi emk obit abik : oitao hmlk ipik ki hoa adnik ohStHoi lo : obt zr bmnHh pnik iHlo eSiri em : kl kbodh bt mlk pnimh mmSbzot chb lboSh : lrqmot tobl lmlk btolot aHrih reotih mobaot lk : toblnh bSmHt ogil tbainh bhikl mlk : tHt abtik ihio bnik tSitmo lSrim bkl harz : ackirh Smk bkl dr odr el kn emim ihodk lelm oed :

46

lmnzH lbni qrH el elmot Sir alhim lno mHsh oec ecrh bzrot nmza mad : el kn la nira bhmir arz obmoT hrim blb imim : ihmo iHmro mimio ireSo hrim bgaoto slh : nhr plgio iSmHo eir alhim qdS mSkni elion : alhim bqrbh bl tmoT iecrh alhim lpnot bqr : hmo goim mTo mmlkot ntn bqolo tmog arz : ihoh zbaot emno mSgb lno alhi ieqb slh : lko Hco mpelot ihoh aSr Sm Smot barz : mSbit mlHmot ed qzh harz qSt iSbr oqzz Hnit eglot iSrp baS : hrpo odeo ki anki alhim arom bgoim arom barz : ihoh zbaot emno mSgb lno alhi ieqb slh :

47

lmnzH lbni qrH mcmor kl hemim tqeo kp hrieo lalhim bqol rnh : ki ihoh elion nora mlk gdol el kl harz : idbr emim tHtino olamim tHt rglino : ibHr lno at nHltno at gaon ieqb aSr ahb slh : elh alhim btroeh ihoh bqol Sopr : cmro alhim cmro cmro lmlkno cmro : ki mlk kl harz alhim cmro mSkil : mlk alhim el goim alhim iSb el ksa qdSo : ndibi emim naspo em alhi abrhm ki lalhim mgni arz mad nelh :

48

Sir mcmor lbni qrH gdol ihoh omhll mad beir alhino hr qdSo : iph nop mSoS kl harz hr zion irkti zpon qrit mlk rb : alhim barmnotih node lmSgb : ki hnh hmlkim noedo ebro iHdo : hmh rao kn tmho nbhlo nHpco : redh aHctm Sm Hil kioldh : broH qdim tSbr aniot trSiS : kaSr Smeno kn raino beir ihoh zbaot beir alhino alhim ikonnh ed eolm slh : dmino alhim Hsdk bqrb hiklk : kSmk alhim kn thltk el qzoi arz zdq mlah imink : iSmH hr zion tglnh bnot ihodh lmen mSpTik : sbo zion ohqipoh spro mgdlih : Sito lbkm lHilh psgo armnotih lmen tspro ldor aHron : ki ch alhim alhino eolm oed hoa inhgno el mot :

49

lmnzH lbni qrH mcmor Smeo cat kl hemim hacino kl iSbi Hld : gm bni adm gm bni aiS iHd eSir oabion : pi idbr Hkmot ohgot lbi tbonot : aTh lmSl acni aptH bknor Hidti : lmh aira bimi re eon eqbi isobni : hbTHim el Hilm obrb eSrm ithllo : aH la pdh ipdh aiS la itn lalhim kpro : oiqr pdion npSm oHdl leolm : oiHi eod lnzH la irah hSHt : ki irah Hkmim imoto iHd ksil ober iabdo oecbo laHrim Hilm : qrbm btimo leolm mSkntm ldr odr qrao bSmotm eli admot : oadm biqr bl ilin nmSl kbhmot ndmo : ch drkm ksl lmo oaHrihm bpihm irzo slh : kzan lSaol Sto mot irem oirdo bm iSrim lbqr ozirm lblot Saol mcbl lo : ak alhim ipdh npSi mid Saol ki iqHni slh : al tira ki ieSr aiS ki irbh kbod bito : ki la bmoto iqH hkl la ird aHrio kbodo : ki npSo bHiio ibrk oiodk ki tiTib lk : tboa ed dor abotio ed nzH la irao aor : adm biqr ola ibin nmSl kbhmot ndmo :

50

mcmor lasp al alhim ihoh dbr oiqra arz mmcrH SmS ed mbao : mzion mkll ipi alhim hopie : iba alhino oal iHrS aS lpnio takl osbibio nSerh mad : iqra al hSmim mel oal harz ldin emo : aspo li Hsidi krti briti eli cbH : oigido Smim zdqo ki alhim SpT hoa slh : Smeh emi oadbrh iSral oaeidh bk alhim alhik anki : la el cbHik aokiHk oeoltik lngdi tmid : la aqH mbitk pr mmklatik etodim : ki li kl Hito ier bhmot bhrri alp : ideti kl eop hrim ocic Sdi emdi : am areb la amr lk ki li tbl omlah : haokl bSr abirim odm etodim aSth : cbH lalhim todh oSlm lelion ndrik : oqrani biom zrh aHlzk otkbdni : olrSe amr alhim mh lk lspr Hqi otSa briti eli pik : oath Snat mosr otSlk dbri aHrik : am rait gnb otrz emo oem mnapim Hlqk : pik SlHt breh olSonk tzmid mrmh : tSb baHik tdbr bbn amk ttn dpi : alh eSit ohHrSti dmit hiot ahih kmok aokiHk oaerkh leinik : bino na cat SkHi aloh pn aTrp oain mzil : cbH todh ikbdnni oSm drk arano biSe alhim :

51

lmnzH mcmor ldod bboa alio ntn hnbia kaSr ba al bt Sbe Hnni alhim kHsdk krb rHmik mHh pSei : hrbh kbsni meoni omHTati Thrni : ki pSei ani ade oHTati ngdi tmid : lk lbdk HTati ohre beinik eSiti lmen tzdq bdbrk tckh bSpTk : hn beoon Hollti obHTa iHmtni ami : hn amt Hpzt bTHot obstm Hkmh todieni : tHTani bacob oaThr tkbsni omSlg albin : tSmieni SSon oSmHh tglnh ezmot dkit : hstr pnik mHTai okl eonti mHh : lb Thor bra li alhim oroH nkon HdS bqrbi : al tSlikni mlpnik oroH qdSk al tqH mmni : hSibh li SSon iSek oroH ndibh tsmkni : almdh pSeim drkik oHTaim alik iSobo : hzilni mdmim alhim alhi tSoeti trnn lSoni zdqtk : adni Spti tptH opi igid thltk : ki la tHpz cbH oatnh eolh la trzh : cbHi alhim roH nSbrh lb nSbr ondkh alhim la tbch : hiTibh brzonk at zion tbnh Homot iroSlm : ac tHpz cbHi zdq eolh oklil ac ielo el mcbHk prim :

52

lmnzH mSkil ldod bboa doag hadmi oigd lSaol oiamr lo ba dod al bit aHimlk mh tthll breh hgbor Hsd al kl hiom : hoot tHSb lSonk kter mlTS eSh rmih : ahbt re mTob Sqr mdbr zdq slh : ahbt kl dbri ble lSon mrmh : gm al itzk lnzH iHtk oisHk mahl oSrSk marz Hiim slh : oirao zdiqim oiirao oelio iSHqo : hnh hgbr la iSim alhim meoco oibTH brb eSro iec bhoto : oani kcit renn bbit alhim bTHti bHsd alhim eolm oed : aodk leolm ki eSit oaqoh Smk ki Tob ngd Hsidik :

53

lmnzH el mHlt mSkil ldod amr nbl blbo ain alhim hSHito ohteibo eol ain eSh Tob : alhim mSmim hSqip el bni adm lraot hiS mSkil drS at alhim : klo sg iHdo nalHo ain eSh Tob ain gm aHd : hla ideo peli aon akli emi aklo lHm alhim la qrao : Sm pHdo pHd la hih pHd ki alhim pcr ezmot Hnk hbSth ki alhim masm : mi itn mzion iSeot iSral bSob alhim Sbot emo igl ieqb iSmH iSral :

54

lmnzH bngint mSkil ldod bboa hcipim oiamro lSaol hla dod msttr emno alhim bSmk hoSieni obgbortk tdinni : alhim Sme tplti hacinh lamri pi : ki crim qmo eli oerizim bqSo npSi la Smo alhim lngdm slh : hnh alhim ecr li adni bsmki npSi : iSob hre lSrri bamtk hzmitm : bndbh acbHh lk aodh Smk ihoh ki Tob : ki mkl zrh hzilni obaibi rath eini :

55

lmnzH bngint mSkil ldod hacinh alhim tplti oal ttelm mtHnti : hqSibh li oenni arid bSiHi oahimh : mqol aoib mpni eqt rSe ki imiTo eli aon obap iSTmoni : lbi iHil bqrbi oaimot mot nplo eli : irah ored iba bi otksni plzot : oamr mi itn li abr kionh aeoph oaSknh : hnh arHiq ndd alin bmdbr slh : aHiSh mplT li mroH seh mser : ble adni plg lSonm ki raiti Hms orib beir : iomm olilh isobbh el Homtih oaon oeml bqrbh : hoot bqrbh ola imiS mrHbh tk omrmh : ki la aoib iHrpni oaSa la mSnai eli hgdil oastr mmno : oath anoS kerki alopi omidei : aSr iHdo nmtiq sod bbit alhim nhlk brgS : iSimot elimo irdo Saol Hiim ki reot bmgorm bqrbm : ani al alhim aqra oihoh ioSieni : erb obqr ozhrim aSiHh oahmh oiSme qoli : pdh bSlom npSi mqrb li ki brbim hio emdi : iSme al oienm oiSb qdm slh aSr ain Hlipot lmo ola irao alhim : SlH idio bSlmio Hll brito : Hlqo mHmat pio oqrb lbo rko dbrio mSmn ohmh ptHot : hSlk el ihoh ihbk ohoa iklklk la itn leolm moT lzdiq : oath alhim tordm lbar SHt anSi dmim omrmh la iHzo imihm oani abTH bk :

56

lmnzH el iont alm rHqim ldod mktm baHc ato plStim bgt Hnni alhim ki Sapni anoS kl hiom lHm ilHzni : Sapo Sorri kl hiom ki rbim lHmim li mrom : iom aira ani alik abTH : balhim ahll dbro balhim bTHti la aira mh ieSh bSr li : kl hiom dbri iezbo eli kl mHSbtm lre : igoro izpino hmh eqbi iSmro kaSr qoo npSi : el aon plT lmo bap emim hord alhim : ndi sprth ath Simh dmeti bnadk hla bsprtk : ac iSobo aoibi aHor biom aqra ch ideti ki alhim li : balhim ahll dbr bihoh ahll dbr : balhim bTHti la aira mh ieSh adm li : eli alhim ndrik aSlm todt lk : ki hzlt npSi mmot hla rgli mdHi lhthlk lpni alhim baor hHiim :

57

lmnzH al tSHt ldod mktm bbrHo mpni Saol bmerh Hnni alhim Hnni ki bk Hsih npSi obzl knpik aHsh ed iebr hoot : aqra lalhim elion lal gmr eli : iSlH mSmim oioSieni Hrp Sapi slh iSlH alhim Hsdo oamto : npSi btok lbam aSkbh lhTim bni adm Snihm Hnit oHzim olSonm Hrb Hdh : romh el hSmim alhim el kl harz kbodk : rSt hkino lpemi kpp npSi kro lpni SiHh nplo btokh slh : nkon lbi alhim nkon lbi aSirh oacmrh : eorh kbodi eorh hnbl oknor aeirh SHr : aodk bemim adni acmrk bl amim : ki gdl ed Smim Hsdk oed SHqim amtk : romh el Smim alhim el kl harz kbodk :

58

lmnzH al tSHt ldod mktm hamnm alm zdq tdbron miSrim tSpTo bni adm : ap blb eolt tpelon barz Hms idikm tplson : cro rSeim mrHm teo mbTn dbri kcb : Hmt lmo kdmot Hmt nHS kmo ptn HrS iaTm acno : aSr la iSme lqol mlHSim Hobr Hbrim mHkm : alhim hrs Snimo bpimo mlteot kpirim ntz ihoh : imaso kmo mim ithlko lmo idrk Hzo kmo itmllo : kmo Sblol tms ihlk npl aSt bl Hco SmS : bTrm ibino sirtikm aTd kmo Hi kmo Hron iSerno : iSmH zdiq ki Hch nqm pemio irHz bdm hrSe : oiamr adm ak pri lzdiq ak iS alhim SpTim barz :

59

lmnzH al tSHt ldod mktm bSlH Saol oiSmro at hbit lhmito hzilni maibi alhi mmtqommi tSgbni : hzilni mpeli aon omanSi dmim hoSieni : ki hnh arbo lnpSi igoro eli ecim la pSei ola HTati ihoh : bli eon irozon oikonno eorh lqrati orah : oath ihoh alhim zbaot alhi iSral hqizh lpqd kl hgoim al tHn kl bgdi aon slh : iSobo lerb ihmo kklb oisobbo eir : hnh ibieon bpihm Hrbot bSptotihm ki mi Sme : oath ihoh tSHq lmo tleg lkl goim : eco alik aSmrh ki alhim mSgbi : alhi Hsdo iqdmni alhim irani bSrri : al thrgm pn iSkHo emi hniemo bHilk ohoridmo mgnno adni : HTat pimo dbr Sptimo oilkdo bgaonm omalh omkHS ispro : klh bHmh klh oainmo oideo ki alhim mSl bieqb lapsi harz slh : oiSobo lerb ihmo kklb oisobbo eir : hmh inoeon lakl am la iSbeo oilino : oani aSir eck oarnn lbqr Hsdk ki hiit mSgb li omnos biom zr li : eci alik acmrh ki alhim mSgbi alhi Hsdi :

60

lmnzH el SoSn edot mktm ldod llmd bhzoto at arm nhrim oat arm zobh oiSb ioab oik at adom bgia mlH Snim eSr alp alhim cnHtno prztno anpt tSobb lno : hreSth arz pzmth rph Sbrih ki mTh : hraith emk qSh hSqitno iin trelh : ntth liraik ns lhtnoss mpni qST slh : lmen iHlzon ididik hoSieh imink oenno : alhim dbr bqdSo aelch aHlqh Skm oemq skot amdd : li gled oli mnSh oaprim meoc raSi ihodh mHqqi : moab sir rHzi el adom aSlik neli eli plSt htreei : mi iblni eir mzor mi nHni ed adom : hla ath alhim cnHtno ola tza alhim bzbaotino : hbh lno ecrt mzr oSoa tSoet adm : balhim neSh Hil ohoa ibos zrino :

61

lmnzH el ngint ldod Smeh alhim rnti hqSibh tplti : mqzh harz alik aqra beTp lbi bzor irom mmni tnHni : ki hiit mHsh li mgdl ec mpni aoib : agorh bahlk eolmim aHsh bstr knpik slh : ki ath alhim Smet lndri ntt irSt irai Smk : imim el imi mlk tosip Snotio kmo dr odr : iSb eolm lpni alhim Hsd oamt mn inzrho : kn acmrh Smk led lSlmi ndri iom iom :

62

lmnzH el idoton mcmor ldod ak al alhim domih npSi mmno iSoeti : ak hoa zori oiSoeti mSgbi la amoT rbh : ed anh thotto el aiS trzHo klkm kqir nToi gdr hdHoih : ak mSato iezo lhdiH irzo kcb bpio ibrko obqrbm iqllo slh : ak lalhim domi npSi ki mmno tqoti : ak hoa zori oiSoeti mSgbi la amoT : el alhim iSei okbodi zor eci mHsi balhim : bTHo bo bkl et em Spko lpnio lbbkm alhim mHsh lno slh : ak hbl bni adm kcb bni aiS bmacnim lelot hmh mhbl iHd : al tbTHo beSq obgcl al thblo Hil ki inob al tSito lb : aHt dbr alhim Stim co Smeti ki ec lalhim : olk adni Hsd ki ath tSlm laiS kmeSho :

63

mcmor ldod bhioto bmdbr ihodh alhim ali ath aSHrk zmah lk npSi kmh lk bSri barz zih oeip bli mim : kn bqdS Hcitik lraot eck okbodk : ki Tob Hsdk mHiim Spti iSbHonk : kn abrkk bHii bSmk aSa kpi : kmo Hlb odSn tSbe npSi oSpti rnnot ihll pi : am ckrtik el izoei baSmrot ahgh bk : ki hiit ecrth li obzl knpik arnn : dbqh npSi aHrik bi tmkh imink : ohmh lSoah ibqSo npSi ibao btHtiot harz : igirho el idi Hrb mnt Selim ihio : ohmlk iSmH balhim ithll kl hnSbe bo ki iskr pi dobri Sqr :

64

lmnzH mcmor ldod Sme alhim qoli bSiHi mpHd aoib tzr Hii : tstirni msod mreim mrgSt peli aon : aSr Snno kHrb lSonm drko Hzm dbr mr : lirot bmstrim tm ptam irho ola iirao : iHcqo lmo dbr re ispro lTmon moqSim amro mi irah lmo : iHpSo eolt tmno HpS mHpS oqrb aiS olb emq : oirm alhim Hz ptaom hio mkotm : oikSiloho elimo lSonm itnddo kl rah bm : oiirao kl adm oigido pel alhim omeSho hSkilo : iSmH zdiq bihoh oHsh bo oithllo kl iSri lb :

65

lmnzH mcmor ldod Sir lk dmih thlh alhim bzion olk iSlm ndr : Sme tplh edik kl bSr ibao : dbri eont gbro mni pSeino ath tkprm : aSri tbHr otqrb iSkn Hzrik nSbeh bTob bitk qdS hiklk : noraot bzdq tenno alhi iSeno mbTH kl qzoi arz oim rHqim : mkin hrim bkHo nacr bgborh : mSbiH Saon imim Saon glihm ohmon lamim : oiirao iSbi qzot maottik mozai bqr oerb trnin : pqdt harz otSqqh rbt teSrnh plg alhim mla mim tkin dgnm ki kn tkinh : tlmih roh nHt gdodih brbibim tmggnh zmHh tbrk : eTrt Snt Tobtk omeglik irepon dSn : irepo naot mdbr ogil gbeot tHgrnh : lbSo krim hzan oemqim ieTpo br itroeeo ap iSiro :

66

lmnzH Sir mcmor hrieo lalhim kl harz : cmro kbod Smo Simo kbod thlto : amro lalhim mh nora meSik brb eck ikHSo lk aibik : kl harz iStHoo lk oicmro lk icmro Smk slh : lko orao mpelot alhim nora elilh el bni adm : hpk im libSh bnhr iebro brgl Sm nSmHh bo : mSl bgborto eolm einio bgoim tzpinh hsorrim al irimo lmo slh : brko emim alhino ohSmieo qol thlto : hSm npSno bHiim ola ntn lmoT rglno : ki bHntno alhim zrptno kzrp ksp : hbatno bmzodh Smt moeqh bmtnino : hrkbt anoS lraSno bano baS obmim otoziano lroih : aboa bitk beolot aSlm lk ndri : aSr pzo Spti odbr pi bzr li : elot mHim aelh lk em qTrt ailim aeSh bqr em etodim slh : lko Smeo oasprh kl irai alhim aSr eSh lnpSi : alio pi qrati oromm tHt lSoni : aon am raiti blbi la iSme adni : akn Sme alhim hqSib bqol tplti : brok alhim aSr la hsir tplti oHsdo mati :

67

lmnzH bngint mcmor Sir alhim iHnno oibrkno iar pnio atno slh : ldet barz drkk bkl goim iSoetk : iodok emim alhim iodok emim klm : iSmHo oirnno lamim ki tSpT emim miSor olamim barz tnHm slh : iodok emim alhim iodok emim klm : arz ntnh ibolh ibrkno alhim alhino : ibrkno alhim oiirao ato kl apsi arz :

68

lmnzH ldod mcmor Sir iqom alhim ipozo aoibio oinoso mSnaio mpnio : khndp eSn tndp khms dong mpni aS iabdo rSeim mpni alhim : ozdiqim iSmHo ielzo lpni alhim oiSiSo bSmHh : Siro lalhim cmro Smo slo lrkb berbot bih Smo oelco lpnio : abi itomim odin almnot alhim bmeon qdSo : alhim moSib iHidim bith mozia asirim bkoSrot ak sorrim Skno zHiHh : alhim bzatk lpni emk bzedk biSimon slh : arz reSh ap Smim nTpo mpni alhim ch sini mpni alhim alhi iSral : gSm ndbot tnip alhim nHltk onlah ath konnth : Hitk iSbo bh tkin bTobtk leni alhim : adni itn amr hmbSrot zba rb : mlki zbaot iddon iddon onot bit tHlq Sll : am tSkbon bin Sptim knpi ionh nHph bksp oabrotih birqrq Hroz : bprS Sdi mlkim bh tSlg bzlmon : hr alhim hr bSn hr gbnnim hr bSn : lmh trzdon hrim gbnnim hhr Hmd alhim lSbto ap ihoh iSkn lnzH : rkb alhim rbtim alpi Snan adni bm sini bqdS : elit lmrom Sbit Sbi lqHt mtnot badm oap sorrim lSkn ih alhim : brok adni iom iom iems lno hal iSoetno slh : hal lno al lmoSeot olihoh adni lmot tozaot : ak alhim imHz raS aibio qdqd Ser mthlk baSmio : amr adni mbSn aSib aSib mmzlot im : lmen tmHz rglk bdm lSon klbik maibim mnho : rao hlikotik alhim hlikot ali mlki bqdS : qdmo Srim aHr ngnim btok elmot toppot : bmqhlot brko alhim ihoh mmqor iSral : Sm bnimn zeir rdm Sri ihodh rgmtm Sri cblon Sri nptli : zoh alhik eck eoch alhim co pelt lno : mhiklk el iroSlm lk iobilo mlkim Si : ger Hit qnh edt abirim begli emim mtrps brzi ksp bcr emim qrbot iHpzo : iatio HSmnim mni mzrim koS triz idio lalhim : mmlkot harz Siro lalhim cmro adni slh : lrkb bSmi Smi qdm hn itn bqolo qol ec : tno ec lalhim el iSral gaoto oeco bSHqim : nora alhim mmqdSik al iSral hoa ntn ec otezmot lem brok alhim :

69

lmnzH el SoSnim ldod hoSieni alhim ki bao mim ed npS : Tbeti bion mzolh oain memd bati bmemqi mim oSblt STptni : igeti bqrai nHr groni klo eini miHl lalhi : rbo mSerot raSi Snai Hnm ezmo mzmiti aibi Sqr aSr la gclti ac aSib : alhim ath idet laolti oaSmoti mmk la nkHdo : al ibSo bi qoik adni ihoh zbaot al iklmo bi mbqSik alhi iSral : ki elik nSati Hrph ksth klmh pni : mocr hiiti laHi onkri lbni ami : ki qnat bitk akltni oHrpot Horpik nplo eli : oabkh bzom npSi othi lHrpot li : oatnh lboSi Sq oahi lhm lmSl : iSiHo bi iSbi Ser onginot Soti Skr : oani tplti lk ihoh et rzon alhim brb Hsdk enni bamt iSek : hzilni mTiT oal aTbeh anzlh mSnai ommemqi mim : al tSTpni Sblt mim oal tbleni mzolh oal taTr eli bar pih : enni ihoh ki Tob Hsdk krb rHmik pnh ali : oal tstr pnik mebdk ki zr li mhr enni : qrbh al npSi galh lmen aibi pdni : ath idet Hrpti obSti oklmti ngdk kl zorri : Hrph Sbrh lbi oanoSh oaqoh lnod oain olmnHmim ola mzati : oitno bbroti raS olzmai iSqoni Hmz : ihi SlHnm lpnihm lpH olSlomim lmoqS : tHSknh einihm mraot omtnihm tmid hmed : Spk elihm cemk oHron apk iSigm : thi Tirtm nSmh bahlihm al ihi iSb : ki ath aSr hkit rdpo oal mkaob Hllik ispro : tnh eon el eonm oal ibao bzdqtk : imHo mspr Hiim oem zdiqim al iktbo : oani eni okoab iSoetk alhim tSgbni : ahllh Sm alhim bSir oagdlno btodh : otiTb lihoh mSor pr mqrn mpris : rao enoim iSmHo drSi alhim oiHi lbbkm : ki Sme al abionim ihoh oat asirio la bch : ihlloho Smim oarz imim okl rmS bm : ki alhim ioSie zion oibnh eri ihodh oiSbo Sm oirSoh : ocre ebdio inHloh oahbi Smo iSkno bh :

70

lmnzH ldod lhckir alhim lhzilni ihoh lecrti HoSh : ibSo oiHpro mbqSi npSi isgo aHor oiklmo Hpzi reti : iSobo el eqb bStm hamrim haH haH : iSiSo oiSmHo bk kl mbqSik oiamro tmid igdl alhim ahbi iSoetk : oani eni oabion alhim HoSh li ecri omplTi ath ihoh al taHr :

71

bk ihoh Hsiti al aboSh leolm : bzdqtk tzilni otplTni hTh ali acnk ohoSieni : hih li lzor meon lboa tmid zoit lhoSieni ki slei omzodti ath : alhi plTni mid rSe mkp meol oHomz : ki ath tqoti adni ihoh mbTHi mneori : elik nsmkti mbTn mmei ami ath goci bk thlti tmid : kmopt hiiti lrbim oath mHsi ec : imla pi thltk kl hiom tpartk : al tSlikni let cqnh kklot kHi al tecbni : ki amro aoibi li oSmri npSi noezo iHdo : lamr alhim ecbo rdpo otpSoho ki ain mzil : alhim al trHq mmni alhi lecrti HiSh : ibSo iklo STni npSi ieTo Hrph oklmh mbqSi reti : oani tmid aiHl ohospti el kl thltk : pi ispr zdqtk kl hiom tSoetk ki la ideti sprot : aboa bgbrot adni ihoh ackir zdqtk lbdk : alhim lmdtni mneori oed hnh agid nplaotik : ogm ed cqnh oSibh alhim al tecbni ed agid croek ldor lkl iboa gbortk : ozdqtk alhim ed mrom aSr eSit gdlot alhim mi kmok : aSr hraitno zrot rbot oreot tSob tHiino omthmot harz tSob telni : trb gdlti otsb tnHmni : gm ani aodk bkli nbl amtk alhi acmrh lk bknor qdoS iSral : trnnh Spti ki acmrh lk onpSi aSr pdit : gm lSoni kl hiom thgh zdqtk ki bSo ki Hpro mbqSi reti :

72

lSlmh alhim mSpTik lmlk tn ozdqtk lbn mlk : idin emk bzdq oeniik bmSpT : iSao hrim Slom lem ogbeot bzdqh : iSpT enii em ioSie lbni abion oidka eoSq : iiraok em SmS olpni irH dor dorim : ird kmTr el gc krbibim crcip arz : iprH bimio zdiq orb Slom ed bli irH : oird mim ed im omnhr ed apsi arz : lpnio ikreo ziim oaibio epr ilHko : mlki trSiS oaiim mnHh iSibo mlki Sba osba aSkr iqribo : oiStHoo lo kl mlkim kl goim iebdoho : ki izil abion mSoe oeni oain ecr lo : iHs el dl oabion onpSot abionim ioSie : mtok omHms igal npSm oiiqr dmm beinio : oiHi oitn lo mchb Sba oitpll bedo tmid kl hiom ibrknho : ihi pst br barz braS hrim ireS klbnon prio oizizo meir keSb harz : ihi Smo leolm lpni SmS inin Smo oitbrko bo kl goim iaSroho : brok ihoh alhim alhi iSral eSh nplaot lbdo : obrok Sm kbodo leolm oimla kbodo at kl harz amn oamn : klo tplot dod bn iSi :

73

mcmor lasp ak Tob liSral alhim lbri lbb : oani kmeT nToi rgli kain Spkh aSri : ki qnati bhollim Slom rSeim arah : ki ain Hrzbot lmotm obria aolm : beml anoS ainmo oem adm la ingeo : lkn enqtmo gaoh ieTp Sit Hms lmo : iza mHlb einmo ebro mSkiot lbb : imiqo oidbro bre eSq mmrom idbro : Sto bSmim pihm olSonm thlk barz : lkn iSib emo hlm omi mla imzo lmo : oamro aikh ide al oiS deh belion : hnh alh rSeim oSloi eolm hSgo Hil : ak riq ckiti lbbi oarHz bnqion kpi : oahi ngoe kl hiom otokHti lbqrim : am amrti asprh kmo hnh dor bnik bgdti : oaHSbh ldet cat eml hia beini : ed aboa al mqdSi al abinh laHritm : ak bHlqot tSit lmo hpltm lmSoaot : aik hio lSmh krge spo tmo mn blhot : kHlom mhqiz adni beir zlmm tbch : ki itHmz lbbi oklioti aStonn : oani ber ola ade bhmot hiiti emk : oani tmid emk aHct bid imini : beztk tnHni oaHr kbod tqHni : mi li bSmim oemk la Hpzti barz : klh Sari olbbi zor lbbi oHlqi alhim leolm : ki hnh rHqik iabdo hzmth kl conh mmk : oani qrbt alhim li Tob Sti badni ihoh mHsi lspr kl mlakotik :

74

mSkil lasp lmh alhim cnHt lnzH ieSn apk bzan mreitk : ckr edtk qnit qdm galt SbT nHltk hr zion ch Sknt bo : hrimh pemik lmSaot nzH kl hre aoib bqdS : Sago zrrik bqrb moedk Smo aottm atot : iode kmbia lmelh bsbk ez qrdmot : oet ptoHih iHd bkSil okilpt ihlmon : SlHo baS mqdSk larz Hllo mSkn Smk : amro blbm ninm iHd Srpo kl moedi al barz : aottino la raino ain eod nbia ola atno ide ed mh : ed mti alhim iHrp zr inaz aoib Smk lnzH : lmh tSib idk oimink mqrb Hoqk klh : oalhim mlki mqdm pel iSoeot bqrb harz : ath porrt beck im Sbrt raSi tninim el hmim : ath rzzt raSi loitn ttnno makl lem lziim : ath bqet mein onHl ath hobSt nhrot aitn : lk iom ap lk lilh ath hkinot maor oSmS : ath hzbt kl gbolot arz qiz oHrp ath izrtm : ckr cat aoib Hrp ihoh oem nbl nazo Smk : al ttn lHit npS tork Hit eniik al tSkH lnzH : hbT lbrit ki mlao mHSki arz naot Hms : al iSb dk nklm eni oabion ihllo Smk : qomh alhim ribh ribk ckr Hrptk mni nbl kl hiom : al tSkH qol zrrik Saon qmik elh tmid :

75

lmnzH al tSHt mcmor lasp Sir hodino lk alhim hodino oqrob Smk spro nplaotik : ki aqH moed ani miSrim aSpT : nmgim arz okl iSbih anki tknti emodih slh : amrti lhollim al thlo olrSeim al trimo qrn : al trimo lmrom qrnkm tdbro bzoar etq : ki la mmoza ommerb ola mmdbr hrim : ki alhim SpT ch iSpil och irim : ki kos bid ihoh oiin Hmr mla msk oigr mch ak Smrih imzo iSto kl rSei arz : oani agid lelm acmrh lalhi ieqb : okl qrni rSeim agde trommnh qrnot zdiq :

76

lmnzH bngint mcmor lasp Sir node bihodh alhim biSral gdol Smo : oihi bSlm sko omeonto bzion : Smh Sbr rSpi qSt mgn oHrb omlHmh slh : naor ath adir mhrri Trp : aStollo abiri lb nmo Sntm ola mzao kl anSi Hil idihm : mgertk alhi ieqb nrdm orkb osos : ath nora ath omi iemd lpnik mac apk : mSmim hSmet din arz irah oSqTh : bqom lmSpT alhim lhoSie kl enoi arz slh : ki Hmt adm todk Sarit Hmt tHgr : ndro oSlmo lihoh alhikm kl sbibio iobilo Si lmora : ibzr roH ngidim nora lmlki arz :

77

lmnzH el iditon lasp mcmor qoli al alhim oazeqh qoli al alhim ohacin ali : biom zrti adni drSti idi lilh ngrh ola tpog manh hnHm npSi : ackrh alhim oahmih aSiHh otteTp roHi slh : aHct Smrot eini npemti ola adbr : HSbti imim mqdm Snot eolmim : ackrh nginti blilh em lbbi aSiHh oiHpS roHi : hleolmim icnH adni ola isip lrzot eod : haps lnzH Hsdo gmr amr ldr odr : hSkH Hnot al am qpz bap rHmio slh : oamr Hloti hia Snot imin elion : ackir melli ih ki ackrh mqdm plak : ohgiti bkl pelk obelilotik aSiHh : alhim bqdS drkk mi al gdol kalhim : ath hal eSh pla hodet bemim eck : galt bcroe emk bni ieqb oiosp slh : raok mim alhim raok mim iHilo ap irgco thmot : crmo mim ebot qol ntno SHqim ap Hzzik ithlko : qol remk bglgl hairo brqim tbl rgch otreS harz : bim drkk oSbilik bmim rbim oeqbotik la ndeo : nHit kzan emk bid mSh oahrn :

78

mSkil lasp hacinh emi torti hTo acnkm lamri pi : aptHh bmSl pi abieh Hidot mni qdm : aSr Smeno ondem oabotino spro lno : la nkHd mbnihm ldor aHron msprim thlot ihoh oecoco onplaotio aSr eSh : oiqm edot bieqb otorh Sm biSral aSr zoh at abotino lhodiem lbnihm : lmen ideo dor aHron bnim ioldo iqmo oispro lbnihm : oiSimo balhim kslm ola iSkHo melli al omzotio inzro : ola ihio kabotm dor sorr omrh dor la hkin lbo ola namnh at al roHo : bni aprim noSqi romi qSt hpko biom qrb : la Smro brit alhim obtorto mano llkt : oiSkHo elilotio onplaotio aSr hram : ngd abotm eSh pla barz mzrim Sdh zen : bqe im oiebirm oizb mim kmo nd : oinHm benn iomm okl hlilh baor aS : ibqe zrim bmdbr oiSq kthmot rbh : oioza noclim msle oiord knhrot mim : oiosipo eod lHTa lo lmrot elion bzih : oinso al blbbm lSal akl lnpSm : oidbro balhim amro hiokl al lerk SlHn bmdbr : hn hkh zor oicobo mim onHlim iSTpo hgm lHm iokl tt am ikin Sar lemo : lkn Sme ihoh oitebr oaS nSqh bieqb ogm ap elh biSral : ki la hamino balhim ola bTHo biSoeto : oizo SHqim mmel odlti Smim ptH : oimTr elihm mn lakl odgn Smim ntn lmo : lHm abirim akl aiS zidh SlH lhm lSbe : ise qdim bSmim oinhg beco timn : oimTr elihm kepr Sar okHol imim eop knp : oipl bqrb mHnho sbib lmSkntio : oiaklo oiSbeo mad otaotm iba lhm : la cro mtaotm eod aklm bpihm : oap alhim elh bhm oihrg bmSmnihm obHori iSral hkrie : bkl cat HTao eod ola hamino bnplaotio : oikl bhbl imihm oSnotm bbhlh : am hrgm odrSoho oSbo oSHro al : oickro ki alhim zorm oal elion galm : oiptoho bpihm oblSonm ikcbo lo : olbm la nkon emo ola namno bbrito : ohoa rHom ikpr eon ola iSHit ohrbh lhSib apo ola ieir kl Hmto : oickr ki bSr hmh roH holk ola iSob : kmh imroho bmdbr ieziboho biSimon : oiSobo oinso al oqdoS iSral htoo : la ckro at ido iom aSr pdm mni zr : aSr Sm bmzrim atotio omoptio bSdh zen : oihpk ldm iarihm onclihm bl iStion : iSlH bhm erb oiaklm ozprde otSHitm : oitn lHsil ibolm oigiem larbh : ihrg bbrd gpnm oSqmotm bHnml : oisgr lbrd beirm omqnihm lrSpim : iSlH bm Hron apo ebrh ocem ozrh mSlHt mlaki reim : ipls ntib lapo la HSk mmot npSm oHitm ldbr hsgir : oik kl bkor bmzrim raSit aonim bahli Hm : oise kzan emo oinhgm kedr bmdbr : oinHm lbTH ola pHdo oat aoibihm ksh him : oibiam al gbol qdSo hr ch qnth imino : oigrS mpnihm goim oipilm bHbl nHlh oiSkn bahlihm SbTi iSral : oinso oimro at alhim elion oedotio la Smro : oisgo oibgdo kabotm nhpko kqSt rmih : oikeisoho bbmotm obpsilihm iqniaoho : Sme alhim oitebr oimas mad biSral : oiTS mSkn Slo ahl Skn badm : oitn lSbi eco otparto bid zr : oisgr lHrb emo obnHlto htebr : bHorio aklh aS obtoltio la hollo : khnio bHrb nplo oalmntio la tbkinh : oiqz kiSn adni kgbor mtronn miin : oik zrio aHor Hrpt eolm ntn lmo : oimas bahl iosp obSbT aprim la bHr : oibHr at SbT ihodh at hr zion aSr ahb : oibn kmo rmim mqdSo karz isdh leolm : oibHr bdod ebdo oiqHho mmklat zan : maHr elot hbiao lreot bieqb emo obiSral nHlto : oirem ktm lbbo obtbonot kpio inHm :

79

mcmor lasp alhim bao goim bnHltk Tmao at hikl qdSk Smo at iroSlm leiim : ntno at nblt ebdik makl leop hSmim bSr Hsidik lHito arz : Spko dmm kmim sbibot iroSlm oain qobr : hiino Hrph lSknino leg oqls lsbibotino : ed mh ihoh tanp lnzH tber kmo aS qnatk : Spk Hmtk al hgoim aSr la ideok oel mmlkot aSr bSmk la qrao : ki akl at ieqb oat noho hSmo : al tckr lno eont raSnim mhr iqdmono rHmik ki dlono mad : ecrno alhi iSeno el dbr kbod Smk ohzilno okpr el HTatino lmen Smk : lmh iamro hgoim aih alhihm iode bgiim leinino nqmt dm ebdik hSpok : tboa lpnik anqt asir kgdl croek hotr bni tmoth : ohSb lSknino Sbetim al Hiqm Hrptm aSr Hrpok adni : oanHno emk ozan mreitk nodh lk leolm ldr odr nspr thltk :

80

lmnzH al SSnim edot lasp mcmor reh iSral hacinh nhg kzan iosp iSb hkrobim hopieh : lpni aprim obnimn omnSh eorrh at gbortk olkh liSeth lno : alhim hSibno ohar pnik onoSeh : ihoh alhim zbaot ed mti eSnt btplt emk : hakltm lHm dmeh otSqmo bdmeot SliS : tSimno mdon lSknino oaibino ilego lmo : alhim zbaot hSibno ohar pnik onoSeh : gpn mmzrim tsie tgrS goim otTeh : pnit lpnih otSrS SrSih otmla arz : kso hrim zlh oenpih arci al : tSlH qzirh ed im oal nhr ionqotih : lmh przt gdrih oaroh kl ebri drk : ikrsmnh Hcir mier ocic Sdi irenh : alhim zbaot Sob na hbT mSmim orah opqd gpn cat : oknh aSr nTeh imink oel bn amzth lk : Srph baS ksoHh mgert pnik iabdo : thi idk el aiS imink el bn adm amzt lk : ola nsog mmk tHino obSmk nqra : ihoh alhim zbaot hSibno har pnik onoSeh :

81

lmnzH el hgtit lasp hrnino lalhim eocno hrieo lalhi ieqb : Sao cmrh otno tp knor neim em nbl : tqeo bHdS Sopr bksh liom Hgno : ki Hq liSral hoa mSpT lalhi ieqb : edot bihosp Smo bzato el arz mzrim Spt la ideti aSme : hsiroti msbl Skmo kpio mdod tebrnh : bzrh qrat oaHlzk aenk bstr rem abHnk el mi mribh slh : Sme emi oaeidh bk iSral am tSme li : la ihih bk al cr ola tStHoh lal nkr : anki ihoh alhik hmelk marz mzrim hrHb pik oamlaho : ola Sme emi lqoli oiSral la abh li : oaSlHho bSrirot lbm ilko bmoezotihm : lo emi Sme li iSral bdrki ihlko : kmeT aoibihm aknie oel zrihm aSib idi : mSnai ihoh ikHSo lo oihi etm leolm : oiakilho mHlb HTh omzor dbS aSbiek :

82

mcmor lasp alhim nzb bedt al bqrb alhim iSpT : ed mti tSpTo eol opni rSeim tSao slh : SpTo dl oitom eni orS hzdiqo : plTo dl oabion mid rSeim hzilo : la ideo ola ibino bHSkh ithlko imoTo kl mosdi arz : ani amrti alhim atm obni elion klkm : akn kadm tmoton okaHd hSrim tplo : qomh alhim SpTh harz ki ath tnHl bkl hgoim :

83

Sir mcmor lasp alhim al dmi lk al tHrS oal tSqT al : ki hnh aoibik ihmion omSnaik nSao raS : el emk ierimo sod oitiezo el zponik : amro lko onkHidm mgoi ola ickr Sm iSral eod : ki noezo lb iHdo elik brit ikrto : ahli adom oiSmealim moab ohgrim : gbl oemon oemlq plSt em iSbi zor : gm aSor nloh emm hio croe lbni loT slh : eSh lhm kmdin ksisra kibin bnHl qiSon : nSmdo bein dar hio dmn ladmh : Sitmo ndibmo kerb okcab okcbH okzlmne kl nsikmo : aSr amro nirSh lno at naot alhim : alhi Sitmo kglgl kqS lpni roH : kaS tber ier oklhbh tlhT hrim : kn trdpm bserk obsoptk tbhlm : mla pnihm qlon oibqSo Smk ihoh : ibSo oibhlo edi ed oiHpro oiabdo : oideo ki ath Smk ihoh lbdk elion el kl harz :

84

lmnzH el hgtit lbni qrH mcmor mh ididot mSknotik ihoh zbaot : nksph ogm klth npSi lHzrot ihoh lbi obSri irnno al al Hi : gm zpor mzah bit odror qn lh aSr Sth aprHih at mcbHotik ihoh zbaot mlki oalhi : aSri ioSbi bitk eod ihllok slh : aSri adm eoc lo bk mslot blbbm : ebri bemq hbka mein iSitoho gm brkot ieTh morh : ilko mHil al Hil irah al alhim bzion : ihoh alhim zbaot Smeh tplti hacinh alhi ieqb slh : mgnno rah alhim ohbT pni mSiHk : ki Tob iom bHzrik malp bHrti hstopp bbit alhi mdor bahli rSe : ki SmS omgn ihoh alhim Hn okbod itn ihoh la imne Tob lhlkim btmim : ihoh zbaot aSri adm bTH bk :

85

lmnzH lbni qrH mcmor rzit ihoh arzk Sbt Sbot ieqb : nSat eon emk ksit kl HTatm slh : aspt kl ebrtk hSibot mHron apk : Sobno alhi iSeno ohpr kesk emno : hleolm tanp bno tmSk apk ldr odr : hla ath tSob tHino oemk iSmHo bk : hrano ihoh Hsdk oiSek ttn lno : aSmeh mh idbr hal ihoh ki idbr Slom al emo oal Hsidio oal iSobo lkslh : ak qrob liraio iSeo lSkn kbod barzno : Hsd oamt npgSo zdq oSlom nSqo : amt marz tzmH ozdq mSmim nSqp : gm ihoh itn hTob oarzno ttn ibolh : zdq lpnio ihlk oiSm ldrk pemio :

86

tplh ldod hTh ihoh acnk enni ki eni oabion ani : Smrh npSi ki Hsid ani hoSe ebdk ath alhi hboTH alik : Hnni adni ki alik aqra kl hiom : SmH npS ebdk ki alik adni npSi aSa : ki ath adni Tob oslH orb Hsd lkl qraik : hacinh ihoh tplti ohqSibh bqol tHnonoti : biom zrti aqrak ki tenni : ain kmok balhim adni oain kmeSik : kl goim aSr eSit iboao oiStHoo lpnik adni oikbdo lSmk : ki gdol ath oeSh nplaot ath alhim lbdk : horni ihoh drkk ahlk bamtk iHd lbbi lirah Smk : aodk adni alhi bkl lbbi oakbdh Smk leolm : ki Hsdk gdol eli ohzlt npSi mSaol tHtih : alhim cdim qmo eli oedt erizim bqSo npSi ola Smok lngdm : oath adni al rHom oHnon ark apim orb Hsd oamt : pnh ali oHnni tnh eck lebdk ohoSieh lbn amtk : eSh emi aot lTobh oirao Snai oibSo ki ath ihoh ecrtni onHmtni :

87

lbni qrH mcmor Sir isodto bhrri qdS : ahb ihoh Seri zion mkl mSknot ieqb : nkbdot mdbr bk eir halhim slh : ackir rhb obbl lidei hnh plSt ozor em koS ch ild Sm : olzion iamr aiS oaiS ild bh ohoa ikonnh elion : ihoh ispr bktob emim ch ild Sm slh : oSrim kHllim kl meini bk :

88

Sir mcmor lbni qrH lmnzH el mHlt lenot mSkil lhimn hacrHi ihoh alhi iSoeti iom zeqti blilh ngdk : tboa lpnik tplti hTh acnk lrnti : ki Sbeh breot npSi oHii lSaol hgieo : nHSbti em iordi bor hiiti kgbr ain ail : bmtim HpSi kmo Hllim Skbi qbr aSr la ckrtm eod ohmh midk ngcro : Stni bbor tHtiot bmHSkim bmzlot : eli smkh Hmtk okl mSbrik enit slh : hrHqt midei mmni Stni toebot lmo kla ola aza : eini dabh mni eni qratik ihoh bkl iom STHti alik kpi : hlmtim teSh pla am rpaim iqomo iodok slh : hispr bqbr Hsdk amontk babdon : hiode bHSk plak ozdqtk barz nSih : oani alik ihoh Soeti obbqr tplti tqdmk : lmh ihoh tcnH npSi tstir pnik mmni : eni ani ogoe mner nSati amik aponh : eli ebro Hronik beotik zmtotni : sboni kmim kl hiom hqipo eli iHd : hrHqt mmni ahb ore midei mHSk :

89

mSkil laitn hacrHi Hsdi ihoh eolm aSirh ldr odr aodie amontk bpi : ki amrti eolm Hsd ibnh Smim tkn amontk bhm : krti brit lbHiri nSbeti ldod ebdi : ed eolm akin crek obniti ldr odor ksak slh : oiodo Smim plak ihoh ap amontk bqhl qdSim : ki mi bSHq ierk lihoh idmh lihoh bbni alim : al nerz bsod qdSim rbh onora el kl sbibio : ihoh alhi zbaot mi kmok Hsin ih oamontk sbibotik : ath moSl bgaot him bSoa glio ath tSbHm : ath dkat kHll rhb bcroe eck pcrt aoibik : lk Smim ap lk arz tbl omlah ath isdtm : zpon oimin ath bratm tbor oHrmon bSmk irnno : lk croe em gborh tec idk trom imink : zdq omSpT mkon ksak Hsd oamt iqdmo pnik : aSri hem iodei troeh ihoh baor pnik ihlkon : bSmk igilon kl hiom obzdqtk iromo : ki tpart ecmo ath obrznk trim qrnno : ki lihoh mgnno olqdoS iSral mlkno : ac dbrt bHcon lHsidik otamr Soiti ecr el gbor hrimoti bHor mem : mzati dod ebdi bSmn qdSi mSHtio : aSr idi tkon emo ap croei tamzno : la iSa aoib bo obn eolh la ienno : oktoti mpnio zrio omSnaio agop : oamonti oHsdi emo obSmi trom qrno : oSmti bim ido obnhrot imino : hoa iqrani abi ath ali ozor iSoeti : ap ani bkor atnho elion lmlki arz : leolm aSmor lo Hsdi obriti namnt lo : oSmti led creo oksao kimi Smim : am iecbo bnio torti obmSpTi la ilkon : am Hqti iHllo omzoti la iSmro : opqdti bSbT pSem obngeim eonm : oHsdi la apir memo ola aSqr bamonti : la aHll briti omoza Spti la aSnh : aHt nSbeti bqdSi am ldod akcb : creo leolm ihih oksao kSmS ngdi : kirH ikon eolm oed bSHq namn slh : oath cnHt otmas htebrt em mSiHk : narth brit ebdk Hllt larz ncro : przt kl gdrtio Smt mbzrio mHth : Ssho kl ebri drk hih Hrph lSknio : hrimot imin zrio hSmHt kl aoibio : ap tSib zor Hrbo ola hqimto bmlHmh : hSbt mThro oksao larz mgrth : hqzrt imi elomio heTit elio boSh slh : ed mh ihoh tstr lnzH tber kmo aS Hmtk : ckr ani mh Hld el mh Soa brat kl bni adm : mi gbr iHih ola irah mot imlT npSo mid Saol slh : aih Hsdik hraSnim adni nSbet ldod bamontk : ckr adni Hrpt ebdik Sati bHiqi kl rbim emim : aSr Hrpo aoibik ihoh aSr Hrpo eqbot mSiHk : brok ihoh leolm amn oamn :

90

tplh lmSh aiS halhim adni meon ath hiit lno bdr odr : bTrm hrim ildo otHoll arz otbl omeolm ed eolm ath al : tSb anoS ed dka otamr Sobo bni adm : ki alp Snim beinik kiom atmol ki iebr oaSmorh blilh : crmtm Snh ihio bbqr kHzir iHlp : bbqr iziz oHlp lerb imoll oibS : ki klino bapk obHmtk nbhlno : St eontino lngdk elmno lmaor pnik : ki kl imino pno bebrtk klino Snino kmo hgh : imi Snotino bhm Sbeim Snh oam bgbort Smonim Snh orhbm eml oaon ki gc HiS oneph : mi iode ec apk okiratk ebrtk : lmnot imino kn hode onba lbb Hkmh : Sobh ihoh ed mti ohnHm el ebdik : Sbeno bbqr Hsdk onrnnh onSmHh bkl imino : SmHno kimot enitno Snot raino reh : irah al ebdik pelk ohdrk el bnihm : oihi nem adni alhino elino omeSh idino konnh elino omeSh idino konnho :

91

iSb bstr elion bzl Sdi itlonn : amr lihoh mHsi omzodti alhi abTH bo : ki hoa izilk mpH iqoS mdbr hoot : babrto isk lk otHt knpio tHsh znh osHrh amto : la tira mpHd lilh mHz ieop iomm : mdbr bapl ihlk mqTb iSod zhrim : ipl mzdk alp orbbh mimink alik la igS : rq beinik tbiT oSlmt rSeim trah : ki ath ihoh mHsi elion Smt meonk : la tanh alik reh onge la iqrb bahlk : ki mlakio izoh lk lSmrk bkl drkik : el kpim iSaonk pn tgp babn rglk : el SHl optn tdrk trms kpir otnin : ki bi HSq oaplTho aSgbho ki ide Smi : iqrani oaenho emo anki bzrh aHlzho oakbdho : ark imim aSbieho oaraho biSoeti :

92

mcmor Sir liom hSbt Tob lhdot lihoh olcmr lSmk elion : lhgid bbqr Hsdk oamontk blilot : eli eSor oeli nbl eli hgion bknor : ki SmHtni ihoh bpelk bmeSi idik arnn : mh gdlo meSik ihoh mad emqo mHSbtik : aiS ber la ide oksil la ibin at cat : bprH rSeim kmo eSb oizizo kl peli aon lhSmdm edi ed : oath mrom lelm ihoh : ki hnh aibik ihoh ki hnh aibik iabdo itprdo kl peli aon : otrm kraim qrni blti bSmn renn : otbT eini bSori bqmim eli mreim tSmenh acni : zdiq ktmr iprH karc blbnon iSgh : Stolim bbit ihoh bHzrot alhino ipriHo : eod inobon bSibh dSnim orennim ihio : lhgid ki iSr ihoh zori ola elth bo :

93

ihoh mlk gaot lbS lbS ihoh ec htacr ap tkon tbl bl tmoT : nkon ksak mac meolm ath : nSao nhrot ihoh nSao nhrot qolm iSao nhrot dkim : mqlot mim rbim adirim mSbri im adir bmrom ihoh : edtik namno mad lbitk naoh qdS ihoh lark imim :

94

al nqmot ihoh al nqmot hopie : hnSa SpT harz hSb gmol el gaim : ed mti rSeim ihoh ed mti rSeim ielco : ibieo idbro etq itamro kl peli aon : emk ihoh idkao onHltk ieno : almnh ogr ihrgo oitomim irzHo : oiamro la irah ih ola ibin alhi ieqb : bino berim bem oksilim mti tSkilo : hnTe acn hla iSme am izr ein hla ibiT : hisr goim hla iokiH hmlmd adm det : ihoh ide mHSbot adm ki hmh hbl : aSri hgbr aSr tisrno ih omtortk tlmdno : lhSqiT lo mimi re ed ikrh lrSe SHt : ki la iTS ihoh emo onHlto la iecb : ki ed zdq iSob mSpT oaHrio kl iSri lb : mi iqom li em mreim mi itizb li em peli aon : loli ihoh ecrth li kmeT Sknh domh npSi : am amrti mTh rgli Hsdk ihoh isedni : brb Srepi bqrbi tnHomik iSeSeo npSi : hiHbrk ksa hoot izr eml eli Hq : igodo el npS zdiq odm nqi irSieo : oihi ihoh li lmSgb oalhi lzor mHsi : oiSb elihm at aonm obretm izmitm izmitm ihoh alhino :

95

lko nrnnh lihoh nrieh lzor iSeno : nqdmh pnio btodh bcmrot nrie lo : ki al gdol ihoh omlk gdol el kl alhim : aSr bido mHqri arz otoepot hrim lo : aSr lo him ohoa eSho oibSt idio izro : bao nStHoh onkreh nbrkh lpni ihoh eSno : ki hoa alhino oanHno em mreito ozan ido hiom am bqlo tSmeo : al tqSo lbbkm kmribh kiom msh bmdbr : aSr nsoni abotikm bHnoni gm rao peli : arbeim Snh aqoT bdor oamr em tei lbb hm ohm la ideo drki : aSr nSbeti bapi am ibaon al mnoHti :

96

Siro lihoh Sir HdS Siro lihoh kl harz : Siro lihoh brko Smo bSro miom liom iSoeto : spro bgoim kbodo bkl hemim nplaotio : ki gdol ihoh omhll mad nora hoa el kl alhim : ki kl alhi hemim alilim oihoh Smim eSh : hod ohdr lpnio ec otpart bmqdSo : hbo lihoh mSpHot emim hbo lihoh kbod oec : hbo lihoh kbod Smo Sao mnHh obao lHzrotio : hStHoo lihoh bhdrt qdS Hilo mpnio kl harz : amro bgoim ihoh mlk ap tkon tbl bl tmoT idin emim bmiSrim : iSmHo hSmim otgl harz irem him omlao : ielc Sdi okl aSr bo ac irnno kl ezi ier : lpni ihoh ki ba ki ba lSpT harz iSpT tbl bzdq oemim bamonto :

97

ihoh mlk tgl harz iSmHo aiim rbim : enn oerpl sbibio zdq omSpT mkon ksao : aS lpnio tlk otlhT sbib zrio : hairo brqio tbl rath otHl harz : hrim kdong nmso mlpni ihoh mlpni adon kl harz : hgido hSmim zdqo orao kl hemim kbodo : ibSo kl ebdi psl hmthllim balilim hStHoo lo kl alhim : Smeh otSmH zion otglnh bnot ihodh lmen mSpTik ihoh : ki ath ihoh elion el kl harz mad nelit el kl alhim : ahbi ihoh Snao re Smr npSot Hsidio mid rSeim izilm : aor cre lzdiq oliSri lb SmHh : SmHo zdiqim bihoh ohodo lckr qdSo :

98

mcmor Siro lihoh Sir HdS ki nplaot eSh hoSieh lo imino ocroe qdSo : hodie ihoh iSoeto leini hgoim glh zdqto : ckr Hsdo oamonto lbit iSral rao kl apsi arz at iSoet alhino : hrieo lihoh kl harz pzHo ornno ocmro : cmro lihoh bknor bknor oqol cmrh : bHzzrot oqol Sopr hrieo lpni hmlk ihoh : irem him omlao tbl oiSbi bh : nhrot imHao kp iHd hrim irnno : lpni ihoh ki ba lSpT harz iSpT tbl bzdq oemim bmiSrim :

99

ihoh mlk irgco emim iSb krobim tnoT harz : ihoh bzion gdol orm hoa el kl hemim : iodo Smk gdol onora qdoS hoa : oec mlk mSpT ahb ath konnt miSrim mSpT ozdqh bieqb ath eSit : rommo ihoh alhino ohStHoo lhdm rglio qdoS hoa : mSh oahrn bkhnio oSmoal bqrai Smo qraim al ihoh ohoa ienm : bemod enn idbr alihm Smro edtio oHq ntn lmo : ihoh alhino ath enitm al nSa hiit lhm onqm el elilotm : rommo ihoh alhino ohStHoo lhr qdSo ki qdoS ihoh alhino :

100

mcmor ltodh hrieo lihoh kl harz : ebdo at ihoh bSmHh bao lpnio brnnh : deo ki ihoh hoa alhim hoa eSno ola anHno emo ozan mreito : bao Serio btodh Hzrtio bthlh hodo lo brko Smo : ki Tob ihoh leolm Hsdo oed dr odr amonto :

101

ldod mcmor Hsd omSpT aSirh lk ihoh acmrh : aSkilh bdrk tmim mti tboa ali athlk btm lbbi bqrb biti : la aSit lngd eini dbr bliel eSh sTim Snati la idbq bi : lbb eqS isor mmni re la ade : mloSni bstr reho aoto azmit gbh einim orHb lbb ato la aokl : eini bnamni arz lSbt emdi hlk bdrk tmim hoa iSrtni : la iSb bqrb biti eSh rmih dbr Sqrim la ikon lngd eini : lbqrim azmit kl rSei arz lhkrit meir ihoh kl peli aon :

102

tplh leni ki ieTp olpni ihoh iSpk SiHo ihoh Smeh tplti oSoeti alik tboa : al tstr pnik mmni biom zr li hTh ali acnk biom aqra mhr enni : ki klo beSn imi oezmoti kmo qd nHro : hokh keSb oibS lbi ki SkHti makl lHmi : mqol anHti dbqh ezmi lbSri : dmiti lqat mdbr hiiti kkos Hrbot : Sqdti oahih kzpor bodd el gg : kl hiom Hrponi aoibi mholli bi nSbeo : ki apr klHm aklti oSqoi bbki mskti : mpni cemk oqzpk ki nSatni otSlikni : imi kzl nToi oani keSb aibS : oath ihoh leolm tSb ockrk ldr odr : ath tqom trHm zion ki et lHnnh ki ba moed : ki rzo ebdik at abnih oat eprh iHnno : oiirao goim at Sm ihoh okl mlki harz at kbodk : ki bnh ihoh zion nrah bkbodo : pnh al tplt herer ola bch at tpltm : tktb cat ldor aHron oem nbra ihll ih : ki hSqip mmrom qdSo ihoh mSmim al arz hbiT : lSme anqt asir lptH bni tmoth : lspr bzion Sm ihoh othlto biroSlm : bhqbz emim iHdo ommlkot lebd at ihoh : enh bdrk kHo qzr imi : amr ali al telni bHzi imi bdor dorim Snotik : lpnim harz isdt omeSh idik Smim : hmh iabdo oath temd oklm kbgd iblo klboS tHlipm oiHlpo : oath hoa oSnotik la itmo : bni ebdik iSkono ocrem lpnik ikon :

103

ldod brki npSi at ihoh okl qrbi at Sm qdSo : brki npSi at ihoh oal tSkHi kl gmolio : hslH lkl eonki hrpa lkl tHlaiki : hgoal mSHt Hiiki hmeTrki Hsd orHmim : hmSbie bTob edik ttHdS knSr neoriki : eSh zdqot ihoh omSpTim lkl eSoqim : iodie drkio lmSh lbni iSral elilotio : rHom oHnon ihoh ark apim orb Hsd : la lnzH irib ola leolm iTor : la kHTaino eSh lno ola keontino gml elino : ki kgbh Smim el harz gbr Hsdo el iraio : krHq mcrH mmerb hrHiq mmno at pSeino : krHm ab el bnim rHm ihoh el iraio : ki hoa ide izrno ckor ki epr anHno : anoS kHzir imio kziz hSdh kn iziz : ki roH ebrh bo oainno ola ikirno eod mqomo : oHsd ihoh meolm oed eolm el iraio ozdqto lbni bnim : lSmri brito olckri pqdio leSotm : ihoh bSmim hkin ksao omlkoto bkl mSlh : brko ihoh mlakio gbri kH eSi dbro lSme bqol dbro : brko ihoh kl zbaio mSrtio eSi rzono : brko ihoh kl meSio bkl mqmot mmSlto brki npSi at ihoh :

104

brki npSi at ihoh ihoh alhi gdlt mad hod ohdr lbSt : eTh aor kSlmh noTh Smim kirieh : hmqrh bmim eliotio hSm ebim rkobo hmhlk el knpi roH : eSh mlakio roHot mSrtio aS lhT : isd arz el mkonih bl tmoT eolm oed : thom klboS ksito el hrim iemdo mim : mn gertk inoson mn qol remk iHpcon : ielo hrim irdo bqeot al mqom ch isdt lhm : gbol Smt bl iebron bl iSobon lksot harz : hmSlH meinim bnHlim bin hrim ihlkon : iSqo kl Hito Sdi iSbro praim zmam : elihm eop hSmim iSkon mbin epaim itno qol : mSqh hrim meliotio mpri meSik tSbe harz : mzmiH Hzir lbhmh oeSb lebdt hadm lhozia lHm mn harz : oiin iSmH lbb anoS lhzhil pnim mSmn olHm lbb anoS ised : iSbeo ezi ihoh arci lbnon aSr nTe : aSr Sm zprim iqnno Hsidh broSim bith : hrim hgbhim lielim sleim mHsh lSpnim : eSh irH lmoedim SmS ide mboao : tSt HSk oihi lilh bo trmS kl Hito ier : hkpirim Sagim lTrp olbqS mal aklm : tcrH hSmS iaspon oal meontm irbzon : iza adm lpelo olebdto edi erb : mh rbo meSik ihoh klm bHkmh eSit mlah harz qnink : ch him gdol orHb idim Sm rmS oain mspr Hiot qTnot em gdlot : Sm aniot ihlkon loitn ch izrt lSHq bo : klm alik iSbron ltt aklm beto : ttn lhm ilqTon tptH idk iSbeon Tob : tstir pnik ibhlon tsp roHm igoeon oal eprm iSobon : tSlH roHk ibraon otHdS pni admh : ihi kbod ihoh leolm iSmH ihoh bmeSio : hmbiT larz otred ige bhrim oieSno : aSirh lihoh bHii acmrh lalhi beodi : ierb elio SiHi anki aSmH bihoh : itmo HTaim mn harz orSeim eod ainm brki npSi at ihoh hllo ih :

105

hodo lihoh qrao bSmo hodieo bemim elilotio : Siro lo cmro lo SiHo bkl nplaotio : hthllo bSm qdSo iSmH lb mbqSi ihoh : drSo ihoh oeco bqSo pnio tmid : ckro nplaotio aSr eSh mptio omSpTi pio : cre abrhm ebdo bni ieqb bHirio : hoa ihoh alhino bkl harz mSpTio : ckr leolm brito dbr zoh lalp dor : aSr krt at abrhm oSboeto liSHq : oiemidh lieqb lHq liSral brit eolm : lamr lk atn at arz knen Hbl nHltkm : bhiotm mti mspr kmeT ogrim bh : oithlko mgoi al goi mmmlkh al em aHr : la hniH adm leSqm oiokH elihm mlkim : al tgeo bmSiHi olnbiai al treo : oiqra reb el harz kl mTh lHm Sbr : SlH lpnihm aiS lebd nmkr iosp : eno bkbl rglio brcl bah npSo : ed et ba dbro amrt ihoh zrptho : SlH mlk oitirho mSl emim oiptHho : Smo adon lbito omSl bkl qnino : lasr Srio bnpSo ocqnio iHkm : oiba iSral mzrim oieqb gr barz Hm : oipr at emo mad oiezmho mzrio : hpk lbm lSna emo lhtnkl bebdio : SlH mSh ebdo ahrn aSr bHr bo : Smo bm dbri atotio omptim barz Hm : SlH HSk oiHSk ola mro at dbrio : hpk at mimihm ldm oimt at dgtm : Srz arzm zprdeim bHdri mlkihm : amr oiba erb knim bkl gbolm : ntn gSmihm brd aS lhbot barzm : oik gpnm otantm oiSbr ez gbolm : amr oiba arbh oilq oain mspr : oiakl kl eSb barzm oiakl pri admtm : oik kl bkor barzm raSit lkl aonm : oioziam bksp ochb oain bSbTio koSl : SmH mzrim bzatm ki npl pHdm elihm : prS enn lmsk oaS lhair lilh : Sal oiba Slo olHm Smim iSbiem : ptH zor oicobo mim hlko bziot nhr : ki ckr at dbr qdSo at abrhm ebdo : oioza emo bSSon brnh at bHirio : oitn lhm arzot goim oeml lamim iirSo : bebor iSmro Hqio otortio inzro hllo ih :

106

hlloih hodo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : mi imll gborot ihoh iSmie kl thlto : aSri Smri mSpT eSh zdqh bkl et : ckrni ihoh brzon emk pqdni biSoetk : lraot bTobt bHirik lSmH bSmHt goik lhthll em nHltk : HTano em abotino heoino hrSeno : abotino bmzrim la hSkilo nplaotik la ckro at rb Hsdik oimro el im bim sop : oioSiem lmen Smo lhodie at gborto : oiger bim sop oiHrb oiolikm bthmot kmdbr : oioSiem mid Sona oigalm mid aoib : oikso mim zrihm aHd mhm la notr : oiamino bdbrio iSiro thlto : mhro SkHo meSio la Hko lezto : oitaoo taoh bmdbr oinso al biSimon : oitn lhm Saltm oiSlH rcon bnpSm : oiqnao lmSh bmHnh lahrn qdoS ihoh : tptH arz otble dtn otks el edt abirm : otber aS bedtm lhbh tlhT rSeim : ieSo egl bHrb oiStHoo lmskh : oimiro at kbodm btbnit Sor akl eSb : SkHo al moSiem eSh gdlot bmzrim : nplaot barz Hm noraot el im sop : oiamr lhSmidm loli mSh bHiro emd bprz lpnio lhSib Hmto mhSHit : oimaso barz Hmdh la hamino ldbro : oirgno bahlihm la Smeo bqol ihoh : oiSa ido lhm lhpil aotm bmdbr : olhpil crem bgoim olcrotm barzot : oizmdo lbel peor oiaklo cbHi mtim : oikeiso bmellihm otprz bm mgph : oiemd pinHs oipll otezr hmgph : otHSb lo lzdqh ldr odr ed eolm : oiqzipo el mi mribh oire lmSh beborm : ki hmro at roHo oibTa bSptio : la hSmido at hemim aSr amr ihoh lhm : oiterbo bgoim oilmdo meSihm : oiebdo at ezbihm oihio lhm lmoqS : oicbHo at bnihm oat bnotihm lSdim : oiSpko dm nqi dm bnihm obnotihm aSr cbHo lezbi knen otHnp harz bdmim : oiTmao bmeSihm oicno bmellihm : oiHr ap ihoh bemo oiteb at nHlto : oitnm bid goim oimSlo bhm Snaihm : oilHzom aoibihm oikneo tHt idm : pemim rbot izilm ohmh imro beztm oimko beonm : oira bzr lhm bSmeo at rntm : oickr lhm brito oinHm krb Hsdo : oitn aotm lrHmim lpni kl Sobihm : hoSieno ihoh alhino oqbzno mn hgoim lhdot lSm qdSk lhStbH bthltk : brok ihoh alhi iSral mn heolm oed heolm oamr kl hem amn hllo ih :

107

hdo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : iamro gaoli ihoh aSr galm mid zr : omarzot qbzm mmcrH ommerb mzpon omim : teo bmdbr biSimon drk eir moSb la mzao : rebim gm zmaim npSm bhm tteTp : oizeqo al ihoh bzr lhm mmzoqotihm izilm : oidrikm bdrk iSrh llkt al eir moSb : iodo lihoh Hsdo onplaotio lbni adm : ki hSbie npS Sqqh onpS rebh mla Tob : iSbi HSk ozlmot asiri eni obrcl : ki hmro amri al oezt elion nazo : oikne beml lbm kSlo oain ecr : oiceqo al ihoh bzr lhm mmzqotihm ioSiem : ioziam mHSk ozlmot omosrotihm intq : iodo lihoh Hsdo onplaotio lbni adm : ki Sbr dltot nHSt obriHi brcl gde : aolim mdrk pSem omeontihm iteno : kl akl tteb npSm oigieo ed Seri mot : oiceqo al ihoh bzr lhm mmzqotihm ioSiem : iSlH dbro oirpam oimlT mSHitotm : iodo lihoh Hsdo onplaotio lbni adm : oicbHo cbHi todh oispro meSio brnh : iordi him baniot eSi mlakh bmim rbim : hmh rao meSi ihoh onplaotio bmzolh : oiamr oiemd roH serh otromm glio : ielo Smim irdo thomot npSm breh ttmogg : iHogo oinoeo kSkor okl Hkmtm ttble : oizeqo al ihoh bzr lhm ommzoqtihm ioziam : iqm serh ldmmh oiHSo glihm : oiSmHo ki iStqo oinHm al mHoc Hpzm : iodo lihoh Hsdo onplaotio lbni adm : oirmmoho bqhl em obmoSb cqnim ihlloho : iSm nhrot lmdbr omzai mim lzmaon : arz pri lmlHh mret iSbi bh : iSm mdbr lagm mim oarz zih lmzai mim : oioSb Sm rebim oikonno eir moSb : oicreo Sdot oiTeo krmim oieSo pri tboah : oibrkm oirbo mad obhmtm la imeiT : oimeTo oiSHo mezr reh oigon : Spk boc el ndibim oitem btho la drk : oiSgb abion meoni oiSm kzan mSpHot : irao iSrim oiSmHo okl eolh qpzh pih : mi Hkm oiSmr alh oitbonno Hsdi ihoh :

108

Sir mcmor ldod nkon lbi alhim aSirh oacmrh ap kbodi : eorh hnbl oknor aeirh SHr : aodk bemim ihoh oacmrk bl amim : ki gdol mel Smim Hsdk oed SHqim amtk : romh el Smim alhim oel kl harz kbodk : lmen iHlzon ididik hoSieh imink oenni : alhim dbr bqdSo aelch aHlqh Skm oemq skot amdd : li gled li mnSh oaprim meoc raSi ihodh mHqqi : moab sir rHzi el adom aSlik neli eli plSt atroee : mi iblni eir mbzr mi nHni ed adom : hla alhim cnHtno ola tza alhim bzbatino : hbh lno ecrt mzr oSoa tSoet adm : balhim neSh Hil ohoa ibos zrino :

109

lmnzH ldod mcmor alhi thlti al tHrS : ki pi rSe opi mrmh eli ptHo dbro ati lSon Sqr : odbri Snah sbboni oilHmoni Hnm : tHt ahbti iSTnoni oani tplh : oiSimo eli reh tHt Tobh oSnah tHt ahbti : hpqd elio rSe oSTn iemd el imino : bhSpTo iza rSe otplto thih lHTah : ihio imio meTim pqdto iqH aHr : ihio bnio itomim oaSto almnh : onoe inoeo bnio oSalo odrSo mHrbotihm : inqS noSh lkl aSr lo oibco crim igieo : al ihi lo mSk Hsd oal ihi Honn litomio : ihi aHrito lhkrit bdor aHr imH Smm : ickr eon abtio al ihoh oHTat amo al tmH : ihio ngd ihoh tmid oikrt marz ckrm : ien aSr la ckr eSot Hsd oirdp aiS eni oabion onkah lbb lmott : oiahb qllh otboaho ola Hpz bbrkh otrHq mmno : oilbS qllh kmdo otba kmim bqrbo okSmn bezmotio : thi lo kbgd ieTh olmcH tmid iHgrh : cat pelt STni mat ihoh ohdbrim re el npSi : oath ihoh adni eSh ati lmen Smk ki Tob Hsdk hzilni : ki eni oabion anki olbi Hll bqrbi : kzl knToto nhlkti nnerti karbh : brki kSlo mzom obSri kHS mSmn : oani hiiti Hrph lhm iraoni inieon raSm : ecrni ihoh alhi hoSieni kHsdk : oideo ki idk cat ath ihoh eSith : iqllo hmh oath tbrk qmo oibSo oebdk iSmH : ilbSo SoTni klmh oieTo kmeil bStm : aodh ihoh mad bpi obtok rbim ahllno : ki iemd limin abion lhoSie mSpTi npSo :

110

ldod mcmor nam ihoh ladni Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : mTh eck iSlH ihoh mzion rdh bqrb aibik : emk ndbt biom Hilk bhdri qdS mrHm mSHr lk Tl ildtik : nSbe ihoh ola inHm ath khn leolm el dbrti mlki zdq : adni el imink mHz biom apo mlkim : idin bgoim mla goiot mHz raS el arz rbh : mnHl bdrk iSth el kn irim raS :

111

hllo ih aodh ihoh bkl lbb bsod iSrim oedh : gdlim meSi ihoh droSim lkl Hpzihm : hod ohdr pelo ozdqto emdt led : ckr eSh lnplatio Hnon orHom ihoh : Trp ntn liraio ickr leolm brito : kH meSio hgid lemo ltt lhm nHlt goim : meSi idio amt omSpT namnim kl pqodio : smokim led leolm eSoim bamt oiSr : pdot SlH lemo zoh leolm brito qdoS onora Smo : raSit Hkmh irat ihoh Skl Tob lkl eSihm thlto emdt led :

112

hllo ih aSri aiS ira at ihoh bmzotio Hpz mad : gbor barz ihih creo dor iSrim ibrk : hon oeSr bbito ozdqto emdt led : crH bHSk aor liSrim Hnon orHom ozdiq : Tob aiS Honn omloh iklkl dbrio bmSpT : ki leolm la imoT lckr eolm ihih zdiq : mSmoeh reh la iira nkon lbo bTH bihoh : smok lbo la iira ed aSr irah bzrio : pcr ntn labionim zdqto emdt led qrno trom bkbod : rSe irah okes Snio iHrq onms taot rSeim tabd :

113
