hllo ih hllo ebdi ihoh hllo at Sm ihoh : ihi Sm ihoh mbrk meth oed eolm : mmcrH SmS ed mboao mhll Sm ihoh : rm el kl goim ihoh el hSmim kbodo : mi kihoh alhino hmgbihi lSbt : hmSpili lraot bSmim obarz : mqimi mepr dl maSpt irim abion : lhoSibi em ndibim em ndibi emo : moSibi eqrt hbit am hbnim SmHh hllo ih :

114

bzat iSral mmzrim bit ieqb mem lec : hith ihodh lqdSo iSral mmSlotio : him rah oins hirdn isb laHor : hhrim rqdo kailim gbeot kbni zan : mh lk him ki tnos hirdn tsb laHor : hhrim trqdo kailim gbeot kbni zan : mlpni adon Holi arz mlpni aloh ieqb : hhpki hzor agm mim HlmiS lmeino mim :

115

la lno ihoh la lno ki lSmk tn kbod el Hsdk el amtk : lmh iamro hgoim aih na alhihm : oalhino bSmim kl aSr Hpz eSh : ezbihm ksp ochb meSh idi adm : ph lhm ola idbro einim lhm ola irao : acnim lhm ola iSmeo ap lhm ola iriHon : idihm ola imiSon rglihm ola ihlko la ihgo bgronm : kmohm ihio eSihm kl aSr bTH bhm : iSral bTH bihoh ecrm omgnm hoa : bit ahrn bTHo bihoh ecrm omgnm hoa : irai ihoh bTHo bihoh ecrm omgnm hoa : ihoh ckrno ibrk ibrk at bit iSral ibrk at bit ahrn : ibrk irai ihoh hqTnim em hgdlim : isp ihoh elikm elikm oel bnikm : brokim atm lihoh eSh Smim oarz : hSmim Smim lihoh oharz ntn lbni adm : la hmtim ihllo ih ola kl irdi domh : oanHno nbrk ih meth oed eolm hllo ih :

116

ahbti ki iSme ihoh at qoli tHnoni : ki hTh acno li obimi aqra : apponi Hbli mot omzri Saol mzaoni zrh oigon amza : obSm ihoh aqra anh ihoh mlTh npSi : Hnon ihoh ozdiq oalhino mrHm : Smr ptaim ihoh dloti oli ihoSie : Sobi npSi lmnoHiki ki ihoh gml eliki : ki Hlzt npSi mmot at eini mn dmeh at rgli mdHi : athlk lpni ihoh barzot hHiim : hamnti ki adbr ani eniti mad : ani amrti bHpci kl hadm kcb : mh aSib lihoh kl tgmolohi eli : kos iSoeot aSa obSm ihoh aqra : ndri lihoh aSlm ngdh na lkl emo : iqr beini ihoh hmoth lHsidio : anh ihoh ki ani ebdk ani ebdk bn amtk ptHt lmosri : lk acbH cbH todh obSm ihoh aqra : ndri lihoh aSlm ngdh na lkl emo : bHzrot bit ihoh btokki iroSlm hllo ih :

117

hllo at ihoh kl goim SbHoho kl hamim : ki gbr elino Hsdo oamt ihoh leolm hllo ih :

118

hodo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : iamr na iSral ki leolm Hsdo : iamro na bit ahrn ki leolm Hsdo : iamro na irai ihoh ki leolm Hsdo : mn hmzr qrati ih enni bmrHb ih : ihoh li la aira mh ieSh li adm : ihoh li becri oani arah bSnai : Tob lHsot bihoh mbTH badm : Tob lHsot bihoh mbTH bndibim : kl goim sbboni bSm ihoh ki amilm : sboni gm sbboni bSm ihoh ki amilm : sboni kdborim deko kaS qozim bSm ihoh ki amilm : dHh dHitni lnpl oihoh ecrni : eci ocmrt ih oihi li liSoeh : qol rnh oiSoeh bahli zdiqim imin ihoh eSh Hil : imin ihoh rommh imin ihoh eSh Hil : la amot ki aHih oaspr meSi ih : isr isrni ih olmot la ntnni : ptHo li Seri zdq aba bm aodh ih : ch hSer lihoh zdiqim ibao bo : aodk ki enitni othi li liSoeh : abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh : mat ihoh hith cat hia nplat beinino : ch hiom eSh ihoh ngilh onSmHh bo : ana ihoh hoSieh na ana ihoh hzliHh na : brok hba bSm ihoh brknokm mbit ihoh : al ihoh oiar lno asro Hg bebtim ed qrnot hmcbH : ali ath oaodk alhi arommk : hodo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo :

119

aSri tmimi drk hhlkim btort ihoh : aSri nzri edtio bkl lb idrSoho : ap la pelo eolh bdrkio hlko : ath zoith pqdik lSmr mad : aHli ikno drki lSmr Hqik : ac la aboS bhbiTi al kl mzotik : aodk biSr lbb blmdi mSpTi zdqk : at Hqik aSmr al tecbni ed mad : bmh ickh ner at arHo lSmr kdbrk : bkl lbi drStik al tSgni mmzotik : blbi zpnti amrtk lmen la aHTa lk : brok ath ihoh lmdni Hqik : bSpti sprti kl mSpTi pik : bdrk edotik SSti kel kl hon : bpqdik aSiHh oabiTh arHtik : bHqtik aSteSe la aSkH dbrk : gml el ebdk aHih oaSmrh dbrk : gl eini oabiTh nplaot mtortk : gr anki barz al tstr mmni mzotik : grsh npSi ltabh al mSpTik bkl et : gert cdim arorim hSgim mmzotik : gl meli Hrph oboc ki edtik nzrti : gm iSbo Srim bi ndbro ebdk iSiH bHqik : gm edtik SeSei anSi ezti : dbqh lepr npSi Hini kdbrk : drki sprti otenni lmdni Hqik : drk pqodik hbinni oaSiHh bnplaotik : dlph npSi mtogh qimni kdbrk : drk Sqr hsr mmni otortk Hnni : drk amonh bHrti mSpTik Soiti : dbqti bedotik ihoh al tbiSni : drk mzotik aroz ki trHib lbi : horni ihoh drk Hqik oazrnh eqb : hbinni oazrh tortk oaSmrnh bkl lb : hdrikni bntib mzotik ki bo Hpzti : hT lbi al edotik oal al bze : hebr eini mraot Soa bdrkk Hini : hqm lebdk amrtk aSr liratk : hebr Hrpti aSr igrti ki mSpTik Tobim : hnh tabti lpqdik bzdqtk Hini : oibani Hsdk ihoh tSoetk kamrtk : oaenh Hrpi dbr ki bTHti bdbrk : oal tzl mpi dbr amt ed mad ki lmSpTk iHlti : oaSmrh tortk tmid leolm oed : oathlkh brHbh ki pqdik drSti : oadbrh bedtik ngd mlkim ola aboS : oaSteSe bmzotik aSr ahbti : oaSa kpi al mzotik aSr ahbti oaSiHh bHqik : ckr dbr lebdk el aSr iHltni : cat nHmti benii ki amrtk Hitni : cdim hlizni ed mad mtortk la nTiti : ckrti mSpTik meolm ihoh oatnHm : cleph aHctni mrSeim ecbi tortk : cmrot hio li Hqik bbit mgori : ckrti blilh Smk ihoh oaSmrh tortk : cat hith li ki pqdik nzrti : Hlqi ihoh amrti lSmr dbrik : Hliti pnik bkl lb Hnni kamrtk : HSbti drki oaSibh rgli al edtik : HSti ola htmhmhti lSmr mzotik : Hbli rSeim eodni tortk la SkHti : Hzot lilh aqom lhodot lk el mSpTi zdqk : Hbr ani lkl aSr iraok olSmri pqodik : Hsdk ihoh mlah harz Hqik lmdni : Tob eSit em ebdk ihoh kdbrk : Tob Tem odet lmdni ki bmzotik hamnti : Trm aenh ani Sgg oeth amrtk Smrti : Tob ath omTib lmdni Hqik : Tplo eli Sqr cdim ani bkl lb azr pqodik : TpS kHlb lbm ani tortk SeSeti : Tob li ki eniti lmen almd Hqik : Tob li tort pik malpi chb oksp : idik eSoni oikonnoni hbinni oalmdh mzotik : iraik iraoni oiSmHo ki ldbrk iHlti : ideti ihoh ki zdq mSpTik oamonh enitni : ihi na Hsdk lnHmni kamrtk lebdk : ibaoni rHmik oaHih ki tortk SeSei : ibSo cdim ki Sqr eotoni ani aSiH bpqodik : iSobo li iraik oideo edtik : ihi lbi tmim bHqik lmen la aboS : klth ltSoetk npSi ldbrk iHlti : klo eini lamrtk lamr mti tnHmni : ki hiiti knad bqiTor Hqik la SkHti : kmh imi ebdk mti teSh brdpi mSpT : kro li cdim SiHot aSr la ktortk : kl mzotik amonh Sqr rdponi ecrni : kmeT kloni barz oani la ecbti pqodik : kHsdk Hini oaSmrh edot pik : leolm ihoh dbrk nzb bSmim : ldr odr amontk konnt arz otemd : lmSpTik emdo hiom ki hkl ebdik : loli tortk SeSei ac abdti benii : leolm la aSkH pqodik ki bm Hiitni : lk ani hoSieni ki pqodik drSti : li qoo rSeim labdni edtik atbonn : lkl tklh raiti qz rHbh mzotk mad : mh ahbti tortk kl hiom hia SiHti : maibi tHkmni mzotk ki leolm hia li : mkl mlmdi hSklti ki edotik SiHh li : mcqnim atbonn ki pqodik nzrti : mkl arH re klati rgli lmen aSmr dbrk : mmSpTik la srti ki ath hortni : mh nmlzo lHki amrtk mdbS lpi : mpqodik atbonn el kn Snati kl arH Sqr : nr lrgli dbrk oaor lntibti : nSbeti oaqimh lSmr mSpTi zdqk : neniti ed mad ihoh Hini kdbrk : ndbot pi rzh na ihoh omSpTik lmdni : npSi bkpi tmid otortk la SkHti : ntno rSeim pH li ompqodik la teiti : nHlti edotik leolm ki SSon lbi hmh : nTiti lbi leSot Hqik leolm eqb : sepim Snati otortk ahbti : stri omgni ath ldbrk iHlti : soro mmni mreim oazrh mzot alhi : smkni kamrtk oaHih oal tbiSni mSbri : sedni oaoSeh oaSeh bHqik tmid : slit kl Sogim mHqik ki Sqr trmitm : sgim hSbt kl rSei arz lkn ahbti edtik : smr mpHdk bSri ommSpTik irati : eSiti mSpT ozdq bl tniHni leSqi : erb ebdk lTob al ieSqni cdim : eini klo liSoetk olamrt zdqk : eSh em ebdk kHsdk oHqik lmdni : ebdk ani hbinni oadeh edtik : et leSot lihoh hpro tortk : el kn ahbti mzotik mchb ompc : el kn kl pqodi kl iSrti kl arH Sqr Snati : plaot edotik el kn nzrtm npSi : ptH dbrik iair mbin ptiim : pi perti oaSaph ki lmzotik iabti : pnh ali oHnni kmSpT lahbi Smk : pemi hkn bamrtk oal tSlT bi kl aon : pdni meSq adm oaSmrh pqodik : pnik har bebdk olmdni at Hqik : plgi mim irdo eini el la Smro tortk : zdiq ath ihoh oiSr mSpTik : zoit zdq edtik oamonh mad : zmttni qnati ki SkHo dbrik zri : zroph amrtk mad oebdk ahbh : zeir anki onbch pqdik la SkHti : zdqtk zdq leolm otortk amt : zr omzoq mzaoni mzotik SeSei : zdq edotik leolm hbinni oaHih : qrati bkl lb enni ihoh Hqik azrh : qratik hoSieni oaSmrh edtik : qdmti bnSp oaSoeh ldbrik iHlti : qdmo eini aSmrot lSiH bamrtk : qoli Smeh kHsdk ihoh kmSpTk Hini : qrbo rdpi cmh mtortk rHqo : qrob ath ihoh okl mzotik amt : qdm ideti medtik ki leolm isdtm : rah enii oHlzni ki tortk la SkHti : ribh ribi ogalni lamrtk Hini : rHoq mrSeim iSoeh ki Hqik la drSo : rHmik rbim ihoh kmSpTik Hini : rbim rdpi ozri medotik la nTiti : raiti bgdim oatqoTTh aSr amrtk la Smro : rah ki pqodik ahbti ihoh kHsdk Hini : raS dbrk amt oleolm kl mSpT zdqk : Srim rdponi Hnm omdbrik pHd lbi : SS anki el amrtk kmoza Sll rb : Sqr Snati oatebh tortk ahbti : Sbe biom hlltik el mSpTi zdqk : Slom rb lahbi tortk oain lmo mkSol : Sbrti liSoetk ihoh omzotik eSiti : Smrh npSi edtik oahbm mad : Smrti pqodik oedtik ki kl drki ngdk : tqrb rnti lpnik ihoh kdbrk hbinni : tboa tHnti lpnik kamrtk hzilni : tbenh Spti thlh ki tlmdni Hqik : ten lSoni amrtk ki kl mzotik zdq : thi idk lecrni ki pqodik bHrti : tabti liSoetk ihoh otortk SeSei : tHi npSi othllk omSpTk iecrni : teiti kSh abd bqS ebdk ki mzotik la SkHti :

120

Sir hmelot al ihoh bzrth li qrati oienni : ihoh hzilh npSi mSpt Sqr mlSon rmih : mh itn lk omh isip lk lSon rmih : Hzi gbor Snonim em gHli rtmim : aoih li ki grti mSk Sknti em ahli qdr : rbt Sknh lh npSi em Sona Slom : ani Slom oki adbr hmh lmlHmh :

121

Sir lmelot aSa eini al hhrim main iba ecri : ecri mem ihoh eSh Smim oarz : al itn lmoT rglk al inom Smrk : hnh la inom ola iiSn Somr iSral : ihoh Smrk ihoh zlk el id imink : iomm hSmS la ikkh oirH blilh : ihoh iSmrk mkl re iSmr at npSk : ihoh iSmr zatk oboak meth oed eolm :

122

Sir hmelot ldod SmHti bamrim li bit ihoh nlk : emdot hio rglino bSerik iroSlm : iroSlm hbnoih keir SHbrh lh iHdo : SSm elo SbTim SbTi ih edot liSral lhdot lSm ihoh : ki Smh iSbo ksaot lmSpT ksaot lbit doid : Salo Slom iroSlm iSlio ahbik : ihi Slom bHilk Sloh barmnotik : lmen aHi orei adbrh na Slom bk : lmen bit ihoh alhino abqSh Tob lk :

123

Sir hmelot alik nSati at eini hiSbi bSmim : hnh keini ebdim al id adonihm keini SpHh al id gbrth kn einino al ihoh alhino ed SiHnno : Hnno ihoh Hnno ki rb Sbeno boc : rbt Sbeh lh npSno hleg hSannim hboc lgaionim :

124

Sir hmelot ldod loli ihoh Shih lno iamr na iSral : loli ihoh Shih lno bqom elino adm : aci Hiim bleono bHrot apm bno : aci hmim STpono nHlh ebr el npSno : aci ebr el npSno hmim hcidonim : brok ihoh Sla ntnno Trp lSnihm : npSno kzpor nmlTh mpH ioqSim hpH nSbr oanHno nmlTno : ecrno bSm ihoh eSh Smim oarz :

125

Sir hmelot hbTHim bihoh khr zion la imoT leolm iSb : iroSlm hrim sbib lh oihoh sbib lemo meth oed eolm : ki la inoH SbT hrSe el gorl hzdiqim lmen la iSlHo hzdiqim beolth idihm : hiTibh ihoh lTobim oliSrim blbotm : ohmTim eqlqlotm iolikm ihoh at peli haon Slom el iSral :

126

Sir hmelot bSob ihoh at Sibt zion hiino kHlmim : ac imla SHoq pino olSonno rnh ac iamro bgoim hgdil ihoh leSot em alh : hgdil ihoh leSot emno hiino SmHim : Sobh ihoh at Sbotno kapiqim bngb : hcreim bdmeh brnh iqzro : hlok ilk obkh nSa mSk hcre ba iboa brnh nSa almtio :

127

Sir hmelot lSlmh am ihoh la ibnh bit Soa emlo bonio bo am ihoh la iSmr eir Soa Sqd Somr : Soa lkm mSkimi qom maHri Sbt akli lHm hezbim kn itn lidido Sna : hnh nHlt ihoh bnim Skr pri hbTn : kHzim bid gbor kn bni hneorim : aSri hgbr aSr mla at aSpto mhm la ibSo ki idbro at aoibim bSer :

128

Sir hmelot aSri kl ira ihoh hhlk bdrkio : igie kpik ki takl aSrik oTob lk : aStk kgpn prih birkti bitk bnik kStli citim sbib lSlHnk : hnh ki kn ibrk gbr ira ihoh : ibrkk ihoh mzion orah bTob iroSlm kl imi Hiik : orah bnim lbnik Slom el iSral :

129

Sir hmelot rbt zrroni mneori iamr na iSral : rbt zrroni mneori gm la iklo li : el gbi HrSo HrSim hariko lmenotm : ihoh zdiq qzz ebot rSeim : ibSo oisgo aHor kl Snai zion : ihio kHzir ggot Sqdmt Slp ibS : Sla mla kpo qozr oHzno memr : ola amro hebrim brkt ihoh alikm brkno atkm bSm ihoh :

130

Sir hmelot mmemqim qratik ihoh : adni Smeh bqoli thiinh acnik qSbot lqol tHnoni : am eonot tSmr ih adni mi iemd : ki emk hsliHh lmen tora : qoiti ihoh qoth npSi oldbro hoHlti : npSi ladni mSmrim lbqr Smrim lbqr : iHl iSral al ihoh ki em ihoh hHsd ohrbh emo pdot : ohoa ipdh at iSral mkl eontio :

131

Sir hmelot ldod ihoh la gbh lbi ola rmo eini ola hlkti bgdlot obnplaot mmni : am la Soiti odommti npSi kgml eli amo kgml eli npSi : iHl iSral al ihoh meth oed eolm :

132

Sir hmelot ckor ihoh ldod at kl enoto : aSr nSbe lihoh ndr labir ieqb : am aba bahl biti am aelh el erS izoei : am atn Snt leini lepepi tnomh : ed amza mqom lihoh mSknot labir ieqb : hnh Smenoh baprth mzanoh bSdi ier : nboah lmSknotio nStHoh lhdm rglio : qomh ihoh lmnoHtk ath oaron eck : khnik ilbSo zdq oHsidik irnno : bebor dod ebdk al tSb pni mSiHk : nSbe ihoh ldod amt la iSob mmnh mpri bTnk aSit lksa lk : am iSmro bnik briti oedti co almdm gm bnihm edi ed iSbo lksa lk : ki bHr ihoh bzion aoh lmoSb lo : cat mnoHti edi ed ph aSb ki aotih : zidh brk abrk abionih aSbie lHm : okhnih albiS iSe oHsidih rnn irnno : Sm azmiH qrn ldod erkti nr lmSiHi : aoibio albiS bSt oelio iziz ncro :

133

Sir hmelot ldod hnh mh Tob omh neim Sbt aHim gm iHd : kSmn hTob el hraS ird el hcqn cqn ahrn Sird el pi mdotio : kTl Hrmon Sird el hrri zion ki Sm zoh ihoh at hbrkh Hiim ed heolm :

134

Sir hmelot hnh brko at ihoh kl ebdi ihoh hemdim bbit ihoh blilot : Sao idkm qdS obrko at ihoh : ibrkk ihoh mzion eSh Smim oarz :

135

hllo ih hllo at Sm ihoh hllo ebdi ihoh : Semdim bbit ihoh bHzrot bit alhino : hllo ih ki Tob ihoh cmro lSmo ki neim : ki ieqb bHr lo ih iSral lsglto : ki ani ideti ki gdol ihoh oadnino mkl alhim : kl aSr Hpz ihoh eSh bSmim obarz bimim okl thomot : melh nSaim mqzh harz brqim lmTr eSh moza roH maozrotio : Shkh bkori mzrim madm ed bhmh : SlH atot omptim btokki mzrim bpreh obkl ebdio : Shkh goim rbim ohrg mlkim ezomim : lsiHon mlk hamri oleog mlk hbSn olkl mmlkot knen : ontn arzm nHlh nHlh liSral emo : ihoh Smk leolm ihoh ckrk ldr odr : ki idin ihoh emo oel ebdio itnHm : ezbi hgoim ksp ochb meSh idi adm : ph lhm ola idbro einim lhm ola irao : acnim lhm ola iacino ap ain iS roH bpihm : kmohm ihio eSihm kl aSr bTH bhm : bit iSral brko at ihoh bit ahrn brko at ihoh : bit hloi brko at ihoh irai ihoh brko at ihoh : brok ihoh mzion Skn iroSlm hllo ih :

136

hodo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : hodo lalhi halhim ki leolm Hsdo : hodo ladni hadnim ki leolm Hsdo : leSh nplaot gdlot lbdo ki leolm Hsdo : leSh hSmim btbonh ki leolm Hsdo : lrqe harz el hmim ki leolm Hsdo : leSh aorim gdlim ki leolm Hsdo : at hSmS lmmSlt biom ki leolm Hsdo : at hirH okokbim lmmSlot blilh ki leolm Hsdo : lmkh mzrim bbkorihm ki leolm Hsdo : oioza iSral mtokm ki leolm Hsdo : bid Hcqh obcroe nToih ki leolm Hsdo : lgcr im sop lgcrim ki leolm Hsdo : ohebir iSral btoko ki leolm Hsdo : oner preh oHilo bim sop ki leolm Hsdo : lmolik emo bmdbr ki leolm Hsdo : lmkh mlkim gdlim ki leolm Hsdo : oihrg mlkim adirim ki leolm Hsdo : lsiHon mlk hamri ki leolm Hsdo : oleog mlk hbSn ki leolm Hsdo : ontn arzm lnHlh ki leolm Hsdo : nHlh liSral ebdo ki leolm Hsdo : SbSplno ckr lno ki leolm Hsdo : oiprqno mzrino ki leolm Hsdo : ntn lHm lkl bSr ki leolm Hsdo : hodo lal hSmim ki leolm Hsdo :

137

el nhrot bbl Sm iSbno gm bkino bckrno at zion : el erbim btokh tlino knrotino : ki Sm Salono Sobino dbri Sir otollino SmHh Siro lno mSir zion : aik nSir at Sir ihoh el admt nkr : am aSkHk iroSlm tSkH imini : tdbq lSoni lHki am la ackrki am la aelh at iroSlm el raS SmHti : ckr ihoh lbni adom at iom iroSlm hamrim ero ero ed hisod bh : bt bbl hSdodh aSri SiSlm lk at gmolk Sgmlt lno : aSri SiaHc onpz at ellik al hsle :

138

ldod aodk bkl lbi ngd alhim acmrk : aStHoh al hikl qdSk oaodh at Smk el Hsdk oel amtk ki hgdlt el kl Smk amrtk : biom qrati otenni trhbni bnpSi ec : iodok ihoh kl mlki arz ki Smeo amri pik : oiSiro bdrki ihoh ki gdol kbod ihoh : ki rm ihoh oSpl irah ogbh mmrHq iide : am alk bqrb zrh tHini el ap aibi tSlH idk otoSieni imink : ihoh igmr bedi ihoh Hsdk leolm meSi idik al trp :

139

lmnzH ldod mcmor ihoh Hqrtni otde : ath idet Sbti oqomi bnth lrei mrHoq : arHi orbei crit okl drki hsknth : ki ain mlh blSoni hn ihoh idet klh : aHor oqdm zrtni otSt eli kpkh : plaih det mmni nSgbh la aokl lh : anh alk mroHk oanh mpnik abrH : am asq Smim Sm ath oazieh Saol hnk : aSa knpi SHr aSknh baHrit im : gm Sm idk tnHni otaHcni imink : oamr ak HSk iSopni olilh aor bedni : gm HSk la iHSik mmk olilh kiom iair kHSikh kaorh : ki ath qnit kliti tskni bbTn ami : aodk el ki noraot npliti nplaim meSik onpSi idet mad : la nkHd ezmi mmk aSr eSiti bstr rqmti btHtiot arz : glmi rao einik oel sprk klm iktbo imim izro ola aHd bhm : oli mh iqro reik al mh ezmo raSihm : asprm mHol irbon hqizti oeodi emk : am tqTl aloh rSe oanSi dmim soro mni : aSr iamrk lmcmh nSa lSoa erik : hloa mSnaik ihoh aSna obtqommik atqoTT : tklit Snah Snatim laoibim hio li : Hqrni al ode lbbi bHnni ode Srepi : orah am drk ezb bi onHni bdrk eolm :

140

lmnzH mcmor ldod Hlzni ihoh madm re maiS Hmsim tnzrni : aSr HSbo reot blb kl iom igoro mlHmot : Snno lSonm kmo nHS Hmt ekSob tHt Sptimo slh : Smrni ihoh midi rSe maiS Hmsim tnzrni aSr HSbo ldHot pemi : Tmno gaim pH li oHblim prSo rSt lid megl mqSim Sto li slh : amrti lihoh ali ath hacinh ihoh qol tHnoni : ihoh adni ec iSoeti skth lraSi biom nSq : al ttn ihoh maoii rSe cmmo al tpq iromo slh : raS msbi eml Sptimo iksomo : imiTo elihm gHlim baS iplm bmhmrot bl iqomo : aiS lSon bl ikon barz aiS Hms re izodno lmdHpt : idet ki ieSh ihoh din eni mSpT abinim : ak zdiqim iodo lSmk iSbo iSrim at pnik :

141

mcmor ldod ihoh qratik HoSh li hacinh qoli bqrai lk : tkon tplti qTrt lpnik mSat kpi mnHt erb : Sith ihoh Smrh lpi nzrh el dl Spti : al tT lbi ldbr re lhteoll ellot brSe at aiSim peli aon obl alHm bmnemihm : ihlmni zdiq Hsd oiokiHni Smn raS al ini raSi ki eod otplti breotihm : nSmTo bidi sle SpTihm oSmeo amri ki nemo : kmo plH obqe barz npcro ezmino lpi Saol : ki alik ihoh adni eini bkh Hsiti al ter npSi : Smrni midi pH iqSo li omqSot peli aon : iplo bmkmrio rSeim iHd anki ed aebor :

142

mSkil ldod bhioto bmerh tplh qoli al ihoh aceq qoli al ihoh atHnn : aSpk lpnio SiHi zrti lpnio agid : bhteTp eli roHi oath idet ntibti barH co ahlk Tmno pH li : hbiT imin orah oain li mkir abd mnos mmni ain dorS lnpSi : ceqti alik ihoh amrti ath mHsi Hlqi barz hHiim : hqSibh al rnti ki dloti mad hzilni mrdpi ki amzo mmni : hoziah mmsgr npSi lhodot at Smk bi iktro zdiqim ki tgml eli :

143

mcmor ldod ihoh Sme tplti hacinh al tHnoni bamntk enni bzdqtk : oal tboa bmSpT at ebdk ki la izdq lpnik kl Hi : ki rdp aoib npSi dka larz Hiti hoSibni bmHSkim kmti eolm : otteTp eli roHi btoki iStomm lbi : ckrti imim mqdm hgiti bkl pelk bmeSh idik aSoHH : prSti idi alik npSi karz eiph lk slh : mhr enni ihoh klth roHi al tstr pnik mmni onmSlti em irdi bor : hSmieni bbqr Hsdk ki bk bTHti hodieni drk co alk ki alik nSati npSi : hzilni maibi ihoh alik ksti : lmdni leSot rzonk ki ath alohi roHk Tobh tnHni barz miSor : lmen Smk ihoh tHini bzdqtk tozia mzrh npSi : obHsdk tzmit aibi ohabdt kl zrri npSi ki ani ebdk :

144

ldod brok ihoh zori hmlmd idi lqrb azbeoti lmlHmh : Hsdi omzodti mSgbi omplTi li mgni obo Hsiti hrodd emi tHti : ihoh mh adm otdeho bn anoS otHSbho : adm lhbl dmh imio kzl eobr : ihoh hT Smik otrd ge bhrim oieSno : broq brq otpizm SlH Hzik othmm : SlH idik mmrom pzni ohzilni mmim rbim mid bni nkr : aSr pihm dbr Soa oiminm imin Sqr : alhim Sir HdS aSirh lk bnbl eSor acmrh lk : hnotn tSoeh lmlkim hpozh at dod ebdo mHrb reh : pzni ohzilni mid bni nkr aSr pihm dbr Soa oiminm imin Sqr : aSr bnino knTeim mgdlim bneorihm bnotino kcoit mHTbot tbnit hikl : mcoino mlaim mpiqim mcn al cn zaonno malipot mrbbot bHozotino : alopino msblim ain prz oain iozat oain zoHh brHbtino : aSri hem Skkh lo aSri hem Sihoh alhio :

145

thlh ldod arommk alohi hmlk oabrkh Smk leolm oed : bkl iom abrkk oahllh Smk leolm oed : gdol ihoh omhll mad olgdlto ain Hqr : dor ldor iSbH meSik ogbortik igido : hdr kbod hodk odbri nplaotik aSiHh : oecoc noratik iamro ogdoltik asprnh : ckr rb Tobk ibieo ozdqtk irnno : Hnon orHom ihoh ark apim ogdl Hsd : Tob ihoh lkl orHmio el kl meSio : iodok ihoh kl meSik oHsidik ibrkokh : kbod mlkotk iamro ogbortk idbro : lhodie lbni hadm gbortio okbod hdr mlkoto : mlkotk mlkot kl elmim ommSltk bkl dor odor : somk ihoh lkl hnplim ocoqp lkl hkpopim : eini kl alik iSbro oath notn lhm at aklm beto : potH at idk omSbie lkl Hi rzon : zdiq ihoh bkl drkio oHsid bkl meSio : qrob ihoh lkl qraio lkl aSr iqraho bamt : rzon iraio ieSh oat Soetm iSme oioSiem : Somr ihoh at kl ahbio oat kl hrSeim iSmid : thlt ihoh idbr pi oibrk kl bSr Sm qdSo leolm oed :

146

hllo ih hlli npSi at ihoh : ahllh ihoh bHii acmrh lalhi beodi : al tbTHo bndibim bbn adm Sain lo tSoeh : tza roHo iSb ladmto biom hhoa abdo eStntio : aSri Sal ieqb becro Sbro el ihoh alhio : eSh Smim oarz at him oat kl aSr bm hSmr amt leolm : eSh mSpT leSoqim ntn lHm lrebim ihoh mtir asorim : ihoh pqH eorim ihoh cqp kpopim ihoh ahb zdiqim : ihoh Smr at grim itom oalmnh ieodd odrk rSeim ieot : imlk ihoh leolm alhik zion ldr odr hllo ih :

147

hllo ih ki Tob cmrh alhino ki neim naoh thlh : bonh iroSlm ihoh ndHi iSral ikns : hrpa lSbori lb omHbS lezbotm : monh mspr lkokbim lklm Smot iqra : gdol adonino orb kH ltbonto ain mspr : meodd enoim ihoh mSpil rSeim edi arz : eno lihoh btodh cmro lalhino bknor : hmksh Smim bebim hmkin larz mTr hmzmiH hrim Hzir : notn lbhmh lHmh lbni erb aSr iqrao : la bgbort hsos iHpz la bSoqi haiS irzh : rozh ihoh at iraio at hmiHlim lHsdo : SbHi iroSlm at ihoh hlli alhik zion : ki Hcq briHi Serik brk bnik bqrbk : hSm gbolk Slom Hlb HTim iSbiek : hSlH amrto arz ed mhrh iroz dbro : hntn Slg kzmr kpor kapr ipcr : mSlik qrHo kptim lpni qrto mi iemd : iSlH dbro oimsm iSb roHo iclo mim : mgid dbro lieqb Hqio omSpTio liSral : la eSh kn lkl goi omSpTim bl ideom hllo ih :

148

hllo ih hllo at ihoh mn hSmim hlloho bmromim : hlloho kl mlakio hlloho kl zbao : hlloho SmS oirH hlloho kl kokbi aor : hlloho Smi hSmim ohmim aSr mel hSmim : ihllo at Sm ihoh ki hoa zoh onbrao : oiemidm led leolm Hq ntn ola iebor : hllo at ihoh mn harz tninim okl thmot : aS obrd Slg oqiTor roH serh eSh dbro : hhrim okl gbeot ez pri okl arcim : hHih okl bhmh rmS ozpor knp : mlki arz okl lamim Srim okl SpTi arz : bHorim ogm btolot cqnim em nerim : ihllo at Sm ihoh ki nSgb Smo lbdo hodo el arz oSmim : oirm qrn lemo thlh lkl Hsidio lbni iSral em qrbo hllo ih :

149

hllo ih Siro lihoh Sir HdS thlto bqhl Hsidim : iSmH iSral beSio bni zion igilo bmlkm : ihllo Smo bmHol btp oknor icmro lo : ki rozh ihoh bemo ipar enoim biSoeh : ielco Hsidim bkbod irnno el mSkbotm : rommot al bgronm oHrb pipiot bidm : leSot nqmh bgoim tokHt bl amim : lasr mlkihm bcqim onkbdihm bkbli brcl : leSot bhm mSpT ktob hdr hoa lkl Hsidio hllo ih :

150

hllo ih hllo al bqdSo hlloho brqie eco : hlloho bgbortio hlloho krb gdlo : hlloho btqe Sopr hlloho bnbl oknor : hlloho btp omHol hlloho bmnim oeogb : hlloho bzlzli Sme hlloho bzlzli troeh : kl hnSmh thll ih hllo ih :

mSli

1

mSli Slmh bn dod mlk iSral : ldet Hkmh omosr lhbin amri binh : lqHt mosr hSkl zdq omSpT omiSrim : ltt lptaim ermh lner det omcmh : iSme Hkm oiosp lqH onbon tHblot iqnh : lhbin mSl omlizh dbri Hkmim oHidtm : irat ihoh raSit det Hkmh omosr aoilim bco : Sme bni mosr abik oal tTS tort amk : ki loit Hn hm lraSk oenqim lgrgrtik : bni am iptok HTaim al tba : am iamro lkh atno narbh ldm nzpnh lnqi Hnm : nblem kSaol Hiim otmimim kiordi bor : kl hon iqr nmza nmla btino Sll : gorlk tpil btokno kis aHd ihih lklno : bni al tlk bdrk atm mne rglk mntibtm : ki rglihm lre irozo oimhro lSpk dm : ki Hnm mcrh hrSt beini kl bel knp : ohm ldmm iarbo izpno lnpStm : kn arHot kl bze bze at npS belio iqH : Hkmot bHoz trnh brHbot ttn qolh : braS hmiot tqra bptHi Serim beir amrih tamr : ed mti ptim tahbo pti olzim lzon Hmdo lhm oksilim iSnao det : tSobo ltokHti hnh abieh lkm roHi aodieh dbri atkm : ien qrati otmano nTiti idi oain mqSib : otpreo kl ezti otokHti la abitm : gm ani baidkm aSHq aleg bba pHdkm : bba kSaoh pHdkm oaidkm ksoph iath bba elikm zrh ozoqh : ac iqranni ola aenh iSHrnni ola imzanni : tHt ki Snao det oirat ihoh la bHro : la abo lezti nazo kl tokHti : oiaklo mpri drkm ommeztihm iSbeo : ki mSobt ptim thrgm oSlot ksilim tabdm : oSme li iSkn bTH oSann mpHd reh :

2

bni am tqH amri omzoti tzpn atk : lhqSib lHkmh acnk tTh lbk ltbonh : ki am lbinh tqra ltbonh ttn qolk : am tbqSnh kksp okmTmonim tHpSnh : ac tbin irat ihoh odet alhim tmza : ki ihoh itn Hkmh mpio det otbonh : ozpn liSrim toSih mgn lhlki tm : lnzr arHot mSpT odrk Hsido iSmr : ac tbin zdq omSpT omiSrim kl megl Tob : ki tboa Hkmh blbk odet lnpSk inem : mcmh tSmr elik tbonh tnzrkh : lhzilk mdrk re maiS mdbr thpkot : hecbim arHot iSr llkt bdrki HSk : hSmHim leSot re igilo bthpkot re : aSr arHtihm eqSim onlocim bmeglotm : lhzilk maSh crh mnkrih amrih hHliqh : hecbt alop neorih oat brit alhih SkHh : ki SHh al mot bith oal rpaim megltih : kl baih la iSobon ola iSigo arHot Hiim : lmen tlk bdrk Tobim oarHot zdiqim tSmr : ki iSrim iSkno arz otmimim iotro bh : orSeim marz ikrto obogdim isHo mmnh :

3

bni torti al tSkH omzoti izr lbk : ki ark imim oSnot Hiim oSlom iosipo lk : Hsd oamt al iecbk qSrm el grgrotik ktbm el loH lbk : omza Hn oSkl Tob beini alhim oadm : bTH al ihoh bkl lbk oal bintk al tSen : bkl drkik deho ohoa iiSr arHtik : al thi Hkm beinik ira at ihoh osor mre : rpaot thi lSrk oSqoi lezmotik : kbd at ihoh mhonk omraSit kl tboatk : oimlao asmik Sbe otiroS iqbik iprzo : mosr ihoh bni al tmas oal tqz btokHto : ki at aSr iahb ihoh iokiH okab at bn irzh : aSri adm mza Hkmh oadm ipiq tbonh : ki Tob sHrh msHr ksp omHroz tboath : iqrh hia mpniim okl Hpzik la iSoo bh : ark imim biminh bSmaolh eSr okbod : drkih drki nem okl ntibotih Slom : ez Hiim hia lmHciqim bh otmkih maSr : ihoh bHkmh isd arz konn Smim btbonh : bdeto thomot nbqeo oSHqim irepo Tl : bni al ilco meinik nzr tSih omcmh : oihio Hiim lnpSk oHn lgrgrtik : ac tlk lbTH drkk orglk la tgop : am tSkb la tpHd oSkbt oerbh Sntk : al tira mpHd ptam omSat rSeim ki tba : ki ihoh ihih bkslk oSmr rglk mlkd : al tmne Tob mbelio bhiot lal idik leSot : al tamr lreik lk oSob omHr atn oiS atk : al tHrS el rek reh ohoa ioSb lbTH atk : al trob em adm Hnm am la gmlk reh : al tqna baiS Hms oal tbHr bkl drkio : ki toebt ihoh nloc oat iSrim sodo : mart ihoh bbit rSe onoh zdiqim ibrk : am llzim hoa iliz oleniim itn Hn : kbod Hkmim inHlo oksilim mrim qlon :

4

Smeo bnim mosr ab ohqSibo ldet binh : ki lqH Tob ntti lkm torti al tecbo : ki bn hiiti labi rk oiHid lpni ami : oirni oiamr li itmk dbri lbk Smr mzoti oHih : qnh Hkmh qnh binh al tSkH oal tT mamri pi : al tecbh otSmrk ahbh otzrk : raSit Hkmh qnh Hkmh obkl qnink qnh binh : slslh otrommk tkbdk ki tHbqnh : ttn lraSk loit Hn eTrt tpart tmgnk : Sme bni oqH amri oirbo lk Snot Hiim : bdrk Hkmh hrtik hdrktik bmegli iSr : blktk la izr zedk oam troz la tkSl : hHcq bmosr al trp nzrh ki hia Hiik : barH rSeim al tba oal taSr bdrk reim : preho al tebr bo STh melio oebor : ki la iSno am la ireo ongclh Sntm am la ikSolo : ki lHmo lHm rSe oiin Hmsim iSto : oarH zdiqim kaor ngh holk oaor ed nkon hiom : drk rSeim kaplh la ideo bmh ikSlo : bni ldbri hqSibh lamri hT acnk : al ilico meinik Smrm btok lbbk : ki Hiim hm lmzaihm olkl bSro mrpa : mkl mSmr nzr lbk ki mmno tozaot Hiim : hsr mmk eqSot ph olcot Sptim hrHq mmk : einik lnkH ibiTo oepepik iiSro ngdk : pls megl rglk okl drkik ikno : al tT imin oSmaol hsr rglk mre :

5

bni lHkmti hqSibh ltbonti hT acnk : lSmr mcmot odet Sptik inzro : ki npt tTpnh Spti crh oHlq mSmn Hkh : oaHrith mrh klenh Hdh kHrb piot : rglih irdot mot Saol zedih itmko : arH Hiim pn tpls neo megltih la tde : oeth bnim Smeo li oal tsoro mamri pi : hrHq melih drkk oal tqrb al ptH bith : pn ttn laHrim hodk oSntik lakcri : pn iSbeo crim kHk oezbik bbit nkri : onhmt baHritk bklot bSrk oSark : oamrt aik Snati mosr otokHt naz lbi : ola Smeti bqol mori olmlmdi la hTiti acni : kmeT hiiti bkl re btok qhl oedh : Sth mim mbork onclim mtok bark : ipozo meintik Hozh brHbot plgi mim : ihio lk lbdk oain lcrim atk : ihi mqork brok oSmH maSt neork : ailt ahbim oielt Hn ddih irok bkl et bahbth tSgh tmid : olmh tSgh bni bcrh otHbq Hq nkrih : ki nkH eini ihoh drki aiS okl megltio mpls : eoonotio ilkdno at hrSe obHbli HTato itmk : hoa imot bain mosr obrb aolto iSgh :

6

bni am erbt lrek tqet lcr kpik : noqSt bamri pik nlkdt bamri pik : eSh cat apoa bni ohnzl ki bat bkp rek lk htrps orhb reik : al ttn Snh leinik otnomh lepepik : hnzl kzbi mid okzpor mid iqoS : lk al nmlh ezl rah drkih oHkm : aSr ain lh qzin STr omSl : tkin bqiz lHmh agrh bqzir maklh : ed mti ezl tSkb mti tqom mSntk : meT Snot meT tnomot meT Hbq idim lSkb : oba kmhlk raSk omHsrk kaiS mgn : adm bliel aiS aon holk eqSot ph : qrz beino mll brglo mrh bazbetio : thpkot blbo HrS re bkl et mdnim iSlH : el kn ptam iboa aido pte iSbr oain mrpa : SS hnh Sna ihoh oSbe toebot npSo : einim rmot lSon Sqr oidim Spkot dm nqi : lb HrS mHSbot aon rglim mmhrot lroz lreh : ipiH kcbim ed Sqr omSlH mdnim bin aHim : nzr bni mzot abik oal tTS tort amk : qSrm el lbk tmid endm el grgrtk : bhthlkk tnHh atk bSkbk tSmr elik ohqizot hia tSiHk : ki nr mzoh otorh aor odrk Hiim tokHot mosr : lSmrk maSt re mHlqt lSon nkrih : al tHmd ipih blbbk oal tqHk bepepih : ki bed aSh conh ed kkr lHm oaSt aiS npS iqrh tzod : hiHth aiS aS bHiqo obgdio la tSrpnh : am ihlk aiS el hgHlim orglio la tkoinh : kn hba al aSt reho la inqh kl hnge bh : la iboco lgnb ki ignob lmla npSo ki ireb : onmza iSlm Sbetim at kl hon bito itn : nap aSh Hsr lb mSHit npSo hoa ieSnh : nge oqlon imza oHrpto la tmHh : ki qnah Hmt gbr ola iHmol biom nqm : la iSa pni kl kpr ola iabh ki trbh SHd :

7

bni Smr amri omzoti tzpn atk : Smr mzoti oHih otorti kaiSon einik : qSrm el azbetik ktbm el loH lbk : amr lHkmh aHti at omde lbinh tqra : lSmrk maSh crh mnkrih amrih hHliqh : ki bHlon biti bed aSnbi nSqpti : oara bptaim abinh bbnim ner Hsr lb : ebr bSoq azl pnh odrk bith ized : bnSp berb iom baiSon lilh oaplh : ohnh aSh lqrato Sit conh onzrt lb : hmih hia osrrt bbith la iSkno rglih : pem bHoz pem brHbot oazl kl pnh tarb : ohHciqh bo onSqh lo hech pnih otamr lo : cbHi Slmim eli hiom Slmti ndri : el kn izati lqratk lSHr pnik oamzak : mrbdim rbdti erSi HTbot aTon mzrim : npti mSkbi mr ahlim oqnmon : lkh nroh ddim ed hbqr ntelsh bahbim : ki ain haiS bbito hlk bdrk mrHoq : zror hksp lqH bido liom hksa iba bito : hTto brb lqHh bHlq Sptih tdiHno : holk aHrih ptam kSor al TbH iboa okeks al mosr aoil : ed iplH Hz kbdo kmhr zpor al pH ola ide ki bnpSo hoa : oeth bnim Smeo li ohqSibo lamri pi : al iST al drkih lbk al tte bntibotih : ki rbim Hllim hpilh oezmim kl hrgih : drki Saol bith irdot al Hdri mot :

8

hla Hkmh tqra otbonh ttn qolh : braS mromim eli drk bit ntibot nzbh : lid Serim lpi qrt mboa ptHim trnh : alikm aiSim aqra oqoli al bni adm : hbino ptaim ermh oksilim hbino lb : Smeo ki ngidim adbr omptH Spti miSrim : ki amt ihgh Hki otoebt Spti rSe : bzdq kl amri pi ain bhm nptl oeqS : klm nkHim lmbin oiSrim lmzai det : qHo mosri oal ksp odet mHroz nbHr : ki Tobh Hkmh mpninim okl Hpzim la iSoo bh : ani Hkmh Sknti ermh odet mcmot amza : irat ihoh Snat re gah ogaon odrk re opi thpkot Snati : li ezh otoSih ani binh li gborh : bi mlkim imlko orocnim iHqqo zdq : bi Srim iSro ondibim kl SpTi zdq : ani ahbih ahb omSHri imzanni : eSr okbod ati hon etq ozdqh : Tob prii mHroz ompc otboati mksp nbHr : barH zdqh ahlk btok ntibot mSpT : lhnHil ahbi iS oazrtihm amla : ihoh qnni raSit drko qdm mpelio mac : meolm nskti mraS mqdmi arz : bain thmot Hollti bain meinot nkbdi mim : bTrm hrim hTbeo lpni gbeot Hollti : ed la eSh arz oHozot oraS eprot tbl : bhkino Smim Sm ani bHoqo Hog el pni thom : bamzo SHqim mmel becoc einot thom : bSomo lim Hqo omim la iebro pio bHoqo mosdi arz : oahih azlo amon oahih SeSeim iom iom mSHqt lpnio bkl et : mSHqt btbl arzo oSeSei at bni adm : oeth bnim Smeo li oaSri drki iSmro : Smeo mosr oHkmo oal tpreo : aSri adm Sme li lSqd el dltti iom iom lSmr mcoct ptHi : ki mzai mzai Hiim oipq rzon mihoh : oHTai Hms npSo kl mSnai ahbo mot :

9

Hkmot bnth bith Hzbh emodih Sbeh : TbHh TbHh mskh iinh ap erkh SlHnh : SlHh nertih tqra el gpi mrmi qrt : mi pti isr hnh Hsr lb amrh lo : lko lHmo blHmi oSto biin mskti : ecbo ptaim oHio oaSro bdrk binh : isr lz lqH lo qlon omokiH lrSe momo : al tokH lz pn iSnak hokH lHkm oiahbk : tn lHkm oiHkm eod hode lzdiq oiosp lqH : tHlt Hkmh irat ihoh odet qdSim binh : ki bi irbo imik oiosipo lk Snot Hiim : am Hkmt Hkmt lk olzt lbdk tSa : aSt ksilot hmih ptiot obl ideh mh : oiSbh lptH bith el ksa mrmi qrt : lqra lebri drk hmiSrim arHotm : mi pti isr hnh oHsr lb oamrh lo : mim gnobim imtqo olHm strim inem : ola ide ki rpaim Sm bemqi Saol qraih :

10

mSli Slmh bn Hkm iSmH ab obn ksil togt amo : la ioeilo aozrot rSe ozdqh tzil mmot : la ireib ihoh npS zdiq ohot rSeim ihdp : raS eSh kp rmih oid Hrozim teSir : agr bqiz bn mSkil nrdm bqzir bn mbiS : brkot lraS zdiq opi rSeim iksh Hms : ckr zdiq lbrkh oSm rSeim irqb : Hkm lb iqH mzot oaoil Sptim ilbT : holk btm ilk bTH omeqS drkio iode : qrz ein itn ezbt oaoil Sptim ilbT : mqor Hiim pi zdiq opi rSeim iksh Hms : Snah teorr mdnim oel kl pSeim tksh ahbh : bSpti nbon tmza Hkmh oSbT lgo Hsr lb : Hkmim izpno det opi aoil mHth qrbh : hon eSir qrit eco mHtt dlim riSm : pelt zdiq lHiim tboat rSe lHTat : arH lHiim Somr mosr oeocb tokHt mteh : mksh Snah Spti Sqr omoza dbh hoa ksil : brb dbrim la iHdl pSe oHSk Sptio mSkil : ksp nbHr lSon zdiq lb rSeim kmeT : Spti zdiq ireo rbim oaoilim bHsr lb imoto : brkt ihoh hia teSir ola iosp ezb emh : kSHoq lksil eSot cmh oHkmh laiS tbonh : mgort rSe hia tboano otaot zdiqim itn : kebor soph oain rSe ozdiq isod eolm : kHmz lSnim okeSn leinim kn hezl lSlHio : irat ihoh tosip imim oSnot rSeim tqzrnh : toHlt zdiqim SmHh otqot rSeim tabd : meoc ltm drk ihoh omHth lpeli aon : zdiq leolm bl imoT orSeim la iSkno arz : pi zdiq inob Hkmh olSon thpkot tkrt : Spti zdiq ideon rzon opi rSeim thpkot :

11

macni mrmh toebt ihoh oabn Slmh rzono : ba cdon oiba qlon oat znoeim Hkmh : tmt iSrim tnHm oslp bogdim oSdm : la ioeil hon biom ebrh ozdqh tzil mmot : zdqt tmim tiSr drko obrSeto ipl rSe : zdqt iSrim tzilm obhot bgdim ilkdo : bmot adm rSe tabd tqoh otoHlt aonim abdh : zdiq mzrh nHlz oiba rSe tHtio : bph Hnp iSHt reho obdet zdiqim iHlzo : bTob zdiqim telz qrih obabd rSeim rnh : bbrkt iSrim trom qrt obpi rSeim thrs : bc lreho Hsr lb oaiS tbonot iHriS : holk rkil mglh sod onamn roH mksh dbr : bain tHblot ipl em otSoeh brb ioez : re iroe ki erb cr oSna tqeim boTH : aSt Hn ttmk kbod oerizim itmko eSr : gml npSo aiS Hsd oekr Saro akcri : rSe eSh pelt Sqr ocre zdqh Skr amt : kn zdqh lHiim omrdp reh lmoto : toebt ihoh eqSi lb orzono tmimi drk : id lid la inqh re ocre zdiqim nmlT : ncm chb bap Hcir aSh iph osrt Tem : taot zdiqim ak Tob tqot rSeim ebrh : iS mpcr onosp eod oHoSk miSr ak lmHsor : npS brkh tdSn omroh gm hoa iora : mne br iqbho laom obrkh lraS mSbir : SHr Tob ibqS rzon odrS reh tboano : boTH beSro hoa ipl okelh zdiqim iprHo : eokr bito inHl roH oebd aoil lHkm lb : pri zdiq ez Hiim olqH npSot Hkm : hn zdiq barz iSlm ap ki rSe oHoTa :

12

ahb mosr ahb det oSna tokHt ber : Tob ipiq rzon mihoh oaiS mcmot irSie : la ikon adm brSe oSrS zdiqim bl imoT : aSt Hil eTrt belh okrqb bezmotio mbiSh : mHSbot zdiqim mSpT tHblot rSeim mrmh : dbri rSeim arb dm opi iSrim izilm : hpok rSeim oainm obit zdiqim iemd : lpi Sklo ihll aiS oneoh lb ihih lboc : Tob nqlh oebd lo mmtkbd oHsr lHm : iode zdiq npS bhmto orHmi rSeim akcri : ebd admto iSbe lHm omrdp riqim Hsr lb : Hmd rSe mzod reim oSrS zdiqim itn : bpSe Sptim moqS re oiza mzrh zdiq : mpri pi aiS iSbe Tob ogmol idi adm iSob lo : drk aoil iSr beinio oSme lezh Hkm : aoil biom iode keso oksh qlon erom : ipiH amonh igid zdq oed Sqrim mrmh : iS boTh kmdqrot Hrb olSon Hkmim mrpa : Spt amt tkon led oed argieh lSon Sqr : mrmh blb HrSi re oliezi Slom SmHh : la ianh lzdiq kl aon orSeim mlao re : toebt ihoh Spti Sqr oeSi amonh rzono : adm erom ksh det olb ksilim iqra aolt : id Hrozim tmSol ormih thih lms : dagh blb aiS iSHnh odbr Tob iSmHnh : itr mreho zdiq odrk rSeim ttem : la iHrk rmih zido ohon adm iqr Hroz : barH zdqh Hiim odrk ntibh al mot :

13

bn Hkm mosr ab olz la Sme gerh : mpri pi aiS iakl Tob onpS bgdim Hms : nzr pio Smr npSo pSq Sptio mHth lo : mtaoh oain npSo ezl onpS Hrzim tdSn : dbr Sqr iSna zdiq orSe ibaiS oiHpir : zdqh tzr tm drk orSeh tslp HTat : iS mteSr oain kl mtroSS ohon rb : kpr npS aiS eSro orS la Sme gerh : aor zdiqim iSmH onr rSeim idek : rq bcdon itn mzh oat noezim Hkmh : hon mhbl imeT oqbz el id irbh : toHlt mmSkh mHlh lb oez Hiim taoh bah : bc ldbr iHbl lo oira mzoh hoa iSlm : tort Hkm mqor Hiim lsor mmqSi mot : Skl Tob itn Hn odrk bgdim aitn : kl erom ieSh bdet oksil iprS aolt : mlak rSe ipl bre ozir amonim mrpa : riS oqlon pore mosr oSomr tokHt ikbd : taoh nhih terb lnpS otoebt ksilim sor mre : hlok at Hkmim oHkm oreh ksilim iroe : HTaim trdp reh oat zdiqim iSlm Tob : Tob inHil bni bnim ozpon lzdiq Hil HoTa : rb akl nir raSim oiS nsph bla mSpT : HoSk SbTo Sona bno oahbo SHro mosr : zdiq akl lSbe npSo obTn rSeim tHsr :

14

Hkmot nSim bnth bith oaolt bidih thrsno : holk biSro ira ihoh onloc drkio bocho : bpi aoil HTr gaoh oSpti Hkmim tSmorm : bain alpim abos br orb tboaot bkH Sor : ed amonim la ikcb oipiH kcbim ed Sqr : bqS lz Hkmh oain odet lnbon nql : lk mngd laiS ksil obl idet Spti det : Hkmt erom hbin drko oaolt ksilim mrmh : aolim iliz aSm obin iSrim rzon : lb iode mrt npSo obSmHto la iterb cr : bit rSeim iSmd oahl iSrim ipriH : iS drk iSr lpni aiS oaHrith drki mot : gm bSHoq ikab lb oaHrith SmHh togh : mdrkio iSbe sog lb omelio aiS Tob : pti iamin lkl dbr oerom ibin laSro : Hkm ira osr mre oksil mtebr oboTH : qzr apim ieSh aolt oaiS mcmot iSna : nHlo ptaim aolt oeromim iktro det : SHo reim lpni Tobim orSeim el Seri zdiq : gm lreho iSna rS oahbi eSir rbim : bc lreho HoTa omHonn eniim aSrio : hloa iteo HrSi re oHsd oamt HrSi Tob : bkl ezb ihih motr odbr Sptim ak lmHsor : eTrt Hkmim eSrm aolt ksilim aolt : mzil npSot ed amt oipH kcbim mrmh : birat ihoh mbTH ec olbnio ihih mHsh : irat ihoh mqor Hiim lsor mmqSi mot : brb em hdrt mlk obaps lam mHtt rcon : ark apim rb tbonh oqzr roH mrim aolt : Hii bSrim lb mrpa orqb ezmot qnah : eSq dl Hrp eSho omkbdo Hnn abion : breto idHh rSe oHsh bmoto zdiq : blb nbon tnoH Hkmh obqrb ksilim tode : zdqh tromm goi oHsd lamim HTat : rzon mlk lebd mSkil oebrto thih mbiS :

15

menh rk iSib Hmh odbr ezb ielh ap : lSon Hkmim tiTib det opi ksilim ibie aolt : bkl mqom eini ihoh zpot reim oTobim : mrpa lSon ez Hiim oslp bh Sbr broH : aoil inaz mosr abio oSmr tokHt ierm : bit zdiq Hsn rb obtboat rSe nekrt : Spti Hkmim icro det olb ksilim la kn : cbH rSeim toebt ihoh otplt iSrim rzono : toebt ihoh drk rSe omrdp zdqh iahb : mosr re lecb arH Sona tokHt imot : Saol oabdon ngd ihoh ap ki lbot bni adm : la iahb lz hokH lo al Hkmim la ilk : lb SmH iiTb pnim obezbt lb roH nkah : lb nbon ibqS det opni ksilim ireh aolt : kl imi eni reim oTob lb mSth tmid : Tob meT birat ihoh maozr rb omhomh bo : Tob arHt irq oahbh Sm mSor abos oSnah bo : aiS Hmh igrh mdon oark apim iSqiT rib : drk ezl kmSkt Hdq oarH iSrim sllh : bn Hkm iSmH ab oksil adm boch amo : aolt SmHh lHsr lb oaiS tbonh iiSr lkt : hpr mHSbot bain sod obrb ioezim tqom : SmHh laiS bmenh pio odbr beto mh Tob : arH Hiim lmelh lmSkil lmen sor mSaol mTh : bit gaim isH ihoh oizb gbol almnh : toebt ihoh mHSbot re oThrim amri nem : ekr bito boze bze oSona mtnt iHih : lb zdiq ihgh lenot opi rSeim ibie reot : rHoq ihoh mrSeim otplt zdiqim iSme : maor einim iSmH lb Smoeh Tobh tdSn ezm : acn Smet tokHt Hiim bqrb Hkmim tlin : pore mosr moas npSo oSome tokHt qonh lb : irat ihoh mosr Hkmh olpni kbod enoh :

16

ladm merki lb omihoh menh lSon : kl drki aiS ck beinio otkn roHot ihoh : gl al ihoh meSik oikno mHSbtik : kl pel ihoh lmenho ogm rSe liom reh : toebt ihoh kl gbh lb id lid la inqh : bHsd oamt ikpr eon obirat ihoh sor mre : brzot ihoh drki aiS gm aoibio iSlm ato : Tob meT bzdqh mrb tboaot bla mSpT : lb adm iHSb drko oihoh ikin zedo : qsm el Spti mlk bmSpT la imel pio : pls omacni mSpT lihoh meSho kl abni kis : toebt mlkim eSot rSe ki bzdqh ikon ksa : rzon mlkim Spti zdq odbr iSrim iahb : Hmt mlk mlaki mot oaiS Hkm ikprnh : baor pni mlk Hiim orzono keb mlqoS : qnh Hkmh mh Tob mHroz oqnot binh nbHr mksp : mslt iSrim sor mre Smr npSo nzr drko : lpni Sbr gaon olpni kSlon gbh roH : Tob Spl roH at eniim mHlq Sll at gaim : mSkil el dbr imza Tob oboTH bihoh aSrio : lHkm lb iqra nbon omtq Sptim isip lqH : mqor Hiim Skl belio omosr aolim aolt : lb Hkm iSkil piho oel Sptio isip lqH : zop dbS amri nem mtoq lnpS omrpa lezm : iS drk iSr lpni aiS oaHrith drki mot : npS eml emlh lo ki akp elio piho : aiS bliel krh reh oel Sptio kaS zrbt : aiS thpkot iSlH mdon onrgn mprid alop : aiS Hms ipth reho oholiko bdrk la Tob : ezh einio lHSb thpkot qrz Sptio klh reh : eTrt tpart Sibh bdrk zdqh tmza : Tob ark apim mgbor omSl broHo mlkd eir : bHiq ioTl at hgorl omihoh kl mSpTo :

17

Tob pt Hrbh oSloh bh mbit mla cbHi rib : ebd mSkil imSl bbn mbiS obtok aHim iHlq nHlh : mzrp lksp okor lchb obHn lbot ihoh : mre mqSib el Spt aon Sqr mcin el lSon hot : leg lrS Hrp eSho SmH laid la inqh : eTrt cqnim bni bnim otpart bnim abotm : la naoh lnbl Spt itr ap ki lndib Spt Sqr : abn Hn hSHd beini belio al kl aSr ipnh iSkil : mksh pSe mbqS ahbh oSnh bdbr mprid alop : tHt gerh bmbin mhkot ksil mah : ak mri ibqS re omlak akcri iSlH bo : pgoS db Skol baiS oal ksil baolto : mSib reh tHt Tobh la tmiS reh mbito : poTr mim raSit mdon olpni htgle hrib nToS : mzdiq rSe omrSie zdiq toebt ihoh gm Snihm : lmh ch mHir bid ksil lqnot Hkmh olb ain : bkl et ahb hre oaH lzrh iold : adm Hsr lb toqe kp erb erbh lpni reho : ahb pSe ahb mzh mgbih ptHo mbqS Sbr : eqS lb la imza Tob onhpk blSono ipol breh : ild ksil ltogh lo ola iSmH abi nbl : lb SmH iiTb ghh oroH nkah tibS grm : SHd mHiq rSe iqH lhTot arHot mSpT : at pni mbin Hkmh oeini ksil bqzh arz : kes labio bn ksil ommr lioldto : gm enoS lzdiq la Tob lhkot ndibim el iSr : HoSk amrio iode det oqr roH aiS tbonh : gm aoil mHriS Hkm iHSb aTm Sptio nbon :

18

ltaoh ibqS nprd bkl toSih itgle : la iHpz ksil btbonh ki am bhtglot lbo : bboa rSe ba gm boc oem qlon Hrph : mim emqim dbri pi aiS nHl nbe mqor Hkmh : Sat pni rSe la Tob lhTot zdiq bmSpT : Spti ksil ibao brib opio lmhlmot iqra : pi ksil mHth lo oSptio moqS npSo : dbri nrgn kmtlhmim ohm irdo Hdri bTn : gm mtrph bmlakto aH hoa lbel mSHit : mgdl ec Sm ihoh bo iroz zdiq onSgb : hon eSir qrit eco okHomh nSgbh bmSkito : lpni Sbr igbh lb aiS olpni kbod enoh : mSib dbr bTrm iSme aolt hia lo oklmh : roH aiS iklkl mHlho oroH nkah mi iSanh : lb nbon iqnh det oacn Hkmim tbqS det : mtn adm irHib lo olpni gdlim inHno : zdiq hraSon bribo iba reho oHqro : mdinim iSbit hgorl obin ezomim iprid : aH npSe mqrit ec omdonim kbriH armon : mpri pi aiS tSbe bTno tboat Sptio iSbe : mot oHiim bid lSon oahbih iakl prih : mza aSh mza Tob oipq rzon mihoh : tHnonim idbr rS oeSir ienh ecot : aiS reim lhtree oiS ahb dbq maH :

19

Tob rS holk btmo meqS Sptio ohoa ksil : gm bla det npS la Tob oaz brglim HoTa : aolt adm tslp drko oel ihoh icep lbo : hon isip reim rbim odl mreho iprd : ed Sqrim la inqh oipiH kcbim la imlT : rbim iHlo pni ndib okl hre laiS mtn : kl aHi rS Snaho ap ki mreho rHqo mmno mrdp amrim la hmh : qnh lb ahb npSo Smr tbonh lmza Tob : ed Sqrim la inqh oipiH kcbim iabd : la naoh lksil tenog ap ki lebd mSl bSrim : Skl adm harik apo otparto ebr el pSe : nhm kkpir cep mlk okTl el eSb rzono : hot labio bn ksil odlp Trd mdini aSh : bit ohon nHlt abot omihoh aSh mSklt : ezlh tpil trdmh onpS rmih treb : Smr mzoh Smr npSo boch drkio iomt : mloh ihoh Honn dl ogmlo iSlm lo : isr bnk ki iS tqoh oal hmito al tSa npSk : grl Hmh nSa enS ki am tzil oeod tosp : Sme ezh oqbl mosr lmen tHkm baHritk : rbot mHSbot blb aiS oezt ihoh hia tqom : taot adm Hsdo oTob rS maiS kcb : irat ihoh lHiim oSbe ilin bl ipqd re : Tmn ezl ido bzlHt gm al piho la iSibnh : lz tkh opti ierm ohokiH lnbon ibin det : mSdd ab ibriH am bn mbiS omHpir : Hdl bni lSme mosr lSgot mamri det : ed bliel iliz mSpT opi rSeim ible aon : nkono llzim SpTim omhlmot lgo ksilim :

20

lz hiin hmh Skr okl Sgh bo la iHkm : nhm kkpir aimt mlk mtebro HoTa npSo : kbod laiS Sbt mrib okl aoil itgle : mHrp ezl la iHrS iSal bqzir oain : mim emqim ezh blb aiS oaiS tbonh idlnh : rb adm iqra aiS Hsdo oaiS amonim mi imza : mthlk btmo zdiq aSri bnio aHrio : mlk ioSb el ksa din mcrh beinio kl re : mi iamr ckiti lbi Thrti mHTati : abn oabn aiph oaiph toebt ihoh gm Snihm : gm bmellio itnkr ner am ck oam iSr pelo : acn Smet oein rah ihoh eSh gm Snihm : al tahb Snh pn torS pqH einik Sbe lHm : re re iamr hqonh oacl lo ac ithll : iS chb orb pninim okli iqr Spti det : lqH bgdo ki erb cr obed nkrim Hblho : erb laiS lHm Sqr oaHr imla piho Hzz : mHSbot bezh tkon obtHblot eSh mlHmh : golh sod holk rkil olpth Sptio la tterb : mqll abio oamo idek nro baiSon HSk : nHlh mbHlt braSnh oaHrith la tbrk : al tamr aSlmh re qoh lihoh oiSe lk : toebt ihoh abn oabn omacni mrmh la Tob : mihoh mzedi gbr oadm mh ibin drko : moqS adm ile qdS oaHr ndrim lbqr : mcrh rSeim mlk Hkm oiSb elihm aopn : nr ihoh nSmt adm HpS kl Hdri bTn : Hsd oamt izro mlk osed bHsd ksao : tpart bHorim kHm ohdr cqnim Sibh : Hbrot pze tmriq bre omkot Hdri bTn :

21

plgi mim lb mlk bid ihoh el kl aSr iHpz iTno : kl drk aiS iSr beinio otkn lbot ihoh : eSh zdqh omSpT nbHr lihoh mcbH : rom einim orHb lb nr rSeim HTat : mHSbot Hroz ak lmotr okl az ak lmHsor : pel aozrot blSon Sqr hbl ndp mbqSi mot : Sd rSeim igorm ki mano leSot mSpT : hpkpk drk aiS ocr ock iSr pelo : Tob lSbt el pnt gg maSt mdonim obit Hbr : npS rSe aoth re la iHn beinio reho : benS lz iHkm pti obhSkil lHkm iqH det : mSkil zdiq lbit rSe mslp rSeim lre : aTm acno mceqt dl gm hoa iqra ola ienh : mtn bstr ikph ap oSHd bHq Hmh ech : SmHh lzdiq eSot mSpT omHth lpeli aon : adm toeh mdrk hSkl bqhl rpaim inoH : aiS mHsor ahb SmHh ahb iin oSmn la ieSir : kpr lzdiq rSe otHt iSrim bogd : Tob Sbt barz mdbr maSt mdonim okes : aozr nHmd oSmn bnoh Hkm oksil adm ibleno : rdp zdqh oHsd imza Hiim zdqh okbod : eir gbrim elh Hkm oird ec mbTHh : Smr pio olSono Smr mzrot npSo : cd ihir lz Smo eoSh bebrt cdon : taot ezl tmitno ki mano idio leSot : kl hiom htaoh taoh ozdiq itn ola iHSk : cbH rSeim toebh ap ki bcmh ibiano : ed kcbim iabd oaiS Some lnzH idbr : hec aiS rSe bpnio oiSr hoa ikin drkio : ain Hkmh oain tbonh oain ezh lngd ihoh : sos mokn liom mlHmh olihoh htSoeh :

22

nbHr Sm meSr rb mksp omchb Hn Tob : eSir orS npgSo eSh klm ihoh : erom rah reh oistr optiim ebro onenSo : eqb enoh irat ihoh eSr okbod oHiim : znim pHim bdrk eqS Somr npSo irHq mhm : Hnk lner el pi drko gm ki icqin la isor mmnh : eSir brSim imSol oebd loh laiS mloh : core eolh iqzor aon oSbT ebrto iklh : Tob ein hoa ibrk ki ntn mlHmo ldl : grS lz oiza mdon oiSbt din oqlon : ahb Thor lb Hn Sptio reho mlk : eini ihoh nzro det oislp dbri bgd : amr ezl ari bHoz btok rHbot arzH : SoHh emqh pi crot ceom ihoh ipol Sm : aolt qSorh blb ner SbT mosr irHiqnh mmno : eSq dl lhrbot lo ntn leSir ak lmHsor : hT acnk oSme dbri Hkmim olbk tSit ldeti : ki neim ki tSmrm bbTnk ikno iHdo el Sptik : lhiot bihoh mbTHk hodetik hiom ap ath : hla ktbti lk SlSom bmoezot odet : lhodiek qST amri amt lhSib amrim amt lSlHik : al tgcl dl ki dl hoa oal tdka eni bSer : ki ihoh irib ribm oqbe at qbeihm npS : al ttre at bel ap oat aiS Hmot la tboa : pn talp arHto olqHt moqS lnpSk : al thi btqei kp berbim mSaot : am ain lk lSlm lmh iqH mSkbk mtHtik : al tsg gbol eolm aSr eSo abotik : Hcit aiS mhir bmlakto lpni mlkim itizb bl itizb lpni HSkim :

23

ki tSb llHom at moSl bin tbin at aSr lpnik : oSmt Skin blek am bel npS ath : al ttao lmTemotio ohoa lHm kcbim : al tige lheSir mbintk Hdl : hteop einik bo oainno ki eSh ieSh lo knpim knSr oeip hSmim : al tlHm at lHm re ein oal ttao lmTemtio : ki kmo Ser bnpSo kn hoa akl oSth iamr lk olbo bl emk : ptk aklt tqianh oSHt dbrik hneimim : bacni ksil al tdbr ki iboc lSkl mlik : al tsg gbol eolm obSdi itomim al tba : ki galm Hcq hoa irib at ribm atk : hbiah lmosr lbk oacnk lamri det : al tmne mner mosr ki tkno bSbT la imot : ath bSbT tkno onpSo mSaol tzil : bni am Hkm lbk iSmH lbi gm ani : otelcnh klioti bdbr Sptik miSrim : al iqna lbk bHTaim ki am birat ihoh kl hiom : ki am iS aHrit otqotk la tkrt : Sme ath bni oHkm oaSr bdrk lbk : al thi bsbai iin bclli bSr lmo : ki sba ocoll iorS oqreim tlbiS nomh : Sme labik ch ildk oal tboc ki cqnh amk : amt qnh oal tmkr Hkmh omosr obinh : gol igol abi zdiq iold Hkm oiSmH bo : iSmH abik oamk otgl ioldtk : tnh bni lbk li oeinik drki trznh : ki SoHh emqh conh obar zrh nkrih : ap hia kHtp tarb obogdim badm tosp : lmi aoi lmi aboi lmi mdonim lmi SiH lmi pzeim Hnm lmi Hkllot einim : lmaHrim el hiin lbaim lHqr mmsk : al tra iin ki itadm ki itn bkis eino ithlk bmiSrim : aHrito knHS iSk okzpeni iprS : einik irao crot olbk idbr thpkot : ohiit kSkb blb im okSkb braS Hbl : hkoni bl Hliti hlmoni bl ideti mti aqiz aosip abqSno eod :

24

al tqna banSi reh oal ttao lhiot atm : ki Sd ihgh lbm oeml Sptihm tdbrnh : bHkmh ibnh bit obtbonh itkonn : obdet Hdrim imlao kl hon iqr oneim : gbr Hkm beoc oaiS det mamz kH : ki btHblot teSh lk mlHmh otSoeh brb ioez : ramot laoil Hkmot bSer la iptH piho : mHSb lhre lo bel mcmot iqrao : cmt aolt HTat otoebt ladm lz : htrpit biom zrh zr kHkh : hzl lqHim lmot omTim lhrg am tHSok : ki tamr hn la ideno ch hla tkn lbot hoa ibin onzr npSk hoa ide ohSib ladm kpelo : akl bni dbS ki Tob onpt mtoq el Hkk : kn deh Hkmh lnpSk am mzat oiS aHrit otqotk la tkrt : al tarb rSe lnoh zdiq al tSdd rbzo : ki Sbe ipol zdiq oqm orSeim ikSlo breh : bnpl aoibik al tSmH obkSlo al igl lbk : pn irah ihoh ore beinio ohSib melio apo : al ttHr bmreim al tqna brSeim : ki la thih aHrit lre nr rSeim idek : ira at ihoh bni omlk em Sonim al tterb : ki ptam iqom aidm opid Snihm mi iode : gm alh lHkmim hkr pnim bmSpT bl Tob : amr lrSe zdiq ath iqbho emim icemoho lamim : olmokiHim inem oelihm tboa brkt Tob : Sptim iSq mSib dbrim nkHim : hkn bHoz mlaktk oetdh bSdh lk aHr obnit bitk : al thi ed Hnm brek ohptit bSptik : al tamr kaSr eSh li kn aeSh lo aSib laiS kpelo : el Sdh aiS ezl ebrti oel krm adm Hsr lb : ohnh elh klo qmSnim kso pnio Hrlim ogdr abnio nhrsh : oaHch anki aSit lbi raiti lqHti mosr : meT Snot meT tnomot meT Hbq idim lSkb : oba mthlk riSk omHsrik kaiS mgn :

25

gm alh mSli Slmh aSr hetiqo anSi Hcqih mlk ihodh : kbd alhim hstr dbr okbd mlkim Hqr dbr : Smim lrom oarz lemq olb mlkim ain Hqr : hgo sigim mksp oiza lzrp kli : hgo rSe lpni mlk oikon bzdq ksao : al tthdr lpni mlk obmqom gdlim al temd : ki Tob amr lk elh hnh mhSpilk lpni ndib aSr rao einik : al tza lrb mhr pn mh teSh baHrith bhklim atk rek : ribk rib at rek osod aHr al tgl : pn iHsdk Sme odbtk la tSob : tpoHi chb bmSkiot ksp dbr dbr el apnio : ncm chb oHli ktm mokiH Hkm el acn Smet : kznt Slg biom qzir zir namn lSlHio onpS adnio iSib : nSiaim oroH ogSm ain aiS mthll bmtt Sqr : bark apim ipth qzin olSon rkh tSbr grm : dbS mzat akl dik pn tSbeno ohqato : hqr rglk mbit rek pn iSbek oSnak : mpiz oHrb oHz Snon aiS enh breho ed Sqr : Sn reh orgl moedt mbTH bogd biom zrh : medh bgd biom qrh Hmz el ntr oSr bSrim el lb re : am reb Snak haklho lHm oam zma hSqho mim : ki gHlim ath Hth el raSo oihoh iSlm lk : roH zpon tHoll gSm opnim ncemim lSon str : Tob Sbt el pnt gg maSt mdonim obit Hbr : mim qrim el npS eiph oSmoeh Tobh marz mrHq : mein nrpS omqor mSHt zdiq mT lpni rSe : akl dbS hrbot la Tob oHqr kbdm kbod : eir prozh ain Homh aiS aSr ain mezr lroHo :

26

kSlg bqiz okmTr bqzir kn la naoh lksil kbod : kzpor lnod kdror leop kn qllt Hnm la tba : SoT lsos mtg lHmor oSbT lgo ksilim : al ten ksil kaolto pn tSoh lo gm ath : enh ksil kaolto pn ihih Hkm beinio : mqzh rglim Hms Sth SlH dbrim bid ksil : dlio Sqim mpsH omSl bpi ksilim : kzror abn bmrgmh kn notn lksil kbod : HoH elh bid Skor omSl bpi ksilim : rb mHoll kl oSkr ksil oSkr ebrim : kklb Sb el qao ksil Sonh baolto : rait aiS Hkm beinio tqoh lksil mmno : amr ezl SHl bdrk ari bin hrHbot : hdlt tsob el zirh oezl el mTto : Tmn ezl ido bzlHt nlah lhSibh al pio : Hkm ezl beinio mSbeh mSibi Tem : mHciq bacni klb ebr mtebr el rib la lo : kmtlhlh hirh cqim Hzim omot : kn aiS rmh at reho oamr hla mSHq ani : baps ezim tkbh aS obain nrgn iStq mdon : pHm lgHlim oezim laS oaiS mdonim lHrHr rib : dbri nrgn kmtlhmim ohm irdo Hdri bTn : ksp sigim mzph el HrS Sptim dlqim olb re : bSpto inkr Sona obqrbo iSit mrmh : ki iHnn qolo al tamn bo ki Sbe toebot blbo : tksh Snah bmSaon tglh reto bqhl : krh SHt bh ipl ogll abn alio tSob : lSon Sqr iSna dkio oph Hlq ieSh mdHh :

27

al tthll biom mHr ki la tde mh ild iom : ihllk cr ola pik nkri oal Sptik : kbd abn onTl hHol okes aoil kbd mSnihm : akcriot Hmh oSTp ap omi iemd lpni qnah : Tobh tokHt mglh mahbh mstrt : namnim pzei aohb onetrot nSiqot Sona : npS Sbeh tbos npt onpS rebh kl mr mtoq : kzpor noddt mn qnh kn aiS nodd mmqomo : Smn oqTrt iSmH lb omtq reho mezt npS : rek oreh abik al tecb obit aHik al tboa biom aidk Tob Skn qrob maH rHoq : Hkm bni oSmH lbi oaSibh Hrpi dbr : erom rah reh nstr ptaim ebro nenSo : qH bgdo ki erb cr obed nkrih Hblho : mbrk reho bqol gdol bbqr hSkim qllh tHSb lo : dlp Tord biom sgrir oaSt mdonim nStoh : zpnih zpn roH oSmn imino iqra : brcl bbrcl iHd oaiS iHd pni reho : nzr tanh iakl prih oSmr adnio ikbd : kmim hpnim lpnim kn lb hadm ladm : Saol oabdh la tSbenh oeini hadm la tSbenh : mzrp lksp okor lchb oaiS lpi mhllo : am tktoS at haoil bmktS btok hripot beli la tsor melio aolto : ide tde pni zank Sit lbk ledrim : ki la leolm Hsn oam ncr ldor dor : glh Hzir onrah dSa onaspo eSbot hrim : kbSim llboSk omHir Sdh etodim : odi Hlb ecim llHmk llHm bitk oHiim lnerotik :

28

nso oain rdp rSe ozdiqim kkpir ibTH : bpSe arz rbim Srih obadm mbin ide kn iarik : gbr rS oeSq dlim mTr sHp oain lHm : ecbi torh ihllo rSe oSmri torh itgro bm : anSi re la ibino mSpT ombqSi ihoh ibino kl : Tob rS holk btmo meqS drkim ohoa eSir : nozr torh bn mbin oreh collim iklim abio : mrbh hono bnSk obtrbit lHonn dlim iqbzno : msir acno mSme torh gm tplto toebh : mSgh iSrim bdrk re bSHoto hoa ipol otmimim inHlo Tob : Hkm beinio aiS eSir odl mbin iHqrno : belz zdiqim rbh tpart obqom rSeim iHpS adm : mksh pSeio la izliH omodh oecb irHm : aSri adm mpHd tmid omqSh lbo ipol breh : ari nhm odb Soqq mSl rSe el em dl : ngid Hsr tbonot orb meSqot Snai bze iarik imim : adm eSq bdm npS ed bor inos al itmko bo : holk tmim ioSe oneqS drkim ipol baHt : ebd admto iSbe lHm omrdp rqim iSbe riS : aiS amonot rb brkot oaz lheSir la inqh : hkr pnim la Tob oel pt lHm ipSe gbr : nbhl lhon aiS re ein ola ide ki Hsr ibano : mokiH adm aHri Hn imza mmHliq lSon : gocl abio oamo oamr ain pSe Hbr hoa laiS mSHit : rHb npS igrh mdon oboTH el ihoh idSn : boTH blbo hoa ksil oholk bHkmh hoa imlT : notn lrS ain mHsor omelim einio rb marot : bqom rSeim istr adm obabdm irbo zdiqim :

29

aiS tokHot mqSh erp pte iSbr oain mrpa : brbot zdiqim iSmH hem obmSl rSe ianH em : aiS ahb Hkmh iSmH abio oreh conot iabd hon : mlk bmSpT iemid arz oaiS tromot ihrsnh : gbr mHliq el reho rSt porS el pemio : bpSe aiS re moqS ozdiq iron oSmH : ide zdiq din dlim rSe la ibin det : anSi lzon ipiHo qrih oHkmim iSibo ap : aiS Hkm nSpT at aiS aoil orgc oSHq oain nHt : anSi dmim iSnao tm oiSrim ibqSo npSo : kl roHo iozia ksil oHkm baHor iSbHnh : mSl mqSib el dbr Sqr kl mSrtio rSeim : rS oaiS tkkim npgSo mair eini Snihm ihoh : mlk SopT bamt dlim ksao led ikon : SbT otokHt itn Hkmh oner mSlH mbiS amo : brbot rSeim irbh pSe ozdiqim bmpltm irao : isr bnk oiniHk oitn mednim lnpSk : bain Hcon ipre em oSmr torh aSrho : bdbrim la iosr ebd ki ibin oain menh : Hcit aiS az bdbrio tqoh lksil mmno : mpnq mner ebdo oaHrito ihih mnon : aiS ap igrh mdon obel Hmh rb pSe : gaot adm tSpilno oSpl roH itmk kbod : Holq em gnb Sona npSo alh iSme ola igid : Hrdt adm itn moqS oboTH bihoh iSgb : rbim mbqSim pni moSl omihoh mSpT aiS : toebt zdiqim aiS eol otoebt rSe iSr drk :

30

dbri agor bn iqh hmSa nam hgbr laitial laitial oakl : ki ber anki maiS ola bint adm li : ola lmdti Hkmh odet qdSim ade : mi elh Smim oird mi asp roH bHpnio mi zrr mim bSmlh mi hqim kl apsi arz mh Smo omh Sm bno ki tde : kl amrt aloh zroph mgn hoa lHsim bo : al tosp el dbrio pn iokiH bk onkcbt : Stim Salti matk al tmne mmni bTrm amot : Soa odbr kcb hrHq mmni raS oeSr al ttn li hTripni lHm Hqi : pn aSbe okHSti oamrti mi ihoh opn aorS ognbti otpSti Sm alhi : al tlSn ebd al adno pn iqllk oaSmt : dor abio iqll oat amo la ibrk : dor Thor beinio omzato la rHz : dor mh rmo einio oepepio inSao : dor Hrbot Snio omaklot mtletio lakl eniim marz oabionim madm : leloqh Sti bnot hb hb SloS hnh la tSbenh arbe la amro hon : Saol oezr rHm arz la Sbeh mim oaS la amrh hon : ein tleg lab otboc liqht am iqroh erbi nHl oiakloh bni nSr : SlSh hmh nplao mmni oarbe la idetim : drk hnSr bSmim drk nHS eli zor drk anih blb im odrk gbr belmh : kn drk aSh mnapt aklh omHth pih oamrh la pelti aon : tHt SloS rgch arz otHt arbe la tokl Sat : tHt ebd ki imlok onbl ki iSbe lHm : tHt Snoah ki tbel oSpHh ki tirS gbrth : arbeh hm qTni arz ohmh Hkmim mHkmim : hnmlim em la ec oikino bqiz lHmm : Spnim em la ezom oiSimo bsle bitm : mlk ain larbh oiza Hzz klo : Smmit bidim ttpS ohia bhikli mlk : SlSh hmh miTibi zed oarbeh miTbi lkt : liS gbor bbhmh ola iSob mpni kl : crcir mtnim ao tiS omlk alqom emo : am nblt bhtnSa oam cmot id lph : ki miz Hlb iozia Hmah omiz ap iozia dm omiz apim iozia rib :

31

dbri lmoal mlk mSa aSr isrto amo : mh bri omh br bTni omh br ndri : al ttn lnSim Hilk odrkik lmHot mlkin : al lmlkim lmoal al lmlkim Sto iin olrocnim ao Skr : pn iSth oiSkH mHqq oiSnh din kl bni eni : tno Skr laobd oiin lmri npS : iSth oiSkH riSo oemlo la ickr eod : ptH pik lalm al din kl bni Hlop : ptH pik SpT zdq odin eni oabion : aSt Hil mi imza orHq mpninim mkrh : bTH bh lb belh oSll la iHsr : gmltho Tob ola re kl imi Hiih : drSh zmr opStim oteS bHpz kpih : hith kaniot soHr mmrHq tbia lHmh : otqm beod lilh ottn Trp lbith oHq lnertih : cmmh Sdh otqHho mpri kpih nTe krm : Hgrh beoc mtnih otamz creotih : Temh ki Tob sHrh la ikbh blil nrh : idih SlHh bkiSor okpih tmko plk : kph prSh leni oidih SlHh labion : la tira lbith mSlg ki kl bith lbS Snim : mrbdim eSth lh SS oargmn lboSh : node bSerim belh bSbto em cqni arz : sdin eSth otmkr oHgor ntnh lkneni : ec ohdr lboSh otSHq liom aHron : pih ptHh bHkmh otort Hsd el lSonh : zopih hlikot bith olHm ezlot la takl : qmo bnih oiaSroh belh oihllh : rbot bnot eSo Hil oat elit el klnh : Sqr hHn ohbl hipi aSh irat ihoh hia tthll : tno lh mpri idih oihlloh bSerim meSih :

aiob

1

aiS hih barz eoz aiob Smo ohih haiS hhoa tm oiSr oira alhim osr mre : oioldo lo Sbeh bnim oSloS bnot : oihi mqnho Sbet alpi zan oSlSt alpi gmlim oHmS maot zmd bqr oHmS maot atonot oebdh rbh mad oihi haiS hhoa gdol mkl bni qdm : ohlko bnio oeSo mSth bit aiS iomo oSlHo oqrao lSlSt aHitihm lakl olStot emhm : oihi ki hqipo imi hmSth oiSlH aiob oiqdSm ohSkim bbqr ohelh elot mspr klm ki amr aiob aoli HTao bni obrko alhim blbbm kkh ieSh aiob kl himim : oihi hiom oibao bni halhim lhtizb el ihoh oiboa gm hSTn btokm : oiamr ihoh al hSTn main tba oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr mSoT barz omhthlk bh : oiamr ihoh al hSTn hSmt lbk el ebdi aiob ki ain kmho barz aiS tm oiSr ira alhim osr mre : oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr hHnm ira aiob alhim : hla at Skt bedo obed bito obed kl aSr lo msbib meSh idio brkt omqnho prz barz : oaolm SlH na idk oge bkl aSr lo am la el pnik ibrkk : oiamr ihoh al hSTn hnh kl aSr lo bidk rq alio al tSlH idk oiza hSTn mem pni ihoh : oihi hiom obnio obntio aklim oStim iin bbit aHihm hbkor : omlak ba al aiob oiamr hbqr hio HrSot ohatnot reot el idihm : otpl Sba otqHm oat hnerim hko lpi Hrb oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk : eod ch mdbr och ba oiamr aS alhim nplh mn hSmim otber bzan obnerim otaklm oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk : eod ch mdbr och ba oiamr kSdim Smo SlSh raSim oipSTo el hgmlim oiqHom oat hnerim hko lpi Hrb oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk : ed ch mdbr och ba oiamr bnik obnotik aklim oStim iin bbit aHihm hbkor : ohnh roH gdolh bah mebr hmdbr oige barbe pnot hbit oipl el hnerim oimoto oamlTh rq ani lbdi lhgid lk : oiqm aiob oiqre at melo oigc at raSo oipl arzh oiStHo : oiamr erm izti mbTn ami oerm aSob Smh ihoh ntn oihoh lqH ihi Sm ihoh mbrk : bkl cat la HTa aiob ola ntn tplh lalhim :

2

oihi hiom oibao bni halhim lhtizb el ihoh oiboa gm hSTn btkm lhtizb el ihoh : oiamr ihoh al hSTn ai mch tba oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr mST barz omhthlk bh : oiamr ihoh al hSTn hSmt lbk al ebdi aiob ki ain kmho barz aiS tm oiSr ira alhim osr mre oedno mHciq btmto otsitni bo lbleo Hnm : oien hSTn at ihoh oiamr eor bed eor okl aSr laiS itn bed npSo : aolm SlH na idk oge al ezmo oal bSro am la al pnik ibrkk : oiamr ihoh al hSTn hno bidk ak at npSo Smr : oiza hSTn mat pni ihoh oik at aiob bSHin re mkp rglo ed qdqdo : oiqH lo HrS lhtgrd bo ohoa iSb btok hapr : otamr lo aSto edk mHciq btmtk brk alhim omt : oiamr alih kdbr aHt hnblot tdbri gm at hTob nqbl mat halhim oat hre la nqbl bkl cat la HTa aiob bSptio : oiSmeo SlSt rei aiob at kl hreh hcat hbah elio oibao aiS mmqmo alipc htimni obldd hSoHi ozopr hnemti oioedo iHdo lboa lnod lo olnHmo : oiSao at einihm mrHoq ola hkirho oiSao qolm oibko oiqreo aiS melo oicrqo epr el raSihm hSmimh : oiSbo ato larz Sbet imim oSbet lilot oain dbr alio dbr ki rao ki gdl hkab mad :

3

aHri kn ptH aiob at piho oiqll at iomo : oien aiob oiamr : iabd iom aold bo ohlilh amr hrh gbr : hiom hhoa ihi HSk al idrSho aloh mmel oal tope elio nhrh : igalho HSk ozlmot tSkn elio ennh ibetho kmriri iom : hlilh hhoa iqHho apl al iHd bimi Snh bmspr irHim al iba : hnh hlilh hhoa ihi glmod al tba rnnh bo : iqbho arri iom hetidim err loitn : iHSko kokbi nSpo iqo laor oain oal irah bepepi SHr : ki la sgr dlti bTni oistr eml meini : lmh la mrHm amot mbTn izati oagoe : mdoe qdmoni brkim omh Sdim ki ainq : ki eth Skbti oaSqoT iSnti ac inoH li : em mlkim oiezi arz hbnim Hrbot lmo : ao em Srim chb lhm hmmlaim btihm ksp : ao knpl Tmon la ahih kellim la rao aor : Sm rSeim Hdlo rgc oSm inoHo igiei kH : iHd asirim Sanno la Smeo qol ngS : qTn ogdol Sm hoa oebd HpSi madnio : lmh itn leml aor oHiim lmri npS : hmHkim lmot oainno oiHprho mmTmonim : hSmHim ali gil iSiSo ki imzao qbr : lgbr aSr drko nstrh oisk aloh bedo : ki lpni lHmi anHti tba oitko kmim Sagti : ki pHd pHdti oiatini oaSr igrti iba li : la Sloti ola SqTti ola nHti oiba rgc :

4

oien alipc htimni oiamr : hnsh dbr alik tlah oezr bmlin mi iokl : hnh isrt rbim oidim rpot tHcq : koSl iqimon mlik obrkim kreot tamz : ki eth tboa alik otla tge edik otbhl : hla iratk ksltk tqotk otm drkik : ckr na mi hoa nqi abd oaiph iSrim nkHdo : kaSr raiti HrSi aon ocrei eml iqzrho : mnSmt aloh iabdo omroH apo iklo : Sagt arih oqol SHl oSni kpirim nteo : liS abd mbli Trp obni lbia itprdo : oali dbr ignb otqH acni Smz mnho : bSepim mHcinot lilh bnpl trdmh el anSim : pHd qrani oredh orb ezmoti hpHid : oroH el pni iHlp tsmr Sert bSri : iemd ola akir mraho tmonh lngd eini dmmh oqol aSme : hanoS maloh izdq am meSho iThr gbr : hn bebdio la iamin obmlakio iSim thlh : ap Skni bti Hmr aSr bepr isodm idkaom lpni eS : mbqr lerb ikto mbli mSim lnzH iabdo : hla nse itrm bm imoto ola bHkmh :

5

qra na hiS eonk oal mi mqdSim tpnh : ki laoil ihrg keS opth tmit qnah : ani raiti aoil mSriS oaqob noho ptam : irHqo bnio miSe oidkao bSer oain mzil : aSr qziro reb iakl oal mznim iqHho oSap zmim Hilm : ki la iza mepr aon omadmh la izmH eml : ki adm leml iold obni rSp igbiho eop : aolm ani adrS al al oal alhim aSim dbrti : eSh gdlot oain Hqr nplaot ed ain mspr : hntn mTr el pni arz oSlH mim el pni Hozot : lSom Splim lmrom oqdrim Sgbo iSe : mpr mHSbot eromim ola teSinh idihm toSih : lkd Hkmim bermm oezt nptlim nmhrh : iomm ipgSo HSk oklilh imSSo bzhrim : oiSe mHrb mpihm omid Hcq abion : othi ldl tqoh oelth qpzh pih : hnh aSri anoS iokHno aloh omosr Sdi al tmas : ki hoa ikaib oiHbS imHz oido trpinh : bSS zrot izilk obSbe la ige bk re : breb pdk mmot obmlHmh midi Hrb : bSoT lSon tHba ola tira mSd ki iboa : lSd olkpn tSHq omHit harz al tira : ki em abni hSdh britk oHit hSdh hSlmh lk : oidet ki Slom ahlk opqdt nok ola tHTa : oidet ki rb crek ozazaik keSb harz : tboa bklH ali qbr kelot gdiS beto : hnh cat Hqrnoh kn hia Smenh oath de lk :

6

oien aiob oiamr : lo Sqol iSql keSi ohiti bmacnim iSao iHd : ki eth mHol imim ikbd el kn dbri leo : ki Hzi Sdi emdi aSr Hmtm Sth roHi beoti aloh ierkoni : hinhq pra eli dSa am igeh Sor el blilo : hiakl tpl mbli mlH am iS Tem brir Hlmot : manh lngoe npSi hmh kdoi lHmi : mi itn tboa Salti otqoti itn aloh : oial aloh oidkani itr ido oibzeni : othi eod nHmti oasldh bHilh la iHmol ki la kHdti amri qdoS : mh kHi ki aiHl omh qzi ki aarik npSi : am kH abnim kHi am bSri nHoS : ham ain ecrti bi otSih ndHh mmni : lms mreho Hsd oirat Sdi iecob : aHi bgdo kmo nHl kapiq nHlim iebro : hqdrim mni qrH elimo itelm Slg : bet icrbo nzmto bHmo ndeko mmqomm : ilpto arHot drkm ielo btho oiabdo : hbiTo arHot tma hlikt Sba qoo lmo : bSo ki bTH bao edih oiHpro : ki eth hiitm la trao Htt otirao : hki amrti hbo li omkHkm SHdo bedi : omlToni mid zr omid erizim tpdoni : horoni oani aHriS omh Sgiti hbino li : mh nmrzo amri iSr omh iokiH hokH mkm : hlhokH mlim tHSbo olroH amri naS : ap el itom tpilo otkro el riekm : oeth hoailo pno bi oel pnikm am akcb : Sbo na al thi eolh oSbi eod zdqi bh : hiS blSoni eolh am Hki la ibin hoot :

7

hla zba lanoS el arz okimi Skir imio : kebd iSap zl okSkir iqoh pelo : kn hnHlti li irHi Soa olilot eml mno li : am Skbti oamrti mti aqom omdd erb oSbeti nddim edi nSp : lbS bSri rmh ogiS epr eori rge oimas : imi qlo mni arg oiklo baps tqoh : ckr ki roH Hii la tSob eini lraot Tob : la tSorni ein rai einik bi oainni : klh enn oilk kn iord Saol la ielh : la iSob eod lbito ola ikirno eod mqmo : gm ani la aHSk pi adbrh bzr roHi aSiHh bmr npSi : him ani am tnin ki tSim eli mSmr : ki amrti tnHmni erSi iSa bSiHi mSkbi : oHttni bHlmot omHcinot tbetni : otbHr mHnq npSi mot mezmoti : masti la lelm aHih Hdl mmni ki hbl imi : mh anoS ki tgdlno oki tSit alio lbk : otpqdno lbqrim lrgeim tbHnno : kmh la tSeh mmni la trpni ed blei rqi : HTati mh apel lk nzr hadm lmh Smtni lmpge lk oahih eli lmSa : omh la tSa pSei otebir at eoni ki eth lepr aSkb oSHrtni oainni :

8

oien bldd hSoHi oiamr : ed an tmll alh oroH kbir amri pik : hal ieot mSpT oam Sdi ieot zdq : am bnik HTao lo oiSlHm bid pSem : am ath tSHr al al oal Sdi ttHnn : am ck oiSr ath ki eth ieir elik oSlm not zdqk : ohih raSitk mzer oaHritk iSgh mad : ki Sal na ldr riSon okonn lHqr abotm : ki tmol anHno ola nde ki zl imino eli arz : hla hm iorok iamro lk omlbm iozao mlim : higah gma bla bzh iSgh aHo bli mim : edno babo la iqTp olpni kl Hzir iibS : kn arHot kl SkHi al otqot Hnp tabd : aSr iqoT kslo obit ekbiS mbTHo : iSen el bito ola iemd iHciq bo ola iqom : rTb hoa lpni SmS oel gnto inqto tza : el gl SrSio isbko bit abnim iHch : am ibleno mmqomo okHS bo la raitik : hn hoa mSoS drko omepr aHr izmHo : hn al la imas tm ola iHciq bid mreim : ed imlh SHoq pik oSptik troeh : Snaik ilbSo bSt oahl rSeim ainno :

9

oien aiob oiamr : amnm ideti ki kn omh izdq anoS em al : am iHpz lrib emo la ienno aHt mni alp : Hkm lbb oamiz kH mi hqSh alio oiSlm : hmetiq hrim ola ideo aSr hpkm bapo : hmrgic arz mmqomh oemodih itplzon : hamr lHrs ola icrH obed kokbim iHtm : nTh Smim lbdo odork el bmti im : eSh eS ksil okimh oHdri tmn : eSh gdlot ed ain Hqr onplaot ed ain mspr : hn iebr eli ola arah oiHlp ola abin lo : hn iHtp mi iSibno mi iamr alio mh teSh : aloh la iSib apo tHto SHHo ecri rhb : ap ki anki aenno abHrh dbri emo : aSr am zdqti la aenh lmSpTi atHnn : am qrati oienni la aamin ki iacin qoli : aSr bSerh iSopni ohrbh pzei Hnm : la itnni hSb roHi ki iSbeni mmrrim : am lkH amiz hnh oam lmSpT mi ioeidni : am azdq pi irSieni tm ani oieqSni : tm ani la ade npSi amas Hii : aHt hia el kn amrti tm orSe hoa mklh : am SoT imit ptam lmst nqim ileg : arz ntnh bid rSe pni SpTih iksh am la apoa mi hoa : oimi qlo mni rz brHo la rao Tobh : Hlpo em aniot abh knSr iToS eli akl : am amri aSkHh SiHi aecbh pni oabligh : igrti kl ezbti ideti ki la tnqni : anki arSe lmh ch hbl aige : am htrHzti bmo Slg ohckoti bbr kpi : ac bSHt tTblni oteboni Slmoti : ki la aiS kmni aenno nboa iHdo bmSpT : la iS binino mokiH iSt ido el Snino : isr meli SbTo oamto al tbetni : adbrh ola airano ki la kn anki emdi :

10

nqTh npSi bHii aecbh eli SiHi adbrh bmr npSi : amr al aloh al trSieni hodieni el mh tribni : hTob lk ki teSq ki tmas igie kpik oel ezt rSeim hopet : heini bSr lk am kraot anoS trah : hkimi anoS imik am Snotik kimi gbr : ki tbqS leoni olHTati tdroS : el detk ki la arSe oain midk mzil : idik ezboni oieSoni iHd sbib otbleni : ckr na ki kHmr eSitni oal epr tSibni : hla kHlb ttikni okgbnh tqpiani : eor obSr tlbiSni obezmot ogidim tskkni : Hiim oHsd eSit emdi opqdtk Smrh roHi : oalh zpnt blbbk ideti ki cat emk : am HTati oSmrtni omeoni la tnqni : am rSeti alli li ozdqti la aSa raSi Sbe qlon orah enii : oigah kSHl tzodni otSb ttpla bi : tHdS edik ngdi otrb keSk emdi Hlipot ozba emi : olmh mrHm hzatni agoe oein la trani : kaSr la hiiti ahih mbTn lqbr aobl : hla meT imi iHdl iSit mmni oabligh meT : bTrm alk ola aSob al arz HSk ozlmot : arz epth kmo apl zlmot ola sdrim otpe kmo apl :

11

oien zpr hnemti oiamr : hrb dbrim la ienh oam aiS Sptim izdq : bdik mtim iHriSo otleg oain mklm : otamr ck lqHi obr hiiti beinik : oaolm mi itn aloh dbr oiptH Sptio emk : oigd lk telmot Hkmh ki kplim ltoSih ode ki iSh lk aloh meonk : hHqr aloh tmza am ed tklit Sdi tmza : gbhi Smim mh tpel emqh mSaol mh tde : arkh marz mdh orHbh mni im : am iHlp oisgir oiqhil omi iSibno : ki hoa ide mti Soa oira aon ola itbonn : oaiS nbob ilbb oeir pra adm iold : am ath hkinot lbk oprSt alio kpk : am aon bidk hrHiqho oal tSkn bahlik eolh : ki ac tSa pnik mmom ohiit mzq ola tira : ki ath eml tSkH kmim ebro tckr : omzhrim iqom Hld teph kbqr thih : obTHt ki iS tqoh oHprt lbTH tSkb : orbzt oain mHrid oHlo pnik rbim : oeini rSeim tklinh omnos abd mnhm otqotm mpH npS :

12

oien aiob oiamr : amnm ki atm em oemkm tmot Hkmh : gm li lbb kmokm la npl anki mkm oat mi ain kmo alh : SHq lreho ahih qra laloh oienho SHoq zdiq tmim : lpid boc leStot Sann nkon lmoedi rgl : iSlio ahlim lSddim obTHot lmrgici al laSr hbia aloh bido : oaolm Sal na bhmot otrk oeop hSmim oigd lk : ao SiH larz otrk oispro lk dgi him : mi la ide bkl alh ki id ihoh eSth cat : aSr bido npS kl Hi oroH kl bSr aiS : hla acn mlin tbHn oHk akl iTem lo : biSiSim Hkmh oark imim tbonh : emo Hkmh ogborh lo ezh otbonh : hn ihros ola ibnh isgr el aiS ola iptH : hn iezr bmim oibSo oiSlHm oihpko arz : emo ec otoSih lo Sgg omSgh : molik ioezim Soll oSpTim iholl : mosr mlkim ptH oiasr acor bmtnihm : molik khnim Soll oatnim islp : msir Sph lnamnim oTem cqnim iqH : Sopk boc el ndibim omciH apiqim rph : mglh emqot mni HSk oiza laor zlmot : mSgia lgoim oiabdm STH lgoim oinHm : msir lb raSi em harz oitem btho la drk : imSSo HSk ola aor oitem kSkor :

13

hn kl rath eini Smeh acni otbn lh : kdetkm ideti gm ani la npl anki mkm : aolm ani al Sdi adbr ohokH al al aHpz : oaolm atm Tpli Sqr rpai all klkm : mi itn hHrS tHriSon othi lkm lHkmh : Smeo na tokHti orbot Spti hqSibo : hlal tdbro eolh olo tdbro rmih : hpnio tSaon am lal tribon : hTob ki iHqr atkm am khtl banoS thtlo bo : hokH iokiH atkm am bstr pnim tSaon : hla Sato tbet atkm opHdo ipl elikm : ckrnikm mSli apr lgbi Hmr gbikm : hHriSo mmni oadbrh ani oiebr eli mh : el mh aSa bSri bSni onpSi aSim bkpi : hn iqTlni la aiHl ak drki al pnio aokiH : gm hoa li liSoeh ki la lpnio Hnp iboa : Smeo Smoe mlti oaHoti bacnikm : hnh na erkti mSpT ideti ki ani azdq : mi hoa irib emdi ki eth aHriS oagoe : ak Stim al teS emdi ac mpnik la astr : kpk meli hrHq oamtk al tbetni : oqra oanki aenh ao adbr ohSibni : kmh li eonot oHTaot pSei oHTati hdieni : lmh pnik tstir otHSbni laoib lk : helh ndp teroz oat qS ibS trdp : ki tktb eli mrrot otoriSni eonot neori : otSm bsd rgli otSmor kl arHoti el SrSi rgli ttHqh : ohoa krqb iblh kbgd aklo eS :

14

adm ilod aSh qzr imim oSbe rgc : kziz iza oiml oibrH kzl ola iemod : ap el ch pqHt eink oati tbia bmSpT emk : mi itn Thor mTma la aHd : am Hrozim imio mspr HdSio atk Hqo eSit ola iebor : Seh melio oiHdl ed irzh kSkir iomo : ki iS lez tqoh am ikrt oeod iHlip oinqto la tHdl : am icqin barz SrSo obepr imot gceo : mriH mim iprH oeSh qzir kmo nTe : ogbr imot oiHlS oigoe adm oaio : aclo mim mni im onhr iHrb oibS : oaiS Skb ola iqom ed blti Smim la iqizo ola iero mSntm : mi itn bSaol tzpnni tstirni ed Sob apk tSit li Hq otckrni : am imot gbr hiHih kl imi zbai aiHl ed boa Hlipti : tqra oanki aenk lmeSh idik tksp : ki eth zedi tspor la tSmor el HTati : Htm bzror pSei otTpl el eoni : oaolm hr nopl ibol ozor ietq mmqmo : abnim SHqo mim tSTp spiHih epr arz otqot anoS habdt : ttqpho lnzH oihlk mSnh pnio otSlHho : ikbdo bnio ola ide oizero ola ibin lmo : ak bSro elio ikab onpSo elio tabl :

15

oien alipc htimni oiamr : hHkm ienh det roH oimla qdim bTno : hokH bdbr la iskon omlim la ioeil bm : ap ath tpr irah otgre SiHh lpni al : ki ialp eonk pik otbHr lSon eromim : irSiek pik ola ani oSptik ieno bk : hraiSon adm told olpni gbeot Hollt : hbsod aloh tSme otgre alik Hkmh : mh idet ola nde tbin ola emno hoa : gm Sb gm iSiS bno kbir mabik imim : hmeT mmk tnHmot al odbr laT emk : mh iqHk lbk omh ircmon einik : ki tSib al al roHk ohzat mpik mlin : mh anoS ki ickh oki izdq ilod aSh : hn bqdSo la iamin oSmim la cko beinio : ap ki nteb onalH aiS Sth kmim eolh : aHok Sme li och Hciti oasprh : aSr Hkmim igido ola kHdo mabotm : lhm lbdm ntnh harz ola ebr cr btokm : kl imi rSe hoa mtHoll omspr Snim nzpno leriz : qol pHdim bacnio bSlom Sodd iboano : la iamin Sob mni HSk ozpo hoa ali Hrb : ndd hoa llHm aih ide ki nkon bido iom HSk : ibetho zr omzoqh ttqpho kmlk etid lkidor : ki nTh al al ido oal Sdi itgbr : iroz alio bzoar bebi gbi mgnio : ki ksh pnio bHlbo oieS pimh eli ksl : oiSkon erim nkHdot btim la iSbo lmo aSr htetdo lglim : la ieSr ola iqom Hilo ola iTh larz mnlm : la isor mni HSk inqto tibS Slhbt oisor broH pio : al iamn bSo nteh ki Soa thih tmorto : bla iomo tmla okpto la rennh : iHms kgpn bsro oiSlk kcit nzto : ki edt Hnp glmod oaS aklh ahli SHd : hrh eml oild aon obTnm tkin mrmh :

16

oien aiob oiamr : Smeti kalh rbot mnHmi eml klkm : hqz ldbri roH ao mh imrizk ki tenh : gm anki kkm adbrh lo iS npSkm tHt npSi aHbirh elikm bmlim oanieh elikm bmo raSi : aamzkm bmo pi onid Spti iHSk : am adbrh la iHSk kabi oaHdlh mh mni ihlk : ak eth hlani hSmot kl edti : otqmTni led hih oiqm bi kHSi bpni ienh : apo Trp oiSTmni Hrq eli bSnio zri ilToS einio li : pero eli bpihm bHrph hko lHii iHd eli itmlaon : isgirni al al eoil oel idi rSeim irTni : Slo hiiti oiprprni oaHc berpi oipzpzni oiqimni lo lmTrh : isbo eli rbio iplH klioti ola iHmol iSpk larz mrrti : iprzni prz el pni prz irz eli kgbor : Sq tprti eli gldi oellti bepr qrni : pni Hmrmrh mni bki oel epepi zlmot : el la Hms bkpi otplti ckh : arz al tksi dmi oal ihi mqom lceqti : gm eth hnh bSmim edi oShdi bmromim : mlizi rei al aloh dlph eini : oiokH lgbr em aloh obn adm lreho : ki Snot mspr iatio oarH la aSob ahlk :

17

roHi Hblh imi nceko qbrim li : am la htlim emdi obhmrotm tln eini : Simh na erbni emk mi hoa lidi itqe : ki lbm zpnt mSkl el kn la trmm : lHlq igid reim oeini bnio tklnh : ohzgni lmSl emim otpt lpnim ahih : otkh mkeS eini oizri kzl klm : iSmo iSrim el cat onqi el Hnp iterr : oiaHc zdiq drko oThr idim isip amz : oaolm klm tSbo obao na ola amza bkm Hkm : imi ebro cmti ntqo morSi lbbi : lilh liom iSimo aor qrob mpni HSk : am aqoh Saol biti bHSk rpdti izoei : lSHt qrati abi ath ami oaHti lrmh : oaih apo tqoti otqoti mi iSornh : bdi Sal trdnh am iHd el epr nHt :

18

oien bldd hSHi oiamr : ed anh tSimon qnzi lmlin tbino oaHr ndbr : mdoe nHSbno kbhmh nTmino beinikm : Trp npSo bapo hlmenk tecb arz oietq zor mmqmo : gm aor rSeim idek ola igh Sbib aSo : aor HSk bahlo onro elio idek : izro zedi aono otSlikho ezto : ki SlH brSt brglio oel Sbkh ithlk : iaHc beqb pH iHcq elio zmim : Tmon barz Hblo omlkdto eli ntib : sbib betho blhot ohpizho lrglio : ihi reb ano oaid nkon lzleo : iakl bdi eoro iakl bdio bkor mot : intq mahlo mbTHo otzedho lmlk blhot : tSkon bahlo mbli lo icrh el noho gprit : mtHt SrSio ibSo ommel iml qziro : ckro abd mni arz ola Sm lo el pni Hoz : ihdpho maor al HSk omtbl indho : la nin lo ola nkd bemo oain Srid bmgorio : el iomo nSmo aHrnim oqdmnim aHco Ser : ak alh mSknot eol och mqom la ide al :

19

oien aiob oiamr : ed anh togion npSi otdkaonni bmlim : ch eSr pemim tklimoni la tbSo thkro li : oap amnm Sgiti ati tlin mSogti : am amnm eli tgdilo otokiHo eli Hrpti : deo apo ki aloh eotni omzodo eli hqip : hn azeq Hms ola aenh aSoe oain mSpT : arHi gdr ola aebor oel ntiboti HSk iSim : kbodi meli hpSiT oisr eTrt raSi : itzni sbib oalk oise kez tqoti : oiHr eli apo oiHSbni lo kzrio : iHd ibao gdodio oislo eli drkm oiHno sbib lahli : aHi meli hrHiq oidei ak cro mmni : Hdlo qrobi omidei SkHoni : gri biti oamhti lcr tHSbni nkri hiiti beinihm : lebdi qrati ola ienh bmo pi atHnn lo : roHi crh laSti oHnti lbni bTni : gm eoilim maso bi aqomh oidbro bi : teboni kl mti sodi och ahbti nhpko bi : beori obbSri dbqh ezmi oatmlTh beor Sni : Hnni Hnni atm rei ki id aloh ngeh bi : lmh trdpni kmo al ombSri la tSbeo : mi itn apo oiktbon mli mi itn bspr oiHqo : beT brcl oeprt led bzor iHzbon : oani ideti gali Hi oaHron el epr iqom : oaHr eori nqpo cat ombSri aHch aloh : aSr ani aHch li oeini rao ola cr klo kliti bHqi : ki tamro mh nrdp lo oSrS dbr nmza bi : goro lkm mpni Hrb ki Hmh eonot Hrb lmen tdeon Sdin :

20

oien zpr hnemti oiamr : lkn Sepi iSiboni obebor HoSi bi : mosr klmti aSme oroH mbinti ienni : hcat idet mni ed mni Sim adm eli arz : ki rnnt rSeim mqrob oSmHt Hnp edi rge : am ielh lSmim Siao oraSo leb igie : kgllo lnzH iabd raio iamro aio : kHlom ieop ola imzaoho oidd kHcion lilh : ein Scpto ola tosip ola eod tSorno mqomo : bnio irzo dlim oidio tSbnh aono : ezmotio mlao elomo oemo el epr tSkb : am tmtiq bpio reh ikHidnh tHt lSono : iHml elih ola iecbnh oimnenh btok Hko : lHmo bmeio nhpk mrort ptnim bqrbo : Hil ble oiqano mbTno iorSno al : raS ptnim iinq thrgho lSon apeh : al ira bplgot nhri nHli dbS oHmah : mSib ige ola ible kHil tmorto ola iels : ki rzz ecb dlim bit gcl ola ibnho : ki la ide Slo bbTno bHmodo la imlT : ain Srid laklo el kn la iHil Tobo : bmlaot Spqo izr lo kl id eml tboano : ihi lmla bTno iSlH bo Hron apo oimTr elimo blHomo : ibrH mnSq brcl tHlpho qSt nHoSh : Slp oiza mgoh obrq mmrrto ihlk elio amim : kl HSk Tmon lzponio taklho aS la npH ire Srid bahlo : iglo Smim eono oarz mtqommh lo : igl ibol bito ngrot biom apo : ch Hlq adm rSe malhim onHlt amro mal :

21

oien aiob oiamr : Smeo Smoe mlti othi cat tnHomtikm : Saoni oanki adbr oaHr dbri tleig : hanki ladm SiHi oam mdoe la tqzr roHi : pno ali ohSmo oSimo id el ph : oam ckrti onbhlti oaHc bSri plzot : mdoe rSeim iHio etqo gm gbro Hil : crem nkon lpnihm emm ozazaihm leinihm : btihm Slom mpHd ola SbT aloh elihm : Soro ebr ola igel tplT prto ola tSkl : iSlHo kzan eoilihm oildihm irqdon : iSao ktp oknor oiSmHo lqol eogb : iblo bTob imihm obrge Saol iHto : oiamro lal sor mmno odet drkik la Hpzno : mh Sdi ki nebdno omh noeil ki npge bo : hn la bidm Tobm ezt rSeim rHqh mni : kmh nr rSeim idek oiba elimo aidm Hblim iHlq bapo : ihio ktbn lpni roH okmz gnbto soph : aloh izpn lbnio aono iSlm alio oide : irao eino kido omHmt Sdi iSth : ki mh Hpzo bbito aHrio omspr HdSio Hzzo : hlal ilmd det ohoa rmim iSpoT : ch imot bezm tmo klo Slann oSlio : eTinio mlao Hlb omH ezmotio iSqh : och imot bnpS mrh ola akl bTobh : iHd el epr iSkbo ormh tksh elihm : hn ideti mHSbotikm omcmot eli tHmso : ki tamro aih bit ndib oaih ahl mSknot rSeim : hla Saltm eobri drk oattm la tnkro : ki liom aid iHSk re liom ebrot ioblo : mi igid el pnio drko ohoa eSh mi iSlm lo : ohoa lqbrot iobl oel gdiS iSqod : mtqo lo rgbi nHl oaHrio kl adm imSok olpnio ain mspr : oaik tnHmoni hbl otSobtikm nSar mel :

22
