olzlm dhba di hqimt la nsgd : badin nbokdnzr htmli Hma ozlm anpohi aStno el Sdrk miSk oebd ngo enh oamr lmca latona Hd Sbeh el di Hch lmcih : olgbrin gbri Hil di bHilh amr lkpth lSdrk miSk oebd ngo lmrma laton nora iqdta : badin gbria alk kpto bsrblihon pTiSihon okrblthon olbSihon ormio lgoa aton nora iqdta : kl qbl dnh mn di mlt mlka mHzph oatona ach itira gbria alk di hsqo lSdrk miSk oebd ngo qTl hmon Sbiba di nora : ogbria alk tlthon Sdrk miSk oebd ngo nplo lgoa aton nora iqdta mkptin : adin nbokdnzr mlka toh oqm bhtbhlh enh oamr lhdbrohi hla gbrin tlta rmina lgoa nora mkptin enin oamrin lmlka iziba mlka : enh oamr ha anh Hch gbrin arbeh Srin mhlkin bgoa nora oHbl la aiti bhon oroh di rbieia dmh lbr alhin : badin qrb nbokdnzr ltre aton nora iqdta enh oamr Sdrk miSk oebd ngo ebdohi di alha elia pqo oato badin npqin Sdrk miSk oebd ngo mn goa nora : omtknSin aHSdrpnia sgnia opHota ohdbri mlka Hcin lgbria alk di la SlT nora bgSmhon oSer raShon la htHrk osrblihon la Sno oriH nor la edt bhon : enh nbokdnzr oamr brik alhhon di Sdrk miSk oebd ngo di SlH mlakh oSicb lebdohi di htrHzo elohi omlt mlka Snio oihbo gSmihon di la iplHon ola isgdon lkl alh lhn lalhhon : omni Sim Tem di kl em amh olSn di iamr Slh el alhhon di Sdrk miSk oebd ngoa hdmin itebd obith noli iStoh kl qbl di la aiti alh aHrn di ikl lhzlh kdnh : badin mlka hzlH lSdrk miSk oebd ngo bmdint bbl :

4

nbokdnzr mlka lkl emmia amia olSnia di darin bkl area Slmkon iSga : atia otmhia di ebd emi alha elia Spr qdmi lhHoih : atohi kmh rbrbin otmhohi kmh tqipin mlkoth mlkot elm oSlTnh em dr odr : anh nbokdnzr Slh hoit bbiti orenn bhikli : Hlm Hcit oidHlnni ohrhrin el mSkbi oHcoi raSi ibhlnni : omni Sim Tem lhnelh qdmi lkl Hkimi bbl di pSr Hlma ihodenni : badin ellin HrTmia aSpia kSdia ogcria oHlma amr anh qdmihon opSrh la mhodein li : oed aHrin el qdmi dnial di Smh blTSazr kSm alhi odi roH alhin qdiSin bh oHlma qdmohi amrt : blTSazr rb HrTmia di anh idet di roH alhin qdiSin bk okl rc la ans lk Hcoi Hlmi di Hcit opSrh amr : oHcoi raSi el mSkbi Hch hoit oalo ailn bgoa area oromh Sgia : rbh ailna otqp oromh imTa lSmia oHcoth lsop kl area : epih Spir oanbh Sgia omcon lkla bh tHtohi tTll Hiot bra obenpohi idron zpri Smia omnh itcin kl bSra : Hch hoit bHcoi raSi el mSkbi oalo eir oqdiS mn Smia nHt : qra bHil okn amr gdo ailna oqzzo enpohi atro epih obdro anbh tnd Hiota mn tHtohi ozpria mn enpohi : brm eqr SrSohi barea Sbqo obasor di prcl onHS bdtaa di bra obTl Smia izTbe oem Hiota Hlqh beSb area : lbbh mn anoSa iSnon olbb Hioh itihb lh oSbeh ednin iHlpon elohi : bgcrt eirin ptgma omamr qdiSin Salta ed dbrt di indeon Hiia di SliT elia bmlkot anoSa olmn di izba itnnh oSpl anSim iqim elih : dnh Hlma Hcit anh mlka nbokdnzr oanth blTSazr pSra amr kl qbl di kl Hkimi mlkoti la iklin pSra lhodetni oanth khl di roH alhin qdiSin bk : adin dnial di Smh blTSazr aStomm kSeh Hdh oreinhi ibhlnh enh mlka oamr blTSazr Hlma opSra al ibhlk enh blTSazr oamr mrai Hlma lSnaik opSrh lerik : ailna di Hcit di rbh otqp oromh imTa lSmia oHcoth lkl area : oepih Spir oanbh Sgia omcon lkla bh tHtohi tdor Hiot bra obenpohi iSknn zpri Smia : anth hoa mlka di rbit otqpt orbotk rbt omTt lSmia oSlTnk lsop area : odi Hch mlka eir oqdiS nHt mn Smia oamr gdo ailna oHblohi brm eqr SrSohi barea Sbqo obasor di prcl onHS bdtaa di bra obTl Smia izTbe oem Hiot bra Hlqh ed di Sbeh ednin iHlpon elohi : dnh pSra mlka ogcrt elia hia di mTt el mrai mlka : olk Trdin mn anSa oem Hiot bra lhoh mdrk oeSba ktorin lk iTemon omTl Smia lk mzbein oSbeh ednin iHlpon elik ed di tnde di SliT elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izba itnnh : odi amro lmSbq eqr SrSohi di ailna mlkotk lk qimh mn di tnde di SlTn Smia : lhn mlka mlki iSpr elik oHTik bzdqh prq oeoitk bmHn enin hn thoa arkh lSlotk : kla mTa el nbokdnzr mlka : lqzt irHin tri eSr el hikl mlkota di bbl mhlk hoh : enh mlka oamr hla da hia bbl rbta di anh bnith lbit mlko btqp Hsni oliqr hdri : eod mlta bpm mlka ql mn Smia npl lk amrin nbokdnzr mlka mlkoth edt mnk : omn anSa lk Trdin oem Hiot bra mdrk eSba ktorin lk iTemon oSbeh ednin iHlpon elik ed di tnde di SliT elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izba itnnh : bh Seta mlta spt el nbokdnzr omn anSa Trid oeSba ktorin iakl omTl Smia gSmh izTbe ed di Serh knSrin rbh oTprohi kzprin : olqzt iomih anh nbokdnzr eini lSmia nTlt omndei eli itob olelia brkt olHi elma SbHt ohdrt di SlTnh SlTn elm omlkoth em dr odr : okl dari area klh HSibin okmzbih ebd bHil Smia odari area ola aiti di imHa bidh oiamr lh mh ebdt : bh cmna mndei itob eli oliqr mlkoti hdri ocoi itob eli oli hdbri orbrbni ibeon oel mlkoti htqnt orbo itirh hospt li : ken anh nbokdnzr mSbH omromm omhdr lmlk Smia di kl mebdohi qST oarHth din odi mhlkin bgoh ikl lhSplh :

5

blSazr mlka ebd lHm rb lrbrbnohi alp olqbl alpa Hmra Sth : blSazr amr bTem Hmra lhitih lmani dhba okspa di hnpq nbokdnzr abohi mn hikla di biroSlm oiSton bhon mlka orbrbnohi Sglth olHnth : badin hitio mani dhba di hnpqo mn hikla di bit alha di biroSlm oaStio bhon mlka orbrbnohi Sglth olHnth : aStio Hmra oSbHo lalhi dhba okspa nHSa prcla aea oabna : bh Seth npqo azben di id anS oktbn lqbl nbrSta el gira di ktl hikla di mlka omlka Hch ps idh di ktbh : adin mlka ciohi Snohi oreinhi ibhlonh oqTri Hrzh mStrin oarkbth da lda nqSn : qra mlka bHil lhelh laSpia kSdia ogcria enh mlka oamr lHkimi bbl di kl anS di iqrh ktbh dnh opSrh iHonni argona ilbS ohmonka di dhba el zoarh otlti bmlkota iSlT : adin ellin kl Hkimi mlka ola khlin ktba lmqra opSra lhodeh lmlka : adin mlka blSazr Sgia mtbhl ociohi Snin elohi orbrbnohi mStbSin : mlkta lqbl mli mlka orbrbnohi lbit mStia ellt ent mlkta oamrt mlka lelmin Hii al ibhlok reionk ocioik al iStno : aiti gbr bmlkotk di roH alhin qdiSin bh obiomi abok nhiro oSkltno oHkmh kHkmt alhin hStkHt bh omlka nbkdnzr abok rb HrTmin aSpin kSdain gcrin hqimh abok mlka : kl qbl di roH itirh omnde oSkltno mpSr Hlmin oaHoit aHidn omSra qTrin hStkHt bh bdnial di mlka Sm Smh blTSazr ken dnial itqri opSrh ihHoh : badin dnial hel qdm mlka enh mlka oamr ldnial anth hoa dnial di mn bni glota di ihod di hiti mlka abi mn ihod : oSmet elik di roH alhin bk onhiro oSkltno oHkmh itirh hStkHt bk : oken helo qdmi Hkimia aSpia di ktbh dnh iqron opSrh lhodetni ola khlin pSr mlta lhHoih : oanh Smet elik di tokl pSrin lmpSr oqTrin lmSra ken hn tokl ktba lmqra opSrh lhodetni argona tlbS ohmonka di dhba el zoark otlta bmlkota tSlT : badin enh dnial oamr qdm mlka mtntk lk lhoin onbcbitk laHrn hb brm ktba aqra lmlka opSra ahodenh : anth mlka alha elia mlkota orbota oiqra ohdrh ihb lnbkdnzr abok : omn rbota di ihb lh kl emmia amia olSnia hoo caein odHlin mn qdmohi di hoh zba hoa qTl odi hoh zba hoh mHa odi hoh zba hoh mrim odi hoh zba hoh mSpil : okdi rm lbbh oroHh tqpt lhcdh hnHt mn krsa mlkoth oiqrh hedio mnh : omn bni anSa Trid olbbh em Hiota Soi oem erdia mdorh eSba ktorin iTemonh omTl Smia gSmh izTbe ed di ide di SliT alha elia bmlkot anSa olmn di izbh ihqim elih : oanth brh blSazr la hSplt lbbk kl qbl di kl dnh idet : oel mra Smia htrommt olmania di bith hitio qdmik oanth orbrbnik Sgltk olHntk Hmra Stin bhon olalhi kspa odhba nHSa prcla aea oabna di la Hcin ola Smein ola idein SbHt olalha di nSmtk bidh okl arHtk lh la hdrt : badin mn qdmohi SliH psa di ida oktba dnh rSim : odnh ktba di rSim mna mna tql oprsin : dnh pSr mlta mna mnh alha mlkotk ohSlmh : tql tqilth bmacnia ohStkHt Hsir : prs prist mlkotk oihibt lmdi oprs : badin amr blSazr ohlbiSo ldnial argona ohmonka di dhba el zoarh ohkrco elohi di lhoa SliT tlta bmlkota : bh blilia qTil blaSzr mlka kSdia : odrioS mdia qbl mlkota kbr Snin Stin otrtin :

6

Spr qdm drioS ohqim el mlkota laHSdrpnia mah oeSrin di lhon bkl mlkota : oela mnhon srkin tlta di dnial Hd mnhon di lhon aHSdrpnia alin ihbin lhon Tema omlka la lhoa ncq : adin dnial dnh hoa mtnzH el srkia oaHSdrpnia kl qbl di roH itira bh omlka eSit lhqmoth el kl mlkota : adin srkia oaHSdrpnia hoo bein elh lhSkHh ldnial mzd mlkota okl elh oSHith la iklin lhSkHh kl qbl di mhimn hoa okl Slo oSHith la hStkHt elohi : adin gbria alk amrin di la nhSkH ldnial dnh kl ela lhn hSkHnh elohi bdt alhh : adin srkia oaHSdrpnia aln hrgSo el mlka okn amrin lh drioS mlka lelmin Hii : atieTo kl srki mlkota sgnia oaHSdrpnia hdbria opHota lqimh qim mlka oltqph asr di kl di ibeh beo mn kl alh oanS ed iomin tltin lhn mnk mlka itrma lgb ariota : ken mlka tqim asra otrSm ktba di la lhSnih kdt mdi oprs di la teda : kl qbl dnh mlka drioS rSm ktba oasra : odnial kdi ide di rSim ktba el lbith okoin ptiHn lh belith ngd iroSlm ocmnin tlth bioma hoa brk el brkohi omzla omoda qdm alhh kl qbl di hoa ebd mn qdmt dnh : adin gbria alk hrgSo ohSkHo ldnial bea omtHnn qdm alhh : badin qribo oamrin qdm mlka el asr mlka hla asr rSmt di kl anS di ibeh mn kl alh oanS ed iomin tltin lhn mnk mlka itrma lgob ariota enh mlka oamr iziba mlta kdt mdi oprs di la teda : badin eno oamrin qdm mlka di dnial di mn bni glota di ihod la Sm elik mlka Tem oel asra di rSmt ocmnin tlth bioma bea beoth : adin mlka kdi mlta Sme Sgia baS elohi oel dnial Sm bl lSicboth oed meli SmSa hoa mStdr lhzloth : badin gbria alk hrgSo el mlka oamrin lmlka de mlka di dt lmdi oprs di kl asr oqim di mlka ihqim la lhSnih : badin mlka amr ohitio ldnial ormo lgba di ariota enh mlka oamr ldnial alhk di anth plH lh btdira hoa iSicbnk : ohitit abn Hdh oSmt el pm gba oHtmh mlka becqth obecqt rbrbnohi di la tSna zbo bdnial : adin acl mlka lhiklh obt Tot odHon la hnel qdmohi oSnth ndt elohi : badin mlka bSprpra iqom bngha obhtbhlh lgba di ariota acl : okmqrbh lgba ldnial bql ezib ceq enh mlka oamr ldnial dnial ebd alha Hia alhk di anth plH lh btdira hikl lSicbotk mn ariota : adin dnial em mlka mll mlka lelmin Hii : alhi SlH mlakh osgr pm ariota ola Hbloni kl qbl di qdmohi cko hStkHt li oap qdmik mlka Hbolh la ebdt : badin mlka Sgia Tab elohi oldnial amr lhnsqh mn gba ohsq dnial mn gba okl Hbl la hStkH bh di himn balhh : oamr mlka ohitio gbria alk di aklo qrzohi di dnial olgb ariota rmo anon bnihon onSihon ola mTo lareit gba ed di SlTo bhon ariota okl grmihon hdqo : badin drioS mlka ktb lkl emmia amia olSnia di darin bkl area Slmkon iSga : mn qdmi Sim Tem di bkl SlTn mlkoti lhon caein odHlin mn qdm alhh di dnial di hoa alha Hia oqim lelmin omlkoth di la ttHbl oSlTnh ed sopa : mSicb omzl oebd atin otmhin bSmia obarea di Sicib ldnial mn id ariota : odnial dnh hzlH bmlkot drioS obmlkot korS prsia :

7

bSnt Hdh lblaSzr mlk bbl dnial Hlm Hch oHcoi raSh el mSkbh badin Hlma ktb raS mlin amr : enh dnial oamr Hch hoit bHcoi em lilia oaro arbe roHi Smia mgiHn lima rba : oarbe Hion rbrbn slqn mn ima Snin da mn da : qdmita karih ogpin di nSr lh Hch hoit ed di mriTo gpih onTilt mn area oel rglin kanS hqimt olbb anS ihib lh : oaro Hioh aHri tninh dmih ldb olSTr Hd hqmt otlt elein bpmh bin Snih okn amrin lh qomi akli bSr Sgia : batr dnh Hch hoit oaro aHri knmr olh gpin arbe di eop el gbih oarbeh raSin lHiota oSlTn ihib lh : batr dnh Hch hoit bHcoi lilia oaro Hioh rbieih dHilh oaimtni otqipa itira oSnin di prcl lh rbrbn aklh omdqh oSara brglih rpsh ohia mSnih mn kl Hiota di qdmih oqrnin eSr lh : mStkl hoit bqrnia oalo qrn aHri ceirh slqt binihon otlt mn qrnia qdmita ateqro mn qdmih oalo einin keini anSa bqrna da opm mmll rbrbn : Hch hoit ed di krson rmio oetiq iomin itb lboSh ktlg Hor oSer raSh kemr nqa krsih Sbibin di nor glglohi nor dlq : nhr di nor ngd onpq mn qdmohi alp alpim iSmSonh orbo rbon qdmohi iqomon dina itb osprin ptiHo : Hch hoit badin mn ql mlia rbrbta di qrna mmllh Hch hoit ed di qTilt Hiota ohobd gSmh oihibt liqdt aSa : oSar Hiota hedio SlTnhon oarkh bHiin ihibt lhon ed cmn oedn : Hch hoit bHcoi lilia oaro em enni Smia kbr anS ath hoh oed etiq iomia mTh oqdmohi hqrbohi : olh ihib SlTn oiqr omlko okl emmia amia olSnia lh iplHon SlTnh SlTn elm di la iedh omlkoth di la ttHbl : atkrit roHi anh dnial bgoa ndnh oHcoi raSi ibhlnni : qrbt el Hd mn qamia oiziba abea mnh el kl dnh oamr li opSr mlia ihodenni : alin Hiota rbrbta di anin arbe arbeh mlkin iqomon mn area : oiqblon mlkota qdiSi elionin oiHsnon mlkota ed elma oed elm elmia : adin zbit lizba el Hiota rbieita di hot Snih mn klhon dHilh itirh Snih di prcl oTprih di nHS aklh mdqh oSara brglih rpsh : oel qrnia eSr di braSh oaHri di slqt onplo mn qdmih tlt oqrna dkn oeinin lh opm mmll rbrbn oHcoh rb mn Hbrth : Hch hoit oqrna dkn ebdh qrb em qdiSin oiklh lhon : ed di ath etiq iomia odina ihb lqdiSi elionin ocmna mTh omlkota hHsno qdiSin : kn amr Hiota rbieita mlko rbieia thoa barea di tSna mn kl mlkota otakl kl area otdoSnh otdqnh : oqrnia eSr mnh mlkoth eSrh mlkin iqmon oaHrn iqom aHrihon ohoa iSna mn qdmia otlth mlkin ihSpl : omlin lzd elia imll olqdiSi elionin ibla oisbr lhSnih cmnin odt oitihbon bidh ed edn oednin oplg edn : odina itb oSlTnh ihedon lhSmdh olhobdh ed sopa : omlkoth oSlTna orbota di mlkot tHot kl Smia ihibt lem qdiSi elionin mlkoth mlkot elm okl SlTnia lh iplHon oiStmeon : ed kh sopa di mlta anh dnial Sgia reioni ibhlnni ocioi iStnon eli omlta blbi nTrt :

8

bSnt SloS lmlkot blaSzr hmlk Hcon nrah ali ani dnial aHri hnrah ali btHlh : oarah bHcon oihi brati oani bSoSn hbirh aSr beilm hmdinh oarah bHcon oani hiiti el aobl aoli : oaSa eini oarah ohnh ail aHd emd lpni habl olo qrnim ohqrnim gbhot ohaHt gbhh mn hSnit ohgbhh elh baHrnh : raiti at hail mngH imh ozponh ongbh okl Hiot la iemdo lpnio oain mzil mido oeSh krzno ohgdil : oani hiiti mbin ohnh zpir hecim ba mn hmerb el pni kl harz oain noge barz ohzpir qrn Hcot bin einio : oiba ed hail bel hqrnim aSr raiti emd lpni habl oirz alio bHmt kHo : oraitio mgie azl hail oitmrmr alio oik at hail oiSbr at Sti qrnio ola hih kH bail lemd lpnio oiSlikho arzh oirmsho ola hih mzil lail mido : ozpir hecim hgdil ed mad okezmo nSbrh hqrn hgdolh otelnh Hcot arbe tHtih larbe roHot hSmim : omn haHt mhm iza qrn aHt mzeirh otgdl itr al hngb oal hmcrH oal hzbi : otgdl ed zba hSmim otpl arzh mn hzba omn hkokbim otrmsm : oed Sr hzba hgdil ommno hrim htmid ohSlk mkon mqdSo : ozba tntn el htmid bpSe otSlk amt arzh oeSth ohzliHh : oaSmeh aHd qdoS mdbr oiamr aHd qdoS lplmoni hmdbr ed mti hHcon htmid ohpSe Smm tt oqdS ozba mrms : oiamr ali ed erb bqr alpim oSlS maot onzdq qdS : oihi brati ani dnial at hHcon oabqSh binh ohnh emd lngdi kmrah gbr : oaSme qol adm bin aoli oiqra oiamr gbrial hbn lhlc at hmrah : oiba azl emdi obbao nbeti oaplh el pni oiamr ali hbn bn adm ki let qz hHcon : obdbro emi nrdmti el pni arzh oige bi oiemidni el emdi : oiamr hnni modiek at aSr ihih baHrit hcem ki lmoed qz : hail aSr rait bel hqrnim mlki mdi oprs : ohzpir hSeir mlk ion ohqrn hgdolh aSr bin einio hoa hmlk hraSon : ohnSbrt otemdnh arbe tHtih arbe mlkiot mgoi iemdnh ola bkHo : obaHrit mlkotm khtm hpSeim iemd mlk ec pnim ombin Hidot : oezm kHo ola bkHo onplaot iSHit ohzliH oeSh ohSHit ezomim oem qdSim : oel Sklo ohzliH mrmh bido oblbbo igdil obSloh iSHit rbim oel Sr Srim iemd obaps id iSbr : omrah herb ohbqr aSr namr amt hoa oath stm hHcon ki limim rbim : oani dnial nhiiti onHliti imim oaqom oaeSh at mlakt hmlk oaStomm el hmrah oain mbin :

9

bSnt aHt ldrioS bn aHSoroS mcre mdi aSr hmlk el mlkot kSdim : bSnt aHt lmlko ani dnial binti bsprim mspr hSnim aSr hih dbr ihoh al irmih hnbia lmlaot lHrbot iroSlm Sbeim Snh : oatnh at pni al adni halhim lbqS tplh otHnonim bzom oSq oapr : oatpllh lihoh alhi oatodh oamrh ana adni hal hgdol ohnora Smr hbrit ohHsd lahbio olSmri mzotio : HTano oeoino ohrSeno omrdno osor mmzotk ommSpTik : ola Smeno al ebdik hnbiaim aSr dbro bSmk al mlkino Srino oabtino oal kl em harz : lk adni hzdqh olno bSt hpnim kiom hch laiS ihodh olioSbi iroSlm olkl iSral hqrbim ohrHqim bkl harzot aSr hdHtm Sm bmelm aSr melo bk : ihoh lno bSt hpnim lmlkino lSrino olabtino aSr HTano lk : ladni alhino hrHmim ohslHot ki mrdno bo : ola Smeno bqol ihoh alhino llkt btortio aSr ntn lpnino bid ebdio hnbiaim : okl iSral ebro at tortk osor lblti Smoe bqlk ottk elino halh ohSbeh aSr ktobh btort mSh ebd halhim ki HTano lo : oiqm at dbrio aSr dbr elino oel SpTino aSr SpTono lhbia elino reh gdlh aSr la neSth tHt kl hSmim kaSr neSth biroSlm : kaSr ktob btort mSh at kl hreh hcat bah elino ola Hlino at pni ihoh alhino lSob meonno olhSkil bamtk : oiSqd ihoh el hreh oibiah elino ki zdiq ihoh alhino el kl meSio aSr eSh ola Smeno bqlo : oeth adni alhino aSr hozat at emk marz mzrim bid Hcqh oteS lk Sm kiom hch HTano rSeno : adni kkl zdqtk iSb na apk oHmtk meirk iroSlm hr qdSk ki bHTaino obeonot abtino iroSlm oemk lHrph lkl sbibtino : oeth Sme alhino al tplt ebdk oal tHnonio ohar pnik el mqdSk hSmm lmen adni : hTh alhi acnk oSme pqHh einik orah Smmtino oheir aSr nqra Smk elih ki la el zdqtino anHno mpilim tHnonino lpnik ki el rHmik hrbim : adni Smeh adni slHh adni hqSibh oeSh al taHr lmenk alhi ki Smk nqra el eirk oel emk : oeod ani mdbr omtpll omtodh HTati oHTat emi iSral ompil tHnti lpni ihoh alhi el hr qdS alhi : oeod ani mdbr btplh ohaiS gbrial aSr raiti bHcon btHlh mep biep nge ali ket mnHt erb : oibn oidbr emi oiamr dnial eth izati lhSkilk binh : btHlt tHnonik iza dbr oani bati lhgid ki Hmodot ath obin bdbr ohbn bmrah : Sbeim Sbeim nHtk el emk oel eir qdSk lkla hpSe olHtm HTaot olkpr eon olhbia zdq elmim olHtm Hcon onbia olmSH qdS qdSim : otde otSkl mn mza dbr lhSib olbnot iroSlm ed mSiH ngid Sbeim Sbeh oSbeim SSim oSnim tSob onbnth rHob oHroz obzoq hetim : oaHri hSbeim SSim oSnim ikrt mSiH oain lo oheir ohqdS iSHit em ngid hba oqzo bSTp oed qz mlHmh nHrzt Smmot : ohgbir brit lrbim Sboe aHd oHzi hSboe iSbit cbH omnHh oel knp Sqozim mSmm oed klh onHrzh ttk el Smm :

10

bSnt SloS lkorS mlk prs dbr nglh ldnial aSr nqra Smo blTSazr oamt hdbr ozba gdol obin at hdbr obinh lo bmrah : bimim hhm ani dnial hiiti mtabl SlSh Sbeim imim : lHm Hmdot la aklti obSr oiin la ba al pi osok la skti ed mlat SlSt Sbeim imim : obiom eSrim oarbeh lHdS hraSon oani hiiti el id hnhr hgdol hoa Hdql : oaSa at eini oara ohnh aiS aHd lboS bdim omtnio Hgrim bktm aopc : ogoito ktrSiS opnio kmrah brq oeinio klpidi aS ocretio omrgltio kein nHSt qll oqol dbrio kqol hmon : oraiti ani dnial lbdi at hmrah ohanSim aSr hio emi la rao at hmrah abl Hrdh gdlh nplh elihm oibrHo bhHba : oani nSarti lbdi oarah at hmrah hgdlh hcat ola nSar bi kH ohodi nhpk eli lmSHit ola ezrti kH : oaSme at qol dbrio okSmei at qol dbrio oani hiiti nrdm el pni opni arzh : ohnh id ngeh bi otnieni el brki okpot idi : oiamr ali dnial aiS Hmdot hbn bdbrim aSr anki dbr alik oemd el emdk ki eth SlHti alik obdbro emi at hdbr hch emdti mreid : oiamr ali al tira dnial ki mn hiom hraSon aSr ntt at lbk lhbin olhtenot lpni alhik nSmeo dbrik oani bati bdbrik : oSr mlkot prs emd lngdi eSrim oaHd iom ohnh mikal aHd hSrim hraSnim ba lecrni oani notrti Sm azl mlki prs : obati lhbink at aSr iqrh lemk baHrit himim ki eod Hcon limim : obdbro emi kdbrim halh ntti pni arzh onalmti : ohnh kdmot bni adm nge el Spti oaptH pi oadbrh oamrh al hemd lngdi adni bmrah nhpko ziri eli ola ezrti kH : ohik iokl ebd adni ch ldbr em adni ch oani meth la iemd bi kH onSmh la nSarh bi : oisp oige bi kmrah adm oiHcqni : oiamr al tira aiS Hmdot Slom lk Hcq oHcq okdbro emi htHcqti oamrh idbr adni ki Hcqtni : oiamr hidet lmh bati alik oeth aSob lhlHm em Sr prs oani ioza ohnh Sr ion ba : abl agid lk at hrSom bktb amt oain aHd mtHcq emi el alh ki am mikal Srkm :

11

oani bSnt aHt ldrioS hmdi emdi lmHciq olmeoc lo : oeth amt agid lk hnh eod SlSh mlkim emdim lprs ohrbiei ieSir eSr gdol mkl okHcqto beSro ieir hkl at mlkot ion : oemd mlk gbor omSl mmSl rb oeSh krzono : okemdo tSbr mlkoto otHz larbe roHot hSmim ola laHrito ola kmSlo aSr mSl ki tntS mlkoto olaHrim mlbd alh : oiHcq mlk hngb omn Srio oiHcq elio omSl mmSl rb mmSlto : olqz Snim itHbro obt mlk hngb tboa al mlk hzpon leSot miSrim ola tezr koH hcroe ola iemd ocreo otntn hia ombiaih ohildh omHcqh betim : oemd mnzr SrSih kno oiba al hHil oiba bmeoc mlk hzpon oeSh bhm ohHciq : ogm alhihm em nskihm em kli Hmdtm ksp ochb bSbi iba mzrim ohoa Snim iemd mmlk hzpon : oba bmlkot mlk hngb oSb al admto : obno itgro oaspo hmon Hilim rbim oba boa oSTp oebr oiSb oitgro ed mech : oitmrmr mlk hngb oiza onlHm emo em mlk hzpon ohemid hmon rb ontn hhmon bido : onSa hhmon irom lbbo ohpil rbaot ola ieoc : oSb mlk hzpon ohemid hmon rb mn hraSon olqz hetim Snim iboa boa bHil gdol obrkoS rb : obetim hhm rbim iemdo el mlk hngb obni prizi emk inSao lhemid Hcon onkSlo : oiba mlk hzpon oiSpk sollh olkd eir mbzrot ocreot hngb la iemdo oem mbHrio oain kH lemd : oieS hba alio krzono oain eomd lpnio oiemd barz hzbi oklh bido : oiSm pnio lboa btqp kl mlkoto oiSrim emo oeSh obt hnSim itn lo lhSHith ola temd ola lo thih : oiSb pnio laiim olkd rbim ohSbit qzin Hrpto lo blti Hrpto iSib lo : oiSb pnio lmeoci arzo onkSl onpl ola imza : oemd el kno mebir nogS hdr mlkot obimim aHdim iSbr ola bapim ola bmlHmh : oemd el kno nbch ola ntno elio hod mlkot oba bSloh ohHciq mlkot bHlqlqot : ocreot hSTp iSTpo mlpnio oiSbro ogm ngid brit : omn htHbrot alio ieSh mrmh oelh oezm bmeT goi : bSloh obmSmni mdinh iboa oeSh aSr la eSo abtio oabot abtio bch oSll orkoS lhm ibcor oel mbzrim iHSb mHSbtio oed et : oier kHo olbbo el mlk hngb bHil gdol omlk hngb itgrh lmlHmh bHil gdol oezom ed mad ola iemd ki iHSbo elio mHSbot : oakli pt bgo iSbroho oHilo iSTop onplo Hllim rbim : oSnihm hmlkim lbbm lmre oel SlHn aHd kcb idbro ola tzlH ki eod qz lmoed : oiSb arzo brkoS gdol olbbo el brit qdS oeSh oSb larzo : lmoed iSob oba bngb ola thih kraSnh okaHrnh : obao bo ziim ktim onkah oSb ocem el brit qodS oeSh oSb oibn el ecbi brit qdS : ocreim mmno iemdo oHllo hmqdS hmeoc ohsiro htmid ontno hSqoz mSomm : omrSiei brit iHnip bHlqot oem idei alhio iHcqo oeSo : omSkili em ibino lrbim onkSlo bHrb oblhbh bSbi obbch imim : obhkSlm iecro ecr meT onloo elihm rbim bHlqlqot : omn hmSkilim ikSlo lzrop bhm olbrr ollbn ed et qz ki eod lmoed : oeSh krzono hmlk oitromm oitgdl el kl al oel al alim idbr nplaot ohzliH ed klh cem ki nHrzh neSth : oel alhi abtio la ibin oel Hmdt nSim oel kl aloh la ibin ki el kl itgdl : olalh mecim el kno ikbd olaloh aSr la ideho abtio ikbd bchb obksp obabn iqrh obHmdot : oeSh lmbzri mecim em aloh nkr aSr hkir irbh kbod ohmSilm brbim oadmh iHlq bmHir : obet qz itngH emo mlk hngb oiSter elio mlk hzpon brkb obprSim obaniot rbot oba barzot oSTp oebr : oba barz hzbi orbot ikSlo oalh imlTo mido adom omoab oraSit bni emon : oiSlH ido barzot oarz mzrim la thih lpliTh : omSl bmkmni hchb ohksp obkl Hmdot mzrim olbim okSim bmzedio : oSmeot ibhlho mmcrH omzpon oiza bHma gdlh lhSmid olhHrim rbim : oiTe ahli apdno bin imim lhr zbi qdS oba ed qzo oain eocr lo :

12

obet hhia iemd mikal hSr hgdol hemd el bni emk ohith et zrh aSr la nhith mhiot goi ed het hhia obet hhia imlT emk kl hnmza ktob bspr : orbim miSni admt epr iqizo alh lHii eolm oalh lHrpot ldraon eolm : ohmSklim ichro kchr hrqie omzdiqi hrbim kkokbim leolm oed : oath dnial stm hdbrim oHtm hspr ed et qz iSTTo rbim otrbh hdet : oraiti ani dnial ohnh Snim aHrim emdim aHd hnh lSpt hiar oaHd hnh lSpt hiar : oiamr laiS lboS hbdim aSr mmel lmimi hiar ed mti qz hplaot : oaSme at haiS lboS hbdim aSr mmel lmimi hiar oirm imino oSmalo al hSmim oiSbe bHi heolm ki lmoed moedim oHzi okklot npz id em qdS tklinh kl alh : oani Smeti ola abin oamrh adni mh aHrit alh : oiamr lk dnial ki stmim oHtmim hdbrim ed et qz : itbrro oitlbno oizrpo rbim ohrSieo rSeim ola ibino kl rSeim ohmSklim ibino : omet hosr htmid oltt Sqoz Smm imim alp matim otSeim : aSri hmHkh oigie limim alp SlS maot SlSim oHmSh : oath lk lqz otnoH otemd lgrlk lqz himin :

ecra

1

obSnt aHt lkorS mlk prs lklot dbr ihoh mpi irmih heir ihoh at roH krS mlk prs oiebr qol bkl mlkoto ogm bmktb lamr : kh amr krS mlk prs kl mmlkot harz ntn li ihoh alhi hSmim ohoa pqd eli lbnot lo bit biroSlm aSr bihodh : mi bkm mkl emo ihi alhio emo oiel liroSlm aSr bihodh oibn at bit ihoh alhi iSral hoa halhim aSr biroSlm : okl hnSar mkl hmqmot aSr hoa gr Sm inSaoho anSi mqmo bksp obchb obrkoS obbhmh em hndbh lbit halhim aSr biroSlm : oiqomo raSi habot lihodh obnimn ohkhnim ohloim lkl heir halhim at roHo lelot lbnot at bit ihoh aSr biroSlm : okl sbibtihm Hcqo bidihm bkli ksp bchb brkoS obbhmh obmgdnot lbd el kl htndb : ohmlk korS hozia at kli bit ihoh aSr hozia nbokdnzr miroSlm oitnm bbit alhio : oioziam korS mlk prs el id mtrdt hgcbr oisprm lSSbzr hnSia lihodh : oalh msprm agrTli chb SlSim agrTli ksp alp mHlpim tSeh oeSrim : kpori chb SlSim kpori ksp mSnim arbe maot oeSrh klim aHrim alp : kl klim lchb olksp HmSt alpim oarbe maot hkl helh SSbzr em helot hgolh mbbl liroSlm :

2

oalh bni hmdinh helim mSbi hgolh aSr hglh nbokdnzor mlk bbl lbbl oiSobo liroSlm oihodh aiS leiro : aSr bao em crbbl iSoe nHmih Srih relih mrdki blSn mspr bgoi rHom benh mspr anSi em iSral : bni preS alpim mah Sbeim oSnim : bni SpTih SlS maot Sbeim oSnim : bni arH Sbe maot HmSh oSbeim : bni pHt moab lbni iSoe ioab alpim Smnh maot oSnim eSr : bni eilm alp matim HmSim oarbeh : bni ctoa tSe maot oarbeim oHmSh : bni cki Sbe maot oSSim : bni bni SS maot arbeim oSnim : bni bbi SS maot eSrim oSlSh : bni ecgd alp matim eSrim oSnim : bni adniqm SS maot SSim oSSh : bni bgoi alpim HmSim oSSh : bni edin arbe maot HmSim oarbeh : bni aTr liHcqih tSeim oSmnh : bni bzi SlS maot eSrim oSlSh : bni iorh mah oSnim eSr : bni HSm matim eSrim oSlSh : bni gbr tSeim oHmSh : bni bit lHm mah eSrim oSlSh : anSi nTph HmSim oSSh : anSi entot mah eSrim oSmnh : bni ecmot arbeim oSnim : bni qrit erim kpirh obarot Sbe maot oarbeim oSlSh : bni hrmh ogbe SS maot eSrim oaHd : anSi mkms mah eSrim oSnim : anSi bit al ohei matim eSrim oSlSh : bni nbo HmSim oSnim : bni mgbiS mah HmSim oSSh : bni eilm aHr alp matim HmSim oarbeh : bni Hrm SlS maot oeSrim : bni ld Hdid oaono Sbe maot eSrim oHmSh : bni irHo SlS maot arbeim oHmSh : bni snah SlSt alpim oSS maot oSlSim : hkhnim bni ideih lbit iSoe tSe maot Sbeim oSlSh : bni amr alp HmSim oSnim : bni pSHor alp matim arbeim oSbeh : bni Hrm alp oSbeh eSr : hloim bni iSoe oqdmial lbni hodoih Sbeim oarbeh : hmSrrim bni asp mah eSrim oSmnh : bni hSerim bni Slom bni aTr bni Tlmon bni eqob bni HTiTa bni Sbi hkl mah SlSim otSeh : hntinim bni ziHa bni HSopa bni Tbeot : bni qrs bni sieha bni pdon : bni lbnh bni Hgbh bni eqob : bni Hgb bni Smli bni Hnn : bni gdl bni gHr bni raih : bni rzin bni nqoda bni gcm : bni eca bni psH bni bsi : bni asnh bni meonim bni npisim : bni bqboq bni Hqopa bni HrHor : bni bzlot bni mHida bni HrSa : bni brqos bni sisra bni tmH : bni nziH bni HTipa : bni ebdi Slmh bni sTi bni hsprt bni proda : bni ielh bni drqon bni gdl : bni SpTih bni HTil bni pkrt hzbiim bni ami : kl hntinim obni ebdi Slmh SlS maot tSeim oSnim : oalh helim mtl mlH tl HrSa krob adn amr ola iklo lhgid bit abotm ocrem am miSral hm : bni dlih bni Tobih bni nqoda SS maot HmSim oSnim : ombni hkhnim bni Hbih bni hqoz bni brcli aSr lqH mbnot brcli hgledi aSh oiqra el Smm : alh bqSo ktbm hmtiHSim ola nmzao oigalo mn hkhnh : oiamr htrSta lhm aSr la iaklo mqdS hqdSim ed emd khn laorim oltmim : kl hqhl kaHd arbe rboa alpim SlS maot SSim : mlbd ebdihm oamhtihm alh Sbet alpim SlS maot SlSim oSbeh olhm mSrrim omSrrot matim : sosihm Sbe maot SlSim oSSh prdihm matim arbeim oHmSh : gmlihm arbe maot SlSim oHmSh Hmrim SSt alpim Sbe maot oeSrim : omraSi habot bboam lbit ihoh aSr biroSlm htndbo lbit halhim lhemido el mkono : kkHm ntno laozr hmlakh chb drkmonim SS rbaot oalp oksp mnim HmSt alpim oktnt khnim mah : oiSbo hkhnim ohloim omn hem ohmSrrim ohSoerim ohntinim berihm okl iSral berihm :

3

oige hHdS hSbiei obni iSral berim oiaspo hem kaiS aHd al iroSlm : oiqm iSoe bn iozdq oaHio hkhnim ocrbbl bn Saltial oaHio oibno at mcbH alhi iSral lhelot elio elot kktob btort mSh aiS halhim : oikino hmcbH el mkontio ki baimh elihm memi harzot oiel elio elot lihoh elot lbqr olerb : oieSo at Hg hskot kktob oelt iom biom bmspr kmSpT dbr iom biomo : oaHrikn elt tmid olHdSim olkl moedi ihoh hmqdSim olkl mtndb ndbh lihoh : miom aHd lHdS hSbiei hHlo lhelot elot lihoh ohikl ihoh la isd : oitno ksp lHzbim olHrSim omakl omSth oSmn lzdnim olzrim lhbia ezi arcim mn hlbnon al im ipoa krSion korS mlk prs elihm : obSnh hSnit lboam al bit halhim liroSlm bHdS hSni hHlo crbbl bn Saltial oiSoe bn iozdq oSar aHihm hkhnim ohloim okl hbaim mhSbi iroSlm oiemido at hloim mbn eSrim Snh omelh lnzH el mlakt bit ihoh : oiemd iSoe bnio oaHio qdmial obnio bni ihodh kaHd lnzH el eSh hmlakh bbit halhim bni Hndd bnihm oaHihm hloim : oisdo hbnim at hikl ihoh oiemido hkhnim mlbSim bHzzrot ohloim bni asp bmzltim lhll at ihoh el idi doid mlk iSral : oieno bhll obhodt lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo el iSral okl hem hrieo troeh gdolh bhll lihoh el hosd bit ihoh : orbim mhkhnim ohloim oraSi habot hcqnim aSr rao at hbit hraSon bisdo ch hbit beinihm bkim bqol gdol orbim btroeh bSmHh lhrim qol : oain hem mkirim qol troet hSmHh lqol bki hem ki hem mrieim troeh gdolh ohqol nSme ed lmrHoq :

4

oiSmeo zri ihodh obnimn ki bni hgolh bonim hikl lihoh alhi iSral : oigSo al crbbl oal raSi habot oiamro lhm nbnh emkm ki kkm ndroS lalhikm ola anHno cbHim mimi asr Hdn mlk aSor hmelh atno ph : oiamr lhm crbbl oiSoe oSar raSi habot liSral la lkm olno lbnot bit lalhino ki anHno iHd nbnh lihoh alhi iSral kaSr zono hmlk korS mlk prs : oihi em harz mrpim idi em ihodh omblhim aotm lbnot : oskrim elihm ioezim lhpr eztm kl imi korS mlk prs oed mlkot drioS mlk prs : obmlkot aHSoroS btHlt mlkoto ktbo STnh el iSbi ihodh oiroSlm : obimi artHSSta ktb bSlm mtrdt Tbal oSar knoto el artHSSta mlk prs oktb hnSton ktob armit omtrgm armit : rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra ktbo agrh Hdh el iroSlm lartHSSta mlka knma : adin rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra oSar knothon dinia oaprstkia Trplia aprsia arkoi bblia SoSnkia dhoa elmia : oSar amia di hgli asnpr rba oiqira ohotb hmo bqrih di Smrin oSar ebr nhrh okent : dnh prSgn agrta di SlHo elohi el artHSSta mlka ebdik anS ebr nhrh okent : idie lhoa lmlka di ihodia di slqo mn lotk elina ato liroSlm qrita mrdta obaiSta bnin oSori aSkllo oaSia iHiTo : ken idie lhoa lmlka di hn qrita dk ttbna oSorih iStkllon mndh blo ohlk la intnon oaptm mlkim thncq : ken kl qbl di mlH hikla mlHna oerot mlka la arik lna lmHca el dnh SlHna ohodena lmlka : di ibqr bspr dkrnia di abhtk othSkH bspr dkrnia otnde di qrita dk qria mrda omhncqt mlkin omdnn oaStdor ebdin bgoh mn iomt elma el dnh qrita dk hHrbt : mhodein anHnh lmlka di hn qrita dk ttbna oSorih iStkllon lqbl dnh Hlq bebr nhra la aiti lk : ptgma SlH mlka el rHom bel Tem oSmSi spra oSar knothon di itbin bSmrin oSar ebr nhrh Slm oket : nStona di SlHton elina mprS qri qdmi : omni Sim Tem obqro ohSkHo di qrita dk mn iomt elma el mlkin mtnSah omrd oaStdor mtebd bh : omlkin tqipin hoo el iroSlm oSliTin bkl ebr nhrh omdh blo ohlk mtihb lhon : ken Simo Tem lbTla gbria alk oqrita dk la ttbna ed mni Tema itSm : ochirin hoo Slo lmebd el dnh lmh iSga Hbla lhncqt mlkin : adin mn di prSgn nStona di artHSSta mlka qri qdm rHom oSmSi spra oknothon aclo bbhilo liroSlm el ihodia obTlo hmo badre oHil : badin bTlt ebidt bit alha di biroSlm ohot bTla ed Snt trtin lmlkot drioS mlk prs :

5

ohtnbi Hgi nbiah ockrih br edoa nbiaia el ihodia di bihod obiroSlm bSm alh iSral elihon : badin qmo crbbl br Saltial oiSoe br iozdq oSrio lmbna bit alha di biroSlm oemhon nbiaia di alha msedin lhon : bh cmna ata elihon ttni pHt ebr nhrh oStr bocni oknothon okn amrin lhm mn Sm lkm Tem bita dnh lbna oaSrna dnh lSkllh : adin knma amrna lhm mn anon Smht gbria di dnh bnina bnin : oein alhhm hot el Sbi ihodia ola bTlo hmo ed Tema ldrioS ihk oadin itibon nStona el dnh : prSgn agrta di SlH ttni pHt ebr nhrh oStr bocni oknoth aprskia di bebr nhrh el drioS mlka : ptgma SlHo elohi okdnh ktib bgoh ldrioS mlka Slma kla : idie lhoa lmlka di aclna lihod mdinta lbit alha rba ohoa mtbna abn gll oae mtSm bktlia oebidta dk asprna mtebda omzlH bidhm : adin Salna lSbia alk knma amrna lhm mn Sm lkm Tem bita dnh lmbnih oaSrna dnh lSkllh : oap Smhthm Salna lhm lhodeotk di nktb Sm gbria di braSihm : oknma ptgma htibona lmmr anHna hmo ebdohi di alh Smia oarea obnin bita di hoa bnh mqdmt dnh Snin Sgian omlk liSral rb bnhi oSkllh : lhn mn di hrgco abhtna lalh Smia ihb hmo bid nbokdnzr mlk bbl ksdia obith dnh strh oemh hgli lbbl : brm bSnt Hdh lkorS mlka di bbl korS mlka Sm Tem bit alha dnh lbna : oap mania di bit alha di dhbh okspa di nbokdnzr hnpq mn hikla di biroSlm ohibl hmo lhikla di bbl hnpq hmo korS mlka mn hikla di bbl oihibo lSSbzr Smh di pHh Smh : oamr lh alh mania Sa acl aHt hmo bhikla di biroSlm obit alha itbna el atrh : adin SSbzr dk ata ihb aSia di bit alha di biroSlm omn adin oed ken mtbna ola Slm : oken hn el mlka Tb itbqr bbit gncia di mlka tmh di bbbl hn aiti di mn korS mlka Sim Tem lmbna bit alha dk biroSlm oreot mlka el dnh iSlH elina :

6

badin drioS mlka Sm Tem obqro bbit spria di gncia mhHtin tmh bbbl : ohStkH baHmta bbirta di bmdi mdinth mglh Hdh okn ktib bgoh dkronh : bSnt Hdh lkorS mlka korS mlka Sm Tem bit alha biroSlm bita itbna atr di dbHin dbHin oaSohi msoblin romh amin Stin ptih amin Stin : ndbkin di abn gll tlta ondbk di ae Hdt onpqta mn bit mlka ttihb : oap mani bit alha di dhbh okspa di nbokdnzr hnpq mn hikla di biroSlm ohibl lbbl ihtibon oihk lhikla di biroSlm latrh otHt bbit alha : ken ttni pHt ebr nhrh Str bocni oknothon aprskia di bebr nhrh rHiqin hoo mn tmh : Sbqo lebidt bit alha dk pHt ihodia olSbi ihodia bit alha dk ibnon el atrh : omni Sim Tem lma di tebdon em Sbi ihodia alk lmbna bit alha dk omnksi mlka di mdt ebr nhrh asprna npqta thoa mtihba lgbria alk di la lbTla : omh HSHn obni torin odkrin oamrin lelon lalh Smia HnTin mlH Hmr omSH kmamr khnia di biroSlm lhoa mtihb lhm iom biom di la Slo : di lhon mhqrbin niHoHin lalh Smia omzlin lHii mlka obnohi : omni Sim Tem di kl anS di ihSna ptgma dnh itnsH ae mn bith ocqip itmHa elhi obith nolo itebd el dnh : oalha di Skn Smh tmh imgr kl mlk oem di iSlH idh lhSnih lHblh bit alha dk di biroSlm anh drioS Smt Tem asprna itebd : adin ttni pHt ebr nhrh Str bocni oknothon lqbl di SlH drioS mlka knma asprna ebdo : oSbi ihodia bnin omzlHin bnboat Hgi nbiah ockrih br edoa obno oSkllo mn Tem alh iSral omTem korS odrioS oartHSSta mlk prs : oSizia bith dnh ed iom tlth lirH adr di hia Snt St lmlkot drioS mlka : oebdo bni iSral khnia oloia oSar bni glota Hnkt bit alha dnh bHdoh : ohqrbo lHnkt bit alha dnh torin mah dkrin matin amrin arbe mah ozpiri ecin lHTia el kl iSral tri eSr lmnin SbTi iSral : ohqimo khnia bplgthon oloia bmHlqthon el ebidt alha di biroSlm kktb spr mSh : oieSo bni hgolh at hpsH barbeh eSr lHdS hraSon : ki hThro hkhnim ohloim kaHd klm Thorim oiSHTo hpsH lkl bni hgolh olaHihm hkhnim olhm : oiaklo bni iSral hSbim mhgolh okl hnbdl mTmat goi harz alhm ldrS lihoh alhi iSral : oieSo Hg mzot Sbet imim bSmHh ki SmHm ihoh ohsb lb mlk aSor elihm lHcq idihm bmlakt bit halhim alhi iSral :

7

oaHr hdbrim halh bmlkot artHSsta mlk prs ecra bn Srih bn ecrih bn Hlqih : bn Slom bn zdoq bn aHiTob : bn amrih bn ecrih bn mriot : bn crHih bn eci bn bqi : bn abiSoe bn pinHs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn hraS : hoa ecra elh mbbl ohoa spr mhir btort mSh aSr ntn ihoh alhi iSral oitn lo hmlk kid ihoh alhio elio kl bqSto : oielo mbni iSral omn hkhnim ohloim ohmSrrim ohSerim ohntinim al iroSlm bSnt Sbe lartHSsta hmlk : oiba iroSlm bHdS hHmiSi hia Snt hSbieit lmlk : ki baHd lHdS hraSon hoa isd hmelh mbbl obaHd lHdS hHmiSi ba al iroSlm kid alhio hTobh elio : ki ecra hkin lbbo ldroS at tort ihoh oleSt ollmd biSral Hq omSpT : och prSgn hnSton aSr ntn hmlk artHSsta lecra hkhn hspr spr dbri mzot ihoh oHqio el iSral : artHSsta mlk mlkia lecra khna spr dta di alh Smia gmir okent : mni Sim Tem di kl mtndb bmlkoti mn emh iSral okhnohi oloia lmhk liroSlm emk ihk : kl qbl di mn qdm mlka oSbet ieThi SliH lbqra el ihod oliroSlm bdt alhk di bidk : olhiblh ksp odhb di mlka oieTohi htndbo lalh iSral di biroSlm mSknh : okl ksp odhb di thSkH bkl mdint bbl em htndbot ema okhnia mtndbin lbit alhhm di biroSlm : kl qbl dnh asprna tqna bkspa dnh torin dkrin amrin omnHthon onskihon otqrb hmo el mdbHh di bit alhkm di biroSlm : omh di elik oel aHik iiTb bSar kspa odhbh lmebd kreot alhkm tebdon : omania di mtihbin lk lplHn bit alhk hSlm qdm alh iroSlm : oSar HSHot bit alhk di ipl lk lmntn tntn mn bit gnci mlka : omni anh artHSsta mlka Sim Tem lkl gcbria di bebr nhrh di kl di iSalnkon ecra khnh spr dta di alh Smia asprna itebd : ed ksp kkrin mah oed HnTin krin mah oed Hmr btin mah oed btin mSH mah omlH di la ktb : kl di mn Tem alh Smia itebd adrcda lbit alh Smia di lmh lhoa qzp el mlkot mlka obnohi : olkm mhodein di kl khnia oloia cmria treia ntinia oplHi bit alha dnh mndh blo ohlk la SliT lmrma elihm : oant ecra kHkmt alhk di bidk mni SpTin odinin di lhon danin lkl emh di bebr nhrh lkl idei dti alhk odi la ide thodeon : okl di la lhoa ebd dta di alhk odta di mlka asprna dinh lhoa mtebd mnh hn lmot hn lSrSo hn lenS nksin olasorin : brok ihoh alhi abotino aSr ntn kcat blb hmlk lpar at bit ihoh aSr biroSlm : oeli hTh Hsd lpni hmlk oioezio olkl Sri hmlk hgbrim oani htHcqti kid ihoh alhi eli oaqbzh miSral raSim lelot emi :

8

oalh raSi abtihm ohtiHSm helim emi bmlkot artHSsta hmlk mbbl : mbni pinHs grSm mbni aitmr dnial mbni doid HToS : mbni Sknih mbni preS ckrih oemo htiHS lckrim mah oHmSim : mbni pHt moab alihoeini bn crHih oemo matim hckrim : mbni Sknih bn iHcial oemo SlS maot hckrim : ombni edin ebd bn iontn oemo HmSim hckrim : ombni eilm iSeih bn etlih oemo Sbeim hckrim : ombni SpTih cbdih bn mikal oemo Smnim hckrim : mbni ioab ebdih bn iHial oemo matim oSmnh eSr hckrim : ombni Slomit bn iospih oemo mah oSSim hckrim : ombni bbi ckrih bn bbi oemo eSrim oSmnh hckrim : ombni ecgd ioHnn bn hqTn oemo mah oeSrh hckrim : ombni adniqm aHrnim oalh Smotm aliplT ieial oSmeih oemhm SSim hckrim : ombni bgoi eoti ocbod oemo Sbeim hckrim : oaqbzm al hnhr hba al ahoa onHnh Sm imim SlSh oabinh bem obkhnim ombni loi la mzati Sm : oaSlHh laliecr larial lSmeih olalntn olirib olalntn olntn olckrih olmSlm raSim olioirib olalntn mbinim : oaozah aotm el ado hraS bkspia hmqom oaSimh bpihm dbrim ldbr al ado aHio hntonim bkspia hmqom lhbia lno mSrtim lbit alhino : oibiao lno kid alhino hTobh elino aiS Skl mbni mHli bn loi bn iSral oSrbih obnio oaHio Smnh eSr : oat HSbih oato iSeih mbni mrri aHio obnihm eSrim : omn hntinim Sntn doid ohSrim lebdt hloim ntinim matim oeSrim klm nqbo bSmot : oaqra Sm zom el hnhr ahoa lhtenot lpni alhino lbqS mmno drk iSrh lno olTpno olkl rkoSno : ki bSti lSaol mn hmlk Hil oprSim lecrno maoib bdrk ki amrno lmlk lamr id alhino el kl mbqSio lTobh oeco oapo el kl ecbio : onzomh onbqSh malhino el cat oietr lno : oabdilh mSri hkhnim Snim eSr lSrbih HSbih oemhm maHihm eSrh : oaSqolh lhm at hksp oat hchb oat hklim tromt bit alhino hhrimo hmlk oiezio oSrio okl iSral hnmzaim : oaSqlh el idm ksp kkrim SS maot oHmSim okli ksp mah lkkrim chb mah kkr : okpri chb eSrim ladrknim alp okli nHSt mzhb Tobh Snim Hmodt kchb : oamrh alhm atm qdS lihoh ohklim qdS ohksp ohchb ndbh lihoh alhi abtikm : Sqdo oSmro ed tSqlo lpni Sri hkhnim ohloim oSri habot liSral biroSlm hlSkot bit ihoh : oqblo hkhnim ohloim mSql hksp ohchb ohklim lhbia liroSlm lbit alhino : onseh mnhr ahoa bSnim eSr lHdS hraSon llkt iroSlm oid alhino hith elino oizilno mkp aoib oaorb el hdrk : onboa iroSlm onSb Sm imim SlSh : obiom hrbiei nSql hksp ohchb ohklim bbit alhino el id mrmot bn aorih hkhn oemo alecr bn pinHs oemhm iocbd bn iSoe onoedih bn bnoi hloim : bmspr bmSql lkl oiktb kl hmSql bet hhia : hbaim mhSbi bni hgolh hqribo elot lalhi iSral prim Snim eSr el kl iSral ailim tSeim oSSh kbSim Sbeim oSbeh zpiri HTat Snim eSr hkl eolh lihoh : oitno at dti hmlk laHSdrpni hmlk opHoot ebr hnhr onSao at hem oat bit halhim :

9

okklot alh ngSo ali hSrim lamr la nbdlo hem iSral ohkhnim ohloim memi harzot ktoebtihm lkneni hHti hprci hibosi hemni hmabi hmzri ohamri : ki nSao mbntihm lhm olbnihm ohterbo cre hqdS bemi harzot oid hSrim ohsgnim hith bmel hch raSonh : okSmei at hdbr hch qreti at bgdi omeili oamrTh mSer raSi ocqni oaSbh mSomm : oali iaspo kl Hrd bdbri alhi iSral el mel hgolh oani iSb mSomm ed lmnHt herb : obmnHt herb qmti mteniti obqrei bgdi omeili oakreh el brki oaprSh kpi al ihoh alhi : oamrh alhi bSti onklmti lhrim alhi pni alik ki eontino rbo lmelh raS oaSmtno gdlh ed lSmim : mimi abtino anHno baSmh gdlh ed hiom hch obeontino ntno anHno mlkino khnino bid mlki harzot bHrb bSbi obbch obbSt pnim khiom hch : oeth kmeT rge hith tHnh mat ihoh alhino lhSair lno pliTh oltt lno itd bmqom qdSo lhair einino alhino olttno mHih meT bebdtno : ki ebdim anHno obebdtno la ecbno alhino oiT elino Hsd lpni mlki prs ltt lno mHih lromm at bit alhino olhemid at Hrbtio oltt lno gdr bihodh obiroSlm : oeth mh namr alhino aHri cat ki ecbno mzotik : aSr zoit bid ebdik hnbiaim lamr harz aSr atm baim lrSth arz ndh hia bndt emi harzot btoebtihm aSr mlaoh mph al ph bTmatm : oeth bnotikm al ttno lbnihm obntihm al tSao lbnikm ola tdrSo Slmm oTobtm ed eolm lmen tHcqo oakltm at Tob harz ohorStm lbnikm ed eolm : oaHri kl hba elino bmeSino hreim obaSmtno hgdlh ki ath alhino HSkt lmTh meonno ontth lno pliTh kcat : hnSob lhpr mzotik olhtHtn bemi htebot halh hloa tanp bno ed klh lain Sarit opliTh : ihoh alhi iSral zdiq ath ki nSarno pliTh khiom hch hnno lpnik baSmtino ki ain lemod lpnik el cat :

10

okhtpll ecra okhtodto bkh omtnpl lpni bit halhim nqbzo alio miSral qhl rb mad anSim onSim oildim ki bko hem hrbh bkh : oien Sknih bn iHial mbni eolm oiamr lecra anHno melno balhino onSb nSim nkriot memi harz oeth iS mqoh liSral el cat : oeth nkrt brit lalhino lhozia kl nSim ohnold mhm bezt adni ohHrdim bmzot alhino oktorh ieSh : qom ki elik hdbr oanHno emk Hcq oeSh : oiqm ecra oiSbe at Sri hkhnim hloim okl iSral leSot kdbr hch oiSbeo : oiqm ecra mlpni bit halhim oilk al lSkt ihoHnn bn aliSib oilk Sm lHm la akl omim la Sth ki mtabl el mel hgolh : oiebiro qol bihodh oiroSlm lkl bni hgolh lhqbz iroSlm : okl aSr la iboa lSlSt himim kezt hSrim ohcqnim iHrm kl rkoSo ohoa ibdl mqhl hgolh : oiqbzo kl anSi ihodh obnimn iroSlm lSlSt himim hoa HdS htSiei beSrim bHdS oiSbo kl hem brHob bit halhim mreidim el hdbr omhgSmim : oiqm ecra hkhn oiamr alhm atm meltm otSibo nSim nkriot lhosip el aSmt iSral : oeth tno todh lihoh alhi abtikm oeSo rzono ohbdlo memi harz omn hnSim hnkriot : oieno kl hqhl oiamro qol gdol kn kdbrik elino leSot : abl hem rb ohet gSmim oain kH lemod bHoz ohmlakh la liom aHd ola lSnim ki hrbino lpSe bdbr hch : iemdo na Srino lkl hqhl okl aSr berino hhSib nSim nkriot iba letim mcmnim oemhm cqni eir oeir oSpTih ed lhSib Hron ap alhino mmno ed ldbr hch : ak iontn bn eShal oiHcih bn tqoh emdo el cat omSlm oSbti hloi ecrm : oieSo kn bni hgolh oibdlo ecra hkhn anSim raSi habot lbit abtm oklm bSmot oiSbo biom aHd lHdS heSiri ldrioS hdbr : oiklo bkl anSim hhSibo nSim nkriot ed iom aHd lHdS hraSon : oimza mbni hkhnim aSr hSibo nSim nkriot mbni iSoe bn iozdq oaHio meSih oaliecr oirib ogdlih : oitno idm lhozia nSihm oaSmim ail zan el aSmtm : ombni amr Hnni ocbdih : ombni Hrm meSih oalih oSmeih oiHial oecih : ombni pSHor alioeini meSih iSmeal ntnal iocbd oaleSh : omn hloim iocbd oSmei oqlih hoa qliTa ptHih ihodh oaliecr : omn hmSrrim aliSib omn hSerim Slm oTlm oaori : omiSral mbni preS rmih oicih omlkih omimn oalecr omlkih obnih : ombni eilm mtnih ckrih oiHial oebdi oirmot oalih : ombni ctoa alioeni aliSib mtnih oirmot ocbd oecica : ombni bbi ihoHnn Hnnih cbi etli : ombni bni mSlm mlok oedih iSob oSal irmot : ombni pHt moab edna okll bnih meSih mtnih bzlal obnoi omnSh : obni Hrm aliecr iSih mlkih Smeih Smeon : bnimn mlok Smrih : mbni HSm mtni mtth cbd aliplT irmi mnSh Smei : mbni bni medi emrm oaoal : bnih bdih klohi : onih mrmot aliSib : mtnih mtni oieSo : obni obnoi Smei : oSlmih ontn oedih : mkndbi SSi Sri : ecral oSlmiho Smrih : Slom amrih iosp : mbni nbo ieial mttih cbd cbina ido oioal bnih : kl alh nSai nSim nkriot oiS mhm nSim oiSimo bnim :

nHmih

1

dbri nHmih bn Hklih oihi bHdS kslo Snt eSrim oani hiiti bSoSn hbirh : oiba Hnni aHd maHi hoa oanSim mihodh oaSalm el hihodim hpliTh aSr nSaro mn hSbi oel iroSlm : oiamro li hnSarim aSr nSaro mn hSbi Sm bmdinh breh gdlh obHrph oHomt iroSlm mprzt oSerih nzto baS : oihi kSmei at hdbrim halh iSbti oabkh oatablh imim oahi zm omtpll lpni alhi hSmim : oamr ana ihoh alhi hSmim hal hgdol ohnora Smr hbrit oHsd lahbio olSmri mzotio : thi na acnk qSbt oeinik ptoHot lSme al tplt ebdk aSr anki mtpll lpnik hiom iomm olilh el bni iSral ebdik omtodh el HTaot bni iSral aSr HTano lk oani obit abi HTano : Hbl Hblno lk ola Smrno at hmzot oat hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr zoit at mSh ebdk : ckr na at hdbr aSr zoit at mSh ebdk lamr atm tmelo ani apiz atkm bemim : oSbtm ali oSmrtm mzoti oeSitm atm am ihih ndHkm bqzh hSmim mSm aqbzm ohboatim al hmqom aSr bHrti lSkn at Smi Sm : ohm ebdik oemk aSr pdit bkHk hgdol obidk hHcqh : ana adni thi na acnk qSbt al tplt ebdk oal tplt ebdik hHpzim lirah at Smk ohzliHh na lebdk hiom otnho lrHmim lpni haiS hch oani hiiti mSqh lmlk :

2

oihi bHdS nisn Snt eSrim lartHSsta hmlk iin lpnio oaSa at hiin oatnh lmlk ola hiiti re lpnio : oiamr li hmlk mdoe pnik reim oath aink Holh ain ch ki am re lb oaira hrbh mad : oamr lmlk hmlk leolm iHih mdoe la ireo pni aSr heir bit qbrot abti Hrbh oSerih aklo baS : oiamr li hmlk el mh ch ath mbqS oatpll al alhi hSmim : oamr lmlk am el hmlk Tob oam iiTb ebdk lpnik aSr tSlHni al ihodh al eir qbrot abti oabnnh : oiamr li hmlk ohSgl ioSbt azlo ed mti ihih mhlkk omti tSob oiiTb lpni hmlk oiSlHni oatnh lo cmn : oaomr lmlk am el hmlk Tob agrot itno li el pHoot ebr hnhr aSr iebironi ed aSr aboa al ihodh : oagrt al asp Smr hprds aSr lmlk aSr itn li ezim lqrot at Seri hbirh aSr lbit olHomt heir olbit aSr aboa alio oitn li hmlk kid alhi hTobh eli : oaboa al pHoot ebr hnhr oatnh lhm at agrot hmlk oiSlH emi hmlk Sri Hil oprSim : oiSme snblT hHrni oTobih hebd hemni oire lhm reh gdlh aSr ba adm lbqS Tobh lbni iSral : oaboa al iroSlm oahi Sm imim SlSh : oaqom lilh ani oanSim meT emi ola hgdti ladm mh alhi ntn al lbi leSot liroSlm obhmh ain emi ki am hbhmh aSr ani rkb bh : oazah bSer hgia lilh oal pni ein htnin oal Ser haSpt oahi Sbr bHomt iroSlm aSr hm prozim oSerih aklo baS : oaebr al Ser hein oal brkt hmlk oain mqom lbhmh lebr tHti : oahi elh bnHl lilh oahi Sbr bHomh oaSob oaboa bSer hgia oaSob : ohsgnim la ideo anh hlkti omh ani eSh olihodim olkhnim olHrim olsgnim olitr eSh hmlakh ed kn la hgdti : oaomr alhm atm raim hreh aSr anHno bh aSr iroSlm Hrbh oSerih nzto baS lko onbnh at Homt iroSlm ola nhih eod Hrph : oagid lhm at id alhi aSr hia Tobh eli oap dbri hmlk aSr amr li oiamro nqom obnino oiHcqo idihm lTobh : oiSme snblT hHrni oTbih hebd hemoni ogSm herbi oilego lno oibco elino oiamro mh hdbr hch aSr atm eSim hel hmlk atm mrdim : oaSib aotm dbr oaomr lhm alhi hSmim hoa izliH lno oanHno ebdio nqom obnino olkm ain Hlq ozdqh ockron biroSlm :

3

oiqm aliSib hkhn hgdol oaHio hkhnim oibno at Ser hzan hmh qdSoho oiemido dlttio oed mgdl hmah qdSoho ed mgdl Hnnal : oel ido bno anSi irHo oel ido bnh ckor bn amri : oat Ser hdgim bno bni hsnah hmh qroho oiemido dlttio mneolio obriHio : oel idm hHciq mrmot bn aorih bn hqoz oel idm hHciq mSlm bn brkih bn mSicbal oel idm hHciq zdoq bn bena : oel idm hHciqo htqoeim oadirihm la hbiao zorm bebdt adnihm : oat Ser hiSnh hHciqo ioide bn psH omSlm bn bsodih hmh qroho oiemido dlttio omnelio obriHio : oel idm hHciq mlTih hgbeni oidon hmrnti anSi gbeon ohmzph lksa pHt ebr hnhr : el ido hHciq ecial bn Hrhih zorpim oel ido hHciq Hnnih bn hrqHim oiecbo iroSlm ed hHomh hrHbh : oel idm hHciq rpih bn Hor Sr Hzi plk iroSlm : oel idm hHciq idih bn Hromp ongd bito oel ido hHciq HToS bn HSbnih : mdh Snit hHciq mlkih bn Hrm oHSob bn pHt moab oat mgdl htnorim : oel ido hHciq Slom bn hloHS Sr Hzi plk iroSlm hoa obnotio : at Ser hgia hHciq Hnon oiSbi cnoH hmh bnoho oiemido dlttio mnelio obriHio oalp amh bHomh ed Ser hSpot : oat Ser haSpot hHciq mlkih bn rkb Sr plk bit hkrm hoa ibnno oiemid dlttio mnelio obriHio : oat Ser hein hHciq Slon bn kl Hch Sr plk hmzph hoa ibnno oiTllno oiemido dlttio mnelio obriHio oat Homt brkt hSlH lgn hmlk oed hmelot hiordot meir doid : aHrio hHciq nHmih bn ecboq Sr Hzi plk bit zor ed ngd qbri doid oed hbrkh heSoih oed bit hgbrim : aHrio hHciqo hloim rHom bn bni el ido hHciq HSbih Sr Hzi plk qeilh lplko : aHrio hHciqo aHihm boi bn Hndd Sr Hzi plk qeilh : oiHcq el ido ecr bn iSoe Sr hmzph mdh Snit mngd elt hnSq hmqze : aHrio hHrh hHciq brok bn cbi mdh Snit mn hmqzoe ed ptH bit aliSib hkhn hgdol : aHrio hHciq mrmot bn aorih bn hqoz mdh Snit mptH bit aliSib oed tklit bit aliSib : oaHrio hHciqo hkhnim anSi hkkr : aHrio hHciq bnimn oHSob ngd bitm aHrio hHciq ecrih bn meSih bn ennih azl bito : aHrio hHciq bnoi bn Hndd mdh Snit mbit ecrih ed hmqzoe oed hpnh : pll bn aoci mngd hmqzoe ohmgdl hioza mbit hmlk helion aSr lHzr hmTrh aHrio pdih bn preS : ohntinim hio iSbim bepl ed ngd Ser hmim lmcrH ohmgdl hioza : aHrio hHciqo htqeim mdh Snit mngd hmgdl hgdol hioza oed Homt hepl : mel Ser hsosim hHciqo hkhnim aiS lngd bito : aHrio hHciq zdoq bn amr ngd bito oaHrio hHciq Smeih bn Sknih Smr Ser hmcrH : aHri hHciq Hnnih bn Slmih oHnon bn zlp hSSi mdh Sni aHrio hHciq mSlm bn brkih ngd nSkto : aHri hHciq mlkih bn hzrpi ed bit hntinim ohrklim ngd Ser hmpqd oed elit hpnh : obin elit hpnh lSer hzan hHciqo hzrpim ohrklim :

4

oihi kaSr Sme snblT ki anHno bonim at hHomh oiHr lo oikes hrbh oileg el hihodim : oiamr lpni aHio oHil Smron oiamr mh hihodim hamllim eSim hiecbo lhm hicbHo hiklo biom hiHio at habnim mermot hepr ohmh Sropot : oTobih hemni azlo oiamr gm aSr hm bonim am ielh Soel oprz Homt abnihm : Sme alhino ki hiino boch ohSb Hrptm al raSm otnm lbch barz Sbih : oal tks el eonm oHTatm mlpnik al tmHh ki hkeiso lngd hbonim : onbnh at hHomh otqSr kl hHomh ed Hzih oihi lb lem leSot : oihi kaSr Sme snblT oTobih oherbim ohemnim ohaSdodim ki elth arokh lHmot iroSlm ki hHlo hprzim lhstm oiHr lhm mad : oiqSro klm iHdo lboa lhlHm biroSlm oleSot lo toeh : ontpll al alhino onemid mSmr elihm iomm olilh mpnihm : oiamr ihodh kSl kH hsbl ohepr hrbh oanHno la nokl lbnot bHomh : oiamro zrino la ideo ola irao ed aSr nboa al tokm ohrgnom ohSbtno at hmlakh : oihi kaSr bao hihodim hiSbim azlm oiamro lno eSr pemim mkl hmqmot aSr tSobo elino : oaemid mtHtiot lmqom maHri lHomh bzHHiim oaemid at hem lmSpHot em Hrbtihm rmHihm oqSttihm : oara oaqom oamr al hHrim oal hsgnim oal itr hem al tirao mpnihm at adni hgdol ohnora ckro ohlHmo el aHikm bnikm obntikm nSikm obtikm : oihi kaSr Smeo aoibino ki node lno oipr halhim at eztm onSob klno al hHomh aiS al mlakto : oihi mn hiom hhoa Hzi neri eSim bmlakh oHzim mHciqim ohrmHim hmgnim ohqStot ohSrinim ohSrim aHri kl bit ihodh : hbonim bHomh ohnSaim bsbl emSim baHt ido eSh bmlakh oaHt mHcqt hSlH : ohbonim aiS Hrbo asorim el mtnio obonim ohtoqe bSopr azli : oamr al hHrim oal hsgnim oal itr hem hmlakh hrbh orHbh oanHno nprdim el hHomh rHoqim aiS maHio : bmqom aSr tSmeo at qol hSopr Smh tqbzo alino alhino ilHm lno : oanHno eSim bmlakh oHzim mHciqim brmHim melot hSHr ed zat hkokbim : gm bet hhia amrti lem aiS onero ilino btok iroSlm ohio lno hlilh mSmr ohiom mlakh : oain ani oaHi oneri oanSi hmSmr aSr aHri ain anHno pSTim bgdino aiS SlHo hmim :

5

othi zeqt hem onSihm gdolh al aHihm hihodim : oiS aSr amrim bnino obntino anHno rbim onqHh dgn onaklh onHih : oiS aSr amrim Sdtino okrmino obtino anHno erbim onqHh dgn breb : oiS aSr amrim loino ksp lmdt hmlk Sdtino okrmino : oeth kbSr aHino bSrno kbnihm bnino ohnh anHno kbSim at bnino oat bntino lebdim oiS mbntino nkbSot oain lal idno oSdtino okrmino laHrim : oiHr li mad kaSr Smeti at ceqtm oat hdbrim halh : oimlk lbi eli oaribh at hHrim oat hsgnim oamrh lhm mSa aiS baHio atm nSaim oatn elihm qhlh gdolh : oamrh lhm anHno qnino at aHino hihodim hnmkrim lgoim kdi bno ogm atm tmkro at aHikm onmkro lno oiHriSo ola mzao dbr : oiamr la Tob hdbr aSr atm eSim hloa birat alhino tlko mHrpt hgoim aoibino : ogm ani aHi oneri nSim bhm ksp odgn necbh na at hmSa hch : hSibo na lhm khiom Sdtihm krmihm citihm obtihm omat hksp ohdgn htiroS ohizhr aSr atm nSim bhm : oiamro nSib omhm la nbqS kn neSh kaSr ath aomr oaqra at hkhnim oaSbiem leSot kdbr hch : gm Hzni nerti oamrh kkh iner halhim at kl haiS aSr la iqim at hdbr hch mbito omigieo okkh ihih neor orq oiamro kl hqhl amn oihllo at ihoh oieS hem kdbr hch : gm miom aSr zoh ati lhiot pHm barz ihodh mSnt eSrim oed Snt SlSim oStim lartHSsta hmlk Snim Stim eSrh ani oaHi lHm hpHh la aklti : ohpHot hraSnim aSr lpni hkbido el hem oiqHo mhm blHm oiin aHr ksp Sqlim arbeim gm nerihm SlTo el hem oani la eSiti kn mpni irat alhim : ogm bmlakt hHomh hcat hHcqti oSdh la qnino okl neri qbozim Sm el hmlakh : ohihodim ohsgnim mah oHmSim aiS ohbaim alino mn hgoim aSr sbibtino el SlHni : oaSr hih neSh liom aHd Sor aHd zan SS brrot ozprim neSo li obin eSrt imim bkl iin lhrbh oem ch lHm hpHh la bqSti ki kbdh hebdh el hem hch : ckrh li alhi lTobh kl aSr eSiti el hem hch :

6

oihi kaSr nSme lsnblT oTobih olgSm herbi olitr aibino ki bniti at hHomh ola notr bh prz gm ed het hhia dltot la hemdti bSerim : oiSlH snblT ogSm ali lamr lkh onoedh iHdo bkpirim bbqet aono ohmh HSbim leSot li reh : oaSlHh elihm mlakim lamr mlakh gdolh ani eSh ola aokl lrdt lmh tSbt hmlakh kaSr arph oirdti alikm : oiSlHo ali kdbr hch arbe pemim oaSib aotm kdbr hch : oiSlH ali snblT kdbr hch pem HmiSit at nero oagrt ptoHh bido : ktob bh bgoim nSme ogSmo amr ath ohihodim HSbim lmrod el kn ath bonh hHomh oath hoh lhm lmlk kdbrim halh : ogm nbiaim hemdt lqra elik biroSlm lamr mlk bihodh oeth iSme lmlk kdbrim halh oeth lkh onoezh iHdo : oaSlHh alio lamr la nhih kdbrim halh aSr ath aomr ki mlbk ath bodam : ki klm miraim aotno lamr irpo idihm mn hmlakh ola teSh oeth Hcq at idi : oani bati bit Smeih bn dlih bn mhiTbal ohoa ezor oiamr noed al bit halhim al tok hhikl onsgrh dltot hhikl ki baim lhrgk olilh baim lhrgk : oamrh haiS kmoni ibrH omi kmoni aSr iboa al hhikl oHi la aboa : oakirh ohnh la alhim SlHo ki hnboah dbr eli oTobih osnblT Skro : lmen Skor hoa lmen aira oaeSh kn oHTati ohih lhm lSm re lmen iHrponi : ckrh alhi lTobih olsnblT kmeSio alh ogm lnoedih hnbiah olitr hnbiaim aSr hio miraim aoti : otSlm hHomh beSrim oHmSh lalol lHmSim oSnim iom : oihi kaSr Smeo kl aoibino oirao kl hgoim aSr sbibtino oiplo mad beinihm oideo ki mat alhino neSth hmlakh hcat : gm bimim hhm mrbim Hri ihodh agrtihm holkot el Tobih oaSr lTobih baot alihm : ki rbim bihodh beli Sboeh lo ki Htn hoa lSknih bn arH oihoHnn bno lqH at bt mSlm bn brkih : gm Tobtio hio amrim lpni odbri hio moziaim lo agrot SlH Tobih lirani :

7

oihi kaSr nbnth hHomh oaemid hdltot oipqdo hSoerim ohmSrrim ohloim : oazoh at Hnni aHi oat Hnnih Sr hbirh el iroSlm ki hoa kaiS amt oira at halhim mrbim : oiamr lhm la iptHo Seri iroSlm ed Hm hSmS oed hm emdim igipo hdltot oaHco ohemid mSmrot iSbi iroSlm aiS bmSmro oaiS ngd bito : oheir rHbt idim ogdolh ohem meT btokh oain btim bnoim : oitn alhi al lbi oaqbzh at hHrim oat hsgnim oat hem lhtiHS oamza spr hiHS heolim braSonh oamza ktob bo : alh bni hmdinh helim mSbi hgolh aSr hglh nbokdnzr mlk bbl oiSobo liroSlm olihodh aiS leiro : hbaim em crbbl iSoe nHmih ecrih remih nHmni mrdki blSn msprt bgoi nHom benh mspr anSi em iSral : bni preS alpim mah oSbeim oSnim : bni SpTih SlS maot Sbeim oSnim : bni arH SS maot HmSim oSnim : bni pHt moab lbni iSoe oioab alpim oSmnh maot Smnh eSr : bni eilm alp matim HmSim oarbeh : bni ctoa Smnh maot arbeim oHmSh : bni cki Sbe maot oSSim : bni bnoi SS maot arbeim oSmnh : bni bbi SS maot eSrim oSmnh : bni ecgd alpim SlS maot eSrim oSnim : bni adniqm SS maot SSim oSbeh : bni bgoi alpim SSim oSbeh : bni edin SS maot HmSim oHmSh : bni aTr lHcqih tSeim oSmnh : bni HSm SlS maot eSrim oSmnh : bni bzi SlS maot eSrim oarbeh : bni Hrip mah Snim eSr : bni gbeon tSeim oHmSh : anSi bit lHm onTph mah Smnim oSmnh : anSi entot mah eSrim oSmnh : anSi bit ecmot arbeim oSnim : anSi qrit ierim kpirh obarot Sbe maot arbeim oSlSh : anSi hrmh ogbe SS maot eSrim oaHd : anSi mkms mah oeSrim oSnim : anSi bit al ohei mah eSrim oSlSh : anSi nbo aHr HmSim oSnim : bni eilm aHr alp matim HmSim oarbeh : bni Hrm SlS maot oeSrim : bni irHo SlS maot arbeim oHmSh : bni ld Hdid oaono Sbe maot oeSrim oaHd : bni snah SlSt alpim tSe maot oSlSim : hkhnim bni ideih lbit iSoe tSe maot Sbeim oSlSh : bni amr alp HmSim oSnim : bni pSHor alp matim arbeim oSbeh : bni Hrm alp Sbeh eSr : hloim bni iSoe lqdmial lbni lhodoh Sbeim oarbeh : hmSrrim bni asp mah arbeim oSmnh : hSerim bni Slom bni aTr bni Tlmn bni eqob bni HTiTa bni Sbi mah SlSim oSmnh : hntinim bni zHa bni HSpa bni Tbeot : bni qirs bni siea bni pdon : bni lbnh bni Hgbh bni Slmi : bni Hnn bni gdl bni gHr : bni raih bni rzin bni nqoda : bni gcm bni eca bni psH : bni bsi bni meonim bni npoSsim : bni bqboq bni Hqopa bni HrHor : bni bzlit bni mHida bni HrSa : bni brqos bni sisra bni tmH : bni nziH bni HTipa : bni ebdi Slmh bni soTi bni soprt bni prida : bni iela bni drqon bni gdl : bni SpTih bni HTil bni pkrt hzbiim bni amon : kl hntinim obni ebdi Slmh SlS maot tSeim oSnim : oalh heolim mtl mlH tl HrSa krob adon oamr ola iklo lhgid bit abotm ocrem am miSral hm : bni dlih bni Tobih bni nqoda SS maot oarbeim oSnim : omn hkhnim bni Hbih bni hqoz bni brcli aSr lqH mbnot brcli hgledi aSh oiqra el Smm : alh bqSo ktbm hmtiHSim ola nmza oigalo mn hkhnh : oiamr htrSta lhm aSr la iaklo mqdS hqdSim ed emd hkhn laorim otomim : kl hqhl kaHd arbe rboa alpim SlS maot oSSim : mlbd ebdihm oamhtihm alh Sbet alpim SlS maot SlSim oSbeh olhm mSrrim omSrrot matim oarbeim oHmSh : sosihm Sbe maot SlSim oSSh prdihm matim arbeim oHmSh : gmlim arbe maot SlSim oHmSh Hmrim SSt alpim Sbe maot oeSrim : omqzt raSi habot ntno lmlakh htrSta ntn laozr chb drkmnim alp mcrqot HmSim ktnot khnim SlSim oHmS maot : omraSi habot ntno laozr hmlakh chb drkmonim Sti rbot oksp mnim alpim omatim : oaSr ntno Sarit hem chb drkmonim Sti rboa oksp mnim alpim oktnt khnim SSim oSbeh : oiSbo hkhnim ohloim ohSoerim ohmSrrim omn hem ohntinim okl iSral berihm oige hHdS hSbiei obni iSral berihm :

8

oiaspo kl hem kaiS aHd al hrHob aSr lpni Ser hmim oiamro lecra hspr lhbia at spr tort mSh aSr zoh ihoh at iSral : oibia ecra hkhn at htorh lpni hqhl maiS oed aSh okl mbin lSme biom aHd lHdS hSbiei : oiqra bo lpni hrHob aSr lpni Ser hmim mn haor ed mHzit hiom ngd hanSim ohnSim ohmbinim oacni kl hem al spr htorh : oiemd ecra hspr el mgdl ez aSr eSo ldbr oiemd azlo mttih oSme oenih oaorih oHlqih omeSih el imino omSmalo pdih omiSal omlkih oHSm oHSbdnh ckrih mSlm : oiptH ecra hspr leini kl hem ki mel kl hem hih okptHo emdo kl hem : oibrk ecra at ihoh halhim hgdol oieno kl hem amn amn bmel idihm oiqdo oiStHo lihoh apim arzh : oiSoe obni oSrbih imin eqob Sbti hodih meSih qliTa ecrih iocbd Hnn plaih ohloim mbinim at hem ltorh ohem el emdm : oiqrao bspr btort halhim mprS oSom Skl oibino bmqra : oiamr nHmih hoa htrSta oecra hkhn hspr ohloim hmbinim at hem lkl hem hiom qdS hoa lihoh alhikm al ttablo oal tbko ki bokim kl hem kSmem at dbri htorh : oiamr lhm lko aklo mSmnim oSto mmtqim oSlHo mnot lain nkon lo ki qdoS hiom ladnino oal tezbo ki Hdot ihoh hia meckm : ohloim mHSim lkl hem lamr hso ki hiom qdS oal tezbo : oilko kl hem lakl olStot olSlH mnot oleSot SmHh gdolh ki hbino bdbrim aSr hodieo lhm : obiom hSni naspo raSi habot lkl hem hkhnim ohloim al ecra hspr olhSkil al dbri htorh : oimzao ktob btorh aSr zoh ihoh bid mSh aSr iSbo bni iSral bskot bHg bHdS hSbiei : oaSr iSmieo oiebiro qol bkl erihm obiroSlm lamr zao hhr ohbiao eli cit oeli ez Smn oeli hds oeli tmrim oeli ez ebt leSt skt kktob : oizao hem oibiao oieSo lhm skot aiS el ggo obHzrtihm obHzrot bit halhim obrHob Ser hmim obrHob Ser aprim : oieSo kl hqhl hSbim mn hSbi skot oiSbo bskot ki la eSo mimi iSoe bn non kn bni iSral ed hiom hhoa othi SmHh gdolh mad : oiqra bspr tort halhim iom biom mn hiom hraSon ed hiom haHron oieSo Hg Sbet imim obiom hSmini ezrt kmSpT :

9

obiom eSrim oarbeh lHdS hch naspo bni iSral bzom obSqim oadmh elihm : oibdlo cre iSral mkl bni nkr oiemdo oitodo el HTatihm oeonot abtihm : oiqomo el emdm oiqrao bspr tort ihoh alhihm rbeit hiom orbeit mtodim omStHoim lihoh alhihm : oiqm el melh hloim iSoe obni qdmial Sbnih bni Srbih bni knni oiceqo bqol gdol al ihoh alhihm : oiamro hloim iSoe oqdmial bni HSbnih Srbih hodih Sbnih ptHih qomo brko at ihoh alhikm mn heolm ed heolm oibrko Sm kbodk omromm el kl brkh othlh : ath hoa ihoh lbdk at eSit at hSmim Smi hSmim okl zbam harz okl aSr elih himim okl aSr bhm oath mHih at klm ozba hSmim lk mStHoim : ath hoa ihoh halhim aSr bHrt babrm ohozato maor kSdim oSmt Smo abrhm : omzat at lbbo namn lpnik okrot emo hbrit ltt at arz hkneni hHti hamri ohprci ohibosi ohgrgSi ltt lcreo otqm at dbrik ki zdiq ath : otra at eni abtino bmzrim oat ceqtm Smet el im sop : ottn att omptim bpreh obkl ebdio obkl em arzo ki idet ki hcido elihm oteS lk Sm khiom hch : ohim bqet lpnihm oiebro btok him bibSh oat rdpihm hSlkt bmzolt kmo abn bmim ecim : obemod enn hnHitm iomm obemod aS lilh lhair lhm at hdrk aSr ilko bh : oel hr sini irdt odbr emhm mSmim ottn lhm mSpTim iSrim otorot amt Hqim omzot Tobim : oat Sbt qdSk hodet lhm omzoot oHqim otorh zoit lhm bid mSh ebdk : olHm mSmim ntth lhm lrebm omim msle hozat lhm lzmam otamr lhm lboa lrSt at harz aSr nSat at idk ltt lhm : ohm oabtino hcido oiqSo at erpm ola Smeo al mzotik : oimano lSme ola ckro nplatik aSr eSit emhm oiqSo at erpm oitno raS lSob lebdtm bmrim oath aloh sliHot Hnon orHom ark apim orb oHsd ola ecbtm : ap ki eSo lhm egl mskh oiamro ch alhik aSr helk mmzrim oieSo nazot gdlot : oath brHmik hrbim la ecbtm bmdbr at emod henn la sr melihm biomm lhnHtm bhdrk oat emod haS blilh lhair lhm oat hdrk aSr ilko bh : oroHk hTobh ntt lhSkilm omnk la mnet mpihm omim ntth lhm lzmam : oarbeim Snh klkltm bmdbr la Hsro Slmtihm la blo orglihm la bzqo : ottn lhm mmlkot oemmim otHlqm lpah oiirSo at arz siHon oat arz mlk HSbon oat arz eog mlk hbSn : obnihm hrbit kkkbi hSmim otbiam al harz aSr amrt labtihm lboa lrSt : oibao hbnim oiirSo at harz otkne lpnihm at iSbi harz hknenim ottnm bidm oat mlkihm oat emmi harz leSot bhm krzonm : oilkdo erim bzrot oadmh Smnh oiirSo btim mlaim kl Tob brot Hzobim krmim ocitim oez makl lrb oiaklo oiSbeo oiSmino oitedno bTobk hgdol : oimro oimrdo bk oiSlko at tortk aHri gom oat nbiaik hrgo aSr heido bm lhSibm alik oieSo nazot gdolt : ottnm bid zrihm oizro lhm obet zrtm izeqo alik oath mSmim tSme okrHmik hrbim ttn lhm moSieim oioSieom mid zrihm : oknoH lhm iSobo leSot re lpnik otecbm bid aibihm oirdo bhm oiSobo oiceqok oath mSmim tSme otzilm krHmik rbot etim : oted bhm lhSibm al tortk ohmh hcido ola Smeo lmzotik obmSpTik HTao bm aSr ieSh adm oHih bhm oitno ktp sorrt oerpm hqSo ola Smeo : otmSk elihm Snim rbot oted bm broHk bid nbiaik ola hacino ottnm bid emi harzt : obrHmik hrbim la eSitm klh ola ecbtm ki al Hnon orHom ath : oeth alhino hal hgdol hgbor ohnora Somr hbrit ohHsd al imeT lpnik at kl htlah aSr mzatno lmlkino lSrino olkhnino olnbiano olabtino olkl emk mimi mlki aSor ed hiom hch : oath zdiq el kl hba elino ki amt eSit oanHno hrSeno : oat mlkino Srino khnino oabtino la eSo tortk ola hqSibo al mzotik oledotik aSr heidt bhm : ohm bmlkotm obTobk hrb aSr ntt lhm obarz hrHbh ohSmnh aSr ntt lpnihm la ebdok ola Sbo mmellihm hreim : hnh anHno hiom ebdim oharz aSr ntth labtino lakl at prih oat Tobh hnh anHno ebdim elih : otboath mrbh lmlkim aSr ntth elino bHTaotino oel goitino mSlim obbhmtno krzonm obzrh gdolh anHno : obkl cat anHno krtim amnh oktbim oel hHtom Srino loino khnino :

10

oel hHtomim nHmih htrSta bn Hklih ozdqih : Srih ecrih irmih : pSHor amrih mlkih : HToS Sbnih mlok : Hrm mrmot ebdih : dnial gnton brok : mSlm abih mimn : mecih blgi Smeih alh hkhnim : ohloim oiSoe bn acnih bnoi mbni Hndd qdmial : oaHihm Sbnih hodih qliTa plaih Hnn : mika rHob HSbih : ckor Srbih Sbnih : hodih bni bnino : raSi hem preS pHt moab eilm ctoa bni : bni ecgd bbi : adnih bgoi edin : aTr Hcqih ecor : hodih HSm bzi : Hrip entot nobi : mgpieS mSlm Hcir : mSicbal zdoq idoe : plTih Hnn enih : hoSe Hnnih HSob : hloHS plHa Sobq : rHom HSbnh meSih : oaHih Hnn enn : mlok Hrm benh : oSar hem hkhnim hloim hSoerim hmSrrim hntinim okl hnbdl memi harzot al tort halhim nSihm bnihm obntihm kl iode mbin : mHciqim el aHihm adirihm obaim balh obSboeh llkt btort halhim aSr ntnh bid mSh ebd halhim olSmor oleSot at kl mzot ihoh adnino omSpTio oHqio : oaSr la ntn bntino lemi harz oat bntihm la nqH lbnino : oemi harz hmbiaim at hmqHot okl Sbr biom hSbt lmkor la nqH mhm bSbt obiom qdS onTS at hSnh hSbieit omSa kl id : ohemdno elino mzot ltt elino SlSit hSql bSnh lebdt bit alhino : llHm hmerkt omnHt htmid oleolt htmid hSbtot hHdSim lmoedim olqdSim olHTaot lkpr el iSral okl mlakt bit alhino : ohgorlot hplno el qrbn hezim hkhnim hloim ohem lhbia lbit alhino lbit abtino letim mcmnim Snh bSnh lber el mcbH ihoh alhino kktob btorh : olhbia at bkori admtno obkori kl pri kl ez Snh bSnh lbit ihoh : oat bkrot bnino obhmtino kktob btorh oat bkori bqrino ozanino lhbia lbit alhino lkhnim hmSrtim bbit alhino : oat raSit eristino otromtino opri kl ez tiroS oizhr nbia lkhnim al lSkot bit alhino omeSr admtno lloim ohm hloim hmeSrim bkl eri ebdtno : ohih hkhn bn ahrn em hloim beSr hloim ohloim ielo at meSr hmeSr lbit alhino al hlSkot lbit haozr : ki al hlSkot ibiao bni iSral obni hloi at tromt hdgn htiroS ohizhr oSm kli hmqdS ohkhnim hmSrtim ohSoerim ohmSrrim ola necb at bit alhino :

11

oiSbo Sri hem biroSlm oSar hem hpilo gorlot lhbia aHd mn heSrh lSbt biroSlm eir hqdS otSe hidot berim : oibrko hem lkl hanSim hmtndbim lSbt biroSlm : oalh raSi hmdinh aSr iSbo biroSlm oberi ihodh iSbo aiS baHcto berihm iSral hkhnim ohloim ohntinim obni ebdi Slmh : obiroSlm iSbo mbni ihodh ombni bnimn mbni ihodh etih bn ecih bn ckrih bn amrih bn SpTih bn mhllal mbni prz : omeSih bn brok bn kl Hch bn Hcih bn edih bn ioirib bn ckrih bn hSlni : kl bni prz hiSbim biroSlm arbe maot SSim oSmnh anSi Hil : oalh bni bnimn sla bn mSlm bn ioed bn pdih bn qolih bn meSih bn aitial bn iSeih : oaHrio gbi sli tSe maot eSrim oSmnh : oioal bn ckri pqid elihm oihodh bn hsnoah el heir mSnh : mn hkhnim ideih bn ioirib ikin : Srih bn Hlqih bn mSlm bn zdoq bn mriot bn aHiTob ngd bit halhim : oaHihm eSi hmlakh lbit Smnh maot eSrim oSnim oedih bn irHm bn pllih bn amzi bn ckrih bn pSHor bn mlkih : oaHio raSim labot matim arbeim oSnim oemSsi bn ecral bn aHci bn mSlmot bn amr : oaHihm gbori Hil mah eSrim oSmnh opqid elihm cbdial bn hgdolim : omn hloim Smeih bn HSob bn ecriqm bn HSbih bn boni : oSbti oiocbd el hmlakh hHiznh lbit halhim mraSi hloim : omtnih bn mikh bn cbdi bn asp raS htHlh ihodh ltplh obqbqih mSnh maHio oebda bn Smoe bn gll bn iditon : kl hloim beir hqdS matim Smnim oarbeh : ohSoerim eqob Tlmon oaHihm hSmrim bSerim mah Sbeim oSnim : oSar iSral hkhnim hloim bkl eri ihodh aiS bnHlto : ohntinim iSbim bepl oziHa ogSpa el hntinim : opqid hloim biroSlm eci bn bni bn HSbih bn mtnih bn mika mbni asp hmSrrim lngd mlakt bit halhim : ki mzot hmlk elihm oamnh el hmSrrim dbr iom biomo : optHih bn mSicbal mbni crH bn ihodh lid hmlk lkl dbr lem : oal hHzrim bSdtm mbni ihodh iSbo bqrit harbe obntih obdibn obntih obiqbzal oHzrih : obiSoe obmoldh obbit plT : obHzr Soel obbar Sbe obntih : obzqlg obmknh obbntih : obein rmon obzreh obirmot : cnH edlm oHzrihm lkiS oSdtih ecqh obntih oiHno mbar Sbe ed gia hnm : obni bnimn mgbe mkmS oeih obit al obntih : entot nb ennih : Hzor rmh gtim : Hdid zbeim nblT : ld oaono gi hHrSim : omn hloim mHlqot ihodh lbnimin :

12

oalh hkhnim ohloim aSr elo em crbbl bn Saltial oiSoe Srih irmih ecra : amrih mlok HToS : Sknih rHm mrmt : edoa gntoi abih : mimin medih blgh : Smeih oioirib ideih : slo emoq Hlqih ideih alh raSi hkhnim oaHihm bimi iSoe : ohloim iSoe bnoi qdmial Srbih ihodh mtnih el hidot hoa oaHio : obqbqih oeno aHihm lngdm lmSmrot : oiSoe holid at ioiqim oioiqim holid at aliSib oaliSib at ioide : oioide holid at iontn oiontn holid at idoe : obimi ioiqim hio khnim raSi habot lSrih mrih lirmih Hnnih : lecra mSlm lamrih ihoHnn : lmloki iontn lSbnih iosp : lHrm edna lmriot Hlqi : ledia ckrih lgnton mSlm : labih ckri lmnimin lmoedih plTi : lblgh Smoe lSmeih ihontn : olioirib mtni lideih eci : lsli qli lemoq ebr : lHlqih HSbih lideih ntnal : hloim bimi aliSib ioide oioHnn oidoe ktobim raSi abot ohkhnim el mlkot drioS hprsi : bni loi raSi habot ktobim el spr dbri himim oed imi ioHnn bn aliSib : oraSi hloim HSbih Srbih oiSoe bn qdmial oaHihm lngdm lhll lhodot bmzot doid aiS halhim mSmr lemt mSmr : mtnih obqbqih ebdih mSlm Tlmon eqob Smrim Soerim mSmr baspi hSerim : alh bimi ioiqim bn iSoe bn iozdq obimi nHmih hpHh oecra hkhn hsopr : obHnkt Homt iroSlm bqSo at hloim mkl mqomtm lhbiam liroSlm leSt Hnkh oSmHh obtodot obSir mzltim nblim obknrot : oiaspo bni hmSrrim omn hkkr sbibot iroSlm omn Hzri nTpti : ombit hglgl omSdot gbe oecmot ki Hzrim bno lhm hmSrrim sbibot iroSlm : oiThro hkhnim ohloim oiThro at hem oat hSerim oat hHomh : oaelh at Sri ihodh mel lHomh oaemidh Sti todt gdolt othlkt limin mel lHomh lSer haSpt : oilk aHrihm hoSeih oHzi Sri ihodh : oecrih ecra omSlm : ihodh obnimn oSmeih oirmih : ombni hkhnim bHzzrot ckrih bn iontn bn Smeih bn mtnih bn mikih bn ckor bn asp : oaHio Smeih oecral mlli glli mei ntnal oihodh Hnni bkli Sir doid aiS halhim oecra hsopr lpnihm : oel Ser hein ongdm elo el melot eir doid bmelh lHomh mel lbit doid oed Ser hmim mcrH : ohtodh hSnit hholkt lmoal oani aHrih oHzi hem mel lhHomh mel lmgdl htnorim oed hHomh hrHbh : omel lSer aprim oel Ser hiSnh oel Ser hdgim omgdl Hnnal omgdl hmah oed Ser hzan oemdo bSer hmTrh : otemdnh Sti htodt bbit halhim oani oHzi hsgnim emi : ohkhnim aliqim meSih mnimin mikih alioeini ckrih Hnnih bHzzrot : omeSih oSmeih oalecr oeci oihoHnn omlkih oeilm oecr oiSmieo hmSrrim oicrHih hpqid : oicbHo biom hhoa cbHim gdolim oiSmHo ki halhim SmHm SmHh gdolh ogm hnSim ohildim SmHo otSme SmHt iroSlm mrHoq : oipqdo biom hhoa anSim el hnSkot laozrot ltromot lraSit olmeSrot lknos bhm lSdi herim mnaot htorh lkhnim olloim ki SmHt ihodh el hkhnim oel hloim hemdim : oiSmro mSmrt alhihm omSmrt hThrh ohmSrrim ohSerim kmzot doid Slmh bno : ki bimi doid oasp mqdm raS hmSrrim oSir thlh ohdot lalhim : okl iSral bimi crbbl obimi nHmih ntnim mniot hmSrrim ohSerim dbr iom biomo omqdSim lloim ohloim mqdSim lbni ahrn :

13

biom hhoa nqra bspr mSh bacni hem onmza ktob bo aSr la iboa emni omabi bqhl halhim ed eolm : ki la qdmo at bni iSral blHm obmim oiSkr elio at blem lqllo oihpk alhino hqllh lbrkh : oihi kSmem at htorh oibdilo kl erb miSral : olpni mch aliSib hkhn nton blSkt bit alhino qrob lTobih : oieS lo lSkh gdolh oSm hio lpnim ntnim at hmnHh hlbonh ohklim omeSr hdgn htiroS ohizhr mzot hloim ohmSrrim ohSerim otromt hkhnim : obkl ch la hiiti biroSlm ki bSnt SlSim oStim lartHSsta mlk bbl bati al hmlk olqz imim nSalti mn hmlk : oaboa liroSlm oabinh breh aSr eSh aliSib lTobih leSot lo nSkh bHzri bit halhim : oire li mad oaSlikh at kl kli bit Tobih hHoz mn hlSkh : oamrh oiThro hlSkot oaSibh Sm kli bit halhim at hmnHh ohlbonh : oadeh ki mniot hloim la ntnh oibrHo aiS lSdho hloim ohmSrrim eSi hmlakh : oaribh at hsgnim oamrh mdoe necb bit halhim oaqbzm oaemdm el emdm : okl ihodh hbiao meSr hdgn ohtiroS ohizhr laozrot : oaozrh el aozrot Slmih hkhn ozdoq hsopr opdih mn hloim oel idm Hnn bn ckor bn mtnih ki namnim nHSbo oelihm lHlq laHihm : ckrh li alhi el cat oal tmH Hsdi aSr eSiti bbit alhi obmSmrio : bimim hhmh raiti bihodh drkim gtot bSbt ombiaim hermot oemsim el hHmrim oap iin enbim otanim okl mSa ombiaim iroSlm biom hSbt oaeid biom mkrm zid : ohzrim iSbo bh mbiaim dag okl mkr omkrim bSbt lbni ihodh obiroSlm : oaribh at Hri ihodh oamrh lhm mh hdbr hre hch aSr atm eSim omHllim at iom hSbt : hloa kh eSo abtikm oiba alhino elino at kl hreh hcat oel heir hcat oatm mosipim Hron el iSral lHll at hSbt : oihi kaSr zllo Seri iroSlm lpni hSbt oamrh oisgro hdltot oamrh aSr la iptHom ed aHr hSbt omneri hemdti el hSerim la iboa mSa biom hSbt : oilino hrklim omkri kl mmkr mHoz liroSlm pem oStim : oaeidh bhm oamrh alihm mdoe atm lnim ngd hHomh am tSno id aSlH bkm mn het hhia la bao bSbt : oamrh lloim aSr ihio mThrim obaim Smrim hSerim lqdS at iom hSbt gm cat ckrh li alhi oHosh eli krb Hsdk : gm bimim hhm raiti at hihodim hSibo nSim aSdodiot emoniot moabiot : obnihm Hzi mdbr aSdodit oainm mkirim ldbr ihodit oklSon em oem : oarib emm oaqllm oakh mhm anSim oamrTm oaSbiem balhim am ttno bntikm lbnihm oam tSao mbntihm lbnikm olkm : hloa el alh HTa Slmh mlk iSral obgoim hrbim la hih mlk kmho oahob lalhio hih oitnho alhim mlk el kl iSral gm aoto hHTiao hnSim hnkriot : olkm hnSme leSt at kl hreh hgdolh hcat lmel balhino lhSib nSim nkriot : ombni ioide bn aliSib hkhn hgdol Htn lsnblT hHrni oabriHho meli : ckrh lhm alhi el gali hkhnh obrit hkhnh ohloim : oThrtim mkl nkr oaemidh mSmrot lkhnim olloim aiS bmlakto : olqrbn hezim betim mcmnot olbkorim ckrh li alhi lTobh :

dbri himim a

1

adm St anoS : qinn mhllal ird : Hnok mtoSlH lmk : nH Sm Hm oipt : bni ipt gmr omgog omdi oion otbl omSk otirs : obni gmr aSknc odipt otogrmh : obni ion aliSh otrSiSh ktim orodnim : bni Hm koS omzrim poT oknen : obni koS sba oHoilh osbta orema osbtka obni rema Sba oddn : okoS ild at nmrod hoa hHl lhiot gbor barz : omzrim ild at lodiim oat enmim oat lhbim oat nptHim : oat ptrsim oat kslHim aSr izao mSm plStim oat kptrim : oknen ild at zidon bkro oat Ht : oat hibosi oat hamri oat hgrgSi : oat hHoi oat herqi oat hsini : oat harodi oat hzmri oat hHmti : bni Sm eilm oaSor oarpkSd olod oarm oeoz oHol ogtr omSk : oarpkSd ild at SlH oSlH ild at ebr : olebr ild Sni bnim Sm haHd plg ki bimio nplgh harz oSm aHio iqTn : oiqTn ild at almodd oat Slp oat Hzrmot oat irH : oat hdorm oat aocl oat dqlh : oat eibl oat abimal oat Sba : oat aopir oat Hoilh oat iobb kl alh bni iqTn : Sm arpkSd SlH : ebr plg reo : Srog nHor trH : abrm hoa abrhm : bni abrhm izHq oiSmeal : alh tldotm bkor iSmeal nbiot oqdr oadbal ombSm : mSme odomh mSa Hdd otima : iTor npiS oqdmh alh hm bni iSmeal : obni qTorh pilgS abrhm ildh at cmrn oiqSn omdn omdin oiSbq oSoH obni iqSn Sba oddn : obni mdin eiph oepr oHnok oabide oaldeh kl alh bni qTorh : oiold abrhm at izHq bni izHq eSo oiSral : bni eSo alipc reoal oieoS oielm oqrH : bni alipc timn oaomr zpi ogetm qnc otmne oemlq : bni reoal nHt crH Smh omch : obni Seir loTn oSobl ozbeon oenh odiSn oazr odiSn : obni loTn Hri ohomm oaHot loTn tmne : bni Sobl elin omnHt oeibl Spi oaonm obni zbeon aih oenh : bni enh diSon obni diSon Hmrn oaSbn oitrn okrn : bni azr blhn oceon ieqn bni diSon eoz oarn : oalh hmlkim aSr mlko barz adom lpni mlk mlk lbni iSral ble bn beor oSm eiro dnhbh : oimt ble oimlk tHtio iobb bn crH mbzrh : oimt iobb oimlk tHtio HoSm marz htimni : oimt HoSm oimlk tHtio hdd bn bdd hmkh at mdin bSdh moab oSm eiro eiot : oimt hdd oimlk tHtio Smlh mmSrqh : oimt Smlh oimlk tHtio Saol mrHbot hnhr : oimt Saol oimlk tHtio bel Hnn bn ekbor : oimt bel Hnn oimlk tHtio hdd oSm eiro pei oSm aSto mhiTbal bt mTrd bt mi chb : oimt hdd oihio alopi adom alop tmne alop elih alop itt : alop ahlibmh alop alh alop pinn : alop qnc alop timn alop mbzr : alop mgdial alop eirm alh alopi adom :

2

alh bni iSral raobn Smeon loi oihodh iSSkr ocblon : dn iosp obnimn nptli gd oaSr : bni ihodh er oaonn oSlh SloSh nold lo mbt Soe hknenit oihi er bkor ihodh re beini ihoh oimitho : otmr klto ildh lo at prz oat crH kl bni ihodh HmSh : bni prz Hzron oHmol : obni crH cmri oaitn ohimn oklkl odre klm HmSh : obni krmi ekr eokr iSral aSr mel bHrm : obni aitn ecrih : obni Hzron aSr nold lo at irHmal oat rm oat klobi : orm holid at emindb oemindb holid at nHSon nSia bni ihodh : onHSon holid at Slma oSlma holid at bec : obec holid at eobd oeobd holid at iSi : oaiSi holid at bkro at aliab oabindb hSni oSmea hSliSi : ntnal hrbiei rdi hHmiSi : azm hSSi doid hSbei : oaHitihm zroih oabigil obni zroih abSi oioab oeSh al SlSh : oabigil ildh at emSa oabi emSa itr hiSmeali : oklb bn Hzron holid at ecobh aSh oat irieot oalh bnih iSr oSobb oardon : otmt ecobh oiqH lo klb at aprt otld lo at Hor : oHor holid at aori oaori holid at bzlal : oaHr ba Hzron al bt mkir abi gled ohoa lqHh ohoa bn SSim Snh otld lo at Sgob : oSgob holid at iair oihi lo eSrim oSloS erim barz hgled : oiqH gSor oarm at Hot iair matm at qnt oat bntih SSim eir kl alh bni mkir abi gled : oaHr mot Hzron bklb aprth oaSt Hzron abih otld lo at aSHor abi tqoe : oihio bni irHmal bkor Hzron hbkor rm obonh oarn oazm aHih : othi aSh aHrt lirHmal oSmh eTrh hia am aonm : oihio bni rm bkor irHmal mez oimin oeqr : oihio bni aonm Smi oide obni Smi ndb oabiSor : oSm aSt abiSor abihil otld lo at aHbn oat molid : obni ndb sld oapim oimt sld la bnim : obni apim iSei obni iSei SSn obni SSn aHli : obni ide aHi Smi itr oiontn oimt itr la bnim : obni iontn plt occa alh hio bni irHmal : ola hih lSSn bnim ki am bnot olSSn ebd mzri oSmo irHe : oitn SSn at bto lirHe ebdo laSh otld lo at eti : oeti hlid at ntn ontn holid at cbd : ocbd holid at apll oapll holid at eobd : oeobd holid at ihoa oihoa holid at ecrih : oecrih hlid at Hlz oHlz hlid at aleSh : oaleSh hlid at ssmi ossmi hlid at Slom : oSlom holid at iqmih oiqmih hlid at aliSme : obni klb aHi irHmal miSe bkro hoa abi cip obni mrSh abi Hbron : obni Hbron qrH otpH orqm oSme : oSme holid at rHm abi irqem orqm holid at Smi : obn Smi meon omeon abi bit zor : oeiph pilgS klb ildh at Hrn oat moza oat gcc oHrn hlid at gcc : obni ihdi rgm oiotm ogiSn oplT oeiph oSep : plgS klb mekh ild Sbr oat trHnh : otld Sep abi mdmnh at Soa abi mkbnh oabi gbea obt klb eksh : alh hio bni klb bn Hor bkor aprth Sobl abi qrit ierim : Slma abi bit lHm Hrp abi bit gdr : oihio bnim lSobl abi qrit ierim hrah Hzi hmnHot : omSpHot qrit ierim hitri ohpoti ohSmti ohmSrei malh izao hzreti ohaStali : bni Slma bit lHm onTopti eTrot bit ioab oHzi hmnHti hzrei : omSpHot sprim iSbo iebz tretim Smetim Soktim hmh hqinim hbaim mHmt abi bit rkb :

3

oalh hio bni doid aSr nold lo bHbron hbkor amnn laHinem hicrealit Sni dnial labigil hkrmlit : hSlSi labSlom bn mekh bt tlmi mlk gSor hrbiei adnih bn Hgit : hHmiSi SpTih labiTl hSSi itrem leglh aSto : SSh nold lo bHbron oimlk Sm Sbe Snim oSSh HdSim oSlSim oSloS Snh mlk biroSlm : oalh noldo lo biroSlim Smea oSobb ontn oSlmh arbeh lbt Soe bt emial : oibHr oaliSme oaliplT : ongh onpg oipie : oaliSme oalide oaliplT tSeh : kl bni doid mlbd bni pilgSim otmr aHotm : obn Slmh rHbem abih bno asa bno ihoSpT bno : iorm bno aHciho bno ioaS bno : amziho bno ecrih bno iotm bno : aHc bno Hcqiho bno mnSh bno : amon bno iaSiho bno : obni iaSiho hbkor ioHnn hSni ihoiqim hSlSi zdqiho hrbiei Slom : obni ihoiqim iknih bno zdqih bno : obni iknih asr Saltial bno : omlkirm opdih oSnazr iqmih hoSme ondbih : obni pdih crbbl oSmei obn crbbl mSlm oHnnih oSlmit aHotm : oHSbh oahl obrkih oHsdih ioSb Hsd HmS : obn Hnnih plTih oiSeih bni rpih bni arnn bni ebdih bni Sknih : obni Sknih Smeih obni Smeih HToS oigal obriH onerih oSpT SSh : obn nerih alioeini oHcqih oecriqm SlSh : obni alioeini hodioho oaliSib oplih oeqob oioHnn odlih oenni Sbeh :

4

bni ihodh prz Hzron okrmi oHor oSobl : oraih bn Sobl holid at iHt oiHt hlid at aHomi oat lhd alh mSpHot hzreti : oalh abi eiTm icreal oiSma oidbS oSm aHotm hzllponi : opnoal abi gdr oecr abi HoSh alh bni Hor bkor aprth abi bit lHm : olaSHor abi tqoe hio Sti nSim Hlah onerh : otld lo nerh at aHcm oat Hpr oat timni oat haHStri alh bni nerh : obni Hlah zrt izHr oatnn : oqoz holid at enob oat hzbbh omSpHot aHrHl bn hrom : oihi iebz nkbd maHio oamo qrah Smo iebz lamr ki ildti bezb : oiqra iebz lalhi iSral lamr am brk tbrkni ohrbit at gboli ohith idk emi oeSit mreh lblti ezbi oiba alhim at aSr Sal : oklob aHi SoHh holid at mHir hoa abi aSton : oaSton holid at bit rpa oat psH oat tHnh abi eir nHS alh anSi rkh : obni qnc etnial oSrih obni etnial Htt : omeonti holid at eprh oSrih holid at ioab abi gia HrSim ki HrSim hio : obni klb bn ipnh eiro alh onem obni alh oqnc : obni ihllal cip ociph tiria oaSral : obn ecrh itr omrd oepr oilon othr at mrim oat Smi oat iSbH abi aStme : oaSto hihdih ildh at ird abi gdor oat Hbr abi Soko oat iqotial abi cnoH oalh bni btih bt preh aSr lqH mrd : obni aSt hodih aHot nHm abi qeilh hgrmi oaStme hmekti : obni Simon amnon ornh bn Hnn otolon obni iSei coHt obn coHt : bni Slh bn ihodh er abi lkh oledh abi mrSh omSpHot bit ebdt hbz lbit aSbe : oioqim oanSi kcba oioaS oSrp aSr belo lmoab oiSbi lHm ohdbrim etiqim : hmh hiozrim oiSbi nTeim ogdrh em hmlk bmlakto iSbo Sm : bni Smeon nmoal oimin irib crH Saol : Slm bno mbSm bno mSme bno : obni mSme Hmoal bno ckor bno Smei bno : olSmei bnim SSh eSr obnot SS olaHio ain bnim rbim okl mSpHtm la hrbo ed bni ihodh :
