oiSbo bbar Sbe omoldh oHzr Soel : obblhh obezm obtold : obbtoal obHrmh obziqlg : obbit mrkbot obHzr sosim obbit brai obSerim alh erihm ed mlk doid : oHzrihm eiTm oein rmon otkn oeSn erim HmS : okl Hzrihm aSr sbibot herim halh ed bel cat moSbtm ohtiHSm lhm : omSobb oimlk oioSh bn amzih : oioal oihoa bn ioSbih bn Srih bn eSial : oalioeini oieqbh oiSoHih oeSih oedial oiSimal obnih : ocica bn Spei bn alon bn idih bn Smri bn Smeih : alh hbaim bSmot nSiaim bmSpHotm obit abotihm przo lrob : oilko lmboa gdr ed lmcrH hgia lbqS mreh lzanm : oimzao mreh Smn oTob oharz rHbt idim oSqTt oSloh ki mn Hm hiSbim Sm lpnim : oibao alh hktobim bSmot bimi iHcqiho mlk ihodh oiko at ahlihm oat hmeinim aSr nmzao Smh oiHrimm ed hiom hch oiSbo tHtihm ki mreh lzanm Sm : omhm mn bni Smeon hlko lhr Seir anSim HmS maot oplTih onerih orpih oecial bni iSei braSm : oiko at Sarit hplTh lemlq oiSbo Sm ed hiom hch :

5

obni raobn bkor iSral ki hoa hbkor obHllo izoei abio ntnh bkrto lbni iosp bn iSral ola lhtiHS lbkrh : ki ihodh gbr baHio olngid mmno ohbkrh liosp : bni raobn bkor iSral Hnok oploa Hzron okrmi : bni ioal Smeih bno gog bno Smei bno : mikh bno raih bno bel bno : barh bno aSr hglh tlgt plnasr mlk aSr hoa nSia lraobni : oaHio lmSpHtio bhtiHS ltldotm hraS ieial ockriho : oble bn ecc bn Sme bn ioal hoa ioSb berer oed nbo obel meon : olmcrH iSb ed lboa mdbrh lmn hnhr prt ki mqnihm rbo barz gled : obimi Saol eSo mlHmh em hhgraim oiplo bidm oiSbo bahlihm el kl pni mcrH lgled : obni gd lngdm iSbo barz hbSn ed slkh : ioal hraS oSpm hmSnh oieni oSpT bbSn : oaHihm lbit abotihm mikal omSlm oSbe oiori oiekn ocie oebr Sbeh : alh bni abiHil bn Hori bn iroH bn gled bn mikal bn iSiSi bn iHdo bn boc : aHi bn ebdial bn goni raS lbit abotm : oiSbo bgled bbSn obbntih obkl mgrSi Sron el tozaotm : klm htiHSo bimi iotm mlk ihodh obimi irbem mlk iSral : bni raobn ogdi oHzi SbT mnSh mn bni Hil anSim nSai mgn oHrb odrki qSt olmodi mlHmh arbeim oarbeh alp oSbe maot oSSim izai zba : oieSo mlHmh em hhgriaim oiTor onpiS onodb : oiecro elihm ointno bidm hhgriaim okl Semhm ki lalhim ceqo bmlHmh onetor lhm ki bTHo bo : oiSbo mqnihm gmlihm HmSim alp ozan matim oHmSim alp oHmorim alpim onpS adm mah alp : ki Hllim rbim nplo ki mhalhim hmlHmh oiSbo tHtihm ed hglh : obni Hzi SbT mnSh iSbo barz mbSn ed bel Hrmon oSnir ohr Hrmon hmh rbo : oalh raSi bit abotm oepr oiSei oalial oecrial oirmih ohodoih oiHdial anSim gbori Hil anSi Smot raSim lbit abotm : oimelo balhi abotihm oicno aHri alhi emi harz aSr hSmid alhim mpnihm : oier alhi iSral at roH pol mlk aSor oat roH tlgt plnsr mlk aSor oiglm lraobni olgdi olHzi SbT mnSh oibiam lHlH oHbor ohra onhr gocn ed hiom hch :

6

bni loi grSon qht omrri : obni qht emrm izhr oHbron oecial : obni emrm ahrn omSh omrim obni ahrn ndb oabihoa alecr oaitmr : alecr holid at pinHs pinHs hlid at abiSoe : oabiSoe holid at bqi obqi holid at eci : oeci holid at crHih ocrHih holid at mriot : mriot holid at amrih oamrih holid at aHiTob : oaHiTob holid at zdoq ozdoq holid at aHimez : oaHimez holid at ecrih oecrih holid at ioHnn : oioHnn holid at ecrih hoa aSr khn bbit aSr bnh Slmh biroSlm : oiold ecrih at amrih oamrih holid at aHiTob : oaHiTob holid at zdoq ozdoq holid at Slom : oSlom holid at Hlqih oHlqih holid at ecrih : oecrih holid at Srih oSrih holid at ihozdq : oihozdq hlk bhglot ihoh at ihodh oiroSlm bid nbkdnazr : bni loi grSm qht omrri : oalh Smot bni grSom lbni oSmei : obni qht emrm oizhr oHbron oecial : bni mrri mHli omSi oalh mSpHot hloi labotihm : lgrSom lbni bno iHt bno cmh bno : ioaH bno edo bno crH bno iatri bno : bni qht emindb bno qrH bno asir bno : alqnh bno oabisp bno oasir bno : tHt bno aorial bno ecih bno oSaol bno : obni alqnh emSi oaHimot : alqnh bno alqnh zopi bno onHt bno : aliab bno irHm bno alqnh bno : obni Smoal hbkr oSni oabih : bni mrri mHli lbni bno Smei bno ech bno : Smea bno Hgih bno eSih bno : oalh aSr hemid doid el idi Sir bit ihoh mmnoH haron : oihio mSrtim lpni mSkn ahl moed bSir ed bnot Slmh at bit ihoh biroSlm oiemdo kmSpTm el ebodtm : oalh hemdim obnihm mbni hqhti himn hmSorr bn ioal bn Smoal : bn alqnh bn irHm bn alial bn toH : bn zip bn alqnh bn mHt bn emSi : bn alqnh bn ioal bn ecrih bn zpnih : bn tHt bn asir bn abisp bn qrH : bn izhr bn qht bn loi bn iSral : oaHio asp hemd el imino asp bn brkiho bn Smea : bn mikal bn beSih bn mlkih : bn atni bn crH bn edih : bn aitn bn cmh bn Smei : bn iHt bn grSm bn loi : obni mrri aHihm el hSmaol aitn bn qiSi bn ebdi bn mlok : bn HSbih bn amzih bn Hlqih : bn amzi bn bni bn Smr : bn mHli bn moSi bn mrri bn loi : oaHihm hloim ntonim lkl ebodt mSkn bit halhim : oahrn obnio mqTirim el mcbH heolh oel mcbH hqTrt lkl mlakt qdS hqdSim olkpr el iSral kkl aSr zoh mSh ebd halhim : oalh bni ahrn alecr bno pinHs bno abiSoe bno : bqi bno eci bno crHih bno : mriot bno amrih bno aHiTob bno : zdoq bno aHimez bno : oalh moSbotm lTirotm bgbolm lbni ahrn lmSpHt hqhti ki lhm hih hgorl : oitno lhm at Hbron barz ihodh oat mgrSih sbibtih : oat Sdh heir oat Hzrih ntno lklb bn ipnh : olbni ahrn ntno at eri hmqlT at Hbron oat lbnh oat mgrSih oat itr oat aStme oat mgrSih : oat Hilc oat mgrSih at dbir oat mgrSih : oat eSn oat mgrSih oat bit SmS oat mgrSih : ommTh bnimn at gbe oat mgrSih oat elmt oat mgrSih oat entot oat mgrSih kl erihm SlS eSrh eir bmSpHotihm : olbni qht hnotrim mmSpHt hmTh mmHzit mTh Hzi mnSh bgorl erim eSr : olbni grSom lmSpHotm mmTh iSSkr ommTh aSr ommTh nptli ommTh mnSh bbSn erim SlS eSrh : lbni mrri lmSpHotm mmTh raobn ommTh gd ommTh cboln bgorl erim Stim eSrh : oitno bni iSral lloim at herim oat mgrSihm : oitno bgorl mmTh bni ihodh ommTh bni Smeon ommTh bni bnimn at herim halh aSr iqrao athm bSmot : ommSpHot bni qht oihi eri gbolm mmTh aprim : oitno lhm at eri hmqlT at Skm oat mgrSih bhr aprim oat gcr oat mgrSih : oat iqmem oat mgrSih oat bit Horon oat mgrSih : oat ailon oat mgrSih oat gt rmon oat mgrSih : ommHzit mTh mnSh at enr oat mgrSih oat blem oat mgrSih lmSpHt lbni qht hnotrim : lbni grSom mmSpHt Hzi mTh mnSh at goln bbSn oat mgrSih oat eStrot oat mgrSih : ommTh iSSkr at qdS oat mgrSih at dbrt oat mgrSih : oat ramot oat mgrSih oat enm oat mgrSih : ommTh aSr at mSl oat mgrSih oat ebdon oat mgrSih : oat Hoqq oat mgrSih oat rHb oat mgrSih : ommTh nptli at qdS bglil oat mgrSih oat Hmon oat mgrSih oat qritim oat mgrSih : lbni mrri hnotrim mmTh cboln at rmono oat mgrSih at tbor oat mgrSih : omebr lirdn irHo lmcrH hirdn mmTh raobn at bzr bmdbr oat mgrSih oat ihzh oat mgrSih : oat qdmot oat mgrSih oat mipet oat mgrSih : ommTh gd at ramot bgled oat mgrSih oat mHnim oat mgrSih : oat HSbon oat mgrSih oat iecir oat mgrSih :

7

olbni iSSkr tole opoah iSib oSmron arbeh : obni tole eci orpih oirial oiHmi oibSm oSmoal raSim lbit abotm ltole gbori Hil ltldotm msprm bimi doid eSrim oSnim alp oSS maot : obni eci icrHih obni icrHih mikal oebdih oioal iSih HmSh raSim klm : oelihm ltldotm lbit abotm gdodi zba mlHmh SlSim oSSh alp ki hrbo nSim obnim : oaHihm lkl mSpHot iSSkr gbori Hilim Smonim oSbeh alp htiHSm lkl : bnimn ble obkr oidieal SlSh : obni ble azbon oeci oecial oirimot oeiri HmSh raSi bit abot gbori Hilim ohtiHSm eSrim oSnim alp oSlSim oarbeh : obni bkr cmirh oioeS oaliecr oalioeini oemri oirmot oabih oentot oelmt kl alh bni bkr : ohtiHSm ltldotm raSi bit abotm gbori Hil eSrim alp omatim : obni idieal blhn obni blhn ieiS obnimn oahod oknenh ocitn otrSiS oaHiSHr : kl alh bni idieal lraSi habot gbori Hilim Sbeh eSr alp omatim izai zba lmlHmh : oSpm oHpm bni eir HSm bni aHr : bni nptli iHzial ogoni oizr oSlom bni blhh : bni mnSh aSrial aSr ildh pilgSo harmih ildh at mkir abi gled : omkir lqH aSh lHpim olSpim oSm aHto mekh oSm hSni zlpHd othinh lzlpHd bnot : otld mekh aSt mkir bn otqra Smo prS oSm aHio SrS obnio aolm orqm : obni aolm bdn alh bni gled bn mkir bn mnSh : oaHto hmlkt ildh at aiShod oat abiecr oat mHlh : oihio bni Smide aHin oSkm olqHi oaniem : obni aprim SotlH obrd bno otHt bno oaledh bno otHt bno : ocbd bno oSotlH bno oecr oaled ohrgom anSi gt hnoldim barz ki irdo lqHt at mqnihm : oitabl aprim abihm imim rbim oibao aHio lnHmo : oiba al aSto othr otld bn oiqra at Smo brieh ki breh hith bbito : obto Sarh otbn at bit Horon htHton oat helion oat acn Sarh : orpH bno orSp otlH bno otHn bno : ledn bno emihod bno aliSme bno : non bno ihoSe bno : oaHctm omSbotm bit al obntih olmcrH nern olmerb gcr obntih oSkm obntih ed eih obntih : oel idi bni mnSh bit San obntih tenk obntih mgdo obnotih dor obnotih balh iSbo bni iosp bn iSral : bni aSr imnh oiSoh oiSoi obrieh oSrH aHotm : obni brieh Hbr omlkial hoa abi brcot : oHbr holid at iplT oat Somr oat Hotm oat Soea aHotm : obni iplT psk obmhl oeSot alh bni iplT : obni Smr aHi orohgh iHbh oarm : obn hlm aHio zopH oimne oSlS oeml : bni zopH soH oHrnpr oSoel obri oimrh : bzr ohod oSma oSlSh oitrn obara : obni itr ipnh opsph oara : obni ela arH oHnial orzia : kl alh bni aSr raSi bit habot brorim gbori Hilim raSi hnSiaim ohtiHSm bzba bmlHmh msprm anSim eSrim oSSh alp :

8

obnimn holid at ble bkro aSbl hSni oaHrH hSliSi : noHh hrbiei orpa hHmiSi : oihio bnim lble adr ogra oabihod : oabiSoe onemn oaHoH : ogra oSpopn oHorm : oalh bni aHod alh hm raSi abot lioSbi gbe oiglom al mnHt : onemn oaHih ogra hoa hglm oholid at eca oat aHiHd : oSHrim holid bSdh moab mn SlHo atm HoSim oat bera nSio : oiold mn HdS aSto at iobb oat zbia oat miSa oat mlkm : oat ieoz oat Skih oat mrmh alh bnio raSi abot : omHSim holid at abiTob oat alpel : obni alpel ebr omSem oSmd hoa bnh at aono oat ld obntih : obreh oSme hmh raSi habot lioSbi ailon hmh hbriHo at ioSbi gt : oaHio SSq oirmot : ocbdih oerd oedr : omikal oiSph oioHa bni brieh : ocbdih omSlm oHcqi oHbr : oiSmri oicliah oiobb bni alpel : oiqim ockri ocbdi : oalieni ozlti oalial : oedih obraih oSmrt bni Smei : oiSpn oebr oalial : oebdon ockri oHnn : oHnnih oeilm oenttih : oipdih opnial bni SSq : oSmSri oSHrih oetlih : oierSih oalih ockri bni irHm : alh raSi abot ltldotm raSim alh iSbo biroSlm : obgbeon iSbo abi gbeon oSm aSto mekh : obno hbkor ebdon ozor oqiS obel ondb : ogdor oaHio ockr : omqlot holid at Smah oap hmh ngd aHihm iSbo biroSlm em aHihm : onr holid at qiS oqiS holid at Saol oSaol holid at ihontn oat mlki Soe oat abindb oat aSbel : obn ihontn mrib bel omrib bel holid at mikh : obni mikh piton omlk otare oaHc : oaHc holid at ihoedh oihoedh holid at elmt oat ecmot oat cmri ocmri holid at moza : omoza holid at bnea rph bno aleSh bno azl bno : olazl SSh bnim oalh Smotm ecriqm bkro oiSmeal oSerih oebdih oHnn kl alh bni azl : obni eSq aHio aolm bkro ieoS hSni oaliplT hSlSi : oihio bni aolm anSim gbri Hil drki qSt omrbim bnim obni bnim mah oHmSim kl alh mbni bnimn :

9

okl iSral htiHSo ohnm ktobim el spr mlki iSral oihodh hglo lbbl bmelm : ohioSbim hraSnim aSr baHctm berihm iSral hkhnim hloim ohntinim : obiroSlm iSbo mn bni ihodh omn bni bnimn omn bni aprim omnSh : eoti bn emihod bn emri bn amri bn bnimn bni prz bn ihodh : omn hSiloni eSih hbkor obnio : omn bni crH ieoal oaHihm SS maot otSeim : omn bni bnimn sloa bn mSlm bn hodoih bn hsnah : oibnih bn irHm oalh bn eci bn mkri omSlm bn SpTih bn reoal bn ibnih : oaHihm ltldotm tSe maot oHmSim oSSh kl alh anSim raSi abot lbit abtihm : omn hkhnim ideih oihoirib oikin : oecrih bn Hlqih bn mSlm bn zdoq bn mriot bn aHiTob ngid bit halhim : oedih bn irHm bn pSHor bn mlkih omeSi bn edial bn iHcrh bn mSlm bn mSlmit bn amr : oaHihm raSim lbit abotm alp oSbe maot oSSim gbori Hil mlakt ebodt bit halhim : omn hloim Smeih bn HSob bn ecriqm bn HSbih mn bni mrri : obqbqr HrS ogll omtnih bn mika bn ckri bn asp : oebdih bn Smeih bn gll bn idoton obrkih bn asa bn alqnh hioSb bHzri nTopti : ohSerim Slom oeqob oTlmn oaHimn oaHihm Slom hraS : oed hnh bSer hmlk mcrHh hmh hSerim lmHnot bni loi : oSlom bn qora bn abisp bn qrH oaHio lbit abio hqrHim el mlakt hebodh Smri hspim lahl oabtihm el mHnh ihoh Smri hmboa : opinHs bn alecr ngid hih elihm lpnim ihoh emo : ckrih bn mSlmih Ser ptH lahl moed : klm hbrorim lSerim bspim matim oSnim eSr hmh bHzrihm htiHSm hmh isd doid oSmoal hrah bamontm : ohm obnihm el hSerim lbit ihoh lbit hahl lmSmrot : larbe roHot ihio hSerim mcrH imh zponh ongbh : oaHihm bHzrihm lboa lSbet himim met al et em alh : ki bamonh hmh arbet gbri hSerim hm hloim ohio el hlSkot oel hazrot bit halhim : osbibot bit halhim ilino ki elihm mSmrt ohm el hmptH olbqr lbqr : omhm el kli hebodh ki bmspr ibiaom obmspr ioziaom : omhm mmnim el hklim oel kl kli hqdS oel hslt ohiin ohSmn ohlbonh ohbSmim : omn bni hkhnim rqHi hmrqHt lbSmim : omttih mn hloim hoa hbkor lSlm hqrHi bamonh el meSh hHbtim : omn bni hqhti mn aHihm el lHm hmerkt lhkin Sbt Sbt : oalh hmSrrim raSi abot lloim blSkt pTirim ki iomm olilh elihm bmlakh : alh raSi habot lloim ltldotm raSim alh iSbo biroSlm : obgbeon iSbo abi gbeon ieoal oSm aSto mekh : obno hbkor ebdon ozor oqiS obel onr ondb : ogdor oaHio ockrih omqlot : omqlot holid at Smam oap hm ngd aHihm iSbo biroSlm em aHihm : onr holid at qiS oqiS holid at Saol oSaol holid at ihontn oat mlki Soe oat abindb oat aSbel : obn ihontn mrib bel omri bel holid at mikh : obni mikh piton omlk otHre : oaHc holid at ierh oierh holid at elmt oat ecmot oat cmri ocmri holid at moza : omoza holid at bnea orpih bno aleSh bno azl bno : olazl SSh bnim oalh Smotm ecriqm bkro oiSmeal oSerih oebdih oHnn alh bni azl :

10

oplStim nlHmo biSral oins aiS iSral mpni plStim oiplo Hllim bhr glbe : oidbqo plStim aHri Saol oaHri bnio oiko plStim at iontn oat abindb oat mlki Soe bni Saol : otkbd hmlHmh el Saol oimzaho hmorim bqSt oiHl mn hiorim : oiamr Saol al nSa klio Slp Hrbk odqrni bh pn ibao herlim halh ohtello bi ola abh nSa klio ki ira mad oiqH Saol at hHrb oipl elih : oira nSa klio ki mt Saol oipl gm hoa el hHrb oimt : oimt Saol oSlSt bnio okl bito iHdo mto : oirao kl aiS iSral aSr bemq ki nso oki mto Saol obnio oiecbo erihm oinso oibao plStim oiSbo bhm : oihi mmHrt oibao plStim lpST at hHllim oimzao at Saol oat bnio nplim bhr glbe : oipSiTho oiSao at raSo oat klio oiSlHo barz plStim sbib lbSr at ezbihm oat hem : oiSimo at klio bit alhihm oat glglto tqeo bit dgon : oiSmeo kl ibiS gled at kl aSr eSo plStim lSaol : oiqomo kl aiS Hil oiSao at gopt Saol oat gopt bnio oibiaom ibiSh oiqbro at ezmotihm tHt halh bibS oizomo Sbet imim : oimt Saol bmelo aSr mel bihoh el dbr ihoh aSr la Smr ogm lSaol baob ldroS : ola drS bihoh oimitho oisb at hmlokh ldoid bn iSi :

11

oiqbzo kl iSral al doid Hbronh lamr hnh ezmk obSrk anHno : gm tmol gm SlSom gm bhiot Saol mlk ath hmozia ohmbia at iSral oiamr ihoh alhik lk ath treh at emi at iSral oath thih ngid el emi iSral : oibao kl cqni iSral al hmlk Hbronh oikrt lhm doid brit bHbron lpni ihoh oimSHo at doid lmlk el iSral kdbr ihoh bid Smoal : oilk doid okl iSral iroSlm hia ibos oSm hibosi iSbi harz : oiamro iSbi ibos ldoid la tboa hnh oilkd doid at mzdt zion hia eir doid : oiamr doid kl mkh ibosi braSonh ihih lraS olSr oiel braSonh ioab bn zroih oihi lraS : oiSb doid bmzd el kn qrao lo eir doid : oibn heir msbib mn hmloa oed hsbib oioab iHih at Sar heir : oilk doid hlok ogdol oihoh zbaot emo : oalh raSi hgborim aSr ldoid hmtHcqim emo bmlkoto em kl iSral lhmliko kdbr ihoh el iSral : oalh mspr hgbrim aSr ldoid iSbem bn Hkmoni raS hSloSim hoa eorr at Hnito el SlS maot Hll bpem aHt : oaHrio alecr bn dodo haHoHi hoa bSloSh hgbrim : hoa hih em doid bps dmim ohplStim naspo Sm lmlHmh othi Hlqt hSdh mlah Seorim ohem nso mpni plStim : oitizbo btok hHlqh oiziloh oiko at plStim oioSe ihoh tSoeh gdolh : oirdo SloSh mn hSloSim raS el hzr al doid al mert edlm omHnh plStim Hnh bemq rpaim : odoid ac bmzodh onzib plStim ac bbit lHm : oitao doid oiamr mi iSqni mim mbor bit lHm aSr bSer : oibqeo hSlSh bmHnh plStim oiSabo mim mbor bit lHm aSr bSer oiSao oibao al doid ola abh doid lStotm oinsk atm lihoh : oiamr Hlilh li malhi meSot cat hdm hanSim halh aSth bnpSotm ki bnpSotm hbiaom ola abh lStotm alh eSo SlSt hgborim : oabSi aHi ioab hoa hih raS hSloSh ohoa eorr at Hnito el SlS maot Hll ola Sm bSloSh : mn hSloSh bSnim nkbd oihi lhm lSr oed hSloSh la ba : bnih bn ihoide bn aiS Hil rb pelim mn qbzal hoa hkh at Sni arial moab ohoa ird ohkh at hari btok hbor biom hSlg : ohoa hkh at haiS hmzri aiS mdh HmS bamh obid hmzri Hnit kmnor argim oird alio bSbT oigcl at hHnit mid hmzri oihrgho bHnito : alh eSh bniho bn ihoide olo Sm bSloSh hgbrim : mn hSloSim hno nkbd hoa oal hSloSh la ba oiSimho doid el mSmeto : ogbori hHilim eSh al aHi ioab alHnn bn dodo mbit lHm : Smot hhrori Hlz hploni : eira bn eqS htqoei abiecr hentoti : sbki hHSti eili haHoHi : mhri hnTpti Hld bn benh hnTopti : aiti bn ribi mgbet bni bnimn bnih hpretni : Hori mnHli geS abial herbti : ecmot hbHromi aliHba hSelbni : bni hSm hgconi iontn bn Sgh hhrri : aHiam bn Skr hhrri alipl bn aor : Hpr hmkrti aHih hplni : Hzro hkrmli neri bn acbi : ioal aHi ntn mbHr bn hgri : zlq hemoni nHri hbrti nSa kli ioab bn zroih : eira hitri grb hitri : aorih hHti cbd bn aHli : edina bn Sica hraobni raS lraobni oelio SloSim : Hnn bn mekh oioSpT hmtni : ecia heStrti Sme oieoal bni Hotm hereri : idieal bn Smri oiHa aHio htizi : alial hmHoim oiribi oioSoih bni alnem oitmh hmoabi : alial oeobd oieSial hmzbih :

12

oalh hbaim al doid lziqlg eod ezor mpni Saol bn qiS ohmh bgborim ecri hmlHmh : nSqi qSt miminim omSmalim babnim obHzim bqSt maHi Saol mbnimn : hraS aHiecr oioaS bni hSmeh hgbeti oicoal oplT bni ecmot obrkh oihoa hentti : oiSmeih hgbeoni gbor bSlSim oel hSlSim oirmih oiHcial oioHnn oiocbd hgdrti : aleoci oirimot obelih oSmriho oSpTiho hHripi : alqnh oiSiho oecral oioecr oiSbem hqrHim : oioealh ocbdih bni irHm mn hgdor : omn hgdi nbdlo al doid lmzd mdbrh gbri hHil anSi zba lmlHmh erki znh ormH opni arih pnihm okzbaim el hhrim lmhr : ecr hraS ebdih hSni aliab hSlSi : mSmnh hrbiei irmih hHmSi : eti hSSi alial hSbei : ioHnn hSmini alcbd htSiei : irmiho heSiri mkbni eSti eSr : alh mbni gd raSi hzba aHd lmah hqTn ohgdol lalp : alh hm aSr ebro at hirdn bHdS hraSon ohoa mmla el kl gditio oibriHo at kl hemqim lmcrH olmerb : oibao mn bni bnimn oihodh ed lmzd ldoid : oiza doid lpnihm oien oiamr lhm am lSlom batm ali lecrni ihih li elikm lbb liHd oam lrmotni lzri bla Hms bkpi ira alhi abotino oiokH : oroH lbSh at emSi raS hSloSim lk doid oemk bn iSi Slom Slom lk oSlom lecrk ki ecrk alhik oiqblm doid oitnm braSi hgdod : ommnSh nplo el doid bbao em plStim el Saol lmlHmh ola ecrm ki bezh SlHho srni plStim lamr braSino ipol al adnio Saol : blkto al ziqlg nplo elio mmnSh ednH oiocbd oidieal omikal oiocbd oalihoa ozlti raSi halpim aSr lmnSh : ohmh ecro em doid el hgdod ki gbori Hil klm oihio Srim bzba : ki let iom biom ibao el doid lecro ed lmHnh gdol kmHnh alhim : oalh mspri raSi hHloz lzba bao el doid Hbronh lhsb mlkot Saol alio kpi ihoh : bni ihodh nSai znh ormH SSt alpim oSmonh maot Hlozi zba : mn bni Smeon gbori Hil lzba Sbet alpim omah : mn bni hloi arbet alpim oSS maot : oihoide hngid lahrn oemo SlSt alpim oSbe maot : ozdoq ner gbor Hil obit abio Srim eSrim oSnim : omn bni bnimn aHi Saol SlSt alpim oed hnh mrbitm Smrim mSmrt bit Saol : omn bni aprim eSrim alp oSmonh maot gbori Hil anSi Smot lbit abotm : omHzi mTh mnSh Smonh eSr alp aSr nqbo bSmot lboa lhmlik at doid : ombni iSSkr iodei binh letim ldet mh ieSh iSral raSihm matim okl aHihm el pihm : mcblon iozai zba erki mlHmh bkl kli mlHmh HmSim alp oledr bla lb olb : omnptli Srim alp oemhm bznh oHnit SlSim oSbeh alp : omn hdni erki mlHmh eSrim oSmonh alp oSS maot : omaSr iozai zba lerk mlHmh arbeim alp : omebr lirdn mn hraobni ohgdi oHzi SbT mnSh bkl kli zba mlHmh mah oeSrim alp : kl alh anSi mlHmh edri merkh blbb Slm bao Hbronh lhmlik at doid el kl iSral ogm kl Srit iSral lb aHd lhmlik at doid : oihio Sm em doid imim SloSh aklim oSotim ki hkino lhm aHihm : ogm hqrobim alihm ed iSSkr ocblon onptli mbiaim lHm bHmorim obgmlim obprdim obbqr makl qmH dblim ozmoqim oiin oSmn obqr ozan lrb ki SmHh biSral :

13

oioez doid em Sri halpim ohmaot lkl ngid : oiamr doid lkl qhl iSral am elikm Tob omn ihoh alhino nprzh nSlHh el aHino hnSarim bkl arzot iSral oemhm hkhnim ohloim beri mgrSihm oiqbzo alino : onsbh at aron alhino alino ki la drSnho bimi Saol : oiamro kl hqhl leSot kn ki iSr hdbr beini kl hem : oiqhl doid at kl iSral mn SiHor mzrim oed lboa Hmt lhbia at aron halhim mqrit ierim : oiel doid okl iSral belth al qrit ierim aSr lihodh lhelot mSm at aron halhim ihoh ioSb hkrobim aSr nqra Sm : oirkibo at aron halhim el eglh HdSh mbit abindb oeca oaHio nhgim beglh : odoid okl iSral mSHqim lpni halhim bkl ec obSirim obknrot obnblim obtpim obmzltim obHzzrot : oibao ed grn kidn oiSlH eca at ido laHc at haron ki SmTo hbqr : oiHr ap ihoh beca oikho el aSr SlH ido el haron oimt Sm lpni alhim : oiHr ldoid ki prz ihoh prz beca oiqra lmqom hhoa prz eca ed hiom hch : oiira doid at halhim biom hhoa lamr hik abia ali at aron halhim : ola hsir doid at haron alio al eir doid oiTho al bit ebd adm hgti : oiSb aron halhim em bit ebd adm bbito SlSh HdSim oibrk ihoh at bit ebd adm oat kl aSr lo :

14

oiSlH Hirm mlk zr mlakim al doid oezi arcim oHrSi qir oHrSi ezim lbnot lo bit : oide doid ki hkino ihoh lmlk el iSral ki nSat lmelh mlkoto bebor emo iSral : oiqH doid eod nSim biroSlm oiold doid eod bnim obnot : oalh Smot hilodim aSr hio lo biroSlm Smoe oSobb ntn oSlmh : oibHr oaliSoe oalplT : ongh onpg oipie : oaliSme obelide oaliplT : oiSmeo plStim ki nmSH doid lmlk el kl iSral oielo kl plStim lbqS at doid oiSme doid oiza lpnihm : oplStim bao oipSTo bemq rpaim : oiSal doid balhim lamr haelh el plStiim onttm bidi oiamr lo ihoh elh onttim bidk : oielo bbel przim oikm Sm doid oiamr doid prz halhim at aoibi bidi kprz mim el kn qrao Sm hmqom hhoa bel przim : oiecbo Sm at alhihm oiamr doid oiSrpo baS : oisipo eod plStim oipSTo bemq : oiSal eod doid balhim oiamr lo halhim la telh aHrihm hsb melihm obat lhm mmol hbkaim : oihi kSmek at qol hzedh braSi hbkaim ac tza bmlHmh ki iza halhim lpnik lhkot at mHnh plStim : oieS doid kaSr zoho halhim oiko at mHnh plStim mgbeon oed gcrh : oiza Sm doid bkl harzot oihoh ntn at pHdo el kl hgoim :

15

oieS lo btim beir doid oikn mqom laron halhim oiT lo ahl : ac amr doid la lSat at aron halhim ki am hloim ki bm bHr ihoh lSat at aron ihoh olSrto ed eolm : oiqhl doid at kl iSral al iroSlm lhelot at aron ihoh al mqomo aSr hkin lo : oiasp doid at bni ahrn oat hloim : lbni qht aorial hSr oaHio mah oeSrim : lbni mrri eSih hSr oaHio matim oeSrim : lbni grSom ioal hSr oaHio mah oSlSim : lbni alizpn Smeih hSr oaHio matim : lbni Hbron alial hSr oaHio Smonim : lbni ecial emindb hSr oaHio mah oSnim eSr : oiqra doid lzdoq olabitr hkhnim olloim laorial eSih oioal Smeih oalial oemindb : oiamr lhm atm raSi habot lloim htqdSo atm oaHikm ohelitm at aron ihoh alhi iSral al hkinoti lo : ki lmbraSonh la atm prz ihoh alhino bno ki la drSnho kmSpT : oitqdSo hkhnim ohloim lhelot at aron ihoh alhi iSral : oiSao bni hloim at aron halhim kaSr zoh mSh kdbr ihoh bktpm bmTot elihm : oiamr doid lSri hloim lhemid at aHihm hmSrrim bkli Sir nblim oknrot omzltim mSmieim lhrim bqol lSmHh : oiemido hloim at himn bn ioal omn aHio asp bn brkiho omn bni mrri aHihm aitn bn qoSiho : oemhm aHihm hmSnim ckriho bn oiecial oSmirmot oiHial oeni aliab obniho omeSiho omttiho oaliplho omqniho oebd adm oieial hSerim : ohmSrrim himn asp oaitn bmzltim nHSt lhSmie : ockrih oecial oSmirmot oiHial oeni oaliab omeSiho obniho bnblim el elmot : omttiho oaliplho omqniho oebd adm oieial oecciho bknrot el hSminit lnzH : oknniho Sr hloim bmSa isr bmSa ki mbin hoa : obrkih oalqnh Serim laron : oSbniho oioSpT ontnal oemSi ockriho obniho oaliecr hkhnim mHzzrim bHzzrot lpni aron halhim oebd adm oiHih Serim laron : oihi doid ocqni iSral oSri halpim hhlkim lhelot at aron brit ihoh mn bit ebd adm bSmHh : oihi becr halhim at hloim nSai aron brit ihoh oicbHo Sbeh prim oSbeh ailim : odoid mkrbl bmeil boz okl hloim hnSaim at haron ohmSrrim oknnih hSr hmSa hmSrrim oel doid apod bd : okl iSral melim at aron brit ihoh btroeh obqol Sopr obHzzrot obmzltim mSmeim bnblim oknrot : oihi aron brit ihoh ba ed eir doid omikl bt Saol nSqph bed hHlon otra at hmlk doid mrqd omSHq otbc lo blbh :

16

oibiao at aron halhim oizigo ato btok hahl aSr nTh lo doid oiqribo elot oSlmim lpni halhim : oikl doid mhelot helh ohSlmim oibrk at hem bSm ihoh : oiHlq lkl aiS iSral maiS oed aSh laiS kkr lHm oaSpr oaSiSh : oitn lpni aron ihoh mn hloim mSrtim olhckir olhodot olhll lihoh alhi iSral : asp hraS omSnho ckrih ieial oSmirmot oiHial omttih oaliab obniho oebd adm oieial bkli nblim obknrot oasp bmzltim mSmie : obniho oiHcial hkhnim bHzzrot tmid lpni aron brit halhim : biom hhoa ac ntn doid braS lhdot lihoh bid asp oaHio : hodo lihoh qrao bSmo hodieo bemim eliltio : Siro lo cmro lo SiHo bkl nplatio : hthllo bSm qdSo iSmH lb mbqSi ihoh : drSo ihoh oeco bqSo pnio tmid : ckro nplatio aSr eSh mptio omSpTi piho : cre iSral ebdo bni ieqb bHirio : hoa ihoh alhino bkl harz mSpTio : ckro leolm brito dbr zoh lalp dor : aSr krt at abrhm oSboeto lizHq : oiemidh lieqb lHq liSral brit eolm : lamr lk atn arz knen Hbl nHltkm : bhiotkm mti mspr kmeT ogrim bh : oithlko mgoi al goi ommmlkh al em aHr : la hniH laiS leSqm oiokH elihm mlkim : al tgeo bmSiHi obnbiai al treo : Siro lihoh kl harz bSro miom al iom iSoeto : spro bgoim at kbodo bkl hemim nplatio : ki gdol ihoh omhll mad onora hoa el kl alhim : ki kl alhi hemim alilim oihoh Smim eSh : hod ohdr lpnio ec oHdoh bmqmo : hbo lihoh mSpHot emim hbo lihoh kbod oec : hbo lihoh kbod Smo Sao mnHh obao lpnio hStHoo lihoh bhdrt qdS : Hilo mlpnio kl harz ap tkon tbl bl tmoT : iSmHo hSmim otgl harz oiamro bgoim ihoh mlk : irem him omloao ielz hSdh okl aSr bo : ac irnno ezi hier mlpni ihoh ki ba lSpoT at harz : hodo lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : oamro hoSieno alhi iSeno oqbzno ohzilno mn hgoim lhdot lSm qdSk lhStbH bthltk : brok ihoh alhi iSral mn heolm oed helm oiamro kl hem amn ohll lihoh : oiecb Sm lpni aron brit ihoh lasp olaHio lSrt lpni haron tmid ldbr iom biomo : oebd adm oaHihm SSim oSmonh oebd adm bn iditon oHsh lSerim : oat zdoq hkhn oaHio hkhnim lpni mSkn ihoh bbmh aSr bgbeon : lhelot elot lihoh el mcbH helh tmid lbqr olerb olkl hktob btort ihoh aSr zoh el iSral : oemhm himn oidoton oSar hbrorim aSr nqbo bSmot lhdot lihoh ki leolm Hsdo : oemhm himn oidoton Hzzrot omzltim lmSmieim okli Sir halhim obni idoton lSer : oilko kl hem aiS lbito oisb doid lbrk at bito :

17

oihi kaSr iSb doid bbito oiamr doid al ntn hnbia hnh anki ioSb bbit harcim oaron brit ihoh tHt irieot : oiamr ntn al doid kl aSr blbbk eSh ki halhim emk : oihi blilh hhoa oihi dbr alhim al ntn lamr : lk oamrt al doid ebdi kh amr ihoh la ath tbnh li hbit lSbt : ki la iSbti bbit mn hiom aSr heliti at iSral ed hiom hch oahih mahl al ahl ommSkn : bkl aSr hthlkti bkl iSral hdbr dbrti at aHd SpTi iSral aSr zoiti lreot at emi lamr lmh la bnitm li bit arcim : oeth kh tamr lebdi ldoid kh amr ihoh zbaot ani lqHtik mn hnoh mn aHri hzan lhiot ngid el emi iSral : oahih emk bkl aSr hlkt oakrit at kl aoibik mpnik oeSiti lk Sm kSm hgdolim aSr barz : oSmti mqom lemi iSral onTetiho oSkn tHtio ola irgc eod ola iosipo bni eolh lblto kaSr braSonh : olmimim aSr zoiti SpTim el emi iSral ohkneti at kl aoibik oagd lk obit ibnh lk ihoh : ohih ki mlao imik llkt em abtik ohqimoti at crek aHrik aSr ihih mbnik ohkinoti at mlkoto : hoa ibnh li bit oknnti at ksao ed eolm : ani ahih lo lab ohoa ihih li lbn oHsdi la asir memo kaSr hsiroti maSr hih lpnik : ohemdtiho bbiti obmlkoti ed heolm oksao ihih nkon ed eolm : kkl hdbrim halh okkl hHcon hch kn dbr ntn al doid : oiba hmlk doid oiSb lpni ihoh oiamr mi ani ihoh alhim omi biti ki hbiatni ed hlm : otqTn cat beinik alhim otdbr el bit ebdk lmrHoq oraitni ktor hadm hmelh ihoh alhim : mh iosip eod doid alik lkbod at ebdk oath at ebdk idet : ihoh bebor ebdk oklbk eSit at kl hgdolh hcat lhdie at kl hgdlot : ihoh ain kmok oain alhim coltk bkl aSr Smeno bacnino : omi kemk iSral goi aHd barz aSr hlk halhim lpdot lo em lSom lk Sm gdlot onraot lgrS mpni emk aSr pdit mmzrim goim : ottn at emk iSral lk lem ed eolm oath ihoh hiit lhm lalhim : oeth ihoh hdbr aSr dbrt el ebdk oel bito iamn ed eolm oeSh kaSr dbrt : oiamn oigdl Smk ed eolm lamr ihoh zbaot alhi iSral alhim liSral obit doid ebdk nkon lpnik : ki ath alhi glit at acn ebdk lbnot lo bit el kn mza ebdk lhtpll lpnik : oeth ihoh ath hoa halhim otdbr el ebdk hTobh hcat : oeth hoalt lbrk at bit ebdk lhiot leolm lpnik ki ath ihoh brkt ombrk leolm :

18

oihi aHri kn oik doid at plStim oikniem oiqH at gt obntih mid plStim : oik at moab oihio moab ebdim ldoid nSai mnHh : oik doid at hddecr mlk zobh Hmth blkto lhzib ido bnhr prt : oilkd doid mmno alp rkb oSbet alpim prSim oeSrim alp aiS rgli oieqr doid at kl hrkb oiotr mmno mah rkb : oiba arm drmSq lecor lhddecr mlk zobh oik doid barm eSrim oSnim alp aiS : oiSm doid barm drmSq oihi arm ldoid ebdim nSai mnHh oioSe ihoh ldoid bkl aSr hlk : oiqH doid at SlTi hchb aSr hio el ebdi hddecr oibiam iroSlm : omTbHt omkon eri hddecr lqH doid nHSt rbh mad bh eSh Slmh at im hnHSt oat hemodim oat kli hnHSt : oiSme teo mlk Hmt ki hkh doid at kl Hil hddecr mlk zobh : oiSlH at hdorm bno al hmlk doid lSaol lo lSlom olbrko el aSr nlHm bhddecr oikho ki aiS mlHmot teo hih hddecr okl kli chb oksp onHSt : gm atm hqdiS hmlk doid lihoh em hksp ohchb aSr nSa mkl hgoim madom ommoab ombni emon omplStim omemlq : oabSi bn zroih hkh at adom bgia hmlH Smonh eSr alp : oiSm badom nzibim oihio kl adom ebdim ldoid oioSe ihoh at doid bkl aSr hlk : oimlk doid el kl iSral oihi eSh mSpT ozdqh lkl emo : oioab bn zroih el hzba oihoSpT bn aHilod mckir : ozdoq bn aHiTob oabimlk bn abitr khnim oSoSa sopr : obniho bn ihoide el hkrti ohplti obni doid hraSnim lid hmlk :

19

oihi aHri kn oimt nHS mlk bni emon oimlk bno tHtio : oiamr doid aeSh Hsd em Hnon bn nHS ki eSh abio emi Hsd oiSlH doid mlakim lnHmo el abio oibao ebdi doid al arz bni emon al Hnon lnHmo : oiamro Sri bni emon lHnon hmkbd doid at abik beinik ki SlH lk mnHmim hla bebor lHqr olhpk olrgl harz bao ebdio alik : oiqH Hnon at ebdi doid oiglHm oikrt at mdoihm bHzi ed hmpSeh oiSlHm : oilko oigido ldoid el hanSim oiSlH lqratm ki hio hanSim nklmim mad oiamr hmlk Sbo birHo ed aSr izmH cqnkm oSbtm : oirao bni emon ki htbaSo em doid oiSlH Hnon obni emon alp kkr ksp lSkr lhm mn arm nhrim omn arm mekh omzobh rkb oprSim : oiSkro lhm Snim oSlSim alp rkb oat mlk mekh oat emo oibao oiHno lpni midba obni emon naspo merihm oibao lmlHmh : oiSme doid oiSlH at ioab oat kl zba hgborim : oizao bni emon oierko mlHmh ptH heir ohmlkim aSr bao lbdm bSdh : oira ioab ki hith pni hmlHmh alio pnim oaHor oibHr mkl bHor biSral oierk lqrat arm : oat itr hem ntn bid abSi aHio oierko lqrat bni emon : oiamr am tHcq mmni arm ohiit li ltSoeh oam bni emon iHcqo mmk ohoSetik : Hcq ontHcqh bed emno obed eri alhino oihoh hTob beinio ieSh : oigS ioab ohem aSr emo lpni arm lmlHmh oinoso mpnio : obni emon rao ki ns arm oinoso gm hm mpni abSi aHio oibao heirh oiba ioab iroSlm : oira arm ki ngpo lpni iSral oiSlHo mlakim oioziao at arm aSr mebr hnhr oSopk Sr zba hddecr lpnihm : oigd ldoid oiasp at kl iSral oiebr hirdn oiba alhm oierk alhm oierk doid lqrat arm mlHmh oilHmo emo : oins arm mlpni iSral oihrg doid marm Sbet alpim rkb oarbeim alp aiS rgli oat Sopk Sr hzba hmit : oirao ebdi hddecr ki ngpo lpni iSral oiSlimo em doid oiebdho ola abh arm lhoSie at bni emon eod :

20

oihi let tSobt hSnh let zat hmlkim oinhg ioab at Hil hzba oiSHt at arz bni emon oiba oizr at rbh odoid iSb biroSlm oik ioab at rbh oihrsh : oiqH doid at eTrt mlkm mel raSo oimzah mSql kkr chb obh abn iqrh othi el raS doid oSll heir hozia hrbh mad : oat hem aSr bh hozia oiSr bmgrh obHrizi hbrcl obmgrot okn ieSh doid lkl eri bni emon oiSb doid okl hem iroSlm : oihi aHrikn otemd mlHmh bgcr em plStim ac hkh sbki hHSti at spi mildi hrpaim oikneo : othi eod mlHmh at plStim oik alHnn bn ieor at lHmi aHi glit hgti oez Hnito kmnor argim : othi eod mlHmh bgt oihi aiS mdh oazbetio SS oSS eSrim oarbe ogm hoa nold lhrpa : oiHrp at iSral oikho ihontn bn Smea aHi doid : al noldo lhrpa bgt oiplo bid doid obid ebdio :

21

oiemd STn el iSral oist at doid lmnot at iSral : oiamr doid al ioab oal Sri hem lko spro at iSral mbar Sbe oed dn ohbiao ali oadeh at msprm : oiamr ioab iosp ihoh el emo khm mah pemim hla adni hmlk klm ladni lebdim lmh ibqS cat adni lmh ihih laSmh liSral : odbr hmlk Hcq el ioab oiza ioab oithlk bkl iSral oiba iroSlm : oitn ioab at mspr mpqd hem al doid oihi kl iSral alp alpim omah alp aiS Slp Hrb oihodh arbe maot oSbeim alp aiS Slp Hrb : oloi obnimn la pqd btokm ki nteb dbr hmlk at ioab : oire beini halhim el hdbr hch oik at iSral : oiamr doid al halhim HTati mad aSr eSiti at hdbr hch oeth hebr na at eoon ebdk ki nsklti mad : oidbr ihoh al gd Hch doid lamr : lk odbrt al doid lamr kh amr ihoh SloS ani nTh elik bHr lk aHt mhnh oaeSh lk : oiba gd al doid oiamr lo kh amr ihoh qbl lk : am SloS Snim reb oam SlSh HdSim nsph mpni zrik oHrb aoibk lmSgt oam SlSt imim Hrb ihoh odbr barz omlak ihoh mSHit bkl gbol iSral oeth rah mh aSib at SlHi dbr : oiamr doid al gd zr li mad aplh na bid ihoh ki rbim rHmio mad obid adm al apl : oitn ihoh dbr biSral oipl miSral Sbeim alp aiS : oiSlH halhim mlak liroSlm lhSHith okhSHit rah ihoh oinHm el hreh oiamr lmlak hmSHit rb eth hrp idk omlak ihoh emd em grn arnn hibosi : oiSa doid at einio oira at mlak ihoh emd bin harz obin hSmim oHrbo Sloph bido nToih el iroSlm oipl doid ohcqnim mksim bSqim el pnihm : oiamr doid al halhim hla ani amrti lmnot bem oani hoa aSr HTati ohre hreoti oalh hzan mh eSo ihoh alhi thi na idk bi obbit abi obemk la lmgph : omlak ihoh amr al gd lamr ldoid ki ielh doid lhqim mcbH lihoh bgrn arnn hibsi : oiel doid bdbr gd aSr dbr bSm ihoh : oiSb arnn oira at hmlak oarbet bnio emo mtHbaim oarnn dS HTim : oiba doid ed arnn oibT arnn oira at doid oiza mn hgrn oiStHo ldoid apim arzh : oiamr doid al arnn tnh li mqom hgrn oabnh bo mcbH lihoh bksp mla tnho li otezr hmgph mel hem : oiamr arnn al doid qH lk oieS adni hmlk hTob beinio rah ntti hbqr lelot ohmorgim lezim ohHTim lmnHh hkl ntti : oiamr hmlk doid larnn la ki qnh aqnh bksp mla ki la aSa aSr lk lihoh ohelot eolh Hnm : oitn doid larnn bmqom Sqli chb mSql SS maot : oibn Sm doid mcbH lihoh oiel elot oSlmim oiqra al ihoh oienho baS mn hSmim el mcbH helh : oiamr ihoh lmlak oiSb Hrbo al ndnh : bet hhia braot doid ki enho ihoh bgrn arnn hibosi oicbH Sm : omSkn ihoh aSr eSh mSh bmdbr omcbH heolh bet hhia bbmh bgbeon : ola ikl doid llkt lpnio ldrS alhim ki nbet mpni Hrb mlak ihoh :

22

oiamr doid ch hoa bit ihoh halhim och mcbH lelh liSral : oiamr doid lknos at hgrim aSr barz iSral oiemd Hzbim lHzob abni gcit lbnot bit halhim : obrcl lrb lmsmrim ldltot hSerim olmHbrot hkin doid onHSt lrb ain mSql : oezi arcim lain mspr ki hbiao hzidnim ohzrim ezi arcim lrb ldoid : oiamr doid Slmh bni ner ork ohbit lbnot lihoh lhgdil lmelh lSm oltpart lkl harzot akinh na lo oikn doid lrb lpni moto : oiqra lSlmh bno oizoho lbnot bit lihoh alhi iSral : oiamr doid lSlmh bno ani hih em lbbi lbnot bit lSm ihoh alhi : oihi eli dbr ihoh lamr dm lrb Spkt omlHmot gdlot eSit la tbnh bit lSmi ki dmim rbim Spkt arzh lpni : hnh bn nold lk hoa ihih aiS mnoHh ohnHoti lo mkl aoibio msbib ki Slmh ihih Smo oSlom oSqT atn el iSral bimio : hoa ibnh bit lSmi ohoa ihih li lbn oani lo lab ohkinoti ksa mlkoto el iSral ed eolm : eth bni ihi ihoh emk ohzlHt obnit bit ihoh alhik kaSr dbr elik : ak itn lk ihoh Skl obinh oizok el iSral olSmor at tort ihoh alhik : ac tzliH am tSmor leSot at hHqim oat hmSpTim aSr zoh ihoh at mSh el iSral Hcq oamz al tira oal tHt : ohnh benii hkinoti lbit ihoh chb kkrim mah alp oksp alp alpim kkrim olnHSt olbrcl ain mSql ki lrb hih oezim oabnim hkinoti oelihm tosip : oemk lrb eSi mlakh Hzbim oHrSi abn oez okl Hkm bkl mlakh : lchb lksp olnHSt olbrcl ain mspr qom oeSh oihi ihoh emk : oizo doid lkl Sri iSral lecr lSlmh bno : hla ihoh alhikm emkm ohniH lkm msbib ki ntn bidi at iSbi harz onkbSh harz lpni ihoh olpni emo : eth tno lbbkm onpSkm ldroS lihoh alhikm oqomo obno at mqdS ihoh halhim lhbia at aron brit ihoh okli qdS halhim lbit hnbnh lSm ihoh :

23

odoid cqn oSbe imim oimlk at Slmh bno el iSral : oiasp at kl Sri iSral ohkhnim ohloim : oispro hloim mbn SlSim Snh omelh oihi msprm lglgltm lgbrim SlSim oSmonh alp : malh lnzH el mlakt bit ihoh eSrim oarbeh alp oSTrim oSpTim SSt alpim : oarbet alpim Serim oarbet alpim mhllim lihoh bklim aSr eSiti lhll : oiHlqm doid mHlqot lbni loi lgrSon qht omrri : lgrSni ledn oSmei : bni ledn hraS iHial octm oioal SlSh : bni Smei Slmot oHcial ohrn SlSh alh raSi habot lledn : obni Smei iHt cina oieoS obrieh alh bni Smei arbeh : oihi iHt hraS ocich hSni oieoS obrieh la hrbo bnim oihio lbit ab lpqdh aHt : bni qht emrm izhr Hbron oecial arbeh : bni emrm ahrn omSh oibdl ahrn lhqdiSo qdS qdSim hoa obnio ed eolm lhqTir lpni ihoh lSrto olbrk bSmo ed eolm : omSh aiS halhim bnio iqrao el SbT hloi : bni mSh grSm oaliecr : bni grSom Sboal hraS : oihio bni aliecr rHbih hraS ola hih laliecr bnim aHrim obni rHbih rbo lmelh : bni izhr Slmit hraS : bni Hbron iriho hraS amrih hSni iHcial hSliSi oiqmem hrbiei : bni ecial mikh hraS oiSih hSni : bni mrri mHli omoSi bni mHli alecr oqiS : oimt alecr ola hio lo bnim ki am bnot oiSaom bni qiS aHihm : bni moSi mHli oedr oirmot SlSh : alh bni loi lbit abtihm raSi habot lpqodihm bmspr Smot lglgltm eSh hmlakh lebdt bit ihoh mbn eSrim Snh omelh : ki amr doid hniH ihoh alhi iSral lemo oiSkn biroSlm ed leolm : ogm lloim ain lSat at hmSkn oat kl klio lebdto : ki bdbri doid haHrnim hmh mspr bni loi mbn eSrim Snh olmelh : ki memdm lid bni ahrn lebdt bit ihoh el hHzrot oel hlSkot oel Thrt lkl qdS omeSh ebdt bit halhim : ollHm hmerkt olslt lmnHh olrqiqi hmzot olmHbt olmrbkt olkl mSorh omdh : olemd bbqr bbqr lhdot olhll lihoh okn lerb : olkl helot elot lihoh lSbtot lHdSim olmedim bmspr kmSpT elihm tmid lpni ihoh : oSmro at mSmrt ahl moed oat mSmrt hqdS omSmrt bni ahrn aHihm lebdt bit ihoh :

24

olbni ahrn mHlqotm bni ahrn ndb oabihoa alecr oaitmr : oimt ndb oabihoa lpni abihm obnim la hio lhm oikhno alecr oaitmr : oiHlqm doid ozdoq mn bni alecr oaHimlk mn bni aitmr lpqdtm bebdtm : oimzao bni alecr rbim lraSi hgbrim mn bni aitmr oiHlqom lbni alecr raSim lbit abot SSh eSr olbni aitmr lbit abotm Smonh : oiHlqom bgorlot alh em alh ki hio Sri qdS oSri halhim mbni alecr obbni aitmr : oiktbm Smeih bn ntnal hsopr mn hloi lpni hmlk ohSrim ozdoq hkhn oaHimlk bn abitr oraSi habot lkhnim olloim bit ab aHd aHc lalecr oaHc aHc laitmr : oiza hgorl hraSon lihoirib lideih hSni : lHrm hSliSi lSerim hrbei : lmlkih hHmiSi lmimn hSSi : lhqoz hSbei labih hSmini : liSoe htSei lSkniho heSri : laliSib eSti eSr liqim Snim eSr : lHph SlSh eSr liSbab arbeh eSr : lblgh HmSh eSr lamr SSh eSr : lHcir Sbeh eSr lhpzz Smonh eSr : lptHih tSeh eSr liHcqal heSrim : likin aHd oeSrim lgmol Snim oeSrim : ldliho SlSh oeSrim lmeciho arbeh oeSrim : alh pqdtm lebdtm lboa lbit ihoh kmSpTm bid ahrn abihm kaSr zoho ihoh alhi iSral : olbni loi hnotrim lbni emrm Sobal lbni Sobal iHdiho : lrHbiho lbni rHbiho hraS iSih : lizhri Slmot lbni Slmot iHt : obni iriho amriho hSni iHcial hSliSi iqmem hrbiei : bni ecial mikh lbni mikh Smor : aHi mikh iSih lbni iSih ckriho : bni mrri mHli omoSi bni ieciho bno : bni mrri lieciho bno oShm ockor oebri : lmHli alecr ola hih lo bnim : lqiS bni qiS irHmal : obni moSi mHli oedr oirimot alh bni hloim lbit abtihm : oipilo gm hm gorlot lemt aHihm bni ahrn lpni doid hmlk ozdoq oaHimlk oraSi habot lkhnim olloim abot hraS lemt aHio hqTn :

25

oibdl doid oSri hzba lebdh lbni asp ohimn oidoton hnbiaim bknrot bnblim obmzltim oihi msprm anSi mlakh lebdtm : lbni asp ckor oiosp ontnih oaSralh bni asp el id asp hnba el idi hmlk : lidoton bni idoton gdliho ozri oiSeiho HSbiho omttiho SSh el idi abihm idoton bknor hnba el hdot ohll lihoh : lhimn bni himn bqiho mtniho ecial Sboal oirimot Hnnih Hnni aliath gdlti ormmti ecr iSbqSh mloti hotir mHciaot : kl alh bnim lhimn Hch hmlk bdbri halhim lhrim qrn oitn halhim lhimn bnim arbeh eSr obnot SloS : kl alh el idi abihm bSir bit ihoh bmzltim nblim oknrot lebdt bit halhim el idi hmlk asp oidoton ohimn : oihi msprm em aHihm mlmdi Sir lihoh kl hmbin matim Smonim oSmonh : oipilo gorlot mSmrt lemt kqTn kgdol mbin em tlmid : oiza hgorl hraSon lasp liosp gdliho hSni hoa oaHio obnio Snim eSr : hSlSi ckor bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hrbiei lizri bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hHmiSi ntniho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hSSi bqiho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hSbei iSralh bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hSmini iSeiho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : htSiei mtniho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : heSiri Smei bnio oaHio Snim eSr : eSti eSr ecral bnio oaHio Snim eSr : hSnim eSr lHSbih bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSlSh eSr Sobal bnio oaHio Snim eSr : larbeh eSr mttiho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lHmSh eSr lirmot bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSSh eSr lHnniho bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSbeh eSr liSbqSh bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSmonh eSr lHnni bnio oaHio Snim eSr : ltSeh eSr lmloti bnio oaHio Snim eSr : leSrim lalith bnio oaHio Snim eSr : laHd oeSrim lhotir bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSnim oeSrim lgdlti bnio oaHio Snim eSr : lSlSh oeSrim lmHciaot bnio oaHio Snim eSr : larbeh oeSrim lrommti ecr bnio oaHio Snim eSr :

26

lmHlqot lSerim lqrHim mSlmiho bn qra mn bni asp : olmSlmiho bnim ckriho hbkor idieal hSni cbdiho hSliSi itnial hrbiei : eilm hHmiSi ihoHnn hSSi alihoeini hSbiei : olebd adm bnim Smeih hbkor ihocbd hSni ioaH hSlSi oSkr hrbiei ontnal hHmiSi : emial hSSi iSSkr hSbiei pelti hSmini ki brko alhim : olSmeih bno nold bnim hmmSlim lbit abihm ki gbori Hil hmh : bni Smeih etni orpal oeobd alcbd aHio bni Hil aliho osmkiho : kl alh mbni ebd adm hmh obnihm oaHihm aiS Hil bkH lebdh SSim oSnim lebd adm : olmSlmiho bnim oaHim bni Hil Smonh eSr : olHsh mn bni mrri bnim Smri hraS ki la hih bkor oiSimho abiho lraS : Hlqiho hSni Tbliho hSlSi ckriho hrbei kl bnim oaHim lHsh SlSh eSr : lalh mHlqot hSerim lraSi hgbrim mSmrot lemt aHihm lSrt bbit ihoh : oipilo gorlot kqTn kgdol lbit abotm lSer oSer : oipl hgorl mcrHh lSlmiho ockriho bno ioez bSkl hpilo gorlot oiza gorlo zponh : lebd adm ngbh olbnio bit haspim : lSpim olHsh lmerb em Ser Slkt bmslh heolh mSmr lemt mSmr : lmcrH hloim SSh lzponh liom arbeh lngbh liom arbeh olaspim Snim Snim : lprbr lmerb arbeh lmslh Snim lprbr : alh mHlqot hSerim lbni hqrHi olbni mrri : ohloim aHih el aozrot bit halhim olazrot hqdSim : bni ledn bni hgrSni lledn raSi habot lledn hgrSni iHiali : bni iHiali ctm oioal aHio el azrot bit ihoh : lemrmi lizhri lHbroni leciali : oSbal bn grSom bn mSh ngid el hazrot : oaHio laliecr rHbiho bno oiSeiho bno oirm bno ockri bno oSlmot bno : hoa Slmot oaHio el kl azrot hqdSim aSr hqdiS doid hmlk oraSi habot lSri halpim ohmaot oSri hzba : mn hmlHmot omn hSll hqdiSo lHcq lbit ihoh : okl hhqdiS Smoal hrah oSaol bn qiS oabnr bn nr oioab bn zroih kl hmqdiS el id Slmit oaHio : lizhri knniho obnio lmlakh hHizonh el iSral lSTrim olSpTim : lHbroni HSbiho oaHio bni Hil alp oSbe maot el pqdt iSral mebr lirdn merbh lkl mlakt ihoh olebdt hmlk : lHbroni irih hraS lHbroni ltldtio labot bSnt harbeim lmlkot doid ndrSo oimza bhm gbori Hil biecir gled : oaHio bni Hil alpim oSbe maot raSi habot oipqidm doid hmlk el hraobni ohgdi oHzi SbT hmnSi lkl dbr halhim odbr hmlk :

27

obni iSral lmsprm raSi habot oSri halpim ohmaot oSTrihm hmSrtim at hmlk lkl dbr hmHlqot hbah ohizat HdS bHdS lkl HdSi hSnh hmHlqt haHt eSrim oarbeh alp : el hmHlqt hraSonh lHdS hraSon iSbem bn cbdial oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : mn bni prz hraS lkl Sri hzbaot lHdS hraSon : oel mHlqt hHdS hSni dodi haHoHi omHlqto omqlot hngid oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : Sr hzba hSliSi lHdS hSliSi bniho bn ihoide hkhn raS oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hoa bniho gbor hSlSim oel hSlSim omHlqto emicbd bno : hrbiei lHdS hrbiei eSh al aHi ioab ocbdih bno aHrio oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hHmiSi lHdS hHmiSi hSr Smhot hicrH oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hSSi lHdS hSSi eira bn eqS htqoei oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hSbiei lHdS hSbiei Hlz hploni mn bni aprim oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hSmini lHdS hSmini sbki hHSti lcrHi oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : htSiei lHdS htSiei abiecr hentti lbnimini oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : heSiri lHdS heSiri mhri hnTopti lcrHi oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : eSti eSr leSti eSr hHdS bnih hpretoni mn bni aprim oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : hSnim eSr lSnim eSr hHdS Hldi hnTopti letnial oel mHlqto eSrim oarbeh alp : oel SbTi iSral lraobni ngid aliecr bn ckri lSmeoni SpTiho bn mekh : lloi HSbih bn qmoal lahrn zdoq : lihodh aliho maHi doid liSSkr emri bn mikal : lcboln iSmeiho bn ebdiho lnptli irimot bn ecrial : lbni aprim hoSe bn ecciho lHzi SbT mnSh ioal bn pdiho : lHzi hmnSh gledh ido bn ckriho lbnimn ieSial bn abnr : ldn ecral bn irHm alh Sri SbTi iSral : ola nSa doid msprm lmbn eSrim Snh olmTh ki amr ihoh lhrbot at iSral kkokbi hSmim : ioab bn zroih hHl lmnot ola klh oihi bcat qzp el iSral ola elh hmspr bmspr dbri himim lmlk doid : oel azrot hmlk ecmot bn edial oel hazrot bSdh berim obkprim obmgdlot ihontn bn eciho : oel eSi mlakt hSdh lebdt hadmh ecri bn klob : oel hkrmim Smei hrmti oel Sbkrmim lazrot hiin cbdi hSpmi : oel hcitim ohSqmim aSr bSplh bel Hnn hgdri oel azrot hSmn ioeS : oel hbqr hreim bSron STri hSroni oel hbqr bemqim SpT bn edli : oel hgmlim aobil hiSmeli oel hatnot iHdiho hmrnti : oel hzan icic hhgri kl alh Sri hrkoS aSr lmlk doid : oihontn dod doid ioez aiS mbin osopr hoa oiHial bn Hkmoni em bni hmlk : oaHitpl ioez lmlk oHoSi harki re hmlk : oaHri aHitpl ihoide bn bniho oabitr oSr zba lmlk ioab :

28

oiqhl doid at kl Sri iSral Sri hSbTim oSri hmHlqot hmSrtim at hmlk oSri halpim oSri hmaot oSri kl rkoS omqnh lmlk olbnio em hsrisim ohgborim olkl gbor Hil al iroSlm : oiqm doid hmlk el rglio oiamr Smeoni aHi oemi ani em lbbi lbnot bit mnoHh laron brit ihoh olhdm rgli alhino ohkinoti lbnot : ohalhim amr li la tbnh bit lSmi ki aiS mlHmot ath odmim Spkt : oibHr ihoh alhi iSral bi mkl bit abi lhiot lmlk el iSral leolm ki bihodh bHr lngid obbit ihodh bit abi obbni abi bi rzh lhmlik el kl iSral : omkl bni ki rbim bnim ntn li ihoh oibHr bSlmh bni lSbt el ksa mlkot ihoh el iSral : oiamr li Slmh bnk hoa ibnh biti oHzroti ki bHrti bo li lbn oani ahih lo lab : ohkinoti at mlkoto ed leolm am iHcq leSot mzoti omSpTi kiom hch : oeth leini kl iSral qhl ihoh obacni alhino Smro odrSo kl mzot ihoh alhikm lmen tirSo at harz hTobh ohnHltm lbnikm aHrikm ed eolm : oath Slmh bni de at alhi abik oebdho blb Slm obnpS Hpzh ki kl lbbot dorS ihoh okl izr mHSbot mbin am tdrSno imza lk oam tecbno icniHk led : rah eth ki ihoh bHr bk lbnot bit lmqdS Hcq oeSh : oitn doid lSlmh bno at tbnit haolm oat btio ognckio oelitio oHdrio hpnimim obit hkprt : otbnit kl aSr hih broH emo lHzrot bit ihoh olkl hlSkot sbib lazrot bit halhim olazrot hqdSim : olmHlqot hkhnim ohloim olkl mlakt ebodt bit ihoh olkl kli ebodt bit ihoh : lchb bmSql lchb lkl kli ebodh oebodh lkl kli hksp bmSql lkl kli ebodh oebodh : omSql lmnrot hchb onrtihm chb bmSql mnorh omnorh onrtih olmnrot hksp bmSql lmnorh onrtih kebodt mnorh omnorh : oat hchb mSql lSlHnot hmerkt lSlHn oSlHn oksp lSlHnot hksp : ohmclgot ohmcrqot ohqSot chb Thor olkpori hchb bmSql lkpor okpor olkpori hksp bmSql lkpor okpor : olmcbH hqTrt chb mcqq bmSql oltbnit hmrkbh hkrbim chb lprSim oskkim el aron brit ihoh : hkl bktb mid ihoh eli hSkil kl mlakot htbnit : oiamr doid lSlmh bno Hcq oamz oeSh al tira oal tHt ki ihoh alhim alhi emk la irpk ola iecbk ed lklot kl mlakt ebodt bit ihoh : ohnh mHlqot hkhnim ohloim lkl ebodt bit halhim oemk bkl mlakh lkl ndib bHkmh lkl ebodh ohSrim okl hem lkl dbrik :

29

oiamr doid hmlk lkl hqhl Slmh bni aHd bHr bo alhim ner ork ohmlakh gdolh ki la ladm hbirh ki lihoh alhim : okkl kHi hkinoti lbit alhi hchb lchb ohksp lksp ohnHSt lnHSt hbrcl lbrcl ohezim lezim abni Shm omloaim abni pok orqmh okl abn iqrh oabni SiS lrb : oeod brzoti bbit alhi iS li sglh chb oksp ntti lbit alhi lmelh mkl hkinoti lbit hqdS : SlSt alpim kkri chb mchb aopir oSbet alpim kkr ksp mcqq lToH qirot hbtim : lchb lchb olksp lksp olkl mlakh bid HrSim omi mtndb lmlaot ido hiom lihoh : oitndbo Sri habot oSri SbTi iSral oSri halpim ohmaot olSri mlakt hmlk : oitno lebodt bit halhim chb kkrim HmSt alpim oadrknim rbo oksp kkrim eSrt alpim onHSt rbo oSmont alpim kkrim obrcl mah alp kkrim : ohnmza ato abnim ntno laozr bit ihoh el id iHial hgrSni : oiSmHo hem el htndbm ki blb Slm htndbo lihoh ogm doid hmlk SmH SmHh gdolh : oibrk doid at ihoh leini kl hqhl oiamr doid brok ath ihoh alhi iSral abino meolm oed eolm : lk ihoh hgdlh ohgborh ohtpart ohnzH ohhod ki kl bSmim obarz lk ihoh hmmlkh ohmtnSa lkl lraS : oheSr ohkbod mlpnik oath moSl bkl obidk kH ogborh obidk lgdl olHcq lkl : oeth alhino modim anHno lk omhllim lSm tpartk : oki mi ani omi emi ki nezr kH lhtndb kcat ki mmk hkl omidk ntno lk : ki grim anHno lpnik otoSbim kkl abtino kzl imino el harz oain mqoh : ihoh alhino kl hhmon hch aSr hkinno lbnot lk bit lSm qdSk midk hia olk hkl : oideti alhi ki ath bHn lbb omiSrim trzh ani biSr lbbi htndbti kl alh oeth emk hnmzao ph raiti bSmHh lhtndb lk : ihoh alhi abrhm izHq oiSral abtino Smrh cat leolm lizr mHSbot lbb emk ohkn lbbm alik : olSlmh bni tn lbb Slm lSmor mzotik edotik oHqik oleSot hkl olbnot hbirh aSr hkinoti : oiamr doid lkl hqhl brko na at ihoh alhikm oibrko kl hqhl lihoh alhi abtihm oiqdo oiStHoo lihoh olmlk : oicbHo lihoh cbHim oielo elot lihoh lmHrt hiom hhoa prim alp ailim alp kbSim alp onskihm ocbHim lrb lkl iSral : oiaklo oiSto lpni ihoh biom hhoa bSmHh gdolh oimliko Snit lSlmh bn doid oimSHo lihoh lngid olzdoq lkhn : oiSb Slmh el ksa ihoh lmlk tHt doid abio oizlH oiSmeo alio kl iSral : okl hSrim ohgbrim ogm kl bni hmlk doid ntno id tHt Slmh hmlk : oigdl ihoh at Slmh lmelh leini kl iSral oitn elio hod mlkot aSr la hih el kl mlk lpnio el iSral : odoid bn iSi mlk el kl iSral : ohimim aSr mlk el iSral arbeim Snh bHbron mlk Sbe Snim obiroSlm mlk SlSim oSloS : oimt bSibh Tobh Sbe imim eSr okbod oimlk Slmh bno tHtio : odbri doid hmlk hraSnim ohaHrnim hnm ktobim el dbri Smoal hrah oel dbri ntn hnbia oel dbri gd hHch : em kl mlkoto ogborto ohetim aSr ebro elio oel iSral oel kl mmlkot harzot :

dbri himim b

1

oitHcq Slmh bn doid el mlkoto oihoh alhio emo oigdlho lmelh : oiamr Slmh lkl iSral lSri halpim ohmaot olSpTim olkl nSia lkl iSral raSi habot : oilko Slmh okl hqhl emo lbmh aSr bgbeon ki Sm hih ahl moed halhim aSr eSh mSh ebd ihoh bmdbr : abl aron halhim helh doid mqrit ierim bhkin lo doid ki nTh lo ahl biroSlm : omcbH hnHSt aSr eSh bzlal bn aori bn Hor Sm lpni mSkn ihoh oidrSho Slmh ohqhl : oiel Slmh Sm el mcbH hnHSt lpni ihoh aSr lahl moed oiel elio elot alp : blilh hhoa nrah alhim lSlmh oiamr lo Sal mh atn lk : oiamr Slmh lalhim ath eSit em doid abi Hsd gdol ohmlktni tHtio : eth ihoh alhim iamn dbrk em doid abi ki ath hmlktni el em rb kepr harz : eth Hkmh omde tn li oazah lpni hem hch oaboah ki mi iSpT at emk hch hgdol : oiamr alhim lSlmh ien aSr hith cat em lbbk ola Salt eSr nksim okbod oat npS Snaik ogm imim rbim la Salt otSal lk Hkmh omde aSr tSpoT at emi aSr hmlktik elio : hHkmh ohmde nton lk oeSr onksim okbod atn lk aSr la hih kn lmlkim aSr lpnik oaHrik la ihih kn : oiba Slmh lbmh aSr bgbeon iroSlm mlpni ahl moed oimlk el iSral : oiasp Slmh rkb oprSim oihi lo alp oarbe maot rkb oSnim eSr alp prSim oiniHm beri hrkb oem hmlk biroSlm : oitn hmlk at hksp oat hchb biroSlm kabnim oat harcim ntn kSqmim aSr bSplh lrb : omoza hsosim aSr lSlmh mmzrim omqoa sHri hmlk mqoa iqHo bmHir : oielo oioziao mmzrim mrkbh bSS maot ksp osos bHmSim omah okn lkl mlki hHtim omlki arm bidm ioziao :

2

oiamr Slmh lbnot bit lSm ihoh obit lmlkoto : oispr Slmh Sbeim alp aiS sbl oSmonim alp aiS Hzb bhr omnzHim elihm SlSt alpim oSS maot : oiSlH Slmh al Horm mlk zr lamr kaSr eSit em doid abi otSlH lo arcim lbnot lo bit lSbt bo : hnh ani bonh bit lSm ihoh alhi lhqdiS lo lhqTir lpnio qTrt smim omerkt tmid oelot lbqr olerb lSbtot olHdSim olmoedi ihoh alhino leolm cat el iSral : ohbit aSr ani bonh gdol ki gdol alhino mkl halhim : omi iezr kH lbnot lo bit ki hSmim oSmi hSmim la iklklho omi ani aSr abnh lo bit ki am lhqTir lpnio : oeth SlH li aiS Hkm leSot bchb obksp obnHSt obbrcl obargon okrmil otklt oide lptH ptoHim em hHkmim aSr emi bihodh obiroSlm aSr hkin doid abi : oSlH li ezi arcim broSim oalgomim mhlbnon ki ani ideti aSr ebdik iodeim lkrot ezi lbnon ohnh ebdi em ebdik : olhkin li ezim lrb ki hbit aSr ani bonh gdol ohpla : ohnh lHTbim lkrti hezim ntti HTim mkot lebdik krim eSrim alp oSerim krim eSrim alp oiin btim eSrim alp oSmn btim eSrim alp : oiamr Horm mlk zr bktb oiSlH al Slmh bahbt ihoh at emo ntnk elihm mlk : oiamr Horm brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr eSh at hSmim oat harz aSr ntn ldoid hmlk bn Hkm iode Skl obinh aSr ibnh bit lihoh obit lmlkoto : oeth SlHti aiS Hkm iode binh lHorm abi : bn aSh mn bnot dn oabio aiS zri iode leSot bchb obksp bnHSt bbrcl babnim obezim bargmn btklt obboz obkrmil olptH kl ptoH olHSb kl mHSbt aSr intn lo em Hkmik oHkmi adni doid abik : oeth hHTim ohSerim hSmn ohiin aSr amr adni iSlH lebdio : oanHno nkrt ezim mn hlbnon kkl zrkk onbiam lk rpsdot el im ipo oath telh atm iroSlm : oispr Slmh kl hanSim hgirim aSr barz iSral aHri hspr aSr sprm doid abio oimzao mah oHmSim alp oSlSt alpim oSS maot : oieS mhm Sbeim alp sbl oSmnim alp Hzb bhr oSlSt alpim oSS maot mnzHim lhebid at hem :

3

oiHl Slmh lbnot at bit ihoh biroSlm bhr hmorih aSr nrah ldoid abiho aSr hkin bmqom doid bgrn arnn hibosi : oiHl lbnot bHdS hSni bSni bSnt arbe lmlkoto : oalh hosd Slmh lbnot at bit halhim hark amot bmdh hraSonh amot SSim orHb amot eSrim : ohaolm aSr el pni hark el pni rHb hbit amot eSrim ohgbh mah oeSrim oizpho mpnimh chb Thor : oat hbit hgdol Hph ez broSim oiHpho chb Tob oiel elio tmrim oSrSrot : oizp at hbit abn iqrh ltpart ohchb chb proim : oiHp at hbit hqrot hspim oqirotio odltotio chb optH krobim el hqirot : oieS at bit qdS hqdSim arko el pni rHb hbit amot eSrim orHbo amot eSrim oiHpho chb Tob lkkrim SS maot : omSql lmsmrot lSqlim HmSim chb oheliot Hph chb : oieS bbit qdS hqdSim krobim Snim meSh zezeim oizpo atm chb : oknpi hkrobim arkm amot eSrim knp haHd lamot HmS mget lqir hbit ohknp haHrt amot HmS mgie lknp hkrob haHr : oknp hkrob haHd amot HmS mgie lqir hbit ohknp haHrt amot HmS dbqh lknp hkrob haHr : knpi hkrobim halh prSim amot eSrim ohm emdim el rglihm opnihm lbit : oieS at hprkt tklt oargmn okrmil oboz oiel elio krobim : oieS lpni hbit emodim Snim amot SlSim oHmS ark ohzpt aSr el raSo amot HmS : oieS SrSrot bdbir oitn el raS hemdim oieS rmonim mah oitn bSrSrot : oiqm at hemodim el pni hhikl aHd mimin oaHd mhSmaol oiqra Sm himini ikin oSm hSmali bec :

4

oieS mcbH nHSt eSrim amh arko oeSrim amh rHbo oeSr amot qomto : oieS at him mozq eSr bamh mSpto al Spto egol sbib oHmS bamh qomto oqo SlSim bamh isb ato sbib : odmot bqrim tHt lo sbib sbib sobbim ato eSr bamh mqipim at him sbib Snim Torim hbqr izoqim bmzqto : eomd el Snim eSr bqr SlSh pnim zponh oSloSh pnim imh oSlSh pnim ngbh oSlSh pnim mcrHh ohim elihm mlmelh okl aHrihm bith : oebio TpH oSpto kmeSh Spt kos prH SoSnh mHciq btim SlSt alpim ikil : oieS kiorim eSrh oitn HmSh mimin oHmSh mSmaol lrHzh bhm at meSh heolh idiHo bm ohim lrHzh lkhnim bo : oieS at mnrot hchb eSr kmSpTm oitn bhikl HmS mimin oHmS mSmaol : oieS SlHnot eSrh oinH bhikl HmSh mimin oHmSh mSmaol oieS mcrqi chb mah : oieS Hzr hkhnim ohecrh hgdolh odltot lecrh odltotihm zph nHSt : oat him ntn mktp himnit qdmh mmol ngbh : oieS Horm at hsirot oat hieim oat hmcrqot oikl Hirm leSot at hmlakh aSr eSh lmlk Slmh bbit halhim : emodim Snim ohglot ohktrot el raS hemodim Stim ohSbkot Stim lksot at Sti glot hktrot aSr el raS hemodim : oat hrmonim arbe maot lSti hSbkot Snim Torim rmonim lSbkh haHt lksot at Sti glot hktrot aSr el pni hemodim : oat hmknot eSh oat hkirot eSh el hmknot : at him aHd oat hbqr Snim eSr tHtio : oat hsirot oat hieim oat hmclgot oat kl klihm eSh Horm abio lmlk Slmh lbit ihoh nHSt mroq : bkkr hirdn izqm hmlk bebi hadmh bin skot obin zrdth : oieS Slmh kl hklim halh lrb mad ki la nHqr mSql hnHSt : oieS Slmh at kl hklim aSr bit halhim oat mcbH hchb oat hSlHnot oelihm lHm hpnim : oat hmnrot onrtihm lberm kmSpT lpni hdbir chb sgor : ohprH ohnrot ohmlqHim chb hoa mklot chb : ohmcmrot ohmcrqot ohkpot ohmHtot chb sgor optH hbit dltotio hpnimiot lqdS hqdSim odlti hbit lhikl chb :

5

otSlm kl hmlakh aSr eSh Slmh lbit ihoh oiba Slmh at qdSi doid abio oat hksp oat hchb oat kl hklim ntn bazrot bit halhim : ac iqhil Slmh at cqni iSral oat kl raSi hmTot nSiai habot lbni iSral al iroSlm lhelot at aron brit ihoh meir doid hia zion : oiqhlo al hmlk kl aiS iSral bHg hoa hHdS hSbei : oibao kl cqni iSral oiSao hloim at haron : oielo at haron oat ahl moed oat kl kli hqdS aSr bahl helo atm hkhnim hloim : ohmlk Slmh okl edt iSral hnoedim elio lpni haron mcbHim zan obqr aSr la ispro ola imno mrb : oibiao hkhnim at aron brit ihoh al mqomo al dbir hbit al qdS hqdSim al tHt knpi hkrobim : oihio hkrobim prSim knpim el mqom haron oikso hkrobim el haron oel bdio mlmelh : oiariko hbdim oirao raSi hbdim mn haron el pni hdbir ola irao hHozh oihi Sm ed hiom hch : ain baron rq Sni hlHot aSr ntn mSh bHrb aSr krt ihoh em bni iSral bzatm mmzrim : oihi bzat hkhnim mn hqdS ki kl hkhnim hnmzaim htqdSo ain lSmor lmHlqot : ohloim hmSrrim lklm lasp lhimn lidton olbnihm olaHihm mlbSim boz bmzltim obnblim oknrot emdim mcrH lmcbH oemhm khnim lmah oeSrim mHzrrim bHzzrot : oihi kaHd lmHzzrim olmSrrim lhSmie qol aHd lhll olhdot lihoh okhrim qol bHzzrot obmzltim obkli hSir obhll lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo ohbit mla enn bit ihoh : ola iklo hkhnim lemod lSrt mpni henn ki mla kbod ihoh at bit halhim :

6

ac amr Slmh ihoh amr lSkon berpl : oani bniti bit cbl lk omkon lSbtk eolmim : oisb hmlk at pnio oibrk at kl qhl iSral okl qhl iSral eomd : oiamr brok ihoh alhi iSral aSr dbr bpio at doid abi obidio mla lamr : mn hiom aSr hozati at emi marz mzrim la bHrti beir mkl SbTi iSral lbnot bit lhiot Smi Sm ola bHrti baiS lhiot ngid el emi iSral : oabHr biroSlm lhiot Smi Sm oabHr bdoid lhiot el emi iSral : oihi em lbb doid abi lbnot bit lSm ihoh alhi iSral : oiamr ihoh al doid abi ien aSr hih em lbbk lbnot bit lSmi hTibot ki hih em lbbk : rq ath la tbnh hbit ki bnk hioza mHlzik hoa ibnh hbit lSmi : oiqm ihoh at dbro aSr dbr oaqom tHt doid abi oaSb el ksa iSral kaSr dbr ihoh oabnh hbit lSm ihoh alhi iSral : oaSim Sm at haron aSr Sm brit ihoh aSr krt em bni iSral : oiemd lpni mcbH ihoh ngd kl qhl iSral oiprS kpio : ki eSh Slmh kior nHSt oitnho btok hecrh HmS amot arko oHmS amot rHbo oamot SloS qomto oiemd elio oibrk el brkio ngd kl qhl iSral oiprS kpio hSmimh : oiamr ihoh alhi iSral ain kmok alhim bSmim obarz Smr hbrit ohHsd lebdik hhlkim lpnik bkl lbm : aSr Smrt lebdk doid abi at aSr dbrt lo otdbr bpik obidk mlat kiom hch : oeth ihoh alhi iSral Smr lebdk doid abi at aSr dbrt lo lamr la ikrt lk aiS mlpni ioSb el ksa iSral rq am iSmro bnik at drkm llkt btorti kaSr hlkt lpni : oeth ihoh alhi iSral iamn dbrk aSr dbrt lebdk ldoid : ki hamnm iSb alhim at hadm el harz hnh Smim oSmi hSmim la iklklok ap ki hbit hch aSr bniti : opnit al tplt ebdk oal tHnto ihoh alhi lSme al hrnh oal htplh aSr ebdk mtpll lpnik : lhiot einik ptHot al hbit hch iomm olilh al hmqom aSr amrt lSom Smk Sm lSmoe al htplh aSr itpll ebdk al hmqom hch : oSmet al tHnoni ebdk oemk iSral aSr itpllo al hmqom hch oath tSme mmqom Sbtk mn hSmim oSmet oslHt : am iHTa aiS lreho onSa bo alh lhalto oba alh lpni mcbHk bbit hch : oath tSme mn hSmim oeSit oSpTt at ebdik lhSib lrSe ltt drko braSo olhzdiq zdiq ltt lo kzdqto : oam ingp emk iSral lpni aoib ki iHTao lk oSbo ohodo at Smk ohtpllo ohtHnno lpnik bbit hch : oath tSme mn hSmim oslHt lHTat emk iSral ohSibotm al hadmh aSr ntth lhm olabtihm : bhezr hSmim ola ihih mTr ki iHTao lk ohtpllo al hmqom hch ohodo at Smk mHTatm iSobon ki tenm : oath tSme hSmim oslHt lHTat ebdik oemk iSral ki torm al hdrk hTobh aSr ilko bh ontth mTr el arzk aSr ntth lemk lnHlh : reb ki ihih barz dbr ki ihih Sdpon oirqon arbh oHsil ki ihih ki izr lo aoibio barz Serio kl nge okl mHlh : kl tplh kl tHnh aSr ihih lkl hadm olkl emk iSral aSr ideo aiS ngeo omkabo oprS kpio al hbit hch : oath tSme mn hSmim mkon Sbtk oslHt ontth laiS kkl drkio aSr tde at lbbo ki ath lbdk idet at lbb bni hadm : lmen iiraok llkt bdrkik kl himim aSr hm Hiim el pni hadmh aSr ntth labtino : ogm al hnkri aSr la memk iSral hoa oba marz rHoqh lmen Smk hgdol oidk hHcqh ocroek hnToih obao ohtpllo al hbit hch : oath tSme mn hSmim mmkon Sbtk oeSit kkl aSr iqra alik hnkri lmen ideo kl emi harz at Smk olirah atk kemk iSral oldet ki Smk nqra el hbit hch aSr bniti : ki iza emk lmlHmh el aoibio bdrk aSr tSlHm ohtpllo alik drk heir hcat aSr bHrt bh ohbit aSr bniti lSmk : oSmet mn hSmim at tpltm oat tHntm oeSit mSpTm : ki iHTao lk ki ain adm aSr la iHTa oanpt bm onttm lpni aoib oSbom Sobihm al arz rHoqh ao qrobh : ohSibo al lbbm barz aSr nSbo Sm oSbo ohtHnno alik barz Sbim lamr HTano heoino orSeno : oSbo alik bkl lbm obkl npSm barz Sbim aSr Sbo atm ohtpllo drk arzm aSr ntth labotm oheir aSr bHrt olbit aSr bniti lSmk : oSmet mn hSmim mmkon Sbtk at tpltm oat tHntihm oeSit mSpTm oslHt lemk aSr HTao lk : eth alhi ihio na einik ptHot oacnik qSbot ltplt hmqom hch : oeth qomh ihoh alhim lnoHk ath oaron eck khnik ihoh alhim ilbSo tSoeh oHsidik iSmHo bTob : ihoh alhim al tSb pni mSiHik ckrh lHsdi doid ebdk :

7

okklot Slmh lhtpll ohaS irdh mhSmim otakl helh ohcbHim okbod ihoh mla at hbit : ola iklo hkhnim lboa al bit ihoh ki mla kbod ihoh at bit ihoh : okl bni iSral raim brdt haS okbod ihoh el hbit oikreo apim arzh el hrzph oiStHoo ohodot lihoh ki Tob ki leolm Hsdo : ohmlk okl hem cbHim cbH lpni ihoh : oicbH hmlk Slmh at cbH hbqr eSrim oSnim alp ozan mah oeSrim alp oiHnko at bit halhim hmlk okl hem : ohkhnim el mSmrotm emdim ohloim bkli Sir ihoh aSr eSh doid hmlk lhdot lihoh ki leolm Hsdo bhll doid bidm ohkhnim mHzzrim ngdm okl iSral emdim : oiqdS Slmh at tok hHzr aSr lpni bit ihoh ki eSh Sm helot oat Hlbi hSlmim ki mcbH hnHSt aSr eSh Slmh la ikol lhkil at helh oat hmnHh oat hHlbim : oieS Slmh at hHg bet hhia Sbet imim okl iSral emo qhl gdol mad mlboa Hmt ed nHl mzrim : oieSo biom hSmini ezrt ki Hnkt hmcbH eSo Sbet imim ohHg Sbet imim : obiom eSrim oSlSh lHdS hSbiei SlH at hem lahlihm SmHim oTobi lb el hTobh aSr eSh ihoh ldoid olSlmh oliSral emo : oikl Slmh at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk oat kl hba el lb Slmh leSot bbit ihoh obbito hzliH : oira ihoh al Slmh blilh oiamr lo Smeti at tpltk obHrti bmqom hch li lbit cbH : hn aezr hSmim ola ihih mTr ohn azoh el Hgb lakol harz oam aSlH dbr bemi : oikneo emi aSr nqra Smi elihm oitpllo oibqSo pni oiSbo mdrkihm hreim oani aSme mn hSmim oaslH lHTatm oarpa at arzm : eth eini ihio ptHot oacni qSbot ltplt hmqom hch : oeth bHrti ohqdSti at hbit hch lhiot Smi Sm ed eolm ohio eini olbi Sm kl himim : oath am tlk lpni kaSr hlk doid abik oleSot kkl aSr zoitik oHqi omSpTi tSmor : ohqimoti at ksa mlkotk kaSr krti ldoid abik lamr la ikrt lk aiS moSl biSral : oam tSobon atm oecbtm Hqoti omzoti aSr ntti lpnikm ohlktm oebdtm alhim aHrim ohStHoitm lhm : ontStim mel admti aSr ntti lhm oat hbit hch aSr hqdSti lSmi aSlik mel pni oatnno lmSl olSninh bkl hemim : ohbit hch aSr hih elion lkl ebr elio iSm oamr bmh eSh ihoh kkh larz hcat olbit hch : oamro el aSr ecbo at ihoh alhi abtihm aSr hoziam marz mzrim oiHciqo balhim aHrim oiStHoo lhm oiebdom el kn hbia elihm at kl hreh hcat :

8

oihi mqz eSrim Snh aSr bnh Slmh at bit ihoh oat bito : oherim aSr ntn Horm lSlmh bnh Slmh atm oioSb Sm at bni iSral : oilk Slmh Hmt zobh oiHcq elih : oibn at tdmr bmdbr oat kl eri hmsknot aSr bnh bHmt : oibn at bit Horon helion oat bit Horon htHton eri mzor Homot dltim obriH : oat belt oat kl eri hmsknot aSr hio lSlmh oat kl eri hrkb oat eri hprSim oat kl HSq Slmh aSr HSq lbnot biroSlm oblbnon obkl arz mmSlto : kl hem hnotr mn hHti ohamri ohprci ohHoi ohibosi aSr la miSral hmh : mn bnihm aSr notro aHrihm barz aSr la klom bni iSral oielm Slmh lms ed hiom hch : omn bni iSral aSr la ntn Slmh lebdim lmlakto ki hmh anSi mlHmh oSri SliSio oSri rkbo oprSio : oalh Sri hnzibim aSr lmlk Slmh HmSim omatim hrdim bem : oat bt preh helh Slmh meir doid lbit aSr bnh lh ki amr la tSb aSh li bbit doid mlk iSral ki qdS hmh aSr bah alihm aron ihoh : ac helh Slmh elot lihoh el mcbH ihoh aSr bnh lpni haolm : obdbr iom biom lhelot kmzot mSh lSbtot olHdSim olmoedot SloS pemim bSnh bHg hmzot obHg hSbeot obHg hskot : oiemd kmSpT doid abio at mHlqot hkhnim el ebdtm ohloim el mSmrotm lhll olSrt ngd hkhnim ldbr iom biomo ohSoerim bmHlqotm lSer oSer ki kn mzot doid aiS halhim : ola sro mzot hmlk el hkhnim ohloim lkl dbr olazrot : otkn kl mlakt Slmh ed hiom mosd bit ihoh oed klto Slm bit ihoh : ac hlk Slmh lezion gbr oal ailot el Spt him barz adom : oiSlH lo Horm bid ebdio aoniot oebdim iodei im oibao em ebdi Slmh aopirh oiqHo mSm arbe maot oHmSim kkr chb oibiao al hmlk Slmh :

9

omlkt Sba Smeh at Sme Slmh otboa lnsot at Slmh bHidot biroSlm bHil kbd mad ogmlim nSaim bSmim ochb lrb oabn iqrh otboa al Slmh otdbr emo at kl aSr hih em lbbh : oigd lh Slmh at kl dbrih ola nelm dbr mSlmh aSr la hgid lh : otra mlkt Sba at Hkmt Slmh ohbit aSr bnh : omakl SlHno omoSb ebdio omemd mSrtio omlboSihm omSqio omlboSihm oelito aSr ielh bit ihoh ola hih eod bh roH : otamr al hmlk amt hdbr aSr Smeti barzi el dbrik oel Hkmtk : ola hamnti ldbrihm ed aSr bati otrainh eini ohnh la hgd li Hzi mrbit Hkmtk ispt el hSmoeh aSr Smeti : aSri anSik oaSri ebdik alh hemdim lpnik tmid oSmeim at Hkmtk : ihi ihoh alhik brok aSr Hpz bk lttk el ksao lmlk lihoh alhik bahbt alhik at iSral lhemido leolm oitnk elihm lmlk leSot mSpT ozdqh : ottn lmlk mah oeSrim kkr chb obSmim lrb mad oabn iqrh ola hih kbSm hhoa aSr ntnh mlkt Sba lmlk Slmh : ogm ebdi Hirm oebdi Slmh aSr hbiao chb maopir hbiao ezi algomim oabn iqrh : oieS hmlk at ezi halgomim mslot lbit ihoh olbit hmlk oknrot onblim lSrim ola nrao khm lpnim barz ihodh : ohmlk Slmh ntn lmlkt Sba at kl Hpzh aSr Salh mlbd aSr hbiah al hmlk othpk otlk larzh hia oebdih : oihi mSql hchb aSr ba lSlmh bSnh aHt SS maot oSSim oSS kkri chb : lbd manSi htrim ohsHrim mbiaim okl mlki erb opHot harz mbiaim chb oksp lSlmh : oieS hmlk Slmh matim znh chb SHoT SS maot chb SHoT ielh el hznh haHt : oSlS maot mgnim chb SHoT SlS maot chb ielh el hmgn haHt oitnm hmlk bbit ier hlbnon : oieS hmlk ksa Sn gdol oizpho chb Thor : oSS melot lksa okbS bchb lksa maHcim oidot mch omch el mqom hSbt oSnim ariot emdim azl hidot : oSnim eSr ariot emdim Sm el SS hmelot mch omch la neSh kn lkl mmlkh : okl kli mSqh hmlk Slmh chb okl kli bit ier hlbnon chb sgor ain ksp nHSb bimi Slmh lmaomh : ki aniot lmlk hlkot trSiS em ebdi Horm aHt lSloS Snim tboanh aniot trSiS nSaot chb oksp Snhbim oqopim otokiim : oigdl hmlk Slmh mkl mlki harz leSr oHkmh : okl mlki harz mbqSim at pni Slmh lSme at Hkmto aSr ntn halhim blbo : ohm mbiaim aiS mnHto kli ksp okli chb oSlmot nSq obSmim sosim oprdim dbr Snh bSnh : oihi lSlmh arbet alpim ariot sosim omrkbot oSnim eSr alp prSim oiniHm beri hrkb oem hmlk biroSlm : oihi moSl bkl hmlkim mn hnhr oed arz plStim oed gbol mzrim : oitn hmlk at hksp biroSlm kabnim oat harcim ntn kSqmim aSr bSplh lrb : omoziaim sosim mmzrim lSlmh omkl harzot : oSar dbri Slmh hraSnim ohaHronim hla hm ktobim el dbri ntn hnbia oel nboat aHih hSiloni obHcot iedi hHch el irbem bn nbT : oimlk Slmh biroSlm el kl iSral arbeim Snh : oiSkb Slmh em abtio oiqbrho beir doid abio oimlk rHbem bno tHtio :

10

oilk rHbem Skmh ki Skm bao kl iSral lhmlik ato : oihi kSme irbem bn nbT ohoa bmzrim aSr brH mpni Slmh hmlk oiSb irbem mmzrim : oiSlHo oiqrao lo oiba irbem okl iSral oidbro al rHbem lamr : abik hqSh at elno oeth hql mebdt abik hqSh omelo hkbd aSr ntn elino onebdk : oiamr alhm eod SlSt imim oSobo ali oilk hem : oioez hmlk rHbem at hcqnim aSr hio emdim lpni Slmh abio bhito Hi lamr aik atm noezim lhSib lem hch dbr : oidbro alio lamr am thih lTob lhem hch orzitm odbrt alhm dbrim Tobim ohio lk ebdim kl himim : oiecb at ezt hcqnim aSr iezho oioez at hildim aSr gdlo ato hemdim lpnio : oiamr alhm mh atm noezim onSib dbr at hem hch aSr dbro ali lamr hql mn hel aSr ntn abik elino : oidbro ato hildim aSr gdlo ato lamr kh tamr lem aSr dbro alik lamr abik hkbid at elno oath hql melino kh tamr alhm qTni ebh mmtni abi : oeth abi hemis elikm el kbd oani asip el elkm abi isr atkm bSoTim oani beqrbim : oiba irbem okl hem al rHbem biom hSlSi kaSr dbr hmlk lamr Sobo ali biom hSlSi : oienm hmlk qSh oiecb hmlk rHbem at ezt hcqnim : oidbr alhm kezt hildim lamr akbid at elkm oani asip elio abi isr atkm bSoTim oani beqrbim : ola Sme hmlk al hem ki hith nsbh mem halhim lmen hqim ihoh at dbro aSr dbr bid aHiho hSloni al irbem bn nbT : okl iSral ki la Sme hmlk lhm oiSibo hem at hmlk lamr mh lno Hlq bdoid ola nHlh bbn iSi aiS lahlik iSral eth rah bitk doid oilk kl iSral lahlio : obni iSral hiSbim beri ihodh oimlk elihm rHbem : oiSlH hmlk rHbem at hdrm aSr el hms oirgmo bo bni iSral abn oimt ohmlk rHbem htamz lelot bmrkbh lnos iroSlm : oipSeo iSral bbit doid ed hiom hch :

11

oiba rHbem iroSlm oiqhl at bit ihodh obnimn mah oSmonim alp bHor eSh mlHmh lhlHm em iSral lhSib at hmmlkh lrHbem : oihi dbr ihoh al Smeiho aiS halhim lamr : amr al rHbem bn Slmh mlk ihodh oal kl iSral bihodh obnimn lamr : kh amr ihoh la telo ola tlHmo em aHikm Sobo aiS lbito ki mati nhih hdbr hch oiSmeo at dbri ihoh oiSbo mlkt al irbem : oiSb rHbem biroSlm oibn erim lmzor bihodh : oibn at bit lHm oat eiTm oat tqoe : oat bit zor oat Soko oat edlm : oat gt oat mrSh oat cip : oat adorim oat lkiS oat ecqh : oat zreh oat ailon oat Hbron aSr bihodh obbnimn eri mzrot : oiHcq at hmzrot oitn bhm ngidim oazrot makl oSmn oiin : obkl eir oeir znot ormHim oiHcqm lhrbh mad oihi lo ihodh obnimn : ohkhnim ohloim aSr bkl iSral htizbo elio mkl gbolm : ki ecbo hloim at mgrSihm oaHctm oilko lihodh oliroSlm ki hcniHm irbem obnio mkhn lihoh : oiemd lo khnim lbmot olSeirim oleglim aSr eSh : oaHrihm mkl SbTi iSral hntnim at lbbm lbqS at ihoh alhi iSral bao iroSlm lcboH lihoh alhi abotihm : oiHcqo at mlkot ihodh oiamzo at rHbem bn Slmh lSnim SloS ki hlko bdrk doid oSlmh lSnim SloS : oiqH lo rHbem aSh at mHlt bn irimot bn doid abihil bt aliab bn iSi : otld lo bnim at ieoS oat Smrih oat chm : oaHrih lqH at mekh bt abSlom otld lo at abih oat eti oat cica oat Slmit : oiahb rHbem at mekh bt abSlom mkl nSio opilgSio ki nSim Smonh eSrh nSa opilgSim SSim oiold eSrim oSmonh bnim oSSim bnot : oiemd lraS rHbem at abih bn mekh lngid baHio ki lhmliko : oibn oiprz mkl bnio lkl arzot ihodh obnimn lkl eri hmzrot oitn lhm hmcon lrb oiSal hmon nSim :

12

oihi khkin mlkot rHbem okHcqto ecb at tort ihoh okl iSral emo : oihi bSnh hHmiSit lmlk rHbem elh SiSq mlk mzrim el iroSlm ki melo bihoh : balp omatim rkb obSSim alp prSim oain mspr lem aSr bao emo mmzrim lobim skiim okoSim : oilkd at eri hmzrot aSr lihodh oiba ed iroSlm : oSmeih hnbia ba al rHbem oSri ihodh aSr naspo al iroSlm mpni SiSq oiamr lhm kh amr ihoh atm ecbtm ati oap ani ecbti atkm bid SiSq : oikneo Sri iSral ohmlk oiamro zdiq ihoh : obraot ihoh ki nkneo hih dbr ihoh al Smeih lamr nkneo la aSHitm ontti lhm kmeT lpliTh ola ttk Hmti biroSlm bid SiSq : ki ihio lo lebdim oideo ebodti oebodt mmlkot harzot : oiel SiSq mlk mzrim el iroSlm oiqH at azrot bit ihoh oat azrot bit hmlk at hkl lqH oiqH at mgni hchb aSr eSh Slmh : oieS hmlk rHbem tHtihm mgni nHSt ohpqid el id Sri hrzim hSmrim ptH bit hmlk : oihi mdi boa hmlk bit ihoh bao hrzim onSaom ohSbom al ta hrzim : obhkneo Sb mmno ap ihoh ola lhSHit lklh ogm bihodh hih dbrim Tobim : oitHcq hmlk rHbem biroSlm oimlk ki bn arbeim oaHt Snh rHbem bmlko oSbe eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm heir aSr bHr ihoh lSom at Smo Sm mkl SbTi iSral oSm amo nemh hemnit : oieS hre ki la hkin lbo ldroS at ihoh : odbri rHbem hraSnim ohaHronim hla hm ktobim bdbri Smeih hnbia oedo hHch lhtiHS omlHmot rHbem oirbem kl himim : oiSkb rHbem em abtio oiqbr beir doid oimlk abih bno tHtio :

13

bSnt Smonh eSrh lmlk irbem oimlk abih el ihodh : SloS Snim mlk biroSlm oSm amo mikiho bt aorial mn gbeh omlHmh hith bin abih obin irbem : oiasr abih at hmlHmh bHil gbori mlHmh arbe maot alp aiS bHor oirbem erk emo mlHmh bSmonh maot alp aiS bHor gbor Hil : oiqm abih mel lhr zmrim aSr bhr aprim oiamr Smeoni irbem okl iSral : hla lkm ldet ki ihoh alhi iSral ntn mmlkh ldoid el iSral leolm lo olbnio brit mlH : oiqm irbem bn nbT ebd Slmh bn doid oimrd el adnio : oiqbzo elio anSim rqim bni bliel oitamzo el rHbem bn Slmh orHbem hih ner ork lbb ola htHcq lpnihm : oeth atm amrim lhtHcq lpni mmlkt ihoh bid bni doid oatm hmon rb oemkm egli chb aSr eSh lkm irbem lalhim : hla hdHtm at khni ihoh at bni ahrn ohloim oteSo lkm khnim kemi harzot kl hba lmla ido bpr bn bqr oailm Sbeh ohih khn lla alhim : oanHno ihoh alhino ola ecbnho okhnim mSrtim lihoh bni ahrn ohloim bmlakt : omqTrim lihoh elot bbqr bbqr oberb berb oqTrt smim omerkt lHm el hSlHn hThor omnort hchb onrtih lber berb berb ki Smrim anHno at mSmrt ihoh alhino oatm ecbtm ato : ohnh emno braS halhim okhnio oHzzrot htroeh lhrie elikm bni iSral al tlHmo em ihoh alhi abtikm ki la tzliHo : oirbem hsb at hmarb lboa maHrihm oihio lpni ihodh ohmarb maHrihm : oipno ihodh ohnh lhm hmlHmh pnim oaHor oizeqo lihoh ohkhnim mHzzrim bHzzrot : oirieo aiS ihodh oihi bhrie aiS ihodh ohalhim ngp at irbem okl iSral lpni abih oihodh : oinoso bni iSral mpni ihodh oitnm alhim bidm : oiko bhm abih oemo mkh rbh oiplo Hllim miSral HmS maot alp aiS bHor : oikneo bni iSral bet hhia oiamzo bni ihodh ki nSeno el ihoh alhi abotihm : oirdp abih aHri irbem oilkd mmno erim at bit al oat bnotih oat iSnh oat bnotih oat epron obntih : ola ezr kH irbem eod bimi abiho oigpho ihoh oimt : oitHcq abiho oiSa lo nSim arbe eSrh oiold eSrim oSnim bnim oSS eSrh bnot : oitr dbri abih odrkio odbrio ktobim bmdrS hnbia edo :

14

oiSkb abih em abtio oiqbro ato beir doid oimlk asa bno tHtio bimio SqTh harz eSr Snim : oieS asa hTob ohiSr beini ihoh alhio : oisr at mcbHot hnkr ohbmot oiSbr at hmzbot oigde at haSrim : oiamr lihodh ldroS at ihoh alhi abotihm oleSot htorh ohmzoh : oisr mkl eri ihodh at hbmot oat hHmnim otSqT hmmlkh lpnio : oibn eri mzorh bihodh ki SqTh harz oain emo mlHmh bSnim halh ki hniH ihoh lo : oiamr lihodh nbnh at herim halh onsb Homh omgdlim dltim obriHim eodno harz lpnino ki drSno at ihoh alhino drSno oinH lno msbib oibno oizliHo : oihi lasa Hil nSa znh ormH mihodh SlS maot alp ombnimn nSai mgn odrki qSt matim oSmonim alp kl alh gbori Hil : oiza alihm crH hkoSi bHil alp alpim omrkbot SlS maot oiba ed mrSh : oiza asa lpnio oierko mlHmh bgia zpth lmrSh : oiqra asa al ihoh alhio oiamr ihoh ain emk lecor bin rb lain kH ecrno ihoh alhino ki elik nSeno obSmk bano el hhmon hch ihoh alhino ath al iezr emk anoS : oigp ihoh at hkoSim lpni asa olpni ihodh oinso hkoSim : oirdpm asa ohem aSr emo ed lgrr oipl mkoSim lain lhm mHih ki nSbro lpni ihoh olpni mHnho oiSao Sll hrbh mad : oiko at kl herim sbibot grr ki hih pHd ihoh elihm oibco at kl herim ki bch rbh hith bhm : ogm ahli mqnh hko oiSbo zan lrb ogmlim oiSbo iroSlm :

15

oecriho bn eodd hith elio roH alhim : oiza lpni asa oiamr lo Smeoni asa okl ihodh obnimn ihoh emkm bhiotkm emo oam tdrSho imza lkm oam tecbho iecb atkm : oimim rbim liSral lla alhi amt olla khn morh olla torh : oiSb bzr lo el ihoh alhi iSral oibqSho oimza lhm : obetim hhm ain Slom lioza olba ki mhomt rbot el kl ioSbi harzot : oktto goi bgoi oeir beir ki alhim hmmm bkl zrh : oatm Hcqo oal irpo idikm ki iS Skr lpeltkm : okSme asa hdbrim halh ohnboah edd hnbia htHcq oiebr hSqozim mkl arz ihodh obnimn omn herim aSr lkd mhr aprim oiHdS at mcbH ihoh aSr lpni aolm ihoh : oiqbz at kl ihodh obnimn ohgrim emhm maprim omnSh omSmeon ki nplo elio miSral lrb bratm ki ihoh alhio emo : oiqbzo iroSlm bHdS hSliSi lSnt HmS eSrh lmlkot asa : oicbHo lihoh biom hhoa mn hSll hbiao bqr Sbe maot ozan Sbet alpim : oibao bbrit ldroS at ihoh alhi abotihm bkl lbbm obkl npSm : okl aSr la idrS lihoh alhi iSral iomt lmn qTn oed gdol lmaiS oed aSh : oiSbeo lihoh bqol gdol obtroeh obHzzrot obSoprot : oiSmHo kl ihodh el hSboeh ki bkl lbbm nSbeo obkl rzonm bqSho oimza lhm oinH ihoh lhm msbib : ogm mekh am asa hmlk hsirh mgbirh aSr eSth laSrh mplzt oikrt asa at mplzth oidq oiSrp bnHl qdron : ohbmot la sro miSral rq lbb asa hih Slm kl imio : oiba at qdSi abio oqdSio bit halhim ksp ochb oklim : omlHmh la hith ed Snt SlSim oHmS lmlkot asa :

16

bSnt SlSim oSS lmlkot asa elh beSa mlk iSral el ihodh oibn at hrmh lblti tt ioza oba lasa mlk ihodh : oiza asa ksp ochb mazrot bit ihoh obit hmlk oiSlH al bn hdd mlk arm hioSb bdrmSq lamr : brit bini obink obin abi obin abik hnh SlHti lk ksp ochb lk hpr britk at beSa mlk iSral oielh meli : oiSme bn hdd al hmlk asa oiSlH at Sri hHilim aSr lo al eri iSral oiko at eion oat dn oat abl mim oat kl msknot eri nptli : oihi kSme beSa oiHdl mbnot at hrmh oiSbt at mlakto : oasa hmlk lqH at kl ihodh oiSao at abni hrmh oat ezih aSr bnh beSa oibn bhm at gbe oat hmzph : obet hhia ba Hnni hrah al asa mlk ihodh oiamr alio bhSenk el mlk arm ola nSent el ihoh alhik el kn nmlT Hil mlk arm midk : hla hkoSim ohlobim hio lHil lrb lrkb olprSim lhrbh mad obhSenk el ihoh ntnm bidk : ki ihoh einio mSTTot bkl harz lhtHcq em lbbm Slm alio nsklt el cat ki meth iS emk mlHmot : oikes asa al hrah oitnho bit hmhpkt ki bcep emo el cat oirzz asa mn hem bet hhia : ohnh dbri asa hraSonim ohaHronim hnm ktobim el spr hmlkim lihodh oiSral : oiHla asa bSnt SloSim otSe lmlkoto brglio ed lmelh Hlio ogm bHlio la drS at ihoh ki brpaim : oiSkb asa em abtio oimt bSnt arbeim oaHt lmlko : oiqbrho bqbrtio aSr krh lo beir doid oiSkibho bmSkb aSr mla bSmim ocnim mrqHim bmrqHt meSh oiSrpo lo Srph gdolh ed lmad :

17

oimlk ihoSpT bno tHtio oitHcq el iSral : oitn Hil bkl eri ihodh hbzrot oitn nzibim barz ihodh oberi aprim aSr lkd asa abio : oihi ihoh em ihoSpT ki hlk bdrki doid abio hraSnim ola drS lbelim : ki lalhi abio drS obmzotio hlk ola kmeSh iSral : oikn ihoh at hmmlkh bido oitno kl ihodh mnHh lihoSpT oihi lo eSr okbod lrb : oigbh lbo bdrki ihoh oeod hsir at hbmot oat haSrim mihodh : obSnt SloS lmlko SlH lSrio lbn Hil olebdih olckrih olntnal olmikiho llmd beri ihodh : oemhm hloim Smeiho ontniho ocbdiho oeShal oSmrimot oihontn oadniho oTobiho oTob adonih hloim oemhm aliSme oihorm hkhnim : oilmdo bihodh oemhm spr tort ihoh oisbo bkl eri ihodh oilmdo bem : oihi pHd ihoh el kl mmlkot harzot aSr sbibot ihodh ola nlHmo em ihoSpT : omn plStim mbiaim lihoSpT mnHh oksp mSa gm herbiaim mbiaim lo zan ailim Sbet alpim oSbe maot otiSim Sbet alpim oSbe maot : oihi ihoSpT hlk ogdl ed lmelh oibn bihodh birniot oeri msknot : omlakh rbh hih lo beri ihodh oanSi mlHmh gbori Hil biroSlm : oalh pqdtm lbit abotihm lihodh Sri alpim ednh hSr oemo gbori Hil SlS maot alp : oel ido ihoHnn hSr oemo matim oSmonim alp : oel ido emsih bn ckri hmtndb lihoh oemo matim alp gbor Hil : omn bnimn gbor Hil alide oemo nSqi qSt omgn matim alp : oel ido ihocbd oemo mah oSmonim alp Hlozi zba : alh hmSrtim at hmlk mlbd aSr ntn hmlk beri hmbzr bkl ihodh :

18

oihi lihoSpT eSr okbod lrb oitHtn laHab : oird lqz Snim al aHab lSmron oicbH lo aHab zan obqr lrb olem aSr emo oisitho lelot al rmot gled : oiamr aHab mlk iSral al ihoSpT mlk ihodh htlk emi rmt gled oiamr lo kmoni kmok okemk emi oemk bmlHmh : oiamr ihoSpT al mlk iSral drS na kiom at dbr ihoh : oiqbz mlk iSral at hnbaim arbe maot aiS oiamr alhm hnlk al rmt gled lmlHmh am aHdl oiamro elh oitn halhim bid hmlk : oiamr ihoSpT hain ph nbia lihoh eod ondrSh mato : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT eod aiS aHd ldroS at ihoh mato oani Snatiho ki ainno mtnba eli lTobh ki kl imio lreh hoa mikiho bn imla oiamr ihoSpT al iamr hmlk kn : oiqra mlk iSral al sris aHd oiamr mhr mikho bn imla : omlk iSral oihoSpT mlk ihodh ioSbim aiS el ksao mlbSim bgdim oiSbim bgrn ptH Ser Smron okl hnbiaim mtnbaim lpnihm : oieS lo zdqiho bn knenh qrni brcl oiamr kh amr ihoh balh tngH at arm ed klotm : okl hnbaim nbaim kn lamr elh rmt gled ohzlH ontn ihoh bid hmlk : ohmlak aSr hlk lqra lmikiho dbr alio lamr hnh dbri hnbaim ph aHd Tob al hmlk oihi na dbrk kaHd mhm odbrt Tob : oiamr mikiho Hi ihoh ki at aSr iamr alhi ato adbr : oiba al hmlk oiamr hmlk alio mikh hnlk al rmt gled lmlHmh am aHdl oiamr elo ohzliHo ointno bidkm : oiamr alio hmlk ed kmh pemim ani mSbiek aSr la tdbr ali rq amt bSm ihoh : oiamr raiti at kl iSral npozim el hhrim kzan aSr ain lhn reh oiamr ihoh la adnim lalh iSobo aiS lbito bSlom : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT hla amrti alik la itnba eli Tob ki am lre : oiamr lkn Smeo dbr ihoh raiti at ihoh ioSb el ksao okl zba hSmim emdim el imino oSmalo : oiamr ihoh mi ipth at aHab mlk iSral oiel
