oipl brmot gled oiamr ch amr kkh och amr kkh : oiza hroH oiemd lpni ihoh oiamr ani aptno oiamr ihoh alio bmh : oiamr aza ohiiti lroH Sqr bpi kl nbiaio oiamr tpth ogm tokl za oeSh kn : oeth hnh ntn ihoh roH Sqr bpi nbiaik alh oihoh dbr elik reh : oigS zdqiho bn knenh oik at mikiho el hlHi oiamr ai ch hdrk ebr roH ihoh mati ldbr atk : oiamr mikiho hnk rah biom hhoa aSr tboa Hdr bHdr lhHba : oiamr mlk iSral qHo at mikiho ohSibho al amon Sr heir oal ioaS bn hmlk : oamrtm kh amr hmlk Simo ch bit hkla ohaklho lHm lHz omim lHz ed Sobi bSlom : oiamr mikiho am Sob tSob bSlom la dbr ihoh bi oiamr Smeo emim klm : oiel mlk iSral oihoSpT mlk ihodh al rmt gled : oiamr mlk iSral al ihoSpT htHpS oboa bmlHmh oath lbS bgdik oitHpS mlk iSral oibao bmlHmh : omlk arm zoh at Sri hrkb aSr lo lamr la tlHmo at hqTn at hgdol ki am at mlk iSral lbdo : oihi kraot Sri hrkb at ihoSpT ohmh amro mlk iSral hoa oisbo elio lhlHm oiceq ihoSpT oihoh ecro oisitm alhim mmno : oihi kraot Sri hrkb ki la hih mlk iSral oiSbo maHrio : oaiS mSk bqSt ltmo oik at mlk iSral bin hdbqim obin hSrin oiamr lrkb hpk idik ohozatni mn hmHnh ki hHliti : otel hmlHmh biom hhoa omlk iSral hih memid bmrkbh nkH arm ed herb oimt let boa hSmS :

19

oiSb ihoSpT mlk ihodh al bito bSlom liroSlm : oiza al pnio ihoa bn Hnni hHch oiamr al hmlk ihoSpT hlrSe lecr olSnai ihoh tahb obcat elik qzp mlpni ihoh : abl dbrim Tobim nmzao emk ki bert haSrot mn harz ohkinot lbbk ldrS halhim : oiSb ihoSpT biroSlm oiSb oiza bem mbar Sbe ed hr aprim oiSibm al ihoh alhi abotihm : oiemd SpTim barz bkl eri ihodh hbzrot leir oeir : oiamr al hSpTim rao mh atm eSim ki la ladm tSpTo ki lihoh oemkm bdbr mSpT : oeth ihi pHd ihoh elikm Smro oeSo ki ain em ihoh alhino eolh omSa pnim omqH SHd : ogm biroSlm hemid ihoSpT mn hloim ohkhnim omraSi habot liSral lmSpT ihoh olrib oiSbo iroSlm : oizo elihm lamr kh teSon birat ihoh bamonh oblbb Slm : okl rib aSr iboa elikm maHikm hiSbim berihm bin dm ldm bin torh lmzoh lHqim olmSpTim ohchrtm atm ola iaSmo lihoh ohih qzp elikm oel aHikm kh teSon ola taSmo : ohnh amriho khn hraS elikm lkl dbr ihoh ocbdiho bn iSmeal hngid lbit ihodh lkl dbr hmlk oSTrim hloim lpnikm Hcqo oeSo oihi ihoh em hTob :

20

oihi aHrikn bao bni moab obni emon oemhm mhemonim el ihoSpT lmlHmh : oibao oigido lihoSpT lamr ba elik hmon rb mebr lim marm ohnm bHzzon tmr hia ein gdi : oira oitn ihoSpT at pnio ldroS lihoh oiqra zom el kl ihodh : oiqbzo ihodh lbqS mihoh gm mkl eri ihodh bao lbqS at ihoh : oiemd ihoSpT bqhl ihodh oiroSlm bbit ihoh lpni hHzr hHdSh : oiamr ihoh alhi abtino hla ath hoa alhim bSmim oath moSl bkl mmlkot hgoim obidk kH ogborh oain emk lhtizb : hla ath alhino horSt at iSbi harz hcat mlpni emk iSral ottnh lcre abrhm ahbk leolm : oiSbo bh oibno lk bh mqdS lSmk lamr : am tboa elino reh Hrb SpoT odbr oreb nemdh lpni hbit hch olpnik ki Smk bbit hch onceq alik mzrtno otSme otoSie : oeth hnh bni emon omoab ohr Seir aSr la ntth liSral lboa bhm bbam marz mzrim ki sro melihm ola hSmidom : ohnh hm gmlim elino lboa lgrSno mirStk aSr horStno : alhino hla tSpT bm ki ain bno kH lpni hhmon hrb hch hba elino oanHno la nde mh neSh ki elik einino : okl ihodh emdim lpni ihoh gm Tpm nSihm obnihm : oiHcial bn ckriho bn bnih bn ieial bn mtnih hloi mn bni asp hith elio roH ihoh btok hqhl : oiamr hqSibo kl ihodh oiSbi iroSlm ohmlk ihoSpT kh amr ihoh lkm atm al tirao oal tHto mpni hhmon hrb hch ki la lkm hmlHmh ki lalhim : mHr rdo elihm hnm elim bmelh hziz omzatm atm bsop hnHl pni mdbr iroal : la lkm lhlHm bcat htizbo emdo orao at iSoet ihoh emkm ihodh oiroSlm al tirao oal tHto mHr zao lpnihm oihoh emkm : oiqd ihoSpT apim arzh okl ihodh oiSbi iroSlm nplo lpni ihoh lhStHot lihoh : oiqmo hloim mn bni hqhtim omn bni hqrHim lhll lihoh alhi iSral bqol gdol lmelh : oiSkimo bbqr oizao lmdbr tqoe obzatm emd ihoSpT oiamr Smeoni ihodh oiSbi iroSlm hamino bihoh alhikm otamno hamino bnbiaio ohzliHo : oioez al hem oiemd mSrrim lihoh omhllim lhdrt qdS bzat lpni hHloz oamrim hodo lihoh ki leolm Hsdo : obet hHlo brnh othlh ntn ihoh marbim el bni emon moab ohr Seir hbaim lihodh oingpo : oiemdo bni emon omoab el iSbi hr Seir lhHrim olhSmid okklotm bioSbi Seir ecro aiS breho lmSHit : oihodh ba el hmzph lmdbr oipno al hhmon ohnm pgrim nplim arzh oain pliTh : oiba ihoSpT oemo lbc at Sllm oimzao bhm lrb orkoS opgrim okli Hmdot oinzlo lhm lain mSa oihio imim SloSh bccim at hSll ki rb hoa : obiom hrbei nqhlo lemq brkh ki Sm brko at ihoh el kn qrao at Sm hmqom hhoa emq brkh ed hiom : oiSbo kl aiS ihodh oiroSlm oihoSpT braSm lSob al iroSlm bSmHh ki SmHm ihoh maoibihm : oibao iroSlm bnblim obknrot obHzzrot al bit ihoh : oihi pHd alhim el kl mmlkot harzot bSmem ki nlHm ihoh em aoibi iSral : otSqT mlkot ihoSpT oinH lo alhio msbib : oimlk ihoSpT el ihodh bn SlSim oHmS Snh bmlko oeSrim oHmS Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ecobh bt SlHi : oilk bdrk abio asa ola sr mmnh leSot hiSr beini ihoh : ak hbmot la sro oeod hem la hkino lbbm lalhi abtihm : oitr dbri ihoSpT hraSnim ohaHrnim hnm ktobim bdbri ihoa bn Hnni aSr helh el spr mlki iSral : oaHrikn atHbr ihoSpT mlk ihodh em aHcih mlk iSral hoa hrSie leSot : oiHbrho emo leSot aniot llkt trSiS oieSo aniot bezion gbr : oitnba aliecr bn ddoho mmrSh el ihoSpT lamr khtHbrk em aHciho prz ihoh at meSik oiSbro aniot ola ezro llkt al trSiS :

21

oiSkb ihoSpT em abtio oiqbr em abtio beir doid oimlk ihorm bno tHtio : olo aHim bni ihoSpT ecrih oiHial ockriho oecriho omikal oSpTiho kl alh bni ihoSpT mlk iSral : oitn lhm abihm mtnot rbot lksp olchb olmgdnot em eri mzrot bihodh oat hmmlkh ntn lihorm ki hoa hbkor : oiqm ihorm el mmlkt abio oitHcq oihrg at kl aHio bHrb ogm mSri iSral : bn SlSim oStim Snh ihorm bmlko oSmonh Snim mlk biroSlm : oilk bdrk mlki iSral kaSr eSo bit aHab ki bt aHab hith lo aSh oieS hre beini ihoh : ola abh ihoh lhSHit at bit doid lmen hbrit aSr krt ldoid okaSr amr ltt lo nir olbnio kl himim : bimio pSe adom mtHt id ihodh oimliko elihm mlk : oiebr ihorm em Srio okl hrkb emo oihi qm lilh oik at adom hsobb alio oat Sri hrkb : oipSe adom mtHt id ihodh ed hiom hch ac tpSe lbnh bet hhia mtHt ido ki ecb at ihoh alhi abtio : gm hoa eSh bmot bhri ihodh oicn at iSbi iroSlm oidH at ihodh : oiba alio mktb maliho hnbia lamr kh amr ihoh alhi doid abik tHt aSr la hlkt bdrki ihoSpT abik obdrki asa mlk ihodh : otlk bdrk mlki iSral otcnh at ihodh oat iSbi iroSlm khcnot bit aHab ogm at aHik bit abik hTobim mmk hrgt : hnh ihoh ngp mgph gdolh bemk obbnik obnSik obkl rkoSk : oath bHliim rbim bmHlh meik ed izao meik mn hHli imim el imim : oier ihoh el ihorm at roH hplStim oherbim aSr el id koSim : oielo bihodh oibqeoh oiSbo at kl hrkoS hnmza lbit hmlk ogm bnio onSio ola nSar lo bn ki am ihoaHc qTn bnio : oaHri kl cat ngpo ihoh bmeio lHli lain mrpa : oihi limim mimim oket zat hqz limim Snim izao meio em Hlio oimt btHlaim reim ola eSo lo emo Srph kSrpt abtio : bn SlSim oStim hih bmlko oSmonh Snim mlk biroSlm oilk bla Hmdh oiqbrho beir doid ola bqbrot hmlkim :

22

oimliko ioSbi iroSlm at aHciho bno hqTn tHtio ki kl hraSnim hrg hgdod hba berbim lmHnh oimlk aHciho bn ihorm mlk ihodh : bn arbeim oStim Snh aHciho bmlko oSnh aHt mlk biroSlm oSm amo etliho bt emri : gm hoa hlk bdrki bit aHab ki amo hith ioezto lhrSie : oieS hre beini ihoh kbit aHab ki hmh hio lo ioezim aHri mot abio lmSHit lo : gm beztm hlk oilk at ihorm bn aHab mlk iSral lmlHmh el Hcal mlk arm brmot gled oiko hrmim at iorm : oiSb lhtrpa bicreal ki hmkim aSr hkho brmh bhlHmo at Hchal mlk arm oecriho bn ihorm mlk ihodh ird lraot at ihorm bn aHab bicreal ki Hlh hoa : omalhim hith tbost aHciho lboa al iorm obbao iza em ihorm al ihoa bn nmSi aSr mSHo ihoh lhkrit at bit aHab : oihi khSpT ihoa em bit aHab oimza at Sri ihodh obni aHi aHciho mSrtim laHciho oihrgm : oibqS at aHciho oilkdho ohoa mtHba bSmron oibaho al ihoa oimtho oiqbrho ki amro bn ihoSpT hoa aSr drS at ihoh bkl lbbo oain lbit aHciho lezr kH lmmlkh : oetliho am aHciho rath ki mt bnh otqm otdbr at kl cre hmmlkh lbit ihodh : otqH ihoSbet bt hmlk at ioaS bn aHciho otgnb ato mtok bni hmlk hmomtim ottn ato oat minqto bHdr hmTot otstirho ihoSbet bt hmlk ihorm aSt ihoide hkhn ki hia hith aHot aHciho mpni etliho ola hmittho : oihi atm bbit halhim mtHba SS Snim oetlih mlkt el harz :

23

obSnh hSbeit htHcq ihoide oiqH at Sri hmaot lecriho bn irHm oliSmeal bn ihoHnn olecriho bn eobd oat meSiho bn ediho oat aliSpT bn ckri emo bbrit : oisbo bihodh oiqbzo at hloim mkl eri ihodh oraSi habot liSral oibao al iroSlm : oikrt kl hqhl brit bbit halhim em hmlk oiamr lhm hnh bn hmlk imlk kaSr dbr ihoh el bni doid : ch hdbr aSr teSo hSlSit mkm bai hSbt lkhnim olloim lSeri hspim : ohSlSit bbit hmlk ohSlSit bSer hisod okl hem bHzrot bit ihoh : oal iboa bit ihoh ki am hkhnim ohmSrtim lloim hmh ibao ki qdS hmh okl hem iSmro mSmrt ihoh : ohqipo hloim at hmlk sbib aiS oklio bido ohba al hbit iomt ohio at hmlk bbao obzato : oieSo hloim okl ihodh kkl aSr zoh ihoide hkhn oiqHo aiS at anSio bai hSbt em iozai hSbt ki la pTr ihoide hkhn at hmHlqot : oitn ihoide hkhn lSri hmaot at hHnitim oat hmgnot oat hSlTim aSr lmlk doid aSr bit halhim : oiemd at kl hem oaiS SlHo bido mktp hbit himnit ed ktp hbit hSmalit lmcbH olbit el hmlk sbib : oioziao at bn hmlk oitno elio at hncr oat hedot oimliko ato oimSHho ihoide obnio oiamro iHi hmlk : otSme etliho at qol hem hrzim ohmhllim at hmlk otboa al hem bit ihoh : otra ohnh hmlk eomd el emodo bmboa ohSrim ohHzzrot el hmlk okl em harz SmH otoqe bHzzrot ohmSorrim bkli hSir omodieim lhll otqre etliho at bgdih otamr qSr qSr : oioza ihoide hkhn at Sri hmaot pqodi hHil oiamr alhm hoziaoh al mbit hSdrot ohba aHrih iomt bHrb ki amr hkhn la tmitoh bit ihoh : oiSimo lh idim otboa al mboa Ser hsosim bit hmlk oimitoh Sm : oikrt ihoide brit bino obin kl hem obin hmlk lhiot lem lihoh : oibao kl hem bit hbel oitzho oat mcbHtio oat zlmio Sbro oat mtn khn hbel hrgo lpni hmcbHot : oiSm ihoide pqdt bit ihoh bid hkhnim hloim aSr Hlq doid el bit ihoh lhelot elot ihoh kktob btort mSh bSmHh obSir el idi doid : oiemd hSoerim el Seri bit ihoh ola iba Tma lkl dbr : oiqH at Sri hmaot oat hadirim oat hmoSlim bem oat kl em harz oiord at hmlk mbit ihoh oibao btok Ser helion bit hmlk oioSibo at hmlk el ksa hmmlkh : oiSmHo kl em harz oheir SqTh oat etliho hmito bHrb :

24

bn Sbe Snim iaS bmlko oarbeim Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo zbih mbar Sbe : oieS ioaS hiSr beini ihoh kl imi ihoide hkhn : oiSa lo ihoide nSim Stim oiold bnim obnot : oihi aHrikn hih em lb ioaS lHdS at bit ihoh : oiqbz at hkhnim ohloim oiamr lhm zao leri ihodh oqbzo mkl iSral ksp lHcq at bit alhikm mdi Snh bSnh oatm tmhro ldbr ola mhro hloim : oiqra hmlk lihoide hraS oiamr lo mdoe la drSt el hloim lhbia mihodh omiroSlm at mSat mSh ebd ihoh ohqhl liSral lahl hedot : ki etliho hmrSet bnih przo at bit halhim ogm kl qdSi bit ihoh eSo lbelim : oiamr hmlk oieSo aron aHd oitnho bSer bit ihoh Hozh : oitno qol bihodh obiroSlm lhbia lihoh mSat mSh ebd halhim el iSral bmdbr : oiSmHo kl hSrim okl hem oibiao oiSliko laron ed lklh : oihi bet ibia at haron al pqdt hmlk bid hloim okraotm ki rb hksp oba sopr hmlk opqid khn hraS oiero at haron oiSaho oiSibho al mqmo kh eSo liom biom oiaspo ksp lrb : oitnho hmlk oihoide al eoSh mlakt ebodt bit ihoh oihio Skrim Hzbim oHrSim lHdS bit ihoh ogm lHrSi brcl onHSt lHcq at bit ihoh : oieSo eSi hmlakh otel arokh lmlakh bidm oiemido at bit halhim el mtknto oiamzho : okklotm hbiao lpni hmlk oihoide at Sar hksp oieSho klim lbit ihoh kli Srt ohelot okpot okli chb oksp oihio melim elot bbit ihoh tmid kl imi ihoide : oicqn ihoide oiSbe imim oimt bn mah oSlSim Snh bmoto : oiqbrho beir doid em hmlkim ki eSh Tobh biSral oem halhim obito : oaHri mot ihoide bao Sri ihodh oiStHoo lmlk ac Sme hmlk alihm : oiecbo at bit ihoh alhi abotihm oiebdo at haSrim oat hezbim oihi qzp el ihodh oiroSlm baSmtm cat : oiSlH bhm nbaim lhSibm al ihoh oieido bm ola hacino : oroH alhim lbSh at ckrih bn ihoide hkhn oiemd mel lem oiamr lhm kh amr halhim lmh atm ebrim at mzot ihoh ola tzliHo ki ecbtm at ihoh oiecb atkm : oiqSro elio oirgmho abn bmzot hmlk bHzr bit ihoh : ola ckr ioaS hmlk hHsd aSr eSh ihoide abio emo oihrg at bno okmoto amr ira ihoh oidrS : oihi ltqopt hSnh elh elio Hil arm oibao al ihodh oiroSlm oiSHito at kl Sri hem mem okl Sllm SlHo lmlk drmSq : ki bmzer anSim bao Hil arm oihoh ntn bidm Hil lrb mad ki ecbo at ihoh alhi abotihm oat ioaS eSo SpTim : oblktm mmno ki ecbo ato bmHliim rbim htqSro elio ebdio bdmi bni ihoide hkhn oihrgho el mTto oimt oiqbrho beir doid ola qbrho bqbrot hmlkim : oalh hmtqSrim elio cbd bn Smet hemonit oihocbd bn Smrit hmoabit : obnio orb hmSa elio oisod bit halhim hnm ktobim el mdrS spr hmlkim oimlk amziho bno tHtio :

25

bn eSrim oHmS Snh mlk amziho oeSrim otSe Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ihoedn miroSlim : oieS hiSr beini ihoh rq la blbb Slm : oihi kaSr Hcqh hmmlkh elio oihrg at ebdio hmkim at hmlk abio : oat bnihm la hmit ki kktob btorh bspr mSh aSr zoh ihoh lamr la imoto abot el bnim obnim la imoto el abot ki aiS bHTao imoto : oiqbz amziho at ihodh oiemidm lbit abot lSri halpim olSri hmaot lkl ihodh obnimn oipqdm lmbn eSrim Snh omelh oimzam SlS maot alp bHor ioza zba aHc rmH oznh : oiSkr miSral mah alp gbor Hil bmah kkr ksp : oaiS halhim ba alio lamr hmlk al iba emk zba iSral ki ain ihoh em iSral kl bni aprim : ki am ba ath eSh Hcq lmlHmh ikSilk halhim lpni aoib ki iS kH balhim lecor olhkSil : oiamr amziho laiS halhim omh leSot lmat hkkr aSr ntti lgdod iSral oiamr aiS halhim iS lihoh ltt lk hrbh mch : oibdilm amziho lhgdod aSr ba alio maprim llkt lmqomm oiHr apm mad bihodh oiSobo lmqomm bHri ap : oamziho htHcq oinhg at emo oilk gia hmlH oik at bni Seir eSrt alpim : oeSrt alpim Hiim Sbo bni ihodh oibiaom lraS hsle oiSlikom mraS hsle oklm nbqeo : obni hgdod aSr hSib amziho mlkt emo lmlHmh oipSTo beri ihodh mSmron oed bit Horon oiko mhm SlSt alpim oibco bch rbh : oihi aHri boa amziho mhkot at adomim oiba at alhi bni Seir oiemidm lo lalhim olpnihm iStHoh olhm iqTr : oiHr ap ihoh bamziho oiSlH alio nbia oiamr lo lmh drSt at alhi hem aSr la hzilo at emm midk : oihi bdbro alio oiamr lo hlioez lmlk ntnok Hdl lk lmh ikok oiHdl hnbia oiamr ideti ki iez alhim lhSHitk ki eSit cat ola Smet lezti : oioez amziho mlk ihodh oiSlH al ioaS bn ihoaHc bn ihoa mlk iSral lamr lk ntrah pnim : oiSlH ioaS mlk iSral al amziho mlk ihodh lamr hHoH aSr blbnon SlH al harc aSr blbnon lamr tnh at btk lbni laSh otebr Hit hSdh aSr blbnon otrms at hHoH : amrt hnh hkit at adom onSak lbk lhkbid eth Sbh bbitk lmh ttgrh breh onplt ath oihodh emk : ola Sme amziho ki mhalhim hia lmen ttm bid ki drSo at alhi adom : oiel ioaS mlk iSral oitrao pnim hoa oamziho mlk ihodh bbit SmS aSr lihodh : oingp ihodh lpni iSral oinso aiS lahlio : oat amziho mlk ihodh bn ioaS bn ihoaHc tpS ioaS mlk iSral bbit SmS oibiaho iroSlm oiprz bHomt iroSlm mSer aprim ed Ser hponh arbe maot amh : okl hchb ohksp oat kl hklim hnmzaim bbit halhim em ebd adom oat azrot bit hmlk oat bni hterbot oiSb Smron : oiHi amziho bn ioaS mlk ihodh aHri mot ioaS bn ihoaHc mlk iSral HmS eSrh Snh : oitr dbri amziho hraSnim ohaHronim hla hnm ktobim el spr mlki ihodh oiSral : omet aSr sr amziho maHri ihoh oiqSro elio qSr biroSlm oins lkiSh oiSlHo aHrio lkiSh oimitho Sm : oiSaho el hsosim oiqbro ato em abtio beir ihodh :

26

oiqHo kl em ihodh at eciho ohoa bn SS eSrh Snh oimliko ato tHt abio amziho : hoa bnh at ailot oiSibh lihodh aHri Skb hmlk em abtio : bn SS eSrh Snh eciho bmlko oHmSim oStim Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo ikilih mn iroSlm : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh amziho abio : oihi ldrS alhim bimi ckriho hmbin brat halhim obimi drSo at ihoh hzliHo halhim : oiza oilHm bplStim oiprz at Homt gt oat Homt ibnh oat Homt aSdod oibnh erim baSdod obplStim : oiecrho halhim el plStim oel herbiim hiSbim bgor bel ohmeonim : oitno hemonim mnHh leciho oilk Smo ed lboa mzrim ki hHciq ed lmelh : oibn eciho mgdlim biroSlm el Ser hpnh oel Ser hgia oel hmqzoe oiHcqm : oibn mgdlim bmdbr oiHzb brot rbim ki mqnh rb hih lo obSplh obmiSor akrim okrmim bhrim obkrml ki ahb admh hih : oihi leciho Hil eSh mlHmh iozai zba lgdod bmspr pqdtm bid ieoal hsopr omeSiho hSoTr el id Hnniho mSri hmlk : kl mspr raSi habot lgbori Hil alpim oSS maot : oel idm Hil zba SlS maot alp oSbet alpim oHmS maot eoSi mlHmh bkH Hil lecr lmlk el haoib : oikn lhm eciho lkl hzba mgnim ormHim okobeim oSrinot oqStot olabni qleim : oieS biroSlm HSbnot mHSbt HoSb lhiot el hmgdlim oel hpnot liroa bHzim obabnim gdlot oiza Smo ed lmrHoq ki hplia lhecr ed ki Hcq : okHcqto gbh lbo ed lhSHit oimel bihoh alhio oiba al hikl ihoh lhqTir el mcbH hqTrt : oiba aHrio ecriho hkhn oemo khnim lihoh Smonim bni Hil : oiemdo el eciho hmlk oiamro lo la lk eciho lhqTir lihoh ki lkhnim bni ahrn hmqdSim lhqTir za mn hmqdS ki melt ola lk lkbod mihoh alhim : oicep eciho obido mqTrt lhqTir obcepo em hkhnim ohzret crHh bmzHo lpni hkhnim bbit ihoh mel lmcbH hqTrt : oipn alio ecriho khn hraS okl hkhnim ohnh hoa mzre bmzHo oibhloho mSm ogm hoa ndHp lzat ki ngeo ihoh : oihi eciho hmlk mzre ed iom moto oiSb bit hHpSot mzre ki ngcr mbit ihoh oiotm bno el bit hmlk SopT at em harz : oitr dbri eciho hraSnim ohaHrnim ktb iSeiho bn amoz hnbia : oiSkb eciho em abtio oiqbro ato em abtio bSdh hqborh aSr lmlkim ki amro mzore hoa oimlk iotm bno tHtio :

27

bn eSrim oHmS Snh iotm bmlko oSS eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo iroSh bt zdoq : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh eciho abio rq la ba al hikl ihoh oeod hem mSHitim : hoa bnh at Ser bit ihoh helion obHomt hepl bnh lrb : oerim bnh bhr ihodh obHrSim bnh birniot omgdlim : ohoa nlHm em mlk bni emon oiHcq elihm oitno lo bni emon bSnh hhia mah kkr ksp oeSrt alpim krim HTim oSeorim eSrt alpim cat hSibo lo bni emon obSnh hSnit ohSlSit : oitHcq iotm ki hkin drkio lpni ihoh alhio : oitr dbri iotm okl mlHmtio odrkio hnm ktobim el spr mlki iSral oihodh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh hih bmlko oSS eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm : oiSkb iotm em abtio oiqbro ato beir doid oimlk aHc bno tHtio :

28

bn eSrim Snh aHc bmlko oSS eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm ola eSh hiSr beini ihoh kdoid abio : oilk bdrki mlki iSral ogm mskot eSh lbelim : ohoa hqTir bgia bn hnm oiber at bnio baS ktebot hgoim aSr hriS ihoh mpni bni iSral : oicbH oiqTr bbmot oel hgbeot otHt kl ez renn : oitnho ihoh alhio bid mlk arm oiko bo oiSbo mmno Sbih gdolh oibiao drmSq ogm bid mlk iSral ntn oik bo mkh gdolh : oihrg pqH bn rmliho bihodh mah oeSrim alp biom aHd hkl bni Hil becbm at ihoh alhi abotm : oihrg ckri gbor aprim at meSiho bn hmlk oat ecriqm ngid hbit oat alqnh mSnh hmlk : oiSbo bni iSral maHihm matim alp nSim bnim obnot ogm Sll rb bcco mhm oibiao at hSll lSmron : oSm hih nbia lihoh edd Smo oiza lpni hzba hba lSmron oiamr lhm hnh bHmt ihoh alhi abotikm el ihodh ntnm bidkm othrgo bm bcep ed lSmim hgie : oeth bni ihodh oiroSlm atm amrim lkbS lebdim olSpHot lkm hla rq atm emkm aSmot lihoh alhikm : oeth Smeoni ohSibo hSbih aSr Sbitm maHikm ki Hron ap ihoh elikm : oiqmo anSim mraSi bni aprim ecriho bn ihoHnn brkiho bn mSlmot oiHcqiho bn Slm oemSa bn Hdli el hbaim mn hzba : oiamro lhm la tbiao at hSbih hnh ki laSmt ihoh elino atm amrim lhsip el HTatino oel aSmtino ki rbh aSmh lno oHron ap el iSral : oiecb hHloz at hSbih oat hbch lpni hSrim okl hqhl : oiqmo hanSim aSr nqbo bSmot oiHciqo bSbih okl mermihm hlbiSo mn hSll oilbSom oinelom oiaklom oiSqom oiskom oinhlom bHmrim lkl koSl oibiaom irHo eir htmrim azl aHihm oiSobo Smron : bet hhia SlH hmlk aHc el mlki aSor lecr lo : oeod adomim bao oiko bihodh oiSbo Sbi : oplStim pSTo beri hSplh ohngb lihodh oilkdo at bit SmS oat ailon oat hgdrot oat Soko obnotih oat tmnh obnotih oat gmco oat bntih oiSbo Sm : ki hknie ihoh at ihodh bebor aHc mlk iSral ki hprie bihodh omeol mel bihoh : oiba elio tlgt plnasr mlk aSor oizr lo ola Hcqo : ki Hlq aHc at bit ihoh oat bit hmlk ohSrim oitn lmlk aSor ola lecrh lo : obet hzr lo oiosp lmeol bihoh hoa hmlk aHc : oicbH lalhi drmSq hmkim bo oiamr ki alhi mlki arm hm mecrim aotm lhm acbH oiecroni ohm hio lo lhkSilo olkl iSral : oiasp aHc at kli bit halhim oiqzz at kli bit halhim oisgr at dltot bit ihoh oieS lo mcbHot bkl pnh biroSlm : obkl eir oeir lihodh eSh bmot lqTr lalhim aHrim oikes at ihoh alhi abtio : oitr dbrio okl drkio hraSnim ohaHronim hnm ktobim el spr mlki ihodh oiSral : oiSkb aHc em abtio oiqbrho beir biroSlm ki la hbiaho lqbri mlki iSral oimlk iHcqiho bno tHtio :

29

iHcqiho mlk bn eSrim oHmS Snh oeSrim otSe Snh mlk biroSlm oSm amo abih bt ckriho : oieS hiSr beini ihoh kkl aSr eSh doid abio : hoa bSnh hraSonh lmlko bHdS hraSon ptH at dltot bit ihoh oiHcqm : oiba at hkhnim oat hloim oiaspm lrHob hmcrH : oiamr lhm Smeoni hloim eth htqdSo oqdSo at bit ihoh alhi abtikm ohoziao at hndh mn hqdS : ki melo abtino oeSo hre beini ihoh alhino oiecbho oisbo pnihm mmSkn ihoh oitno erp : gm sgro dltot haolm oikbo at hnrot oqTrt la hqTiro oelh la helo bqdS lalhi iSral : oihi qzp ihoh el ihodh oiroSlm oitnm lcoeh lSmh olSrqh kaSr atm raim beinikm : ohnh nplo abotino bHrb obnino obnotino onSino bSbi el cat : eth em lbbi lkrot brit lihoh alhi iSral oiSb mmno Hron apo : bni eth al tSlo ki bkm bHr ihoh lemd lpnio lSrto olhiot lo mSrtim omqTrim : oiqmo hloim mHt bn emSi oioal bn ecriho mn bni hqhti omn bni mrri qiS bn ebdi oecriho bn ihllal omn hgrSni ioaH bn cmh oedn bn ioaH : omn bni alizpn Smri oieoal omn bni asp ckriho omtniho : omn bni himn iHoal oSmei omn bni idoton Smeih oecial : oiaspo at aHihm oitqdSo oibao kmzot hmlk bdbri ihoh lThr bit ihoh : oibao hkhnim lpnimh bit ihoh lThr oioziao at kl hTmah aSr mzao bhikl ihoh lHzr bit ihoh oiqblo hloim lhozia lnHl qdron Hozh : oiHlo baHd lHdS hraSon lqdS obiom Smonh lHdS bao laolm ihoh oiqdSo at bit ihoh limim Smonh obiom SSh eSr lHdS hraSon klo : oiboao pnimh al Hcqiho hmlk oiamro Thrno at kl bit ihoh at mcbH heolh oat kl klio oat SlHn hmerkt oat kl klio : oat kl hklim aSr hcniH hmlk aHc bmlkoto bmelo hkno ohqdSno ohnm lpni mcbH ihoh : oiSkm iHcqiho hmlk oiasp at Sri heir oiel bit ihoh : oibiao prim Sbeh oailim Sbeh okbSim Sbeh ozpiri ecim Sbeh lHTat el hmmlkh oel hmqdS oel ihodh oiamr lbni ahrn hkhnim lhelot el mcbH ihoh : oiSHTo hbqr oiqblo hkhnim at hdm oicrqo hmcbHh oiSHTo halim oicrqo hdm hmcbHh oiSHTo hkbSim oicrqo hdm hmcbHh : oigiSo at Seiri hHTat lpni hmlk ohqhl oismko idihm elihm : oiSHTom hkhnim oiHTao at dmm hmcbHh lkpr el kl iSral ki lkl iSral amr hmlk heolh ohHTat : oiemd at hloim bit ihoh bmzltim bnblim obknrot bmzot doid ogd Hch hmlk ontn hnbia ki bid ihoh hmzoh bid nbiaio : oiemdo hloim bkli doid ohkhnim bHzzrot : oiamr Hcqiho lhelot helh lhmcbH obet hHl heolh hHl Sir ihoh ohHzzrot oel idi kli doid mlk iSral : okl hqhl mStHoim ohSir mSorr ohHzzrot mHzzrim hkl ed lklot helh : okklot lhelot kreo hmlk okl hnmzaim ato oiStHoo : oiamr iHcqiho hmlk ohSrim lloim lhll lihoh bdbri doid oasp hHch oihllo ed lSmHh oiqdo oiStHoo : oien iHcqiho oiamr eth mlatm idkm lihoh gSo ohbiao cbHim otodot lbit ihoh oibiao hqhl cbHim otodot okl ndib lb elot : oihi mspr helh aSr hbiao hqhl bqr Sbeim ailim mah kbSim matim lelh lihoh kl alh : ohqdSim bqr SS maot ozan SlSt alpim : rq hkhnim hio lmeT ola iklo lhpSiT at kl helot oiHcqom aHihm hloim ed klot hmlakh oed itqdSo hkhnim ki hloim iSri lbb lhtqdS mhkhnim : ogm elh lrb bHlbi hSlmim obnskim lelh otkon ebodt bit ihoh : oiSmH iHcqiho okl hem el hhkin halhim lem ki bptam hih hdbr :

30

oiSlH iHcqiho el kl iSral oihodh ogm agrot ktb el aprim omnSh lboa lbit ihoh biroSlm leSot psH lihoh alhi iSral : oioez hmlk oSrio okl hqhl biroSlm leSot hpsH bHdS hSni : ki la iklo leSto bet hhia ki hkhnim la htqdSo lmdi ohem la naspo liroSlm : oiiSr hdbr beini hmlk obeini kl hqhl : oiemido dbr lhebir qol bkl iSral mbar Sbe oed dn lboa leSot psH lihoh alhi iSral biroSlm ki la lrb eSo kktob : oilko hrzim bagrot mid hmlk oSrio bkl iSral oihodh okmzot hmlk lamr bni iSral Sobo al ihoh alhi abrhm izHq oiSral oiSb al hpliTh hnSart lkm mkp mlki aSor : oal thio kabotikm okaHikm aSr melo bihoh alhi abotihm oitnm lSmh kaSr atm raim : eth al tqSo erpkm kabotikm tno id lihoh obao lmqdSo aSr hqdiS leolm oebdo at ihoh alhikm oiSb mkm Hron apo : ki bSobkm el ihoh aHikm obnikm lrHmim lpni Sobihm olSob larz hcat ki Hnon orHom ihoh alhikm ola isir pnim mkm am tSobo alio : oihio hrzim ebrim meir leir barz aprim omnSh oed cblon oihio mSHiqim elihm omlegim bm : ak anSim maSr omnSh omcblon nkneo oibao liroSlm : gm bihodh hith id halhim ltt lhm lb aHd leSot mzot hmlk ohSrim bdbr ihoh : oiaspo iroSlm em rb leSot at Hg hmzot bHdS hSni qhl lrb mad : oiqmo oisiro at hmcbHot aSr biroSlm oat kl hmqTrot hsiro oiSliko lnHl qdron : oiSHTo hpsH barbeh eSr lHdS hSni ohkhnim ohloim nklmo oitqdSo oibiao elot bit ihoh : oiemdo el emdm kmSpTm ktort mSh aiS halhim hkhnim crqim at hdm mid hloim : ki rbt bqhl aSr la htqdSo ohloim el SHiTt hpsHim lkl la Thor lhqdiS lihoh : ki mrbit hem rbt maprim omnSh iSSkr ocblon la hThro ki aklo at hpsH bla kktob ki htpll iHcqiho elihm lamr ihoh hTob ikpr bed : kl lbbo hkin ldroS halhim ihoh alhi abotio ola kThrt hqdS : oiSme ihoh al iHcqiho oirpa at hem : oieSo bni iSral hnmzaim biroSlm at Hg hmzot Sbet imim bSmHh gdolh omhllim lihoh iom biom hloim ohkhnim bkli ec lihoh : oidbr iHcqiho el lb kl hloim hmSkilim Skl Tob lihoh oiaklo at hmoed Sbet himim mcbHim cbHi Slmim omtodim lihoh alhi abotihm : oioezo kl hqhl leSot Sbet imim aHrim oieSo Sbet imim SmHh : ki Hcqiho mlk ihodh hrim lqhl alp prim oSbet alpim zan ohSrim hrimo lqhl prim alp ozan eSrt alpim oitqdSo khnim lrb : oiSmHo kl qhl ihodh ohkhnim ohloim okl hqhl hbaim miSral ohgrim hbaim marz iSral ohioSbim bihodh : othi SmHh gdolh biroSlm ki mimi Slmh bn doid mlk iSral la kcat biroSlm : oiqmo hkhnim hloim oibrko at hem oiSme bqolm otboa tpltm lmeon qdSo lSmim :

31

okklot kl cat izao kl iSral hnmzaim leri ihodh oiSbro hmzbot oigdeo haSrim ointzo at hbmot oat hmcbHt mkl ihodh obnimn obaprim omnSh ed lklh oiSobo kl bni iSral aiS laHcto lerihm : oiemd iHcqiho at mHlqot hkhnim ohloim el mHlqotm aiS kpi ebdto lkhnim olloim lelh olSlmim lSrt olhdot olhll bSeri mHnot ihoh : omnt hmlk mn rkoSo lelot lelot hbqr oherb ohelot lSbtot olHdSim olmedim kktob btort ihoh : oiamr lem lioSbi iroSlm ltt mnt hkhnim ohloim lmen iHcqo btort ihoh : okprz hdbr hrbo bni iSral raSit dgn tiroS oizhr odbS okl tboat Sdh omeSr hkl lrb hbiao : obni iSral oihodh hioSbim beri ihodh gm hm meSr bqr ozan omeSr qdSim hmqdSim lihoh alhihm hbiao oitno ermot ermot : bHdS hSlSi hHlo hermot lisod obHdS hSbiei klo : oibao iHcqiho ohSrim oirao at hermot oibrko at ihoh oat emo iSral : oidrS iHcqiho el hkhnim ohloim el hermot : oiamr alio ecriho hkhn hraS lbit zdoq oiamr mhHl htromh lbia bit ihoh akol oSboe ohotr ed lrob ki ihoh brk at emo ohnotr at hhmon hch : oiamr iHcqiho lhkin lSkot bbit ihoh oikino : oibiao at htromh ohmeSr ohqdSim bamonh oelihm ngid konniho hloi oSmei aHiho mSnh : oiHial oecciho onHt oeShal oirimot oiocbd oalial oismkiho omHt obniho pqidim mid konniho oSmei aHio bmpqd iHcqiho hmlk oecriho ngid bit halhim : oqora bn imnh hloi hSoer lmcrHh el ndbot halhim ltt tromt ihoh oqdSi hqdSim : oel ido edn omnimn oiSoe oSmeiho amriho oSkniho beri hkhnim bamonh ltt laHihm bmHlqot kgdol kqTn : mlbd htiHSm lckrim mbn SloS Snim olmelh lkl hba lbit ihoh ldbr iom biomo lebodtm bmSmrotm kmHlqotihm : oat htiHS hkhnim lbit abotihm ohloim mbn eSrim Snh olmelh bmSmrotihm bmHlqotihm : olhtiHS bkl Tpm nSihm obnihm obnotihm lkl qhl ki bamontm itqdSo qdS : olbni ahrn hkhnim bSdi mgrS erihm bkl eir oeir anSim aSr nqbo bSmot ltt mnot lkl ckr bkhnim olkl htiHS bloim : oieS kcat iHcqiho bkl ihodh oieS hTob ohiSr ohamt lpni ihoh alhio : obkl meSh aSr hHl bebodt bit halhim obtorh obmzoh ldrS lalhio bkl lbbo eSh ohzliH :

32

aHri hdbrim ohamt halh ba snHrib mlk aSor oiba bihodh oiHn el herim hbzrot oiamr lbqem alio : oira iHcqiho ki ba snHrib opnio lmlHmh el iroSlm : oioez em Srio ogbrio lstom at mimi heinot aSr mHoz leir oiecroho : oiqbzo em rb oistmo at kl hmeinot oat hnHl hSoTp btok harz lamr lmh iboao mlki aSor omzao mim rbim : oitHcq oibn at kl hHomh hprozh oiel el hmgdlot olHozh hHomh aHrt oiHcq at hmloa eir doid oieS SlH lrb omgnim : oitn Sri mlHmot el hem oiqbzm alio al rHob Ser heir oidbr el lbbm lamr : Hcqo oamzo al tirao oal tHto mpni mlk aSor omlpni kl hhmon aSr emo ki emno rb memo : emo croe bSr oemno ihoh alhino lecrno olhlHm mlHmtno oismko hem el dbri iHcqiho mlk ihodh : aHr ch SlH snHrib mlk aSor ebdio iroSlimh ohoa el lkiS okl mmSlto emo el iHcqiho mlk ihodh oel kl ihodh aSr biroSlm lamr : kh amr snHrib mlk aSor el mh atm bTHim oiSbim bmzor biroSlm : hla iHcqiho msit atkm ltt atkm lmot breb obzma lamr ihoh alhino izilno mkp mlk aSor : hla hoa iHcqiho hsir at bmtio oat mcbHtio oiamr lihodh oliroSlm lamr lpni mcbH aHd tStHoo oelio tqTiro : hla tdeo mh eSiti ani oaboti lkl emi harzot hikol iklo alhi goi harzot lhzil at arzm midi : mi bkl alhi hgoim halh aSr hHrimo aboti aSr ikol lhzil at emo midi ki iokl alhikm lhzil atkm midi : oeth al iSia atkm Hcqiho oal isit atkm kcat oal tamino lo ki la iokl kl aloh kl goi ommlkh lhzil emo midi omid aboti ap ki alhikm la izilo atkm midi : oeod dbro ebdio el ihoh halhim oel iHcqiho ebdo : osprim ktb lHrp lihoh alhi iSral olamr elio lamr kalhi goi harzot aSr la hzilo emm midi kn la izil alhi iHcqiho emo midi : oiqrao bqol gdol ihodit el em iroSlm aSr el hHomh liram olbhlm lmen ilkdo at heir : oidbro al alhi iroSlm kel alhi emi harz meSh idi hadm : oitpll iHcqiho hmlk oiSeiho bn amoz hnbia el cat oiceqo hSmim : oiSlH ihoh mlak oikHd kl gbor Hil ongid oSr bmHnh mlk aSor oiSb bbSt pnim larzo oiba bit alhio omiziao meio Sm hpilho bHrb : oioSe ihoh at iHcqiho oat iSbi iroSlm mid snHrib mlk aSor omid kl oinhlm msbib : orbim mbiaim mnHh lihoh liroSlm omgdnot liHcqiho mlk ihodh oinSa leini kl hgoim maHri kn : bimim hhm Hlh iHcqiho ed lmot oitpll al ihoh oiamr lo omopt ntn lo : ola kgml elio hSib iHcqiho ki gbh lbo oihi elio qzp oel ihodh oiroSlm : oikne iHcqiho bgbh lbo hoa oiSbi iroSlm ola ba elihm qzp ihoh bimi iHcqiho : oihi liHcqiho eSr okbod hrbh mad oazrot eSh lo lksp olchb olabn iqrh olbSmim olmgnim olkl kli Hmdh : omsknot ltboat dgn otiroS oizhr oarot lkl bhmh obhmh oedrim laorot : oerim eSh lo omqnh zan obqr lrb ki ntn lo alhim rkoS rb mad : ohoa iHcqiho stm at moza mimi giHon helion oiiSrm lmTh merbh leir doid oizlH iHcqiho bkl meSho : okn bmlizi Sri bbl hmSlHim elio ldrS hmopt aSr hih barz ecbo halhim lnsoto ldet kl blbbo : oitr dbri iHcqiho oHsdio hnm ktobim bHcon iSeiho bn amoz hnbia el spr mlki ihodh oiSral : oiSkb iHcqiho em abtio oiqbrho bmelh qbri bni doid okbod eSo lo bmoto kl ihodh oiSbi iroSlm oimlk mnSh bno tHtio :

33

bn Stim eSrh Snh mnSh bmlko oHmSim oHmS Snh mlk biroSlm : oieS hre beini ihoh ktoebot hgoim aSr horiS ihoh mpni bni iSral : oiSb oibn at hbmot aSr ntz iHcqiho abio oiqm mcbHot lbelim oieS aSrot oiStHo lkl zba hSmim oiebd atm : obnh mcbHot bbit ihoh aSr amr ihoh biroSlm ihih Smi leolm : oibn mcbHot lkl zba hSmim bSti Hzrot bit ihoh : ohoa hebir at bnio baS bgi bn hnm oeonn onHS okSp oeSh aob oideoni hrbh leSot hre beini ihoh lhkeiso : oiSm at psl hsml aSr eSh bbit halhim aSr amr alhim al doid oal Slmh bno bbit hch obiroSlm aSr bHrti mkl SbTi iSral aSim at Smi leilom : ola aosip lhsir at rgl iSral mel hadmh aSr hemdti labtikm rq am iSmro leSot at kl aSr zoitim lkl htorh ohHqim ohmSpTim bid mSh : oite mnSh at ihodh oiSbi iroSlm leSot re mn hgoim aSr hSmid ihoh mpni bni iSral : oidbr ihoh al mnSh oal emo ola hqSibo : oiba ihoh elihm at Sri hzba aSr lmlk aSor oilkdo at mnSh bHHim oiasrho bnHStim oiolikho bblh : okhzr lo Hlh at pni ihoh alhio oikne mad mlpni alhi abtio : oitpll alio oietr lo oiSme tHnto oiSibho iroSlm lmlkoto oide mnSh ki ihoh hoa halhim : oaHri kn bnh Homh Hizonh leir doid merbh lgiHon bnHl olboa bSer hdgim osbb lepl oigbihh mad oiSm Sri Hil bkl herim hbzrot bihodh : oisr at alhi hnkr oat hsml mbit ihoh okl hmcbHot aSr bnh bhr bit ihoh obiroSlm oiSlk Hozh leir : oikn at mcbH ihoh oicbH elio cbHi Slmim otodh oiamr lihodh lebod at ihoh alhi iSral : abl eod hem cbHim bbmot rq lihoh alhihm : oitr dbri mnSh otplto al alhio odbri hHcim hmdbrim alio bSm ihoh alhi iSral hnm el dbri mlki iSral : otplto ohetr lo okl HTato omelo ohmqmot aSr bnh bhm bmot ohemid haSrim ohpslim lpni hkneo hnm ktobim el dbri Hoci : oiSkb mnSh em abtio oiqbrho bito oimlk amon bno tHtio : bn eSrim oStim Snh amon bmlko oStim Snim mlk biroSlm : oieS hre beini ihoh kaSr eSh mnSh abio olkl hpsilim aSr eSh mnSh abio cbH amon oiebdm : ola nkne mlpni ihoh khkne mnSh abio ki hoa amon hrbh aSmh : oiqSro elio ebdio oimitho bbito : oiko em harz at kl hqSrim el hmlk amon oimliko em harz at iaSiho bno tHtio :

34

bn Smonh Snim iaSiho bmlko oSlSim oaHt Snh mlk biroSlm : oieS hiSr beini ihoh oilk bdrki doid abio ola sr imin oSmaol : obSmonh Snim lmlko ohoa eodno ner hHl ldroS lalhi doid abio obStim eSrh Snh hHl lThr at ihodh oiroSlm mn hbmot ohaSrim ohpslim ohmskot : ointzo lpnio at mcbHot hbelim ohHmnim aSr lmelh melihm gde ohaSrim ohpslim ohmskot Sbr ohdq oicrq el pni hqbrim hcbHim lhm : oezmot khnim Srp el mcbHotim oiThr at ihodh oat iroSlm : oberi mnSh oaprim oSmeon oed nptli bhr btihm sbib : ointz at hmcbHot oat haSrim ohpslim ktt lhdq okl hHmnim gde bkl arz iSral oiSb liroSlm : obSnt Smonh eSrh lmlko lThr harz ohbit SlH at Spn bn azliho oat meSiho Sr heir oat ioaH bn ioaHc hmckir lHcq at bit ihoh alhio : oibao al Hlqiho hkhn hgdol oitno at hksp hmoba bit alhim aSr aspo hloim Smri hsp mid mnSh oaprim omkl Sarit iSral omkl ihodh obnimn oiSbi iroSlm : oitno el id eSh hmlakh hmpqdim bbit ihoh oitno ato eoSi hmlakh aSr eSim bbit ihoh lbdoq olHcq hbit : oitno lHrSim olbnim lqnot abni mHzb oezim lmHbrot olqrot at hbtim aSr hSHito mlki ihodh : ohanSim eSim bamonh bmlakh oelihm mpqdim iHt oebdiho hloim mn bni mrri ockrih omSlm mn bni hqhtim lnzH ohloim kl mbin bkli Sir : oel hsblim omnzHim lkl eSh mlakh lebodh oebodh omhloim soprim oSTrim oSoerim : obhoziam at hksp hmoba bit ihoh mza Hlqiho hkhn at spr tort ihoh bid mSh : oien Hlqiho oiamr al Spn hsopr spr htorh mzati bbit ihoh oitn Hlqiho at hspr al Spn : oiba Spn at hspr al hmlk oiSb eod at hmlk dbr lamr kl aSr ntn bid ebdik hm eSim : oitiko at hksp hnmza bbit ihoh oitnoho el id hmpqdim oel id eoSi hmlakh : oigd Spn hsopr lmlk lamr spr ntn li Hlqiho hkhn oiqra bo Spn lpni hmlk : oihi kSme hmlk at dbri htorh oiqre at bgdio : oizo hmlk at Hlqiho oat aHiqm bn Spn oat ebdon bn mikh oat Spn hsopr oat eSih ebd hmlk lamr : lko drSo at ihoh bedi obed hnSar biSral obihodh el dbri hspr aSr nmza ki gdolh Hmt ihoh aSr ntkh bno el aSr la Smro abotino at dbr ihoh leSot kkl hktob el hspr hch : oilk Hlqiho oaSr hmlk al Hldh hnbiah aSt Slm bn toqht bn Hsrh Somr hbgdim ohia ioSbt biroSlm bmSnh oidbro alih kcat : otamr lhm kh amr ihoh alhi iSral amro laiS aSr SlH atkm ali : kh amr ihoh hnni mbia reh el hmqom hch oel ioSbio at kl halot hktobot el hspr aSr qrao lpni mlk ihodh : tHt aSr ecboni oiqTiro lalhim aHrim lmen hkeisni bkl meSi idihm ottk Hmti bmqom hch ola tkbh : oal mlk ihodh hSlH atkm ldroS bihoh kh tamro alio kh amr ihoh alhi iSral hdbrim aSr Smet : ien rk lbbk otkne mlpni alhim bSmek at dbrio el hmqom hch oel iSbio otkne lpni otqre at bgdik otbk lpni ogm ani Smeti nam ihoh : hnni aspk al abtik onaspt al qbrtik bSlom ola trainh einik bkl hreh aSr ani mbia el hmqom hch oel iSbio oiSibo at hmlk dbr : oiSlH hmlk oiasp at kl cqni ihodh oiroSlm : oiel hmlk bit ihoh okl aiS ihodh oiSbi iroSlm ohkhnim ohloim okl hem mgdol oed qTn oiqra bacnihm at kl dbri spr hbrit hnmza bit ihoh : oiemd hmlk el emdo oikrt at hbrit lpni ihoh llkt aHri ihoh olSmor at mzotio oedotio oHqio bkl lbbo obkl npSo leSot at dbri hbrit hktobim el hspr hch : oiemd at kl hnmza biroSlm obnimn oieSo iSbi iroSlm kbrit alhim alhi abotihm : oisr iaSiho at kl htoebot mkl harzot aSr lbni iSral oiebd at kl hnmza biSral lebod at ihoh alhihm kl imio la sro maHri ihoh alhi abotihm :

35

oieS iaSiho biroSlm psH lihoh oiSHTo hpsH barbeh eSr lHdS hraSon : oiemd hkhnim el mSmrotm oiHcqm lebodt bit ihoh : oiamr lloim hmbonim lkl iSral hqdoSim lihoh tno at aron hqdS bbit aSr bnh Slmh bn doid mlk iSral ain lkm mSa bktp eth ebdo at ihoh alhikm oat emo iSral : ohkono lbit abotikm kmHlqotikm bktb doid mlk iSral obmktb Slmh bno : oemdo bqdS lplgot bit habot laHikm bni hem oHlqt bit ab lloim : oSHTo hpsH ohtqdSo ohkino laHikm leSot kdbr ihoh bid mSh : oirm iaSiho lbni hem zan kbSim obni ecim hkl lpsHim lkl hnmza lmspr SlSim alp obqr SlSt alpim alh mrkoS hmlk : oSrio lndbh lem lkhnim olloim hrimo Hlqih ockriho oiHial ngidi bit halhim lkhnim ntno lpsHim alpim oSS maot obqr SlS maot : okonniho oSmeiho ontnal aHio oHSbiho oieial oiocbd Sri hloim hrimo lloim lpsHim HmSt alpim obqr HmS maot : otkon hebodh oiemdo hkhnim el emdm ohloim el mHlqotm kmzot hmlk : oiSHTo hpsH oicrqo hkhnim midm ohloim mpSiTim : oisiro helh lttm lmplgot lbit abot lbni hem lhqrib lihoh kktob bspr mSh okn lbqr : oibSlo hpsH baS kmSpT ohqdSim bSlo bsirot obdodim obzlHot oirizo lkl bni hem : oaHr hkino lhm olkhnim ki hkhnim bni ahrn bhelot heolh ohHlbim ed lilh ohloim hkino lhm olkhnim bni ahrn : ohmSrrim bni asp el memdm kmzot doid oasp ohimn oidton Hoch hmlk ohSerim lSer oSer ain lhm lsor mel ebdtm ki aHihm hloim hkino lhm : otkon kl ebodt ihoh biom hhoa leSot hpsH ohelot elot el mcbH ihoh kmzot hmlk iaSiho : oieSo bni iSral hnmzaim at hpsH bet hhia oat Hg hmzot Sbet imim : ola neSh psH kmho biSral mimi Smoal hnbia okl mlki iSral la eSo kpsH aSr eSh iaSiho ohkhnim ohloim okl ihodh oiSral hnmza oioSbi iroSlm : bSmonh eSrh Snh lmlkot iaSiho neSh hpsH hch : aHri kl cat aSr hkin iaSiho at hbit elh nko mlk mzrim lhlHm bkrkmiS el prt oiza lqrato iaSiho : oiSlH alio mlakim lamr mh li olk mlk ihodh la elik ath hiom ki al bit mlHmti oalhim amr lbhlni Hdl lk malhim aSr emi oal iSHitk : ola hsb iaSiho pnio mmno ki lhlHm bo htHpS ola Sme al dbri nko mpi alhim oiba lhlHm bbqet mgdo : oiro hirim lmlk iaSiho oiamr hmlk lebdio hebironi ki hHliti mad : oiebirho ebdio mn hmrkbh oirkibho el rkb hmSnh aSr lo oiolikho iroSlm oimt oiqbr bqbrot abtio okl ihodh oiroSlm mtablim el iaSiho : oiqonn irmiho el iaSiho oiamro kl hSrim ohSrot bqinotihm el iaSiho ed hiom oitnom lHq el iSral ohnm ktobim el hqinot : oitr dbri iaSiho oHsdio kktob btort ihoh : odbrio hraSnim ohaHrnim hnm ktobim el spr mlki iSral oihodh :

36

oiqHo em harz at ihoaHc bn iaSiho oimlikho tHt abio biroSlm : bn SloS oeSrim Snh ioaHc bmlko oSlSh HdSim mlk biroSlm : oisirho mlk mzrim biroSlm oienS at harz mah kkr ksp okkr chb : oimlk mlk mzrim at aliqim aHio el ihodh oiroSlm oisb at Smo ihoiqim oat ioaHc aHio lqH nko oibiaho mzrimh : bn eSrim oHmS Snh ihoiqim bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm oieS hre beini ihoh alhio : elio elh nbokdnazr mlk bbl oiasrho bnHStim lhliko bblh : omkli bit ihoh hbia nbokdnazr lbbl oitnm bhiklo bbbl : oitr dbri ihoiqim otebtio aSr eSh ohnmza elio hnm ktobim el spr mlki iSral oihodh oimlk ihoikin bno tHtio : bn Smonh Snim ihoikin bmlko oSlSh HdSim oeSrt imim mlk biroSlm oieS hre beini ihoh : oltSobt hSnh SlH hmlk nbokdnazr oibaho bblh em kli Hmdt bit ihoh oimlk at zdqiho aHio el ihodh oiroSlm : bn eSrim oaHt Snh zdqiho bmlko oaHt eSrh Snh mlk biroSlm : oieS hre beini ihoh alhio la nkne mlpni irmiho hnbia mpi ihoh : ogm bmlk nbokdnazr mrd aSr hSbieo balhim oiqS at erpo oiamz at lbbo mSob al ihoh alhi iSral : gm kl Sri hkhnim ohem hrbo lmeol mel kkl tebot hgoim oiTmao at bit ihoh aSr hqdiS biroSlm : oiSlH ihoh alhi abotihm elihm bid mlakio hSkm oSloH ki Hml el emo oel meono : oihio mlebim bmlaki halhim obocim dbrio omteteim bnbaio ed elot Hmt ihoh bemo ed lain mrpa : oiel elihm at mlk kSdiim oihrg bHorihm bHrb bbit mqdSm ola Hml el bHor obtolh cqn oiSS hkl ntn bido : okl kli bit halhim hgdlim ohqTnim oazrot bit ihoh oazrot hmlk oSrio hkl hbia bbl : oiSrpo at bit halhim ointzo at Homt iroSlm okl armnotih Srpo baS okl kli mHmdih lhSHit : oigl hSarit mn hHrb al bbl oihio lo olbnio lebdim ed mlk mlkot prs : lmlaot dbr ihoh bpi irmiho ed rzth harz at Sbtotih kl imi hSmh Sbth lmlaot Sbeim Snh : obSnt aHt lkorS mlk prs lklot dbr ihoh bpi irmiho heir ihoh at roH korS mlk prs oiebr qol bkl mlkoto ogm bmktb lamr : kh amr korS mlk prs kl mmlkot harz ntn li ihoh alhi hSmim ohoa pqd eli lbnot lo bit biroSlm aSr bihodh mi bkm mkl emo ihoh alhio emo oiel :

al-hromiim

1

polos ebd ihoSe hmSiH mqra lhiot SliH onbdl lbSort alhim : aSr hbTiHh mlpnim bid nbiaio bktbi hqdS : el dbr bno hnold mcre dod lpi hbSr : aSr hokn lbn halhim bgborh lpi roH hqdSh btHito mbin hmtim hoa ihoSe hmSiH adnino : aSr bido qblno Hn oSliHot lhqim mSmet hamonh bkl hgoim lmen Smo : aSr btokm hnkm gm atm qroai ihoSe hmSiH : lkl aSr bromi ididi alhim oqroaim lhiot qdoSim Hsd oSlom lkm mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : braSonh aodh lalhi bihoSe hmSiH el klkm aSr spr amontkm bkl heolm : ki halhim aSr ani ebd ato broHi bbSort bno led li ki tmid ani mckir atkm : bhetiri btploti bkl et lmen aSr rq hpem azliH brzon alhim lboa alikm : ki nksp nkspti lraotkm olHlq lkm ai co mtt roH lmen ttHcqi : ohoa lhtnHm emkm ch bch bamonh aSr lkm ogm li : ola akHd mkm aHi ki pemim rbot Smti el lbi lboa alikm ak nmne mmni ed hnh lmen amza pri gm bkm kmo bitr hgoim : mHib anki lionim ogm llecim lHkmim ogm lptaim : lkn ndbni lbi lhSmie at hbSorh gm atkm aSr bromi : ki ainni boS mbSort hmSiH baSr gbort alhim hia ltSoet kl hmamin lihodi braSonh okn gm lioni : ki tglh bh zdqt alhim mamonh al amonh kktob ozdiq bamonto iHih : ki nglh Hron alhim mn hSmim el kl rSet bni adm oeoltm aSr iezro at hamt beolh : ien aSr det halhim gloih bqrbm ki halhim hodiem aoth : ki mhoto hnelmh hia kHo hnzHi oalhoto met nbra heolm tode bmeSim otrah lblti hiot lhm lhtnzl : ien bdetm at halhim la kbdho kalhim ogm la hodo lo ki am hlko aHri hhbl bmoezotihm oiHSk lbm hnber : obamrm Hkmim anHno hio lksilim : oimiro at kbod halhim aSr ainno npsd bdmot zlm adm hnpsd zlm kl eop oholk el arbe ormS hadmh : el kn gm ntnm halhim lTmah btaot lbm lnbl goiotihm aiS at reho : aSr hmiro amt halhim bkcb oikbdo oiebdo at hbrih tHt brah hmbrk leolmim amn : bebor cat ntnm halhim ltaot boSh ki nSihm hHlipo at htSmiS kdrkn bSla kdrkn : okn gm hckrim ecbo at tSmiS haSh kdrkh oiHmo ch bch btSoqtm oieSo toebh ckr em ckr oiqHo Skr mSobtm hraoi lhm bezm gopm : okaSr maso lhSig halhim bdet ntnm halhim bidi deh nmash leSot at aSr la itkn : oirb bqrbm kl Hms cnot orSe bze oaon oimlao qnah orzH omribh omrmh othpkot : hlki rkil omlSinim Snai alhim ogaim ocdim ohollim oHSbi aon oainm Smeim bqol abotm : nberim mdet obgdim akcrim nTri Snah ola rHmnim : iodeim hmh at mSpT alhim ki eSi alh bni mot hm ola lbd SieSo at alh ki gm rzth npSm beSihm :

2

lkn ain lk htnzlot ath bn adm hdn thih mi Sthih ki bmh Stdin at Hbrk tHib at npSk baSr ath hdn teSh kmeSho : oideno ki mSpT alhim kpi hamt el eSi alh : oath bn adm hdn at aSr pelo kalh oeSit kmeSihm htHSb lhmlT mmSpT halhim : ao htboc letrt Tobo olHmlto olark roHo ola ttbonn ki Tobt halhim tdrik atk ltSobh : obqSi lbbk hmman lSob tzbr lk ebrh al iom ebrt halhim oet hglot zdqt mSpTo : aSr iSlm laiS kmeSho : lmtmidim beSot hTob ombqSim at hkbod ohhdr oat aSr ainno ebd itn at Hii heolmim : oel bni hmri oaSr la iSmeo lamt ki am leolh Smeo Hron ap oHmh : zrh omzoqh el kl npS adm eSh hre el hihodi braSonh okn gm el hioni : okbod ohdr oSlom lkl eSh hTob lihodi braSonh okn gm lioni : ki ain mSa pnim em halhim : ki kl alh aSr HTao bli torh gm bbli torh iabdo oaSr HTao btorh gm el pi htorh iSpTo : ki la Smei htorh zdiqim lpni halhim ki am eSi htorh hm izdqo : ki hgoim aSr ain lhm torh beSotm kdbri htorh malihm gm bain torh hm torh lnpSm : bhraotm meSh htorh ktob el lbm odetm meidh bhm omHSbotm bqrbm mHibot cat at cat ao gm mckot : biom aSr iSpT halhim at kl telmot bni hadm bid ihoSe hmSiH kpi bSorti : hn ath nqra bSm ihodi onSent el htorh ohthllt balhim : oidet hraoi obhiotk mlmd btorh tbin bin Tob lre : obTHt bnpSk lhiot molik heorim oaor lhlkim bHSk : misr lHsri lb omorh hptaim oiS lk zort hmde ohamt btorh : oath aSr torh aHrim at npSk la torh amrt la tgnb ohnk gnb : amrt la tnap oath nap tSqz at halilim oath gcl at hqdS : tthll btorh otnbl at halhim bebrk at htorh : ki Sm halhim bgllkm mHll bgoim kaSr ktob : hn hmilh moeilh am tSmr at htorh abl am ebr ath at htorh ac miltk hith lk lerlh : lkn am iSmr herl at mSpTi htorh hla tHSb lo erlto lmilh : oherl mldh hmqim at htorh hla hoa idin atk aSr iS lk hktb ohmilh oebrt at htorh : ki la hnrah mHoz hoa hihodi ola hnrah mHoz bbSr hia hmilh : ki am aSr bpnim hoa ihodi omilh hia aSr blb kpi hroH ola kpi hktb aSr la mbni adm thlto ki am mat halhim :

3

oeth mh hoa itron hihodi omh hia toelt hmilh : hrbh mkl pnim braSon ki hpqdo bidm dbri alhim : ki mh hoa am mqztm la hamino hibTl Hsron amontm at amont alhim : Hlilh abl ihi hal hoa hnamn okl hadm kcb kktob lmen tzdq bdbrk tckh bSpTk : oam eoltno tromm at zdqt halhim mh namr hki iS eol balhim hmSlH Hron apo lpi drk bni adm anki mdbr : Hlilh Sam kn aik iSpT halhim at heolm : ki am el idi kcbi trbh otprz amt alhim lthlto lmh ch ani aSpT eod kHoTa : ola neSh kdbr mHrpino omqzt moziai dbh elino lamr hnh amrim neSh hre lmen iza hTob aSr dinm iba elihm bzdq : oeth mh hoa hiS lno melh itrh la bmaomh kbr hokHno ki gm hihodim gm hionim klm hm tHt hHTa : kktob ain zdiq ain gm aHd : ain mSkil ain drS at alhim : hkl sr iHdo nalHo ain eSh Tob ain gm aHd : qbr ptoH gronm lSonm iHliqon Hmt ekSob tHt Sptimo : aSr alh pihm mla omrrot : rglihm imhro lSpk dm : Sd oSbr bmslotm : odrk Slom la ideo : ain pHd alhim lngd einihm : oanHno ideno ki kl mh Samrh htorh mdbrt al alh aSr tHt htorh lmen iskr kl ph ohih kl heolm mHib lpni alhim : ien aSr mmeSi htorh la izdq lpnio kl bSr ki el idi htorh det hHTa : oeth bbli torh zdqt alhim laor izah aSr heido elih htorh ohnbiaim : ohia zdqt alhim bamont ihoSe hmSiH al kl oel kl aSr hamino bo ki ain hbdl : ki klm HTao oHsri kbod alhim hmh : onzdqo Hnm bHsdo el idi hpdot aSr hith bmSiH ihoSe : aSr Smo halhim lpnino lkprt el idi hamonh bdmo lhraot at zdqto aHri aSr hebir at hHTaim SneSo lpnim bet Hmlt alhim : lhraot at zdqto bet hcat lhioto zdiq omzdiq at bn amont ihoSe : oeth aih hhthllot hla nSbth oel idi tort mh hel idi tort hmeSim la ki el idi tort hamonh : lkn nHSb ki bamonh izdq hadm bbli meSi torh : ao halhim rq alhi hihodim hla gm alhi hgoim akn gm alhi hgoim hoa : ki aHd halhim hmzdiq at hmolim mtok hamonh oat herlim el idi hamonh : oeth hmbTlim anHno at htorh el idi hamonh Hlilh ak mqimim anHno at htorh :

4

oeth mh namr el abrhm abino mh ch hSig lpi hbSr : ki am nzdq abrhm mtok hmeSim lo hthlh ak la lpni halhim : ki hktob mh hoa amr ohamn abrhm bihoh oiHSbh lo zdqh : hnh hpel la iHSb lo Skro el pi hHsd ki am el pi hHob : abl laSr ainno pel ki am mamin bmzdiq at hrSe amonto tHSb lo lzdqh : kaSr gm dod maSr at hadm aSr halhim iHSb lo zdqh bla meSim bamro : aSri nSoi pSe ksoi HTah : aSri adm la iHSb ihoh lo eon : oeth haSor hch hel hmilh hoa am gm el herlh hla amrno ki labrhm nHSbh amonto lzdqh : oain nHSbh lo am bhioto mhol ao beodno erl hn la bhioto mhol ki am berlto : oaot hmilh qbl lHotm zdqt hamonh aSr hith lo berlto lhiot lab lkl hmaminim ohm erlim lmen ap lhm tHSb hzdqh : olhiot lab gm lmolim ak la laSr hm nmolim lbd ki am gm hlkim beqbot hamonh Shith lo labrhm beodno berlto : ki la el idi torh bah hhbTHh labrhm olcreo lhioto irS heolm ki am el idi zdqt hamonh : ki alo lbni htorh hirSh hamonh lriq thih ohhbTHh bTlh : ki htorh mbiah qzp ki baSr ain torh gm ain Sm ebrh : el kn mtok amonh lmen lpi Hsd lmen tHih hhbTHh qimt lkl creo la lbni htorh lbdm ki gm lbni amont abrhm aSr hoa ab lklno : kktob ki ab hmon goim nttik ohoa hamin bhbiT al al hmHih at hmtim ohqora at aSr la hih kmo hoh : baSr ain tqoh qoh oiamn lmen aSr ihih lab hmon goim kmo Snamr kh ihih crek : ola rpth amonto ola htbonn al gopo Skbr npog bhioto kbn mat Snh oal blot rHm Srh : ola Hlq lbo bhbTHt halhim kHsr hamonh ki am htHcq bamonto oitn kbod lalhim : oide blbb Slm ki at aSr hbTiH gm ikl leSoto : el kn gm nHSbh lo lzdqh : ola lbd lmeno ktobh cat SnHSbh lo : ki am gm lmenno aSr etidh lhHSb lno hmaminim bmi Sheir at ihoSe adnino mn hmtim : aSr nmsr bebor pSeino oneor lbebor zdqno :

5

lkn aHri nzdqno bamonh Slom lno em halhim badnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr bido mzano bamonh mboa al hHsd hch aSr anHno emdim bo onthll btqot kbod halhim : ola cat blbd ki ap nthll bzrot ien aSr ideno ki hzrh mbiah lidi sblnot : ohsblnot lidi emidh bnsion ohemidh bnsion lidi tqoh : ohtqoh hia la tbiS ki hozq blbbno ahbt al el idi roH hqdS hntn lno : ki hmSiH beodno HlSim mt beto bed hreSim : hn bed hzdiq iqSh laiS lmot akn lmot bed hTob aoli iSaho lbo : abl bcat hodie halhim at ahbto alino ki hmSiH mt bedno bhiotno eod HTaim : oeth aSr nzdqno bdmo mh mad noSe bo mn hqzp : ki am nrzino lalhim bmot bno bhiotno aibim ap ki noSe eth bHiio aHri aSr nrzino : ola cat blbd ki gm mthllim anHno balhim el id adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr bo eth qblno at hrzoi : lkn kaSr el idi adm aHd ba hHTa leolm ohmot beqb hHTa okn ebr hmot el kl bni adm mpni aSr klm HTao : ki ed cmn htorh hih hHTa beolm ak la iHSb HTa bain torh : aolm hmot mlk madm ed mSh gm el alh aSr la HTao bdmion ebrt adm hraSon aSr hoa dmot hetid lboa : ak la kdbr hpSe dbr hmtnh ki am bpSe haHd mto hrbim ap ki Hsd alhim omtnto edpo erop lrbim bHsd hadm haHd ihoSe hmSiH : ola kmo el idi HTa aHd kn hmtnh ki hmSpT iza maHd lHib abl mtnt hHsd hia lckot mpSeim rbim : ki am bpSe haHd mlk hmot el idi haHd ap ki mqbli edp hHsd omtnt hzdqh imlko bHiim el idi haHd ihoSe hmSiH : lkn kaSr bpSe aHd naSmo kl bni adm kkh gm el idi ckot aHt icko kl bni adm lHiim : ki kaSr bmri hadm haHd hio hrbim lHTaim kkh gm el idi mSmet haHd ihio hrbim lzdiqim : abl htorh nknsh lmen irbh hpSe obaSr rbh hHTa edp mmno hHsd : lmen kaSr mlk hHTa bmot kkh imlk gm hHsd el idi hzdqh lHii eolm bihoSe hmSiH adnino :

6

am kn mh namr hnemd bHTa lmen irbh hHsd : Hlilh lno ki mtno lHTa oaik nosip lHiot bo : ao hainkm ideim ki klno hnTblim lmSiH ihoSe lmoto nTblno : lkn nqbrno ato bTbilh lmot lmen kaSr neor hmSiH mn hmtim bkbod hab kn nthlk gm anHno bHiim mHdSim : ki am ndbqno bdmion moto akn gm nhih dboqim ltHito : baSr ideim anHno ki nzlb ato hadm hiSn aSr bno lmen tbTl goit hHTa lblti hiotno eod ebdim lHTa : ki aSr mt hoa nqh mn hHTa : ohnh am mtno em hmSiH namin ki gm nHih emo : baSr ideno ki hmSiH aHri aSr neor mn hmtim la imot eod ohmot la iSlT bo eod : ki aSr mt mt lHTa pem aHt oaSr Hi Hi hoa lalhim : okn gm atm HSbo atkm mtim lHTa oHiim lalhim bmSiH ihoSe adnino : am kn apoa al tmlk hHTat bgopkm aSr imot lnTot aHrih btaotio : gm al tkino at abrikm lhiot kli eol lHTa ak tkino at npSkm lalhim kHiim mem hmtim oabrikm kli zdqh lalhim ki hHTa la iokl lmSl eod bkm ien ainkm tHt id htorh ki am tHt id hHsd : : oeth mh hnHTa ien ainno tHt id htorh ki am tHt id hHsd Hlilh : hla idetm ki laSr ttno at npSkm lhiot ebdio lsor lmSmeto hn ebdim atm laSr tSmeo lo am lHTa ali mot am lmSmet ali zdqh : abl todt lalhim ki hiitm ebdi hHTa oaHr Smetm bkl lbbkm al tkont hlqH aSr nmsrtm lo : SHrrtm midi hHTa lkn hStebdtm lzdqh : kdrk bni adm ani mdbr mpni rpion bSrkm ki kaSr lpnim hkinotm at abrikm lebodt hHTah ohrSe lhrSie kn eth hkino at abrikm lebodt hzdqh lhtqdS : ki bet hiotkm ebdi hHTa HpSim hiitm mn hzdqh : omh apoa hpri Shih lkm ac mn hmeSim aSr eth tbSo mhm ki aHritm hmot : akn eth bhiotkm mSHrrim midi hHTa omSebdim lalhim iS lkm prikm lqdSh oaHrito Hii eolm : ki Skr hHTa hoa hmot omtnt Hsd alhim hia Hii heolm bmSiH ihoSe adnino :

7

ao hla idetm aHi olidei htorh anki mdbr ki htorh tSlT el hadm kl imi Hiio : ki aSh belt bel qSorh hia baiSh kpi htorh bHiio obmot hbel pTorh hia mtort belh : ohnh am tHih laiS aHr bHii belh napt iqra lh abl aHri mot belh pTorh hia mn htorh oainnh napt bhioth laiS aHr : lkn aHi homtm gm atm ltorh bgoit hmSiH lhiotkm laHr laSr neor mn hmtim lmen neSh pri lalhim : ki bet hiotno bbSr tSoqot hHTa aSr hteorro el idi htorh hio pelot babrino leSot pri lmot : abl eth npTrno mn htorh ki mtno laSr hiino asorim bo lmen nebd meth lpi htHdSot hroH ola lpi iSn hktb : am kn mh namr hki htorh HTa hia Hlilh ala la ideti at hHTa blti el idi htorh ki la hiiti iode hHmod loli amrh htorh la tHmd : oimza hHTa sbh lo bmzoh leorr bqrbi kl Hmod ki mbledi htorh hHTa mt hoa : oani Hiiti mlpnim bla torh okaSr bah hmzoh oiHi hHTa : oani mti ohmzoh aSr ntnh lHiim hia nmzah li lmot : ki mza hHTa sbh bmzoh lhteot ati oihrgni el idh : obkn htorh hia qdoSh ohmzoh qdoSh oiSrh oTobh : hki hTobh hith li lmot Hlilh ala hHTa lmen irah ki HTa hoa hbia li el idi hTobh at hmot lmen aSr ihih hHTa lHTah itrh el idi hmzoh : ki ideim anHno Shtorh hia roHnit oani Sl bSr onmkr tHt id hHTa : ki at aSr ani pel la ideti ki ainni eSh at aSr ani rzh bo ki am aSr Snati ato ani eSh : obeSoti at aSr la rziti bo hnni modh bcat ki htorh Tobh hia : oeth la anki eod hpel ato ki am hHTa hiSb bi : ki ideti aSr bi bbSri la iSb Tob hn hrzon iS emdi abl eSot hTob la mzati : ki ainni eSh hTob aSr ani rzh bo ki am hre aSr ainni rzh bo aoto ani eSh : oam at aSr la rziti bo ani eSh la eod anki hpel ki hHTa hiSb bqrbi : obkn mza ani bi ch hHq anki rzh leSot hTob odbq bi hre : ki lpi hadm hpnimi Hpzti btort alhim : ak rah ani babri Hq aHr hlHm lHq Skli oiolikni Sbi ltort hHTa aSr babri : aoi li hadm heni mi izilni mgop hmot hch : aodh lalhim bihoSe hmSiH adnino : lkn bSkli hnni ebd ltort halhim obbSri ani ebd ltort hHTa :

8

el kn ain aSmh balh aSr hm bmSiH ihoSe hmthlkim bla kbSr ki am lpi hroH : ki tort roH hHiim bmSiH ihoSe SHrrh ati mtort hHTa ohmot : ki mh Sla iklh htorh leSot hnHlSh el id hbSr eSh halhim bSlHo at bno btoar bSr hHTa obed hHTa oirSie at hHTa bbSr : lmen tmla Hqt htorh bno hmthlkim bla kbSr ki am lpi hroH : ki aSr hmh lbSr benini hbSr iHSbo oaSr lroH benini hroH iHSbo : ki mHSbt hbSr hia hmot omHSbt hroH hia hHiim ohSlom : ien mHSbt hbSr rq Snat alhim hia baSr la tStebd ltort halhim oap ainnh ikolh : oaSr hmh bbSr la ioklo lhiot rzoim lalhim : oatm ainkm bbSr ki am broH am amnm roH halhim Skn bqrbkm ki mi Sain bo roH hmSiH ainno Slo : oam hmSiH bqrbkm ac hgop mt hoa bdbr hHTa ohroH Hiim hoa bdbr hzdqh : oam iSkn bqrbkm roH hmeir at ihoSe mn hmtim hoa aSr heir at hmSiH mn hmtim gm at goiotikm hmtot iHih el idi roHo hSkn bqrbkm : lkn aHi Hibim anHno la lbSr lHiot lpi hbSr : ki am tHio lpi hbSr mot tmton oam el idi hroH tmotto at melli hbSr Hih tHio : ki kl aSr roH alhim inhgm bni alhim hmh : ki la qbltm roH ebdot lSob lira ki am qbltm roH mSpT bnim aSr bo qraim anHno aba abino : ohroH hhoa meid broHno ki bni alhim anHno : oam bnim anHno gm irSim nhih irSi alhim oHbri hmSiH birSh am amnm ntenh ato lmen gm ato nkbd : ki aHSb aSr enoii hcmn hch ainm Sqolim kngd hkbod hetid lhglot elino : ki hbriah terg oeinih tloiot lhtglot bni alhim : ki nkbSh hbriah lhbl la mrzonh ki am lmen hkbS ath ali tqoh : aSr hbriah gm hia tSHrr mebdot hklion al Hrot kbod bni halhim : ki ideno aSr hbriah klh iHd tanH otHil ed hnh : ola cat blbd ki gm anHno ap am iS lno bkori hroH nanH bnpSno onHkh lmSpT hbnim pdot goitno : ki noSeno btqoh ak htqoh hnrah leinim ainnh tqoh ki aik iiHl aiS ldbr aSr hoa rah : abl am nqoh laSr la rainho nHkh lo bsblnot : okn gm hroH tmk atno bHlSotino ki la ideno mh lhtpll kraoi akn hroH hoa mpgie bedno banHot emqot mdbr : ohHqr lbbot iode at aSr iHSb hroH ki krzon halhim ipgie bed hqdoSim : ohnh ideno ki lahbi alhim hqroaim bezto hkl iecr lTob lhm : ki at aSr idem mqdm atm gm ied mqdm lhiot domim ldmot bno lmen ihih hbkor btok aHim rbim : oat aSr iedm mqdm atm gm qra oat aSr qram atm gm hzdiq oat aSr hzdiqm atm gm par : oeth mh namr el cat am halhim lno mi irib atno : aSr el bno iHido la Hs ki am ntno bed klno hla gm itn lno emo at hkl : mi ienh bbHiri alhim hn alhim hoa hmzdiq : omi hoa iaSimm hn hmSiH aSr mt obiotr aSr neor mem hmtim hoa limin halhim ohoa ipgie bedno : mi ipridno mahbt hmSiH hzrh ao mzoqh ao mSTmh ao reb am erih ao sknh ao Hrb : kktob ki elik hrgno kl hiom nHSbno kzan TbHh : abl bkl alh gbrno mad el idi hahb atno : obToH anki ki la hmot ola hHiim la mlakim ola Srrot ola gborot la hhoh ola hetid : la hroH ola hemq ola kl brih aHrt ioklo lhpridno mahbt halhim aSr hia bmSiH ihoSe adnino :

9

amt ani mdbr bmSiH ola aSqp odeti meidh li broH hqdS : ki gdol ezboni oain qz ldabon lbi : ki mi itn hiti ani mHrm mn hmSiH bed aHi Sari obSri : aSr hm bni iSral oiS lhm mSpT hbnim ohkbod ohbritot omtn htorh ohebodh ohhbTHot : olhm habot oaSr mhm iza hmSiH lpi bSro aSr hoa al el hkl mbrk leolmim amn : abl la kalo npl dbr alhim arzh ki la kl aSr hm miSral gm iSral hmh : ola el hiotm cre abrhm klm bnim hm ki bizHq iqra lk cre : klomr la bni hbSr hmh bni halhim ki am bni hhbTHh hm hnHSbim lcre : ki dbr hbTHh hoa mh Snamr lmoed aSob olSrh bn : ola cat blbd ki kn hih gm brbqh bhioth hrh laHd lizHq abino : ki bTrm ildo bnih oeod la eSo Tob ao re lmen tqom ezt halhim kpi bHirto la mtok meSim ki am krzon hqra : namr lh ki rb iebd zeir : kktob oahb at ieqb oat eSo Snati : am kn mh namr hki iS eol balhim Hlilh : ki lmSh amr oHnti at aSr aHn orHmti at aSr arHm : oel kn ain hdbr la bid hrzh ola bid hrz ki am bid halhim hmrHm : ki kn hktob amr lpreh bebor cat hemdtik bebor hratk at kHi olmen spr Smi bkl harz : oioza mch ki at aSr iHpz iHnno oat aSr iHpz iqSho : oki tamr ali mdoe iokiH eod ngd rzono mi itizb : amnm bn adm mi ath aSr trib at halhim hiamr izr lizro lmh kkh eSitni : am ain rSot lizr el hHmr leSot mglm aHd kli aHd lkbod oaHd lqlon : omh apoa am halhim hHpz lhraot cemo olhodie gborto nSa bkl ark roHo at kli hcem hnkonim labdon : lhodie gm at eSr kbodo el kli hHninh aSr iedm lkbod : ohm anHno aSr qram la mn hihodim blbd ki ap mn hgoim : kdbro bhoSe aqra lla emi emi olla rHmh rHmh : ohih bmqom aSr iamr lhm la emi atm iamr lhm bni al Hi : oiSeiho zoH el iSral ki am ihih mspr bni iSral kHol him Sar iSob bo klion Hroz SoTp zdqh : ki klh onHrzh adni eSh bqrb harz : okaSr amr iSeiho lpnim loli ihoh zbaot hotir lno Srid kmeT ksdm hiino lemrh dmino : oeth mh namr hgoim aSr la rdpo aHri hzdqh hSigo at hzdqh hia hzdqh aSr mtok hamonh : oiSral bbqSo aHri tort zdqh ltort hzdqh la hgie : oel mh ien aSr la mamonh drSoh ki am mmeSim ki htngpo babn ngp : kktob hnni isd bzion abn ngp ozor mkSol okl hmamin bo la iboS :

10

aHi Hpz lbbi otplti lalhim bed iSral aSr ioSeo : ki meid ani elihm SiS lhm qnah lalhim ak la bdet : ki at zdqt alhim la ideo oibqSo lhqim at zdqtm obebor cat lzdqt alhim la nkneo : ki hmSiH sop htorh lzdqh lkl hmamin bo : ki mSh ktb el dbr hzdqh mtok htorh aSr ieSh atm hadm oHi bhm : ohzdqh aSr mtok hamonh kh amrt al tamr blbbk mi ielh hSmimh hla cat hia lhorid at hmSiH : ao mi ird lthom cat hia lhelot at hmSiH mn hmtim : abl mh hia amrt qrob alik hdbr bpik oblbbk hoa dbr hamonh aSr anHno mbSrim : ki am todh bpik aSr ihoSe hoa hadon otamin blbbk aSr halhim heiro mn hmtim ac toSe : ki blbbo iamin hadm ohith lo lzdqh obpiho iodh ohith lo lihoSeh : ki hktob amr kl hmamin bo la iboS : oain hbdl bch bin hihodi lioni ki adon aHd lklm ohoa eSir lkl qraio : ki kl aSr iqra bSm ihoh imlT : oeth aik iqrao al aSr la hamino bo oaik iamino baSr la Smeo at Smeo oaik iSmeo bain mgid : oaik igido am ainm SloHim kktob mh naoo rgli mbSr Slom mbSr Tob : ak la klm Smeo lqol hbSorh ki iSeiho amr ihoh mi hamin lSmetno : lkn hamonh bah mtok hSmoeh ohSmoeh el idi dbr alhim : oamr hki la Smeo amnm bkl harz iza qom obqzh tbl mlihm : oamr hki iSral la ide hnh kbr mSh amr ani aqniakm bla em bgoi nbl akeiskm : oiSeiho mlao lbo lamr nmzati lla bqSni ndrSti lloa Salo : oel iSral hoa amr prSti idi kl hiom al em sorr omrh :

11

obkn amr ani hki cnH halhim at emo Hlilh ki gm anki bn iSral mcre abrhm lmTh bnimn : la cnH halhim at emo aSr ideo mqdm ao hla tdeo at aSr hktob amr baliho kaSr qra al halhim el iSral lamr : ihoh at nbiaik hrgo oat mcbHtik hrso oaotr ani lbdi oibqSo at npSi : abl mh enh ato menh alhim hSarti li Sbet alpim aiS aSr la kreo lbel : okn gm bet hcat notrh Sarit el pi bHirt hHsd : oam hith cat el idi hHsd la hith mtok hmeSim ki loli kn hHsd ainno eod Hsd oam hith mtok hmeSim ainno eod Hsd ki loli kn hmeSim iHdl lhiot meSh : oeth mh hoa at aSr bqS iSral la hSig rq hnbHrim hm hSigo ohnSarim hSmino lbbm : kktob ntn lhm halhim roH trdmh einim la lraot oacnim la lSme ed hiom hch : odod hoa amr ihi SlHnm lpH olrSt olmoqS olSlomim lhm : tHSknh einihm mraot omtnihm tmid hmed : obkn ani amr hnkSlo lmen iplo Hlilh ak bpSem izah hihoSeh lgoim lmen hqniam : oam pSem eSr heolm oHsronm eSr hgoim mlam el aHt kmh okmh : ki alikm hgoim ani mdbr okpi aSr SliH hgoim anki at Sroti apar : lo aokl lhqnia at bSri olhoSie mqztm : ki am geiltm rzoi leolm mh apoa thih asptm hla Hiim mn hmtim : oam htromh qdS kn gm hesh oam hSrS qdS kn gm henpim : oki nqpo mqzt henpim oath cit hier hrkbt bmqomm ontHbrt lSrS hcit oldSno : al ttpar el henpim oam ttpar de Saink nSa at hSrS ki am hSrS hoa nSa aotk : oki tamr hla nqpo henpim lmen arkb anki : kn hoa hmh nqpo el aSr la hamino oath hnk qim el idi hamonh al ttgah ki am ira : ki halhim am la Hs el henpim hnoldim mn hez aoli la iHos gm elik : lkn rah na Tobt alhim ocemo cemo el hnplim oelik Tobto am temd bTobto oam ain ki eth gm ath tgde : ogm hmh am la iemdo bmrim irkbo ki ikl halhim lSob lhrkibm : ki am ath ngcrt mez aSr hoa bTbeo cit ier ohrkbt Sla kTbe bcit Tob alh hizaim mmno el aHt kmh okmh Sirkbo bcit Slhm : ki la akHd mkm aHi at hsod hch pn thio Hkmim beinikm ki TmTom hlb lmqzt nhih liSral ed ki ikns mla hgoim : obkn kl iSral ioSe kktob oba lzion goal oiSib pSe mieqb : oani cat briti aotm bhsiri HTatm : hn lpi hbSorh Snoaim hm lmenkm ak lpi hbHirh Hbibim hm lmen habot : ki la inHm halhim el mtnotio oel qriato : ki kaSr gm atm mlpnim mmrim hiitm at pi alhim oeth hoHntm bmrim Sl alh : kn gm alh eth mmrim hio lmen el idi Hnintkm gm hm iHno : ki halhim hsgir at klm bid hmri lmen iHn at klm : mh emq eSr Hkmt alhim oeSr deto mSpTio mi iHqr odrkio mi imza : ki mi tkn at roH ihoh oaiS ezto iodieno : ao mi hqdimo oiSlm lo : hla hkl mmno ohkl bo ohkl alio aSr lo hkbod leolmim amn :

12

oeth hnni mchir atkm aHi brHmi alhim aSr tSimo at goiotikm qrbn Hi oqdoS onrzh lalhim ohith cat ebodtkm hSklit : oal tStoo leolm hch ki am htHlpo bhtHdS detkm lmen tbHno ldet mh hoa rzon halhim hTob ohHmd ohSlm : ki el pi hHsd hntn li amr ani lkl aiS oaiS mkm lblti rom lbbo lmelh mn hraoi ki am ihi znoe bmHSbotio kpi mdt hamonh aSr Hlq lo halhim : ki kaSr bgop aHd iS lno abrim hrbh oain pelh aHt lkl habrim : kn anHno hbrim gop aHd bmSiH okl aHd oaHd mmno abr lHbro hoa : oiS lno mtnot Snot kpi hHsd hntn lno am nboah thi kpi mdt hamonh : oam laiS SmoS ieml bSmoS oam morh bhorah : oam mokiH btokHh hnotn ieSh btm lbb ohmnhig bSqidh ohgml Hsd bsbr pnim ipot : hahbh thih bli Hnph Snao at hre odbqo bTob : bahbt aHim hrao Hbh itrh obkbod hqdimo aiS at reho : Sqdo oal tezlo htlhbo broH ebdo at hadon : SmHo btoHlt sblo bzrh Sqdo el htplh : hSttpo bzrki hqdoSim rdpo hknst arHim : brko at rdpikm brko oal tqllo : SmHo em hSmHim obko em hbkim : lb aHd ihi lklkm al thlko bgdlot ki am htnhgo em hSplim al thio Hkmim beinikm : al tSlmo laiS reh tHt reh drSo hTob beini kl adm : am toklo kkl aSr tmza idkm hio bSlom em kl adm : al tnqmo nqm ididi ki am tno mqom lrgc ki ktob li nqm oSlm amr ihoh : lkn am reb Snak hakilho lHm oam zma hSqho mim ki gHlim ath Hth el raSo : al na ikbSk hre kboS ath at hre bTob :

13

kl npS tkne lgdlt hrSiot ki ain rSot ki am mat halhim ohrSiot hnmzaot el id alhim ntmno : lkn kl hmtqomm lrSot mrd hoa bzooi halhim ohmrdim iSao at dinm : ki hSliTim ainm lpHd lmeSim hTobim ki am lhreim oel kn am rzonk Sla tira mn hrSot eSh hTob ohih lk SbH mmnh : ki mSmSt alhim hia lTob lk ak am hre teSh ira ki la lHnm Hgrt Hrb hia ki mSmSt alhim hia nqmt bqzp mkl eSh hre : el kn elino lhkne la lbd bebor hqzp ki gm bebor det Hobtno : ki lcat ap mSlmim atm at hms ki mSrti alhim hmh hSqdim el cat : lkn tno lkl aiS kHobtkm hms laSr lo hms hmks laSr lo hmks ohmora laSr lo hmora ohkbod laSr lo hkbod : oal thio Hibim laiS dbr colti ahbt aiS at reho ki hahb at Hbro qim at htorh : ki mzot la tnap la trzH la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr la tHmd oeod kalh klolot hnh bmamr hch oahbt lrek kmok : hahbh la tre lre el kn hahbh qiom htorh klh : okcat eSo mdetkm at hcmn ki kbr hgieh hSeh lhqiz mn hSnh ki ihoSetno qrobh eth mhiom aSr bano lhamin : hlilh Hlp ohiom qrb lkn nsirh na at meSi hHSk onlbSh at kli nSq haor : okmo biom nthlkh bznieot la bcollot obSkron ola bbeilot oeSot cmh ola bmribh oqnah : ki am lbSo at hadon ihoSe hmSiH odago lbSrkm ak la lhgbir htaot :

14

oat hHloS bamonh aoto qblo ola ldin at hmHSbot : iS mamin ki nkon lakl kl dbr ohHloS iakl rq at hirq : hakl al ibc at aSr la iakl oaSr la iakl al idin at hakl ki qbl ato halhim : mi ath ki tdin at ebd haHr hn ladnio hoa iqom ao ipl abl ioqm ki ikl halhim lhqimo : iS mbdil bin iom liom oiS aSr kl himim Soim beinio oihi kl aiS nkon bdeto : hSmr at hiom ladon Smr ato oaSr ainno Smr at hiom ladon ainno Smr hakl ladon hoa akl ki modh hoa lalhim oaSr ainno akl ladon ainno akl omodh hoa lalhim : ki ain aiS matno aSr iHih lnpSo oain aiS aSr imot lnpSo : ki kaSr nHih nHih ladon okaSr nmot nmot ladon lkn am nHih oam nmot ladon hnno : ki lcat mt hmSiH oiqm oiHi lmen ihih adon gm el hmtim gm el hHiim : oath lmh ch tdin at aHik ao ath lmh tboc laHik hla klno etidim lemd lpni ksa din alhim : ki ktob Hi ani nam ihoh ki li tkre kl brk okl lSon todh lalhim : hnh na kl aHd mmno el npSo itn HSbon lalhim : lkn al ndin eod aiS at reho ki am ch ihi dinkm Sla itn aiS lpni aHio mkSol ao moqS : ideti ombTH ani badon ihoSe ki ain dbr Tma bpni ezmo orq Tma hoa lmi SiHSbno lo lTma : oam iezb aHik el dbr hakl aink mthlk eod bdrk hahbh al na tabd baklk at aSr bedo mt hmSiH : lkn hchro pn ihih Tobkm lgdopim : ki mlkot halhim ainnh akilh oStih ki zdqh hia oSlom oSmHh broH hqdS : ohebd balh at hmSiH rzoi hoa lalhim obHon lanSim : oeth nrdph drk hSlom odrk hbnot iHd aiS mreho : al thros at meSh alhim el dbr makl hn hkl Thor hoa abl re ladm aSr iaklno bmkSl lbo : Tob Sla takl bSr ola tSth iin ola teSh dbr aSr itngp bo aHik ao ikSl ao iHlS : iS lk amonh thi lk lbdk lpni halhim aSri mi Sla idin at npSo bdbr aSr kSr beinio : oaSr lo spq baklo naSm ki la eSh mamonh okl aSr neSh mbli amonh HTa hoa, :

15

oelino hHcqim lSat HlSot hkSlim oal nbqS hnat ezmno : ki kl aHd mmno ibqS hnat Hbro lTob lo lmen ibnh : ki gm hmSiH la bqS hnat ezmo ala kktob Hrpot Horpik nplo eli : ki kl aSr nktb mlpnim llmdno nktb lmen thih lno tqoh bsblnot obtnHomot hktobim : oalhi hsblnot ohnHmh hoa itn lkm lhiot klkm lb aHd el pi hmSiH ihoSe : aSr tkbdo bnpS aHt obph aHd at halhim abi adnino ihoSe hmSiH : el kn tqblo aiS at aHio kaSr gm hmSiH qbl atno lkbod halhim : oani amr ki ihoSe hmSiH hih lmSrt bni hmilh lmen amt halhim lqim at hhbTHot aSr labot : ohgoim hmh ikbdo at halhim lmen rHmio kktob el kn aodk bgoim olSmk acmrh : oaomr hrnino goim emo : oaomr hllo at ihoh kl goim SbHoho kl hamim : oiSeiho amr ohih SrS iSi aSr emd lns emim alio goim iqoo : oalhi htqoh hoa imla atkm kl SmHh oSlom bamonh lmen tedp tqotkm bgbort roH hqdS : ohnh aHi mbTH ani bkm ki gm atm bezmkm mlai ahbt Hsd mmlaim kl det otoklo lhokiH aiS at reho : ak hecti meT bktbi alikm hnh ohnh kmckir atkm el pi hHsd hnton li mat halhim : lhioti mSrt ihoSe hmSiH lgoim olkhn bbSort halhim lmen ihih qrbn hgoim rzoi omqdS broH hqdS : el kn iS li lhthll bmSiH ihoSe ngd halhim : ki la aec pni ldbr dbr colti aSr eSh hmSiH bidi lmen hTot bamr obmeSh at lb hgoim lsor lmSmeto : bgbort atot omoptim obgbort roH alhim ed ki mlati miroSlim osbibotih oed laloriqon at bSort hmSiH : bhStdli lhgid at hbSorh la bmqmot aSr Sm kbr nqra Sm hmSiH lblti bnot el isod aHrim : ki am kktob aSr la spr lhm rao oaSr la Smeo htbonno : och hoa hdbr aSr nezrti bgllo pem oStim mboa alikm : abl ket aSr ain eod mqom li bglilot halh onksp nkspti lba alikm ch Snim rbot : aboa alikm blkti laspmia ki mqoh anki lraotkm bebri oatm tSlHoni Smh oaSbeh meT mkm braSonh : amnm eth alkh iroSlimh lecor at hqdoSim : ki mqdonia oakia hoailo ltt mSat ndbh labioni hqdoSim aSr biroSlim : ki hoailo oap mHibim hm lhm ki am hih lgoim Hlq bdbri hroH aSr lhm hla elihm lecrm gm bdbri hgop : lkn kSgmrti at cat oHtmti lhm hpri hch ac aebrh drk arzkm laspmia : oiode anki ki bbai alikm aboa bmla brkt bSort hmSiH : oani meorr atkm aHi badnino ihoSe hmSiH obahbt hroH lhtamz ati bhetir bedi al halhim : lmen aSr anzl mhsorrim barz ihodh oierb el hqdoSim SmoSi lSm iroSlim : oaSr aboa alikm bmSHh brzon alhim oanpS emkm : oalhi hSlom em klkm amn :

16

ohnni mckir lkm lTob at pobi aHotno Shia mSmSt hqhlh aSr bqnkri : aSr tqbloh badnino kraoi lqdoSim otecro lh bkl aSr tzTrk lkm ki hith gm hia ecrt lrbim ogm lezmi : Salo lSlom prisqla oeqils Shm Hbri bebodt hmSiH ihoSe : oaSr msro at zoarm bed npSi ola ani lbdi aodh lhm ki gm kl qhlot hgoim ogm lSlom hqhlh bbitm : Salo lSlom apinTos Hbibi Shoa raSit akia lmSiH : Salo lSlom mrim Semlh eml rb beborno : Salo lSlom androniqos oionis Shm qrobi oasorim ati olhm Sm bSliHim olpni hio bmSiH : Salo lSlom amplias Hbibi badnino : Salo lSlom aorbnos Hbrno bebodt hmSiH olSlom asTkim Hbibi : Salo lSlom aplis hbHon bmSiH Salo lSlom bni bito Sl arisToblos : Salo lSlom horodion qrobi Salo lSlom bni bito Sl nrqisos aSr hm badnino : Salo lSlom Tropinh oTropsh hemlot badnino Salo lSlom prsis hHbibh Semlh eml rb badnino : Salo lSlom ropos hnbHr badnino olSlom amo Shia kam li : Salo lSlom asonqriTos opligon ohrms opTrobs ihrmis ohaHim aSr atm : Salo lSlom pilologos oiolia niros oaHoto oaolomps okl hqdoSim aSr atm : Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSiqh hqdoSh qhlot hmSiH Salot lSlomkm : oani mchir atkm aHi lSom pnikm beSi mHlqot omkSolim lngd hlqH aSr lmdtm osoro mhm : ki anSim aSr kalh ainm ebdim at adnino ihoSe hmSiH ki am at krSm obamri nem oSpt Hlqot iteo at lb hptaim : ki mSmetkm nodet lkl lkn ani SmH elikm ak Hpzti hitkm Hkmim lhTib otmimim lblti hre : oalhi hSlom hoa idka at hSTn bmhrh tHt rglikm Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH emkm : Timotios Hbri oloqios oison osospTros qrobi Salim lSlomkm : ani TrTios kotb hagrt hcat Sal lSlomkm badnino : gios hmarH aoti oat kl hqhlh Sal lSlomkm arsTos skn heir oqorTos aHino Salim lSlomkm : Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH em klkm amn : olaSr ikl lHcq atkm kbSorti okqriat ihoSe hmSiH kpi gloi hsod aSr hih mksh mimot eolm : oeth ntprsm onode el idi ktbi hnbiaim kmzot alhi eolm lkl hgoim lhbiam lmSmet hamonh : lalhim hHkm lbdo lo hkbod bihoSe hmSiH leolmim amn :

hraSonh al-hqorintim

1

polos hmqra lhiot SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim osostnis aHino : al qhlt alhim aSr bqorntos al hmqdSim bmSiH ihoSe hqroaim lhiot qdSim em kl hqraim bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH bkl mqom Slhm oSlno : Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : aodh lalhi beborkm bkl et el Hsd halhim hntn lkm bmSiH ihoSe : aSr eSrtm bo bkl bkl dbor obkl det : baSr edot hmSiH htqimh bkm : ed ki la Hsrtm kl mtn hHsd ohnkm mHkim lhtglot adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr gm iqim atkm er et qz lhiot nqiim biom adnino ihoSe hmSiH : namn hoa halhim aSr el pio nqratm lHbrt bno ihoSe hmSiH adnino : ohnni mchir atkm aHi bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH lhiot klkm ph aHd ola thiin mHlqot bqrbkm ki am tkonno iHd blb aHd obezh aHt : ki hgd li elikm bid bni bit kloah ki iS mribot binikm : ocat ani amr ki aiS aiS mkm ch amr lpolos och lapolos och lkipa och lmSiH hnni : hki Hlq hmSiH hki polos nzlb bedkm ao lSm polos nTbltm : aodh lalhim Sla Tblti aiS mkm ki am at qrspos oat gios : pn iamro ki lSmi Tblti : ak Tblti gm at bni bit asTpnos omlbd alh ainni ide am Tblti eod aiS aHr : ki la SlHni hmSiH lTbol ki am lbSr la bHkmt dbrim lmen aSr la ihih lriq zlb hmSiH : ki dbr hzlb sklot hoa labdim abl lno hnoSeim gbort alhim hoa : ki kn ktob aabd Hkmt Hkmim obint nbonim astir : aih Hkm aih spr aih drS heolm hch hla skl halhim at Hkmt heolm hch : ki aHri aSr bHkmt halhim la ide heolm at halhim bHkmh hih rzon lpnio lhoSie bsklot hqriah at hmaminim : ki hihodim Salim lhm aot ohionim mbqSim Hkmh : oanHno mSmieim at hmSiH hzlob mkSol lihodim osklot lionim : abl lmqraim hn mihodim hn mionim at hmSiH aSr hoa gbort alhim oHkmt alhim : ien ki sklot hal Hkmh hia madm oHlSt hal Hcqh hia madm : ki rao na aHi at qriatkm Sla rbim hmh hHkmim lpi hbSr la rbim hSliTim ola rbim hHrim : ki am bskl Sbeolm bHr hal lmen biS at hHkmim obHloS Sbeolm bHr hal lmen biS at hHcq : obdlt heolm bHr hal obnmas obaSr kain lmen bTl at aSr iSno : kdi Sla ithll lpnio kl bSr : ommno atm bmSiH ihoSe aSr hih lno lHkmh mat halhim olzdqh olqdoS olpdion : oihi kktob hmthll ithll bihoh :

2

ogm anki bbai alikm aHi la bati bgaot hdbor ohHkmh bhgidi lkm at edot halhim : ki la HSbti ldet btokkm dbr blti am ihoSe hmSiH ohoa hnzlb : oahi azlkm bHlSh obirah obHlHlh rbh : odbri oqriati la lptot bamri Hkmt bni adm ki am btokHt hroH ohgborh : lmen aSr la thih amontkm bHkmt bni adm ki am bgbort alhim : akn Hkmh ndbr bin hSlmim la Hkmt heolm hch gm la Sl Sri heolm hch aSr iabdo : ki am bsod ndbr Hkmt halhim hnstrh aSr halhim iedh lkbodno lpni imi heolm : aSr la ideh aiS mSri heolm hch ki lo ideoh la zlbo at adon hkbod : ala kktob aSr ein la rath oacn la Smeh ola elh el lb anoS at aSr hkin halhim lahbio : olno glh halhim broHo ki hroH Hoqr at hkl gm at memqi halhim : ki mi hoa bbni adm hide at aSr badm blti am roH hadm aSr bqrbo kn gm la ide aiS at aSr balhim blti am roH halhim : oanHno la qblno at roH heolm ki am hroH mat halhim lmen nde at aSr ntn lno mat halhim bHsdo : oat cat ndbr la bdbrim aSr tlmdm Hkmt bni adm ki am bdbrim aSr roH hqdS tlmdm onbar dbrim roHniim el pi hroH : hn hadm hnpSi ainno mqbl at dbri roH alhim ki hmh sklot lo ola iokl lhbinm baSr hmh ndonim bdrk hroH : abl hadm hroHni idin at hkl oaoto la idin aiS : ki mi tkn at roH ihoh omi iodieno oanHno hnh iS lno roH hmSiH :

3

oani la iklti ldbr emkm aHi kem roHniim ki eodkm Sl hbSr okmo eollim bmSiH : Hlb hSqiti atkm ola makl ki ac la ikltm ogm eth la toklo ien hitkm eod Sl hbSr : ki baSr qnah omribh omHlqim binikm hla Sl hbSr atm omthlkim lpi drk bni adm : hn bamr haHd ani lpolos ohSni ani lapolos hla Sl hbSr atm : mi apoa polos omi hoa apolos ak mSrtim hm aSr el idm batm lhamin aiS aiS kmtnt hadon aSr ntn lo : ani nTeti oapolos hSqh abl halhim hoa hzmiH : el kn hnTe ainno maomh ohmSqh ainno maomh ki am halhim hmzmiH : ohnTe ohmSqh kaHd hmh oaiS aiS iqbl at Skro kpi emlo : ki ecri al anHno oatm Sdh alhim obnin alhim atm : oani kpi Hsd alhim hntn li kbni Hkm Sti isod oaHr bonh elio ak ira kl aiS lSit isod aHr Hoz mn hmosd Shoa ihoSe hmSiH : : oam ibnh hbonh el hisod hch chb ao ksp ao abnim iqrot ao ez ao Hzir ao qS : meSh kl aiS iglh ki hiom hoa ibrrho ki baS irah oat mh meSh kl aiS oaiS haS tbHnno : am iemd meSh aiS aSr bnh elio iqbl Skro : oam iSrp meSho ipsidno ohoa ioSe ak kmo mzl maS : hla idetm ki hikl alhim atm oroH alhim Skn bqrbkm : oaiS aSr iSHit at hikl alhim halhim iSHit ato ki hikl alhim qdoS oatm hnkm qdoSim : al irmh aiS at ezmo ohHSb at ezmo Hkm beolm hch ihi lskl lmen iHkm : ki Hkmt heolm hch sklot hia lpni halhim kktob lkd Hkmim bermm : oeod ktob ihoh ide mHSbot Hkmim ki hmh hbl : el kn al ithll aiS badm ki hkl hoa Slkm : am polos am apolos oam kipa am heolm am hHiim oam hmot am hhoh oam hetid hkl hoa Slkm : oatm hnkm Sl hmSiH ohmSiH hoa Sl alhim :

4

kn iHSb aiS atno kmSrti hmSiH oskni rci al : hnh sop dbr Sla ibqS mn hsknim ki am lhmza namn : oani nqlh hia beini ki atm dnim ati ao iom din Sl bni adm gm ani at npSi la adin : ki ainni iode bnpSi re obkl cat la azdq ki hdn ati hoa ihoh : el kn al tSpTo SpoT lpni het ed ki iboa hadon aSr gm iozia laor at telmot hHSk oiglh at ezt hlbbot oac thih thlh lkl aiS mat halhim : oat cat aHi hsbti el ezmi oel apolos beborkm lmen tlmdo bno Sla itHkm aiS iotr mmh Sktob pn ttgao aiS bSm aiS lngd reho : ki mi hplia aotk omh bidk aSr la qblto oam qblto lmh tthll kaiS aSr la qbl : hn kbr Sbetm kbr eSrtm obledino mlktm olo mlktm lmen nmlk atkm gm anHno : ki aHSb Shalhim hzig atno hSliHim Spli hSplim kbni tmoth ki hiino lraoh leolm gm lmlakim gm lbni adm : anHno sklim lmen hmSiH oatm Hkmim bmSiH anHno HlSim oatm gborim atm nkbdim oanHno nqlim : oed hSeh hcat hnno rebim gm zmaim oermim omkim bagrp oain mnoH lno : oigeim anHno beml idino qllono onbrk Hrpono onsbl : gdpo atno otnHnn onhi kglli heolm olsHi lklm ed eth : ola lbiS atkm ani ktb hdbrim halh ki am mchir atkm kbni hahobim : ki gm am hio lkm rbbot amnim bmSiH ain lkm abot rbim ki anki holdti atkm bihoSe hmSiH el idi hbSorh : el kn ani mbqS mkm llkt beqboti : obebor cat SlHti alikm at Timotios bni hahob ohnamn badon ohoa ickir lkm at drki bmSiH kaSr mlmd anki bkl mqom bkl qhlh oqhlh : hn iS mtnSaim kalo la aboa alikm : abl boa aboa alikm bcmn qrob am irzh hadon oadeh la at dbri hmtrommim ki am at gbortm : ki mlkot halhim ainnh bdbr Sptim ki am bgborh : omh tHpzo hboa aboa alikm bSbT ao bahbh obroH enoh :

5

Smoeh nSmet barz ki nmzah cnot binikm oap cnot aSr bgoim la spr kmoh ki iqH aiS at aSt abio : oatm eod gbhi roH tHt aSr hih lkm lhtabl lmen iosr mqrbkm eSh hmeSh hch : hn anki hrHoq mkm bgopi oqrob broHi kbr dnti kalo hiiti azlkm el haiS aSr eSh kdbr hch : bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH bhqhltkm iHd oroHi atkm em gbort adnino ihoSe hmSiH : lmsr at haiS hhoa lSTn labdn hbSr lmen ioSe hroH biom hadon ihoSe : la Tob hthllkm hla idetm ki meT Sar mHmz at kl hesh : bero at hSaor hiSn lmen thio esh HdSh hla lHm mzot atm ki gm lno psHno hncbH bedno hoa hmSiH : el kn nHgh na hHg la bSar iSn ola bSar hre ohrSe ki am bmzot hiSr ohamt : ktbti lkm bagrt Sla tterbo em hcnim : oain deti bcat el hcnim Sbeolm hch ao el bzei bze ogclnim oebdi alilim ki ac ihih lkm lzat mn heolm : ak cat ktbti lkm lblti hterb em aiS aSr aH iqra ohoa cnh ao bze bze ao ebd alilim ao mgdp ao sba ao gcln em haiS aSr kch gm la taklo : ki mh li lSpT at aSr bHoz hla tSpTo at aSr bbit : oaSr bHoz halhim iSpTm oatm tbero at hre mqrbkm :

6

hiS bkm aiS aSr bribo em reho icid lhbia dbr dino lpni hrSeim ola lpni hqdSim : hla idetm ki hqdSim idino at heolm oam heolm idon el idkm hainkm raoim ldin dinim qTnim : hla idetm ki ndin at hmlakim ap ki dbri mmonot : oatm kaSr iS lkm dini mmonot moSibim atm at hnHSbim lain bqhl lSpTikm : lbStkm amr ani at cat hki ain bkm Hkm aHd Siokl lhokiH bin aiS laHio : ki aH rb em aHio ocat lpni la maminim : hn bkl iridh hia lkm Stribo ch em ch lmh la tbHro lsbl honah olmh la tbHro lhiot eSoqim : abl monim atm oeSqim ap at aHikm : hla idetm ki hrSeim la iirSo at mlkot halhim al tteo at npSotikm la hcnim la ebdi alilim la hmnapim ola hqdSim ola hSkbim at ckr : la hgnbim ola bzei bze la hsbaim ola hmgdpim ola hgclnim kl alh la iirSo at mlkot halhim : okalh lpnim hio mqztkm abl rHztm abl qdStm abl hzdqtm bSm hadon ihoSe obroH alhino : hkl hoa brSoti ak la kl dbr ioeil hkl hoa brSoti ak la iSebdni dbr : hmakl lkrS ohkrS lmakl ohalhim at ch oat ch ilkh ohgop al ihi lcnot ki am ladon ohadon lgop : ohalhim heir gm at adnino oieir gm atkm bgborto : hla idetm ki goptikm abri hmSiH hnh hki aqH at abri hmSiH oaeSh atm labri conh Hlilh : ao hla idetm ki hdbq bconh gop aHd hoa emh ki hktob amr ohio Snihm lbSr aHd : abl hdbq badon roH aHd hoa emo : noso mn hcnot kl HTa aSr ieSh aoto hadm mHoz lgopo hoa ohconh HTa bezm gopo : ao hla idetm ki gopkm hoa hikl roH hqdS hSkn bqrbkm aSr qbltm mat halhim oki la lezmkm atm : ki bmHir nqnitm el kn kbdo at halhim bgopkm obroHkm aSr lalhim hmh :

7

olenim mh Sktbtm ali hnh Tob ladm Sla ige baSh : ak mpni hcnot thi lkl aiS aSto oihi lkl aSh belh : haiS iqim Hobt heonh laSto okmo kn haSh lbelh : haSh ainnh SlTt el goph ki am belh okmo kn gm haiS ainno SlT el gopo ki am aSto : al tmneo at ezmkm ch mch colti bhskmt Snikm el cmn qboe lhiot pnoim ltenit oltplh otSobo ottaHdo pn insh atkm hSTn bebor prizot izrkm : oani amr cat bdrk ezh ola bdrk mzoh : ki mi itn ohih kl adm kmni ak iS lkl aiS mtnto mat halhim ch bkh och bkh : oal hpnoim oal halmnot amr ani ki Tob lhm am iSbo kkh kmo gm ani : ak am la ioklo lhncr itHbro bnSoain ki Tob lhtHbr bnSoain mhiot ber btaoh : ohnh at hnSoaim anki mzoh ola anki ki am hadon aSr la tprS aSh mbelh : oam prS tprS mmno tSb bla aiS ao ttrzh lbelh oaiS al iSlH at aSto : ohnh al haHrim amr anki ola hadon ki thih laH aSh aSr ainnh mamnt orzonh lSbt emo la iecbnh : oaSh ki ihih lh bel aSr ainno mamin orzono lSbt emh la tecbno : ki haiS aSr ainno mamin mqdS hoa baSh ohaSh aSr ainnh mamnt mqdSt hia baiS Sam la kn ihio bnikm Tmaim amnm eth qdoSim hmh : abl am iprS mi Sainno mamin iprS ohaH ao haHot ainm mSebdim balh ki lSlom qrano halhim : ki mh tdei at haSh am toSiei at haiS omh tde ath haiS am toSie at haSh : rq ithlk aiS aiS kpi mh SHlq lo halhim okpi mh Sqra ato hadon okn mtqn anki bkl hqhlot : am nmol haiS hmqra al imSk at erlto oam erl hoa al imol : ain hmilh nHSbh oain herlh nHSbh ki am
