Smirt mzot halhim : aiS aiS bmSmrto aSr nqra bh Sm iemd : am nqrat bhiotk ebd al ire beinik ala am tSig idk lzat lHpSi bHr bch : ki hqroa badon bhioto ebd mSHrr hoa ladon okkh gm hqroa bhioto HpSi ebd hoa lmSiH : bmHir nqnitm al thio ebdi bni adm : aiS aiS bmSmrt aSr nqra bh aHi bcat iemd lpni halhim : oel dbr hbtolot ain li mzoh mat hadon rq aodie at ezti aHri aSr Hnni hadon lhiot namn : hnni HSb ki Tob ladm mpni hzrh hqrobh ki Tob lo lhiot kmo Shoa : am nqSrt baSh al tbqS lhpTr oam npTrt al tbqS aSh : ogm ki tqH aSh aink HTa ohbtolh ki thih laiS ainnh HTat ak ibaom zrot bbSrm ohnni Hs elikm : ocat ani amr aHi ki hSeh dHoqh lmen meth ihio hnSoaim kalo ain lhm nSim : ohbkim kainm bkim ohSmHim kainm SmHim ohqonim kalo ain qnin bidm : ohnhnim mn heolm hch kalo ain lhm hnah mmno ki ebor iebr tar heolm hch : oani Hpzti Sthio bli dagh mi Sain lo aSh dag laSr ladon aik iiTb beini hadon : omi SiS lo aSh dag hoa lenini heolm aik iiTb beini haSh : iS hbdl bin aSt aiS lbtolh ki haSh aSr la hith laiS dagt laSr ladon olhiot qdoSh gm bgoph gm broHh obeolt bel dagt hia lenini heolm aik tiTb beini belh : ocat ani amr ltoeltkm ola lhSlik elikm pH ki am lhnhgh Tobh olhiotkm nkonim tmid lpni hadon bain mne : oki iHSb aiS lmeSh Sla khgn lbtolto am tebr prqh odbr Hobh hoa ac ieSh kaSr em lbbo ainno HoTa iSianh : omi Shoa nkon blbo oainno mkrH oiokl leSot krzono oigmr cat blbo lSmr at btolto Tob eSh : lkn hmSia ath Tob hoa eSh oaSr ainno mSia eSh Tob mmno : haSh qSorh lbelh el pi htorh kl et Shoa Hi oki mt belh aci mtrt hia lhnSa lmi Strzh oblbd Sthih badon : abl aSrih iotr am temd pnoih cat deti oaHSb gm ani ki roH alhim bi :

8

oel dbr cbHi halilim ideno SiS deh lklno hdet tgbih lb ohahbh hia hbonh : hHSb ki hoa ide dbr mh eod la ide maomh kaSr elio ldet ato : abl am iahb aiS at halhim halhim ideo : oel dbr akilt cbHi halilim hnh ideno ki halil ain beolm oain alhim blti aHd : oap ki iS hnqraim alhim am bSmim am barz baSr iS alhim rbim oadnim rbim : amnm lno ak la aHd hab aSr hkl mmno oanHno alio oadon aHd ihoSe hmSiH aSr hkl el ido onHno el ido : ak la bklm hdet ki iS aSr bckrm eod at halil aklim kcbH halil obkn lbm hHloS itgal : hmakl la iqrb atkm lalhim ki am nakl ain lno itron oam la nakl la ngre : abl hchro pn ihih ato hrSion Slkm lmkSl hHlSim : ki haiS hrah atk aSr lk hdet msb bbit alilim hla iec broHo hHloS lakl mcbHi alilim : oiabd el idi detk aHik hHlS aSr lmeno mt hmSiH : oam kkh tHTao laHikm otkaibo at roHm hHloS lmSiH atm HTaim : el kn am makli mkSil at aHi la akl bSr leolm lmen la akSil at aHi :

9

hla SliH anki hla HpSi anki hla raiti at ihoSe hmSiH adnino hla atm peli badnino : oam ainni SliH laHrim ak lkm hnni SliH ki Hotm SliHoti atm badnino : ocat htnzloti kngd hdnim aoti : hain rSot bidno lakl olStot : hain rSot bidno lholik emno aHot laSh kmo gm hSliHim haHrim okmo aHi hadon okmo kipa : am li lbdi olbr nba la ntnh rSot lhbTl mmlakh : mi hlk lzba bmSkrt Sl ezmo mi nTe krm ola iakl at prio mi reh edr omHlb hedr la iakl : hki lpi drko Sl adm ani mdbr kcat hla gm htorh amrt kn : ki ktob btort mSh la tHsm Sor bdiSo hlSorim hoSS halhim : ao ak lmenno mdbr akn lmenno nktb ki hHrS iHrS ali tqoh ohdS idoS ali tqoh lqHt Hlqo btqoh : am creno bkm enini hroH hki dbr gdol hoa am nqzr mkm enini hbSr : oam laHrim iS rSot elikm hla biotr lno abl la hStmSno brSot hcat ki am sblno at hkl lblti Som mezor lbSort hmSiH : hla idetm ki ebdi ebdt hqdS aklim mn hqdSim omSrti hmcbH lqHim Hlqm bmcbH : kn tqn adnino gm hoa aSr iHio hmbSrim el hbSorh : oanki la hStmSti baHt malh ogm la ktbti cat lmen ieSh li kcat ki Tob li hmot maSr iSim aiS at thlti lriq : am abSr at hbSorh ain li thlh ki hHobh mTlt eli oaoi li am la abSr : ki am brzoni aeSh kn ihih li Skr oam bel krHi pqdt mSmrti hia : oeth mh hoa Skri hla ch SabSr bSort hmSiH bla mHir lblti hStmS lhnat ezmi brSion hntn li bbSorh : ki bhioti HpSi mkl eSiti ezmi ebd lkl adm lmen aqna at hrbim : oahi lihodim kihodi lqnot hihodim oaSr hm tHt htorh hiiti lhm kmo tHt htorh lmen qnot aotm aSr tHt htorh : lalh aSr bli torh hiiti kbli torh ap ki ainni bli tort halhim ki am tHt tort hmSiH anki lmen qnot aotm aSr bli torh : olHlSim hiiti kHlS lqnot at hHlSim hkl lklm nhiiti lmen bkl drk aoSie aHdim : oat cat ani eSh bebor hbSorh lmen aqH Hlqi bh gm anki : hla idetm ki rzi hmrozh basTdin rzim klm orq aHd mhm iSig at Skr hnzoH kkh rozo lmen tSigho : okl hemd lhabq incr mkl dbr hmh lqHt ktr npsd oanHno lqHt ktr aSr ainno npsd : lkn hnni rz la kmo bHSkh hnni nlHm la kholm roH : ki am adka at gopi oaSebdno pn ahih ani hqora laHrim nalH bezmi :

10

ola akHd mkm aHi aSr abotino hio klm tHt henn oklm ebro btok him : oklm nTblo lmSh benn obim : oklm aklm makl aHd roHni : oklm Sto mSqh aHd roHni ki Sto mn hzor hroHni hhlk emhm ohzor hhoa hih hmSiH : abl brbm la rzh halhim opgrihm nplo bmdbr : okl cat hith lno lmopt lblti htaot lreh kaSr htaoo gm hmh : ola thio ebdi alilim kaSr hio mqztm kmo Sktob oiSb hem lakl oSto oiqmo lzHq : ola nhih cnim kaSr cno mqztm oiplo biom aHd SlSh oeSrim alp aiS : ola nnsh at hmSiH kaSr nsoho mqztm oiabdom hnHSim : gm la tlino kaSr hlino mqztm oimoto bid hmSHit : kl cat mzatm lhiot lmopt otktb lmosr lno aSr hgieo alino qzi heolmim : lkn hHSb Shoa nzb ira pn ipol : edin la ba elikm nsion aHr blti am nsion bni adm ki namn hoa halhim aSr la iniH lnsot atkm lmelh mikltkm ki am itn em hnsion gm tozatio kdi Stoklo Sat : el kn Hbibi noso mebodt alilim : kmo al nbonim mdbr anki oSpTo atm at aSr amr : kos hbrkh aSr anHno mbrkim hla hia htHbrot dm hmSiH ohlHm aSr anHno bzeim hla hoa htHbrot gop hmSiH : ki lHm aHd hoa lkn gm nop aHd anHno hrbim baSr lklno Hlq blHm haHd : rao at iSral lpi hbSr hla akli hcbHim Hbri hmcbH hmh : oeth mh amr hiS mmS balil am iS mmS bcbHi alilim : ala at aSr icbHo hgoim lSdim hm cbHim ola lalhim oani la aHpz hitkm Hbrim lSdim : la toklo lStot iHd kos adnino ogm kos hSdim ola toklo lhtHbr al SlHn adnino ogm al SlHn hSdim : hnec lhqnia at adnino hki Hcqim anHno mmno : hkl brSoti abl ain hkl moeil hkl brSoti abl ain hkl bnh : aiS aiS al ibqS at toelt ezmo ki am at toelt reho : kl hnmkr bmqolin ato taklo oal tHqro mpni mkSl hlb : ki lihoh harz omloah : oam iqra atkm aiS maSr ainm maminim otrzo llkt alio akol taklo mkl aSr iSimo lpnikm oal tHqro mpni mkSol hlb : oaiS ki iamr alikm ch hoa cbH alilim al taklo bebor hmodie ompni mkSol hlb ki lihoh harz olmoah : ohlb aSr ani amr la lbk ki am lb rek ki lmh ch tSpT Hroti el idi lb haHr : oam akl ani btodh lmh ahih mgdp el hdbr aSr ani modh elio : lkn am taklo ao am tSto ao kl aSr teSo at hkl eSo lkbod alhim : oal ttno mkSol la lihodim ola lionim ola lqhlt alhim : kaSr gm anki mbqS lhiot rzoi lkl bkl ola abqS toelt ezmi ki am Sl hrbim lmen ioSeo :

11

lko beqboti kaSr gm ani hlk beqbot hmSiH : oel cat ani mSbH atkm aHi ki ckrtm ati bkl lSmr at hqblot kaSr msrti lkm : ak Hpz anki Stdeo ki raS kl aiS hmSiH oraS haSh haiS oraS hmSiH hoa halhim : kl aiS aSr itpll ao itnba oraSo mksh mbch hoa at raSo : okl aSh aSr ttpll ao ttnba oraSh proe mbch hia at raSh ien bch hia kmo mglHh : ki haSh am la ttksh gm ttglH oam bcion hoa laSh lhksm ao lhtglH ttksh : ohaiS ainno Hib lksot at raSo ki hoa zlm alhim okbodo abl haSh hia kbod haiS : ki ain haiS mn haSh ki am haSh mn haiS : gm la nbra haiS bebor haSh ki am haSh bebor haiS : el kn haSh Hibt lhiot lh kph el raSh bebor hmlakim : abl ain haiS bla aSh oain haSh bla aiS badon : ki kaSr haSh mn haiS kn gm haiS el idi haSh okl cat malhim : SpTo na bnpSkm hnaoh laSh lhtpll al halhim bgloi raS : ao hla gm hTbe bezmo ilmd atkm ki aiS aSr igdl pre Ser raSo Hrph hia lo : abl haSh ki tgdl Serh par hoa lh ki ntn lh hSer lznip : oam iHSb aiS lerer elino ain lno mnhg kch ola lqhlot halhim : ohnh bzoti at cat la aokl lSbH atkm el aSr tqhlo iHd la lhoeil ki am lreh : ki braSonh Smeti SiS mHlqot binikm kaSr toedo bqhl omqzto ani mamin : ki ap zrikot ktot lhiot binikm lmen iodeo hnamnim bkm : oeth kaSr tqhlo iHd ain ch lakl seodt hadon : ki kl aHd mqdim lqHt seodto bet hakilh och ireb och iStkr : hain lkm btim lakl olStot bhm ao htboco at qhl alhim otklimo at aSr ain bidm maomh mh amr lkm hel cat aSbH atkm ainni mSbH : ki kh qblti anki mn hadon at aSr gm msrti lkm ki hadon ihoSe blilh hhoa aSr nmsr bo lqH at hlHm : oibrk oibze oiamr qHo aklo ch gopi hnbze bedkm eSo cat lckroni : okn gm at hkos aHr hseodh oiamr hkos hcat hia hbrit hHdSh bdmi eSo cat lckroni bkl et StSto : ki bkl et Staklo at hlHm hch otSto at hkos hcat hckr tckiro at mot adnino ed ki iboa : lkn mi Siakl mn hlHm hch ao iSth mkos hadon Sla kraoi iaSm lgop adnino oldmo : ibHn haiS at npSo oac iakl mn hlHm oiSth mn hkos : ki hakl ohSth Sla kraoi akl oSth din lnpSo ien aSr la hplh at gop hadon : bebor cat iS bkm Holim oHlSim rbim ohrbh iSno hmot : ki am nbHn at npSno la nhih ndonim : okaSr ndon nosr el id hadon lmen la nHib em heolm : el kn aHi bhqhlkm iHd lakl tHko aiS al reho : oki ireb aiS iakl bbito pn tqhlo laSmh oitr hdbrim atqn bbai :

12

obenin hroHniot aHi la akHd mkm dbr : hla idetm ki bhitkm goim aHri alilim almim hobltm kaSr nmSktm : lkn aodie atkm ki ain aiS dbr broH alhim aSr iamr ihoSe Hrm hoa ola iokl aiS lqra lihoSe adon blti am broH hqdS : oSnot hnh hmtnot abl hroH aHd hoa : oSnim hmh hSmoSim ohadon aHd hoa : oSnot hnh hpelot ohalhim hoa aHd hpel at hkl bkl : olkl aiS oaiS ntnh lo htglot hroH lhoeil : ki haHd ntn lo el idi hroH dbor hHkmh olaHd dbor hdet kpi hroH hhoa : laHr hamonh broH hhoa olaHr mtnot hrpaot broH hhoa : olaHr lpel gborot olaHr nboah olaHr lhbHin bin hroHot olaHr mini lSnot olaHr baor lSnot : okl alh pel hroH haHd hhoa hmHlq laiS aiS krzono : ki kaSr hgop hoa aHd oiS bo abrim hrbh okl abri hgop hhoa ap ki rbim hm klm gop aHd kn gm hmSiH : ki broH aHd nTblno klno lgop aHd am ihodim am ionim am ebdim am bni Horin oklno lroH aHd hSqino : ki gm hgop la abr aHd hoa ki am rbim : am tamr hrgl ainni id el kn ainni mn hgop hbebor cat ainnh mn hgop : oam tamro hacn ainni ein el kn ainni mn hgop hbebor cat ainnh mn hgop : am hgop klo ihih ein aih hSme oam klo ihih Sme aih hriH : oeth halhim St at habrim kl aHd oaHd mhm bgop kmi rzono : oalo hio klm abr aHd aih hgop : hnh rbim hm habrim ohgop aHd : hein la tokl dbr al hid lamr la azTrk lk ogm hraS la iokl dbr al hrglim lamr la azTrk lkn : ki lhpk abri hgop hnraim rpim hm lno lzrk biotr : ohnraim lno nqlim bgop atm nlbiS bitr kbod oaSr lbSt lno hmh kalo hhgonim mklm : ki hhgonim lno ainm zrikim lcat abl halhim mcg kkh at hgop Sntn kbod iotr lgroe : lmen la thih mHlqt bgop ki am idago kl habrim iHd ch lch : oam ikab abr aHd ikabo ato kl habrim oam ikbd abd aHd iSmHo ato kl habrim : akn gop hmSiH atm oabrio kl aHd lpi Hlqo : omhm Sm halhim bqhl raSonh lSliHim oSnit lnbiaim oSliSit lmlmdim oitn gborot ap mtnot hrpaot oecrim omnhigim omini lSnot : hklm SliHim am klm nbiaim ao klm mlmdim hklm eSi gborot : hlklm mtnot rpaot hklm mdbrim blSnot hklm mprSi lSnot : oatm htaoo hmtnot hmoeilot biotr obkl cat arah atkm drk nelh el klnh :

13

am blSnot anSim omlakim adbr oain bi hahbh hiiti knHSt hmh ao kzlzl troeh : oki thih li nboah oade kl hsodot okl hdet oki thih li kl hamonh ed ki aetiq hrim oain bi hahbh hiiti kain : oam aHlq at kl honi oam atn at gopi lSrph oain bi hahbh kl cat la toeilni : hahbh markt ap oeSh Hsd hahbh la tqna hahbh la ttpar ola ttromm : la teSh dbr tplh ola tbqS at aSr lh ola ttmrmr ola tHSb hreh : la tSmH beolh ki SmHth em hamt : at kl tSa at kl tamin at kl tqoh oat kl tsbl : hahbh la tbl leolm ak hnboaot hnh tbTlnh ohlSnot tklinh ohdet tbTl : ki qzt hoa Sideno oqzt hoa Snbano : okboa htmim ac ebor tebr hqzt : kaSr hiiti eoll keoll dbrti keoll hgiti keoll HSbti okaSr hiiti laiS hsirti dbri heoll : ki ket mbiTim anHno bmrah obHidot oac pnim al pnim ket iode ani qzto oac kaSr nodeti ade ap ani : oeth SlS alh temdnh hamonh ohtqoh ohahbh ohgdolh bhn hia hahbh :

14

rdpo aHri hahbh ohtaoo mtnot hroH obiotr aSr ttnbao : ki hmdbr blSon ainno mdbr ladm ki am lalhim ki ain aiS aSr iSmeho rq broH hoa mdbr sodot : ohmtnba hoa mdbr lbni adm lbnotm olisrm olnHmm : hmdbr blSon bonh at npSo ohmtnba bonh at hedh : oHpzti ki tdbro klkm blSnot obiotr ki ttnbao ki gdol hmtnba mn hmdbr blSnot blti am iprS lmen tbnh hedh : oeth aHi ki aboa alikm oadbr blSnot mh aoeil lkm am la adbr alikm bHcon ao bdet ao bnboah ao bhorah : hla gm hklim hdommim hntnim qol hn Hlil hn knor am la iSmieo qlot aSr tokl hacn lhbHin aikh iode mh icmr omh ingn : gm hSopr am itn at qolo blti bror mi iHlz lmlHmh : kn gm atm am la toziao blSonkm dbor mprS aikh iode hamor hla thio kmdbrim lroH : hn kmh mini lSnot iS beolm oain aHt mhn bli qol : lkn am ainni ide pSr hqol ahih nkri beini hmdbr ohmdbr ihih nkri beini : kn gm atm bhiotkm mtaoim lkHot roHniot bqSo lhedip bmh Sibnh at hedh : el kn itpll hmdbr blSon ogm iprSnh : ki am atpll blSon roHi mtpll oSkli ainno eSh pri : oeth mh leSot atpllh broHi oatpllh gm bSkli acmrh broHi oacmrh gm bSkli : ki am tbrk broH aik ienh hemd nmzb hhdioT amn el hoditk baSr la ide mh ath amr : hn ath tiTib lhodot abl rek la ibnh : aodh lalhi ki iotr mklkm ani mdbr blSnot : akn bqhl abHr ldbr HmS mlin bSkli lmen hort gm at haHrim mldbr rbbot mlin blSon : aHi al thio ildim bbinh rq lre hio ellim obbinh hio Slmim : hn ktob btorh ki blegi Sph oblSon aHrt adbr al hem hch ogm bcat la abo Sme li amr ihoh : lkn hlSnot la lmaminim hnh laot ki am laSr ainm maminim abl hnboah ainnh laSr ainm maminim ki am lmaminim : ohnh am tqhl kl hedh iHd oklm idbro blSnot oiboao hdioTim ao aSr ainm maminim hla iamro ki mSgeim atm : abl am itnbao klm oba aiS la mamin ao hdioT ac iokH el idi klm oidon el idi klm : obkn iglo telmot lbbo oipl el pnio oiStHoh lalhim oiodh bqol ki bamt halhim bqrbkm : oeth mh leSot aHi bhqhlkm iHd kl aHd oaHd mkm iS lo mcmor iS lo horah iS lo lSon iS lo Hcon iS lo baor ak ieSh hkl lhbnot : ki idbr aiS blSon idbro na Snim Snim ao el hiotr SlSh och aHr ch oaHd iprS : oam ain mprS ac idm bqhl oidbr lnpSo olalhim : ohnbiaim hm idbro Snim ao SlSh ohaHrim ibHno : oki nglh Hcon laHr hiSb Sm ac idm hraSon : ki toklo lhtnba klkm ch aHr ch lmen ilmdo klm oklm ichro : oroHot hnbiaim tHt idi hnbiaim hmh : ki la alhi mbokh halhim ki am alhi hSlom kaSr bkl qhlot hqdSim : nSikm bknsiot tStqnh ki la ntnh lhn rSot ldbr ki am lhkne kaSr gm amrh htorh : oam Hpzn llmd dbr tSalnh at belihn bbit ki Hrph hia lnSim ldbr bqhl : ao hmkm iza dbr alhim am alikm lbdkm hgie : ki itbrk aiS blbbo lhiot nbia ao aiS hroH bin ibin at aSr ani ktb lkm ki mzot hadon hnh : omi aSr la ide al ide : lkn aHi hStdlo lhtnba oal tklao mldbr blSnot : hkl ieSh khgn okSorh :

15

oani aHi aodiekm at hbSorh aSr bSrti atkm aSr gm qbltm ath ogm emdtm bh : aSr gm toSeo bh am tHciqo bdbr aSr bSrti atkm ak am la lSoa hamntm : ki msrti lkm braSonh at aSr gm qblti ki hmSiH mt bed HTatino kpi hktobim : oki nqbr oki hoqm biom hSliSi kpi hktobim : oki nrah al kipa oaHrio al Snim heSr : oaHri kn nrah liotr mHmS maot aHim kaHd aSr rbm eodm bHiim omqztm iSno : oaHri kn nrah al ieqb oaHrio al kl hSliHim : oaHri klm nrah gm ali kmo al hnpl : ki ani hzeir bSliHim oainni kdi lhqra SliH baSr rdpti at qhl halhim : abl bHsd alhim hiiti mh Shiiti oHsdo eli la hih lriq ki iotr mklm ebdti ola ani ki am Hsd alhim aSr emdi : ohnh gm ani gm hmh kkh mSmieim okkh hamntm : oam hgd hgd ki hoqm hmSiH mn hmtim aik iamro anSim mkm ki ain tHih lmtim : am ain tHih lmtim gm hmSiH la hoqm : oam hmSiH la hoqm ki eth riq Smoetno ogm riq amontkm : ogm nmza edi Sqr lalhim ien aSr heidno at halhim ki hqim at hmSiH aSr la hqimo am amt hoa Shmtim la iqomo : ki am hmtim la iqomo gm hmSiH la qm : oam hmSiH la qm hbl amontkm oeodkm bHTatikm : aci gm aSr iSno bmSiH abd abdo : oam bHiim halh lbd bTHim anHno bmSiH amllim anHno mkl adm : oeth hmSiH hoqm mn hmtim oihi lraSit hiSnim : ki aHri aSr ba hmot el idi adm aHd gm tHit hmtim bah el idi adm aHd : ki kaSr badm mtim klm kn gm iHio klm bmSiH : okl aHd oaHd bsdro raSit klm hmSiH oaHri kn aSr hm lmSiH bboao : oaHri kn hqz kSimsr at hmlkot al halhim hab aHri bTlo kl mSrh okl SlTn ogborh : ki hoa mlk imlk ed ki iSit at kl aibio tHt rglio : oaHron haibim aSr ibTl hoa hmot : ki kl St tHt rglio obamro kl hoSt tHtio bror hoa ShSt kl tHtio ainno bkll : okaSr ioSt hkl tHtio ac hbn gm hoa ioSt tHt hSt kl tHtio lmen ihih halhim hkl bkl : ki mh ieSo hnTblim bed hmtim am amt hoa Shmtim qom la iqomo lmh ch iTblo bed hmtim : olmh ch anHno bsknh bkl Seh : bthltno aSr iS li bmSiH ihoSe adnino meid ani eli ki mt anki bkl iom oiom : am lpi rrko Sl adm nlHmti em hHiot hreot bapsos mh toelt iS li am hmtim la iqomo naklh onSth ki mHr nmot : al na tteo Hbrt anSim reim mSHtt mdot Tbot : hqizo bmiSrim mSkron oal tHTao ki iS anSim aSr ain bhm det alhim lbStkm ani amr cat : oam iamr aiS aik iqomo hmtim obai ch gop iboao : ath hskl hn mh Stcre la iHih blti am imot : omh Stcre aink cre at hgop aSr ihih ki am kgrgr erm Sl HTh ao Sl aHd hcreim : ohalhim itn lo gop kpi rzono olkl cre ocre at gopo lminho : la kl hbSr baSr aHd hoa ki min aHr hoa bSr hadm omin aHr bSr hbhmh omin aHr bSr hdgh omin aHr bSr heop : oiS gopot SbSmim ogopot Sbarz abl aHr hoa kbod hgopot SbSmim ogopot Sbarz abl aHr hoa kbod hgopot SbSmim oaHr hoa kbod hgopot Sbarz : aHr hoa kbod hSmS oaHr hoa kbod hirH oaHr hoa kbod hkokbim ki kokb mkokb nbdl bkbodo : okn gm btHih hmtim hn icre bklion oiqom bla klion : icre bbcion oiqom bkbod icre bHlSh oiqom bgborh : icre gop npSi oiqom gop roHni iS gop npSi oiS gop roHni : kn gm ktob oihi hadm hoa adm hraSon lnpS Hih adm haHron lroH mHih : abl la Sl hroH hia hraSonh ala Sl hnpS oaHri kn Sl hroH : hadm hraSon mn hadmh hoa Sl epr ohadm hSni hoa hadon mn hSmim : okmo aSr hoa mepr kkh gm aSr hm mepr okmo aSr hoa mn hSmim kkh gm aSr hm mn hSmim : okaSr lbSno dmot hadm aSr mepr kn nlbS gm dmot hadm aSr mn hSmim : ocat ani amr aHi ki bSr odm la iokl lrSt at mlkot halhim oaSr iklh la iirS at aSr la iklh : hnh sod agidh lkm hn la klno niSn hmot abl klno ntHlp : brge aHd khrp ein ktqe hSopr haHron ki itqe bSopr ohmtim iHio bli klion oanHno ntHlp : ki mh Seth lklion lboS ilbS al klion oamr imot iboS ilbS al mot : okSilbS mh Seth lklion al klion omh Seth lmot ilbS al mot ac ihih dbr hktob ble hmot lnzH : aih eqzp hmot aih Saol bzHonk : eqz hmot hoa hHTa okH hHTa hia htorh : abl todot lalhim aSr ntn lno hnzHon el idi adnino ihoSe hmSiH : el kn aHi Hbibi htkonno bl tmoTo ohedipo bkl et bmeSh adnino mdetkm ki la lriq emlkm badnino :

16

oel dbr qboz htromot lecrt hqdoSim kaSr tqnti lqhlot aSr bglTia kn teSo gm atm : bkl aHd bSbt iniH azlo aiS aiS mkm oiazr at aSr elh bido lmen aSr bbai la iqbz eod : oani bbai at aSr tmzao namnim em agrot aSlH atm lhbia at ndbtkm liroSlim : oam Soh hTrH Sgm anki alk Smh ati ilko : oani aba alikm aHri ebri at mqdonia ki at mqdonia aebrh : oaoli aSb emkm imim aHdim ao kl imi hsto lmen tloni al aSr alk Smh : ki ket ain rzoni lratkm ak bebri ki aqoh lSbt azlkm cmn mh am irzh ihoh : abl aSb bapsos ed Hg hSboeot : ki nptH li ptH gdol orb pelim orbim hmtqommim : oki iboa alikm Timotios rao na Sihih emkm bli pHd ki mlakt ihoh hoa eSh kmo gm ani : el kn aiS al ibc ato ak SlHho bSlom lmen iba ali ki aHkh lo em haHim : oapolos haH hnh pzrti bo lboa alikm em haHim ak la hih brzono lboa eth amnm boa iboa bmzao et nkonh : Sqdo oemdo bamonh htaSSo ohtHcqo : okl dbrikm ieSo bahbh : oabqSh mkm aHi hla idetm at bit asTpnos Shoa raSit akia oitno at npSm lSrot hqdSim : lkn hkneo gm atm mpni anSim kalh ompni kl aSr iebd emhm oiemlo : ohnni SmH bbiat asTpnos oprTonTos oakiqos ki hmh mlao at aSr Hsrti atkm : oiniHo at roHi oat roHkm el kn hkiro anSim kalh : hqhlot aSr basia Salot lSlomkm eqils oprisqla ogm hqhlh aSr bbitm mrbim lSal lSlomkm badnino : haHim klm Salim lSlomkm Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSqh hqdoSh : Salt Slomkm bidi ani polos : mi Sla iahb at hadon ihoSe hmSiH iHrm mrn ata : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino ihi emkm : oahbti at klkm bmSiH ihoSe amn :

hSniih al-hqorintim

1

polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim oTimotios aHino al qhlt alhim aSr bqorntos em kl hqdSim aSr bakia : Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : brok halhim oabi adnino ihoSe hmSiH ab hrHmim oalhi kl hnHmh : hmnHm atno bkl lHzno ed Snokl lnHm hnlHzim bkl lHz bnHmh aSr anHno mnHmim bh mat halhim : ki krb enoii hmSiH bno kn trbh nHmtno el idi hmSiH : ohnh am nlHz hoa lnHmtkm olihoSetkm aSr irah kHh bsblkm henoim aSr nsbl atn gm anHno oam nnHm gm hoa lnHmtkm olihoSetkm : otqotno bedkm nkonh hia baSr ideno ki kaSr Hlq lkm benoim kn gm Hlq lkm bnHmh : ki la nkHd mkm aHi at zrtno aSr mzatno basia aSr kbdh elino ed lmad oiotr mkHno ed ki noaSno mn hHiim : oanHno blbbno Hrzno lno at hmot lmen la nhih bTHim bnpSno ki am balhim hmHih at hmtim : aSr hzilno mmot kch oeodno mzil olo anHno mqoim ki iosip lhzilno : becrkm atno btpltkm lmen iodo rbim bedno el mtnt hHsd Shith lno el idi rbim : ki cat hia thltno edot lbbno aSr btm oiSr alhim hthlkno beolm obiotr atkm ola bHkmt hbSr ki am bHsd alhim : ki la nktb lkm ki am mh Satm qraim ao gm ideim : oaqoh ki kaSr idetm atno lmqzt ap tdeo ed tklit ki anHno thltkm kaSr gm atm thltno biom adnino ihoSe : obbTHon hch Hpzti lboa alikm mraS lmen tqblo Tobh pemim : olebr btokkm al mqdonia olSob mmqdonia alikm oatm tSlHoni al arz ihodh : oeth hki nmhr hiiti bezti am aSr iezti lpi hbSr iezti ohih azli pem hn hn opem la la : akn namn halhim ki dbrno alikm la hih hn ola : ki bn halhim ihoSe hmSiH hnqra btokkm el idino el idi oel idi slonos oTimotios hoa la hih hn ola ki hio hih bo rq hn : ki kl hbTHot halhim kln bo hio hn obo hio amn lkbod halhim el idino : ohmkonn aotno atkm bmSiH oaSr mSHno hoa halhim : aSr gm Htmno oaSr ntn blbno at erbon hroH : oani at alhim aqra lhiot ed lnpSi ki bebor hioti Hs elikm la bati eod lqorntos : la SnmSl bamontkm ki am ecrim anHno lSmHtkm ki bamonh emdtm :

2

oani gmrti blbi lblti Sob eod alikm bezbt : ki am ani aezibkm mi apoa iSmHni blti am hnezb el idi : ocat ktbti lkm pn ihih li bboai ezb malh aSr hih li lSmH elihm obTH ani bklkm ki SmHti hia SmHt klkm : ki mrb zrt lbi omzoqh ktbti lkm obdmeot hrbh ola lhezibkm rq lmen tdeo hahbh hitrh aSr ahbti atkm : oam iS aiS aSr hezib la ati hezib ala klkm pn apric el hmdh hezib lmqzt : odi laiS kmho htokHh hhia amt hrbim : oeth lhpk tslHo otnHmo kdi Sla itble haiS bgdl hezbon : el kn abqSh mkm lgml elio gmolt ahbh : ki lbebor cat gm ktbti lmen ade at tmtkm am bkl tSmeon : oaiS aSr tslHo lo aslH lo gm ani ki gm anki am slHti dbr slHti lo lmenkm bpni hmSiH : pn ionh atno hSTn ki la nelmo matno mcmotio : oani bbai lTroas el dbr bSort hmSiH ap ki nptH li ptH badnino : la hith roHh lroHi el aSr la mzati Sm at TiTos aHi oani npTrti mhm oizati llkt al mqdonia : abl todot lalhim hntn lno bkl et nzHon bmSiH ompiz el idino at riH deto bkl mqom : ki riH niHH hmSiH anHno lalhim gm btok hnoSeim ogm btok habdim : lalh riH mot lmot olalh riH Hiim lHiim omi ch raoi lkk : ki anHno ainno kmo hrbim heSim sHorh bdbr halhim ki am mtok iSr lbb omalhim lpni alhim ndbr bmSiH :

3

hnHl eod lSbH ezmno ham nzTrk kmqzt anSim lagrot alikm ao mkm hmckirot atno lSbH : atm agrtno hktobh blbbno onodeh onqrah lkl adm : ki bidoe Satm agrt hmSiH erokh el idi Srotno ktobh la bdio ki am broH alhim Hiim ola el loHot abn ki am el loHot bSr hlb : okch bTHonno balhim el idi hmSiH : ien aSr la nokl anHno ldin din mezmno ki ikltno mat halhim hia : aSr hkSir atno lmSrti brit HdSh la Sl haotiot ala Sl hroH ki haot imit ohroH iHih : oam Srot hmot hHrot baotiot el habn nrah bkbod ed Sla iklo bni iSral lhbiT al pni mSh mpni kbod pnio hemd lhbTl : kmh igdl kbod Srot hroH : ki am hSrot aSr lHib kbod hoa kmh iedp bkbod hSrot aSr lckot : ki ap hnkbd ainno nHSb lkbod lemt hkbod hnelh hch : ki am hdbr hemd lhbTl iS lo kbod hdbr hqim el aHt kmh okmh : el kn bhiot lno tqoh kcat ptHon pino rb hoa : ola kmSh aSr ntn msoh el pnio pn ibiTo bni iSral al sop hemd lhbTl : abl nTmTmo deotihm ki ed hiom hch bqram hbrit hiSnh nSar ola glh hmsoh hhoa aSr la iosr ki am bmSiH : abl ed hiom hch bqram at mSh monH msoh el lbm : okSipno al hadon iosr hmsoh : ohadon hoa hroH obaSr roH hadon Sm hHrot : oanHno klno bpnim mglim raim at kbod hadon bmrah onHlp al ezm dmot hhia mkbod al kbod khHlp mat adon hroH :

4

el kn bhiot lno hSrot hch kaSr Hnno la nHt : ki am masno bstri hbSt Sla lhthlk bermh ola lcip at dbr halhim ala bhraot hamt nckir atno lTob ngd det kl bni adm lpni halhim : ogm ki nelmh bSortno nelmh hia mn habdim : aSr alhi heolm hch eor bhm at deot hsorrim lblti crH lhm ngh bSort kbod hmSiH aSr hoa zlm halhim : ki la atno mkricim anHno ki am at hmSiH ihoSe lamr hoa hadon oanHno ebdikm lmen ihoSe : ki halhim aSr amr oipe aor mHSk hoa hopie blbno lhpiz aor det kbod halhim aSr bpni hmSiH : abl iS lno haozr hch bkli HrS lmen aSr thih hgborh hitrh lalhim ola matno : nHlzim anHno bkl ola ndkaim dagim ola noaSim : nrdpim ola nToSim mSlkim ola abdim : onSaim bkl et mitt hadon ihoSe bgoitno lmen iglo gm Hii ihoSe bgoitno : ki anHno hHiim nmsrim tmid lmot bebor ihoSe lmen iglo gm Hii ihoSe bbSrno bSr htmoth : lkn bno iamz hmot obkm hHiim : obhiot lno hroH hhoa Sl hamonh kdbr hktob hamnti ki adbr gm anHno namin oel kn ndbr : baSr ideno ki hmeir at hadon ihoSe ieir gm atno el id ihoSe oiemidno emkm : ki kl cat lmenkm lmen aSr irbh hHsd el idi rbim otprz htodh lkbod halhim : obebor cat la nHt oap am iklh bno hadm hHizon hnh hadm hpnimi itHdS iom iom : ki lHzno aSr hoa ql oak lrge ibia lno kbod eolmim gdol orb ed lmad : aSr la nbiT al hdbrim hnraim ki am al aSr ainm nraim ki hnraim lSeh hmh oaSr ainm nraim hm leolm :

5

hn ideno ki bhrs bit ahlno aSr barz iS lno bnin mat halhim bit aSr ainno meSh idim ohoa leolm bSmim : ki gm eth nanHim onkspim anHno lhteTp bbitno aSr mn hSmim : baSr aHri lbSnho la nmza ermim : ki gm eth bahlno ch nanH mpni hkbd ola Hpzno lhtpST ki am lhteTp lmen ible hmot el idi hHiim : ohmkin atno lcat hoa halhim aSr ap ntn lno at erbon hroH : lkn bToHim anHno bkl et oideim ki kl eod SmoSbno bgop rHoqim anHno mn hadon : ki bamonh nthlk ola braot einim : amnm bToHim anHno onbHrh lno lhtrHq mn hgop olhiot qrobim al hadon : el kn gm nStdl am qrobim am rHoqim lhiot lo lrzon : ki klno etidim lhraot lpni ksa din hmSiH lmen iqbl aiS oaiS kpi pelo bHii gopo am Tob oam re : oeth ien aSr ideno irat hadon ndbr el lb bni adm olalhim anHno gloim oaqoh ki gloim anHno gm bmdekm : ki ain anHno mStbHin Snit alikm ak ntnim lkm sbh lhtpar bno lngd hmtparim bpnim ola blb : ki am hStgeno lalhim hith cat oam hSklno lkm hith : ki ahbt hmSiH dHqt atno bhiotno dnim aSr am mt aHd bed klm klm mto : obed klm mt lmen la iHio hHiim eod lnpSm ki am laSr mt oiqm bedm : lkn meth anHno la nde aiS lpi hbSr ogm am ideno at hmSiH lpi hbSr meth la ndeho eod : obkn mi Shoa bmSiH briah HdSh hoa hiSnot ebro ohnh hkl nhih lHdS : ohkl mat halhim hmrzh atno lezmo el idi ihoSe hmSiH oitn lno Srot hrzoi : ien aSr alhim hih bmSiH mrzh at heolm lezmo ola HSb lhm at pSeihm oiSm bno at dbr hrzoi : lkn mlizi hmSiH anHno okalo halhim mchir atkm el idno nbqS mkm bed hmSiH htrzo na al halhim : ki at aSr la ide HTat ato eSh lHTat bedno lmen nhih bo anHno lzdqt alhim :

6

oanHno kecrim nchirh atkm Sla tqblo lriq at Hsd alhim : ki hoa aomr bet rzon enitik obiom ihoSeh ecrtik hnh eth et rzon hnh eth iom ihoSeh : oain anHno ntnim mkSol bmaomh pn ihih Srotno lnazh : ki am nrah bkl dbr kmSrti alhim bsblnot rbh blHz obzrot obmzoqot : bmkot obmosrot obmhomot btlaot bSqidot obzomot : bThrh obdet obark roH obHsd obroH hqdS obahbh la zboeh : bdbr hamt obgbort alhim bkli nSq hzdqh mimin omSmal : bkbod obqlon bSm re obSm Tob kmteim obkl cat namnim : kainm idoeim ogm idoeim kmtim ohnno Hiim kmisrim ola momtim : knezbim obkl et SmHim krSim omeSiri rbim kaSr ain lhm maomh oiS lhm kl : pino ptoH lkm anSi qorntos orHb lbno : la zr mqomkm bno ak zr hmqom bmeikm : ohih ch gmoli kmo al bnim anki mdbr am trHibo lbbkm gm atm : al thio mSki el cr em Hsri amonh ki ai ch Stpot iS lzdqh em heol oai ch htHbrot laor em hHSk : oai ch hskmh lmSiH em blial ao mh Hlq hmamin em Sainno mamin : oai ch dbq iS lhikl alhim em halilim ki atm hikl alhim Hiim kmo Samr halhim oSknti ohthlkti btokm ohiiti lhm lalhim ohm ihio li lem : el kn zao mtokm ohbro nam ihoh oTma al tgeo oani aqbz atkm : ohiiti lkm lab oatm thio li lbnim olbnot nam ihoh zbaot :

7

lkn Hbibi bhiot lno hhbTHot halh nThrh at ezmno mkl Tmat bSr oroH lhSlim qdStno birat alhim : tno lno mqom blbbkm la Hmsno aiS la Hblno aiS la eSqno aiS : la lHib atkm ani mdbr hla hqdmti lamr ki atm blbno iHd lmot oiHd lHiot : rb bTHoni elikm rbh thlti bkm mlati nHmh Sbeti SmHot bkl lHzno : ki gm bbano al mqdonia la hith mrgeh lbSrno rq nlHzno bkl mHoz mlHmot omHdrim aimh : abl halhim hmnHm at hSplim nHm atno bboa TiTos : ola bbao lbd ki am gm bnHmh aSr nHm bkm bhgido lno at tSoqtkm oat ablkm oat qnatkm li obkn hospti lSmoH : ki gm am hezbti atkm bagrt ainni mtHrT gm ki htHrTti lpni mch braoti ki hagrt hhia hezibh atkm oap am lSeh : eth ani SmH la el aSr nezbtm ki am el aSr nezbtm ltSobh ki nezbtm krzon alhim lmen la tSao ncq bmaomh el idno : ki hezbt Shia krzon alhim tpel tSobh lihoSeh aSr aiS la itHrT elih abl ezbt heolm pelt at hmot : ki rao na at aSr nezbtm krzon alhim kmh hbia atkm ch lidi cricot gm lhtnzlot gm lrgc gm lirah gm ltSoqh gm lqnah gm lnqmh obkl hokHtm ki nqiim atm bdbr hhoa : lkn gm am ktbti lkm la ktbti bebor helb ola bebor hnelb rq lmen tglh bkm cricotno bedkm lpni halhim : obebor cat nHmno bnHmtkm oeod SmHh itrh hith lno bSmHt TiTos ki honH roHo el idi klkm : ki bmh Shthllti lpnio bkm la nklmti ki kmo Sdbrno hkl alikm bamt kn gm thltno al TiTos hith amt : obiotr meio hmo lkm bckro at mSmet klkm oat aSr qbltm ato birah obHrdh : lkn ani SmH ki bkl dbr iamz lbi bkm :

8

ohnno modieim atkm aHi at Hsd alhim hntn bqhlot mqdonia : ki brb nsion hlHz rbth SmHtm oSplot riSm hediph lhraot eSr tmtm : ki meid anki aSr lpi kHm oiotr mkHm htndbo : oibqSo mmno brb tHnonim lhiot Hbrino bgmilot Hsdm lecrt hqdSim : ola kaSr hoHlno ki am at ezmm ntno braSonh ladon ogm lno brzon halhim : ed ki bqSno mn TiTos kaSr hHl kn gm lgmor bkm at gmilot hHsd hcat : abl kaSr hotrtm bkl bamonh obdbor obdet obkl cricot obahbtkm atno kn gm totiro bHsd hch : oainni amr cat bdrk zooi ki am lbHn el idi cricot aHrim gm at amtt ahbtkm : ki ideim atm at Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH ki bhioto eSir neSh rS beborkm lmen teSiro el idi riSo : oaHoh at deti bdbr hch ki cat lhoeil lkm aSr hqdmtm kbr bSnh Sebrh la leSot blbd ki gm lHpz : oeth gm hSlimo at hmeSh lmen kaSr htndbtm leSot kn gm tgmro kpi ikltkm : ki bhmza laiS roH ndibh rzoih hia lpi mh SiS lo ola lpi mh Sain lo : ki la lmen thih roHh laHrim olkm zoqh ki am bSooi imla itrkm bet hcat at mHsorm : lmen gm itrm ihih lmla mHsrkm kdi lhSot : kktob la hedip hmrbh ohmmeiT la hHsir : otodot lalhim hnotn gm blb TiTos lSqd elikm bSqidh kcat : ki Sme lbqStno obSqidto hitrh hlk alikm mrzon npSo : oemo iHdo SlHno haH aSr iza SbHo bbSorh bkl hqhlot : omlbd cat gm nbHr hoa mat hqhlot llkt atno lhbia hHsd hch hgboi el idino lkbod hadon olamz lbbkm : onSmr bcat Sla iozia aiS elino dbh reh bSpet hmtnh hcat hgboih el idino : ki mSgiHim anHno el hTob la lpni hadon lbd ki gm lpni hadm : onSlH emhm at aHino aSr bHno at Sqidto pemim rbot bdbrim hrbh oeth hoa Sqod eod iotr bgdl bTHono elikm : am lTiTos hnh Hbri hoa oecri bkm oam laHino hnh SloHi hqhlot hm otpart hmSiH : el kn hrao ohokiHo lhm lpni hqhlot at ahbtkm oat thltno elikm :

9

amnm ain zrk lktb alikm el dbr hSrot aSr lecrt hqdSim : ki ideti at ndibtkm aSr elih ani mthll bkm lpni anSi mqdonia lamr akia mcmnt hia mSnh Sebrh oter hqnah hiozat mkm at roH rbm : abl SlHti at haHim pn thih lriq thltno elikm bdbr hch olmen thio mcmnim kaSr amrti : pn bboa ati anSim mmqdonia imzao atkm la mcmnim onboS anHno oainni amr atm bbTHon hch aSr hthllno bo : el kn hih nkon beini lbqS mn haHim ki iqdmo llkt alikm oikino at brktkm hmioedh mlpnim lmen thih moknt kein brkh ola kein kilot : ki hnh hcre bzmzom gm iqzr bzmzom ohcre bbrkot gm iqzr bbrkot : okl aiS kaSr idbno lbo la mzer ola mans ki hntn blb SmH iahbno alhim : oalhim ikl lhSpie elikm kl Hsd ed ki ihih lkm bkl et di spoqkm bkl ototiro bkl meSh Tob : kktob pcr ntn labionim zdqto emdt led : ohntn cre lcre olHm lakl itn oirbh at crekm oipria tnobot zdqtkm : lmen teSiro bkl lkl htmimot hpelt todh lalhim el idino : ki Srot hebodh hcat la lbd imla at mHsri hqdoSim ki gm iodo rbim lalhim bSrotkm hnamn hch : oikbdo at halhim el mSmet hodatkm lbSort hmSiH oel tmt htHbrotkm alihm oal klm : ohm bhtHnnm bedkm nkspim lkm bebor Hsd halhim aSr gbr elikm : otodh lalhim el mtnto hezomh mspr :

10

oani polos hnni mchir atkm benot hmSiH oHmlto aSr pnim bpnim Spl ani btokkm obrHqi mtamz elikon : oatHnnh Sla azTrk bbai lhtamz bbTHon hhoa aSr aHSb lhtgbr bo ngd hanSim hHSbim atno kmthlkim lpi hbSr : ki blktno bbSr la nlHm lpi hbSr : ki kli mlHmtno ainm Sl hbSr ki am Hcqim hm lalhim lhrs mbzrim : baSr hrsim anHno tHblot okl mrom hmtnSa ngd det halhim oSobim kl mcmh lmSmet hmSiH : onkonim lnqm nqmh mat kl mri am tSlm mSmetkm : htSpTo lmrah pnim aiS ki ibTH lhiot lmSiH iSob oidin blbo ki kaSr hoa lmSiH kn lmSiH gm anHno : ogm ki athll iotr meT el dbr hrSot aSr ntn lno hadon lbnotkm ola lSHtkm la aboS : lmen la arah kmaim atkm el idi hagrot : kamrm hn hagrot qSot hnh oHcqot abl hgop bhioto lngdno HloS hoa onibo nbch : ide na hamr kcat ki kmo SanHno bdbor el idi agrot bhiotno rHoqim kn gm bpel anHno bhiotno qrobim : ki al nec pnino lkll atno em hanSim hmSbHim npSm ao lerk atno lalh akn nbero mdet hmddim at npSm bnpSm oerkim at npSm lnpSm : oanHno la ntgdl lbli mdh ki am kpi mdt hgbol aSr Hlq lno halhim lHq lhgie gm edikm : ki lola hgeno edikm la nStre lmelh merkno hla kbr qdmno gm atkm bbSort hmSiH : la ntgdl lbli mdh bigiet aHrim abliS lno htqoh ki brbot amontkm nkbd bkm kpi gbolno ed lmelh : kdi lbSr hbSorh gm lhlah mkm ola lhthll bmh Smokn kbr bgbol aHrim : ohmthll ithll bihoh : ki la hmSbH npSo mSbH hoa ki am aSr iSbHno ihoh :

11

aHli tSao meT aolti oap amnm tSaoni : ki mqna ani lkm qnat alhim ki arSti atkm laiS aHd lhemid atkm btolh Thorh lpni hmSiH : ak ira anki pn kaSr hSia hnHS bermto at Hoh kn tSTinh gm mHSbotikm mn htmimot aSr em hmSiH : ki am iba hba ohgid lkm ihoSe aHr aSr la hgdnho ao am tqHo roH aHr aSr la lqHtm ato ao bSorh aHrt aSr la qbltm ath ki eth hiTb tSaho : aolm aHSb aSr ainni npl bmaomh mhSliHim hgdolim kl kk : oap am ber anki bdbor ainni ber bdet ki am bkl nglino alikm bpni kl adm : ao hHTa HTati bhSpili at ezmi lmen hgbihkm ki bSrti atkm bla mHir at bSort halhim : qhlot aHrot Sloti bqHti mhn Skr lmen aSrtkm obhioti emkm oaHsr la hlaiti adm : ki at mHsori mlao haHim bbam mmqdonia obkl dbr nSmrti mhiot lkm lmSa ogm aSmr : bamto Sl hmSiH aSr bi meid ani bkm ki thlti cat la tkla mmni bglilot akia : el mh ch hel aSr ainni ahb atkm halhim iode : abl at aSr ani eSh aosip leSot lblti tt mqom lmbqSim elilh lmen bmh Sithllo bo imzao domim lno : ki anSim kalh SliHi Sqr hm peli rmih mtHpSim lSliHi hmSiH : oainno pla hla hSTn gm hoa mtHpS lmlak haor : lkn ain ch dbr gdol am gm mSrtio itHpSo lmSrti hzdq aSr aHritm thih lpi mellihm : oaSob oamr al na iHSbni aiS lskl oam ain ap kskl qbloni lmen athll meT gm ani : at aSr adbr la lpi drk hadon anki mdbr ki am kmo bsklot aec oathll : rbim mthllim lpi hbSr lkn athll ap ani : ki nSaim atm brzon at hsklim bhiotkm Hkmim : hla tSao am iebid atkm aiS am ible am ilkd atkm am itnSa am ikh atkm el pnikm : lHrptno anki amr cat kalo hiino rpim abl bkl aSr irhb aiS lhthll bsklot amr cat arhb gm anki : ebrim hm kn gm anki iSralim hm kn gm anki cre abrhm hm kn gm anki : mSrti hmSiH hm kmtholl amr anki iotr mhm iotr bigieot iotr lmad bmkot iotr bmosrot orb pemim bmzoqot mot : HmS pemim spgti bidi hihodim arbeim Hsr aHt : SlS pemim isrti bSoTim pem aHt sqlti oSlS pemim nSbrh li hspinh oahi bmzolot im lilh oiom : bmseot rbot bsknot nhrot bsknot Sddim bsknot mzd bni emi bsknot mzd hgoim sknot beir sknot bmdbr sknot bim sknot btok aHi Sqr : beml obtlah bSqidot hrbh breb obzma bzomot hrbh bqr obeirom : mlbd Sar hdbrim hbaim eli iom iom ohdagh lkl hqhlot : mi iHlS oani la aHlS mi ikSl ola iber lbi : am iS lhthll athll bHlSti : halhim abi ihoSe hmSiH adnino hmbrk leolmi eolmim hoa ide ki la aSqr : bdmSq Smr hnzb Sl hmlk arTs at eir hdmSqiin oibqS ltpSni : obed hHlon horido ati bsl mel hHomh oamlT midio :

12

amnm lhthll la ioeil li ki aboa lmraot hadon oHcinotio : ideti aiS bmSiH ch arbe eSrh Snh am hih bgop la ideti ao mHoz lgop la ideti halhim iode ohaiS hhoa lqH ed lrqie hSliSi : oideti at haiS hhoa am bgop ao mHoz lgop la ideti halhim iode : aSr helh al hprds oiSme dbrim nstrim aSr nmne maiS lmllm : el aiS kmoho athll ak el ezmi la athll colti bHlSoti : ki lo Hpzti lhthll la ahih skl ki amt adbr abl atapq pn iHSbni aiS iotr mmh Sirah bi ao SiSme mmni : olmen aSr la atromm brb gdl hHcinot ntn li slon bbSri mlak hSTn lhktni bagrop lmen la atromm : el cat htHnnti SlS pemim al hadon lhsiro mmni : oiamr ali di lk Hsdi ki bHlSh tSlm gborti el kn SmH lbi lhthll bHlSoti lmen tSrh eli gbort hmSiH : lkn rzth npSi bHlSot obHrpot obzrot obrdipot obmzoqot bed hmSiH ki kaSr HlSti ac gbor ani : skl hiiti bhthlli atm hkrHtm ati tHt aSr hih elikm lhckirni lSbH ki la npl anki bmaomh mn hSliHim hgdolim kl kk ap ki kain anki : hn atot hSliH neSo bqrbkm bkl sblnot batot obmoptim obgborot : ki bmh ngretm mn hqhlot haHrot am la hlaiti atkm slHo na li at heolh hcat : hnni mokn lboa alikm pem SliSit ola alah atkm ki la abqS at aSr lkm ki am atkm ki hbnim ainm Hibim lazr aozrot labot ki am habot lbnim : abl ani bkl Hpz lbbi apcr ogm apcr bed npSotikm ap am tHt ahbti lkm hitrh atm tmeiTo at ahbtkm ali : ak am kn hoa oani la hkbdti elikm aoli kaiS erom bmrmh lkdti atkm : hap honiti atkm bid aHd malh aSr SlHti alikm : bqSti mn TiTos oSlHti ato at haH hki honh atkm TiTos hla broH aHd hthlkno hla bmegl aHd : htHSbo eod ki mtnzlim anHno alikm la ki lpni halhim ndbr bmSiH okl cat Hbibi lmen tbno : ki ira anki pn bbai la amza atkm kaSr Hpzti oatm gm atm la tmzao ati kaSr Hpztm pn ihih bkm mzh oqnah orgc omribot odbh reh orkilot ogaot ombokh : pn aSob lboa oiSpilni alhi azlkm oatabl el rbim aSr HTao kbr ola Sbo mn hTmah omn hcnot omn hcmh aSr eSo :

13

cat hpem hSliSit aSr aboa alikm el pi Snim edim ao SlSh edim iqom kl dbr : mqdm amrti bhioti azlkm bpem hSnit omqdm ani amr oktb eth brHqi mkm laSr HTao lpni mch olkl hnSarim ki bSobi lboa la aHos : ien bqSkm lbHn at hmSiH hmdbr bi aSr ainno HlS lkm ki am gbor hoa btokkm : ki am gm nzlb bHlSh akn Hi hoa bgbort alhim oam gm HlSim bo anHno akn nHih emo bgbort alhim lngdkm : nso na atkm am bamonh atm bHno atkm ao hainkm ideim at npSkm ki ihoSe hmSiH bkm am la ki nmasim atm : abl aqoh ki tdeo aSr anHno ainno nmasim : oani mtHnn al halhim aSr la teSo kl re la lmen nrah anHno namnim ki am lmen teSo atm at hTob oanHno nhih knmasim : ki ain anHno ikolim leSot maomh lngd hamt ki am bed hamt : ki nSmH am HlSim anHno oatm gborim oel cat gm ntpll el aSr tkonno : obebor cat ktbti at alh bhioti brHoq lmen aSr la azTrk bqrbi alikm ldbr atkm mSpTim lpi hrSot aSr ntnh li hadon lbnot ola lhros : obkn aHi SmHo ohtkonno htnHmo oihi lkm lb aHd ahbo hSlom oalhi hahbh ohSlom ihi emkm : Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSiqh hqdoSh hqdoSim klm Salim lSlomkm : : Hsd hadon ihoSe hmSiH oahbt halhim ohtHbrot roH hqdS em klkm amn :

al-hglTim

1

polos hSliH la mbni adm ola el idi bn adm ki am el idi ihoSe hmSiH oalhim hab aSr heiro mn hmtim : okl haHim aSr emdi al hqhlot aSr bglTia : Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino omat adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr ntn at npSo bed HTatino lHlzno mn heolm hre hch krzon alhino abino : aSr lo hkbod leolmi eolmim amn : tmh ani ki srtm mhr maHri hqra atkm bHsd hmSiH al bSorh crh : ohia ainnh aHrt rq SiS anSim hekrim atkm oHpzim lhpk at bSort hmSiH : abl gm anHno ao mlak mn hSmim am iboa lbSr atkm bSorh mbledi cat aSr bSrno atkm Hrm ihih : kmo Samrno kbr kn amr eth eod hpem aiS ki ibSr atkm bSorh mbledi aSr qbltm Hrm ihih : oeth hmtrzh anki al bni adm am al halhim ao hmbqS anki lmza Hn beini bni adm ki bmzai Hn beini bni adm la ahih eod ebd hmSiH : abl modie ani atkm aHi ki hbSorh aSr bSrti la lpi drk adm hia : ki gm anki la qbltih madm ola lmdoni ath ki am bHcion ihoSe hmSiH : ki hla Smetm at drki aSr hthlkti mlpnim bin hihodim oat aSr rdpti el itr at edt alhim oabdtih : oahi holk oHcq bdt hihodit el rbim mbni gili bemi bqnati hgdolh lqblot aboti : ak kaSr hih rzon halhim aSr hbdil ati mrHm ami oiqrani bHsdo : lglot bi at bno SabSrno bgoim mid la noezti em bSr odm : gm la eliti iroSlim al aSr hio SliHim lpni ki am hlkti lerb omSm Sbti al dmSq : aHri kn mqz SlS Snim eliti iroSlim lraot at kipa oaSb emo HmSh eSr iom : oaHr mn hSliHim la raiti colti at ieqb aHi adnino : oaSr ani ktb alikm hnh ngd halhim ki la akcb : aHri kn bati al glilot soria oqiliqia : abl qhlot ihodh aSr bmSiH hnh la ideo at pni : rq cat blbd Smeo ki haiS hhoa aSr hih rdp atno mac eth hoa mbSr at hamonh aSr habidh mlpnim : oihllo bi at halhim :

2

aHri kn mqz arbe eSrh Snh Sbti oeliti liroSlim em br nba oaqH ati gm at TiTos : oael Smh el pi mHch oaSim lpnihm at hbSorh aSr qrati bgoim obiHod Smtih lpni hHSobim Sbhm pn thih lriq mrozti aSr aroz ao rzti : abl gm TiTos aSr ati ap ki ioni hoa la hkrH lhmol : mpni aHi hSqr hnknsim bstr btokno aSr bao lrgl at Hrotno aSr lno bihoSe hmSiH lmen hebidno : aSr la srno lmSmetm ap la Seh aHt lmen aSr temd bqrbkm amth Sl hbSorh : omat hnHSbim lhiot mh ihio mi Sihio ainni HoSS lch ki halhim la iSa pni aiS li la hosipo hHSobim maomh : othi lhpk braotm ki hpqdh li hbSorh al herlim kmo Shpqd kipa al hmolim : ki hpel bkipa lSlHo al hmolim hoa pel gm bi lSlHni al hgoim : okaSr ideo ieqb okipa oioHnn hnHSbim lemodim at hHsd hntn li ntno li olbr nba at id iminm onaot ki nlk anHno lgoim ohmh lmolim : rq Snckr at habionim aSr gm Sqdti leSoth : okaSr ba kipa lanTiokia hokHti al pnio drko mpni Shih bo aSm : ki lpni ba anSim mat ieqb hih akl em hgoim iHdo okbam hih mtrHq oporS mhm mirato at bni hmilh : oikHSo emo gm Sar hihodim ed ki br nba gm hoa ndH aHri kHSm : akn braoto at aSr la iSro lkt kamth Sl hbSorh amrti al kipa bpni kl am ath hihodi ttnhg knkri ola kihodi lmh tkriH at hgoim lhtnhg kihodim : hn mcre hihodim anHno ola HTaim mn hgoim : omdetno ki la izdq adm mtok meSi htorh ki am bamont ihoSe hmSiH gm anHno hamno bmSiH ihoSe lmen nzdq mamont hmSiH ola mmeSi htorh ki mmeSi htorh la izdq kl bSr : oam bbqSno lhzdq bmSiH nmza gm anHno HTaim hnh hmSiH mSrt hHTa Hlilh : ki am aSob oabnh at mh Sstrti ani eSh at ezmi pSe : ki mti ani ltorh el idi htorh lmen aHih lalhim : em hmSiH nzlbti oain eod anki hHi ki am hmSiH hoa Hi bqrbi oaSr ani Hi eth bbSr aHih bamont bn alhim aSr ahbni oitn at npSo bedi : la amas at Hsd halhim ki alo thih el idi htorh zdqh hnh Hnm mt hmSiH :

3

ahh glTim Hsri det mi hteh atkm bkSpio mSme at hamt aHri aSr zir btokkm ihoSe hmSiH hzlob lngd einikm : cat lbd Hpzti llmd mkm ham mmeSi htorh qbltm at hroH ao mSmoet hamonh : hatm sklim kl kk aSr hHlotm broH oeth tklo bbSr : hkcat sbltm lriq am amnm ak lriq : hnh hmpiq lkm at hroH opel bkm gborot hki mmeSi htorh hoa eSh alh ao mSmoet hamonh : kaSr hamin abrhm balhim otHSb lo lzdqh : deo apoa ki bni hamonh bni abrhm hmh : ohmqra brato mraS ki halhim izdiq at hgoim mtok hamonh qdm lbSr at abrhm lamr onbrko bk kl hgoim : el kn bni hamonh itbrko em abrhm hmamin : ki bni meSi htorh tHt hqllh hmh Snamr aror aSr la iqim at kl hdbrim hktobim bspr htorh leSot aotm : ogloi hoa ki el idi htorh la izdq hadm lpni halhim ki zdiq bamonto iHih : ohtorh ainnh mn hamonh ki am aSr ieSh atm hadm oHi bhm : hmSiH pdno mqllt htorh bhioto lqllh bedno Snamr qllt alhim tloi : lmen aSr tba brkt abrhm bmSiH ihoSe el hgoim lmen aSr nSa at hbTHt hroH el idi hamonh : aHi lpi drk adm adbr aplo ditiqi Sl bn adm am mqimt hia la iprnh aiS gm la iosip elih dbr : ohnh labrhm namro hhbTHot olcreo ola amr olcreik kalo lrbim ala kalo liHid olcrek ohoa hmSiH : ocat ani amr ki ditiqi aSr qimh halhim mac limot hmSiH la tokl htorh aSr bah aHri arbe maot oSlSim Snh lhpr aoth olbTl at hhbTHh : ki am tboa hnHlh mtok htorh la tboa eod mtok hhbTHh abl at abrhm Hnn halhim el idi hbTHh : am kn htorh mh hia mpni hpSeim nosph ed ki iboa hcre aSr lo hhbTHh otoSm htorh el idi hmlakim obid srsr : ohsrsr la Sl aHd hoa ak halhim hoa aHd : oeth hki htorh strt at hbTHot halhim Hlilh ki alo ntnh torh aSr bkHh lhHiot ac bamt hith hzdqh el idi htorh : abl hktob sgr at hkl bid hHTa lmen tntn hhbTHh al hmaminim bamont ihoSe hmSiH : lpni boa hamonh hiino sgorim onSmrim tHt htorh ali hamonh hetidh lhglot : obkn htorh hith amnt aotno al hmSiH lmen nzdq el idi hamonh : abl eth aHri aSr bah hamonh ain anHno eod tHt id hamn : ki klkm bni alhim atm el idi hamonh bmSiH ihoSe : ki klkm aSr nTbltm lmSiH lbStm at hmSiH : oain eod la ihodi ola ioni la ebd ola bn Horin la ckr ola nqbh ki atm klkm aHd bmSiH ihoSe : oam atm lmSiH hnkm cre abrhm onHlim kpi hhbTHh :

4

oani amr hiorS kl et hioto qTn ain hbdl bino obin hebd ap am hoa adon hkl : ala hoa tHt id amnim opqidi hbit ed lcmn hmied lo mat abio : kkh gm anHno beod hiotno qTnim hiino mSebdim lisdot heolm : obmlat het SlH halhim at bno aSr nold maSh ontn tHt id htorh : lpdot at aSr hio tHt id htorh lmen nqbl at mSpT hbnim : oien ki bnim atm SlH halhim blbbkm at roH bno hqora aba abino : lkn aink eod ebd ki am bn oam bn ath hnk gm iorS halhim el idi hmSiH : hn lpnim bain det alhim hiitm ebdim at aSr bezmotm ainm alhim : oeth aHri idetm at halhim oiotr aHri Snodetm lalhim aik tSobo al hisdot hrpim ohdlim hhm aSr trzo lhkne lhm mHdS : imim atm Smrim oHdSim omoedim oSnim : mtira ani pn lriq emlti bkm : hio na kmoni ki gm ani kmokm mtHnn ani lkm aHi la hretm li maomh : atm idetm aSr bHlSt bSri bSrti lkm at hbSorh lraSonh : oatm la bcitm at nsioni aSr nsiti bbSri ola geltm ato ki am qbltm ati kmlak alhim kmSiH ihoSe : oeth aih aSrkm ki meid ani elikm aSr am ikltm hiitm eqrim at einikm lttn li : oeth hnhiiti lkm laib bdbri amt alikm : ainm mqnaim lkm lTobh ki Hpzm lhprid atkm melino lmen thio mqnaim lhm : abl Tob lqna tmid lTobh ola lbd bhioto azlkm : bni aSr ani mHoll Snit ed ki iozr bkm hmSiH : amnh Hpzti lhiot eth azlkm lSnot at qol dbri ki nbok ani bkm : amro li atm hHpzim lhiot mSebdim ltorh hla Smetm at htorh : ki ktob Shio labrhm Sni bnim haHd mn hamh ohSni mn hHpSih : oaSr lamh hoa nold lpi hbSr oaSr lHpSih el pi hhbTHh : ohdbrim hm lrmc ki Sti hbritot hnh haHt mn hr sini hioldt lebdot ohia hgr : ki hgr sini hr berb hoa ohoa kngd iroSlim Sl eth ki hia bebdot em bnih : abl iroSlim Sl melh hia HpSih ohia am klno : ki ktob rni eqrh la ildh pzHi rnh ozhli la Hlh ki rbim bni Sommh mbni beolh : oanHno aHi hnno kizHq bni hhbTHh : okaSr hnold lpi hbSr ac hih rdp at hnold lpi hroH kn hoa gm eth : abl hktob mh hoa amr grS hamh oat bnh ki la iirS bn hamh em bn hHpSih : el kn aHi la bni hamh anHno ki am bni hHpSih :

5

oeth emdo na bHrot aSr SHrr atno hmSiH oal tSobo lhlkd bel hebdot : hnh ani polos amr lkm ki am tmolo la ioeil lkm hmSiH : omeid ani eod hpem bkl aiS aSr imol ki mHib hoa lSmr at kl htorh : ngcrtm mn hmSiH atm hmzTdqim btorh npltm mn hHsd : ki anHno broH niHl mtok hamonh ltqot hzdqh : ki bmSiH ainnh nHSbt la hmilh ola herlh ki am hamonh hpelt bahbh : hiTbtm lroz mi HSk atkm mSme al hamt : hptoi hch ainno mat hqra atkm : meT Sar mHmz hoa at kl hesh : mbTH ani bkm badon Sla thih roH aHrt emkm ohekr atkm iSa at eono ihih mi Sihih : oani aHi am akric eod hmilh el mh ahih nrdp hla ac mbTl mkSol hzlb : mi itn oikrto hmdiHim atkm : ki atm aHi lHrot nqratm oblbd Sla thih hHrot tanh lbSr ala Stebdo aiS at reho bahbh : ki kl htorh klolh bmzoh aHt ohia oahbt lrek kmok : abl am tnSko otaklo aiS at aHio rao pn tklo aiS el idi reho : ohnni amr hthlko broH ola tmlao at taot hbSr : ki hbSr mtaoh hpk mn hroH ohroH hpk mn hbSr oSnihm mtqommim ch lch ed Sla toklo leSot at aSr tHpzo : oam tnhgo el idi hroH ac ainkm tHt htorh : ogloim hm peli hbSr aSr hm naop cnot Tmah ocmh : ebodt alilim okSop aibot omzot oqnah orgc mribot mHlqot oktot : zrot ein oSpikot dmim oSron ocollot odomihn aSr amr elihn kmo Samrti kbr ki eSi alh la inHlo mlkot halhim : opri hroH ahbh SmHh oSlom ark roH ondibot oHsd oamonh : oenoh opriSot ain torh lngd eSi alh : oaSr hm lmSiH zlbo at bSrm em kl tSoqtio otaotio : am nHih broH nthlkh gm broH : ola nrdp aHri kbod Soa lhkeis aiS at reho olqna aiS at reho :

6

aHi gm ki itpS aiS mkm bebrh atm anSi hroH tqimho broH enoh ohSmr lnpSk pn tba lidi nsion gm ath : Sao aiS at mSa reho bcat tmlao at tort hmSiH : ki hHSb at ezmo lhiot mh oainno maomh at npSo hoa mrmh : abl ibHn kl aiS at meSho oac lo lbdo thih thlto ola lngd aHr : ki kl aiS at mSao iSa : hmlmd bdbr iHlq mkl Tobo lmlmdho : al tteo la itn alhim lhtl bo ki mh Scre hadm ato iqzr : hcre bbSro iqzr klion mSbro ohcre broH iqzr mn hroH Hii eolm : oanHno beSot hTob al nHt ki nqzr beto am la nrph : lkn kaSr het bidno neSh na at hTob em kl adm obiotr em bni amontno : rao na mh gdol hmktb aSr ktbti alikm bidi : hHpzim lhthdr bbSr mkriHim atkm lhmol rq lmen la irdpo el zlb hmSiH : ki gm hm hnmolim ainm Smrim at htorh ala rzonm Stmolo lmen ithllo bbSrkm : oanki Hlilh mhthll colti bzlb adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr bo heolm nzlb li oani nzlb leolm : ki bmSiH ihoSe gm hmilh gm herlh ainn nHSbot ki am briah HdSh : okl hmhlkim kpi hSorh hcat Slom orHmim elihm oel iSral aSr lalhim : meth aiS al ilani eod ki at Hborot hadon ihoSe ani nSa bgoiti : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino ihi em roHkm aHi amn :

al-hapsiim

1

polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim al hqdSim hnmzaim bapsos omaminim bmSiH ihoSe : Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : brok hoa halhim oabi adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr brkno bkl brkt roH bmromim bmSiH : kaSr bHr atno bo lpni mosdot tbl lhiot qdSim otmimim lpnio bahbh : iedno lo lbnim el idi ihoSe hmSiH kHpz rzono : lthlt kbod Hsdo aSr ntn atno bidido : aSr bo lno hpdiom bdmo osliHt hpSeim krb Hsdo : aSr hSpieo elino bkl Hkmh ohSkl : ohodieno at sod rzono kezto hieozh bo : el dbr hnhgto bmlat hetim lqbz at hkl tHt hmSiH hn mh SbSmim hn mh Sbarz : aSr gm lqHno bo nHltno anHno hmiedim lh mac bmHSbt pel hkl kezt Hpzo : lhiotno lthlt kbodo anHno aSr iHlno al hmSiH mac : oaSr gm atm nToeim bo aHri Smekm dbr hamt at bSort ihoSetkm oaSr bo kShamntm gm nHtmtm broH hhbTHh roH hqdS : ki ch erbon irStno lpdot lo em sglh lthlt kbodo : bebor cat gm anki aHri Smei amontkm badnino ihoSe ohahbh aSr ahbtm at kl hqdSim : la aHdl mhodot beborkm bhckiri atkm btplti : ki itn lkm alhi adnino ihoSe hmSiH abi hkbod at roH hHkmh ohHcon ldet ato : oiar eini lbbkm lmen tdeo ai co hia toHlt qriato oai ch hoa eSr kbod nHlto bqdSim : oai ch hoa itron gdlt gborto bno hmaminim kpi pelt ezt kHo : aSr pel bmSiH bheir ato mn hmtim oioSibno limino bmromim : mmel lkl Srrh oSlTn ogborh ommSlh okl hnqra bSm la lbd beolm hch ki am gm beolm hba : oiSt kl tHt rglio oitn ato lraS el hkl al hedh : aSr hia gopo mloa hmmla at hkl bkl :

2

gm atkm hmtim lpnim bpSeikm oHTatikm : aSr hthlktm bhm lpi dor heolm hch krzon Sr mmSlt haoir ohoa hroH hpel ket bbni hmri : ogm anHno klno btokm hlkno lpnim btaot hbSr leSot Hpzi bSrno omHSbotino onhi ak bni rgc bTbeno kaSr bni adm : abl halhim hmla rHmim brb ahbto aSr ahb atno : aHri hiotno mtim bpSeim hHino em hmSiH bHsd noSetm : oieirno ato ap hoSibno bmromim bmSiH ihoSe : lhraot bdrot hbaim at gdlt eSr Hsdo bTobto elino bmSiH ihoSe : ki bHsd noSetm el idi hamonh ola midkm hith cat ki mtt alhim hia : la mtok hmeSim Sla ithll aiS : ki pel alhim anHno nbraim bmSiH ihoSe lmeSim Tobim aSr hkin halhim mqdm lmen nthlk bhm : el kn ckro ki atm hgoim bbSr hnqraim erlim bpi hnqraim bni hmilh Shia meSh idim bbSr : ki atm bet hhia hiitm bli mSiH mocrim ledt iSral onkrim lbritot hhbTHh bain tqoh obain lkm alhim beolm : oeth bihoSe hmSiH atm hrHoqim mac hiitm qrobim bdm hmSiH : ki hoa Slomno aSr eSh hSnim laHd ohrs mHizt hgdr : bbTlo haibh bbSro at tort hmzot bgcrotihn lbra bnpSo at hSnim laiS aHd HdS oieS Slom : oirzh at Snihm bgop aHd lalhim el idi zlibto bhmito bnpSo at haibh : oiba oibSr Slom lkm hrHoqim ohqrobim : ki el ido iS lSnino mboa broH aHd al abino : lkn ainkm eod grim otoSbim ki atm bni eir aHt em hqdSim obni bit alhim : bnoim el isod hSliHim ohnbiaim oihoSe hmSiH hoa abn hpnh : aSr Hbr bo iHd hbnin klo edi igbh lhikl qdS lihoh : obo nbnim gm atm lhiot mSkn alhim broH :

3

bebor cat ani polos asir hmSiH lmenkm hgoim : ki amnm Smetm hnhgt Hsd halhim aSr ntn li alikm : ki bHcon glh li hsod aSr lmelh ktbti lkm bmeT : obqrakm toklo lhkir bcat at binti bsod hmSiH : aSr bdort hraSnim la node lbni adm kaSr nglh eth lSliHio hqdSim olnbiaio broH : lhiot hgoim gm hm bni irSto ogop aHd ato oHbri hbTHto bmSiH el idi hbSrh : aSr hiiti lh lmSrt bmtnt Hsd alhim hntonh li kpi pelt gborto : li zeir hzeirim Sbkl hqdSim ntn hHsd hch lbSr bgoim at eSr hmSiH aSr la iHqr : olhair eini kl mh hia hnhgt hsod hnstr mdrt eolm balhim iozr hkl el idi ihoSe hmSiH : lmen aSr tode eth el idi hedh lSrim lSliTim aSr bmromim Hkmt alhim hmpliah dtkih : el pi ezt eolmim aSr iez bmSiH ihoSe adnino : aSr ptHon pino mmno oqrbtno bbTHh el id amonto : bebor cat abqS Sla tHto bzroti lmenkm ien ki hia tpartkm : el kn akreh el brki labi adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr nqra el Smo kl bit abot SbSmim oSbarz : ltt lkm lpi eSr kbodo lhtHcq bgborh el idi roHo ladm hpnimi : SiSkn hmSiH blbbkm bamonh ohiitm mSrSim omisdim bahbh : lmen toklo lhSig em kl hqdSim mh hoa hrHb ohark ohemq ohgbh : oidetm at ahbt hmSiH hnelh el kl det onmlatm at kl mloa halhim : olo aSr ikl lhrbot gmolio elino iotr mkl mSalotino omHSbotino lpi hkH hpel bqrbno : lo hkbod bqrb hqhl bmSiH ihoSe ldr odr ed eolmi eolmim amn :

4

lkn achirkm ani hasor badon lhthlk kaSr iath lmSmrtkm aSr nqratm lh : bkl nmikot oenoh obark roH lSat aiS at reho bahbh : oSqdo lSmr at aHdot hroH bagdt hSlom : gop aHd oroH aHd kaSr gm nqratm btqot mSmrtkm haHt : adon aHd amonh aHt Tbilh aHt : al oab aHd lkl Shoa el kl obkl obtok klkm : abl lkl aHd oaHd mmno ntn hHsd kmdt mtnt hmSiH : el kn hoa aomr elh lmrom Sbh Sbi oitn mtnot ladm : oelh Samr mh hoa am la Sird ird mqdm ltHtiot arz : hird hoa aSr gm elh lmelh mkl hSmim lmen imla at hkl : ohoa ntn at alh SliHim oat alh nbiaim oat alh mbSrim oat alh reim omlmdim : lhSlim at hqdSim lmeSh hebodh lbnin gop hmSiH : ed ki ngie klno laHdot hamonh odet bn halhim kaiS aHd Slm lSeor qomt mloa hmSiH : ola nhih eod ildim ngrSim ondpim bkl roH hlmod btrmit bni adm omqSotm aSr Sto lhteot : ki am ndbr hamt bahbh ongdlh bkl dbr lo lmSiH Shoa hraS : aSr mmno kl hgop bhioto mrkb omdbq bkl Hbor hSmoS kpi mdt hpelh hntonh lkl abr oabr irbh oigdl lhSlmt bnino bahbh : ohnh cat ani amr omeid badon ki meth la tlko eod kitr hgoim hhlkim bhbli Sklm : HSki hdet omocrim lHii alhim mpni aoltm aSr bhm ki TH mhSkil lbbm : aSr hSmino oitno at npSm lcmh leSot kl toebh bahbt hbze : oatm la kn lmdtm at hmSiH : am amnm ato Smetm obo lmdtm kpi hamt bihoSe : aSr tsoro mdrkikm hraSnim otpSTo at hadm hiSn hnSHt btaot htrmit : ottHdSo broH Sklkm : otlbSo at hadm hHdS hnbra kdmot alhim bzdqh oqdSt hamt : el kn hsiro mkm at hSqr odbro amt aiS at reho ki abrim klno iHd aiS laiS : rgco oal tHTao al tSqe hHmh el rgckm : gm la ttno mqom lSTn : mi Sgnb al isp lgnb ki am iige obidio ieSh at hTob lmen ihih lo ltt laiS mHsor : kl dbr nbol la iza mpikm ki am hTob ohmoeil lbnot lpi hzrk lmen itn Hn lSmeio : ola tezbo at roH hqdS Sl alhim aSr nHtmtm bo al iom hgalh : kl mrirot oHmh orgc ozeqh ogdop tsiro mkm em kl hrSeh : ohio Tobim aiS al reho orHmnim oslHim aiS laHio kaSr slH lkm halhim bmSiH :

5

lkn lko bdrk halhim kbnim Hbibim : ohthlko bahbh kaSr gm hmSiH ahb atno ohqrib at npSo bedno lqrbn ocbH lalhim lriH niHoH : abl cnot okl Tmah oahbt bze bl ickr binikm kaSr naoh lqdSim : gm la nbol ph odbri sklot oleg aSr la khgn ki am qol todh : ki cat ide tdeo ki kl cnh oTma oahb bze Shoa ebd alilim ain lo Hlq onHlh bmlkot hmSiH ohalhim : al iSia aiS atkm bdbri riq ki bgll alh Hron alhim ba el bni hmri : el kn al ihi Hlqkm emhm : ki mlpnim hiitm HSk oeth hnkm aor badnino hthlko na kbni aor : ki pri hroH kl meSi Hsd ozdq oamt : obHno mh hoa rzoi beini adnino : oal tSttpo em meSi hHSk aSr la ieSo pri ki am hokH tokiHo aotm : ki mh Shm eSim bstr Hrph hia ak lspr : abl kl cat iglh kSiokH el idi haor ki kl hnglh aor hoa : el kn hoa aomr eorh hiSn oqomh mn hmtim oiar lk hmSiH : oeth rao ohchro lhthlk la kksilim ki am kHkmim : moqirim het ki himim reim hmh : el kn al thio Hsri det ki am mbinim ldet mh hoa rzon adnino : oal tStkro miin hmbia lidi prizot ki am hmlao broH : oSiHo aiS lreho bthlot otSbHot oSirot roHniot Siro ocmro ladni blbbkm : ohodo bkl et el hkl lalhim abino bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH : hkneo aiS laHio birat alhim : hnSim hknenh lbelikn kmo ladnino : ki haiS hoa raS haSh kaSr hmSiH hoa raS hedh ohoa moSie Sl hgop : abl kaSr tkne hedh lmSiH kkh gm hnSim lbelihn bkl dbr : hanSim ahbo at nSikm kaSr gm hmSiH ahb at hedh oitn at npSo bedh : lmen qdSh bdbro aHri aSr Thrh brHizt hmim : lhqimh bkbod lo ledh aSr ain bh ktm oqmT okdomh ki am lmen thih qdoSh otmimh : kn hanSim Hibim lahb at nSihm kgopm ki hahb at aSto ahb at ezmo : ki meolm la Sna aiS at bSro ki am cn omklkl ato kaSr gm hadon at edto : ki abri gopo anHno mSbro omezmio : el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio Snihm lbSr aHd : gdol hsod hch oani mprS ato el hmSiH oel edto : oaolm gm atm kl aiS mkm iahb at aSto knpSo ohaSh hia tchr otira at belh :

6

Smeo bnim al horikm badnino ki arH iSr hoa : kbd at abik oat amk cat hia hmzoh hraSonh aSr lh hhbTHh : lmen iiTb lk olmen iarikn imik el hadmh : oatm habot al tkeiso at bnikm ak gdlom bmosr adnino obtokHto : Smeo ebdim al adnikm lpi hbSr birah ortt obtm lbbkm kmo lmSiH : la bebdt mrah hein kmbqSi Hn bni adm ki am kebdi hmSiH eSim rzon halhim bkl npSm : oebdim bnpS Hpzh at hadon ola bni adm : oidetm ki kl dbr Tob aSr eSh hadm iSlmno lo adnino am ebd hoa ao bn Horin : oatm hadnim kkh teSo gm lhm Hdlo mger bm oidetm ki gm elikm iS adon bSmim oain lpnio mSa pnim : sop dbr aHi Hcqo badnino obec gborto : lbSo kli nSq alhim lmen toklo emd ngd nkli hSTn : ki la em bSr odm mlHmtno ki em Srim oSliTim em hmSlim bHSkt heolm hch em hroHot hreot aSr bmromim : el kn aHco bkli nSq alhim lmen toklo lqom biom hre olmla zbakm olemod : emdo na Hgori mtnim bamt omlbSim bSrion hzdq : orglikm mnelot lhiotkm moknim lbSort hSlom : oel kl alh tpSo at mgn hamonh aSr toklo lkbot bo at Hzi hrSe hberim : oqHo at kobe hihoSeh oHrb hroH Shia dbr halhim : ohtpllo tmid bkl et btplh otHnonim broH oSqdo ohtamzo el cat lhetir tmid bed kl hqdSim : ogm bedi lmen intn li hdbr bptHi pi lhgid bbTHon at sod hbSorh aSr anki zir lh bmosrot : lmen adbr bh bbTHh kaSr mTl eli ldbr : olmen aSr tdeo gm atm at qrti oat meSi hnh at hkl iodie atkm Tokiqos haH hHbib ohmSrt hnamn badnino : aSr lcat SlHtiho alikm lmen tdeo at qrtino olmen inHm at lbbkm : hSlom laHim ohahbh em hamonh mat halhim hab omat hadon ihoSe hmSiH : hHsd em kl hahbim at adnino ihoSe hmSiH bahbh aSr la tklh amn :

al-hpilipiim

1

polos oTimotios ebdi hmSiH ihoSe al kl hqdSim bmSiH ihoSe aSr hm bpilpi em hpqidim ohSmSim : Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : aodh lalhi mdi ckri atkm : otmid bkl tploti atHnn bSmHh bed klkm : el htHbrotkm al hbSorh lmn hiom hraSon oed hnh : obTH ani ki hmtHil bkm hmeSh hTob gm igmrno ed iom ihoSe hmSiH : kaSr raoi li lHSb kkh el klkm bebor Sati atkm blbbi bmosri obhzdiqi obHcqi at hbSorh baSr klkm Hbri bHsd : ki halhim li led aSr lklkm nkspti bahbt ihoSe hmSiH : oel cat mtpll anki ki trbh otgdl ahbtkm bhSkl obkl det : lmen tbHno at hmbHrot ohiitm ckim obli mkSol ed iom hmSiH : mlaim pri hzdqh el idi ihoSe hmSiH lkbod alhim othlto : ohnni modie atkm aHi ki aSr mzatni hith ak litron hbSorh : ed aSr nglo mosroti bmSiH bkl Ser hmlk olkl hnSarim : orb haHim badnino hosipo amz bmosroti ohtHcqo iotr blbbm ldbr at hdbr bli pHd : hn iS mgidim at hmSiH mqnah orib oiS mgidim bkonh Tobh : alh mmribh mgidim at hmSiH la blb Thor ki HSbim lhosip zrh el mosri : oalh mahbh baSr hm ideim ki nton anki lhzdiq at hbSorh : ak mh bkk hla bkl aopn am belilh ao bamt igd hmSiH oani hnni SmH bcat ogm aSmH : ki iode ani Sthih li cat lihoSeh btpltkm obecrt roH ihoSe hmSiH : oaoHil oaqoh Sla aboS bkl dbr ki am bkl bTHon kaSr mac kn gm eth itgdl hmSiH bgopi am bHii am bmoti : ki hmSiH hoa Hii ohmot roH li : aolm am lHiot bbSr eod iosip li pri emli ain li lhgid bmh abHr : ki mSok ani mn hSnim npSi aoth lhpTr olhiot em hmSiH ki ch hmbHr : abl lemd eod bbSr zrik itr beborkm : oani bTH oide ki aotr oaemd em klkm iHd lamz atkm olhgdil SmHt amontkm : lmen trbh el idi thltkm bmSiH ihoSe bSobi lboa alikm : rq Htnhgo kraoi lbSort hmSiH lmen aSme elikm am bboai lraotkm am bhioti rHoq ki qimim atm broH aHt oecrim ati bnpS aHt lhlHm bed amont hbSorh : oainkm Hrdim maomh mpni hmtqommim aSr cat lhm aot labdm olkm lihoSetkm omat halhim hia : ki ntn lkm bed hmSiH la lbd lhamin bo ki am gm lhtenot bedo : ki gm lkm hmlHmh aSr raitm bi oaSr eth Smeim atm eli :

2

lkn am iS tokHh bmSiH am tnHomot hahbh am htHbrot hroH am rHmim oHmlh : hSlimo na at SmHti bhiot lkm lb aHd oahbh aHt onpS aHt orzon aHd : ola teSo dbr bdrk mribh ao kbod Soa ki am bSplot roH tHSbo aiS at reho iotr mezmo : kl aHd al idag laSr lo lbdo ki am gm laSr lHbro : ki hroH hhia aSr hith bmSiH thi gm bkm : aSr ap ki hih bdmot halhim la HSb lo lSll hioto Soh lalhim : ki am hpSiT at ezmo oilbS dmot ebd oidmh lbni adm oimza btkonto kbn adm : oiSpl at npSo oikne ed mot ed mitt hzlibh : el kn gm halhim hgbiho mad oitn lo Sm nelh el kl Sm : lmen aSr bSm ihoSe tkre kl brk aSr bSmim obarz omtHt larz : okl lSon todh ki adon hoa ihoSe hmSiH lkbod alhim hab : lkn Hbibi kaSr Smetm li bkl et kn la lbd bhioti emkm ki eod itr eth aSr ani rHoq mkm tigeo btSoet npStikm birah obredh : ki halhim hoa hpel bkm gm lHpz gm lpel kpi rzono : eSo kl dbr bla tlnot obla mcmot : lmen thio nqiim oThorim bni alhim la mom bm btok dor eqS optltl aSr tairo binihm kmaort beolm : mHciqim bdbr hHiim lthlh li biom hmSiH aSr la lHnm rzti ola lriq igeti : abl am gm ask el cbH amontkm oebodth hnni SmH ogm SS em klkm : okkh SmHo ap atm oSiSo emdi : oqoiti bihoSe adnino lSlH bmhrh alikm at Timotios lmen tnoH deti bhode li dbr memdkm : ki colto ain ati aiS klbbi aSr blb Slm idag lkm : ki klm at aSr lhm idrSo ola at aSr lihoSe hmSiH : oaoto idetm ki bHon hoa aSr kbn hebd at abio kn hih ati bebodt hbSorh : oato aqoh lSlH alikm mhr kaSr arah mh ihih li : obTHti badnino aSr gm anki aboa alikm bmhrh : oaHSb mn hzrk lSlH alikm at approdiTos aHi oecri oHbri bzba ohoa SliHkm omSrti bzrki : ien hioto nksp lklkm onezb mad el aSr Smetm ki Hlh : amnm Hlh Hlh ogm nTh lmot abl halhim rHm elio ola elio blbd ki gm eli rHm Sla iboa eli igon el igon : lkn mhrti lSlHo alikm lmen traho otSobo lSmoH ogm imeT igoni : el kn qblho badnino bkl SmHh ohoqiroT anSim kmho : ki bebor meSh hmSiH hgie ed mot otql npSo beinio lmen imla at aSr Hsrtm bSrtkm aoti :

3

obkn aHi SmHo badnino hn lktb olSnot kcat alikm eli ainno lTrH olkm hoa lHcoq : hchro mn hklbim hchro mn hpelim hreim hchro mn hHtok : ki anHno bni hmilh hebdim at halhim broH omtparim bmSiH ihoSe oainno bTHim bbSr : ap ki gm li iS lbTH bbSr oam iHSb aiS Siokl lbTH bbSr hnh ani iotr mmno : aSr ani nmol bn Smont imim mbni iSral mSbT bnimin ebri mn hebrim : lpi htorh proS bqnati rdp at hedh olpi zdqt htorh bli Smz : ak hitrnot halh kln HSbti li lHsrnot lmen hmSiH : ogm eodni HSb at kln lHsron lemt melt idiet ihoSe hmSiH adni aSr beboro Hsrti at npSi mkl alh oaHSbm lsHi lhroiH at hmSiH olhmza bo : ola thih li zdqti mtok htorh ki am bamont hmSiH hzdqh hbah mat halhim bamonh : ldet ato oat gbort tHito ohtHbrot enoiio olhdmot lmoto : lhgie am aokl al tHit hmtim : la kalo hSgti kbr ao kalo hSlmti abl ardp aoli aSig kaSr gm hSigni hmSiH ihoSe : aHi ainni HSb ki kbr hSgti ak aHt dbrti ki SkH ani at aSr maHri oaStTH al aSr lpni : oardp at mTrt Skr hnzHon aSr hoa bqriah Sl melh mat halhim bmSiH ihoSe : lkn mi Shoa Slm bno kn iHSb oam tHSbo mHSbh aHrt gm cat iglh lkm halhim : rq nthlkh baSr hgeno edih bmegl aHd iblb aHd : aHi hio Hbrim lhlkim aHri ohbiTo al hmthlkim kn kaSr anHno mopt lkm : ki rbim hmthlkim kn kaSr anHno mopt lkm : ki rbim hmthlkim aSr elihm amrti lkm pemim hrbh oeth gm bbki ani amr ki hm aibi zlb hmSiH : aSr aHritm habdon aSr krsm alhihm okbodm bbStm oqrbm hbli Hld : ki acrHotno bSmim hia omSm mHkim anHno lmoSieno adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr iHlip at gop Splotno lhioto domh lgop kbodo kpi kH iklto lkbS hkl tHtio :

4

oeth aHi hHbibim ohHmodim SmHti oeTrt raSi emdo na kn badnino Hbibi : at abhodih ani mchir oat sonTiki ani mchir lhiot lb aHd badnino : oath Hbri hnzmd li bamt ap mmk ani mbqS lhiot lhn lecr aSr igeo emdi el hbSorh em qlimis oem Sar tmki aSr Smotm iHd bspr hHiim : SmHo badnino bkl et oeod hpem amr ani SmHo : enot roHkm tode lkl aiS qrb hoa hadon : al tdago ki am btplh obtHnonim em todh todieo bkl dbr at mSalotikm lalhino : oSlom alhim hnSgb mkl Skl inzr at lbbkm oat mHSbotikm bmSiH ihoSe : obkn aHi kl aSr hoa amt onkbd oiSr oThor oneim oaSr Smeo Tob kl meSh zdq kl meSh SbH el alh tSimo lbbkm : aSr lmdtm oqbltm oSmetm oraitm bi at alh teSo oalhi hSlom ihih emkm : oani SmHti mad badnino ki eth hpem hHlptm kH lhSgiH eli ogm mSgiHim hiitm ed kh ak la elth bidkm : ola mmHsor adbr kn ki lmdti lhstpq bmh SiS li : ideti lenot ap ideti lhotir mHnk ani bkl enin oaopn hn lSbe hn lreb hn lhotir hn lHsr : kl cat aokl becrt hmSiH hnotn kH bqrbi : abl hiTbtm leSot bhtHbrkm ali bzrti : oidetm gm atm pilpiim ki braSit hbSorh kzati mmqdonia la htHbrh li aHt mn hqhlot beSq mSa omtn ki am atm blbd : ki gm btsloniqi SlHtm li at zrki pem oStim : la SabqS at hmtn ak abqS hpri aSr irbh bHSbnkm : oani qblti at hkl oiS li di ohotr oani nmlati riH niHH bqbli midi approdiTos at kl aSr SlHtm cbH erb orzoi lalhim : oalhi hoa imla at kl zrkkm keSr kbodo bmSiH ihoSe : olalhim abino hkbod leolmi eolmim amn : Salo lSlom kl qdoS bmSiH ihoSe haHim aSr emdi Salim lSlomkm : kl hqdSim Salim lSlomkm obiotr alh aSr mbit hqisr : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino em klkm amn :

al-hqolomim

1

polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon alhim oTimotios aHino : al hqdSim ohaHim hnamnim bmSiH aSr hm bqolSa Hsd lkm oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : nodh lalhim abi adnino ihoSe hmSiH bkl et aSr anHno mtpllim bedkm : aHri aSr Smeno amontkm bmSiH ihoSe oahbtkm al kl hqdSim : bebor htqoh hzponh lkm bSmim onodetm lkm mqdm bdbr amt hbSorh : aSr bah alikm ogm lkl heolm otprh otrbh kmo gm btokkm lmn hiom aSr Smetm ohkrtm bamt at Hsd alhim : kaSr lmdtm mn apprs Hbrno hHbib aSr hoa mSrt namn bedkm lmSiH : ohoa gm hodie atno at habtkm broH : bebor cat gm anHno lmn hiom aSr Smenoh la Hdlno lhtpll bedkm olbqS Stmlao det rzon halhim bkl Hkmh otbonh roHnit : lhthlk kTob beini hadon okkl rzono oleSot pri bkl meSh Tob olrbot bdet alhim : lhtHcq bkl kH kgbort kbodo lkl sblnot oark roH em SmHh : oltt todh labino heSh atno raoim lHlq nHlt hqdSim baor : aSr hoa Hlzno mmmSlt hHSk ohebirno lmlkot bn ahbto : aSr iS lno bo hpdion bdmo sliHt hHTaim : ohoa zlm halhim hnelm obkor kl nbra : ki bo nbra kl aSr bSmim oaSr barz kl hnrah okl aSr ainno nrah hn ksaot ommSlot hn Srrot orSiot hkl nbra el idi olmenho : ohoa lpni hkl ohkl qim bo : ohoa raS gop hedh aSr hoa raSit obkor mem hmtim lmen ihih hraSon bkl : ki kn hih hrzon lSkn bo at kl hmloa : olrzot al ezmo at hkl el ido beSoto Slom bdm zlbo el ido hn aSr barz hn aSr bSmim : ogm atm aSr hiitm mlpnim mocrim oaibim bnTot lbbkm aHri hmeSim hreim : eth rzh atkm bgop bSro el idi moto lhemidkm lpnio qdSim obli mom odpi : am temdo misdim onkonim bamonh ola tcoeo mtoHlt hbSorh aSr Smetm oaSr nSmeh lkl hnbra tHt hSmim oani polos hiiti lh lmSrt : eth hnni SmH benoii aSr ani sbl lmenkm oamla at hHsr bisori hmSiH bbSri bed gopo hia hedh : aSr hiiti lh lmSrt kpi pqdt alhim aSr ntnh li elikm lmlat at dbr halhim : at hsod aSr hih nstr meolmim omdor odor oeth nglh lqdoSio : aSr rzh halhim lhodiem ai ch hoa eSr kbod hsod hhoa bgoim ohoa hmSiH aSr bkm aSr hoa tqot hkbod : oaoto mSmieim anHno bhokiHno kl aiS oblmdno kl aiS bkl Hkmh lmen hemid kl aiS Slm bmSiH ihoSe : obcat ap ani eml onlHm kpi pelt kHo hpel bi bgborh :

2

hnni modie atkm gdl hqrb aSr bqrbi el adotikm oel adot anSi lodqia oel kl aSr la rao at pni bbSr : lmen inHmo lbotm onqSro iHd bahbh olkl eSr det nkonh lhSkil sod halhim abino osod hmSiH : aSr zponim bo kl azrot hHkmh ohdet : ocat amr ani lkm lmen aSr la iTeh atkm aiS bSpti Hlqot : ki gm am bbSri ani rHoq mkm hnh broHi ani azlkm oaSmH brati at tkontkm oamz amontkm bmSiH : lkn kaSr qbltm at hmSiH at ihoSe adnino kn gm hthlko bo : mSrSim onbnim bo oqimim bamonh kaSr lmdtm omrbim btodh bh : hchro pn iolik aiS atkm Soll bpilsopih obmdoHi Soa lpi qblt bni hadm oisdot heolm ola el pi hmSiH : ki bo bgopo Skn kl mla halhot obo atm nmlaim : aSr hoa raS kl Srrh oSlTn : obo atm gm nmolim milh Sla bidim bhpSTt gop hbSr hHoTa hia milt hmSiH : ki nqbrtm ato bTbilh ap qmtm ato btHih el idi hamonh bgbort alhim aSr heiro mn hmtim : gm atkm hmtim bpSeim oberlt bSrkm hHih ato bslH lkm at kl pSeikm : oimHq at hSTr hmeid bno bHqtio aSr hih lngdno oiSaho mtokno oitqeho bzlb : oipST at hSrim ohSliTim oitnm bid rmh lraoh bm oiolikm Soll bnpSo : el kn la idin aiS atkm el dbr makl omSqh ao benin hmoedim oraSi HdSim oSbtot : aSr hm zl hdbrim hetidim lba ogopm hoa bmSiH : al ttno laiS leqb atkm el idi Splot roH oebodh mlakim hmhlk bdbrim aSr la rao einio omla roH gaoh el la dbr mSkl bSro : oainno aHc braS aSr mHbr mmno kl hgop omaHc bzirio odbqio igdl gdol alhim : lkn am mtm em hmSiH lisodt heolm lmh tStebdo lHqim kalo edkm Hiim beolm : al taHc al tTem al tge : ohm klm lklion btSmiSm lpi mzot anSim olmodihm : hnraim kein Hkmh bebodh bdoih mlb obSplot roH obenoi hgop Sla khgn rq lhSbie hbSr :

3

lkn am qmtm em hmSiH bqSo at aSr lmelh aSr hmSiH iSb Sm limin halhim : at aSr lmelh ihgh lbbkm la at aSr barz : ki mtm oHiikm zponim em hmSiH balhim : bet hglot hmSiH aSr hoa Hiikm gm atm tglo emo bkbod : el kn tmotto at abrikm barz at hcnot ohTmah ohcmh ohtaot hreot onTot aHri hbze aSr hia ebodt alilim : ki bgll alh ba Hron alhim el bni Hmri : aSr gm atm hlktm bhm mlpnim bHiotkm btokm : ak eth hsiro mkm kl alh at hrgc at hkes at hrSe at hgdop oat dbri nblh mpikm : oal tSqro aiS bemito ki pSTtm at hadm hiSn em pelotio : olbStm at hadm hHdS hmtHdS bdet kzlm brao : aSr ain Sm ioni oihodi ain milh oerlh ain lec osqoti ain ebd obn Horin ki hmSiH hoa hkl obkl : lkn atm kbHiri halhim hqdSim ohHbibim lbSo hmon rHmim ondibot onmikot roH oenoh oark apim : otSao aiS at reho otslHo bhiot lkm rib aiS em aHio kaSr hmSiH slH lkm kn tslHo gm atm : oel kl alh lbSo hahbh hia agdt hSlmot : oiSlT blbbkm Slom halhim aSr nqratm lo bgop aHd ocbHo todh : dbr hadon iSkn bqrbkm bSpe rb bkl Hkmh otlmdo oteorro at npSkm bthlot otSbHot oSirot roHniot oSiro lihoh bneimh blbbkm : okl aSr teSo hn bmlin hn bpel eSo bSm hadon ihoSe ohodo lalhim abino el idi : atn hnSim hknenh lbelikn kraoi badnino : atm hanSim ahbo at nSikm oal ttmrmro alihn : hbnim Smeo al ildikm bkl dbr ki hoa lrzon ladnino : habot al trgico at bnikm pn iHto : hebdim Smeo bkl dbr al adnikm lpi hbSr la bebodh lmrah hein kmbqSi Hn bni adm ki am btm lbb kirai halhim : kl aSr teSo eSo bkl npSkm kmo lihoh ola lbni adm : oidetm ki tqblo mat ihoh gmol hirSh ki at adnino hmSiH ebdim atm : okl eSh eol hoa iSa heol aSr eSh oain Sm mSa pnim :

4

atm hadnim tno lebdikm hiSr ohSoh odeo ki gm atm iS lkm adon bSmim : htmido btplh oSqdo bh btodh : ohtpllo gm bedno lmen iptH lno halhim at Ser hdbor lHot at sod hmSiH aSr beboro asor anki : lmen aSr aglh ato kmSpT eli lHot : hthlko bHkmh em aSr bHoz ohoqiro at het : dbrikm ihio neimim bkl et ommlHim bmlH lmen tdeo lhSib dbr lkl adm : at kl hqrt aoti oidiekm Tokiqos haH hHbib ohmSrt hnamn oebd emiti badon : aSr lcat SlHtiho alikm lmen ide at dbrikm oinHm at lbbkm : em aonisimos haH hnamn ohHbib aSr hoa mkm hmh iodieo atkm at kl dbrino ph : arsTrkos hSboi emi iHd Sal lSlomkm omrqos bn aHot br nba aSr zoitm elio am iboa alikm tqblho : oihoSe hnqra iosTos aSr hm mn hmolim alh lbdm mn hecrim lmlkot halhim hio li lnHmh : apprs aSr hoa mkm Sal lSlomkm mSrt hmSiH hnabq bedkm btpltio bkl et lmen temdo Slmim omlaim det bkl rzon alhim : ki meid ani elio ki qnah gdolh hoa mqna lkm olanSi lodqia olanSi hirpolis : loqs hropa hHbib odims Salim lSlomkm : Salo lSlom haHim aSr blodqia olSlom nomps ohqhlh aSr bbito : oaHri qram at hagrt hcat lpnikm eSo Stqra gm bqhl lodqiim oat aSr llodqia tqraoh gm atm : oamro al arkpos Sit lbk lebodh aSr qblth badon lmen tmlanh : Salt hSlom midi ani polos ckro at mosri hHsd emkm amn :

hraSonh al-htsloniqim

1

polos oslonos oTimotios al qhlt htsloniqim balhim hab obadon ihoSe hmSiH Hsd lkm oSlom mat alhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : nodh lalhim el klkm bkl et bhckir atkm btplotino : bckrno tmid lpni halhim abino at pel amontkm oigiet ahbtkm osblnot tqotkm ladnino ihoSe hmSiH : ki ideno aHi Hbibi halhim at aSr nbHrtm : baSr bSortno la hith lkm bdbor lbd ki gm bgborh obroH hqdS obdet namnh mad kaSr idetm gm atm at aSr hiino btokkm lmenkm : oatm hiitm hlkim beqbotino obeqbot adnino bqblkm at hdbr btok eni rb em Hdot roH hqdS : ed hiotkm mopt lkl hmaminim aSr bmqdonia obakia : ki matkm nSme qol dbr ihoh la lbd bmqdonia oakia ki am bkl mqom izah amontkm balhim ed Sain lno zrk ldbr dbr : ki pihm hmspr mh hih mboano alikm oaik pnitm mebodt alilim oSbtm lalhim lebd at al Hi oamti : olHkot lbno mn hSmim aSr heiro mn hmtim lihoSe mzilno mn hHron hba :

2

ki atm aHi hnkm ideim at mboano alikm ki la hih lriq : ak aHri aSr enino olHrpot hiino bpilpi kaSr idetm htHcqno balhino lhgid gm lkm at hbSorh bnptolim rbim : ki tokHtno ainnh mtok Teot ogm la mtok Tmah ola brmih : ki am kaSr nHSbno namnim lalhim lhpqid bidno at hbSorh kn ndbr ola kHpzim lhiot rzoim lbni adm ki am lalhim hbHn lbotno : ki meolm la dbrno bSpt Hlqot kaSr idetm ogm la lmen bze bze halhim ed : gm la bqSno mn hadm kbod la mkm ola maHrim ap ki hih lno mqom lhtkbd kSliHi hmSiH : abl hlkno laT btokkm kamnt mpnqt at bnih : obHbbno kkh atkm Hpzno ltt lkm la lbd at bSort halhim ki gm at npStino ien ki hiitm Hbibim elino : hla tckro aHi at igietno oat tlatno aSr hiino emlim lilh oiomm lblti hiot lmSa laiS bbSrno bqrbkm at bSort halhim : edim atm oed halhim ki bqdS obzdq obtmim hiino emkm hmaminim : oatm idetm ki kab at bnio hchrno at kl aHd mkm odbrno el lbo : oned bkm llkt kraoi lpni halhim hqora atkm lmlkoto olkbodo : bebor cat gm nodh tmid lalhim ki atm bqblkm matno dbr Smoet halhim la qbltm aoto kdbr bni adm ki am kmo Shoa bamt kdbr halhim aSr hoa gm pel bkm hmaminim : ki atm aHi hlktm beqbi qhlot halhim aSr barz ihodh bmSiH ihoSe ki sbltm gm atm kalh el idi bni SbTkm kaSr sblo gm hmh el idi hihodim : aSr ap hmito at hadon ihoSe oat nbiaihm oaotno rdpo oainm Tobim beini alhim oaibim lkl adm : hmneim atno mdbr al hgoim ki ioSeo lmen aSr imlao at HTatihm bkl et oiSigm hHron ed lklh : oanHno aHi aHri aSr Sklno atkm lcmn meT bpnim ola blb hStdlno biotr lraot pnikm btSoqh rbh : oel kn Hpzno lboa alikm ani polos pem oStim ohSTn ezrno : ki mi tqotno omi SmHtno oeTrt tpartno hla gm atm lpni adnino ihoSe hmSiH bboao : amnm atm kbodno oSmHtno :

3

oel kn la iklno eod lhtapq onoez lhotr lbdno batins : onSlH at Timotios aHino omSrt halhim oecrno bbSort hmSiH lHcq olhchir atkm el dbr amontkm : Sla imoT aiS bmzoqot halh ki idetm ap atm ki lcat iedno : hla kbd amrno alikm bhiotno azlkm ki etidim anHno lhlHz kaSr gm hih oatm idetm : obebor kn la iklti eod lhtapq oaSlH ldet amontkm ki amrti pn nsh atkm hmnsh ohith lriq igietno : oeth kSob alino Timotios matkm oibSr atno at bSort amontkm oahbtkm oat aSr atm ckrim atno lTobh bkl et onkspim lraot atno kaSr gm anHno nkspim lkm : ac nHmno elikm aHi bkl zrtno olHzno el idi amontkm : ki eth nHih am temdo atm badnino : ki mh nSib lalhim lhodot lo beborkm el kl hSmHh aSr SmHno elikm lpni alhino : lilh oiomm mpilim anHno tHntno lraot at pnikm olhSlim at mHsri amontkm : ohoa halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH iiSr at drkno alikm : oatkm irbh oiotir hadon lahbh aiS at reho olahbh kl adm kaSr gm anHno ahbim atkm : oikonn at lbbkm lhiot tmim bqdSh lpni alhino abino bboa ihoSe hmSiH adnino em kl qdSio :

4

oeod nbqSh mkm aHi onchir atkm badnino ihoSe ki kaSr qbltm matno aik lkm lhthlk olmza Hn beini halhim kn tosipo okn trbo eod : ki idetm at hmzot aSr ntno lkm bSm hadon ihoSe : ki rzon halhim hia qdStkm aSr ttrHqo mn hcnot : oide kl aiS mkm lSmr at klio bqdSh oiqr : ola btaot cmh kdrk hgoim aSr ainm ideim halhim : ola iprz aiS oionh at aHio beSq ki noqm ihoh el kl cat kaSr kbr amrno oheidno lkm : ki la qra aotno halhim lTmah ki am lqdSh : el kn hboch cat la anSim hoa boch ki am at halhim aSr gm Sm bqrbno at roH qdSo : oel ahbt haHim ain zrk lktb alikm hla ap atm lmodi ihoh lahbh aiS at reho : ogm eSim atm kn lkl aHikm aSr bkl mqdonia ak nbqSh mkm aHi aSr tosipo otrbo eod : otStdlo lSbt bnHt oteSo aiS mlakto beml idikm kaSr zoino atkm : lmen ttnhgo khgn em aSr bHoz ola tzTrko ladm : oel dbr hiSnim aHi la nkHd mkm dbr lmen la tezbo kaHrim aSr ain lhm tqoh : ki am namin aSr mt ihoSe oiHi kn ibia halhim el idi ihoSe gm at hiSnim ato : ki at cat namr lkm bdbr ihoh ki anHno hHiim hnotrim ed ba hadon la nqdm at hiSnim : ki hoa hadon ird mn hSmim btroeh bqol Sr hmlakim obSopr alhim oac iqomo raSonh hmtim bmSiH : aHri kn anHno hHiim hnSarim nlqH atm iHdo bennim lqrat hadon lrqie obkn nhih tmid em hadon : lkn nHmo ch at ch bdbrim halh :

5

oel dbr hetim ohcmnim ain zrk lktb alikm aHi : hla ap atm idetm hiTb ki iom ihoh kgnb blilh kn boa iboa : ki bet amrm Slom oSloh iba elihm hSbr ptam kHblim el hhrh ola ioklo lhmlT : abl atm aHi ainkm bHSk SiSig atkm hiom kgnb : atm klkm bni haor obni hiom la bni hlilh anHno ola bni hHSk : lkn al na nrdm kmo haHrim ki am nSqd onncr : ki hnrdmim hm blilh nrdmim ohmStkrim mStkrim blilh : oanHno bni hiom nncrh na onlbS at Srion hamonh ohahbh okkobe at tqot hihoSeh : ien aSr la iedno halhim lHron ki am lnHl at hihoSeh el idi adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr mt bedno lmen am nSqd oam niSn Hih nHih emo iHd : el kn nHmo ch at ch obno aiS at aHio kaSr gm eSitm : ohnno mbqSim mkm aHi lhkir at hemlim bkm oaSr hm nzbim elikm badon omokiHim atkm : aSr tnhgo bm kbod ed lmelh bahbh lmen peltm oihi Slom binikm : ohnno mchirim atkm aHi hokiHo at hsorrim amzo at rki hlbb tmko at hHlSim ohariko roH al kl adm : orao pn iSlm aiS laiS reh tHt reh ki am rdpo bkl et at hTob hn laiS aiS mkm hn lkl adm : hio SmHim bkl et : htmido btplh : hodo el hkl ki ch rzon halhim alikm bmSiH ihoSe : at hroH la tkbo : at hnboaot la tmaso : bHno kl dbr obTob aHco : htrHqo mkl hdomh lre : ohoa alhi hSlom iqdS atkm qdSh Slmh okl roHkm onpSkm ogopkm iSmr tmim bboa adnino ihoSe hmSiH : namn hqora atkm aSr gm ieSh : aHi htpllo bedno : Salo lSlom kl haHim bnSiqh hqdSh : hnni mSbiekm badon Stqra hagrt hcat bacni kl haHim hqdSim : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino emkm amn :

hSniih al-htsloniqim

1

polos oslonos oTimotios al qhlt htsloniqim balhim abino obadnino ihoSe hmSiH : Hsd lkm oSlom mat alhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : Hibim anHno lhodot bkl et lalhim elikm aHi kraoi ki amontkm gdlh mad orbh ahbt klkm aiS lreho : ed ki nthll bkm ap anHno bqhlot alhim el sblnotkm oel amontkm bkl hrdipot obkl hlHz aSr sbltm : laot zdqt mSpT alhim lmen tmzao raoim lmlkot halhim aSr beborh gm teno : baSr zdiq halhim lgml lHz llHzikm : olkm hnlHzim roHh atno iHd bhglot hadon ihoSe mn hSmim em mlaki eco : baS lhbh lhSib nqm laSr la ideo at halhim ola Smeo lbSort adnino ihoSe hmSiH : aSr iSao mSpT abdn eolm mat pni hadon omhdr gaono : bbao biom hhoa lhkbd bqdSio olhtpla bkl hmaminim ki hamntm ledotno alikm : lkn gm ntpll bedkm bkl et aSr itn atkm alhino raoim al aSr atm mqraim oimla bec kl Hpzkm bTob okl meSh amontkm : lmen ikbd bkm Sm ihoSe adnino oatm tkbdo bo el pi Hsd alhino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH :

2
