ohnno mbqSim mkm aHi el adot biat adnino ihoSe hmSiH oasiptno alio : aSr la tTrp detkm ptam oaSr la tbhlo la broH ola bdbor ola bagrt kmo SloHh matno kalo hgie iom hmSiH : al iteh atkm aiS bSom aopn ki la iba bTrm ihih braSonh hmrd onglh aiS hHTah bn habdon : hmtqomm ohmtromm el kl hnqra al ao ebodh ed ki gm iSb bhikl halhim kalhim omrah at ezmo ki alhim hoa : hla tckro ki beod hioti atkm dbrti alh alikm : oeth idetm mh Simneho mlhglot beto : ki sod hrSe kbr hHl lpel rq Siosr mtok hmne ed kh : oac iglh hrSe aSr imitno hadon broH Sptio oiSbitno bhopet biato : at aSr iboa kHcqt hSTn brb kH obatot obmopti Sqr : obkl mrmt aon babdim tHt aSr la qblo at ahbt hamt lhoSe : obebor cat iSlH lhm halhim mdoHi Soa lhamin bSqr : lmen idono bl aSr la hamino bamt ki am rzo beolh : abl anHno Hibim lhodot lalhim bkl et beborkm aHi Hbibi hadon aSr halhim bHr bkm mraSit lihoSeh bqdoS hroH obamont hamt : lcat qra atkm bbSortno lnHlt kbod adnino ihoSe hmSiH : lkn aHi emdo ohHciqo bqblot aSr lmdtm am bdbrno am bagrtno : ohoa adnino ihoSe hmSiH oalhino abino aSr ahb atno oitn lno bHsdo nHmt eolm otqoh Tobh : hoa inHm at lbbkm oikonn atkm bkl dbr omeSh Tob :

3

oeod aHi htpllo bedno aSr iroz dbr ihoh oikbd kmo gm bqrbkm : oaSr nnzl mn hanSim hteim ohreim ki la lkl adm hamonh : abl namn hoa hadon aSr iHcq atkm oiSmrkm mn hre : oanHno bToHim elikm badnino ki teSo ogm tosipo leSot at aSr nzoh : ohadon hoa iiSr at lbbkm lahbt halhim olsblnot hmSiH : ohnno mzoim atkm aHim bSm adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr tbdlo mkl aH meqS drkio oainno mthlk el pi hqblh aSr qbl matno : hla idetm ap atm aik elikm lhthlk kmno ki la nhgno drk meot btokkm : gm la aklno lHm aiS Hnm ki bigieh otlah lilh oiomm hiino emlim lblti hiot laiS mkm lmSa : la bebor Sain lno hrSot lcat ki am ltt atno lkm lmopt llkt beqbotino : ki gm bhiotno azlkm zoino atkm lamr mi Sla irzh lebd gm akol la iakl : ki Smeno SiS bkm anSim hmeqSim at drkihm oainm ebdim maomh omblim imihm bhblim : oanSim kalh nzoh aotm onbqS mhm badnino ihoSe hmSiH lebd bnHt lmen iaklo at lHmm : oatm aHi al tlao beSot hTob : oam la iSme aiS al dbrno bagrt hcat ato trSmo lkm oal tterbo emo lmen iboS : ak la kaib tHSbho ki am tokiHho kaH : ohoa adon hSlom hoa itn lkm at hSlom tmid obkl pnim : ihi hadon em klkm : Salt hSlom midi ani polos ohia haot bkl hagrot kn anki ktb : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino em klkm amn :

hraSonh al-Timotiom

1

polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH kmzot halhim moSieno ohadon ihoSe hmSiH tqotno : al Timotios bno hamti bamonh Hsd orHmim oSlom mat alhim abino ohmSiH ihoSe adnino : hnh blkti lmqdonia bqSti mmk lSbt bapsos lmen tchir mqzt anSim Sla ioro torh crh : ola iSimo lbm lhgdot ollmodi toldot ain qz hmbiaim iotr lSalot mlbnot bit alhim bamonh : ki tklit hmzoh hia hahbh blb Thor obroH Tobh obamonh la zboeh : iS aSr teo mmnh oipno aHri lmodi tho : bHSbm lhiot mori torh oainm mbinim mh hm amrim omh hm mHliTim : abl ideno ki htorh Tobh hia am itnhg bh hadm ktorh : bdeto cat ki Hq la hoSm bebor hzdiq ala bebor hsorrim ohmrdim hrSeim ohHTaim eSi cmh onblh mki ab omki am omrzHim : ocnim oSkbim at ckr ognbi npS okcbim onSbeim lSqr okl meSh hpk mn hlqH hbria : kpi bSort kbod hal hmbrk aSr pqdh eli : ohnni modh lihoSe hmSiH adnino hmacrni Hil ki HSbni namn oiSimni lmSrt lo : ati aSr mlpnim hiiti mgdp omrdp omHrp abl rHmti ki eSiti mbli det bain amonh : oigdl eli bmad mad Hsd adnino em hamonh ohahbh bmSiH ihoSe : namn hdbr oraoi lhtqbl el kl ki hmSiH ihoSe ba leolm lhoSie at hHTaim aSr anki hgdol bhm : obebor cat rHmti lmen aSr irah ihoSe hmSiH bi braSonh at kl ark roHo lhioti lmopt lkl aSr ibao lhamin bo lHii eolm : olmlk eolmim lalhim hqim led ohnelm mein ohHkm lbdo lo hkbod ohhdr leolmi eolmim amn : at hmzoh hcat ani mzok bni Timotios kpi hnboaot hqdmot elik StlHm lpihn hmlHmh hTobh : laHc bamonh obroH hTobh aSr iS masim bh otSbr anit amontm : omhm homnios oalksndr aSr msrtim lSTn lmen iosro lblti gdp eod :

2

oeth qdm kl dbr abqSh mkm lSat tplot otHnonim obqSot otodot bed kl bni adm : bed hmlkim okl hSliTim lmen nHih Hii hSqT obTH bkl Hsidot oiSr : ki kn Tob orzoi beini alhim moSieno : aSr Hpzo SioSeo kl bni hadm oigieo lhkrt hamt : ki aHd hoa halhim oaHd hoa hemd bin alhim obin bni adm hoa bn adm hmSiH ihoSe : aSr ntn at npSo kpr bed kl ocat hedot hbah beth : aSr ani hpqdti lh lkroc olSliH amt ani amr bmSiH ola aSqr morh hgoim bamonh obamt : lkn rzoni Sitpllo hanSim bkl mqom oiSao idihm qdS bli kes omdon : okn gm hnSim ttipinh btlbSt nah em bSt pnim oznieot la bmHlpot hraS la bchb la bpninim ola bmlboSim iqrim : ala kmo Shoa hgon lnSim aSr bHro lhn irat alhim bmeSim Tobim : haSh tlmd domm bkl hkneh : oainni ntn rSot laSh llmd ap la lhtnSa el haiS ala tdom : ki adm nozr braSonh oaHrio Hoh : oadm la npth ki haSh Smeh lqol hmSia otba lidi ebrh : abl toSe bldth bnim am temdnh bamonh obahbh obqdSh em hznieot :

3

amt hdbr aiS ki ibqS lo pqidot hoa mtaoh meSh Tob : opqid hedh zrik lhiot aiS aSr ain bo dpi bel aSh aHt mSl broHo znoe onHmd lbriot mknis arHim ombin llmd ola ahb iin ola noH lhkot ola bze bze re : ki am dn lkp ckot ola bel qTTh ola ahb ksp : oihi mnhig at bito bTob omdrik at bnio lmSmeto bkl hiSr : ki am la ide aiS lhnhig at bito aikkh iokl ldag ledt alhim : oal ihi tlmid hdS lmen la irhb lbo oipl bdin hmSTin : ohoa gm zrik lSm Tob bpi alh aSr bHoz pn ipl bHrph obmoqS hmSTin : okn gm hSmSim ihio iSrim ola mHliqi lSon ola ahbim sba iin ola nTim aHri bze re : ki am iSmro at sod hamonh broH Thorh : ogm alh ibHno braSonh oaHr kn iSmSo am ain bhm dpi : okkh hnSim thiinh iSrot ola mlSinot mSlot broHn onamnot bkl : hSmSim ihio kl aHd bel aSh aHt omnhlim bTob at bnihm oat btihm : ki hmSmSim hiTb iqno lezmm melh Tobh obTHon rb bamont hmSiH ihoSe : cat ani ktb alik oaqoh lba alik bmhrh : oam aHr hnh tde aik lhtnhg bbit halhim Shia edt alhim Hiim emod hamt omkonh : obodi gdol sod hHsidot alhim nglh bbSr nzdq broH nrah lmlakim hgd bgoim ntqbl bamonh beolm nelh bkbod :

4

abl hroH amr bproS ki baHrit himim ihio anSim aSr isoro mn hamonh bpnotm al hroHot hmTeot oal tort hSdim : dbri Sqrim bHnph onkoim hm bmdet : asrim lqHt aSh omneim mmini makl aSr bram halhim Siaklot btodh hmaminim oidei hamt : ki kl briat alhim Tobh hia oain dbr mSqz am iakl btodh : ki iqdS bdbr alhim obtplh : am tSim kcat lpni aHik mSrt Tob thih lihoSe hmSiH mgdl bdbri hamonh oblqH hTob aSr dbqt aHrio : ak htrHq mhgdot psolot oblot ohrgl ezmk bHsidot : ki hrgl hgop ioeil meT abl hHsidot toeil lkl dbr oiS lh hbTHt Hii heolm hch oheolm hba : namn hdbr hch oraoi el kl lhtqbl : ki lcat anHno gm igeim gm nelbim el aSr hoHlno lalhim Hiim Shoa hmoSie lkl hadm obiotr lmaminim : at cat tzoh otlmd : al iboc aiS at bHorotik ak hih mopt lmaminim bdbor bmeSh bahbh broH bamonh obThrh : ohih Sqod lqrot olhokiH olhort ed ki aboa : oal tql beinik mtnt hHsd aSr bk hntonh lk bnboah em smikt idi hcqnim : lalh tSit lbk obhm hih lmen trah hzlHtk lkl : Sit lbk lnpSk olhorah ohHcq bch ki beSotk kn toSie at npSk oat npS hSmeim alik :

5

al tger bcqn ki am tchirno kab lk oat hzeirim kaHim : at hcqnot kamot oat hzeirot kaHiot obkl Thrh : kbd at halmnot aSr bamt almnot hnh : oki ihio lalmnh bnim ao bni bnim hm ilmdo lraSonh leSot Hsd em bitm olSlm gmol labotm ki ch hoa Tob orzoi lpni halhim : abl halmnh bamt aSr nSarh iHidh Smh alhim mbTHh omtmdt btplot obtHnot lilh oiomm : ak hmengh mth hia bHiih : ocat tzoh lmen thiinh bla dpi : abl mi Sla iprns at qrobio obiotr at bni bito kpr bamonh ohoa groe maSr ainno mamin : almnh al tbHr colti bt SSim Snh oaSr hith aSt aiS aHd : oiS lh edot el meSih hTobim Sgdlh bnim ohknish arHim irHzh at rgli hqdSim otmkh at heSoqim ordph kl meSh Tob : abl halmnot hzeirot al tqbl ki bhTot izrn at lbn mn hmSiH HSqot hn lhiot laiS : odinn elihn ki bgdo bamontn hraSonh : oeod bhiotn ezlot lmdo lSoTT mbit lbit ola lbd ezlot ki ap mpTpTot ordpot aHr HdSot omdbrot at aSr la itkn : el kn rzoni ki hzeirot thiinh laiS lldt bnim olhnhig at btihn ola ltt laib tanh lHrp : ki iS mhn aSr kbr sro aHri hSTn : bn amonh ao bt amonh SiS lhm almnot iecro atn ola thiinh lmSa el hqhl kdi Siokl lhspiq lalh aSr hnh almnot bamt : hcqnim hmiTibim lnhl raoim hm lmSnh kbod obiotr hemlim bdbr obhorah : ki hktob amr la tHsm Sor bdiSo oeod namr hpel Soh bSkro : al tqbl STnh el hcqn blti am el pi Snim ao SlSh edim : at hHTaim tokiH bpni kl lmen iirao gm haHrim : hnni meid bk ngd halhim oadnino ihoSe hmSiH ongd bHiri hmlakim aSr Smor tSmr at cat bli mSpT nmhr ola teSh dbr bmSa pnim : al thi nmhr bsmikt idik el adm ola tSttp lHTat aHrim Smr at npSk bThrh : al trbh lStot eod mim ki am qH meT iin bebor bTnk oaSr pemim rbot Hlh ath : iS bni adm aSr HTatihm gloiot omqdimot ldin oiS mhm aSr hnh hlkot aHrihm : okkh gm hmeSim hTobim gloim hmh oaSr ainm kn la ioklo lhstr :

6

kl aSr hm tHt el hebdot iHSbo at adnihm raoim lkl kbod lmen la iHll Sm halhim ohlqH : oalh aSr adnihm bni amonh al iqlo atm el hiotm aHim ki am iebdom biotr bebor ki maminim oahobim hm hmStdlim lgml Hsd at cat tlmd otzoh : haiS aSr iorh torh aHrt ola iemd bdbrim hbriaim Sl adnino ihoSe hmSiH oblqH hHsidot : npSo eplh ola ide maomh ki am Hlh hoa bSalot omHlqot mlim hmbiaim lidi qnah omribh ogdopim oHSd re : okoHi hbl Sl anSim nSHti det omHsri amt hSmim at hHsidot ldbr bze sor manSim kalh : oap amnm itron gdol hia hHsidot em lb SmH bgorlo : ki la hbano maomh leolm bidoe Sgm la nokl lhozia mmno maomh : oel kn am iS lno mcon oksot nstpqh bhm : abl hmbqSim lheSir iplo bnsion obmoqSim obrb taot sblot omSHitot hmSqieot at hadm bSHt obabdon : ki SrS kl hreot ahbt hksp oiS aSr ergo lo oisoro mn hamonh oiezibo at npSm bmkabim rbim : oath aiS halhim brH lk malh ordp zdqh oHsidot oamonh oahbh osblnot oenoh : hlHm hmlHmh hTobh Sl hamonh oaHc Hii eolmim aSr nqrat lhm ohodit hodah iph bpni edim rbim : hnni mzok ngd halhim hmHih at kl ongd hmSiH ihoSe aSr heid hhodah hiph lpni pnTios pilTos : ki Smor tSmr at hmzoh bain Smz odpi ed hopet hmSiH ihoSe adnino : aSr iranh beth hmbrk ohSliT lbdo mlk hmlkim oadni hadnim : aSr hoa lbdo Hi oqim ohoa hdr baor nSgb oaiS la raho ola iokl lraono olo hkbod ogbort eolmim amn : at eSiri heolm hch tzoh Sla irom lbbm gm la ibTHo beSr hbogd ki am balhim Hiim hmspiq lno di ohotr lSbe : oigmlo Tob oieSiro bmeSim Tobim ltt mhonm olecr lcoltm : oiazro lhm aozr lisod Tob letid SiSigo at Hii heolm : ath Timotios Smr at hpqdon ohtrHq mdbri hbl hpsolim omn okoHi hmde hnqra kn bSqr : aSr iS mtparim bo oiteo mn hamonh : hHsd emk amn :

hSniih al-Timotiom

1

polos SliH ihoSe hmSiH brzon halhim lpi hbTHt hHiim aSr bihoSe hmSiH : al Timotios bno hHbib Hsd orHmim oSlom mat alhim abino omat hmSiH ihoSe adnino : modh ani lalhim aSr ani ebd aoto mimi aboti broH Thorh ki tmid ackrk btploti lilh oiomm : onkspti lraotk bckri at dmeotik lmen amla SmHh : ki bati lckr at amontk blti zboeh SSknh kbr bloais cqntk obabniqh amk ombTH ani ki tSkn gm bk : el kn ackirk Steorr at mtnt halhim hntonh lk bsmikt idi : ki halhim la ntn lno roH aimh ki am roH gborh oahbh omosr : lkn al tboS la medot adnino ola mmni asiro ki am tsbl hreot gm ath kmoni el hbSorh kpi kH halhim : aSr hoa hoSieno oqrano bqriah qdoSh la lpi meSino ki am lpi ezto oHsdo hntn lno bmSiH ihoSe lpni imot eolm : oeth nglh bhraot moSieno ihoSe hmSiH aSr bTl at hmot oioza laor el idi hbSorh at hHiim oat aSr ainno eobr : aSr hpqdti lhiot lh kroc oSliH omorh hgoim : obebor cat asbl kalh ola aboS ki iode anki bmi hamnti ombTH anki ki hiklt lo lSmr at pqdoni ed hiom hhoa : hHcq btkont hdbrim hbriaim aSr Smet mmni bamonh obahbh aSr bmSiH ihoSe : Smr at hpqdon hTob becrt roH hqdS hSkn bno : cat ath iode ki pno mmni kl aSr basia obtokm poglos ohrmognis : itn hadon rHmim lbit anisiporos ki pemim rbot hSib at npSi ola boS mmosri : ki am bhioto bromi ige lbqSni ed ki mzani : itn lo hadon lmza rHmim mlpni ihoh biom hhoa orb Sroto aSr Srt bapsos ath idet hiTb :

2

lkn bni htHcq bHsd aSr bmSiH ihoSe : oat aSr Smet mmni bpni edim rbim tpqidno bidi anSim namnim aSr hm kSrim llmd gm at haHrim : osbl hreot kaiS Hil bzba mlHmt ihoSe hmSiH : aiS iza lzba la iterb beSqi hHiim lmen ihih rzoi lSr hzba : ogm am nabq aiS la iktr am la iabq kmSpT : hakr hebd hoa iakl raSonh mpri hadmh : bin baSr ani amr ki hadon itn lk Hkmh bkl dbr : ckor tckr at ihoSe hmSiH hneor mn hmtim aSr hoa mcre dod kpi bSorti : aSr beborh ani nSa reot ed lmosrot keSh eol abl dbr halhim ainno nasr : oel kn asbl at kl lmen hbHirim lmen iSigo gm hmh at htSoeh bmSiH ihoSe em kbod eolmim : namn hdbr hch ki am mtno ato gm ato nHih : am nsbl gm nmlk ato oam nnkr gm hoa inkr atno : am la namin hnh hoa qim bamonto ki lkHS bezmo la iokl : cat hckr lhm ohed lpni hadon Sla leSq bmHlqt mlim aSr la lhoeil rq leot det hSmeim : hih Sqod lhtizb namn lpni alhim okpel aSr la iboS hmHlq el nkon dbr hamt : abl trHq mdbri hbl hpsolim ki iosipo hrbot rSe : oSiHtm krqb takl sbib aSr mhm homnios opiliTos : aSr teo mn hamt bamrm ki tHit hmtim kbr hith oiblblo amont qzt anSim : ak aitn hoa isod halhim och Hotmo ide ihoh at aSr lo oeod isor meol kl hqora at Sm hmSiH : ki bbit gdol la kli chb oksp blbd ala gm Sl ez oSl HrS omhm lkbod omhm lbcion : ohnh am Thr aiS at npSo malh ihih kli lkbod mqdS omoeil lbel hbit mokn lkl meSh Tob : brH lk mtaot hneorim ordp zdq oamonh oahbh oSlom em kl hqraim al ihoh blb Thor : otrHq mn hSalot htplot bain mosr baSr tde ki ak qTTh molidot hnh : oebd hadon la itqoTT ala ihi noH lkl ombin llmd osbln : omisr bnmikot roH at hmtngdim aoli itn halhim blbbm lSob lhkrt hamt : oieiro mmoqSi hSTn aSr zdm bhm lrzono :

3

ocat tde ki baHrit himim ibao etim qSot : ki ihio hanSim ahbi ezmm oahbi bze ohollim ogaim omgdpim ommrim babotm okpoii Tobh ola Hsidim : Hsri ahbh obogdim omlSinim ocollim oakrcim oSnai Tob : omsrim opHcim ogbhi roH ohlkim aHri tenogim iotr maHri halhim : oaSr dmion Hsidot lhm omkHSim bkHh oath sor malh : ki iS bhm hbaim blaT al hbtim oSbim nSim Teonot HTaim onteot btaot Snot : hlmdot tmid oleolm ainn iklot lboa lidiet hamt : ki kmo inis oimbris aSr qmo el mSh kn gm alh mtqommim al hamt anSim aSr nSHth detm onmasim bdbr hamonh : akn la iosipo lhzliH ki Sgeonm iglh lkl kaSr qrh gm at hanSim hhm : abl ath hlkt aHri bhorah obhnhgh obrzon obamonh obark hroH obahbh obsblnot : obrdipot obenoim aSr mzaoni banTiokia obaqonia oblosTra oalh hrdipot sblti omkln hzilni hadon : ogm kl hHpzim lHiot Hii Hsidot bmSiH ihoSe hmh irdpo : oanSim reim oqsmim iosipo srh mteim onteim : abl ath emd bmh Slmdt ohbTHt ki iode ath mi hoa aSr lmdt mmno : omneorik idet at ktbi hqdS hiklim lhHkimk al hihoSeh el idi hamonh bmSiH ihoSe : ki kl hktob nktb broH alhim gm moeil lhort olhokiH oliSr olisr bzdq : lmen aSr ihih aiS halhim tmim omhir lkl meSh Tob :

4

lkn ani meid bk ngd halhim ongd adnino ihoSe hmSiH hba lSpT at hHiim oat hmtim bhopeto obmlkoto : hkrc at hdbr ohtmd bin beto bin Sla beto hokH oger ohchr bkl ark roH ohorah : ki boa tba het aSr la ikilo at hlqH hbria ki am kaot npSm iqbzo lhm morim lSeSei acnim : oiTo acnihm mn hamt oipno al hhgdot : abl ath hih er bkl sbl hreot oeSh mlakt hmbSr omla at Srotk : ki eth ch ask nsk oet pTirti hgieh : hmlHmh hTobh nlHmti at hmrozh hSlmti at hamonh Smrti : ometh Smor li ktr hzdqh aSr biom hhoa itnno li hadon hSpT hzdiq ola li lbdi ki gm lkl ahbi hopeto : HoSh lboa ali bmhrh : ki dims ecbni bahbto at heolm hch oilk lo ltsloniqi oqrisqis hlk lglTia oTiTos ldlmTia : oloqs hoa lbdo emdi qH at mrqos ohbiaho atk ki ioeil li lmad lebodh : at Tokiqos SlHti lapsos : at hmTpHt ShnHti bTroas azl qrpos hbiaho atk bboak oap at hsprim obprT at hmglot Sl qlp : alksndr HrS hnHSt eSh li reot rbot iSlm lo ihoh kmeSio : ogm ath hSmr lk mmno ki mro mrh at dbrino : bhtnzloti hraSonh la hih aiS lecrni ki klm ecboni al iHSb lhm eon : abl hadon hoa ecrni oHcqni lmen tSlm el idi hbSorh oiSmeoh kl hgoim oanzl mpi arih : oizilni hadon mkl meSh re oioSieni al mlkoto SbSmim lo hkbod leolmi eolmim amn : Sal lSlom prisqh oeqils obit anisiporos : arsTos nSar bqorntos oat Tropimos hnHti Holh bmilTos : HoSh lboa lpni hstio aobolos opodis olinos oqlodih ohaHim klm Salim lSlomk : adnino ihoSe hmSiH ihi em roHk hHsd emkm amn :

al-TiTom

1

polos ebd alhim oSliH ihoSe hmSiH lpi amont bHiri alhim odet hamt aSr lHsidot : eli tqot Hii heolm aSr hbTiH lpni imot eolm hal aSr la iSqr : oglh bmoedo at dbro el idi hqriah hmpqdh bidi el pi mzot halhim moSieno : al TiTos bno hamti lpi amonh aHt Hsd orHmim oSlom mat halhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH moSieno : lcat ecbtik bqriTi lmen tSlim at hHsd otSim cqnim bkl eir oeir kaSr zoitik : am imza aiS tm obel aSh aHt oiS lo bnim maminim oain elihm Tent prizot oainm sorrim : ki pqid hedh zrik lhiot aiS tm kskn lalhim la emd el deto ola rgcn ola ahb iin ola bel agrp ola nTh aHri hbze : ki am ihi mknis arHim oahb Tob oznoe ozdiq oqdoS okbS at izro : omHciq bdbr hnamn kpi hhorah lmen ihih bkHo lhchir blqH hbria olhokiH at hmribim : ki iS hrbh mrdim mdbri hbl omtei npS obprT mn hmolim : aSr skor iskr pihm hhpkim btim klm bhorotm dbrim la knim eqb bze : okbr amr aHd mhm nbiam aSr btokm bni qriTi kcbim hm meolm oHiot reot okrSim ezlim : ohedot hcat amt hia obebor kn tokiHm tokHh qSh lmen ihio briaim bamonh : ola iSimo lb al hgdot hihodim oal mzot hanSim hsrim mn hamt : hn hkl Thor lThorim abl lnTmaim olainm maminim ain dbr Thor ki nTmah gm detm gm roHm : amrim hmh ki ideo at halhim obmeSihm koprim bo ki mtebim ommrim hm ola izlHo lkl meSh Tob :

2

oath dbr at hnah llqH hbria : Sihio hcqnim mSlim broHm omkbdim oznoeim obriaim bamonh obahbh obsblnot : okn hcqnot thi hnhgtn kaSr naoh lqdS la thiinh mlSinot ola nkbSot lsboa iin ki am mlmdot Tob : omiSrot at hzeirot lahb at belihn olahb at bnihn : olhiot znoeot oThrot zopiot hlikot bitn oTbot onkneot lbelihn lmen la iHll dbr halhim : kkh tchir gm at hbHorim Sihio znoeim : obkl dbr hih ath lmopt bmeSim Tobim bhorah zroph onhdrh : obdbr bria omom ain bo lmen iboS hmtqomm ola imza ldbr elikm re : hebdim ikneo ladnihm oitrzo lhm bkl dbr ola imro at dbrihm : ola imelo mel ki am irao kl amonh Tobh lmen iparo bkl at lqH alhino moSieno : ki hopie Hsd alhim lhoSie at kl bni hadm : olisr atno aSr nteb hrSe otaot heolm onHih beolm hch bznieot obzdq obHsidot : onHkh ltqoh hmaSrt olhopet kbod alhino hgdol omoSieno ihoSe hmSiH : aSr ntn at npSo bedno lgalno mkl eol olThr lo em sglh hcric bmeSim Tobim : at alh tdbr otchir otokiH bkl Hcqh oaiS al iboc lk :

3

hckr atm lhkne olSme lSrim olSlTonim olhiot nkonim lkl meSh Tob : olblti gdp adm olHdl mrib olhkrie lkp ckot olhtnhg bkl enoh lpni kl adm : ki gm anHno hiino mlpnim Hsri det osorrim otoeim oebdim ltaot oltSoqot Snot omthlkim brSeh oqnah oSnoaim oSnaim aiS at aHio : amnm kaSr nglh nem alhim moSieno orHmnoto al hadm : ac la bgll meSi hzdqh aSr eSino hoSie atno ki am mtok Hsdo el idi Tbilt htoldh hSnih oHdoS roH hqdS : aSr Spk elino lmkbir el idi ihoSe hmSiH moSieno : lmen nzdq bHsdo onirS lpi htqoh at Hii heolmim : namn hoa hdbr orzh ani ki tqim at alh lmen aSr iStdlo hmaminim lalhim leSq bmeSim Tobim eSot kalh Tob hoa omoeil ladm : abl trHq mn hSalot htplot omlmodi toldot omn hqTTot omHlqot benini hHqim ki ain bhn moeil ohbl hnh : oaiS hHolq el hamonh am hokH pem oStim STh melio : ode ki aiS kch aiS thpkot hoa oHoTa bhrSie at npSo : kaSr aSlH alik at arTms ao at Tokiqos tmhr lboa ali lniqplis ki gmrti blbi lSbt Sm bimi hstio : hStdl llot el drkm at cins hmlmd btorh oat apolos lmen la iHsro dbr : oilmdo gm anSi edtno leSq bmeSim Tobim lecr bkl mHsor pn ihio bli pri : kl aSr emdi Salim lSlomk Sal lSlom hahbim atno bamonh hHsd em klkm amn :

al-pilimon

1

polos asir hmSiH ihoSe oTimotios haH al pilimon hHbib ohecr atno : oal apih hahobh oal arkpos Hbr mlHmtino oal hqhlh aSr bbitk : Hsd lkm oSlom mat alhim abino oadnino ihoSe hmSiH : modh ani lalhi bkl et bhckiri atk btploti : aHri Smei ahbtk oamontk aSr bk ladnino ihoSe olkl hqdoSim : lmen aSr tamz htHbrot amontk bdet kl Tob aSr bkm lSm hmSiH : ki SmHh gdolh onHmh iS lno bahbtk baSr hith roHh lmei hqdoSim aHi el idik : lkn ap ki iS li bTHon rb bmSiH lzotk at hraoi lk hnh bHrti lmen hahbh lHlot at pnik : kaSr hnh anki polos aiS cqn oeth gm asir ihoSe hmSiH : abqSh mmk el bni aSr holltio bmosri el anisimos : aSr mlpnim la hoeil lk oeth hoa lhoeil gm lk gm li ohSibtio alik : oath qbl na ato Shoa mei : Hpzti lezr ato azli SiSrtni tHtik bmosrot hbSorh : abl bli rzonk la abiti leSot dbr lmen la thih Tobtk bans ki am bndbh : ki aoli nprd mmk lSeh bebor aSr ihih lk leolm : ometh la kebd ki am lmelh mebd kaH ahob Skn hoa li biotr oap ki lk hn bbSr hn badon : ohnh am tHSbni lHbr lk tqblno kmoni : oam hre lk bdbr ao Hib hoa lk dbr HSbho li : ani polos ktbti bidi ani aSlm ola amr ki ath Hib li gm at npSk : kn aHi ahnh na mmk badon nHm na at mei badon : bbTHoni ki tSme li ktbti alik oiode ani ki teSh iotr mmh Samrti : oem ch gm tkin li bit mlon ki aqoh aSr antn lkm el idi tplotikm : apprs hasor ati bmSiH ihoSe : omrqos oarsTrkos odims oloqs ecri Salim lSlomk : Hsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino em roHkm amn :

al-hebrim

1

halhim aSr dbr mqdm pemim rbot obpnim Snim al abtino bid hnbiaim dbr alino baHrit himim halh bid bno : aSr ntno liorS kl ogm eSh bido at heolmot : ohoa chr kbodo ozlm iSoto onoSa kl bdbr gborto oaHri eSto bnpSo Thrt HTatino iSb limin hgdlh bmromim : oigdl mad mn hmlakim kaSr hSm aSr nHlo iqr hoa mSlhm : ki al mi mn hmlakim amr meolm bni ath ani hiom ildtik oeod ani ahih lo lab ohoa ihih li lbn : obhbiao at hbkor Snit leolm amr ohStHoo lo kl mlakim alhim : hn el hmlakim hoa amr eSh mlakio roHot mSrtio aS lhT : ak el hbn amr ksak alhim eolm oed SbT miSr SbT mlkotk : ahbt zdq otSna rSe el kn mSHk alhim alhik Smn SSon mHbrik : oeod ath adni lpnim harz isdt omeSh idik Smim : hmh iabdo oath temd oklm kbgd iblo : klboS tHlipm oiHlpo oath hoa oSnotik la itmo : oal mi mn hmlakim amr meolm Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : hla hm klm roHot hSrt SloHim lecrh bed hetidim lrSt at hihoSeh :

2

lkn anHno Hibim biotr lhkin lbbno al aSr Smeno pn iloc oiabd mmno : ki am hdbr hnamr el idi hmlakim hih qim okl pSe omri nSa at enSo kmSpT : aik nmlT anHno am la nSim lb ltSoeh gdolh aSr kcat hnamrh mtHlh bpi hadon otqim lno el idi Smeih : ogm alhim heid elih batot obmoptim obgborot Snot obhazil mroH qdSo krzono : ki la tHt id hmlakim St at heolm hba aSr anHno mdbrim elio : ki am kaSr heid hamr bmqom aHd mh anoS ki tckrno obn adm ki tpqdno : otHsrho meT malhim okbod ohdr teTrho otmSilho bmeSi idik : kl Sth tHt rglio hnh baSr St kl tHtio la hSair dbr Sla St tHtio oeth ch la raino edin ki kl hoSt tHtio : abl ihoSe hmHsr meT mmlakim aoto raino meTr bkbod ohdr mpni enoto ed mot lmen aSr iTem bHsd alhim at hmot bed klm : ki nah hih lo aSr hkl lmeno ohkl el ido bhnHto bnim rbim lkbod lhSlim benoim at Sr ihoSetm : ki gm hmqdS gm hmqdSim klm maHd hmh oel kn la boS mqra lhm aHim : bamro asprh Smk laHi btok qhl ahllk : oeod oqoiti lo oeod hnh anki ohildim aSr ntn li ihoh : oien ki hildim klm iHdo bSr odm ap hoa lbS bSr odm kmohm lmen aSr ibTl el idi hmot at aSr lo mmSlt hmot hoa hSTn : olhtir at alh aSr maimt hmot hio ntnim lebdot kl imi Hiihm : ki amnm la bmlakim hHciq ki am bcre abrhm hHciq : el kn hih elio lhdmot laHio bkl dbr lmen aSr ihih khn gdol rHmn onamn benini alhim lkpr el HTat hem : ki baSr hoa bezmo enh ontnsh ikl lecr at hmnsim :

3

lkn aHi hqdoSim Hbrim lqriah Sl melh hbiTo al hSliH okhn hoditno hgdol al hmSiH ihoSe : aSr hoa namn leSho kmo gm mSh bkl bito : ki kbod gdol mmSh nHl ch kaSr bnh hbit HSob iotr mn hbit : ki kl bit iS lo bnh abl bonh kl hoa halhim : ohn mSh namn bkl bito kebd ledot hemdot lhamr : abl hmSiH hoa hbn el bito oanHno bito am nHciq bbTHon obthlt htqoh ola nrpnh ed hqz : lkn kmamr roH hqdS hiom am bqlo tSmeo : al tqSo lbbkm kmribh kiom msh bmdbr : aSr nsoni abotikm bHnoni gm rao peli arbeim Snh : lkn aqoT bdor oamr em tei lbb hm ohm la ideo drki : aSr nSbeti bapi am ibaon al mnoHti : rao eth aHi pn iS baHd mkm lb re oHsr amonh lsor malhim Hiim : ak hokH tokiHo aiS at reho iom iom ed Siqra hiom lmen aSr la iqSh aiS mkm at lbo bmdoHi pSe : ki ntHbrno lmSiH am nHciq braSit hbTHh ola nrpnh ed hqz : kaSr namr hiom am bqlo tSmeo al tqSo lbbkm kmribh : mi apoa alh aSr Smeo oiribo hla kl izai mzrim bid mSh : obmi htqoTT arbeim Snh hla bHTaim aSr nplo pgrihm bmdbr : olmi nSbe lblti ba al mnoHto am la lsorrim : oanHno raim ki la iklo lboa el aSr la hamino :

4

el kn nira na bhmza eod hhbTHh lboa al mnoHto pn irah aiS mkm maHr pemio : ki gm alino bah hbSorh kmo alihm ak la hoeil lhm dbr hSmoeh mpni aSr la hterb bamonh lSmeim : ki bai hmonh anHno hmaminim kmo Samr aSr nSbeti bapi am ibaon al mnoHti ap ki ngmro meSi ihoh met hosd heolm : ki el hiom hSbiei amr bmqom aHd oiSbt biom hSbiei mkl mlakto : obmqom hch amr eod am ibaon al mnoHti : oien ki iS eod mqom lboa alih oaSr htbSro braSonh hmh la bao Sm bebor hmri : lkn hosip lqboe iom bamro hiom el idi dod mqz imim rbim kmo Snamr hiom am bqlo tSmeo al tqSo lbbkm : ki alo ihoSe hniH lhm la hih mdbr aHri cat el iom aHr : el kn nSarh eod mnoHt Sbt lem alhim : ki hba al mnoHto gm hoa Sbt mmlakto kmo halhim mSlo : lkn nSqdh na lboa al hmnoHh hhia lmen aSr la ikSl aiS ohih mmrh kmohm : ki dbr halhim Hi hoa opel gborot oHd mHrb pipiot onkns ed lhbdil bin npS lroH obin hdbqim lmoH obHn mHSbot lbb omcmotio : oain kl nbra nstr mngdo ki hkl HSop ogloi leini bel dbrim Slno : oeth bhiot lno khn raS gdol aSr ebr bSmim hoa ihoSe bn halhim nHciqh bhodatno : ki ain lno khn gdol aSr la iokl lhzTer el Hliino ki am hmnsh bkl kmono ak bli HTa : el kn nqrbh bbTHon al ksa hHsd lSat rHmim olmza Hsd lecrh beth :

5

ki kl khn gdol hlqoH mtok bni adm mpqd hoa bebor bni adm benini alhim lhqrib mnHh ocbH el hHTaim : ohoa ikol lHml el hSggim ohteim bhioto gm hoa idoe Hli : aSr el kn Hib lhqrib el hHTaim gm bed hem gm bed npSo : oat hgdlh hcat la iqH aiS lezmo rq hqroa lh mat halhim kmo ahrn : kn gm hmSiH la kbd at ezmo lhiot khn gdol ki am hamr alio bni ath ani hiom ildtik : kmo Samr gm bmqom aHr ath khn leolm el dbrti mlki zdq : aSr bimi hioto bbSr hqrib tplot otHnonim bzeqh gdolh obdeot lpni mi Sikol lhoSieo mmot oietr lo mpni irato : oap ki hih hbn lmd menoto lSmoe : oaHri aSr hSlm hih mmzia tSoet eolmim lkl Smeio : ohalhim qra lo khn gdol el dbrti mlki zdq : el cat iS lno ldbr hrbh oqSot lbar lkm bmlin ien ki kbdo acnikm : ki tHt aSr hih raoi lkm lpi ark hcmn lhiot mlmdim eth mn hzrk lSob ollmd atkm eqri raSit dbri alhim onzrktm lHlb ola lmakl bria : ki kl aSr maklo Hlb ainno mbin bdbr zdq ki eodno eoll : ak lSlmim hmakl hbria aSr el pi hhrgl iS lhm HoSim mnsim lhbdil bin Tob lre :

6

el kn becb ket raSit dbr hmSiH nebr al hSlmot ola nSob lSit isodi htSobh mmeSi mot ohamonh balhim : otort hTbilot osmikt idim otHit hmtim ohdin hnzHi : oat cat neSh am itn hal : ki alh aSr ngh elihm haor oTemo mmtnt hSmim ontn lhm Hlqm broH hqdS : oTemo at dbr alhim hTob okHot heolm hba oimelo mel : nmneo mhtHdS eod ltSobh ki zlbo lhm mHdS at bn halhim oitnoho lmSl : ki hadmh hSoth at hgSm hird elih lmkbir omoziah eSb Tob lebdih tSa brkh mat halhim : oaSr tozia qoz odrdr nmash hia oqrobh lmarh osoph lhSrp : amnm ididi mbTHim anHno bkm Tbot malh oqrbot lihoSeh ap ki dbrno kcat : ki halhim la ieot zdq lSkH at meSikm oat eml ahbtkm aSr hraitm lSmo SSrtm oeodkm mSrtim at hqdSim : abl Hpzno Skl aHd mkm gm iSqd Sqod lhHciq bSlmot htqoh ed hqz : Sla tezlo ki am tlko beqbot hiorSim bamonh oark roH at hhbTHot : ki bhbTiH alhim at abrhm nSbe bnpSo ien aSr ain gdol mmno lhSbe bo : oiamr ki brk abrkk ohrbh arbh aotk : oihi bharik npSo hSig at hhbTHh : bni hadm iSbeo bgdol mhm ohSboeh lhm qz kl ereor lqiom hdbr : el kn kaSr rzh halhim lhraot biotr at irSi hhbTHh ki la tStnh ezto erb ath bSboeh : lmen el pi Sni dbrim blti mStnim aSr Hlilh lalhim lSqr bm ihih lno aSr nsno elio croc gdol laHc btqoh hntonh lpnino : aSr hia lnpSno leogin nkon oHcq omgie al mbit lprkt : aSr ba Smh ihoSe hebr lpnino oihi khn gdol leolm el dbrti mlki zdq :

7

ki ch mlki zdq mlk Slm khn lal elion aSr iza lqrat abrhm bSobo mhkot at hmlkim oibrkho : oaSr Hlq lo abrhm meSr mkl Smo iprS mlk hzdq oeod mlk Slm hoa mlk hSlom : bain ab bain am bain iHS olimio ain tHlh olHiio ain sop ki am ndmh lbn halhim hoa eomd bkhnto lnzH : rao eth mh gdol hoa aSr gm abrhm abino ntn lo meSr mraSit hSll : hn alh mbni loi aSr nHli at hkhnh iS lhm Hq el pi htorh lqHt at hmeSrot mn hem mn aHihm aSr ap hm izai irk abrhm : oaSr ainno mtiHS lmSpHtm hoa lqH at hmeSr mn abrhm oibrk at aSr hith lo hhbTHh : ohnh nkon hdbr ki hqTn ibrk el idi hgdol mmno : oph bni adm Simoto lqHim at hmeSr abl Sm lqHo mi Shoed elio ki hoa Hi : oitkn lomr ki gm loi hlqH at hmeSrot hih meSr beSr abrhm : ki eod birk hab hih bzat mlki zdq lqrato : el kn alo hith Slmot el idi khnt bni loi aSr bh ntnh htorh lem lmh ch zrik lqom eod khn aHr el dbrti mlki zdq ola iamr el dbrti ahrn : ki bhStnot hkhnh mn hzrk StStnh gm htorh : ki aSr mdbr bo kcat hoa mSbT aHr aSr meolm la Srt aiS mmno at hmcbH : ki gloi lkl aSr adnino crH mihodh mn hSbT aSr mSh la dbr alio dbr el hkhnh : oeod iotr bror hoa am ioqm el dmion mlki zdq khn aHr : aSr ainno el pi Hqt bSr odm ala el pi kH Hiim blti npsqim : ki heid elio ath khn leolm el dbrti mlki zdq : bebor ki hmzoh hqdmt hosrh bhioth HloSh oqzrt id mhoeil : ki htorh la hSlimh dbr ohnh nknsh bmqomh tqoh Tobh mmnh aSr nqrb el idh lalhim : okpi aSr la hith cat bli Sboeh : ki hmh ntkhno bli Sboeh och bSboeh el idi hamr lo nSbe ihoh ola inHm ath khn leolm el dbrti mlki zdq : gm hbrit Tobh oitrh hia aSr ihoSe erb aoth : oSm ntkhno rbim mpni aSr hmot la hniHm lhotr barz : abl ch bemdo leolm iS lo khnh aSr la tebr mmno : aSr el kn iokl gm lhoSie bkl okl at hngSim el ido lalhim ki Hi hoa tmid lhpgie bedm : ki naoh lno khn kch Shoa Hsid otmim oThor onbdl mn hHTaim onSa mhSmim : aSr ainno zrik iom iom kkhnim hgdolim hhm lhqrib braSonh el HTatio oaHri kn el HTat hem ki cat eSh bpem aHt bhqribo at npSo : ki htorh hemidh lkhnim gdolim bni adm HlSim abl dbr hSboeh hbah aHri htorh hemid at hbn hmSlm leolm :

8

och raS hnamrim ki iS lno khn gdol hioSb limin ksa hgborh bSmim : ohoa mSrt hqdS ohmSkn hamti aSr konno adni ola adm : ki kl khn gdol hoa mpqd lhqrib mnHot ocbHim oel kn zrik Sihih gm lch dbr lhqrib : ohnh alo hih barz la hih khn ki iS ph hkhnim hmqribim hqrbnot lpi htorh : omkhnim ldmot ozl hdbrim SbSmim kdbr ihoh al mSh bbao lklot at hmSkn ki amr alio rah oeSh hkl btbnito aSr ath mrah bhr : oeth hoa qbl Srot melh kpi melt hbrit hneSh el ido aSr hoqmh el hbTHot Tbot oitrot : ki alo hith hraSonh hhia tmimh la ibqS mqom lSnih : ki kh amr bhokiH atm hnh imim baim nam ihoh okrti at bit iSral oat bit ihodh brit HdSh : la kbrit aSr krti at abotm biom hHciqi bidm lhoziam marz mzrim aSr hmh hpro at briti oanki bHlti bm nam ihoh : ki cat hbrit aSr akrt at bit iSral aHri himim hhm nam ihoh ntti at torti bqrbm oel lbm aktbnh ohiiti lhm lalhim ohmh ihio li lem : ola ilmdo eod aiS at reho oaiS at aHio lamr deo at ihoh ki kolm ideo aoti lmqTnm oed gdolm : ki aslH leonm olHTatm olpSeihm la ackr eod : hnh bamro brit HdSh iSn at hraSonh omh Shoa noSn omcqin qrob hoa al qzo :

9

hn hih gm lbrit hraSonh mSpTi hebodh omqdS arzi : ki hoqm hmSkn hHizon aSr bo hmnorh ohSlHn omerkt hlHm ohoa nqra qdS : ombit lprkt hSnit mSkn hnqra qdS hqdSim : aSr lo mcbH hchb lqTrt oaron hbrit mzph chb klo obo znznt chb aSr hmn btoko omTh ahrn aSr prH oloHot hbrit : ommel lo krobi hkbod hskkim el hkprt la ndbr ket el kl aHd mhm bprT : oaHri Shokno alh kkh bao hkhnim tmid al hmSkn hHizon lebd Sm at ebodtm : oal hmSkn aSr lpnim mmno ba Smh hkhn hgdol lbdo pem aHt bSnh la bbli dm aSr iqrib bed npSo obed Sggot hem : oroH hqdS modie bcat ki la nglh hdrk al hqdS kl himim aSr hmSkn hHizon iS lo lemd : ohoa mSl el het hhoh aSr bh mqribim mnHot ocbHim aSr la ioklo lhSlim at lbb hebd : ak mSpTi hgop hmh em hmaklot ohmSqim ohTbilot hSnot aSr hoSmo ed et htqon : abl hmSiH bbao lhiot khn gdol lTbot hetidot ebr btok hmSkn hmelh bgdlh oSlmot aSr la neSh bidim klomr aSr ainno bkll hbriah hcat : gm la ba bdm Seirim oeglim ala bdm npSo ba bpem aHt al hqdS pnimh oimza galt eolm : ki am dm hprim ohSeirim oapr hprh aSr ich el hTmaim iqdSm lThrt gopm : ap ki dm hmSiH aSr hqrib at ezmo lalhim broH nzHi obli mom iThr lbbkm mmeSi mot lebd at alhim Hiim : obebor cat hoa gm srsr lbrit HdSh lmen aSr iirSo hmqraim at hbTHt nHlt eolm aHri aSr mt lpdot mn hpSeim aSr neSo tHt hbrit hraSonh : ki bmqom SiS ditiqi zrik ldet mot mqimh : ki rq bmot hmt tkon ditiqi oainnh btqph beod mqimh bHiim : lkn gm hraSonh la Hnkh bla dm : ki kklot mSh lhgid lkl hem at kl hmzot ktorh lqH dm heglim ohSeirim em mim otolet Sni oacob oicrq el hspr oel kl hem : oiamr hnh dm hbrit aSr zoh alhim alikm : okn hch mn hdm el hmSkn oel kl kli hSrt : okmeT hkl iThr bdm el pi htorh oain kprh bli Spikt dm : lkn dmioni hdbrim SbSmim zrikim lhThr balh ohdbrim SbSmim bezmm zrikim lhThr bcbHim Tobim malh : ki hmSiH la ba al hqdS hneSh bidim Shoa rq dmot hamti ki am ba al ezm hSmim lraot eth bedno at pni halhim : ap la lhqrib at npSo pemim rbot kkhn hgdol aSr ba Snh bSnh al hqdS bdm aHrim : ki am kn hoa hla hih lo lenot pemim rbot mraSit heolm oeth bqz hetim nglh bpem aHt kdi lbTl at hHTa bcbH npSo : okaSr ngcr el bni adm pem aHt hmot oaHrio hdin : kn hqrb hmSiH pem aHt lmen Sat HTai rbim opem Snit irah bli HTa lihoSeh lmHkim lo :

10

ki htorh bhiot bh zl hTbot hetidot ola mrah ezm hdbrim ain biklth lhSlim at hqrbim bqrbnot hhm aSr iqribo tmid mdi Snh bSnh : ki lola cat Hdlo mhbiam baSr hmqribim bhThrm pem aHt la hith bhm eod rgSt HTaim : abl iS Sm hckrt hHTaim Snh bSnh : ki dm hprim ohSeirim la iokl lhsir HTaim : obebor cat amr bboao leolm cbH omnHh la Hpzt gop konnt li : eolh oHTah la Salt : ac amrti hnh bati bmglt spr ktob eli leSot rzonk alhi : aHri amro lmelh cbH omnHh eolh oHTah la Hpzt ola Salt aSr iqribo atm el pi htorh : ac amr hnh bati leSot rzonk alhi mebir bch at hraSonh lmen hqim at hSnih : obrzon hch mqdSim anHno el idi hqrbt qrbn gop ihoSe hmSiH bpem aHt : okl khn emd iom iom lSrt omosip pemim rbot lhqrib atn hqrbnot aSr la ioklo leolm lhebir HTaim : aolm ch aHri hqribo cbH aHd el hHTaim iSb ed eolm limin halhim : oHkh iHkh ed ki ioSto aibio hdm lrglio : ki hoa bqrbn aHt hSlim lnzH at hmqdSim : oap roH hqdS meid lno el cat ki aHri amro : cat hbrit aSr akrt atm aHri himim hhm amr ihoh ntti at torti bqrbm oel lbm aktbnh : oleonm olHTatm la ackr eod : ohnh baSr nslHo hHTaim ain eod qrbn elihm : oeth aHi bhiot lno bTHon drk hqdS bdm ihoSe : drk HdS oHi aSr HdS lno bprkt hia bSro : obhiot lno khn gdol el bit alhim : nqrbh na blbb Slm obamonh tmimh mThrim bhcit lbbno mroH reh orHozi bSr bmim Thorim : nHciqh bhodit htqoh bl nmoT ki namn hmbTiH : ontbonnh ch el ch leorr atno lahbh olmeSim Tobim : oal necb at knaitno kmnhg qzt anSim ki am nokiH aiS at aHio obiotr bratkm ki qrob hiom : ki am nHTa bcdon aHri aSr qblno det hamt la iSar eod cbH qrbn lkpr el hHTa : ki am beoti hdin hetid oaS qnah aSr takl at hzrrim : hn aiS ki ipr tort mSh mot imot bli Hmlh el pi Snim edim ao SlSh : mh tHSbo kmh igdl henS hraoi lrms brglo at bn halhim oHSb lHl at dm hbrit aSr hoa mqdS bo omHrp at roH hHsd : ki ideno at hamr li nqm oSlm oeod ki idin ihoh emo : mh nora lnpl bid alhim Hiim : abl ckro na at himim hraSonim ki ac aHri aro einikm nSatm kbd enoim rbim : pem bhiotkm lrai bHrph otogh pem bhSttp laSr hgie alihm kcat : ki hzTertm el mosri ogclt rkoSkm sbltm bSmHh mdetkm bnpSkm SiS lkm bSmim qnin Tob mmno oqim led : lkn al tSliko at bTHonkm ki iS lo Skr rb : ki zrikim atm lsblnot lmen teSo rzon alhim onSatm at hhbTHh : ki eod meT rge ohba iba la iaHr : hzdiq bamonto iHih oam isg aHor la rzth npSi bo : amnm anHno ainno mn hnsogim aHor labdm ki am mn hmaminim lhzlt hnpS :

11

ki hamonh hia Hsn hbTHon bmqoh ohokHt dbrim la nraim : obh nHlo habot edot : bamonh nbin ki heolmot neSo bdbr halhim lmen aSr iza hnrah mn hnelm : bamonh hqrib hbl lalhim cbH Tob mqin aSr hih lo ledot ki zdiq hoa bheid alhim el mnHtio obh eodno mdbr aHri moto : bamonh lqH Hnok lblti raoto hmot oainno ki lqH ato alhim ohoed elio lpni hlqHo ki at halhim hthlk : obli amonh la iokl aiS lhiot rzoi al halhim ki kl hqrb alio zrik lhamin ki iS alhim ogmol hoa mSib ldrSio : bamonh bnh nH birat ihoh at htbh lhzlt bito atri aSr zoh el dbrim la nraim edin oirSe bh at heolm oihi lirS hzdqh eqb hamonh : bamonh Sme abrhm kaSr nqra llkt al harz aSr iirSnh oiza ola ide anh iboa : bamonh hih gr barz hhbTHh kmo bnkrih oiSb bahlim hoa oizHq oieqb aSr irSo emo hhbTHh hhia : ki Hkh leir aSr isodth namnh obonh omkonnh halhim : bamonh Srh gm hia qblh hkH lhcrie otld aHri blth ki HSbh lnamn at hmbTiH : el kn maHd aSr kmeT mt gopo izao kkokbi hSmim lrb okHol el Spt him aSr la ispr : kpi amonh mto kl alh ola hSigo at hhbTHot rq mrHoq rao aotn oibTHo oiSmHo lqratn oiodo ki grim hm otoSbim barz : hla hmdbrim kcat iodieo ki hm mbqSi arz moSb : oam hith detm el harz hhia aSr izao mmnh hla hih bidm lSob alih : akn nkspo lmoSb Tob mmno ohoa bSmim oel kn la boS halhim lhqra alhihm ki hkin lhm eir : bamonh helh abrhm at izHq kaSr nsh oat iHido hqrib hmqbl at hhbTHot : aSr namr lo ki bizHq iqra lk cre : oiHSb blbo ki ikol iokl alhim lhHiot gm at hmtim el kn gm hoSb alio lhiot lmSl : bamonh brk izHq at ieqb oat eSo oidbr el hetidot : bamonh brk ieqb at Sni bni iosp lpni moto oiStHo el raS hmTh : bamonh hckir iosp bqrb qzo at iziat bni iSral oizo el adot ezmotio : bamonh hzpino at mSh abotio SlSh irHim ahri holdo kratm at hild ki Tob hoa ola irao at mzot hmlk : bamonh man mSh kaSr gdl lhqra bn lbt preh : oibHr lsbl at eni em alhim mlhteng lSeh btenogi hHTa : bHSbo at Hrpt hmSiH leSr gdol mazrot mzrim ki hbiT al hgmol : bamonh ecb at arz mzrim ola ira mHmt hmlk ki hih krah aSr ainno nrah oitHcq : bamonh eSh at hpsH ontint hdm lmen aSr la ige hmSHit bbkorihm : bamonh ebro at im sop bibSh aSr nso mzrim gm hmh lebr bo oiTbeo : bamonh nplo Homot iriHo aHri hqipo aotn Sbet imim : bamonh la abdh rHb hconh em hsorrim ki asph at hmrglim al bith bSlom : omh amr eod hn tqzr li het am aspr meSi gdeon obrq oSmSon oiptH odod oSmoal ohnbiaim : aSr bamonh kbSo mmlkot opelo zdq ohSgo hbTHot oskro pi ariot : okbo gbort haS onmlTo mpi hHrb ohtHcqo mHlim oeSo Hil bmlHmh ohpilo mHnot crim : nSim lqHo mtHih at mtihn oaHrim rTSo benoim ola abo lhnzl lmen icko ltHih Tobh mmnh : mhm nso btelolim obmkot ogm nmsro lkbl omsgr : nsqlo babnim nsro bmgrh nbHno bisorim mto lpi Hrb oineo eTopi eort kbSim oecim bHsr obezr reh oigon : aSr heolm la hih kdi lhm hm teo bmdbr obhrim obmerot obnqiqi harz : okl alh ap hith lhm hedot bgll amontm la qblo at hhbTHh : lmen aSr la iSlmo bledino ki zph lno alhim mqdm Tobh itrh :

12

lkn gm anHno aSr enn edim rb kch sbb atno nSlikh mmno kl TrH ohHTa hmqip elino onrozh btoHlt at hmrozh herokh lpnino : onbiTh al ihoSe raS hamonh omSlimh aSr bed hSmHh hSmorh lo sbl at hzlb oibc hHrph oiSb limin ksa halhim : htbonno alio aSr nSa klmt HTaim gdolh kcat lmen la tiepo ola tigeo bnpSotikm : edin la emdtm ed ldm bmlHmtkm em hHTa : otSkHo dbr hnHomim hmdbr alikm kmo al bnim lamr mosr ihoh bni al tmas oal tqz btokHto : ki at aSr iahb ihoh iokiH ikab at bn irzh : am sblim atm mosr deo ki kab em bnio kn mtnhg alhim emkm ki aih hbn aSr abio la iisrno : ak am thio bain mosr aSr hih mnt klm ac mmcrim atm ola bnim : oeod am abot bSrno hio misrim atno onira mhm ap ki nkne lpni abi hroHot onHih : ki hmh isrono kTob beinihm limim meTim abl ch lhoeil lmen ihih lno Hlq bqdSto : okl mosr bet ebro elino ainno SmHh beinino ki am igon aolm baHrito itn pri Slom lzdqh lmlmdim bo : el kn Hcqo idim rpot obrkim kSlot : omegl rglikm plso lmen la tTh hzleh mn hdrk ki am trpa : rdpo at hSlom em kl adm oat hqdSh aSr bledih la irah aiS at hadon : ohchro pn iS bkm aiS mtaHr mHsd alhim pn iogiekm SrS prh lenh oiTmao bo rbim : pn imza bkm cnh ao Hll keSo aSr bncid aHd mkr at bkorto : hla idetm ki gm nmas aHri kn kaSr rzh lrSt at hbrkh ki la mza mqom ltSobh ap bqS aoth bdmeot : ki la batm al hr nmSS ober baS ola al enn oerpl oserh : ola lqol Sopr olqol hdbrim aSr Smeio bqSo Sla iosip ldbr emhm eod : ki la iklo lSat at aSr zoo oam bhmh tge bhr sql tqsl ao irh tirh bHzim : ohmrah hih nora ed mad oiamr mSh igrti oHrdti : ki am batm al hr zion oal eir alhim Hiim al iroSlim SbSmim : oal ezrt rbbot hmlakim oedt hbkorim hktobim bSmim oal alhim SpT hkl oal roHot hzdiqim hnSlmim : oal ihoSe srsr hbrit hHdSh oal dm hhcah hmiTib dbr mdm hbl : lkn rao pn tmano lSme al hmdbr ki hn la nmlTo hmanim lSme al hmdbr emhm barz ap anHno am nman lSme bqol hmdbr mn hSmim : aSr qolo hreiS ac at harz oeth ch hbTiH lamr eod aHt oani mreiS la lbd at harz ki gm at hSmim : oco eod aHt Samr mSmie Hlipt hnreSim aSr hm eSoim lmen iemd aSr ainno nreS : lkn anHno hmqblim mlkot aSr la tmoT nbah na btodh onebd bh at halhim lrzon lo bznieot obirah : ki alhino aS aklh hoa :

13

ahbt haHim temd : hknst arHim al tSkHo ki iS aSr hkniso bh mlakim ola ideo : ckro at hasorim kalo atm asorim emhm oat hnlHzim baSr gm atm bbSr : haiSot tiqr bkl oerS izoekm al iHll at hcnim oat hmnapim idin alhim : rHqo mahbt ksp oSmHo bHlqkm ki hoa amr la arpk ola aecbk : el kn nbTH onamr ihoh li becri la aira mh ieSh li adm : ckro at mnhigikm aSr hgido lkm at dbr halhim bino laHrit drkm olko bamontm : ihoSe hmSiH gm tmol gm hiom hoa hoa ogm leolmim : al tnoeo btorot Snot ocrot ki Tob lkonn lbno bHsd ola benini makl aSr la hoeilo lmthlkim bhm : iS lno mcbH aSr ainm rSaim lakl melio mSrti hmSkn : ki hbhmot aSr hoba dmn bqdS lkprt hHTa el idi hkhn hgdol goitihn nSrpo mHoz lmHnh : bebor cat gm ihoSe lmen qdS bdmo at hem enh mHoz lSer : lkn nzah na alio al mHoz lmHnh onSa at Hrpto : ki ph ain lno eir emdt ki at hetidh anHno mbqSim : lkn nqrib el ido bkl et cbH todh lalhim hia pri Sptim hmodot lSmo : oal tSkHo lgml Hsd oltt labionim ki cbHim kalh ierbo lalhim : Smeo al mnhigikm ohkneo mpnihm ki Sqdim hm el npStikm ketidim ltt HSbon lmen ieSo cat bSmHh ola banHh ki cat la lhoeil lkm : htpllo bedno ki ideno aSr Slmh mHSbtno onHpz llkt drk iSrh bkl : obHcqh abqS mkm leSot cat lmen aoSb alikm bmhrh : oalhi hSlom aSr bdm brit eolm helh mn hmtim at reh hzan hgdol at ihoSe adnino : hoa iSlimkm bkl meSh Tob leSot rzono bpelo bkm at hrzoi lpnio bid ihoSe hmSiH aSr lo hkbod leolmi eolmim amn : oabqS mkm aHi Sao na dbr htokHh ki ktbti alikm bqzrh : odeo ki Timotios aHino iza mbit hasorim ohih am iba bmhrh arah ato at pnikm : Salo lSlom kl mnhigikm olSlom kl hqdSim bni arz aiTlia Salim lSlomkm : hHsd em klkm amn :

ieqb

1

ieqb ebd alhim oadnino ihoSe hmSiH Sal lSlom Snim eSr hSbTim hnpozim : ak lSmHh HSbo lkm aHi kaSr tbao bnsinot Sonim : bdetkm ki bHn amontkm mbia lidi sblnot : ohsblnot Slmh thih bpelh lhiotkm Slmim otmimim ola tHsro kl dbr : oaiS mkm ki iHsr Hkmh ibqSnh malhim hnotn lkl bndibh obain gerh otntn lo : rq ibqS bamonh obbli spq ki bel spq domh lgli him hser ohngrS : ohaiS hhoa al idmh bnpSo ki iSa dbr mat ihoh : aiS aSr Hlq lbo hpkpk hoa bkl drkio : abl haH hSpl ithll brommto : oheSir ithll bSploto ki iebr kziz hHzir : ki crH hSmS bHmto oiibS at hHzir oibl zizo oHsd mraho abd kn ibol heSir bhlikotio : aSri haiS hemd bnsiono ki kaSr nbHn iSa eTrt hHiim aSr hbTiH ihoh lahbio : al iamr hmnsh halhim nsni ki halhim ainno mnsh bre ohoa la insh aiS : ki am insh kl aiS btaot npSo aSr tsitho otptho : oaHri kn hrth htaot otld HTa ohHTa ki nSlm iolid at hmot : al tteo aHi ahobi : kl mtnh Tobh okl mnHh Slmh trd mmel mat abi haorot aSr Hlop okl zl Snoi ain emo : hoa bHpzo ild aotno bdbr hamt lhiotno kmo raSit bkori izorio : el cat aHi ahobi ihi kl aiS mhir lSme qSh ldbr oqSh lkeos : ki kes adm la ipel zdqt alhim : lkn hsiro melikm kl Tnop otrbot reh oqblo benoh at hdbr hnToe bkm aSr ikl lhoSie at npStikm : ohio eSi hdbr ola Smeio lbd lrmot at npSkm : ki haiS aSr rq Sme at hdbr ola eSho nmSl laiS mbiT at tar hoito bmrah : ki hbiT al mraho oilk lo obrge SkH mh taro : abl hmSqip btorh hSlmh tort hHrot omHciq bh aSr ainno Sme oSkH ki am eSh bpel aSri haiS hhoa bmeSho : aiS mkm am idmh lhiot ebd alhim oainno Sm rsn llSno ki am mteh hoa at lbbo ebdto ak lriq thih : cat hebodh hThorh ohbrh lpni halhim abino lbqr at hitomim ohalmnot blHzm olSmr at ezmo nqi mHlat heolm :

2

aHi al ihi mSa pnim bamontkm bihoSe hmSiH adnino adon hkbod : ki am iboa aiS lbit knstkm oTbet chb el idio ohoa lboS lbSi mklol ogm aiS eni iba Smh obgdo mTnp : opnitm al hlboS lbSi mklol oamrtm lo Sb lk hnh bTob oleni tamro emd Sm ao Sb ph mtHt lhdm rgli : hla bcat nHlq lbkm ohnkm SpTim beli mHSbot reot : Smeo aHi ahobi hla benii heolm hch bHr halhim lhiot eSirim bamonh oirSi hmlkot aSr hbTiH lahbio : oatm hklmtm at heni hla heSirim hm heSqim atkm ohm hsHbim atkm al bti din : hla hm hmgdpim at hSm hTob hnqra elikm : hn bqimkm at hmzoh hmlkt el kln kpi hktob oahbt lrek kmok tiTibo leSot : aolm am tSao pnim tHTao bmeSikm ohtorh tokiHkm kebrim aoth : ki aiS aSr iqim at kl htorh onkSl bdbr aHd hoa aSm aSm bklm : ki hamr la tnap gm hoa amr la trzH oam aink nap oath rozH hih nhiit lebr htorh : kn dbro okn eSo kanSim hetidim lhSpT el pi tort hHrot : ki ain Hsd bdin laSr la eSh Hsd ohHsd itgah el hdin : aHi mh ioeil laiS am iamr ki iS lo amonh omeSim ain bo htokl hamonh lhoSieo : aH ao aHot am ihio beirm obHsr lHm iomm : oaiS mkm iamr alihm lko lSlom ohtHmmo oSbeo ola ttno lhm di mHsor gopm mh toeil cat : kkh gm hamonh am ain bh meSim mth hia bezmh : ak iamr aiS ath iS lk amonh oani iS li meSim hrani na at amontk mtok meSik oani arak mtok meSi at amoni : ath mamin ki halhim aHd hoa hTibot gm hSdim maminim bo oredim : oath aiS ber htHpz ldet ki hamonh bbli meSim mth hia : abrhm abino hla bmeSio nzdq bhelto at izHq bno el hmcbH : hnk rah ki hith hamonh ecrt lmeSio omtok hmeSim hSlmh hamonh : oimla hktob hamr ohamn abrhm bihoh otHSb lo lzdqh oiqra ahb ihoh : hnkm raim ki bmeSim izdq haiS ola bamonh lbdh : okn gm rHb hconh hla nzdqh bmeSim basph at hmlakim al bith otSlHm bdrk aHr : ki kaSr hgop bli nSmh mt hoa kn gm hamonh bli meSim mth hia :

3

aHi al ihio rbim mkm lmorim baSr idetm ki bcat nkbid elino at hdin : ki klno mrbim lhkSl oaSr la ikSl bdbor hoa aiS tmim obiklto lSom rsn gm lkl gopo : hnh bpi hsosim nSim at hrsn lmen aSr iSmeo lno onhgno bo at kl goitm : ohnh haniot ap ki gdlot hnh oroHot qSot ihdpom inhg atn mSoT qTn al kl aSr iHpz hHbl kn gm hlSon abr qTn hia ogdlot tdbr : rah mh gdol hier oaS qTnh tbeirno gm hlSon aS hia eolm mla eolh : kn hlSon nzbt bin abrino hmgalt at kl hgop omlhTt at glgl hoitno ohia lhoTh baS gihnm : ki min kl bhmh oeop ormS oHiot him ikbS onkbSim hm el idi min hadm : abl hlSon ain adm ikl lkbSh ain mezor lreh hcat osm hmot mlah : bh nbrk at halhim abino obh nqll at hanSim heSoim bzlm alhim : mph aHd izat brkh oqllh okn la ieSh aHi : hibie hmein mtoqim omrim mmoza aHd : aHi hiokl ez htanh lhozia citim ao htokl hgpn lhozia tanim kn gm mein aHd la iokl nbe mim mloHim omtoqim : mi bkm Hkm onbon irah bdrko hTobh at meSio benot hHkmh : oam qnah mrh omribh blbbkm al tthllo oal tSqro bamt : ain cat hHkmh hirdt mmel ki am Hkmt admh hia oHkmt hizr ohSdim : ki bmqom qnah omribh Sm mhomh okl meSh re : abl hHkmh aSr mmel braSonh znoeh hia ap ahbt Slom omkret lkp ckot oainnh emdt el deth omlah rHmim opri Tob bla lb olb obli Hnph : opri hzdqh bSlom icre leSi hSlom :

4

main hmlHmot ohmdnim aSr binikm hla mtok htaot hmtgrot babrikm : atm mtaoim oain lkm trzHo otqnao ohSg la tSigo tribo otlHmo oain lkm ien aSr la htplltm : hn atm mbqSim oainkm mqblim el aSr ttpllo breh lmen tblo btaotikm : hnapim ohmnapot hla idetm ki ahbt heolm aibt alhim hia oeth hHpz lhiot ahb heolm ihih aib lalhim : ao htdmo bnpSkm ki lriq amr hktob bqnah itaoh lroH hSkn bqrbno : ogm igdil ltt Hn el kn aomr alhim llzim iliz olenoim itn Hn : lkn hkneo lalhim htizbo ngd hSTn oibrH mpnikm : qrbo lalhim oiqrb alikm rHzo idikm hHTaim Thro lbbkm Hloqi hlbb : hteno ohtablo obko SHqkm ihpk labl oSmHtkm ligon : hkneo lpni ihoh ohoa irim atkm : aHi al tHrpo aiS at reho hmHrp at reho odn at aHio hoa mHrp at htorh odn at htorh oam tdin at htorh aink eSh htorh ki am SpTh : aHd hoa hmHqq aSr ikol lhoSie olabd omi ath ki tdin at emitk : hoi hamrim nlkh hiom omHr leir plonit almonit oneSh Sm Snh aHt lsHr bh olhrbot roH : ola tdeo mh ild iom mHr ki mh Hiikm eSn hm aSr nrah kmeT rge oaHr klh oilk : tHt aSr tamro am irzh ihoh onHih neSh kch okch : eth ttgao bpHcotkm okl gaoh aSr kcat reh hia : lkn hiode leSot hTob ola ieSno ohih bo HTa :

5

hoi heSirim bko ohililo el hzrot aSr tbanh elikm : eSrkm blh obgdikm aklm eS : chbkm okspkm kstm Hlah ohith Hlatm bkm ledot oaklh kmo aS at bSrkm azrtm lkm aozrot bqz himim : hnh Skr hpelim aspi qzir Sdtikm aSr eSqtm zeq elikm ozeqt hqozrim bah bacni ihoh zbaot : htedntm barz ohtengtm ohSmntm at lbkm kmo liom TbHh : hrSetm ohmtm at hzdiq ohoa nenh la iptH pio : lkn aHi dmo ohoHilo ed boa hadon hnh hakr mHkh lTob tboat hadmh bhoHilo ki ird elih gSm iorh omlqoS : kn hoHilo gm atm oamzo lbbkm ki qrob hadon lba : aHi al ttaonno aiS el reho pn tSpTo hnh hSopT emd lptH : aHi hnbiaim aSr dbro bSm ihoh hm ihio lkm lmopt heni ohtoHlt : hnh maSrim anHno at hsblim at sblnot aiob Smetkm oat aHrit hadon raitm ki rHom oHnon ihoh : oraS dbr aHi la tSbeo la bSmim ola barz ola bkl Sboeh aHrt oihi hn Slkm hn ola Slkm la pn tplo bidi hdin : ki izr laiS bkm hoa itpll oaSr iiTb lbo hoa icmr : aiS ki iHlh bkm iqra at cqni hqhlh oitpllo bedo oisokho Smn bSm ihoh : otplt hamonh toSie at hHolh oihoh iqimno oaSr HTa islH lo : htodo eonotikm aiS lpni reho ohtpllo aiS bed reho lmen trpao ki gdol kH tplt hzdiq hqra al alhim bHcqh : aliho anoS anoS hih kmno ohtpll tplh Sla ihih mTr ola hih mTr barz SlS Snim oSSh HdSim : oiSb oitpll ohSmim ntno mTr oharz hzmiHh at prih : aHi ki iteh aiS bkm mn hamt oaiS aHr iSibno : idoe ide ki hmSib at hHoTa meqSot drko hoa ioSie at npSo mmot oiksh el hmon pSeim :

pTrom hraSonh

1

pTros SliH ihoSe hmSiH al toSbi tpozot pnTos glTia qpodqia asia obitonia : hnbHrim mqdm kpi det alhim hab bqdoS hroH al mSmet ihoSe hmSiH oal hcit dmo Hsd oSlom lmkbir ihio lkm : brok halhim abi adnino ihoSe hmSiH aSr krb rHmio Sb oholid atno ltqoh Hih bhqmt ihoSe hmSiH mem hmtim : lnHlh aSr la tSHt ola tgal ola tbl hzponh bSmim lkm : hnSmrim bec alhim el id hamonh ltSoeh hetidh lhglot bet qz : aSr bh tgilo atm hmtezbim eth meT lpi hzrk bmst Snot : lmen tmza amontkm hmcqqh iqrh hrbh mn hchb habd hzrop baS lthlh olkbod oltpart bhtglot ihoSe hmSiH : aSr ahbtm ola raitm oaSr eth tamino bo bla raot ato obkn tgilo bSmHh mparh ezmh mspr : bqHtkm eqb amontkm tSoeh lnpStikm : at htSoeh aSr elih Hqro odrSo hnbiaim hnbaim el hHsd hSmor lkm : bHqrm ldet mti oaik thih het aSr hodieh roH hmSiH aSr bqrbm bhgido mraS at enoii hmSiH oat hgdlot aSr aHrihm : onglh lhm ki la lpnSm ki am lno Srto bdbrim hhm aSr hgd lkm eth el pi hmbSrim atkm broH hqdS hSloH mSmim dbrim aSr mlaki alhim Hmdo lhSqip al tokm : lkn Hgro mtni Sklkm hteorro oqoo qoh lHsd aSr iboakm bhtglot ihoSe hmSiH : kbni mSmet al ttnhgo btaot aSr htaoitm beod hiotkm bbli det : ki am hio qdSim bkl drkikm kaSr qdoS hoa aSr qra atkm : ki el kn ktob ohiitm qdSim ki qdoS ani : oam ab tqrao lalhim hSpT bbli mSa pnim kpi melli aiS oaiS hthlko na birah bimi mgorikm : mdetkm ki la bdbr npsd bksp ao bchb npditm mdrk hblkm aSr hnHltm mat abotikm : ki am bdm iqr Sl Sh tmim omom ain bo bdm hmSiH : hnode mraS lpni mosdot tbl onglh baHrit himim lmenkm : hmaminim el pio balhim aSr hqim ato mem hmtim oitn lo kbod lmen hiot amontkm gm tqoh lalhim : cko at npStikm el idi hroH bSmekm bqol hamt lahbt aHim bla Hnph oahbtm aiS at reho ahbh Hcqh blb Thor : knoldim mHdS la mcre nSHt ki am mcre la iSHt bmamr alhim hHi ohqim leolm : ki kl bSr Hzir okl kbod aiS kziz hSdh ibS Hzir nbl ziz : odbr ihoh iqom leolm och hoa hdbr aSr bSr lkm :

2

oeth hsiro mkm kl rSe okl mrmh oHnph oqnah okl lSon re : okellim aSr mqrob noldo htaoo lHlb hSkli ohck lmen tgdlo bo : am amnm Temtm ki Tob hadon : aSr ngStm alio al abn Hih aSr maso bh bni hadm ohia nbHrh oiqrh lalhim : onbnitm gm atm kabnim Hiot lbit roHni lkhnt qdS lhelot cbHi roH lrzon lalhim bihoSe hmSiH : och hoa Samr hktob hnni isd bzion abn pnh abn bHn oiqrh ohmamin bh la iboS : lkn lkm hmaminim hiqr abl lsorrim habn aSr maso hbonim hith lraS pnh olabn ngp olzor mkSl : ohm nkSlo ien la Smeo ldbr olcat gm noedo : oatm hnkm cre nbHr mmlkt khnim ogoi qdoS oem sglh lmen tspro thlot hqora atkm mHSk al aoro hnpla : aSr lpnim la em hiitm oeth em alhim oaSr lpnim la rHmo oeth mrHmim : ahobim achirkm kgrim otoSbim hncro mtaot hbSr hmtgrot bnpS : ohiTibo drkkm bgoim lmen ibiTo al meSikm hTobim ohih tHt aSr Hrpo atkm kpeli aon ikbdo at halhim biom hpqdh : ohkneo lkl pqdt adm bgll hadon am lmlk kraoi lraS : am lmSlim kraoi lSloHim mato lnqmt peli aon olthlt eSi Tob : ki kn hoa Hpz alhim aSr beSotkm hTob tskro at pi aolt hanSim aSr ain bm det : kHpSim ola kalo hith lkm hHpSh lmksh hreh ki am kebdi alhim : nhgo kbod bkl aiS ahbo at haHim irao at alhim kbdo at hmlk : hebdim hkneo lpni adnikm bkl irah la lpni hTobim ohenoim lbd ki am gm lpni heqSim : ki Hsd hoa laiS am iSbe mmrrim oienh Hnm lmen det halhim : ki am HTa tHTao osbltm mkot agrop mh tthllo ak am teno osbltm beSotkm hTob Hsd hoa mlpni alhim : ki lcat nqratm ki gm hmSiH enh beborkm ohSair lkm mopt llkt beqbotio : aSr HTa la eSh ola mrmh bpio : aSr Sme Hrpto ola hSib nenh ola ger ki am msr dino lSpT zdq oat HTatno hoa nSa bgoito el hez : lmen nHih lzdqh maHr SnpTrno mn hHTaim : aSr bHbrto nrpa lkm ki hiitm kzan abdot oeth Sbtm al hreh pqid npStikm :

3

okn atn hnSim hknenh lpni belikn lmen gm am iS aSr ainm Smeim ldbr iqno bain amr odbrim el idi meSi hnSim : braotm ki tznenh lkt birah : oparkn al ihi mbHoz bmHlpot Ser oedi chb olbiSt mHlzim : ki am hadm hzpon pnimh broH enoh ohSqT aSr la iklh oiqr hoa beini alhim : ki kn htqSTo lpnim gm hnSim hqdSot hmiHlot lalhim bhknen lpni belihn : kSrh aSr Smeh bqol abrhm otqra lo adon aSr atn hiitn lh lbnot beSotkn hTob ola tiranh mpHd : okn atm hanSim Sbo emhn btbonh ki kli rph haSh otno lh kbod ki gm lhn iS Hlq bnHlt mtnt hHiim pn tklao mtplotikm : osop dbr hio klkm lb aHd beli Hmlh ahbi haHim rHmnim omtqblim el hbriot : al tSlmo reh tHt reh ao Hrph tHt Hrph ki am tbrko mdetkm ki lcat nqratm lmen tirSo at hbrkh : ki haiS hHpz Hiim ahb imim lraot Tob izr lSono mre oSptio mdbr mrmh : isor mre oieSh Tob ibSq Slom oirdpho : ki eini ihoh al zdiqim oacnio al Soetm opni ihoh beSi re : omi ire lkm am tqnao leSot hTob : abl aSrikm gm am teno lmen hzdqh ak moram la tirao ola terizo : at ihoh alhim ato tqdiSo blbbkm ohio nknim tmid lhSib dbr benoh obirah lkl Sal atkm HSbon htoHlt aSr bqrbkm : roH Slmh thi lkm lmen ibSo hmnazim drkkm hTobh bmSiH bhlSinm atkm kpeli aon : ki Tob lkm am Hpz alhim hoa aSr teno beSotkm hTob mSteno beSotkm re : ki gm hmSiH enh pem aHt el HTatino hzdiq bed hrSeim lqrb atno al halhim homt lpi hbSr oiHi broH : aSr bo hlk oiqra gm lroHot aSr bmSmr : aSr lpnim la hamino kaSr Hkh alhim bark apo bimi nH bheSot htbh aSr nmlTo alih meTim ohm Smnh npSot bmim : och hoa aot hTbilh aSr ket toSie gm atno la bhsir Tnop hbSr ki am bSal lno mat alhim roH Slmh el idi hqmt ihoSe hmSiH : aSr hoa limin alhim aHri aSr ebr hSmimh oikneo lpnio hmlakim ohrSiot ohgborot :

4

oeth kaSr enh hmSiH bedno bbSr kn hio gm atm mcinim bmHSbh hhia ki hmenh bbSr Hdl mHToa : lmen aSr la tHio eod ltaot bni adm ki am lrzon alhim kl imi hitkm eod bbSr : ki dino et hHiim aSr ebrh leSot kHpz hgoim blktno bdrki cmh obtaot ksbai iin oclli bSr ordpi Skr otoebot ebdt halilim : oel cat tmhim hmh omgdpim ki la trozo emhm lSTp bcmh kmohm : aSr itno HSbon lpni hetid lSpT hHiim ohmtim : ki el kn htbSro gm hmtim lmen iSpTo bbSr lpi drk bni adm oiHio broH lpi drk alhim : hn qz hkl qrb lkn hio znoeim oerim lhtpll : olpni kl dbr ahbo aiS at aHio ahbh Hcqh ki el rb pSeim tksh hahbh : hio marHim aiS at reho bbli tlnot : aiS aiS kmtn hHsd aSr qbl tecro aiS lreho kgcbrim mmnim el Hsdi alhim hrbim : aiS ki idbr ihi kamri al oaiS ki iecr thi ecrto mtok hHil aSr Hnno alhim lmen ikbd alhim bkl el idi ihoSe hmSiH aSr lo hkbod ohec leolmi eolmim amn : ahobim bbakm btok kor eni lmen nstkm al na ttmho kalo qrh lkm dbr cr : ki am SmHo el aSr Hlq lkm benoii hmSiH lmen gm tSmHo otelzo bhglot kbodo : am iHrpo atkm lmen Sm hmSiH aSrikm ki nHh elikm roH hkbod roH alhim azlm mnaz hoa oazlkm nkbd : rq al ienh aiS mkm krzH ao kgnb ao kpel aon ao knkns bpqdt aHrim : oam ienh kaHd hmSiHiim al iboS ki am iodh lalhim el hdbr hch : ki et hHl hmSpT mbit alhim oam mmno raSnh mh apoa thih aHrit hmmrim at bSort alhim : hn zdiq kmeT ioSe ap ki rSe oHoTa : lkn gm hmenim krzon alhim ipqido at npSotm bid alhim hbra hnamn oiosipo leSot hTob :

5

at hcqnim aSr bqrbkm achir anki emitm hcqn oed enoii hmSiH ogm Hbr lkbod hetid lhglot : reo at edr halhim aSr bidkm ohSgiHo elihm la bans ki am bndbh ap la eqb bze ki am bnpS Hpzh : gm la kmtemrim bnHlt ihoh ki am bhiotkm mopt lzan : ohih bhglot Sr hreim tSao eTrt hkbod aSr la tbl : okn gm atm hnerim hkneo lpni hcqnim oHgro klkm Splot roH bhkne aiS lreho ki alhim llzim iliz olenoim itn Hn : hSpilo npSkm tHt id alhim hHcqh lmen iromm atkm beto : hSliko elio kl ihbkm ki hoa idag lkm : hteorro Sqdo ki mribkm hSTn mSoTT karih Sag ombqS at aSr ible : oemdtm ngdo Hcqim bamonh odeo ki enoim kalh bao gm el aHikm aSr beolm : oalhi kl hHsd aSr qrano lkbodo hnzHi bmSiH ihoSe aHri enotkm meT hoa iSlim oiHcq oigbr oiisd atkm : lo hkbod ohec leolmi eolmim amn : bid slonos haH hnamn lkm kaSr aHSb ktbti alikm bdbrim meTim lhchir atkm olheid ki Hsd halhim hch aSr emdtm bo amt hoa : Hbrtkm aSr bbbl hnbHrh atkm omrqos bni Salim lSlomkm : Salo lSlom aiS at reho bnSiqt ahbh Slom lklkm aSr bmSiH ihoSe amn :

pTrom hSniih

1

Smeon pTros ebd ihoSe hmSiH oSliHo al aSr qblo amonh iqrh kSlno bzdqt alhino omoSieno ihoSe hmSiH : Hsd oSlom ihio lkm lmkbir bdet halhim oihoSe adnino : baSr gborto halhit ntnh lno at kl aSr lHiim olHsidot el idi det hqora atno bkbodo oHilo : aSr bhm ntn lno hbTHot gdlot mad oiqrot lmen tqHo el idn Hlq bTbe alhim bhmlTkm mklion htaoh aSr beolm : bebor cat hStdlo lhemid bamontkm at hzdqh obzdqh at hdet : obdet at hpriSot obpriSot at hsblnot obsblnot at hHsidot : obHsidot at haHoh obaHoh at hahbh : ki am alh tmzanh otrbinh bkm la ttnh atkm lhiot bTlim obla eSot pri ldet adnino ihoSe hmSiH : ki haiS aSr ain alh lo eor hoa qzr hraot oSkH at Thrto mHTatio hraSnot : lkn aHi hosipo ohStdlo lHcq at qriatkm obHirtkm ki beSotkm cat kSol la tkSlo : ki kn iptH lpnikm lroHh hmboa al mlkot eolm aSr ladnino omoSieno ihoSe hmSiH : el kn la aHdl lhckirkm el alh bkl et gm ki idetm ohtkonntm bamt aSr hia lpnino : oaHSb ki nkon lhckir olheir atkm kl imi hioti bmSkn hch : baSr ideti ki mhr ietq mSkni kaSr gm glh li adnino ihoSe hmSiH : oaStdl Sihih lkm tmid gm aHri pTirti ckron hdbrim halh : ki hodeno atkm gbort adnino ihoSe hmSiH obao la blktno aHri hgdot mHkmot ki am raot hio einino at gdlto : ki lqH mat alhim hab iqr okbod bba alio qol mtok hdrt kbodo lamr ch bni ididi rzth npSi bo : oat hqol hch Smeno bacnino iza mSmim bhiotno emo bhr hqdS : oeth dbr hnboah iotr qim atno ohTibtm eSot aSr Stm lbkm alio kmo al nr mair bmqom apl ed ki ibqe aor hiom ocrH kokb hngh blbbkm : ocat tdeo raSonh aSr kl nboat hmqra ainnh tlh bptron adm mlbo : ki meolm la izah nboah brzon hadm ki am broH hqdS aSr nSam dbro anSi alhim hqdoSim :

2

ogm nbiai Sqr hio bem kaSr ihio gm bkm mori Sqr aSr ikniso ktot mSHitot obkHSm bmSl aSr qnm ibiao el npSm klion ptam : orbim ilko aHri toebotm obeborm itn drk hamt lgdopim : obdbri bdoi ieSo atkm lmHsr lhm lmen bze bze aSr mSpTm meolm la itmhmh oSbrm la inom : ki la Hs alhim el hmlakim aSr HTao ki am horidm lqzbi hrim oisgirm bkbli apl lSmrm lmSpT : ogm el dorot qdm la Hs oiSmr rq at nH hSmini qra hzdq bhbiao at hmbol el dor hrSeim : oat eri sdom oemrh hpk lapr ohaSimm bmhpkh oiSimm lmSl laSr etidim leSot cmh : oizl at loT hzdiq aSr hlaoho anSi bliel hhm bdrk cmtm : ki hzdiq hch bSbto btokm hadib at npSo hiSrh iom iom braoto obSmeo meSi rSem : ki iode ihoh lhzil at Hsidio mnsion olHSk at hrSeim liom hmSpT lhSib gmolm lhm : obiotr at hhlkim aHri hbSr btaot tbl obcim at hmmSlh eci pnim hlkim bSrirot lbm ola iHrdo mHrp at hSrrot : aSr ap hmlakim hgdolim mhm bec okH la igdpom lpni ihoh bmSpTm : ohmh kbhmot hsklot hnoldot kHq Tbem llkd olSHt iabdo babod npSm ien Hrpo at aSr la hbino oiSao gmol eoltm : aSr ednt iomm leng iHSbo mTnpim omom bm hmtpnqim bmdoHi npSm oaklim oStim emkm : einim lhm mlaot napim aSr la tHdlot mHToa oat npSot hptaim izoddo olb mlmd bze lhm bni hmarh : at hdrk hiSr ecbo oiteo oilko bdrk blem bn beor aSr ahb Skr heolh : othi lo tokHt el HTato ki hbhmh halmt dbrh bqol adm otezr baolt hqsm : barot bli mim hmh ebim ndpim bserh aSr Smor lhm HSk aplh leolm : ki bdbrm bgaot dbri Soa izodo btaot hbSr el idi cmtm at aSr ak nmlTo midi hhlkim bdrk toeh : HpSh ibTiHo lhm ohm bezmm ebdim lSHt ki haiS ebd laSr nkbS mmno : ki aHri hmlTm mTmat heolm bdet adnino omoSieno ihoSe hmSiH am Sbo ohTbeo btokn onkbSo aHritm thih reh mraSitm : Tob hih lhm la ldet at drk hzdqh maSr ideho onsgo aHor mn hmzoh hqdoSh hmsorh lhm : oiqr lhm kaSr iamr mSl hamt hklb Sb el qao ohHcir elh mn hrHzh lhtgll brpS :

3

cat hia hagrt hSnit aSr ani ktb alikm ahobim obStihn aeir bdrk hckrh at tmt lbbkm : lckr at hdbrim hnamrim mqdm bidi hnbiaim hqdSim oat mzot adnino omoSieno aSr ntnh bidno hSliHim : odeo cat lkm raSnh ki baHrit himim ibao lzim hhlkim aHri taot npSm oitlozzo lamr : aih hbTHt bao ki mac Skbo habot hkl emd kmo mraSit hbriah : onstr mhm baSr la iabo ldet ki mqdm qmo hSmim oharz bdbr alhim mn hmim oel idi hmim : obmim abdh tbl mac ki nSTph bmi hmbol : gm hSmim oharz aSr lpnino nzpno bdbro ohm Smorim laS liom hdin oabd anSi hrSe : ocat haHt al telm mkm ahobim ki iom aHd kalp Snim beini ihoh oalp Snim kiom aHd : ola iaHr ihoh at aSr hbTiH kaSr iS HSbim ath laHor ki ak harik apo beborno ola iHpz babd aiS ki am bpnot klm ltSobh : ba iba iom ihoh kgnb blilh ac hSmim bSaon iHlpo ohisdot ibero ohtmggo oharz ohmeSim aSr elih iSrpo : oeth am kl alh imogo mh mad Hibim atm lhthlk bqdSh obHsidot : olHkot lba iom ihoh olhHiS ato aSr bgllo hSmim imogo baS ohisdot ibero onmso : oanHno kpi hbTHto mHkim lSmim HdSim olarz HdSh aSr zdq ilin bm : el kn ahobim aSr lalh Hkitm Sqdo lhmza lpnio bSlom nqim ockim mpSe : oat ark roH adnino tHSbo ltSoeh kaSr gm aHino hahob polos ktb alikm kpi hHkmh hntonh lo : okn bkl agrotio bdbro Sm el alh obhm iS dbrim qSi hhbnh ohberim ohptaim ihpko atm kaSr gm ieSo lktbim haHrim labdn npSm : oatm ahobim aSr idetm cat hSmro lnpStikm pn tmSko aHri Teot anSi bliel onpltm mmeckm : orbo bHsd obdet adnino omoSieno ihoSe hmSiH aSr lo hkbod gm hiom ogm liom heolm amn :

ioHnn hraSonh

1

at aSr hih mraS aSr Smeno obeinino raino aSr hbTno oaSr mSSo idino el dbr hHiim : ohHiim nglo onra omeidim anHno omodieim lkm at Hii heolm aSr hio em hab onglo lno : at aSr raino oSmeno nodieh lkm lmen ttHbro lno gm atm ohtHbrotno hia em hab oem bno ihoSe hmSiH : oat cat ktbim anHno lkm lmen thih SmHtkm Slmh : ocat hia hSmoeh aSr Smeno mmno ongd lkm ki halhim aor hoa okl HSk ain bo : am namr ki iS lno htHbrot emo onthlk bHSk hnno kcbim opeltno ainnh amt : ak am baor nlk kaSr hoa baor hnh ntHbrno iHd odm ihoSe hmSiH bno iThrno mkl HTa : am namr ki ain bno HTa hnno mteim at npStino ohamt ain bno : oam ntodh at HTatino namn hoa ozdiq lslH lno at HTatino olThrno mkl eon : oam namr ki la HTano lkcb nSimno odbro ain bno :

2

bni hnni ktb alikm at cat lblti tHTao oam iHTa aiS iS lno mliz lpni abino ihoSe hmSiH hzdiq : ohoa kprh el HTatino ola el HTatino lbd ki gm el HTat kl heolm : obcat nde ki hkrno aoto am nSmr at mzotio : hamr hkrtio oat mzotio la iSmr kcb hoa ohamt ain bo : abl hSmr at dbro bo nSlmh bamt ahbt alhim obcat nde ki bo anHno : hamr ki bo iemd elio lhthlk bdrk aSr gm hoa hlk : aHi ainni ktb lkm mzoh HdSh ki am mzoh iSnh aSr hith lkm mraS ohmzoh hiSnh hia hdbr aSr Smetm mraS : oeod mzoh HdSh ani ktb lkm aSr hia amt gm bo gm bkm ki hHSk ebr ohaor hamti kbr corH : haomr ki iSno baor ohoa Sna at aHio eodno bHSk : hahb at aHio iemd baor omkSol ain bo : ohSna at aHio bHSk hoa obHSk ithlk ola ide anh hoa hlk ki hHSk eor at einio : hnni ktb alikm hbnim ien ki nslHo lkm HTatikm lmen Smo : ktb ani alikm habot ien ki hkrtm ato aSr hoa mraS ktb ani alikm hbHorim ien ki htgbrtm el hre ktb ani alikm hildim ien ki hkrtm at hab : ktbti alikm habot ien ki hkrtm ato aSr hoa mraS ktbti alikm hbHorim ien ki Hcqtm odbr halhim Skn bqrbkm ohtgbrtm el hre : al tahbo at hHld oat dbri hHld am iahb aiS at hHld ain bo ahbt hab : ki kl aSr bHld taot hbSr otaot heinim ogaot hhon ainno mn abino ki am mn hHld : ohHld ebor iebr em taotio oheSh rzon alhim iemd led : ildi hnh hSeh haHronh bah okaSr Smetm ki iba zr hmSiH kn eth rbo zri hmSiH obcat nde ki hia hSeh haHronh : matno izao ak la mSlno hio ki alo hio mSlno ki ac hio emdim emno abl lmen iglo ki la klm mSlno hmh : oatm hmSHh lkm mat hqdoS oidetm hkl : la ktbti alikm ien ki la idetm at hamt ak ien ki idetm ath oaSr kl kcb ainno mn hamt : mi hoa hkcb am la hmkHS bihoSe lamr ki ainno hmSiH ch hoa zr hmSiH hmkHS bab obbn : kl hmkHS bbn gm hab ain lo : oatm iqm na bkm hdbr aSr Smetm mraS oam iqom bkm aSr Smetm mraS ac gm atm tqomo bbn obab : ohhbTHh aSr hbTiHno hia Hii eolmim : cat ktbti alikm mpni hmteim atkm : oatm hmSHh aSr qbltm mato emdt bkm ola tzTrko laiS aSr ilmdkm ki am kaSr tlmd atkm hmSHh bkl dbr hia hamt oainnh kcb okaSr lmdh atkm kn temdo bo : oeth bnim emdo bo lmen iamz lbno bhraoto ola nboS mpnio bboao : am idetm ki zdiq hoa deo ki kl eSh zdqh nold mmno :

3

rao mh gdlh ahbt hab hntonh lno aSr nqra bni halhim el kn heolm ainno ide atno ien ki aoto la ide : ahobi eth bnim lalhim anHno oeod la nglh mh nhih ak ideno ki bhgloto ndmh lo ki nraho kaSr hoa : okl aSr lo tqoh kcat iThr at ezmo kaSr Thor gm hoa : kl heSh HTa gm pSe btorh hoa ohHTa hoa pSe btorh : oidetm ki hoa nglh lSat at HTaino obo ain HTa : kl hemd bo la iHTa kl hHoTa la raho gm la ideo : bni al iteh atkm aiS heSh zdqh zdiq hoa kaSr hoa zdiq : oheSh HTa mn hSTn hoa ki hSTn HTa mraS lcat nglh bn halhim lhpr at pelot hSTn : kl hnold malhim la iHTa ki creo bo iqom ola iokl lHTa ki malhim nold : onodeo bcat bni halhim obni hSTn kl aiS aSr la ieSh zdqh ainno malhim okn kl aSr la iahb at aHio : ki cat hia hSmoeh aSr Smetm mraS lahbh aiS at reho : la kqin aSr hih mn hre ohrg at aHio omdoe hrgo ien ki meSio hio reim omeSi aHio meSi zdq : al ttmho aHi am iSna atkm heolm : anHno ideno ki ebrno mn hmot al hHiim el ki nahb at aHino aiS aSr la iahb at aHio iSar bmot : kl hSna at aHio rzH npS hoa oidetm ki kl rzH npS la itqimo bo Hii eolmim : bcat hkrno at hahbh ki hoa ntn at npSo bedno gm anHno Hibim ltt at npStino bed aHino : oaiS aSr lo nksi heolm ohoa rah at aHio Hsr lHm oqpz at rHmio mmno aik temd bo ahbt alhim : bni al na nahb bmlin oblSon ki am bpel obamt : obcat ndeh ki mn hamt anHno olpnio nSqiT at lbotino : ki am lbbno irSie atno halhim nSgb hoa mlbbno oide at kl : ahobi am lbbno la irSieno bTHon lno balhim : okl aSr nSal mato nqbl ki nSmr at mzotio oneSh at hrzoi lpnio : ocat hia mzoto lhamin bSm bno ihoSe hmSiH olahbh aiS at reho kaSr zono : ohSmr at mzotio iqom bo ohoa bo obcat nde ki hoa Skn bno broH aSr ntn lno :

4

ahobi al tamino lkl roH ki am bHno hroHot am malhim hmh ki nbiai Sqr rbim izao leolm : bcat tkiro at roH alhim kl roH hmodh bihoSe hmSiH ki ba bbSr malhim hoa : okl roH aSr ainno modh bihoSe hadon ki ba bbSr la malhim hoa och hoa roH zr hmSiH aSr Smetm elio ki boa iba oeth hnh hoa beolm : atm hbnim hnkm malhim onzHtm atm ki aSr bkm gdol hoa maSr beolm : hmh mn heolm el kn mheolm idbro oheolm iSme alihm : oanHno malhim hnno hiode at halhim iSme alino oaSr ainno malhim la iSme alino bcat nkir at roH hamt oat roH htoeh : ahobi nahb na aiS at reho ki hahbh malhim hia okl aSr iahb nold malhim oide at halhim : oaSr ainno ahb la ide at halhim ki halhim hoa ahbh : bcat nrath ahbt halhim lno ki SlH halhim at bno at iHido leolm lmen nHih el ido : bcat hia hahbh la SanHno ahbno at halhim ki am hoa ahb aotno oiSlH at bno lkprh el HTatino : ahobi am kkh ahb atno halhim gm anHno Hibim lahbh aiS at reho : at halhim la rah aiS meolm oam nahb aiS at reho halhim iemd bqrbno oahbto nSlmh bno : bcat nde aSr bo nqom ohoa bno ki ntn lno mroHo : oanHno Hcino oneidh ki hab SlH at hbn moSie heolm : kl hmodh ki ihoSe hoa bn halhim halhim Skn bo ohoa balhim : oanHno ideno onamn bahbh aSr alhim ahb atno halhim hoa ahbh ohemd bahbh emd balhim ohalhim emd bo : obcat nSlmh bno hahbh bhiot lno bTHon biom hdin ki kmho kn gm anHno beolm hch : ain aimh bahbh ki am hahbh hSlmh tgrS at haimh ki baimh mezbh oaSr baimh ainno Slm bahbh : anHno ahbim ato ki hoa qdm lahbh atno : ki iamr aiS ahb ani at halhim ohoa Sna at aHio kcb hoa ki aSr la iahb at aHio aSr hoa rah aikkh iokl lahb at halhim aSr ainno rah ato : ocat hmzoh iS lno mato ki hahb at halhim iahb gm at aHio :

5

kl hmamin ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH hnh ch ild malhim okl hahb at molido iahb gm at hnold mato : bcat nde ki nahb at bni halhim bahbtno at halhim obSmrno at mzotio : ki cat ahbt alhim hia aSr nSmr at mzotio omzotio ainn kbdot : ki kl hnold mat halhim mnzH at heolm oamontno hnzHon hmnzH at heolm : mi hoa ch hmnzH at heolm am la hmamin bihoSe Shoa bn halhim : ch hoa aSr ba bmim obdm ihoSe hmSiH la bmim lbd ki am bmim obdm ohroH hoa hmeid ki hroH hoa hamt : ki SlSh hmh hmeidim bSmim hab hdbr oroH hqdS oSlStm aHd hmh : oSlSh hmh hmeidim barz hroH hmim ohdm oSlStm laHt hmh : am nqbl edot bni adm hnh edot halhim gdolh mmnh ki cat hia edot halhim aSr heid el bno : hmamin bbn halhim iS lo hedot bnpSo oaSr la iamin lalhim lkcb Smho ien la hamin bedot aSr heid halhim el bno : ocat hia hedot ki Hii eolmim ntn lno halhim ohHiim halh bbno hmh : aSr iS lo hbn iS lo hHiim oaSr ain lo bn halhim ain lo hHiim : cat ktbti alikm hmaminim bSm bn halhim lmen tdeon SiS lkm Hii eolm olmen tamino bSm bn halhim : och hoa bTHonno alio aSr am nSal dbr kpi rzono iSmeno : omdetno ki iSmeno lkl aSr nSal nde gm cat ki nSig at hmSalot aSr Salno mmno : aiS ki irah at aHio HoTa HTat aSr la lmot Sal iSal bedo oitn lo Hiim lkl aSr HTao la lmot hn iS HTa lmot el ch la amr lSal bedo : kl meSh Sla kmSpT HTa hia oiS HTa Sla lmot : ideno ki kl hnold mat halhim la iHTa ki aSr ild mat halhim iSmr at npSo ohre la ige bo : ideno ki malhim anHno okl heolm bre hoa : oideno ki ba bn alhim oitn lno binh ldet at hamti obamti anHno bbno ihoSe hmSiH ch hoa hal hamti oHii heolm : bni hSmro lkm mn halilim amn :

ioHnn hSniih

1

hcqn al hgbirh hbHirh oal bnih aSr ani ahb atm bamt ola ani lbdi ki am gm kl idei hamt : lmen hamt hemdt bqrbno ogm thih emno leolm : ihi emkm Hsd orHmim oSlom mat halhim abino omat adnino ihoSe hmSiH bn hab bamt obahbh : SmHti lmad ki mzati mbnik mthlkim bamt kmzoh aSr qblno mat hab : oeth mbqS ani mmk hgbirh ola kktb alik mzoh HdSh ki am at aSr hith lno mraS lahbh aiS at reho : ocat hia hahbh aSr nthlk bmzotio cat hia hmzoh aSr Smetm mraS lhthlk bh : ki mteim rbim bao leolm aSr ainm modim bihoSe hmSiH ki ba bbSr ch hoa hmteh ozr hmSiH : hSmro lkm pn tabd mmno peltno ki am nqH mSkrtno Slmh : kl hebr el tort hmSiH oainno emd bh ain lo alhim ohemd btort hmSiH iS lo gm hab gm hbn : kl hba alikm ola ibia at htorh hcat la taspo ato hbith ola tSalo lo lSlom : ki hSal bSlomo hoa mSttp bmeSio hreim : hrbh li lktb alikm ola Hpzti bnir obdio ki aqoh lboa alikm oldbr ph al ph lmen thih SmHtno Slmh : bni aHotk hbHirh Salim lSlomk amn :

ioHnn hSliSit

1

hcqn al gios hHbib aSr ani ahb ato bamt : Hbibi Hpzi hoa ki iiTb lk bkl dbr otHcq kaSr Tob lk bnpSk : ki SmHti lmad kaSr bao aHim oieido el amtk aSr mthlk bamt ath : ain li SmHh gdolh mlSme at aSr bni ithlko bamt : Hbibi bamonh kl meSik em haHim oem harHim : aSr heido el ahbtk bpni hqhl oap tiTib leSot blotk atm kaSr iath lpni alhim : ki bebor Smo izao ola lqHo maomh mn hgoim : el kn Hibim anHno lqbl atm lmen nhih ecrim lamt : ani ktbti al hqhlh ak dioTrips hmtaoh lhiot elihm lraS ainno mqbl atno : el kn bbai ackir at meSio aSr hoa eSh bspro elino dbrim reim ola dio Sla iqbl at haHim ki gm imne at hHpzim lqbl oigrSm mtok hqhlh : Hbibi al trdp hreh ki am hTob heSh Tob hoa malhim oheSh re la rah at halhim : el dimTrios heido hkl ogm hamt ezmh ogm anHno meidim elio oidetm ki edotno hia namnh : hrbh li lktb ola Hpzti lktb alik bdio obqnh : abl aqoh lraotk bmhrh oph al ph ndbr : Slom lk hreim Salim lSlomk Sal lSlom hreim laiS aiS bSmo :

ihodh

1

ihodh ebd ihoSe hmSiH oaHi ieqb al hmqraim aSr hm mqdSim balhim hab oSmorim lihoSe hmSiH : rHmim oSlom oahbh ihio lkm lmkbir : ahobi bhStdli lktb alikm el dbr htSoeh haHt lklno Hobh hia beini lcrckm bmktb aSr tlHmo lamonh hmsorh pem aHt lqdoSim : ki htgnbo lboa mqzt anSim hktobim mac lmSpT hch anSi rSe hhpkim at Hsd alhino lcmh okprim balhim hmSl hiHid obadnino ihoSe hmSiH : oiS at npSi lhckir atkm at aSr kbr idetm ki hoSie ihoh at hem mmzrim oiSmd aHri kn at aSr la hamino : ohmlakim aSr la Smro at mSrtm ki am ecbo at cblm Smrm bmosrot eolm obaplh lmSpT hiom hgdol : kaSr sdom oemrh oherim sbibotihn aSr hcno kmohm oilko aHri bSr cr nhio krai ki nmsro lmosr aS eolm : okn gm beli hHlmot halh mTmaim at hbSr oat hmmSlh inazo oat hSrrot iHrpo : omikal Sr hmlakim bhtokHo em hSTn oirb ato el adot goit mSh la mlao lbo lHrz mSpT gdopim ki am amr iger ihoh bk : oalh mgdpim at aSr la ideo obdbrim aSr ibino mHq Tbeim kbhmot hsklot bhmh iSHito at npSm : aoi lhm ki brdk qin hlko oiStqeo btoet blem lqbl Skr obmri qrH abdo : hla zori mkSol hmh bseodtikm Sl ahbh obqlot raS iaklo oiSto emkm oreim at npSm ennim hm bbli mim hndpim mpni roH ezi Hrp bain pri aSr mto pemim oneqro : mSbri im ecim aSr igrSo bStm kkbim teim aSr HSk aplh zpon lhm edi ed : ogm Hnok hSbiei ladm nba lalh lamr hnh ihoh ba brbbt qdSio : leSot mSpT bklm olhokiH kl rSei arz el kl meSi rSetm oel kl hqSot aSr dbro elio HTaim anSi rSe : alh hm hrgnim ohmtaonnim hhlkim aHri taotihm aSr pihm idbr etq hdri pnim eqb SHd : oatm hahobim ckro at hdbrim hnamrim mqdm bid SliHi adnino ihoSe hmSiH : bdbrm alikm lamr hnh baHrit himim ibao lzim hhlkim aHri taot rSem : alh hm hprSim mn hzbor anSim npSiim oroH ain bhm : oatm hahobim hbno bamontkm hnelh el kl bqdSth ohtpllo broH hqdS : oSmrtm at npStikm bahbt alhim oHkitm lrHmi adnino ihoSe hmSiH lHii heolm : hbdilo at alh ohtnhgo emhm brHmim : oat alh toSieo baimh oHlztm atm mtok haS ogeltm gm at hlboS hmgal bHlat hbSr : olaSr ikol lSmrkm bbli mkSol olhemid atkm bSSon tmimim lpni kbodo : lalhim aSr lo lbdo hHkmh hmoSie atno lo hkbod ohgdlh ohec ohmmSlh meth oleolmi ed amn :

ihoSe lpi mti

1

spr toldt ihoSe hmSiH bn dod bn abrhm : abrhm holid at izHq oizHq holid at ieqb oieqb holid at ihodh oat aHio : oihodh holid at prz oat crH mtmr oprz holid at Hzron oHzron holid at rm : orm holid at emindb oemindb holid at nHSon onHSon holid at Slmon : oSlmon holid at bec mrHb obec holid at eobd mrot oeobd holid at iSi : oiSi holid at dod hmlk odod hmlk holid at Slmh maSt aorih : oSlmh holid at rHbem orHbem holid at abih oabih holid at asa : oasa holid at ihoSpT oihoSpT holid at iorm oiorm holid at eciho : oeciho holid at iotm oiotm holid at aHc oaHc holid at iHcqiho : oiHcqiho holid at mnSh omnSh holid at amon oamon holid at iaSiho : oiaSiho holid at ikniho oat aHio let glot bbl : oaHri glotm bblh holid iknih at Saltial oSaltial holid at crbbl : ocrbbl holid at abihod oabihod holid at aliqim oaliqim holid at ecor : oecor holid at zdoq ozdoq holid at ikin oikin holid at alihod : oalihod holid at alecr oalecr holid at mtn omtn holid at ieqb : oieqb holid at iosp bel mrim aSr mmnh nold ihoSe hnqra mSiH : ohnh kl hdrot mn abrhm ed dod arbeh eSr drot omn dod ed glot bbl arbeh eSr drot omet glot bbl ed hmSiH arbeh eSr drot : ohldt ihoSe hmSiH kh hith mrim amo arSh liosp obTrm iba alih nmzat hrh lroH hqdS : oiosp belh hih aiS zdiq ola abh ltth lboc oiamr blbo lSlHh bstr : hoa HSb kcat ohnh mlak ihoh nrah alio bHlom oiamr iosp bn dod al tira mknos alik at mrim aStk ki aSr hrh bh mroH hqdS hoa : ohia ildt bn oqrat at Smo ihoSe ki hoa ioSie at emo meonotihm : othi kl cat lmlat at aSr dbr ihoh bid hnbia lamr : hnh helmh hrh oildt bn oqrao Smo emnoal aSr proSo hal emno : oiiqz iosp mSnto oieS kaSr zoho mlak ihoh oiqH alio at aSto : ola ideh ed ki ildh bn at bkorh oiqra at Smo ihoSe :

2

oihi kaSr nold ihoSe bbit lHm ihodh bimi hordos hmlk oibao mgoSim marz mcrH iroSlimh lamr : aih mlk hihodim hnold ki raino at kokbo bmcrH onba lhStHot lo : oihi kSme hordos hmlk at dbrihm oibhl hoa okl iroSlim emo : oiqhl at kl raSi hkhnim osopri hem oidrS matm lamr aiph iold hmSiH : oiamro lo bbit lHm ihodh ki kn ktob bid hnbia : oath bit lHm arz ihodh aink zeir balpi ihodh ki mmk iza moSl aSr ireh at emi iSral : ac qra hordos lmgoSim bstr oiHqr atm ldet et hraot hkokb : oiSlHm bit lHm oiamr lko Hqro hiTb el dbr hild ohih ki tmzaon ato ohgdtm li oabah lhStHot lo gm ani : oihi kSmem at dbri hmlk oilko ohnh hkokb aSr rao bmcrH drk lpnihm ed bao al mqom aSr Sm hild oiemd mmel lo : oirao at hkokb oiSmHo SmHh gdolh ed mad : oibao hbith oimzao at hild em mrim amo oipl el pnihm oiStHoo lo oiptHo at aozrotm oiqribo lo mnHh chb olbonh omr : oizoo bHlom lblti Sob al hordos oilko bdrk aHr al arzm : hm hlko mSm ohnh mlak ihoh nrah al iosp bHlom lamr qom qH at hild oat amo obrH lk mzrimh ohih Sm ed aSr amr alik ki hordos zdh at hild labdo : oiqm oiqH at hild oat amo blilh oibrH mzrimh : oihi Sm ed mot hordos lmlat at aSr dbr ihoh bid hnbia lamr mmzrim qrati lbni : oira hordos ki htlo bo hmgoSim oiqzp mad oiSlH oimt at kl hildim aSr bbit lHm obkl gbolih mbn Sntim olmTh kpi het aSr Hqrh mpi hmgoSim : oimla hdbr hnamr bpi irmih hnbia lamr : qol brmh nSme nhi obki tmrorim rHl mbkh el bnih manh lhnHm ki ainm : oihi aHri mot hordos ohnh mlak ihoh nrah bHlom al iosp barz mzrim : oiamr alio qom qH at hild oat amo olk Sob al arz iSral ki mto hmbqSim at npS hild : oiqm oiqH at hild oat amo oiba arzh iSral : okSmeo ki arqlos mlk bihodh tHt hordos abio ira llkt Smh oizoh bHlom oilk lo al arzot hglil : oiba oiSb beir aSr Smh nzrt lmlat hdbr hnamr el pi hnbiaim ki nzri iqra lo :

3

bimim hhm ba ioHnn hmTbil oihi qra bmdbr ihodh lamr : Sobo ki mlkot hSmim hgieh : hla ch hoa aSr nba elio iSeiho hnbia lamr qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro mslotio : ohoa ioHnn lboSo Ser gmlim oacor eor bmtnio omaklo Hgbim odbS hier : oizao alio iSbi iroSlim okl ihodh okl kkr hirdn : oiTblo el ido birdn mtodim at HTatm : oihi kraoto rbim mn hproSim ohzdoqim ngSim lTbilto oiamr lhm ildi hzpeonim mi hSkil atkm lhmlT mn hqzp hba : lkn eSo pri hraoi ltSobh : oal tHSbo blbbkm lamr abrhm hoa abino ki ani amr lkm ki mn habnim halh ikol halhim lhqim bnim labrhm : okbr hoSm hgrcn el SrS hezim ohnh kl ez aSr ainno eSh pri Tob igde oiSlk baS : hn anki Tobl atkm bmim ltSobh ohba aHri Hcq hoa mmni aSr ainni kdi lSat nelio ohoa iTbl atkm broH hqdS obaS : aSr bido hmcrh ocrh at grno oasp at dgno al aozro oat hmz iSrpno baS aSr la tkbh : oiba ihoSe mn hglil hirdnh al ioHnn lhTbl el ido : oioHnn HSk aoto lamr ani zrik lhTbl el idk oath ba ali : oien ihoSe oiamr alio hniHh li ki kn naoh lno lmla kl hzdqh oinH lo : oihi kaSr nTbl ihoSe oimhr lelot mn hmim ohnh nptHo lo hSmim oira at roH alhim iordt kionh onHh elio : ohnh qol mn hSmim aomr ch bni ididi aSr rzth npSi bo :

4
