ac nSa hroH at ihoSe hmdbrh lmen insho hSTn : oihi aHri zomo arbeim iom oarbeim lilh oireb : oigS alio hmnsh oiamr am bn halhim ath amr labnim halh othiin llHm : oien oiamr hn ktob la el hlHm lbdo iHih hadm ki el kl moza pi ii : oiSaho hSTn al eir hqdS oiemidho el pnt bit hmqdS : oiamr alio am bn halhim ath htnpl lmTh ki ktob ki mlakio izoh lk oel kpim iSaonk pn tgp babn rglk : oiamr alio ihoSe oeod ktob la tnsh at ihoh alhik : oiosp hSTn oiSaho al hr gbh mad oiraho at kl mmlkot tbl okbodn : oiamr alio at kl cat lk atnnh am tqd otStHoh li : oiamr alio ihoSe sor mmni hSTn ki ktob lihoh alhik tStHoh oaoto lbdo tebd : oirp mmno hSTn ohnh ngSo alio mlakim oiSrtoho : oihi kSmeo ki hsgiro at ioHnn oilk lo arz hglil : oiecb at nzrt oiba oiSb bkpr nHom aSr el Spt him bgbol cblon onptli : lmlat hnamr el pi iSeiho hnbia lamr : arzh cblon oarzh nptli drk him ebr hirdn glil hgoim : hem hhlkim bHSk rao aor gdol oiSbi barz zlmot aor ngh elihm : mn het hhia hHl ihoSe lqra qroa oamor Sobo ki hgieh mlkot hSmim : oihi bhthlko el id im hglil oira Sni anSim aHim at Smeon hnqra pTros oat andri aHio ohmh mSlikim mzodh bim ki digim hio : oiamr alihm lko aHri oaSimkm ldigi anSim : oiecbo mhrh at hmkmrot oilko aHrio : oihi kebro mSm oira Sni anSim aHim aHrim at ieqb bn cbdi oat ioHnn aHio banih em cbdi abihm mtqnim at mkmrotm oiqra alihm : oiecbo mid at hanih oat abihm oilko aHrio : oisb ihoSe bkl hglil oilmd bbti knsiotihm oibSr bSort hmlkot oirpa kl mHlh okl mdoh bem : oiza Smeo bkl arz soria oibiao alio at kl hHolim hmenim bkl Hlim omkaobim oaHoci Sdim omki irH onki abrim oirpam : oilko aHrio hmnim hmnim mn hglil omn eSr herim omiroSlim oihodh omebr lirdn :

5

oihi kraoto at hmon hem oiel hhrh oiSb Sm oigSo alio tlmidio : oiptH at piho oilmd aotm lamr : aSri enii roH ki lhm mlkot hSmim : aSri hablim ki hm inHmo : aSri henoim ki hmh iirSo harz : aSri hrebim ohzmaim lzdqh ki hm iSbeo : aSri hrHmnim ki hm irHmo : aSri bri lbb ki hm iHco at halhim : aSri rdpi Slom ki bni alhim iqrao : aSri hnrdpim el dbr hzdqh ki lhm mlkot hSmim : aSrikm am iHrpo oirdpo atkm oidbro bSqr elikm kl re bebori : SmHo ogilo ki Skrkm rb bSmim ki kn rdpo at hnbiaim aSr hio lpnikm : atm mlH harz oam hmlH hih tpl bmh imlH hn la izlH eod lkl ki am lhSlik Hozh ohih mrms lbni adm : atm aor heolm eir iSbt el hhr la tokl lhstr : gm ain mdliqim nr oSmim aoto tHt haiph ki am el hmnorh oiar lkl anSi hbit : kn iar aorkm lpni bni hadm lmen irao meSikm hTobim oSbHo at abikim SbSmim : al tHSbo ki bati lhpr at htorh ao at dbri hnbiaim la bati lhpr ki am lmlat : ki amn amr ani lkm ed ki iebro hSmim oharz la tebr iod aHt ao qoz aHd mn htorh ed aSr ieSh hkl : lkn mi aSr ipr aHt mn hmzot hqTnot halh okn ilmd at bni hadm qTon iqra bmlkot hSmim oaSr ieSh oilmd aotn hoa gdol iqra bmlkot hSmim : ki ani amr lkm am la trbh zdqtkm mzdqt hsoprim ohproSim la tbao al mlkot hSmim : Smetm ki namr lqdmonim la trzH oaSr irzH mHib hoa lbit din : abl ani amr lkm kl aSr iqzp el aHio Hnm mHib hoa lbit din oaSr iamr al aHio rqa mHib hoa lsnhdrin oaSr iamr ath hnbl mHib laS gihnm : lkn am tqrib qrbnk al hmcbH oSm tckr ki iS laHik dbr elik : ecob tecb Sm at qrbnk lpni hmcbH oqdm llkt lkpr pni aHik oaHri kn boa hqrb at qrbnk : mhr htrzh laiS ribk beodk bdrk ato pn isgir atk aiS ribk al hSpT ohSpT isgirk lSoTr ohSlkt at bit hkla : amn amr ani lk la tza mSm ed aSr Slmt at hproTh haHronh : Smetm ki namr lqdmonim la tnap : abl ani amr lkm kl aSr ibiT baSh lHmd aoth nap naph blbo : oam tkSilk ein imink nqr aoth ohSlk mmk ki Tob lk aSr iabd aHd mabrik mrdt kl gopk al gihnm : oam idk himnit tkSilk qzz aoth ohSlk mmk ki Tob lk aSr iabd aHd mabrik mrdt kl gopk al gihnm : onamr aiS aSr iSlH at aSto ontn lh spr kritot : abl ani amr lkm hmSlH at aSto blti el dbr cnot eSh ath napt ohlqH at hgroSh lo laSh nap hoa : eod Smetm ki namr lqdmonim la tSbe lSqr oSlm lihoh Sbeotik : abl ani amr lkm la tSbeo kl Sboeh la bSmim ki ksa alhim hmh : ola barz ki hdom rglio hia ola biroSlim ki hia qrit mlk rb : ap braSk al tSbe ki ain bikltk lhpk Ser aHd llbn ao lSHr ak ihi dbrin hn hn la la ohiotr malh mn hre hoa : : Smetm ki namr ein tHt ein Sn tHt Sn : abl ani amr lkm al ttqommo lre ak hmkh aotk el hlpi himnit hTh lo gm at haHrt : oaSr iHpz lrib emk olqHt at ktntk tn lo gm at Hmeil : ohans aotk llkt emo drk mil lk ato Snim : hSal matk tn lo ohba llot mmk al tSb pnio : Smetm ki namr oahbt lrek oSnat at aibk : abl ani amr lkm ahbo at aibikm brko at mqqlikm hiTibo lSnaikm ohtpllo bed mkaibikm ordpikm : lmen thio bnim labikm SbSmim aSr hoa mcriH SmSo lreim olTobim ommTir el hzdiqim ogm el hrSeim : ki am tahbo at ahbikm mh hoa Skrkm hla gm hmksim ieSo cat : oam tSalo lSlom aHikm blbd mh itron lkm hla gm hmksim ieSo cat : lkn hio Slmim kaSr abikm SbSmim Slm hoa :

6

hSmro lkm meSot zdqtkm lpni bni adm lmen irao atkm oam la ain lkm Skr mat abikm SbSmim : lkn beSotk zdqh al trie lpnik bSopr kmeSh hHnpim bbti hknsiot obHrbot lmen ihllo aotm hamSim amn amr ani lkm ki lqHo at Skrm : oath beSotk zdqh al tde Smalk at aSr eSh imink : lmen thih zdqtk bstr oabik hrah bmstrim hoa bgloi igmlk : oki ttpll al thi kHnpim hahbim lhtpll bemdm bbti hknsiot oazl pnot hSoqim lmen irao lbni adm amn amr ani lkm ki lqHo at Skrm : oath ki ttpll boa bHdrk osgr dltk bedk ohtpll al abik aSr bstr oabik hrah bmstrim hoa bgloi igmlk : obhtpllkm al tpTpTo kgoim hHSbim ki bhrbot dbrihm iSmeo : oatm al tdmo lhm ki iode abikm kl zrkkm bTrm tSalo mmno : lkn kh ttpllo abino SbSmim itqdS Smk : tba mlkotk ieSh rzonk kmo bSmim kn barz : at lHm Hqno tn lno hiom : oslH lno at Hbotino kaSr slHno gm anHno lHibino : oal tbiano lidi nsion ki am Hlzno mn hre ki lk hmmlkh ohgborh ohtpart leolmi eolmim amn : ki am tslHo lbni adm at HTatm abikm SbSmim islH gm lkm : oam la tslHo lbni adm gm abikm la islH lkm at HTatikm : oki tzomo al thio cepim kHnpim hmSnim at pnihm lhraot zmim lbni adm amn amr ani lkm ki lqHo at Skrm : oath ki tzom sok at raSk orHz at pnik : lmen la trah bzomk lbni adm ki am labik aSr bstr oabik hrah bmstrim hoa bgloi igmlk : al tazro lkm aozrot barz aSr iaklom Sm ss orqb ognbim iHtro Sm ognbo : abl tazro lkm aozrot bSmim aSr ss orqb la iaklom Sm ognbim la iHtro Sm ola ignbo : ki bmqom aSr aozrkm bo Sm ihih gm lbbkm : nr hgop hoa hein oam eink hia tmimh kl gopk iaor : oam eink reh kl gopk iHSk ohnh am iHSk haor aSr bqrbk mh rb hHSk : la iokl aiS lebd Sni adnim ki am iSna at haHd oiahb at haHr ao idbq baHd oibch at haHr la toklo ebod at halhim oat hmmon : el kn amr ani lkm al tdago lnpSkm mh taklo omh tSto olgopkm mh tlbSo hla hnpS hia iqrh mn hmcon ohgop iqr mn hmlboS : hbiTo orao at eop hSmim aSr ainm creim oainm qzrim oainm aspim lasmim oabikm SbSmim mklkl atm hla atm nelitm elihm mad : omi ch mkm aSr bdagto iokl lhosip el qomto amh aHt : ollboS lmh tdago htbonno na al SoSni hSdh hzmHot ainn emlot oainn Tot : oani amr lkm ki gm Slmh bkl hdro la hih lboS kaHt mhnh : oam kkh mlbiS halhim at Hzir hSdh aSr hiom zmH omHr iSlk ltok htnor ap ki atkm qTni hamonh : lkn al tdago lamr mh nakl omh nSth omh nlbS : ki at kl alh mbqSim hgoim hla ide abikm aSr bSmim ki atm zrikim lkl alh : ak bqSo braSonh at mlkot alhim oat zdqto onosp lkm kl alh : lkn al tdago liom mHr ki iom mHr hoa idag lezmo odio liom zrto :

7

al tSpTo lmen la tSpTo : ki bmSpT aSr atm SpTim bo tSpTo obmdh aSr atm mddim bh imd lkm : olmh ch ath rah at hqsm bein aHik oat hqorh aSr beink la tbiT : oaik tamr al aHik hniHh li oasirh at hqsm meink ohnh hqorh beink : hHnp hsr braSonh at hqorh meink oaHri kn rah trah lhsir at hqsm mein aHik : al ttno at hqdS lklbim oal tSliko pninikm lpni hHcirim pn irmsom brglihm opno oTrpo atkm : Salo ointn lkm drSo otmzao dpqo oiptH lkm : ki kl hSal iqbl ohdrS imza ohdpq iptH lo : omi ch aiS mkm aSr iSal mmno bno lHm ontn lo abn : oki iSal mmno dg hitn lo nHS : hn atm hreim ideim ltt mtnot Tbot lbnikm ap ki abikm SbSmim itn ak Tob lSalim mato : lkn kl aSr tHpzo ki ieSo lkm bni hadm eSo lhm gm atm ki cat hia htorh ohnbiaim : bao bptH hzr ki rHb hptH omroH hdrk hmbia labdon orbim aSr ibao bo : omh zr hptH omozq hdrk hmbia lHiim omeTim hm aSr imzaoho : hSmro lkm mnbiai hSqr hbaim alikm blboS kbSim obqrbm cabim Trpim hmh : hkr tkiro aotm bprihm hiaspo enbim mn hqzim ao tanim mn hbrqnim : kn kl ez Tob eSh pri Tob ohmSHt eSh pri re : ez Tob la iokl eSot pri re oez mSHt la ieSh pri Tob : okl ez aSr la ieSh pri Tob igde oiSlk baS : lkn bprim tkiro aotm : la kl hamr li adni adni iboa al mlkot hSmim ki am heSh rzon abi SbSmim : ohih biom hhoa iamro rbim ali adnino adnino hla bSmk nbano obSmk grSno Sdim obSmk eSino gborot rbot : ac aenh bm lamr meolm la ideti atkm soro mmni peli haon : lkn kl hSme at dbri alh oeSh atm admho laiS Hkm aSr bnh at bito el hsle : oird hgSm oiSTpo hnhrot oiSbo hroHot oigeo bbit hhoa ola npl ki isd el hsle : okl hSme at dbri alh ola ieSh atm idmh laiS ber aSr bnh at bito el hHol : oird hgSm oiSTpo hnhrot oiSbo hroHot oipgeo bbit hhoa oipl othi mplto gdolh : oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at hdbrim halh oiStomm hmon hem el torto : ki hih mlmd aotm kbel gborh ola ksoprim :

8

oird mn hhr oilk aHrio hmon em rb : ohnh aiS mzre ba oiStHo lo oiamr adni am trzh tokl lThrni : oiSlH ihoSe at ido oige bo oiamr Hpz anki Thr omid nrpah zreto : oiamr alio ihoSe rah pn tspr laiS ki am lk lk ohrah al hkhn ohqrb at hqrbn aSr zoh mSh ledot lhm : oihi kbao al kpr nHom oigS alio Sr mah aHd oitHnn lo lamr : adni hnh neri npl lmSkb bbiti ohoa nkh abrim omenh ed mad : oiamr ihoSe alio aba oarpaho : oien Sr hmah oiamr adni nqlti mbak bzl qorti ak dbr na rq dbr onrpa neri : ki anki aiS nton tHt hSlTon ogm iS tHt idi anSi zba oamrti lch lk ohlk olch boa oba olebdi eSh cat oeSh : oiSme ihoSe oitmh oiamr al hhlkim aHrio amn amr ani lkm gm biSral la mzati amonh gdolh kcat : oani amr lkm rbim ibao mmcrH ommerb oisbo em abrhm oizHq oieqb bmlkot hSmim : abl bni hmlkot hmh igrSo al hHSk hHizon Sm thih hillh oHroq hSnim : oiamr ihoSe al Sr hmah lk okamontk kn ihih lk oirpa nero bSeh hhia : oiba ihoSe bith pTros oira at Hmoto nplt lmSkb ki aHcth hqdHt : oige bidh otrp mmnh hqdHt otqm otSrtm : oihi let erb oibiao alio rbim aHoci Sdim oigrS at hroHot bdbr oirpa at kl hHolim : lmlat at aSr dbr iSeiho hnbia lamr Hlino hoa nSa omkabino sblm : oihi kraot ihoSe hmon em rb sbibtio oizo lebr mSm al ebr him : oigS alio aHd hsoprim oiamr alio rbi alkh aHrik al kl aSr tlk : oiamr alio ihoSe lSoelim iS Hori epr oleop hSmim qnim obn hadm ain lo mqom lhniH Sm at raSo : oaHr mn htlmidim amr alio adni hniHh li braSonh llkt olqbr at abi : oiamr alio ihoSe lk aHri ohnH lmtim lqbr at mtihm : oird al hanih oirdo ato tlmidio : ohnh ser gdol hih bim otksh hanih bglim ohoa iSn : oigSo alio tlmidio oieiro aoto lamr hoSieno adnino abdno : oiamr alihm qTni hamonh lmh ch iratm oiqm oiger broHot obim othi dmmh gdolh : oitmho hanSim oiamro mi apoa hoa amr gm hroHot ohim lo iSmeon : oihi kbao al ebr him al arz hgrgSim oipgSoho Sni anSim aHoci Sdim izaim mbti hqbrot ohmh rgonim mad ed aSr la ikl aiS lebr bdrk hhoa : ohnh hm zeqim lamr mh lno olk ihoSe bn halhim hbat hlm lenotno bla etno : oedr Hcirim rbim hih Sm bmreh hrHq mhm : oitHnno alio hSdim lamr am tgrSno SlHno bedr hHcirim : oiamr alihm lko lkm oizao oibao bedr hHcirim ohnh hSter kl edr hHcirim mn hmord el him oimoto bmim : oinoso hreim oibao heirh oigido at hkl oat aSr neSh laHoci hSdim : ohnh kl heir izah lqrat ihoSe okraotm ato oibqSo mmno lebr mgbolm :

9

oird banih oiebr oiba al eiro : ohnh hm mbiaim alio aiS nkh abrim ohoa mSkb el hmTh oihi kraot ihoSe at amontm oiamr al nkh habrim Hcq bni nslHo lk HTatik : ohnh anSim mn hsoprim amro blbbm mgdp hoa : oira ihoSe at mHSbtm oiamr lmh tHSbo reh blbbkm : ki mh hnql hamr nslHo lk HTatik am amr qom hthlk : ak lmen tdeon ki bn hadm iS lo hSlTn barz lslH HTaim oiamr al nkh habrim qom Sa at mTtk olk lk al bitk : oiqm oilk lbito : ohmon hem kraotm cat hStommo oiSbHo at halhim aSr ntn SlTn kch lbni adm : oihi bebr ihoSe mSm oira aiS iSb bbit hmks oSmo mti oiamr alio lkh aHri oiqm oilk aHrik : oihi bhsbo bbito ohnh moksim oHTaim rbim bao oisbo em ihoSe otlmidio : oirao hproSim oiamro al tlmidio mdoe em hmoksim ohHTaim akl rbkm : oiSme cat ihoSe oiamr alihm hHcqim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHolim : oatm zao olmdo mh hoa Hsd Hpzti ola cbH ki la bati lqra at hzdiqim ki am at hHTaim ltSobh : oigSo alio tlmidi ioHnn oiamro mdoe anHno ohproSim zmim hrbh otlmidik ainm zmim : oiamr alihm ihoSe aik ioklo bni hHph lhtabl beod hHtn emhm hnh imim baim olqH matm hHtn oac izomo : ain mSim mTlit HdSh el Smlh blh ki tntq mlato mn hSmlh otre hqrieh : oain notnim iin HdS bnadot blim pn ibqeo hnadot ohiin iSpk ohnadot iabdo abl notnim at hiin hHdS bnadot HdSim oSnihm iHdo iSmro : oihi hoa mdbr alihm at alh ohnh aHd hSrim ba oiStHo lo oiamr eth ch mth bti ba na oSim at idk elih otHih : oiqm ihoSe oilk aHrio hoa otlmidio : ohnh aSh cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh ngSh maHrio otge bzizt bgdo : ki amrh blbh ak am age bbgdo aoSe : oipn ihoSe oira aoth oiamr Hcqi bti amontk hoSieh lk otoSe haSh mn hSeh hhia : oiba ihoSe al bit hSr oira at hmHllim bHlilim oat hem hhomh oiamr : soro mph ki la mth hildh ak iSnh hia oiSHqo lo : oihi aHri grS hem oiba hbith oiaHc bidh otqm hnerh : otza hSmoeh hcat bkl harz hhia : oiebr ihoSe mSm oilko aHrio Sni anSim eorim ohmh zeqem oamrim Hnno bn dod : okboao hbith ngSo alio heorim oiamr alihm ihoSe hmaminim atm ki iS lal idi leSot cat oiamro alio kn adnino : oige beinihm oiamr ieSh lkm kamontkm : otpqHnh einihm oiger bm ihoSe oiamr rao pn iode laiS : ohmh bzatm hSmieo at Smeo bkl harz hhia : hmh izao ohnh hbiao alio aiS alm aHoc Sd : okaSr grS hSd oidbr halm oitmh hmon hanSim oiamro meolm la nrath kcat biSral : ohproSim amro el idi Sr hSdim mgrS hoa at hSdim : oisb ihoSe bkl herim ohkprim oilmd bbti knsiotihm oibSr bSort hmlkot oirpa kl mHlh okl mdoh bem : obraoto at hhmnim nkmro rHmio elihm ki hm mtelpim ondHim kzan aSr ain lhm reh : ac idbr ltlmdidio oiamr rb hqzir ohpelim meTim : lkn htHnno al bel hqzir lSlH pelim lqziro :

10

oiqra alio at Snim eSr tlmidio oitn lhm SlTn el roHot hTmah lgrSm olrpoa kl Hli okl mdoh : oalh Smot Snim eSr hSliHim hraSon Smeon hnqra pTros oandri aHio ieqb bn cbdi oioHnn aHio : pilpos obr tlmi toma omti hmoks ieqb bn Hlpi olbi hmknh tdi : Smeon hqni oihodh aiS qriot aSr gm msr ato : at Snim heSr halh SlH ihoSe oizo atm lamr al drk hgoim al tlko oal eir hSmronim al tbao : ki am lko al hzan habdot lbit iSral : oblktkm qrao lamr lmkot hSmim qrbh lboa : rpao at hHolim Thro at hmzreim hqimo at hmtim oat hSdim grSo Hnm lqHtm Hnm ttno : la tqHo chb ola ksp ola nHSt bHgorikm : ola trmil ldrk ola Sti ktnot ola nelim ola mTh ki Soh hpel di mHito : okl eir okpr aSr tbao Smh drSo mi hoa hraoi lch btokh oSm Sbo ed ki tzao : obboakm al hbit Salo lo lSlom : ohih am raoi hbit iboa elio Slomkm oam ainno raoi Slomkm alikm iSob : okl aSr la iqbl atkm ola iSme ldbrikm zao lkm mn hbit hhoa omn heir hhia onero at epr rglikm : amn amr ani lkm ki iql larz sdom oemrh biom hdin mn heir hhia : hnni SlH atkm kkbSim bin hcabim lkn hio eromim knHSim otmimim kionim : ohSmro lkm mbni hadm ki imsro atkm lsnhdriot oiko atkm bSoTim bbti knsiotihm : olpni mSlim omlkim tobao lmeni ledot lhm olgoim : oki imsro atkm al tdago aik omh tdbro ki intn lkm bSeh hhia at aSr tdbro : ki la atm hm hmdbrim ki roH abikm hoa hmdbr bpikm : ohih aH imsr at aHio lmot oab imsr at bno oqmo bnim babotm oimito aotm : ohiitm Snoaim lkl adm lmen Smi ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe : oam irdpo atkm beir aHt noso leir aHrt ki amn amr ani lkm la tklo lebr eri iSral ed ki iboa bn hadm : ain tlmid elh el rbo oebd el adnio : dio ltlmid lhiot krbo olebd lhiot kadnio am lbel hbit qrao bel cbob ap lanSi bito : el kn la tiraom ki ain dbr mksh aSr la iglh oain nelm aSr la iode : at aSr ani amr lkm bHSk dbro baor oaSr ilHS lacnikm hSmieo el hggot : oal tirai mn hhrgim at hgop oat hnpS la ioklo lhrg ak tirao at aSr iokl labd gm at hnpS gm at hgop bgihnm : hla tmkrnh Sti zprim basr oaHt mhnh la tpol arzh mbledi abikm : oatm gm Serot raSkm nmnot kln : lkn al tirao hnkm iqrim mzprim rbot : hn kl aSr iodh bi lpni hadm aodh bo gm ani lpni abi SbSmim : oaSr ikHS bi lpni hadm akHS bo gm ani lpni abi SbSmim : al tHSbo ki bati lhTil Slom barz la bati lhTil Slom ki am Hrb : ki bati lhprid aiS mabio obt mamh oklh mHmoth : oaibi aiS anSi bito : hahb at abio oat amo iotr mmni ainno kdi li ohahb at bno obto iotr mmni ainno kdi li : oaSr la iqH at zlbo ohlk aHri ainno kdi li : hmza at npSo iabdnh ohmabd at npSo lmeni hoa imzanh : hmqbl atkm aoti hoa mqbl ohmqbl aoti hoa mqbl at aSr SlHni : hmqbl nbia lSm nbia Skr nbia iqH ohmqbl zdiq lSm zdiq Skr zdiq iqH : ohmSqh at aHd hqTnim halh rq kos mim qrim lSm tlmid amn amr ani lkm ki la iabd Skro :

11

oihi kklot ihoSe lzot at Snim eSr tlmidio oilk mSm llmd olqra berihm : oioHnn Sme bbit hshr at meSi hmSiH oiSlH Snim mtlmidio : oiamr alio hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr : oien ihoSe oiamr lhm lko hgido lioHnn at aSr Smetm oraitm : eorim raim opsHim mthlkim mzreim mThrim oHrSim Somein omtim qmim oeniim mtbSri ihoSeh hm : oaSri aSr la ikSl bi : hmh hlko lhm oihoSe hHl ldbr al hmon hem el adot ioHnn oiamr mh ch izatm hmdbrh lraot hqnh aSr inoe broH : oam la mh ch izatm lraot haiS lboS bgdi ednim hnh hlbSim ednim bbti hmlkim hmh : oam la mh ch izatm lraot am aiS nbia hn ani amr lkm ki gm gdol hoa mnbia : ki ch hoa aSr ktob elio hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh rdkk lpnik : amn amr ani lkm la qm bilodi aSh aiS gdol mioHnn hmTbil ak hqTn bmlkot hSmim gdol hoa mmno : omimi ioHnn hmTbil ed hnh mlkot hSmim ntpSh bHcqh ohmtHcqim iHTpoh : ki kl hnbiaim ohtorh edi ioHnn nbao : oam trzo lqbl hnh hoa alih hetid lboa : mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oal mi admh at hdor hch domh hoa lildim hiSbim bSoqim oqraim lHbrihm lamr : Hllno lkm bHlilim ola rqdtm qonno lkm qinh ola spdtm : ki ba ioHnn la akl ola Sth oiamro Sd bo : oiba bn hadm ohoa akl oSth oiamro hnh aiS coll osba oahb moksim oHTaim onzdqh hHkmh mat bnih : ac hHl lger berim aSr rb gborotio neSo btokn ola Sbo : aoi lk korcin aoi lk bit zidh ki hgborot aSr neSo bqrbkn lo bzor obzidon neSo hla kbr Sbo bSq oapr : abl ani amr lkm ki biom hdin iql lzor ozidon iotr mkm : oat kpr nHom hmrommh ed hSmim ed Saol tordi ki hgborot aSr neSo btokk lo bsdom neSo ki eth emdh el tlh ed hiom hch : abl ani amr lkm ki biom hdin iql ladmt sdom mmk : bet hhia enh ihoSe oamr aodk abi adon hSmim oharz ki hstrt at alh mn hHkmim ohnbonim oglitm leollim : hn abi ki kn hih rzon lpnik : hkl nmsr li mat abi oain mkir at hbn blti hab oain mkir at hab blti hbn oaSr iHpz hbn lgloto lo : lko ali kl hemlim ohTeonim oani aniH lkm : qblo elikm at eli olmdo mmni ki eno oSpl roH anki otmzao mrgoe lnpStikm : ki eli neim hoa oql mSai :

12

bet hhia ebr ihoSe bin hqmh biom hSbt otlmidio rebo oiHlo lqTp mlilt oiaklo : oirao hproSim oiamro lo hnh tlmidik eSim at aSr asor leSot bSbt : oiamr alihm hla qratm at aSr eSh dod bhito reb hoa ohanSim aSr ato : ki ba al bit halhim oiakl at lHm hpnim aSr ainno mtr lo olanSio laklh rq lkhnim lbdm : ao hla qratm btorh ki bSbtot iHllo hkhnim at hSbt bmqdS oain lhm eon : abl ani amr lkm ki iS ph gdol mn hmqdS : olo idetm mh hoa Hsd Hpzti ola cbH la hrSetm at hnqim : ki bn hadm hoa gm adon hSbt : oiebr mSm al bit knstm : ohnh Sm aiS aSr ido ibSh oiSaloho lamr hmtr lrpa bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh : oiamr alihm mi haiS bkm aSr lo kbS aHd onpl bbor bSbt ola iHciq bo oielno : omh iqr adm mn hkbS lkn mtr lhiTib bSbt : oiamr al haiS pST at idk oipST ath otrpa otSb kido haHrt : oiza hproSim oitiezo elio labdo : oide ihoSe oisr mSm oilk aHrio hmon em rb oirpam klm : oizo atm bgerh Sla iglho : lmlat at aSr dbr iSeiho hnbia lamr : hn ebdi bHrti bo ididi rzth npSi ntti roHi elio omSpT lgoim iozia : la izeq ola iSa ola iSme bHoz qolo : qnh rzoz la iSbor opSth khh la ikbnh ed iozia lnzH mSpT : olSmo goim iiHlo : ac hoba alio aiS eor oalm aSr aHco Sd oirpaho oidbr halm ogm rah : oiStommo kl hmon hem oiamro hki ch hoa bn dod : ohproSim kSmem cat amro ch ainno mgrS at hSdim ki am el idi bel cbob Sr hSdim : oihoSe ide at mHSbotm oiamr alihm kl mmlkh hnHlqh el ezmh tHrb okl eir obit hnHlqim el ezmm la ikono : ohSTn am igrS at hSTn nHlq el ezmo oaikkh tkon mmlkto : oam ani mgrS at hSdim bbel cbob bnikm bmi hm mgrSim atm el kn hmh ihio SpTikm : ak am broH alhim ani mgrS at hSdim hnh hgieh alikm mlkot halhim : ao aik iokl aiS lboa lbit hgbor olgcl at klio am la iasr braSonh at hgbor oaHr iSsh at bito : kl aSr ainno ati hoa lngdi oaSr ainno mkns ati hoa mpcr : el kn ani amr lkm kl HTa ogdop islH ladm ak gdop hroH la islH ladm : okl aSr idbr dbr Hrph el bn hadm islH lo ohmHrp at roH hqdS la islH lo la beolm hch ola beolm hba : ao eSo at hez Tob oprio Tob ao eSo at hez mSHt oprio mSHt ki bprio nkr hez : ildi hzpeonim aikh toklo lmll Tob oatm reim ki mSpet hlb imll hph : haiS hTob maozr lbo hTob mozia at hTob ohaiS hre maozr hre mozia re : oani amr lkm kl mlh bTlh aSr idbro bni hadm itno elih HSbon biom hdin : ki mdbrik tzdq omdbrik tHib : oieno mn hsoprim ohproSim oiamro rbi Hpzno lraot aot midk : oien oiamr alihm dor re omnap mbqS lo aot oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia : ki kaSr hih ionh bmei hdg SlSh imim oSlSh lilot kn ihih bn hadm blb hadmh SlSh imim oSlSh lilot : anSi ninoh iqomo bmSpT em hdor hch oirSieoho ki hm Sbo bqriat ionh ohnh ph gdol mionh : mlkt timn tqom bmSpT em hdor hch otrSieno ki bah mqzot harz lSme at Hkmh Slmh ohnh ph gdol mSlmh : ohroH hTmah aHri zath mn hadm tSTT bmqmot zih lbqS lh mnoHh ola tmzanh : ac tamr aSobh al biti aSr izati mSm obah omzah ato mpnh omTaTa omhdr : oaHr tlk olqHh alih Sbe roHot aHrot reot mmnh obao oSkno Sm ohith aHrit hadm hhoa reh mraSito kn ihih gm ldor hre hch : eodno mdbr al hmon hem ohnh amo oaHio emdo bHoz mbqSim ldbr ato : oigd alio hnh amk oaHik emdim bHoz ombqSim ldbr atk : oien oiamr al haiS hmgid lo mi hia ami omi hm aHi : oiT ido el tlmidio oiamr hnh ami oaHi : ki kl aSr ieSh rzon abi SbSmim hoa aHi oaHoti oami :

13

oihi biom hhoa oiza ihoSe mn hbit oiSb el him : oiqhlo alio hmon em rb oird al hanih oiSb bh okl hem emdim el Spt him : oirb ldbr alihm bmSlim lamr hnh hcore iza lcre : obcreo npl mn hcre el id hdrk oiba heop oiaklho : oiS aSr npl el mqmot sle aSr ain lo Sm admh hrbh oimhr lzmH ki la hih lo emq admh : oihi kcrH hSmS oizrb oiibS ki la hih lo SrS : oiS aSr npl bin hqzim oielo hqzim oimekho : oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oitn pri ch mah Serim och SSim och SlSim : mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oigSo alio htlmidim oiamro lmh ch bmSlim tdbr alihm : oien oiamr ki lkm ntn ldet at sodot mlkot hSmim olhm la ntn : ki mi SiS lo ntn intn lo oiedip omi Sain lo gm at aSr iS lo iqH mmno : el kn bmSlim adbr alihm ki bratm la irao obSmem la iSmeo ap la ibino : otqim bhm nboat iSeiho hamrt Smeo Smoe oal tbino orao rao oal tdeo : ki hSmn lb hem hch oacnio hkbd oeinio hSe pn irah beinio obacnio iSme olbbo ibin oSb orpa lo : oatm aSri einikm ki trainh oacnikm ki tSmenh : ki amn amr ani lkm nbiaim ozdiqim rbim nkspo lrat at aSr atm raim ola raoho olSme at aSr atm Smeim ola Smeoho : lkn atm Smeo na at mSl hcore : kl aiS Sme at dbr hmlkot ola ibinho oba hre oHTp at hcroe blbbo hoa hncre el id hdrk : ohncre el hsle hoa hSme at hdbr oimhr oiqHno bSmHh : ak ain lo SrS tHtio orq lSeh iemd obhiot zrh ordiph el adot hdbr mid nkSl : ohncre bin hqzim hoa hSme at hdbr odagt heolm hch omrmt heSr imeko at hdbr opri la ihih lo : ohncre el hadmh hTobh hoa hSme at hdbr ombin ato ap ieSh pri ontn ch mah Serim och SSim och SlSim : oiSm lpnihm mSl aHr lamr mlkot hSmim domh laiS aSr cre cre Tob bSdho : oihi bnpl trdmh el hanSim oiba aibo oicre conin btok hHTim oilk lo : okaSr prH hdSa oieS pri oirao gm hconin : oigSo ebdi bel hbit oiamro alio adnino hla cre Tob cret bSdk omain lo hconin : oiamr lhm aiS aib eSh cat oiamro alio hebdim hiS at npSk ki nlk onlqT atm : oiamr la pn blqTkm at hconin tSrSo gm at hHTim : hniHo atm oigdlo Snihm iHd ed hqzir ohih bet hqzir amr lqozrim lqTo braSonh at hconin oagdo atm agdot lSrpm oat hHTim aspo laozri : oiSm lpnihm mSl aHr lamr mlkot hSmim domh lgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr lqHo aiS oicreho bSdho : ohoa qTn mkl hcroeim okaSr zmH gdol hoa mn hirqot ohih lez ed aSr ibao eop hSmim oqnno benpio : oiSa eod mSlo oiamr mlkot hSmim domh lSar aSr lqHto aSh otTmnho bSlS saim qmH ed ki iHmz klo : kl cat dbr ihoSe bmSlim al hmon hem obbli mSl la dbr alihm : lmlat at aSr dbr hnbia lamr aptHh bmSl pi abieh Hidot mni qdm : ac SlH ihoSe at hmon hem oiba hbith oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro bar na lno at mSl coni hSdh : oien oiamr alihm hcore at hcre hTob hoa bn hadm : ohSdh hoa heolm ohcre hTob bni hmlkot hm ohconin bni hre hmh : ohaib aSr crem hoa hSTn ohqzir hoa qz heolm ohqzrim hm hmlakim : ohnh kaSr ilqTo hconin onSrpo baS kn ihih bqz heolm hch : bn hadm iSlH at mlakio olqTo mmlkoto at kl hmkSlot oat kl peli haon : ohSliko atm al tnor haS Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim : ac ichiro hzdiqim kSmS bmlkot abihm mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : eod domh mlkot hSmim laozr Tmon bSdh aSr mzao aiS oiTmnho obSmHto ilk omkr at kl aSr lo oqnh at hSdh hhoa : eod domh mlkot hSmim lsHr hmbqS mrgliot Tbot : okaSr mza mrglit aHt iqrh mad hlk lo oimkr at kl aSr lo oiqn ath : eod domh mlkot hSmim lmkmrt aSr hordh lim ominim Sonim iaspo ltokh : okaSr nmlah helo ath al Spt him oiSbo oilqTo at hminim hTobim ltok hklim oat hmSHtim hSliko Hozh : kn ihih bqz heolm izao hmlakim ohbdilo at hrSeim mtok hzdiqim : ohSlikom al tnor haS Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim : oiamr alihm ihoSe hatm hbinotm at kl cat oiamro alio kn adnino : oiamr alihm el kn kl sopr hmlmd lmlkot hSmim domh laiS bel hbit hmozia maozro HdSot oiSnot : oihi kklot ihoSe at hmSlim halh oiebr mSm : oiba larzo oilmd atm bbit knstm ed ki hStommo oiamro main lch hHkmh hcat ohgborot : hla ch hoa bn hHrS hla amo Smh mrim oaHio ieqb oiosi oSmeon oihodh : oaHiotio hla kln atno hn omain aipoa lo kl alh : oihi lhm lmkSol oiamr ihoSe alihm ain hnbia nqlh ki am barzo obbito : ola eSh Sm gborot rbot mpni Hsr amontm :

14

bet hhia Sme hordos Sr rbe hmdinh at Sme ihoSe : oiamr al nerio ch hoa ioHnn hmTbil ohoa qm mn hmtim el kn hgborot pelot bo : ki hordos tpS at ioHnn oiasrho oiSimho bbit hshr bgll horodih aSt pilpos aHio : ki ioHnn amr alio la nkon hith lk laSh : oibqS hmito ak ira at hhmon ki lnbia HSbo ato : oihi biom hldt hordos otrqd bt horodih btokm otiTb beini hordos : oiSbe lh oiamr mh tSal npSk oatn lk : oamh Smh at hdbrim bpih otSal lamr tnh li ph bqerh at raS ioHnn hmTbil : oiezb hmlk ak bebor hSboeh ohmsbim emo zoh ltt lh : oiSlH oiSa at raS ioHnn melio bbit hshr : oibiao at raSo bqerh oitno lnerh otbiaho al amh : oigSo tlmidio oiSao at goito oiqbroh oilko oigido lihoSe : oihi kSmeo at cat oisr mSm banih al mqom Hrbh lbdd oiSmeo hmon hem oilko aHrio brglihm mn herim : oiza ihoSe oira hmon em rb oihmo meio elihm oirpa at hHlSim aSr bhm : oihi lpnot erb oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro hmqom Hrb ogm nTh hiom SlHh at hmon hem oilko al hkprim lqnot lhm akl : oiamr alihm ainm zrikim llkt tno atm lhm lakl : oiamro alio ain lno ph ki am HmSt kkrot lHm oSni dgim : oiamr hbiaom ali hlm : oizo at hem lSbt el hdSa oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk oiprs oitn at hlHm ltlmidim ohtlmidim ntno lem : oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Snim eSr slim mlaim : ohaklim hio kHmSt alpi aiS mlbd hnSim ohTp : oiaz ihoSe btlmidio lrdt banih lebr lpnih al ebr him ed aSr iSlH at hem : oaHri SlHo at hem elh hhrh bdd lhtpll oihi erb ohoa lbdo Smh : ohanih hlkh btok him otTrp mn hglim ki hroH lngdh : oihi baSmrt hrbieit oiba alihm ihoSe mthlk el pni him : ohtlmidim bratm aoto mthlk el pni him nbhlo lamr mrah roH hoa oizeqo mpHd : oidbr ihoSe ptam alihm Hcqo ki ani hoa al tirao : oien pTros oiamr alio am ath hoa adni zoh na ki aba alik el hmim : oiamr boa oird pTros mn hanih oithlk el hmim lboa al ihoSe : oihi krato at hroH ki Hcqh hia oiira oiHl lTbe oizeq lamr adni hoSieni : oimhr ihoSe lSlH at ido oiHcq bo oiamr alio qTn hamonh lmh lHq lbk : hm elo al hanih ohroH Skkh : oanSi hanih ngSo oiStHoo lo lamr bamt bn alhim ath : oiebro at him oibao arzh gnisr : oikiro ato anSi hmqom hhoa oiSlHo al kl sbibotihm oibiao alio at kl hHolim : oibqSo mmno ki igeo rq bzizt bgdo okl hngeim noSeo :

15

ac bao al ihoSe hsoprim ohproSim aSr miroSlim : oiamro mdoe tlmidik ebrim at qblt hcqnim ki ainm rHzim at idihm baklm lHm : oien oiamr alihm mdoe gm atm ebrim at mzot alhim bebor qbltkm : ki alhim zoh lamr kbd at abik oat amk omqll abio oamo mot iomt : oatm amrim hamr labio olamo qrbn kl mh Sath nhnh li ain elio lkbd at abio oat amo : otpro at dbr halhim bebor qbltkm : Hnpim hiTb nba elikm iSeiho lamr : hem hch ngS bpio obSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni : otho iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdim : oiqra al hem oiamr lhm Smeo ohbino : la hba al hph iTma at hadm ki am hioza mn hph hoa mTma at hadm : oigSo alio tlmidio oiamro hidet ki hproSim bSmem at hdbr hch nkSlo bo : oien oiamr kl mTe aSr la nTe abi SbSmim eqor ieqr : hniHo aotm mnhlim eorim hmh leorim oki iolik eor at heor onplo Snihm btok hbor : oien pTros oiamr alio bar lno at hmSl hch : oiamr ihoSe ednh gm atm bain binh : heod la tSkilo ki kl hba al hph iord al hkrS oiSpk mSm lmozaot : abl hioza mn hph ioza mn hlb ohoa mTma at hadm : ki mn hlb iozaot mHSbot re rziHot naopim cnonim gnbot ediot Sqr ogdopim : alh hm hmTmaim at hadm abl akol bli nTilt idim la iTma at hadm : oiza ihoSe mSm oisr al glilot zor ozidon : ohnh aSh knenit izah mn hgbolot hhm otzeq alio lamr Hnni adni bn dod ki bti menh mad el idi Sd : ohoa la enh ath dbr oigSo tlmidio oibqSo mmno lamr SlHh ki zeqt hia aHrino : oien oiamr la SlHti ki am al hzan habdot lbit iSral : ohia bah otStHo lo lamr adni ecrni : oien oiamr la Tob lqHt at lHm hbnim olhSliko lzeiri hklbim : otamr kn adni aps ki gm zeiri hklbim iaklo mprorim hnplim mel SlHn adnihm : oien ihoSe oiamr alih aSh gdlh amontk ihi lk krzonk otrpa bth mn hSeh hhia : oiebr ihoSe mSm oiba al im hglil oiel hhrh oiSb Sm : oibao alio hmon em rb oemhm psHim eorim HrSim qTeim orbim khmh oipilom lrgli ihoSe oirpam : oitmho hem braotm at halmim mdbrim ohqTeim briaim ohpsHim mthlkim oheorim raim oiSbHo at alhi iSral : oiqra ihoSe al tlmidio oiamr nkmro rHmi el hem ki ch SlSt imim emdo emdi oain lhm mh lakl oainni abh lSlHm rebim pn itelpo bdrk : oiamro alio htlmidim main lno di lHm bmdbr lhSbie at hhmon hgdol hch : oiamr ihoSe alihm kmh kkrot lHm lkm oiamro Sbe omeT dgim qTnim : oizo at hmon hem lSbt larz : oiqH at Sbe kkrot hlHm oat hdgim oibrk oiprs oitn al htlmidim ohtlmidim ntno lem : oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Sbeh dodim mlaim : ohaklim hio arbet alpi aiS mlbd hnSim ohTp : oiSlH at hem oird banih oiba al gbol mgdla :

16

oigSo hproSim ohzdoqim lnsoto oiSalo mato lhraotm aot mn hSmim : oien oiamr lhm berb tamro iom zH ihih ki admo hSmim : obbqr tamro hiom ser ki admo ohtqdro hSmim Hnpim atm at pni hSmim idetm lbHn oatot hetim la toklo : dor re omnap bqS lo aot oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia oiecbm oilk lo : okboa htlmidim al ebr him SkHo lqHt atm lHm : oiamr ihoSe alihm rao ohSmro lkm mSar hproSim ohzdoqim : oiHSbo blbbm lamr ki la lqHno atno lHm : oide ihoSe oiamr alihm qTni hamonh mh tHSbo blbbkm ki la lqHtm atkm lHm : heod la tSkilo ola tckro at HmSt kkrot hlHm lHmSt alpi aiS okmh slim nSatm : oat Sbe kkrot lHm larbet alpi aiS okmh dodim nSatm : aik la tbino ki la el hlHm amrti alikm hSmro lkm mSar hproSim ohzdoqim : ac hbino ki la amr lhSmr mSar hlHm ki am mlmod hproSim ohzdoqim : oihi kboa ihoSe al glilot qisrin Sl pilpos oiSal at tlmidio lamr mh amrim hanSim eli mi hoa bn hadm : oiamro iS amrim ioHnn hmTbil hoa oaHrim amrim aliho oiS amrim irmiho ao aHd mn hnbiaim : oiamr alihm oatm mh tamro mi ani : oien Smeon pTros oiamr ath hoa hmSiH bn alhim Hiim : oien oiamr alio aSrik Smeon br ionh ki bSr odm la glh lk at cat ki am abi SbSmim : oap ani amr alik ki ath pTros oel hsle hch abnh at qhlti oSeri Saol la igbro elih : oatn lk at mptHot mlkot hSmim okl aSr tasr el harz asor ihih bSmim okl aSr ttir el harz mtr ihih bSmim : ac zoh at htlmidim bgerh lblti hgid laiS ki hoa ihoSe hmSiH : mn het hhia hHl ihoSe lhorot at tlmidio Shoa zrik llkt iroSlim oienh hrbh bidi hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oihrg obiom hSliSi qom iqom : oiqHho pTros oiHl lger bo lamr Hs lk adni al ihi lk kcat : oipn oiamr lpTros sor meli hSTn lmkSol ath li ki ain lbk ldbri alhim ki am ldbri bni adm : oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio aiS ki iHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo onSa at zlbo ohlk aHri : ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr tabd lo npSo lmeni hoa imzanh : ki mh ioeil hadm ki iqnh at kl heolm onpSo tSHt ao mh itn hadm pdion npSo : ki etid bn hadm lboa bkbod abio em mlakio oac iSlm lkl aiS kmeSho : amn amr ani lkm ki iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao at bn hadm ba bmlkoto :

17

omqz SSt imim lqH lo ihoSe at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn aHio oielm bdd el hr gboh : oiStnh leinihm oichiro pnio kSmS obgdio kaor hlbino : ohnh nrao alihm mSh oaliho mdbrim ato : oien pTros oiamr al ihoSe adni Tob hiotno ph am tHpz neSh na ph SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt : eodno mdbr ohnh enn aor hzl elihm ohnh qol mtok henn amr ch bni ididi aSr rziti bo alio tSmeon : oihi kSme htlmidim oiplo el pnihm oiirao mad : oigS ihoSe oige bm oiamr qomo oal tirao : oiSao einihm ola rao aiS blti at ihoSe lbdo : obrdtm mn hhr zoh ihoSe atm lamr la tgido laiS at dbr hmrah ed am qm bn hadm mem hmtim : oiSalho tlmidio lamr lmh ch amrim hsoprim ki aliho boa iboa braSonh : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hnh aliho ba braSonh ohSib at hkl : abl amr ani lkm ki aliho kbr ba ola hkirho oieSo bo krzonm okn gm bn hadm ienh el idm : ac hbino htlmidim ki el ioHnn hmTbil dbr alihm : oihi kboam al hmon hem oigS alio aiS oikre el brkio lngdo : oiamr adni rHm na el bni ki mkh irH hoa oHlio re ki pemim rbot hoa npl baS opemim rbot al tok hmim : oabia ato al tlmidik ola iklo lrpa lo : oien ihoSe oiamr hoi dor blti mamin optltl ed mti ahih emkm ed mti asbl atkm hbiao aoto ali hnh : oiger bo ihoSe oiza hSd mmno oirpa hner mn hSeh hhia : oigSo htlmidim al ihoSe ohoa lbdo oiamro mdoe anHno la iklno lgrSo : oiamr ihoSe alihm mpni aSr ainkm maminim ki amn amr ani lkm am iS lkm amonh kgrgr hHrdl oamrtm al hhr hch hetq mch Smh onetq mmqomo oain dbr aSr ibzr mkm : abl hmin hch la iza ki am btplh obzom : oihi bhthlkm barz hglil oiamr alihm ihoSe etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi anSim : oihrgho obiom hSliSi qom iqom oitezbo mad : oihi kboam al kpr nHom oigSo al pTros gbi mHzit hSql oiamro hla itn rbkm at mHzit hSql : oiamr hn obboao hbith qdm ato ihoSe lSal mh detk Smeon mlki harz mmi iqHo mks oms mat bnihm ao mat hcrim : oiamr pTros alio mat hcrim oiamr lo ihoSe am kn apoa hbnim HpSim hmh : ak lmen la nhih lhm lmkSol lk al him ohSlkt al toko Hkh oat hdg hraSon aSr ielh Saho okaSr tptH at pio tmza bo astira aoto qH lk ontt lhm bedi obedk :

18

bSeh hhia ngSo htlmidim al ihoSe oiamro mi apoa gdol mHbrio bmlkot hSmim : oiqra ihoSe alio ild qTn oiemidho btokm : oiamr amn amr ani lkm am la tSobo lhiot kildim la tboa al mlkot hSmim : lkn kl hmSpil at ezmo kild hch hoa hgdol bmlkot hSmim : okl aSr iqbl ild aHd kch bSmi aoti hoa mqbl : okl hmkSil at aHd mn hqTnim halh hmaminim bi noH lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro oTbe bmzolot im : aoi leolm mpni hmkSlim ki hmkSlim zrikim lboa abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido iboa hmkSol : oam tkSilk idk ao rglk qzz aoth ohSlk mmk Tob lk lboa lHiim psH ao qTe mhiot lk Sti idim ao Sti rglim otSlk al aS eolm : oam eink tkSlik nqr aoth ohSlk mmk Tob lk lboa lHiim bein aHt mhiot lk Sti einim otSlk al aS gihnm : rao pn tbco aHd wqTnim halh ki amr ani lkm ki mlakihm raim tmid at pni abi SbSmim : ki ba bn hadm lhoSie at habd : mh detkm ki ihio laiS mah kbSim oteh aHd mhm hla iecb at htSeim otSeh el hhrim ohlk lbqS at hteh : ohih kaSr imzaho amn amr ani lkm ki iSmH elio iotr mel htSeim otSeh aSr la teo : kn ainno rzon mlpni abikm SbSmim ki iabd aHd mn hqTnim halh : oki iHTa lk aHik lk ohokHt aoto bink obino lbdo oam iSme alik qnit lk aHik : oam la iSme qH emk eod aHd ao Snim lmen el pi Snim ao SlSh edim iqom kl dbr : oam la iSme alihm hgd al hqhl oam la iSme gm al hqhl ohih lk kgoi okmoks : amn amr ani lkm kl aSr tasro el harz asor ihih bSmim okl aSr ttiro el harz mtr ihih bSmim : oeod amr ani lkm Snim mkm ki ioezo iHdo barz el kl dbr aSr iSalo hih ihih lhm mat abi SbSmim : ki bkl mqom aSr Snim ao SlSh naspo bSmi Sm ani btokm : oigS alio pTros oiamr lo adni kmh pemim iHTa li aHi oslHti lo hed Sbe pemim : oiamr alio ihoSe la amr lk ed Sbe pemim ki am ed Sbeim oSbe : el kn domh mlkot hSmim lmlk bSr odm aSr Hpz leSot HSbon em ebdio : okaSr hHl lHSb hoba lpnio aiS aSr Hib lo eSrt alpim kkri ksp : ola hih lo lSlm oizo adnio lmkr aoto oat aSto oat bnio oat kl aSr lo okn iSlm : oipl hebd oiStHo lo lamr adni hark li apk oat kl aSlmh lk : oihmo rHmi adoni hebd hhoa oipTrho oiSmT lo at hHob : oiza hebd hhoa mlpnio oimza aHd mHbrio hebdim ohoa Hib lo mah dinrim oiHcq bo oiHnqho lamr Slm at aSr ath Hib li : oipl Hbro lpni rglio oibqS mmno lamr hark li apk oaSlmh lk hkl : ohoa man oilk oiSlikho bmSmr ed ki iSlm lo at Hobo : oHbrio hebdim rao at hneSh oiezbo mad oibao oigido ladnihm at kl aSr neSh : oiqra alio adnio oiamr lo ath hebd hre at kl hHob hhoa hSmTti lk ien aSr bqSt mmni : hla hih lk gm ath lrHm el hebd Hbrk kaSr rHmti ani elik : oiqzp adnio oisgr aoto lmisrim ed ki iSlm at kl Hobo : kkh ieSh lkm gm abi SbSmim am la tslHo aiS aiS laHio bkl lbbkm at HTatm :

19

oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at hdbrim halh oise mn hglil oiba al gbol ihodh bebr hirdn : oilko aHrio hmon em rb oirpam Sm : oigSo alio hproSim lnsoto lamr hiokl aiS lSlH at aSto el kl dbr : oien oiamr alihm hla qratm ki eSh braSit ckr onqbh eSh atm : oamr el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto ohio Snihm lbSr aHd : am kn ainm eod Snim ki am bSr aHd lkn at aSr Hbr halhim al ipridno hadm : oiamro alio olmh ch zoh mSh ltt lh spr kritt olSlHh : oiamr alihm bebor qSi lbbkm hniH lkm mSh lSlH at nSikm ak mraS la hith kkh : oani amr lkm hmSlH at aSto blti el dbr cnot olqH lo aHrt nap hoa ohlqH at hgroSh nap hoa : oiamro alio htlmidim am kkh hoa enin aiS oaSto la Tob lqHt aSh : oiamr alihm la iokl kl adm qbl at hdbr hch ki am alh aSr ntn lhm lhbin : iS srisim aSr noldo kn mbTn amm oiS srisim hmsrsim el idi adm oiS srisim aSr srso at ezmm lmen mlkot hSmim mi Siokl lqbl iqbl : ac ibiao alio ildim lmen iSim elihm at idio oitpll elihm oigero bm htlmidim : ohoa ihoSe amr hniHo lildim oal tmneom mboa ali ki lalh mlkot hSmim : oiSm at idio elihm oiebr mSm : ohnh aiS ngS alio oiamr rbi hTob ai ch hTob aSr aeSno lqnot Hii eolmim : oiamr alio mh tqrani Tob ain Tob ki am aHd halhim oam Hpzk lboa al hHiim Smr at hmzot : oiamr alio mh hnh oiamr ihoSe alh hn la trzH la tnap la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr : kbd at abik oat amk oahbt lrek kmok : oiamr alio hbHor at kl alh Smrti mneori omh Hsrti eod : oiamr ihoSe alio am Hpzk lhiot Slm lk mkr at rkSk otn leniim ohih lk aozr bSmim oSob hlm olk aHri : oihi kSme hbHor at hdbr hch oilk mSm nezb ki hio lo nksim rbim : oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio amn amr ani lkm qSh leSir lboa al mlkot hSmim : oeod ani amr lkm ki nql lgml lebr drk nqb hmHT mba eSir al mlkot halhim : ohtlmidim kSmem cat hStommo mad oiamro mi apoa iokl lhoSe : oibT bn ihoSe oiamr lhm mbni adm ipla hdbr abl mhalhim la ipla kl dbr : oien pTros oiamr alio hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik mh ihih lno : oiamr ihoSe alihm amn amr ani lkm atm hhlkim aHri bhtHdS hbriah kaSr iSb bn hadm el ksa kbodo tSbo gm atm el Snim eSr ksaot lSpT at Snim eSr SbTi iSral : okl aiS aSr ecb at btio oat aHio oat aHiotio oat abio oat amo oat aSto oat bnio oat Sdotio lmen Smi hoa iqH mah Serim oHii eolmim iirS : oaolm rbim mn hraSonim aSr ihio aHronim omn haHronim ihio raSonim :

20

ki domh mlkot hSmim ladm bel bit aSr hSkim lzat bbqr lSkr pelim lkrmo : ohtnh em hpelim Skr dinr liom oiSlHm al krmo : oiza bSeh hSliSit oira aHrim emdim bTlim bSoq : oiamr lhm lko gm atm al krmi okiSr atn lkm oilko : oiza gm bSeh hSSit gm btSieit oieS kdbr hch : oiza bSet eSti eSrh oimza aHrim emdim oiamr alihm lmh atm emdim ph bTlim kl hiom : oiamro lo ki la Skr aotno aiS oiamr alihm lko gm atm al hkrm okiSr itn lkm : oihi berb oiamr bel hkrm al pqido qra at hpelim oSlm lhm at Skrm hHl baHronim oklh braSonim : oibao hnSkrim bSet aHt eSrh oiqHo aiS aiS dinr aHd : obba hraSonim dmo bnpSm ki iqHo iotr oiqHo gm hm aiS aiS dinr aHd : oihi bqHtm oilono el bel hbit lamr : alh haHronim la eSo ki am Seh aHt oath hSoitm alino aSr sblno at kbd hiom oat Hmo : oien oiamr al aHd mhm rei la eSqtik hla Skr dinr htnit emi : qH at Slk olk oani rzoni ltt gm lch haHron kmo lk : hla aokl leSot bSli krzoni ham tre eink el aSr Tob anki : kkh ihio haHronim raSonim ohraSonim ihio aHronim ki rbim hm hqroaim omeTim hnbHrim : oihi kelot ihoSe iroSlim oiqH alio at Snim heSr lbdm oiamr lhm bdrk : hnno elim iroSlimh obn hadm imsr lraSi hkhnim olsoprim ohrSieho lmot : omsro aoto lgoim lhtl bo olhkot aoto bSoTim olzlb aoto obiom hSliSi qom iqom : ac ngSh alio am bni cbdi em bnih otStHo lo lbqS mmno dbr : oiamr alih mh bqStk otamr alio amr na ki iSbo Sni bni alh aHd limink oaHd lSmalk bmlkotk : oien ihoSe oiamr la idetm at aSr Saltm hikl toklo Stot at hkos aSr ani etid lStoto ohTbl bTbilh aSr ani nbTl bh oiamro alio nokl : oiamr alihm hn at kosi tSto obTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh tTblo ak Sbt limimi olSmali ain bidi ltth blti laSr hokn lhm mat abi : oihi kaSr Smeo cat heSrh oikeso al Sni haHim : oihoSe qra lhm oiamr atm idetm ki Sri hgoim rdim bhm ohgdolim SlTim elihm : oatm al ihi kn binikm ki am hHpc lhiot gdol bkm ihi lkm lmSrt : ohHpz lhiot bkm lraS ihi lkm ebd : kaSr bn hadm la ba lmen iSrtoho ki am lSrt oltt at npSo kpr tHt rbim : oihi kzatm miriHo oilk aHrio hmon em rb : ohnh Sni eorim iSbim el id hdrk oiSmeo ki ihoSe ebr oizeqo lamr Hnno na adnino bn dod : oiger bm hem lhStiqm ohm hrbo lzeq oiamro adnino Hnno na bn dod : oiemd ihoSe oiqra lhm oiamr mh tHpzo oaeSh lkm : oiamro alio adnino eSh StpqHnh einino : orHmi ihoSe nkmro oige beinihm optam hHlo einihm lraot oilko aHrio :

21

oihi kaSr qrbo liroSlim obao al bit pgi bhr hcitim oiSlH ihoSe Snim mn htlmidim : oiamr alihm lko al hkpr aSr mmolkm Sm tmzao aton asorh oeir emh htiro atm ohbiao ali : oki iamr aiS alikm dbr oamrtm hadon zrik lhm obrge iSlHm : okl cat hith lmlat hnamr bid hnbia lamr : amro lbt zion hnh mlkk iboa lk eni orkb el Hmor oel eir bn atnot : oilko htlmidim oieSo kaSr zoh atm ihoSe : oibiao at haton oat heir oiSimo elihm at bgdihm oirkibho elihm : orb hhmon prSo at bgdihm el hdrk oaHrim krto enpi ezim oiSTHom el hdrk : ohmon hem hhlkim lpnio oaHrio qrao lamr hoSe na lbn dod brok hba bSm ihoh hoSe na bmromim : oihi bbao iroSlim othm kl heir lamr mi hoa ch : oiamro hmni hem ch hoa hnbia ihoSe mnzrt aSr bglil : oiba ihoSe al mqdS halhim oigrS mSm at kl hmokrim ohqonim bmqdS oihpk at SlHnot hSlHnim oat moSbot mkri hionim : oiamr alihm hn ktob ki biti bit tplh iqra oatm Smtm ato lmert prizim : oigSo alio eorim opsHim bmqdS oirpam : oihi kraot hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim at hnplaot aSr eSh oat hildim hzeqim bmqdS oamrim hoSe na lbn dod oiHr lhm : oiamro alio hSme ath at aSr alh amrim oiamr ihoSe alihm kn hki qra la qratm mpi eollim oionqim isdt ec : oiecbm oiza mHoz leir al bit hini oiln Sm : obbqr Sb al heir ohoa reb : oira tanh aHt el hdrk oiqrb alih ola mza bh maomh mlbd helim oiamr alih meth la ihih mmk pri ed eolm otibS htanh ptam : oirao htlmidim oitmho lamr aik ibSh htanh ptam : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm am thih lkm amonh oainkm mstpqim la lbd kmeSh htanh hcat teSo ki gm bamrkm al hhr hch hnSa ohetq al tok him hio thih : okl aSr tSalo btplh oatm maminim tqHho : oiba al hmqdS oihi blmdo Sm oigSo alio raSi hkhnim ocqni hem oiamro bai co rSot ath eSh alh omi ntn lk hrSot hcat : oien ioSe oiamr alihm gm ani aSalh atkm dbr aHd aSr am tgido ato li gm ani agid lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh : Tbilt ioHnn main hith hmn hSmim am mbni adm oiHSbo blbbm lamr : am namr mn hSmim iamr alino mdoe apoa la hamontm lo oam namr mbni adm iraim anHno at hmon hem ki klm HSbim at ioHnn lnbia : oieno at ihoSe oiamro la ideno oiamr alihm gm ani la amr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh : abl mh detkm aiS hih olo Sni bnim oigS al hraSon oiamr bni lk hiom oebd bkrmi : oien oiamr ainni aba oaHri kn nHm oilk : oigS al hSni oidbr kcat gm alio oien oiamr hnni adni ola hlk : mi mSnihm eSh at rzon hab oiamro alio hraSon oiamr lhm ihoSe amn amr ani lkm hmoksim ohconot iqdmo atkm lboa al mlkot halhim : ki ioHnn ba alikm bdrk zdqh ola hamntm lo abl hmoksim ohconot hm hamino lo oatm raitm ola Sbtm aHri kn lhamin lo : mSl aHr Smeo aiS bel bit hih oiTe haiS krm oieS gdr sbib lo oiHzb iqb oibn mgdl btoko oitnho al krmim oilk bdrk mrHoq : oihi bhgie et hasip oiSlH ebdio al hkrmim lqHt at prio : oiHciqo hkrmim bebdio at ch hko oat ch hrgo oat ch sqlo : oiosp SlH ebdim aHrim rbim mn hraSonim oieSo kkh gm lhm : obaHronh SlH alihm at bno bamro mpni bni igoro : oihi kraot hkrmim at hbn oiamro aiS al aHio ch hoa hiorS lko onhrgho onaHch bnHlto : oiHciqo bo oidHpoho al mHoz lkrm oihrgo ato : ohnh kboa bel hkrm mh ieSh lkrmim hhm : oiamro alio ire lreim oiabdm oat hkrm itn lkrmim aHrim aSr iSibo lo at hpri beto : oiamr ihoSe alihm hki qra la qratm bktobim abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh mat ihoh hith cat hia nplat beinino : el kn ani amr lkm ki tqH mkm mlkot halhim otntn lgoi aSr ieSh at prih : ohnpl el habn hhia iSbr oaSr tpl elio tSHqho : oihi kSme hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim at mSlio oibino ki elihm dbr : oibqSo ltpSo ak irao mpni hmon hem ki lnbia HSbho :

22

oien ihoSe oisp dbr bmSlim alihm lamr : domh mlkot hSmim lmlk bSr odm aSr eSh Htnh lbno : oiSlH at ebdio lqra hqroaim al hHtnh ola abo lboa : oisp SlH ebdim aHrim lamr amro al hqroaim hnh erkti at seodti Sori omriai TboHim ohkl mokn bao al hHtnh : ohm la Sto lbm lcat oilko lhm ch al Sdho och al msHro : ohnSarim tpSo at ebdio oitello bm oihrgom : oiqzp hmlk oiSlH zbaotio oiabd at hmrzHim hhm oat eirm Srp baS : ac amr al ebdio hn hHtnh moknh ohqroaim la hio raoim lh : lkn lko na al raSi hdrkim okl aiS aSr tmzao qrao ato al hHtnh : oizao hebdim hhm al hdrkim oiaspo at kl aSr mzao gm reim gm Tobim oimla bit hHtnh msbim : oihi kboa hmlk lraot at hmsbim oira bhm aiS ola hih lboS bgdi Htnh : oiamr alio rei aikh bat hnh oain lk bgdi Htnh oialm : oiamr hmlk lmSrtim asro idio orglio onSatm ohSlktm aoto al hHSk hHizon Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim : ki rbim hm hqroaim omeTim hnbHrim : oilko hproSim oitiezo aik ikSilho bdbr : oiSlHo alio at tlmidihm em hhordosiim lamr rbi ideno ki aiS amt ath otorh bamt at drk alhim ola tgor mpni aiS ki aink mkir pni adm : lkn hgidh na lno at detk hnkon lno ltt ms al hqisr am la : oihoSe ide at rSetm oiamr hHnpim mh tnsoni : hraoni at mTbe hms oibiao lo dinr : oiamr alihm Sl mi hzorh hcat ohmktb aSr elio : oiamro alio Sl hqisr oiamr alihm lkn tno lqisr at aSr lqisr olalhim at aSr lalhim : okSmem at cat tmho oiecbho oilko lhm : biom hhoa ngSo alio zdoqim hamrim ki ain tHit hmtim oiSalo ato lamr : rbi hn mSh amr aiS ki imot obnim ain lo aHio iibm at aSto ohqim cre laHio : oatno hio Sbeh aHim ohraSon nSa aSh oimt ocre ain lo oiecb at aSto laHio : okmo kn gm hSni okn gm hSliSi ed hSbeh : oaHri klm mth gm haSh : oeth btHit hmtim lmi mn hSbeh thih laSh ki lklm hith : oien ihoSe oiamr lhm Teim atm baSr ainkm iodeim at hktobim ogm at gbort halhim : ki btHit hmtim la iSao nSim ola tnSanh ki am kmlaki alhim bSmim ihio : oel dbr tHit hmtim hla qratm at hnamr lkm mpi halhim lamr : anki alhi abrhm oalhi izHq oalhi ieqb ohoa ainno alhi hmtim ki am alhi hHiim : oiSme hmon hem oiStommmo el torto : ohproSim kSmem ki skr pi hzdoqim oioedo iHdo : oaHd mhm mbin btorh Sal ato lnsoto lamr : rbi ai co mzoh gdolh hia btorh : oiamr ihoSe alio oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl mdek : cat hia hmzoh hgdolh ohraSonh : ohSnit domh lh oahbt lrek kmok : bSti hmzot halh kl htorh tloih ogm hnbiaim : oihi bhqhl hproSim oiSalm ihoSe lamr : mh detkm el hmSiH bn mi hoa oiamro alio bn dod : oiamr alihm oaik qra lo dod broH adon bamro : nam ihoh ladni Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : oeth am dod qra lo adon aik hoa bno : ola ikl aiS lenot ato dbr ola erb eod aiS at lbo mn hiom hhoa lSal aoto :

23

ac idbr ihoSe al hmon hem oal tlmidio lamr : el ksa mSh iSbo hsoprim ohproSim : lkn kl aSr iamro lkm tSmro leSot ak kmeSihm la teSo ki amrim hm oainm eSim : ki asrim mSat kbdim oemsim el Skm hanSim ola iabo lhniem ap bazbem : oeSim at kl meSihm lhraot bhm lbni adm ki mrHibim at tplihm omgdilim at ziziotihm : oahbim at hsbt hraS bseodot oat moSbi hraS bbti hknsiot : oat Salot Slomm bSoqim oat aSr iqrao lhm bni hadm rbi rbi : aolm atm al tqrao rbi ki aHd hoa rbkm hmSiH oatm aHim klkm : oal tqrao ab laiS mkm el hadmh ki aHd hoa abikm aSr bSmim : gm al tqrao mnhigim ki aHd hoa mnhigkm hmSiH : ohgdol bkm ihi lkm lmSrt : kl hmromm at ezmo iSpl ohmSpil at ezmo iromm : ak aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki sgrim atm lpni hadm at mlkot hSmim hn atm la tbao bh oat hbaim la tniHo lboa : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki bleim atm at bti halmnot omarikim btplh lmrah ein tHt cat mSpT el itr tqHo : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki sobbim atm bim obibSh lmen gir gr aHd oki itgir teSo aoto lbn gihnm kplim iotr mkm : aoi lkm mnhlim eorim hamrim hnSbe bhikl ain cat maomh ohnSbe bchb hhikl iaSm : atm hksilim oheorim ki mh hoa hgdol am hchb ao hhikl hmqdS at hchb : oamrtm hnSbe bmcbH ain maomh ohnSbe bqrbn aSr elio iaSm : atm hksilim oheorim ki mh hoa hgdol am hqrbn ao hmcbH hmqdS at hqrbn : lkn hnSbe bmcbH nSbe bo obkl aSr elio : ohnSbe bhikl nSbe bo obSokn btoko : ohnSbe bSmim nSbe bksa alhim obiSb elio : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki meSrim atm at hmnta oat hSbt oat hkmn otniHo at hHmorot btorh at hmSpT oat hHsd oat hamonh ohih lkm leSot at alh ola lhniH gm at alh : mnhlim eorim hmsnnim at hitoS obleim at hgml : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki mThrim atm pni hkos ohqerh mHoz otokn mla gcl oprizot : proS eor Thr braSonh at tok hkos lmen tThr gm mHoz : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki dmim atm lqbrim hmsidim hnraim naim mHoz otokm mla ezmot mtim okl Tmah : kkh gm atm mHoz nraim kzdiqim al bni adm otokkm mla Hnph oaon : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki bonim atm at qbri hnbiaim otipo at mzbot qbrot hzdiqim : oamrtm am hiino bimi abotino la hith idno emhm lSpk dm hnbiaim : obkn teido el npSkm ki bnim atm lrozHi hnbiaim : ap atm mlao sat abotikm : nHSim atm ildi hzpeonim aikh tmlTo mdin gihnm : lkn hnni SlH lkm nbiaim oHkmim osoprim omhm thrgo otzlbo omhm tko bSoTim bbti knsiotikm otrdpom meir leir : lmen iba elikm kl dm nqi hnSpk barz mdm hbl hzdiq ed dm ckrih bn brkih aSr rzHtm aoto bin hhikl olmcbH : amn amr ani lkm ba iba kl alh el hdor hch : iroSlim iroSlim hhrgt at hnbiaim ohsqlt at hSloHim alih kmh pemim rziti lqbz at bnik ktrnglt hmqbzt at aprHih tHt knpih ola abitm : hnh bitkm iecb lkm Smm : ki ani amr lkm rah la traoni meth ed aSr tamro brok hba bSm ihoh :

24

oiza ihoSe mn hmqdS llkt ldrko oigSo tlmidio lhraoto at bnini hmqdS : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hraitm at kl alh amn amr ani lkm la tSar ph abn el abn aSr la ttprq : oiSb el hr hcitim oigSo alio htlmidim lbdm oiamro amr na lno mti thih cat omh hoa aot boak oaot qz heolm : oien ihoSe oiamr lhm rao pn iteh atkm aiS : ki rbim ibao bSmi lamr ani hoa hmSiH ohteo rbim : oatm etidim lSme mlHmot oSmeot mlHmh rao pn tbhlo ki hio thih kl cat ak edn ain hqz : ki iqom goi el goi ommlkh el mmlkh ohih reb odbr oreS hnh ohnh : okl alh rq raSit hHblim : ac imsro atkm leni ohmito atkm ohiitm Snoaim lkl hgoim lmen Smi : oac ikSlo rbim omsro aiS at reho oSnao aiS at aHio : onbiai Sqr rbim iqomo ohteo rbim : ompni aSr irbh hrSe tpog ahbt rbim : ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe : otqra bSort hmlkot hcat btbl klh ledot lkl hgoim oaHr iboa hqz : lkn kaSr trao Sqoz mSmm hamor el idi dnial hnbia eomd bmqom qdS hqra ibin : ac nos inoso anSi ihodh al hhrim : oaSr el hgg al ird lSat dbr mbito : oaSr bSdh al iSb hbith lSat at mlboSo : oaoi lhrot olminiqot bimim hhm : ak htpllo aSr mnostkm la thih bHrp ola bSbt : ki ac thih zrh gdolh aSr kmoh la nhith mraSit heolm ed eth okmoh la thih eod : olola nqzro himim hhm la ioSe kl bSr ak lmen hbHirim iqzro himim hhm : oki iamr alikm aiS bet hhia hnh ph hmSiH ao hno Sm al tamino : ki iqomo mSiHi Sqr onbiai Sqr oitno atot gdlot omoptim lmen hteot ap at hbHirim am ioklo : hnh mraS hgdti lkm : lkn ki iamro alikm hno bmdbr al tzao hno bHdrim al tamino : ki kbrq hioza mmcrH omair ed merb kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm : ki baSr hHll Sm iqbzo hnSrim : omid aHri zrt himim hhm tHSk hSmS ohirH la igih aoro ohkokbim iplo mn hSmim okHot hSmim itmoTTo : ac aot bn hadm irah bSmim ospdo kl mSpHot harz orao at bn hadm ba em enni hSmim bgborh okbod rb : oiSlH at mlakio bqol Sopr gdol oiqbzo at bHirio marbe hroHot lmqzh hSmim oed qzh hSmim : lmdo na at mSl htanh kaSr irTb enph oprHo elih idetm ki qrob hqiz : kn gm atm braotkm at kl alh deo ki qrob hoa lptH : amn amr ani lkm ki la iebr hdor hch ed aSr ihio kl alh : hSmim oharz iebro odbri la iebron : ak hiom hhoa ohSeh hhia ain aiS iode ath gm la mlaki hSmim blti abi lbdo : okimi nH kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm : ki kaSr bimi hmbol hio aklim oStim nSaim nSim ontnim atn lanSim ed hiom aSr ba nH al htbh : ola ideo ed boa hmbol oiSHt at klm kn ihih gm boao Sl bn hadm : ac ihio Snim bSdh aHd iasp oaHd iecb : Stim ToHnot brHim aHt tasp oaHt tecb : lkn Sqdo ki ainkm iodeim bai co Seh iba adnikm : oat cat hbino aSr lo ide bel hbit bai co aSmorh iba hgnb ki eth Sqd ola hniH lHtr at bito : lkn hio nkonim gm atm ki bSeh aSr la tdmo iboa bn hadm : mi hoa apoa hebd hnamn ohnbon aSr hpqido adnio el bni bito ltt lhm at aklm beto : aSri hebd aSr adnio bboao imzaho eSh kn : amn amr ani lkm ki ipqidho el kl aSr lo : oam hebd hre iamr blbo bSS adni lboa : oiHl lhkot at Hbrio oakl oSth em hsobaim : boa iboa adni hebd hhoa biom la izph obSeh la ide : oiSsp ato oiSim at Hlqo em hHnpim Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim :

25

ac tdmh mlkot hSmim leSr elmot aSr lqHo at nrotihn otzanh lqrat hHtn : HmS mhn hio Hkmot oHmS ksilot : hksilot lqHo at hnrot ola lqHo emhn Smn : ohHkmot lqHo Smn bklihn oat nrotihn : okaSr bSS hHtn lboa otnmnh kln otrdmnh : oihi bHzot hlilh othi zoHh hnh hHtn zainh lqrato : ac hteorro kl helmot hhn otiTbnh at nrotihn : otamrnh hksilot al hHkmot tnh lno mSmnkn ki ikbo nrotino : oteninh hHkmot lamr la kn pn iHsr lno olkn ki am lknh al hmokrim oqninh lkn : oihi bet lktn lqnot oiboa hHtn ohnknot llkt bao ato al hHtnh otsgr hdlt : oaHri kn bao gm Sar helmot otamrnh adnino adnino ptH lno : oien oiamr amn amr ani lkn la ideti atkn : lkn Sqdo ki ainkm iodeim at hiom oat hSeh aSr iba bh bn hadm : ki kmo aiS nse lmrHoq aSr qra al ebdio oimsr lhm at rkoSo : oitn lch HmS kkrim olch Stim olch aHt lkl aiS oaiS kpi erko oimhr oise mSm : oilk haiS hlqH HmS kkrim oisHr bhn oieS lo HmS kkrim aHrot : okn hlqH Stim gm hoa hroiH Stim aHrot : ak lqH haHt hlk oiHpr badmh oiTmn at ksp adnio : oaHri imim rbim ba adoni hebdim hhm oieS HSbon emhm : oigS hlqH HmS hkkrim oiba HmS kkrim aHrot lamr adni HmS kkrim msrt li hnh HmS kkrim aHrot hroHti bhn : oiamr alio adnio kn hebd hTob ohnamn ki bmeT namn hiit oel hrbh apqidk boa al SmHt adnik : oigS gm lqH hkkrim oiamr adni kkrim msrt li hnh kkrim hroHti bhn : oiamr alio adnio hiTbt hebd hTob ohnamn bmcer namn hiit oel hrbh apqidk boa al SmHt adnik : oigS gm hlqH at hkkr haHt oiamr adni idetik ki aiS qSh ath qzr baSr la cret okns maSr la pcrt : oaira oalk oaTmn at kkrk badmh oeth ha lk at aSr lk : oien adnio oiamr alio hebd hre ohezl ath idet ki qzr anki baSr la creti okns maSr la pcrti : lkn hih elik ltt at kspi lSlHnim oani bboai hiiti lqH at aSr li btrbit : el kn Sao mmno at hkkr otno al haiS aSr lo eSr hkkrim : ki kl aiS aSr iS lo intn lo oiedip ohaiS aSr ain lo gm at aSr lo iqH mmno : oat ebd hbliel hSliko al hHSk hHizon Sm thih hillh oHrq hSnim : ohih ki iboa bn hadm bkbodo okl hmlakim hqdSim emo oiSb el ksa kbodo : onaspo lpnio kl hgoim ohprid binotm kaSr iprid hreh at hkbSim mn hetodim : ohzib at hkbSim limino oat hetodim lSmalo : ac iamr hmlk al hnzbim limino bao broki abi orSo at hmlkot hmoknh lkm lmn hosd heolm : ki reb hiiti otakilni zma hiiti otSqoni gr hiiti otasponi : erom otksoni Holh otbqroni bmSmr hiiti otbao ali : oeno hzdiqim oamro adnino mti rainok reb onklklk ao zma onSqh aotk : omti rainok gr onaspk ao erm onksk : omti rainok Holh ao bmSmr onba alik : ohmlk ienh oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm mh SeSitm laHd maHi hzeirim halh li eSitm : oac iamr gm al hnzbim lSmalo lko meli atm harorim al aS eolm hmoknh lSTn olmlakio : ki reb hiiti ola hakltm aoti zma hiiti ola hSqitm aoti : gr hiiti ola asptm aoti erom ola ksitm aoti Holh obmSmr ola bqrtm aoti : oeno gm hm oamro adnino mti rainok reb ao zma ao gr ao erom ao Holh ao bmSmr ola Srtnok : ac ienh atm lamr amn amr ani lkm mh Sla eSitm laHd mn hzeirim halh gm li la eSitm : oilko alh lmezbt eolm ohzdiqim lHii eolm :

26

oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at kl hdbrim halh oiamr al tlmidio : atm idetm ki aHri iomim ihih hpsH obn hadm imsr lhzlb : oiqhlo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ocqni hem al Hzr hkhn hgdol hnqra qipa : oioezo iHdo ltpS at ihoSe bermh olhmito : oiamro ak la bHg pn thih mhomh bem : oihi bhiot ihoSe bit hini bbit Smeon hmzre : otqrb alio aSh obidh pk Smn iqr mad otzq el raSo bhsbo el hSlHn : oirao htlmidim oitremo lamr el mh habod hch : ki hSmn hch hih raoi lhmkr bmHir rb oltto leniim : oide ihoSe oiamr alihm lmh togo at haSh hla meSh Tob eSth emdi : ki eniim tmid emkm oanki ainni atkm tmid : ki aSr Spkh at hSmn hch el gopi lHnT aoti eSth cat : amn amr ani lkm baSr tqra hbSorh hcat bkl heolm gm at aSr hia eSth ispr lckron lh : oilk aHd mSnim heSr hnqra ihodh aiS qriot al raSi hkhnim : oiamr mh ttno li oamsrno bidkm oiSqlo lo SlSim ksp : omn het hhia bqS tanh lmsr aoto : oihi braSon lHg hmzot oigSo htlmidim al ihoSe lamr bai ch mqom tHpz ki nkin lk lakl at hpsH : oiamr lko heirh al plni almni oamrtm alio kh amr hrb eti qrobh hia obbitk aeSh at hpsH em tlmidi : oieSo htlmidim kaSr zom ihoSe oikino at hpsH : oihi berb oisb em Snim heSr : obaklm oiamr amn amr ani lkm ki aHd mkm imsrni : oitezbo mad oiHlo aiS oaiS lamr lo hanki hoa adni : oien oiamr haiS aSr Tbl emi at ido bqerh hoa imsrni : hn bn hadm hlok ilk lo kktob elio abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido imsr bn hadm Tob laiS hhoa am la nold : oien ihodh hmsr aoto oiamr rbi hani hoa oiamr alio ath amrt : obaklm oiqH ihoSe at hlHm oibrk oibze oitn ltlmidim oiamr qHo oaklo ch hoa gopi : oiqH at hkos oibrk oitn lhm lamr Sto mmnh klkm : ki ch hoa dmi dm hbrit hHdSh hnSpk bed rbim lsliHt HTaim : oani amr lkm ki meth Sth la aSth mtnobt hgpn hcat ed hiom hhoa aSr aSth ath emkm HdSh bmlkot abi : oihi aHri gmrm at hhll oizao al hr hcitim : ac amr alihm ihoSe atm klkm tkSlo bi blilh hch ki ktob akh at hreh otpozin hzan : oaHri qomi alk lpnikm hglilh : oien pTros oiamr lo gm ki ikSlo bk klm ani leolm la akSl : oiamr alio ihoSe amn amr ani lk ki blilh hch bTrm iqra htrngol tkHS bi SlS pemim : oiamr alio pTros gm ki ihih eli lmot atk kHS la akHS bk okn amro gm kl htlmidim : aHri kn ba atm ihoSe al Hzr hnqra gt Smni oiamr al htlmidim Sbo lkm ph ed aSr alk Smh ohtpllti : oiqH ato at pTros oat Sni bni cbdi oiHl lhezb olmog : oiamr lhm npSi mrh li ed mot emdo ph oSqdo emi : oilk meT halh oipl el pnio oitpll lamr abi am iokl lhiot tebr na meli hkos hcat ak la krzoni ki am krzonk : oiba al htlmidim oimzam iSnim oiamr al pTros hnh la hih bikltkm lSqd emi Seh aHt : Sqdo ohtpllo pn tbao lidi nsion hn hroH hia Hpzh ohbSr hoa rph : oiosp llkt lo Snit oitpll lamr abi am la tokl hkos hcat lebr mmni mbli Stoti ath ihi krzonk : oiba oimzam gm bpem hcat iSnim ki einihm hio kbdot : oiniHm oiosp llkt oitpll SliSit bamro eod hpem kdbr hch : oiba al htlmidim oiamr alihm nomo meth onoHo hnh hSeh qrobh obn hadm nmsr lidi HTaim : qomo onlkh hnh hlk oqrb hmsr aoti : eodno mdbr ohnh ba ihodh aHd mSnim heSr oemo hmon rb brHbot obmqlot mat raSi hkhnim ocqni hem : ohmsr ato ntn lhm aot lamr haiS aSr aSqho ch hoa tpSoho : omid ngS al ihoSe oiamr Slom lk rbi oinSq lo : oiamr alio ihoSe rei el mh bat oigSo oiSlHo at idihm bihoSe oitpSo ato : ohnh aHd mn hanSim aSr em ihoSe SlH ido oiSlp Hrbo oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno : oiamr alio ihoSe hSb at Hrbk al terh ki kl aHci Hrb bHrb iabdo : ao hiHSb lbk ki la iklti lSal eth mat abi ohoa izoh li iotr mSnim eSr lgionot Sl mlakim : oaikkh apoa imlao hktobim ki kn hih thih : bSeh hhia amr ihoSe al hmon hem kel priz izatm bHrbot obmqlot ltpSni oiom iom hiiti iSb omlmd azlkm bmqdS ola hHcqtm bi : okl cat hith lmlat ktbi hnbiaim ac ecboho htlmidim klm oinoso : ohanSim aSr tpSo at ihoSe holikho al qipa hkhn hgdol aSr nqhlo Sm hsoprim ohcqnim : opTros hlk aHrio mrHoq ed lHzr hkhn hgdol oiba pnimh oiSb lo azl hmSrtim lraot at aHrit hdbr : ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim okl hsnhdrin bqSo edot Sqr bihoSe lhmito ola mzao : oap bemd Sm edi Sqr rbim la mzao obaHronh ngSo Sni edi Sqr : oiamro ch amr iS biklti lhrs at hikl halhim olSob lbnoto bSlSt imim : oiqm hkhn hgdol oiamr alio haink mSib dbr el aSr eno bk alh : oihoSe hHriS oien hkhn hgdol oiamr lo mSbiek ani balhim Hiim Stamr lno am ath hoa hmSiH bn halhim : oiamr alio ihoSe ath amrt abl ani amr lkm ki meth trao at bn hadm iSb limin hgborh oba em enni hSmim : oiqre hkhn hgdol at bgdio oiamr hoa gdp omh lno eod lbqS edim hnh eth Smetm at gdopo : mh detkm oieno oiamro aiS mot hoa : oirqo bpnio oikho bagrop oaHrim hkho el hlHi : oiamro hnba lno hmSiH mi hoa hmkh aotk : opTros iSb mHoz lbit bHzr otgS alio SpHh lamr gm ath hiit em ihoSe hglili : oikHS bpni klm lamr la ideti mh at amrt : oiza al ptH hSer otra aoto aHrt otamr lanSim aSr Sm gm ch hih em ihoSe hnzri : oiosp lkHS oiSbe lamr la ideti at haiS : okmeT aHri kn oigSo hemdim Sm oiamro al pTros amt ki gm ath mhm ki gm lSonk mglh aotk : oiHl lhHrim at npSo olhSbe lamr la ideti at haiS omid qra htrngol : oickr pTros at dbr ihoSe aSr amr alio lamr bTrm iqra htrngol tkHS bi SlS pemim oiza hHozh oimrr bbki :

27

oihi lpnot hbqr oitiezo kl raSi hkhnim ocqni hem el ihoSe lhmito : oiasro ato oiolikho mSm oimsrho al ponTios pilTos hhgmon : oira ihodh hmsr aoto ki hrSieho oinHm oiSb at SlSim hksp al hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim lamr : HTati ki dm nqi hsgrti ohm amro mh lno olcat ath trah : oiSlk at hksp al hhikl oipn oilk oiHnq : oiqHo raSi hkhnim at hksp oiamro la nkon lno ltto al aron hqrbn ki mHir dmim hoa : oitiezo oiqno bo at Sdh hiozr lqbort hgrim : el kn Sm hSdh hhoa Sdh hdm ed hiom hch : ac ntmla mh Snamr bid irmih hnbia oiqHo SlSim hksp adr hiqr aSr iqr mel bni iSral : oitno atm al Sdh hiozr kaSr zoni ihoh : oihoSe hemd lpni hhgmon oiSalho hhgmon lamr hath hoa mlk hihodim oiamr ihoSe ath amrt : oidbro elio STnh hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim ohoa la enh dbr : oiamr alio pilTos haink Sme kmh hm meidim bk : ola enho ap dbr aHd oitmh hhgmon ed mad : omnhg hhgmon hih lpTr lem bkl Hg asir aHd at aSr iHpzo : obet hhia hih lhm asir idoe oSmo br aba : oihi kaSr nqhlo oiamr alihm pilTos at mi tHpzo ki apTr lkm at br aba ao at ihoSe hnqra bSm mSiH : ki ide aSr rq mqnah msro ato : oihi kSbto el ksa hdin otSlH alio aSto lamr al ihi lk dbr em hzdiq hch ki beboro eniti hrbh hiom bHlom : ohkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim pto at hmon hem lSal lhm at br aba olabd at ihoSe : oien hhgmon oiamr alihm at mi mSnihm tHpzo ki apTr lkm oiamro at br aba : oiamr alihm pilTos omh aeSh lihoSe hnqra bSm mSiH oieno klm izlb : oiamr hhgmon mh apoa hreh aSr eSh oiosipo eod zeq lamr izlb : oihi kraot pilTos ki la ioeil maomh orbth eod hmhodh oiqH mim oirHz at idio leini hem oiamr nqi anki mdm hzdiq hch atm trao : oieno kl hem oiamro dmo elino oel bnino : ac pTr lhm at br aba oat ihoSe hkh bSoTim oimsr aoto lhzlb : oiqHo anSi hzba aSr lhgmon at ihoSe oibiaho al bit hmSpT oiaspo elio at kl hgdod : oipSiTo aoto at bgdio oieTpho meil Sni : oiSrgo qzim oieSo eTrt oiSimo el raSo oqnh bimino oikreo lpnio oitlozzo bo lamr Slom lk mlk hihodim : oirqo bo oiqHo at hqnh oikho el raSo : oaHri htlozzm bo hpSiTo aoto at hmeil oilbiSho at bgdio oiolikho lzlb : oihi bzatm oimzao aiS qorini oSmo Smeon oianso ato lSat lo at zlbo : oibao al hmqom hnqra glglta hoa mqom glglt : oitno lo lStot Hmz mcog bmrorh oiTem ola abh lStot : oihi kaSr zlbo aoto oiHlqo lhm at bgdio ogorl hpilo lmlat at aSr namr bpi hnbia iHlqo bgdi lhm oel lboSi ipilo gorl : oiSbo Smh oiSmro aoto : oiSimo at dbr aSmto ktob mmel lraSo ch hoa ihoSe mlk hihodim : oizlbo ato Sni prizim aHd limino oaHd lSmalo : ohebrim gdpo aoto oinieo at raSm : oiamro ath hhrs at hhikl obnho bSlSt imim hoSe lnpSk oam bn halhim ath rdh mn hzlb : okn hleigo gm raSi hkhnim em hsoprim ohcqnim lamr : at aHrim hoSie olezmo la iokl lhoSie am mlk iSral hoa ird na eth mn hzlb onamin bo : bTH balhim eth iplTho am Hpz bo ki amr bn halhim ani : ogm hprizim hnzlbim ato Hrpho kdbrim halh : omSeh hSSit hih HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit : oket hSeh htSieit oizeq ihoSe bqol gdol ali ali lmh Sbqtni otrgomo ali ali lmh ecbtni : oiamro mqzt hemdim Sm kSmem at cat lamr al aliho hoa qora : oimhr aHd mhm oirz oiqH spog oimla ato Hmz oiSimho el qnh oiSqho : oSar hanSim amro hniHo lo onrah am iboa aliho lhoSieo : oihoSe hosip lqra bqol gdol otza roHo : ohnh nqreh prkt hhikl mlmelh lmTh lSnim qreim oharz nreSh ohsleim nbqeo : ohqbrim nptHo orbim mgopot hqdoSim iSni admt epr neoro : oizao mn hqbrim aHri hqizo oibao al heir hqdoSh oirao lrbim : oSr hmah ohanSim aSr ato hSmrim at ihoSe kraotm at hreS oat aSr nhith nbhlo mad oiamro akn ch hih bn alhim : othiinh Sm nSim rbot hraot mrHoq aSr hlko aHri ihoSe mn hglil lSrto : obtokn mrim hmgdlit omrim am ieqb oiosi oam bni cbdi : oihi berb oiba aiS eSir mn hrmtim oSmo iosp ogm hoa hih mtlmidi ihoSe : oigS al pilTos lSal at goit ihoSe oizo pliTos ki tntn lo : oiqH iosp at hgoih oikrk aoth bsdin Thor : oiSimh bqbr hHdS aSr Hzb lo bsle oigl abn gdolh el ptH hqbr oilk lo : omrim hmgdlit omrim haHrt hio iSbot Sm mmol hqbr : oihi mmHrt erb hSbt oiqhlo hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim al pilTos : oiamro adnino ckrno ki amr hmteh hhoa beodno Hi mqzh SlSt imim qom aqom : lkn zoh na oiskr mboa hqbr ed hiom hSliSi pn ibao tlmidio blilh ognbho oamro al hem hnh qm mn hmtim ohith htrmit haHronh reh mn hraSonh : oiamr alihm pilTos hnh lkm anSi mSmr lko skroho kdetkm : oilko oiskro at mboa hqbr oiHtmo at habn oiemido elio at hmSmr :

28

oaHri mozai hSbt kShair laHd bSbt bah mrim hmgdlit omrim haHrt lraot at hqbr : ohnh reS gdol hih ki mlak ihoh ird mn hSmim oigS oigl at habn mn hptH oiSb elih : oihi mraho kbrq olboSo lbn kSlg : ompHdo nbhlo hSmrim oihio kmtim : oien hmlak oiamr al hnSim atn al tiran hn ideti ki at ihoSe hnzlb atn mbqSot : ainno ph ki qm kaSr amr banh rainh at hmqom aSr Skb Sm hadon : omhrtn llkt oamrtn al tlmidio ki qm mn hmtim ohnh hoa holk lpnikm hglilh oSm traho hnh amrti lkn : otmhrnh lzat mn hqbr birah obSmHh gdolh otrznh lhgid ltlmidio : hnh hlkot lhgid ltlmidio ohnh ihoSe nqrh alihn oiamr Slom lkn otgSnh otaHcnh brglio otStHoin lo : oiamr alihn ihoSe al tiran lknh ohgdn laHi oilko hglilh oSm iraoni : oihi blktn ohnh anSim mn hmSmr bao heirh oigido lraSi hkhnim at kl hneSh : oiqhlo em hcqnim oitiezo oitno ksp lrb al anSi hzba lamr : amro ki bao tlmidio lilh oignbo aoto bhiotno iSnim : oam iSme hdbr lpni hhgmon anHno npisho ohiitm bli pHd : oiqHo at hksp oieSo kaSr lmdo otza hSmoeh hcat bin hihodim ed hiom hch : oeSti eSr htlmidim hlko hglilh al hhr aSr zom ihoSe : oihi kraotm ato oiStHoo lo omqztm nHlqo blbm : oigS ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr ntn li kl SlTn bSmim obarz : lko oeSo ltlmidim at kl hgoim oTbltm atm lSm hab ohbn oroH hqdS : olmdtm atm lSmr at kl aSr zoiti atkm ohnh anki atkm kl himim ed qz heolm amn :

ihoSe lpi mrqomi

1

raSit bSort ihoSe hmSiH bn halhim : kktob bnbiaim hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh drkk lpnik : qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro mslotio : oihi ioHnn Tbl bmdbr oqora Tbilt htSobh lsliHt hHTaim : otza alio kl arz ihodh obni iroSlim oiTblo klm el ido bnhr hirdn mtodim at HTatm : oioHnn lboS Ser gmlim oacor eor bmtnio oakl Hgbim odbS hier : oiqra lamr boa iba aHri hHcq mmni aSr ainni kdi lkre olhtir at Srok nelio : anki Tblti atkm bmim ohoa iTbl atkm broH hqdS : oihi bimim hhm oiba ihoSe mnzrt aSr bglil oiTbl el idi ioHnn birdn : oihi ak elh elh mn hmim oira at hSmim nbqeim ohroH kionh irdt elio : oihi qol mn hSmim ath bni ididi aSr rzth npSi bo : oaHri kn hoziao hroH hmdbrh : oihi Sm bmdbr arbeim iom ohSTn nsho oihi em hHiot ohmlakim Srtoho : oaHri aSr hsgr ioHnn ba ihoSe hglilh oiqra at bSort mlkot halhim lamr : mlah het ohgieh mlkot halhim Sobo ohamino bbSorh : oihi bhthlko el id im hglil oira at Smeon oat andri aHi Smeon prSim mzodh bim ki digim hio : oiamr alihm ihoSe lko aHri oaSimkm ldigi anSim : oiecbo mhr at mkmrtihm oilko aHrio : oihi kebro meT mSm oira at ieqb bn cbdi oat ioHnn aHio ogm hmh banih mtqnim at hmkmrot : oiqra mhrh alihm oiecbo at cbdi abihm banih em hSkirim oilko aHrio : oibao al kpr nHom oimhr lboa bSbt lbit hknst oilmd : oiStommo el torto ki hih mlmdm kbel gborh ola ksprim : oaiS hih bbit knstm aSr roH Tmah bo oizeq lamr : ahh mh lno olk ihoSe hnzri bat lhabidno ideti mi ath qdoS halhim : oiger bo ihoSe lamr halm oza mmno : oisHbho roH hTmah oizeq bqol gdol oiza mmno : oibhlo klm oiSalo aiS at reho lamr mh cat mh hia htorh hHdSh aSr ap lroHot hTmah bgborh hoa mzoh ohnh Smeot lo : oiza Smeo mhr bkl mqmot arz hglil : oihi aHri zatm mbit hknst oibao bith Smeon oandri hmh oieqb oioHnn emm : oHmot Smeon Skbh aHoct hqdHt oimhro ldbr alio elih : oigS oiaHc bidh oiqimh otrp mmnh hqdHt ptam otSrt aotm : oihi berb kboa hSmS oibiao alio at kl hHolim oat aHoci hSdim : okl heir naspo iHdo ptH hbit : oirpa rbim aSr hio Holim Hliim Sonim oigrS Sdim hrbh ola ntn at hSdim ldbr ki ideho : oiSkm mmHrt beod lilh oiza oilk al mqom Hrbh oitpll Sm : oirdpo aHrio Smeon ohanSim aSr ato : oimzaho oiamro alio hnh klm mbqSim aotk : oiamr alihm nebrh mch al eri hprcot hqrbot oaqra gm Sm ki bebor cat izati : oihi qra bbti knsiotihm bkl hglil oigrS at hSdim : oiboa alio aiS mzre oitHnn alio oikre el brkio oiamr lo am trzh tokl lThrni : oirHm elio oiSlH at ido oige bo oiamr rzh anki Thr : eodno mdbr ohzret srh mmno oiThr : oiger bo oimhr lhoziao hHozh : oiamr alio rah al tspr dbr laiS ki am lk hrah al hkhn ohqrb el Thrtk at aSr zoh mSh ledot lhm : ak hoa bzato hHl lqra hrbh olhSmie hdbr ed aSr la ikl lboa eod al eir bgloi ki am hih iSb mHoz leir bmqmot Hrbh oibao alio mkl ebrio :

2

oihi mqz imim bSobo al kpr nHom oiSmeo ki hoa bbit : oiaspo rbim mhrh ed aps mqom lemd ap mHoz lptH oidbr alihm at hdbr : oibao alio anSim nSaim aiS nkh abrim oiSaho barbeh : ola iklo lgSt alio mpni hem oisiro at hgg bmqom aSr hih Sm oiHtro Htirh oiorido at hmSkb aSr Skb elih nkh habrim : oihi kraot ihoSe at amontm oiamr al nkh habrim bni nslHo lk HTatik : oihio mn hsoprim iSbim Sm oHSbim blbm lamr : mh idbr ch gdopim kalh mi iokl lslH HTaim blti halhim lbdo : oide ihoSe broHo ki kkh HSbo blbbm oiamr alihm mdoe tHSbo kalh blbbkm : mh hnql hamr al nkh habrim nslHo lk HTatik am amor qom Sa at mSkbk ohthlk : ak lmen tdeon ki lbn hadm iS hSlTn lslH HTaim barz oiamr al nkh habrim : lk ani amr qom Sa at mSkbk olk al bitk : oiqm ptam oiSa at mSkbo oiza leini klm ed ki hStmmo klm oiSbHo at halhim lamr meolm la raino kcat : oiSb lzat al id him oibao alio kl hem oilmdm : oihi bebro oira at loi bn Hlpi iSb bbit hmks oiamr alio lkh aHri oiqm oilk aHrio : oihi kaSr hsb bbito oisbo moksim oHTaim rbim em ihoSe oem tlmidio ki rbim hio hhlkim aHrio : ohsoprim ohproSim rao ato akl em hmoksim ohHTaim oiamro al tlmidio lmh ch em hHTaim ohmoksim akl rbkm : oiSme ihoSe oiamr hHcqim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHlim la bati lqra hzdiqim ki am hHTaim ltSobh : otlmidi ioHnn ohproSim hio zmim oibao oiamro alio mdoe tlmidi ioHnn otlmidi hproSim zmim otlmidik ainm zmim : oiamr alihm ihoSe aik ioklo bni hHph lzom beod hHtn emhm kl imi hiot hHtn emhm la ioklo lzom : hnh imim baim olqH matm hHtn oac izomo bimim hhm : ain tpr mTlit bgd HdS el Smlh blh ki ac intq mloio hHdS mn hblh otre hqrieh : oain ntn iin HdS bnadot blim ki ac ibqe hiin at hnadot ohiin iSpk ohnadot iabdo abl bnadot HdSim intn hiin hHdS : oihi kebro bSbt bin hqmh oiHlo tlmidio lqTp mlilt blktm : oiamro alio hproSim rah mh hmh eSim bSbt dbr aSr la ieSh : oiamr alihm hki la qratm at aSr eSh dod bhito Hsr oreb hoa oaSr hio ato : ki ba al bit alhim bimi abitr hkhn hgdol oiakl at lHm hpnim aSr la nkon laklh ki am lkhnim oitn gm lanSim aSr ato : oiamr alihm hSbt neSh bebor hadm ola hadm bebor hSbt : lkn bn hadm adon hoa gm lSbt :

3

oiSb oibao al bit hknst oSm aiS aSr ido ibSh : oitbonno bo am irpaho bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh : oiamr al haiS aSr ibSh ido qom emd btok : oiamr alihm hnkon bSbt lhiTib ao lhre lhzil npS ao labdh oiHriSo : oibT alihm sbib bHmh oitezb el TmTom lbbm oiamr al haiS pST at idk oipST ido otrpa otSb kaHrt : ohproSim izao mhrh oitiezo elio em hhordosiim labdo : oihoSe sr mSm em tlmidio al id him oilko aHrio hmon em rb mn hglil omihodh : omiroSlim omadom omebr hirdn omsbibot zor ozidon hmon rb aSr Smeo at kl aSr eSh oibao alio : oiamr al tlmidio ki ikino lo anih qTnh mpni hem lmen la ilHzoho : ki rpa lrbim ed ki htnplo elio kl hmngeim lnge bo : ohroHot hTmaot kraotn ato nplo lpnio otzeqnh lamr ath hoa bn alhim : oiger bhn mad aSr la tglinh aoto : oiel al hhr oiqra al aSr hoa Hpz bm oibao alio : oiSm Snim eSr aiS lmen ihio ato olmen iSlHm lqra : ohih lhm hSlTn lrpa at htHlaim olgrS at hSdim : oiknh at Smeon bSm pTros : oat ieqb bn cbdi oat ioHnn aHi ieqb oiknh atm bSm bni rgoS hoa bni rem : oat andri oat pilpos oat br tlmi oat mti oat toma oat ieqb bn Hlpi oat tdi oat Smeon hqni : oat ihodh aiS qriot aSr gm msro : oibao hbith oiSb hmon hem lhtasp ed ki la iklo ap lakl lHm : oiSmeo qrobio oizao lhHciq bo ki amro iza mdeto : ohsoprim aSr irdo miroSlim amro ki bel cbob nkns bo oel idi Sr hSdim hoa mgrS at hSdim : oiqra aotm alio oidbr lhm bmSlim lamr aik iokl hSTn lgrS hSTn : oam nHlqh mmlkh el ezmh la tokl lemd hmmlkh hhia : obit am nHlq el ezmo la iokl lemd hbit hhoa : oam hSTn itqomm al ezmo onHlq la iokl lemd ki ba qzo : ain aiS aSr ikl lboa lbit hgbor olgcl at klio am la iasr braSonh at hgbor oaHr iSsh at bito : amn amr ani lkm ki kl hHTaim islHo lbni adm okl hgdopim aSr igdpo : ak hmgdp at roH hqdS ain lo sliHh leolm ki iaSm beono lnzH : ki hmh amro roH Tmah bo : oibao amo oaHio oiemdo mHoz lbit oiSlHo alio lqra lo : ohmon hem iSbo sbibio oiamro alio hnh amk oaHik bHoz mbqSim aotk : oien oiamr alihm mi hm ami oaHi : oibT sbib al hiSbim sbibio oiamr hnh ami oaHi : ki kl aSr ieSh rzon halhim hoa aHi oaHoti oami :

4

oiSb al him oiHl llmd oiqhlo alio hmon em rb ed aSr ird lSbt banih bim okl hem eomd el Hop him bibSh : oilmdm hrbh bmSlim oiamr alihm blmdo atm : Smeo Smoe hnh hcre iza lcre : oihi bcreo oipl mn hcre el id hdrk oiba eop hSmim oiaklho : oiS aSr npl el mqom hsle aSr ain lo Sm admh hrbh oimhr lzmH ki la hih lo emq admh : oihi kcrH hSmS oizrb oiibS ki ain lo SrS : oiS aSr npl bin hqzim oielo hqzim oimekho ola ntn pri : oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oitn pri elh ogdl oieS ch SlSim Serim och SSim och mah : oiamr alihm mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oihi bhioto lbdo oiSaloho hanSim aSr sbibio em Snim heSr el hmSl : oiamr alihm lkm ntn ldet sod mlkot halhim oaSr bHoz lhm hkl bmSlim : lmen irao rao ola ideo oSmeo Smoe ola ibino pn iSobo onslH lHTatm : oiamr lhm hn la idetm at hmSl hch oaik tbino at hmSlim klm : hcre hoa cre at hdbr : oalh hm hncreim el id hdrk aSr icre bm hdbr okSmem aoto mid ba hSTn oiSa at hdbr hcroe blbbm : okn hncreim el mqmot hsle hm hSmeim at hdbr omhr bSmHh iqHho : ak ain lhm SrS bqrbm orq lSeh iemdo oaHr kn bhiot zrh ordiph el adot hdbr mhrh ikSlo : ohaHrim hncreim bin hqzim hm hSmeim at hdbr : odagot heolm hch omrmt heSr otaot Sar hdbrim baot ommekot at hdbr opri la ihih lo : oalh hmcreim el hadmh hTobh hm hSmeim at hdbr omqblim ato oeSim pri lSlSim Serim olSSim olmah : oiamr alihm hki ibiao hnr lmen ioSm tHt haiph otHt hmTh ola lmen ielho el hmnorh : ki ain dbr stom aSr la iglh ola nelm dbr ki am lmen iba lgloi : kl aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oiamr alihm rao mh atm Smeim bmdh aSr atm moddim bh imd lkm oeod iosp lkm hSmeim : ki mi SiS lo nton intn lo omi Sain lo gm at aSr iS lo iqH mmno : oiamr mlkot halhim hia kaSr iSlik aiS cre el hadmh : oiSn oqm lilh oiom ohcre izmH ogdl ohoa la ide : ki harz malih moziah prih at hdSa raSonh oaHrio at hSblt oaHri kn at hHTh hmlah bSblt : okaSr gml hpri imhr lSlH at hmgl ki bSl hqzir : oiamr al mh ndmh at mlkot halhim obai ch mSl nmSilnh : kgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr icre badmh ohoa qTn mkl hcreim aSr el harz : oaHri hcreo ielh oigdl el kl hirqot oeSh enpim gdolim ed aSr ioklo eop hSmim lqnn bzlo : obmSlim rbim kalh dbr alihm at hdbr kpi aSr iklo lSme : obbli mSl la dbr alihm ohih bhioto em tlmidio lbdm ibar lhm at hkl : oiamr alihm biom hhoa lpnot erb nebrh hebr : oiecbo at hmon hem oiqHo ato kaSr hoa banih ogm aniot aHrot hlko emo : otqm roH serh gdolh oiSTpo hglim al tok hanih ed aSr kmeT nmlah : ohoa iSn el hkst baHri hanih oieiro aoto oiamro alio rbi haink dag lno ki nabd : oieor oiger broH oiamr al him hs odm otSk hroH othi dmmh gdolh : oiamr alihm lmh kkh atm Hrdim aik ain lkm amonh : oiirao irah gdolh oiamro aiS al reho mi apoa hoa aSr gm hroH ohim Smeim lo :

5

oibao al ebr him al arz hgdrim : ohoa iza mn hanih ohnh aiS ba lqrato mbin hqbrim aSr roH Tmah bo : omoSbo bqbrim ogm bebtim la ikl aiS lasro : ki pemim hrbh asroho bkblim obebtim ointq at hebtim oiSbr at hkblim oain aiS ikl lkbSo : otmid lilh oiomm hih bhrim obqbrim zeq opze at ezmo babnim : oihi kraoto at ihoSe mrHoq oirz oiStHo lo : oizeq bqol gdol oiamr mh li olk ihoSe bn al elion balhim ani mSbiek aSr la tenni : ki hoa amr alio za roH Tma mn hadm hch : oiSal ato mh Smk oien oiamr lgion Smi ki rbim anHno : oitHnn alio mad lblti SlHm al mHoz larz : oedr Hcirim rbim hih Sm bmreh hhrim : oitHnno lo kl hSdim lamr SlHno al hHcirim onbah al tokm : oinH lhm oizao roHot hTmah oibao bHcirim oiSter hedr mn hmord al him kalpim bmspr oiTbeo bim : oinoso rei hHcirim oigido cat beir obSdot oizao lraot mh nhith : oibao al ihoSe oirao at aHoc hSdim aSr hlgion bo ohoa ioSb mlbS oTob Skl oiirao : oispro lhm hraim at aSr neSh laHoc hSdim oat dbr hHcirim : oiHlo lhtHnn lo lsor mgbolihm : oihi brdto al hanih htHnn alio haiS aSr hih aHoc Sdim ltto lSbt emo : ola hniH lo ki am amr alio Sob lbitk al bni mSpHtk ohgd lhm at hgdlot aSr eSh lk ihoh oiHnk : oilk lo oiHl lqra beSr herim at hgdlot aSr eSh lo ihoSe oitmho klm : oiSb ihoSe lebr banih al ebr him oiqhl alio hmon rb ohoa el Spt him : ohnh ba aHd mraSi hknst oSmo iair oira ato oipl lrglio : oitHnn alio mad lamr bti hqTnh Hlth ed lmot ana boa na oSim idik elih lmen trpa otHih : oilk ato oilko aHrio hmon rb oidHqho : oaSh hith cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh : ohia sblh hrbh tHt idi rpaim rbim ohoziah at kl aSr lh ola lhoeil oihi Hlih Hcq mad : oihi kSmeh at Sme ihoSe otboa bhmon hem maHrio otge bbgdo : ki amrh rq am age bbgdio aoSe : oiibS mqor dmih ptam otbn bbSrh ki nrpa ngeh : obrge ide ihoSe bnpSo ki gborh izah mmno oipn btok hem oiamr mi nge bbgdi : oiamr alio tlmidio ath rah at hhmon doHq atk oamrt mi nge bi : oibT sbib lraot at aSr eSth cat : otira haSh otHrd ki ideh at aSr neSh lh otba otpl lpnio otgd lo at hamt klh : oiamr alih bti amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom oHiit mngek : eodno mdbr ohnh baim mbit raS hknst lamr btk mth lmh tTriH eod at hmorh : okSme ihoSe at hdbr aSr dbro oiamr al raS hknst al tira rq haminh : ola hniH laiS llkt ato blti am lpTros olieqb olioHnn aHi ieqb : oiba bit raS hknst oira hmon hbkim ohmillim hrbh : obbao amr alihm mh thmo otbko hnerh la mth ak iSnh hia : oiSHqo lo ohoa grS at klm oiqH at abi hnerh oat amh oat aSr ato oiba hHdrh aSr Sm Skbt hnerh : oiaHc bid hnerh oiamr alih Tlita qomi aSr proSo hildh ani amr lk qomi na : omid qmh hildh otthlk ohia bt Stim eSrh Snh oiSmo Smh gdolh : oichr aotm mad Sla iode hdbr laiS oiamr ltt lh lakol :

6

oiza mSm oiba al arzo oilko aHrio tlmidio : obiom hSbt hHl llmd bbit hknst oiSmeo rbim oiStommo lamr main lch kalh omh hia hHkmh hntonh lo ed aSr neSo gborot kalh el idio : hla ch hoa hHrS bn mrim oaHi ieqb oiosi oihodh oSmeon ohla aHiotio atno ph oihi lhm lmkSol : oiamr alihm ihoSe ain hnbia nqlh ki am barzo obin qrobio obbito : ola ikl leSot Sm pla rq el HlSim meTim Sm at idio oirpam : oitmh el Hsron amontm oisb bkprim sbob olmd : oiqra al Snim heSr oiHl lSlH aotm Snim Snim oitn lhm SlTn el roHot hTmah : oizo aotm aSr la iSao maomh ldrk colti mql lbdo la trmil ola lHm ola nHSt bHgorh : rq lhiot neoli sndl oSti ktnot la ilbSo : oiamr alihm bmqom aSr tbao bit aiS Sbo bo ed ki tzao mSm : okl aSr la iqblo atkm ola iSmeo alikm zao mSm onero at epr kpot rglikm ledot lhm amn ani amr lkm lsdm
