olemrh iql biom hdin mn heir hhia : oizao oiqrao lSob btSobh : oigrSo Sdim rbim oisoko bSmn HlSim rbim oirpaom : oiSme elio hmlk hordos ki node Smo oiamr ioHnn hTobl qm mn hmtim oel kn pelot bo hgborot : oaHrim amro ki hoa aliho oaHrim amro ki nbia hoa ao kaHd hnbiaim : oiSme hordos oiamr ioHnn aSr anki nSati at raSo melio hoa qm mn hmtim : ki hoa horods SlH ltpS at ioHnn oiasrho bbit hshr bgll horodih aSt pilpos aHio ki ath lqH lo laSh : ien aSr amr ioHnn al hordos aSt aHik ainnh mtrt lk : otSTm aoto horodih otbqS hmito ola iklh : ki hordos ira at ioHnn bdeto ki hoa aiS zdiq oqdoS oign bedo ohrbh eSh bSmeo alio oiahb lSme ato : oiba hiom hmkSr ki hordos biom hldt ato eSh mSth lgdolio olSri halpim olraSi hglil : otba bt horodih otrqd otiTb beini hordos obeini hmsbim emo oiamr hmlk al hnerh Sali mmni at aSr tHpzi oatn lk : oiSbe lh lamr kl aSr tSali mmni atn lk ed Hzi mlkoti : otza otamr lamh mh aSal otamr at raS ioHnn hmTbil : otmhr mad lboa al hmlk otSal lamr rzoni aSr ttn li eth bqerh at raS ioHnn hmTbil : oitezb hmlk mad ak bebor hSboeh ohmsbim emo la rzh lhSib pnih : omid SlH hmlk aHd hTbHim oizoho lhbia at raSo : oilk oikrt at raSo bbit hshr oibiaho bqerh oitnho lnerh ohnerh ntnh ato al amh : oiSmeo tlmidio oibao oiSao at goito oiSimoh bqbr : oiqhlo hSliHim al ihoSe oigido lo at kl aSr eSo oat aSr lmdo : oiamr alihm bao atm lbdd al mqom Hrbh onoHo meT ki rbim hio hbaim ohizaim ed lain et lhm lakol : oilko mSm banih al mqom Hrbh lbdd : ohhmon rah aotm izaim oikirho rbim oirozo Smh brglihm mkl herim oiebro aotm oiaspo alio : oiza oira hmon em rb oihmo meio elihm ki hio kzan aSr ain lhm reh oiHl llmd aotm dbrim hrbh : oihi kaSr rph hiom lerob oigSo alio tlmidio lamr hnh hmqom Hrb ohiom rd mad : SlH aotm oilko al hHzrim ohkprim msbib lqnot lhm lHm ki ain lhm mh lakl : oien oiamr alihm tno atm lhm laklh oiamro alio hnlk lqnot lHm bmatim dinr ontn lhm laklh : oiamr alihm kmh kkrot lHm iS lkm lko orao oideo oiamro HmS oSni dgim : oizo aotm lSbt klm Hbrh Hbrh lbdh el irq hdSa : oiSbo lhm Sorot Sorot lmaot olHmSim : oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk oiprs at hlHm oitn ltlmidio lSom lpnihm oat Sni hdgim Hlq lklm : oiaklo klm oiSbeo : oiSao mn hptotim mloa slim Snim eSr ogm mn hdgim : ohaklim mn hlHm hio kHmSt alpi aiS : oaHri kn haiz btlmidio lrdt banih olebor lpnio al ebr him al bit zidh ed SlHo at hem : oihi aHr SlHo atm oiel hhrh lhtpll : oihi erb ohanih bah btok him ohoa lbdo bibSh : oira aotm mtemlim bSoTm ki hroH lngdm oihi ket haSmrt hrbieit oiba alihm mthlk el pni him oioal lebor lpnihm : ohm bratm ato mthlk el pni him HSbo ki mrah roH hoa oizeqo : ki klm raoho oibhlo ac dbr atm oiamr alihm Hcqo ki ani hoa al tirao : oird alihm al hanih ohroH Skkh oiStommo eod iotr blbbm oitmho : ki la hSkilo bdbr kkrot hlHm mpni TmTom lbbm : oiebro at him oibao arzh gnisr oiqrbo al hibSh : oihi kzatm mn hanih ac hkirho : oirozo bkl sbibotihm oiHlo lSat at hHolim bmSkbot al kl mqom aSr Smeo ki Sm hoa : obkl mqom aSr iba al hkprim ao herim oal hSdot Sm Smo at hHolim bHozot oitHnno lo ki igeo rq bzizt bgdo ohih kl aSr ngeo onoSeo :

7

oiqhlo alio hproSim omn hsoprim aSr bao miroSlim : oihi kraotm mtlmidio aklim lHm bTmat idihm bla nTilh oiokiHo atm : ki hproSim okl hihodim la iaklo blti at rHzo at idihm ed hprq baHcm bqblt hcqnim : oat aSr mn hSoq ainm aklim bla Tbilh oeod dbrim aHrim rbim aSr qblo lSmr kmo Tbilt ksot okdim oiorot omTot : oiSalo aoto hproSim ohsoprim mdoe tlmidik ainm nhgim el pi qblt hcqnim ki aklim lHm bla nTbilt idim : oien oiamr alihm hiTb nba iSeiho elikm hHnpim kktob hem hch bSptio kbdoni olbo rHq mmni : otho iratm ati mzot anSim mlmdim : ki ecbtm at mzot alhim laHc bqblt bni adm Tbilot kdim oksot okalh rbot atm eSim : oiamr alihm mh iph eSitm aSr bTltm at mzot halhim kdi StSmro at qbltkm : ki mSh amr kbd at abik oat amk omqll abio oamo mot iomt : oatm amrim aiS ki iamr labio olamo qrbn proSo mtnh lalhim kl mh Sath nhnh li : ola tniHo lo leSot eod maomh labio olamo : otpro at dbr halhim el idi qbltkm aSr qbltm ohrbh kalh atm eSim : oiqra al kl hem oiamr alihm Smeo ali klkm ohbino : ain dbr mHoz ladm aSr iokl lTma aoto bbao al qrbo ki am hdbrim hiozaim mmno hmh iTmao at hadm : kl aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oihi kaSr Sb hbith mn hhmon oiSalho tlmidio el dbr hmSl : oiamr alihm hap atm Hsri binh hla tSkilo ki kl hba at tok hadm mHozh lo la iTmano : ki la iboa al lbo ki am al krSo oiza lmozaot lhbr kl akl : oiamr hiza mn hadm hoa mTma at hadm : ki mtok lb hadm izaot hmHSbot hreot nap ocnh orzoH ognob oahbt bze orSeh ormih ocollot ozrot ein ogdop ocdon osklot : : kl hreot halh mqrb hadm hn iozaot omTmaot ato : oiqm mSm oilk lo al gbolot zor ozidon obboao hbith la abh ki iode laiS ola ikl lhstr : ki aSh aSr roH Tmah nknsh bbth hqTnh Smeh at Smeo otba otpl lrglio : ohaSh ionit oarz moldth knen aSr lsoria otbqS mmno lgrS ar hSd mbth : oiamr alih ihoSe hniHo lSbe braSonh hbnim ki la Tob lqHt lHm hbnim olhSliko lzeiri hklbim : oten otamr alio kn adni abl gm zeiri hklbim iaklo tHt hSlHn mprori lHm hbnim : oiamr alih bgll dbrk ch lki lk iza hSd mbtk : otba al bith otmza at hildh mSkbt el HmTh ohSd iza mmnh : oiSb oiza mgbol zor ozidon oiba al im hglil btok gbol eSr herim : oibiao alio aiS aSr hih HrS oalm oitHnno lo lSom elio at ido : oiqH ato lbdo mqrb hhmon oiSm at azbeotio bacnio oirq oige el lSno : oibT hSmimh oianH oiamr alio aptH oproSo hptH : obrge nptHo acnio oitr qSr lSono oidbr bSph brorh : oichr aotm ki la ispro laiS okaSr ichirm kn irbo lhkric : oiStommo ed mad oiamro at hkl eSh iph gm hHrSim hoa eSh lSmeim gm halmim lmdbrim :

8

oihi bimim hhm bhqbz em rb oain lhm mh iaklo oiqra al tlmidio oiamr alihm : nkmro rHmi el hem ki ch SlSt imim emdo emdi oain lhm lHm lakl : ohih bSlHi aotm rebim lbtihm itelpo bdrk ki iS mhm aSr bao mmrHq : oieno ato tlmidio main iokl aiS lhSbie at alh ph bmdbr lHm : oiSal aotm kmh kkrot lHm iS lkm oiamro Sbe : oizo at hem lSbt larz oiqH at Sbe kkrot hlHm oibrk oiprs oitn aotm ltlmidio lSom lpnihm oiSimo lpni hem : oihi lhm meT dgim qTnim oibrk oiamr lSom lpnihm gm at alh : oiaklo oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim Sbet dodim : ohaklim hio karbet alpi aiS oiSlHm : ac ird banih em tlmidio oiba al glilot dlmonta : oizao hproSim oiHlo lhtokH ato oiSalo memo aot mn hSmim ohm mnsim ato : oianH broHo oiamr mh hdor hch mbqS lo aot amn amr ani lkm am intn aot ldor hch : oiecb aotm oird banih oiSb oiebr al ebr him : oiSkHo lqHt atm lHm ola hih lhm banih blti am kkr lHm aHt : oichr aotm lamr rao hSmro lkm mSar hproSim omSar hordos : oiHSbo oiamro aiS al reho el ki lHm ain atno : oide ihoSe oiamr lhm mh tHSbo el ki lHm ain lkm heod la tSkilo ola tbino olbkm eodno mTmTm : einim lkm ola trao oacnim lkm ola tSmeo ola tckro : kaSr prsti at HmSt kkrot hlHm lHmSt alpi aiS kmh slim mlai ptotim nSatm oiamro alio Snim eSr : obSbe larbet alpi aiS kmh dodim mlai ptotim nSatm oiamro alio Sbeh : oiamr alihm aik la tbino : oiba al bit zidh oibiao alio aiS eor oitHnno lo lget bo : oiaHc bid heor oiolikho al mHoz lkpr oirq beinio oiSm at idio elio oiSalho lamr hrah ath dbr : oibT oiamr arah at bni hadm ki mthlkim kailnot ani rah : oiosp lSom at idio el einio otpqHnh einio oirpa oira hkl hiTb ed lmrHoq : oiSlHho al bito lamr al tba btok hkpr oal tdbr laiS bkpr : oiza ihoSe otlmidio llkt al kpri qisrin Sl pilpos oihi bdrk oiSal at tlmidio oiamr alihm mh amrim eli hanSim mi ani : oieno oiamro ioHnn hmTbil oiS amrim aliho oaHrim amrim aHd mn hnbiaim : oiSal atm lamr oatm mh tamro eli mi ani oien pTros oiamr alio ath hoa hmSiH : oizo atm bgerh lblti dbr elio laiS : oiHl llmdm ki zrik bn hadm lenot hrbh oimas el idi hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oiomt omqzh SlSt imim qom iqom : ohoa bgloi dbr at hdbr hch oiqHho pTros oiHl lger bo : oipn aHrio oibT at tlmidio oiger bpTros lamr sor mel pni hSTn ki ain lbk ldbri halhim ki am ldbri hadm : oiqra al hem oal tlmidio oiamr alihm hHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo oiSa at zlbo oilk aHri : ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr tabd lo npSo lmeni olmen hbSorh hoa ioSienh : ki mh iskn ladm ki iqnh at kl heolm onSHth npSo : ao mh itn aiS pdion npSo : ki kl aiS aSr hiiti ani odbri lo lHrph bdor hnap ohHoTa hch ap hoa ihih lHrph lbn hadm bboao bkbod abio em hmlakim hqdoSim :

9

oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ki iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao mlkot halhim bah bgborh : oaHri SSt imim lqH ihoSe at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn oielm el hr gbh ato lbdm oiStnh leinihm : obgdio nhio mchirim lbnim mad kSlg aSr la iokl kobs barz lhlbin kmohm : oira alihm aliho omSh mdbrim em ihoSe : oien pTros oiamr al ihoSe rbi Tob hiotno ph neSh na SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt : ki la ide mh idbr ki hio nbhlim : oihi enn sokk elihm oiza mn henn qol amr ch bni ididi alio Smeo : ohmh hbiTo kh okh ptam ola rao eod aiS blti at ihoSe lbdo atm : oirdo mn hhr oichirm lblti hgid laiS at aSr rao ed ki iqom bn hadm mn hmtim : oiSmro at hdbr blbbm oidrSo ldet mh hia htqomh mn hmtim : oiSalho lamr mh ch amrim hsoprim ki aliho boa iboa braSonh : oien oiamr lhm hnh aliho ba braSonh oiSib at hkl omh ktob el bn hadm hla ki ienh hrbh oimas : abl amr ani lkm gm ba aliho ogm eSo lo krzonm kaSr ktob elio : oihi kboao al htlmidim oira em rb sbibotm osoprim mtokHim atm : okl hem kraotm ato kn tmho oirozi alio oiSalo lo lSlom : oiSal at hsoprim mh atm mtokHim emhm : oien aHd mn hem oiamr rbi hbati alik at bni aSr roH alm bqrbo : ohih bkl mqom aSr iaHcho hoa mrzz ato oird riro oHrq at Snio oibS gopo oamr al tlmidik lgrSo ola iklo : oien oiamr lhm hoi dor blti mamin ed mti ahih emkm ed mti asbl atkm hbiao ato lpni : oibiaho lpnio oihi kaSr raho hroH oirozzno ptam oipl arzh oitgoll oiord riro : oiSal at abio kmh imim hith lo cat oiamr mimi neorio : opemim rbot hpil ato gm baS gm bmim lhabido ak am ikl tokl rHm elino oecrno : oiamr alio ihoSe lamr am tokl lhamin kl iokl hmamin : oitn abi hild at qlo bbki oiamr ani mamin ecr na lHsron amonti : oira ihoSe at hem mtqbz alio oiger broH hTma lamr roH alm oHrS ani mzok za mmno oal tsp lboa bo eod : oizeq oirzz ato mad oiza oihi kmt ed aSr amro rbim ki goe : oiHcq ihoSe bido oinieho oiqm : oihi kaSr ba hbith oiSalho tlmidio bhiotm lbdm ato mdoe anHno la iklno lgrSo : oiamr alihm hmin hch iza la iza ki am btplh obzom : oizao mSm oiebro bglil ola abh lhode laiS : ki hih mlmd at tlmidio lamr alihm ki etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi bni adm oihrgho oaHri aSr nhrg iqom biom hSliSi : ohm la hbino at hdbr oiirao lSal aoto : oiba al kpr nHom obhioto bbit oiSal aotm mh htokHtm aiS em reho bdrk : oiHriSo ki hteSqo bdrk mi hoa hgdol bhm : oiSb oiqra al Snim heSr oiamr alihm aiS ki iHpz lhiot hraSon hoa ihih haHron lklm omSrt klm : oiqH ild oiemidho btokm oiHbqho oiamr lhm : kl aSr iqbl bSmi ild aHd kch hoa mqbl aoti okl aSr aoti iqbl ainno mqbl aoti ki am at aSr SlHni : oien ioHnn oiamr alio rbi raino aiS mgrS Sdim bSmk oainno holk aHrino onklano ien aSr la hlk aHrino : oiamr ihoSe al tklaho ki ain aiS eSh gborh bSmi oiokl bmhrh ldbr bi reh : ki kl aSr ainno ngdno hoa bedno : ki kl hmSqh atkm kos mim bSmi el aSr atm lmSiH amn amr ani lkm ki la iabd Skro : okl hmkSil aHd hqTnim hmaminim bi Tob lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro ohSlk bim : oam idk tkSilk qzz ath Tob lk lboa qTe lHiim mhiot lk Sti idim otlk al gihnm al haS aSr la tkbh : aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh : oam rglk tkSilk qzz ath Tob lk lboa psH lHiim mhiot lk Sti rglim otSlk lgihnm al haS aSr la tkbh : aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh : oam eink tkSilk eqr ath Tob lk lboa al mlkot halhim bein aHt mhiot lk Sti einim otSlk lgihnm : aSr Sm toletm la tmot oaSm la tkbh : ki kl aiS baS imlH okl qrbn bmlH imlH : Tob hmlH oam hmlH ihih tpl bmh ttqno aoto ihi lkm mlH bqrbkm oihi Slom binikm :

10

oiqm mSm oilk al gbol ihodh mebr hirdn oiqhlo eod alio hmon em oilmdm kpem bpem : oigSo alio hproSim oiSalho am iokl aiS lSlH at aSto ohm mnsim ato : oien oiamr alihm mh zoh atkm mSh : oiamro mSh htir lktb spr kritt olSlH : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm bebor qSi lbbkm ktb lkm at hmzoh hcat : abl mraSit hbriah ckr onqbh eSh atm alhim : el kn iecb aiS at abio oat amo odbq baSto : ohio Snihm lbSr aHd oam kn apoa ainm eod Snim ki am bSr aHd : lkn at aSr Hbr alhim la ipridno adm : oihi bbit oiSobo tlmidio lSal ato el cat : oiamr alihm hmSlH at aSto olqH aHrt nap hoa elih : oaSh ki tecb aiSh olqHh aiS aHr napt hia : oibiao alio ildim lmen ige bhm oigero htlmidim bmbiaihm : oira ihoSe oikes oiamr alihm hniHo lildim lboa ali oal tmneom ki lalh mlkot halhim : amn amr ani lkm kl aSr la iqbl at mlkot halhim kild hoa la iba bh : oiHbqm oibrkm bSomo at idio elihm : oihi bzato ldrk ohnh aiS rz alio oikre lpnio oiSal aoto rbi hTob mh aeSh oairS Hii eolm : oiamr lo ihoSe mdoe qrat li Tob ain Tob blti aHd halhim : hn idet at hmzot la tnap la trzH la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr la teSq kbd at abik oat amk : oien oiamr alio rbi at kl alh Smrti neori : oibT bo ihoSe oiahbho oiamr alio aHt Hsrt lk mkr at kl aSr lk otn leniim oihi lk aozr bSmim oboa Sa at hzlb olk aHri : oizr lo el hdbr hch oiezb oilk lo ki hon rb hih lo : oibT ihoSe sbib oiamr al tlmidio kmh iqSh lbeli nksim lboa al mlkot halhim : oibhlo htlmidim el dbrio oisp ihoSe oien oiamr lhm bni mh qSh lbTHim el Hilm lboa al mlkot halhim : nql lgml lebr btok nqb hmHT mboa eSir al mlkot halhim : oiosipo eod lhStomm oiamro aiS alm aHio mi apoa iokl lhoSe : oibT bm ihoSe oiamr mbni adm tpla cat ak la malhim ki malhim la ipla kl dbr : oien pTros oiamr alio hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik : oiamr ihoSe amn amr ani lkm ki ain aiS aSr ecb at bito ao at aHio ao at aHiotio ao at abio ao at amo ao at aSto ao at bnio ao at Sdotio lmeni olmen hbSorh : aSr la iqH eth bcmn hch bkl hrdipot mah pemim khmh btim oaHim oaHiot oamot obnim oSdot obeolm hba Hii eolmim : oaolm rbim mn hraSonim ihio aHronim ohaHronim raSonim : oihi bdrk belotm iroSlim oihoSe holk lpnihm ohmh nbhlim oiraim blktm aHrio oiosp lqHt alio at Snim heSr oiHl lhgid lhm at aSr iqrho lamr : hnh anHno elim iroSlimh obn hadm imsr lraSi hkhnim olsoprim oirSieho lmot oimsro ato lgoim : oihtlo bo oikho bSoTim oirqo bpnio oimitho obiom hSliSi qom iqom : oiqrbo alio ieqb oioHnn bni cbdi oiamro rbi aoth npSno ki teSh lno at aSr nSal mmk : oiamr alihm mh aoitm ki aeSh lkm : oiamro alio tnh lno lSbt aHd limink oaHd lSmalk bkbodk : oiamr alihm ihoSe la idetm at aSr Saltm hikl toklo lStot at hkos aSr ani Sth olhTbl bTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh : oiamro alio nokl oiamr alihm ihoSe at hkos aSr ani Sth tSto obTbilh aSr ani nTbl bh tTblo : ak Sbt limini olSmali ain bidi ltth blti laSr hokn lhm : oihi kSme cat heSrh oiHlo lkeos el ieqb oioHnn : oiqra lhm ihoSe oiamr alihm atm idetm ki hnHSbim lSri hgoim hm rdim bhm ogdolihm SolTim elihm : oatm la kn binikm ki am hHpz lhiot gdol binikm ihih lkm lmSrt : ohHpz lhiot bkm raSon ihih ebd lkl : ki bn hadm ap hoa la ba lmen iSrtoho ki am lSrt oltt at npSo kpr tHt rbim : oibao iriHo oihi kzato miriHo hoa otlmidio ohmon em rb ohnh brTimi bn Timi aiS eor iSb el id hdrk lSal ndbot : oiSme ki hoa ihoSe hnzri oiHl lzeq oiamr ana bn dod ihoSe Hnni : oigero bo rbim lhStiqo ohoa hrbh lzeq bn dod Hnni : oiemd ihoSe oiamr qrao lo oiqrao leor oiamro alio Hcq qom qra lk : oiSlk at Smlto melio oiqm oiba al ihoSe : oien ihoSe oiamr alio mh Hpzt oaeSh lk oiamr alio heor rboni ki arah : oiamr ihoSe alio lk lk amontk hoSieh lk optam rah oilk aHri ihoSe bdrk :

11

oihi kaSr qrbo liroSlim al bit pgi obit hini bhr hcitim oiSlH Snim mtlmidio : oiamr alihm lko al hkpr aSr mmolkm ohih kbakm Smh tmzao eir asor aSr la iSb elio adm aoto htiro ohbiao : oki iamr alikm aiS lmh teSo cat oamrtm hadon zrik lo obrge iSlHno hnh : oilko oimzao heir asor al hSer bHoz el am hdrk oitiroho : oanSim mn hemdim Sm amro alihm mh cat teSo lhtir at heir : oiamro alihm kaSr zom ihoSe oiniHo lhm : oibiao at heir al ihoSe oiSliko elio at bgdihm oiSb elio : orbim prSo at bgdihm el hdrk oaHrim krto enpim mn hezim oiSTHo el hdrk : ohhlkim lpnio oaHrio zeqim lamr hoSe na brok hba bSm ihoh : brokh mlkot dod abino hbah bSm ihoh hoSe na bmromim : oiba ihoSe iroSlim oal bit hmqdS oira oitbonn el hkl ohiom rph lerob oiza al bit hini em Snim heSr : oihi mmHrt bzatm mbit hini oireb : oira tanh mrHoq ola elim oiba lraot himza bh pri oiqrb alih ola mza bh ki am elim lbd ki la hith et tanim : oien oiamr alih meth aiS al iakl pri mmk ed eolm oiSmeo tlmidio : oibao iroSlim oiba ihoSe al hmqdS oiHl lgrS mSm at hmokrim oat hqonim oihpk at SlHnot hSlHnim oat moSbot mkri hionim : ola hniH laiS lSat kli drk hmqdS : oilmd oiamr lhm hla ktob ki biti bit tplh iqra lkl hemim oatm eSitm ato mert priaim : oiSmeo hsoprim oraSi hkhnim oitnklo ato lhSmido ki irao mpnio ien aSr kl hem mStommim el torto : oihi berb oiza al mHoz leir : oihi hm ebrim bbqr oirao at htanh ki ibSh em SrSih : oickr pTros oiamr alio rbi hnh htanh aSr arrth ibSh : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm thi na bkm amont alhim : ki amn amr ani lkm kl aSr iamr al hhr hch hnSa ohetq al tok him oain spq blbbo ki am iamin ki ihih kaSr amr kn gm ihih lo : el kn ani amr lkm kl aSr tSalo bhtpllkm hamino ki tqHo oihi lkm : oki temdo lhtpll tslHo lkl aiS at aSr blbbkm elio lmen islH lkm abikm SbSmim ap hoa at pSeikm : oatm am la tslHo ap abikm SbSmim la islH lkm at pSeikm : oiSobo oibao iroSlim oihi hoa mthlk bmqdS oibao alio hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ohcqnim : oiamro alio bai co rSot ath eSh alh omi ntn lk at hrSot hcat leSot at alh : oiamr ihoSe alihm gm ani aSalh atkm dbr aHd oatm hSiboni oamr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh : Tbilt ioHnn hmn hSmim hith am mbni adm hSiboni : oiHSbo kh okh bqrbm lamr am namr mn hSmim iamr mdoe apoa la hamntm lo : ao hnamr mbni adm oiirao at hem ki klm HSbo at ioHnn lnbia bamt : oieno oiamro al ihoSe la ideno oien ihoSe oiamr alihm am kn gm ani la amr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh :

12

oiHl ldbr alihm bmSlim lamr aiS nTe krm oieS gdr sbibotio oiHzb iqb oibn mgdl oitnho al krmim oilk lmrHqim : olmoed SlH al hkrmim ebd lqHt mat hkrmim mpri hkrm : oiHciqo bo oikho oiSlHho riqm : oisp lSlH alihm ebd aHr oato sqlo babnim omHqo raSo oiSlHho nklm : oisp oiSlH aHr ogm ato hrgo okn eSo brbim aHrim mhm hko omhm hrgo : oihi lo eod bn iHid aSr ahbo oiSlH gm ato alihm baHrnh lamr mpni bni igoro : ohkrmim hhm amro aiS al reho hnh ch hoa hiorS lko onhrgho olno thih hirSh : oiHciqo bo oihrgo aoto oiSlikho al mHoz lkrm : oeth mh ieSh bel hkrm iboa oiabd at hkrmim hhm oitn at hkrm laHrim : hla qratm at hktob hch abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh : mat ihoh hith cat hia nplat beinino : oibqSo ltpSo oiirao mpni hem ien aSr hbino ki elihm dbr at hmSl hch oiecbho oilko lhm : oiSlHo alio anSim mn hproSim omn hhordosim llkd ato bdbro : oibao oiamro alio rbi ideno ki aiS amt ath ola tgor mpni aiS ki la tkir pnim ki am bamt morh ath at drk halhim hnkon ltt ms al hqisr am la ntn : ohoa ide at Hnptm oiamr alihm mh tnsoni hbiao ali dinr oarah : oibiao oiamr alihm Sl mi hzorh hcat ohmktb aSr elio oiamro alio Sl hqisr : oiamr ihoSe alihm at aSr lqisr tno lqisr oat aSr lalhim tno lalhim oitmho elio : oibao alio mn hzdoqim hamrim ki ain tHih lmtim oiSalho lamr : rbi ktb lno mSh ki imot aHi aiS oecb aSh obnim ain lo iibm aHio at aSto oiqm cre laHio : ohnh Sbeh aHim ohraSon lqH aSh obmoto la hSair aHrio cre : oiqH ath hSni oimt ola hniH cre okn gm hSliSi : oiqHoh kl hSbeh ola hSairo aHrihm cre oaHri mot klm mth gm haSh : oeth btHit hmtim kSiqomo lmi mhm thih laSh ki lSbeh hith laSh : oiamr ihoSe alihm hla bcat atm teim baSr ainkm iodeim gm at hktobim gm at gbort halhim : ki bet qomm mn hmtim hanSim la iSao nSim ola tnSanh ak ihio kmlaki hSmim : oel dbr hmtim ki qom iqomo hla qratm bspr mSh bsnh at aSr dbr alio halhim lamr anki alhi abrhm oalhi izHq oalhi ieqb : halhim ainno alhi hmtim ki am alhi hHiim lkn hrbitm lteot : oaHd mn hsoprim Sme atm mtokHim oiqrb alihm oira ki hiTb hSibm oiSalho mh hia hraSnh lkl hmzot : oien ihoSe oidbr alio hraSnh lkl hmzot hia Sme iSral ihoh alhino ihoh aHd : oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl mdek obkl madk cat hia hmzoh hraSnh : ohSnit hdmh lh hia oahbt lrek kmok oain mzoh gdolh malh : oiamr alio hsopr amnm rbi iph dbrt ki alhim aHd hoa oain eod mlbdo : olahbh ato bkl lbb obkl mde obkl npS obkl mad olahbh at hre knpSo gdolh hia mkl elot ocbHim : oira ihoSe ki enh bdet oiamr alio la rHoq ath mmlkot halhim oaiS la erb eod at lbo lSal aoto Salh : oien ihoSe blmdo bmqdS oiamr aik iamro hsoprim ki hmSiH hoa bn dod : ohoa dod amr broH hqdS nam ihoh ladni Sb limini ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : hnh dod bezmo qra lo adon oaik hoa bno oiahb rb hem lSme ato : oiamr alihm blmd atm hSmro mn hsoprim hahbim lhthlk eTopi Tlit oat Salot Slomm bSoqim : oat moSbi hraS bbti knsiot oat msbot hraS bseodot : hbleim at bti halmnot omarikim btplh lmrah einim hmh mSpT el itr iqHo : oihoSe iSb mmol aron haozr ohoa rah at hem mSlikim meot laron haozr oeSirim rbim ntno hrbh : otba almnh enih otSlk Sti proTot aSr hn rbe asr : oiqra al tlmidio oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ki halmnh henih hcat ntnh iotr mkl hntnim al aron haozr : ki klm ntno mn hedp Slhm ohia mmHsrh ntnh kl aSr lh at kl rkoSh :

13

oihi bzato mn hmqdS oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio rbi rah mh ipo habnim ohbninim halh : oien ihoSe ato oiamr hrait at kl hbninim hgdolim halh la tSar abn el abn aSr la ttprq : oiSb el hr hcitim mmol hmqdS oiSalho pTros oieqb oioHnn oandri ohm ato lbdm : amr na lno mti thih cat omh hoa haot bba het aSr teSh bh kl cat : oien atm ihoSe oiHl ldbr rao pn iteh atkm aiS : ki rbim ibao bSmi lamr ani hoa oiteo rbim : obSmekm mlHmot oSmeot mlHmh al tbhlo ki hio thih cat ak la cat hia hqz : ki iqom goi el goi ommlkh el mmlkh ohih reS kh okh ohih reb omhomh : alh raSit hHblim oatm hSmro bnpStikm ki imsro atkm lsnhdriot ohkitm bbti knsiot olpni mSlim omlkim tobao lmeni ledot lhm : ohbSorh zrikh lhqra braSnh lkl hgoim : okaSr ioliko omsro atkm al tdago oal tHSbo mh tdbro ki hdbr aSr intn lkm bSeh hhia aoto dbro ien la atm hm hmdbrim ki am roH hqdS : oaH imsr at aHio lmot oab at bno oqmo bnim babotm ohmito aotm : ohiitm Snoaim lkl adm lmen Smi ohmHkh ed et qz hoa ioSe : oki trao at Sqoz mSmm hnamr bid dnial hnbia emd bmqom aSr la lo hqora ibin ac nos inoso anSi ihodh al hhrim : oaSr el hgg al ird hbith oal iba pnimh lSat dbr mbito : oaSr bSdh al iSb hbith lSat mlboSo : oaoi lhrot olminiqot bimim hhmh : ak htpllo aSr la thih mnostkm bHrp : ki himim hhm ihio et zrh aSr la nhith kmoh mraSit hbriah aSr bra alhim ed eth okmoh la thih eod : ololi qzr ihoh at himim hhm la ioSe kl bSr ak lmen hbHirim aSr bHr bm qzr at himim : oac am iamr aiS alikm hnh ph hmSiH ao hnho Sm al tamino : ki iqomo mSiHi Sqr onbiai Sqr ontno atot omoptim lhteot ap at hbHirim am ioklo : oatm rao hnh mraS hgdti lkm at kl : ohih bimim hhm aHri hzrh hhia tHSk hSmS ohirH la igih aoro : ohkokbim iplo mn hSmim okHot hSmim itmoTTo : oac irao at bn hadm ba bennim bgborh rbh obkbod : oac iSlH at mlakio oiqbz at bHirio marbe hroHot mqzh harz ed qzh hSmim : lmdo na at mSl htanh kSirTb enph oprH elh idetm ki qrob hqiz : kn ap atm bratkm ki hio kl alh deo ki qrob hoa lptH : amn amr ani lkm la iebr hdor hch ed aSr ihio kl alh : hSmim oharz iebro odbri la iebron : ak et boa hiom hhoa ohSeh hhia ain aiS iode aoth gm la mlaki hSmim gm la hbn mbledi hab : rao Sqdo ohtpllo ki la idetm mti thih het : ohih kaiS holk lmrHq aSr ecb at bito oitn SlTn lebdio olaiS aiS at mlakto ogm at hSoer zoh lSqd : lkn Sqdo ki la idetm mti iboa bel hbit am let erb ao bHzot hlilh am bet qriat hgbr ao bbqr : pn iboa ptam omza atkm iSnim : oat aSr amrti lkm amr ani lkl Sqdo :

14

oihi iomim lpni Hg hpsH ohmzot oibqSo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim aik itpSho bermh lhmito : oiamro ak la bHg pn thih mhomh bem : oihi bhioto bbit hini bit Smeon hmzre oisb al hSlHn otba aSh obidh pk Smn nrd ck oiqr mad otSbr at hpk otzq el raSo : oiS aSr mtremim aiS al reho lamr el mh hih abod hSmn hch : ki raoi hih ch lhmkr biotr mSlS maot dinr oltto leniim oigero bh : oiamr ihoSe hniHo lh lmh tgion npSh meSh Tob eSth emdi : ki heniim tmid emkm okStrzo toklo lhiTib lhm oanki la ahih atkm tmid : at aSr hih lal idh eSth qdmh lmSoH at gopi lHnTo : amn amr ani lkm ki baSr tqra hbSorh hcat al kl heolm gm at aSr eSth hia ispr lckron lh : oihodh aiS qriot aHd mSnim heSr hlk al raSi hkhnim lmsr aoto alihm : ohm kSmem SmHo oiamro ltt lo ksp oibqS tanh lmsro : oihi braSon lHg hmzot et cbH hpsH oiamro alio tlmidio aiph tHpz lakl at hpsH onlkh onkin : oiSlH Snim mtlmidio oiamr alihm lko heirh oipge atkm aiS nSa zpHt hmim lko aHrio : obaSr iboa Smh amro lbel hbit kh amr hrb aih hmlon aSt aklh Sm at hpsH em tlmidi : ohoa irah atkm elih gdolh mzeh omoknh oSm hkino lno : oizao tlmidio oibao heirh oimzao kaSr dbr lhm oikino at hpsH : oihi berb oiba em Snim heSr : oisbo oiaklo oiamr ihoSe amn amr ani lkm aHd mkm hakl ati imsrni : oiHlo lhtezb oiamro alio ch aHr ch hki ani hoa : oien oiamr alihm aHd mSnim heSr hoa hTbl emi bqerh : hn bn hadm hlk ilk kaSr ktob elio abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido imsr bn hadm Tob laiS hhoa Sla nold : oihi baklm oiqH ihoSe lHm oibrk oibze oitn lhm oiamr qHo aklo ch hoa gopi : oiqH at hkos oibrk oitn lhm oiSto mmnh klm : oiamr lhm ch hoa dmi dm hbrit hHdSh hnSpk bed rbim : amn amr ani lkm Sth la aSth eod mtnobt hgpn ed hiom hhoa aSr aSth aoth HdSh bmlkot halhim : oaHri gmrm at hhll oizao al hr hcitim : oiamr alihm ihoSe atm klkm tkSlo bi blilh hch ki ktob akh at hreh otpozin hzan : oaHri qomi mn hmtim alk lpnikm hglilh : oiamr alio pTros gm am klm ikSlo ani la akSl : oiamr alio ihoSe amn amr ani lk ki hiom blilh hch bTrm iqra htrngol pemim ath tkHS bi SlS pemim : ohoa htHcq oiosp ldbr oiamr gm ki ihih eli lmot atk kHS la akHS bk okn amro gm klm : oibao al Hzr gt Smni Smo oiamr al tlmidio Sbo lkm ph ed aSr atpll : oiqH ato at pTros oat ieqb oat ioHnn oiHl lhSmim olmog : oiamr alihm npSi mrh li ed mot emdo ph oSqdo : oiebr mSm meT ohlah oipl arzh oitpll aSr am iokl hiot tebr na melio hSeh hcat : oiamr aba abi hkl tokl hebr na meli at hkos hcat ak la at aSr ani rozh ki am at aSr ath : oiba oimzam iSnim oiamr al pTros Smeon htiSn hki la iklt lSqd Seh aHt : Sqdo ohtpllo pn tbao lidi nsion hn hroH hia Hpzh ohbSr rph : oisp lsor oitpll bamro eod hpem kdbrim hhmh : oiSb oimzam Snit iSnim ki einihm hio kbdot ola ideo mh ienho : oiba pem SliSit oiamr alihm meth nomo onoHo rb li ki bah hSeh hnh bn hadm nmsr bidi HTaim : qomo onlkh hnh hmosr aoti qrb : eodno mdbr oihodh ba ohoa aHd mSnim heSr oemo hmon rb bHrbot obmqlot mat hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ohcqnim : ohmosr ato ntn lhm aot lamr haiS aSr aSqho ch hoa aoto tpSo oholikho al imlT : hoa ba ohoa ngS alio oiamr rbi rbi oinSq lo : oiSlHo bo at idihm oitpSho : oaHd mn hemdim azlo Slp at Hrbo oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm kmo el priz izatm eli bHrbot obmqlot ltpSni : oiom iom hiiti azlkm mlmd bmqdS ola hHcqtm bi abl lmen imlao hktobim : oiecbo aoto klm oinoso : oner aHd hlk aHrio meTp bsdin lksot at eroto oiaHcho hnerim : ohoa ecb at hsdin bidm oins erm mpnihm : oioliko at ihoSe al hkhn hgdol oiqhlo ato kl hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim ohsoprim : opTros hlk aHrio mrHoq ed lHzr hkhn hgdol pnimh oiSb Sm em hmSrtim oitHmm ngd haor : oraSi hkhnim okl hsnhdrin bqSo edot el ihoSe lhmito ola mzao : ki rbim eno bo edot Sqr ak hediot la hio Sot : oiqomo anSim oieno bo edot Sqr lamr : Smeno ato amr ani ahrs at hhikl hch meSh idi adm olSlSt imim abnh hikl aHr aSr ainno meSh idi adm : ogm bcat edotm la Soth : oiqm hkhn hgdol oiemd btok oiSal at ihoSe lamr haink mSib dbr mh ch alh enim bk : ohoa hHriS ola hSib dbr oiosp eod hkhn hgdol lSal ato oiamr alio hath hoa hmSiH bn hmbrk : oiamr ihoSe ani hoa oatm trao at bn hadm ioSb limin hgborh oba em enni hSmim : oiqre hkhn hgdol at bgdio oiamr mh lno eod lbqS edim : Smetm at hgdop mh detkm oirSieho klm ki Hib mith hoa : oiHlo mhm lrq bo oiHpo at pnio oikho bagrp oiamro alio hnba ohmSrtim hkaibho bhkotm aoto el hlHi : oihi bhiot pTros btHtit hHzr otba aHt mSpHot hkhn hgdol : otra at pTros ki mtHmm hoa otbT bo otamr gm ath hiit em hnzri ihoSe : oikHS lamr la ade ola abin mh at amrt oiza hHozh al haolm ohtrngl qra : otraho hSpHh otosp otamr al hemdim Sm ki ch hoa aHd mhm oikHS pem Snit : okmeT aHri kn gm hemdim Sm amro al pTros amnm ath aHd mhm ki ap glili ath olSonk klSonm : oiHl lhHrim at npSo olhSbe lamr la iedti at haiS hch aSr amrtm : ohtrngl qra pem Snit oickr pTros at hdbr aSr amr lo ihoSe bTrm iqra htrngl pemim tkHS bi SlS pemim oiSm al lbo oibk :

15

oiSkimo raSi hkhnim em hcqnim ohsoprim okl hsnhdrin bbqr oitiezo oiasro at ihoSe oiolikho mSm oimsrho al pilTos : oiSal aoto pilTos hath mlk hihodim oien oiamr alio ath amrt : oraSi hkhnim hrbo lSTno : oiosp pilTos oiSalho lamr haink mSib dbr rah kmh hm meidim bk : oihoSe la hSib eod ap dbr aHd oitmh pilTos : obkl Hg hih drko lpTr lhm asir aHd at aSr ibqSo : oihi aiS hnqra bSm br aba asor em hmordim aSr rzHo rzH bet hmrd : oiSa hhmon at qolo oiHlo lbqS SieSh lhm kpem bpem : oien atm pilTos oiamr htHpzo ki apTr lkm at mlk hihodim : ki ide aSr rq mqnah msroho raSi hkhnim : oraSi hkhnim hsito at hhmon lblti pTr lhm ki am br aba : oisp pilTos oien oiamr lhm omh apoa Hpztm oaeSh laSr atm qraim mlk hihodim : oiosipo lzeq hzlb aoto : oiamr alihm pilTos mh apoa eSh reh ohm hrbo eod lzeq hzlb aoto : oioal pilTos leSot krzon hem oipTr lhm at br aba oat ihoSe hkh bSoTim oimsr aoto lhzlb : oiolikho anSi hzlb al hHzr hpnimit hoa bit hmSpT oiceiqo at kl hgdod : oilbiSho argmn oiSrgo eTrt qzim oieTrho : oiHlo lbrko lamr Slom lk mlk hihodim : oiko el raSo bqnh oirqo bo oikreo el brkihm oiStHoo lo : oaHri htlozzm bo hpSiTo aoto at hargmn oilbiSho at bgdio oioziaho lzlb aoto : oianso aiS ebr aHd hba mn hSdh oSmo Smeon hqorini abi alksndros oropos lSat at zlbo : oibiaho al mqom glglta hoa mqom hglglt : oitno lo iin mcog bmr ohoa la qbl : oihi kaSr zlbo aoto oiHlqo bgdio lhm bhpilm elihm gorl mh iqH aiS aiS : othi hSeh hSliSit oizlbho : omktb dbr aSmto ktob lmelh mlk hihodim : oizlbo ato Sni prizim aHd limino oaHd lSmalo : oimla hktob hamr oat pSeim nmnh : ohebrim gdpo aoto oinieo raSm lamr haH ath hhors at hhikl obonh aoto bSlSt imim : hoSe at ezmk ordh mn hzlb : okn lego lo gm raSi hkhnim em hsoprim bamrm aiS al reho at aHrim hoSie oat ezmo la iokl lhoSie : hmSiH mlk iSral ird na mn hzlb lmen nrah onamin ogm hnzlbim ato Hrpoho : obhiot hSeh hSSit hih HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit : obSeh htSieit oizeq ihoSe bqol gdol alhi alhi lmh Sbqtni aSr proSo ali ali lmh ecbtni : omqzt hemdim azlo bSmem at cat amro hnh al aliho hoa qora : oirz aHd mhm oimla spog Hmz oiSm el qnh oiSqho oiamr hniHo onrah am iba aliho lhorido : oihoSe ntn qol gdol oipH at npSo : oprkt hhikl nqreh lSnim qreim mlmelh lmTh : oira Sr hmah hemd lngdo ki bceqo kn npH at npSo oiamr akn haiS hch hih bn halhim : ogm nSim hio Sm raot mrHoq obtokn gm mrim hmgdlit omrim amo Sl ieqb hzeir oSl iosi oSlmit : aSr gm hlko aHrio oSrtho bhioto bglil oaHrot rbot aSr elo ato iroSlim : oet herb hgie ompni aSr erb Sbt hih hoa hiom Slpni hSbt : oiba iosp hrmti ioez nkbd aSr hih mHkh gm hoa lmlkot halhim oitHcq oiba al pilTos oiSal at gopt ihoSe : oitmh pilTos el aSr hoa kbr mt oiqra al Sr hmah oiSalho hgoe kbr : oide mpi Sr hmah ki kn oitn at gopto mtnh liosp : ohoa qnh sdin oiord ato oikrkho bsdin oiSimho bqbr Hzob bsle oigl abn el ptH hqbr : omrim hmgdlit omrim am iosi hio raot at hmqom aSr hoSm Smh :

16

oihi kaSr ebr iom hSbt otqninh mrim hmggdlit omrim am ieqb oSlmit smim lboa olsok ato bhm : obaHd bSbt bbqr hSkm bao al hqbr kcroH hSmS : otamrnh aSh al aHoth mi igl lno at habn mel ptH hqbr : obhbiTn rao ohnh ngllh habn ki hith gdlh mad : otbanh al tok hqbr otrainh bHor aHd iSb mimin ohoa eTh Smlh lbnh otStommnh : oiamr alihn al tStommnh at ihoSe hnzri atn mbqSot at hnzlb hoa qm ainno ph hnh ch hmqom aSr hSkibho bo : ak lknh oamrtn al tlmidio oal pTros ki holk hoa lpnikm hglilh oSm traho kaSr amr lkm : otmhrnh lzat otbrHnh mn hqbr ki aHctn redh otmhon ola hgido dbr laiS ki irao : ohoa kaSr qm mn hmtim baHd bSbt nrah braSonh al mrim hmgdlit aSr grS mmnh Sbeh Sdim : otlk otgd lanSim aSr hio emo ohm mtablim obkim : okaSr Smeo ki Hi onrah alih la hamino lh : oaHri kn nrah bdmot aHrt lSnim mhm bhitm mthlkim bzatm hSdh : ohm hlko oigido laHrim ogm lhm la hamino : obaHrnh nrah leSti heSr bhiotm msbim oiHrp Hsron amontm oqSi lbbm aSr la hamino lraim ato neor mn hmtim : oiamr alihm lko al kl heolm oqrao at hbSorh lkl hbriah : hmamin onTbl hoa ioSe oaSr la iamin iaSm : oalh hatot aSr iloo al hmaminim igrSo Sdim bSmi oblSnot HdSot idbro : nHSim iSao bidihm oam iSto sm hmot la iciqm el Holim iSimo at idihm oiiTb lhm : oihi aHri aSr dbr atm hadon oinSa hSmimh oiSb limin halhim : ohmh izao oiqrao bkl hmqmot ohadon ecrm oiHcq at hdbr batot hbaot aHri dbrm amn :

ihoSe lpi loqm

1

aHri aSr rbim hoailo lHbr spor hmeSim aSr namno bSlmot btokno : kaSr msrom lno hraim atm beinihm mtHlh oaSr hio mSrti hdbr : HSbti lTob gm ani hHpS kl hdbrim hiTb mraSitm lktbm alik bsdr taopilos hadir : lmen tde qST hamrim aSr Hnkt bm : khn hih bimi hordos mlk ihodh ckrih Smo mmSmrt abih olo aSh mbnot ahrn oSmh aliSbe : oSnihm hio zdiqim lpni halhim ohlki tm bkl mzot ihoh obHqtio : ola hih lhm ild ki aliSbe eqrh oSnihm bao bimim : oihi hiom oikhn lpni alhim bsdr mSmrto : okmSpT ebodt hkhnim iza gorlo lhqTir qTrt oiba al hikl ihoh : okl qhl hem hio mtpllim bHoz bet hqTrt : oira alio mlak ihoh emd limin mcbH hqTrt : oibhl ckrih braoto ato oaimh nplh elio : oiamr alio hmlak al tira ckriho ki nSmeh tpltk oaliSbe aStk tld lk bn oqrat Smo ioHnn : ohih lk lSmHh ogil orbim iSmHo bholdo : ki gdol ihih lpni ihoh oiin oSkr la iSth oroH hqdS imla beodno bbTn amo : orbim mbni iSral iSib al ihoh alhihm : ohoa ilk lpnio broH aliho obgborto lhSib at lb abot el bnim oat hsorrim ltbont hzdiqim lhemid lihoh em mtqn : oiamr ckrih al hmlak bmh ade cat ki ani cqnti oaSti bah bimim : oien hmlak oiamr alio ani gbrial heomd lpni halhim oSloH anki ldbr alik olbSrk at cat : ohnh talm ola tokl ldbr ed hiom aSr thih cat tHt ki la hamnt bdbri aSr imlao lmoedm : ohem hih mHkh lckrih oitmho ki aHr bhikl : oihi bzato la ikl ldbr alihm oideo ki mrah rah bhikl oirmc lhm oeodno nalm : oihi kaSr mlao imi ebdto oilk lo al bito : oihi aHri himim halh othr aliSbe aSto ottHba HmSh HdSim otamr : kkh eSh li ihoh bimi pqdo aoti lasp at Hrpti btok bni adm : oihi bHdS hSSi oiSlH hmlak gbrial mat halhim glilh al eir aSr Smh nzrt : al btolh marSh laiS aSr Smo iosp mbit dod oSm hbtolh mrim : oiba hmlak alih hHdrh oiamr Slom lk aSt Hn ihoh emk brokh at bnSim : ohia braoth nbhlh ldbro otamr blbh mh hia hbrkh hcat : oiamr lh hmlak al tirai mrim ki mzat Hn lpni halhim : ohnk hrh oildt bn oqrat at Smo ihoSe : ohoa gdol ihih obn elion iqra oihoh alhim itn lo at ksa dod abio : oel bit ieqb imlk leolm oed olmlkoto ain qz : otamr mrim al hmlak aik thih cat oani ainni idet aiS : oien hmlak oiamr alih roH hqdS tboa elik ogbort elion tzl elik el kn gm lqdoS hilod iqra bn alhim : ohnh aliSbe qrobtk aSr qrao lh eqrh gm hia hrth bn bcqnth och lh hHdS hSSi : ki la ipla malhim kl dbr : otamr mrim hnni SpHt ihoh ihi li kdbrk oiza math hmlak : otqm mrim bimim hhm otmhr llkt hhrh al eir ihodh : otba bit ckrih otbrk at aliSbe : oihi kSme aliSbe at brkt mrim oirqd hild bmeih otmla aliSbe roH hqdS : otqra bqol gdol otamr brokh at bnSim obrok pri bTnk : omain li cat aSr am adni bah ali : ki qol brktk ba bacni ohnh rqd bSmHh hild bmei : oaSri hmaminh ki hmla tmla aSr dbr lh mat ihoh : otamr mrim rommh npSi at ihoh : otgl roHi balhi iSei : aSr rah beni amto ki hnh meth kl hdrot iaSroni ki gdlot eSh li Sdi oqdoS Smo : : oHsdo ldor dorim el iraio : gborot eSh bcreo pcr gaim bmcmot lbbm : hrs ndibim mksaoto oirm Splim : rebim mla Tob oeSirim SlH riqm : tmk biSral ebdo lckr at rHmio : kaSr dbr al abotino labrhm olcreo ed eolm : otSb mrim emh kSlSh HdSim otSb lbith : oimlao imi aliSbe lldt otld bn : oiSmeo Sknih oqrobih ki hgdil ihoh at Hsdo emh oiSmHo ath : oihi biom hSmini oibao lmol at hild oiqrao ato ckrih el Sm abio : oten amo otamr la ki ioHnn iqra : oiamro alih ain aiS bmSpHtk aSr nqra bSm hch : oirmco al abio ldet mh hSm aSr iHpz lhqra lo : oiSal loH oiktb elio lamr ioHnn Smo oitmho klm : oiptH pio olSono ptam oidbr oibrk at halhim : otpl aimh el kl Sknihm oispr kl hdbrim halh bkl hri ihodh : oiSimo kl hSmeim al lbm lamr mh apoa ihih hild hch oid ihoh hith emo : oimla ckrih abio roH hqdS oinba lamr : brok ihoh alhi iSral ki pqd at emo oiSlH lo pdot : oirm lno qrn ihoSeh bbit dod ebdo : kaSr dbr bpi nbiaio hqdoSim aSr meolm : ihoSeh maibino omid kl Snaino : leSot Hsd em abotino olckr at brit qdSo : at hSboeh aSr nSbe labrhm abino : lhzilno mid aibino olttno lebdo bli pHd : btmim obzdqh lpnio kl imi Hiino : oath hild nbia elion tqra ki lpni ihoh tlk lpnot at drkio : ltt det hihoSeh lemo bsliHt HTatihm : brHmi Hsd alhino aSr bhm pqdno hngh mmrom : lhair liSbi HSk ozlmot olhkin at rglino al drk hSlom : oigdl hild oiHcq broH oihi bmdbrot ed iom hrato al iSral :

2

oihi bimim hhm otza dt mat hqisr aogosTos lspr at kl iSbi tbl : och hmpqd hih hraSon bhiot qorinios SliT bsoria : oilko klm lhtpqd aiS leiro : oiel gm iosp mn hglil meir nzrt al ihodh leir dod hnqrah bit lHm ki hih mbit dod ommSpHto : lhtpqd em mrim hmarSh lo ohia hrh : oihi bhiotm Sm oimlao imih lldt : otld at bnh hbkor otHtlho otSkibho babos ki la hih lhm mqom bmlon : oreim hio barz hhia lnim bSdh oSmrim at mSmrot hlilh bedrm : ohnh mlak ihoh nzb elihm okbod ihoh hopie elihm msbib oiirao irah gdolh : oiamr alihm hmlak al tirao ki hnni mbSr atkm SmHh gdolh aSr thih lkl hem : ki hiom ild lkm beir dod moSie aSr hoa hmSiH hadon : och lkm haot tmzaon ild mHtl omnH babos : oihi ptam azl hmlak hmon zba hSmim ohm mSbHim at halhim oamrim : kbod bmromim lalhim obarz Slom bbni adm rzono : oihi kaSr elo melihm hmlakim hSmimh oiamro hreim aiS al reho nebrh na ed bit lHm onrah hmeSh hch aSr hodieno ihoh : oimhro lboa oimzao at mrim oat iosp oat hild Skb babos : oirao oiSmieo at hdbr hnamr alihm el hger hch : okl hSmeim tmho el hdbrim aSr dbro alihm hreim : omrim Smrh at hdbrim halh otHSbm blbh : oiSobo hreim mhllim omSbHim at halhim el kl aSr Smeo orao kpi aSr namr alihm : oihi bmlat lner Smnh imim oimol oiqra Smo ihoSe kSm aSr qra lo hmlak bTrm hrh bbTn : oimlao imi Thrh lpi tort mSh oielho liroSlim lhemido lpni ihoh : kaSr ktob btort ihoh kl ckr pTr rHm iqra qdS lihoh : oltt qrbn kamor btort ihoh Sti trim ao Sni bni ionh : ohnh aiS hih biroSlim oSmo Smeon ohoa aiS zdiq oHsid mHkh lnHmt iSral oroH hqdS hih elio : olo nglh broH hqdS ki la irah mot ed raoto at mSiH ihoh : oiba broH al hmqdS oihi kaSr hbiao horio at hner ihoSe leSot elio kmSpT htorh : oiqHho el creotio oibrk at halhim oiamr : eth tpTr at ebdk kdbrk adni bSlom : ki rao eini at ihoSetk : aSr hkinot lpni kl hemim : aor lglot eini hgoim otpart iSral emk : oiosp oamo tmhim el hdbrim hnamrim elio : oibrk aotm Smeon oiamr al mrim amo hnh ch mosd lnpilh oltqomh lrbim biSral olaot mribh : ogm bnpSk tHtr Hrb lmen tglinh mHSbot lbb rbim : othi Sm Hnh aSh nbiah bt pnoal mSbT aSr ohia bah bimim oHith em belh Sbe Snim aHri btolih : ohia almnh karbe oSmnim Snh ola mSh mn hmqdS obzom obtHnonim ebdh at halhim lilh oiom : otqm bSeh hhia otgS lhdot lihoh otdbr elio bacni kl hmHkim lgalh biroSlim : oiklo at hkl kpi tort ihoh oiSobo hglilh al nzrt eirm : oigdl hner oiHcq broH oimla Hkmh oHsd alhim emo : oelo horio iroSlim Snh bSnh lHg hpsH : oihi bhioto bn Stim eSrh Snh oielo iroSlim kmSpT hHg : oimlao at himim oiSobo oiotr ihoSe hner biroSlim oiosp oamo la ideo : oiHSbo ki em Hbl harHim hoa oilko kdrk iom oibqSho bin hqrobim ohmideim : ola mzaho oiSbo iroSlim lbqSo : oihi aHri SlSt imim oimzaho bmqdS iSb btok hmorim Sme alihm oSal atm : okl hSmeim alio hStommo el Sklo oel tSobtio : oihi kraotm ato oiHrdo otamr alio amo bni mdoe kkh eSit lno hnh abik oanki bezbt lb bqSnok : oiamr alihm lmh ch bqStm ati hla idetm ki eli lhiot baSr labi : ohm la hbino at hdbr aSr dbr alihm : oird atm oiba al nzrt oikne lhm oamo Smrh blbh at kl hdbrim halh : oihoSe hlk ogdl bHkmh omqomh obHn em alhim oem anSim :

3

bSnt HmS eSrh lmlkot hqisr Tibrios bhiot ponTios pilTos hgmon bihodh ohordos Sr rbe el hglil oaHio pilpos Sr rbe el mdinot iTor oTrkonh olosnis Sr rbe el abilin : bimi hkhnim hgdolim Hnn oqipa hih dbr alhim al ioHnn bn ckrih bmdbr : oiba al kl kkr hirdn oiqra Tbilt htSobh lsliHt hHTaim : kktob bspr dbri iSeiho hnbia qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh iSro mslotio : kl gia inSa okl hr ogbeh iSplo ohih heqb lmiSor ohrksim lbqeh : orao kl bSr at ihoSet alhim : oiamr al hmon hem hizaim lhTbl el ido atm ildi hzpeonim mi horh atkm lhmlT mpni hqzp hba : lkn eSo pri hraoi ltSobh oal tdmo bnpSkm lamr abrhm hoa abino ki ani amr lkm ki mn habnim halh ikl halhim lhqim bnim labrhm : okbr hoSm hgrcn el SrS hezim ohnh kl ez aSr ainno eSh pri Tob igde ohSlk baS : oiSalho hmon hem lamr mh apoa neSh : oien oiamr alihm mi aSr lo ktnot Stim hoa iHlq laSr ain lo omi aSr lo mcon kkh ieSh gm hoa : oibao gm moksim lhTbl oiamro alio rbi mh neSh : oiamr alihm al tgbo iotr mHqkm : oiSalho gm anSi hzba lamr oanHno mh neSh oiamr alihm aiS al tceceo oal tlSino aiS oihi di lkm bSkrkm : oihi kaSr Hkh hem oklm HSbim blbm lamr aoli ioHnn hoa hmSiH : oien ioHnn oiamr lklm hn ani Tobl atkm bmim abl boa iboa hHcq mmni aSr ainni kdi lhtir at Srok nelio hoa iTbl atkm broH hqdS obaS : aSr hmcrh bido lhbr at grno oiasp at dgno al aozro oat hmz iSrpno baS aSr la tkbh : okn eod dbrim aHrim hrbh bSr ogm hchir at hem : ohordos Sr rbe hmdinh aSr hokH el ido el adot horodih aSt aHio pilpos oel adot kl hre aSr eSh hordos : hosip el kl alh gm at cat oisgr at ioHnn bmSmr : oihi bhTbl kl hem ogm ihoSe nTbl omtpll oiptHo hSmim : oird elio roH hqdS bdmot gop kionh oihi qol mn hSmim oiamr ath bni ididi bk rzth npSi : ohoa ihoSe bhHlo hih kbn SlSim Snh oiHSbho lbn iosp bn eli : bn mtt bn loi bn mlki bn ini bn iosp : bn mttih bn amoz bn nHom bn Hsli bn ngi : bn mHt bn mttih bn Smei bn iosp bn iodh : bn ioHnn bn riSa bn crbll bn Saltial bn gri : bn mlki bn adi bn qosm bn almdm bn er : bn iosi bn aliecr bn iorim bn mtt bn loi : bn Smeon bn ihodh bn iosp bn ionm bn aliqim : bn mlia bn mina bn mtth bn ntn bn dod : bn iSi bn eobd bn bec bn Slmon bn nHSon : bn emindb bn arm bn Hzron bn prz bn ihodh : bn ieqb bn izHq bn abrhm bn trH bn nHor : bn Srog bn reo bn plg bn ebr bn SlH : bn qinn bn arpkSd bn Sm bn nH bn lmk : bn mtoSlH bn Hnok bn ird bn mhllal bn qinn : bn anoS bn St bn adm bn alhim :

4

oihoSe Sb mn hirdn mla roH hqdS oinhgho hroH hmdbrh : oinsho hSTn arbeim iom ola akl maomh bimim hhm oaHri aSr tmo oireb : oiamr alio hSTn am bn halhim ath amr al habn hcat othi llHm : oien ato ihoSe hn ktob ki la el hlHm lbdo iHih hadm ki el kl moza pi ihoh : oielho hSTn el hr gbh oiraho brge aHd at kl mmlkot tbl : oiamr alio hSTn lk atn at kl hmmSlh hcat oat kbodn ki nmsrh bidi onttih laSr aHpz : oeth am tStHoh lpni hkl ihih lk : oien ihoSe oiamr alio sor mmni hSTn ki ktob lihoh alhik tStHoh oato tebd : oibiaho iroSlim oiemidho el pnt bit hmqdS oiamr alio am bn halhim ath htnpl mch mTh : ki ktob ki mlakio izoh lk lSmrk : oki el kpim iSaonk pn tgp babn rglk : oien ihoSe oiamr alio namr la tnsh at ihoh alhik : okklot hSTn kl msh oirp mmno ed et : oiSb ihoSe bgbort hroH al hglil oiza Smeo bkl hkkr : ohoa hih mlmd bbti knsiotihm oihllho klm : oiba al nzrt aSr gdl Sm oilk kmSpTo biom hSbt al bit hknst oiqm lqra btorh : oitn lo spr iSeih hnbia oiptH at hspr oimza at hmqom aSr hih ktob bo : roH adni eli ien mSH ati lbSr enoim : SlHni lHbS lnSbri lb lqra lSboim dror oleorim pqH qoH lSlH rzozim HpSim lqra Snt rzon lihoh : oihi kaSr gll at hspr oiSibho al hHcn oiSb oeini kl aSr bbit hknst nSaot alio : oiHl oiamr alihm hiom ntmla hktob hch bacnikm : oklm heidho otmho el dbri Hn aSr izao mpiho oiamro hla ch hoa bn iosp : oiamr alihm hn tamro li at hmSl hch rpa rpa at ezmk okkl aSr Smeno SneSh bkpr nHom eSh kn gm ph beir moldtk : oiamr amn amr ani lkm ki ain nbia rzoi barz moldto : oamt ani amr lkm almnot rbot hio biSral bimi aliho bhezr hSmim SlS Snim oSSh HdSim oreb gdol hih bkl harz : ola nSlH aliho al aHt mhnh colti zrpth aSr lzidon al aSh almnh : omzreim rbim hio biSral bimi aliSe hnbia ola Thr aHd mhm colti nemn harmi : oimlao kl aSr bbit hknst Hmh bSmem at alh : oiqomo oidiHo aoto al mHoz leir oibiaho ed gb hhr aSr nbnth eirm elio lmen hSliko mTh : ak hoa ebr btokm oilk ldrko : oird al kpr nHom eir hglil oilmdm bSbtot : oiStommo el torto ki ezom dbro : oaiS hih bbit hknst obo roH Sd Tma oizeq bqol gdol lamr : ath mh lno olk ihoSe hnzri bat lhabidno idetik mi ath qdoS halhim : oiger bo ihoSe lamr halm oza mmno oipilho hSd btokm oiza mmno la hre lo : otpl aimh el klm oidbro aiS al reho lamr mh hdbr hch ki bSlTn obgborh mzoh lroHot hTmah ohmh izaim : oSmeo holk bkl mqmot hkkr : oiqm mbit hknst oiba bith Smeon oHmot Smeon aHcth qdHt Hcqh oiSalho bedh : oitizb elih oiger bqdHt otrp mmnh otqm mhrh otSrt atm : okboa hSmS hbiao alio kl aSr lhm Hlim Hliim Sonim oirpa aotm bSomo at idio el kl aHd mhm : ogm Sdim izao mrbim zeqim oamrim ath hoa hmSiH bn halhim oiger bm ola ntnm ldbr ki ideo aSr hoa hmSiH : oiza oilk lo kaor hbqr al mqom Hrbh ohmon hem bqSho oibao edio oipzro bo lblti sor mhm : oiamr lhm hn eli lbSr gm lerim haHrot at bSort mlkot halhim ki lcat SlHti : oihi qora bbti hknsiot aSr bglil :

5

oihi kaSr ndHq hmon hem lSme at dbr halhim ohoa emd el id im gnisr : oira Sti aniot emdot el id him ohdigim izao mhn oidiHo at hmkmrot : oird al aHt mn haniot aSr hia lSmeon oibqS mmno lholiko meT mn hibSh al him oiSb oilmd at hem mtok hanih : oikl ldbr oiamr al Smeon holikh al emq him ohorido at mkmrotikm lzod : oien Smeon oiamr alio morh kl hlilh igeno ola lkdno maomh ak el pi dbrk aorid at hmkmrt : oieSo kn oilkdo dgim hrbh mad otqre mkmrtm : oinipo id al Hbrihm aSr bamih hSnit lboa alihm olecrm oibao oimlao at Sti haniot ed ki Sqeo : oihi kraot Smeon pTros at cat oipl lbrki ihoSe oiamr adni za na memi ki aiS HoTa anki : ki Smh hHciqh aoto oat kl aSr ato el zid hdgim aSr zdo : okn gm at ieqb oat ioHnn bni cbdi aSr htHbro em Smeon oiamr ihoSe al Smeon al tira meth zod tzod anSim : oioliko at haniot al hibSh oiecbo at hkl oilko aHrio : oihi bhioto baHt herim ohnh aiS mla zret oira at ihoSe oipl el pnio oitHnn alio lamr adni am tHpz tokl lThrni : oiSlH at ido oige bo oiamr Hpz anki Thr optam srh mmno hzret : oied bo lblti spr laiS ki am lk ohrah al hkhn ohqrb qrbn el Thrtk kaSr zoh mSh ledot lhm : oSmeo holk hlok ogdl oiqbzo em rb lSmoe olhrpa bido mtHloaihm : ohoa sr al hmdbrot oitpll : oihi baHd himim ohoa mlmd oiSbo Sm proSim omori htorh aSr bao mkl kpri hglil omihodh oiroSlim ogbort ihoh hith bo lrpoa : ohnh anSim noSaim aiS bmTh ohoa nkh abrim oibqSo lhbiao hbith olSom lpnio : ola mzao drk lhkniso mrb hem oielo hggh oioridho oat erSo bin hrepim ltok hbit lpni ihoSe : oira at amontm oiamr alio bn adm nslHo lk HTatik : oiHlo hsoprim ohproSim lHSb mHSbot lamr mi hoa ch hmdbr gdopim mi iokl lslH HTaim mbledi halhim lbdo : oide ihoSe at mHSbotm oien oiamr alihm mh atm HSbim blbbkm : mh hoa hnql hamr nslHo lk HTatik am amr qom ohthlk : ak lmen tdeon ki bn hadm iS lo hSlTn barz lslH HTaim oiamr al nkh habrim amr ani alik qom oSa at erSk olk lk al bitk : oimhr oiqm leinihm oiSa at mSkbo oilk lo al bito mhll at halhim oiSa at mSkbo oilk lo al bito mhll at halhim : oSmh hHciqh at klm oibrko at halhim oimlao irah oiamro ki nplaot raino hiom : oihi aHri kn oiza oira moks oSmo loi ioSb bbit hmks oiamr alio lkh aHri : oiecb at hkl oiqm oilk aHrio : oieS lo loi mSth gdol bbito oem rb Sl moksim oanSim aHrim hio msbim emhm : oilono hsoprim aSr bhm ohproSim el tlmidio oiamro lmh atm aklim alihm hbriaim ainm zrikim lrpa ki am hHlim : : la bati lqroa hzdiqim ki am hHTaim ltSobh : oiamro alio hn tlmidi ioHnn zmim hrbh oamrim tHnot ogm tlmidi hproSim eSim kn otlmidik aklim oStim : oiamr alihm htoklo ans bni hHph lzom ohHtn eod emhm : oaolm imim baim olqH matm hHtn ac izomo bimim hhmh : oidbr alihm gm am hmSl hch ain aiS melh mTlit Sl bgd HdS el bgd bloi ki ac gm hHdS iqre ogm la tSoh mTlit hHdS lbloi : oain aiS ntn iin HdS bnadot blim ki ac hiin hHdS ibqe at hnadot ohoa iSpk ohnadot iabdo : ak itn hiin hHdS bnadot HdSim oSnihm iHdo iSmro : oaSr Sth iin iSn ainno Hpz eod biin HdS ki iamr hiSn hoa neim mmno :

6

oihi bSbt hSnit lspirt hemr ebr bin hqmh oiqTpo tlmidio mlilt oiprko atn bidihm oiaklo : oiS mn hproSim aSr amro alihm lmh atm eSim at aSr ainno mtr leSot bSbt : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hla qratm at aSr eSh dod bhioto reb hoa oaSr hio ato : kaSr ba al bit halhim oiqH at lHm hpnim oiakl ogm ntn laSr ato at aSr la nkon laklo ki am lkhnim lbdm : oiamr alihm bn hadm gm adon hSbt hoa : oihi bSbt aHrt ba al bit hknst oilmd oSm aiS aSr ibSh ido himnit : oiarbo lo hsoprim ohproSim lraot am irpa bSbt lmen imzao elio STnh : ohoa ide at mHSbotm oiamr al haiS aSr ido ibSh qom oemod btok oiqm oiemd : oiamr alihm ihoSe aSalh atkm dbr hnkon bSbt lhiTib am lhre lhzil npS am labd : oibT sbib al klm oiamr laiS pST at idk oieS kn otrpa ido otSb kaHrt : ohmh nmlao Hmh oiosdo iHd mh leSot lihoSe : oihi bimim hhm oiza hhrh lhtpll oiemd kl hlilh btplh lalhim : obhit hbqr asp alio at tlmidio oibHr mhm Snim eSr aSr gm qra lhm SliHim : at Smeon aSr gm qrao pTros oat andri aHio at ieqb oat ioHnn at pilpos oat br tlmi : at mti oat toma oat ieqb bn Hlpi oat Smeon hmknh hqna : at ihodh bn ieqb oat ihodh aiS qriot aSr gm hih lmosr : oird atm oiemd bmqom miSor ohmon tlmidio oqhl em rb mkl ihodh oiroSlim omHop im zr ozidon aSr bao lSme ato olhrpa mHliihm : ogm hnlHzim broHot Tmaot oirpao : okl hhmon mbqSim lget bo ki gborh izah mato orpah at klm : ohoa nSa at einio al tlmidio oiamr aSrikm heniim ki lkm mlkot halhim : aSrikm hrebim ket ki tSbeo aSrikm hbkim ket ki tSHqo : aSrikm am iSnao atkm hanSim oam indo atkm oHrpo ohdiHo at Smkm kSm re bebor bn hadm : SmHo biom hhoa orqdo ki hnh Skrkm rb bSmim ki kcat eSo abtihm lnbiaim : ak aoi lkm heSirim ki kbr lqHtm at nHmtkm : aoi lkm hSbeim ki trebo aoi lkm hSHqim ket ki ttablo otbko : aoi lkm am kl hanSim mSbHim atkm ki kcat eSo abotihm lnbiai hSqr : abl alikm hSmeim ani amr ahbo at aibikm hiTibo lSnaikm : brko at mqllikm ohtpllo bed mklimikm : hmkh atk el hlHi hTh lo gm at haHrt ohlqH at meilk al tmne mmno gm at ktntk : okl hSal mmk tn lo ohlqH at aSr lk al tSal mato : okaSr tHpzo ki ieSo lkm bni hadm kn teSo lhm gm atm : oam tahbo at ahbikm mh hoa Hsdkm ki gm hHTaim ahbim at ahbihm : oam tiTibo lmTibikm mh hoa Hsdkm gm hHTaim ieSo kn : oam tloo at hanSim aSr tqoo lqbl mhm mh hoa Hsdkm gm hHTaim mloim at hHTaim lmen ioSb lhm bSoh : abl ahbo at aibikm ohiTibo ohloo mbli toHlt oihi Skrkm rb ohiitm bni elion ki Tob hoa gm lSkHi Tobh olreim : lkn hio rHmnim kaSr gm abikm rHom hoa : oal tSpTo ola tSpTo al tHibo ola tHibo nqo otnqo : tno otntn lkm mdh Tobh dHoqh ogdoSh omSpeh itno al Hiqkm ki bmdh aSr atm moddim bh imd lkm : oiSa mSlo oiamr alihm hiokl eor lnhl at heor hla iplo Snihm al hpHt : ain tlmid nelh el rbo odi lkl tlmid Slm lhiot krbo : olmh ch ath rah at hqsm aSr bein aHik oat hqorh beink la tbiT : oaik tamr al aHik aHi hniHh li oasirh at hqsm aSr beink oaink rah at hqorh aSr beink hHnp hsr braSonh at hqorh meink oaHr rah trah lhsir at hqsm aSr bein aHik : ki ez Tob ainno eSh pri mSHt ogm ez mSHt ainno eSh pri Tob : ki kl ez nkr bprio ki ain aspim tanim mn hqzim ap ain bzrim enb mn hsnh : haiS hTob maozr lbbo hTob mpiq at hTob ohaiS hre maozr lbbo hre mpiq at hre ki mSpet hlb imll piho : olmh ch atm qraim li adni adni oainkm eSim at aSr ani amr : kl hba ali oSome at dbri oeSh atm aorh atkm lmi hoa domh : domh hoa laiS bnh bit aSr hemiq lHpr oiisdo el hsle okboa hSTp prz hnhr bbit hhoa ola ikl lhnieo ki el hsle isodo : oaSr Sme ola eSh domh laiS aSr bnh bit el hqrqe bli isod oiprz bo hnhr oipl ptam oigdl Sbr hbit hhoa :

7

oihi aHri kloto ldbr at kl dbrio bacni hem oiba al kpr nHom : oebd laHd mSri hmaot Hlh lmot ohoa iqr lo mad : oiSme at Sme ihoSe oiSlH alio mcqni hihodim oiSal mato lboa olhoSie at ebdo : oibao al ihoSe oitHnno lo mad oiamro raoi hoa aSr teSh bqSto : ki ahb emno hoa ohoa bnh lno at bit hknst : oilk atm ihoSe oihi kaSr qrb al hbit oiSlH alio Sr hmah el idi reio lamr lo bi adni al na tTriH at ezmk ki ainni kdi Stboa bzl qorti : obebor cat gm at ezmi la HSbti raoi lboa alik ak dbr na dbr oirpa neri : ki gm anki aiS nton tHt hSlTon iS tHt idi anSi zba oamrti lch lk ohlk olch boa oba olebdi eSh cat oeSh : oiSme ihoSe at dbrio oitmh elio oipn oiamr al hhmon hhlk aHrio amr ani lkm gm biSral la mzati amonh gdolh kcat : oiSobo hSloHim al hbit oimzao at hebd hHlh ohoa nrpa : oihi mmHrt oilk al eir oSmh neim orbim mtlmidio hlkim ato ohmon em rb : hoa qrb al Ser heir ohnh moziaim mt bn iHid lamo ohia almnh oemh rbim mem heir : okraot ath hadon nkmro rHmio elih oiamr lh al tbki : oigS oige baron ohnSaim emdo oiamr elm amr ani alik qomh : oiteodd hmt oiHl ldbr oitnho lamo : otaHc klm redh oiSbHo at halhim oiamro ki nbia gdol qm bqrbno oki pqd halhim at emo : oiza hdbr hch bkl ihodh obkl hkkr : otlmidi ioHnn hgido lo at kl alh : oiqra alio ioHnn Snim mtlmidio oiSlHm al ihoSe lamr lo hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr : oibao alio hanSim oiamro ioHnn hmTbil SlHno alik lamr hath hoa hba am nHkh laHr : bet hhia rpa rbim mHliim omngeim omroHot reot oleorim rbim ntn raot einim : oien ihoSe oiamr lhm lko ohgido lioHnn at aSr raitm oaSr Smetm ki eorim raim opsHim mthlkim omzreim mThrim oHrSim Someim omtim qmim oeniim mtbSrim : oaSri aSr la ikSl bi : oihi kaSr hlko lhm SloHi ioHnn oiHl ldbr al hmon hem el adot ioHnn oiamr mh ch izatm hmdbrh lraot hqnh aSr inoe broH : oam la mh ch izatm lraot haiS lboS bgdi ednim hnh hmlbSim bgdi tpart ohmengim bHzrot hmlkim hmh : oeth mh ch izatm lraot am lraot aiS nbia hn ani amr lkm ki ap gdol hoa mnbia : ch hoa aSr ktob elio hnni SlH mlaki lpnik opnh drkk lpnik : ki amr ani lkm ain aiS bilodi aSh gdol mioHnn hmTbil ak hqTn bmlkot halhim gdol hoa mmno : okl hem ohmksim kSmem hzdiqo at halhim oiTblo bTbilt ioHnn : ak hproSim obeli htorh nazo at ezt halhim el npSm ola nTblo el ido : oiamr hadon eth al mi admh at anSi hdor hch oal mi hm dmim : dmim hm lildim hiSbim bSoq oqraim ch al ch oamrim Hllno lkm bHlilim ola rqdtm qonno lkm qinh ola bkitm : ki ba ioHnn hmTbil lHm la akl oiin la Sth oamrtm Sd bo : oba bn hadm ohoa akl oSth oamrtm hnh coll osba ore lmoksim olHTaim : otzdq hHkmh el idi kl bnih : oibqS mmno aHd mn hproSim lakl ato lHm oiba al bit hproS oisb : ohnh aSh aHt beir ohia HTat Smeh ki hoa msb bit hproS otba pk Smn hmor : otemd lrglio maHrio otbk otHl lhrTib at rglio bdmeot otngb atn bSerot raSh otSq at rglio otmSH atn bSmn : oira hproS hqra ato oiamr blbo alo hih ch nbia ki eth ide ide mi hia cat oai co hia hnget bo ki aSh HTat hia : oien ihoSe oiamr alio Smeon dbr li alik oiamr rbi dbr : Sni Hibim hio lnSh aHd haHd Hib lo dinrim HmS maot ohSni dinrim HmSim : oihi baSr la hSigh idm lSlm oiSmT at Snihm oeth amr na mi mSnihm irbh lahbh ato : oien Smeon oiamr aHSb ki haiS hhoa aSr hrbh lhSmiT lo oiamr alio kn SpTt : oipn al haSh oiamr al Smeon hrait at haSh hcat hnh bati al bitk omim el rgli la ntt ohia hrTibh at rgli bdmeot otngb bSerotih : nSiqh la nSqtni ohia mac bati la Hdlh mnSq at rgli : bSmn la mSHt at raSi ohia bSmn hmor mSHh at rgli : lkn ani amr alik nslHo lh HTatih hrbot ki hrbh ahbh oaSr nslH lo meT hoa ahb meT : oiamr alih nslHo lk HTatik : oiHlo hmsbim emo lamr blbm mi hoa ch aSr gm islH HTaim : oiamr al haSh amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom :

8

oihi aHri kn oiebr meir al eir omkpr al kpr qora ombSr at mlkot halhim oSnim heSr ato : onSim aSr nrpao mroHot reot omHliim mrim hnqrah mgdlit aSr grSo mmnh Sbeh Sdim : oioHnh aSt koca sokn hordos oSoSnh oaHrot rbot aSr Srtho mnksihn : oihi bhtasp hmon em rb aSr izao alio meir oeir oidbr bmSl : hcore iza lcre at creo obcreo npl mn hcre el id hdrk oirms oeop hSmim aklo : oiS aSr npl el hsle oizmH oiibS ki la hith lo lHh : oiS aSr npl btok hqzim oizmHo hqzim emo oimekho : oiS aSr npl el hadmh hTobh oizmH oieS pri mah Serim kcat dbr oiceq mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme : oiSalho tlmidio lamr mh hmSl hch : oiamr lkm ntn ldet at sodot mlkot halhim olaHrim bmSlim lmen bratm la irao obSmem la ibino : och hoa hmSl hcre dbr alhim hoa : oaSr el id hdrk hm hSmeim oaHr kn ba hSTn onSa at hdbr mlbm pn iamino onoSeo : oaSr el hsle hm hmqblim bSmHh at hdbr bSmem oSrS ain lhm rq lSeh maminim obet hnsion isgo aHor : oaSr npl bin hqzim hm hSmeim oholikm lhm oimko bdagot obeSr obtaot hHiim opri la iSoo lmo : oaSr badmh hTobh hm hSmrim blb Tob oThor at hdbr aSr Smeo oeSim pri btoHlt : oain aiS mdliq nr aSr iksh aoto bkli ao iSimho tHt hmTh ki am el hmnorh ielho lmen irao kl bai hbit at haor : ki ain dbr nelm aSr la iglh oain gnoc aSr la iode oba laor : lkn rao aik tSmeon ki kl aSr iS lo nton intn lo okl aSr ain lo gm at aSr hoa HSb lhiot lo iqH mmno : oibao alio amo oaHio ola iklo lgSt alio mpni hem : oigd lo lamr amk oaHik emdim bHoz ohm Hpzim lraotk : oien oiamr alihm ami oaHi hm hSmeim oeSim at dbr halhim : oihi hiom oird al anih hoa otlmidio oiamr alihm nebrh al ebr him oiSoTo himh : oihi blktm banih oiSkb oiiSn oroH serh irdh el him oiSTpo elihm hmim oihio bsknh : oigSo oieiro aoto lamr morh morh abdno oieor oiger broH obmSbri im oiStqo othi dmmh : oiamr alihm aih amontkm oiirao oitmho oiamro aiS al reho mi apoa hoa hmzoh gm at hroHot oat hmim oiSmeo lo : oiebro oibao al arz hgdriim aSr mmol hglil : oiza al hibSh oipgSho aiS mn heir aSr Sdim bo mimim rbim obgd la lbS obbit la iSb ki am bqbrim : oira at ihoSe oipl lpnio oiqra bqol gdol mh li olk ihoSe bn al elion mbqS ani mmk aSr la tenni : ki zoh at hroH hTma lzat mn haiS ki imim rbim HTp ato onasr bciqim onSmr bkblim ohih bntqo at hmosrot ondHp bid hSd al hmdbrot : oiSal ato ihoSe lamr mh Smk oiamr lgion Smi ki Sdim rbim nknso bo : oitHnn lo lblti zot atm lrdt al hthom : oihi Sm edr Hcirim rbim el hmreh bhr oitHnno lo ki iniH lhm lboa al tokm oinH lhm : oizao hSdim mn hadm hhoa oibao bHcirim oiSter hedr mn hmord al him oiTbe : oinoso hreim kraotm at aSr neSh oigido hdbr beir obkprim : oizao lrat at aSr neSh oibao al ihoSe oimzao Sm at hadm aSr izao mmno hSdim iSb lrgli ihoSe mlbS oTob Skl oiirao : oispro lhm hraim aik nrpa aHoc hSdim : oibqSo mmno kl hmon Hbl hgdriim llkt matm ki aimh gdolh nplh elihm oird al hanih oiSb : oibqS mmno haiS aSr izao mmno hSdim lSbt ato oiSlH ato ihoSe bamro : Sob lbitk ospr hgdlot aSr eSh lk halhim oilk lo oiSme bkl heir at hgdlot aSr eSh lo ihoSe : oihi bSob ihoSe oiqbl ato hem ki klm hio mHkim lo : ohnh ba aiS oSmo iair ohoa raS bit hknst oipl lrgli ihoSe oitHnn lo lboa ato al bito : ki bt iHidh kStim eSrh Snh hith lo ohia noTh lmot oihi blkto Smh oidHqho hmon hem : oaSh cbt dm Stim eSrh Snh aSr hoziah kl qninh lrpaim oain aiS ikl lrpath : hia qrbh maHrio otge bzizt bgdo ocob dmh emd ptam : oiamr ihoSe mi ch nge bi oklm kHSo oiamr pTros ohemdim azlo morh hmon hem dHqim olHzim atk oath tamr mi nge bi : oiamr ihoSe nge bi adm ki ideti aSr izah mmni gborh : otra haSh ki la nstrh mmno otHrd lqrato otpl lpnio otgd bacni kl hem el mh ngeh bo oaik nrpah ptam : oiamr alih Hcqi bti amontk hoSieh lk lki lSlom : eodno mdbr oaiS ba mbit raS hknst oiamr mth btk al tTriH at hmorh : oiSme ihoSe oien oiamr lo al tira ak hamn ohia toSe : oiba hbith ola hniH laiS lboa ato blti am lpTros olieqb olioHnn olabi hildh olamh : oklm bkim ospdim lh oiamr al tbko ki la mth ak iSnh hia : oiSHqo elio baSr ideo ki mth : ohoa aHc bidh oiqra lamr hildh qomi : otSb roHh otqm ptam oizo ltt lh lakol : oiStommo abih oamh ohoa zoh atm lblti hgid laiS at aSr neSh :

9

oiqra al Snim heSr oitn lhm gborh oSlTn el kl hSdim olrpa Hliim : oiSlHm lqra at mlkot halhim olrpa at hHlim : oiamr lhm al tqHo maomh ldrk la mTot ola trmil ola lHm ola ksp oal ihih laiS mkm Sti ktnot : ohbit aSr tbao bo Sm Sbo lkm omSm zao : okl aSr la iqblo atkm zao mn heir hhia onero at hepr mel rglikm ledot bhm : oizao oiebro bkprim mbSrim at hbSorh omrpaim bkl mqom : oiSme hordos Sr hrbe at kl aSr neSh el ido otpem roHo ki iS aSr amro ioHnn qm mn hmtim : oiS Samro aliho nrah oaHrim amro nbia qm mn hqdmonim : oiamr hordos hn anki nSati at raS ioHnn melio omi apoa hoa aSr ani Sme elio kcat oibqS lraoto : oiSobo hSliHim oispro lo at kl aSr eSo oiqHm alio oisr lbdd al mqom Hrb aSr leir hnqrah bit zidh : ohmon hem kaSr ideo at cat hlko aHrio oiqblm oidbr alihm el mlkot halhim oirpa at hzrikim lrpoah : ohiom rph lerb oSnim heSr qrbo oiamro alio SlH na at hem oilko al hkprim ohHzrim aSr sbibotino llon Sm olmza mcon ki ph anHno bmqom Hrbh : oiamr alihm tno atm lhm lakl oiamro ain lno ki am HmSt kkrot lHm odgim Snim blti am nlk onqnh akl lkl hem hch : ki hio kHmSt alpi aiS oiamr al tlmidio hoSibo atm Sorot Sorot HmSim bSorh : oieSo kn oioSibo at klm : oiqH at HmSt kkrot hlHm oat Sni hdgim oiSa einio hSmimh oibrk elihm oiprs oitn ltlmidio lSom lpni hem : oiaklo klm oiSbeo oiSao mn hptotim hnotrim lhm Snim eSr slim : oihi hoa mtpll lbdd oiaspo alio tlmidio oiSal atm lamr mh amrim eli hmon hem mi ani : oieno oiamro ioHnn hmTbil oaHrim amrim aliho oaHrim amrim nbia qm mn hqdmonim : oiamr alihm oatm mh atm amrim mi ani oien pTros oiamr mSiH halhim ath : oizo atm bgerh lblti hgid laiS at hdbr hch : oiamr mn hzrk hoa aSr bn hadm ienh hrbh oimas mn hcqnim ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oihrg obiom hSliSi qom iqom : oal klm amr aiS ki iHpz llkt aHri ikHS bnpSo oiom iom iSa at zlbo ohlk aHri : ki kl aSr iHpz lhoSie at npSo tabd npSo mmno okl aSr iabd at npSo lmeni hoa ioSienh : ki mh ioeil hadm ki iqnh at kl heolm oabd ohSHit at npSo : ki kl aSr hiiti ani odbri lo lHrph hoa ihih lHrph lbn hadm kaSr iba bkbodo obkbod hab ohmlakim hqdoSim : obamt ani amr lkm iS mn hemdim ph aSr la iTemo mot ed ki irao at mlkot halhim : oihi kSmnh imim aHri hdbrim halh oiqH alio at pTros oat ioHnn oat ieqb oiel al hhr lhtpll Sm : oihi bhtpllo nStnh mrah pnio olboSo hlbin ohbriq : ohnh Sni anSim mdbrim ato ohmh mSh oaliho : aSr nrao bkbod ohgido at aHrito aSr imlanh biroSlim : oihio pTros oaSr ato nrdmim obhqizm rao at kbodo oat Sni hanSim hemdim elio : oihi bhprdm mmno oiamr pTros al ihoSe morh Tob hiotno ph neSh na SlS skot lk aHt olmSh aHt olaliho aHt ola ide mh dbr : hoa mdbr kcat ohnh enn skk elihm okboam benn nbeto : oiza qol mn henn amr ch bni ididi alio tSmeon : obhiot hqol nSar ihoSe lbdo ohmh hHSo ola hgido dbr laiS bimim hhm mkl aSr rao : oihi mmHrt brdtm mn hhr oiza em rb lqrato : ohnh aiS aHd mn hem zeq lamr ana rbi pnh na al bni ki iHid hoa li : ohnh roH aHc bo optam hoa mzeq ohroH mrozz ato bhorid riro omqSh lsor mmno obsoro idka ato : oabqS mtlmidik lgrSo ola iklo : oien ihoSe oiamr hoi dor Hsr amonh optltl ed mti ahih emkm oasbl atkm hba hnh at bnk : oihi ak hqrib lboa oirezho hSd oirozzho oihoSe ger broH hTma oirpa at hner oiSibho labio : oiStommo klm el gdlt halhim oihi btmhm klm el kl aSr eSh oiamr ihoSe al tlmidio : Simo atm bacnikm at hdbrim halh ki etid bn hadm lhmsr bidi bni hadm : ohmh la hbino at hmamr hch onelm hoa mdetm oiirao lSal ato el hmamr hch : oiel el lbbm lHSob mi hoa hgdol bhm : oira ihoSe at mHSbt lbm oiqH ild oiemidho azlo : oiamr alihm kl aSr iqbl at hild hch lSmi aoti hoa mqbl okl aSr iqbl aoti hoa mqbl at aSr SlHni ki hqTn bklkm hoa ihih hgdol : oien ioHnn oiamr morh raino aiS mgrS Sdim bSmk onkla aoto ien ainno holk emno : oiamr ihoSe alio al tklao ki kl aSr ainno ngdno bedno hoa : oihi kmlat imi heloto ohoa Sm at pnio llkt iroSlim : oiSlH mlakim lpnio oilko oibao al aHd mkpri hSmronim lhkin lo : ola qblho el aSr hio pnio hlkim iroSlim : oiamro ieqb oioHnn tlmidio kraotm cat lamr adnino htrzh onamr ki trd aS mn hSmim otaklm kaSr eSh gm aliho : oipn oiger bm oiamr hla idetm bni roH mi atm : ki bn hadm la ba labd npSot adm ki am lhoSiem oilko lhm al kpr aHr : oihi blktm bdrk oiamr alio aiS adni alkh aHrik al kl aSr tlk : oiamr alio ihoSe lSoelim iS Hori epr oleop hSmim qnim obn hadm ain lo mqom lhniH Sm at raSo : oal aiS aHr amr lk aHri ohoa amr adni tn li oalkh braSonh lqbr at abi : oiamr alio ihoSe hnH lmtim lqbr at mtihm oath lk hode at mlkot halhim : oiamr eod aiS aHr alkh aHrik adni ak hniHh li braSonh lhpTr mbni biti : oiamr ihoSe kl hSm at ido el hmHrSh ombiT aHrio la ikSr lmlkot halhim :

10

oaHri kn hbdil hadon eod Sbeim aHrim oiSlHm lpnio Snim Snim al kl eir omqom aSr bqS lboa Smh : oiamr lhm hn hqzir rb ohpelim meTim lkn htHnno al adon hqzir oiSlH pelim lqziro : lko na hnni SlH atkm kkbSim bin hcabim : al tSao kis ola trmil ola nelim oal tSalo lSlom aiS bdrk : olkl bit aSr tbao Sm amro braSonh Slom lbit hch : ohih ki ihih Sm bn Slom onH elio Slomkm oam la alikm iSob : obbit hhoa tSbo otaklo otSto mSlhm ki Soh hpoel bSkro al tseo mbit lbit : okl eir aSr tbao bh oqblo atkm aklo Sm at aSr iSimo lpnikm : orpao at hHolim aSr bqrbh oamro lhm qrbh alikm mlkot halhim : okl eir aSr tbao bh ola iqblo atkm zao lkm al rHobotih oamro : ap at epr eirkm hndbq brglino nnerho lkm ak ide tdeo ki qrbh alikm mlkot halhim : ani amr alkim ki lsdom iql biom hhoa mn heir hhia : aoi lk korcin aoi lk bit zidh ki hgborot aSr neSo bqrbkn alo neSo bzor obzidon hla kbr iSbo bSq oapr oSbo : akn lzor ozidon iql bdin mkm : oat kpr nHom aSr ed hSmim htrommt al Saol tordi : hSome alikm ali hoa Some ohboch atkm aoti hoa boch ohboch aoti hoa boch at aSr SlHni : oiSobo hSbeim bSmHh oiamro adnino gm hSdim nkneim lno bSmk : oiamr alihm raiti at hSTn npl kbrq mn hSmim : hnh hSlTti atkm ldrk el nHSim oeqrbim oel kl gbort haib okl dbr la iciq lkm : ak bcat al tSmHo ki nkneim lkm hroHot ki am SmHo el aSr nktbo Smotikm bSmim : bSeh hhia elz ihoSe broH oiamr aodk hab adon hSmim oharz ki hstrt at alh mn hHkmim ohnbonim oglitm lellim hn abi ki kn hih rzon mlpnik : hkl nmsr li mat abi oain iode mi hoa hbn blti hab omi hoa hab blti hbn oaSr iHpz hbn lgloto lo : oipn al tlmidio lbdm oiamr aSri heinim hraot at aSr atm raim : ki ani amr lkm nbiaim omlkim rbim Hpzo lraot at aSr atm raim ola rao olSme at aSr atm Smeim ola Smeo : ohnh aHd mbeli htorh qm lnsoto oiamr morh mh aeSh oairS Hii eolm : oiamr alio mh ktob btorh oaik ath qora : oien oiamr oahbt at ihoh alhik bkl lbbk obkl npSk obkl madk obkl mdek oat rek kmok : oiamr alio kn hSibot eSh cat oHih : ohoa Hpz lhzTdq oiamr al ihoSe omi hoa rei : oien ihoSe oiamr aiS aHd ird miroSlim liriHo onpl bidi Sddim ohm hpSiTho ogm pzeho oiecbo aoto bin Hiim lmot oilko lhm : oiqr hmqrh ki ird khn aHd bdrk hhoa oira ato oiebr melio : okn gm aiS loi pge bmqom oigS oira ato oiebr melio : oaiS Smroni hlk bdrk oiba elio oira ato oihmo rHmio : oigS alio oiHbS at pzeio oisokm bSmn oiin oielho el bhmto oiolikho al hmlon oiklklho : olmHrt bnseo hozia Sni dinrim oitnm lbel hmlon oiamr klkl aoto oat aSr tosip eod lhozia elio ani bSobi aSlmno lk : oeth mi malh hSlSh hih beinik hre lnpl bidi hSddim : oiamr heSh emo at hHsd oiamr alio ihoSe lk oeSh kn gm ath : oihi bnsem oiba al kpr aHd oaSh aHt oSmh mrta asph aoto al bith : olh hith aHot oSmh mrim aSr iSbh lrgli ihoSe lSme al dbro : omrta igeh brb Sroth otgS otamr hla tSim el lbk adni aSr aHoti ecbtni lSrt lbdi amr na alih otecr li : oien ihoSe oiamr lh mrta mrta at dagt ombhlt el hrbh : abl aHt hia mn hzrk omrim bHrh lh hHlq hTob aSr la iqH mmnh :

11

oihi hoa mtpll bmqom aHd oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio aHri kloto adni lmdno lhtpll kaSr lmd gm ioHnn at tlmidio : oiamr alihm ki ttpllo amro abino SbSmim itqdS Smk tboa mlkotk ieSh rzonk kmo bSmim kn barz : at lHm Hqno tn lno iom iom : oslH lno at Hobtno ki slHim gm anHno lkl hHib lno oal tbiano lidi nsion ki am hzilno mn hre : oiamr alihm mi bkm aSr ihih lo ahb ohlk oba alio bHzot hlilh oamr alio ididi hloni SlSt kkrot lHm : ki ahbi ba ali mn hdrk oain li dbr lSom lpnio : ohoa mlpnim ienh oiamr al togieni ki kbr nsgrh hdlt oildi Sokbim emdi bmTh la aokl lqom oltt lk : ani amr lkm gm ki la iqom ltt lo el hioto ahbo iqom bebor ecot pnio oitn lo kkl zrko : ogm ani amr lkm Salo ointn lkm drSo otmzao dpqo oiptH lkm : ki kl hSal iqbl ohdrS imza oldpq iptH : omi bkm hab aSr iSal mmno bno lHm ontn lo abn oam dg hitn lo nHS tHt hdg : ao ki iSalno bizh hitn lo eqrb : hn atm hreim ideim ltt mtnot Tbot lbnikm ap ki hab mn hSmim itn at roH hqdS lSalim mato : oihi hiom oigrS Sd ohoa alm oihi aHri zat hSd oidbr halm oitmho hem : oiS aSr amro bbel cbob Sr hSdim hoa mgrS at hSdim : oiS aSr nsoho oiSalo mmno aot mn hSmim : ohoa ide at mHSbotm oiamr alihm kl mmlkh hnHlqh el ezmh tHrb obit ipl el bit : ogm hSTn am nHlq el ezmo aikkh tkon mmlkto ki amrtm Sbbel cbob mgrS ani at hSdim : oam ani mgrS at hSdim bbel cbob bnikm bmi hm mgrSim atm el kn hmh ihio SpTikm : oam bazbe alhim mgrS ani at hSdim hnh hgieh alikm mlkot halhim : bhiot hgbor Smr at Hzro ohoa mcin ohih rkoSo Slom : oam iboa elio Hcq mmno otqpo iSa mmno at nSqo aSr bTH bo oat mlqHo iHlq : kl aSr ainno ati hoa lngdi oaSr ainno masp ati hoa mpcr : hroH hTmah aHri zath mn hadm tSoTT bmqmot zih lbqS lh mnoHh ola tmza ac tamr aSobh na al biti aSr izati mSm : obboah tmza ato mTaTa omhdr : oaHr tlk olqHh Sbe roHot aHrot reot mmnh obao oSkno Sm ohith aHrit hadm hhoa reh mraSito : oihi kdbro at hdbrim halh oaSh aHt mn hem nSah at qolh otamr alio aSri hbTn aSr nSatk ohSdim aSr inqt : ohoa amr oap ki aSri hSmeim ohSmrim at dbr halhim : oiqbzo em rb oiHl ldbr hdor hch dor re hoa aot hoa mbqS oaot la intn lo blti am aot ionh hnbia : ki kaSr hih ionh lanSi ninoh laot kn ihih gm bn hadm ldor hch : mlkt timn tqom bmSpT em anSi hdor hch ohrSieh aotm ki bah mqzot harz lSme at Hkmt Slmh ohnh iS ph gdol mSlmh : anSi ninoh iqomo bmSpT em hdor hch ohrSieho ki hm Sbo bqriat ionh ohnh iS ph gdol mionh : ain mdliq nr aSr iSimho bstr ao tHt haiph ki am el hmnorh lmen irao bai hbit at aoro : nr hgop hoa hein lkn bhiot eink tmimh gm kl gopk iaor obhioth reh oHSk gm gopk : el kn hSmr lk pn iHSk haor aSr bqrbk : ohnh am gopk klo aor oain bo kl dbr HSk ac iaor klo ohih khair lk hnr bbrq ngho : oihi bdbro oibqS mmno proS aHd lakl ato lHm oiba hbith oisb : oitmh hproS brato aSr la nTl idio braSonh lpni hseodh : oiamr alio hadon ket atm hproSim mThrim at hkom ohqerh mHoz ohpnimi aSr bkm hoa mla gcl orSe : hksilim hla eSh hHizon gm eSh at hpnimi : abl tno lzdqh at aSr bm ohnh hkl Thor lkm : ak aoi lkm hproSim ki teSro at hmnta oat hpigm oat kl hirq otebro at hmSpT oat ahbt alhim ohih lkm leSot at alh ola lhniH gm at alh : aoi lkm hproSim ki tahbo at moSb hraS bbti hknsiot oat Salot Slomkm bSoqim : aoi lkm hsoprim ohproSim hHnpim ki atm kqbrim hnstrim obni hadm mthlkim elihm ola ideo : oien aHd mbeli htorh oiamr alio rbi bdbrik alh tHrp gm atno : oiamr aoi gm lkm beli htorh ki emsim atm el bni hadm mSaot kbdim msbl oatm bezmkm ainkm ngeim bmSaot gm baHt mazbeotikm : aoi lkm ki bonim atm at qbrot hnbiaim oabotikm hrgo aotm : okn atm meidim orozim bmeSi abotikm ki hmh hrgo aotm oatm bonim at qbrihm : bebor cat gm amrh Hkmt halhim aSlH alihm nbiaim oSliHim omhm ihrgo oirdpo : lmen idrS mn hdor hch dm kl hnbiaim aSr nSpk lmn hosd harz : mdm hbl ed dm ckriho aSr nhrg bin hmcbH olbit hn amr ani lkm droS idrS mn hdor hch : aoi lkm beli htorh ki hsirtm at mptH hdet atm la batm oat hbaim mnetm : oihi kdbro lhm at alh oiHlo hsoprim ohproSim lSTm aoto mad olhqSot lo bdbrim rbim : oiarbo lo oibqSo lzodd dbr mpiho lmen imzao elio STnh :

12

oihi ed kh oed kh bhtasp rbbot em ed ki lHzo aiS at reho oiHl ldbr al tlmidio braSonh hSmro lnpStikm mSaor hproSim Shoa hHnph : oain dbr mksh aSr la iglh oain nelm aSr la iode : lkn kl aSr dbrtm bHSk baor iSme oat aSr lHStm lacn bHdrim qra iqra el hggot : oani amr lkm ididi al tirao mn hmmitim at hgop oaHri cat ain lal idm leSot eod dbr : abl aorh atkm at aSr tirao irao at aSr iS lo SlTn aHri hmito lhSlik al gihnm hn ani amr lkm aoto tiraon : hla HmS zprim tmkrnh bSni asrim oain aHt mhn nSkHt lpni halhim : oatm gm Serot raSkm nmnot kln lkn al tirao iqrtm mzprim rbot : oani amr lkm kl aSr iodh bi lpni hadm gm bn hadm iodh bo lpni mlaki alhim : oaSr ikHS bi lpni hadm hoa ikHS lpni mlaki alhim : okl aSr idbr dbr Hrph el bn hadm islH lo ohmgdp at roH hqdS la islH lo : okaSr ibiao atkm al bti hknsiot olpni hrSiot ohSlTonim al tdago aik ao bmh tzTdqo omh tdbro : ki roH hqdS hoa iorh atkm bSeh hhia at hnkon ldbr : oiamr alio aHd mn hem rbi amr na al aHi oiHlq ati at hirSh : oiamr alio bn adm mi Smni elikm lSpT olmHlq : oiamr alihm rao ohSmro lkm mbze bze ki Hii hadm ainm tloim bhrbot nksio : oiSa mSlo oiamr alihm lamr Sdh aiS eSir aHd eSh tboah hrbh : oiHSb blbo lamr mh aeSh ki ain li mqom lknos bo at tboati : oiamr at cat aeSh hrs at asmi obnh gdolim mhm oaknsh Smh at kl iboli oTobi : oamr lnpSi npSi iS lk etodot hrbh lSnim rbot hnpSi akli Sti oSiSi : ohalhim amr lo ath hksil bezm hlilh hch idrSo mmk at npSk oaSr hkinot lk lmi ihih : ch Hlq hazr lo azrot ola ieSir balhim : oiamr al tlmidio lkn ani amr lkm al tdago lnpSkm mh taklo olgopkm mh tlbSo : hnpS iqrh hia mn hmcon ohgop iqr mn hmlboS : htbonno al herbim aSr ainm creim oainm qzrim ogm ain lhm mgorh oaozr ohalhim mklkl aotm omh melim atm mn heop : omi ch mkm aSr bdagto iokl lhosip amh aHt el qomto : oeth hn meT mcer ain bikltkm oliotr mh tdago : htbonno al hSoSnim hzmHot oainn Tot oainn argot oani amr lkm ki gm Slmh bkl hdro la hih lboS kaHt mhnh : oam kkh ilbiS alhim at Hzir hSdh aSr hiom iSno omHr iSlk ltok htnor ap ki atkm qTni hamonh : gm atm al tdrSo mh taklo omh tSto oal thlko bgdlot : ki at kl alh mbqSim goii harz oabikm hoa iode ki zrikim atm lalh : ak bqSo at mlkot halhim onosp lkm kl alh : al tira hedr hqTn ki rzh abikm ltt lkm at hmlkot : mkro at rkoSkm otno zdqh eSo lkm kisim aSr la iblo oaozr bSmim aSr la igre leolm aSr gnb la iqrb alio oss la iaklho : ki bmqom aSr aozrkm bo Sm ihih gm lbbkm : mtnikm ihio Hgorim ohnrot dlqim : oatm hio dmim lanSim hmHkim ladnihm mti iSob mn hHtnh okaSr iboa odpq iptHo lo krge : aSri hebdim hhm aSr bboa hadon imzam Sqdim amn amr ani lkm ki itacr oioSibm oilk lSrt aotm : oam iboa baSmrh hSnit ao baSmrh hSliSit okn imza aSri hebdim hhm : ocat deo aSr am ide ide bel hbit bai co Seh iboa hgnb ki eth Sqd Sqod ola itn lHtr at bito : lkn gm atm hio nkonim ki bSeh aSr la plltm iboa bn hadm : oiamr pTros adnino hlno ath amr at hmSl hch am gm lkl adm : oiamr hadon mi hoa apoa hskn hnamn ohnbon aSr ipqidho hadon el ebdto ltt at arHtm beto : aSri hebd hhoa aSr bba adnio imzaho eSh kn : amt amr ani lkm ki el kl aSr iS lo ipqidho : ohebd hhoa am iamr blbo bSS adni lboa ohHl lhkot at hebdim oat hSpHot olakl olStot olSkr : boa iboa adni hebd hhoa biom la izph obSeh la ide oiSsp aoto oiSim at Hlqo em hsorrim : ohebd hhoa aSr ide at rzon adnio ola hkin ola eSh krzono ikh mkot rbot, oaSr la ide oeSh dbrim aSr elihm bn hkot hoa la ikh ki am meT ki kl aiS aSr ntn lo hrbh droS idrS mmno hrbh oaSr hpqido bido hrbh iSalo mato iotr : : lhpil aS el harz bati omh Hpz ani ki kbr berh : oeli Tbilh lhTbl omh izr li ed ki tSlm : hHSbim atm ki bati ltt Slom barz ani amr lkm la ki am mHlqt : ki meth HmSh bbit aHd iHlqo SlSh el Snim oSnim el SlSh : hab iHlq el hbn ohbn el hab ham el hbt ohbt el ham hHmot el hklh ohklh el hHmot : oiamr gm al hmon hem kratkm at henn elh bmerb oamrtm gSm ba okn ihih : oam nSbh roH hngb tamro hnh Hm ba ogm iboa : hHnpim at pni harz ohSmim idetm lbHn oat het hcat aik la tbHno : lmh ap mnpSkm la tSpTo at hiSr : ki kaSr tlk al hSr em aiS ribk beodk bdrk hStdl lhnzl mmno pn isHb aotk al hSpT ohSpT imsrk al hSoTr ohSoTr iSlikk al bit hkla : oani amr lk la tza mSm ed am Slmt gm at hproTh haHronh :

13

oibao anSim bet hhia oigido lo el dbr hglilim aSr pilTos erb dmm em cbHihm : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hHSbim atm ki hglilim halh hio HTaim mkl anSi hglil el aSr bah kcat elihm : la ki amr ani lkm am la tSobo tabdo klkm gm atm : ao Smnh heSr hhm aSr npl elihm hmgdl bSlH oimitm hHSbim atm ki hio aSmim mkl hanSim hiSbim biroSlim : la ki amr ani lkm am la tSobo tabdo klkm gm atm : oiSa mSlo oiamr aiS aHd hith lo tanh nToeh bkrmo oiba lbqS bh pri ola mza : oiamr al hkrm hnh ch SlS Snim anki ba lbqS pri btanh hcat oainni moza gde aoth lmh ch tSHit at hadmh : oien oiamr alio adni hniHh ath eod hSnh hcat ed ki aedr oSmti dmn sbibotih : aoli teSh pri oam la bSnh hbah tgdenh : oihi hoa mlmd bSbt baHd mbti hknsiot : ohnh aSh Teont roH Hli kSmnh eSrh Snh othi kpoph ola iklh lqom qomh cqoph : oihi braot ath ihoSe oiqra alih oiamr lh aSh hHlzi mHlik : oiSm at idio elih okrge qmh otteodd otSbH at halhim : oikes raS hknst el aSr rpa ihoSe bSbt oien oiamr al hem SSt imim hm aSr teSh bhm mlakh lkn balh bao ohrpao ola biom hSbt : oien hadon oiamr alio hHnp aiS aiS mkm hla itir bSbt at Soro ao at Hmro mn habos oiolikho lhSqto : ocat aSr hia bt abrhm oaSr hSTn asrh ch Smnh eSrh Snh hla ttr mmosrotih biom hSbt : oihi kamro at hdbrim halh nklmo kl mtqommio oiSmH kl hem el kl hnplaot hneSot el ido : oiamr lmh domh mlkot halhim oal mh amSilnh : domh hia lgrgr Sl Hrdl aSr lqHo aiS oiSimho bgno oizmH oihi lez gdol oeop hSmim iqnn benpio : oiamr eod al mh admh at mlkot halhim : domh hia lSar aSr lqHto aSh otTmnho bSlS saim qmH ed ki iHmz klo : oiebr berim obkprim ebor olmd oiSm at drko lboa iroSlim : oiSalho aiS lamr adnino hmeT hm hnoSeim : oiamr alihm htamzo lboa bptH hzr ki amr ani lkm rbim ibqSo lboa ola ioklo : ohih miom aSr iqom bel hbit osgr at hdlt otHlo lemd bHoz oldpq el hdlt lamr adnino adnino ptH lno oenh oamr alikm ainni iode atkm main atm : ac tHlo lamr aklno oStino lpnik obrHbotino lmdt : oiamr ani amr lkm ainni iode atkm main atm soro mmni kl peli haon : oSm thih hillh oHrq hSnim kaSr trao at abrhm oizHq oieqb oat kl hnbiaim bmlkot halhim oatm mgrSim hHozh : oibao mmcrH ommerb omzpon omdrom oisbo bmlkot halhim : ohnh iS aHronim aSr ihio raSonim oraSonim aSr ihio aHronim : biom hhoa ngSo mn hproSim oiamro alio za olk mch ki hordos mbqS lhrgk : oiamr alihm lko oamro al hSoel hch hnni mgrS Sdim opel rpoaot hiom omHr obSliSi aba ed qzi : abl hlok alk hiom omHr ommHrto ki la itkn aSr iabd nbia mHoz liroSlim : iroSlim iroSlim hhrgt at hnbiaim ohsqlt at hnSlHim alih kmh pemim Hpzti lqbz at bnik kaSr tqbz htrnglt at aproHih tHt knpih oatm la abitm : hnh bitkm iecb lkm Smm oani amr lkm ki rah la traoni ed boa het aSr tamro brok hba bSm ihoh :

14

oihi bbao bSbt al bit aHd mraSi hproSim lakl lHm ohmh arbim lo : ohnh aiS aHd lpnio aSr gopo zbh mmim : oien ihoSe oiamr al beli htorh oal hproSim lamr hmtr lrpa bSbt am la oiHriSo : oiaHc bo oirpaho oiSlHho : oien oiamr alihm mi mkm aSr Hmro ao Soro ipol al hbar ola imhr lheloto biom hSbt : ola iklo lhSib el cat dbr : oiSa mSlo al hqroaim braoto aik bHro lhm lhsb braS oiamr alihm : ki iqra atk aiS al hHtnh al tsb braS pn iqra Smh aiS nkbd mmk : oba hqra aotk oaoto oamr alik pnh mqom lch oac tqom bklmh lqHt at hmqom haHron : abl ki tqra lk ohsb bmqom haHron lmen iba hqra atk oamr alik ahobi elh lmelh mch ohih lk kbod lpni hmsbim emk : ki kl hmromm at ezmo iSpl ohmSpil at ezmo iromm : ogm al haiS aSr qra aoto amr ki teSh seodt zhrim ao seodt erb al tqra lahbik olaHik olqrobik olSknik heSirim pn iqrao lk gm hmh ohih lk lSlom : abl ki teSh mSth qra leniim olnSbrim olpsHim oleorim : oaSrik baSr ain lhm lSlm lk ki iSlm lk btHit hzdiqim : oiSme cat aHd mn hmsbim oiamr alio aSri hakl lHm bmlkot halhim : ohoa amr alio aiS aHd eSh seodh gdolh oiqra lrbim : oiSlH at ebdo let hseodh lamr al hqroaim bao ki kbr mokn hkl : oiHlo klm ph aHd lhtnzl oiamr alio hraSon Sdh qniti oeli lzat lrato abqS mmk nqni : oaHr amr HmSt zmdi bqr qniti oani hlk lbHn aotm abqS mmk nqni : oaHr amr aSh lqHti obebor cat la aokl lboa : oiba hebd oigd at hdbrim halh ladnio oiqzp bel hbit oiamr lebdo mhr za al rHbot heir oal hozotih ohba hnh at heniim oat hnSbrim oat heorim oat hpsHim : oiamr hebd adni kaSr zoit kn neSh oiS eod mqom : oiamr hadon al hebd za al hdrkim oal hgdrot opzr bhm lboa lmen imla biti : ki ani amr lkm ain aHd mn hanSim hqroaim hhm aSr iTem seodti : ohmon em rb hlkim ato oipn oiamr alihm : aiS ki iboa ali ola iSna at abio oat amo oat aSto oat bnio oat aHio oat aHitio oap gm at npSo la iokl lhiot tlmidi : oaSr la iSa at zlbo oba aHri la iokl lhiot tlmidi : ki mi mkm hHpz lbnot mgdl hla iSb braSonh oiHSb at hhozaot am hSg tSig ido lhSlimo : pn iSim at hisod ola iokl lkloto ohih kl hraim iqomo lhleig lo lamr : ki ch haiS hHl lbnot ola ikl lklot : ac mi hoa hmlk hqm lhtgrot mlHmh bmlk aHr ola iSb braSonh oitiez am iokl beSrt alpim lerk lqrat hba elio beSrim alp : oam la oSlH alio mlakim beodno rHoq lbqS Slom : kkh kl aiS mkm aSr la npTr mkl rkoSo la iokl lhiot tlmidi : Tob hmlH oam hmlH hih tpl bmh itqn : la izlH gm ladmh gm ldmn hHozh iSlikho mi aSr acnim lo lSme iSme :

15
