oihi bqrb alio kl hmoksim ohHTaim lSme aoto : oilono hproSim ohsoprim lamr hnh ch mqbl at hHTaim oakl atm : oidbr alihm at hmSl hch lamr : mi ch haiS mkm aSr lo mah kbSim oabd lo aHd mhm ola iToS at htSeim otSeh bmdbr ohlk aHri habd ed ki imzaho : ohih kmzao ato iSimno el ktpio bSmHh : oba al bito oqra lahbio olSknio iHd lamr SmHo ati ki mzati at Sii habd : ani amr lkm ki kn thih SmHh bSmim el HoTa aHd hSb iotr mel tSeim otSeh zdiqim aSr la izTrko ltSobh : ao mi haSh aSr lh eSrh drkmonim oabd lh drkmon aHd ola tdliq nr otTaTa at hbit otHpS hiTb ed ki tmzaho : ohih kmzah aoto tqra lreotih olSknotih lamr SmHnh ati ki mzati at hdrkmon aSr abd li : kn ani amr lkm thih SmHh lnpi mlaki alhim el HoTa aHd aSr Sb mHTao : oiamr aiS aHd hio lo Sni bnim : oiamr hzeir al abio abi tnh li at Hlq hrkoS aSr ipl li oiHlq lhm at hnHlh : oihi mqz imim oiasp hbn hzeir at hkl oilk al arz rHoqh oSm pcr at rkSo oilk bdrk sobaim ocollim : oaHri kloto at hkl hih reb Hcq barz hhia oiHl lhiot Hsr lHm : oilk oidbq baHd mbni hmdinh barz hhia oiSlH aoto al Sdotio lreot Hcirim : oitao lmla at bTno bHrobim aSr iaklo hHcirim oain ntn lo : oiSb al lbo oiamr mh rbo Skiri abi oiS lhm lHm lSbe oani abd breb : aqomh na oalkh al abi oamr alio abi HTati lSmim olpnik : onqlti mhqra eod bnk Simni kaSr Skirik : oiqm oiba al abio eodno mrHoq oabio raho oihmo meio oirz oipl el zoario oiSqho : oiamr alio hbn abi HTati lSmim olpnik oani nqlti mhqra eod bnk : oiamr hab al ebdio hoziao at hSmlh hTobh mkln ohlbiSho otno Tbet el ido onelim brglio : ohbiao at egl hmrbq oTbHo ato onaklh onSmH : ki ch bni hih mt oiHi oaobd hih oimza oiHlo lSmH : obno hgdol hih bSdh oihi kaSr ba oiqrb al hbit oiSme qol cmrh omHlot : oiqra al aHd hnerim oiSal mh cat : oiamr alio ki ba aHik oiTbH abik at egl hmrbq el aSr hoSb lo Slm : oiHr lo ola abh lboa hbith oiza abio oidbr el lbo : oien oiamr al abio hnh ch Snim rbot ani ebd atk omimi la ebrti at mzotk omimi la ntt li gdi lmen aSiS em rei : oiba bnk ch aSr ble at nHltk em hcnot otcbH lo at egl hmrbq : oiamr alio bni ath tmid emdi okl aSr li lk hoa : abl nkon lSoS olSmH ki aHik ch hih mt oiHi oabd hih oimza :

16

oiamr gm al tlmidio aiS eSir hih olo pqid el bito oilSinho alio bamrm ki mpcr hoa at qninik : oiqra ato oiamr alio mh cat Smeti elik tn HSbon pqdtk ki la tokl lhiot eod pqid : oiamr hpqid blbo mh aeSh ki iqH adni mmni at hpqdh ledr la aokl olSal el hptHim ani boS : ideti mh aeSh lmen iasponi al btihm bet aosr mpqdti : oiqra al kl aiS aSr nSh bhm adnio oiSal at hraSon kmh ath Hib ladni : oiamr mat bti Smn oiamr alio qH at STrk omhr Sb oktbt HmSim : oal aHr amr kmh ath Hib oiamr mat kr HTim oiamr qH at STrk oktb Smnim : oiSbH hadon at pqid heolh el aSr herim leSot ki bni heolm hch eromim hm bdorm mbni haor : ogm ani amr lkm eSo lkm ahbim bmmon heolh lmen bet klto iaspo atkm al mSknot eolm : hnamn bmeT mcer namn gm bhrbh ohmeol bmeT mcer meol gm bhrbh : lkn am bmmon heolh la hiitm namnim at hamti mi ipqid bidkm : oam bdbr aSr laHrim la hiitm namnim at aSr lkm mi itn lkm : ain ebd aSr iokl lebd Sni adnim ki iSna at haHd oiahb at haHr ao idbq baHd oat haHr ibch la toklo ebd at halhim oat hmmon : oiSmeo kl cat gm hproSim aSr hm ahbi ksp oilego lo : oiamr alihm atm hm hmzTdqim lpni hadm oalhim iode at lbbkm ki hgbh badm toebh hoa lpni halhim : htorh ohnbiaim ed ioHnn omn ac ohlah bSort mlkot halhim okl aiS bHcqh iboa bh : abl nql ki iebro hSmim oharz maSr ipl qoz aHd mn htorh : kl aiS hmSlH at aSto olqH aHrt nap hoa okl hlqH at hgroSh maiSh nap hoa : aiS eSir hih ohoa lboS argmn oSS oitegg oiSmH iom iom : oaiS abion oSmo lecr mSkb ptH Ser bito ohoa mla abebeot : oitao lSbe mn hprorim hnplim mel SlHn heSir ogm hklbim bao oilqo abebeotio : oihi kaSr mt habion oiobl el idi hmlakim al Hiq abrhm oimt gm heSir oiqbr : obhioto bmkabot bSaol oiSa at einio oira at abrhm mrHoq oat lecr bHiqo : oizeq oiamr abi abrhm Hnni oSlH na at lecr oiTbl at qzh azbeo bmim lmen qrr at lSoni ki eniti bmoqd hch : oiamr abrhm bni ckr ki lqHt Tobk bHiik ogm lecr lqH at hreot oeth hoa inHm oath tzTer : omlbd kl cat SoHh gdolh mpsqt binino obinikm lblti ioklo ebor hHpzim llkt mph alikm olblti iebro mSm alino : oiamr am kn abi Sal ani matk ki tSlH ato al bit abi : ki iS li HmSh aHim lmen ieid bhm pn ibao gm hm al mqom hmezbh hch : oiamr abrhm iS lhm mSh ohnbiaim alihm iSmeon : oiamr la kn abi abrhm ak am ilk alihm aHd mn hmtim ac iSobo : oiamr alio am la iSmeo al mSh oal hnbiaim gm ki iqom aHd mn hmtim la iamino :

17

oiamr al tlmidio ai apSr Sla ibao hmkSlim abl aoi laiS aSr el ido ibao : noH lo Sitlh plH rkb el zoaro oiSlk al him maSr ikSil at aHd mhqTnim walh : hSmro lnpSotikm am iHTa lk aHik hokH lo oam inHm slH lo : oam iHTa lk Sbe pemim biom oSb alik Sbe pemim biom oamr nHmti oslHt lo : oiamro hSliHim al hadon hosp lno amonh : oiamr hadon lo hith lkm amonh kgrgr hHrdl ac tamro al htot hch heqr ohnTe btok him oiSme lkm : mi hoa ch mkm olo ebd HrS ao reh aSr bbao mn hSdh iamr alio mhr gSh hnh ohsb : hla iamr alio hkn li aroHt herb oHgr mtnik oSrtni ed am kliti lakl olStot oaHr takl otSth gm ath : hgm itn todh lebd el eSto at aSr zoho amrti la itn : kkh gm atm aHri eSotkm at kl aSr zoitm amro ebdim ain moeil bm anHno ki rq at hmTl elino leSot eSino : oihi bnseo iroSlim ohoa ebr btok Smron ohglil : oiba al kpr aHd oipgeho eSrh anSim mzreim ohm emdim mrHoq : oiSao at qolm lamr ihoSe morh Hnno : oira aotm oiamr alihm lko ohrao al hkhnim oihi blktm oiThro : oaHd mhm brato ki nrpa oiSb oiSbH at halhim bqol gdol : oipl el pnio lrglio oiodh lo ohoa hih Smroni : oien ihoSe oiamr hla heSrh Thro ohtSeh aih hm : ham la nmza aSr Sb ltt kbod lalhim colti hnkri hch : oiamr alio qom olk amontk hoSieh lk : oiSalho hproSim mti tboa mlkot halhim oien atm lamr mlkot halhim la tboa bmrah einim : ola iamro hnh ph ao hnh Sm ki mlkot halhim hnh bqrbkm hia : oiamr al htlmidim imim baim ohtaoitm lraot iom aHd mimi bn hadm ola trao : oam iamro alikm hnh Sm hnh ph al tlko oal trozo aHrihm : ki kbrq aSr ibrq mqzh hSmim oiair ed qzh hSmim kn ihih bn hadm biomo : ak braSonh zrik hoa lsbl hrbh olhmas mn hdor hch : okaSr hih nH kn ihih bimi bn hadm : aklo oSto nSao nSim ohSiao nSim lanSim ed hiom aSr ba nH al htbh oiba hmbol oiSHt at klm : okaSr hih bimi loT akl oSth qnh omkr nTe obnh : oihi biom aSr iza loT msdom oimTr aS ogprit mn hSmim oiSHt at klm : kkh ihih biom aSr iglh bn hadm : biom hhoa aiS aSr ihih el hgg oklio bbit al ird lSat atm oaiS aSr bSdh al iSb hbith : ckro at aSt loT : hmbqS lmlT at npSo iabdnh oaSr iabd ath ihih : ani amr lkm blilh hhoa Snim ihio bmTh aHt haHd iasp ohaHr iecb : Stim thiinh THnot iHd haHt tasp ohaHrt tecb : Snim ihio bSdh onasp haHd ohaHr iecb : oieno oiamro alio aih cat adnino oiamr alihm baSr hpgr Sm iqbzo hnSrim :

18

ogm mSl dbr alihm lhtpll tmid ola lhtrpot : oiamr SopT hih beir aHt aSr la ira at halhim ola nSa pnim ladm : oalmnh hith beir hhia otba alio lamr dinh at dini mmribi : oiman miom al iom oaHri kn amr bnpSo gm ki at halhim ainni ira oladm la aSa pnim : aeSh at din halmnh hcat el hogieh ati pn tboa tmid otdkani bmlim : oiamr hadon Smeo at aSr amr din heolh : ohalhim hla hoa ieSh din bHirio hqraim alio iomm olilh gm ki itmhmh lhoSiem : ani amr lkm ki ieSh at dinm bmhrh ak bn hadm bbao himza amonh barz : oiosp oiSa mSlo al anSim bTHim bnpSm ki zdiqim hmh oaHrim nbcim beinihm oiamr : Sni anSim elo al hmqdS lhtpll haHd proS ohaHd moks : oitizb hproS lbdo oitpll lamr alhim aodk ki ainni kaSr hadm hgclim oheSqim ohnapim ao gm kmks hch : ani zm pemim bSboe ani meSr at kl qnini : ohmoks hih emd mrHoq ola abh ap lSat at einio lSmim ki am topp el lbo lamr alhim slH li hHoTa : ani amr lkm ki ird ch lbito nzdq mch ki kl hmrim at npSo iSpl oaSr iSpilh iromm : oibiao alio gm at hildim lmen ige bhm oirao htlmidim oigero bm : oiqra atm ihoSe alio oiamr hniHo lildim lboa ali oal tmneom ki lalh mlkot halhim : amn amr ani lkm kl aSr la iqbl at mlkot halhim kild hoa la iba bh : oiSalho qzin aHd lamr rbi hTob mh li leSot oairS Hii eolmim : oiamr alio ihoSe mdoe qrat li Tob ain Tob blti aHd halhim : at hmzot ath iode la tnap la trzH la tgnb la tenh ed Sqr kbd at abik oat amk : oiamr at kl alh Smrti mneori : oiSme ihoSe oiamr eod aHt Hsrt mkr at kl aSr lk oHlq leniim oihi lk aozr bSmim oboa olk aHri : oihi kSmeo at cat oiezb mad ki eSr gdol hih lo : oira ihoSe ki nezb oiamr kmh iqSh lbeli nksim lboa al mlkot halhim : ki nql lgml ebr btok nqb hmHT mboa eSir al mlkot halhim : oiamro hSmeim omi iokl lhoSe : oiamr mh Sipla mbni adm la ipla malhim : oiamr pTros hn anHno ecbno at hkl onlk aHrik : oiamr alihm amn amr ani lkm ain aiS aSr ecb at bito ao at abotio ao at aHio ao at aSto ao at bnio lmen mlkot halhim : ola iqH tHtihm kplim hrbh beolm hch obeolm hba Hii eolmim : oiqH alio at Snim heSr oiamr lhm hnno elim iroSlimh oimla kl hktob bidi hnbiaim el bn hadm : ki imsr lgoim oihtlo bo oitello bo oirqo bpnio : oaHri hkotm ato bSoTim imitoho obiom hSliSi qom iqom : ohm la hbino maomh oihi hdbr hch nelm mhm ola ideo at hnamr : oihi bqrbo al iriHo ohnh aiS eor iSb el hdrk ohoa mSal : oiSme at qol hem hebr oidrS ldet mh cat : oigido lo ki ihoSe hnzri eobr : oizeq lamr ihoSe bn dod Hnni : ohhlkim braSnh gero bo lhHSto ohoa hrbh eod lzeq ihoSe bn dod Hnni : oiemd ihoSe oizo lhbiao alio oihi kaSr qrb oiSalho lamr : mh Hpzk ki aeSh lk oiamr adni ki arah : oiamr alio rah amontk hoSieh lk : optam rah oilk aHrio hlk oSbH at halhim okl hem braotm cat ntno todh lalhim :

19

oiboa oiebr biriHo : ohnh aiS oSmo cki mraSi hmoksim ohoa eSir : oibqS lraot at ihoSe mi hoa ola ikl mpni hem ki Spl qomh hih : oiqdm oirz oiel el Sqmh lraoto ki Sm hdrk aSr iebr bh : oihi bbao al hmqom hhoa oibT ihoSe oiraho oiamr alio cki rd mhr ki zrik ani lSbt hiom bbitk : oimhr oird oiaspho bSmHh : oilono kl hraim lamr ba llon bbit aiS HoTa : oiemd cki oiamr al hadon hnh adni at mHzit nksi ani ntn leniim oam eSqti aiS aSib lo arbetim : oiamr alio ihoSe hiom hith tSoeh lbit hch baSr bn abrhm gm hoa : ki ba bn hadm lbqS olhoSie at habd : oihi hm Smeim at cat oisp Sat mSl el aSr qrb liroSlim ohmh HSbim ki mhrh tglh mlkot halhim : el kn amr aiS aHd mn hadirim hlk al arz rHoqh lqHt lo mmlkh olSob : oiqra al eSrh mebdio oitn lhm eSrh mnim oiamr lhm sHro bhm ed bai : obni eiro Snaim aoto oiSlHo mlakim aHrio lamr la nHpz bch ki imlk elino : oihi aHri qHto at hmmlkh oiSb oiamr lqra at hebdim hhm aSr ntn lhm at hksp lmen ide mh hroiH kl aHd bmsHro : oiba hraSon oiamr adni mnh Slk hbia eSrt mnim : oiamr alio kn hebd hTob tHt aSr hiit namn bmeT mcer hih SliT el eSr erim : oiba hSni oiamr adni mnh Slk eSh HmSt mnim : oiamr gm lch ap ath hih el HmS erim : oiba haHr oiamr ha lk mnh Slk aSr hih azli zror bsodr : mpni irati atk ki ath aiS qSh lqH at aSr la hnHt oqzr at aSr la cret : oiamr alio mpik aSpTk hebd hre ath idet ki ani aiS qSh lqH at aSr la hnHti oqozr at aSr la creti : olmh la ntt at kspi lSlHni oani bboai hiiti tobe aoto bmrbit : oiamr al hemdim Sm Sao mmno at hmnh otnoho al aSr lo eSrt hmnim : oiamro alio adnino iS lo eSrt mnim : hn ani amr lkm ki kl aiS SiS lo intn lo oaSr ain lo iqH mmno gm at aSr lo : abl at aibi hhm aSr la Hpzo mlki elihm hbiao atm hnh ohrgo atm lpni : oikl ldbr hdbrim halh oiebr lpnihm oiel iroSlim : oihi bqrbo al bit pgi obit hini bhr hnqra hr hcitim oiSlH Snim mtlmidio lamr : lko al hkpr aSr mmolno ohih bboakm Smh tmzao eir asor aSr la iSb elio adm ed eth htiro ato ohbiao : oki iSal atkm aiS lmh ttirho kh tamro alio ien ki hadon zrik lo : oilko hSloHim oimzao kaSr dbr alihm : oitiro at heir oiamr alihm belio lmh ch atm mtirim at heir : oiamro hadon zrik lo : oibiaho al ihoSe oiSliko at bgdihm el heir oirkibo elio at ihoSe : obnseo hzieo at bgdihm el hdrk : oiqrb al mord hr hcitim oiHlo kl hmon htlmidim lSbH at halhim bSmHh obqol gdol el kl hgborot aSr rao lamr : brok hmlk hba bSm ihoh Slom bSmim okbod bmromim : omqzt proSim aSr btok hem amro alio rbi ger btlmidik : oien oiamr ani amr lkm ki am iHSo alh tceqnh habnim : oihi kaSr qrb oira at heir oibk elih lamr : lo idet ap at beod iomk hch at dbr Slomk oeth nelm meinik : ki imim baim elik oSpko aibik sollh sbibik ohqipok ozro elik mkl ebrik : osHbo aotk oat bnik bqrbk ola iSairo bk abn el abn eqb ki la idet at et pqdtk : oiba al hmqdS oiHl lgrS mSm at hmkrim oat hqonim bo : oiamr alihm hn ktob biti bit tplh hoa oatm eStim aoto lmert prizim : oihi mlmd iom iom bmqdS ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim ogm raSi hem mbqSim labdo : ola mzao mh leSot ki kl hem dbqo aHrio lSme ato :

20

oihi hiom ohoa mlmd at hem bmqdS ombSr oigSo hkhnim ohsoprim em hcqnim : oiamro alio amr na lno bai co rSot ath eSh at alh ao mi hoa hntn lk at hrSot hcat : oien oiamr alihm ap ani aSalkm dbr oamro li : Tbilt ioHnn hmn hSmim hith am mbni adm : oiHSbo blbm lamr am namr mn hSmim oamr lmh ch la hamntm lo : oam namr mbni adm osqlno kl hem bemdm el detm ki ioHnn nbia hih : oieno la ideno main : oiamr ihoSe alihm gm ani la amr lkm bai co rSot ani eSh alh : oiHl ldbr al hem at hmSl hch aiS aHd nTe krm oitn ato al krmim oilk bdrk mrHoq limim rbim : olmoed SlH ebd al hkrmim ltt lo mpri hkrm ohkrmim hkho oiSlHho riqm : oisp SlH ebd aHr oiko gm ato oiHrpho oiSlHho riqm : oisp lSlH SliSi ogm ato pzeo oigrSho oidHpho Hozh : oiamr bel hkrm mh aeSh aSlHh at bni at ididi kraotm aoto aoli igoro mpnio : okraot ato hkrmim noezo iHdo lamr ch hoa hiorS lko onhrgho othi lno hirSh : oigrSo aoto al mHoz lkrm oihrgho oeth mh ieSh lhm bel hkrm : iboa oiabd at hkrmim halh oitn at hkrm laHrim oihi kSmem oiamro Hlilh mhiot kcat : oibT bm oiamr omh hoa ch hktob abn maso hbonim hith lraS pnh : kl hnpl el habn hhia iSbr oat aSr tpl elio tSHqho : oibqSo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim lSlH bo at idm bet hhia oiirao mpni hem ki ideo aSr elihm dbr at hmSl hch : oiarbo lo oiSlHo marbim ohm ndmo kzdiqim lmen ilkdo aoto bdbr lhsgiro al hSrrh oal id hhgmon : oiSalho lamr rbi ideno ki nkonh tdbr otlmd ola tSa pnim ki bamt morh ath at drk alhim : hmtr lno ltt ms al hqisr am la : oikr at nklihm oiamr lhm : mh tnsoni hraoni dinr Sl mi hzorh ohmktb aSr elio oieno oiamro Sl hqisr : oiamr alihm lkn tno lqisr at aSr lqisr olalhim at aSr lalhim : ola iklo llkdo bdbr lpni hem oitmho el menho oiHriSo : oiqrbo anSim mn hzdoqim hkprim btHit hmtim oiSalho lamr : morh mSh ktb lno ki imot aH bel aSh obnim ain lo olqH aHio at aSto ohqim cre laHio : ohnh hio Sbeh aHim ohraSon lqH aSh oimt la bnim : oiqH ath hSni oimt gm hoa la bnim : oiqH ath hSliSi okkh eSo ap hSbeh ola hniHo bnim oimoto : obaHronh mth gm haSh : ohnh btHit hmtim lmi mhm thih laSh ki hith aSh lSbeh : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm bni heolm hch iSao nSim otnSanh : ohckim lnHl at heolm hba oat tHit hmtim la iSao nSim ola tnSanh : ki la ioklo eod lmot ki Soim hm lmlakim obni alhim hmh bhiotm bni htqomh : ogm mSh rmc bsnh ki iqomo hmtim bqrao at ihoh alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb : ohalhim ainno alhi hmtim ki am alhi hHiim ki klm Hiim lo : oieno mn hsoprim rbi iph dbrt : ola erbo eod at lbm lSal aoto dbr : oiamr alihm aik iamro el hmSiH ki hoa bn dod : ohoa dod amr bspr thlim nam ihoh ladni Sb limini : ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : hnh dod qra lo adon oaik hoa bno : oiamr al tlmidio bacni kl hem : hchro mn hsoprim hHpzim lhthlk eTopi Tlit oahbim at Salot Slomm bSoqim oat moSbi hraS bbti hknsiot oat msbot hraS bseodot : hbleim at bti halmnot omarikim tpltm lmrah einim hmh mSpT el itr iqHo :

21

oibT oira at heSirim mSlikim at ndbotm laron haozr : oira gm almnh enih ntnt bo Sti proTot : oiamr amt amr ani lkm ki halmnh henih hcat ntnh iotr mklm : ki kl alh htndbo lalhim mhedp Slhm ohia mHsronh at kl rkoSh ntnh : oihi bamrm el hmqdS ki mhdr hoa babnim ipot obmtnot oiamr : at aSr atm raim hnh imim baim ola tSar abn el abn aSr la ttprq : oiSalho lamr rbi mti apoa thih cat omh hoa haot let hioth : oiamr rao pn tteo ki rbim ibao bSmi lamr ani hoa ohet qrobh oatm al tlko aHrihm : obSmekm mlHmot omhomot al tHto ki hio thih cat lraSonh ak eod qz lmoed : oisp dbr alihm lamr iqom goi el goi ommlkh el mmlkh : ohih reS gdol kh okh oreb odbr ogm moraim oatot gdlot mn hSmim : olpni kl alh iSlHo bkm at idihm oirdpo oimsro atkm lbti knsiot oal bti klaim otobao lpni mlkim omSlim lmen Smi : ohith cat lkm ledot : el kn Sito lbbkm lblti dag bmh tzTdqo : ki anki ntn lkm ph oHkmh aSr la ioklo lemd lpnih oldbr ngdh kl mtqommikm : ogm tmsro el idi ioldikm oaHikm oqrobikm oreikm oimito mkm : ohiitm Snoaim lkl adm lmen Smi : ak la ipl mSert raSkm arzh : btoHltkm qno lkm at npStikm : okaSr trao mHnot sobbim at iroSlim ide tdeo ki qrb Hrbnh : ac inoso anSi ihodh al hhrim oaSr hm btokh izao oaSr hm bprcot al iboao bh : ki imi nqm hmh lmlat kl hktob : oaoi lhrot olminiqot bimim hhm ki thih zrh gdolh barz oqzp el hem hch : onplo lpi Hrb ohglo al kl hgoim oiroSlim trms brgli goim ed ki imlao etot hgoim : ohio atot bSmS obirH obkokbim oel harz mzoqh lgoim ombokh mhmit him odkio : oimogo bni hadm maimh omHrdt hbaot el kl harz ki kHot hSmim itmoTTo : oac irao at bn hadm ba benn bgborh obkbod rb : okaSr tHl lhiot cat hteoddo oSao raSikm ki qrobh galtkm lboa : oidbr alihm mSl rao at htanh oat kl hezim : ki trao atm moziaim at prHm hla idetm ki qrb hqiz : kkh ap atm bba alh leinikm deo ki qrobh mlkot halhim : amn amr ani lkm la iebr hdor hch ed ki ihih hkl : hSmim oharz iebro odbri la iebron : rq hSmro lkm pn ikbd lbbkm bsba obSkron obdagot hmHih oba elikm hiom hhoa ptam : ki kmo pH iboa el kl hiSbim el pni kl harz : lkn Sqdo bkl et ohtpllo lmen tezro kH lhmlT mkl hetidot halh olhtizb lpni bn hadm : oihi mlmd iomm bmqdS oblilh iza bhr hnqra hr hcitim llon : okl hem hSkimo lboa alio bmqdS lSme aoto :

22

oiqrb Hg hmzot hnqra psH : ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim mbqSim aik ihrgho ki irao mpni hem : ohSTn nkns bihodh hmknh aiS qriot ohoa bmspr Snim heSr : oilk oidbr em raSi hkhnim oSri hHil aik imsrno al idm : oiSmHo oiato ltt lo ksp : oibTH atm oibqS toanh lmsro alihm Sla leini hhmon : oiba iom hmzot aSr cboH icbH bo hpsH : oiSlH at pTros oat ioHnn lamr lko ohkino lno at hpsH onaklh : oiamro alio bai ch mqom tHpz ki nkin aoto : oiamr alihm hnh atm baim heirh opge atkm aiS nSa zpHt mim lko aHrio al hbit aSr iboa Smh : oamrtm al bel hbit kh amr lk hrb aih hmlon aSr aklh Sm at hpsH em tlmidi : ohoa irah atkm elih gdolh mzeh Sm tkino : oilko oimzao kaSr dbr alihm oikino at hpsH : oihi kaSr hgieh hSeh oisb hoa oSnim eSr hSliHim ato : oiamr alihm nksp nkspti lakl atkm at hpsH hch lpni enoti : ki amr ani lkm ainni akl aoto eod ed ki imla bmlkot halhim : oiqH at hkos oibrk oiamr qHo ath oHlqo binikm : ki amr ani lkm Sth la aSth meth mtnobt hgpn ed ki tboa mlkot halhim : oiqH at hlHm oibrk oibze oitn lhm lamr ch gopi hntn bedkm cat eSo lckroni : okn gm at hkos aHr hseodh lamr co hkos hia hbrit hHdSh bdmi hnSpk bedkm : ak hnh id hmsr aoti ati el hSlHn : ki hn bn hadm hlk lo kpi aSr nHrz elio abl aoi laiS hhoa aSr el ido imsr : ohm hHlo lHqr aiS at reho mi hoa ch mhm aSr ieSh cat : ogm mribh hith binihm mi iHSb lhiot hgdol bhm : oiamr alihm mlki hgoim rdim bhm oSliTihm iqrao eSi Hsd : oatm la kn ki hgdol bkm ihih kzeir ohmSl ihih kmSrt : ki mi hoa hgdol am hmsb ao hmSrt hla hmsb oani hnni btokkm kmo hmSrt : oatm hm hemdim emdi ed eth bnsionti : lkn ani mnHil atkm kaSr hnHilni abi at hmlkot : lmen taklo otSto el SlHni bmlkoti oiSbtm el ksaot lSpT at Snim eSr SbTi iSral : oiamr hadon Smeon Smeon hnh tbe atkm hSTn lcrotkm kHTim : oani htpllti bedk aSr la tklh amontk oath kaSr tSob Hcq at aHik : ohoa amr alio adni hnni nkon llkt atk gm lbit hasorim gm lmot : oiamr ani amr lk pTros la iqra trngl hiom ed ki SlS pemim kHSt bi lamr la idetio : oiamr alihm kaSr SlHti atkm bli kis otrmil onelim hHsrtm dbr oiamro la Hsrno kl dbr : oiamr alihm akn eth aSr lo kis iSaho okn gm at htrmil oaSr ain lo hoa imkr at bgdo oiqnh Hrb : ki amr ani lkm aSr zrik eod lhtmla bi hktob hch oat pSeim nmnh ki kl hktob eli ba ed qzo : oiamro adnino hnh ph Sti Hrbot oiamr alihm di : oiza oilk kiom biom el hr hcitim oilko aHrio gm tlmidio : oiba al hmqom oiamr alihm htpllo lblti boa lidi nsion : ohoa nprd mhm hrHq kqle abn oikre el brkio oitpll lamr : abi am rzonk lhebir meli at hkos hcat ak al ihi krzoni ki am krzonk : oira alio mlak mn hSmim oiHcqho : oibao elio Hbli mot oiosp lhtpll bHcqh othi ceto knTpi dm irdim larz : oiqm mhtpll oiba al htlmidim oimzam iSnim migon : oiamr alihm lmh tiSno qomo ohtpllo aSr la tbao lidi nsion, eodno mdbr ohnh hmon oaHd mSnim heSr hnqra ihodh hlk lpnihm oiqrb al ihoSe lnSq lo : : oiamr ihoSe alio ihodh hbnSiqh ath mosr at bn hadm : ohanSim aSr ato raim at aSr ihih oiamro alio adnino hnkh bHrb : oik aHd mhm at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno himnit : oien ihoSe oiamr rb eth hrpo oige bacno oirpaho : oiamr ihoSe al raSi hkhnim oSri hmqdS ohcqnim aSr bao elio lamr kmo el priz izatm eli bHrbot obmqlot : oahi azlkm iom iom bhikl ola SlHtm bi id oaolm cat hia Setkm oSlTn hHSk : oitpSo aoto oiolikho oibiaho bit hkhn hgdol opTros hlk aHrio mrHoq : oihi ki bero aS btok hHzr oiSbo iHdo oiSb gm pTros btokm : otraho hSpHh ioSb ngd haor otbT bo otamr gm ch hih emo : oikHS bo oiamr aSh la idetio : oaHri meT raho adm aHr oiamr gm ath mhm oiamr pTros la adm ki ainni : oaHri ebr kSeh aHt qim aiS aHr lamr amnm gm ch hih emo ki ap hoa glili : oiamr pTros bn adm la ideti mh ath amr ohoa eodno mdbr ohtrngol qra : oipn hadon oibT al pTros oickr pTros at dbr hadon aSr dbr alio ki bTrm iqra htrngl tkHS bi SlS pemim : oiza pTros hHozh oimrr bbki : ohanSim aSr aHco at ihoSe htello bo oikho : oiHpo at raSo oikho el pnio oiSalho lamr hnba mi hoa hhlm aotk : oeod gdopim aHrim hrbo elio : obhit hbqr nqhlo cqni hem ohkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oielho lpni hsnhdrin Slhm oiamro hath hoa hmSiH amr lno : oiamr alihm ki agid lkm la tamino : ogm am aSal la tSibo dbr ola tSlHoni : abl meth ihih bn hadm iSb limin gbort halhim : oiamro klm hki ath hoa bn halhim oiamr alihm atm amrtm ki ani hoa : oiamro mh lno eod lbqS edot hla bacnino Smenoh mpio :

23

oiqm kl qhlm oiolikho al pilTos : oiHlo ldbr elio STnh lamr at ch mzano msit at hem omne ato mtt ms al hqisr bamro ki hoa mlk hmSiH : oiSalho pilTos lamr hath hoa mlk hihodim oien ato oiamr ath amrt : oiamr pilTos al raSi hkhnim oal hmon hem la mzati dbr aSm baiS hch : ohm htamzo ldbr mdiH hoa at hem blmdo bkl ihodh hHl mn hglil oed hnh : oihi kSme pilTos at Sm hglil oiSal am hoa aiS glili : okaSr ide ki mmmSlt hordos hoa SlHo al hordos aSr hih gm hoa biroSlim bimim halh : oiSmH hordos ed mad kraoto at ihoSe ki mimim rbim aoh lrat ato el ki Sme at Smeo oiqo lrat aot aSr ieSh : oirb lSal aoto ohoa la hSib ato dbr : oiemdo hkhnim hgdolim ohsoprim oitHcqo ldbr elio STnh : oibc ato hordos em zbaotio oihtl bo oilbS aoto bgd chorit oiSlHho al pilTos : biom hhoa nhio pilTos ohordos lahbim iHdo ki mlpnim aibh hith bintm : oiqra pilTos at raSi hkhnim oat hSrim oat hem : oiamr alihm hbatm lpni at haiS hch kmsit at hem ohnh ani Hqrtio leinikm ola mzati baiS hch aSmt maomh mn hdbrim aSr atm Toenim elio : ogm hordos la mza ki SlHti atkm alio ohnh ain bo HTa mSpT mot : el kn aisrno oapTrno : oelio hih lpTr lhm aiS aHd bimi hHg : oizeqo kl hmonm oiamro hsr at ch opTr lno at br aba : ohoa hih mSlk bit hasorim el dbr mrd aSr nhih beir oel dbr rzH : oisp pilTos lSat qolo ki Hpz lpTr at ihoSe : ohmh zeqo alio lamr hzlb aoto hzlb : oiamr alihm pem SliSit mh apoa eSh ch reh kl aSmt mot la mzati bo el kn aisrno oapTrno : oipzro bo bqol gdol oibqSo ki izlb oiHcq qolm oqol hkhnim hgdolim : oigcr pilTos ki teSh bqStm : oipTr lhm at hmSlk bit hasorim el dbr mrd orzH at aSr Salo oat ihoSe msr lrzonm : okaSr holikho mSm oiHciqo baiS aHd hba mn hSdh oSmo Smeon aiS qorini oiSimo elio at hzlb lSat aHri ihoSe : oilko aHrio hmon em rb ohmon nSim ohnh spdot omqonnot elio : oipn ihoSe oiamr alihn bnot iroSlim al tbkinh eli ki am el npSkn bkinh oel bnikn : ki hnh imim baim oamro aSri heqrot oaSri hmeim aSr la ildo ohSdim aSr la hiniqo : ac iHlo lamr al hhrim nplo elino oal hgbeot ksono : ki am ieSo kcat bez hlH mh ieSh bibS : ogm Snim aHrim anSi bliel mozaim ato lmot : oihi kaSr bao al hmqom hnqra glglta oizlbo ato Sm oat anSi hbliel ch limino och lSmalo : oiamr ihoSe abi slH lhm ki la ideo mh hm eSim oiHlqo bgdio lhm oipilo gorl : ohem emd Sm orah oilego lo hSrim lamr at aHrim hoSie ioSe na at npSo am hoa hmSiH bHir halhim : oihtlo bo anSi hzba oigSo oibiao lo Hmz : oiamro am ath hoa mlk hihodim hoSe at npSk : ogm mktb hih mmel lo bktb ioni oromi oebri ch hoa mlk hihodim : oaHd manSi hbliel htloim gdpo lamr hla ath hmSiH hoSe at ezmk oatno : oien haHr oiger bo lamr haink ira at halhim bhiotk bezm henS hch : ohn anHno bo kmSpT ki lqHno kpi meSino abl ch la eSh maomh re : oiamr al ihoSe ckrni na adni bbak bmlkotk : oiamr ihoSe alio amn amr ani lk ki hiom thih emdi bgn edn : oihi kSeh hSSit ohnh HSk el kl harz ed hSeh htSieit : oiHSk hSmS otqre prkt hhikl lSnim qreim : oiqra ihoSe bqol gdol oiamr abi bidk apqid roHi obamro cat npH npSo : oira Sr hmah at aSr nhith oitn kbod lalhim lamr akn haiS hch zdiq hih : okl hmon hem aSr htaspo iHd lmrah hch bhbiTm al kl aSr neSh toppo el lbbihm oiSobo : okl mideio emdo mrHoq ogm hnSim aSr hlko ato mn hglil oeinihn raot at alh : ohnh aiS oSmo iosp ohoa mn hiezim aiS Tob ozdiq mn hrmtim eir hihodim : aSr la hskim leztm olpelm omHkh gm hoa lmlkot halhim : oigS al pilTos oiSal mmno at goit ihoSe : oiord ath oikrkh bsdinim oiSimh bqbr Hzob bsle aSr edn la hoSm bo adm : oiom erb Sbt hih ohSbt hgieh : otlknh aHrio mn hnSim aSr bao ato mn hglil otHcinh at hqbr oat aSr hoSm bo goito : oaHri Sobn hkino smim omrqHot obSbt Sbto kpi hmzoh :

24

obaHd bSbt lpni elot hSHr bao al hqbr otbiainh at hsmim aSr hkino oemhn eod aHrot : oimzao at habn glolh mn hqbr : otbanh pnimh ola mzao at goit hadon ihoSe : oihi hnh nbkot el hdbr hch ohnh Sni anSim emdo elihn olboSihm mchirim : oipl pHd elihn otqdnh apim arzh oiamro alihn mh tbqSnh at hHi azl hmtim : ainno ph ki qm ckrnh at aSr dbr alikn beod hioto bglil lamr : ki zrik bn hadm lhmsr lidi anSim HTaim olhzlb obiom hSliSi qom iqom : otckrnh at dbrio : otSbnh mn hqbr otgdnh at kl hdbrim halh leSti heSr olkl haHrim : omrim hmgdlit oioHnh omrim am ieqb ohaHrot aSr emhn hnh hio hmdbrot al hSliHim at hdbrim halh : oihio dbrihn kdbri riq beinihm ola hamino lhn : opTros qm oirz al hqbr oiSqp ola rah ki am htkrikim mnHim Sm oiSb lmqomo mStomm el hnhih : ohnh Snim mhm hio hlkim bezm hiom hch al kpr hrHq miroSlim kSSim ris oSmo emaos : ohm ndbro aiS al reho el kl hqrot halh : oihi bdbrm obhtokHm iHd oigS ihoSe ap hoa oilk atm : oeinihm naHco ola ikirho : oiamr alihm mh hmh hdbrim halh aSr atm nSaim ontnim bhm iHdo bdrk opnikm cepim : oien haHd aSr Smo qliops oiamr alio hath lbdk gr biroSlim oaink ide at hqrt bh bimim halh : oiamr alihm omh hmh oigido alio meSh ihoSe hnzri aSr hih aiS nbia gbor bpel obamr lpni halhim olpni kl hem : oat aSr khnino hgdolim ocqnino hsgirho lmSpT mot oizlbho : oanHno Hkino ki hoa hetid lgal at iSral oeth bkl cat hiom iom SliSi mac neSo alh : ohnh gm nSim mqrbno hHridno aSr qdmo bbqr lba lqbr : ola mzao at goito otbanh otamrnh ki rao gm mrah mlakim hamrim ki hoa Hi : oilko anSim mSlno al hqbr oimzao kaSr amro hnSim oaoto la rao : oiamr alihm hoi Hsri det okbdi lb mhamin bkl aSr dbro hnbiaim : hla el hmSiH hih lsbl at kl cat olboa al kbodo : oiHl mmSh omkl hnbiaim oibar lhm at kl hktobim hnamrim elio : oiqrbo al hkpr aSr hm hlkim Smh oiSm pnio khlk lo ldrko : oipzro bo lamr Sbh atno ki et erb hgie onTh hiom oiba hbith lSbt atm : oihi kaSr hsb emhm oiqH at hlHm oibrk oibze oitn lhm : otpqHnh einihm oikirho ohoa Hmq ebr meinihm : oiamro aiS al reho hla hih ber lbbno bqrbno bdbro alino bdrk oiptH lno at hktobim : oiqomo bSeh hhia oiSobo iroSlim oimzao at eSti heSr oat aSr atm nqhlim iHd : hamrim akn qm hadon mn hmtim onrah al Smeon : oispro gm hm at aSr neSh lhm bdrk oaik hkirho bbziet hlHm : eodm mdbrim kdbrim halh ohoa ihoSe emd btokm oiamr alihm Slom lkm : ohmh Hto onbeto oiHSbo ki roH rao : oiamr alihm mh ch atm nbhlim oel mh ch mHSbot elot blbbkm : rao at idi oat rgli ki anki hoa mSoni orao ki roH ain lo bSr oezmot kaSr atm raim SiS li : oaHri amro at cat hrah atm at idio oat rglio : ohm eod la hamino mSmHh otmho oiamr alihm hiS lkm ph dbr akl : oitno lpnio Hlq dg zloi omeT zop dbS : oiqH oiakl leinihm : oiamr alihm alh hm hdbrim aSr dbrti alikm beod hioti emkm ki hmla imla kl hktob eli btort mSh obnbiaim obthlim : ac ptH at lbbm lhbin at hktobim : oiamr alihm kn ktob okn ngcr aSr ienh hmSiH oiqom mn hmtim biom hSliSi : oaSr tqra bSmo tSobh osliHt hHTaim bkl hgoim hHl miroSlim : oatm edim bcat : ohnni SolH elikm at hbTHt abi oatm Sbo beir iroSlim ed ki tlbSo ec mmrom : oiolikm mHoz leir ed bit hini oiSa at idio oibrkm : oihi bbrko atm oiprd matm oinSa hSmimh : ohm hStHoo lo oiSobo liroSlim bSmHh gdolh : oihio tmid bmqdS mhllim ombrkim at halhim amn :

meSi hSliHim

1

hn hmamr hraSon taopilos eSitiho el kl aSr hHl ihoSe leSot ollmd : ed hiom aSr lqH lmrom aHri zoto broH hqdS at hSliHim aSr bHr bhm : oaSr gm htizb lhm Hi aHri enoto batot rbot bhraoto alihm arbeim iom oidbr el mlkot halhim : obaklo lHm emhm zoh atm lblti sor miroSlim ki am lhoHil lhbTHt hab aSr Smetm mmni : ki ioHnn hTbil bmim oatm tTblo broH hqdS bqrob aHri himim halh : oihi kaSr naspo iHdo oiSalho lamr adnino hmSib ath bet hcat at hmlokh liSral : oiamr alihm la lkm ldet hetim ohcmnim aSr ied hab bSlTno : abl tqblo gborh bboa elikm roH hqdS ohiitm edi biroSlim obkl ihodh obSmron oed qzh harz : oihi kdbro cat helh ohm raim oiSaho enn mngd einihm : oibiTo aHrio hSmimh bebro ohnh Sni anSim lboSi bdim nzbim elihm : oiamro atm anSi hglil mh temdo ph oeinikm hSmimh ihoSe ch aSr lqH matkm hSmimh kn boa iboa kaSr raitm ato elh hSmimh : oipno oilko iroSlimh mn hhr hnqra hr hcitim ohoa qrob liroSlim drk tHom Sbt : oibao heirh oielo al helih aSr hio iSbim bh pTros oieqb oioHnn oandri pilpos otoma br tlmi omti ieqb bn Hlpi oSmeon hqna oihodh bn ieqb : kl alh hio Sqdim iHdo blb aHd lhtpll olhtHnn oemhm hnSim omrim am ihoSe ogm aHio : obimim halh qm pTros btok htlmidim omspr Smot hnqhlim iHd kmah oeSrim oiamr : anSim aHim mn hzrk hih ki imla hktob hhoa aSr dbr mqdm roH hqdS bpi dod el ihodh aSr hih molik at tpSi ihoSe : ki hih nmnh atno ockh bgorl hSrot hch : ohnh hoa qnh lo Sdh bmHir hrSeh oipl el pnio arzh oibqe btok oiSpko kl meio : ogm nodeh cat lkl iSbi iroSlim oiqra bSptm lSdh hhoa Hql dma hoa Sdh hdm : ki ktob bspr thlim thi Tirto nSmh oal ihi bh iSb opqdto iqH aHr : oel kn mn hzrk ki mn hanSim halh aSr hthlko atno kl imi hiot adnino ihoSe ioza oba lpnino : hHl mTbilt ioHnn ed iom hlqHo matno ki aHd mhm ihih led emno el qomo mn hmtim : oiemido Snim at iosp hnqra br Sba ohoa mknh iosTos oat mtih : oitpllo oiamro ath adni hiode kl hlbbot hrah na mn hSnim halh at haHd aSr bHrt bo : lqHt at gorl hSrot hch ohSliHot aSr sr mmnh ihodh lhlk al mqomo : oipilo gorlot oipl hgorl el mtih oispH al eSti eSr hSliHim :

2

obiom mlat Sbet hSbeot oitaspo klm lb aHd : oihi ptam qol reS mn hSmim kqol roH serh oimla at kl hbit aSr iSbo bo : otrainh alihm lSnot nHlqot omraihn kaS otnoHinh aHt aHt el kl aHd mhm : oimlao klm roH hqdS oiHlo ldbr blSnot aHrot kaSr ntnm hroH lhTip : obiroSlim Skno ihodim anSi Hsd mkl goi ogoi aSr tHt hSmim : oihi bhiot qol hreS hhoa oiqbzo em rb oihio nbkim ki aiS aiS Sme atm mdbrim bSpt emo : oiStommo oitmho oiamro aiS al reho hnh kl alh hmdbrim hla glilim hmh : oaik anHno Smeim atm aiS kSpt arz moldtno : prtiim omdim oeilmim oiSbi arm nhrim ihodh oqpodqih pnTos oasia : progia opmpolia mzrim oHbl lob aSr el id qorini ohbaim mromi gm ihodim gm grim : krtim oerbim hnh anHno Smeim atm msprim blSnotino gdlot halhim : oiStommo klm oibhlo oiamro aiS al aHio mh thih cat : oaHrim lego oiamro ki mlai esis hmh : ac iemd pTros oeSti heSr emo oiSa at qolo oidbr alihm anSi ihodh oiSbi iroSlim klkm cat tode lkm ohacino al dbri : ki alh la Skorim hmh kaSr HSbtm ki Seh SliSit biom eth : abl ch hoa hamor el idi ioal hnbia : ohih baHrit himim nam alhim aSpk at roHi el kl bSr onbao bnikm obntikm obHorikm Hcinot irao ocqnikm Hlmot iHlmon : ogm el ebdi oel SpHoti bimim hhmh aSpk at roHi onbao : ontti moptim bSmim mmel oatot barz mtHt dm oaS otimrot eSn : hSmS ihpk lHSk ohirH ldm lpni boa iom ihoh hgdol ohnora : ohih kl aSr iqra bSm ihoh imlT : anSi iSral Smeo hdbrim halh ihoSe hnzri haiS aSr namn lkm mat halhim bgborot obmoptim obatot aSr halhim eSh el ido btokkm kaSr idetm gm atm : ato hnmsr el pi ezt halhim hnHrzh oidieto mqom lqHtm obidi rSeim hoqetm ohrgtm ato : ohalhim hqimo mn hmtim bhtir at Hbli hmot baSr nmne mn hmot lezr ato : ki dod amr elio Soiti ihoh lngdi tmid ki mimini bl amoT : lkn SmH lbi oigl kbodi ap bSri iSkn lbTH : ki la tecb npSi lSaol la ttn Hsidk lraot SHt : todieni arHot Hiim Sbe SmHot at pnik : anSim aHim hniHo li oadbrh bacni klkm el dod abino aSr gm mt gm nqbr oqborto atno hia ed hiom hch : ohoa bhioto nbia omdeto at hSboeh aSr nSbe lo halhim lhqim at hmSiH kpi hbSr mpri Hlzio lhoSibo el ksao : lkn bHcoto mraS dbr el tqomt hmSiH ki la necbh npSo lSaol ogm bSro la rah SHt : at ihoSe ch hqim alhim mn hmtim oanHno klno edio : oeth aHri hnSao bimin halhim lqH mat hab at hbTHt roH hqdS oiSpk at aSr atm raim oSmeim : ki dod la elh hSmimh ohnh hoa amr nam ihoh ladni Sb limini : ed aSit aibik hdm lrglik : lkn ide na bit iSral klo ki ladon olmSiH Smo halhim at ihoSe ch aSr zlbtm : oihi kSmem htezbo al lbm oiamro al pTros oal Sar hSliHim anSim aHim mh elino leSot : oiamr pTros alihm Sobo mdrkikm ohTblo kl aiS mkm el Sm ihoSe hmSiH lsliHt HTaikm oqbltm at mtnt roH hqdS : ki lkm hhbTHh olbnikm olkl hrHoqim lkl aSr qra ihoh alhino : oied eod bhm bamrim aHrim hrbh oichr atm lamr hmlTo na mdor thpkot hch : oiqblo at dbro bSmHh oiTblo obiom hhoa nospo kSlSt alpi npS : oihio Sqdim el tort hSliHim oel hhtHbrot oel bziet hlHm oel htplh : otpl aimh el kl npS omoptim rbim oatot neSo el idi hSliHim biroSlim : okl hmaminim htaHdo iHd oihi lhm hkl bStpot : oat aHctm oat rkoSm mkro oiHlqo atm lklm laiS aiS di mHsoro : oiom iom hio Sqdim bmqdS lb aHd oibzeo at hlHm bbit bbit : oiaklo mconm bgilh obtm lbb oiSbHo at halhim oimzao Hn beini kl hem ohadon hosip iom iom el hedh at hnoSeim :

3

opTros oioHnn elim iHdo al hmqdS let htplh bSeh htSieit : oaiS aHd psH mbTn amo moba Smh aSr ioSibho iom iom Ser hmqdS hnqra Ser hmhdr lSal mtnot mat bai hmqdS : oihi kraoto at pTros oat ioHnn baim al hmqdS oibqS lqHt matm zdqh : oistkl bo pTros ogm ioHnn oiamr alio hbiTh alino : oiSm pnio alihm bqoto lqHt matm dbr : oiamr pTros ksp ochb ain li abl at aSr bidi atnno lk bSm ihoSe hmSiH hnzri qom hthlk : oiaHc bid imino oiqm aoto oitHcqo ptam rglio oqrslio : oiqpz oithlk oiba atm al hmqdS mthlk omrqd omSbH at halhim : oiraho kl hem mthlk omSbH at halhim : oikiro aoto ki hoa aSr hih iSb lSal zdqh bSer hmqdS hmhdr oimlao Smh oSmmon el hneSh lo : oihi hoa mHciq bpTros obioHnn oirz alihm kl hem al haolm hnqra aolm Sl Slmh oiStommo : oira pTros oien oiamr al hem anSi iSral mh atm tmhim el cat omh tstklo bno kalo anHno bkHno obHsidotno Smno at ch mthlk : alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb alhi abotino hoa par at ebdo ihoSe aSr atm msrtm aoto okHStm bo bpni pilTos kShih dn lpTro : abl atm kHStm bqdoS obzdiq obqStm ki iHn lkm aiS rzH : oat Sr hHiim hrgtm aSr halhim hqimo mn hmtim oanHno edio : olmen amont Smo Hcq Smo at haiS hch aSr atm raim omkirim ato ohamonh aSr lno el ido hia helth lo at harkh hcat leini klkm : oeth aHi ide ani ki bbli det eSitm gm atm gm raSikm : ohalhim kkh mla at aSr hgid mqdm bpi kl nbiaio ki ienh hmSiH : lkn hnHmo oSobo oimHo HTaikm : lmen aSr ibao imi roHh mlpni ihoh oiSlH at aSr bSro lkm mqdm at ihoSe hmSiH : aSr zrik ki iqblho hSmim ed imi Sob kl hdbrim ltqonm aSr dbr elihm halhim bpi nbiaio hqdoSim mimi eolm : hn mSh amr al abotino nbia iqim lkm ihoh alhikm mqrb aHikm kmni alio tSmeon kkl aSr idbr alikm : ohih kl hnpS aSr la tSme al hnbia hhoa onkrth memih : ogm kl hnbiaim mSmoal oaSr nbao aHrio klm hgido mraS at himim halh : atm bni hnbiaim obni hbrit aSr krt halhim em abotino bamro al abrhm onbrko bcrek kl mSpHot hadmh : lkm braSonh hemid halhim at ebdo ihoSe oiSlHho lbrk atkm bSobkm kl aiS mre mellikm :

4

oihi bdbrm al hem oiqomo elihm hkhnim ongid bit hmqdS ohzdoqim : ki Hrh lhm el aSr lmdo at hem ohgido bihoSe at tHit hmtim : oiSlHo bhm at idihm oiSimom bmSmr ed lmHr ki kbr ba herb : orbim mhSmeim at hdbr hamino oihi mspr hanSim kHmSt alpim : oihi mmHrt oiqhlo Srihm raSihm ocqnihm osoprihm iroSlim : oHnn hkhn hgdol oqipa oioHnn oalksndros okl aSr mmSpHt hkhn hgdol : oiemido atm btok oiSalom bai ch kH obai ch Sm eSitm cat : oimla pTros roH hqdS oiamr alihm atm raSi hem ocqni iSral : am anHno nHqrim hiom el hTobh aSr eSino laiS Holh oSaltm bmh ch noSe : iode lklkm olkl em iSral ki bSm ihoSe hmSiH hnzri aSr zlbtm aoto oaSr halhim hqimo mn hmtim ki bSmo emd ch lpnikm bria : ohoa habn aSr mastm atm hbonim othi lraS pnh : oain hihoSeh baHr oain tHt hSmim Sm aHr hntn lbni adm aSr bo noSe : oihi kaSr rao at bTHon lb Sl pTros oioHnn ohbino ki hdioTim ola beli Hkmh hmh oitmho elihm oikirom ki hthlko em ihoSe : obraotm at haiS hnrpa emd azlm la mzao ldbr ngdm dbr : oizoo atm lzat Hozh mn hsnhdrin oitiezo iHdo : oiamro mh neSh lanSim halh hnh aot gloi neSh el idihm ogm mprsm lkl iSbi iroSlim ola nokl lkHS bo : ak lmen la irbh hdbr bem oiprz nchirh atm bgerh lblti dbr eod lkl adm bSm hch : oiqrao atm oizoom aSr la idbro dbr ola ilmdo bSm ihoSe : oieno pTros oioHnn oiamro alihm hnkon hoa lpni halhim Sme lkm itr mSme lalhim SpTo atm : ki la nokl anHno lHdl mdbr at aSr raino oSmeno : oiosipo lger bm oipTro atm baSr la mzao dbr lenoS atm mpni hem ki klm mhllim at halhim el hneSh : ki bn arbeim Snh omelh hih haiS hhoa aSr neSh emo aot hrpoah hcat : oaHri hpTrm bao al aHihm oispro lhm at aSr amro alihm hkhnim hgdolim ohcqnim : oihi kaSr Smeo at cat oiSao at qolm blb aHd lalhim oiamro adni ath hal heSh at hSmim oat harz oat him oat kl aSr bm : aSr amrt bpi ebdk dod lmh rgSo goim olamim ihgo riq : itizbo mlki arz orocnim nosdo iHd el ihoh oel mSiHo : ki amnm nosdo hordos opnTios pilTos em hgoim olami iSral el ihoSe ebdk hqdoS aSr mSHt : leSot at aSr idk oeztk mqdm gcrh lhiot : oeth adni rah at gertm otn lebdik ldbr at dbrk bkl bTHon lbm : bnTtk at idk lmrpa oltt atot omoptim bSm ihoSe ebdk hqdoS : oihi kaSr htpllo oine hmqom aSr hio nqhlim Sm oimlao klm roH hqdS oidbro at dbr halhim bbTHon lbb : oqhl hmaminim hih lhm lb aHd onpS aHt oain aiS mhm aomr el aSr bido li hoa ki hkl hih lhm bStpot : obgborh gdolh ieido hSliHim el tqomt hadon ihoSe oHsd gdol nmSk lklm : ki la hih bhm Hsr dbr ki kl beli Sdot obtim mkro atm oibiao at ksp mHirm : oiSimho lrgli hSliHim oitn lkl aiS oaiS di mHsro : oiosp aSr knoho hSliHim bSm br nba proSo bn hnHmh aiS loi aSr nold barz ktim : gm lo hih Sdh oimkrho oiba at hksp oiSimho lrgli hSliHim :

5

oaiS aHd oSmo Hnnih em aSto Spirh mkr at aHcto : oiqH mn hmHir oistirho oaSto idet gm hia oHlq aHd hbia oiSm lrgli hSliHim : oiamr pTros Hnnih lmh ch mla hSTn at lbbk lSqr broH hqdS olhstir mmHir hSdh : hla Slk hih Trm hmkro ogm aHri nmkr hih bidk olmh Smt el lbbk hdbr hch la Sqrt bbni adm ki am balhim : okSme Hnnih at hdbrim halh npl arzh oigoe othi irah gdolh el kl hSmeim : oiqomo hzeirim oiaspo ato oiSaho hHozh oiqbrho : oihi kmSlS Seot otba aSto ohia la ideh at hneSh : oien pTros oiamr alih amri li hbmHir hch mkrtm at hSdh otamr kn bmHir hch : oiamr pTros alih lmh ch noedtm lnsot at roH ihoh hnh bptH rgli hmqbrim at aiSk onSao atk hHozh : otpl ptam lrglio otgoe ohbHorim bao ohnh mth oiSaoh hHozh oiqbroh azl aiSh : othi irah gdolh el kl hqhl oel kl hSmeim at alh : oieSo atot omoptim rbim bqrb hem el idi hSliHim oklm naspo lb aHd baolm Sl Slmh : omn haHrim ain aiS aSr mlao lbo lHlot elihm ak hoqir atm hem : abl nspHo eod itr maminim al hadon anSim onSim hrbh mad : ed ki nSao at hHolim al hrHbot oiSimom el mTot omSkbot lmen aSr ilk pTros onpl ak zlo el aHd mhm : ogm hmon em herim aSr msbib nqbzo iroSlim mbiaim at hHolim oat hnlHzim mroHot Tmaot oirpao klm : oiqm hkhn hgdol okl aSr ato ohm anSi kt hzdoqim oimlao qnah : oiSlHo id bSliHim oitnom bmSmr heir : oihi blilh oiptH mlak ihoh at dlti bit hkla oioziam lamr : lko ohtizbo bmqdS odbro al hem at kl dbri hHiim halh : ohm kSmem at cat bao al hmqdS bhit hbqr oilmdo Sm oiba hkhn hgdol oaSr ato oiqrao al hsnhdrin oal kl cqni bni iSral oiSlHo al bit hasorim lhbia atm : oilko hmSrtim ola mzaom bbit hkla oiSobo oigido lamr : at bit hasorim mzano sgor omsgr ohSmrim emdim el hdltot okaSr ptHno la nmza bo adm : oihi kSme hkhn ongid hmqdS oraSi hkhnim at hdbrim halh oibhlo elihm oiamro aik ipl hdbr hch : oaiS aHd ba oigd lhm lamr hnh hanSim aSr Smtm bmSmr emdim hm bmqdS omlmdim at hem : oilk Smh hngid em mSrtio oiqHm ak la bHcqh ki irao mpni hem pn isqlo : oibiao atm oiemidom lpni hsnhdrin oiSalm hkhn hgdol lamr : hla zoh zoino elikm lblti lmd bSm hch ohnh mlatm at iroSlim tortkm otHpzo lhbia elino at dmi haiS hch : oien pTros ohSliHim oiamro hla elino lhqSib bqol alhim mhqSib bqol bni adm : alhi abotino hqim at ihoSe aSr SlHtm idkm bo ottlo aoto el hez : at ch nSa halhim bimino lSr olmoSie ltt tSobh liSral osliHt hHTaim : oanHno edio el alh ogm roH hqdS aSr ntn aoto halhim lSmeim bqolo : oihi kSmem oitrgco oitiezo lhrog atm : oiqm btok hsnhdrin aHd mn hproSim gmlial Smo ohoa morh htorh mkbd beini kl hem oizo lhozia at hSliHim hHozh lcmn meT : oiamr alihm anSi iSral hSmro lkm mpni hanSim halh bmh Satm eSim lhm : ki lpni himim halh qm tods oitn at npSo kaHd hgdolim oidbqo bo karbe maot aiS oihrg okl aSr Smeo alio htprdo oihio lain : oaHr kn qm ihodh hglili bimi hspr oist aHrio em rb ogm hoa nhrg okl aSr Smeo alio npzo : oeth ani amr alikm Hdlo lkm mn hanSim halh ohniHo lhm ki hezh ohpelh hcat am mat adm hia tpr : oam mat halhim hia la toklo lhpr ath pn tmzao nlHmim at halhim : oiSmeo alio oiqrao at hSliHim oilqo atm oizoo aSr la idbro bSm ihoSe oipTro aotm : oizao SmHim mlpni hsnhdrin el ki cko lSat el Smo klmh : okl hiom la Hdlo llmd bmqdS obbtim olbSr at bSort ihoSe hmSiH :

6

bimim hhm kaSr rbo htlmidim hith tlont hionim el hebriim el aSr helimo einihm malmnotihm lblti tt lhn iom iom at aroHtn : oiqrao Snim heSr at hmon htlmidim oiamro la naoh lno ki necb at dbr halhim onSmS at hSlHnot : lkn aHi bro lkm Sbeh anSim mqrbkm aSr Sm Tob lhm omlaim roH hqdS oHkmh onpqidm el henin hch : oanHno nSqd el htplh oel SmoS hdbr : oiiTb hdbr lpni kl hhmon oibHro at asTpnos aiS mla amonh oroH hqdS oat pilpos oat prokoros oat niqnor oat Timon oat prmns oat niqls gr anTiokia : at alh hemido lpni hSliHim oitpllo oismko at idihm elihm : oihi dbr halhim holk ogdl oirb mspr htlmidim biroSlim ed mad ogm hmon rb mn hkhnim nkneo al hamonh : oasTpnos mla amonh ogborh oieS atot omoptim gdolim bqrb hem : oiqomo anSim mbit hknst hnqra el Sm hlibrTinim oSl qorinim oalksndriim omn bni qiliqia oasia oitokHo em asTpnos : ola iklo emd lngd hHkmh ohroH aSr dbr bo : oisito bo anSim amrim Smeno ato mdbr gdopim bmSh obalhim : oieorro at hem oat hcqnim ohsoprim oiqomo elio oiHTpho oibiaho lpni hsnhdrin : oiemido edi Sqr aSr amro haiS hch ainno Hdl mhTiH dbrim ngd mqom hqdS hch ongd htorh : ki Smenho amr ch ihoSe hnzri itz at hmqom hch oiSnh at hHqim aSr msr lno mSh : oistklo bo kl hiSbim bsnhdrin oirao at pnio kpni mlak alhim :

7

oiamr hkhn hgdol hamt hoa aSr dbro : oien oiamr anSim aHim oabot Smeo alhi hkbod nrah al abrhm abino bhioto barm nhrim lpni Sbto bHrn : oiamr alio lk lk marzk ommoldtk oba al harz aSr arak : oiza marz kSdim oiSb bHrn oaHri mot abio hebir ato mSm al harz hcat aSr atm iSbim bh eth : ola ntn lo nHlh bh ap la mdrk kp rgl oibTH ltth laHch lo olcreo aHrio oeod la hih lo bn : oiamr lo alhim ki gr ihih creo barz la lhm oebdom oeno atm arbe maot Snh : ogm at hgoi aSr iebdo dn anki amr alhim oaHri kn izao oiebdoni bmqom hch : oitn lo at brit hmilh obkn holid at izHq oiml ato biom hSmini oizHq holid at ieqb oieqb holid at Snim eSr habot : oiqnao habot biosp oimkro aoto mzrimh oalhim hih emo : oizilho mkl zrotio oitn lo Hn oHkmh lpni preh mlk mzrim oiSimho SliT el mzrim oel kl bito : oihi reb el kl arz mzrim oknen ozrh gdolh oabotino la mzao akl : oiSme ieqb ki iS Sbr bmzrim oiSlH Smh at abotino bpem hraSonh : obpem hSnit htode iosp al aHio omoldt iosp nglth lpreh : oiSlH iosp oiqra lieqb abio olkl mSpHto bSbeim oHmS npS : oird ieqb mzrimh oimt hoa oabotino : oiobao Skmh oioSmo bqbr aSr qnh abrhm bkspo mid bni Hmor abi Skm : oihi kaSr qrbh et hhbTHh aSr nSbe alhim labrhm oigdl hem oirb bmzrim : ed ki qm mlk aHr aSr la ide at iosp : och htHkm lmSpHtno oire labotino oizo atm lhSlik at ellihm al pni hSdh lblti hHiotm : bet hhia nold mSh oihi Tob lalhim oihi amon bbit abio SlSh irHim : okaSr hSlk asph ato bt preh otgdlho lh lbn : oilmd mSh bkl Hkmt mzrim oihi gbor bdbrim obmeSim : obmlat lo arbeim Snh elh el lbo lpqd at aHio bni iSral : oira aiS aHd meSq Hnm oioSe lo oiqm nqmt hmkh bhkoto at hmzri : oiHSb blbbo ki ibino aHio aSr el ido itn halhim lhm tSoeh ohm la hbino : oihi biom hSni oiba btokm ohm nzim oibqS leSot Slom binihm lamr anSim aHim atm olmh teSqo aiS at aHio : oheSq at reho hdpo lamr mi Smk laiS Sr oSpT elino : hlhrgni ath amr kaSr hrgt atml at hmzri : oibrH mSh el hdbr hch oihi gr barz mdin oiold Sm Sni bnim : obmlat arbeim Snh nrah alio mlak ihoh bmdbr hr sini blbt aS mtok hsnh : oira mSh oitmh el hmrah obsoro lraot oihi qol ihoh alio : anki alhi abotik alhi abrhm alhi izHq oalhi ieqb oiHrd mSh oiira mhbiT : oiamr alio ihoh Sl nelik mel rglik ki hmqom aSr ath eomd elio admt qdS hoa : rah raiti at eni emi aSr bmzrim oat naqtm Smeti oard lhzilm oeth lkh oaSlHk mzrimh : hoa mSh aSr kHSo bo lamr mi Smk lSr oSpT ato SlH halhim lSr ogal bid hmlak hnrah alio bsnh : ohoa hoziam oieS atot omptim barz mzrim obim sop obmdbr arbeim Snh : hoa mSh aSr amr al bni iSral nbia mqrb aHikm kmni iqim lkm ihoh alhikm alio tSmeon : hoa aSr hih bqhl bmdbr em hmlak hdbr alio bhr sini oem abotino oaSr qbl dbrim Hiim ltt lno : hoa aSr abotino la abo lSme lo ki am maso ato olbbm pnh mzrimh : oiamro al ahrn eSh lno alhim aSr ilko lpnino ki ch mSh aSr helno marz mzrim la ideno mh hih lo : oieSo egl bimim hhm oicbHo cbHim lalil oiSmHo bmeSh idihm : oipn mhm halhim oitnm lebd at zba hSmim kaSr ktob bspr hnbiaim hcbHim omnHh hgStm li bmdbr arbeim Snh bit iSral : onSatm at skt mlkm oat kokb alhikm rmpn hzlmim aSr eSitm lhStHot lhm ohgliti atkm mhlah lbbl : mSkn hedot hih labotino bmdbr kaSr zoh hmdbr al mSh leSot ato ktbnit aSr rah : oabotino lqHho ogm hbiaho atm hm oihoSe brStm at arzot hgoim aSr grS atm alhim mpni abotino ed imi dod : ohoa mza Hn beini alhim oiSal lmza mSknot lalhi ieqb : oSlmh bnh lo bit : abl helion la iSkn bhiklot meSi idim kaSr amr hnbia : hSmim ksai oharz hdm rgli ai ch bit aSr tbno li amr ihoh oai ch mqom mnoHti : hla at kl alh idi eSth : qSi erp oerli lb oacnim mmrim hiitm tmid broH hqdS kabotikm gm atm : mi mhnbiaim aSr la rdpoho abotikm ap hmito at hmbSrim mqdm biat hzdiq aSr eth hiitm atm mosrio omrzHio : atm aSr qbltm at htorh el idi mlakot hmlakim ola Smrtm aoth : oihi kSmem at alh htrgco blbbm oiHrqo elio Snihm : ohoa mla roH hqdS oibT hSmimh oira at kbod alhim oat ihoSe nzb limin halhim : oiamr hnni rah at hSmim nptHim oat bn hadm nzb limin halhim : oizeqo bqol gdol oiaTmo at acnihm oitnplo elio klm iHd : oidHpho Hozh leir oisqlo ato babnim ohedim pSTo at bgdihm lrgli bHor aHd oSmo Saol : oisqlo at asTpnos ohoa mSoe oamr adni ihoSe qbl at roHi : oikre el brkio oizeq bqol gdol ihoh al tSmr lhm at hHTa hch oihi aHri dbro kdbr hch oiiSn :

8

oSaol gm hoa hih rzh bhrgto othi biom hhoa rdiph gdolh el hqhlh aSr biroSlim oipzo klm beri ihodh oSmron lbd mn hSliHim : oiSao anSim Hsidim at asTpnos oiqbrho oispdo elio mspd gdol : oSaol hHrib at hqhlh oiSoTT bbtim oisHb mSm anSim onSim oisgirm lkla : ohnpozim ebro barz oibSro at hdbr : opilpos ird al eir Smron oikrc lhm at hmSiH : oiqSb hmon hem blb aHd al amri pilpos bSmem obraotm at hatot aSr eSh : ki rbim hio aHoci roHot hTmah ohroHot izao mhm zeqot bqol gdol orbim nki abrim opsHim oirpao : othi SmHh gdolh beir hhia : oaiS aHd oSmo Smeon hih mlpnim beir mkSp omSmim at em Smron bamro el npSo ki gdol hoa : oiqSibo alio mqTnm oed gdolm lamr ch hoa gbort halhim hgdolh : oiqSibo alio el hioto mSmim aotm bkSpio imim rbim : oihi kaSr hamino lpilpos bbSro at mlkot halhim oat Sm ihoSe hmSiH oiTblo anSim onSim : oiamn Smeon gm hoa oiTbl oidbq bpilpos oira at hatot ohmptim hgdlim aSr neSo oiStomm : oiSmeo hSliHim aSr biroSlim ki qblh Smron at dbr halhim oiSlHo alihm at pTros oat ioHnn : oirdo Smh oitpllo bedm aSr iqblo at roH hqdS : ki hroH la zlHh ed eth el aHd mhm ohm rq nTblim bSm hadon ihoSe : oismko at idihm elihm oiqblo at roH hqdS : oihi braot Smeon ki bsmikot idi hSliHim ntn roH hqdS oiba lpnihm ksp : oiamr tno na gm li at hiklt hcat aSr iqbl at roH hqdS kl aSr aSim elio at idi : oiamr alio pTros kspk ihi atk labdon ien HSbt lqnot bmHir at mtt halhim : ain lk Hlq ogorl bdbr hch ki lbbk ainno iSr lpni halhim : oeth Sob mretk cat ohtHnn al halhim aoli tslH lk mcmt lbbk : ki rah anki ki bat lidi mrort roS oHrzbot rSe : oien Smeon oiamr hetiro atm bedi al ihoh lblti boa eli dbr mkl aSr amritm : ohmh aHri aSr heidh odbro at dbr ihoh Sbo iroSlim oibSro at hbSorh bkprim rbim aSr lSmronim : oidbr mlak ihoh al pilpos lamr qom lk hngbh el hdrk hirdt miroSlim ecth ohia Hrbh : oiqm oilk ohnh aiS koSi ohoa sris oSliT lqndq mlkt koS ommnh el kl gncih aSr elh al iroSlim lhStHot : oihi bSobo ohoa iSb el mrkbto oqra bspr iSeih hnbia : oiamr hroH al pilpos gSh ohloh el hmrkbh hcat : oirz pilpos alih oiSme ato qra bspr iSeih hnbia oiamr hgm tbin at aSr ath qora : oiamr oaikkh aokl am ain aiS aSr iorni oibqS mat pilpos lelot olSbt azlo : oenin hktob aSr qra ch hoa kSh lTbH iobl okrHl lpni goccih nalmh ola iptH pio : bezr mSpTo lqH oat doro mi iSoHH ki ngcro marz Hiio : oien hsris oiamr al pilpos aSalh mmk el mi hnbia mdbr at cat el npSo ao el aiS aHr : oiptH pilpos at pio oiHl mn hktob hch oibSr aoto at ihoSe : oihi bebrm bdrk oibao al mqom mim oiamr hsris hnh mim mh imneni mhTbl : oiamr pilpos am mamin ath bkl lbbk mtr lk oien oiamr ani mamin ki ihoSe hmSiH bn halhim hoa : oizo lhemid at hmrkbh oirdo Snihm al tok hmim pilpos ohsris oiTbl aoto : oihi ki elo mn hmim oiSa roH ihoh at pilpos ola isp hsris lraoto ki hlk ldrko SmH : opilpos nmza baSdod oiebr oibSr bkl herim ed bao lqsrin :

9

oSaol eodno ipH cem orzH el tlmidi hadon oiba al hkhn hgdol : oiSal mato mktbim ldmSq al bti hknsiot lmen aSr iasr at aSr imza bdrk hhia anSim ao nSim oibiam iroSlim : oihi hoa hlk oqrb ldmSq ohnh ptam ngh elio msbib aor mn hSmim : oipl arzh oiSme qol mdbr alio Saol Saol lmh trdpni : oiamr mi ath adni oiamr hadon anki ihoSe aSr ath rodp qSh lk lbeT bdrbnot : ohoa Hrd onbet oiamr adni mh tHpz oaeSh oien hadon qom lk heirh oiamr lk at aSr elik leSot : ohanSim aSr hlko ato emdo nalmim ki Smeo at hqol oaiS la hbiTo : oiqm Saol mn harz obptHo at einio la rah aiS oiHciqo bido oiolikho ldmSq : oiHSko einio mraot SlSt imim ola akl ola Sth : otlmid aHd hih bdmSq Hnnih Smo oiamr alio hadon bmHch Hnnih oiamr hnni adni : oiamr alio hadon qom lk al hrHob hnqra hiSr oSal bbit ihodh laiS Trsi oSmo Saol ki hnh hoa mtpll : oira bmHch ohnh aiS oSmo Hnnih ba hHdrh oSm elio at ido lmen iSob oirah : oien Hnnih oiamr adni Smeti rbim msprim el haiS hch kmh reot eSh lqdoSik biroSlim : ogm ph rSion iS lo mat raSi hkhnim lasr at kl hqraim bSmk : oiamr alio hadon lk ki kli Hpz hoa li lSat at Smi lpni goim omlkim olpni bni iSral : ki ani araho kmh iS lo lsbl lmen Smi : oilk Hnnih oiba hbith oiSm at idio elio oiamr Saol aHi hadon ihoSe hnrah alik bdrk aSr bat bh SlHni lmen tSob otrah otmla roH hqdS : okrge nplo mel einio kmo qSqSim oiSb ptam lraot oiqm oiTbl : oiakl lHm oiHcq oiSb Saol imim aHdim em htlmidim aSr bdmSq : oimhr oiqra bbti hknsiot at hmSiH lamr ki hoa hoa bn halhim : oiStommo kl hSmeim oiamro hla ch hoa aSr habid biroSlim at qrai hSm hch olmen cat ba hnh lhbiam asorim lpni raSi hkhnim : oSaol hih holk oHcq oihm at hihodim iSbi dmSq bhokiHo ki ch hoa hmSiH : oihi ki arko lo Sm himim oioezo hihodim iHdo lhmito : oiode lSaol arbm ohmh Smro at hSerim iomm olilh lmen imitho : oiqHo ato htlmidim lilh oioridho bsl bed hHomh : oihi kboa Saol iroSlimh oibqS lhlot al htlmidim oiirao klm mpnio ola hamino ki tlmid hoa : oiqH ato br nba oibiaho al hSliHim oispr lhm at aSr rah bdrk at hadon oki hoa dbr alio oaik bdmSq hSmie bbTHon at Sm ihoSe : oihi atm ioza oba biroSlim : oiqra bbTHon bSm hadon ihoSe oidbr oitokH gm em hihodim hionim ohm cmmo lhmito : oiSmeo haHim oiorido ato lqsrin oiSlHho al Trsos : oihi Slom lqhlot bkl mqmot ihodh ohglil oSmron otbninh otthlknh birat hadon otrbinh bnHmt roH hqdS : oihi bsbb pTros bkl hmqmot oird gm al hqdoSim aSr iSbo bld : oimza Sm aiS Smo anis ohoa Skb el mSkbo ch Smnh Snim ohoa nkh abrim : oiamr alio pTros anis rpak ihoSe hmSiH qom hze lk ath oiqm ptam : oirao aoto kl iSbi ld ohSron oipno al hadon : otlmidh bipo oSmh Tbita trgomo zbih ohia mlah meSim Tobim ozdqot aSr eSth : oihi bimim hhm otHlh otmt oirHzo ath oiSimoh belih : old qrobh hia lipo oiSmeo htlmidim ki pTros Sm oiSlHo alio Sni anSim oipzro bo lblti hezl lebr alihm : oiqm pTros oilk atm obbao helho al helih otnSnh alio kl halmnot bokiot omraot lo at hktnt oat hbgdim aSr eSth zbih beodh emhn : oioza pTros at klm hHozh oikre el brkio oitpll oipn al goith oiamr Tbita qomi otptH at einih otra at pTros otteodd : oiSlH ido oiqm ath oiqra at hqdoSim oat halmnot oiemd ath Hih lpnihm : oiode hdbr bkl ipo oiamino rbim badon : oioal lSbt bipo imim rbim em borsi aHd oSmo Smeon :

10

oaiS hih bqsrin oSmo qrnilios Sr mah mn hgdod hnqra haiTlqi : ohoa Hsid oira alhim em kl bni bito oeSh zdqot hrbh lem omtpll tmid lalhim : omHch nrah alio kSeh htSieit liom oira mlak alhim ba alio pnimh oamr qrnilios : oibT alio oiira oiamr mh ch adni oiamr alio tplotik ozdqotik elo lckron lpni halhim : oeth SlH lk anSim al ipo ohba alik at Smeon hmknh pTros : hoa mtgorr em borsi aHd Smeon Smo aSr bito el id him hoa iamr lk at aSr elik leSot : oilk lo hmlak hdbr al qrnilios oiqra al Snim mebdi bito oal aiS mlHmh aHd ira alhim mn hemdim tmid lpnio lSrto : oispr lhm at kl hdbrim oiSlHm al ipo : oihi mmHrt ohmh hlkim bdrk oqrbim leir oiel pTros el hgg lhtpll kSeh hSSit : ohoa reb oitao lTem lHm obhkinm lo nplh trdmh elio : oira at hSmim nptHim ohnh kli ird alio kdmot mTpHt bd gdolh oiord barbe knpotio el harz : obtoko mkl bhmt harz oHih ormS oeop hSmim : oihi qol alio lamr qom pTros cbH oakl : oiamr pTros Hlilh li adni ki meolm la aklti kl pgol oTma : oihi eod qol alio pem Snit lamr at aSr Thr halhim ath al tTmano : okn hih SlS pemim ohkli Sb ohelh hSmimh : oihi bhtpem roH pTros el hmrah aSr rah ohnh hanSim hSloHim mat qrnilios Salo lbit Smeon oiemdo el hptH : oiqrao oidrSo hiS mtgorr Sm Smeon hmknh pTros : opTros eodno HSb em lbbo el hmrah ohroH amr alio hnh SlSh anSim mbqSim aotk : lkn qom rd olkh na atm oal ttmhmh ki anki SlHtim : oird pTros al hanSim hnSlHim alio mat qrnilios oiamr anki haiS aSr atm mbqSim lmh ch batm hnh : oiamro qrnilios Sr mah aiS zdiq oira alhim olo Sm Tob bkl em hihodim zoh el pi mlak qdoS lqra lk al bito olSme dbrim mpik : oiqra atm alio oiaspm hbith oihi mmHrt oiza pTros atm omqzt haHim aSr bipo hlko emo : olmHrto bao al qsrin oqrnilios mHkh lhm oemo bni mSpHto oqrobio omideio hnqhlim alio : oihi kboa pTros oiza qrnilios lqrato oipl lrglio oiStHo : oiqm aoto pTros oiamr qom ki gm ani anoS anki : oidbr ato oiba hbith oimza rbim naspim Smh : oiamr alihm atm idetm ki asor hoa laiS ihodi lhlot olqrb al nkri oati horh alhim lblti amr Hl ao Tma el kl adm : obebor cat kaSr nqrati la nmneti mhlk oeth aSalkm mdoe qratm li : oiamr qrnilios ch arbeh imim hiiti zm ed hSeh hcat obSeh htSieit htpllti btok biti ohnh aiS nzb lpni blboS chr : oiamr qrnilios nSmeh tpltk ozdqotik hio lckron lpni halhim : oeth SlH al ipo oqra alik at Smeon hmknh pTros mtgorr hoa bbit Smeon hborsi el him aSr bboao idbr lk : oamhr oaSlH alik oath hiTbt leSot aSr bat ali ohnno klno ph lpni halhim lSme at kl aSr zoit mat ihoh : oiptH pTros at pio oiamr eth ideti bamt ki halhim ainno nSa pnim : ki am bkl em oem hira aoto oeSh zdq rzoi hoa lpnio : oiSlH at dbro lbni iSral oibSr at hSlom el idi ihoSe hmSiH ohoa adon hkl : atm idetm at hdbr hneSh bkl ihodh hHl mn hglil aHri hTbilh aSr qra aoth ioHnn : at aSr mSH halhim at ihoSe hnzri broH hqdS obgborh oiebr barz eSh Hsd orpa at kl hnkbSim tHt id hSTn ki halhim hih emo : oanHno edim el kl aSr eSh barz hihodim obiroSlim oaSr hrgho bhoqiem ato el hez : aoto hqim halhim biom hSliSi oitnho lhraot bgloi : la lkl hem ki am lno hedim aSr halhim bHr bhm mraS aSr aklno oStino ato aHri qomo mn hmtim : oizo atno lhSmie lem olheid ki ato Sm halhim lSopT hHiim ohmtim : oelio kl hnbiaim meidim ki iqblo sliHt hHTaim bSmo kl hmaminim bo : eod pTros mdbr hdbrim halh oroH hqdS zlHh el kl hSmeim at hdbr : ohmaminim bni hmilh aSr bao at pTros hStommo ki mtnt roH hqdS nSpkh gm el hgoim : ki Smeo atm mmllim blSnot omgdlim at halhim : oien pTros oiamr hiokl aiS lmne at hmim mTbl at alh aSr qblo at roH hqdS gm hm kmno : oizo lTbl atm bSm hadon oibqSo mmno lSbt atm imim aHdim :

11

oiSmeo hSliHim ohaHim aSr bihodh ki qblo gm hgoim at dbr halhim : oihi kaSr elh pTros iroSlim oiribo emo bni hmilh lamr : al anSim aSr lhm erlh bat otakl atm lHm : oiHl pTros oispr lhm at kl aSr qrho lamr : mtpll hiiti beir ipo oardm oara mrah ohnh kli kdmot mTpHt bd gdolh iord mn hSmim otord barbe knpotih otba edi : ohstklti bh oabin oara at bhmt harz oat hHih ormS hadmh oeop hSmim : oaSme gm qol hamr ali qom pTros cbH oakl : oamr Hlilh li adni ki kl pgol oTma la ba bpi meolm : oienni hqol Snit mn hSmim oiamr at aSr Thr halhim ath al tTmano : okn hih SlS pemim ohkl Sb ohelh hSmimh : ohnh krge SlSh anSim emdim el ptH hbit aSr anki Sm ohmh SloHim ali mqsrin : oiamr ali hroH llkt atm olblti htmhmh oilko ati gm SSt haHim halh onboa al bit haiS : oigd lno at aSr rah hmlak nzb bbito oamr alio SlH al ipo anSim oqra alik at Smeon hmknh pTros : ohoa idbr alik dbrim aSr toSe bhm ath okl bitk : okaSr hHloti ldbr zlHh elihm roH hqdS kaSr zlHh elino btHlh : oackr at dbr hadon aSr amr ioHnn hTbil bmim oatm tTblo broH hqdS : oeth am mtnh aHt ntn halhim lhm olno hmaminim badon ihoSe hmSiH mi anki ki aezr lalhim : oihi kSmem cat oiHriSo oihllo at halhim oiamro akn gm lgoim ntn halhim htSobh lHiim : ohnpozim mpni hzrh aSr hith el aodt asTpnos hlko obao ed pinoqia oqpros oanTiokia ola dbro at hdbr ki am al hihodim lbdm : oihi btokm anSi qpros oqorini aSr bao al anTiokia oidbro gm al hionim oibSro atm at hadon ihoSe : othi emhm id ihoh omspr rb hamino oiSobo al hadon : oiSme hdbr bacni hqhlh aSr biroSlim oiSlHo at br nba al anTiokia : oiba Smh oiSmH krato at Hsd halhim oichr at klm ldbqh badon blb nkon : ki aiS Tob hih omla roH hqdS oamonh oiaspo ladon em rb : oilk br nba mSm al Trsos lbqS at Saol oimza ato oibiaho al anTiokia : oihio iSbim iHd bqhlh Snh tmimh omlmdim em rb ac hoHl banTiokia lqra at htlmidim bSm mSiHiim : oihi bimim hhm oibao nbiaim miroSlim al anTiokia : oiqm aHd mhm oSmo agbos oigd el pi hroH ki reb gdol iboa el kl iSbi tbl oihi kn bimi qlodios : oioezo htlmidim lSlH aiS aiS maSr tSig ido lecrt haHim hiSbim bihodh : okn gm eSo oiSlHo al hcqnim el idi br nba oSaol :

12

bet hhia SlH hmlk hordos at ido lhre lanSim mn hqhl : oimt at ieqb aHi ioHnn bHrb : oira ki Tob hdbr beini hihodim oiosp ltpS gm at pTros ohimim imi Hg hmzot : oiaHc ato oitnho bmSmr oimsrho larbe mHlqot Sl arbeh anSi zba lSmro ki amr lheloto aHri hpsH lpni hem : pTros hih ezor bmSmr ohqhlh hetirh bedo bHcqh al halhim : oihi blilh hhoa aSr amr hordos lhbiao mHr ldin oiiSn pTros bin Sni anSi zba ohoa asor bSnim cqim oSmri hptH Smrim at hmSmr : ohnh mlak ihoh nzb elio oaor ngh bHdr oispq el irk pTros oieirho lamr qom mhrh oiplo mosrotio mel idio : oiamr alio hmlak Hgr mtnik ohnel at rglik oieS kn oiamr alio eTh meilk olk aHri : oiza oilk aHrio ola ide am amt hoa hneSh lo el idi hmlak ki kmrah hih beinio : oiebro drk hmSmrt hraSonh ohSnih oibao ed Ser hbrcl aSr izao bo heirh oiptH hSer lpnihm malio oizao hHozh oilko mhlk rHob aHd ohmlak sr melio ptam : oihi bSobo al deto oiamr pTros eth ch ideti bamt ki halhim SlH at mlako oiplTni mid hordos omkl mcmt em hihodim : hoa HSb kcat ohoa ba ed bit mrim am ioHnn hmknh mrqos aSr nqhlo Sm rbim ohm mtpllim iHd : oidpq el dlt hSer otgS nerh lhqSib oSmh rodi : otkr at qol pTros omSmHth la ptHh lo am dlt hSer otrz hbith otgd lhm ki pTros emd el hSer : oiamro alih mSget at ohia mtamzt ki kn hoa oiamro mlako hoa : opTros hrbh ldpq oiptHo oiraho oiStommo : ohoa rmc lhm bido lHSot oispr lhm at aSr hoziao hadon mn hmSmr oiamr hgido at cat lieqb olaHim oiza oilk lo lmqom aHr : hbqr aor ombokh la qTnh hith bin anSi hzba el pTros mh hih lo : oihi kaSr bqS aoto hordos ola mzao Hqr at hSmrim oizo lhoziam lmot oird mihodh al qsrin oiSb Sm : oaibh hith bin hordos obin bni zor ozidon oibao alio blb aHd oipto at blsTos aSr el Hdr hmlk oibqSo Slom ien lqHo mHit arzotm marz hmlk : oihi biom hmoed oilbS hordos lboS mlkot oiSb el ksa hmSpT oiTp alihm amrto : oirieo lo hem lamr qol alhim hoa ola qol adm : oikho mlak ihoh ptam eqb aSr la ntn hkbod lalhim oiaklho toleim oigoe : odbr alhim holk orb : oiSobo br nba oSaol miroSlim aHri klotm at hSmoS oiqHo atm at ioHnn hmknh mrqos :

13

oanSim nbiaim omlmdim hio banTiokia bqhlh aSr bh br nba oSmeon hnqra nigr oloqios hqorini omnHm aSr gdl em hordos Sr hrbe oSaol : oihi bSrtm at ihoh obzomm oiamr roH hqdS hbdilo li at br nba oat Saol lmlakh aSr qratim lh : oizomo oitpllo oismko at idihm elihm oiSlHom : ohmh hmSlHim el idi roH hqdS irdo al sloqia omSm bao banih al qpros : oibao al eir slmis oigido at dbr halhim bbti hknsiot aSr lihodim oihi lhm gm ioHnn lmSrt : oiebro bkl hai ed ppos oimzao aiS mgoS aHd nbia Sqr aiS ihodi oSmo br ihoSe : aSr hih em srgios polos Sr hmdinh aiS nbon ohoa qra alio at br nba oat Saol oitao lSme at dbr halhim : oiemd lngdm alima hmgoS ki ch trgom Smo oibqS lhTot at hSr mn hamonh : oSaol hnqra gm polos mla roH hqdS oistkl bo : oiamr ath hmla kl mrmh okl eolh bn bliel oSona kl zdq hla tHdl lslp at drki ihoh hiSrim : oeth hnh id ihoh bk ohiit eor ola trah at hSmS ed et moed otpl elio ptam aplh oHSkh oipn hnh ohnh oibqS aiS lholiko bido : ohSr kaSr rah at hmeSh hamin oiStomm el tort hadon : oizao polos ohanSim aSr ato mppos oirdo banih oibao al prgi aSr bpmpolia oiecb atm ioHnn oiSb iroSlim : ohmh nseo mprgi oibao al anTiokia aSr bpisdia oibao al bit hknst biom hSbt oiSbo : oihi aHr qriat htorh ohnbiaim oiSlHo alihm raSi hknst lamr anSim aHim am iS lkm dbr mosr lem dbro : oiqm polos oinp ido oiamr anSi iSral oirai alhim Smeo : alhi hem hch alhi iSral bHr babotino oiromm at hem bhiotm grim barz mzrim obcroe rmh hoziam mSm : oiSa atm oiklklm bmdbr karbeim Snh : oiSmd Sbeh goim barz knen oiHlq at arzm lhm lnHlh : oaHri kn ntn lhm SpTim karbe maot oHmSim Snh ed imi Smoal hnbia : oiSalo mlk oitn lhm alhim at Saol bn qiS aiS mSbT bnimn arbeim Snh : okhsiro aoto oiqm at dod lmlk elihm aSr gm heid elio lamr mzati dod at bn iSi aiS klbbi ohoa ieSh at kl Hpzi : och hoa aSr mcreo hqim halhim kpi hhbTHh goal liSral at ihoSe : aSr lpni boao qdm ioHnn lqra at Tbilt htSobh al kl em iSral : oihi kklot ioHnn at mrozto oiamr lmi tHSboni la ani hoa ki hnh hoa ba aHri oani nqlti mhtir at neli rglio : anSim aHim bni mSpHt abrhm oirai alhim aSr bqrbkm lkm SloH dbr hihoSeh hcat : ki iSbi iroSlim oraSihm ien aSr la hkirho mlao bmSpTm aSr SpTho at dbri hnbiaim hnqraim bkl Sbt : oap ki la mzao bo mSpT mot Salo mat pilTos lhmito : okaSr hSlimo at kl hdbrim hktobim elio horido aoto mn hez oiniHho bqbr : abl halhim hqimo mn hmtim : oira imim rbim al helim ato mn hglil iroSlimh ohmh eth edio al hem : oanHno mbSrim atkm at bSort hhbTHh aSr hith labotino ki ath mla halhim lbnino bhqimo at ihoSe : kktob bmcmor hSni bni ath hiom ildtik : oel aSr hqim ato mn hmtim lblti Sob eod lSHt kh amr atn lkm Hsdi dod hnamnim : el kn hoa amr gm bmqom aHr la ttn Hsidk lraot SHt : ki dod goe aHri Srto bdoro lezt halhim oiasp al abotio oira at hSHt : oaSr halhim hqim aoto hoa la rah hSHt : lkn anSim aHim iode lkm ki el idi ch hgd lkm sliHt hHTaim : obkl aSr la ikltm lhzTdq btort mSh kl hmamin izdq el ido : lkn hSmro lkm pn iboa elikm hnamr bnbiaim : rao bgdim ohtmho oSmo ki pel pel ani bimikm pel aSr la tamino ki ispr lkm : obzat hihodim mbit hknst bqSo mhm hgoim ldbr alihm at hdbrim halh bSbt hbah : orbim mn hihodim omgri hzdq hlko aHri polos obr nba bhprd hqhl ohmh dbro el lbm oichirom lemd bHsd halhim : obSbt hSnit nqhlh kmeT kl heir lSme at dbr ihoh : oihi kraot hihodim at hmon hem oimlao qnah oikHiSo at dbri polos hkHS ogdp : ac hgido polos obr nba el pnihm lamr bdin hih lhSmie atkm braSonh at dbr halhim oeth aHri aSr mastm aoto oainkm ckim beinikm lHii heolm lkn hnno pnim al hgoim : ki kn zoh elino hadon nttik laor goim lhiot ihoSeti ed qzh harz : oiSmHo hgoim kSmem oihllo at dbr ihoh oiamino kl aSr hio moknim lHii eolm : oiprz dbr ihoh bkl hmqom : ak hihodim hsito at hnSim hHsidot ohHSobot oat azili heir oieorro rdiph el polos obr nba oigrSom mgbolm : ohmh nero elihm at hepr mel rglihm oilko laiqnion : ohtlmidim mlao SmHh oroH hqdS :

14

oihi baiqnion oibao iHdo al bit knst hihodim oidbro Sm ed ki hamin hmon rb mn hihodim omn hionim : ak hihodim aSr la hamino eorro ohkeiso at npSot hgoim el haHim : oiSbo Sm imim rbim oilmdo bbTHonm bihoh hemid el dbr Hsdo beSoto el idm atot omoptim : oiHlq hmon heir lHzi alh nTo aHri hihodim oalh aHri hSliHim : oihi rgSt hgoim ohihodim em raSihm lhtell bhm olsqlm : oiode lhm oibrHo leri loqonia al losTra odrbi osbibotn : oibSro Sm hbSorh : oaiS nkh rglim hih blosTra ohoa iSb psH mbTn amo ola hlk mimio : oiSme at polos mdbr ohoa hstkl bo oira ki amonh bo lhoSe : oiamr bqol gdol emd hkn el rglik oidlg oithlk : ohmon hem kraotm at aSr eSh polos nSao at qolm oiamro blSon loqonit irdo alino halhim bdmot anSim : oiqrao lbr nba bl olpolos qrao hrmis baSr hoa raS hmdbrim : okhn bit bl aSr mHoz leirm hbia hSerh Sorim oeTrot oiHpz lcbH hoa ohmon hem : oihi kSme cat hSliHim polos obr nba oiqreo at bgdihm oirozo al tok hem : oizeqo lamr anSim lmh teSo kcat gm anHno bni adm HlSim kmokm onbSrh atkm lmen Sob tSobo mn hblikm alh al alhim Hiim aSr eSh at hSmim oat harz oat him oat kl aSr bm : oaSr bdrot qdm hniH lkl hgoim llkt bdrkihm : ogm la Hdl lheid el ezmo oiiTb lno btto mTr mn hSmim oetot Sbe oimla lbotino mcon oSSon : oap bdbrim halh kmeT la ezro kH lkloa at hem mcbH lhm : oibao Smh ihodim mn anTiokia omn aiqnion oisito at hem oirgmo at polos babnim oisHbho Hozh leir bHSbm ki mt : oisbo ato htlmidim oiqm oiba heirh ommHrt iza al drbi hoa obr nba : oibSro at hbSorh beir hhia oaHri hemidm tlmidim hrbh Sbo al losTra oaiqnion oanTiokia : oiHcqo at npSot htlmidim oichiro atm lemd bamonh oki rq bzrot rbot boa nboa al mlkot halhim : oibHro lhm cqnim bkl qhlh oqhlh oitpllo oizomo oipqidom bid hadon aSr hamino bo : oiebro bpisdia oibao al pmpolia : oiSmieo at dbr ihoh bprgi oirdo al aTlia : omSm bao banih al anTiokia aSr nmsro Sm lHsd alhim el hmlakh aSr mlao ath : obbam Smh hqhilo at hedh oigido at kl aSr eSh atm halhim oat aSr ptH lgoim ptH hamonh : oiSbo Sm em htlmidim imim la meTim :

15

oanSim irdo mihodh oilmdo at haHim lamr am la tmolo kdt mSh la toSeon : oihi el cat rib omHlqt la qlh lpolos olbr nba emhm oigcro ki polos obr nba oaHrim mhm ielo iroSlim al hSliHim ohcqnim el adot hSalh hcat : otloh atm hqhlh oiebro at pinoqia oat Smron msprim at tSobt hgoim oiSmHo at kl haHim SmHh gdolh : oihi kbam iroSlim oiqblo atm hqhlh ohSliHim ohcqnim oigido lhm at aSr hgdil halhim leSot emhm : oiqomo anSim maminim mkt hproSim oiamro ki Hobh hia lmol atm olzotm lSmr at tort mSh : oiqhlo hSliHim ohcqnim lein bdbr hch : oihi brbot hmHlqt qm pTros oiamr alihm anSim aHim atm idetm ki mimim raSim bi bHr halhim mklno aSr iSmeo hgoim mpi at dbr hbSorh oiamino : ohalhim ide hlbbot heid elihm btto gm lhm at roH hqdS kaSr ntn lno : ola hbdil binino obinihm ki Thr at lbbm el idi hamonh : oeth mh tnso at halhim lSom el el zoari htlmidim aSr gm abotino gm anHno la iklno lSat : abl bHsd ihoSe hmSiH adnino namin lhoSe kmohm kmono : oiHriSo kl hqhl oiSmeo al br nba oal polos msprim at hatot ohmoptim aSr hrbh halhim leSot el idihm bqrb hgoim : oiklo ldbr oien ieqb oiamr anSim aHim Smeo ali : Smeon spr aik halhim rah lo braSonh lqHt mbin hgoim em lSmo : olcat mskimim dbri hnbiaim kktob : aHri cat aSob oaqim at skt doid hnplt ohrsotih aqim obnitih : lmen idrSo Sarit adm at ihoh okl hgoim aSr nqra Smi elihm nam ihoh eSh kl alh : nodeim lalhim meolm kl meSio : oel kn ani dn Sla lhHmir el hSbim mn hgoim lalhim : rq lktb alihm aSr irHqo mTmat halilim omn hcnot ombSr hnHnq omn hdm : ki mSh mdrt eolm iS lo mgidio bkl eir oeir oiqra bbti hknsiot mdi Sbt bSbto : oiiTb beini hSliHim ohcqnim em kl hqhl lbHr mhm anSim olSlH atm al anTiokia em polos obr nba at ihodh hmknh br Sba oat sila anSi Sm bin haHim : oiktbo oiSlHo el idm lamr anHno hSliHim ohcqnim ohaHim Salim lSlom haHim aSr mn hgoim banTiokia obsoria obqiliqia : ien obien Smeno ki izao matno mblblim atkm omqlqlim npStikm bdbrim bamrm lkm lhmol olSmr at htorh aSr la zoino aotm : lkn Tob beini klno iHdo lbHr anSim lSlHm alikm em Hbibino br nba opolos : anSim aSr msro npSm el Sm adnino ihoSe hmSiH : el kn SlHno at ihodh oat sila aSr gm hmh igido cat bpihm : ki Tob lpni roH hqdS olpnino lblti Som elikm mSa aHr lbd malh hdbrim hzrikim : aSr trHqo mcbHi alilim omn hdm ombSr hnHnq omn hcnot am malh tSmro at npStikm tiTibo leSot oSlom lkm : oiSlHo hanSim oibao al anTiokia oiqhilo at hem oitno lhm at hagrt : oiqrao ath oiSmHo el hnHmh : oihodh osila aSr gm hm nbiaim nHmo haHim bdbrim rbim oiHcqom : oihio Sm imim aHdim oiSlHom haHim bSlom al hSliHim : oiiTb beini sila lSbt Sm : opolos obr nba iSbo banTiokia oilmdo oibSro at dbr ihoh hmh ogm rbim aHrim emm : oihi mqz imim oiamr polos al br nba lkh onSobh onpqdh at aHino bkl eir oeir aSr qrano Sm at dbr ihoh onrah mh hmh : obr nba iez lqHt atm at ioHnn hmknh mrqos : ak polos la abh lqHt atm at haiS aSr sr melihm bpmpolia ola hlk atm bmlaktm : oihi rgc ed aSr nprdo aiS maHio oiqH br nba at mrqos oise banih al qpros : opolos bHr lo at sila oimsrho haHim al Hsd ihoh oiza : oiebr bsoria obqiliqia oiHcq at hqhlot :

16

oiba al drbi oal losTra ohnh Sm tlmid aHd oSmo Timotios ohoa bn aSh ihodit mamnt oabio ioni : oihi lo Sm Tob bin haHim aSr blosTra obaiqnion : bo bHr polos aSr iza ato oiqH oiml ato bebor hihodim aSr bmqmot hhm ki klm ideo at abio ki ioni hoa : oihi bebrm berim oimsro lhm lSmr at hpqodim aSr gcro hSliHim ohcqnim aSr biroSlim : ottHcqnh hqhlot bamonh oirb msprn iom iom : oiebro bprogia obarz glTia ki mnem roH hqdS mhSmie at hdbr basia : okbam al mosia hoailo llkt al bitonia ola hniH lhm hroH : oiHlpo mmosia oirdo al Troas : oHcon nrah al polos blilh ohnh aiS moqdon nzb ohoa mbqS mmno lamr ebr al mqdonia oecrno : okrato at hmHch mid bqSno llkt al mqdonia bhbinno ki halhim qrano Smh lbSr atm hbSorh : onza mn Troas onrd banih onba drk iSrh al smotrqia ommHrt al npolis : omSm al pilpi raSit eri hplk Sl mqdonia ohia bt Horin onSb beir hcat imim aHdim : obiom hSbt izano al mHoz leir al id hnhr aSr Sm mqom tplh kmnhgm onSb ondbr al hnSim hnqhlot Smh : oaSh irat alihm oSmh lodia mkrt argmn meir tiaTira Smeh oiptH ihoh at lbh lhqSib al dbri polos : otTbl hia obni bith otbqS mmno lamr am HSbtm ati namnh ladon bao na al biti oSbo bo otpzr bno : oihi blktno lmqom htplh otpge bno SpHh belt aob aSr eSth hon rb ladnih bqsmih : otlk aHri polos oaHrino hlok oqroa lamr hanSim halh ebdi al elion hmh hmodieim atno arH hihoSeh : okn eSth imim rbim oire beini polos hdbr hch oipn oiamr al hroH anki mzok bSm ihoSe hmSiH lzat mmnh oiza bSeh hhia : oirao adnih ki aclh toHlt bzem oitpSo at polos oat sila oisHbom al hrHob lpni cqni heir : oibiaom al hSrim oiamro hanSim halh ekrim at eirno ohm ihodim : omodieim Hqot aSr la nkon lno lqblm oleStm ki romiim anHno : oiqm gm hem elihm ohSrim qreo at bgdihm melihm oizoo lhkotm bSoTim : oihi aHri hkot atm mkh rbh oiSlikom bmSmr oizoo at Somr hasorim lSmrm hiTb : ohoa kaSr zoh kn hSlikm bHdr hmSmr hpnimi oiSm at rglihm bsd : oihi kHzot hlilh oitpllo polos osila oicmro lalhim ohasorim mqSibim alihm : optam hih reS gdol ed aSr ceo mosdot bit hkla okrge nptHo kl hdltot omosrot klm ntqo : oSomr hasorim neor mSnto oihi krato at dltot hmSmr nptHot oiSlp Hrbo oibqS labd at ezmo bHSbo ki brHo hasorim : oiqra polos bqol gdol lamr al teS lk maomh re ki ph anHno klno : oiSal nrot oidlg pnimh ohoa mreid oipl lrgli polos osila : oioziam hHozh oiamr adni mh eli leSot lmen aoSe : oiamro hamn badon ihoSe hmSiH otoSe ath obitk : oigido lo at dbr ihoh olkl aSr bbito : oiqHm blilh bSeh hhia oirHz at Hbortihm oimhr lhTbl hoa okl aSr lo : oielm al bito oiSm SlHn lpnihm oigl em kl bito el hioto mamin balhim : obHit hbqr SlHo hSrim at hSoTrim lamr SlH at hanSim hhm : oigd Smr hasorim lpolos at hdbrim halh lamr SlHo hSrim lpTr atkm oeth zao olko bSlom : oiamr polos alihm hkh hkono ngd kl hem bla din omSpT oanHno anSim romiim oiSliko atno bmSmr oeth nstr igrSono al na ki am ibao hmh oioziaono : oigido hSTrim lSrim at hdbrim halh oihi kSmem ki romiim hm oiirao : oibao oiHlo pnihm oioziaom oiSalo mhm lzat mn heir : oizao mn hmSmr oibao al bit lodia oirao at haHim oichirom oilko ldrkm :

17

oihi aHri ebrm bamppolis obaploina oibao al tsloniqi aSr Sm bit knst hihodim : opolos nkns alihm kmSpTo oSlS Sbtot dbr emhm bdbri hktobim : ptoH ohokH lhm ki zrik hih aSr ienh hmSiH oiqom mn hmtim oki ch hoa hmSiH ihoSe aSr ani mgid lkm : oiamino mqztm oispHo el polos osila ogm irai alhim mn hionim lrb ogm nSim HSobot mspr la meT : oiqnao hsorrim Sbihodim oiqHo lhm anSi bliel mbTlni hSoq oiqbzo hmon oihmo at heir oisbo el bit ison oibqSo lhbiam Hozh al hem : okaSr la mzao aotm sHbo at ison oanSim mn haHim lpni raSi heir oizeqo lamr hnh hmdiHim at kl iSbi tbl bao gm hlom : oison asp atm al bito ohm klm eSim ngd dti hqisr bamrm ki iS mlk aHr ohoa ihoSe : oiHrido at hem oat raSi heir aSr Smeo at cat : oiqHo erbon midi ison omidi haHrim oaHri kn pTrom : ohaHim mhro lSlH at polos oat sila lilh lbroah ohm bbam Smh hlko lbit knst hihodim : oalh hio ndibim manSi tsloniqi oiqblo at hdbr bkl lb oidrSo bktobim iom iom ldet am kn hoa hdbr : oiamino hrbh mhm ogm mn hnSim hHSobot hioniot omn hanSim la meT : oihi kaSr Smeo hihodim aSr mtsloniqi ki mgid polos at dbr alhim gm bbroah oibao oierro at hem gm Smh : oimhro haHim oiSlHo at polos llkt ed him osila oTimotios nSaro Sm : ohmloim at polos holikho ed atins oiqblo mzoto al sila oTimotios ki boa ibao alio bmhrh oilko : oihi batins opolos mhkh lhm ottHmz roHo bqrbo brato at heir mlah alilim : el kn bbit hknst dbr em hihodim oem irai alhim obSoq iom iom em hnqrim alio : ogm mqzt hpilosopim mtlmidi apiqoros omHbrt hasToa htgro bo oiS aSr amro mh iamr hmpTpT hlc oaHrim amrim kpi hnrah hoa mgid alhi nkr ien ki bSr atm at ihoSe oat htHih : oiaHcoho oibiaho al gbet hmSpT hnqrah bSm ariopgos oiamro hnokl ldet mh hia co htorh hHdSh aSr ath mSmie : ki dbrim crim ath mbia bacnino ohnno Hpzim ldet mh eninm : ki hatiniim klm ogm hnkrim hgrim Sm la HSo ldbr aHr ki am lspr ao lSme HdSot : oiemd polos btok oed hSpTim oiamr anSi atins hnni rah bkl ki irai alim atm mad : ki ani ebr omtbonn al ebdot alhikm oamza mcbH aHd ktob elio lal hnelm oeth at aSr ebdtm oainkm ideim ato ani mgid lkm : hal aSr eSh at heolm okl aSr bo la iSkn bhiklot meSh idim ki hoa adon hSmim oharz : gm la iSrtoho idi bni adm kalo izTrk ldbr ki hoa hntn lkl Hiim onSmh okl dbr : oioSb kl emmi bni adm el kl pni hadmh mdm aHd oizb moedim qboeim ogbolt moSbm : lmen ibqSo at halhim aoli imSSho oimzaho ap ki ainno rHoq mkl aHd mmno : ki bo anHno Hiim omtnoeeim oqimim kaSr gm mqzt mSorrikm amro ap ilidio anHno : ohnh bhiotno ilidi halhim la nkon lno lHSb ki halhot tdmh lchb ao lksp ao labn meSh HrS omHSbt bni adm : lkn eth aHri ebr alhim el imot hsklot mzoh hoa at kl bni hadm bkl apsi arz ki Sob iSobo : ien aSr St iom lSpT tbl bzdq el idi aiS aSr hpqido oitn edot namnh lklm bhqimo ato mn hmtim : okaSr Smeo tHit mtim alh hleigo lo oalh amro el cat nSmek bet aHrt : obkn iza polos mtokm : omqztm dbqo bo oiamino obhm dionosios mn hSpTim Sl ariopgos oaSh aHt Smh dmris oeod aHrim emhm :

18

aHr kn sr polos matins oiba al qorntos : oimza ihodi nold bponTos omSo eqils aSr ba mqrob mn aiTlia hoa oaSto prisqlh mpni aSr zoh qlodios at kl hihodim lsor meir romi : oiba alihm oihi bhitm bni amnot aHt oiSb atm oieS mlakto oamnotm eSot irieot ahlim : oidbr bbit hknst bkl Sbt oSbt oiokH at hihodim oat hionim : okboa sila oTimotios mmqdonia hih polos ngS broH lheid al hihodim ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH : oihi khmrotm okgdpm oiner at bgdio oiamr alihm dmkm braSikm oanki nqi meth alkh li al hgoim : oilk mSm oiba al bit aiS oSmo iosTos aiS ira alhim obito smok lbit hknst : oqrispos raS hknst hamin badon hoa okl bito ogm qorntim rbim bSmem hamino oiTblo : odbr hadon hih al polos bmHch blilh lamr al tira ki am dbr oal tHSh : ki emk anki oaiS al ige bk lhre lk ki goi gdol li beir hcat : oiSb Sm Snh oSSh HdSim oilmd bhm at dbr halhim : oihi bhiot glion Sr mdint akia oiqomo hihodim klm oHdo el polos oibiaho al ksa hmSpT : oiamro haiS hch mpth at bni hadm lebd at alhim bla ktorh : oihi ak bqS polos lptH at pio oglion amr al hihodim lamr am hih dbr pSe ao meSh nblh ki eth nSati oSmeti atkm hihodim kmSpT : abl am hia Salh el mlin oSmot ohdt Slkm rao atm oani ain rzoni lhiot SpT el dbrim kalh : oigrS atm mlpni ksa hmSpT : oiaHco kl hionim at sostnim raS hknst oikoho lpni ksa hmSpT oglion la St lbo gm lcat : opolos iSb Sm eod imim rbim oipTr mn haHim oird banih llkt al soria oato prisqlh oeqils oiglH at raSo bqnkri ki ndr elio : oibao al apsos oiecb atm Sm ohoa hlk lbit hknst oidbr em hihodim : oibqSo mmno lharik imi Sbto atm ola abh : ki am npTr mhm bamro mHib ani lHg at hHg hba biroSlim oaHri kn aSobh alikm am irzh ihoh oilk lo banih mn apsos : oiba al qsrin oiel oiSal lSlom hqhlh oird al anTiokia : oiSb Sm imim aHdim oilk lmseio oiebr barz glTia oprogia oiHcq at kl htlmidim : oaiS ihodi ba al apsos oeir moldto alksndria oSmo apolos aiS dbrim otqip bktobim : hoa hih mlmd drk hadon ohoa mdbr kHm roHo omlmd hiTb el adot ihoSe ola ide ki am Tbilt ioHnn lbdh : ohoa hHl lqra bbit hknst bbTHon lbb oiSmeo ato eqils oprisqlh oiqHho alihm oiosipo lhgid lo at drk halhim bar hiTb : oiHpz llkt lakia oiktbo haHim al htlmidim oierro atm lqblo oiba Smh oiecr hrbh at hmaminim el idi hHsd : ki bHcqh htokH em hihodim lpni kl hem oiram mn hmqraot ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH :

19

oihi bhiot apolos bqorntos oiebr polos bmdinot heliont oird al apsos oimza Sm tlmidim : oiamr alihm hqbltm at roH hqdS aHri aSr hamntm oiamro alio ap la Smeno ki iSno roH hqdS : oiamr alihm el mh apoa hTbltm oiamro el Tbilt ioHnn : oiamr polos ioHnn hTbil bTbilt htSobh oamr al hem ki hamn iamino baSr iboa aHrio ohoa hmSiH ihoSe : oihi kSmem cat oibao lhTbl bSm ihoSe hadon : oismk polos at idio elihm oiba elihm roH hqdS oimllo blSnot oitnbao : oihio klm kSnim eSr aiS : oiba al bit hknst oiqra Sm bbTHon lbb oidbr emm kSlSh HdSim oiT at lbm al dbri mlkot halhim : ak mqztm hqSo at lbbm ola hamino oidbro srh el hdrk hch lpni hqhl oisr mhm oibdl mtokm at htlmidim oidbr atm iom iom bbit hmdrS Sl Tornos : okn hith kSntim imim ed ki Smeo kl iSbi asia gm ihodim gm ionim at dbr ihoSe hadon : ogborot gdlot eSh halhim el idi polos : ed ki gm hniHo sodrim oHgrt mel eor bSro el hHolim oisoro mhm tHlaihm ogm hroHot hreot izao : oanSim mn hihodim hsbbim omlHSim hoailo lhckir at Sm ihoSe hadon el aHoci hroHot hreot lamr mSbie ani atkm bihoSe aSr polos qra aoto : oheSim kkh hio Sbet bni sqoh aHd mgdoli khni hihodim : oien hroH oiamr at ihoSe ani mkir oat polos ani ide omi atm : oiqpz elihm bel hroH hreh oigbr elihm oikbSm ed ki nso mn hbit hhoa eirmim opzoeim : oiode hdbr lkl hihodim ohionim iSbi apsos oipl pHd el klm oigdl Sm hadon ihoSe : orbim mn hmaminim bao oitodo oiodieo at aSr eSo : orbim aSr eSqo bmeSi kSpim hbiao at sprihm oiSrpom leini kl oiHSbo at erkm oimzaho HmSt rbbot dinrim : odbr ihoh gbr mad oilk hlk oHcq : oihi kklot hdbrim halh iez polos broHo lebr btok mqdonia oakia ollkt iroSlim oiamr aHri hioti Smh rah arah gm at romi : oiSlH Snim mn hmSrtim ato at Timotios oat arsTos al mqdonia ohoa htmhmh eod imim basia : othi bet hhia mhomh la qTnh el adot drk ihoh : ki zorp ksp aHd dmTrios Smo eSh hiklot ksp Sl arTmis hmzia lHrSim mSkrt la meT : oiqhl atm oat Sar hesqim bmlakh hhia oiamr anSim atm ideim ki mn hmlakh hcat eSino kbod : oatm raim oSmeim aSr la
