bapsos lbdh ki gm kmeT basia klh ch polos pth ohdiH hmon em rb lamr la alhim alh hneSim bidim : oeth eod meT ola lbd Hlqno ch ihih lboc ki am gm hikl arTmis hmlkt hgdolh iHSb lain otklh tparth aSr kl asia okl iSbi tbl mkbdim aoth : oihi kSmem at dbrio oimlao Hmh oizeqo lamr gdolh arTmis Sl hapsiim : otmla kl heir mbokh oisero klm iHdo al htaTron oiHTpo atm at gios oat arsTrkos anSim mqdonim oHbri polos bmseio : oial polos lboa al tok hem ola hniHo lo htlmidim : ogm mqzt raSi asia aSr hio ahbio SlHo alio oichiro ato aSr la imlaho lbo lboa al htaTron : oizeqo Sm alh bkh oalh bkh ki mbokh gdolh hith bqhl orbm la ideo el mh ch naspo : oimSko mtok hhmon at alksndr ohihodim dHo ato ed zato oinp alksndr at ido oibqS lhzTdq lpni hem : ohmh khkirm ki hoa ihodi nSao klm qol oizeqo kSti Seot lamr gdolh arTmis Sl hapsiim : oihs sopr heir at hem oiamr anSi apsos mi hoa haiS aSr la ide ki heir apsos sknt hia lhikl Sl arTmis hmlkt hgdolh olzlmh hiord mn hSmim : oien aSr ain lkHS bdbrim halh raoi lkm lhiot SqTim ola leSot dbr nmhr : ki hbatm at hanSim halh aSr ainm gcli mqdS gm ainm mgdpi mlktkm : lkn am ldmTrios olHrSim aSr ato dbr rib em aiS hnh lno imi bit din oSri hmdinh oibiao alihm at ribm : oam tbqSo dbr aHr SpoT iSpT bqhl kpi hHq : ki hla bsknh anHno lhtHib bmrd bebor hiom hch odbr ain lno ltt din oHSbon el hrgSh hcat : oihi kaSr klh ldbr kdbrim halh oiSlH at hqhl :

20

oaHri aSr SqTh hmhomh qra polos ltlmidim oibrkm oiza llkt al mqdonia : oiebr bmdinot hhn oichr atm bdbrim rbim oiba al arz ion : oiSb Sm SlSh HdSim oihi bamro llkt al soria oiarbo lo hihodim oigmr blbo lSob drk mqdonia : oilko ato ed lasia sopTros hbroai omn htsloniqim arsTrkos osqondos ogios hdrbi oTimotios omn asia Tokiqos oTropimos : oalh hlko lpnino oioHilo lno bTroas : oanHno izano mn pilpi aHri imi Hg hmzot omqz HmSh imim bano banih alihm al Troas onSb Sm Sbet imim : oihi baHd bSbt kaSr naspo htlmidim lbze hlHm oidbr atm polos ki amr llkt mSm lmHrt hiom oiark hdbr ed Hzot hlilh : onrot rbim hio belih aSr naspno Sm : obHor aHd Smo abTokos iSb bHlon oirdm bharik polos at amrto otgbr elio Snto oipl mhmdor hSliSi lmTh oiSaho mt : oird polos oighr elio oiHbqho oiamr al tbhlo ki nSmto bo : oaHr elh oibze hlHm oiTem oirb lSiH atm ed aor hbqr oiza llkt ldrko : ohm hbiao at hner Hi oinHmo ed mad : oanHno qdmno lrdt banih onebr asosh lmen nqH Sm atno at polos ki kn zoh ohoa HSb blbo llkt Smh brglio : oipgS atno basos onqH ato onba al miTolini : omSm izano banih onpge mmHrt al mol kios obiom hSliSi ebrno al smos onln bTrogolion olmHrto bano al miliTos : ki polos amr lebr mel pni apsos pn izTrk lhtmhmh basia ki az lboa am iokl ed Hg hSboeot iroSlim : ommiliTos SlH al apsos oiqra at cqni hqhlh : oibao alio oiamr lhm atm idetm aik hiiti emkm bkl et mn hiom hraSon aSr drkh rgli basia : aSr ebdti at hadon bkl enoh obdmeot hrbh obmsot hmzaot ati bnkli hihodim : aik la kHdti mkm kl dbr toelt ohgdtio lkm olmdti atkm brbim obkl bit obit : oaeid lihodim olionim at htSobh lalhim oat hamonh badnino ihoSe hmSiH : oeth hnni asir hroH llkt iroSlim oainni iode mh iqrni Sm : aps ki roH hqdS meid bkl eir oeir lamr ki mosrot ozrot nkono li : abl la aHoS laHt mhnh ogm npSi la iqrh beini lmen aSlim bSmHh at mrozti oat hSrot aSr qblti mat hadon ihoSe lheid el bSort Hsd alihm : oeth hnh ide anki ki atm klkm aSr hthlkti bqrbkm hlok ohSme at mlkot ihoh ki la tosipo eod raot pni : el kn meid ani bkm hiom hch ki nqi anki mdmi klkm : ki la kHdti mhgid lkm at ezt halhim klh : lkn Smro at npSotikm oat kl hedr aSr hqim atkm roH hqdS lpqidim bo lreot at edt halhim aSr qnh lo bdm npSo : ki ide ani aSr aHri zati iboao btokkm cabim ecim aSr la iHoso el hedr : ogm mqrbkm iqomo anSim dbri thpkot lhTot aHrihm at htlmidim : el kn Sqdo ockro ki SlS Snim iomm olilh la Hdlti ldbr el lb kl aHd mkm bdmeot : oeth aHi ani msr atkm lalhim oldbr Hsdo aSr lo hiklt lbnot atkm oltt lkm nHlh bqrb kl hmqdSim : la Hmdti ksp aiS ao chbo ao lboSo : oatm idetm ki idi alh ebdo bed zrki obed zrki hhlkim ati : obkl hraiti atkm ki kn elino leml oltmk at hHlSim olckr at dbri hadon ihoSe ki hoa amr Tob aSr ttn mStqH : oaHri dbro at hdbrim halh kre el brkio oitpll em klm : oibko klm bki gdol oiplo el zoari polos oinSqo lo : obiotr htezbo el hdbr aSr dbr ki la iosipo eod lraot pnio oiloho al hanih :

21

oihi kaSr nprdno mhm onrd banih onboa drk iSrh al qos ommHrt al rodos omSm al pTrh : Sm mzano anih ebrt al pinoqia onrd bh onebr : onra at pni qpros onecbnh lSmal onebr al soria ongie al zor ki Smh ioziao at memst hanih : onmza at htlmidim onSb Sm Sbet imim ohm amro al polos el pi hroH lblti elot iroSlim : oihi aHri mlat lno himim halh onza llkt ldrkno oiloo atno klm em nSihm oem Tpm ed mHoz leir onkre el brkino el Hop him ontpll : onbrk aiS at reho onel al hanih ohmh Sbo aiS lbito : oanHno klino at drk him onrd mzor al eko onSal lSlom haHim onSb atm iom aHd : ommHrt nseno polos oaSr ato onba al qsrin onlk al bit pilpos hmbSr aSr hoa aHd mn hSbeh onSb emo : olo hio arbe bnot btolot mtnbaot : oihi bhiotno Sm imim rbim oird nbia aHd mihodh oSmo agbos : oiba azlno oiqH at acor polos oiasr bo at idio oat rglio oiamr kh amr roH hqdS kkh iasro hihodim biroSlim at haiS aSr lo hacor hch oisgirho bidi hgoim : oihi kaSr Smeno at cat onbqS mmno anHno oanSi hmqom aSr la ielh iroSlim : oien polos oiamr mh lkm aSr tbko otSbro lbbi ki nkon anki la lbd lhasr ki gm lmot biroSlim el Sm ihoSe hadon : ola abh Sme onrp mmno lamr rzon ihoh ieSh : oaHri himim halh nSano at klino onel iroSlim : oilko atno gm tlmidim mqsrin oibiao atno llon bbit aiS kti oSmo mnson ohoa tlmid iSn : oihi kbano iroSlim oiqblo atno haHim bSmHh : ommHrt hiom nkns polos emno al ieqb oibao Smh kl hcqnim : oiSalm lSlom oispr aHt laHt at aSr eSh halhim lgoim bSroto : oiSmeo oihllo at halhim oiamro alio hnk rah aHino kmh rbbot ihodim bao lhamin oklm mqnaim ltorh : ohm Smeo elik Smoeh ki tlmd at kl hihodim aSr bqrb hgoim lsor mmSh bamrk ki ain elihm lmol at bnihm ollkt bHqot htorh : oeth mh leSot hnh hasp iasp hmon hem ki iSmeo ki bat : lkn eSh cat apoa aSr namr alik : hnh iS atno arbeh anSim aSr ndr elihm atm qH lk ohThr atm oSlm hhozaot bedm lmen aSr iglHo at raSm oideo klm ki Smoet Soa Smeo elik oki ath bezmk mthlk bHqot htorh : oel dbr hmaminim bgoim ktbno ogcrno aSr la iSmro dbr malh rq lhSmr mcbHi alilim omn hdm ombSr hnHnq omn hcnot : oiqH polos at hanSim oiThr atm ommHrt ba al hmqdS oigd ki mlao imi Thrtm ed ki hqrb qrbn kl aHd mhm : oihi kaSr qrbo Sbet himim lklot ohihodim aSr masia rao ato bmqdS oieorro at kl hhmon oiSlHo bo at idihm : oizeqo lamr anSi iSral ecro ch hoa haiS hmlmd at kl adm aSr bkl harz srh el hem hch oel htorh oel hmqom hch ogm hbia al hmqdS anSim ionim oiHll at hmqom hqdoS hch : ki hio raim at Tropimos hapsi beir ato oiHSbo ki polos hbia ato al hmqdS : othm kl heir oirz hem oiqbz oiaHco at polos oimSkho al mHoz lmqdS optam sgro hdltot : ohmh mbqSim lhmito ohSmoeh bah al Sr halp Sl hgdod ki kl iroSlim nbokh : oimhr oiqH ato anSi zba oSri maot oirz alihm oihi kraotm at Sr halp oat anSi hzba oiHdlo mhkot at polos : oigS Sr halp oiHcq bo oizo lasro bnHStim oiSal mi hoa ch omh eSh : oieno mn hem alh bkh oalh bkh ola ikl ldet maomh al nkon mrb hSaon oizo lholiko al hmzd : oihi kboao ed hmelot oiSaho anSi hzba mpni Hmt hem : ki em rb hlk aHrio ohm zeqim oamrim hsr ato : okaSr hqrib polos lhasp al hmzd amr al Sr halp htniH li ldbr alik dbr oiamr hidet ionit : ham aink hmzri aSr lpni himim halh heir mrd ohozia hmdbrh arbet alpim anSi dmim : oiamr polos aiS ihodi anki mTrsos bn eir qiliqia aSr ainnh bli Sm oeth aSalh matk hniHh li ldbr al hem : oinH lo oiemd polos el hmelot hnip ido al hem othi dmmh rbh oidbr blSon ebrit oiamr :

22

anSim aHim oabot Smeo na at dbri htnzloti alikm : oihi kSmem ki hoa mdbr alihm blSon ebrit oiHSo eod iotr : oiamr aiS ihodi anki nold bTrsos aSr bqiliqia omgdl beir hcat lrgli gmlial omlmd lpi dqdoqi tort abotino oahi mqna lalhim kmokm klkm hiom : oardp at hdrk hcat ed mot oahi asr omsgir lkla anSim onSim : kaSr gm ieid eli hkhn hgdol okl bit hcqnim aSr mhm lqHti mktbim oalk al haHim ldmSq lasr ap at hnmzaim Smh lhbiam iroSlim lmen iosro : oihi anki hlk oqrb ldmSq ket zhrim optam ngh eli msbib aor gdol mn hSmim : oapl arzh oaSme qol mdbr ali Saol Saol lmh trdpni : oaen oamr mi ath adni oiamr ali ani ihoSe hnzri aSr ath rdpo : ohanSim aSr ati rao at haor oiirao oat qol hmdbr ali la Smeo : oamr mh aeSh adni oiamr ali hadon qom lk al dmSq oSm iamr lk at kl aSr zoit leSot : oani la iklti lraot mpni chr haor hhoa ohanSim aSr ati holikoni bid oaba ldmSq : oaiS Hsid kpi htorh oSmo Hnnih aSr qnh lo Sm Tob bqrb kl hihodim hiSbim Sm : oiba ali oiemd oiamr ali Saol aHi Sob rah obSeh hhia npqHo eini oraitiho : oiamr alhi abotino bHr bk ldet at rzono olraot at hzdiq olSme qol mpiho : ki hio thih lo led al kl bni hadm el kl aSr rait oSmet : oeth lmh ttmhmh qom ohTbl ohtrHz mHTatik bqrak bSmo : oihi bSobi al iroSlim oatpll bmqdS othi eli id ihoh : oara aoto mdbr ali HoSh za bmhrh miroSlim ki la iqblo at edotk eli : oamr hla hm iodeim at aSr hSlkti al hkla ohlqiti bbti hknsiot at hmaminim bk : obhSpk dm asTpnos edk ap ani emdti Sm Hpz bhrgto oSomr at bgdi hrgio : oiamr ali lk ki ani al hgiom ed lmrHoq aSlHk : oiSmeo alio ed hdbr hch oiSao at qolm oiamro hsiro aiS kch mel hadmh ki ainno raoi ki iHih : oihi bhiotm zeqim omSlikim at bgdihm melihm ocrqim epr hSmimh : oizo Sr halp lholiko al hmzd oiamr lbdqo bmlqot lmen ide mdoe hmh kkh zeqim elio : oihi kaSr asr lhkoto brzoeot oiamr al Sr hmah hemd elio hap rSion lkm lhkot aiS romi bla din omSpT : oilk Sr hmah kSmeo at hdbr hch oigd lSr halp lamr rah mh teSh ki haiS hch romi hoa : oiba Sr halp oiamr amr li hromi ath oiamr hn : oien Sr halp ani bksp rb qniti li mSpT hacrHot hcat oiamr polos oani ap noldti bh : ac hrpo mmno hanSim aSr bao lbdqo ogm Sr halp ira bdeto ki romi hoa ohoa asr aoto : ommHrt bqS ldet al nkon el mh STnim aoto hihodim oitr mosrotio oizo lhbia at raSi hkhnim oat kl hsnhdrin oiord at polos oiemidho btokm :

23

oibT polos al hsnhdrin oiamr anSim aHim bkl tmt lbbi hthlkti lpni alhim ed hiom hch : oizo Hnnih hkhn hgdol at hemdim elio lhkoto el pio : oiamr alio polos ikkh alhim hqir hmsid hamnm iSb ath ldin ati ktorh oath mzoh lhkoti Sla ktorh : oiamro hemdim Sm at hkhn hgdol lalhim tHrp : oiamr polos aHi la ideti aSr hoa hkhn hgdol ki ktob nSia bemk la tar : opolos ide ki mqztm zdoqim omqztm proSim oizeq btok hsnhdrin anSim aHim proS bn proS anki oel tqot hmtim otHitm ani ndin : obdbro hdbr hch hih rib bin hzdoqim obin hproSim oiHlq hhmon : ki hzdoqim amrim ain tHih oain mlak oroH ohproSim modim bSnihm : othi hmlh gdolh oiqomo hsoprim aSr mkt hproSim oitokHo lamr la mzano dbr re baiS hch oam roH dbr alio ao mlak al nlHmh balhim : ohrib holk oHcq oSr halp dag pn iSseo at polos oizo at anSi hzba lrdt olHTp ato mtokm olhkiao al hmzd : oblilh hhoa nzb elio hadon oiamr Hcq polos ki kaSr heidot li biroSlim kn hed teid bromi : oihi lpnot hbqr oitHbro hihodim oiasro asr el npSm lamr ki la iaklo ola iSto ed am ihrgo at polos : omspr hbaim balh hcat hih iotr marbeim : oigSo la raSi hkhnim oal hcqnim lamr asr asrno el npSno lblti Tem maomh ed am hrgno at polos : oeth hodieo atm ohsnhdrin at Sr halp oioridho mHr alikm kalo tHpzo ldrS hiTb at enino oanHno nkonim lhmito bTrm iqrb alikm : oiSme bn aHot polos at arbm oilk oiba al hmzd oigd lpolos : oiqra polos laHd mSri hmaot oiamr alio holk at hbHor hch al Sr halp ki dbr lo lhodieo : oiqHho oiolikho al Sr halp oiamr polos hasir qrani alio oibqS mmni lholik alik at hbHor hch ki dbr lo lhgid lk : oiaHc Sr halp bido oisr emo lbdo oiSalho mh hoa ch aSr lk lhodieni : oiamr ki noezo hihodim iHdo lbqS mmk ki mHr torid at polos lpni hsnhdrin ohmh kalo Hpzim ldet hiTb at enino : oath al tSme lhm ki arbim lo mhm iotr marbeim aiS aSr asro asr el npSm lblti akl oStot bTrm ihrgoho ohmh eth emdim omHkim lhbTHtk : oiSlH Sr halp at hbHor oizoho lblti amr laiS ki glh lo at hdbr hch : oiqra lSni Sri maot oiamr hHlzo matkm anSi zba matim llkt lqsrin oprSim Sbeim omSki qSt matim mn hSeh hSliSit blilh : obhmot ikino lhrkib at polos lmen hbiao Slm al piliks hhgmon : oiktb agrt och tkn dbrih : qlodios losias al piliks hhgmon hadir Slom : at haiS hch tpSo hihodim oibqSo hmito oaba em anSi hzba oaplTho mtokm bSmei ki romi hoa : obaSr Hpzti ldet el mh Smno ato hordtio al hsnhdrin Slhm : oamza ki STno ato el dbri Salot dtm ola el dbr aSr ihih elio Hib mith ao mosrot : oeth hnh hgd li Shihodim mtnklim baiS hch oaSlHho alik mid ogm at STnio zoiti lboa olhgiS STntm lpnik oath Slom : oiqHo anSi hzba at polos kaSr zoo oibiaho lilh al anTpTris : ommHrt hniHo at hprSim llkt ato oiSobo lmzd : ohmh bao al qsrin oitno at hagrt bidi hhgmon oiemido lpnio gm at polos : oihi kqra hhgmon at hagrt oiSal mai ch mdinh hoa oihi kSmeo ki hoa mqiliqia oiamr : aSme at dbrik bboa gm STnik hnh oizo lSmro bbit hmSpT aSr lhordos :

24

oird Hnnih hkhn hgdol aHri HmSt imim oato hcqnim oTrTlos aiS dbrim oiodieo at hhgmon at dbr ribm em polos : oihi kaSr qrao lo oiHl TrTlos lSTno oiamr : at aSr iSbno el idk bSlom rb oaSr neSo tqnot rbot lem hch bhSgHtk nqbl el kl pnim obkl mqom bkl todh piliks hadir : ak lblti hlaotk hrbh atHnn alik aSr tSmeno bqzr dbrino kHmltk : ki mzano at haiS hch kqTb omgrh mdinim bin kl hihodim el pni tbl ohoa raS kt hnzrim : ohoa gm nsh lHll at hmqdS ontpS aoto onHpz lSpTo el pi tortno : oiba elino losias Sr halp brb kH oiHTpho midino : oizo at STnio ki boa ibao lpnik oath ki tHqr ato tokl ldet mpiho at kl hdbrim halh aSr anHno Tenim elio : oimlao hihodim at dbrio lamr ki kn hoa : oirmc hhgmon al polos ldbr oien oiamr ien aSr ideti ki ch kmh Snim SopT ath lem hch hnni mzTdq blb bToH el enini : ath tokl ldet aSr la ebro iotr mSnim eSr iom met eloti iroSlim lhStHot : ola bmqdS mzaoni mtokH em aiS ao meorr mhomh bem ola bbti hknsiot ola beir : gm ain bikltm lhokiH eli at aSr eth hm STnim aoti : abl at cat modh ani lpnik ki bdrk hhia aSr iqraoh bSm kt bh ani ebd at alhi abotino bhamini bkl hktob btorh obnbiaim : otqoti lalhim aSr gm hm iHko lh cat hia ki etidh lhiot tHit hmtim lzdiqim olrSeim : obcat gm emlti lhiot tmim lb lalhim oladm tmid : omqz Snim rbot bati lhbia ndbot lemi olhqrib qrbn : oahi mThr bmqdS la bhmon em ola bmhomh okn mzaoni anSim ihodim masia : aSr elihm hih lemd hnh lpnik olenot bi am hih lhm dbr ngdi : ao alh idbro na hmh mh mzao bi eol bemdi lpni hsnhdrin : blti am hdbr haHd hhoa aSr qrati bemdi btokm ki el tHit hmtim ani ndon hiom lpnikm : oihi kSme piliks at hdrim halh oiaHr at dinm let aHrt ki enini hdrk hcat nodeo lo hiTb oiamr brdt ali losias Sr halp aSpT el dbrkm : oizo at Sr hmah lSom ato bmSmr oltt lo roHh olblti mne aiS mmideio mSrt ato omboa alio : oaHri imim aHdim ba piliks em aSto droslh ohia ihodit oiSlH lqra lpolos oiSme ato el dbr hamonh bmSiH : oihi kdbro el hzdq ohpriSot oel hdin hetid lboa oiHrd piliks oien eth ch lk olkSapnh aSob lqra lk : ohoa mqoh ki polos itn lo SHd lmen itirho obebor ch qra lo pemim hrbh oidbr emo : oihi mqz Sntim imim oiqm prqios psTos tHt piliks opiliks Hpz lhtrzot al hihodim oiecb at polos HboS bbit hasorim :

25

oiba psTos al hmdinh oiel aHri SlSt imim mqsrin liroSlim : ohkhn hgdol oraSi hihodim hodieho at ribm em polos : oipzro bo oiSalo mmno leSot Hsd emhm lhbiao iroSlim ohmh mtnklim ato lhmito bdrk : oien aotm psTos ki ezor polos bqsrin oki gm hoa iSob Smh bqrob : oiamr lkn irdo ati hezomim Sbkm oam iS maom baiS hch ieno bo : oiSb btokm iotr mimim eSrh oird al qsrin ommHrt iSb el ksa hmSpT oizo lhbia at polos : hoa ba ohihodim aSr irdo miroSlim sbbho oiaSimo at polos baSmot rbot oqSot aSr la iklo lhokiH : ohoa hzTdq lamr la HTati bmaomh la ldt hihodim ola lmqdS ola lqisr : opsTos Hpz lhtrzot al hihodim oien at polos oiamr htHpz lelot iroSlim lhSpT el alh lpni Smh : oiamr polos lpni ksa mSpT hqisr ani emd oSm nkon li lhSpT la hreti lihodim kaSr idet hiTb gm ath : am hreti oiS bi dbr mSpT mot bl aHSk npSi mmot oam ain bi maomh mkl aSr hm enim bi aiS la iokl lhsgirni al idm at hqisr ani qora ldini : oioez psTos em ioezio oien ato lamr at hqisr qrat al hqisr tlk : oihi aHri imim oirdo hmlk agrps obrniqh al qsrin lSal lSlom psTos : oihi ki arko lhm himim Sm oispr psTos lmlk at rib polos lamr iS ph aiS aSr piliks hniHo asor : obhioti biroSlim dbro ali raSi hkhnim ocqni hihodim el adotio oibqSo mmni lHrz mSpTo : oaen aotm ki ain mnhg hromiim lmgn aiS labd bTrm iemd hnSTn lnkH STnio ontn lo mqom lhzTdq mn hSTnh : olkn kaSr bao hnh iHd HSti ola htmhmhti ki mmHrt hiom iSbti el ksa hmSpT oazoh lhbia at haiS : oiemdo elio STnio ola hbiao elio dbr re maSr hiiti HSd ato : rq hio lhm dbri ribt lngdo el ebodt alhihm oel mt aHd ihoSe Smo aSr amr elio polos ki hoa Hi : otkbd beini hSalh hcat oamr hHpz ath llkt iroSlim olhSpT Sm el alh : abl polos Sal lhniHo bmSmr ed zat mSpTo mlpni agosTos oazoh lSmro ed aSr aSlH ato al hqisr : oiamr agrps al psTos gm ani Hpz lSme at haiS oiamr mHr tSmeno : oihi mmHrt kboa agrps obrniqh bhod gdol oibao al alm hmSmet hmh oSri halp ongidi heir oizo psTos oibiao at polos : oiamr psTos agrps hmlk okl haiSim aSr atm ph atno hnkm raim at haiS aSr beboro pgeo bi kl hmon hihodim gm biroSlim ogm ph oizeqo ki aino bdin SiHih eod : oani kaSr hkrti ki la eSh dbr lHibo mith ohoa gm hoa qra at agosTos ldino iezti lSlH ato Smh : ak ain li lktb elio dbr nkon ladnino obebor cat hbiatio lpnikm obiotr lpnik hmlk agrps lmen iHqr oideti mh aktb : ki la itkn beini lSloH asir mbli hodie gm at elilt hdbrim aSr Smo lo :

26

oiamr agrps al polos ntn lk ldbr bed npSk ac izTdq polos oioST at ido oiamr : maSr ani at npSi hmlk agrps ki lpnik azTdq hiom el kl aSr STnim ati hihodim : ki ath ide hiTb kl hmnhgim ohSalot aSr bin hihodim oel kn aSalh matk lSme ati kark roHk : hnh at drki mneori aSr hthlkti bh mac btok emi obiroSlim ideim aoth kl hihodim : ki mimim raSonim ideoni am irzo lheid ki kproS htnhgti el pi hkt hmqpdt biotr bebodtno : oeth ani emd lhSpT el tqot hhbTHh aSr hbTiHh halhim at abotino : oaSr Snim eSr SbTino miHlim lhgie lh bebdm at ihoh tmid iomm olilh el dbr htqoh hcat agrps hmlk STnim aoti hihodim : mdoe ipla beinikm ki halhim iHih mtim : hn lpnim ani HSbti zdqh lzrr at Sm ihoSe hnzri ed mad : kaSr eSiti biroSlim ogm qdoSim rbim ani hsgrti lbti klaim brSion aSr qblti mat hkhnim hgdolim okSnhrgo hskmti : obkl bti hknsiot isrti atm pemim rbot oanstim lgdp oathollh bm ed mad oardpm ed lerim aSr Hozh larz : oihi blkti el cat ldmSq brSion hkhnim hgdolim obmzotm : ohnh adni hmlk bzhrim bdrk raiti aor zH mchr hSmS aSr mSmim ngh eli msbib oel hhlkim ati : onpl klno arzh oaSme qol mdbr ali blSon ebrit lamr Saol Saol lmh trdpni qSh lk lbeT bdrbnot : oamr mi ath adni oiamr anki ihoSe aSr ath rdp : abl qom oemd el rglik ki lbebor cat nraiti alik lbHr bk lmSrt oled el aSr rait oel aSr arak : bhzili aotk mn hem omn hgoim aSr aSlHk eth alihm : lpqH at einihm lmen iSobo mHSk laor omid hSTn al halhim oimzao bamontm bi at sliHt hHTaim oat hnHlh btok hmqdSim : el kn hmlk agrps la hmriti at hmrah aSr raiti mn hSmim : ki am qrati raSonh liSbi dmSq oiroSlim obkl arz ihodh ogm lgoim ki inHmo oiSobo al halhim oieSo meSim raoim ltSobh : obgll hdbr hch tpSo ati hihodim bmqdS oibqSo lhmitni : ohalhim hih becri oed hiom hch emd ani omeid lpni qTn ogdol oainni mdbr dbr colti aSr dbro hnbiaim omSh ki etidot hnh lhiot : ki hmSiH menh hoa oki raSon hoa lqmim mn hmtim lhpiz aor bem obgoim : oihi hoa mzTdq kcat oien psTos bqol gdol lamr hnk mStge polos rb hlmod hbiak lidi Sgeon : oiamr polos ainni mSge psTos hadir ki am dbri amt oTem abie : ki hmlk iode at alh oel cat gm bbTHon ani mdbr alio ien aSr la aamin ki nelm mmno dbr mn hdbrim halh ki la bqrn coit neSth cat : hmlk agrps hmamin ath bnbiaim ideti ki mamin ath : oiamr agrps al polos eod meT optitni lhiot nzri : oiamr polos abqSh malhim aSr am bmeT oam bhrbh la ath lbdk ki gm kl hSmeim aoti ihio kmoni colti hmosrot halh : oihi bdbro hdbr hch oiqm hmlk ohhgmon obrniqh ohiSbim atm : oisoro hHdrh oidbro aiS al reho lamr haiS hch la eSh dbr aSr ihih elio Hib mith ao mosrot : oiamr agrps al psTos haiS hch iokl lhpTr lola qra at hqisr ldino :

27

okaSr ngmr hdin ki nebr banih al aiTlia msro at polos omqzt asirim aHrim al Sr hmah lgdod agosTos oSmo iolios : onrd al anih adrmTit nknim lboa el pni Hop asia onebr himh oihi atno arsTrkos moqdon mn tsloniqi : ommHrt hgeno al zidon oiolios eSh em polos Hsd oinH lo llkt al mideio lhecr bidm : onlk mSm onebr bsbibot qpros ki hroHot hio lngdno : onebr at him aSr lpni qiliqia opmpolia onba al mora aSr bloqia : oimza Sm Sr hmah anih alksndrit bah laiTlia oiebirno ltokh : ohanih hlkh bkbdot imim rbim oaHri aSr igeno obano al mol qnidos la hniHno hroH lHtr al hibSh onebr mzd lqriTi el pni hr slmoni : oaHri aSr ebrno btlaot bano lmqom aHd nqra qlilmni aSr qrobh lo eir oSmh lsia : oihi mqz imim rbim kaSr bah et hsknh lirdi him ki gm hzom kbr ebr oichr atm polos : oiamr alihm anSim rah ani ki hliktno thih ak mri oncq gdol la lbd lmemsh olanih ki am gm lnpSotino : oSr hmah la Sme al dbri polos ki am al rb hHbl oal bel hanih : obaSr hHop ainno Tob lemd bo bimi hstio iezo hrbim lebr mSm lamr aoli nokl hgie lpiniks oiSbno Sm bimi hsto ohoa Hop bqriTi ponh drk hdrom merbh odrk hzpon merbh : oroH nSbt laT mdrom oiHSbo ki tzlH eztm bidm oielo heogin oiebro lemt Spt qriTi : oihi kmeT aHri kn otpge bh roH nHSl hnqrah aoriqlidon : otTrp hanih ola iklh lemd ngd hroH onrp idino mmnh onndp : otrz hanih al ebr ai qTn hnqra qlodh okmeT la iklno laHc hebrh : oaHri mSkm aoth alihm oiqHo lecr at kl aSr hSigh idm oiHSbo at dpni hanih omiratm pn iplo al bin rksi hHol horido at kli hmprS okh ndpo : oihi hser holk oser elino ommHrt hTilo at hmemsh al him : obiom hSliSi hTlno bidino at kli hanih al him : oihi imim rbim gm hSmS gm hkokbim la nrao ohserh Hcqh elino ed mad otkrt mmno kl tqot ihoSeh : opolos emd btokm aHri harikm bzom oiamr anSim lo Smetm ali ola izatm mqriTi ki ac la qrno hncq hch bmrikm : oeth ani amr alikm Hcqo oamzo ki la tabd npS mkm blti hspinh lbdh : ki blilh hch nzb eli mlak halhim aSr lo anki oaSr ani ebd ato : oiamr al tira polos elik eod lemd lpni hqisr oeth hnh ntn lk halhim at kl hhlkim atk banih : el kn anSim Hcqo oamzo ki mamin ani lalhim ki kn ihih kaSr namr ali : ak hSlk nSlk al aHd haiim : oihi kboa lil arbeh eSr lTlTolno bim adrih kHzot hlilh oiHSbo hmlHim ki qrbh lhm ibSt : oiorido at hank oimzao emq him eSrim qomh oiebro meT oiosipo lhorid at hank oimzao qomot HmS eSrh : oiirao pn ipgeo bSni hsleim oiSliko mel aHori hanih arbeh eoginim al him oikspo laor hiom : ohmlHim bqSo lbrH mn hanih oiorido at hebrh al him bamrm ki iS at npSm lSlH eoginim gm mraS hanih : oiamr polos al Sr hmah oal anSi hzba lamr am alh la iSbo atno banih la toklo atm lhoSe : oiqzzo anSi hzba at Hbli hebrh oitnoh lnpol : ohbqr Trm iaor opolos mbqS mklm lTem lHm lamr hiom iom arbeh eSr aSr Hkitm zmim ola Temtm maomh : el kn qra ani atkm lTem lHm ki hoa lmHitkm ki aiS aiS mkm la ipl mSert raSo arzh : hoa dbr at hdbrim halh ohoa lqH at hlHs oiodh lalhim lpni klm oibze oiHl lakl : oiamz lb klm oiTemo akl gm hmh : oanHno kl npS aSr banih matim oSbeim oSS : oiaklo lSbeh oiqlo mel hanih oiTilo at hzdh al him : hbqr aor ola hkiro at harz abl rao kmprz oHop lo oioezo lnhg alio at hanih am ioklo : oigdeo at heoginim oiecbom lim oitiro gm at mitri hmnhig oiprSo mprS htrn al pni hroH oibqSo lba al hHop : oipgeo bmqom aSr him mSni ebrio otdbq bo hanih otemd raSh la inoe oaHorih nSbro mSaon hglim : othi ezt anSi hzba lhmit at hasirim pn iSHh aiS mhm oimlT : oSr hmah Hpz lhzil at polos oina at eztm oiamr mi ide lSHot ird oiebr libSh braSnh ohnSarim alh el qrSim oalh el Sbri hanih : oihi kn oimlTo klm al hibSh :

28

okaSr nmlTno node lno ki Sm hai mliTi : ohnkrim la hmeiTo Hsdm emno ki bero aS oiaspo at klno alihm mpni hgSm hiord ompni hqr : opolos asp lo ermt qzim oiSm el hmoqd omn hHm iza apeh oiaHc bido : oirao hnkrim at hHih tloih el ido oiamro aiS al reho akn rzH haiS hch aSr hnqmh la hniHh lo lHiot ap ki nmlT mn him : ohoa ner at hHih mel ido al tok haS ola hreh lo maomh : ohm hoHilo aSr izbh gopo ao aSr ipl mt ptam oiHilo ed boS ohnh la qrho kl ason oihpk lbm oiamro ki alhim hoa : obsbibo hmqom hhoa hio Sdot aSr lraS anSi hai oSmo poblios hoa hbia atno lbito oiklkl atno bTobo SlSt imim : oabi poblios moTl lmSkb bqdHt obmHlh hmeim oiba alio polos oitpll oiSm elio at idio oirpaho : oaHri hmeSh hch bao gm hHlim haHrim aSr bai oirpao : oikbdno kbod gdol oblktno mSm spqo lno di zrkno : oaHri SlSt HdSim ebrno mSm banih alksndrit aSr iSbh bai bimi hsto oaot dglh htaomim : onba al srqosa onSb Sm SlSt imim : mSm sbno onba al rgion obnSb roH dromit biom hmHrt bano biom hSni al poTioli : oSm mzano aHim oibqSo mmno lSbt atm Sbet imim obkn hlkno al romi : oiSmeo haHim at boano oizao mSm lqratno ed lSoq apios oed lSlSt hHniot oira atm polos oiodh lalhim oitHcq : oaHr bano al romi hebir Sr hmah at hasirim al Sr hzba olpolos hniHo lSbt lbdo em aiS hzba hSmr aoto : oihi aHri SlSt imim oiqra polos alio at raSi hihodim oiqhlo alio oiamr alihm anSim aHim ap ki la melti mel bemno obHqot abotino asroni biroSlim oimsroni lidi hromiim : ohm aHri Hqrm ati amro lpTrni ki la nmza bi mSpT mot : ohihodim qmo bi oaans lqra at hqisr ldini ak ain npSi lSTon at emi bdbr : obebor cat qrati lkm lraotkm oldbr emkm ki bgll tqot iSral asor ani bkbl hch : oiamro alio la qblno el adotik agrot marz ihodh ola ba hnh aHd mn haHim aSr hgid ao dbr elik dbr re : amnm Hpzim anHno lSme at aSr blbbk ki node lno aSr bkl mqom iribo al hkt hcat : oiSimo lo iom moed oibao alio rbim al mlono oied bhm oibar at mlkot alhim oiokH lhm enini ihoSe mtort mSh omn hnbiaim mbqr ed erb : oiS aSr Smeo al dbrio oiS aSr la hamino : oiHlqo bdetm oisoro llkt ldrkm bdbr polos hdbr haHd hch hiTb dbr roH hqdS labotino bpi iSeiho hnbia lamr : lk oamrt lem hch Smeo Smoe oal tbino orao rao oal tdeo : ki Smn lb hem hch oacnio kbdo oat einio hSe pn irah beinio obacnio iSme olbbo ibin oSb orpatio : lkn deo ki lgoim nSlHh tSoet alhim ohmh iSmeo : oihi bdbro cat hlko mato hihodim oitokHo hrbh aiS em reho : opolos iSb Sntim imim bbito aSr Skr lo oiqbl at kl hbaim alio : oiqra at mlkot halhim oilmd at drki ihoSe hmSiH adnino bkl bTHon lbo oain mne :

ihoSe lpi ioHnn

1

braSit hih hdbr ohdbr hih at halhim oalhim hih hdbr : hoa hih braSit azl halhim : hkl nhih el ido ombledio la nhih kl aSr nhih : bo hio Hiim ohHiim hio aor bni hadm : ohaor bHSk crH ohHSk la hSigo : oihi aiS SloH mat halhim oSmo ioHnn : hoa ba ledot lheid el haor lmen iamino klm el ido : hoa la hih haor ki am lheid el haor : haor hamti hmair lkl adm hih ba al heolm : beolm hih oel ido nhih heolm oheolm la hkiro : hoa ba al aSr lo oaSr hmh lo la qblho : ohmqblim ato ntn ec lmo lhiot bnim lalhim hmaminim bSmo : aSr la mdm ola mHpz hbSr ap la mHpz gbr ki am malhim noldo : ohdbr nhih bSr oiSkn btokno onHch tparto ktpart bn iHid labio rb Hsd oamt : oioHnn meid elio oiqra lamr hnh ch hoa aSr amrti elio hba aHri hih lpni ki qdm li hih : ommloao lqHno klno Hsd el Hsd : ki htorh ntnh bid mSh ohHsd ohamt bao el idi ihoSe hmSiH : at halhim la rah aiS meolm hbn hiHid aSr bHiq hab hoa hodie : ocat hia edot ioHnn bSlH hihodim miroSlim khnim oloim lSal ato mi ath : oiodh ola kHS oiodh lamr ani ainni hmSiH : oiSalo ato mi apoa ath hath aliho oiamr ainni hath hnbia oien la : oiamro alio mi ch ath lmen nSib lSlHino dbr mh tamr elik : oiamr ani qol qora bmdbr pno drk ihoh kaSr dbr iSeiho hnbia : ohmSlHim hio mn hproSim : oiSalho oiamro alio mdoe apoa mTbil ath am aink hmSiH ao alih ao hnbia : oien atm ioHnn oiamr anki mTbil bmim obtokkm eomd aSr la idetm ato : hoa hba aHri aSr hih lpni oani nqlti mhtir Srok nelio : cat hith bbit ebrh mebr lirdn mqom aSr ioHnn mTbil Sm : oihi mmHrt oira ioHnn at ihoSe ba alio oiamr hnh Sh halhim hnSa HTat heolm : ch hoa aSr amrti elio aHri iba aiS aSr hih lpni ki qdm li hih : oani la idetio ki am bebor iglh biSral bati ani lTbl bmim : oied ioHnn oiamr Hciti hroH kdmot ionh irdt mSmim otnH elio : oani la idetio aolm hSlH ati lTbl bmim hoa amr ali at aSr trah hroH irdt onHh elio hnh ch hoa aSr iTbl broH hqdS : oani raiti oaeidh ki ch hoa bn halhim : oihi mmHrt oisp ioHnn oiemd oSnim mtlmidio emo : oibT al ihoSe ohoa mthlk oiamr hnh Sh halhim : oSni tlmidio Smeo at dbro oilko aHri ihoSe : oipn ihoSe aHrio oira atm hlkim aHrio oiamr alihm mh tbqSo oiamro alio rbi proSo mori aiph tlin : oiamr alihm bao orao oibao oirao at mqom mlono oiSbo emo biom hhoa ohet kSeh heSirit : oaHd mn hSnim aSr Smeo mat ioHnn ohlko aHrio hoa andri aHi Smeon pTros : hoa pgS braSonh at Smeon aHio oiamr alio at hmSiH mzano aSr trgomo krisTos : oiolikho al ihoSe oihi khbiT alio ihoSe oiamr Smeon bn ionh lk iqra kipa aSr trgomo pTros : oihi mmHrt oioal ihoSe lzat hglilh oimza at pilpos oiamr alio lk aHri : opilpos hih mbit zidh eir andri opTros : oipge pilpos at ntnal oiamr alio mzano ato aSr ktb mSh bspr htorh ohnbiaim at ihoSe bn iosp mnzrt : oiamr alio ntnal hmnzrt tza lno Tobh oiamr alio ba orah : oira ihoSe at ntnal ba lqrato oiamr elio hnh bamt bn iSral aSr ain bo rmih : oiamr alio ntnal main idetni oien ihoSe oiamr lo bTrm qra lk pilpos bhiotk tHt htanh anki raitik : oien ntnal oiamr alio rbi ath bn alhim ath hoa mlk iSral : oien ihoSe oiamr alio el amri lk ki tHt htanh raitik hamnt hnh gdlot malh trah : oiamr alio amn amn ani amr lkm meth trao hSmim nptHim omlaki alhim elim oirdim el bn alhim :

2

obiom hSliSi hith Htnh bqnh aSr bglil oam ihoSe hith Sm : oihoSe otlmidio hio gm hm qroaim al hHtnh : oiHsr hiin otamr am ihoSe alio iin ain lhm : oiamr alih ihoSe mh li olk aSh eti edin la bah : otamr amo al hmSrtim kkl aSr iamr lkm teSo : ohnh SSh kdi abn erokim Sm kmSpT hihodim lThrtm Stim ao SlS btim ikil kl aHd : oiamr alihm ihoSe mlao lkm hkdim mim oimlaom ed lmelh : oiamr Sabo na ohbiao al rb hmsbh oibiao : oiTem rb hmsbh at hmim aSr nhpko liin ola ide main hoa oaolm hmSrtim aSr Sabo at hmim ideo oiqra rb hmsbh al hHtn : oiamr alio kl aiS itn braSonh at hiin hTob okaSr iSkro itn lhm at hgroe oath zpnt hiin hTob ed eth : cat tHlt hatot aSr eSh ihoSe bqnh aSr barz hglil oglh at kbodo oiamino bo tlmidio : oihi aHri kn oird al kpr nHom hoa oamo oaHio otlmidio ola arko imi Sbtm Sm : oiqrbo imi Hg hpsH aSr lihodim oiel ihoSe iroSlim : oimza bmqdS mkri bqr ozan obni ionh oat mHlipi ksp iSbim Sm : oiqH Hblim oiebtm lSoT oigrS klm mn hmqdS oat hzan oat hbqr oipcr at meot hSlHnim oihpk SlHntihm : oal mkri hionim amr hoziao alh mch oal teSo at bit abi lbit msHr : oickro tlmidio at hktob ki qnat bitk akltni : oieno hihodim oiamro alio ai co aot trano ki kcat ath eSh : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm hrso at hhikl hch obSlSh imim aqimno : oiamro hihodim hnh ch arbeim oSS Snh nbnh hhikl hch oath bSlSh imim tqimno : ohoa dbr el hikl goito : oaHri qomo mn hmtim ckro tlmidio ki cat amr lhm oiamino bktob obdbr aSr dbr ihoSe : oihi bhito biroSlim bHg hpsH hamino rbim bSmo ki rao hatot aSr eSh : ohoa ihoSe la hpqid at ezmo bidm el aSr ide at klm : ola hzTrk ledot aiS el hadm ki hoa ide mh bqrb hadm :

3

oihi aiS aHd btok hproSim oSmo nqdimon Sr lihodim : oiba al ihoSe lilh oiamr alio rbi ideno ki ath morh mat alhim bat ki la iokl aiS leSot hatot aSr ath eSh blti am halhim emo : oien ihoSe oiamr alio amn amn ani amr lk am la iold aiS mlmelh la iokl lraot mlkot halhim : oiamr alio nqdimon aik iold adm ohoa cqn hki Sob iSob al bTn amo oiold : oien ihoSe amn amn ani amr lk am la iold aiS mn hmim ohroH la iokl lboa al mlkot halhim : hnold mn hbSr bSr hoa ohnold mn hroH roH hoa : al ttmh el amri lk ki elikm lhold mlmelh : hroH baSr iHpz Sm hoa nSb oath tSme at qolo ak la tde main ba oanh hoa holk kn kl hnold mn hroH : oien nqdimon oiamr alio aikh thih kcat : oien ihoSe oiamr alio rbn Sl iSral ath ocat la idet : amn amn ani amr lk ki at aSr ideno ndbr oat aSr raino neid oatm la tqblo edotno : am amrti alikm dbri harz oainkm maminim aik tamino bamri alikm dbri hSmim : oaiS la elh hSmimh blti am aSr ird mn hSmim bn hadm aSr hoa bSmim : okaSr hgbih mSh at hnHS bmdbr kn zrik bn hadm lhnSa : lmen la iabd kl hmamin bo ki am iHih Hii eolmim : ki kkh ahb halhim at heolm ed aSr ntn at bno at iHido lmen la iabd kl hmamin bo ki am iHih Hii eolmim : ki halhim la SlH at bno al heolm ldin at heolm ki am lmen ioSe bo heolm : hmamin bo la idon oaSr la iamin bo kbr ndon ki la hamin bSm bn halhim hiHid : och hoa hdin ki haor ba al heolm obni hadm ahbo hHSk mn haor ki reim meSihm : ki kl pel eolh iSna at haor ola iba laor pn iokHo meSio : abl eSh hamt iba laor lmen iglo meSio ki neSo balhim : oihi aHri hdbrim halh oiba ihoSe otlmidio al arz ihodh oigr Sm emhm oiTbl : ogm ioHnn hih Tbl beinon qrob lSlm ki Smh mim lrb oibao oiTblo : ki eod la ntn ioHnn al bit hshr : oihi rib bin tlmidi ioHnn obin hihodim el dbr hThrh : oibao al ioHnn oiamro alio rbi haiS aSr hih emk bebr hirdn oaSr heidt lo hno Tbl oklm baim alio : oien ioHnn la iokl aiS lqHt dbr blti am ntn lo mn hSmim : oatm edi ki amrti anki ainni hmSiH rq SloH ani lpnio : aSr lo hklh hoa hHtn ore hHtn hemd oSme ato SmoH iSmH lqol hHtn hnh SmHti cat eth Slmh : hoa igdl hlok ogdl oani aHsr hlok oHsor : hba mmel nelh el kl oaSr marz marz hoa omarz idbr hba mSmim nelh el kl : oat aSr rah oSme at cat ieid oain mqbl edoto : oaSr qbl edoto Htom Htm ki halhim amt : ki at aSr SlHo alhim dbri alhim idbr ki la bmdh ntn alhim at hroH : hab ahb at bno oat kl ntn bido : kl hmamin bbn iS lo Hii eolmim oaSr la iamin bbn la irah Hiim ki am Hron alhim iSkn elio :

4

oihi kaSr node ladon ki Smeo hproSim aSr ihoSe hemid ohTbil tlmidim hrbh mioHnn : oaolm ihoSe hoa la hTbil ki am tlmidio : oiecb at arz ihodh oilk Snit hglilh : oihi lo lebr barz Smron : oiba leir meri Smron oSmh sokr hia mmol Hlqt hSdh aSr ntnh ieqb lbno liosp : oSm bar ieqb oihoSe hih eip mn hdrk oiSb lo el hbar ohet kSeh hSSit : otba aSh mSmron lSab mim oiamr alih ihoSe tni na li lStot : ki tlmidio hlko heirh lqnot akl : otamr alio haSh hSmronit hn ihodi ath oaikkh tSal mmni lStot oanki aSh Smronit ki la iterbo hihodim em hSmronim : oien ihoSe oiamr alih lo idet at mtt alhim omi hoa hamr alik tni na li lStot ki eth Salt mmno ontn lk mim Hiim : otamr alio haSh adni hn ain lk kli lSab bo ohbar emqh omain lk apoa mim Hiim : hath gdol mieqb abino aSr ntn lno at hbar hcat oiSt mmnh hoa obnio obeiro : oien ihoSe oiamr alih kl hSth mn hmim halh iSob oizma : oaSr iSth mn hmim aSr anki ntn lo la izma leolm ki hmim aSr atn lo ihio bqrbo lmqor mim nbeim lHii heolmim : otamr alio haSh adni tnh li hmim hhm lmen la azma eod ola aosip lboa hnh lSab : oiamr alih ihoSe lki oqrai laiSk oSobi hlom : oten haSh otamr ain li aiS oiamr alih ihoSe kn dbrt ain li aiS : ki belim HmSh hio lk oaSr lk eth ainno belk lkn amt hdbr aSr dbrt : otamr alio haSh adni rah anki ki nbia ath : abotino hStHoo bhr hch oatm amrim ki iroSlim hia hmqom hnbHr lhStHot Smh : oiamr alih ihoSe aSh hamini li ki tboa Seh aSr la bhr hch ap la biroSlim tStHoo lab : atm mStHoim al aSr la idetm oanHno mStHoim al aSr ideno ki hihoSeh mn hihodim hia : aolm tboa Seh oeth hia aSr ebdi al hamtim iStHoo lab broH obamt ki bmStHoim kalh Hpz hab : halhim roH hoa ohmStHoim lo zrikim lhStHot broH obamt : otamr alio haSh ideti ki iba hmSiH hnqra krisTos hoa bbao igid lno at kl : oiamr alih ihoSe ani hoa hmdbr alik : oihi hoa mdbr kkh otlmidio bao oitmho el dbro em aSh ak la amr lo aiS mh ch tSal ao mh tdbr emh : otecb haSh at kdh otlk heirh otamr al hanSim : bao orao aiS aSr hgid li kl aSr eSiti hki ch hoa hmSiH : oizao mn heir oibao alio : Trm ibao otlmidio bqSo mmno lamr akl na adni : oiamr alihm iS li akl lakl aSr atm la idetm : oiamro htlmidim aiS al reho hki hbia lo aiS lakl : oiamr alihm ihoSe makli hoa leSot rzon SlHi olhSlim meSho : hla atm tamro ki eod arbeh HdSim ohqzir ba hnh ani amr lkm Sao einikm orao bSdot ki kbr hlbino lqzir : ohqozr iqH Skro oiasp tboah lHii eolmim lmen iSmHo iHdo gm hcre gm hqozr : ki bcat amt hmSl ki ch cre oaHr iqzr : anki SlHti atkm lqzr at aSr la emltm bo oaHrim emlo oatm nknstm bemlm : oiamino bo Smrnim rbim mn heir hhia el dbr haSh aSr heidh lamr hoa hgid li at kl aSr eSiti : oihi kaSr bao alio hSmrnim oiSalo mmno lSbt atm oiSb Sm iomim : oeod rbim mhmh hamino bo bebor dbro : oiamro al haSh meth la bebor mamrk namin ki bacnino Smeno onde ki amnm ch hoa hmSiH moSie heolm : oihi mqz Sni himim oiza mSm llkt hglilh : ki hoa ihoSe heid ki nbia barz moldto ainno nkbd : oihi hoa ba arz hglil oiaspho anSi hglil ki rao at kl aSr eSh biroSlim bimi hHg ki gm hm elo lHg at hHg : oiba ihoSe eod hpem al qnh aSr bglil mqom Somo hmim liin oaiS hih mebdi hmlk obno Hlh bkpr nHom : oihi kSmeo ki ba ihoSe mihodh larz hglil oilk alio oiSal mato lrdt olrpa at bno ki qrb lmot : oiamr alio ihoSe am la trao atot omoptim la tamino : oiamr alio haiS aSr mebdi hmlk adni rdh na bTrm imot bni : oiamr alio ihoSe lk lk bnk Hi ohaiS hamin ldbr aSr dbr alio ihoSe oilk : oihi brdto oipgeo bo ebdio oibSro ato ki Hi bno : oidrS matm at hSeh aSr bh roH lo oiamro alio tmol bSeh hSbieit ecbto hqdHt : oide abiho ki hith hSeh aSr dbr lo ihoSe bnk Hi oiamn hoa okl bito : ch hoa haot hSni aSr eSh ihoSe bbao mihodh larz hglil :

5

aHr hdbrim halh hih Hg lihodim oiel ihoSe iroSlim : obiroSlim brkh qrobh lSer hzan oSmh blSon ebrit bit Hsda olh HmSh almim : Smh Skbo Holim oeorim opsHim oibSi kH lrb ohmh miHlim ltnoet hmim : ki mlak ird bmoedo al hbrkh oireS at mimih ohih hird raSon al tokh aHri htgeSo hmim hoa nrpa mkl mHlh aSr dbqh bo : oaiS hih Sm aSr Hlh Hlio ch SlSim oSmnh Snh : oira ato ihoSe Skb oide ki arko lo imi Hlio oiamr alio htHpz lhrpa : oien hHolh adni ain aiS ati aSr iSlikni bhreS hmim al hbrkh obTrm aba oird aHr lpni : oiamr alio ihoSe qom Sa at mSkbk ohthlk : okrge Sb haiS laitno oiSa at mSkbo oithlk ohiom hhoa iom Sbt hih : oiamro hihodim al haiS hnrpa Sbt hiom asor lk lSat at mSkbk : oien atm lamr haiS aSr hHlimni hoa amr ali Sa at mSkbk ohthlk : oiSalho mi ch haiS aSr amr lk Sa at mSkbk ohthlk : ohnrpa la ide mi hoa ki sr ihoSe oilk bhiot hmon rb bmqom hhoa : oihi aHri kn oimzaho ihoSe bbit hmqdS oiamr alio hnh nrpa lk al tosip lHTa pn tanh alik reh gdolh mcat : oilk haiS oigd lihodim ki ihoSe hoa aSr rpao : oel kn rdpo hihodim at ihoSe oibqSo hmito el ki eSh kcat bSbt : oien atm ihoSe abi pel ed eth ogm anki pel : ac iosipo hihodim lbqS at npSo ki mlbd aSr Hll at hSbt eod amr ki halhim hoa abio oidmh lalhim : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm amn amn ani amr lkm la iokl hbn leSot dbr mnpSo blti at aSr irah at abio eSh ki at aSr eSh hoa gm hbn ieSh kmho : ki hab ahb at hbn omrah ato kl aSr ieSh oeod meSim gdolim malh iraho lmen ttmho : ki kaSr hab ieir oiHih at hmtim kn gm hbn iHih at aSr iHpz : ki hab la idin aiS ki am kl hmSpT ntn lbn lmen ikbdo klm at hbn kaSr ikbdo at hab : mi aSr la ikbd at hbn gm at hab aSr SlHo ainno mkbd : amn amn ani amr lkm hSme dbri omamin lSlHi iS lo Hii eolmim ola iba bmSpT ki ebr mmot lHiim : amn amn ani amr lkm ki tboa Seh oeth hia aSr iSmeo hmtim at qol bn halhim ohSmeim Hih iHio : ki kaSr lab iS Hiim bezmo kn ntn gm lbn lhiot lo Hiim bezmo : oap SlTn ntn lo leSot mSpT ki bn adm hoa : al ttmho el cat ki hnh Seh bah aSr kl Skni qbr at qolo iSmeon : oizao eSi hTob ltqomt hHiim oeSi hre ltqomt hmSpT : la aokl leSot dbr mnpSi kaSr aSme kn aSpT omSpTi mSpT zdq ki la abqS rzoni ki am rzon hab aSr SlHni : am anki meid eli edoti ainnh namnh : iS aHr hmeid eli oideti ki edoto aSr hoa meid eli namnh hia : atm SlHtm al ioHnn ohoa heid el hamt : oani ainni lqH edot madm ak amrti cat lmen toSeon : hoa hih hnr hdlq ohmair oatm rzitm lSoS kSeh laoro : oani iS li edot gdolh medot ioHnn ki hmeSim aSr ntn li abi lhSlimm hmeSim halh aSr ani eSh meidim eli ki hab SlHni : ohab aSr SlHni hoa meid eli oatm at qolo la Smetm meolm otmonto la raitm : odbro ainno Skn bqrbkm ki ainkm maminim lSloHo : drSo bktobim aSr tHSbo SiS lkm Hii eolmim bhm ohmh hmeidim eli : oatm ainkm abim lboa ali lhiot lkm Hiim : la aqH kbod mbni adm : akn ideti atkm ki ain ahbt alhim bqrbkm : ani hnh bati bSm abi ola qbltm ato oam iba aHr bSm ezmo ato tqblo : aik toklo lhamin atm hlqHim kbod aiS mreho oat hkbod aSr mat halhim hiHid la tbqSo : al tHSbo ki anki aTen elikm lpni abi mSh hoa hTen elikm aSr lo tiHlo : ki lo hamntm lmSh gm li tamino ki hoa ktb eli : oam lktbio ainkm maminim aikh ldbri tamino :

6

oihi aHri kn oiza ihoSe al ebr im hglil aSr lTibrih : oilko aHrio hmon em rb ki rao aottio aSr eSh em hHolim : oiel ihoSe el hhr oiSb Sm hoa otlmidio : oimi hpsH Hg hihodim qrbo lboa : oiSa ihoSe at einio oira em rb ba alio oiamr al pilpos main nqnh lhm lHm lakl : oak lmen nsot ato dbr cat ki hoa ide at aSr ieSh : oien ato pilpos lHm matim dinr la imza lhm lqHt lo aiS aiS meT : oiamr alio aHd mtlmidio andri aHi Smeon pTros : iS ph ner aSr lo HmS kkrot lHm Serim oSni dgim ak alh mh hmh lem rb kch : oiamr ihoSe zoo at hem lSbt arzh oirq dSa lrb hih bmqom hhoa oiSbo larz kHmSt alpi aiS bmspr : oiqH ihoSe at kkrot hlHm oibrk oitn ltlmidio ohtlmidim al hmsbim okkh gm mn hdgim kaot npSm : oihi kaSr Sbeo oiamr al tlmidio aspo at ptoti lHm hnotrim lmen la iabd maomh : oiaspo oimlao Snim eSr slim bptoti HmS kkrot lHm hSerim hnotrim laklihm : oihi kraot hanSim at haot hch aSr eSh ihoSe oiamro hnh ch hoa bamt hnbia hba leolm : oide ihoSe ki ibao oitpSho lhmlik aoto oimlT eod hpem al hhr hoa lbdo : oihi berb oirdo tlmidio al him oibao banih oiebro al ebr him al kpr nHom : oiks atm hHSk oihoSe la ba alihm : oiser him ki roH gdolh noSbt : ohm Htro bmSoTihm kdrk eSrim oHmS ao SlSim ris oirao at ihoSe mthlk el him hlok oqrb al hanih oiirao : oiamr alihm ani hoa al tirao : oioailo lqHt ato al hanih orge hgieh hanih larz aSr hm hlkim Smh : oihi mmHrt oira hmon hem hemd mebr lim ki la hith anih bch blti aHt aSr irdo bh tlmidio oki ihoSe la ba em tlmidio al hanih ak tlmidio lbdm nseo mch : oaniot aHrot bao mTibrim qrob lmqom aSr aklo Sm at hlHm bbrkt hadon : oihi kraot hmon hem ki ihoSe ainno Sm ap la tlmidio oirdo gm hm baniot oibao al kpr nHom lbqS at ihoSe : okaSr mzao ato mebr him oiamro alio rbi mti bat hlm : oien atm ihoSe oiamr amn amn ani amr lkm la el raotkm at hatot tbqSoni ki am el aSr akltm mn hlHm otSbeo : al temlo bmakl aSr iabd ki am bmakl hqim lHii eolmim aSr bn hadm itnno lkm ki bo Htm Hotmo abio halhim : oiamro alio mh neSh lpel pelot alhim : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm cat pelt alhim ki tamino bch aSr hoa SlHo : oiamro alio mh apoa haot aSr teSh lmennrah onamin bk mh tpel : abotino aklo at hmn bmdbr kaSr ktob lHm mn hSmim ntn lmo lakl : oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm la mSh ntn lkm at hlHm mn hSmim ki am abi ntn lkm at hlHm mn hSmim hamti : ki lHm alhim hoa hiord mn hSmim ontn Hiim leolm : oiamro alio adni tnh lno tmid at hlHm hch : oiamr lhm ihoSe anki hoa lHm hHiim kl hba ali la ireb oaSr iamin bi la izma eod : oani hnh amrti lkm ki gm Hcitm ati ola tamino : kl aSr itnno li abi iboa ali ohba ali la ahdpno hHozh : ki irdti mn hSmim la leSot rzoni ki am rzon SlHi : och rzon hab aSr SlHni ki kl aSr ntn li la iabd li ki am aqimno biom haHron : och rzon SlHi aSr kl hrah at hbn omamin bo ihio lo Hii eolmim oani aqimno biom haHron : oilno elio hihodim el amro anki hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim : oiamro hla ch hoa ihoSe bn iosp aSr anHno ideim at abio oat amo oaik iamr mn hSmim bati : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm al tlino aiS al reho : la iokl aiS lboa ali blti am imSkho abi aSr SlHni oani aqimno biom haHron : hla ktob bnbiaim okl bnik lmodi ihoh lkn kl aSr Sme mn hab olmd iba ali : la kalo rah aiS at hab blti hba mat halhim hoa rah at halhim : amn amn ani amr lkm hmamin bi lo Hii eolmim : anki hoa lHm hHiim : abotikm aklo at hmn bmdbr oimto : ch hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim lmen iakl aiS mmno ola imot : anki hlHm hHi hird mn hSmim aiS ki iakl mn hlHm hch iHih leolm ohlHm aSr atnno hoa bSri aSr ani ntn bed Hii heolm : oitokHo hihodim aiS em reho lamr aikh iokl ch ltt lno at bSro lakl : oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm am la taklo at bSr bn hadm oStitm at dmo ain lkm Hiim bqrbkm : hakl at bSri ohSth at dmi iS lo Hii eolmim oani aqimno biom haHron : ki bSri bamt hoa makl odmi bamt hoa mSqh : hakl at bSri oSth at dmi hoa ilin bi oani bo : kaSr SlHni hab hHi oanki Hi bgll abi kn hakl ati gm hoa iHih bglli : ch hoa hlHm hird mn hSmim la kaSr aklo abotikm at hmn oimto hakl at hlHm hch iHih leolm : kcat dbr bbit hknst blmdo bkpr nHom : orbim mtlmidio kSmem amro qSh hdbr hch mi iokl lSme ato : oibn ihoSe blbo ki tlmidio mlinim el cat oiamr alihm hcat lkm lmkSol : mh apoa am trao at bn hadm elh al aSr hih Sm lpnim : hroH hoa hntn Hiim ohbSr ain bo moeil hdbrim aSr ani dbrti alikm roH hmh oHiim hmh : ak iS mkm aSr la iamino ki ihoSe ide mraS mi hm aSr ainm maminim omi hmosr ato : oiamr el kn amrti lkm ki la iokl aiS lboa ali blti am ntn lo mat abi : mn het hcat rbim mtlmidio nsgo aHor ola ispo lhthlk ato : oiamr ihoSe al Snim heSr hiS at npSkm gm atm lsor mmni : oien ato Smeon pTros adni al mi nlk dbri Hii eolmim emk : oanHno hamno onde ki ath hmSiH bn al Hi : oien atm ihoSe hla bHrti ani bkm Snim heSr oaHd mkm STn hoa : cat amr el ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot ki etid hih lmsro ohoa aHd mSnim heSr :

7

aHri hdbrim halh hlk ihoSe barz hglil hlok oebor ki la abh lhthlk bihodh el aSr bqSo hihodim lhrgo : oiqrb Hg hihodim hoa Hg hskot : oiamro alio aHio qom olk mch arzh ihodh lmen irao gm tlmidik at hmeSim aSr ath eSh : ki la ieSh aiS dbr bstr ohoa Hpz lhtprsm lkn am ath eSh kalh hglh al heolm : ki aHio gm hm la hamino bo : oiamr alihm ihoSe eti la bah ed eth oetkm tmid nkonh : la iokl heolm lSnoa atkm oati iSna baSr ani meid elio ki reim mellio : elo atm lHg at hHg ani la aelh al hHg hch ki eti la mlah ed eth : kcat dbr oiSb bglil : oihi kaSr elo aHio lrgl oiel gm hoa la bgloi ki am kmsttr : ohihodim bqSho bHg oiamro aih hoa : othi tlonh rbh el adotio btok hem alh amro Tob hoa oalh amro la ki mteh hoa at hem : ak ain aiS mdbr elio bgloi mpni irat hihodim : oihi bHzi imi hHg elh ihoSe al hmqdS oilmd : oitmho hihodim oiamro aik ide ch spr ohoa la lmd : oien atm ihoSe oiamr lqHi la Sli hoa ki am laSr SlHni : haiS hHpz leSot rzono ide lqHi am mat alhim hoa oam mnpSi adbr : hmdbr mnpSi kbod ezmo ibqS abl hmbqS kbod SlHo namn hoa oain eolth bo : hla mSh ntn lkm at htorh oain aiS mkm eSh htorh mdoe tbqSo lhrgni : oien hem oiamr Sd bqrbk mi mbqS lhrgk : oien ihoSe oiamr lhm pelh aHt pelti oklkm elih ttmho : mSh ntn lkm hmilh ak la mmSh hia ki am mn habot obiom hSbt tmolo kl ckr : oeth am imol ckr bSbt lmen aSr la topr tort mSh mh tqzpo eli ki rpati aiS klo bSbt : al tSpTo lmrah ein ki am mSpT zdq SpTo : oiamro anSim miSbi iroSlim hla ch hoa aSr bqSo lhmito : ohnh hoa dbr bgloi ola igero bo hap amnm ideo raSino ki bamt ch hoa hmSiH : ak at ch ideno main hoa okaSr iboa hmSiH la ide aiS ai mch hoa : ac qra ihoSe bmqdS oilmd lamr hn idetm ati ap idetm main ani omnpSi la bati akn iS amti aSr SlHni oato la idetm : oani idetio ki mato ani ohoa SlHni : oibqSo ltpSo oaiS la SlH bo id ki la ba eto : orbim mn hem hamino bo oiamro am iba hmSiH hgm ieSh atot rbot maSr eSh ch : ohproSim Smeo at hem mtlHSim elio kcat oiSlHo hproSim oraSi hkhnim mSrtim ltpSo : oiamr alihm ihoSe ak lmzer eodni emkm ohlkti al aSr SlHni : tSHrnni ola tmzanni obaSr ani Sm atm la toklo lboa : oiamro hihodim aiS reho anh ilk ch oanHno la nmzaho hki ilk al hnpozim bin hionim oilmd anSi ion : mh ch hdbr aSr amr tSHrnni ola tmzanni obaSr ani Sm atm la toklo lboa : oihi biom hHg haHron hgdol emd ihoSe oiqra lamr aiS ki izma iba na ali oiSth : hmamin bi kdbr hktob mbTno inhro nhri mim Hiim : ocat amr el hroH aSr iqHho hmaminim bo ki la ntn roH hqdS ednh ien aSr ihoSe eod la ntpar : orbim mhmon hem kSmem at hdbr hch amro akn ch hoa hnbia : oiS aSr amro ch hoa hmSiH oaHrim amro hmn hglil iba hmSiH : hla hktob amr ki mcre dod omkpr bit lHm mqom dod iza hmSiH : othi mHlqt btok hem el adotio : omqztm rzo ltpSo oaiS la SlH bo id : oiSobo hmSrtim al hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim ohmh amro alihm mdoe la hbatm ato : oieno hebdim meolm la dbr aiS kaiS hch : oiamro alihm hproSim hki ndhtm gm atm : hgm hamin bo aiS mn hSrim ao mn hproSim : rq hhmon hch aSr ainm ideim at htorh arorim hmh : oiamr alihm nqdimon aSr ba alio blilh ohoa hih aHd mhm : htSpT tortno aiS bTrm tHqrho ldet at aSr eSh : oieno oiamro alio hgm ath mn hglil drS na orah ki la qm nbia mn hglil : oilko aiS aiS lbito :

8

oihoSe hlk al hr hcitim : oihi bbqr oiba eod al hmqdS okl hem bao alio oiSb oilmdm : oibiao hsoprim ohproSim aSh lpnio aSr ntpSh bSToth oiemidoh btok : oiamro alio rbi haSh hcat ntpSh kSnTmat bnaopih : omSh zono btorh lsql nSim kalh oath mh tamr : oak lnsot ato dbro cat lmza elio STnh oikp ihoSe lmTh oito bazbeo el hqrqe : oihi kaSr hosipo lSal ato oiSa at einio oiamr alihm mi bkm ck bli pSe hoa raSonh idh bh abn : oikp Snit lmTh oito el hqrqe : oihi kSmem oik lbm atm oizao aHd aHd hHozh hHl mn hcqnim oed haHronim oiotr ihoSe lbdo ohaSh nzbt btok : oiSa ihoSe at einio oira ki ain aiS blti haSh lbdh oiamr alih aSh aiph STnik hki hrSiek aiS : otamr la adni oiamr lkn gm ani la arSiek lki ldrkk oal tHTai eod : oisp ihoSe oidbr alihm lamr ani aor heolm kl hhlk aHri la ithlk bHSkh ki aor hHiim ihih lo : oiamro hproSim el nSpk meid ath edotk ainnh namnh : oien ihoSe oiamr alihm ap am aeid el npSi edoti namnh ien ki ideti main bati oanh ani hlk oatm la idetm main bati oanh alk : atm lpi hbSr tSpTo oani la aSpT aiS : oam anki aSpT mSpTi amt ki la lbdi hnni ki am ani ohab aSr SlHni : ogm btortkm ktob ki edot Sni anSim namnh hia : ani hoa hmeid eli ogm hab aSr SlHni ieidni : oiamro alio aio abik oien ihoSe gm ati gm at abi la idetm alo ati idetm ki eth gm at abi idetm : kdbrim halh dbr bbit haozr blmdo bmqdS ola tpSo aiS ki la ba eto : oiosp ihoSe oiamr alihm ani hlk mch otbqSoni obHTatkm tmoto al aSr ani hlk Smh atm la toklo lboa : oiamro hihodim hhmt imit at npSo ki amr al aSr ani holk Smh atm la toklo lboa : oiamr alihm atm hnkm mn htHtonim oani mn helionim atm mn heolm hch oani ainni mn heolm hch : lkn amrti alikm ki tmoto bHTaikm ki am la tamino ki ani hoa bHTaikm tmoto : oiamro alio mi ch ath oiamr alihm ihoSe mh Sgm mraS dbrti alikm : rbot emi ldbr olSpT elikm akn SlHi namn hoa oaSr Smeti mmno ato ani mdbr al heolm : ohm la htbonno ki el hab amr alihm : ac amr lhm ihoSe bet tnSao at bn hadm oidetm ki ani hoa oki ainni eSh dbr mnpSi ki am kaSr lmdni abi alh adbr : oaSr SlH ati hoa emdi hab la ecbni lbdd ki at hTob beinio ani eSh tmid : oihi bdbro cat oiamino bo rbim : oiamr ihoSe al hihodim hmaminim bo am temdo bdbri bamt tlmidi atm : oidetm at hamt ohamt tSimkm lbni Horin : oieno ato cre abrhm nHno omeolm la hiino laiS lebdim aikh tamr bni Horin thio : oien atm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm kl eSh HTa ebd hHTa hoa : ohebd la iSkn bbit leolm hbn iSkn leolm : lkn am hbn ieSh atkm bni Horin HpSim bamt thio : ideti ki cre abrhm atm abl atm mbqSim lhmitni ki dbri la ikn btokkm : ani mdbr at aSr raiti azl abi oatm eSim at aSr raitm azl abikm : oieno oiamro alio abino hoa abrhm oiamr alihm ihoSe alo hiitm bni abrhm kmeSi abrhm eSitm : oeth atm mbqSim lhmitni aiS dbr alikm hamt aSr Smeti mem halhim abrhm la eSh kcat : at meSi abikm atm eSim oiamro alio la ildi cnonim anHno iS lno ab aHd hoa halhim : oiamr alihm ihoSe alo alhim hoa abikm ki eth ahbtm ati ki anki izati obati mat halhim hn la mmni bati ak hoa SlHni : mdoe la tbino lSoni ien la toklon lSme at dbri : atm mn abikm hSTn oleSot at taot abikm Hpztm hoa rozH npS hih mraS obamt la emd ki amt ain bo mdi dbri kcb mSlo idbr ki kcb hoa oabi hkcb : oani ien dbri hamt la tamino li : mi bkm el eon iokiHni oam amt dbrti mdoe la tamino li : aSr mat halhim hoa iSme at dbri halhim el kn atm la Smetm ki ainkm mat halhim : ac ieno hihodim oiamro alio hla hTbno aSr dbrno ki Smroni ath oSd bk : oien ihoSe Sd ain bi rq at abi ani mkbd oatm tbconi : akn la abqS at kbodi iS aHd aSr ibqS oiSpT : amn amn ani amr lkm am iSmr aiS at dbri la irah mot lnzH : oiamro alio hihodim eth ideno ki Sd bk hn abrhm ohnbiaim mto oath amrt am iSmr aiS at dbri la iTem mot lnzH : hath gdol mabrhm abino aSr mt gm hnbiaim mto mh teSh at ezmk : oien ihoSe am ani mkbd at npSi kbodi main abi hoa hmkbd ati aSr tamro elio ki hoa alhikm : ola idetm ato oani idetio oam amr la ideti ato ahih kcb kmokm abl idetio oat dbro Smrti : abrhm abikm SS lraot at iomi oira oiSmH : oiamro alio hihodim hnh aink bn HmSim Snh oat abrhm rait : oiamr alihm ihoSe amn amn ani amr lkm bTrm hiot abrhm ani hoa : ac irimo abnim lrgm ato oihoSe htelm oiza mn hmqdS oiebr btokm ebor oHlop :

9

oihi bebro oira aiS ohoa eor miom holdo : oiSalo ato tlmidio lamr rbi mi hoa aSr HTa hch am ildio ki nold eor : oien ihoSe la ch HTa ola ioldio ak lmen iglo bo melli al : eli leSot meSi SlHi beod iom iboa hlilh aSr bo la iokl aiS lpel : bhioti beolm aor heolm ani : oihi kdbro cat oirq el harz oieS TiT mn hroq oimrH at hTiT el eini heor : oiamr alio lk orHz bbrkt hSlH proSo SloH oilk oirHz oiba oeinio raot : oiamro Sknio oaSr rao ato lpnim ki eor hoa hla ch hoa hiSb omSal : alh amro ki hoa ch oalh amro ak domh lo ohoa amr ani hoa : oiamro alio bmh apo npqHo einik : oien oiamr aiS aSr nqra Smo ihoSe eSh TiT oimrH el eini oiamr ali lk orHz bbrkt hSlH oalk oarHz otarnh eini : oiamro alio aio oiamr la ideti : oibiao at haiS aSr hih eor lpnim al hproSim : ohiom aSr eSh bo ihoSe at hTiT oipqH at einio Sbt hih : oiosipo lSal ato gm hproSim aik npqHo einio oiamr alihm TiT Sm el eini oarHz ohnni rah : oiamro mqzt hproSim ch haiS la malhim hoa ki la iSmr at hSbt oaHrim amro aikh iokl aiS HTa leSot atot kalh oihi rib binihm : oiosipo oiamro al heor mh tamr ath elio aSr pqH einik oiamr nbia hoa : ola hamino hihodim elio ki eor hih oaro einio ed aSr qrao al ioldi hnrpa : oiSalo atm lamr hch hoa bnkm aSr amrtm ki nold eor oaikh hoa rah eth : oieno atm ioldio oiamro ideno ki ch hoa bnno oki nold eor : abl aik hoa rah eth ao mi pqH at einio anHno la ideno hla bn det hoa Salo at piho ohoa igid mh hih lo : kcat dbro ioldio miratm at hihodim ki hihodim kbr noezo lndot at kl aSr iodh ki hoa hmSiH : el kn amro ioldio bn det hoa Salo at piho : oiqrao Snit laiS aSr hih eor oiamro alio tn kbod lalhim anHno ideno ki haiS hch HTa hoa : oien oiamr am haiS HTa hoa ainni ide aHt ideti ki eor hiiti oeth hnni rah : oiamro alio eod mh eSh lk aikh pqH einik : oien atm kbr amrti lkm hla Smetm omh lkm lSme Snit htabo gm atm lhiot tlmidio : oiHrpo ato oiamro ath tlmido oanHno tlmidio Sl mSh : anHno iodeim ki al mSh dbr halhim oat ch la ideno main hoa : oien haiS oiamr alihm cat hia hpla opla ki la idetm main hoa ohoa pqH at eini : ohnh ideno ki at hHTaim la iSme al ki am at ira halhim oeSh rzono ato iSme : meolm la nSme ki pqH aiS eini eor mrHm : lola hih ch mat alhim la hih ikl leSot maomh : oieno oiamro alio hn bHTaim noldt klk oath tlmdno oihdpho hHozh : oiSme ihoSe ki hdpho hHozh oipgSho oiamr alio htamin bbn hadm : oien oiamr mi hoa ch adni lmen aamin bo : oiamr alio ihoSe hn rait ato ohmdbr alik hnh ch hoa : oiamr ani mamin adni oiStHo lo : oiamr ihoSe ani ldin bati leolm hch lmen irao heorim ohraim iko beoron : oaSr hio emo mn hproSim Smeo dbrio oiamro alio hgm anHno eorim : oiamr alihm am eorim hiitm la hih bkm HTa oeth ki amrtm pqHim anHno HTatkm temd :

10

amn amn ani amr lkm aiS aSr la iboa drk hSer al mkla hzan ki am ielh bdrk aHr gnb opriz hoa : oaSr iboa drk hSer hoa reh hzan : lo iptH Smr hsp ohzan at qlo tSmenh ohoa lzano bSm iqra oioziam : oaHri hoziao at zano hoa iebr lpnihn ohzan hlkot aHrio ki ideo at qolo : oaHri cr la tlknh ki am inoso mpnio ki at qol hcrim la ideo : hmSl hch dbr ihoSe bacnihm ohmh la ideo mh cat aSr amr alihm : oiosp ihoSe oidbr alihm amn amn ani amr lkm ani hoa dlt hzan : kl aSr bao lpni gnbim hmh oprizim ohzan la Smeo lqolm : anki hdlt aiS ki iboa bi ioSe obzato obboao imza mreh : hgnb la iboa ki am lgnob olhrog olabd oani bati lbebor hbia lhm Hiim omla spqm : anki hoa hreh hTob hreh hTob itn at npSo bed zano : ohSkir aSr la reh hoa ohzan la lo hnh braoto ki ba hcab iecb at hzan ons ohcab iHTp oipiz at hzan : hSkir inos ki Skir hoa ola idag lzan : ani hreh hTob oideti at aSr li onodeti laSr li : kaSr hab ideni oani ideti at hab oat npSi atn bed hzan : ozan aHrot iS li aSr ainn mn hmklh hcat oeli lnhl gm atn otSmenh qoli ohih edr aHd oreh aHd : el kn ahb ati abi ki at npSi atn lmen aSob oaqHh : oaiS la iqHnh mati ki am ani mezmi atnnh iS bidi ltt ath obidi lSob lqHth at hmzoh hcat lqHti mem abi : othi mHlqt gm bpem hcat bin hihodim el hdbrim halh : oiamro rbim mhm Sd bo omSge hoa lmh tSmeo alio : oaHrim amro la kalh idbr aiS aHoc Sd hiokl Sd lpqH eini eorim : oihi Hg Hnkt hbit biroSlim ostio hih : oithlk ihoSe bmqdS baolm Sl Slmh : oisbo ato hihodim oiamro alio ed anh ttlh at npSno at hmSiH ath hgidh lno bror : oien atm ihoSe hn amrti alikm ola hamntm bi hmeSim aSr ani eSh bSm abi hm ieido eli : abl atm la tamino ien la mzani atm kaSr amrti lkm : zani tSmenh at qoli oani idetin oaHri tlknh : oani atn lhn Hii eolmim ola tabdnh lnzH oaiS la iHTp athn midi : hab aSr ntnn li gdol hoa el kl oaiS la iHTp athn mid hab : ani oabi aHd anHno : ac irimo hihodim kpem bpem abnim lsqlo : oien atm ihoSe meSim Tobim rbim hraiti atkm mat abi el ai ch mn hmeSim hhm tsqlni : oieno hihodim ato lamr el meSh Tob la nsql atk ki am el gdpk at alhim oel ki adm ath oteS at ezmk lalhim : oien atm ihoSe hla ktob btortkm ani amrti alhim atm : hn qra Sm alhim lalh aSr hih dbr halhim alihm ohktob la iopr : oaik tamro el aSr qdSo hab oSlHo leolm mgdp ath ien amrti bn alhim ani : am la aeSh at meSi abi al tamino li : oam eSiti ola tamino li hamino na lmeSi lmen tdeo otamino ki bi hab oani bo : ac iSobo oibqSo ltpSo oimlT midm : oilk oiSb al ebr hirdn al hmqom aSr hTbil Sm ioHnn btHlh oiSb Sm : oibao alio rbim oiamro hnh ioHnn la eSh aot abl kl aSr dbr ioHnn el haiS hch amt hih : oiamino bo rbim bmqom hhoa :

11

oihi aiS Holh lecr Smo mbit hini kpr mrim omrta aHoth : hia mrim aSr mSHh at hadon bSmn hmr otngb at rglio bSerotih oeth lecr aHih Hlh : otSlHnh aHiotio alio lamr adni hnh ch aSr ahbt Hlh hoa : oiSme ihoSe oiamr cat hmHlh ainnh lmot ki am lkbod halhim lmen ikbd bh bn halhim : oihoSe ahb at mrta oat aHoth oat lecr : oihi kSmeo ki Hlh oitmhmh oiSb iomim bmqom aSr hoa Sm : maHri kn amr ltlmidio lko onSobh larz ihodh : oiamro alio tlmidio rbi eth ch bqSo hihodim lsqlk oath tSob Smh : oien ihoSe hla Stim eSrh Seot liom aiS ki ilk biom la ikSl ki irah aor heolm hch : abl hhlk blilh ikSl ki haor ain bo : kcat dbr oaHri kn amr alihm lecr ididno iSn hoa oanki hlk lmen aeirno : oiamro tlmidio adni am iSn hoa ioSe : oihoSe dbr el moto ohmh HSbo ki el mnoHt hSnh dbr : ac glh ihoSe at acnm oiamr alihm lecr mt : oSmH ani bgllkm ki la hiiti Sm lmen tamino oeth nseh onlkh alio : oiamr toma hnqra didomos al htlmidim Hbrio nlkh gm anHno lmen nmot emo : oiba ihoSe oimzaho ch arbeh imim Skb bqbr : obit hini hih qrob liroSlim kdrk HmS eSrh ris : orbim mn hihodim bao bit mrta omrim lnHm athn el aHihn : oihi kSme mrta ki ihoSe ba otza lqrto omrim ioSbt bbit : otamr mrta al ihoSe adni alo hiit ph ki ac la mt aHi : ogm eth ideti ki kl aSr tSal mat alhim itn lk alhim : oiamr alih ihoSe qom iqom aHik : otamr alio mrta ideti ki iqom btqomh biom haHron : oiamr alih ihoSe anki htqomh ohHiim hmamin bi iHih gm ki imot : okl hHi aSr iamin bi la imot leolm htamini cat : otamr alio kn adni hamnti ki ath hmSiH bn halhim hba leolm : oihi aHr dbrh cat otlk otqra lmrim aHoth bstr lamr hnh hmorh ph oqra lk : hia Smeh otmhr lqom otba alio : oihoSe Trm iba al hkpr ki eodno emd bmqom aSr pgSto Sm mrta : ohihodim aSr bao al bith lnHmh kraotm at mrim ki qmh ptam otza hlko aHrih bamrm ki hlkh lh al hqbr lbkot Smh : otba mrim al hmqom aSr ihoSe emd Sm otra ato otpl lrglio otamr lo adni alo hiit ph ki ac la mt aHi : oihi kraot ihoSe ath bkih ogm hihodim aSr bao ath bkim otcem roHo oihi mreid : oiamr aiph Smtm ato oiamro alio adni ba orah : oibk ihoSe : oiamro hihodim hnh mh gdlh ahbto ato : omqztm amro hpqH eini heor hla ikl leSot Sgm ch la imot : oiosp eod ihoSe lhcem broHo oiba al hqbr ohoa merh oabn el mboah : oiamr ihoSe Sao at habn melih otamr alio mrta aHot hmt adni hnh kbr baS ki arbeh imim lo : oiamr alih ihoSe hla amrti lk ki am tamini tHci at kbod halhim : oiSao at habn aSr hmt hoSm Sm oihoSe nSa at einio lmrom oiamr aodk abi ki enitni : oani ideti ki bkl et tenni aolm bebor hem hch aSr sbiboti dbrti lmen iamino bi ki ath SlHtni : oihi kkloto ldbr oiqra bqol gdol lecr qom za : oiza hmt oidio orglio krokt btkrikin opio loTim bsodr oiamr alihm ihoSe htiro ato oilk ldrko : orbim mn hihodim aSr bao al mrim braotm at aSr eSh ihoSe hamino bo : omqztm hlko al hproSim oigido lhm at aSr eSh ihoSe : ac iqhilo hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim at hsnhdrin oiamro mh neSh ki haiS hlch eSh atot hrbh : am nniH lo leSot klm iamino bo obao hromiim olqHo gm at admtno ogm at emno : oaHd mhm qipa Smo ohoa khn gdol bSnh hhia amr alihm hn la tdeo maomh : ap la ttbonno ki Tob lno mot aiS aHd bed hgoi mabd hem klo : ocat la dbr mlbo ki am bhioto khn gdol bSnh hhia nba ki ihoSe imot bed hem : ola bed hem lbd ki am lqbz gm at bni alhim hmpcrim ohio laHdim : oioezo iHdo lhmito mhiom hhoa ohlah : el kn la hthlk ihoSe eod btok hihodim bgloi ki am sr mSm larz hqrobh al hmdbr al eir eprim oigr Sm em tlmidio : oiqrbo imi hpsH lihodim oem rb elo mn harz iroSlimh lpni hpsH lmen iThro : oibqSo at ihoSe obemdm bbit hmqdS ndbro lamr mh tHSbo hki la iboa al hHg : ohkhnim hgdolim ohproSim gcro gcrh aSr am ide aiS at mqomo iodieno lmen itpSho :

12

oSSt imim lpni Hg hpsH ba ihoSe lbit hini mqom lecr aSr heir ato mem hmtim : oieSo lo Sm mSth berb omrta mSrtt olecr hih aHd mn hmsbim ato : otqH mrim mrqHt nrd ck oiqr mad lTra aHt mSqlh otmSH bh at rgli ihoSe otngb at rglio bSerotih ohbit imla riH hmrqHt : oiamr aHd mtlmidio hoa ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot hetid lmsro : mdoe la nmkrh hmrqHt bSlS maot dinr ontn leniim : ohoa la dbr at cat mHmlto el heniim ki am gnb hih okis hksp ato oiSa kl aSr iSimo bo : oiamr ihoSe hniHh lh liom qborti zpnh cat : ki heniim tmid hmh emkm oani ainni tmid emkm : oiSmeo em rb bihodh ki Sm hoa oibao la bebor ihoSe lbdo ki am lraot gm at lecr aSr heiro mem hmtim : oraSi hkhnim htiezo lhrg gm at lecr : ki bgllo bao Smh rbim mn hihodim oiamino bihoSe : oihi mmHrt kSmoe hmon rb aSr bao lHg hHg ki iba ihoSe iroSlim : oiqHo bidm kpot tmrim oizao lqrato oirieo lamr hoSe na brok hba bSm ihoh mlk iSral : oimza ihoSe eir aHd oirkb elio kaSr ktob : al tirai bt zion hnh mlkk iboa lk rkb el eir bn atnot : okl cat la hbino tlmidio braSonh ak aHri aSr ntpar ihoSe ckro ki kn ktob elio oki cat eSo lo : oieido hem aSr hio azlo bqrao al lecr lzat mn hqbr oier ato mem hmtim : el cat gm hmon hem iza lqrato el Smem ki eSh haot hch : ohproSim dbro aiS at aHio lamr hraitm ki hoeil la toeilo maomh hnh kl heolm nmSk aHrio : obtok helim lhStHot bHg hio anSim ionim : oiqrbo al pilpos aiS bit zidh aSr barz hglil oiSalo mmno lamr adni lraot at ihoSe Hpzno : oiba pilpos oigd cat al andri oandri opilpos hgido al ihoSe : oien aotm ihoSe oiamr bah hSeh Sipar bn hadm : amn amn ani amr lkm am la ipl grgr hHTa al tok hadmh omt iSar lbdo okaSr mt ieSh pri hrbh : hahb at npSo iabdnh ohSna at npSo beolm hch inzrh lHii nzH : hHpz lSrtni ilk aHri obaSr ahih Sm ihih gm mSrti oaiS aSr iSrtni ato ikbd abi : eth nbhlh npSi omh amr hoSieni abi mn hSeh hcat ak el kn bati al hSeh hcat : abi par at Smk otza bt qol mn hSmim gm parti ogm aosip lpar : ohem hemdim Smh kSmem amro rem nSme oaHrim amro mlak dbr ato : oien ihoSe oiamr la lmeni hih hqol hch ki am lmenkm : eth mSpT ba el heolm hch eth iSlk Sr heolm hch Hozh : oani bhnSai mel harz amSk klm ali : ocat dbr lrmoc ai ch mot hoa etid lmot : oieno ato hem oiamro hnh Smeno btorh ki hmSiH ikon leolm oaik amrt ki bn hadm zrik lhnSa omi bn hadm hlch : oiamr alihm ihoSe ak lmzer ihih haor emkm hthlko beod lkm haor pn iSopkm HSk ohhlk bHSk la ide anh hoa hlk : beod lkm haor hamino baor lmen thio bni haor at hdbrim halh dbr ihoSe oilk lo oistr mpnihm : rbim hatot aSr eSh leinihm obkl cat la hamino bo : lmlat dbr iSeiho hnbia aSr amr ihoh mi hamin lSmetno ocroe ihoh el mi nglth : el kn la iklo lhamin ki eod amr iSeiho : hSe einihm ohSmin lbbm pn irao beinihm olbbm ibin oSbo orpati lhm : kcat dbr iSeiho braoto at tparto oinba elio : aolm rbim ap mn hSrim hamino bo ak bgll hproSim la hodo lmen aSr la indo : ki ahbo kbod anSim iotr mkbod halhim : oiqra ihoSe oiamr hmamin bi la bi hoa mamin ki am bSlH ati : ohrah ati at aSr SlHni hoa rah : ani bati laor al heolm lmen kl aSr iamin bi la iSb bHSk : ohSme at dbri ola iSmrm ani la aSpT ato ki la bati lSpT at heolm ki am lhoSie at heolm : oaiS aSr ibcni ola iqH amri iS aHd aSr idin ato hdbr aSr dbrti hoa idin ato biom haHron : ki ani la mlbi dbrti ki am abi hSlH ati hoa zoni at aSr amr oat aSr adbr : oani ideti ki mzoto Hii eolm lkn kl aSr adbr kaSr amr ali abi kn ani mdbr :

13

olpni Hg hpsH kSide ihoSe ki bah Seto lebr mn heolm hch al abio kaSr ahb at bHirio aSr beolm kn ahbm ed hqz : oihi aHri hHl hseodh ohSTn ntn blb ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot lmsro : oide ihoSe ki ntn abio at hkl bido oki malhim ba oal alhim iSob : oiqm mel hSlHn oipST at bgdio oiqH mTpHt oiHgrh : oaHr izq mim bkior oiHl lrHz at rgli tlmidio olngb bmTpHt aSr hoa Hgor bh : oiqrb al Smeon pTros ohoa amr alio adni hath trHz at rgli : oien ihoSe oiamr alio at aSr ani eSh aink ide ket oaHri kn tde : oiamr alio pTros leolm la trHz at rgli oien ihoSe am la arHz atk ain lk Hlq emi : oiamr alio Smeon pTros adni la lbd at rgli ki am gm at idi oat raSi : oiamr alio ihoSe hmrHz ain lo lrHz eod ki am at hrglim ki klo Thor hoa oatm Thorim ak la klkm : ki ide mi imsrho el kn amr la klkm Thorim : oihi aHri aSr rHz at rglim oilbS at bgdio oiSb lhsb oiamr alihm hidetm mh hdbr aSr eSiti lkm : atm qraim li rb oadon ohiTbtm aSr dbrtm ki ani hoa : lkn am ani hmorh ohadon rHzti at rglikm gm atm Hibim lrHz aiS at rgli aHio : ki mopt ntti lkm lmen teSo gm atm kaSr eSiti lkm : amn amn ani amr lkm ki hebd ainno gdol madnio ohSloH ainno gdol mSlHo : am idetm cat aSrikm am kn teSo : la el klkm dbrti iode ani at aSr bHrti bhm ak lmen imla hktob aokl lHmi hgdil eli eqb : meth ani amr lkm bTrm hioth lmen bboah tamino ki ani hoa : amn amn ani amr lkm ki kl hmqbl at aSr aSlHho ati hoa mqbl ohmqbl ati hoa mqbl at SlHi : oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr hdbrim halh oibhl broHo oied oiamr amn amn ani amr lkm ki aHd mkm imsrni : oitrao tlmidio oitmho aiS al reho ldet el mi dbr : oaHd mtlmidio msb el Hiq ihoSe aSr ihoSe ahbo : oirmc lo Smeon pTros ldrS mi hoa ch aSr dbr elio : oipl el lb ihoSe oiamr alio adni mi hoa : oien ihoSe hnh ch hoa aSr aTbl pti ltto lo oiTbl at pto oitn al ihodh bn Smeon aiS qriot : oaHri bleo ba hSTn al qrbo oiamr alio ihoSe at aSr teSh eSh mhrh : omn hmsbim la ide aiS el mh dbr alio kcat : ki iS aSr HSbo ki amr alio ihoSe qnh lno zrki hHg ao ltt labionim ien aSr kis hksp tHt id ihodh : ohoa bqHto at pt hlHm mhr lzat hHozh oihi lilh : hoa iza oihoSe amr eth ntpar bn hadm ohalhim ntpar bo : am halhim ntpar bo gm halhim hoa iparho bezmo obmhrh iparho : bni eod meT mcer ahih emkm atm tbqSoni okaSr amrti al hihodim ki al aSr ani holk la toklo lboa Smh kn alikm amr ani eth : mzoh HdSh ani ntn lkm ki tahbo aiS at aHio kaSr ahbti atkm kn gm atm aiS at aHio tahbon : bcat ideo klm ki tlmidi atm bhiot ahbh binikm : oiamr alio pTros adni anh tlk oien ato ihoSe al aSr ani holk Smh la tokl eth llkt aHri ak aHri kn tlk aHri : oiamr alio pTros mdoe la aokl eth llkt aHrik hn npSi bed npSk atn : oien ato ihoSe hki ttn npSk bed npSi amn amn ani amr lk bTrm iqra htrngl tkHS bi SlS pemim :

14

al ibhl lbbkm hamino balhim obi hamino : bbit abi meonot rbot oam la kn hoa ki eth hgdti lkm hnni hlk lhkin mqom lkm : ohih ki hlkti ohkinoti lkm mqom Sob aSob olqHti atkm ali lmen baSr ahih Sm thio gm atm : oal aSr ani holk Smh idetm oat hdrk idetm : oiamr alio toma adni la ideno anh ath hlk oaikkh nde at hdrk : oiamr alio ihoSe anki hnni hdrk ohamt ohHiim la iba aiS al hab ki am el idi : lo idetm ati gm at abi idetm ometh idetm ato oraitm ato : oiamr alio pilpos adni hrano na at hab odi lno : oiamr alio ihoSe ch kmh imim anki atkm oath pilpos hTrm tdeni hrah ati rah at hab olmh ch tamr hrano at hab : haink mamin ki anki babi oabi bi hoa hdbrim aSr adbr alikm la mnpSi anki dbr ki abi hSkn bqrbi hoa eSh at hmeSim : hamino li ki anki babi oabi bi hoa oam la ak bgll hmeSim hamino li : amn amn ani amr lkm hmamin bi ieSh gm hoa at hmeSim aSr anki eSh ogdlot malh ieSh ki ani holk al abi : okl aSr tSalo bSmi aeSno lmen ikbd hab bbno : ki tSalo dbr bSmi ani aeSno : am ahbtm ati at mzoti tSmro : oani aSalh mabi ohoa itn lkm prqliT aHr aSr iSkn atkm lnzH : at roH hamt aSr la ikl heolm lhSigo baSr la iraho ola ideho oatm idetm ato ki atkm Skn hoa ap ihih btokkm : la aecbkm itomim aboah alikm : eod meT oheolm la iosip lraot ati oatm traoni ki Hi ani ogm atm Hih tHio : ohih biom hhoa idoe tdeo ki ani babi oatm bi oani bkm : mi aSr mzoti ato oinzrn ch hoa aSr iahbni oahbi ahob hoa labi oani ahbho oalio atode : oiamr alio ihodh la ihodh aiS qriot adni mh hoa ch ki tHpz lhtode alino ola leolm : oien ihoSe oiamr alio aiS ki iahbni iSmr at dbri oabi iahb ato onboah alio onSim azlo meontno : oaSr la iahbni hoa la iSmr at dbri ohdbr aSr Smetm la Sli hoa ki am Sl abi aSr SlHni : at alh dbrti alikm beod hioti emkm : ohprqliT toH hqdS aSr iSlHno abi bSmi hoa ilmdkm at kl oickirkm at kl aSr hgdti lkm : Slom aniH lkm at Slomi atn lkm la kaSr itn heolm anki ntn lkm al ibhl lbbkm oal iHt : hla Smetm ki amrti alikm alk li oaSobh alikm am ahb tahboni ki eth tSmHo bamri lkm ki hlk ani al hab ki abi gdol mmni : oeth hnh hgdti cat lkm bTrm hioth lmen bboah tamino : la arbh eod amrim emkm ki iboa Sr heolm hch obi ain lo maomh : ak lmen ide heolm ki at abi ani ahb okaSr zoni abi kn ani eSh qomo onlkh mch :

15

anki hgpn hamtit oabi hoa hkrm : kl Srig bi aSr ainno eSh pri isirno oaSr ieSh pri iThrno lhrbot at prio : atm ket mThrim bebor dbri aSr dbrti alikm : emdo bi oani bkm kaSr hSrig bl ieSh pri malio am la iemd bgpn kn gm atm am la temdo bi : anki hoa hgpn oatm hSrigim hemd bi oani bo hoa ieSh pri lrb ki bledi la toklon eSot maomh : aiS aSr la iemd bi hSlk kSrig hHozh oiibS oilqTom oiSlikom al tok haS ohih lber : ohih am temdo bi odbri ihio bkm kkl Hpzkm tSalo oieSh lkm : bcat nkbd abi beSotkm pri lrb ohiitm li ltlmidim : kaSr ahbni abi ahbti atkm gm ani oatm emdo bahbti : am tSmro at mzoti temdo bahbti kaSr Smrti gm ani at mzot abi oemdti bahbto : at alh dbrti alikm bebor thih SmHti bkm otmla SmHtkm : hnh cat mzoti ki tahbon aiS at aHio kaSr ahbtikm : ain laiS ahbh itrh mtto at npSo bed ididio : oatm ididi atm am teSo at aSr ani mzoh atkm : la aqra lkm eod ebdim ki hebd ainno ide at aSr ieSh adnio ki am amrti ididi atm ki kl aSr Smeti mat abi hodeti atkm : la atm bHrtm bi ki am anki bHrti bkm ohpqdti atkm llkt oleSot pri oprikm iqom ohih kl aSr tSalo mabi bSmi itn lkm : at alh ani mzoh atkm lmen tahbon aiS at aHio : am heolm Sna atkm deo ki ati Sna raSonh : alo mn heolm hiitm ki ac ahb heolm at aSr lo oien ki ainkm mn heolm ki am bHrti atkm mtok heolm lkn heolm iSna atkm : ckro at dbri aSr dbrti alikm hebd ainno gdol madnio am rdpo ati gm atkm irdpo am Smro at dbri gm at dbrkm iSmro : abl kl cat ieSo lkm bebor Smi ki la ideo at SlHi : lola bati odbrti alihm la hih bhm HTa oeth la ioklon lhtnzl el HTatm : hSna ati iSna gm at abi : lola eSiti btokm at hmeSim aSr aiS colti la eSh la hih bhm HTa oeth rao oiSnao gm ati gm at abi : ak lmlat dbr hktob btortm Snat Hnm Snaoni : obboa hprqliT aSr aSlHno lkm mat abi roH hamt hioza mat abi hoa ieid eli : ogm atm teido ki mraS hiitm emdi :

16

at alh dbrti alikm lmen la tkSlo : hnh indo atkm oap bah hSeh aSr kl hrg atkm idmh lhqrib ebodh lalhim : okcat ieSo lkm ien gm at abi ogm ati la ideo : abl hgdti lkm at alh lmen aSr bba hSeh tckrom ki anki amrti alikm okalh la amrti alikm mraS ki hiiti emkm : oeth hlk anki al SlHi ola iSalni aiS mkm anh tlk : ak el dbri at alh alikm mla lbbkm ezbt : aolm hamt agid lkm ki lkti ak Tob lkm ki am la alk la iba alikm hprqliT oam alk aSlHho alikm : ohih bbao iokiH at heolm el dbr hHTa ohzdq ohmSpT : el hHTa ki la hamino bi : oel hzdq ki alk al abi ola tosipo lraot ati : oel hmSpT ki ndon Sr heolm hch : eod rbot li lhgid lkm ak la toklon Sat eth : oroH hamt bbao hoa idrik atkm al kl hamt ki la idbr mezmo ki am aSr iSme idbr ohatiot igid lkm : hoa iparni ki mSli iqH oigid lkm : kl aSr labi li hoa el kn amrti ki mSli iqH oigid lkm : hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi ki ani hlk al abi : omqzt tlmidio ndbro aiS al aHio lamr mh ch amr alino hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi oamro ani hlk al abi : oiamro mh ch aSr amr meT la ideno mh dbr : oide ihoSe ki em lbbm lSal ato oiamr alihm hel cat atm drSim binikm ki amrti hn meT ola traoni oeod meT otHconi : amn amn ani amr lkm ki atm tbko otililo oheolm iSmH hn atm tezbo akn ezbkm ihpk lSSon : haSh bldth ezb lh ki bah eth oaHri ildh at hild la tckr eod at ezbonh mSmHth ki adm nold leolm : ogm atm ket ttezbo ak aSob arah atkm oSS lbkm oain lqH SmHtkm mkm : obiom hhoa la tSaloni dbr amn amn ani amr lkm ki kl aSr tSalo mat abi bSmi itnno lkm : ed eth la Saltm dbr bSmi Salo otqHo lmen tmla SmHtkm : at alh dbrti alikm bmSlim akn Seh bah ola adbr eod alikm bmSlim ki am bror amll lkm el abi : biom hhoa tSalo bSmi oainni amr lkm ki ani aetir labi bedkm : ki abi gm hoa ahb atkm eqb aSr ahbtoni ohamntm ki mat alhim izati : mat hab izati oaba leolm aSobh aecb at heolm oalk al abi : oiamro alio tlmidio hnh ket bror tmll ola tmSl mSl : eth ideno ki kl idet ola tzTrk ki iSalk aiS bcat namin ki mat alhim izat : oien atm ihoSe eth tamino : hnh Seh bah oeth ch hgieh onpzotm aiS aiS lbito oati tecbo lbdi oainni lbdi ki abi emdi : at alh dbrti alikm lmen bi ihih lkm Slom beolm ihih lkm eni ak iamz lbbkm ani nzHti at heolm :

17

at alh dbr ihoSe oiSa einio hSmimh oiamr abi hnh bah hSeh par at bnk lmen gm bnk ipark : kaSr ntt lo hSlTn el kl bSr lmen itn Hii eolmim lkl aSr ntt lo : oalh hm Hii heolmim ldet atk aSr ath lbdk al amt oat ihoSe hmSiH aSr SlHt : ani partik barz kliti pelk aSr zoitni leSot : oeth parni ath abi emk bkbod aSr hih li emk Trm hiot heolm : at Smk hodeti lbni hadm aSr nttm li mtok heolm lk hio oli ntt atm oat dbrk nzro : oeth ideo ki kl aSr ntt li memk hoa : ki hdbrim aSr ntt li ntti lhm ohm qblom oikiro bamt ki memk izati oiamino ki ath SlHtni : ani bedm aetir lk la bed heolm aetir ki am bed alh aSr ntt li ki lk hmh : okl aSr li lk hoa oSlk Sli ontparti bhm : oani ainni eod beolm ohm beolm hmh oani ba alik abi hqdoS nzr bSmk at aSr nttm li lmen ihio aHd kmno : bhioti emhm beolm ani nzrti atm bSmk at aSr nttm li Smrti ola abd mhm aiS colti bn habdon lmlat dbr hktob : oeth hnni ba alik oalh ani mdbr beolm lmen tmla lhm SmHti bqrbm : ani ntti lhm at dbrk oheolm Sna atm ien ki la mn heolm hmh kaSr gm anki la mn heolm ani : ola aetir lk aSr tqHm mn heolm rq Stzrm mn hre : mn heolm ainmo kaSr gm anki ainni mn heolm : qdS atm bamtk dbrk amt hoa : kaSr ath SlHt ati al heolm kn gm ani SlHti atm al heolm : ohtqdSti bedm lmen ihio gm hm mqdSim bamt : aolm la lbd bed alh anki metir lk ki am gm bed hmaminim bi el pi dbrm : lmen ihio klm aHd kaSr ath abi bi ath oani bk ohio gm hmh bno kaSr lmen iamin heolm ki ath SlHtni : oani ntti lhm at hkbod aSr ntt li lmen ihio aHd kaSr anHno aHd nHno : ani bhm oath bi lmen ihio mSlmim laHd olmen ide heolm ki ath SlHtni oahbt atm kaSr ahbtni : abi Hpzti ki gm hm aSr nttm li ihio emi baSr ahih ani lmen iHco at kbodi aSr ntt li ki ahbtni lpni mosdot eolm : abi hzdiq hn heolm la idek oani idetik oalh hkiro ki ath SlHtni : oani hodetim at Smk oaosip lhodiem lmen thih bm hahbh aSr ahbtni oani ahih bhm :

18

oihi kklot ihoSe ldbr at hdbrim halh oiza hHozh em tlmidio mebr lnHl qdron oSm gn oiba bo hoa otlmidio : ogm ihodh mosro ide at hmqom ki pemim rbot noed Smh ihoSe em tlmidio : oiqH ihodh at hgdod omSrtim mat hkhnim hgdolim ohproSim oiba Smh bnrot oblpidim obkli nSq : oihoSe ide at kl aSr iba elio oiza oiamr alihm at mi tbqSo : oieno oiamro at ihoSe hnzri oiamr alihm ihoSe ani hoa ogm ihodh mosro emd azlm : oihi bdbr ihoSe alihm ani hoa oisgo aHor oiplo arzh : oisp oiSal atm at mi tbqSo oiamro at ihoSe hnzri : oien ihoSe hla amrti lkm ani hoa lkn am ati tbqSo hniHo lalh oilko : lmlat hdbr aSr amr malh aSr ntt li la abd li ap aHd : olSmeon pTros Hrb oiSlph oik at ebd hkhn hgdol oiqzz at acno himnit oSm hebd mlkos : oiamr ihoSe al pTros hSb Hrbk al ndnh hki la aSth at hkos aSr ntn li abi : ac tpSo hgdod oSr halp omSrti hihodim at ihoSe oiasrho : oiolikho braSonh al Hnn ohoa Htn qipa aSr SmS bkhnh gdolh bSnh hhia : hoa qipa aSr iez at hihodim ki Tob aSr aiS aHd iabd bed kl hem : oSmeon pTros otlmid aHr hlko aHri ihoSe ohtlmid hhoa hih node lkhn hgdol oiba em ihoSe lHzr hkhn hgdol : opTros emd mHoz lptH oiza htlmid haHr hmide lkhn hgdol oidbr al hSert oiba at pTros pnimh : otamr hamh hSert al pTros hla gm ath mtlmidi haiS hch oiamr ainni : ohebdim ohmSrtim bero aS gHlim ki et qr hith oiemdo Sm oitHmmo ogm pTros emd emm omtHmm : oiSal hkhn hgdol at ihoSe el tlmidio oel lqHo : oien ato ihoSe anki bgloi dbrti al heolm otmid lmdti bbit hknst obbit hmqdS aSr kl hihodim nqhlim Smh ola dbrti dbr bstr : omh tSal ati Sal na at hSmeim mh Sdbrti alihm hnm iodeim at aSr amrti : oihi kdbro hdbrim halh oik aHd hmSrtim hemd Smh at ihoSe el hlHi oiamr hkcat tenh at hkhn hgdol : oien aoto ihoSe am reh dbrti tnh ed ki reh hia oam Tob mdoe tsTrni : oiSlHho Hnn asor bcqim al qipa hkhn hgdol : oSmeon pTros emd omtHmm oiamro alio hla gm ath mtlmidio oikHS oiamr ainni : oiamr aiS mebdi hkhn hgdol ohoa mode laSr qzz pTros at acno hla raitik emo btok hgn : oisp pTros lkHS optam qra htrngol : oioliko at ihoSe mbit qipa al bit hmSpT oihi bbqr hSkm ohmh la nknso al bit hmSpT lmen aSr la iTmao ki am iaklo at hpsH : oiza pilTos alihm oiamr el mh taSimo at haiS hch : oieno oiamro alio lola hih ch eSh re ki eth la hsgrnho alik : oiamr alihm pilTos qHho atm emkm oeSo mSpTo ktortkm oiamro alio hihodim ain lno rSion lhmit aiS : lmlat dbr ihoSe aSr dbr lrmc ai ch mot etid hoa lmot : oiSb pilTos al bit hmSpT oiqra al ihoSe oiamr alio hath hoa mlk hihodim : oien ato ihoSe hmlbk tdbr cat ao aHrim hgido lk eli : oien pilTos hap anki ihodi hla emk oraSi hkhnim hsgirok ali mh eSit : oien ihoSe mlkoti ainnh mn heolm hch am hith mlkoti mn heolm hch ki ac nlHmo li mSrti lblti hmsr bid hihodim oeth mlkoti ainnh mph : oiamr alio pilTos am kn apoa mlk ath oien ihoSe ath amrt ki mlk anki lch noldti olch bati beolm lheid lamt kl aSr hoa mn hamt iSme bqoli : oiamr alio pilTos mh hia hamt oaHri dbro cat iza Snit al hihodim oiamr alihm ani la mzati bo kl eon : hn mnhg hoa bkm ki aSlH lkm aiS aHd HpSi bpsH hiS at npSkm ki aSlH lkm at mlk hihodim : oiosipo oizeqo lamr la at haiS hch ala at br aba obr aba hih mrzH :

19

ac lqH pilTos at ihoSe oiisrho bSoTim : oiSrgo anSi hzba eTrt qzim oiSimo ato el raSo oieTho lboS argmn : oiamro Slom lk mlk hihodim oikho el hlHi : oiza pilTos eod hHozh oiamr alihm hnni mozia ato alikm lmen tdeo ki la mzati bo kl eon : oihoSe iza hHoz oelio eTrt hqzim olboS hargmn oiamr alihm pilTos hnh hadm : oihi kaSr raho hkhnim hgdolim ohmSrtim oizeqo lamr hzlb hzlb oiamr alihm pilTos qHho atm ohzlibho ki anki la mzati bo aSmh : oieno hihodim torh iS lno oel pi tortno Hib mot hoa ki eSh ezmo lbn alhim : oihi kSme pilTos at hdbr hch oiasp lra eod : oiSb oiba al bit hmSpT oiamr al ihoSe main ath ola hSibo ihoSe dbr : oiamr alio pilTos ali la tdbr hla idet ki iS lal idi lzlbk oiS lal idi lSlHk : oien ihoSe la hith lk rSot eli lola ntn lk mlmelh lkn eon hmsgir ati alik gdol meonk : ac ibqS pilTos lSlHo ohihodim zeqo oiamro am tSlH at ch aink ahb lqisr ki kl hmtnSa lhiot mlk mrd hoa bqisr : oihi kSme pilTos at hdbr hch hozia at ihoSe hHozh oiSb el ksa hmSpT bmqom hnqra bSm rzph oblSonm gbta : oac hith hknt hpsH ohSeh kSeh hSSit oiamr al hihodim hnh mlkkm ohm zeqo Tol Tol zlb ato : oiamr alihm pilTos hzlb azlb at mlkkm oieno raSi hkhnim ain lno mlk ki am hqisr : ac msro alihm lhzlibo oiqHo at ihoSe oiolikho : oiSa at zlbo oiza al hmqom hnqra mqom hglglt oblSonm glglta : oizlbo ato Smh oSni anSim aHrim emo mch aHd omch aHd oihoSe btok : opilTos ktb el loH oiSm el hzlb och mktbo ihoSe hnzri mlk hihodim : oihodim rbim qrao at hmktb hch ki hmqom aSr nzlb Sm ihoSe hih qrob al heir ohmktb hih blSon ebr ion oromi : oiamro raSi khni hihodim al pilTos al na tktb mlk hihodim ki am aSr amr ani mlk hihodim : oien pilTos oiamr at aSr ktbti ktbti : oihi kaSr zlbo anSi hzba at ihoSe oiqHo at bgdio oiHlqom larbeh Hlqim laiS aiS Hlq aHd ogm at ktnto ohktnt la hith tporh ki am meSh
