arg mlmelh oed qzh : oiamro aiS al aHio al na nqreh lqreim ak npil elih gorl lmi thih lmlat dbr hktob iHlqo bgdi lhm oel lboSi ipilo gorl oieSo kn anSi hzba : oel id zlb ihoSe emdo amo oaHot amo mrim aSt qlops omrim hmgdlit : oira ihoSe at amo oat tlmido aSr ahb emdim azlo oiamr al amo aSh hnh ch bnk : oaHr amr al tlmido hnh cat amk omn hSeh hhia asp ath htlmid al bito : oihi maHri kn kaSr ide ihoSe ki eth ch klh hkl lmen imla hktob klo amr zmati : oSm kli mla Hmz oiTblo spog bHmz oiSimho el acob oiqribho al pio : oiqH ihoSe at hHmz oiamr klh oiT at raSo oipqd at roHo : olmen la tSarnh hgoiot el hzlb biom hSbt ki erb Sbt hih ogdol iom hSbt hhoa Salo hihodim mn pilTos lSbr at Soqihm olhorid atm : oibao anSi hzba oiSbro at Soqi hraSon ohSni hnzlbim emo : oibao al ihoSe obratm ki kbr mt la Sbro at Soqio : ak aHd manSi hzba dqr bHnit at zdo okrge iza dm omim : ohrah cat heid oedoto namnh ohoa iode ki hamt igid lmen gm atm tamino : ki kl cat hith lmlat hktob oezm la tSbro bo : oeod ktob aHr amr ohbiT alio at aSr dqro : oihi aHri kn ba iosp hrmti ohoa tlmid ihoSe ak bstr mpni hihodim oiSal mat pilTos aSr itnho lSat at gopt ihoSe oinH lo pilTos oiba oiSa at gopt ihoSe : oiba gm nqdimon aSr ba lpnim blilh al ihoSe oiba erob mr oahlot kmah liTrin : oiqHo at gopt ihoSe oiHtloh btkrikin em hbSmim kaSr nhgim hihodim lqbr at mtihm : obmqom aSr nzlb Sm hih gn obgn qbr HdS aSr la hoSm bo aiS ed eth : Sm Smo at ihoSe ki erb Sbt hih lihodim ohqbr qrob :

20

oihi baHd bSbt lpnot hbqr beod HSk otba mrim hmgdlit al hqbr otra at habn mosrh mel hqbr : otrz otba al Smeon pTros oal htlmid haHr aSr HSq bo ihoSe otamr alihm hnh nSao at hadon mqbro ola ideno aiph hniHho : oiza pTros ohtlmid haHr oilko al hqbr : oirozo Snihm iHdo oimhr htlmid haHr lroz oiebr at pTros oiba raSonh al hqbr : oiSqp al toko oira at htkrikin mnHim ak la ba pnimh : oiba Smeon pTros aHrio ohoa nkns al hqbr oira at htkrikin mnHim : ohsodr aSr hith el raSo ainnh mnHt azl htkrikin ki am mqplt lbdh bmqomh : oiba Smh gm htlmid haHr aSr ba raSonh al hqbr oira oiamn : ki la hbino ed eth at hktob aSr qom iqom mem hmtim : oiSobo htlmidim oilko al bitm : omrim emdh bokih mHoz lqbr oihi bbkoth otSqp al tok hqbr : otra Sni mlakim lboSi lbnim iSbim bmqom aSr Smo Sm at gopt ihoSe aHd mraSotio oaHd mrglotio : oiamro alih aSh lmh tbki otamr alihm ki nSao mch at adni ola ideti aiph hniHho : oihi bdbrh cat otpn aHrih otra at ihoSe emd ola ideh ki hoa ihoSe : oiamr alih ihoSe aSh lmh tbki at mi tbqSi ohia HSbh ki hoa Smr hgn otamr alio adni am ath nSat ato mch hgidh na li aiph hnHto olqHtio mSm : oiamr alih ihoSe mrim otpn otamr alio rboni hoa morh : oiamr alih ihoSe al tgei bi ki eod la eliti al abi ak lki na al aHi oamri alihm ani elh al abi oabikm oal alhi oalhikm : otba mrim hmgdlit otspr al htlmidim ki rath at hadon okcat dbr alih : oihi let erb biom hhoa ohoa aHd bSbt kaSr nsgro dltot hbit aSr nqbzo Sm htlmidim mirat hihodim oiba ihoSe oiemd binihm oiamr alihm Slom lkm : obdbro cat hrah atm at idio oat zdo oiSmHo htlmidim braotm at hadon : oisp ihoSe ldbr alihm Slom lkm kaSr SlH ati hab kn anki SlH atkm : oihi bdbro cat oipH bhm oiamr alihm qHo lkm at roH hqdS : ohih kl aSr tslHo at HTatm onslH lhm oaSr taSimo iaSmo : otoma aHd mSnim heSr hnqra didomos la hih btokm kboa ihoSe : oigido lo htlmidim hnSarim rah raino at hadon oiamr alihm am la arah bidio at rSm hmsmrot oaSim at azbeti bmqom hmsmrot oaSim at idi bzdo la aamin : oihi mqzh Smont imim otlmidio Snit pnimh otoma emhm oiba ihoSe ohdltot msgrot oiemd binihm oiamr Slom lkm : oaHr amr al toma SlH azbek hnh orah at idi oSlH at idk hnh oSim bzdi oal thi Hsr amonh ki am mamin : oien toma oiamr alio adni oalhi : oiamr alio ihoSe ien rait ati hamnt aSri hmaminim oainm raim : ohnh gm atot aHrim rbim eSh ihoSe leini tlmidio aSr la nktbo bspr hch : ak alh nktbo lmen tamino ki ihoSe hoa hmSiH bn alhim olmen ihio lkm hmaminim Hii eolm bSmo :

21

oihi aHri kn oisp ihoSe hglot al tlmidio el im Tibrih okh nglh alihm : Smeon pTros otoma hnqra didomos ontnal mqnh aSr barz hglil obni cbdi oeod Snim aHrim mtlmidio iSbo iHdo : oiamr alihm Smeon pTros hnni hlk ldig oiamro alio gm anHno nlk emk oizao oimhro lrdt al hanih oblilh hhoa la aHco maomh : hbqr aor oihoSe emd el Spt him ola ideo htlmidim ki ihoSe hoa : oiamr alihm ihoSe bni hiS lkm akl maomh oieno ato ain : oiamr lhm hSliko hmkmrt mimin lanih otmzao oiSliko ola iklo eod lmSk ath mrb hdgim : oiamr htlmid hhoa aSr ihoSe ahbo al pTros ch hoa hadon oihi kSme Smeon pTros ki hoa hadon oiHgr at meilo ki eirom hih oitnpl al him : ohtlmidim hnSarim bao bspinh ki la hrHiqo mn hibSh ki am kmatim amh oimSko at hmkmrt em hdgim : oihi kzatm al hibSh oirao Sm gHli aS erokim odgim elihm olHm lakl : oiamr alihm ihoSe hbiao hlm mn hdgim aSr aHctm eth : oiel Smeon pTros oimSk at hmkmrt al hibSh ohia mlah dgim gdolim mah oHmSim oSlSh ola nqreh hmkmrt ap ki rbim hio : oiamr alihm ihoSe bao bro lHm oain gm aHd btlmidim aSr mlao lbo lSal ato mi ath ki ideo aSr hoa hadon : oiba ihoSe oiqH at hlHm oitn lhm ogm at hdgim : ocat hia hpem hSliSit aSr nglh ihoSe al tlmidio aHri qomo mem hmtim : oihi aHri aklm amr ihoSe al Smeon pTros Smeon bn ionh htahb ati iotr malh oiamr alio kn adni ath idet ki ahbtik oiamr alio reh at Tlai : oiamr alio eod hpem Smeon bn ionh htahb ati oiamr alio kn adni ath idet ki ahbtik oiamr alio nhg at zani : oiamr alio pem SliSit Smeon bn ionh htahb ati oitezb pTros el ki amr alio bSliSit htahb ati oiamr alio adni at kl ath iode oidet ki ahbtik oiamr alio ihoSe reh at zani : amn amn ani amr lk bhiotk zeir limim ath Hgrt at ezmk otlk al aSr Hpzt ohih kaSr tcqn oprSt kpik oaHr iHgrk onSak al aSr la tHpz : okl cat dbr lrmc el hmith aSr ikbd bh at halhim oihi kkloto ldbr oiamr alio lk aHri : oipn pTros oira at htlmid aSr ihoSe ahbo hlk aHrihm hoa hnpl el lbo bet hseodh ogm Sal adni mi hoa ch aSr imsrk : oihi braot ato pTros oiamr al ihoSe adni och mh hoa : oiamr alio ihoSe am Hpzi ki iSar ed bai mh lk olcat ath lk aHri : el kn iza hdbr hch bin haHim ki htlmid hhoa la imot oihoSe la amr lo ki la imot ak amr am Hpzi ki iSar ed bai mh ch lk : ch hoa htlmid hmeid el alh oaSr ktb kl cat oideno ki edoto namnh : oiS eod meSim rbim aHrim aSr eSh ihoSe oam iktbo klm laHd aHd aHSbh ki gm heolm klo la ikil at hsprim aSr iktbo amn :

htglot ihoSe

1

Hcon ihoSe hmSiH aSr ntn lo halhim lhraot at ebdio at aSr hih ihih bmhrh ohoa hodie bSlHo bid mlako lebdo ioHnn : aSr heid dbr halhim oedot ihoSe hmSiH oat kl aSr rah : aSri hqora oaSri hSmeim at dbri hnboah oSmrim at aSr ktob bh ki qrobh het : ioHnn al Sbe hqhlot aSr basia Hsd lkm oSlom mat hhoh ohih oiboa omn Sbet hroHot aSr lpni ksao : omat ihoSe hmSiH hed hnamn obkor mn hmtim oelion lmlki arz lo aSr ahb atno obdmo galno mHTatino : oieS atno lmlkim okhnim lalhim abio hkbod ohec leolmi eolmim amn : hnh hoa ba em hennim orath ato kl ein gm alh aSr dqrho ospdo elio kl mSpHot harz kn ihih amn : ani halp oani hto raS osop nam ihoh alhim hhoh ohih oiboa alhi zbaot : ani ioHnn aHikm ogm Hbr lkm blHz obmlkot obsblnot lmen ihoSe hmSiH hiiti bai aSr Smo pTmos bebor dbr halhim obebor edot ihoSe hmSiH : oahi broH biom hadon oaSme aHri qol gdol kqol Sopr : oiamr ani halp oani hto hraSon ohaHron oat aSr ath rah ktb al spr oSlHho al hqhlot aSr basia lapsos olcmirna olprgmos oltiaTira olsrdis olpildpia ollodqia : oapn lraot at hqol hmdbr ali oihi bpnoti oara Sbe mnrot chb : obtok Sbe hmnrot dmot bn adm lboS meil oHgor acor chb el lbo : oraSo oSero lbnim kzmr zHr kSlg oeinio klbt aS : omrgltio kein nHSt qll kzropot bkor oqolo kqol mim rbim : oihi lo bid imino Sbeh kokbim ompio iozat Hrb pipiot Hdh opnio kSmS hmair bgborto : okrati aoto oapl lrglio kmt oiSt eli id imino oiamr al tira ani hraSon ohaHron ohHi : oahi mt ohnni Hi leolmi eolmim amn obidi mptHot Saol omot : oeth ktb at aSr rait oaSr neSh eth oaSr etid lhiot aHri kn : at sod Sbet hkokbim aSr rait bimini oat Sbe mnrot hchb Sbet hkokbim hm mlaki Sbe hqhlot oSbe hmnrot aSr rait Sbe qhlot hnh :

2

al mlak qhl apsos ktb kh amr haHc bimino Sbet hkokbim hmthlk btok Sbe mnrot hchb : ideti at meSik oat emlk oat sblk oki la tokl Sat at hrSeim otnsh at hamrim SliHim anHno oainm otmzam kcbim : oath nSat hrbh oiS lk sblnot olmen Smi la iept : ak iS li elik ki ecbt at ahbtk hraSonh : ckr apoa ai mch nplt oSobh oeSh meSik hraSnim oam la hnni ba elik mhr onsHti mnortk mmqomh am la tSob : abl cat hia lk ki tSna at meSi hniqlsiim aSr Snatim gm ani : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot hmnzH atn lo lakl mez hHiim aSr btok gn edn lalhim : oal mlak qhl cmirna ktb kh amr hraSon ohaHron aSr mt oiHi : ideti at meSik oat zrtk oat riSk oaolm eSir ath oat gdop hamrim ihodim anHno oainm ki am knsit hSTn : al tira at aSr elik lsbl hnh etid hmlSin lhSlik mkm lbit hmSmr lmen tnso ohiitm bzrh eSrt imim hih namn ed mot oatnh lk eTrt hHiim : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot hmnzH la incq bmot hSni : oal mlak qhl prgmos ktb kh amr aSr lo Hrb pipiot hHdh : ideti at meSik oat mqom Sbtk aSr Sm ksa hSTn otdbq bSmi ola Sqrt bamonti gm bimi anTips edi hnamn aSr nhrg azlkm mqom moSb hSTn : ak meT iS li elik ki Sm emk anSim dbqim btort blem aSr horh at blq ltt mkSol lpni bni iSral lakl mcbHi alilim olcnot : kn nmzao gm bk anSim dbqim btort hniqlsiim aSr Snati : Sobh oam la ki eth aboa elik mhrh onlHmti bm bHrb pi : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot hmnzH aakilno mn hmn hgnoc ontti lo abn lbnh oel habn mptH Sm HdS aSr la ideno aiS colti hmqbl : oal mlak qhl tiaTira ktb kh amr bn halhim aSr einio klbt aS omrgltio kein nHSt qll : ideti at meSik oahbtk oamontk oebortk osblk oki meSik haHronim rbim hm mn hraSnim : ak meT iS li elik ki tniH at haSh aicbl hamrt ki hia nbiah llmd olhteot at ebdi lcnot olakl cbHi alilim : oatn lh cmn lSob ohia manh lSob mtcnotih : hnni mpil ath el mTh oat hmnapim ath bzrh gdolh am la iSobo mmeSihm : ohrgti bmot at bnih oideo kl hqhlot ki ani Hqr kliot olb ontti lkm lkl aiS kpri mellio : abl amr ani lkm olSar hnmzaim btiaTira kl aSr ain lhm hlqH hhoa ola ideo at emqot hSTn kaSr hm mthllim la aSim elikm mSa aHr : aps mh SiS lkm hHciqo bo ed ki aboa : ohmnzH oSmr at meSi ed et qz atn lo SlTn el hgoim : orem bSbT brcl kkli iozr inpzo kaSr qblti gm anki mat abi : ontti lo kokb hSHr : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot :

3

oal mlak qhl srdis ktb kh amr aSr lo Sbe roHot halhim oSbet hkokbim ideti at meSik ki lk Sm kalo ath Hi ohnk mt : Sqd oHcq at hSarit hqrobh lmot ki la mzati meSik Slmim lpni halhim : ckor at aSr qblt oSmet oSmrh cat oSobh oam la tSqd hnni ba elik kgnb ola tde bai co Seh aba elik : iS lk gm bsrdis Smot meTim aSr la galo at mlboSihm oithlko ati lbSi lbnim ki raoim hm lcat : hmnzH ilbS bgdim lbnim ola amHh at Smo mspr hHiim oaodh Smo lpni abi olpni mlakio : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot : oal mlak qhl pildlpia ktb kh amr hqdoS hamti aSr bido mptH dod hptH oain sgr ohsgr oain ptH : ideti at meSik hnh ntti lpnik ptH nptH aSr la iokl aiS lsgro ki gbort meT lk otSmr at dbri ola kHSt bSmi : hnni ntn anSim mknsit hSTn hamrim ihodim anHno oainm ki kcbim hmh hnni eSh aSr ibao lhStHot lpni rglik oideo ki ani ahbtik : ien Smrt dbr sblnoti aSmrk gm anki mSet hnsion hetidh lboa el tbl klh lnsot at iSbi harz : hnni ba mhrh hHcq baSr lk lmen la iqH aiS at ncrk : hmnzH atnno lemod bhikl alhi ola iza eod hHozh oktbti elio at Sm alhi oat Sm eir alhi iroSlim hHdSh hirdt mSmim mem alhi oat Smi hHdS : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot : oal mlak qhl lodqia ktb kh amr hamn hed hnamn ohamti raSit briat halhim : ideti at meSik ki la qr ola Hm ath mi itn ohiit qr ao Hm : ki eth poSr ath ola qr ola Hm el kn aqiak mpi : ki amrt ak eSrti mzati aon li ola Hsrti kl ola idet ki amll ath odoi oeni oeor oerm : ani aiezk lpnot mati chb zrop baS lmen teSir obgdim lbnim lmen ttksh bhm ola trah bSt erotot olmSH einik qlorit lmen trah : ani at kl aSr ahb aokiHm oaisrm lkn tSqd otSob, hnni emd lptH odpq ohih ki iSme aiS lqoli optH hptH aboa alio lseod emo ohoa emdi : : hmnzH atnno lSbt ati el ksai kaSr nzHti gm anki oaSb at abi el ksao : mi aSr acn lo iSme at aSr hroH amr lqhlot :

4

oihi aHr hdbrim halh oara ohnh ptH nptH bSmim ohqol hraSon aSr Smetio kqol Sopr mdbr ali amr elh hnh oarak at aSr hih ihih aHri kn : okrge hiiti broH ohnh ksa nrah bSmim oaHd iSb el hksa : ohiSb mraho kmrah abn iSph oadm oqSt sbib lksa omraih kein brqt : osbib lksa arbeh oeSrim ksaot oel hksaot raiti at arbeh oeSrim hcqnim iSbim ohm lbSi bgdim lbnim oeTrot chb braSihm : omn hksa iozaim brqim oremim oqolot oSbeh lpidi aS berim lpni hksa aSr hm Sbeh roHot halhim : olpni hksa im ckokit kein hqrH obin hksa osbib lksa arbe Hiot mlaot einim mlpnihm omaHrihm : odmot hHih hraSonh karih ohHih hSnit kSor opni hHih hSliSit kpni adm odmot hHih hrbieit knSr meopp : olkl aHt marbe hHiot SS knpim msbib olpnimh hnh mlaot einim oain dmi lhn iomm olilh oamrot qdoS qdoS qdoS ihoh alhim zbaot hih ohoh oiboa : omdi tt hHiot kbod ohdr otodh liSb el hksa aSr hoa Hi leolmi eolmim : ac iplo eSrim oarbeh hcqnim el pnihm lpni hiSb el hksa ohStHoo lHi eolmi heolmim oSmo at eTrotihm lpni hksa lamr : lk nah adnino lqHt kbod ohdr oec ki ath brat hkl ohkl brzonk hio onbrao :

5

oara bimin hiSb el hksa spr ktob pnim oaHor oHtom bSbeh Htmot : oara mlak abir qora bqol gdol mi hoa hckh lptH hspr olhtir at Hotmio : ola ikl aiS gm bSmim gm barz gm mtHt larz lptH at hspr ao lhbiT alio : oabk bki gdol el aSr la nmza aiS ckh lptH at hspr olqra bo ao lhbiT alio : oiamr ali aHd mn hcqnim al tbkh hnh nzH harih aSr hoa mSbT ihodh SrS dod lptH at hspr olhtir Sbet Hotmio : oara ohnh bin hksa oarbe hHiot obin hcqnim Sh emd kmo TboH olo Sbe qrnim oSbeh einim aSr hm Sbeh roHot halhim hSloHim al kl harz : oiba oiqH at hspr mimin hiSb el hksa : oihi bqHto at hspr oiplo lpni hSh arbe hHiot oeSrim oarbeh hcqnim oaiS aiS knor bido oqerot chb mlat qTrt aSr hnh tplot hqdoSim : oiSiro Sir HdS lamr lk nah lqHt at hspr olptH at Hotmio ki ath nSHTt obdmk qnitno lalhim mkl mSpHh olSon okl em ogoi : oteS atm mlkim okhnim lalhino oimlko el harz : oara oaSme qol mlakim rbim sbib lksa olHiot olcqnim msprm rbo rbbot oalpi alpim : qraim bqol gdol nah lSh hTboH lqHt ec oeSr oHkmh ogborh ohdr okbod obrkh : okl brih aSr bSmim obarz omtHt larz oaSr el him okl aSr bhm at klm Smeti amrim lamr liSb el hksa olSh hbrkh ohhdr ohkbod ohec leolmi eolmim : otamrnh arbe hHiot amn oeSrim oarbeh hcqnim nplo el pnihm oiStHoo lHi eolmi heolmim :

6

oara kaSr ptH hSh aHd mn Sbeh hHtmot oaSme aHt marbe hHiot mdbrt kqol rem lamr ba orah : oabiT ohnh sos lbn ohrkb elio qSt bido otntn lo eTrh oiza mnzH olmen inzH : okptHo at hHotm hSni oaSme at hHih hSnit amrt ba orah : oiza sos Sni ohoa adm olrkb elio ntn lSat at hSlom mn harz lmen ihrgo aiS at aHio otntn lo Hrb gdolh : okptHo at hHotm hSliSi oaSme at hHih hSliSit amrt ba orah oabiT ohnh sos SHr ohrkb elio macnim bido : oaSme qol mtok arbe hHiot lamr qb HTim bdinr oSlSh qbim Serim bdinr oat hSmn ohiin al tSHt : okptHo at hHotm hrbiei oaSme at hHih hrbieit amrt ba orah : oara ohnh sos irqrq ohrkb elio Smo hmot oSaol iozat lrglio ointn lhm SlTn el rbieit harz lhmit bHrb obreb obdbr obHit harz : okptHo hHotm hHmiSi oara mtHt lmcbH at npSot hTboHim el dbr halhim oel hedot aSr hith lhm : oiceqo bqol gdol oiamro ed mti adni hqdoS ohamti la tSpT ola tqom at dmino miSbi harz : oitn laiS aiS mhm Smlot lbnot oiamr alihm lnoH eod cmn meT ed mlat mspr hebdim Hbrim oaHihm hetidim lhrg kmohm : oara bptHo at hHotm hSSi ohnh reS gdol hih oiqdr hSmS kSq Ser ohirH nhpk ldm : okokbi hSmim nplo arzh kaSr tnoe tanh broH Hcqh ohSlikh pgih : ohSmim mSo kspr ngll okl hr oai hntqo mmqomm : omlki harz ohrcnim oSri halpim oheSirim ohtqipim okl ebd okl bn Hrim htHbao bmerot obslei hhrim : oiamro al hhrim oal hsleim nplo elino oksono mpni hiSb el hksa ompni Hmt hSh : ki ba iom ebrto hgdol omi iokl lhtizb :

7

oaHri kn raiti arbeh mlakim emdim barbe knpot harz oiezro at arbe roHot harz lmen la tSb roH la barz ola bim ola bkl ez : oara mlak aHr elh mmrH SmS obido Htmt alhim Hiim oiqra bqol gdol al arbeh hmlakim aSr ntn lhm lHbl harz ohim lamr : al tHblo at harz oat him oat hez ed am Htmno at ebdi alhino el mzHotm : oaSme mspr hHtomim mah alp oarbeim oarbeh alp ohm Htomim mkl SbTi bni iSral : lSbT ihodh Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT raobn Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT gd Htomim Snim eSr alp : lSbT aSr Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT nptli Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT mnSh Htomim Snim eSr alp : lSbT Smeon Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT loi Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT iSSkr Htomim Snim eSr alp : lSbT cblon Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT iosp Htomim Snim eSr alp lSbT bnimn Htomim Snim eSr alp : aHri kn raiti ohnh hmon rb aSr la ikl aiS lmnoto mkl hgoim ohmSpHot ohemim ohlSnot oiemdo lpni hksa olpni hSh mlbSim Smlot lbnot okpot tmrim bidihm : oiqrao bqol gdol lamr hihoSeh lalhino hiSb el hksa olSh : okl hmlakim emdo sbib lksa osbib lcqnim olarbe hHiot oiplo el pnihm lpni hksa oiStHoo lalhim : oiamro amn hbrkh ohkbod ohHkmh ohtodh ohhdr ohkH ohec lalhino leolmi eolmim amn : oien aHd mn hcqnim oiamr ali alh hmlbSim bgdi lbn mi hmh omain bao : oamr alio adni ath idet oiamr ali alh hm hbaim mn hzrh hgdolh oikbso at Smltm oilbinom bdm hSh : lkn hnm lpni ksa halhim omSrtim aoto bhiklo iomm olilh ohiSb el hksa itn mSkno elihm : la irebo eod ola izmao ola ikm SmS oSrb : ki hSh aSr btok hksa hoa irem oel mboei mim Hiim inhlm omHh alihm kl dmeh meinihm :

8

okptHo hHotm hSbiei othi dmmh bSmim kHzi Seh : oara at Sbet hmlakim aSr emdo lpni halhim ointno lhm Sbeh Soprot : oiba mlak aHr oigS al hmcbH omHtt chb bido otntn lo qTrt hrbh ltth em tplot kl hqdSim el mcbH hchb aSr lpni hksa : oiel eSn hqTrt em tplot hqdSim mid hmlak lpni alhim : oiqH hmlak at hmHth oimlah aS mel hmcbH oiSlk el harz oihi qolot oremim obrqim oreS : oSbeh hmlakim hhm aSr bidm Sbet hSoprot htetdo ltqe : ohmlak hraSon tqe bSopr oihi brd oaS blolim bdm otSlk arzh otSrp SliSit hez okl irq eSb nSrp : ohmlak hSni tqe bSopr ohnh kdmot hr gdol ber baS hSlk al tok him othi SliSit him ldm : otmt SliSit kl npS Hih aSr bim oSliSit haniot nSHth : ohmlak hSliSi tqe bSopr oipl mn hSmim kokb gdol ber klpid oipl el SliSit hnhrot oel meinot hmim : oSm hkokb nqra lenh othi SliSit hmim llenh orbim mbni adm mto mn hmim ki mrim hio : ohmlak hrbiei tqe bSopr otkh SliSit hSmS oSliSit hirH oSliSit hkokbim lmen tHSk SliSitm ohiom la iair SliSito okn gm hlilh : oara oaSme mlak aHd meopp bmrom hrqie hqora bqol gdol aoi aoi aoi liSbi harz mSar qlot Sopr SlSt hmlakim hetidim ltqe :

9

ohmlak hHmiSi tqe bSopr oara kokb npl mn hSmim larz ointn lo mptH bar hthom : oiptH at bar hthom oiel eSn mn hbar keSn kbSn gdol oiHSk hSmS ohrqie mqiTr hbar : omn hqiTr iza arbh el harz ointn lhm SlTn kSlTn eqrbi harz : oiamr alihm aSr la iSHito at eSb harz ola kl irq ola kl ez ki am at bni hadm aSr ain lhm Hotm alhim bmzHotm : ola ntn lhm lhmitm rq lhkaibm HmSh HdSim okabm kkab aiS aSr ikho heqrb : obimim hhm ibqSo bni adm at hmot ola imzaho oiSalo at npSm lmot ohmot ibrH mhm : oihi mrah harbh kdmot sosim eroki mlHmh oel raSihm keTrot kein chb opnihm kpni adm : oSer lhm kSer nSim oSnihm Sni arih : oSrinim lhm kSrini brcl oqol knpihm kqol mrkbot sosim rbim hrzim lmlHmh : ocnbot lhm kcnbot eqrbim oeqzim bcnbotm ohSlTo lenot at bni hadm HmSh HdSim : omlak hthom hoa mlk elihm oSmo abdon bebrit ohoa apolion blSon ion : hzrh haHt Hlph hlkh lh ohnh baot aHrih eod zrot Stim : ohmlak hSSi tqe bSopr oaSme qol aHd marbe qrnot mcbH hchb aSr lpni alhim : oiamr lmlak hSSi aSr hSopr bido htr at arbeh hmlakim hhm hasorim el hnhr hgdol nhr prt : oitro arbeh hmlakim aSr hio nkonim lSeh oliom olHdS olSnh lhmit SliSit bni hadm : oihi mspr zbaot hprSim Sti rboa rbbot oani Smeti msprm : okn raiti bmrah at hsosim orkbihm aSr Srinotihm kein aS otklt ogprit oraSi hsosim kraSi ariot otza mpihm aS oqiTor ogprit : otomt SliSit bni adm bSlS halh baS obqiTor obgprit hizaot mpihm : ki kH hsosim bpihm ki cnbotm domim lnHSim oiS lhm raSim obhm iSHito : oSar bni adm aSr la nhrgo bmgpot halh bkl cat la Sbo mmeSi idihm mhStHot eod lSdim olezbi chb oksp onHSt oabn oez aSr la irao ola iSmeo ola ihlko : ola Sbo mdrkm lrzH olkSp olcnot olgnb :

10

oara mlak aHr abir iord mn hSmim ohoa eTh enn oel raSo kmrah qSt henn opnio kSmS orglio kemodi aS : obido spr qTn ptoH oiSm at rgl imino el him oat Smalo el harz : oiqra bqol gdol kaSr iSag harih obqrao dbro Sbet hremim bqoltihm : okdbr Sbet hremim bqoltihm Hpzti lktb oaSme qol mn hSmim lamr Htom at aSr dbro Sbet hremim oal tktb cat : ohmlak aSr raitio emd el him oel harz hrim ido al hSmim : oiSbe bHi eolmi heolmim aSr bra at hSmim okl aSr bhm oharz okl aSr bh ohim okl aSr bo ki la ihih eod cmn : ak bimi qol hmlak hSbiei bet emdo ltqoe onSlm sod halhim kaSr bSr at ebdio hnbiaim : ohqol aSr Smeti mn hSmim Sb ldbr ali lamr lk oqH at hspr hqTn hptoH aSr bid hmlak hemd el him oel harz : oaba al hmlak oamr lo tnh li at hspr oiamr ali qH oakl ato oimr lbTnk abl bpik ihih mtoq kdbS : oaqH at hspr mid hmlak oaklho oihi bpi kdbS lmtoq oaHri akli ato oimla bTni mrorim : oiamr ali elik lSob lhnba eod el emim ogoim olSnot omlkim rbim :

11

ointn li qnh domh lmTh oiemd hmlak oiamr qom omd at hikl ihoh oat hmcbH oat hmStHoim bo : oat hHzr aSr lpnimh lhikl hSlk Hozh oal tmdnh ki ntnh lgoim ormso at heir hqdSh arbeim oSnim HdSim : oatn lSni edi onbao imim alp omatim oSSim mtksim bSqim : alh hm Sni hcitim oSti hmnrot hemdim lpni alhi harz : oki ibqS aiS lhre lhm tza aS mpihm oaklh at aibihm okn kl hmbqS lhre lhm mot iomt : olhm hSlTn lezr at hSmim ola ihih mTr bimi nboatm oiSlTo el hmim lhpkm ldm oel harz lhkth bkl nge mdi iHpzo : oaHri hSlimm edotm hHih helh mn hthom teSh emhm mlHmh otokl lhm ohrgtm : ohith nbltm brhob heir hgdolh hnqrat kpi hroH bSm sdom omzrim aSr Sm nzlb gm adnino : orbim mn hemim ohmSpHot ohlSnot ohgoim irao at nbltm imim SlSh oHzi ola itno at goitm lSom bqbrim : oiSbi harz iSmHo elihm oielco oiSlHo mnot ch lch ki Sni hnbiaim halh hkaibo at iSbi harz : oihi aHri imim SlSh oHzi otba bhm roH Hiim mat halhim oiemdo el rglihm oaimh gdolh nplh el kl raihm : oiSmeo qol gdol mn hSmim mdbr alihm lamr elo hnh oielo benn hSmimh oSnaihm raim atm : obSeh hhia hih reS gdol otpl eSirit heir oSbet alpim Smot bni adm nhrgo breS ohnSarim redh aHctm oitno kbod lalhi hSmim : hzrh hSnit Hlph hlkh lh ohnh hzrh hSliSit mhrh tboa : ohmlak hSbiei tqe bSopr oihi qlot gdolim bSmim oiamro hnh mmlkt heolm hith ladinio olmSiHo ohoa imlk leolmi eolmim : oeSrim oarbeh hcqnim hiSbim lpni halhim el ksaotm nplo el pnihm oiStHoo lalhim : oiamro modim anHno lk ihoh alhim zbaot hhoh ohih oiboa ki lbSt eck hgdol otmlk : ohgoim qzpo oiba qzpk oet hmtim lhSpT oltt Skr lebdik hnbiaim olqdSim olirai Smk lmqTnm oed gdolm olhSHit at mSHiti harz : oiptH hikl ihoh bSmim oira aron brito bhikl oihi brqim oqlot oremim oreS obrd kbd :

12

oaot gdolh nrath bSmim aSh aSr hSmS lboSh ohirH tHt rglih oel raSh eTrt Snim eSr kokbim : ohia hrh otceq bHblih otqS bldth : otra aot aHrt bSmim ohnh tnin gdol adm kaS olo Sbeh raSim oeSr qrnim oel raSio Sbeh ktrim : ocnbo sHb mn hSmim SliSit hkokbim oiSlikm arzh oitizb htnin lpni haSh hHlh lldt lmen ble at bnh bldth : otld bn ckr hetid lreot kl hgoim bSbT brcl oilqH bnh al halhim oal ksao : ohaSh brHh hmdbrh aSr Sm hokn lh mqom mat alhim lmen iklkloh Sm imim alp omatim oSSim : othi mlHmh bSmim mikal omlakio nlHmim btnin ohtnin nlHm omlakio : ola htHcqo ogm mqomm la nmza eod bSmim : oioTl htnin hgdol hnHS hqdmoni aSr nqra Smo mlSin oSTn hmdiH tbl klh hoa hoTl arzh omlakio emo hoTlo : oaSme qol gdol bSmim oiamr eth bah ihoSet alhino oeco omlkoto ommSlt mSiHo ki hord SoTn aHino hemd lSTnm lpni alhino iomm olilh : ohm nzHho lmen dm hSh olmen dbr edotm ola ahbo at npSm ed lmot : rno el cat Smim oSknihm aoi liSbi arz oim ki ird alikm hmlSin bHmh gdolh mdeto ki qzrh eto : oihi kaSr rah htnin ki hoTl arzh oirdp at haSh aSr ildh at hckr : oitno laSh Sti knpi hnSr hgdol leop hmdbrh al mqomh aSr tklkl Sm moed moedim oHzi mpni hnHS : oiSlH hnHS nhr mim mpio aHri haSh lSTph bnhr : otecr harz at haSh otptH harz at pih otble at hnhr aSr SlH htnin mpiho : oiqzp htnin el haSh oilk leSot mlHmh em itr creh hSmrim pqodi alhim oaSr lhm edot ihoSe :

13

oahi emd el Hol him oara Hih elh mn him olh Sbeh raSim oeSr qrnim oel qrnih eSrh ktrim oel raSih Sm gdopim : ohHih aSr raiti mrah knmr orglih krgli db opih kpi arih oitn lh htnin at kHo oat ksao ommSl rb : oara ohnh aHd mraSih kpzoe ed mot omkt mot aSr lo nrpah otStomm kl harz aHri hHih : oiStHoo ltnin aSr ntn mmSlh lHih oiStHoo lHih oiamro mi idmh lHih omi iokl lhlHm ath : ointn lh ph mmll gdlot onazot oSlTn ntn lh lhlHm arbeim oSnim HdSim : otptH at pih lnazh al halhim otnaz at Smo oat mSkno oat hHnim bSmim : ointn lh leSot mlHmh em hqdSim olnzHm otntn lh mmSlh el kl mSpHh oem olSon ogoi : oiStHoo lh kl iSbi harz aSr la nktbo Smotm bspr hHiim aSr lSh hTboH miom hosd tbl : kl aSr acn lo iSme : kl hmolik lSbi ilk bSbi okl hhrg bHrb hrg ihrg bHrb bch sblnot oamont hqdSim : oara Hih aHrt elh mn hadmh olh qrnim kqrni Sh omdbrt ktnin : ohia eSh kl pqodi hHih hraSonh bpnih ombiah at harz oiSbih lhStHot lHih hraSonh aSr nrpah mkt mot aSr lh : ontnt aotot gdlot ogm aS mn hSmim torid arzh leini bni adm : otteh at iSbi harz el idi haotot aSr ntn lh leSot bpni hHih bamrh al iSbi harz leSot zlm lHih aSr hkth mkt Hrb otHi : ointn lh ltt roH bzlm hHih lmen dbr idbr zlm hHih oeSth ki kl aSr aimn mStHoim lzlm hHih mot iomto : oteS ki klm lmqTn oed gdol am abion oam eSir gm bni hHrim gm hebdim itoo to el di iminm ao el mzHtm : oki la iokl aiS lqnot ao lmkr ki am bhiot elio to hHih ao Smh ao mspr Smh : bch hHkmh mi aSr lo tbonh iHSb mspr hHih ki mspr bn adm hoa omspro SS maot oSSim oSS :

14

oara ohnh Sh emd el hr zion oemo mat alp oarbeim oarbeh alpim hnSaim Sm abio ktob el mzHotm : oaSme qol mn hSmim kqol mim rbim okqol rem gdol oaSme qol tpSi knor hmngnim bknorotihm : oiSiro kSir HdS lpni hksa olpni arbe hHiot olpni hcqnim oain aiS aSr ikl llmd at hSir colti mat halp oarbeim oarbet halpim hhm aSr nqno mn harz : alh hm aSr la ngalo bnSim ki btolot hmh alh hm hhlkim aHri hSh al kl aSr ilk alh nqno mtok bni hadm lraSit bkorim lalhim olSh : otrmit la nmzah bpihm ki tmimim hmh lpni ksa halhim : oara mlak aHr meopp bmrom hrqie aSr hih lo bSort eolm lbSr at iSbi harz oat kl goi onSpHh olSon oem : oiamr bqol gdol irao at halhim ohbo lo kbod ki bah et mSpTo ohStHoo leSh Smim oarz at him omeinot hmim : omlak aHr ba aHrio oiamr nplh nplh bbl heir hgdolh ki hSqth kl hgoim miin Hmt tcnth : omlak SliSi ba aHrihm oiamr bqol gdol kl aSr iStHoh lpni hHih olpni zlmh onSa at toh el mzHo ao el ido : gm hoa Sth iSth miin Hmt alhim iin blti mhol hnmsk bkos cemo oienh baS ogprit lpni hmlakim hqdSim olpni hSh : oeSn enoim ielh leolmi ed ola imzao mnoHh iomm olilh hmStHoim lHih olzlmh oaSr iSa at to Smh : bch sblnot hqdSim bch hSmrim at mzot halhim oat amont ihoSe : oaSme qol mn hSmim mdbr ali ktb aSri hmtim aSr imoto badon meth amnm kn amr hroH lmen inoHo memlm omeSihm hlk ilko aHrihm : oara ohnh enn bhir oel henn iSb kdmot bn adm oel raSo eTrt chb obido mgl mlTS : omlak aHr iza mn hhikl oiceq bqol gdol al hiSb el henn lamr SlH mglk oqzr ki bah het lqzr ki ibS qzir harz : oiSlH hiSb benn at mglo barz oharz nqzrh : omlak aHr iza mn hhikl aSr bSmim ogm lo mgl mlTS bido : oiza mlak aHr mn hmcbH ommSlto el haS oiqra qol gdol al aSr bido hmgl hmlTS lamr SlH mglk hmlTS obzr at gpn harz ki bSlo enbihm : oinp hmlak at mglo el harz oibzr at aSklt gpn harz oiSlikm bgt Hmt alhim hgdolh : otdrk hgt mHoz leir oiza dm mn hgt ed rsni hsosim drk alp oSS maot ris :

15

oara aot aHrt bSmim gdolh onplah Sbeh mlakim hnSaim at Sbe hmkot haHrnot ki bhn klh cem alhim : oara kim ckokit blol baS oat hmtgbrim el hHih oel zlmh oel toh oel mspr Smh emdim el im hckokit oknrot alhim bidihm : oiSiro at Sirt mSh ebd alhim oSirt hSh lamr gdolim meSik onplaim ihoh alhim zbaot zdq oamt drkik mlk hgoim : mi la iirak ihoh ola ikbd at Smk ki qdoS ath lbdk ki kl hgoim ibao oiStHoo lpnik ki nglo mSpTi zdqk : oaHri kn raiti ohnh nptH hikl mSkn hedot bSmim : oizao mn hhikl Sbeh hmlakim hnSaim at Sbe hmkot mlbSim bd Thor ozH oHgorim acori chb el lbbihm : oaHt marbe hHiot ntnh al Sbet hmlakim Sbe qert chb mlaot Hmt halhim hHi leolmi heolmim : oimla hhikl eSn mkbod alhim oeco ola ikl aiS lboa al hhikl ed aSr klo Sbe hmkot aSr bidi Sbeh hmlakim :

16

oaSme qol gdol mn hhikl hamr al Sbet hmlakim lko oSpko at qert Hmt halhim arzh : oilk hraSon oiSpk at qerto el harz oihi Shin re omkaib banSim aSr elihm to hHih obmStHoim lzlmh : oiSpk hSni at qerto el him oihi ldm kdm Hll otmt kl npS Hih aSr bim : oiSpk hSliSi at qerto bnhrot obmeinot hmim oihio ldm : oaSme at mlak hmim amr zdiq ath hhoh ohih ohqdoS ki kn SpTt : ki dm qdSim onbiaim Spko odm hSqitm ki gmol idm hoa : oaSme at hmcbH amr amnm kn ihoh alhim zbaot amt ozdq mSpTik : oiSpk hmlak hrbiei at qerto el hSmS ointn lo lzrb at bni adm baS : oizrbo bni adm bHm gdol oigdpo at Sm alhim aSr lo hmmSlh el hmkot halh ola Sbo ltt lo hkbod : oiSpk hHmiSi at qerto el ksa hHih otHSk mlkoth oinSko mkab lb at lSonm : oigdpo at alhi hSmim mmkabm oSHinm ola Sbo mmeSihm : oiSpk hSSi at qerto el hnhr hgdol nhr prt oiHrbo mimio lmen tiSr mslh lmlkim aSr mmcrH SmS : oara ohnh mpi htnin ompi hHih ompi nbia hSqr izaot SlS roHot Tmaot domt lzprdeim : ki roHot hSdim hnh eSot aotot oizaot al mlki arz otbl klh laspm lmlHmh hiom hhoa hgdol iom alhi hzbaot : hnni ba kgnb aSri hSqd oSmr at bgdio lmen la ilk erm orao at eroto : oiasp atm al hmqom hnqra bebrit hr mgdon : oiSpk hmlak hSbiei at qerto el haor oiza qol gdol mhikl hSmim mn hksa oiamr hih nhith : oihio qlot oremim obrqim oihi reS gdol aSr la hih kmho lmn hiot adm el harz reS kch gdol ed mad : oheir hgdolh nHlqh lSlSh Hlqim otplnh eri hgoim otckr bbl hgdolh lpni alhim ltt lh kos iin Hmt apo : oins kl ai ohhrim la nmzao : obrd kbd kkkr ird mn hSmim el bni hadm oigdpo bni hadm at halhim el adot mkt hbrd ki kbdh mkto mad :

17

oiba aHd mn Sbeh hmlakim hnSaim Sbe hqerot oidbr ali lamr ba oarak at mSpT hconh hgdolh hiSbt el mim rbim : aSr cno ath mlki hadmh oiSkro Skni tbl miin tcnoth : oiolikni broH hmdbrh oara ohnh aSh iSbt el Hih admh ktole mlat Smot gdopim olh Sbeh raSim oeSr qrnim : ohaSh lboSh argmn oSni ohia mkllh bchb oabn iqrh opninim obidh kos chb mlah toebot oTmat tcnoth : oel mzHh ktob Sm sod bbl hgdolh am hcnot otoebot hadmh : oara at haSh Skorh mdm hqdSim omdm edi ihoSe oaStomm el hmrah Smh gdolh : oiamr ali hmlak lmh ch hStommt ani amr lk at sod haSh ohHih hnSat ath belt Sbet hraSim oeSrt hqrnim : hHih aSr raith hith oainnh oetidh lelot mn hthom ollkt labdon oiSbi harz aSr Smm ainno nktb bspr hHiim miom hosd tbl iStommo bratm at hHih aSr hith oainnh otboa : bch lhbin laSr lo Hkmh Sbet hraSim Sbet hrim hmh aSr haSh iSbt elihm : oSbeh mlkim hmh HmSh mhm nplo ohaHd iSno ohaHr eod la ba ohih ki iboa emd iemd let meT : ohHih aSr hith oainnh hoa hSmini ohoa mn hSbeh oilk labdon : oeSr hqrnim aSr rait eSrh mlkim hm aSr la qblo mlkot ed hnh rq lSeh aHt mmSlh kmlkim iqblo em hHih : olalh ezh aHt oat kHm oat mmSltm itno lHih : hmh ilHmo bSh ohSh ikol iokl lhm ki hoa adni hadnim omlk hmlkim oemo hqroaim ohbHirim ohnamnim : oiamr ali hmim hhm aSr rait aSr hconh iSbt elihm emim ohmnim hmh ogoim olSnot : oeSr hqrnim aSr rait ohHih hmh iSnao at hconh oeSoh glmodh oermh oaklo at bSrh oath iSrpo baS : ki halhim ntn blbm leSot at ezto oleSot ezh aHt oltt at mmSltm lHih ed ki iSlmo dbri halhim : ohaSh aSr rait hia heir hgdolh aSr hia nbrt mmlkot harz :

18

aHri kn raiti mlak aHr iord mn hSmim aSr lo SlTn gdol oharz hairh mkbdo : oiqra bqol ec lamr nplh nplh bbl hgdolh othi noh Serim omSmr lkl roH Tma omSmr lkl eop Tma onmas : ki miin Hmt cnoth Sto kl hgoim omlki arz cno emh osHri arz mSpet tengih heSiro : oaSme qol aHr mn hSmim hamr zao mmnh emi pn ttHbro al HTatih opn tqHo mmkotih : ki HTatih hgieo ed lSmim oickr alhim at eonotih : Slmo lh gmolh Sgmlh lkm oeSo lh kplim kpelh bkos aSr mskh msko lh kplim : kaSr htrommh ohtengh kn tno lh Hbl oabl ki amrh htrommh ohtengh kn tno lh Hbl oabl ki amrh blbbh ani iSbti mlkh ola ahih almnh oabl la arah : el kn rge biom aHd tbanh mkotih mot oabl oreb otSrp bmo aS ki Hcq ihoh alhim hSpT ath : oibko oispdo elih mlki arz aSr cno ohtengo emh bratm at eSn Srpth : omrHoq iemdo mpni aimt enoih oamro aoi aoi lk bbl heir hgdolh heir hHcqh ki bSeh aHt ba mSpTk : osHri harz bkim omtablim elih ki eth la iqnh eod aiS at mSa aniotm : at mSa chb oksp oabn iqrh opninim oboz oargmn omSi oSni okl ezi bSm okl kli Snhbim okl kli ez iqr okli nHSt obrcl oSiS : oqnmon oqTrt smim omr olbonh oiin oSmn oslt oHTim omqnh ozan ososim omrkbot ogoiot onpS adm : ohmgdim mHmd npSk aclo mmk okl Smn omzhir abd mmk ola tmzam eod : orklihm aSr heSiro mmnh iemdo mrHoq mpni aimt enoih obko ohtablo : oamro aoi aoi heir hgdolh hmksh bSS oargmn oSni omkllh bchb oabn iqrh opninim ki bSeh aHt hHrb eSr gdol kch : okl Hbl okl bel mebrt ohmlHim okl eSi mlakh bim emdo mrHoq : oizeqo bratm eSn Srpth lamr mi berim keir hgdolh : oicrqo epr el raSihm oizeqo bkh ospod lamr aoi aoi heir hgdolh aSr bh heSiro mhonh kl aSr lhm aniot bim ki bSeh aHt hHrbh : rno elih hSmim ohSliHim hqdSim ohnbiaim ki SpT alhim at mSpTkm mmnh : oiSa mlak nora abn gdolh kplH rkb oiSlikh al tok him lamr kkh tSlk bmerzh bbl heir hgdolh ola tmza eod : oqol hmngnim bknor ohmcmrim omHllim bHlilim omHzrim bHzzrot bl iSme eod btokk okl HrS oHSb bl imza bk eod oqol rHim bl iSme eod bqrbk : oaor nr la iair lk eod oqol Htn oqol klh la iSme bk eod ki knenik hio nkbdi arz obkSpik teo kl hgoim : obh nmza dm hnbiaim ohqdSim okl hrogi arz :

19

aHri kn Smeti qol gdol kqol hmon rb bSmim hamrim hlloih hihoSeh ohkbod ohec lihoh alhino : ki amt oiSr mSpTio ki SpT at hconh hgdolh aSr hSHith at harz btcnth oidrS midh Tat dm ebdio : oiSno oiamro hlloih oeSnh ielh leolmi eolmim : oeSrim oarbeh hcqnim oarbe hHiot nplo el pnihm oiStHoo lalhim hiSb el hksa oiamro amn hlloih : oqol ioza mn hksa oiamr hllo at alhino kl ebdio oiraio hqTnim em hgdolim : oaSme kqol hmon rb okqol mim rbim okqol remim Hcqim oiamro hlloih ki mlk alhino ihoh zbaot : nSmHh ongilh ontnh lo hkbod ki bah Htnt hSh oaSto htqdSh : ointn lh llbS boz Thor ozH ki hboz hoa zdqot hqdSim : oiamr ali ktb aSri hqroaim al mSth Htnt hSh oiamr ali alh hdbrim amt hm dbri alhim : oapl lpni rglio lhStHot lo oiamr ali rah al teSh cat ebd kmok anki oHbr lk olaHik aSr lhm edot ihoSe hStHoh lalhim ki edot ihoSe hia roH hnboah : oara at hSmim nptHim ohnh sos lbn ohrkb elio nqra namn oamti obzdq hoa SpT olHm : oeinio klbt aS oeTrot hrbh el raSo oiS lo Sm ktob aSr la ide aiS ki am hoa lbdo : ohoa lboS blboS madm bdm oSmo nqra dbr halhim : ozbaot hSmim izaim aHrio el sosim lbnim mlbSim bgdi boz lbn oThor : ompio izat Hrb Hdh lhkot bh at hgoim ohoa irem bSbT brcl ohoa drk port iin Hmt ap alhi hzbaot : oel bgdo oel irko ktob Sm mlk hmlkim oadni hadnim : oara mlak aHd emd bSmS oizeq bqol gdol oiamr al zpor kl knp aSr teop bmrom hrqie bao ohaspo el cbH halhim hgdol : oakltm bSr mlkim obSr Sri alpim obSr gborim obSr sosim orkbihm obSr kl bni Horim oebdim hqTnim em hgdolim : oara at hHih omlki harz oagpihm nqhlim leSot mlHmh em hrkb el hsos obzbao : ottpS hHih onbia hSqr ath aSr eSh haotot lpnih aSr hdiH bhn at nSai to hHih ohmStHoim lzlmh oHiim hSlko Snihm bagm haS hber bgprit : ohnSarit nhrgo bHrb hiozat mpi hrkb el hsos okl heop Sbeo mbSrm :

20

oara mlak iord mn hSmim obido mptH hthom okbl gdol : oitpS at htnin at hnHS hqdmoni hoa hmlSin ohoa hSTn oiasrho lalp Snim : oiSlikho bthom oisgr bedo oiHtm elio lmen la idiH eod at hgoim ed klot alp hSnim oaHri kn itr lcmn mzer : oara ksaot oiSbo elihm ohmSpT ntn bidm onpSot hhrogim el edot ihoSe oel dbr halhim oaSr la hStHoo lHih olzlmh ola qblo at toh el mzHotm oel idm oiqomo oiHio oimlko em hmSiH alp Snim : oSar hmtim la qmo lHiim ed klot alp hSnim cat hia htHih hraSonh : aSri haiS oqdoS hoa aSr Hlqo lqom btHih hraSonh balh la iSlT hmot hSni ki am ihio khnim lalhim olmSiHo oimlko ato alp Snim : oaHri klot alp hSnim itr hSTn mbit mSmro : oiza lhdiH at hgoim barbe knpot harz at gog omgog olqbzm lmlHmh aSr msprm kHol him : oielo el mrHbi arz oisbo at mHnh hqdSim oat heir hHbibh otrd aS mat halhim mn hSmim otakl atm : ohSTn aSr hdiHm hSlk bagm aS ogprit aSr Sm gm hHih onbia hSqr oisro iomm olilh leolmi eolmim : oara ksa lbn ogdol oat hiSb elio aSr mpnio nso arz oSmim ola nmza lhm mqom : oara at hmtim hqTnim em hgdlim emdim lpni hksa osprim nptHim oiptH spr aHr aSr hoa spr hHiim oiSpTo hmtim el pi hktob bsprim kmeSihm : oitn him at mtio ohmot ohSaol ntno at mtihm oiSpTo aiS aiS kmeSihm : ohmot ohSaol hSlko bagm haS ohoa hmot hSni : okl aiS aSr la nmza ktob bspr hHiim hSlk bagm haS :

21

oara Smim HdSim oarz HdSh ki hSmim hraSnim oharz hraSonh ebro ohim ainno eod : oara at heir hqdoSh iroSlim hHdSh irdt mat halhim mn hSmim nkonh kklh hmqSTt lbelh : oaSme qol gdol mn hSmim lamr hnh mSkn alhim em bni hadm oSkn btokm ohmh ihio lo lem ohoa halhim ihih atm alhihm : omHh alhim kl dmeh meinihm ohmot la ihih eod ogm abl oceqh okab la ihih eod ki hraSnot ebro : oiamr hiSb el hksa hnni eSh hkl HdS oiamr ali ktb ki hdbrim halh amtim onamnim hm : oiamr ali hih nhith ani halp ohto hraS ohsop ani atn lzma mmein mim Hiim Hnm : hmnzH iirS hkl oani ahih lo lalhim ohoa ihih li lbn : abl rki hlb oaSr ainm maminim ohmgalim ohmrzHim ohcnim ohmkSpim oebdi halilim okl hmkcbim Hlqm ihih bagm hber baS ogprit aSr hoa hmot hSni : oiba ali aHd mSbet hmlakim hnSaim Sbe hqerot hmlaot Sbe hmkot haHrnot oidbr ali lamr ba oarak at hklh aSt hSh : oiolikni broH el hr gdol ogbh oirani heir hgdolh iroSlim hqdoSh irdt mn hSmim mat halhim : oiS lh kbod alhim oaor nghh kabn iqrh mad kabn iSph hmbhqt kein hqrH : oiS lh Homh gdolh ogbhh oSnim eSr Serim lh oel hSerim Snim eSr mlakim oSmot ktobim elihm aSr hm Smot Snim eSr SbTi bni iSral : Serim SlSh mmcrH Serim SlSh mzpon Serim SlSh mngb oSerim SlSh mmerb : olHomt heir Snim eSr mosdot oelihm Snim eSr Smot lSnim eSr SliHi hSh : obid hmdbr ali hih qnh chb lmd bo at heir oat Serih oat Homth : omoSb heir mrbe oarkh krHbh oimd at heir bqnh hmdh Snim eSr alp ris arkh orHbh oqomth Soim hmh : oimd at Homth el mah oarbeim oarbe amot bmdt aiS aSr hia mdt hmlak : obnin Homth abn iSph oheir chb mopc domh lckokit ckh : omosdot Homt heir mrbzot bkl abni Hpz hmosd hraSon iSph hSni spir hSliSi Sbo hrbiei brqt : hHmiSi ihlm hSSi adm hSbiei trSiS hSmini Shm htSiei pTdh heSiri npk aHd heSr lSm Snim heSr aHlmh : oSnim eSr hSerim hm Stim eSrh mrgliot kl Ser oSer mrglit aHt orHob heir chb mopc kckokit bhirh : ohikl la raiti bh ki ihoh alhim zbaot hiklh hoa ohSh : oheir ainnh zrikh laor hSmS olngh hirH ki kbod alhim hair lh onrh hoa hSh : ohgoim ilko laorh omlki arz mbiaim kbodm otpartm alih : oSerih iomm la isgro ki lilh la ihih Sm : ohbiao bh kbod hgoim otpartm : ola iboa bh kl Tma oeSh toebh oSqr ki am hktobim bspr hHiim Sl hSh :

22

oirani nHl Sl mim Hiim ck mbhiq kein hqrH iza mksa halhim ohSh : obtok rHob heir oal Spt hnHl mch omch ez Hiim eSh pri Snim eSr ki mdi HdS bHdSo itn at prio oelh hez ltropt hgoim : okl Hrm la ihih eod oksa halhim ohSh ihih bh oebdio iSrtho : ohmh irao at pnio oSmo el mzHotm : olilh la ihih eod ola izTrko eod laor nr olaor SmS ki ihoh alhim hoa iair lhm oimlko ed eolmi eolmim : oiamr ali hdbrim halh amtim onamnim hm oihoh alhi hnbiaim hqdSim SlH at mlako lhraot at ebdio at aSr hih ihih bmhrh : hnni ba mhr aSri hSmr at dbri nboat hspr hch : oani ioHnn hoa hrah alh oSmem oihi kSmei okraoti oapl lpni rgli hmlak aSr hrani at alh lhStHot lo : oiamr ali rah al teSh cat ki ebd kmok anki oHbr lk olaHik hnbiaim olSmrim at dbri hspr hch lalhim hStHoh : oiamr ali al tHtm at dbri nboat hspr hch ki qrob hmoed : hHoms iosip lHms ohTma iosip lhTma ohzdiq iosip lhzdq ohqdoS iosip lhtqdS : ohnni ba mhr oSkri ati lSlm lkl aiS kmeSho : ani halp ohto hraS ohsop hraSon ohaHron : aSri heSim at mzotio lmen thih mmSltm bez hHiim obao heirh drk hSerim : omHoz lh hklbim ohmkSpim ohcnim ohmrzHim oebdi halilim okl ahb Sqr oeSho : ani ihoSe SlHti at mlaki lheid lkm at alh bpni hqhlot anki SrS dod otoldto kokb ngh hSHr : ohroH ohklh amrim ba ohSme iamr ba ohzma iboa ohHpz iqH mim Hiim Hnm : meid ani bkl hSme dbri nboat hspr hch am iosip aiS elihm iosip elio halhim at hmkot hktobot bspr hch : oam igre aiS mdbri spr hnboah hcat igre halhim at lHqo mez hHiim omeir hqdS hktobim bspr hch : hmeid at alh amr amnm kn ani ba mhr amn bah na hadon ihoSe : Hsd adnino ihoSe hmSiH em klkm kl hqdoSim amn :
